Ruhango: Umuryango w'abantu 6 baherutse kwica w@@ ashyinguwe mu cyubahiro Umuryango w'abantu 6 wishwe tariki ya 31@@ /07/201@@ 4 bik@@ amenyekana nyuma y'iminsi ibiri, kuri icyi cyumweru tariki 03@@ /08/201@@ 4, nibwo wah@@ erekejwe mu cy@@ um@@ ahiro mu murenge wa Byimana akarere ka Ruhango. Ku isaha ya saa cyenda z'amany@@ wa, nibwo abantu 6 bo mu muryango umwe bari batangiye kur@@ ur@@ utswa mu mv@@ a, abavandimwe b'uyu muryango bari baje ari benshi, ndetse harimo na Ng@@ ay@@ ab@@ erura Silv@@ estre ny@@ '@@ iri uyu muryango, wari wambaye imyenda iranga inf@@ ungwa kuko amaze imyaka 4 afunze. Umwe mu bavandimwe b'uyu muryango Niy@@ ir@@ era Oliv@@ e, avuga ko abana bishwe bari babyara be, kuko mama we ava inda imwe na se w'@@ abana, Ng@@ ay@@ ab@@ erura Sil@@ vest@@ re. Yagize ati "@@ ubusanzwe njye mba i Tam@@ bwe, nab@@ yumvise kuri radiyo sin@@ abyem@@ era, nab@@ yemeye mp@@ ageze batangiye gutunganya amas@@ anduku yo ku@@ bashying@@ uramo. Rwose icyam@@ babaje cyane ni ukuntu bab@@ ishe babat@@ em@@ ag@@ uye@@ ". Umuryango w'abantu 6 wiciwe rimwe mu karere ka Ruhango. Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Ruhango, Mbabazi Francois Xav@@ ier, yasabye abaturage gufatanya n'izindi nzego gutahura aba bagizi ba nabi, abizeza ko niba@@ fat@@ wa baz@@ erekanwa ku mugaragaro. Kugeza ubu abantu batanu nibo bamaze gutabwa muri yombi mu rwego rw'@@ iperereza, nk'uko byatangajwe na Chief Sup@@ ert Hubert Gash@@ agaza umuvugizi w'@@ igipolisi cy'u Rwanda mu ntara y'Amajyepfo. Umwana w'umuhungu warokotse uru urupfu, wari warag@@ iye gushaka akazi i Kigali mbere y'umunsi umwe ubwo uyu muryango wic@@ waga, ntiy@@ abonetse mu muhango wo gushyingura abavandimwe be, abantu bakaba bakomeje kumw@@ ibazaho byinshi niba we akiriho. Uyu muryango w@@ ashyinguwe ahantu hamwe. Amakuru y'urupfu ry'uyu muryango yamenyekanye mu gitondo cyo ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 02@@ /08/201@@ 4, ubwo umwana w'umuhungu yahag@@ eraga agasanga ihene zabo zimaze iminsi hanze ziz@@ iritse ndetse n'@@ inka zirimo kw@@ abira kubera inzara. Ab@@ ishwe ni abana 5 bari hagati y'imyaka 4 na 17 ndetse na mama wabo. Uyu mwana w'umuhungu wab@@ ob@@ onye bwa mbere ngo yari aragiye ingurube hafi yaho abona ihene zimaze iminsi ziz@@ iritse hanze, abona ku rugi h@@ egets@@ eho arah@@ amagara ar@@ ababaza ati "@@ ese amar@@ wa y'@@ ejo aracy@@ abar@@ im@@ o? Y@@ umva ntaw@@ ukom@@ ye, arar@@ ung@@ uruka abona abantu bishwe bater@@ amag@@ uwe ibyuma ahita at@@ abaz@@ a. Uyu muryango wah@@ erekejwe n'abantu benshi. Uru rupfu kugeza ubu r@@ aracy@@ ateje amayobera menshi, gusa umuyobozi w'akarere ka Ruhango, Mbabazi Francois Xav@@ ier, avuga ko hak@@ ekwa amakimbirane ashingiye ku butaka. Kuko ngo uyu muryango wari ufite isambu wat@@ ijwe n'@@ umuntu, ariko iyi sambu uway@@ ibat@@ ije nawe yari yar@@ ayit@@ ijwe n'@@ undi. Eric Muvara
Abas@@ obanura filime bahinduye umuv@@ uno wo kuzig@@ eza ku baz@@ ikunda mu ngo mu kwirinda Coronavirus Abak@@ unda filime zis@@ obanuye bashyizwe ig@@ orora kuko batangiye kuzig@@ em@@ urirwa mu ngo muri gahunda yo kwirinda ikwirakwizwa ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyane ko Abanyarwanda basabwe kuguma mu ngo zabo. Mu ngamba z@@ atangajwe ku mugoroba wo ku wa Gatandatu, Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Edouard Ngir@@ ent@@ e, yavuze ko hashingiwe ku ntera Coronavirus imaze gufata n’uburyo ibindi bihugu bih@@ angana nayo, abantu badafite ibikorwa byihutirwa bagomba kuguma mu ngo. Mu Rwanda hamaze kugaragara abantu 19 banduye Coronavirus, ndetse bakaba barah@@ uye n’abandi bantu basaga 68@@ 0. Bitewe n’ubw@@ iyongere bw’@@ abanduye hahise hafatwa imyanzuro irimo ko ’@@ gusohoka mu rugo nta mpamvu zih@@ utirwa birab@@ ujij@@ we, keretse abajya gutanga no gushaka serivisi z’ingenzi harimo kwivuza, guh@@ aha, seriv@@ izi za banki n’iz@@ ind@@ i.’ Mu gufasha Abanyarwanda bari mu ngo kut@@ icwa n’ir@@ ungu, Roc@@ ky Kir@@ abir@@ anya na Bugingo Bon@@ ny uzwi nka Junior bazwi cyane mu gusobanura filime bashyizeho gahunda yo kugeza filime ku baz@@ ishaka nk’uburyo bwo kub@@ egereza icyo bahug@@ iraho no kubahiriza amabwiriza ya leta abasaba kut@@ ava mu rugo. Junior G@@ iti yagize ati ”@@ Kurwanya Coronavirus ngo id@@ akwirakw@@ ira hose birasaba ko buri wese aguma mu rugo ntagire aho ajy@@ a. Ubu biroroshye filime zir@@ abageraho ku buryo bworoshye zir@@ ag@@ usanga w@@ ibereye mu nzu aho uri. Mukomeze mwirinde mugire ubuzima buzira umuz@@ e, kandi iyi ndwara twese tuy@@ iv@@ iriyeho inda imwe yac@@ ika burund@@ u.” Abajijwe umubare wa filime umukiliya ah@@ abwa, Roc@@ ky yagize ati “Turi muri gahunda yo gufasha Leta ko abantu baguma mu ngo zabo, turashaka kubaha ibyo bahug@@ iraho rero tubaha izo twizeye neza ko ziz@@ amara igihe gih@@ agij@@ e.” Umuntu ushaka filime zis@@ obanurwa n’aba basore bimusaba guhamagara 078@@ 56@@ 48@@ 3@@ 31 na 078@@ 9@@ 06@@ 00@@ 86 ubundi bakaz@@ im@@ ushyira ku biciro bumvikanye cyane ko bishyura bitewe n’ubw@@ umvikane hagati y’impande zombi. Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo kugira umuriro, ibicurane, umunaniro n’@@ inkorora ijyana no kubabara mu mih@@ ogo, guhumeka nabi bishobora no kugera aho itera umus@@ onga no kubuza impyiko gukora bishobora gutera urupfu. Iyi ndwara ishobora kwandura binyuze mu gukora ku muntu uyir@@ waye, cyane cyane mu kur@@ amuk@@ anya abantu bahana ibig@@ anza. Abaturarwanda basabwe gukomeza kwitwar@@ arika, bakurikiza amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima hibandwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki, kwirinda kujya ahantu hateraniye abantu benshi n’ingendo zitari ngombwa. U Rwanda rwafashe ingamba zirimo gufunga amashuri, insengero n’ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi ndetse abakozi bash@@ ishikarizwa gukorera mu mu ngo aho bishoboka no kugabanya ingendo mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus. Minisante itanga inama ko ug@@ aragaweho ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus yakw@@ ihutira guhamagara umurongo ut@@ ishyurwa wa 114 cyangwa ak@@ itabaza umujyanama w’ubuzima umw@@ egereye. Abashaka kubona filime boroh@@ erejwe uburyo bwo kuzig@@ ezwaho mu ngo zabo
Inkomoko y’@@ ins@@ ig@@ amig@@ ani “Y@@ aje nk’ iya Gat@@ era” Uyu mugani baw@@ uca iyo hagize ig@@ ikorera umuntu amarorerwa kim@@ uguye git@@ umo, ni bwo bagira ngo ‘@@ C@@ yaje nk’iya Gat@@ er@@ a!@@ ’ W@@ akomotse kuri Gatera w i T@@ anda na Rusizi mu Bug@@ anza, bivuye ku muk@@ azana w’ikir@@ ongore na nyirabukwe bakorewe amarorerwa na Gat@@ era. Gatera k’@@ i T@@ anda yari atuye mu Bug@@ anza bwa ruguru ya Muh@@ azi, agakunda abagore byam@@ ush@@ aj@@ ije. Umugore we bwite yari uw’@@ i Bumbogo bwa N@@ kuz@@ uzu mu Bw@@ an@@ acy@@ am@@ bwe. Bukeye sebukwe wa Gatera arar@@ wara arar@@ emba, bamut@@ umaho n’umugore we bab@@ ibam@@ enyesh@@ a. Gatera ahaguruka iwe ajya kureba seb@@ uk@@ we, yamb@@ uka Muh@@ azi, akomeza urugendo. Ageze i Gic@@ aca ashaka kunywa agat@@ ab@@ i. Ar@@ eba ahantu hari agac@@ ucu arah@@ icara atuma umuhungu bari kumwe ngo ajye kumut@@ ek@@ erera. Uwo muhungu ajya gut@@ ekera itabi mu rugo rwari hafi y’aho bari bag@@ eze. Urwo rugo rw@@ arimo umugeni umaze gutinyuka abantu ba hafi. Yari amaze kujya yirirwa mu nzu yar@@ ongor@@ ew@@ emo, at@@ akirirwa kwa nyirabukwe na seb@@ uk@@ we. Iyo nzu yarimo umuriro kuko bay@@ ic@@ anag@@ amo kugira ngo umus@@ wa utaz@@ ayir@@ ya. Uwo muhungu abonye ak@@ otsi k@@ ava muri ya nz@@ u; agenda ariho ag@@ ana. Inzu yari y@@ ase ink@@ ike ya ruguru, ifite n’@@ igik@@ ari cyayo. Ageze mu muryango, abona umukobwa w’@@ inkumi wicaye mu mf@@ uruka ab@@ oh@@ a. Uwo mug@@ eni yumvise umuntu winj@@ iye, abanza kugira ngo ni mu bo bas@@ angany@@ we. Umuhungu amuh@@ ereza int@@ oke bar@@ aramuk@@ anya. Umug@@ enzi amusaba igish@@ ir@@ ira, undi aramubwira ati "T@@ ambuka ng@@ uwo umuriro ku rub@@ umbir@@ o." Ar@@ at@@ amb@@ uka, at@@ ekera itabi, ar@@ ahaguruka amus@@ ezeraho arag@@ enda. Amaze kugenda nyirabukwe w’@@ umugeni amuk@@ urikiza amaso agira ngo am@@ umenye ariko ntiy@@ am@@ umeny@@ a. As@@ igara yibaza ati “Ur@@ iya muntu umv@@ iriye mu nzu y’umwana ni uwah@@ e?” Uwo muhungu ageze aho Gatera ari amuha itabi, amushimira n’uwo mukobwa ati" Muri ruriya rugo hari umukobwa mwiza cyane kandi ni umugeni kuko nabonye yit@@ wikiriye mu mas@@ o." Gatera ati “@@ Ari mu nzu wenyine sh@@ a?” Uwo muhungu ati “@@ Ari mu nzu iri mu nk@@ ike ya ruguru y@@ ase urugo, arab@@ ohera mu mf@@ uruk@@ a.” Gatera ati " M@@ fasha iri t@@ ab@@ i@@ !" Ar@@ ahaguruka na we ajya mu rugo, abon@@ eza uko wa muhungu yam@@ ubwiye. Nyir@@ abukwe w’@@ umugeni arar@@ eba, abona Gatera yinjira mu nzu. Umukobwa abonye ko ari umugabo ufite icyubahiro ar@@ ahaguruka yigira mu kir@@ ambi. Gatera amusanga mu kir@@ ambi vuba. Umukobwa agira ubwoba amuh@@ ungira ku buriri. Gatera akubita iny@@ eg@@ amo amus@@ ang@@ ayo. Wa mukecuru agira amak@@ eng@@ a; arib@@ wira ati " Uriya muntu watumye umwana, aho nt@@ afitanye amasezerano n’umuk@@ azana wanjye@@ ? H@@ enga njye kur@@ eba@@ ." Ubwo rero Gatera amaze kugera ku buriri afata wa mug@@ eni barag@@ und@@ agur@@ ana, Gatera amurusha amaboko aramus@@ amb@@ anya. Igihe batar@@ arang@@ iza, wa mukecuru aba ageze mu muryango arab@@ umva. Ntibyat@@ inda, Gatera arangije amanuka ku buriri n’igih@@ unga cy@@ inshi. A@@ pf@@ a kwihangana amuh@@ ereza ukuboko bar@@ aramuk@@ anya, Gatera ariy@@ and@@ uruk@@ ira. Uwo mukecuru at@@ ambuka agana mu kir@@ ambi, ahura n’umuk@@ azana ava ku buriri afite ipfunwe ry@@ inshi, aramuk@@ oba, aram@@ ukw@@ en@@ ura, ati "@@ Yewe ga ny@@ abu, yewe bak@@ osha badah@@ annye we! Yewe w@@ ok@@ any@@ agwa we, kugaragaza ingeso zawe utar@@ anak@@ izwa amas@@ unz@@ u@@ !" Umukobwa ati "@@ Muk@@ ecuru ur@@ and@@ eng@@ any@@ a! Uriya muntu sim@@ uzi, aje atyo nk’uko umub@@ on@@ ye@@ !" Umukecuru ati "@@ Ur@@ amb@@ eshy@@ a! Yoh@@ ereje umwana aza yit@@ ek@@ eza itabi mur@@ avug@@ ana, asubirayo ajya kuvuga ubutumwa, amaze kub@@ umubwira undi araza mujya ku bur@@ ir@@ i; ntiyag@@ ufatiye mu muryango, ntiyag@@ ufatiye mu mf@@ uruka, ntiyag@@ ufatiye mu kir@@ ambi, ahubwo wam@@ unsh@@ yir@@ iye ku buriri bw’umw@@ an@@ a!" Umukecuru arash@@ ega ati "H@@ enga inka zik@@ uke mb@@ ivuge us@@ end@@ we izo wak@@ owe zim@@ ene ikib@@ anga zik@@ ob@@ we und@@ i@@ !" Ubwo rero Gatera yageze aho wa mwana bari kumwe ari, asanga igish@@ irira cyaz@@ im@@ ye. Arongera atuma uwo mwana ngo ajye kum@@ ushyir@@ iraho ikindi. Umwana ageze inyuma y’umuryango yumva uwo mukecuru akw@@ ena umuk@@ azana we. Ar@@ ahagarara akomeza kumva uko amuk@@ oba, yumva n’uko umuk@@ azana amw@@ ih@@ oh@@ oraho amusaba imbabazi. Undi aho kuz@@ imuha akamut@@ uka. Byose amaze kuby@@ umva, ati "N@@ im@@ uny@@ ongere igish@@ irira ikindi cyaz@@ im@@ ye." Uwo mukecuru ati "@@ Uwo ut@@ ek@@ erera itabi ni nd@@ e?" Undi ati "Ni Gatera wo hakurya ya Muhazi i T@@ anda rya Ruz@@ izi na Gih@@ et@@ a." Umukecuru ati “Mur@@ ajya h@@ e?" Undi ati "Tur@@ ajya i Bumbogo bwa N@@ kuz@@ uz@@ u.” B@@ amuha igish@@ irira ashyira ku nk@@ ono ashyira Gat@@ era. Am@@ ut@@ ekerereza ibyo yumvise umuk@@ azana akorerwa na nyir@@ abuk@@ we. Ati « W@@ agize nabi cyane! Uriya mwana agiye gus@@ endwa kubera wowe, kandi bam@@ bajije izina ryawe n’aho utuye byose ndab@@ iba@@ bwir@@ a! None rero uriya mukobwa nabwira bene wabo ko ibyo wam@@ ukoreye ari byo bim@@ us@@ end@@ esheje baz@@ akw@@ itura ibih@@ wanye n’ibyo wakoreye umwana wabo, kandi nibura nt@@ umuj@@ yanye ngo akub@@ ere umugore cyangwa se ngo umuhe umwana wawe akub@@ ere umuk@@ az@@ ana.” Gatera amaze kuby@@ umva, ati “M@@ fasha iyi nk@@ on@@ o!” Umwana aram@@ ufasha. Gatera asubir@@ ayo. Ageze ku muryango yumva umukecuru aracy@@ iy@@ asira, yumva umuk@@ azana arira. Y@@ injira mu nzu vuba, babona ageze mu kir@@ ambi. Af@@ ata wa mukecuru , aramut@@ erura amuc@@ ana ( am@@ uny@@ uran@@ a) mu ny@@ eg@@ amo am@@ uta ku buriri. Bag@@ igiraho gato, Gatera amurusha amaboko, nawe aramus@@ amb@@ anya. Umukecuru akag@@ umya kumut@@ uka, ati “@@ Wa gis@@ azi we nd@@ ekura n@@ ireng@@ anyir@@ izaga umwana wo gat@@ s@@ indwa we@@ !” Biba iby’@@ ubusa, Gatera aram@@ wih@@ orera, arit@@ onda birat@@ inda. Umuk@@ azana aho yibereye mu kir@@ ambi agas@@ ekera mu b@@ ipfun@@ si. Amaherezo Gatera ar@@ arang@@ iza, amanuka ku buriri, asezera ku wa mbere (@@ umuk@@ azan@@ a). Undi ati “Ur@@ abeho kandi urakoze kuko un@@ kuye mu cyaha wari unsh@@ yiz@@ em@@ o.” Gatera ar@@ igend@@ era, umukecuru amanuka ku buriri n’ik@@ imwaro kir@@ engeje icyo umuk@@ azana yari afite mu kanya. Nuko umuk@@ azana abaza nyirabukwe amw@@ ish@@ ong@@ oraho, ati “@@ Mbese aho wowe nt@@ umuhaye ko mwat@@ ind@@ anye@@ ?” Undi ati “@@ Mwana wa! H@@ ora mp@@ ore, c@@ eceka nc@@ ec@@ eke, ubonye ishyano mbona irind@@ i! Mbese harya uriya mugabo ngo yitwa nd@@ e?” Undi ati “N@@ umvise wa muhungu atubwira ko yitwa Gat@@ era.” Uwo mukecuru ati “B@@ amera nyinshi, iya Gatera yo yaje ari sin@@ s@@ iga n’ind@@ amy@@ i!” Umuk@@ azana ati “Ntabwo m@@ bir@@ eka jye sind@@ abyara nz@@ agomba gusaba amas@@ uby@@ o”. Nyir@@ abukwe ati “@@ Mwana wa, uram@@ enye uba un@@ yambuye n’is@@ azi ntiz@@ akug@@ we ku mun@@ wa! N@@ ayo amas@@ ub@@ yo nz@@ ayag@@ ushakira ny@@ aguh@@ e.” Nuko barig@@ orora bir@@ ashira kandi bombi bakomeza kuba inshuti za Gat@@ era. Nuko iyo nd@@ uru umukecuru yavug@@ ije yamagana Gatera yah@@ uruje rubanda, bigeze aho byose biram@@ enyekana, bamenya n’izina ry’uwo mugabo Gat@@ era. Kuva ubwo inkuru iba kim@@ omo, ikije ari ing@@ und@@ ir@@ izi cyose, kig@@ akoresha umuntu icyo at@@ iteguye, at@@ anag@@ ishaka, bati “@@ C@@ yaje nk’iya Gat@@ era.” Yaba umuntu aguye undi gitumo atamw@@ iteguye, bati “Y@@ aje nk’iya Gat@@ er@@ a!”
Gicumbi: Abayobozi bakubise abaturage, Minisitiri ategeka ko bahita birukanwa Umuyobozi ’@@ Akagari afatanyije n’umuyobozi w’Umudugudu mu Kagari ka R@@ ukurura , Umurenge wa Kan@@ iga bakubise abaturage kuko banze gutanga ubwisungane mu kwivuza, Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’igihugu ahita ategeka ko birukanwa ku kazi burundu. Bernadette Mukamusoni wayoboraga Akagali ka R@@ ukurura n’Umuyobozi w’umudugudu wa Ng@@ abira uzwi ku izina rya B@@ ahemuka bari mu maboko ya Polisi nyuma yo gukubita abaturage bane bak@@ ababaza ngo kuko banze gutanga ubwisungane mu kwivuza. Byabaye kuwa Kane w’icyumweru gishize ubwo aba bayobozi bari bagiye kwaka abaturage amafaranga y’ubw@@ isungane mu kwivuza, bamwe mu baturage banga kuyatanga aribwo ngo ba@@ bakub@@ ise. Abaturage bamaze gukubit@@ wa, bahise bat@@ abaza ubuyobozi bwo hejuru ndetse Akarere gah@@ ita koherez@@ ayo itsinda rishinzwe gukurikirana icyo kibaz@@ o,@@ naho abayobozi bakubise abaturage bo bahita batabwa muri yombi. Ubwo Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’igihugu Francis Kaboneka yitabiraga gahunda y’Inteko rusange y’Akarere ka Gicumbi kuri uyu wa kabiri , yahise ategeka ko abo bayobozi birukanwa burundu mu kazi, ngo kuko bakoze ibinyuranyije n’ind@@ anag@@ agaciro z@@ akar@@ anze umuyobozi. Minisitiri Kaboneka yavuze ko kuba abaturage batar@@ atanze ubwisungane bid@@ aha uburenganzira umuy@@ op@@ b@@ ozi bwo kum@@ ukub@@ ita, ngo ahubwo igik@@ iw@@ iriye ni uk@@ umwigisha akamenya impamvu akwiye gutanga ubwo bw@@ is@@ ung@@ ane, ubutaha akajya aby@@ ibwir@@ iza. Minisitiri Kaboneka yavuze ko abayobozi bakeneye atari abakoresha ingufu mu kumvisha abaturage gahunda za Leta, ngo ahubwo abak@@ enewe n’ab@@ igisha abaturage ibyiza bya gahunda za Leta. Abo bayobozi bavugwaho gukubita abaturage bafungiye kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Mulindi mu Karere ka Gicumbi. M@@ urag@@ ij@@ em@@ ariya Juvent@@ ine
Ikiganiro giteye umujinya umukobwa yagiranye n’umugabo wa mukuru we amufashe aca inyuma umuvandimwe we Umukobwa yafashe umugabo wa mukuru we yaman@@ uriye ipantalo undi mugore mu gitanda cya mukuru we bagirana ikiganiro cyateye benshi kwik@@ anga. Umugabo : Bite Linda ? Umukobwa : M@@ eze neza. Umugabo : M@@ abukwe ameze ate ? Nd@@ im@@ bwira ko uri kumwitaho neza. Umukobwa : Umuryango wanjye ndi ku@@ witaho keretse abantu bamwe bam@@ v@@ angira. Umugabo : H@@ mm@@ m@@ …@@ Umugabo ndakeka ko dufite ikintu tugomba kuganir@@ aho, kuki tut@@ avugana ku byabaye ejo ? Umukobwa : Nta kintu nshaka kuganira nawe, t@@ egereza mukuru wanjye az@@ agaruk@@ e. Umugabo : Ubwo se wab@@ ikora ! Umukobwa : N@@ akubon@@ anye n’undi mugore mu buriri bw’@@ umuvandimwe wanjye, none ut@@ inyutse no kumv@@ ug@@ ish@@ a.@@ nta soni ug@@ ira. Umugabo : Ny@@ iz@@ eza, uko ubit@@ ekereza siko biri. Umukobwa : Umuvandimwe wanjye asanzwe akeka ko umuc@@ a inyuma, ibi byo sinzi uko ab@@ ifata, nar@@ akw@@ iboneye n’amaso yanjye, nta no kujya muri hoteli ! Mu rugo ! Ur@@ ant@@ eng@@ ushye ! Umugabo : Ntabwo nari ng@@ ambiriye kubabaza umuvandimwe wawe kuri iki kibazo, ndag@@ usabye ibi ntub@@ ikor@@ e, ndab@@ ibar@@ angir@@ iza. Umukobwa : Mukuru wanjye akwiye gusobanukirwa umugabo yash@@ atse. Umugabo : Icyo ushaka cyose nd@@ akig@@ uha, nzi neza ko nawe ushaka kumva uburyohe bw@@ abyo, mba n@@ kubona uburyo un@@ yir@@ eb@@ eshya iyo umuvandimwe wawe at@@ atur@@ eba. Nd@@ atekereza ko ukeneye ikintu kimeze nk’@@ amab@@ ir@@ ing@@ anya. Umukobwa : Uk@@ omeje kunt@@ eg@@ usha birenze uko nab@@ it@@ ekerez@@ aga. Umugabo : Ndag@@ uha rug@@ ari, reka kwigira nk’umwana ndabizi ko@@ i bi ubik@@ eneye, Nd@@ aza gutuma uv@@ uza induru nim@@ anuka hepfo d@@ ow@@ nt@@ own@@ , ndatekereza ko icyo mvuga ucy@@ umva. Umukobwa : Ushaka kun@@ kur@@ amo ikariso ? Ushaka kuryamana na murumuna w’umugore wawe ? Umugabo : Ni imibonano mpuzabitsina gusa. Umukobwa : Um@@ babar@@ ije umutima. Ishy@@ ire mu mwanya wa Linda us@@ angiye abandi uko wab@@ igenza ikibazo nk’iki kik@@ ubayeho. Andika igitekerezo cyawe ah@@ atangirwa ibitekerezo ku nkuru.
Abagabo babiri n'abana babo bafashwe bas@@ arura urumogi muri Nyungwe Nt@@ ibig@@ irwa w'imyaka 45 na mugenzi we N@@ ayir@@ wanda w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'abana babo babiri bag@@ uwe gitumo n'abac@@ unga pariki ya Nyungwe tariki 18@@ /03/201@@ 3 aho ba@@ basanze bari gusarura umurima w'@@ urumogi bari bah@@ inze mu ishyamba rya Nyung@@ we. Bombi bavuga ko bari basanzwe bazi ko gukoresha cyangwa gucuruza ibiyobyabwenge bibujijwe ndetse mu rwego rwo gusaba imbabazi bemeye ko bafite indi mifuka ba@@ bitse mu ngo zabo kugira ngo babar@@ irwe. Abac@@ unga pariki ya Nyungwe nibo bafashe abo bagabo barik@@ umwe n'abana babo. Aba bagabo be@@ yemerera icyaha batuye mu murenge wa Butare mu karere ka Rusizi bakaba bafungiye kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Kam@@ embe. Imbuto y'@@ urumogi ngo bay@@ ihawe n'umugabo w'Umur@@ undi witwa Nzeyimana Daniel w@@ ababwiye guhinga rwinshi kugira ngo nibas@@ arura incuro imwe bazah@@ ite bas@@ ezera ku bukene. Nt@@ ibig@@ irwa na mugenzi we N@@ ayir@@ wanda kandi bakurikiranyweho kwica inyamaswa zo muri parik@@ e. Ubwo bafat@@ waga bari bafite inyamaswa yitwa Umuh@@ ari n'@@ imitego baz@@ iteg@@ esha. ngo nyama zazo nizo zibat@@ unga mu gihe baba bari mu ish@@ yamba. Abagabo bafashwe bas@@ arura urumogi muri Nyung@@ we. Abar@@ inzi ba pariki ya Nyungwe batangaza ko umurima baf@@ ati@@ yemo aba bagabo ungana na hegitari imwe gusa banavuga ko gufata aba b@@ angiza ibidukikije bitoroshye kuko ngo barwana nabo k@@ akah@@ ava ndetse ngo mu minsi yashize bamug@@ aje umwe muri bagenzi babo ku buryo bukomeye . Ingingo ya 59@@ 3-@@ 59@@ 7 yo mu gitabo cy'amategeko ahana zivuga ko umuntu wese ukoresha cyangwa uh@@ inga ibiyobyabwenge ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku mwaka umwe kugera ku myaka itatu n'ihazabu y'amafaranga ibihumbi 50 kugeza ku bihumbi 500. Hejuru y'@@ urumogi hari inyamaswa bishe muri pariki ya Nyung@@ we. Iyo aby@@ injiza mu gihugu ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku myaka itatu kugeza ku myaka itanu n'ihazabu y'amafaranga kuva ku bihumbi 500 kugeza kuri miliyoni eshanu. Musabwa Euphrem
Inkomoko y’@@ ins@@ ig@@ amug@@ ani “Y@@ igize nyir@@ anz@@ akah@@ a” Uyu mugani bakunda kuw@@ ucira ku muntu w’@@ igitsina gore wigize (@@ bameny@@ a) y’iby’@@ aha n’ah@@ a; ni we bavuga ngo (Y@@ igize Nyir@@ anz@@ akah@@ a!@@ ) iyo ari igitsina gabo bavuga “B@@ ameny@@ a”. W@@ akomotse ku muj@@ a wa Rug@@ aju witwaga M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni, wo mu Bib@@ ungo bya Muk@@ inga (@@ Git@@ aram@@ a@@ ); ah@@ asaga umwaka wa 18@@ 00. Izina rya Nyir@@ anz@@ ak@@ aha si irya se, ahubwo ni irih@@ imbano. Ubundi yitwaga M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni, akaba umuj@@ a wa Rug@@ aju rwa Mut@@ imb@@ o; wa mut@@ oni w’@@ akad@@ asohoka wa Yuhi Gah@@ ind@@ iro. Se wa M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni yari umugaragu wa Mut@@ imbo. Uwo mukobwa abana na Rug@@ aju bakiri aban@@ a; barar@@ eranwa barag@@ irana inyana bar@@ akur@@ ana. Bukeye Rug@@ aju ah@@ akwa n’ib@@ wami ariko ah@@ ijyan@@ ye; nta wam@@ ush@@ oh@@ oj@@ e! Ar@@ at@@ ona aba umutware w’@@ akad@@ asohok@@ a. Nuko amaze kuba umutware birambuye yibuka wa mukobwa M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni. Ar@@ amut@@ umiza aram@@ ushying@@ ira. Umuhungu umur@@ ongoye ag@@ abana ubutware ku mpamvu ya M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni w’inshuti ya Rug@@ aj@@ u. M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni amaze kubyara kabiri umugabo we arapfa. Rug@@ aju amushyira iwe, ariko amur@@ ekera n’iby’@@ umugabo we; urugo n’inka n’abag@@ arag@@ u. Ar@@ amut@@ onesha cyane; umuntu wese ushaka ubuh@@ ake kuri Rug@@ aju akabanza guca kuri M@@ upf@@ as@@ on@@ i; n’@@ ugize ubuh@@ ake buke yegera M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni ngo amuh@@ ak@@ irwe bik@@ amuh@@ ira. Ar@@ ah@@ ongerwa karah@@ av@@ a; ndetse no mu batware ba Gah@@ ind@@ iro, uwag@@ iraga amakuba yihut@@ iraga kujya kwa M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni ngo am@@ ubwir@@ ire Rug@@ aju am@@ umuh@@ akir@@ weho. Umuntu yam@@ ubaza uko Rug@@ aju amum@@ ereye, M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni, ati “Nd@@ abizi humura nz@@ abik@@ um@@ arir@@ a’’. Ni bwo abahungu bamuh@@ induye Nyir@@ anz@@ ak@@ aha. Ariko bakab@@ ivuga rwihishwa kugira ngo at@@ abimenya bik@@ abagwa nabi. Bukeye aho Rug@@ aju agiriye amak@@ uba, ariko b@@ igih@@ wihwiswa mu rwih@@ isho ibwami bar@@ eshya M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni baram@@ ujyana ngo ababw@@ ire neza ibya Rug@@ aj@@ u. Ageze ibwami akajya abamenyesha uko ameze kugeza igihe bam@@ utang@@ iye. Amaze gupfa, ibwami bah@@ induk@@ irana Nyir@@ anz@@ akah@@ a; bati “N@@ a we ntakwiye gus@@ igar@@ a’’. B@@ aramut@@ anga. Rubanda rub@@ yumvise bar@@ iyam@@ ir@@ ira, bati “@@ Nyir@@ anz@@ ak@@ aha apf@@ anye nash@@ ebuja Rug@@ aj@@ u@@ !@@ ’’. Nuko bis@@ akara igihugu cyose, biturutse kuri M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni wari war@@ ihaye kumenyera Rug@@ aju ibih@@ wihwiswa aha na har@@ iya. Kuva ubwo rero, ushatse kumenya ibintu byose by’@@ aha na har@@ iya, na we bakamug@@ ereranya na M@@ upf@@ as@@ oni, bati “N@@ aka uriya cyangwa ny@@ iran@@ aka yigize Nyir@@ anz@@ akah@@ a!@@ ’’ -@@ Kuba nyir@@ anz@@ ak@@ aha ( = nyir@@ a-@@ nz@@ i-@@ akah@@ a) = Kw@@ igira bamenya w’@@ ibintu byose.
Igis@@ ibo cy’@@ Ukwezi kwa Ramadhan kiz@@ asozwa ku Cyumweru Ubuyobozi bukuru bw’Umuryango w’@@ Abayisilamu mu Rwanda (RM@@ C) bwatangaje ko Umunsi Mukuru usoza igisibo git@@ agatifu cy’ukwezi kwa Ramadhan uzaba ku Cyumweru tariki 24 Gicurasi 2020. Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Mufti w’u Rwanda, Sheikh Salim Hit@@ imana, rim@@ enyesha Abayisilamu ko isengesho ry’uwo Munsi Mukuru wa Id@@ d@@ il@@ -@@ El Fit@@ ri baz@@ arik@@ urikirana kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda guhera saa M@@ oya kugeza saa Mb@@ ili za mu gitondo. Ibyo bikaba bisobanuye ko isengesho rizabera mu ngo kubera kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus nk’uko RMC yab@@ ishim@@ angiye. Itangazo rigira riti “@@ Ubuyobozi bubon@@ eyeho umwanya wo kumenyesha Abayisilamu ko mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID -19 amasengesho bazay@@ akorera mu ngo zabo n’imiryango yab@@ o.” Ubusanzwe mu bihugu byinshi Umunsi wa E@@ id al-@@ Fit@@ r wizih@@ izwaga byihariye n’@@ Abayisilamu aho baby@@ ukira mu masengesho mu mis@@ igit@@ i, ag@@ akurikirwa n’ibir@@ ori bihuza Abayisilamu n’abandi baba batumiye bishimira ko barangije igisibo git@@ agatifu amahoro. Ibyo byose uyu mwaka ntibiz@@ akorwa uko byari bisanzwe kubera ingamba zashyizweho hirya no hino ku Isi zo guhangana na Coronavirus. Muri rusange Igis@@ ibo nacyo cyakozwe mu buryo budasanzwe kubera ibihe bidasanzwe. Iby@@ akor@@ erwaga mu mis@@ igit@@ i, byakorewe mu ngo, uretse gutora Ad@@ h@@ ana byakomeje nk’ibisanzwe mu kwibutsa Abayisilamu isaha yo gusenga. Ku Cyumweru azaba ari tariki 24 Gicurasi 2020 ku Nd@@ angam@@ insi isanzwe, naho ku ya Islam izaba ari tariki ya 1 Ukwakira [@@ bita Sh@@ aw@@ war@@ ] umwaka wa 144@@ 1. Ntabwo Abayisilamu baz@@ os@@ oreza igisibo muri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo nkuko byari bisanzwe bigenda Igis@@ ibo cy’@@ Ukwezi kwa Ramadhan kiz@@ asozwa ku Cyumweru
Huye: Hari abacuruzi bifuza kuba muri M@@ omo Pa@@ y bay@@ ibuze Mu gihe abantu bash@@ ishikarizwa kwifashisha ikor@@ anab@@ unga mu guhererekanya amafaranga mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwizwa rya Coronavirus, hari abacur@@ uriza mu isoko rya Huye bavuga ko hashize igihe basabye gushyirwa muri M@@ omo Pa@@ y batar@@ abyem@@ erer@@ wa. I Huye hari abacuruza imboga n’imbuto bavuga ko bifuje kujya muri M@@ omo p@@ ay ariko batar@@ abih@@ abwa Uburyo bwo kwishyura hifashishijwe M@@ omo Pa@@ y bw@@ ashyizweho na sosiyete y’itumanaho ya MT@@ N, bufasha abacuruzi kwakira amafaranga y’@@ abakiriya nta yo kubikuza bareng@@ ej@@ eho, na bo bakabasha kuy@@ abik@@ uza babifashijwemo na MTN nta kig@@ uzi, cyangwa bakay@@ ashyira kuri konti za banki zabo na bwo nta kig@@ uzi. Umwe muri abo bacuruzi agira ati “@@ Guh@@ ererekanya amafaranga tur@@ abyumva ko twah@@ and@@ urira, ariko noneho hano mu isoko abamaze guhabwa M@@ omo Pa@@ y ni bak@@ eya. Abandi ntitur@@ az@@ ibon@@ , sinzi ikibazo cy@@ abaye. Iyo mbonye umukiriya ushaka kwishyura hifashishijwe M@@ omo, njya kuri mugenzi wanjye uy@@ irimo akaba ari we bishy@@ ura, we akaz@@ ay@@ ansubiza yabik@@ uj@@ e”. Hari n’umubyeyi na we ucur@@ uriza imbuto mu isoko rya Huye uvuga ko we yari yayih@@ awe, iza guhagarara atazi impamvu. Ati “Hari abakiriya ban@@ c@@ ika kubera ko itag@@ ikora. Muri MTN bambwiye gushaka man@@ aja (@@ manag@@ er), mureba kabiri, haza n’umuhungu wo kuy@@ imfung@@ urira arambwira ati bazag@@ uf@@ ungur@@ ira, nd@@ ategereza ndah@@ eba. N’@@ ubu ngiye gusubira kuri MTN kuko nday@@ igira nt@@ ayig@@ ir@@ a”. Abafite M@@ omo Pa@@ y na bo bavuga ko bagifite imbogamizi y’uko badashobora gufata amafaranga bakiriye kuri M@@ omo Pa@@ y ngo na bo bay@@ ifash@@ ishe mu kurangura n’aba@@ yir@@ imo, kuko bit@@ emera. Hari n’abavuga ko abo bar@@ angura batagira telefone, ku buryo biba ngombwa ko bo bab@@ ishyura amafaranga mu ntoki. B@@ yah@@ ur@@ irana n’uko kugira ngo amafaranga umuntu yakiriye kuri M@@ omo Pa@@ y ashobora kuy@@ abik@@ uza ku biro bya MTN gusa cyangwa kuy@@ ashyira kuri konti ye ya banki hanyuma akajya kuy@@ abik@@ uz@@ ayo, bigatuma hari igihe bibav@@ iramo kubura ibyo bari bagiye kurang@@ ura. Murekatete ati “U@@ jya kuri MTN ugas@@ ang@@ ayo umur@@ ongo, rimwe na rimwe bikak@@ uviramo gusanga imari bayit@@ waye. Byaba byiza M@@ omo Pa@@ y igeze ku bakora ubucuruzi bose, hanyuma hakan@@ abaho uburyo bwo guhererekanya amafaranga yakiriwe mu buryo bwa M@@ omo Pa@@ y ku buntu, bitabaye ngombwa kwifashisha Mobile Money kandi bwo bag@@ uk@@ ata amafarang@@ a”. Hari n’abag@@ uzi binubira kujya guhaha bagasanga abacuruzi batari muri M@@ omo Pay@@ , nyamara kuri bo kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga ari bumwe mu buryo bwo kwirinda Coronavirus. Aba bavuga ko byoroshye kuba amafaranga yakiriwe i Rusizi mu gitondo, yar@@ ara i Nyagatare, na bwo yanyuze mu ntoki z’abantu benshi, harimo wenda n’abafite Coronavirus. Uwitwa Fidèle Kamanzi ati “@@ E@@ j@@ obundi nagiye kugura port@@ e-@@ m@@ ang@@ er, nsanga uwo tugomba kuyigura nta na mobile mon@@ ey abam@@ o, nyamara afite telefone. Y@@ ansabye kumwishyura nd@@ eng@@ ejeho ayo kubik@@ uza, na bwo mw@@ ishyura mb@@ inyujije kuri mugenzi we uri muri M@@ omo Pay@@ . Nam@@ ubajije impamvu y’ayo mafaranga areng@@ aho, avuga ko nta kundi byari kugenda kandi atari we ng@@ ur@@ iye”. Kamanzi ngo hari n’aho yagiye kugura imbuto, ashatse kub@@ ishyura yifashishije terefone bamubwira ko ibyo ari iby’@@ abak@@ ire, nta muntu w’umuk@@ ene w@@ ishyurwa gutyo. Ati “Hari hakwiye kubaho uburyo bwo gutegeka abacuruzi bose kugira uburyo bwo kwishyura hifashishijwe M@@ omo, kuko abantu bose babag@@ ana. Ut@@ aby@@ ubahirije ag@@ afung@@ irwa, cyane ko ari ibintu bikorerwa ubun@@ tu@@ ”. Cam@@ ille Bir@@ asa, umukozi wa MTN ushinzwe Amaj@@ yepfo, avuga ko abenshi mu bacuruzi b’i Huye batar@@ ashyirwa muri M@@ omo Pa@@ y nyamara bar@@ abis@@ abye ari abacuruza imboga n’@@ imbuto, bakorera ku map@@ at@@ ante atari ay@@ abo. Ati “Turi kwiga ku mwanzuro w@@ afatwa ku kibazo cyabo. Tur@@ aza kohereza mu isoko abakurikirana iki kibazo, gik@@ emuk@@ e”. Ku bijyanye no kuba abari muri M@@ omo Pa@@ y batabasha kwifashisha amafaranga bay@@ ifiteho kugira ngo na bo ubwabo babashe kurang@@ ura, Bir@@ asa avuga ko kuba byashoboka by@@ atangijwe mu minsi yashize, ko atari azi ko bit@@ emera. Naho ku bijyanye no kubikuza amafaranga yakiriwe muri M@@ omo Pay@@ , abayir@@ imo bahitamo hagati yo kuba bajya bay@@ ibik@@ uriza hifashishijwe mobile mon@@ ey bakishyura bisanzwe, cyangwa kuny@@ uza amafaranga yabo kuri konti zabo nta mafaranga baciwe cyangwa se na none ibiro bya MTN bikab@@ ibafash@@ amo ku buntu ku babik@@ uza amafaranga ari munsi y’ibihumbi 40. Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hose, abacuruzi bifashisha M@@ omo Pa@@ y ni ibihumbi 40, kandi amafaranga bagenda banyuz@@ aho ngo agenda yiyongera uko iminsi yic@@ uma, nk’uko bivugwa na Bir@@ asa. Masudi w@@ agar@@ uye Manzi Thierry, yiteguye kudas@@ uz@@ ugurwa kabiri Umutoza Masudi Juma aratangaza ko APR iramutse im@@ utsinze kabiri byaba ari agasuzug@@ uro, atangaza ko Abouba Sibomana adak@@ innye hari izindi ngamba Mu myitozo ya Rayon Sports iri kubera i Rug@@ ende ahazwi nko ku M@@ afar@@ ashi, Masudi Juma utoza Rayon Sports yatangaje ko yiteguye gits@@ inda APR Fc, kuko aba@@ ona ko iramutse im@@ uts@@ ize kabiri byaba ari agasuzuguro ku mugabo. Mu myitozo i Rug@@ ende .... Rwar@@ utab@@ ura, n'abandi bari bitabiriye imyitozo Rwigema Yves wahoze muri APR Fc, aritegura kongera guhura nayo Masudi kandi yatangaje ko ikipe ye ihagaze neza, kandi ko yiteguye gukina n'ubwo avuga ko h@@ irengagijwe amategeko Abouba Sibomana yateganyaga kubanza mu kibuga ak@@ imwa ibyangombwa. Abakinnyi mu myitozo i Rug@@ ende Ibi ni bimwe mu byo Masudi yatangaje mbere yo gukina na APR "Nta rimwe kabiri mu rugo rw'@@ umugabo, byaba ari agasuzuguro yongeye APR kud@@ utsinda nk'uko yad@@ utsinze muri p@@ re-@@ se@@ as@@ on, ubushize ni twe tw@@ abih@@ ereye ibitego ntabwo bigeze bat@@ urush@@ a, ubu ibyo twar@@ abik@@ os@@ oye@@ " Rwar@@ utab@@ ura, n'abandi bari bitabiriye imyitozo "B@@ anze gukurikiza amategek@@ o,@@ Rayon Sports si ikipe ish@@ ngira ku mukinnyi umwe, Abouba n@@ adakina hari abandi bazakina kandi twizeye intsinzi, tuz@@ akoresha ubwenge bwacu bwose dufite ariko umukino tuw@@ utsind@@ e." Yavuze no kuri Manzi Thierry wat@@ unguranye akag@@ aragara ku myitozo "@@ Manzi Thierry maze iminsi mus@@ ura tun@@ avug@@ ana, ntiy@@ iv@@ urije hanze (muri Maroc@@ ) ariko amaze iminsi yiv@@ uza, kandi nawe yavuze ko ari t@@ ay@@ ali gukina, gusa urutonde muz@@ ar@@ umenya ku wa Gatandatu Saa tan@@ u." Danny Vumbi yahishuye byinshi ku rukundo rwe n’umugore bamaranye imyaka 15 Sem@@ ivumbi Daniel wamamaye mu muziki nka Danny V@@ umbi, yavuze byinshi ku muryango we na Jeannette Muhaw@@ en@@ imana, y@@ itsa ku ipfundo riz@@ ir@@ itseho urukundo rwabo rumaze imyaka 19. Danny Vumbi w’imyaka 41 ni umwe mu bahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda, by’umwihariko ari mu bafite urugo rukomeye uhereye kubig@@ aragarira amaso. Danny Vumbi na Muhawenimana bafitanye abana 2 b’abah@@ ung@@ u; Henry Jay@@ z Ineza na David Ih@@ irwe. Danny Vumbi yahoze ari umwe mu bagize itsinda rya The Broth@@ ers, aza kur@@ ivamo mu 2011 atangira gukora umuziki ku giti cye ndetse ari mu bahanzi bafite ubuhanga bwihariye kandi bakora ibihangano birimo ubutumwa bufasha benshi. Uretse kuba umuh@@ anzi, ni n’umwanditsi ukomeye w’indirimbo kuko benshi mu bahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda bamw@@ itabaza kugira ngo bakore indirimbo zifite icy@@ anga. IGIHE yaganiriye na we ku rukundo rwe na Muhawenimana n’andi mabanga y’urugo ye at@@ azwi na benshi. IGIHE: B@@ akunze kuvuga ko ingo z’@@ ibyamamare zikunze kut@@ amara kabiri. Nawe ni ko ub@@ ibon@@ a? Danny V@@ umb@@ i: N@@ ibyo. Ikintu kiba ku Isi yose tw@@ irirwa tureba ntabwo nag@@ ihakana n’ubwo nta bush@@ ak@@ atsi nakoze njye nka Danny V@@ umbi, ariko hari abagiye bab@@ ukora. Tw@@ irirwa tubona ingo nyinshi zis@@ eny@@ uka, na hano iwacu mu Rwanda tubona abantu bazwi babana ariko ukajya kumva ngo nyuma y’amezi atatu, atandatu cyangwa umwaka se, batandukanye. Ntabwo biba byoroshye kubana n’umuh@@ anzi, keretse nawe uri we kubera ko abahanzi baba mu Isi yabo, kuko producer ag@@ uhaye gahunda ya saa munani z’ijoro uray@@ ubahir@@ iza. Urumva niba ufite umugore ukagenda izo saha ntabwo byoroh@@ a. Nko mu minsi ishize byam@@ bayeho nari mfite indirimbo ngomba kurangiza kandi ngomba kuyir@@ irimbira abantu mu gitondo nka saa yine ahantu kure, kandi yari itar@@ ar@@ angir@@ a; producer arambwira ati nubona akanya saa munani z’ijoro uze tuy@@ irang@@ ize. M@@ bwira madamu nti ‘@@ saa munani z’ijoro nibwo ndi bug@@ end@@ e’, arans@@ ubiza ati ‘@@ nta kibaz@@ o.’ Nk’@@ ibyo hari udashobora kub@@ yak@@ ira. Kuba muba mud@@ ahuje gahunda, ikindi kivugwa mu bahanzi urabona ibintu by’@@ ibiyobyabwenge nk’@@ amay@@ oga, n’abafana bari mu bintu bituma ingo zit@@ aramba cyane. Urugero wenda niba uri wa mus@@ itari w’@@ umufana ufite abakobwa birirwa bakw@@ andikira bakubwira ko bag@@ ukunda, hari umuntu udashobora kubyumva akavuga ati ‘@@ ibyo aribyo byose ntabwo ari umuziki gus@@ a’. Haz@@ amo ikintu cyo kumvikana n’uwo mubana no kuba muz@@ iranye, ni cyo cyatuma urugo rw’@@ umuhanzi rw@@ aramba rug@@ akom@@ era. IGIHE@@ :@@ W@@ adus@@ angiza ku rugendo rwawe n’umugore wawe mum@@ aranye imyaka 15@@ ? Danny V@@ umb@@ i: Ntabwo tumaranye imyaka 15 gusa kuko tw@@ akundanye imyaka ine duh@@ uriye muri Kaminuza, urumva imyaka 15 yo niyo tumaze nk’umugabo n’umugore. Habayeho kumenyana bihagije no kwihang@@ anirana ku tuntu tumwe na tumwe kuko nta muntu sh@@ yashya kuko ntabwo habura agatotsi mu mubano wanyu ariko muk@@ akag@@ aniraho muk@@ ak@@ umva. Nicyo cyam@@ fashije kuba mar@@ anye iyi myaka yose n’umugore wanjye. Hari ubwo ushobora gufata icyemezo mugenzi wawe ntag@@ ishy@@ igikir@@ e, ibyo rero bisaba kwigomwa ku ruhande rumwe, iyo bit@@ ayeho nibwo usanga byageze mu nshuti byakw@@ anga muk@@ itabaza inkiko kuko zo zit@@ ananirwa zik@@ abat@@ anduk@@ anya. Kumenya mugenzi wawe, kwihanganira mugenzi no kumw@@ umva, nibyo byatuma urugo rukom@@ era. IGIHE: Dus@@ angize uko wowe n’umugore wawe mw@@ ameny@@ anye@@ ! Danny V@@ umb@@ i: Twam@@ eny@@ aniye mu ngando z’@@ abanyeshuri, njyewe nari ngiye mu mwaka wa kabiri we agiye kujya mu wa mbere. T@@ uram@@ eny@@ ana, tur@@ akund@@ ana, kuko nigaga imibare nawe ariyo yiga kuko nigaga mu mwaka uri hejuru akajya ambaza nk@@ amus@@ obanur@@ ira, bitavuze ko mur@@ usha imibare ahubwo ni uko nigaga mu mwaka w@@ isumbuye uwe, ibyo atar@@ asobanukirwa akab@@ imbaza nk@@ amus@@ obanurira kugeza ndangije nd@@ amut@@ egereza nawe akir@@ angiza duhita tub@@ ana. IGIHE: Umunsi wa mbere muh@@ ura byagenze bite? Danny V@@ umb@@ i: Umunsi wa mbere duhura yari arimo at@@ emb@@ era. Iryo koranabuhanga riz@@ atuma umunyamuryango wa Sacco abasha kubik@@ uriza aho ageze nta gusubira aho yafung@@ urije kont@@ i, nk'uko Umugenzuzi mukuru w'@@ amakoperative mu kigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere amakoperative (R@@ CA) Gilbert Habyarimana. Avuga ko icyo gikorwa kandi kiz@@ ajyana no gushyiraho banki imwe za Sacco z'@@ imirenge zizaba zih@@ ur@@ iyeho. H@@ akozwe porogaramu ya telefoni ihuza abashaka gutera akabariro Isi ir@@ akat@@ aje mu iterambere, ikoranabuhanga rimaze gushinga imizi mu mibereho ya benshi bituma hah@@ angwa uburyo bushya bwo kuganira no guhanahana amakuru. Kuri ubu hakozwe porogaramu ya ‘@@ Fe@@ el@@ d@@ ’ ifite umwihariko wo gufasha itsinda ry’abantu bashaka gutera akabariro kugabanya ingendo bakoraga bakaba bab@@ ivugana no mu gihe bari ku kazi. Fe@@ el@@ d yahoze yitwa ‘@@ 3@@ nder@@ ’ cyangwa ‘T@@ ind@@ er for th@@ re@@ es@@ om@@ es’ mu Cy@@ ongereza, yashyizeho serivisi nshya y’@@ ubutumwa bugufi bw@@ ohererez@@ anywa mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga ku bantu bifuza kujya mu rukundo. Iyi serivisi ifasha abantu bakorana ku kazi runaka koherez@@ anya ubutumwa baba@@ baza niba bashobora kuryam@@ ana. Ifite umwihariko kuko uw@@ ohererezwa ubutumwa at@@ ashobora kumenya ko ari gusabwa urukundo kugeza igihe bim@@ uj@@ emo ak@@ isanga yab@@ yem@@ eye. Ubuyobozi bwa Fe@@ el@@ d bw@@ ashyizeho ubu buryo mu rwego rwo gufasha abantu kugaragaza ibyiyumviro by’@@ imibiri yabo no mu gihe bari mu kazi, ibintu bavuga ko bifasha abatari bake kugira ubuzima bwiza. Ubu buryo bw@@ ahoze bwitwa ‘@@ Th@@ re@@ es@@ om@@ e’ bw@@ ahinduye izina ariko ntib@@ wah@@ induye imikorere kandi aba@@ bukoresha ntibag@@ omba gut@@ eshuka ngo bar@@ enge imbibi z’@@ amategeko abag@@ enga aho bakorera. Ubuyobozi bw’@@ uru ruganda bukomeza butangaza ko “Kw@@ idagad@@ ura no gut@@ ebya uri ku kazi ni byiza, ariko kugaragaza ibyiyumviro byawe twizera ko bit@@ ugira abo dushaka kuba b@@ o.” “Uko byaba bimeze kose akazi ni akazi. Iteka jya uzirikana ko ugomba gukora ibin@@ ogeye abo mukor@@ ana.” Har@@ acy@@ arebwa am@@ abw@@ irizwa ngend@@ erwaho, nko kuba abakoresha ubu buryo basezer@@ anya ko hataz@@ abaho kugir@@ irana nabi hagati yabo kandi ko bazakomeza kugira amatsiko yo kumenya umuntu ubash@@ ak@@ aho ubucuti no kwir@@ ekura mu gihe bamaze kumeny@@ ana. Igihe iyi porogaramu izajya iba yashyizwe muri telefoni, uzajya wandika izina ry’uwo ushaka gusaba urukundo kandi amakuru yose utanze azajya agirwa ibanga mu gihe mut@@ arah@@ uza. Aba bombi bazajya bah@@ uzwa mu gihe ubu buryo bw@@ emerera ubutumwa kugera kuri nyir@@ abwo na we agatera intambwe yo kwiyumvamo mugenzi we. Iyi porogaramu izajya ik@@ ug@@ aragariza ubutumwa buvuga ko runaka akw@@ iyumvamo ushobora gutangira kumug@@ anir@@ iza. Fe@@ el@@ d yakozwe n’@@ ikompanyi yo mu B@@ ongereza yitwa Fe@@ el@@ d Ltd n’@@ Umunya-@@ Bul@@ gar@@ ian witwa D@@ imo Tr@@ if@@ on@@ ov mu 2014. Mu 2015 yatangiye gukoreshwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ndetse kugeza mu ntangiriro za Kanama 2016, yari imaze gukoreshwa n’abasaga miliyoni imwe n’igice.
B@@ asanga atari ngombwa gutanga insimbur@@ amub@@ y@@ izi ku miryango ib@@ anye nabi Bamwe mu bak@@ angurambaga mu byo kurwanya ihohoterwa mu ngo bavuga ko amafaranga y’@@ insimbur@@ amub@@ y@@ izi imiryango nt@@ erankunga igenera imiryango irang@@ wamo amakimbirane mu gihe babig@@ isha, akwiye gukur@@ waho, bakay@@ ahabwa mu bundi buryo. Abah@@ abwa amahugurwa ku makimbirane ntibakwiye guhabwa insimbur@@ amub@@ y@@ izi Impamvu ni uko ngo hari bamwe na bamwe bamara gufata ayo mafaranga, aho kwiyunga cyangwa gukorera hamwe na bagenzi babo bakarushaho kubah@@ ohot@@ era, kuko ayo mafaranga aho kuyik@@ en@@ uza bay@@ ajyana mu tubar@@ i, bas@@ inda bak@@ itwara nabi. Akenshi ayo mafaranga ba@@ yatanga nk’@@ insimbur@@ amub@@ y@@ izi cyangwa nk’@@ iny@@ orosh@@ yarug@@ end@@ ondo, bitewe n’uko inyigisho zibak@@ angurira kubana neza ziba z@@ abereye kure y’aho batuye. Conc@@ il@@ ie Mukand@@ ut@@ iye, umuyobozi w’inama y’igihugu y’abagore mu murenge wa Gish@@ ubi mu Karere ka Gisagara agira ati “Ubundi tuba ari udufaranga duk@@ eya. Nubwo hari abumva inyigisho bakaz@@ ikurik@@ iza, amakimbirane bakay@@ ar@@ eka, n’amafaranga bahawe bak@@ ayik@@ en@@ uza, hakaba n’abay@@ ajyana mu kabari, ugasanga bas@@ inze, ihohotera aho gushira r@@ ikar@@ ushaho kwiy@@ onger@@ a.” Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Gish@@ ub@@ i, Jean Damascene R@@ enz@@ aho, avuga ko yaje gusanga hari n’abab@@ ona abagiye guhugurwa bat@@ ahana amafaranga, na bo bagatangira guhohotera abo bab@@ ana, kugira ngo na bo baz@@ atum@@ irwe mu nyigisho bibon@@ ere amafaranga. Uyu muyobozi avuga ko hari n’abo yagiye abona baje gusaba ko bajya ku rutonde rw’@@ abab@@ anye nabi. Amafaranga twak@@ abahaye nk’@@ itik@@ e, nibamara gukora ibim@@ ina, bagakora umushinga runaka, tuz@@ aw@@ utera inkung@@ a.” Aimé Nshimiy@@ imana, umuyobozi w’ihuriro ry’@@ abafatanyabikorwa mu karere ka Gisagara, we avuga ko muri iki gihe abari gufashwa ban@@ ahabwa amafaranga ahanini ari abakene bari mu cyiciro cya mbere n’icya kabiri cy’ubud@@ ehe, baba bakeneye gufashwa ngo bik@@ ure mu bukene. Ati “@@ Imiryango itari iya Leta iyo ib@@ eg@@ ereye, isanga mu ngo zabo harimo n’@@ ihohoterwa, hanyuma amafaranga babahaye agatuma rya hohoterwa rigaragara kurush@@ aho.” Nshimiyimana we avuga ko ubwo bushobozi bagenerwa but@@ ahagarik@@ wa, ahubwo inzego z’@@ ubuyobozi, ari na zo ziba z@@ abahaye imiryango itari iya Leta ngo ibafash@@ e, zig@@ afatanya na yo mu gufasha aba baturage guhinduka biteza imbere aho kurushaho guk@@ imbir@@ ana. Umulisa Jos@@ elyne yatangije Ac@@ ad@@ ém@@ ie izafasha u Rwanda kubona abakinnyi ba Tennis Umulisa Jos@@ elyne usanzwe ari umukinnyi akaba n’umutoza wa Tennis mu Rwanda, yatangiye kwigisha uyu mukino abakinnyi bakiri bato kugira ngo mu azam@@ ure umubare w’@@ abakinnyi ukiri muto cyane cyane mu bak@@ obwa. Umulisa ufite impamyabushobozi y’ubut@@ oza yo ku rwego rwa mbere, akunze kwiharira menshi mu marushanwa ya Tennis akinirwa mu Rwanda. Kuri ubu ari gutoza abana bakiri bato ku bibuga bya Tennis biherereye i Remera, iruhande rwa Petit Stad@@ e. Avuga ko yahisemo gukora uyu mushinga wo kwigisha abana Tennis kuko yasanze mu Rwanda hari umubare muto w’@@ abakinnyi by’umwihariko mu cyiciro cy’@@ abakobwa. Ati “N@@ jya gutangira gutekereza uyu mushinga wo gutoza abana bato no kubaz@@ amura mu mwuga wa Tennis byatewe n’uko nari maze igihe kinini cyane ndi Champion@@ ne [@@ nt@@ wara Shampiyon@@ a] w’Igihugu. Numvise nshaka abana bans@@ imbur@@ a.” “N@@ arar@@ ebye mbona mu gih@@ ucu cyacu dufite umubare muto w’@@ abakinnyi ba Tennis cyane cyane uw’@@ abakobwa, n@@ iyemeza gushyiramo imbaraga ngo ntang@@ ize igikorwa nk’@@ iki, nshaka abana bato bafite impano gahoro gah@@ oro. N@@ atang@@ iranye abana bake, ariko uko mwab@@ ibonye, bamaze kuba bensh@@ i.” Abajijwe icyizere afite cyo kuba uyu mushinga wam@@ ara igihe kirekire n’aho akura ubushobozi bwo kugura ibikoresho byifashishwa muri Tenn@@ is, Umulisa yavuze ko hari ababyeyi ba bamwe mu ban@@ a- bafite ubushoboz@@ i- bitanga kugira ngo n’abat@@ ishoboye babone uko biga gukina Tenn@@ is. Ati “Ni umushinga wanjye, ariko nkaba mfite abafatanyabikorwa aribo feder@@ asiyo ya Tennis mu Rwanda (R@@ T@@ F@@ ). Ibikoresho nkoresha ni ibyo n@@ ish@@ ats@@ emo njyewe ubwanjye kubera ko mfite ubushake nubwo ubushobozi butar@@ aboneka neza. N@@ izera ko nib@@ igenda neza nz@@ abona abaterankunga kuko ibikoresho bya Tennis birah@@ enda kandi bis@@ aza vuba@@ .” “@@ Ababyeyi uko dukor@@ ana, mbasaba kugura bimwe mu bikoresho by’abana nk’@@ imyambaro n’@@ inkw@@ eto. H@@ abamo n’abandi bishyura amafaranga kugira ngo dufashe n’abat@@ ishoboye kwiga no kwita ku bib@@ ug@@ a.” Perezida w’Ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Tennis mu Rwanda; Karenzi Théonest@@ e, yavuze ko bazakomeza gushyigikira Umulisa Jos@@ elyne muri uyu mushinga we kuko uhuye na gahunda yabo yo kuzamura impano z’@@ abakiri bato. Munezero Fiston yahagaritswe muri Musanze FC Myugariro Munezero Fiston yamaze guhagarikwa n’ikipe ya Musanze FC igihe kit@@ azwi azira imyitwarire mibi. Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe ya Musanze FC bushinja Munezero Fiston imyitwarire mibi ishingiye ku gusuzugura umutoza wungirije M@@ bw@@ eki Tariki T@@ od@@ ek was@@ igaranye ikipe nyuma y’uko Ruremesha Emmanuel ahagaritswe igihe cy’@@ ukwezi. Tuyishime Placide uyobora Musanze FC yatangarije Rwandamag@@ azin@@ e.com ko impamvu bamuh@@ agaritse ari uko as@@ uzugura umutoza was@@ igaranye ikipe ndetse akan@@ am@@ uvugaho amagambo mab@@ i. Ati " Yakomeje kuvuga amagambo mabi ku mutoza was@@ igaranye ikipe, akan@@ amus@@ uzug@@ urira ku rubuga bahur@@ iraho , agaragaza ko ari umukinnyi ukomeye cyane, ut@@ avug@@ waho. Umutoza we yari yamusabye ko yaz@@ agaruka mu myitozo ari uko Ruremesha yagarutse ariko twe tw@@ amuh@@ agaritse igihe kit@@ azwi , tun@@ ahagarika ibyo tw@@ amug@@ en@@ erag@@ a." Muri Mutarama uyu mwaka nibwo Munezero Fiston yerekeje muri Musanze FC nyuma yo kwirukanwa muri Police FC. Yas@@ inye muri Musanze FC amezi 6. Tariki 9 Werurwe 2019 nibwo Musanze FC yahagaritse umutoza Ruremesha Emmanuel mu gihe kingana n’ukw@@ ezi. Hari nyuma yo gutakaza umukino w’umunsi wa 19 wa shampiyona w@@ abahuje na Espoir FC i Rusizi. Icyo gihe ikipe yamush@@ injaga umusaruro muke. Amakuru agera kuri Rwandamag@@ azin@@ e.com yemeza ko kuva icyo gihe aribwo Munezero Fiston yatangiye kubura umwanya ubanza mu kibuga ku buryo buhoraho ari nabyo byatumye ashinja umutoza M@@ bw@@ eki Tariki T@@ od@@ ek kut@@ amuk@@ inisha ngo ahubwo akaba agendera ku nama aba yagiriwe n’abak@@ innyi. Kuva aho ahagarik@@ iwe muri Musanze FC, Ruremesha ntiyem@@ erewe kugera mu bakinnyi ndetse no mu bindi bikorwa by’@@ ikipe. K@@ uza ku kibuga ho ahaza bisanzwe nk’@@ undi mukunzi cyangwa umufana w’@@ ikipe. Kuva Ruremesha yah@@ agarikwa muri Musanze FC, imaze gukina imikino 2 harimo uwo batsindiye Police FC 2-0 kuri Stade Ubw@@ oroherane n’uwo bang@@ anyije n’@@ Amagaju 0-0 i Nyagis@@ eny@@ i. Iyo mikino yombi ntabwo Munezero Fiston yigeze abanz@@ wa mu kibuga. Tw@@ ashatse kuvugana na Munezero Fiston ku cyo avuga ku i@@ ahagarikwa rye ariko ubwo twandik@@ aha iyi nkuru ntiy@@ afataga telefone ye igendanwa ndetse ntiy@@ asub@@ izaga n’ubutumwa bugufi twam@@ wandik@@ iye. Kugeza ubu, ku rutonde rw’agateganyo rwa Shampiyon@@ a, Musanze FC iri ku mwanya wa 12 n’amanota 23. Mu Rwanda abandi babiri bishwe na COVID-19 Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 17 Nzeri 2020, mu Rwanda abantu babiri by@@ ishwe na COVID-19. Abo babiri bishwe na COVID-19 ni Abanyarwanda umwe w’imyaka 80 n’undi w’imyaka 29 y’amavuko bitabye Imana bari i Kigali. Mbere yaho ku wa Kane undi mugabo w’imyaka 48 y’amavuko na we yitabye Imana ari i Kigali, abamaze kwicwa na COVID-19 mu Rwanda bose hamwe bakaba ari 25. Abantu mu Rwanda bongeye kwicwa n’iki cyorezo mu gihe hari hashize iminsi irindwi nta muntu bivugwa ko yishwe na COVID-19 mu Rwanda, dore ko uwah@@ erukaga kwicwa n’icyo cyorezo ari umubyeyi w’imyaka 62 witabye Imana i Kigali ku wa Kane tariki 10 Nzeri 2020. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima kandi yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa Gatanu habonetse abantu 18 bashya banduye icyorezo cya COVID-19, mu gihe abandi 28 bak@@ ize. Mbere yaho ku wa Kane hari habonetse abarwayi bashya 19, abakize nabwo bari 28. Abo barwayi bashya 18 babonetse mu bipimo 1,@@ 5@@ 49 bakaba barimo 9 babonetse muri Kigali (@@ bapimwe mu bibasiwe kurusha aband@@ i), naho abandi 4 babon@@ eka muri Nyamagabe, i Rubavu na ho habonetse 4, undi umwe aboneka i Bugesera. Kugeza kuri uyu wa Gatanu mu Rwanda abamaze kwandura icyo cyorezo ni 4,@@ 6@@ 71 muri bo abamaze gukira ni 2,@@ 8@@ 45 naho abak@@ iv@@ urwa ni 1,@@ 80@@ 1. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima isaba Abaturarwanda bose gukomeza kwitwararika bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19. Intego ni ug@@ utsinda Rayon Sports@@ .” Kirehe FC ya 14 n’amanota 27, isigaje imikino ibiri izah@@ uramo na Rayon Sports (mu rug@@ o) na Bugesera FC (@@ hanz@@ e) mu gihe Gicumbi FC ya 15 n’amanota 27 yo isigaje guhura na AS Muhanga (mu rug@@ o) na Mukura Victory Sports (@@ hanz@@ e). Umunyarwanda yatoranyijwe mu bazitabira amahugurwa yo kongerera ubushobozi abagore mu miyoborere Umunyeshuri wiga mu mwaka wa gatatu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, Grace Ineza Umuh@@ oza, yatoranyijwe mu bazitabira gahunda yo kongerera ubushobozi abagore mu miyoborere n’iterambere rya Afurika. Iyi gahunda izwi nka ‘@@ Mor@@ emi Initi@@ ative Le@@ ader@@ ship and Emp@@ ow@@ er@@ ment Development (M@@ IL@@ E@@ AD@@ )@@ ’ itor@@ anya muri Afurika yose abagore batanga icyizere kurusha abandi mu bijyanye n’im@@ iyoborere, kandi bakaba bafite umuhate n’umur@@ ava wo kuyobora abandi no guharanira impinduka z’uyu mugabane. Uyu mwaka abagore bagera ku 2500 bo mu bihugu bya Afurika 45 no muri Diaspora bari basabye kujya muri aya mahugurwa ariko 26 barimo Umuhoza wiga amasomo ajyanye n’iby’@@ amazi no kubungabunga ibidukikije muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, baba aribo bator@@ anywa. Abay@@ itabira baba bari mu kigero kiri hagati y’imyaka 19 na 25 bafite imishinga ijyanye no guhanga imirimo, ubuzima bw’@@ abagore, ubutabera, kugira uruhare muri politiki, guhanga udushya mu bijyanye n’ib@@ idukikije n’ubur@@ inganire nkuko The New@@ Times yabitangaje. Umuhoza umwaka ushize wan@@ atsindiye igihembo cyo guhanga udushya tugamije ubucuruzi muri Afurika, kubera umushinga we Baby A@@ n Angel ugamije gufasha abagore n’imiryango yo mu cyaro abinyujije mu kwita ku bana bato, avuga ko aya ari amahirwe abonye yo kongera ubumenyi bwe. Yagize ati “N@@ ishimiye kuba nat@@ or@@ anyijwe kwitabira iyi porogaramu ya M@@ IL@@ EA@@ D 2017, ndizera ko aya ari amahirwe kuri njye yo kwiy@@ ungura ubumenyi kugira ngo m@@ bashe gukemura ibibazo byugarije umugore mu gihugu cyanjye na Afurika muri rusange bityo bab@@ eho neza.” Mor@@ emi Initi@@ ative ni umuryango ugamije guteza imbere abagore mu miyoborere n’ubutabera muri Afurika. Ufite icyicaro muri Ghana no muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Iyi gahunda itanga ubumenyi bufasha abayitabiriye kugira imiyoborere ibereye Afurika kandi izatuma uyu mugabane uba ahantu heza ku Isi.

Ij@@ isho ku miyoborere ya Perezida Macron yahinduye byinshi mu mibanire n’u Rwanda Ku itariki nk’iyi mu 2017 nibwo Emmanuel Macron icyo gihe wari ufite imyaka 3@@ 9, yatorewe kuyobora u Bufaransa ku majwi 66 % atsinze Marine Le P@@ en wagize 3@@ 3,@@ 94 %, asimbura François Hollande muri manda y’imyaka itanu. Mu mwaka we wa mbere muri El@@ ys@@ ée, Macron yagaragaje ubushake bwo guhindura politiki y’u Bufaransa kuri Afurika, yo kubaka umubano w’@@ abafatanyabikorwa bitandukanye n’iy’@@ aba@@ mub@@ anjirije bubatse uwag@@ ereranywa n’umwana imbere y’@@ umubyeyi. Umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa wakunze kuba mubi bishingiye ku ruhare bush@@ injwa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, mbere na nyuma yayo, bwo buk@@ agaragaza ibisa no kwih@@ unza ibyo bwakoze birimo ibirego bw@@ ashyir@@ iyeho abayobozi bahagaritse Jenoside. Ubutegetsi bwa Macron mu gukosora ibyag@@ enze nabi Mu Ukuboza 2018 abacamanza b’Abafaransa bahagaritse iperereza ku ihanurwa ry’indege ya Habyarimana ryari rimaze imyaka 20, ryah@@ oraga ku iz@@ ingiro ry’@@ umwuka mubi hagati y’ibihugu byombi. R@@ yah@@ embereye umubano mubi hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa. Mbere gato y’uko u Rwanda rw@@ injira mu bikorwa byo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 25 Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994, Perezida Emmanuel Macron yakiriye itsinda ry’ abayobozi b’@@ Umuryango uharanira inyungu z’@@ abarokotse Jenoside, Ibuk@@ a-@@ Franc@@ e. Nyuma Perezida Macron yatangaje ishyirwaho rya komisiyo igizwe n’abahanga mu mateka n’abash@@ akashatsi, izas@@ esengura inyandiko icyo gihugu k@@ ibitse zigaragaza ibikorwa byacyo mu Rwanda hagati ya 199@@ 0-@@ 1994, ngo hashyir@@ we ahabona ukuri ku ruhare rw@@ acyo muri Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi. Perezida Macron yanatangaje ko hagiye gushyirwaho uburyo bwo gusobanura amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no gushishikariza abantu gukora ubushakashatsi kuri Jenoside. Y@@ agarag@@ aragaje kandi ko ad@@ ashyigikiye umuco wo kudah@@ ana, avuga ko agiye kongerera ubushobozi urukiko ruk@@ urikirana ibyaha bifitanye isano na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no kongera umubare w’@@ abag@@ enzacyaha “@@ kugira ngo abakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside bakurikiranwe kandi bac@@ irwe imanza mugihe gik@@ w@@ iye.” U Bufaransa bw@@ ashyigikiye Mushikiwabo muri OIF Kimwe mu bikorwa Macron yagaragaje mu mubano mushya, ni uko yashyigikiye byeruye kandidatire ya Louise Mushikiwabo wari umukandida w’u Rwanda n’Umuryango wa Afurika yunze Ubumwe, ku mwanya w’@@ Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa, OIF@@ . Mushikiwabo yaje kwemezwa n’abakuru b’ibihugu ku bwumvikane buses@@ uye, asimbura Micha@@ elle Jean wari usanzwe muri uwo mwanya ndetse w@@ ifuzaga manda ya kabiri. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru muri Gicurasi 2018, ari kumwe na Perezida Kagame, Macron yavuze ko umutima wa Francoph@@ onie uherereye muri Afurika, ko buri wese wifuza kugeza aheza uyu muryango at@@ abigeraho at@@ ishing@@ ikirije urubyiruko rwo ku mugabane wa Afurika. Ibyo ngo bituma ku bwa Macron "@@ Kand@@ idat@@ ire ku buyobozi bwa Francoph@@ onie yaba iturutse muri kimwe mu bihugu bya Afurika, niyo yaba ifite ishingiro cyan@@ e". Afurika ifite ibihugu 30 kuri 50 bifata ibyemezo muri OIF ndetse uyu muryango wan@@ ashingiwe kuri uyu mugabane. Perezida Macron yagiranye ibiganiro n'abayobozi ba Ibuk@@ a-@@ France ari kumwe na Depite Herv@@ é B@@ erv@@ ille ukomoka mu Rwanda, wam@@ uhagarariye mu bikorwa byo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 25 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi U Bufaransa bw@@ ahagar@@ ariwe mu bikorwa byo Kwibuka Perezida Macron yatumiwe inshuro nyinshi ngo azas@@ ure u Rwanda, ndetse bamwe bari biteze ko azar@@ usura muri uyu mwaka. Mu kiganiro yagiriye muri Ethiop@@ ie muri Werurwe, yabajijwe n’abanyamakuru kuri ubu butumire bw’u Rwanda. Ati "@@ U Rwanda nibyo rw@@ adut@@ umiye mu bikorwa byo Kwib@@ uka, ubutumire twar@@ abw@@ akiriye kandi nd@@ emeza ko u Bufaransa buzaba buhagarariwe muri ibyo bikorwa byo Kwibuk@@ a." Y@@ ahagar@@ ariwe na Depite Herv@@ é B@@ erv@@ ille ufite inkomoko mu Rwanda w@@ ifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda mu mugoroba wo Kwibuka wabereye kuri Stade Amahoro. Kut@@ iy@@ izira ubwe byan@@ enzwe n’abantu batandukanye ariko bigaragaza ubushake mu kunga ubumwe nyuma y’@@ ibyabaye byose. Mu muhango wo Kwibuka wabereye i Paris naho Macron yohereje Minisitiri w’imari n’@@ ubukungu, Bruno Le Ma@@ ire, un@@ itabirwa n’umuyobozi w’umujyi wa Paris, Anne H@@ id@@ al@@ g@@ o. Hejuru y’ibyo byose Macron yagaragaje icyifuzo cy’uko itariki ya 7 Mata, mu Bufaransa yafatwa nk’@@ umunsi wo Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Kw@@ injiza uyu munsi mu y@@ ubahwa mu Bufaransa ni ikimenyetso gikomeye, harebwe ku mateka y’icyo gihugu mu Rwanda, mbere ya Jenoside ndetse n’igihe yakor@@ waga. U Rwanda rush@@ ima imiyoborere ya Macron Nyuma ya Jenoside, Perezida Nicolas Sarkozy ni we wa mbere uyoboye u Bufaransa wasuye u Rwanda, muri Gashyantare 2010. Icyo gihe yan@@ asuye Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali, an@@ emera ‘@@ amakos@@ a’ igihugu cye cy@@ akoze. Perezida Kagame nawe yagiye i Paris muri Nzeri 2011, ashim@@ angiraga ubushake hagati y’ibihugu byombi mu kuzahura umub@@ ano. Nyamara Sarkozy av@@ uyeho mu 2012, ibyari bitangiye kujya mu murongo hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa byongeye guk@@ onj@@ a. Ubwo Macron yator@@ waga, ubutegetsi bwe bw@@ azanye icyizere n’@@ itandukaniro ry’@@ abayoboye u Bufaransa bose nyuma ya 1994. Ni nawe Perezida u Bufaransa bwagize nyuma ya 1994, utari mu buyobozi ubwo Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi yabag@@ a. Nyuma y’imyaka yose yari ishize, muri Gicurasi 2018 Perezida Kagame yasuye u Bufaransa aganira na Perezida Macron bemeza kunoza umub@@ ano. Perezida Kagame aheruka kuvuga ko muri iki gihe nta gushidikanya ko hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa hari ubwumvikane ahanini bitewe n’imikorere ya Perezida Emmanuel Mac@@ r@@ on. Yavuze ko “@@ Perezida Macron yazanye imitekerereze mishya muri politiki y’u Bufarans@@ a” ndetse ko ari guhindura “@@ Politiki y’u Bufaransa n’amateka yabw@@ o”. H@@ ategerejwe intambwe ikomeye mu mubano Mu kiganiro yagiranye na TV@@ 5 i Er@@ ev@@ an muri Arm@@ én@@ ie umwaka ushize, Perezida Kagame yabajijwe niba nyuma y’igihe kinini u Bufaransa bushobora kongera kugira Ambasaderi mu Rwanda, asubiza ko usibye icyo hari n’ibindi bishoboka. Ati “Nd@@ atekereza ko icyo kigiye kuba umusaruro w’iyi mitekerereze mishya n’uburyo bwo gukorera hamwe. Hari ibintu bigiye kuba birenze na Ambasade kuko ibi bir@@ ajyana n’umubano mu buryo bwag@@ utse aho ibintu byinshi biba harimo n’icy@@ o.” “I@@ cy’ingenzi ni uko tugomba gusa n’abav@@ ug@@ urura uyu mubano tug@@ atuma uba mwiza uk@@ ajyana n’imitekerereze mishy@@ a.” Aya magambo yasaga n’@@ agiye guhindura amateka yari amaze imyaka itatu u Bufaransa butagira Ambasaderi mu Rwanda kuko uheruka ari Michel Fl@@ es@@ ch@@ . Mbere y’uko agenda mu 2015, u Bufaransa bw@@ ahaye u Rwanda izina rishya ry’uwo yifuza ko yayih@@ agarar@@ ira, Fred Const@@ ant, wari usanzwe ari Ambasaderi mu B@@ irwa bya Ant@@ ill@@ es na G@@ uy@@ ane. Ntiy@@ aje koherezwa mu Rwanda kuko hashize igihe kirenga umwaka rut@@ aram@@ wem@@ eza, ajyanwa muri Guinée É@@ qu@@ ator@@ ial@@ e. Mu gihe u Bufaransa nta Ambasaderi bugira mu Rwanda, Char@@ g@@ é d’@@ Af@@ f@@ air@@ es, Etienne de So@@ uza, ni we ukurikirana ibikorwa bya Ambas@@ ade. Mu ntangiriro z’umwaka ushize yabwiye IGIHE ko hari icyizere ko haz@@ aboneka ambasaderi mushya. Ati “Ntabwo nakubwira igihe biz@@ abera, ariko urabizi biterwa n’ubushake bw’ibihugu byombi, tuz@@ areba icyo ahazaza h@@ aduh@@ ish@@ iye. Igik@@ enewe ni ukureba mu buryo bw’igihe kirekir@@ e.” Mu ruzinduko i Paris, Perezida Kagame na Macron bashyigikiye kandidatire ya Mushikiwabo Macron i Paris Izina rya Macron rir@@ ubashywe ku rwego rw’@@ Isi ariko iwe mu gihugu amaze amezi atandatu h@@ anganye no kwigarurira icyizere afitiwe n’abaturage, nyuma y’@@ imyigaragambyo irang@@ ajwe imbere n’abaturage bambaye ak@@ enda k’@@ umuhondo buri muntu aba ategetswe kugendana mum@@ odoka ye, ari naho h@@ akomoka izina ‘@@ Gil@@ ets Ja@@ un@@ es@@ .’ Ubwo Macron yiyamamaz@@ aga ndetse akan@@ atorwa mu 2017, yatangaga icyizere cyo kuzaba umuyobozi ukiri muto uzanye impinduka muri politiki y’u Bufaransa akazana n’impinduka mu bukungu zizatuma imibere@@ yo myiza izamuka n’ubush@@ ob@@ m@@ eri buk@@ ag@@ abany@@ uka. Ibintu byatangiye neza ariko nyuma abantu batangira kugenda bagaragaza icy@@ uh@@ o, ku buryo hagendewe kuri politiki y’ubukungu mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari ya 2018/201@@ 9, abas@@ esenguzi bavugaga ko abak@@ ennye n’ubundi baz@@ arushaho guk@@ ena cyangwa ntibagire icyo biy@@ ungura. Imyigaragambyo ya Gil@@ ets Ja@@ un@@ es yatangiye mu Ukwakira 2018, ku ikubitiro iba iyo kwamagana imisoro yari yashyizwe ku bikomoka kuri peter@@ oli. A@@ gahinda k’@@ abaturage k@@ azamutse kuko igiciro cya lisansi cy@@ iyongereye kuri 23 %, mu gihe abenshi batuye kure y’im@@ ijyi bashak@@ iramo ubuzima bityo bagakoresha imodoka cyane, ku buryo kuzamura uwo musoro byafashwe nk’@@ ibiz@@ anye ubusumbane mu mibereho bijyanye n’amafaranga bakorera n’ibiciro by’@@ ibindi nkenerwa by@@ azam@@ utse. Impamvu z’@@ imy@@ igarag@@ abyo zaje kwaguka noneho zigera ku kiguzi cy’ubuzima cyat@@ um@@ bagiye mu Bufaransa, bituma n’igihe leta yemereye kwisubiraho kuri wa musoro it@@ abasha kun@@ eza bose, maze gahunda z’@@ ubukungu za Perezida Macron zitangira kwin@@ ubir@@ wa. Mu kwezi gushize Perezida Macron yijeje ‘@@ Gil@@ ets Ja@@ un@@ es’ amavugurura arimo kugabanya imisoro ku mish@@ ahara y’abak@@ ozi, kongera pansiyo hit@@ awe ku guta agaciro k’@@ ifaranga n’am@@ avugurura mu mirimo ya leta, hakabaho gahunda zish@@ ishikariza abantu gukora bakar@@ enza imyaka 62 yagenewe kujya mu kiruhuko cy’@@ izab@@ ukuru. Hari kandi gukuraho ishuri rizwi nka ‘@@ Ecole Nation@@ ale d’@@ Administr@@ ation, EN@@ A@@ ’ r@@ iny@@ uramo abo mu miryango ikomeye ari nabo bav@@ amo abayobozi bakuru muri Leta, na Macron ubwe akaba yarar@@ yiz@@ emo. Ibi ngo byakorwa hagamijwe gutanga amahirwe ku bantu bose. Yavuze ko yumva akababaro k’@@ abaturage babona ko bir@@ engag@@ ijwe, ko azakora ku buryo ubutegetsi bw@@ eg@@ erezwa abaturage, uturere tug@@ ahabwa ububasha bw@@ isumb@@ uye, kuko wasangaga “hari abantu benshi i Paris bafata ibyemezo batazi uko ibintu byifashe mu baturag@@ e”. Iyi myigaragambyo ikomeje kugenda ic@@ ogora nyuma yo kuba ku minsi ya gatandatu 23 yikurikiranya ndetse ikaba yar@@ akunze kurangwa n’@@ ubugizi bwa nabi ku buryo hari benshi bay@@ ifati@@ wemo ubu bafunzwe ndetse abandi bagejejwe imbere y’ink@@ iko. U Rwanda duhagaze neza mu buvuzi bwa Coronavirus - Dr Nsanzimana Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima (RBC) Dr Nsanzimana Sab@@ in, avuga ko u Rwanda ruhagaze neza mu buvuzi bwa Coronavirus no mu bushakashatsi bunyuranye bw’@@ umuti wo kuvura iyo vir@@ us. Dr Nsanzimana Sabin Ubwo yari mu kiganiro U@@ by@@ umva U@@ te cya KT Radio cyo ku itariki 27 Gicurasi 2020, uwo muyobozi yagaragaje ibipimo u Rwanda rumaze kugeraho mu kuvura Coronavirus agendeye ku bipimo by’@@ ibihugu binyuranye ku isi. Yavuze ko n’ubwo umuti wa Coronavirus utar@@ aboneka, u Rwanda ruhagaze neza mu bushakashatsi mu gushaka uburyo iyo ndwara iv@@ urwa. Yagize ati “Kugeza ubu u Rwanda duhagaze neza. Nta muti ur@@ aboneka wiz@@ ewe, hari imiti yagiye ica mu igeragezwa n’iy@@ agiye yiz@@ erwa cyane byagera hagati bikarangira bid@@ ak@@ unze. Uz@@ wi cyane ni Ch@@ l@@ oro@@ qu@@ ine, Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ukaba Umuryango mpuzamahanga ushinzwe iby’@@ ubuzima wamaze guhagarika ubushakashatsi bw@@ akorwaga kuri uwo mut@@ i. Natwe twari twar@@ atangiye kwinjira mu itsinda mpuzamahanga rikora ubushakashatsi ku miti na wo ur@@ imo, twar@@ abih@@ agaritse nta n’umuntu n’umwe twari twak@@ awuh@@ aye@@ ”. Arongera Ati “Hari indi miti igera kuri itatu duk@@ urikirana itanga icyizere, hari uwo turi kwitaho cyane tutar@@ atangira gutanga aha mu Rwanda, gusa ubushakashatsi bwa mbere bur@@ agaragaza ko ushobora kugira ingaruka nziza kurusha Ch@@ l@@ oro@@ qu@@ ine yamaze no kuva muri uru rug@@ amba@@ ”. Yagarutse ku iterambere ry’@@ ubuvuzi bwa Coronavirus mu Rwanda, aho kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hatar@@ aboneka umurwayi wo ku gipimo cya nyuma. Agira ati “Kugeza uyu munsi, nta barwayi turag@@ ira bari bagera ku rwego bita ubuvuzi bw@@ isumb@@ uyeho kuko twari twar@@ aby@@ iteguye byose, ni ikintu tw@@ ishimira, iyo umurwayi ageze kuri icyo gipimo cya nyuma, birag@@ orana kumuv@@ ura, n’amahirwe yo gukira aba ari mak@@ e”. Abajijwe n’umunyamakuru ibanga u Rwanda rufite ryo kuba umubare w’@@ abarwayi bakira Coronavirus ukomeje kwiyongera, Dr Nz@@ anz@@ imana yavuze ko uburyo bwa mbere bw@@ ifashishwa ari ukw@@ ita cyane ku bar@@ wayi, mu rwego rwo gufasha umubiri w’@@ umurwayi kwirwanaho mu guhangana n’iyo vir@@ us. Ikindi ngo ni uburyo bwo kuvura iby@@ urir@@ izi, umuntu ag@@ akira n’ubwo nta miti ir@@ aboneka ku isi hose ivura COVID-19. Yavuze ko u Rwanda rufite akarusho ku bindi bihugu, aho kugeza ubu rw@@ akat@@ aje mu gupima abantu benshi mu buryo bwihuse. Agira ati “Mu bijyanye no gupima Coronavirus, hari itsinda ry’@@ abashakashatsi bacu bamaze iminsi bap@@ ima mu buryo bwihuse, ndetse twan@@ aby@@ anditseho inkuru y’@@ ubushakashatsi ishobora gufasha n’ibindi bihugu@@ ”. Arongera ati “Hari uburyo d@@ upima abantu benshi icyar@@ imwe, nk’@@ ibihumbi bibiri mu buryo bwihuse. Ni abashakashatsi muri Laboratwari yacu bic@@ aye, bar@@ areba basanga bir@@ akunda. Ubu hari ibihugu byinshi biri kutug@@ isha inama bat@@ ubaza uburyo tub@@ ikor@@ a”. Dr Nsanzimana kandi, yavuze ko hari n’irindi tsinda riri mu bushakashatsi bwo gupima hifashishijwe ibipimo byo mu Rwanda, aho bakurikirana abakize ngo harebwe ubudahangarwa umubiri wabo wagiye ukora, ubwoko bw@@ abwo, n’abasirikare b’@@ umubiri, ndetse hakaba h@@ igwa n’ubwoko bwa vir@@ us. Ati “@@ Ndetse na virus ubwayo turi kuy@@ iga, kugira ngo turebe ko iyo dufite mu Rwanda itandukanye n’iyo mu bindi bihugu nko muri Aziya cyangwa muri Amerik@@ a”. Uko u Rwanda ruhagaze mu guhashya icyorezo cya Coronavirus Dr Nsanzimana avuga ko mu mezi abiri n’igice ashize habonetse umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus mu Rwanda. Ingamba zafashwe zatumye icyo cyorezo kid@@ akwirakw@@ ira mu baturage, akaba ari na yo mpamvu kugeza ubu Coronavirus it@@ as@@ akaye mu baturage. Yavuze ko kugeza ku itariki 27 Gicurasi 2020, hari hamaze kuboneka abarwayi 3@@ 46 aho 24@@ 5 ari abak@@ ize, abari bakir@@ waye bag@@ ikurikir@@ anwa bakaba 10@@ 1. Avuga ko hari amasomo menshi y@@ izwe aho urugamba rug@@ ikomeje abantu bakaba basabwa kwirinda kwirara kuko icyorezo gikomeje guhindura isura hirya no hino ku isi. Ati “Mu rwego rw’@@ ubuzima, tubona uyu ari umwanya wo gufungura amaso kurushaho kuko ibihugu byinshi byagiye bik@@ umira byagera hagati bik@@ irara imibare ikab@@ ibana myinshi ik@@ anab@@ is@@ iga, mu Rwanda turacy@@ afite agahenge tugomba gufat@@ iran@@ a”. Yavuze ko mu gihe raporo ya buri munsi ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima igaragaje umubare munini w’@@ abarwayi bashya, ko bidakwiye gutera Abanyarwanda impung@@ enge. Ati “@@ Nkunda kuvuga ngo iyo twabonye imibare myinshi biba ari byiza, kuko uba wabonye ikibazo aho giherereye ugafata n’ingamba uko bikwiye. Kubona imibare mike bishobora gusobanura ibintu bibir@@ i: ibipimo wafashe bishobora kuba bitari bihagije cyangwa byafashwe ah@@ atari ho, cyangwa se big@@ asobanura ko icyorezo kiri kug@@ abanuka. Buriya rero nta bipimo turag@@ eraho ngo tw@@ ishimire ko twageze ku mibare tw@@ ifuza, iyaba byad@@ ush@@ obok@@ eraga ngo d@@ up@@ ime abantu bose tumenye uko bah@@ agaz@@ e”. Yavuze ko mu byumweru bitatu bishize, abarwayi bashya ari abafite aho bahuriye n’aba@@ twara amakamyo yam@@ bukiranya imipaka, abo bahuye n’abo baz@@ anye, icyorezo kikaba kiva mu gihugu kimwe kijya mu kindi aho abo bashyiriweho ingamba zo gupimwa batar@@ ahura n’abaturage. Ati “Mu minsi ishize akazi kacu kar@@ ahindutse, aho uyu munsi akazi kacu g@@ akorerwa ku mipaka kurusha uko mbere by@@ adus@@ abaga gushakisha abantu mu ngo zab@@ o”. Mu Rwanda uburyo bwo gupima Coronavirus bw@@ ageze mu Ntara Dr Nsanzimana yavuze ko uburyo bwo gupima Coronavirus bukomeje kwiyongera, aho mu ntara hatangiye gushyirwa ibyuma byifashishwa mu gupima iyo ndwara. Intara y’Iburasirazuba ni yo yab@@ imburiye izindi, aho ibitaro bya Rwamagana byamaze kubona imashini igiye kwifashishwa mu gupima Coronavirus ikan@@ ifashishwa no gupima Virusi itera SIDA. Ngo ni yo mpamvu hakomeje kugaragara ubwiyongere bw’@@ abarwayi mu bipimo bifatwa ku munsi, aho ku nshuro ya mbere abagera ku bihumbi bibiri bapimwe ku munsi umwe. Imashini yahawe ibitaro bya Rwamagana igiye kwifashishwa mu gupima Coronavirus Dr Nsanzimana abajijwe n’umunyamakuru impamvu abantu batemerewe gus@@ urana baturutse mu ntara zinyuranye, ariko abaturuka hanze y’igihugu bo bak@@ emererwa kwinj@@ ira, yasubije ko imigend@@ eranire y’ibihugu igenda ikom@@ orerwa mu bushishozi hashingiwe ku buryo imibare y’@@ abarwayi igenda ig@@ abanuka, ndetse ngo ni na byo bigend@@ erwaho mu gihugu runaka, aho serivise zimwe na zimwe zigenda z@@ ifungurwa bitewe n’uburyo icyo cyorezo cy@@ ifash@@ e. Ngo ubwo ku itariki ya 1 Kamena hagiye gufungurwa z@@ er@@ iv@@ ise zimwe na zim@@ we, ubu hafashwe ingamba zo gupima abaz@@ akora muri izo seriv@@ ise, urugero abamotari n’abandi bakora ingendo zinyuranye zifite aho zih@@ urira n’abantu benshi, hagamijwe kwirinda ko virus yakwirakw@@ izwa mu bantu. Yavuze kandi ko kuba ingendo zihuza Intara n’Umujyi wa Kigali zigiye gus@@ ubuk@@ urwa, bid@@ ateye impungenge kuko mu bipimo bafashe basanze mu mujyi wa Kigali nta coronavirus irimo. Agira ati “Mbere twari dufite impungenge z’uko Umujyi wa Kigali ari wo w@@ ibas@@ iwe, abantu bakaba bajyana Coronavirus kure aho tudashobora gutanga ubutabazi bwihuse. Ubu ikigaragara ni uko mu Mujyi wa Kigali nta kimenyetso na kimwe kit@@ wereka ko hari coronavirus iri kugenda tut@@ azi. Aho iri tur@@ ahabona ku mipaka n’ahandi tur@@ ayik@@ urikirana muri abo batwara amak@@ am@@ yo, icyo tuzakomeza kureba ni uko hat@@ avuka ahandi hantu hari coronavirus yakw@@ injira mu baturage. Matayo 19@@ :3-@@ 6: Abaf@@ arizayi baza aho ari kugira ngo bam@@ uteg@@ ere mu byo avuga, baram@@ ubaza bati: "@@ Mbese bir@@ emewe ko umugabo yirukana umugore we ku mpamvu ibonetse yos@@ e?" Nuko rero ntih@@ akag@@ ire umuntu ut@@ andukanya abo Imana yafat@@ anyij@@ e." 1@@ Abakorinto 7@@ :3@@ 9: Umugore aba aham@@ biriwe ku mugabo we igihe cyose uwo mugabo akiriho. Ntabwo wavuga ireme ry'uburezi ut@@ ongereye ubushobozi bw'@@ abarimu –@@ MINEDUC Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri MINEDUC ushinzwe amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye yatangaje ko uburezi bufite ireme ari bwo buzafasha abanyarwanda mu iterambere ariko kandi akavuga ko igihe abarimu bazaba bat@@ it@@ aweho iryo r@@ eme ntaho ryat@@ uruka. Ibi yabitangaje kuri uyu wa 21 Ukuboza 2016 ubwo yasozaga amahugurwa y'@@ abarimu bitwa aba ment@@ ors mu ishuri ryisumbuye ry@@ itiriwe mutagatifu Aloys ry'@@ i Rwamagana. (G@@ . S St@@ a@@ int Aloy@@ s) Aba barimu ubusanzwe baba bafite inshingano yo guhugura bagenzi babo mu rurimi rw'@@ icyongereza bavuga ko bazafasha abana kugera ku ireme ry'uburezi ariko bakavuga ko hari bamwe mu bana biga nabi bitewe n'@@ ubukene abandi big@@ aturuka ku babyeyi babo. Umwe muri bo witwa G@@ irik@@ wayo Phocas yemeza ko ayo mahugurwa azatuma uburezi bugira ireme kuko bayak@@ uyemo byinshi ariko akavuga ko muri iki gihe ngo ababyey@@ io basa n'aho bah@@ ariye abarimu uburere bw'abana babo kandi ngo ubundi haba hakenewe ubufatanye ku babyeyi n'abar@@ imu. Yagize " Tur@@ ishimira ko baduha amahugurwa, tuzakomeza gufasha ibigo by'amashuri tw@@ atur@@ utsemo ariko hakwiye ubufatanye n'inzego zose kugirango tuz@@ agere ku nshingano zacu, nibyo tubonye amahugurwa ariko hari bamwe mu bana bagenda bata ishuri kubera ibibazo byo miryango bigatuma bat@@ iga neza na byo bikagira ingaruka ku ireme ry'@@ ubur@@ ez@@ i." Yakomeje agira ati: "@@ Ababyeyi bamwe bakwiye guhindura imyumvire kandi abag@@ aragara ko bakeneye gufashwa basanzwe bafashwa ariko hari uruhare rw'@@ umubyeyi agira mu gushakira umwana iby'@@ ibanze bituma yiga neza." Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y'uburezi ushinzwe amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye Isaac Munyakazi agaruka ku bibazo by'@@ ireme ry'uburezi we yavuze ko mbere na mbere abarimu bagomba kubanza guhugurwa kugira ngo babone aho bakura rya r@@ eme ry'@@ uburezi. Yagize ati: "@@ ntabwo wavuga ireme ry'uburezi ud@@ afashije abarimu mu kubongerera ubushobozi, ubu hamaze guhugurwa bagera ku 15@@ 36 kandi bose b'abanyarwanda mu gihe tug@@ itangira twak@@ oreshaga abanyamahanga kuko hashize igihe gito dutangiye kwigisha mu rurimi rw'@@ icyongereza, ubu turi muri gahunda yo kuvugurura uburyo bw' imyigishirize kugirango uburezi bur@@ usheho kugira irem@@ e" Agaruka ku ruhare rw'@@ ababyeyi, Munyakazi yagize ati: "@@ uruhare rwa buri munyarwanda rur@@ akenewe kugirango uburezi bug@@ ire ireme kuko uburere ntib@@ ureba Minisiteri y'uburezi gusa, nta mwana ugomba kuv@@ utswa amahirwe yo kwiga ngo abantu bar@@ ebere kandi Leta yo ikora ibishoboka ngo buri mwana yig@@ e kandi neza , Tuzakomeza gukangurira inzego zose n'ababyeyi gufasha abana kwiga neza kuko nta mwana ugejeje igihe cyo kwiga wakagombye kuva mu ishur@@ i." Mu Rwanda hag@@ itangira gukoreshwa ururimi rw'@@ icyongereza mu burezi, hari benshi mu barimu byabereye imbogamizi kuko bat@@ umvaga neza icyongereza, ibi byatumye Leta iha akazi bamwe mu banyamahanga ariko ishyiraho gahunda yo guhugura abarimu na bo bakajya guhugura abandi muri uru rurimi mu rwego rwo gushimangira ireme ry'uburezi mu Rwanda. Iki kiciro gis@@ ojwe kuri uyu wa gatatu cyari kirimo abarimu 340 baturutse mu turere twose tw'@@ u Rwanda. Justin Ngabonziza

Ubuy@@ obozi, inzego z'umutekano n'abaturage bafatanyije kuzimya iyi nkongi y'@@ umuriro. Ababyeyi bari baje kureba abana babo ntib@@ ishimiye ko hat@@ aha aba bana gusa, kuko bo bavugaga ko abana bose bakwiye gutaha hak@@ abanza hak@@ amenyekana igitera izi nkongi z'@@ umuriro zimaze kuba ubugira gatatu muri iki kigo. Abanyeshuri biga mu mwaka wa gatandatu, nabo bari mu bat@@ ashye, baravuga ko bahangayikishijwe n'@@ ikizamini cya Leta bagomba gukora uyu mwaka, ngo kuko amak@@ aye yabo yose yarahiye kuburyo kuzabona aho bigira biz@@ abagora cyane. Iyi nkongi yongeye kwibasira aya macumbi nyuma y'aho tariki 20@@ /05/201@@ 3 na 23@@ /04/201@@ 3 yari yahiye agak@@ ong@@ oka. Ku nshuro ya kabiri 20@@ /05/201@@ 3 bwo aba banyeshuri ntib@@ ongeye gutaha kuko hakozwe ibishoboka abana bagakomeza amasomo. Iri shuri risanzwe riz@@ wiho kuza mu myanya ya mbere mu gutsind@@ isha abanyeshuri benshi mu kizamini cya Leta. Kugeza ubu ntih@@ aramenyekana icyaba cy@@ ihishe inyuma y'@@ izi nkongi z'@@ umuriro. Abasirikare bakuru bakiriye APR FC mu bus@@ abane, Manzi Thierry abizeza gutwara ibikombe byose (Amafoto) Abasirikare bakuru mu ngabo z’u Rwanda (RDF) barangajwe imbere n’Umuyobozi w’@@ icyubahiro wa APR FC akaba n’@@ Umujyanama wa Perezida wa Repubulika mu bijyanye n’@@ Umut@@ ekano, Gen James Kabarebe, baraye bakiriye abakinnyi n’abatoza b’iyi kipe mu bus@@ abane bwabereye mu Kigo cya Gisirikare kiri i Gako mu Karere ka Bugesera, kuri iki Cyumweru. Hari kandi Umugaba mukuru w’@@ Inkeragutabara Gen. Fred Ib@@ ingira, Perezida wa APR FC akaba n’@@ Umugenzuzi mukuru wa RD@@ F, Lt Gen. Jacques Musemakweli ndetse n’Umuyobozi wungirije wa APR FC akaba n’umuyobozi w’ingabo mu ntara y’Uburasirazuba n’Umujyi wa Kigali, Maj Gen. Mubar@@ aka Mug@@ anga. Bar@@ umuna ba APR FC bo mu ikipe y’@@ Intare FC n’abayobozi b’@@ amatsinda y’abafana ba APR FC mu gihugu cyose, bitabiriye ubu bus@@ abane bwo kwishimira uko iyi kipe yitwaye mu mwaka wa 2019 nubwo yaw@@ us@@ oje nta gikombe yeguk@@ anye. Perezida w’@@ icyubahiro wa APR FC, Gen. James Kabarebe, wari umushyitsi mukuru muri uyu muhango, yashimiye abakinnyi n’abatoza uko bitwaye mu 2019, anasaba kugira imyumvire y’uko iyi kipe igomba gutsinda buri gihe. Ati ”@@ Tur@@ abashimira umusaruro mw@@ agize mu mwaka ushize wa 2019, mwakoze byinshi kandi byiza turifuza kub@@ ikomeza kandi tug@@ asoza neza, bir@@ ashoboka, nta na kimwe kiz@@ at@@ ubuz@@ a. Kuva APR FC yash@@ ingwa, ubu nibwo tugize ikipe nziza ifite ubuyobozi bwiza, abatoza beza, abakinnyi beza ndetse n’abafana beza iyo urebye neza hose usanga h@@ uz@@ uye@@ .’’ ” Niba byose rero bimeze neza, ikintu cyo gukosora kugeza ubu ni kimwe gusa kandi mugomba kuz@@ irik@@ ana, ni imyumvire ya APR FC. Iyi myumvire ntabwo ig@@ oranye ni uko APR FC ijya gukina igomba gutsinda byanze bik@@ unze, iyi myumvire rero iyo igiye mu bat@@ oza, abakinnyi ndetse n’abafana twese tukajya ku kibuga twumva ko tugomba gutsinda nta cyat@@ ubuza kub@@ iger@@ aho.” Kapiteni wa APR FC, Manzi Thierry, wavuze mu izina ry’@@ abakinnyi, yashimiye ubuyobozi buh@@ ora ikipe hafi ndetse n’abafana bababaye inyuma bakab@@ injiza mu mwaka w’@@ imihigo wa 2020 bari ku mwanya wa mbere. Uyu mukinnyi yijeje Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe y’ingabo kuz@@ egukana ibikombe byose biz@@ akinirwa mu Rwanda muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 uhereye ku G@@ ikombe cy’@@ Intwari kiz@@ atangwa tariki ya 1 Gashyantare uyu mwaka. Ati ‘’@@ Tw@@ asoje umwaka wa 2019 turi ku mwanya wa mbere ku rutonde rw’agateganyo rwa shampiyona, ariko ntibih@@ agije kuko uyu mwaka twatangiye wa 2020 ari uw’@@ imihigo kandi tugomba guh@@ ig@@ ura, tugomba ku@@ bashim@@ isha bitewe n’icyizere mut@@ ugirira n’uburyo mud@@ utera imbaraga zo gukora cyane.” ”@@ Uyu mwaka dutangiye urimo akazi g@@ akomeye, harimo imikino yo kwishyura ya shampiyona ya 2019-@@ 20 twan@@ atang@@ iye, igikombe cy’@@ Intwari ndetse n’igikombe cy’@@ Amahoro. Kuri twe abakinnyi imbag@@ ara zir@@ ahari, intego dufite ni uguh@@ aranira gutwara ibyo bikombe byose kandi tugomba kuy@@ iger@@ aho.” APR FC yatangiye umwaka wa 2020 inganya na AS Kigali ubusa ku busa, iyoboye Shampiyona n’amanota 38 nyuma y’imikino 16, irusha amanota ane Rayon Sports ya kabiri. Ikipe y’ingabo iz@@ agaruka mu kibuga ku Cyumweru, yakira Bugesera FC mu mukino uzabera kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo. Kompanyi ’@@ Vis@@ a’ yashyizeho Umuyobozi Mukuru mu bihugu birimo n’u Rwanda Kompanyi ifite uburyo bwo kwishyura hifashishijwe ikarita y’ikoranabuhanga ‘@@ Vis@@ a’, yashyizeho Cor@@ ine Mb@@ i@@ ak@@ et@@ ch@@ a, ngo ay@@ ibere Visi Perezida n’Umuyobozi Mukuru wayo mu Karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, akaz@@ atangira inshingano kuwa 5 Ugushyingo 2019. M@@ bab@@ i@@ ak@@ et@@ ch@@ a yari asanzwe ari umuyobozi mu kigo cya Or@@ ac@@ le, mu ishami ryacyo rikorera muri Kenya, aho yari ashinzwe ibijyanye n’@@ ikoranabuhanga. Inshingano yahawe zirimo kuyobora ikipe ifite icyicaro i Nairobi, aho az@@ afatanya nayo mu kuzamura ubucuruzi bwa Visa mu bihugu birimo Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, u Rwanda, Maurit@@ ius na Ethiopia, akaba ari naho iyi Kompanyi ya Visa ifite isoko rinini mu bihugu 13 byo mu karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba ikor@@ eramo. Az@@ aba kandi ashinzwe ibikorwa byose birimo kubaka umubano urambye hagati ya Visa n’abak@@ iriya bayo, abagenzuzi ndetse n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa mu kwimakaza umuco wo kwishyura h@@ ifash@@ ijijwe ikoranabuhanga nta kujyana amafaranga mu ntoki. Umuyobozi wa Kompanyi ya Visa muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sah@@ ara, A@@ ida Diar@@ ra, yavuze ko Cor@@ ine yaz@@ iye igihe cyane ko ngo azafasha Afurika y’Iburasirazuba gukoresha uburyo bwizewe bwo kwishyura hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga. Ati “@@ Cor@@ ine yaz@@ iye igihe muri Visa kuko azafasha Afurika y’Iburasirazuba mu nzira yo kuva mu kwishyurana amafaranga mu ntoki ahubwo bagakoresha uburyo bwiz@@ ewe, but@@ ekanye bwo kwishyura hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga n’ubufatanye n’ibindi bigo byim@@ akaza ikoranabuhanga mu by’@@ imar@@ i.” Cor@@ ine Mb@@ i@@ ak@@ et@@ ch@@ a nawe yavuze ko yishimiye kujya mu ikipe y’abakozi ba Vis@@ a, yizeza imikoranire myiza n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo. Cor@@ ine Mb@@ i@@ ak@@ et@@ ch@@ a wagizwe Umuyobozi wa Visa muri Afurika y'Iburasirazuba
REG yatangije “H@@ uz@@ a”, ikoranabuhanga rya miliyoni enye z’amadolari riz@@ ifashishwa mu guhuza imikorere Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ingufu (R@@ EG@@ ), cy@@ atangije ku mugaragaro ikoranabuhanga ryitwa ‘H@@ uz@@ a’, kivuga ko kiz@@ ar@@ yifashishwa mu kugenzura no guhuriza hamwe imirimo yose. Raporo y’@@ Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta y’umwaka wa 2016 yagaragaje ko muri REG hari ububiko bwa miliyari 1.5 bud@@ akoresh@@ wa, ibigega by’amazi yajyan@@ waga kuri Kalis@@ imbi mu mushinga wa Ge@@ oth@@ er@@ m@@ al bya Miliyari 2.@@ 7 Frw bimaze imyaka itatu bid@@ akoreshwa n’ibindi bikoresho bya miliyari 1.5 bis@@ ohoka mu bubiko gake cyane. Ibyo n’ibindi ni bimwe mu byo umuyobozi ushinzwe uwo mushinga Patrick J. Mw@@ es@@ ig@@ ye, yavuze ko iryo koranabuhanga riz@@ akemura ndetse rikan@@ afasha mu kuzamura urwo rwego. Yagize ati “@@ Iryo koranabuhanga rizafasha REG n’ibigo byayo mu kugenzura mu buryo bwaba ubw’@@ amafaranga, imicungire y’abak@@ ozi, int@@ onde z’@@ abakozi, gutanga amasoko no gukora imishing@@ a. Usibye ibyo kandi gahunda zose zo kuyobora umuriro w’amashanyarazi byose bikaz@@ akorwa kuri mudasobwa hifashishijwe iryo kor@@ anabuh@@ anga.” Nyuma yayo kandi hateganyijwe gutangizwa irindi ryitwa C@@ ust@@ om@@ er Management Syst@@ em@@ , rizafasha abakiliya gukorana na sosiyete zitanga umuriro haba mu buj@@ yanama, mu kuvug@@ ana, guhabwa ubuj@@ yanama, aho umuriro wac@@ itse, ikibazo cyabaye cyose kig@@ ahita kigaragara muri mudasobwa. Mw@@ es@@ igye avuga ko iryo koranabuhanga rizafasha kugabanya ibikoresho byagend@@ eraga mu micungire mibi kuko buri kintu cyose kizajya kiba cyageze mu REG kizajya kiba kizwi ndetse inag@@ ikurikir@@ ane. Ati “Buri kigo mu bigo byose bya REG gifite ubub@@ iko, iryo koranabuhanga rizafasha nk’umuntu uri mu Bugesera ku buryo niba ibikoresho bizajya biba byam@@ ush@@ iranye azajya ar@@ ebaho akamenya ko mu bundi bubiko buri i Remera harimo ibyo ak@@ eneye, agahita abis@@ aba@@ .” Umuyobozi Mukuru wa REG@@ , R@@ on We@@ is@@ s, yavuze ko iryo koranabuhanga rizafasha mu kugenzura no kwihutisha imikorere y’@@ urwego rw’@@ ingufu mu Rwanda. Yagize ati “Nd@@ asaba ko iri koranabuhanga twaz@@ arik@@ oresha kugira ngo tugeze ku ndunduro ibyo abakiliya bacu bose b@@ ifuz@@ a.” Urwego rw’@@ ingufu mu Rwanda rwateye imbere mu myaka irindwi ishize bitewe n’ingamba nyinshi Guverinoma yashyizeho zirimo kongera ing@@ omero z’amashanyarazi no korohereza abash@@ akaga gushora imari muri urwo rwego byatumye haboneka MW 20@@ 8.@@ 36 zivuye kuri MW 97 zar@@ iho mu 2010. Uko kongera umubare wa megaw@@ ate byan@@ azamuye umubare w’Abanyarwanda bafite amashanyarazi bava ku ngo 2@@ 88@@ 6@@ 85 zingana na 10.@@ 8% mu 2010 zigera kuri 28@@ 9@@ 3000 mu 2017 zingana na 3@@ 4.@@ 6%.
