Ikigo gishinzwe imis@@ oro@@ ( RR@@ A) cyashyize hanze urutonde rw'@@ abarimo Leta imyenda basabwa kwishyura byihuse Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe imisoro n'amahoro (RRA) cyashyize ahagaragara urutonde rw'@@ ibigo n'abantu ku giti cyabo bab@@ ereyemo Leta imyenda nkuko itangazo ry'@@ iki kigo r@@ ibis@@ aba ngo aba bantu bakaba basabwa kwishyura iyo myenda bitarenze mu minsi 10 uhereye ku itariki 15 Nzeri 2014. Dore urutonde rw'@@ amazina y'@@ ibigo n'abantu ku giti cyabo bagomba kwishyura Leta vuba. Ng@@ iryo itangazo risaba abo bantu kwishyura vuba Leta ikaba yar@@ ahagurukiye ikibazo cy'@@ abantu bashaka kugira amafaranga yayo ay@@ abo, kuko mu minsi ibiri ishize nibwo na Minisiteri y'@@ Ubutabera yashyize hanze urutonde rw'@@ abany@@ ereje imitungo ya Leta, bamwe bagejejwe mu nkiko, abandi basabwa kwishyura vuba. Abana bigishijwe kwizigamira bakiri bato bar@@ abik@@ urana bik@@ abagirira akamaro bakuze Ababyeyi n'@@ abarezi barak@@ angurirwa gutangira kwigisha abana kwizigamira bakiri bato, kugira ngo ubwo bazaba bamaze gukura ntibiz@@ abagore kubera ko bizaba by@@ ababa@@ yemo umuco, nk'uko bitangazwa n'@@ Ishyirahamwe ry'@@ Ibigo by@@ imari bic@@ iriritse (@@ AM@@ IR@@ ). Iri shyirahamwe ryatangiye ubushakashatsi bugamije guhug@@ urira abanyeshuri bakiri mu mashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye guk@@ urana umuco wo kwizig@@ am@@ ira. Gusa n'ubwo bigoye ko abakiri bato bakw@@ izig@@ amira kubera ntaho bakura amafaranga, ariko biba byiza byibura iyo bak@@ uranye icyo gitekerezo kugira ngo kiba@@ b@@ emo umuco, nk'uko bitangazwa na Faustin Z@@ Ih@@ iga uyobora inama y'ubutegetsi muri AM@@ IR@@ . Ati: "Mu gihe tugezemo kugira ngo igihugu cy'u Rwanda k@@ ibashe gutera imbere ni uko tugomba gukira ishoramari rirambye. Ish@@ oramari rirambye ntir@@ ishobora kubaho igihugu kit@@ izig@@ ama, Abanyarwanda bat@@ izig@@ ama. Kugira ngo uwo muco wo kwizig@@ ama ush@@ inge imizi ugomba guhera mu bana bat@@ oya. Abakuru baba batangiye kugira ibintu byinshi bibasaba gukoresha amafarang@@ a". Z@@ ih@@ iga yabitangarije mu mahugurwa yagenewe abarezi bo mu bigo by'amashuri bitandukanye yabaye kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 18@@ /07/201@@ 3. Yasobanuye ko akenshi iyo umuntu atigeze y@@ izig@@ ama akiri muto bimug@@ ora iyo abonye akazi kuko hari ibindi byinshi ahita ashyiraho umutima, birimo kubaka, gushinga urugo. Nubwo abana nta mafaranga bagira, Z@@ ih@@ iga yemeza ko kwizigamira kw'@@ abana biba bit@@ agambiriye kubika amafaranga ahubwo ari ukub@@ ibat@@ oz@@ amo nk'@@ umuco. Ibi ni nabyo byagarutsweho na bamwe mu barimu nabo bemeza ko ari igitekerezo cyiza ariko bagasaba ko iyi gahunda yash@@ akirwa umwanya wo kwinjizwa mu masomo asanzwe, nk'uko be@@ yemejwe n'umwe mu bayobozi b'ibigo witwa Jerem@@ ie Sin@@ amen@@ ye. Ati: "@@ Birumvikana ko abanyeshuri twigisha nta mafaranga bagira ariko hari impano bajya bah@@ abwa. Iyo umubyeyi amubwiye ati watsinze akamuh@@ ereza wenda nk'@@ amafaranga 500. Wa mwana aho kugira ngo yiruk@@ anke ajye kuy@@ agura amab@@ ombo, ashobora kwizig@@ am@@ iraho 400 ijana wenda akaba ariryo ag@@ uramo nk'@@ amab@@ ombo ariko noneho n'ikindi gihe ariko agenda y@@ izig@@ amira cyane cyane ko ibigo by'imari byinshi dukorana nabyo amak@@ onti bay@@ abaf@@ ung@@ urira ku bun@@ tu@@ ." Iyi gahunda izatangira ku mushinga AM@@ IR yatanze muri D@@ F@@ ID@@ , waje gutor@@ anywa muri 26 yatoranyijwe mu 150 yari yat@@ anzwe. B@@ izera ko mu gihe cy'imyaka ibiri y'@@ igerageza uzamara kugira ngo D@@ F@@ ID ibone kuw@@ ut@@ angiza hari icyo bizaba byahinduye ku myumvire y'@@ abana. AM@@ IR kandi yiyemeje gukora ubuvugizi ku bigo by'imari iciriritse ih@@ uriza hamwe kugira ngo byoroh@@ ereze abanyeshuri bo muri za kaminuza bat@@ ashyizwe ku rutonde rw'@@ abagomba gukomeza kurih@@ irwa. Emmanuel N. Hitimana

Rwamagana: Ngo urumuri rutaz@@ ima ni ikimenyetso gitanga icyizere cy'@@ ahazaza heza Mu muhango wo kwakira urumuri rutaz@@ ima mu karere ka Rwamagana wabereye ku musozi wa Mw@@ urire kuwa 20@@ /03/201@@ 4, abaturage b'akarere ka Rwamagana basabwe kwakira uru rumuri mu mitima yabo nk'ikimenyetso cy'uko Abanyarwanda bavuye mu icuraburindi u Rwanda rwash@@ ow@@ emo n'@@ amahano ya Jenoside, bakinjira mu mucyo utanga icyizere cy'@@ ahazaza heza. Mw@@ urire ni agasozi kamwe mu duce tw'@@ akarere ka Rwamagana k@@ akor@@ eweho ubwicanyi ndengakamere mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kuko mu gihe kit@@ arenga ibyumweru bibiri gusa, ubwo Jenoside yari itang@@ iye, aka gasozi k@@ ic@@ iweho Abatutsi basaga ibihumbi 26, mbere y'uko Ingabo zahoze ari iza FPR Inkotanyi z@@ afataga aka gace zik@@ anab@@ ohora abari bas@@ umbir@@ ijwe n'ab@@ icanyi ku itariki ya 20@@ /04/@@ 1994. Aba ni abana b'@@ imyaka 20 batwaye urumuri rw'@@ Icyizere nk'ikimenyetso ko nyuma y'imyaka 20 u Rwanda rwose rufite icyizere cy'@@ ejo hazaza. Abah@@ ar@@ okokeye batanga ubuhamya bagaragaza ko mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ngo abah@@ igwaga baturutse muri za s@@ egiteri zitandukanye zari zigize icyahoze ari komini B@@ ic@@ umbi, bahungiye ku kibuga cya Mw@@ urire ariko ngo bakag@@ abwaho ibitero bikomeye n'abas@@ irikare. Is@@ t@@ inda ry'@@ abaturage ba Gatsibo ryaje rih@@ erekeje urumuri rw'@@ Icyizere rir@@ ushyikiriza abaturage ba Rwamagana. Mbere ngo bagerageje kwirwanaho ariko ku matariki ashyira 20@@ /04/@@ 1994, haje igitero simusiga cy'@@ abasirikare benshi kandi bafite ibikoresho bya gisirikare bikomeye, ari nacyo cy@@ ishe Abatutsi bari bahat@@ er@@ aniye, har@@ okoka mbar@@ wa. Ku itariki ya 20@@ /04/@@ 1994 ngo ni bwo ingabo zahoze ari iza FPR Inkotanyi zah@@ as@@ esek@@ aye, maze zir@@ okora abari bagih@@ umeka ndetse abandi ziba@@ jyana kwa muganga. Mu kwakira urumuri rutaz@@ ima muri aka karere, abaturage bibukijwe ko aya ari amateka mabi u Rwanda rw@@ anyuzemo kandi ko bagomba kuy@@ azirikana kugira ngo ataz@@ ababera impf@@ abus@@ a, ahubwo ko bay@@ ubak@@ iraho barwanya ikibi bagaharanira icy@@ iza, nk'uko byagarutsweho na minisitiri w'@@ Ib@@ ikor@@ waremezo, Professor Silas Lwak@@ abamba wari umushyitsi mukuru muri uwo muhango. Abaturage ba Rwamagana bakiriye urumuri rw'@@ Icyizere ari benshi. G@@ ahura Joseph war@@ okokeye kuri aka gasozi avuga ko nyuma y'uko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ih@@ agaritswe n'ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi, ngo yagerageje kwir@@ emamo icyizere, ar@@ akora kandi ak@@ ishimira ko ubu abayeho neza. Ku bwe ngo uru rumuri ar@@ ubona nk'ikimenyetso cyo "@@ Kuva ib@@ uzimu ukajya ib@@ untu@@ " kandi u Rwanda rug@@ aharanira amateka meza kugira ngo abantu bad@@ ahora mu bibi bid@@ ashira. Kayiranga Jean Claude na we war@@ okokeye kuri aka gasozi ka Mw@@ urire ubwo yari afite imyaka 19 y'amavuko, ngo yariy@@ ubatse ajya mu mashuri ku buryo ubu arangije icyiciro cya kabiri cya kaminuza. Avuga ko uru rumuri rus@@ obanuye icyizere mu mitima y'Abanyarwanda bose kuko ngo mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, abantu bari bafite umwijima muri bo, bityo ngo uru rumuri rukaba rugamije kubam@@ urikira kugira ngo hatazagira uw@@ ongera gusubira mu bikorwa bibi, ahubwo bose bakabana mu mahoro. Minisitiri Silas Lwak@@ abamba yavuze ko urumuri rutaz@@ ima ari ikimenyetso gitanga icyizere cy'@@ ahazaza ku Rwanda. Mu batanze ubuhamya batandukanye harimo n'uw@@ akoze Jenoside wir@@ eze akemera icyaha, bashimiye leta y'u Rwanda uburyo yim@@ akaje ubumwe n'ubwiyunge mu Banyarwanda kandi ikaba iharanira ko buri muturage wese yash@@ ingira ku Bun@@ yarwanda ak@@ iteza imbere. Akarere ka Rwamagana ni akarere ka 24 k@@ akiriye urumuri rutaz@@ ima ruvuye mu karere ka Gatsibo. Uru rumuri ruk@@ az@@ akomereza mu karere ka Bugesera ku wa 22@@ /03/201@@ 4. Emmanuel Ntivuguruzwa

Ibitekerezo by’@@ abanyamadini ku gusengera abarwaye SIDA bag@@ akira Ni kenshi hirya no hino mu Rwanda no mu mahanga humvikana abavuga ko bakize virusi itera SIDA abandi bakavuga ko bay@@ ivura bifashishije ibim@@ era, amasengesho cyangwa izindi mbar@@ aga. Abakora muri serivisi z’ubuvuzi bo bany@@ omoza abir@@ irwa bavuga ko bakize virusi itera SIDA burundu, bakemeza ko iyi ndwara idak@@ ira. Iyi ni ingingo abakozi b’Imana mu Rwanda bat@@ avug@@ aho rumwe kuko hari ab@@ emeza ko umukozi w’Imana yas@@ engera ufite virusi ya SIDA agak@@ ira, abandi bakavuga ko ari ubuy@@ obe. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Mata, abagize ihuriro ry’@@ abanyamadini n’amatorero ryita ku buzima mu Rwanda rizwi nka (Rwanda Inter@@ fa@@ ith Counc@@ il on He@@ alth@@ , R@@ IC@@ H@@ ) bahuguwe ku buryo bafasha abayoboke babo kwirinda, ariko n’aba@@ maze kwandura nabo bak@@ abakangurira gufata imiti. Intego za Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ni uko mu 2020 nibura 90% by’@@ abafite virusi itera Sida bazaba babizi binyuze mu kwip@@ im@@ isha, 90% by’@@ abamaze kwandura bakazaba bafata imiti igabanya ubuk@@ ana, naho 90% by’@@ abafashe imiti igabanya ubukana bikagaragara ko ubwandu bwabo bwag@@ abanutse. Bamwe mu bany@@ amadini baganiriye na IGIHE bagaragaje ko intego yabo ari ukubwira intama bayobora kuva mu cyaha bakirinda ingeso y’@@ ubusambanyi. Ku birebana n’uko hari abigisha bamwe babwira abo bayobora banduye virusi itera Sida ko babas@@ engera bagak@@ ira, mu idini ya Isilamu bavuga ko ibi atari ukuri. Umujyanama wa Mufti w’u Rwanda Sheikh Mbarushimana Suleiman yavuze ko gusengera umuntu ag@@ akira SIDA bitari mu myemerere ya Islam@@ . Yagize ati “Twe iriya myemerere ivuga ko umuntu asengera undi ag@@ akira nta miti yafashe ivura kandi yemezwa n’abahanga ntabwo tub@@ yemera ndetse ntabwo biri mu myemerere shingiro twebwe tugend@@ eraho. Tw@@ emera ko umuntu avurwa agak@@ izwa n’uko yany@@ we@@ we imiti yemejwe n’abaganga gus@@ engerwa akamaro bim@@ ara, ni uko bimw@@ ongerera kugira icyizere gituma arushaho kud@@ ahung@@ aban@@ a.” Yakomeje agira ati “K@@ uvuga gusa ngo umuntu yag@@ usengera nta kintu wafashe cy’@@ umuti, iyo myemerere ntabwo tu@@ yemera keretse iyo uri mu rwego rw’@@ Int@@ umwa, iyo ntumwa noneho ikaba ari Imana im@@ uhaye igitangaza kandi ibyo ntabwo biba kuri buri wes@@ e.” Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Kabgayi muri Kiliziya Gatolika, Musenyeri Smaragde Mbonyintege yavuze ko Imana ishatse gukiza urwaye SIDA yab@@ ikora icyakora ashimangira ko nta we ar@@ abona by@@ abayeho. Yagize ati “Imana ishatse kugira uwo iha iyo ng@@ abire ag@@ akira tway@@ ishimira, nanjye hari abo nzi bagiye bavuga ngo bakize iyi ndwara no muri Gatolika ariko nyuma ukabona ba bantu baracy@@ anduye. Niba Imana yarahaye umuntu ubwenge kandi ik@@ amubwira ngo ntaz@@ as@@ ambane yareg@@ angaho agas@@ amb@@ ana, aho kujya kuyir@@ ukira bir@@ utwa no kuy@@ isaba imbabazi kandi ukareba uko w@@ ifata, aho niho duh@@ agaz@@ e.” Yavuze ko abafite ubwandu bwa virusi itera SIDA bakwiriye kweg@@ erwa kugira ngo bat@@ ih@@ eba kandi bag@@ asobanurirwa kugira ngo bad@@ asubira mu bus@@ ambanyi. Pasiteri Mukansanga Step@@ hanie wo mu itorero rya Zion Temple we avuga ko Imana ishobora gukiza umuntu. Yagize ati “M@@ we mugomba kumenya ko Imana ishobora byose, ntacyo id@@ ash@@ obora. Imana irema umuntu yan@@ anirwa kumuk@@ iza? Icyakora nubwo umuntu ahabwa ubutumwa ko yakize n’ubundi ajya kumenya ko abana n’ubwandu bwa SIDA yab@@ imenye ari uko avuye kwip@@ im@@ isha, no kumenya ko yakize agomba kub@@ ishimangira ari uko avuye kwip@@ imish@@ a.” Mukansanga yavuze ko abantu bagomba kwemera ko ibitangaza bibaho kuko Imana ikora byose. Ati “G@@ ukira rwose birashoboka ijana ku ijana ntabwo ari 90@@ %, igitangaza se ni iki? igitangaza ni ikintu cyiza utak@@ iteg@@ urag@@ a”. Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abantu barenga ibihumbi 220 nibo bafite ubwandu bw’agakoko gatera Sida. Ubwo Pasiteri Mukansanga yabazwaga impamvu ibi bitangaza bid@@ akor@@ eka kuri benshi muri aba, yagize ati “Ese mu gihe Yesu yaz@@ uraga Lazaro mu git@@ uro, nta bandi bapf@@ u bari barim@@ o? Bari barimo ahubwo ni ukuvuga ngo umuntu wese agira umunsi we w’@@ igitangaza, Imana ikiza rero ni nayo iz@@ ura, iy@@ abikoze ntaho yagiye iracy@@ akora ibitangaz@@ a.” Gusa nawe avuga ko abakozi b’Imana bagomba gushishikariza abo bayobora gufata imiti kugira ngo igihugu kiz@@ agere kuri cya kigereranyo kih@@ aye. Ikigo gishinzwe ubuzima mu Rwanda, RBC giherutse gutangaza ko nta muntu bar@@ apima ngo bas@@ ange yarak@@ ize SIDA burundu.
Jay Polly na Riderman bagiye gususurutsa Abanya-@@ Rubavu At@@ urage bo mu Karere ka Rubavu bakunda umuziki ntibaz@@ icwa n’ir@@ ungu mu mpera z’iki cyumweru kuko bazat@@ aram@@ irwa na bamwe mu bahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda. Jay Polly na Riderman bagiye guhurira mu gitaramo i Rubavu Biteganijwe ko kuri uyu wa gatandatu tariki ya 28 Ukwakira 2017 ari bwo hazaba amarushanwa ya nyuma yo kuririmba yo guhitamo umuhanzi urusha abandi impano mu Karere ka Rubavu. Ibyo birori bizabera ahahoze inkambi ya Nk@@ amira ni byo biz@@ as@@ usur@@ utswa n’abahanzi barimo Jay Polly, Riderman, Young Grace, Kh@@ all@@ ed na Bosebabireba n’abandi bahanzi bo muri Rubavu. Niyigena S@@ ano, umwe mu bateguye icyo gitaramo atangaza ko batumiye abo bahanzi bagendeye ku busabe bwa benshi mu rubyiruko rw’i Rubavu. Agira ati “Tw@@ anyuze mu mashuri t@@ ubaza abantu bifuza kubona kuri uwo munsi abenshi bahurije kuri biriya bih@@ angange bimaze kwandika izina mu Rwanda. Tur@@ izera ko bizaba ibirori by’@@ akataraboneka kandi bizabera urugero impano zisanzwe ziboneka muri Rubav@@ u.” Ayo marushanwa yo kureba Umunya-@@ Rubavu urusha abandi impano mu kuririmba, az@@ ahuza abahanzi 12 batsinze nyuma y’@@ ijonjora ryakozwe mu bahanzi 3@@ 17. Minisante yavuze icy@@ agabanya umuvuduko ukabije w’@@ ubwiyongere bw’abaturage b’u Rwanda Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’@@ Ibarurishamibare (NIS@@ R), kigaragaza ko umuvuduko w’@@ ubwiyongere bw’Abanyarwanda werekana ko mu 2050 baz@@ ikuba kabiri, mu gihe haba nta gikozwe mu gushyiraho buryo buhamye bwo kuboneza urubyaro bak@@ ikuba gatatu. NIS@@ R igaragaza ko ubu, u Rwanda rut@@ uwe n’abaturage bagera kuri 12,@@ 08@@ 9,@@ 7@@ 21, bivuze ko nta gikozwe bagera muri miliyoni 39 mu 20@@ 50. Minisiteri y’ubuzima (@@ Minis@@ ant@@ e), yerekana ko umubare w’abana bavuka buri mwaka ukomeje kwiyongera, kuko ibarura rya kane ry’abaturage ryo mu 2012, ryerekana ko abagore bo mu Rwanda babyara abana barenga ibihumbi 300 ku mwaka, naho impuzandengo y’abana ku mugore umwe ikaba abana 4.@@ 2. Iyi Minisiteri ivuga kugira ngo umuvuduko w’@@ ubwiyongere bw’abaturage ug@@ aban@@ uke bityo impuzandengo y’abana ku mugore umwe ibe abana 2.@@ 3, abashakanye bakwiye gukoresha uburyo burambye bwo kuboneza urubyaro. Dr Bikorimana Ferdin@@ and, Umuyobozi w’@@ agashami gashinzwe ubuzima bw’umwana n’umubyeyi muri Minis@@ ant@@ e, anagira inama urubyiruko yo kwirinda gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina idak@@ ing@@ iye. Ati “Kugira ngo umubare w’abana bavuka buri mwaka ug@@ aban@@ uke, ni uko abashakanye bakoresha uburyo burambye bwo kuboneza urubyaro. Hari nk’@@ agapira bashyira mu kiz@@ igira cy’@@ umugore, agapira bashyira mu m@@ ura w’@@ umugore, hari n’igihe habaho uburyo bwo kw@@ ifung@@ isha burund@@ u”. Yakomeje asobanura ko imiti ikoreshwa mu kubuza gus@@ ama, yifitemo ubushobozi bwo guhindura imikorere y’umubiri kubera ko igizwe n’imis@@ emburo (@@ hor@@ mon@@ es) ihindura isanzwe itera umugore ubur@@ umbuk@@ e. Iyi miti iyo igeze mu mubiri ituma umusemburo utuma umugore ajya mu bur@@ umbuke id@@ akora, bityo bikaba bitashoboka ko as@@ ama. Iyi miti iramutse ikoreshejwe neza, yag@@ abanya umubare w’abana bavuka buri mwaka. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Minisante mu mwaka wa 2016, bugaragaza ko mu mwaka wa 2005 gahunda zo kuboneza urubyaro zitab@@ irwaga n’abaturage 10@@ %, mu 2007 bakagera ku gipimo cya 28@@ %, mu 2010 bakagera kuri 4@@ 5% naho mu 2015 bakagera kuri 48@@ %. Ibi bipimo bigaragaza ko umuvuduko w’ab@@ itabira serivise zo kuboneza urubyaro wag@@ abanutse. Ubwo bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko abantu bagera kuri 18@@ % bakenera serivise zo kuboneza urubyaro ntibaz@@ ibon@@ e. Zimwe mu mpamvu zig@@ aragazwa nk’iz@@ akom@@ ye mu nkokora ubwo bw@@ itabire zishingiye ku bakozi bake batanga izo seriv@@ ise, amavuriro yegereye abaturage akiri make, amavuriro amwe ad@@ atanga serivise zo kuboneza urubyaro, agakingirizo k@@ atak@@ iboneka ku buryo bw@@ oroheye abag@@ akeneye hakiyongeraho ubujiji n’imyumvire bituma kuboneza urubyaro byumvikana nabi. Kugeza ubu haracyari miliyoni 2@@ 14 z’@@ abagore bo mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira y’amaj@@ yambere bashaka kwirinda gusama ariko batag@@ erwaho na serivisi zab@@ ibafash@@ amo. Ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko aba bagore babonye serivisi kuboneza urubyaro byatuma buri mwaka abagore bagera kuri 76 000, bad@@ apfa ndetse bigatuma ¾ by’@@ inda zitateguwe zir@@ indwa zik@@ ava kuri miliyoni 89 zikagera kuri miliyoni 22 ku mwaka, inda z@@ ivamo zik@@ ava kuri miliyoni 48 zikagera kuri 12 ku mwaka ndetse hak@@ azig@@ amwa miliyari 8.@@ 3 z’amadolari atangwa mu kwita ku bagore batwite n’abana bav@@ utse. Dr Bikorimana avuga ko kuboneza urubyaro no kwirinda imibonano mpuzabitsina idak@@ ingiye byag@@ abanya ubwiyongere bw'abaturage Abash@@ akanye barasabwa gukoresha uburyo burambye bwo kuboneza urubyaro [email protected]
Abaturage bikoreye urugomero ruto rub@@ yara amashanyarazi Abaturage batuye Umurenge wa Musange muri Nyamagabe, bikoreye urugomero ruto rub@@ yara amashanyarazi babasha kuva mu bwigunge no gukorera ahari umwij@@ ima. Nyuma yo kuba mu bw@@ ing@@ unge nta mashanyarazi ngo abaturage babashe gukora ibikorwa bibateza imbere, ngo babe ban@@ abyaza umuriro w'amashanyarazi umusaruro, bamwe mu batuye umurenge wa Mus@@ ange, Akagari ka Mas@@ izi biy@@ ubakiye urugomero rub@@ yara amashanyarazi. Abaturage baby@@ aje umugezi muto urug@@ ore rutanga amashy@@ an@@ r@@ azi babasha kwiteza imbere mu bikorwa bitandukanye bik@@ enera amashanyarazi. Igitekerezo cyo kwiyubakira urugomero kikaba cyar@@ aturutse mu baturage, bamaze kubona ko hari byinshi batabasha gukora kandi bik@@ enera amashanyarazi. Venuste Musaby@@ imana, umwe mu bagize igitekerezo cyo kuzana amashanyarazi yatangaje ko bamaze gusanga bakeneye amashanyarazi, bifashishije ibikoresho bitandukanye babasha kuy@@ azana mu murenge wabo. Yagize ati "T@@ wari dufite ikibazo cy'@@ ahantu twajya duc@@ ag@@ inga amat@@ eref@@ oni, tugira igitekerezo gutyo, tw@@ ishakamo ubushobozi twubaka urug@@ om@@ ero, twashatse amazi ku kag@@ ezi kitwa Gis@@ uma, noneho tug@@ ura n'@@ imashini iy@@ ahind@@ uramo amashanyarazi gusa ubu iyi mashini yar@@ angir@@ its@@ e." Abac@@ ur@@ uriza muri iyi sent@@ erere bifuza ko ubuyobozi bw@@ abag@@ oboka kuko imashini yatumaga bac@@ ana y@@ angiritse. Yakomeje avuga ko amashanyarazi yar@@ abaf@@ itiye akamaro yari yar@@ abaku@@ ye mu bw@@ ing@@ unge barig@@ ukora ibishoboka ngo bag@@ ure indi mach@@ ine is@@ imbura iy@@ apfuye. Yagize ati "@@ Mbere ntit@@ wabonaga aho duc@@ ag@@ inga amat@@ eref@@ oni ariko ubu turah@@ afite, ubu dukorera mu mucyo niho ubucuruzi bwih@@ uta, abantu ntibat@@ ahe kare, ukabona ko bifasha abikorera, ubu turi kwisuganya ngo turebe ko twak@@ ongera kugura iyo mashini y@@ angir@@ its@@ e." Vinc@@ ente N@@ ayit@@ urik@@ i, ucuruza imiti y'@@ amatungo atangaza babangamiwe no kuba batag@@ ic@@ ana. Yagize ati "@@ Ahantu hari amashanyarazi ibintu byose bir@@ agenda, ntayo dufite akazi k@@ agenda nabi, kuko n'ubundi batubwira ko tugomba gukora amanywa n'@@ ijoro, ubu saa ku mi n'ebyiri umuntu aba y@@ afunz@@ e." Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Nyamagabe Philbert Mugisha atangaza ko bashimira ibyo abaturage bakoze, ariko ko mu minsi mike amashanyarazi azaba yabag@@ ezeho n'indi mirenge it@@ ay@@ afite. Ati "@@ Aba baturage bakeneye kung@@ anirwa ngo amashanyarazi agere n'ahandi atag@@ eze, turi kuganira n'inzego bireba ku buryo uyu mwaka utaha cyangwa uz@@ akurikira bazaba ba@@ yabon@@ ye." Kugeza ubu imirenge Nkom@@ ane, Mug@@ ano na Musange ku mirenge 17 igize Akarere ka Nyamagabe niyo yari isigaye idafite amashanyarazi. Ca@@ iss@@ y Christine Nak@@ ure

Mu minsi ishize umutoza Luc E@@ ym@@ ael yari yatangarije ibit@@ ang@@ z@@ amakuru byo mu Rwanda ko ubuyobozi bw'@@ ikipe ya APR FC bw@@ amusabye ibyangombwa bamusaba kuza kuyit@@ oza. Umunyamabanga wa APR FC Kalisa Adolphe Camarade wab@@ eshy@@ uje E@@ ym@@ ael yagize ati:" Mur@@ abizi ko iy'@@ umutoza ag@@ iye, abatoza benshi bohereza ibyangombwa byabo basaba akazi. Si ubwa mbere umutoza Luc E@@ ym@@ ael avuga ko APR FC imw@@ ifuza kuko ubwo yamaraga kuva mu Rwanda yirukanywe muri Gicurasi 2015 yatangaje ko nabwo ngo bari bifuje ko yaza kubat@@ oreza APR FC. Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziherutse gutangaza ibihano byafatiwe Sosiyete y’@@ Ikoranabuhanga ya Huawe@@ i, by’umwihariko Google y@@ anzura ko Huawei itazongera gukoresha porogaramu zayo za Android muri telefoni ishyira ku isoko. Iz@@ ingiro nyamukuru ry’@@ ikibazo cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na Huawei ni uko iki gihugu cy’@@ igihangange ku Isi cyagaragaje impungenge zo kuba u Bushinwa (aho Huawei ibar@@ iz@@ wa) bushobora kwifashisha ibikoresho bya Huawei mu kun@@ eka ibindi bihugu n’ibigo bitandukanye. Iyo ni yo mpamvu mu 2012 Amerika yabujije sosiyete zitandukanye gukoresha ibikoresho bitanga internet bya Huawe@@ i. Mu gihe Isi ik@@ ataje na internet yihuta ya 5@@ G, Huawei nk’@@ ikigo cya mbere mu gukora ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga byifashishwa mu gusakaza internet yari ku isonga mu kureba uko yabig@@ eza ku isoko ku bwinshi ariko yahise itangira gukom@@ wa mu nk@@ ok@@ ora. Miss Kal@@ imp@@ inya yatangije itsinda rih@@ ug@@ urana ku buzima bw’imyororokere mu mashuri (@@ Amafoto na V@@ ideo) Igisonga cya gatatu cya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda, Kal@@ imp@@ inya Que@@ en, yatangije itsinda rih@@ ug@@ urana ku buzima bw’imyororokere mu bigo by’amashuri abanza n’@@ ayisumbuye, mu gushyira mu bikorwa bimwe mu byo yiyemeje ubwo yiyamamaz@@ aga. Miss Kal@@ imp@@ inya yiy@@ amamariza kuba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda yavugaga ko afite umushinga wo gukora ubukangurambaga bugamije kugabanya impfu z’@@ ababyeyi bapfa babyara ariko cyane cyane abakiri bato kubera ko akenshi ari bo baba bafite ibyago byo gupfa mu gihe bari kubyara. Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu, tariki 13 Nzeri 2017, Miss Kal@@ imp@@ inya, yagend@@ ereye ishuri rya Groupe Scolaire Cyah@@ afi yan@@ izeho mu mashuri abanza, ryo mu Karere ka Nyarugenge, ah@@ atang@@ iriza itsinda yise "B@@ amb@@ e" ryo kungurana ubumenyi ku buzima bw’imyororok@@ ere, rih@@ uriyemo abanyeshuri 40. Biteganyijwe ko iri tsinda rizajya rikora ibiganiro rik@@ ungurwa ubumenyi butandukanye n’aba@@ ku@@ ze basanzwe bafite ubumenyi runaka ku buzima bw’imyororokere hanyuma ab@@ igishijwe na bo bagas@@ akaza ubumenyi bas@@ aruye muri bagenzi babo. At@@ angiza iki gikorwa, Miss Kal@@ imp@@ inya, yasabye abanyeshuri bose bo kuri icyo kigo kwita cyane ku ndangagaciro nziza zikwiye kubar@@ anga no kumenya uko bitwara imbere ya buri muntu kuko bib@@ ubah@@ isha. Y@@ asoban@@ uriye abanyeshuri ko iri tsinda rigamije kurushaho kwigisha ababy@@ iruka kwim@@ enya bakarushaho gusobanukirwa ubuzima bw’imyororokere mu rwego rwo kwirinda inda zit@@ ateganyijwe mu bakiri bato nk’@@ umwihariko w’@@ umushinga we. Yavuze ko kuba mu Rwanda hari umubare uri hejuru w’ab@@ angavu batwara inda zitateg@@ anyijwe, ari ikibazo gikomeye kandi gih@@ angayik@@ ishije. Uyu mukobwa yasobanuye ko itsinda "B@@ amb@@ e" [@@ bishatse gusobanura amarangamutima y’@@ impuh@@ we@@ ], ar@@ yit@@ ezeho kuz@@ afasha mu kugabanya icyo kibazo binyuze mu kwigisha abanyeshuri bakiri urubyiruko ibijyanye n’ubuzima bw’imyororokere kugira ngo barusheho gukura biy@@ izi. Yagize ati "Mu bikorwa by’@@ iri tsinda, tuzajya tw@@ igira hamwe ubuzima bw’imyororok@@ ere, duh@@ ug@@ uran@@ e, m@@ baz@@ anire abafite ubuhanga runaka babah@@ ug@@ ure. Dut@@ angiranye n’abanyeshuri 40 hanyuma abandi tuz@@ agenda tubash@@ yiramo buhoro buhoro ari na ko tujya mu bindi bigo by’amashuri bitandukanye@@ ." Umuyobozi wa Groupe Scolaire Cyah@@ af@@ i, Rut@@ emb@@ esa Faustin, aho uyu mukobwa yatang@@ irije ibikorwa bye, yabwiye IGIHE ko ibyo Miss Kal@@ imp@@ inya yakoze ari intangarugero kuko kuba umwana wah@@ ar@@ erewe yiyumvamo ubutwari bwo kugaruka guhugura barumuna be bahari muri iki gihe ari ibyo gushim@@ wa. Dore ingingo 4 zaz@@ akur@@ engera mugihe utandukanye n’uwo mw@@ akundanaga Abantu benshi bakunze gufata urukundo nk’@@ ikintu kidasanzwe cyangwa bakar@@ uha indi sura rut@@ akagombye kugira bitewe n’ubur@@ yo, igihe cyangwa inshuro bak@@ unze. Ik@@ iz@@ akubwira ibi ni uko usanga hari abas@@ es@@ agura mu gihe bari mu rukundo cyangwa ugasanga b@@ ibagiwe indi mishinga yabat@@ eza imbere kuko baba bibereye mu kin@@ yenga nyamara bakiy@@ ibagiza ko ejo cyangwa ejobundi byas@@ eswa buri wese ag@@ asub@@ irwa kubera ubukene cyangwa igihombo yatewe no kubara nabi. Hano hari ibintu by’ingenzi bishobora gufasha umuntu wese uri mu rukundo yaba arug@@ iyemo vuba cyangwa ar@@ us@@ anzwemo kuko nubwo gukunda no gukundwa ari byiza biba byiza kurushaho iyo umuntu afite amikoro n’@@ ’@@ izindi nsh@@ uti. 1. Ubw@@ ig@@ enge. Hari igihe usanga abantu barabaye abacakara b’@@ abo bakundana bitewe n’iby@@ iyumv@@ o abakunzi babo bafite bityo ugasanga buri wese yumva ko bahorana basangira ariko bakiy@@ ibagiza ko bishobora gushira bag@@ asub@@ iran@@ amo. Ubw@@ ig@@ enge, ntibis@@ obanuye kudas@@ abana n’umukunzi wawe, ahubwo na none bisobanura kuba ufite umurongo ngenderwaho ku buryo ushobora no kubona akanya ko gusabana n’abandi ndetse no gukora utundi dush@@ inga twag@@ uteza imbere. Hari abantu rero usanga barabaye nk’@@ abacakara b’@@ urukundo ku buryo na bo ubwabo nta kanya biha ko gutekereza ku byahise n’@@ ahazaza muri rusange. Muri icyo gihe, umwe aba ari nk’@@ ikig@@ eragezo cy’@@ undi aho kumubera umufasha n’umw@@ ungan@@ izi. 2. Imy@@ izer@@ ere. B@@ aca umugani ngo ingendo y’@@ undi ir@@ avun@@ a. Aha abantu benshi usanga barya ibyo abakunzi babo barya cyangwa banywa nyamara mbere atari ko byari bimeze. Aha rero, abashakashatsi bavuga ko atari byiza guhindura imyizerere kubera umuntu mugenzi wawe kuko rimwe na rimwe bishobora kuz@@ amug@@ iraho ingar@@ uko mu buryo at@@ ateg@@ uye. Aha tug@@ aruka cyane ku bijyanye n’amadini aho umwe ahind@@ urira mugenzi we ngo bakunde babane nyamara nyuma byar@@ angira buri wese agasubira ku ke. Ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko umuntu ug@@ ufitiye urukundo adashobora kukw@@ angira ibyo ur@@ ya, wiz@@ era, unywa cyangwa uko uri ahubwo ko ugomba kumw@@ iy@@ ereka uko uri hanyuma nawe akakw@@ akira hatabayeho kwiy@@ ober@@ anya. 3. Inzozi zawe cyangwa intego. Iyo uri mu rukundo, ntibivuze ko uh@@ induye ibyo wari wit@@ eze kuzag@@ eraho. Kuba wiga indimi ukabona inshuti yiga mu m@@ ibare, ntibivuze ko na we uz@@ ahita uhindura ukaba umunyam@@ ibare bitewe n’uko uwo muntu wamw@@ iyumv@@ isemo ahubwo ugomba gukomeza intego wari war@@ ihaye mutar@@ akund@@ ana. Akenshi abantu bagera mu rukundo ugasanga ni rwo bahaye umwanya munini ndetse bamwe bakan@@ agendera ku bitekerezo by’@@ abakunzi babo nyamara bak@@ ibagirwa ko na bo hari icyo bari bar@@ iyemeje mbere cyangwa ko bashobora kuzana igitekerezo gishya cyaz@@ abateza imbere bombi. 4. Umuryango Si byiza kubona inshuti ngo ucike ku bavandimwe bawe n’izindi nshuti muri rusange. Umuryango rero ntibivuze abo muv@@ ukana gusa ahubwo n’abo mwah@@ oranye mu gihe wari ukiri wenyine utar@@ abona umukunzi baba abahungu n’abak@@ obwa. Umukunzi wawe rero ntagomba kug@@ uca ku bantu mwar@@ er@@ anywe cyangwa mw@@ agendanye mut@@ aram@@ eny@@ ana dore ko hari n’abakora ikosa ryo k@@ osh@@ y@@ wa n’uwo bakundana ngo niba yanga umuntu nawe amw@@ ange. Ibi rero ni amakosa akomeye kuko mu isi yuzuye abantu b’@@ imico n’imyitwarire bitandukanye ntago uba ugomba kwiga iby’@@ uwo mukundana gusa ahubwo uba ugomba no kongera kubona akanya gah@@ agije ko gusabana no gusangira n’abandi.
Amb Mas@@ ozera yagaragaje uruhare rw’abahanzi n’abanyamakuru mu gusigasira Ikinyarwanda Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Inteko y’@@ Umuco, Ambasaderi Mas@@ ozera Robert yatangaje ko abahanzi n’abanyamakuru bari ku mwanya wa mbere w’@@ ibyiciro by’abantu bashobora gutuma ururimi kavukire rugira ibyago byo kuz@@ imira cyangwa ruk@@ av@@ angirwa n’iz’@@ amahanga. Yabig@@ arutseho kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 18 Gashyantare 2021, mu biganiro byahuje Inteko y’@@ Umuco, Abahanzi n’@@ Abanyamakuru biri mu muj@@ yo w’icyumweru cyahariwe kur@@ iz@@ ikana ku rurimi kavukire kiz@@ asozwa hizihizwa Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’@@ Ur@@ irimi Kav@@ ukir@@ e. Amb Mas@@ ozera yavuze ko abantu bagira uruhare rukomeye mu mikoreshereze y’@@ ururimi no guteza imbere umuco w’igihugu, ari nabo bafite uruhare rukomeye rwo kurinda ko ibyo byombi biv@@ angirwa n’indi mico cyangwa bikaz@@ imira. Ni mu gihe Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Bur@@ ezi, Ubumenyi n’Umuco (UN@@ ES@@ CO@@ ), rigaragaza ko nibura indimi ziri hejuru ya 44@@ % y’@@ iz@@ ikoreshwa ku Isi zamaze kuz@@ imira naho izindi zikaba z@@ aragiye zih@@ ura n’ibindi bibazo byo kuv@@ angir@@ wa. Amb Mas@@ ozera yagize ati “Ntabwo ari ibintu biza mu ijoro rimwe cyangwa umunsi umwe, ngo usange wenda ur@@ irimi rw@@ az@@ imiye cyangwa rwagiye mu kaga. Ni ibintu bigenda biza abantu bat@@ abizi habaho kuvanga ind@@ imi, kurug@@ or@@ eka, kwih@@ imbira amagambo mashya, bityo bityo bikaz@@ arangira rwa rurimi rw’@@ umwimerere rwar@@ ahindutse ibintu ut@@ amenya ibyo ariby@@ o.” Amb Mas@@ ozera yavuze ko abantu benshi usanga bad@@ akoresha neza ururimi cyangwa bak@@ itandukanye n’umuco wabo akenshi baba batazi ko ariko bimeze ahubwo bash@@ iduka ur@@ imi n’indangagaciro zabo byatangiye kuv@@ angir@@ wa. Ati “@@ Igit@@ eye impungenge kandi ni uko akenshi ababig@@ iramo uruhare usanga babikora bat@@ abig@@ ambir@@ iye, batazi ingaruka z@@ abyo. Ntabwo ari uko baba bay@@ obewe urur@@ imi, ahubwo ni abantu baba basa n’abakur@@ ikiye izindi nyungu runaka ariko zishyira ururimi rwacu mu kaga n’indangagaciro z’@@ umuc@@ o.” Amb Mas@@ ozera yavuze kandi ko abahanzi n’abanyamakuru nk’abantu bak@@ urikirwa cyangwa bakund@@ wa n’ing@@ eri nyinshi , bityo bakaba aribo bakwiye gufata iya mbere mu kurinda ur@@ imi kavukire n’indangagaciro z’@@ umuco. Yakomeje agira ati “U@@ ruhare rw’abahanzi n’abanyamakuru ni runini cyane kuko abantu bashobora kurinda ururimi bikab@@ orohera ni abahanzi n’abanyamakuru, ni nabo kandi bashobora kugira uruhare kuri bya bibazo byo kurush@@ yira mu kag@@ a.” Mu biganiro byatanzwe hari icy@@ atanzwe n’@@ Umushakashatsi akaba n’Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’@@ Umuco mu Nteko y’@@ Umuco, Nsanzabaganwa Modeste wagarutse ku kwibutsa ko ururimi ari agaciro k’@@ uruk@@ oresha kandi iyo ruk@@ oreshejwe neza byubaka agaciro k’@@ igihugu. Umuhanzi Danny Vumbi yagize ati “Uyu wakabaye umukoro wa mbere w’Inteko y’umuco gushaka amagambo y’@@ Ikinyarwanda n’iyo yaba ac@@ uzwe asimbura ayo twita amat@@ ir@@ ano nka link@@ , net@@ wor@@ k, fir@@ igo, amaf@@ ir@@ iti, n’andi mensh@@ i.” Umunyamakuru akaba n’umuh@@ anzi, Bis@@ angwa Ng@@ anji Benjamin yagize ati “Hari aho bishobora gutera impaka, kuko ubuhanzi ni ikindi k@@ intu. Rusizi: Abacuruzi banze kwimukira mu isoko rishya Abacuruzi bac@@ urur@@ izaga mu isoko rya Kamembe ritar@@ avugururwa bateje imy@@ ivumbagatanyo ku gicamunsi cyo kuwa 17@@ /10/201@@ 2 ubwo basabwaga gutanga amafaranga ngo bahabwe ibibanza mu isoko rishy@@ a. Abo bacuruzi bari bamaze iminsi bacururiza mu bik@@ ari by'@@ amazu y'abaturage nyuma y'@@ iryo soko ryari ririmo kubakwa bavuga ko ibyo bik@@ ari by@@ abatwaye amafaranga arenga miliyoni bakaba bibaza uko ayo mafaranga bazay@@ agar@@ uza. Igik@@ ari bac@@ urur@@ iz@@ agamo bag@@ isoh@@ ow@@ emo ngo bajye mu isoko rya kij@@ yambere. Ikindi kibazo nuko abo bacuruzi bataz@@ emererwa gusubira mu isoko bose ngo kuko iryo soko rishya ryabaye rit@@ o. Abo bacuruzi batangaje ko batazigera bajya muri iryo soko bat@@ agiye bose dore ko n'ubundi bari basanzwe bakorera hamwe. Abo bacuruzi bas@@ ohowe aho bac@@ urur@@ izaga biriwe hanze akazi k@@ ahagaze bamwe bavuga ko ngo ubuzima buhagaze kubera ko bari bat@@ uzwe n'aho hantu bakor@@ eraga. Inyubako basabwa kwim@@ uk@@ iramo. Bamwe mu bacuruzi bavuga ko hari bamwe bash@@ ukwa n'@@ abagenzi babo kuko kuba bacururiza muri ibyo bik@@ ari harimo abad@@ atanga imisoro ya Leta bakih@@ isha muri bagenzi babo. Bamwe muri aba bacuruzi wabonaga ko babaye cyane kuko ababyeyi bamwe barimo kurira batekereza aho baz@@ avana amafaranga yo kwishyura inguzanyo bafashe mu gihe bubak@@ aga icyo gikari wag@@ ereranya n'@@ isoko bafung@@ iwe. U Rwanda rw@@ ungutse robo@@ t eshatu zifashishwa mu gukumira Covid-19 Minisiteri y’@@ Ikoranabuhanga na In@@ ov@@ asiyo yashyikirije Minisiteri y’Ubuzima robo@@ t eshatu zizajya zifashishwa mu gukora isuku ahahurira abantu benshi mu kurushaho kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Covid-19. Izi robo@@ t zatanzwe ku nkunga y’Umuryango UND@@ P Rwanda na Guverinoma y’u Buyapani. Z@@ it@@ ezweho gufasha muri serivisi z’ubuzima kurushaho guhangana n’@@ ikwirakwira rya Covid-19 bitewe n’uko zizajya zifashishwa mu gukora isuku ahantu hahurira abantu benshi nko mu bitaro, mu mas@@ oko, ku mipaka no ku bibuga by’@@ indege. Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu Gishinzwe Ubuzima, RBC, Dr Sabin Nsanz@@ imana, yavuze ko izi robo@@ t zigiye gutanga umusanzu ukomeye no kurushaho kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’@@ icyor@@ ezo. Ati “Ibi bikoresho bizadufasha gusukura ahantu hashobora kuba hari vir@@ usi, cyangwa izindi mikorobe zitera indwara, kandi mu buryo bwihuse. Twebwe nk’@@ inzego z’ubuzima twishimiye ubu bufasha bw@@ iyongereye ku bikoresho twari dufite bizajya bidufasha kuko twajyaga tuv@@ anga imiti dukoresheje amap@@ om@@ pe asanzwe ubu rero big@@ eye koroh@@ a kuko izi mashini zizajya z@@ ikoresh@@ wa.” Uretse no guhanga na Covid-19 ariko Dr Nsanzimana yavuze ko bishimiye ko zizajya zikora no mu kurwanya n’izindi ndwara zand@@ ura. Uhagarariye UND@@ P mu Rwanda, Max@@ wel@@ l Gom@@ era, yavuze ko ibi bikoresho bigiye kuba igisubizo mu kurandura burundu iki cyorezo. Ati “Iyo tur@@ ebye, iri kor@@ anab@@ unga riz@@ adufasha guhashya iki cyorezo, ubu dufite icyizere cyo gukira binyuze muri siyansi itera imbere. Nka UND@@ P twishimiye gukorana na Minisiteri y’ikoranabuhanga tw@@ ohereza robo@@ t eshatu za UV@@ -@@ C ziz@@ akoreshwa mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19. Izi robo@@ t kandi zigaragaza imbaraga zo guhanga udushya mu guhangana n’@@ ikwirakwira ry’@@ indwara kandi ni intsinzi ikomeye ku ikor@@ anab@@ ung@@ a.” Y@@ uko Hot@@ ta wari uhagarariye Ambasade y’u Buyapani mu Rwanda, yashim@@ ingiye ko u Rwanda ari igihugu cyafashe iya mbere mu guhangana na Covid-19 ndetse ko u Buyapani buzakomeza kur@@ uba hafi. Ati “Tw@@ ishimira uruhare u Rwanda rugaragaza mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya Covid-19. U Buyapani turi gukora ku buryo nta gihugu twifuza ko cy@@ azas@@ igara kit@@ agezweho n’@@ uruk@@ ingo. M@@ fashe uyu mwanya nsh@@ imangira ko tuzakomeza gutera ingabo mu bitugu inshuti zacu z’u Rwanda.” Izi robo@@ t z@@ ashyikirijwe Urwego rw’@@ ubuvuzi zit@@ ezweho guhashya burundu ikwirakwira rya Covid-19, zifite agaciro kangana na miliyoni 210 Frw bivuze ko nibura imwe ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 70 Frw. Biteganyijwe ko robo@@ t imwe iz@@ ajyanwa ku kibuga cy’indege i Kanombe, indi ig@@ asigara ku bitaro by’Akarere ka Nyarugenge ahari gukurikir@@ anirwa abarwaye Covid-19 ariko barem@@ bye, naho indi isigaye ikajya ikoreshwa ahantu h@@ anyuranye mu gihe byaba ngomba ko ik@@ ener@@ wa. Imikorere y’izi robo@@ t Muri serivisi z’ubuzima mu Rwanda hari hasanzwe hari robo@@ t eshanu zifashishwa mu kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Covid-19, ari zo Ak@@ azuba@@ , Ikir@@ ezi, Mw@@ iza, Ngabo na Ur@@ umur@@ i, kandi zat@@ anze umusaruro. Bitandukanye n’imiterere y’izi robo@@ t zisanzwe kuko zo zag@@ anir@@ izaga umuntu zik@@ amut@@ egeka icyo akora niba ari kwambara agapfukamunwa guhana intera n’ibindi, izi robo@@ t zo zizajya zifashishwa mu gusukura no kwica za mikorobe mu cyumba runaka cyangwa ahantu runaka mu rwego rwo kurandura burundu Coronavirus. Z@@ ifite ubushobozi bwo gusukura ahantu hari virusi cyangwa mikorobe mu gihe gito haba mu cyumba cy’@@ uru@@ bag@@ iro, laborat@@ wari, ibyumba by’@@ umuh@@ ezo, mu modoka nka amb@@ ul@@ ance n’ahandi, mu gihe cy’@@ iminota 32 biba byamaze gus@@ ukurwa gusa bitewe n’imikorere yazo bisaba ko umuntu afunga icyumba agiye gukor@@ amo isuku hanyuma agakoresha igikoresho cy@@ abugenewe cya tel@@ ek@@ om@@ ande. Impamvu umuntu agomba gufunga ahantu agiye gusukura kandi nawe ntabe arimo ni uko iyi robo@@ t ifite imirasire yica izi virusi ishobora kugira ingaruka ku buzima bw’@@ umuntu. Igihe uy@@ ikoresha rero bigusaba kubanza kugenzura niba nta mw@@ enge uri ahantu ugiye gusukura kugira ngo nawe bit@@ akug@@ iraho ingaruka. Bimwe mu biranga ba Bienv@@ enu Ni umuntu utajya ugaragaza icyo atekereza cyangwa amarangamutima ye kandi agira ibanga bitang@@ aje. Ni umuntu utagira inshuti nyinshi, ntabwo aba ashaka ko bamw@@ injirira mu buzima cyangwa se ngo babe bakin@@ isha umutima we. Ni umuntu ukunda kur@@ imba kandi ar@@ abanza akakw@@ iga mbere yo kuk@@ ugira inshuti ye ngo arebe niba hari icyo wamug@@ ezaho. Ni umuntu usa nk’@@ ubona ubuzima mu buryo bub@@ i,@@ akumva adafite icyizere cy’@@ ahazaza ndetse ugasanga ib@@ ipfa kum@@ ushimisha ari bik@@ e. Ni umuntu udakunda impinduka, aba ashaka ko ibintu bikomeza kugenda uko yabis@@ anze. Y@@ ita ku kazi ke, iyo hari icyo wam@@ ushinze uba wizeye ko ari bug@@ ikore neza at@@ ig@@ anda. Mashami yatangaje abakinnyi 20 Amavubi ajyana muri Seychelles Umutoza w’ikipe y’igihugu Mashami Vincent yamaze gutangaza abakinnyi 20 ajyana muri Seychelles nyuma y’imyitozo ya nyuma yabaye kuri uyu wa Mbere mu gitondo. U Rwanda ruz@@ ahura na Seychelles mu ijonjora rya mbere ryo gushaka itike y’@@ Igikombe cy’Isi cya 2022 kizabera muri Qatar@@ . Imyitozo ya nyuma yabaye kuri uyu wa Mbere, ntiy@@ agarag@@ ayemo abakinnyi bahamagawe barimo N@@ is@@ ir@@ arike Salomon utaz@@ akina iyi mikino na Tuyisenge Jacques uz@@ ahurira na bagenzi be muri Seych@@ elles. Umutoza w’ikipe y’igihugu Mashami Vincent yatangaje kandi abakinnyi 20 azah@@ itamo abo akoresha ku mukino ubanza uzaba ku wa Kane tariki ya 5 Nzeri kuri Stade de L@@ in@@ ite muri Seych@@ elles. Mu bakinnyi 23 bari mu myit@@ ozo, hasigaye abakinnyi bane ari b@@ o: Butera Andrew na Manishimwe Djabel bakinira APR FC, Iradukunda Eric wa Rayon Sports na Mico Justin wa Police FC. Aganira n’abanyamakuru, Mashami Vincent yavuze ko biteguye kwitwara neza muri uyu mukino ubanza, anavuga ko yahisemo gusiga abakinnyi bane kubera impamvu at@@ atangaza mu ruhame. Ati@@ “ Tumaze iminsi irindwi mu myitozo yari imyitozo ikomeye kuko twakoraga kabiri ku munsi. Dus@@ oje imyitozo ya nyuma mbere yo kwerekeza muri Seychelles aho tugiye gushakira itik@@ e”. “Mu busanzwe mu majonjora ya FIFA tw@@ emerewe kujyana abakinnyi kugera kuri 23 ariko ku mpamvu nt@@ atangaza aha hari bane tuz@@ asiga ino. Gusa nit@@ uva muri Seychelles tuz@@ abasanga ino tuk@@ om@@ ez@@ anye kwitegura umukino wo kwishyura hamwe n’umukino w’@@ amajonjora ya CHAN tuz@@ ahuriramo na Ethiop@@ ie@@ ”. Amavubi ar@@ ahaguruka mu Rwanda saa 01@@ :45 hamwe na RwandAir@@ . Nyuma yo gukina umukino ubanza, u Rwanda ruzakira umukino wo kwishyura uzabera kuri Stade ya Kigali tariki ya 10 Nzeri saa 18:@@ 00. APR FC yasezerewe na Dj@@ ol@@ iba AC yo muri Mali mu mikino Nyafurika APR FC yari ihagarariye u Rwanda mu mikino ya CAF Confederation yatsinze Dj@@ ol@@ iba AC ibitego bibiri kuri kimwe mu mukino wo kwishyura kuri uyu wa G@@ t@@ andatu kuri Stade Amahoro ariko isezererwa muri iri rushanwa kubera igitego kimwe yari yatsindiwe mu mukino ubanza wabereye muri Mali mu Cyumweru gishize. Ikipe imwe mu zari zas@@ erukiye u Rwanda mu mikino Nyafurika uyu mwaka ariyo APR FC yari iri gukina CAF Confederation Cup yasezerewe ku giter@@ anyo cy’@@ ibitego 2-2 mu mikino yombi ariko ivamo kubera igitego yari yatsinzwe mu mukino ub@@ anza. Mu mukino wo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu wabereye kuri Stade Amahoro amakipe yombi yatangiye asatira cyane ariko biza guh@@ ira Dj@@ ol@@ iba AC ibona igitego hakiri kare cyane ku munota wa 10 gitsinzwe na Si@@ aka B@@ akay@@ oko. APR FC nk’ikipe ikomeye kandi yakiniraga imbere y’abafana bayo, ntiy@@ acitse intege nayo yahise itangira kotsa igitutu izamu rya Dj@@ ol@@ iba AC biza no kuyih@@ ira ku munota wa 19 yishyura igitego gitsinzwe na Bizimana Djih@@ adi ku ishoti rya kure yat@@ ereye inyuma y’urubuga rw’amah@@ ina. Iyi kipe y’umutoza Petr@@ ovic ariko yat@@ ozwaga ahanini na Jimmy Mulisa kuri uyu mukino, yakomeje gushaka igitego cya kabiri mbere y’uko igice cya mbere kirangira cyari kuyifasha cyane kwiy@@ ongerera icyizere cyo kujya mu ijonjora rya nyuma biranga iminota 45 irangira ari kimwe kuri kimwe. Mu gice cya kabiri APR FC niyo yabanje gukora impinduka Sekamana Maxime asimbura Issa Bigirimana ku munota wa 6@@ 7, Umutoza wa Dj@@ ol@@ iba AC, Diarra F@@ en@@ yar@@ i, abonye ko ikipe ye itangiye kugar@@ izwa nawe ahita akora impinduka ku munota wa 74 akuramo Nab@@ y So@@ um@@ ah asimburwa na Mohammed C@@ iss@@ e. APR FC yasabwaga nibura ibitego bindi bibiri kugira ngo ibone itike yakomeje gushaka igitego cya kabiri igah@@ ererekanya neza hagati mu kibuga biza kuyiha umusaruro ku munota wa 76 ku ishoti ryatewe na Bizimana Djihad wigaragaje cyane umuzamu aw@@ ugar@@ uye Innocent Nshuti ahita abon@@ eza mu rush@@ undura biba bibiri. Kugera kuri uyu munota abafana ba APR FC bari bamaze kwigarurira icyizere kuko ikipe yabo yasabwaga igitego kimwe gusa ikir@@ inda gutsindwa ikindi igahita ikomeza ariko yagerageje uburyo butandukanye biranga iminota 90 irangira ari ibitego 2-1. G@@ utsindwa uyu mukino byashyize iherezo ku nzozi z’iyi kipe y’ingabo z’igihugu zo kugera mu matsinda biha amah@@ irwa Dj@@ ol@@ iba AC yo kujya mu ijonjora rya nyuma aho izahura n’imwe mu makipe az@@ asezererwa muri CAF Champions League. Kigali: Polisi yagar@@ uje miliyoni 20 zibwe sosiyete y'@@ Abany@@ at@@ uruk@@ iya Umugore witwa B@@ akund@@ ukize Chantal w'imyaka 30 na Tuyisenge Eric ufite imyaka 24 y'amavuko, bakoreraga isosiyete y'@@ ubwubatsi y'@@ Abany@@ at@@ uruk@@ iya yitwa "D@@ AB@@ CO@@ " bafungiwe kuri Sitasiyo ya Polisi y'i Remera bakurikiranweho kwiba amafaranga miliyoni 20 y'u Rwanda mu kazi. Aba bakozi uko ari babiri batawe muri yombi kuwa Kabiri tariki 2 Ukuboza, babwiye itangazamakuru ko bibye aya mafaranga ba@@ yakuye mu k@@ abati kari mu cyumba cy'@@ Umuyobozi wabo. Bas@@ obanuye ko bagiye inama z'@@ uburyo bay@@ iba, kuko bari bamaze umwaka bah@@ akora kandi ari bamwe mu biz@@ erwaga cyane kugeza n'aho bageraga no mu mbere h'@@ umuk@@ oresha. Umugore wakoraga akazi ko guteka muri D@@ AB@@ CO wemera icyaha nubwo yagize ati "N@@ ibyo twaray@@ ibye tuy@@ akuye mu biro hejuru y'@@ ameza turay@@ ajyana turay@@ ahisha ariko ni ubwa mbere nib@@ ye njye kandi ndab@@ isabira im@@ abaz@@ i." Ayo mafaranga yari yibwe arimo, amadorari y'@@ am@@ anyam@@ erika, amapaw@@ undi, akoreshwa muri Turukiya ndetse n'@@ amany@@ arwanda. Tuyisenge er@@ ic wah@@ ah@@ iraga iyi sosiyete ari nawe wag@@ uze umufuka akab@@ ikamo igice kimwe cy'amafaranga akajya kuw@@ ub@@ itsa hafi y'aho bakorera nawe yemera icyaha. Yagize ati " Rwose uko mugenzi wanjye yabivuze niko bimeze twaray@@ ibye kubw'@@ amahirwe make tur@@ afat@@ wa." Umuvugizi wa Polisi y'igihugu, CSP Celestin Twah@@ irwa, yavuze ko aba bantu uko ari 2 bamaze kwiba ayo mafaranga bagiye inama z'uko bagomba kuy@@ ahisha amwe ba@@ yat@@ aba mu git@@ aka aho bakoraga andi uriya muhungu yaguze umufuka wa kaw@@ unga ay@@ ashyiramo ajya kuw@@ ub@@ itsa ku iduka ababwira ko azaza kuw@@ ufata bukeye bw@@ aho. Yakomeje avuga ko nyuma y'uko Polisi itangiye iperereza uyu mukobwa yaje kugira ubwoba bwinshi bituma bafat@@ wa. Yagize ati"@@ Y@@ ashak@@ ishije umuntu amubwira ngo amush@@ akire uz@@ abafasha kugira ngo bataz@@ afatwa ariko uwo bab@@ ibwiye yaje guc@@ ikwa abivuga mu kabari bituma umwe muny@@ angamugayo wamw@@ umvise ahita ibim@@ enyesha Pol@@ is@@ i." Ih@@ ereye kuri izo miliyoni zibwe mu nzu, Polisi yasabye abantu kutab@@ ika amafaranga angana kuriya mu ngo zabo, kuko hari uburyo bwinshi bwo kuy@@ ab@@ ika. Umuyobozi wa D@@ AB@@ CO, Em@@ re C@@ ICE@@ K , we yashimye imikorere ya Polisi y'u Rwanda amaze gusubizwa amafaranga ye. Yagize ati"@@ Polisi ikwiye gushimwa bitewe n'uko ikora kuko itandukanye n'izindi zose, yaba izo hanze kuko usanga zo zir@@ enza iminsi kandi zifite za kam@@ era mu gihe bo bakora nt@@ azo bafit@@ e." Nyuma yo guk@@ ubuka I Burayi mu butumwa yaganiriye n’um@@ ubavu.com maze asobanura ko icyari cyam@@ ujyanye cyag@@ ezweho ashingiye ku buryo yatunguwe no kubona uburyo abo yabwiraga baby@@ akir@@ iye. Ati “@@ byar@@ ant@@ unguye nange ndebye uburyo baby@@ akir@@ aga, bar@@ abyumva cyane, babih@@ aye n’agaciro cyane ku buryo n@@ ababw@@ iraga uburyo twebwe nk’@@ abanyarwanda dufite imis@@ engere yacu mu Rwanda, n@@ abak@@ anguriye ko no mu bindi bihugu bakwiye kuba bakoresha gakondo zabo bam@@ baza Imana z’@@ iwabo aho gufata ib@@ ivuye mu bindi bihugu, baraby@@ umvise neza ndetse bar@@ anab@@ yakira numva biran@@ ejeje cyane”. Ku bumva ko ngo hari Imana babwiwe n’abaz@@ ungu b’abany@@ aburayi b’@@ abam@@ isiyoneri uyu muvugizi w’Imana y’I Rwanda yabibukije ko bakwiye kumenya ko umuco wabo ariwo ukwiye gufata umwanya wa mbere kurusha imico y’@@ ahandi. Ati “@@ bakeneye kumenya ko umuco w’@@ iwacu ariwo ufite agaciro kurusha imico y’@@ ahandi bafat@@ a, imis@@ engere dufite cyane iyi ibak@@ ikije siyo y’@@ iwacu, siyo kamere y’@@ iwacu y’@@ abanyarwanda, Imana y’I Rwanda yah@@ ozeho ahubwo abazungu barebye uburyo imyemerere yacu ihamye tun@@ ayih@@ agazeho baray@@ ijyana bar@@ ayih@@ indura aba ariyo bag@@ arura ari nayo dufite ub@@ u”. Uy@@ uwe ngo arak@@ angurira abantu gusenga bijyanye na gakondo no kwivuza bya gakondo Dusabimana Emmanuel Um@@ urag@@ uzi ukomoka mu igis@@ ekuru cy’@@ ib@@ urag@@ ura Bwami aratangaza ko Abanyarwanda bagomba gukang@@ ukira ubuvuzi bwa gakondo no gusenga bijyanye na gakondo ndetse bakamenya n’ind@@ anga gaciro z’umuco w’@@ abanyarwanda. Impamvu ikomeye yagaragaje kubyo avuga ko abantu bagomba gukang@@ ukira kwivuza mub@@ ya Kinyarwanda, ngo ni uko hari indwara abazungu batajya bav@@ ura, hari indwara zimwe naz@@ imwe nagiye mbabwira no mu inkuru iheruka kujya ku igitangaza amakuru cy’@@ Um@@ ubav@@ u.@@ com, amarozi y’@@ amat@@ eg@@ ano nday@@ av@@ ura, amah@@ umane bar@@ oze umuntu nayo nday@@ av@@ ura, uburozi bah@@ uhera kugirango bufat@@ e umuntu batag@@ abur@@ iye, no gutega umuntu ndab@@ iv@@ ura. Ibyo nta umuganga wa kizungu ndabona ub@@ ikora. Hari n@@ ikindi abavuzi ba kizungu batajya bavura nk’@@ ubufat@@ ire ubufat@@ ire n’indwara ifata umugabo iyo yaciye umugore we inyuma uwo umugore yag@@ iyeho utari uwe niwe umufat@@ ira, noneho umugabo yagera m’@@ urugo rwe ashaka gutera akabariro bikanga kubera ko uwo yagih@@ eyo aciye umugore we inyuma yamuhaye ubwo bur@@ ozi bwo kum@@ ufat@@ ira. Nkaba nifuza ko abanyarwanda bab@@ and@@ wa, bagat@@ erekera bag@@ asub@@ iz@@ aho, bakiy@@ ambaza abaz@@ imu kuko nabo ni abantu bacu kuruta uko twakw@@ iyam@@ abaza abaz@@ imu bo mu amahanga bitwa abat@@ agatifu. Yabajijwe impamvu avuga ko abanyarwanda bagomba kureba no ku ind@@ anga agaciro z’umuco nyarwanda zisanzwe zizwi mu itorero ry’@@ Igihugu. Nyamagabe: Umugore yahisemo kwibera "@@ muc@@ om@@ a" ngo ahe serivisi nziza abakiriya be Mukeshimana Thac@@ ienne wo mu karere ka Nyamagabe mu murenge wa T@@ are aratangaza ko yahisemo kuba "@@ muc@@ om@@ a" (@@ umuntu w@@ otsa inyama mu kabar@@ i) mu kabari ke kugira ngo abashe gutanga serivisi nziza ku bakiriya be. Uyu mugore atangaza ko mbere yakoreshaga abakozi bamufasha muri aka kazi ariko imikoranire ik@@ amugora ndetse ntiban@@ atange serivisi nziza ku bakir@@ iya, akaba yarahisemo gushaka umufasha mu kubaga ibindi byose akaby@@ ikorera. Ati "@@ mbere n@@ ahoze mfite abakozi nkabona nyine imikoranire nabo it@@ agenda neza, yenda n'@@ abakiriya ntiba@@ bakira neza, biba ngombwa ko mby@@ injiramo kugira ngo njye ntanga serivisi nziz@@ a". Mukeshimana Thac@@ ienne (hagati) yashyikirijwe ishimwe nk'@@ umugore wo mu cyaro wabashije kwiteza imbere mu karere ka Nyamagabe. Mukeshimana avuga ko uyu mwuga we wo guc@@ oma aw@@ ukora aw@@ ukunze kandi aw@@ ishimiye ngo kuko wagize uruhare rugaragara mu iterambere amaze kugeraho. Mbere ngo yabanje gucuruza ihene ariko nkeya bitewe n'@@ amikoro make nyuma aza kuyoboka iy'@@ akabari agamije kunguka menshi kuri za hene binyuze mu kuz@@ ibag@@ a. Ubu bucuruzi hamwe no gukorana n'@@ umurenge SACCO ab@@ itsa an@@ afata inguzanyo ndetse no kwis@@ ungana n'abandi mu bim@@ ina ngo bimaze kumut@@ eza imbere mu buryo bufat@@ ika. "@@ Nk@@ itangira umwuga w'@@ ubucuruzi bw'@@ ihene nabaga mu nzu nk@@ odesh@@ a. Gukora uwo mwuga wo Guc@@ oma byatumye njya mu bim@@ ina big@@ ur@@ izanya amafaranga, bituma mbasha gufung@@ uza konti mu murenge SACCO nkab@@ its@@ a, nk@@ abik@@ uza nk@@ abasha no gufata inguzanyo kandi nkay@@ ishyura. Ibi byatumye mva mu buk@@ ode bw'@@ inzu ubu ntuye mu nzu yange y'@@ amatafari ah@@ iye, harimo amazi n'@@ umurir@@ o,@@ " Mukesh@@ imana. Hon Senateri Mush@@ inz@@ imana Appol@@ ina@@ ire, n'umuyobozi w'akarere ka Nyamagabe, Mugisha Philbert bashy@@ ikiriza Mukeshimana amashimwe ye. Kw@@ is@@ ungana mu bim@@ ina kandi ngo byatumye abasha kugura inka ya kijyambere ubu ikaba yaraby@@ aye, ikaba ih@@ aka kandi ikin@@ akam@@ wa ndetse n'iy@@ ayo ih@@ aka, akaba avuga ko int@@ eranya ntaho yah@@ era im@@ enera mu rugo rwe. Uyu mugore aha inama bagenzi be zo kut@@ itinya ngo kuko akazi kose bag@@ ashoboye kandi ko umurimo wose umuntu yakora aw@@ ukunze umut@@ eza imbere. Ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga w'umugore wo mu cyaro tariki ya 26@@ /10/201@@ 3, Mukeshimana yash@@ ikir@@ ijwe icyemezo cy'@@ ishimwe ndetse n'amafaranga ibihumbi 200 n'inama y'igihugu y'abagore nk'@@ umugore wahize abandi mu bikorwa byo kwiteza imbere mu karere ka Nyamagabe. Emmanuel Nshimiyimana
Urubyiruko rur@@ anenga ababyeyi bak@@ iba@@ c@@ engez@@ amo amacakubiri Urubyiruko rw@@ ishimira ko rwatangiye kugenda rwig@@ obotora izo nyigisho mbi baba bigishwa n'ababyeyi babo R@@ umwe mu rubyiruko rur@@ avuga ko hak@@ iriho bamwe mu babyeyi bakib@@ an@@ aniza mu kwimakaza umuco w'@@ amahoro, bab@@ icishije mu mvugo zabo ziba z@@ uzuyemo amacakubiri n'@@ urw@@ ango, kuburyo ngo bituma hari urubyiruko rushobora kwishora mu bikorwa by'@@ ubugizi bwa nabi kubera bo. Bamwe mu rubyiruko twag@@ anir@@ iye, ruvuga ko bamwe mu babyeyi usanga bashyira umwuka mubi w'@@ amacakubiri mu bana babo, bababwira ko kuba ud@@ ahuje ubwoko n'umuntu runaka mud@@ ashobora guh@@ uza. G@@ anzo Jordan agira ati" ikijyanye n'@@ amacakubiri usanga ahanini kikiri mu bantu bakuze bitwa ko bari bahari kiriya gihe cya Jenoside, kuko mu rubyiruko dufite amatsinda (@@ club@@ s) zigenda zid@@ ufasha ahanini aho tw@@ igira ibyabaye ndetse n'uburyo tugomba kubik@@ umir@@ a." Uyu musore yavuze ko yajyaga yumva ibyo yabwir@@ waga na bamwe mu muryango we, ariko we ngo aho yagiriye mu matsinda y'@@ urubyiruko, yagiye yumva ko abantu bose ari bamwe , nta t@@ andukaniro rishingiye ku kintu icyo aricyo cyose. K@@ aye@@ su Mon@@ ica nawe avuga ko koko aba babyeyi bigisha abana babo inzangano ndetse n'@@ amacakubiri bakir@@ iho, ariko asaba urubyiruko kub@@ ima matwi nubwo ari ababyeyi babo. Agira ati" umubyeyi bwa mbere ugomba kumw@@ ubah@@ ira ko ari umubyeyi, ariko na none mubwire ko amateka yamur@@ anze siyo agomba kund@@ anga. Niba yarabaye mu gihe cyo kumva ko ibyo bintu byari bihari, reka jyewe uv@@ utse uyu munsi nanjye amp@@ e ubwo bur@@ enganz@@ ira, nanjye mw@@ umvishe akamaro ko kugira amahoro kugira ngo amateka ye ntaz@@ anjye@@ ho, sinz@@ agend@@ ere ku mateka ababyeyi banjye bagend@@ e@@ yem@@ o." Hon. Depite By@@ abar@@ umwanzi Francois, Umuyobozi wa Komisiyo y'Ubumwe bw'Abanyarwanda Uburenganzira bwa muntu no kurwanya Jenoside mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, yavuze ko ibi bibazo bikiri mu bantu batandukanye, ariko ngo bari gukora ibishoboka byose ngo babir@@ wan@@ ye, bik@@ uramo amateka banyuz@@ emo. Agira ati" icyo muvuga n@@ icy@@ o, biragaragara ko igis@@ ekuru (g@@ ener@@ ation) yacu, ndashaka kuvuga ab@@ angana nanjye cyangwa undi munyarwanda wo mu gihe cyacu, muhora muvuga ko dufite ibitekerezo bya kera bik@@ itur@@ imo, ibitekerezo by'@@ amacakubiri, ibitekerezo by'@@ inzangano byakur@@ uye inzangano na jenoside yo mu 1994, nibyo ntago tub@@ ih@@ akana, ariko turag@@ erageza kubir@@ wany@@ a." Hon By@@ abar@@ umwanzi Yavuze ko bagize amahirwe make yo kuba mu buyobozi bubi bwab@@ igishaga amacakubiri, ariko ngo kubera ko abanyarwanda bari mu buyobozi bwiza bub@@ igisha ibintu by'@@ ingirakamaro bibafasha no kwik@@ uramo ayo mateka mabi banyuz@@ emo. Yavuze ko nk'abantu bakuru cyane abayobozi bagerageza guharanira amahoro, kugira ngo urubyiruko rut@@ azam@@ era nkabo (@@ abantu bak@@ uru@@ ) ruk@@ oreka igihugu kikaba cy@@ asubira mu bihe cy@@ anyuzemo mu 1994.
Abak@@ ecuru bahangayikishijwe n’abakobwa babyara bakabat@@ ana abuzukuru Abak@@ ecuru bo mu Karere ka Muhanga baravuga ko bag@@ owe cyane no kurera abuzukuru babo ahanini basig@@ irwa n’abakobwa babyar@@ ira iwabo. Abak@@ ecuru batak@@ ibyara usanga bariy@@ andik@@ ish@@ ijeho abuzukuru kandi nta bushobozi bwo kubar@@ era bafite Ababyeyi bavuga ko kubera amikoro make, kurera umwana w’@@ undi nta bufasha bituma batabasha kugira icyo bikorera kandi n’uburenganzira bw’umwana buk@@ ahah@@ ung@@ aban@@ ira. Bab@@ ivugiye mu Nteko y’abaturage ya buri wa kabiri ku mugoroba, aho abaturage bo mu Kagari ka Kin@@ ini mu Murenge wa Shyogwe ban@@ oza urutonde rw’@@ abageze mu za bukuru bagomba guhabwa inkunga y’ing@@ oboka. Ikibazo cy@@ igaragaza kuri uru rutonde ni abenshi muri abo bak@@ ecuru usanga baragiye babar@@ urwaho abuzukuru babo, mu gihe bagombye kuba babana n’aba@@ baby@@ aye, ibi bigatuma bongera gukurwaho abo bana mbere yo kwemeza burundu abagize imiryango y’abo bagomba guhabwa inkunga y’ing@@ oboka. Sch@@ ol@@ ast@@ ique Baz@@ u@@ bagira arera umwuzukuru we w’imyaka itatu. Avuga ko kubyara imburagihe ku bakobwa bituruka ku kuba bat@@ acy@@ emera kugirwa inama no guhan@@ urwa, ubukene na bwo ngo bukaba bu@@ bag@@ usha mu bish@@ uko bibash@@ ora mu mibonano mpuzabitsina. Agira ati, “@@ Umukobwa w’imyaka 19 na 20 iyo ugize ngo uram@@ ugira inama akubwira ko az@@ icunga kuko ibyo umubwira abizi kandi abik@@ urusha bikarangira bipf@@ uye@@ ”. Ati “@@ Mbona impamvu abakobwa batwara ziriya nda ari ukubera ubukene, barangiza amashuri bakabura akazi bahura n’abasore babaha akantu bakaba ba@@ bateye inda gutyo. Nk’ubu ndar@@ era umwuzukuru wanjye w’imyaka itatu, nyina afite undi w’umwaka n’igic@@ e”. Uwamariya avuga ko umukecuru wiy@@ andik@@ ish@@ ijeho umwana ufite se agomba kum@@ ukur@@ waho akajya kur@@ erwa na se umubyara Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Muhanga, Uwam@@ aliya Beat@@ rice, avuga ko abakobwa babyariye iwabo bakwiye gufatanya n’inzego z’ubuyobozi kugira ngo ba se b’@@ abana bam@@ enyekane bityo bafashe ba nyina kubar@@ era nk’@@ inshingano zose z’@@ umubyeyi. Agira ati, “@@ Amakuru ba@@ yatang@@ e mu nzego zose kuko ni bo ubwa mbere bagomba kudufasha kubafasha. Dufite inzego zitandukanye zik@@ urikirana ibijyanye n’@@ ihohoterwa, niba@@ ze bad@@ uhe amakuru@@ ”. Yongeyeho ati “Ntabwo bikwiye ko abakobwa babyara baz@@ anira ba yir@@ akuru, bas@@ ubir@@ ayo nta mah@@ wa kuko ni ingeso mbi, ntabwo ari byo ko umukecuru ruk@@ ukuri yirirwa akur@@ urana n’umw@@ uzukuru na we adafite imbaraga zo kumw@@ itah@@ o” Abakobwa bo mu Gas@@ antere ka Kin@@ ini mu Murenge wa Shyogwe ahagaragara abakobwa bakiri bato bah@@ etse abana babyariye iwabo bavuga ko bishimira kuba bagiye gufashwa gushaka ba se b’@@ abana babo. Aba bakobwa bah@@ etse abana nta ba se bafite babit@@ aho kuko bamwe batazi aho bagiye abandi bakaba bafite abandi bagore Umwe muri abo bakobwa avuga ko we yatewe inda n’umugabo wubatse amub@@ eshya ko ari umusore bazaba inshuti none akaba yaranze kujyana uwo mwana kuko ngo afite undi mugore nyamara kurera uwo mwana ntib@@ imw@@ oroheye. Agira ati, “Bir@@ akwiye ko n’abo bagabo twab@@ yaranye ubuyobozi bw@@ adufasha bagafata abana babo kuko bar@@ atur@@ ushya ntacyo dufite cyo kubah@@ a, nta bwisungane mu kwivuza, nta n’uburenganzira bagira kuri ba se@@ ”. Nta mibare ntakuka igaragara y’abakobwa babyariye iwabo mu Karere ka Muhanga. Icyakora mu kig@@ ererany@@ o, bivugwa ko nibura mu ngo icumi haba harimo umukobwa wab@@ yariye iwabo. Ni ikibazo gikomeza gufata intera n’ubwo ubukangurambaga mu kurwanya inda ziterwa abangavu na bwo bukom@@ eje. Dr Kimonyo yagarutse ku bibazo byaz@@ onze u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside n’@@ intege nke zar@@ anze Guverinoma y’Ubumwe Umwandits@@ i, inzobere muri politiki akaba n’umujyanama wa Perezida, Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yagaragaje ko nubwo u Rwanda hari ibihe bikomeye kandi bibi rw@@ anyuz@@ emo, hari icyizere ko ibyagezweho biz@@ asig@@ as@@ irwa kubera ko urubyiruko rwongeye kwiyumvamo ubun@@ yarwanda. Ibi yabitangaje ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu mu muh@@ uro ugamije kungurana ibitekerezo (c@@ af@@ é l@@ itt@@ é@@ ra@@ ir@@ e) by’umwihariko hag@@ anirwa ku gitabo cye ‘Rwanda dem@@ ain ! : U@@ ne l@@ ong@@ ue mar@@ che v@@ ers la trans@@ form@@ ation’ kivuga ku mbogamizi n’ibitekerezo byiza byaranze inzira yo kongera kwiyubaka k’u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Uyu muh@@ uro wateguwe n’umun@@ yarwenya Ntar@@ indwa Di@@ og@@ ène uzwi nka At@@ ome mu biganiro akunze gutegura bivuga ku buv@@ anganzo n’ub@@ wanditsi bizwi nka ‘@@ At@@ om@@ ium@@ ’. Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yagarutse ku bihe bibi u Rwanda rw@@ anyuz@@ emo, ahera mu mwaka wa 1959 ubwo Abatutsi bam@@ en@@ esh@@ waga mu gihugu bikozwe n’abari bari mu mashyaka nka Par@@ m@@ eh@@ utu ku bufasha bahabwaga n’@@ Abab@@ il@@ igi. Kimonyo yavuze uburyo Abatutsi babaye impunzi muri icyo gihe babayeho nabi cyane mu bihugu bahung@@ iyemo dore ko nta n’imiryango yita ku mpunzi yari ihari, byatumye bamwe bakur@@ izamo gupfa kubera imibereho mibi. Ati “@@ Impunzi zavuye mu Rwanda zabayeho nabi cyane, z@@ icwa n’inzara n’indwara n’ibis@@ imba haba muri Ugand@@ a,@@ Tanzania n’i Burundi. Muri Congo ho baz@@ ijyanye ahantu habi cyane, ntabwo bashakaga kubaha ahantu hameze neza, ba@@ bashyize ahantu hatari aho gutur@@ wa”. Dr Kimonyo yavuze ko impunzi zakomeje guh@@ anyany@@ aza, mu myaka ya 1960 zir@@ is@@ uganya zig@@ aba ibitero byiswe iby’@@ Iny@@ enzi ariko ntiby@@ azih@@ ira. Z@@ akomeje kubaho mu buzima bubi mu mahanga, bigeze mu myaka ya 1980, haba ibibazo bya Politiki hirya no hino muri Afurika, impunzi z’Abanyarwanda z@@ ongera gufatwa nabi, ari nabwo abari urubyiruko muri zo icyo gihe bishyize hamwe, bag@@ ashinga FPR Inkotanyi bafite umugambi wo gusubira mu gihugu cyabo, kugeza ubwo batangije urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu no guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. G@@ utsindwa kwa Guverinoma ya Twagiramungu no kug@@ um@@ uka mu banyamuryango ba FPR Muri uwo muh@@ uro, Dr Kimonyo yagarutse ku bihe bikomeye politiki y’u Rwanda yanyuzemo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, cyane cyane ubwo hari hamaze gushyirwaho Guverinoma y’@@ Ub@@ umwe. Ni guverinoma yari igizwe n’amashyaka atar@@ ij@@ anditse muri Jenoside, ku isonga arimo MDR ya Twagiramungu Faustin ari na we wagizwe Minisitiri w’Int@@ ebe. Nta mwaka wash@@ ize, aba mbere batangiye kwegura hashize amezi make ig@@ iyeho kubera kut@@ umvikana. Dr Kimonyo avuga ko uko kutumvikana kw@@ atewe n’uburyo abari muri Guverinoma bari bafite iby@@ erekezo bitandukanye nyamara bagomba guha igihugu icyerekezo kimwe. Ati “G@@ uv@@ e@@ ir@@ n@@ oma y’ubumwe yagize gutsindwa kub@@ iri. U@@ gutsindwa kwa mbere ni ukwa politiki kubera ko abantu bamwe bat@@ umvikanaga muri Guverinoma cyane cyane FPR na MDR kubera impamvu zitandukanye, nk’@@ ikibazo cy’umutekano uburyo cyari kiri gukem@@ urwa. Ayo mashyaka yombi kandi ntiyari afite imigambi imwe, ntabwo yabonaga ahazaza h’@@ u Rwanda kim@@ we.” Twagiramungu yeguye muri Kanama mu 1995, bukeye abandi ba minisitiri bav@@ anwa muri Guverinoma. Dr Kimonyo avuga ko mu myaka ya 199@@ 7/@@ 1998 haje kubaho ikindi kibazo cyo kug@@ um@@ uka kwa bamwe mu bari abayoboke ba FPR Inkotanyi, batangira kurya ruswa mu ishyaka haza umwuka mubi. Ati “ Hari indi Guverinoma yag@@ iyeho ariko nayo iza gutsind@@ wa, ib@@ angamirwa na bamwe mu banyamuryango ba FPR bari bag@@ umut@@ se mu 199@@ 7/@@ 1998 , bamwe bamagana ibintu bya ruswa byari bitangiye gukomera cyane. FPR yahise ijya mu bihe bibi cyane, ishaka uko yab@@ ivamo hav@@ anwaho abantu bak@@ ekwagaho rus@@ wa.” Ibibazo byad@@ ind@@ izaga Guverinoma bimaze kuv@@ aho, nibwo hatangiye gutekerez@@ wa ku hazaza h’@@ igihugu, hatang@@ izwa ibiganiro byo mu Urugwiro ari nabyo by@@ acur@@ iwemo icy@@ erecyezo 2020 kiri gus@@ ozwa. Guverinoma y’Ubumwe yarangiye mu 2003 ubwo hator@@ waga Itegeko Nshinga hakaba n’amatora ya Perezida, ya mbere kuva Jenoside yar@@ angira. Kimonyo yemeza ko urebye aho u Rwanda rug@@ eze, n’imyumvire urubyiruko rw’@@ ubu r@@ ufite, nta kabuza ko ibyagezweho bizakomeza gusig@@ as@@ irwa no kong@@ erwa. Ati “Ur@@ asanga rubyiruko rutangiye kwitabira ibintu by’@@ umuco kandi no kuva cy@@ era, haba mu gushinga FPR, kurwanya igitugu no kubaka igihugu, umuco w’@@ ubunyarwanda no gukunda igihugu nibyo byari umusingi w’ibyo tw@@ ashoboye kugeraho. Ur@@ asanga urubyiruko muri iyi minsi rutangiye kwitabira iby’@@ umuc@@ o.” Yash@@ ishikarije urubyiruko kujya rw@@ itabira ibiganiro nk’ibyo bigaruka ku byaranze u Rwanda, kugira ngo rw@@ ige uko ibyagezweho byakozwe n’uko rwar@@ ushaho kuby@@ ongera. Uretse igitabo ‘‘@@ Rwanda dem@@ ain !@@ ’ Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo asanganywe ikindi gitabo cyitwa ‘Rwanda : Un gé@@ noc@@ ide p@@ op@@ ul@@ air@@ e’ yasohoye mu 2008. Benshi bari bateze amatwi Dr Kimonyo ubwo yasobanuraga urugendo rwo kwiyubaka kw'@@ Abanyarwanda Urubyiruko ruri mu bitabiriye uyu muh@@ uro Dr Kimonyo yavuze ko na nyuma ya Jenoside, Guverinoma y'Ubumwe yahuye n'@@ imbogamizi zirimo kutumvikana mu bari bay@@ igize Ntar@@ indwa Di@@ og@@ ène uzwi nka At@@ ome niwe wateguye uyu muh@@ uro uzwi nka c@@ af@@ é l@@ itt@@ é@@ ra@@ ire Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yavuze ko urubyiruko rw'u Rwanda kuri ubu rugaragaza gusigasira ibyagezweho Umwarimu mu ishuri ry'@@ itangazamakuru rya Kaminuza y'u Rwanda, Yan@@ n G@@ we@@ t ni umwe mu bayoboye ibiganiro Kimonyo yafashe umwanya wo kumva ibitekerezo by'@@ abitabiriye Uyu muh@@ uro watang@@ iwemo ibitekerezo bigamije kumenya byimbitse ah@@ ahise h'@@ u Rwanda n'ingamba ku hazaza
Umugore ngo ntiy@@ agera ku iterambere ad@@ ahereye kuri bik@@ eya In@@ araribonye mu gukurikirana imishinga mu bigo by'@@ imari, n'abagore bahereye ku gish@@ oro git@@ oya bavuga ko ari yo nzira y'iterambere ry'@@ umugore. Nyir@@ anz@@ eyimana Alphonsine wo mu Murenge Rug@@ end@@ abari wa ubarizwa muri Koperative "@@ Abibumbye Ny@@ und@@ o" yatangiye muri 2007, avuga ko ubuzima bwe na bagenzi be bw@@ arang@@ wag@@ wa n'@@ bwigunge n'@@ ubun@@ eke, ubu bas@@ ezereye kubera gutinyuka kwishyira hamwe. Nyirans@@ engimana Alphonsine avuga ko kwit@@ inya kw'@@ abad@@ amu bitera umwanda n'ubut@@ indi. Agira ati "Nt@@ ak@@ intu nagira iw@@ anjye, ariko ubu nyuma yo gukora amas@@ abune muri Koperative yacu, nd@@ akaraba ng@@ acy@@ a, n'abaturanyi bag@@ acy@@ a, ubuzima bumeze neza kuko usibye no kwiteza imbere dufite n'ubumenyi bw@@ ateza abandi imbere mu mishinga yo guhinga ibih@@ um@@ y@@ o." Muk@@ anyam@@ ibwa Seraphine utuye mu Murenge wa C@@ yez@@ a, ati "Nt@@ ak@@ id@@ ashoboka ku mugore usibye kwin@@ angira mu mutwe, ubu batur@@ eb@@ eraho kandi n'abagabo bacu basigaye babona ko dufite akamar@@ o." N'ubwo aba bagore bavuga gutya ariko haracyari abig@@ unze bataramenya icyo bakora kubera kutagira ibish@@ oro ari nabyo In@@ araribonye mu gucunga imishinga iciriritse zivuga ko igihe cyose abagore bataz@@ ashora bahereye kuri bik@@ eya ntacyo bazag@@ eraho. Abagore bat@@ inyutse gutangirira kuri make bavuga ko bigaragaza ugereranyije n@@ abakomeje kwin@@ angira. Chantal Z@@ ih@@ inj@@ ishi amaze imyaka 12 mu kazi ko gutanga no kugira inama abagana ibigo by'imari zic@@ iriritse gucunga imishing@@ a, avuga ko Leta hari uburyo yashyizeho bwo korohereza abaturage by'umwihariko abagore kwiteza imbere. Z@@ ih@@ inj@@ ishi avuga ko igitera kut@@ agana amabanki ngo abantu batangire ibikorwa bibateza imbere, icyo yita nk'@@ igihombo k@@ y@@ uri bo. Ati "Iyo ug@@ annye banki n'ibigo by'imari wongera igishoro ukagera ku bintu bibat@@ ik@@ a." Z@@ ih@@ inj@@ ishi kandi avuga ko batagira igish@@ oro, babiterwa n'@@ imyumvire ikiri mik@@ eya, ati "@@ Dufite ikigega B@@ D@@ F, ikigo gitanga ingwat@@ e, hari ibim@@ ina n'@@ amatsinda yo kugur@@ iz@@ anya. Ibyo byose byafasha ushaka gutangira umushinga wo kwiteza imbere, abantu bareke kwit@@ inya bag@@ ane ibyo bigo byose bibas@@ obanurire kwinjira ni ubuntu gusohoka ni uguh@@ abwa amafarang@@ a." Ibibazo byo kwiteza imbere byakomeje kut@@ avugwaho rumwe mu byiciro bitandukanye, ariko Leta ikomeje gushishikariza abanyarwanda muri rusange kwishyira hamwe bagat@@ izanya ingufu kuko bigoye ku banyarwanda besnhi gushora ku giti cyabo.
Ur@@ ashaka guhumuriza umukunzi wawe ko umuk@@ und@@ a? Dore imitoma yabig@@ ufash@@ amo Umutesi ut@@ et@@ ana ituze Nt@@ ugat@@ inye narag@@ ut@@ oye N@@ agut@@ uje ahat@@ aba itik@@ u Mu mutima ut@@ emba ituze C@@ yo hat@@ ure uh@@ at@@ emb@@ ere@@ ! Ntug@@ ash@@ av@@ ure narag@@ ushim@@ ye Nshaka sh@@ enge kugut@@ et@@ esha I@@ by'@@ agash@@ iha tukab@@ in@@ esha Sin@@ an@@ ashobora kwih@@ ishira Njye sin@@ abasha kukw@@ it@@ esh@@ a! Kug@@ ukunda ntib@@ int@@ onda Nit@@ ondera ibyo udakunda I@@ byag@@ uh@@ anda nk@@ abik@@ urinda I@@ by'@@ agahinda nk@@ anab@@ ih@@ inda Ngo ukunde d@@ isi ko ng@@ ukunda Humura Uhoraho yar@@ aduh@@ uje Nt@@ azah@@ wema no kuduh@@ anura Ngo duh@@ ige d@@ isi icy@@ ad@@ uhuza No kubahana bih@@ ore ah@@ acu N@@ anag@@ uh@@ ate uduh@@ ozo uh@@ age
Nt@@ ende Hotel yabaye igisubizo cy’@@ abash@@ ak@@ iraga amacumbi iyo big@@ wa (Amafoto) Nyuma y’aho ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi bw’@@ umuceri bya Cop@@ r@@ or@@ iz Nt@@ ende byag@@ utse bik@@ abyara ishoramari mu byo kwakira no gucumbikira abantu, ubuyobozi bwayo buvuga ko byatangiye gutanga umusaruro no kuzana impinduka zifatika mu gace iher@@ ere@@ yemo. Cop@@ r@@ or@@ iz Nt@@ ende (@@ Co@@ operative de Promot@@ ion des R@@ iz@@ ic@@ ul@@ t@@ eurs de Nt@@ end@@ e) ni koperative yashinzwe mu 2003 yibanda ku gihingwa cy’@@ umuceri, ikaba yaragiye yag@@ uka haba mu bwinshi bw’@@ abanyamuryango n’@@ umusaruro. Mu mpera z’umwaka wa 2017 yatashye ku mugaragaro hoteli n’ibindi bikorwa byo kwakira abantu birimo amacumbi yo ku rwego rwiy@@ ubash@@ ye, aciriritse n’ah@@ end@@ uts@@ e; restaurant n’@@ akabar@@ i, ibyumba by’@@ inama, amahugurwa n’ubuk@@ we. Cop@@ r@@ or@@ iz Nt@@ ende ikorera mu Murenge wa Rugarama w’Akarere ka Gatsibo hagati y’Umujyi wa Nyagatare na Kayonza ari na ho abakor@@ eraga muri aka gace basabwaga kwerekeza igihe babaga bakeneye serivisi itanga. Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa by’@@ ishoramari, Karangwa James, yatangaje ko biga uyu mushinga bashingiye ku bibazo byari bifit@@ we na benshi ikaba ari yo mpamvu ugenda neza. Yagize ati “ Twah@@ ereye ku cyumba cy’inama n’ubuk@@ we, abat@@ ug@@ annye bakabura aho biy@@ ak@@ irira biduha igitekerezo cyo kubaka restaurant n’@@ akabari gato. Byatumye restaurant iganwa kuko umushinga w@@ izwe hashingiwe ku byo abantu bak@@ en@@ eye.” “Nyuma abantu bakoreraga ubukwe n’amahugurwa hano batug@@ aragarije ko bajya kurara i Kayonza cyangwa i Nyagatare. Tw@@ atekereje ko umushinga wacu wakw@@ ag@@ uka tuk@@ agera ku gikorwa cy’@@ amac@@ umbi, aho abah@@ akoreye bah@@ akirirwa bakan@@ ah@@ arar@@ a. Tur@@ ishimira ko umushinga w@@ unguk@@ a; ku kwezi h@@ injira hagati ya miliyoni esheshatu n’umunani z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.” Ibikorwa bya hoteli no kwakira abantu bisa n’aho ari umwihariko wa Cop@@ r@@ or@@ iz Nt@@ ende ndetse ngo bimaze kwigarurira imitima y’abat@@ uruka impande zose z’igihugu ndetse no hanze yacyo bajya gukorera muri Gatsibo. Ni nako bizana impinduka muri aka gace nk’uko Perezida wa Cop@@ r@@ or@@ iz Nt@@ ende, Rug@@ wiz@@ angoga El@@ ys@@ ée, yabivuze haba mu kwegereza serivisi abaturage bashak@@ iraga kure no guhanga imirimo. Nt@@ ende Hotel, igice kirimo amacumbi yo ku rwego rwa mbere Nt@@ ende Hotel iherereye mu bice by'@@ icyaro ariko imaze kuh@@ ateza imbere Buri cyumba cyo mu macumbi yo ku rwego rwa mbere kiba gifite ibice bitatu birimo na '@@ Sal@@ on@@ ' Ah@@ aherereye amacumbi yo ku rwego rwa kabiri muri Nt@@ ende Hotel Am@@ ac@@ umbi yo ku rwego rwa gatatu (@@ ah@@ endutse kurusha ayandi ndetse afite ibyumba rusang@@ e) Inzu yagenewe inama n'@@ amahugurwa byakira abantu bar@@ inganiye Icy@@ umba cyagenewe inama n'@@ amahugurwa ku bantu batari benshi Nt@@ ende Hotel ifite n’@@ akabari g@@ afasha abakeneye ibinyobwa by’@@ amoko yose Restaurant iri mu bikurura abantu benshi muri aka gace Icy@@ umba cy'@@ inama cyakira abantu besnhi icyarimwe Icy@@ umba gishobora kwakira inama, amahugurwa cyangwa ubukwe Ikindi gice cyagenewe kwakira ubukwe Amafoto: Niyonzima Moses

Iyi karita yiswe C@@ ash@@ X@@ pr@@ ess ifasha uwo ari wese yaba umukiriya wa ECO@@ BAN@@ K cyangwa undi uwo ari we wese uy@@ ifite guh@@ aha, kwishyura no kubitsa no kubikuza amafaranga ahantu hose hari icyuma gitanga amafaranga cya AT@@ M mach@@ ine. Ubuyobozi bwa Ec@@ oban@@ k but@@ angiza ikarita ya Cas@@ X@@ press@@ . Kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki 18 Ugushyingo 2015, nibwo ubuyobozi bwa ECO@@ BAN@@ K bwatang@@ ike ku mugaragaro iyi karita bw@@ izera ko izafasha kongera ubuzima bw'Abanyarwanda bakoresha ihererek@@ anyam@@ afar@@ anga. Ubuyobozi bwa ECO@@ BAN@@ K buvuga ko umuntu ari we wih@@ itiramo uko azakoresha iyo kar@@ ita, haba kugena amafaranga azajya asoh@@ ora, haba kuy@@ ifatanya n'umuryango we c@@ angwa kugena ukundi kose ashatse azajya ay@@ ikoresha. ECO@@ BAN@@ K ivuga ko iyi karita ije kunganira Abanyarwanda. Iyi karita kandi ishobora gukoreshwa hagati y'abantu bari hanze n'abari mu Rwanda kuko ikora ku isi hose, bitewe n'uburyo bwa Visa ikoresha. Har@@ ateganywa kandi ubukangurambaga buz@@ akorwa hirya no hino mu gihugu, kugira ngo serivisi z'@@ iyi karita zig@@ ere no ku muturage wo hasi. Emmanuel N. Hitimana
Ese birakwiye ko amadini ash@@ yamirana apfa abay@@ obok@@ e? 1 Abakorinto 3@@ :4@@ - 5 " Igihe umwe muri mwe avuga ati: “@@ Jye ndi uwa Pawul@@ o”, undi ati: “@@ Jyewe ndi uwa Apol@@ o ”, ntibiba byerekana ko muk@@ imeze nk’@@ ab’@@ isi? Mbese ye, Apol@@ o ni nde? Ese Pawulo we ni nde? Tw@@ embi turi abagaragu b’Imana batumye mw@@ emera Kristo. Buri wese muri twe akora umurimo yih@@ erewe na Nyagas@@ an@@ i." Zimwe mu nsengero usanga zid@@ acana uwaka n’iz@@ in@@ ndi bib@@ angik@@ anye cyangwa iz@@ agiye zikomoka ku z@@ ind@@ i@@ ;@@ aho usanga abapasiteri bombi bayoboye insengero bash@@ yamiranye mu buryo bukom@@ eye@@ ; ndetse hari ubwo n’aba@@ Kristo babo iyo hagize urenga ku mabwiriza yatanzwe yo gushyiraho imipaka yo kugend@@ erer@@ anirana hagati yabo, ahagarik@@ irwa amas@@ akaram@@ ent@@ u. Ese byag@@ akwiriye ko amatorero abiri afite imyizerere imwe ak@@ imbir@@ ana bikomeye kugeza aho abayobozi bab@@ iba uwo mwuka mubo baba bayoboye ndetse bagashyiraho amategeko ahagarika ubusabane no kugend@@ erer@@ anirana kuri bene so muri Kristo Yesu ? Bamwe muba Kristo usanga bat@@ engwa bazira ko bagiye mu mak@@ we ya bene wabo bagakora inshingano runak@@ a; kandi mu byukuri byari bikwiye kubera amas@@ ano ya hafi bafit@@ anye@@ ; Uw@@ agiye muri urwo rusengero rundi akagenda mu byukuri at@@ ajyanywe n’iy@@ obokamana ashaka gufasha no gushyigikira umuvandimwe we.@@ Benshi usanga bava muri ibyo birori bag@@ afatirwa ibihano bikomeye@@ ; Abandi bak@@ abwirwa amagambo yo kubas@@ ebya no kubah@@ arabika mu ruhame ngo bas@@ uzuguye itorero n’ur@@ iy@@ obo@@ ye; bag@@ ashyirwa inyuma y’@@ itorero. Ibyo nt@@ ibikorwa n’aba@@ p@@ agani batazi Imana; Usanga bikorwa n’@@ insengero zose ziy@@ itirira ko zis@@ enga kandi zig@@ akorera Imana; B@@ iyobowe nabo tuzi ko ari abakozi b’Imana babis@@ igiwe amav@@ uta. Akenshi usanga ipfundo rya byose haba hari ikibazo cyabaye hagati ya@@ ’@@ abapasiteri , maze ibyo bapfa bombi bakaby@@ injiza mu ntama bay@@ oboye. " 1 Abat@@ es@@ ar@@ on@@ ike 1:@@ 12-1@@ 5 " Dore icyo mvuga ni ik@@ i: buri wese avuga ibye umwe ati: “Ndi uwa Pawul@@ o,” undi ati: “@@ Jyewe ndi uwa Apol@@ o,” naho undi ati: “@@ Jyewe ndi uwa Peter@@ o,” n’undi ati: “@@ J@@ ye@@ weho ndi uwa Krist@@ o.” Ese Kristo yac@@ iwemo ibice byinsh@@ i? Mbese Pawulo ni we w@@ aba@@ bamb@@ iwe ku musar@@ aba@@ ? Mbese ni mu izina rya Pawulo mw@@ abat@@ ij@@ we? Ndashimira Imana ko nta n’umwe muri mwe nabat@@ ije uretse K@@ ris@@ ipo na G@@ ayo, bityo nta wavuga ko yabat@@ ijwe mu izina ry@@ anjye@@ ." Ikindi gitera ayo makimbirane ni uk@@ urw@@ anira abay@@ obok@@ e, bityo ugasanga habaho gukumira kugend@@ er@@ anirana hagati y’@@ insengero ngo hagati aho hatazagira ushima ibyiza by’@@ ahandi akah@@ ab@@ eng@@ uka akagenda buh@@ er@@ iher@@ i, maze haba akantu gato ugasanga kabaye impamvu yo guhangana no gushyamirana gukom@@ eye@@ ; Imiryango no kugend@@ erer@@ anirana big@@ afungwa guhera ubwo@@ ;@@ big@@ akurikirwa no guhanga no gusebanya buri umwe ashaka kwereka abo ayoboye ko ari umun@@ yakur@@ i! Usanga ari icyaha kit@@ ababarirwa iyo umu@@ Kristo avuye mu rusengero akajya mu rundi wenda kuko ariho yumva h@@ amub@@ ohok@@ eye. Iyo agarutse muri rwa rusengero afatwa nk’@@ umwanzi ukomeye ndetse n’iz@@ ari inshuti ze bisanzwe zik@@ amug@@ endera kure z@@ anga ko abayobozi bo mu itorero baz@@ abareba nabi. U@@ va mu rusengero we ah@@ amagawe n’Imana akajya gutangiza ur@@ und@@ i; we usanga ah@@ igwa bukware akar@@ wanywa bikomeye@@ ; Intego nyamukuru ari ukw@@ anga ko hari abanye@@ torero bam@@ ukurikir@@ a! Ibi birababaje kandi bir@@ atang@@ aje. Aho kugirango umuyobozi w’@@ urusengero an@@ ez@@ ezwe nuko Imana yaguye umurimo wayo ikaba hari uwo ih@@ amagariye kwagura ubwami bway@@ o; Usanga aho kumushyigikira no kumutera ingabo mu bit@@ ugu@@ ; Uw@@ akam@@ ushyigikiye niwe umur@@ wanya akamus@@ eby@@ a; Rimwe na rimwe yaba amurusha ubushobozi agashyirwa aruko as@@ enye ibyo yubats@@ e. Igitangaje nuko abapasiteri bamwe bakora ibikorwa nk’ibyo byo kug@@ aw@@ a; baby@@ ir@@ ata mu ruhame maze abayoboke babo si ik@@ ubash@@ im@@ agiza no kubak@@ omera amashy@@ i; induru n’imp@@ undu bik@@ avuga. Intambara turwana ntabwo ari iy’@@ umubir@@ i; Imana iduh@@ ish@@ urire tumenye neza ko ibyo twah@@ amagariwe atari kwin@@ ezeza no kubaka ubwami bwacu@@ ; Ko icyo twah@@ amagariwe ari kubaka umubiri wa Krist@@ o; Bityo tureke kubera imbogamizi abo Imana ih@@ aguruk@@ ije. Igitangaje nuko abo bar@@ ema inzangano bakan@@ ak@@ umira abandi kujya gukora ibyo Imana ibah@@ amagarira nabo baba baratangiye aho bavuye babar@@ wany@@ a; ariko ibibi banyuzemo ntibib@@ igishe ibyo bagomba guk@@ osora. Abefeso 4:@@ 26 " Nim@@ ur@@ akara ntim@@ ug@@ akore icyaha, izuba nt@@ irikar@@ enge muk@@ ir@@ akaye " Ese Bir@@ akwiriye ko habaho gushyamirana n’amakimbirane mu bantu b’Imana byumwihariko hagati y’aba@@ bakozi b’Imana bayoboye aband@@ i; Uwo mwuka ug@@ ashyirwa no mu bay@@ obor@@ wa? Bibiliya itubwira ko tud@@ akwiye gutamba ibitambo tut@@ arik@@ iran@@ ura neza nabo dufitanye ibibazo. Tay@@ m@@ or Mc@@ Int@@ y@@ re wamamaye nka Tay@@ -@@ K, mu 2016 nibwo yashinjwe urupfu rw’@@ umusore witwa Eth@@ an Wal@@ ker wari ufite imyaka 21, waras@@ iwe mu rugo iwe mu Mujyi wa M@@ ans@@ field muri Leta ya Tex@@ as. Abat@@ angabuhamya bavuze ko Tay@@ -@@ K yari mu mugambi wo kwiba ibiyobyabwenge n’amafaranga mu rugo rwa Wal@@ k@@ er. Eth@@ an Wal@@ ker yarashwe n’@@ igitero cy’@@ abajura barimo na Tay@@ -@@ K wah@@ an@@ ishijwe igifungo cy’imyaka 55 n’ihazabu y’ibihumbi $@@ 21 nyuma yo guhamwa n’iby@@ aha.
