Nti@@ bategereza yashy@@ ig@@ uwe ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa mbere tariki ya 21/@@ 7/201@@ 4. H@@ ort@@ ense Munyantore
Abamotari babiri basanzwe bar@@ anduye Coronavirus bateye impungenge Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’@@ Ubuzima, RBC, Dr Nsanzimana Sabin yavuze ko abamotari babiri babonetse kuri iki Cyumweru bar@@ anduye Coronavirus bah@@ angayikishije cyane asaba abantu kwitwararika kugira ngo moto zit@@ aba ikiraro cyo gukwirakwiza iki cyorezo. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Rwanda yatangaje ko kuri iki Cyumweru hagaragaye abantu bashya batandatu banduye Coronavirus mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu gihe I Rusizi habonetse 18 naho ku mupaka wa Rusumo haboneka babiri. Muri rusange abarwayi babonetse kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 21 Kamena 2020, ni 26 mu bipimo 3,@@ 25@@ 2. Mu barwayi batandatu bagaragaye mu Mujyi wa Kigali harimo babiri bakora imirimo yo gutwara abantu kuri moto naho abandi bane ni abafite aho bahuriye n’abandi barwayi bari barag@@ aragaye ubush@@ ize. Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’@@ Ubuzima, RBC gitangaza ko abatwara za moto bagaragaye mu buryo bwo gupima bwari bumaze iminsi itanu h@@ apimwa abantu benshi ngo hamenyekane niba iki cyorezo kid@@ akomeje gukwirakw@@ ira. Umuyobozi wa RBC, Dr Nsanzimana Sab@@ in, yavuze ko abamotari babiri bag@@ aragaweho Coronavirus bateye inkeke aho abaturage n’abam@@ otari muri rusanga basabwe kwitwararika ngo bataba ikiraro gik@@ wirakwiza Coronavirus. Yagize ati “N@@ ibo bah@@ angayikishije cyane kuko ni icyiciro cy@@ afung@@ uriwe imirimo nyuma y’ibindi byose ku buryo rero bid@@ uh@@ angayikishije mu buryo bwo kuvuga ngo izi moto turi kugend@@ aho tugomba kwitwararika cyane ngo zit@@ aba ikiraro cyo gukwirakwiza Coronavirus@@ .” Dr Nsanzimana yabwiye RBA ko ubu igik@@ urikiyeho ari ugush@@ akisha hakarebwa aho aba bamotari bakuye icyorezo ndetse no kumenya abo bashobora kuba barat@@ waye cyangwa barah@@ uye nabo n’ubwo bigoye. Yakomeje agira ati “Icyo dusaba Abanyarwanda ni uko abagenda kuri za moto n’abakora indi mirimo gukurikiza amabwiriza ni ingenzi kuko nt@@ umenya niba ugut@@ waye ataba afite ubwo burwayi at@@ anab@@ izi kuko abenshi ntan@@ ’@@ ibimenyetso bari kugarag@@ az@@ a.” Dr Nsanzimana avuga ko n’ubwo icyorezo bigaragara ko tuz@@ abana nacyo igihe kirekire ariko kwirinda ikwirakwira ryacyo birashoboka Amabwiriza yashyizweho n’Urwego Ngenzuramikorere (RUR@@ A) ku wa 3 Kamena 2020, ubwo serivisi zo gutwara abantu kuri moto zas@@ ubuk@@ urw@@ aga, asaba abamotari n’abagenzi kwitwaza imiti y’@@ isuku yabugenewe (H@@ and@@ -@@ San@@ it@@ iz@@ ers) kugirango bas@@ uk@@ ure intoki na cas@@ ques mbere y’@@ urugendo. Abamotari n’abagenzi bagomba kuba bafite Agat@@ ambaro ko kwambara imbere y’ing@@ ofero (C@@ as@@ qu@@ es). Abamotari n’abagenzi kandi bagomba kwambara udupfukamunwa uko bikwiye nk’uko biteganywa n’amabwiriza ya Minisiteri y’ubuzima ndetse abantu bose bash@@ ishikarizwa kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga mu kwishyura. Dr Nsanzimana avuga ko kuba abamotari batangiye kug@@ aragaraho iki cyorezo bishoboka cyane ko hagiye kubaho ikwirakwira ryih@@ use rya Coronavirus cyane ko baba batwara abantu benshi mu gihe gito cyane. Ati “Uko urujya n’uruza rw’abantu rw@@ iyongera hirya no hino mu Rwanda, biroroshye cyane ko abantu bav@@ ana uburwayi ahantu bab@@ ujyana ahandi. Ariko biroroshye cyane kuko dufite uburyo bwo kwirinda aribwo bwo kubahiriza neza amabwiriza yashyiz@@ weh@@ o.” Icyizere I Rusiz@@ i? Uyu muyobozi avuga ko kuri ubu mu mibare bigaragara ko akarere ka Rusizi ariko g@@ akomeje kuza imbere mu bwandu bwa Coronavirus cyane ko nko mu barwayi 26 bagaragaye kuri iki Cyumweru 18 ari ab’@@ I Rusizi. Yakomeje avuga ko bigaragara ko hari ibiri kugerwaho kuko nk’aba 18 bagaragaye ku Cyumweru, batatu muri bo ni abanyarwanda bari barat@@ ah@@ utse, mu gihe abandi bane ari ababana n’umwe wari wagaragaye mu minsi ishize mu gihe abandi 11 ari ababon@@ etse ahantu h@@ ibasiwe muri aka karere ka Rusizi. Ati “@@ Haracyari kare kugira ngo tuvuge ko icyorezo mu Karere ka Rusizi kiri kugabany@@ uka, abaturage barasabwa kubahiriza ingamba zashyizweho kuko twabonaga ko hari abat@@ az@@ ik@@ urikiza nk’abo tubona bajya gusura ababo ndetse n’abag@@ erageza kuva muri Rusizi bajya ahand@@ i.” Yakomeje agira ati “M@@ ub@@ y’ukuri ingamba dufite n’ib@@ ipimo byinshi biri gufatwa ndetse na guma mu rugo iri I Rusizi, twizeye ko mu minsi iri imbere ibipimo biza kug@@ abanyuka ndetse n’ababa barah@@ uye n’ubu burwayi bagatangira guk@@ ira.” Icyorezo tuz@@ abana nacyo igihe kirekire Icyorezo cya COVID19 giterwa n’agakoko gashya ka Coronavirus cyageze mu Rwanda ku wa 13 Werurwe 2020, ubwo h@@ abonekaga umurwayi wa mbere. Kuva icyo gihe abantu 11@@ 1,@@ 25@@ 7 nibo bamaze gupimwa aho muri bo abagera kuri 7@@ 28 bamaze kwandura iki cyorezo mu gihe abandi 35@@ 9 aribo bamaze gukira naho abakir@@ waye ni 36@@ 7. Abantu babiri nibo bamaze guhitanwa n’iki cyorezo ku butaka bw’u Rwanda. Iminsi igera mu 100 ishize icyorezo kigeze mu Rwanda igaragaza ko abanyarwanda bazabana nacyo igihe kirekire, aho basabwa kubahiriza amabwiriza n’ingamba byashyizweho ku nyungu zabo n’iz@@ abandi.
Kuki Afurika ariwo mugabane uzah@@ azwa n’iby@@ orezo bikomeye kurusha ahand@@ i? Uko umwaka ush@@ ira undi ukaza niko hirya no ku Isi havuka ibyorezo bih@@ itana ubuzima bw’@@ abatari bake, kimwe mu bikomeje kuvugwa ubu ni Ebola ikomeje kuy@@ ogoza Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. Nubwo ibi by@@ orezo biv@@ uka ku Isi, muri iki gihe nta mugabane ug@@ aragaramo ibi by@@ orezo nka Afurika, nk’uko n’ikinyamakuru N@@ BC cyab@@ itangaje. K@@ ivuga ko akenshi biterwa n’imiyoborere itan@@ oze ikunze kugaragara kuri uyu mugabane, ubuvuzi butar@@ atera imbere no kutagira ingamba zihamye zishobora gukumira cyangwa guhashya icyorezo runaka cyav@@ utse. Isi muri rusange yagiye y@@ ibasirwa n’iby@@ orezo bikomeye, ik@@ izwi cyane ni icy@@ iswe Sp@@ an@@ ish Fl@@ u cyangwa Fl@@ u of 19@@ 18, iki ni icyorezo cy@@ adutse nyuma y’intambara ya mbere y’@@ Isi. Ibitangazamakuru bivuga ko mu mateka y’Isi iki gishobora kuba aricyo cyorezo cy@@ ishe umubare w’abantu utari muke kuko bari hagati ya miliyoni 50@@ -1@@ 00. Impamvu iki cyorezo ngo cy@@ akwir@@ akwiye vuba ni abasirikare bari bavuye mu ntambara ya mbere y’Isi bajya mu bihugu byabo bagenda bag@@ ikwirakw@@ iza. Nyuma yo kubona ibi by@@ orezo bikomeza kugenda bib@@ ibas@@ ira, ibihugu cyane cyane iby’@@ i Burayi byafashe ingamba zikomeye zirimo gukora imiti, gukora inkingo no gufata ingamba zikomeye z@@ ibih@@ ashya. Afurika yo kugeza ubu ikomeje guhura n’ibibazo birimo Ebola, Malaria na virusi itera Sida. Kuva mu 1976 abahanga nibwo bavumbuye Virusi ya Ebola muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ku mugezi wa Ebola, uherereye mu Majyaruguru y’iki gihugu. Kuva icyo gihe iki cyorezo cyakomeje kuy@@ ogoza Afurika gusa cy@@ ibukwa cyane mu 2014 ubwo k@@ ibas@@ iraga ibihugu bir@@ imo, Liber@@ ia, Guinea, Sierra Le@@ one, Nigeria, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na Mali. Abantu barenga ibihumbi 11 nibo bapfuye gusa mu mezi 21. Nubwo Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigaragara mu bihugu byagezweho na Ebola muri uwo mwaka, mu bantu 11 bari bay@@ anduye nabwo bay@@ ikuye muri Afurika, babiri nibo bapfuye, ibi byatewe n’ubuvuzi bwateye imbere buri muri iki gihugu. Kugeza ubu ibihugu birimo u Rwanda bikomeje gufata ingamba zikomeye nyuma yaho muri Kanama 2018 nabwo Ebola yongeye kugaragara mu Burasirazuba bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, kugeza ubu abarenga 14@@ 00 ikaba imaze kubah@@ itana. Afurika si wo mugabane w@@ ibasirwa gusa Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ushinzwe Ubuzima rusange, Dr. Ndimub@@ anzi Patrick, yabwiye IGIHE ko hari ibyorezo koko muri Afurika ariko ko hari n’ibindi usanga biri ku yindi mig@@ abane. Yagize ati “Niba mw@@ ibuka neza hari ibyorezo no mu bindi bice by’@@ Isi, ikibazo kiba cyane muri Afurika ni ingamba ziba zit@@ iteguye zo guhangana nabyo. Ubu niyo mpamvu turimo gushyiramo imbaraga mu gutegura uburyo dushobora gusubiza kuri icyo cyor@@ ez@@ o.” Yakomeje agira ati “@@ Ebola yabaye mu bihugu by’amahanga mu Budage yarah@@ abaye no muri Amerika ariko bisaba kuba ufite uburyo bwiza, waba ugize umurwayi umwe cyangwa babiri uk@@ abav@@ ura bag@@ akir@@ a.” Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) mu Rwanda, Dr Kas@@ onde Mw@@ inga, we yabwiye IGIHE ko ibi by@@ orezo bitari muri Afurika gusa ahubwo igikenewe ni ukub@@ ir@@ wanya. Ati “Njye ndatekereza ko ibi by@@ orezo bitari gusa ku mugabane wa Afurika, uyu munsi ni Ebola iri ku mugabane wa Afurika ariko turabona no mu tundi duce tw’@@ Isi ahari ibindi by@@ or@@ ezo, icyangombwa ni ukub@@ irwanya no gufata ingamba zih@@ am@@ ye.” Ibibazo by’umutekano muke, ubukene, urwego rw’@@ ubuvuzi rutar@@ atera imbere, politiki zid@@ aham@@ ye zo guhangana n’iby@@ or@@ ezo, ni impamvu zikomeye zituma Afurika izah@@ azwa nabyo kurusha ahandi. Inzobere mu by’ubuzima zivuga ko guhangana n’ibi by@@ orezo biv@@ uka umunsi ku munsi, bisaba guhuza kw’@@ ibihugu no gushyiraho politike ihamye ku buryo iba yiteguye guhangana n’icyorezo kiv@@ utse kit@@ agombye kumara umubare w’abaturage bafash@@ we. Ebola na virusi itera Sida ni bimwe mu by@@ orezo bikomeje kuzah@@ aza Afurika
Rayon Sport itsinzwe na Police, APR itwara igikombe idak@@ innye Ku munsi wa 25 wa shampiyona, ikipe ya Rayon Sport itsinzwe na Police 2-1 naho APR FC itwara igikombe idak@@ innye nyuma y'uko Gicumbi ihagaritse As Kigali banganya 0-0. Umukino wabereye ku Kicukiro Rayon Sport Police yari yakiriye Rayon Sport amakipe zombi zari zar@@ arangije gukura amaso ku gikombe cya sh@@ amb@@ iy@@ ona kuko amakipe az@@ iri imbere yari yaraz@@ is@@ izeho amanota menshi. Ibi byatumye n'@@ umukino ut@@ agaragaza ubukana bwinshi haba mu bakinnyi ndetse no mu baf@@ ana. Mu kibuga amakipe yatangiye akina umupira w@@ oroheje agac@@ ishamo agas@@ at@@ irana cyane cyane ku ruhande rwa Police ariko ishyaka ryo kur@@ angiriza imipira mu izamu ngo ibitego bibon@@ eke rik@@ abura. Igice cya mbere cyarangiye amakipe yombi anganya 0-0 , mu gice cya 2 nibwo Police yaje ihindura umukino itsinda igitego ariko ibyishimo byayo ntib@@ yatinze kuko Rayon Sport yahise igaruka mu mukino maze Fu@@ ad Ndayisenga atsinda igitego ac@@ enze ba myugariro ba Polic@@ e. Amakipe yose yakomeje gukina as@@ at@@ irana ariko Rayon Sport ik@@ agaragaza ko yigar@@ anzuye Polic@@ e. Gusa umutoza K@@ asa yaje gushyiramo kapiteni we Tuyisenge Jack wari umaze igihe mu mvune ahindura umukino atsinda igitego cya kabiri. Umutoza Kayiranga Baptiste yavuze ko nubwo atsinzwe nacyo yan@@ enga abakinnyi be kuko bakoze ibyo bagombaga gukora ariko hak@@ abura amahirwe. Kayiranga yavuze ko ntacyo Police yabar@@ ushije ngo uretse ko bakoze ikosa rimwe ryatumye batsindwa igitego cya 2. Mugenzi we K@@ asa Mbungo Andrew nawe yavuze ko amakipe yombi yakinnye umukino mwiza wo gus@@ at@@ irana ariko ikipe ikar@@ usha Rayon Sport amahirwe yo kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe yabon@@ ye. Umutoza K@@ asa kandi yavuze ko abakinnyi be bah@@ ushije ibitego byinshi mu gice cya mbere bakabaye barangije umukino hakiri kare. Undi mukino wabaye uyu munsi ni ikipe ya As Kigali yanganyije n'ikipe ya Gicumbi 0-0 binatuma APR bari bahang@@ aniye igikombe ihita icy@@ egukana bidasubirwaho nubwo yo izakina ejo. Ku g@@ eza ubu As Kigali yagize amanota 46 mu gihe APR ifite amanota 51 mu gihe is@@ igaranye imikino 2 As Kigali is@@ igaranye 1.
Guc@@ unga umutekano neza by@@ abah@@ esheje imodoka ya miliyoni 32@@ RW@@ F Umurenge wa Remera wegukanye imodoka itangwa n'Umujyi wa Kigali ufat@@ anije na Polisi y'@@ Igihugu, nyuma yo kurusha isuku n'umutekano indi mir@@ enge. Umurenge wa Remera wah@@ embwe imodoka Uyu murenge wahawe imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa M@@ ahind@@ ra ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 32 RW@@ f. Mu kwezi kw'@@ Ukuboza 2016 nibwo batoranyijwe nk'@@ abah@@ ize abandi, ariko imodoka bahawe itah@@ wa ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa 06 Mutarama 2017. Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Remera, Kalisa Jean Sa@@ uv@@ eur@@ , avuga ko iki gihembo bag@@ ikesha abaturage bakorana n'@@ ubuyobozi, ndetse n'@@ irondo r@@ ikor@@ anywe umwuga. Yagize ati"@@ Uyu murenge ufite abaturage b@@ umva, ufite abafatanyabikorwa barimo abakora isuku neza; tun@@ afite irondo ry'@@ umwuga ry@@ ubak@@ itse kandi habaho guhuza ibikor@@ wa". Akomeza agira ati "@@ Isuku n'umutekano twabig@@ ize ubuzima bwa buri munsi. Ir@@ ondo rir@@ ahembwa kandi rifite ibikoresh@@ o; hari ibintu byinshi by@@ ibwa bikaz@@ anwa muri Remera, ariko turab@@ ifata tukab@@ ishyikiriza Polisi, nayo ik@@ abiha ba nyir@@ aby@@ o". Umuturage witwa Mukabar@@ anga Ann@@ e-@@ Mar@@ ie, ni umwe mu bavuga ko bishimiye imodoka izajya ibat@@ abara, igihe hari nk'@@ ukeneye ubufasha bwo kujyanwa kwa muganga. Ati "Iyi nanjye nd@@ ayik@@ esha kuba mby@@ uka buri munsi ng@@ akora isuku ahantu hose, nta mac@@ upa n'indi myanda wasanga mu muhand@@ a". Kab@@ ogoza Innocent, umukuru w'umudugudu w'@@ Urumuri muri Ruk@@ ili ya mbere, aremeza ko irondo ryabo ry@@ iy@@ ubaha kandi rih@@ embwa neza, ku buryo ngo nta bir@@ arane ubuyobozi bu@@ bafit@@ iye. Umurenge wa Remera wari us@@ ang@@ anwe imodoka imwe ishinzwe irondo n'@@ isuku, ariko ngo iya kabiri yabonetse iz@@ ay@@ unganira mu bikorwa bya Leta no gutabara abaturage. Igihembo nk'iki Umujyi wa Kigali na Polisi bag@@ itanga buri mwaka ku murenge wahize indi muri Kigali, mu bijyanye n'isuku n'@@ umutekano.
Bugesera: Imvura ivanze n'@@ umuyaga yas@@ ambuye amazu 45 Imvura yiganjemo amah@@ indu n'@@ umuyaga mwinshi yas@@ ak@@ ambuye amazu 45 ndetse in@@ angiza ibintu byinshi birimo imyaka nk'@@ ibigori, insina n'ibindi bitandukanye mu Kagari ka Mar@@ any@@ undo mu Murenge wa Nyamata mu Karere ka Bugesera. Iyi mvura yaguye ku mugoroba wo kuwa 18@@ /01/201@@ 5 hagati ya saa kumi n'imwe n'igice na saa kumi n'@@ ebyiri. Umukozi ushinzwe iterambere n'imibereho myiza mu Kagari ka Mar@@ any@@ undo, Rwam@@ ucyo Janvier avuga ko kuri ubu ibyangijwe bik@@ irimo kubarurwa kuko bit@@ aramenyekana byose. Agira ati "@@ gusa nko mu mudugudu wa Rusagara honyine har@@ abarurwa urutoki rungana na hegitari 4 rwag@@ uye insina zikaba z@@ aram@@ baraye zose, ibyo bik@@ iyongeraho ibigori byari mu murima ariko naba nabyo kuko byo byari by@@ eze kuko ba nyirabyo ntabwo bah@@ om@@ bye@@ ". Imwe mu mazu yasamb@@ uwe n'imvura ivanze n'@@ umuyaga mwinshi. Rwam@@ ucyo avuga ko muri ayo mazu yas@@ ambutse amaze kubarurwa agera kuri 14 niyo ibis@@ enge byayo by@@ angiritse cyane ku buryo ba nyirayo bibasaba gushaka irindi s@@ ak@@ aro rishy@@ a. "Tur@@ ashimira abaturage bat@@ angirijwe amazu n'imvura kuko bah@@ utiye gucumbikira bagenzi babo bakabona aho bar@@ ambika umus@@ aya. Kuri ubu hakaba harimo gukorwa raporo kugira ngo ig@@ ezwe ku murenge no ku karere kugira ngo abo baturage babashe gufashwa bih@@ use kuko bigaragara ko ntako bamwe bam@@ ez@@ e,@@ " Rwam@@ ucy@@ o. Mu gitondo cyo kuwa 19@@ /01/201@@ 5 abaturage baby@@ utse bator@@ agura ndetse ban@@ asubir@@ anya ibyo imvura yas@@ igaje kugira ngo barebe uko bas@@ ana amazu yabo. Amazu yas@@ enyutse mu buryo butandukanye. Hari bamwe basabwa gushaka isak@@ aro bundi bushya. Sekamana Pierre, umwe mu@@ bas@@ enyewe n'imvura aravuga ko yaguye batay@@ iteguye kuko bagiye kubona bakabona haje umuyaga mwinshi uhita ukurik@@ irwa n'imvura irimo inkuba z@@ akub@@ itaga cyane. Akomeza agira ati "@@ turasaba ubuyobozi ko bw@@ adufasha kuko muri twe hari abadafite isak@@ aro rindi kuko amabati amwe imvura yay@@ ash@@ wany@@ ag@@ uje, none ubu tukaba twibaza uko twabig@@ enz@@ a". Iyo mvura yamaze igihe kingana n'iminota nka 40 ariko ibyo yangije bikaba ari byinshi n'ubu bik@@ ibar@@ urwa. Iyi mvura kandi yan@@ as@@ enye amazu mu Kagari ka May@@ ange, aho hamaze kubarurwa inzu 2 ndetse n'ib@@ ik@@ oni 6 mu mudugudu w@@ ubakiwe abanyarwanda birukanwe mu gihugu cya Tanzaniya. Egide Kayiranga
Muhanga: Abantu umunani bahitanywe n'imvura Abaturage umunani bo mu mirenge ya Nyab@@ in@@ oni, R@@ ongi na Mush@@ ish@@ iro mu Karere ka Muhanga bahitanywe n'ibiza by'@@ imvura. Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Muhanga, Uwam@@ aliya Beat@@ rice, avuga ko imvura yaguye mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa 08 Gicurasi 2016 yateje inkangu zis@@ enya amazu ag@@ wira abantu bar@@ apfa, aho Umurenge wa Nyab@@ in@@ oni ubar@@ urwamo batanu, R@@ ongi abantu babiri, naho Mush@@ ish@@ iro hag@@ apfa imwe. Abaturage b'i Muhanga batuye mu manegeka bar@@ amagarirwa kwimuka vuba ngo bar@@ engere ubuzima bwabo. Abana bane bo mu Murenge wa Nyab@@ in@@ oni baraye bashying@@ uwe kuko ababo babuze uko barar@@ ana imirambo yabo aho bahung@@ iye, mu gihe umwana umwe w'umwaka n'igice w'i Nyab@@ in@@ oni we yakomeje kuburirwa irengero kuko ngo yatwawe na Nyabar@@ ongo. Abantu babiri bo mu Murenge wa R@@ ongi bo bar@@ ashy@@ igurwa kuri uyu wa 09 Gicurasi 2016 hamwe n'uwo w'i Mush@@ ish@@ iro, mu gihe ubutabazi bwo bukomeje h@@ ifashishwa inzego z'umutekano zirimo abasirikare na Polisi bari gufasha mu bikorwa byo kwimura abaturage bakiri mu man@@ egeka. Ubuyobozi bw'Akarere ka Muhanga bw@@ atangarije Kigali Today ko amazu asaga 30 na yo y@@ angiritse, ndetse na H@@ a zisaga z'@@ imyaka 100 zir@@ angirika, hapfa kandi amwe mu matungo magufi n'@@ amar@@ em@@ are yatwawe n'@@ imvura, imihanda igana R@@ ongi na K@@ abac@@ uzi ir@@ angirika ku buryo bitoroshye kujyayo n'@@ imodoka. Akarere ka Muhanga k@@ agaragaza ko abaturage bag@@ ituye aman@@ egeka basabwa bose kwimuka kugira ngo bar@@ engere ubuzima mu gihe hategerejwe ko mu Mp@@ eshyi bazakomeza ibikorwa by'@@ ubwubatsi ku bazim@@ uka. Ubuyobozi buvuga ko ah@@ akenewe ubufasha buri guteg@@ urwa, aho bizaba ngombwa hak@@ it@@ abazwa Minisiteri ishinzwe Ibiz@@ a, ariko ko n'abaturage bakaba bagomba gushyiraho ak@@ abo.
Ib@@ uye rimwe ry@@ ishe inyoni ebyiri kwa Rug@@ agi, uw@@ ahan@@ uriwe at@@ ahana igif@@ ur@@ umba cy’amafaranga (Amafoto) Kayumba Faustin yabonye umugisha w’@@ uruhurirane ubwo yahan@@ urirwaga n’umun@@ yabitang@@ aza Bishop Rugagi ndetse ahita an@@ amuha amafaranga yit@@ anzwe n’abak@@ irisitu bari bateraniye mu rusengero Red@@ e@@ emed Gospel Church ruherereye mu Mujyi rwagati hafi yo kwa Rub@@ ang@@ ura. Uyu mugabo ufite abana batandatu yaje gusenga nk’abandi ariko aza kubona igitangaza cyo guhan@@ urirwa no gut@@ ahana umugisha w’@@ igis@@ eke amafaranga, imyenda n’@@ inkw@@ eto. Ubwo Bishop Rugagi yabwir@@ izaga yaje guh@@ agurutsa Kayumba mu iteraniro avuga ko yamug@@ izeho iy@@ erekw@@ a, yanah@@ ish@@ uriwe ibibazo by’@@ urudaca ari kuny@@ uramo. Yagize ati “@@ Hag@@ uruka Imana iny@@ eretse ufite ibibazo by’@@ ubushobozi, ku buryo hirya no hino hose uh@@ afite imyenda, ndetse n’aho uh@@ ahira (B@@ out@@ ique) usaba ibyo kurya ubu byabaye ibibazo n’ahandi hose isoni n’ik@@ imwaro ni byinsh@@ i.” Kayumba umaze imyaka 15 yakiriye agakiza yabaye nk’@@ uguye mu kantu yagize ati “Nibyo rwose kuko tumaze na kenshi t@@ ubur@@ ara, ubundi tuk@@ abw@@ irir@@ wa.” Bishop yahise amuhamagara ku ruh@@ imbi am@@ ubw@@ irira imbere y’@@ iteraniro ko Imana yamubwiye ko iri b@@ umus@@ etse. Bishop ak@@ imug@@ eza imbere, abantu bahise baby@@ igana batangira gutanga amafaranga bay@@ ashyira imbere ku ruh@@ imbi, aho Bishop na Kayumba bari bah@@ agaze. Abantu bakomeje kwitanga uko b@@ ifite, abadafite amafaranga bagatanga sh@@ eke, abandi bakaz@@ ana imyenda n’inkweto n’amas@@ ak@@ osh@@ i. Kayumba yatangarije urubuga Abac@@ ung@@ uwe@@ .@@ org rw’@@ Itorero rya Bishop Rug@@ agi, dukesha iyi nkuru ko an@@ ezerewe cyane bidasanzwe kandi ashimye Imana ku bw’@@ umugambi wayo mwiza. Yagize ati “@@ Aha nkunda kuh@@ aza cyane, kuko nabonye Bishop kuri Tel@@ eviz@@ iyo, mbona uko asengera abantu bagak@@ ira, abandi akababwira ibyabo byose, mpitamo kuzajya nza kuh@@ asengera uko nsh@@ oboye, kuko iyo mp@@ as@@ engeye nt@@ aha numva nt@@ andukanye n’uko n@@ aj@@ e.” Yakomeje agira ati “Ubundi mfite umwana wigaga Kaminuza Kampala niwe watumye njya muri iyo myenda yose ngira ngo mw@@ ishy@@ urire ishuri, wak@@ ongeraho inzu y’ubuk@@ ode n’umuryango kuw@@ utunga kandi nta kazi, ibibazo b@@ imbana ing@@ um@@ e. Bamwe bari barah@@ aze ibisobanuro byanjye birirwa bant@@ uka kuri telefone, abandi bak@@ abim@@ bwir@@ isha umun@@ wa. K@@ ubur@@ ara byo bit@@ ubayeho kenshi cyane cyangwa ukabona umuntu ar@@ ariye irind@@ azi gusa. Mbese byari bibabaje ariko Imana ishimwe cyane ko uyu munsi gutaka kwanjye kw@@ ageze imbere yay@@ o.” Bishop Rugagi yakunze kumvikana avuga ko ashobora gusengera umuntu ku by@@ amun@@ aniye ariko ibyo ashoboye agomba kuby@@ ikorera maze ubonye umugisha agataha ahimbaza Imana. Ny@@ und@@ o: Bam@@ urikiwe ivuriro rishya nyuma y'@@ ir@@ yangijwe na Seb@@ eya Ubuyobozi bwa Diyosezi gat@@ urika ya Nyundo bwam@@ urikiye abaturage n'ubuyobozi ikigo nderabuzima gishya nyuma y'uko icyari gisanzwe cyang@@ ijwe n'@@ umugezi wa Seb@@ eya. Kuva Gicurasi 2010 nibwo ikigo nderabuzima cya Nyundo cyang@@ ijwe n'amazi biba ngombwa ko h@@ ashakwa ahandi hakw@@ imurirwa serivisi z'@@ ubuvuzi zah@@ atang@@ ir@@ waga, aho hak@@ odesh@@ ejwe inzu y'@@ umuturage ariko nabwo serivisi zose ntiz@@ ish@@ obore kuh@@ atang@@ irwa. Izi nyubako z@@ amuritswe nyuma y'imyaka isaga ine icy@@ igo nderabuzima cya Nyundo cyar@@ aseny@@ utse. Nk'uko bamwe mu baturage bari basanzwe biv@@ uza ku kigo nderabuzima cya Nyundo ba@@ bitangaz@@ a, ngo n'ubwo cyari cyiza bakig@@ anaga bafite ubwoba ko Seb@@ eya yak@@ ibas@@ angamo kuko iyo amazi yazaga inyubako zose z@@ uz@@ uraga amazi. Inyubako z@@ amuritswe kuri uyu wa mbere tariki ya 6@@ /10/201@@ 4 zubatswe mu mezi 19 zitwaye amafaranga y'u Rwanda angana na miliyoni 4@@ 40 yatanzwe n'abat@@ erankunga batandukanye barimo umushinga wo mu gihugu cy'@@ Ubudage witwa M@@ iz@@ ere@@ or, umushinga wo mu gihugu cy'@@ Ububiligi witwa Ing@@ obyi hamwe na Minisiteri y'ubuzima mu Rwanda. Musenyeri Habiyambere n'abandi bayobozi bataha ku mugaragaro inyubako z'@@ ikigo nderabuzima cya Ny@@ undo. Musenyeri wa Diyoseze ya Nyundo, Dr Habiyambere Al@@ é@@ x@@ is avuga ko ivuriro rya Nyundo mu mwaka wa 2010 ry@@ itaga k'@@ ubuzima bw'abaturage ibihumbi 50, harimo ubuzima bw'@@ abanyeshuri biga ku mashuri ya Nyundo bagera ku bihumbi 3. Musenyeri Habiyambere asaba abaturage kwitabira gahunda yo kuboneza urubyaro hakoreshejwe uburyo bwa gakondo bigafasha no kwirinda virusi itera Sida. Inyubako z'@@ ikigo nderabuzima cya Nyundo zari z@@ angijwe n'@@ umugezi wa Seb@@ eya muri Gicurasi, 2010. Uretse kuba Diyoseze ya Nyundo yarafashe iya mbere mu kubaka ivuriro ry@@ angijwe n'@@ umugezi wa Seb@@ eya, yatanze n'@@ ikibanza kiz@@ ubakw@@ amo urwibutso ruz@@ im@@ urirwamo imibiri yari mu rwibutso rwa Nyundo narwo rw@@ angijwe n'@@ amazi, akarere ka Rubavu kakaba g@@ atangaza ko kamaze kubona amafaranga n'ubwo k@@ atar@@ atangira ibikorwa byo kubaka. Nyanza: Abak@@ eba babiri barwanye umwe y@@ ivugana nyirabukwe abat@@ abaye Mukany@@ ang@@ ezi Claudine na Uwimana Rachel basanzwe ari abak@@ eba bakaba batuye mu mudugudu wa Gih@@ isi A mu kagali ka Kavumu mu murenge wa Busasamana mu karere ka Nyanza bakoz@@ anyijeho mu mirwano yabereye hafi y'@@ ingo zabo nyirabukwe wabo abat@@ abaye kugira ngo abakize umwe muri bo aram@@ wad@@ ukira amukubita igiti mu r@@ ubavu yitaba Imana ageze iwe mu rugo. Bamwe mu baturanyi bari hafi yabo bavuga ko Uwimana Rachel ari nawe nyiri uwo murima ngo yabwiraga mugenzi we Mukany@@ ang@@ ezi Claudine ko inka ye itagomba na rimwe kumuk@@ andag@@ irira mu murima maze mu gihe yamus@@ at@@ iraga bat@@ ongana barag@@ und@@ agur@@ ana. Muk@@ ahora Appol@@ ine umuturanyi w'@@ aba bagore ndetse ngo mu gihe barwan@@ aga akaba yari hafi yabo ariko abura uburyo abak@@ iza kubera kubera gutinya ko nawe yari bub@@ ig@@ wemo. Ab@@ ivuga at@@ ya: "@@ Uriya mukecuru Muk@@ amb@@ ungo God@@ el@@ ive yumvise abak@@ azana be bat@@ ong@@ anira munsi y'@@ urugo rwe nkatwe twese maze aram@@ anuka ngo abakize Uw@@ iman@@ ana Rachel yamw@@ iy@@ amye aran@@ amut@@ uka arangije atora igiti cy'@@ umuy@@ enzi akim@@ ukubita mu r@@ ubav@@ u". Ngo ubwo yari amaze kuk@@ im@@ ukubita mu r@@ ubavu umukecuru Muk@@ amb@@ ugo God@@ el@@ ive yat@@ atse rimwe agira ati: "@@ Rachel urany@@ ish@@ e" maze mu gihe yari asubiye iwe ataka cyane yir@@ ambitse ku gitanda mu kanya gato ahita apfa nk'uko Nyir@@ akam@@ ana Dom@@ ina umukobwa we wamug@@ ezeho bwa mbere mu rugo abivuga. Nyir@@ akam@@ ana asobanura iby'@@ urupfu nyina yapf@@ uyemo muri aya magambo: " Njye nat@@ ashye nka saa mbiri z'ijoro ariko ngeze hafi y'@@ urugo bambwira ko mama wanjye yakubiswe n'umuk@@ azana we Rachel ubwo n@@ injiye mu cyumba cye nasanze yashizemo umw@@ uk@@ a". Abaturanyi bahise batangira kum@@ ubar@@ iza isanduku ngo ashying@@ urwe. Mu gihe muri aka gace inkuru y'urupfu rw'uyu mukecuru yari imaze kuba kim@@ omo abaturanyi bamujyanye mu bitaro bya Nyanza kugira ngo abaganga bagaragaze icy@@ amwishe ariko kubera ko ibi bitaro byavuze ko nta bushobozi bifite bwo kub@@ ipima byasabye ko yoherezwa i Kigali ariko ba nyiri uyu mukecuru nabo babura ubushobozi bwo kwishyura ibyo bizamini byose maze niko kumusubiza mu rugo ngo ashying@@ urwe. Uwimana Rachel ukekwaho kuba yakubise uyu mukecuru bikamuviramo urupfu nawe yahise atabwa muri yombi ajya kuba acumbikiwe kuri st@@ asiyo ya polisi iri i Busasamana mu karere ka Nyanza kugira ngo ash@@ ore kugezwa imbere y'@@ ubutabera. Mukany@@ ang@@ ezi Claudine bivugwa ko yar@@ wanaga na Uwimana Rachel yahise ahunga atinya ko nawe ashobora kubazwa iby'@@ uru rupfu rw'uyu mukecuru ngo kuko abaturage bo muri aka gace bat@@ ongeye kum@@ ubona. Nyakwigendera Muk@@ amb@@ ugo God@@ el@@ ive yitabye Imana ku myaka 66 y'amavuko yari afite abana batanu yabyaye bose ngo ubu bamaze kubaka ingo zabo nk'uko abaturanyi be ba@@ bitangaz@@ a. Miss Akiwacu Colombe agiye gufasha abatishoboye kubakirwa inzu ya miliyoni 15 Mbere y'uko hatorwa Miss Rwanda 2015 uzasimbura Akiwacu Colomb@@ e, uyu mukobwa wabaye Nyampinga w'u Rwanda mu mwaka wa 2014 yagaragaje ko ag@@ ikomeje ibikorwa byateza imbere igihugu bikaz@@ amura n'imibereho myiza y'abaturage, ubu abatishoboye bakaba bagiye kubakirwa inzu ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 15 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda babikesha uyu Miss Rwanda Akiwacu Colomb@@ e. Iki nicyo gishushanyo mbonera cy'@@ inzu yatangiye kubakwa bigizwemo uruhare Miss Colombe Izi nsh@@ ike zari zisanzwe ziba mu nzu z@@ enda kuz@@ abagwa hejuru ariko bagiye kuba mu nzu ijyanye n'igihe Nk'uko uyu mukobwa yab@@ ishim@@ angiye mu kiganiro yagiranye n'umunyamakuru wa Umuryang@@ o.@@ rw, yashatse inkunga mu bigo bitandukanye afatanyije n'umuryango w'abana barokotse Jenoside, kuri iyo nkunga babasha kubona ubushobozi bwo gutangira kubakira insh@@ ike za Jenocide inzu igezweho kandi ijyanye n'igihe izatwara miliyoni cumi n'@@ eshanu z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda. N'ubwo agiye kubona umusimbura ku mwanya wa Miss Rwanda, Akiwacu Colombe akomeje ibikorwa byo kwita ku bababaye Iyi nzu ig@@ ezweho, n'ubwo ari imwe ariko yubatse mu buryo yifitemo inzu eby@@ eri, ikaba ifite ibyumba bitandatu n'ubw@@ iherero n'ubw@@ ogero bubiri bwo mu nzu, ikaba iz@@ abamo abantu bane b'@@ insh@@ ike. Umuhango wo kuy@@ itangiza ku mugaragaro wabaye tariki 3 Gashyantare 2015, bikaba biteganyijwe ko izarangira mu kwezi kwa Kanama uyu mwaka. Miss Colombe agiye gufasha abatishoboye kubona inzu ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 15 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda Nk'uko Miss Colombe yakomeje abitangaza, babonye inkunga zitandukanye z'abantu ku giti cyabo ndetse n'ibigo n'am@@ akom@@ panyi atandukanye nka E@@ ts M@@ ubil@@ ig@@ i@@ Paul, E@@ ts Har@@ ij@@ it, Com@@ eka, Petr@@ oc@@ om, Simba C@@ ement ndetse ban@@ afashwa n'@@ Intara y'Uburasirazuba kugera kuri iki gikorwa cy'@@ inzu irimo kubakwa ahitwa i Bwiza mu murenge wa Kigabiro ho mu karere ka Rwamagana.
UBUH@@ AM@@ Y@@ A: Umugore wubatse aravuga amakosa abagabo banga Ubu ni uhamya bw’umugore yageneye bagenzi be abereka amakosa abagabo banga n’inama z@@ abafasha kubaka neza urugo. – “@@ njye sin@@ icuza kuba nar@@ ashatse mubyukuri njye nashatse umugabo uny@@ orohereza cyane”. – “ hari n ‘@@ ayandi makosa nagiye nkora mu rugo rwanjye iyo nza kuy@@ amenya ntari gukora kuko kenshi tur@@ is@@ enyera tut@@ abizi ugasanga byose tur@@ abig@@ ereka ku bag@@ ab@@ o”. Umugore wubatse ufite abana babiri. Ab@@ ifuza gushaka bakwiye gushaka bat@@ agendeye ku marangamutima gusa. Usanga abakobwa benshi bavuga ngo kanaka nubwo am@@ babaza ndamuk@@ und@@ a! Ugasanga umuntu arih@@ ambira ku wundi ngo bamaranye igih@@ e.@@ Ngo ubu se abantu bazab@@ ifata gute nt@@ andukanye na@@ we? Uk@@ ajya kubana n’ umuntu ubibona ko harimo ibibazo. Nit@@ anzeho urugero njye nari nar@@ ishyizemo ngo umuhungu tuz@@ akundana bwa mbere niwe tuz@@ aban@@ a,@@ rwa rukundo rwo mu bit@@ abo. Ariko siko byaje kugenda kuko yar@@ amp@@ emukiye kumur@@ eka birang@@ ora. Kuva ubwo mfata dec@@ ision ko igihe cyose ntar@@ asezerana n’ umuntu ataz@@ antera str@@ ess. Uwo wa mbere tw@@ amaranye umwaka ,@@ abandi tw@@ amar@@ anaga amezi abiri ,@@ icyumweru, gutyo gutyo, nk@@ ahita m@@ basezer@@ era. Kugeza ubwo mp@@ uye nuwo nifuzaga ariwe mugabo wanjye. Inshuti zanjye z@@ akundaga kumbwira ngo nta rukundo ng@@ ira. Igisubizo cyanjye nuko nari nar@@ ahisemo ko aho kugira amarangamutima azam@@ babaza nyuma nagira cont@@ rol mu rukundo hakiri kare. Gatsibo: Abaturage big@@ abije amazi y'@@ amatungo yabo bagira ngo bir@@ wan@@ eho Abaturage bo mu Murenge wa Kabarore mu Karere ka Gatsibo bibasiwe n'ikibazo cyo kubura amazi meza bakoresha mu buzima bwa buri munsi aho kuri ubu bavoma mu bid@@ endezi byari byarag@@ enewe kuh@@ irir@@ wamo amatungo. Aba baturage bavuga ko kuba bakoresha aya mazi atari ukuy@@ akunda ahubwo ni uko nta yandi babona kuko ngo kubona amar@@ iba abaha amazi meza bisa nk'@@ inzozi kuri bo cyane ko batuye mu bice bir@@ angwamo izuba cyane, kuburyo bituma ubutaka bwak@@ abahaye amasoko y'amazi meza bw@@ uma vuba cyane bityo amazi meza bag@@ aca ukubiri nayo. Umuturage witwa Gasana Steven waganiriye na Makuruki.rw yavuze ko aho bavoma rimwe na rimwe usanga ari aho buh@@ irira amatungo ndetse ngo hari n'abo bigora kuh@@ abona. Yagize ati :"@@ Urabona ino ikibazo cy'amazi kir@@ akabije kuko nta mazi meza dut@@ ekereza, izuba riba ryinshi bigatuma ubutaka buk@@ ama vuba ntit@@ ubone amasoko yo gukora imiyoboro y'amazi meza bityo rero tug@@ apfa gukoresha ayo tubon@@ ye. Biriya bid@@ endezi tuv@@ om@@ amo hari ibyo usanga byad@@ ufashaga kuh@@ irira amatungo, kandi hari n'aho bitar@@ i." Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Gatsibo Richard Gasana yadutangarije ko ikibazo cy'amazi meza mu ntara y'i burasirazuba ari icya kera ariko bikaba umwihariko mu turere twa Nyagatare na Gatsibo. Ariko avuga ku ruhande rw'akarere ka Gatsibo abereye umuyobozi, hari ibirimo gukorwa kugira ngo imirenge itandukanye yo muri Gatsibo nibura mu myaka ibiri iri imbere iz@@ abe yabonye amazi meza. Yagize ati: Mu mihigo y'uyu mwaka wa 2016 harimo umuyoboro w'@@ amazi urimo kubakwa uz@@ ava i Gih@@ engeri muri Gicumbi uz@@ ageza amazi mu mirenge 6 harimo na Kabar@@ ore, uk@@ azongera m@@ 3 hafi 800 z'@@ amaz@@ i." Yakomeje agira ati:" Ubu ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry'uyu muyoboro bigeze kuri 50@@ %. Hari n'undi mushinga uri mu nyigo ugomba kur@@ angirana n'umwaka wa 2016 turimo gufat@@ anyamo na WASAC wo gutunganya amazi yo muk@@ iyaga cya Muh@@ azi, mu byukuri iyi mishinga yombi nir@@ angira ikibazo cy'amazi mu karere ka Gatsibo kizaba kibon@@ ewe umut@@ i." Ubusanzwe mu myaka itanu ishize akarere ka gat@@ sibo kari ku kigero cya 3@@ 2% by'@@ amazi meza agera ku baturage ariko ubu hakaba hari intambwe imaze guterwa aho aka karere kamaze kugera ku gipimo cya 6@@ 5% nkuko Meya Gasana abivuga, akan@@ ongeraho ko bifuza ko nibura mu mwaka wa 2016 w'@@ imihigo bazava kuri 6@@ 5% bakagera kuri 70@@ %. Ikibazo cy'@@ ibura ry'@@ amazi meza ntik@@ ih@@ ariwe n'akarere ka Gatsibo gusa kuko no mu turere dutandukanye tugize igihugu iki kibazo gik@@ unda kumvikana cyane, ariko bik@@ arushaho kugaragara cyane mu turere tugize intara y'i Bur@@ asirazuba.
Is@@ ano yo kub@@ and@@ wa no gusenga, ubupf@@ umu n’ubuh@@ anuzi, gut@@ erekera no kwiyambaza abatagatifu Hari imigenzo imwe n’imwe ikorwa n’amadini n’amatorero yo muri iki gihe w@@ itegereza neza ukabona ifitanye isano n’ib@@ yakorwaga h@@ ambere, uretse gusa ko byitwa amazina atandukanye, bigakorwa no mu buryo twakwita ko buvug@@ ur@@ uye. Zimwe mu nzu zo mu Gah@@ or@@ omani zikomeje guk@@ urwamo imibiri y’ab@@ ishwe muri Jenoside Kigali today yasoban@@ uriwe n’Umuyobozi wa IBUKA (@@ Umuryango ur@@ engera inyungu z’@@ abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatuts@@ i) mu murenge wa Mas@@ aka, Gasinzigwa Innocent, ko gut@@ abur@@ ura iyi mibiri bitaz@@ arangira vuba. Agira ati “@@ Umwaka ur@@ ashize dush@@ akisha imibiri hano, uretse ku cyumweru nta munsi n’umwe tur@@ as@@ iba, hamaze guseny@@ wa amazu 16, tumaze kugera muri site eshanu, tumaze gut@@ abur@@ ura imibiri irenga ibihumbi 47 kandi tur@@ akomej@@ e”. Kuri ubu har@@ aseny@@ wa amazu yubatswe mu butaka bw’@@ uwari Bur@@ ugum@@ estre wa Kanombe, Ntiy@@ amira Jean Paul n’umuryango we. Izi nzu zaje kugurwa n’uwitwa Jacqu@@ el@@ ine, nawe akaba yar@@ ahag@@ urishije uwitwa Nyir@@ ant@@ uro There@@ se, ari nawe amazu abar@@ urwaho kugeza ubu. H@@ amaze guseny@@ wa inzu 16 ari nako bas@@ angamo imibiri y’@@ abic@@ iwe mu Gah@@ or@@ omani mu gihe cya Jenoside Avuga ko ba nyir’@@ amazu arimo guseny@@ wa bagomba kubyumva neza bakemera kuy@@ avamo bad@@ ateje impaka, kuko ngo abah@@ ambwe munsi y’izo nkuta ‘@@ nabo bafite agacir@@ o’. Abanyeshuri barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi (A@@ ER@@ G) ubwo bari mu cyumweru cyahariwe ibikorwa bitegura Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 25, bavuga ko batunguwe no kubona imibiri y’@@ ababo idat@@ eze gushira mu byobo byo mu Gah@@ orom@@ ani. Umuhuzabikorwa wa AER@@ G, Muneza Emmanuel agira ati “@@ Abad@@ uh@@ isha aho imibiri y’@@ abacu iherereye ba@@ bikom@@ eze cyangwa bar@@ orere ariko iz@@ aboneka, gusa icyiza n’uko bagaragaza ahantu iri kugira ngo natwe tur@@ uhuk@@ e”. Mu bikorwa abagize AERG barimo byo gutegura Kwibuka@@ 25, baz@@ itiye ibice bitab@@ ur@@ urwamo imibiri y’ab@@ ishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, bateye ubusitani ndetse banas@@ ukura urwibutso rw’i Ruh@@ anga mu karere ka Gasabo. Ub@@ uvugizi bw’@@ inganda z@@ ibyaza umusaruro ibit@@ ok@@ i: Isezerano PL yahaye ab’@@ Iburasirazuba Ishyaka riharanira ukwishyira ukizana kwa buri muntu, PL@@ , ry@@ ijeje abaturage b’@@ Intara y’Iburasirazuba, kubakorera ubuvugizi bakabona inganda z@@ ibyaza umusaruro ibit@@ oki, nka kimwe mu bihingwa byera cyane muri iyi ntara. PL kimwe n’indi mitwe ya politiki bakomeje ibikorwa byo kwiyamamariza imyanya y’@@ Ubud@@ epite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, aho kuri iki Cyumweru bari mu Karere ka Rwamagana na Kayonza. Perezida wa PL@@ , Mukabalisa Donat@@ ille, yijeje abaturage ko niba@@ bagirira icyizere bakabat@@ ora mu matora ateganyijwe mu cyumweru gitaha, baz@@ abakorera ubuvugizi ku buryo haboneka inganda zitunganya umusaruro uvuye mu buhinzi bw’@@ ibit@@ oki. Ati “N@@ im@@ uramuka mut@@ ugiriye icyizere tuzakomeza gukora ubuvugizi muri bwa bufatanye bwa leta n’ab@@ ikorera, ku buryo hano haz@@ aboneka inganda zikora ibintu binyuranye bivuye muri bya bit@@ oki bya hano iwacu@@ ." Intara y’Iburasirazuba ifite umwihariko wo kweza ibitoki byinshi, ku buryo habonetse inganda nyinshi z@@ ongerera umusaruro iki gihingwa nta gushidikanya ko n’imibereho y’abahinzi yatera imbere, bityo ubuhinzi bukaba umwuga. Mukabalisa yongeyeho ko bazakora ubuvugizi bw@@ isumb@@ uyeho buzatuma umunyarwanda akora ubuhinzi n’ubworozi bya kinyamw@@ uga. Ati “Ubwo ubuhinzi bw’@@ umwuga turifuza ko butanga umusaruro ugaragara w@@ atuma umunyarwanda ubuk@@ ora atera imbere ava mu cyiciro kimwe akajya muk@@ ind@@ i”. Mu bindi iri shyaka r@@ ishyize imbere birim@@ o; kwita ku mabuye y’agaciro hak@@ aboneka inganda ziy@@ atung@@ anya, kwita ku musaruro w’@@ amafi n’ibindi. Nsengiyumva Well@@ ar@@ s, umuturage wo mu Murenge wa Nyamir@@ ama yabwiye IGIHE ko ubuhinzi busanzwe bugenda neza ariko ko batakw@@ anga inyongera PL ishaka kubaz@@ anira. Yavuze ko bakeneye cyane amasoko y’@@ umusaruro w’@@ ibigori kuko baby@@ eza bakabura aho babig@@ urisha. Ati “Ikibazo ubundi hano dufite bag@@ ashyizemo imbaraga ni ukud@@ ushakira aho tug@@ urisha ibigori byacu kuko hari igihe usanga tw@@ ejeje byinshi ntit@@ ubone aho tubig@@ urish@@ a”. PL ni ishyaka ryashinzwe tariki 14 Nyakanga 199@@ 1. Ku rupapuro rw’@@ itora rizaba rir@@ angwa n’iyi mp@@ ine yaryo n’iny@@ enyeri eshatu ziri mu ibara ry’@@ umuh@@ ondo. Minisitiri Kanimba yasobanuye impamvu ibihugu bikomeje kwin@@ angira gusinya amasezerano ya EP@@ A Minisitiri w’@@ Ub@@ ucuruzi, Inganda n’@@ Ibikorwa by’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, François Kan@@ imba, yakomoje ku mpamvu abona ituma bimwe mu bihugu byo muri EAC, bigenda biguru ntege mu gushyira umukono ku masezerano y’ubufatanye mu by’ubucuruzi n’ibihugu by’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi (E@@ U@@ ). Ba Minisitiri b’@@ Ubucuruzi mu Rwanda na Kenya bashyize umukono ku masezerano ya EP@@ A, kuwa 1 Nzeri 2016, mu muhango wabereye i Brus@@ sel@@ s mu Bubiligi. Aya masezerano afasha mu buryo bwo koroshya ubuhahirane binyuze mu gufungur@@ irana imipaka, hag@@ akurwaho imisoro ku bicuruzwa bimwe na bimwe. Is@@ inywa ry’@@ aya masezerano ku bihugu byo muri EAC ryak@@ unze kuzamo kutumvikana ndetse kuva icyo gihe ibindi bihugu byo mu Karere byagaragaje impungenge ndetse bituma bimwe bit@@ asinya kuri aya masezerano. Minisitiri Kanimba yatangaje ko ingingo ikomeye ituma bimwe mu bihugu bid@@ asinya biterwa n’uko inyungu by@@ abona mu masezerano ya EP@@ A, bisanzwe biy@@ ikura mu Muryango Mpuzamahanga w’Ubucuruzi (W@@ TO@@ ). Yakomeje atangaza ko ibi bituma hari ibihugu byo muri EAC by@@ umva ko gusinya amasezerano bit@@ ihut@@ irwa. Minisitiri Kanimba yashimangiye ko ibihugu bikize bigomba gufung@@ urira imiryango ku masoko yabo ibik@@ ennye bikiri mu nzira y’amaj@@ yambere. Mu gihe ibihugu byose byaba bin@@ aniwe kumvikana ngo bihur@@ ize ku mwanzuro umwe, harebwa uburyo buri gihugu cyakw@@ emererwa gusinya aya masezerano. Kenya iri mu bihugu by@@ injiza amafaranga menshi mu Karere, yakunze kugaragaza ko bifite inyungu nyinshi bitewe n’uko ifite byinshi yohereza mu Burayi. Iki gihugu ni cyo gishobora kubih@@ omb@@ eramo cyane. Imwe mu mbogamizi z@@ igihari harimo i@@ y’uko EU yafatiye u Burundi ibih@@ ano, bituma hari ab@@ ibaza niba impande zombi zishobora gushyira umukono ku masezerano mu gihe hakigaragara agat@@ otsi. Inkuru irambuye ni mu kanya … Indi nkuru wasom@@ a: Ibihugu bya EAC byasabye ko hari ibibanza gusoban@@ uka mbere yo kwemeranya ubucuruzi na@@ EU
Inyungu mbumbe ya Bralirwa y@@ iyongereyeho 9.@@ 5% mu 2015 Yanditswe kuya 28@@ -04-@@ 2016 saa 21@@ :0@@ 6@@ ' na Rabbi Mal@@ o Umucunguzi Inyungu mbumbe y'@@ uruganda rukora rukan@@ acuruza ibinyobwa bis@@ embuye n'ib@@ idas@@ emb@@ uye, Bral@@ irwa, mu 2015 yazam@@ utseho 9.@@ 5@@ %, ahanini bikaba byar@@ ashingiye ku kwiyongera kw'@@ ibinyobwa bidas@@ embuye byoherezwa ku isoko. Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 28 Mata 2016, uru ruganda rwashyize ahagaragara imibare rw@@ acur@@ uje mu mwaka ushize, aho ingano y'@@ ibinyobwa byashyizwe ku isoko y@@ iyongereyeho 7.@@ 6@@ %, inzoga zikaba zar@@ azamutse kuri 5.@@ 3% mu gihe ibinyobwa bidas@@ embuye ari 14@@ %. Ibi byatumye inyungu yinjijwe mu mwaka ushize igera kuri miliyari 84 na miliyoni 88 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda. Uyu ubaye umwaka wa kane wik@@ urikir@@ anya ibinyobwa bidas@@ embuye bikorwa na Bralirwa bit@@ azamuye ibic@@ iro, mu gihe inzoga nazo ziheruka kongererwa ibiciro muri Nyakanga 2011. Umuyobozi wa Bral@@ irwa, Jonathan H@@ all yavuze ko Bralirwa ihagaze neza ku isoko rikomeje kuzamo uguh@@ angana, bitari mu rwego rw'@@ ibinyobwa gusa ahubwo no mu zindi nzego zinyuranye. Yakomeje avuga ko mu myaka ine ishize Bralirwa yashoye imari mu rw@@ engero rwa Gisenyi n'@@ ahakorerwa ibinyobwa bidas@@ embuye muri Kigali, ibintu byakozwe mu mafaranga y'@@ uruganda ndetse n'@@ inguzanyo. Ati "@@ Icyiciro cyo gushora imari kiri kugera ku musozo. Tumaze igihe dukora ishoramari rigera kuri miliyoni 30 z'@@ amayero mu bikorwa byacu, mu myaka ine n'igice ishize. Ni ishoramari riri kurwego rwo hejuru. Hak@@ enewe ko tuz@@ amura ubushobozi bwacu, hakenewe ko tuvug@@ urura ibyo duk@@ oresh@@ a…@@ ." Bralirwa igiye gukora F@@ anta zo mu mac@@ upa ya ‘@@ Pl@@ ast@@ ic@@ ' Freddy Nyang@@ ezi Bin@@ iga, ushinzwe itumanaho muri Bral@@ irwa, yabwiye IGIHE ko hari gukorwa ishoramari ku buryo mu Rwanda hatangira gukorwa F@@ anta ariko ziri mu mac@@ upa ya Pl@@ ast@@ ic. Yagize ati ‘‘@@ N@@ ubundi twaz@@ icur@@ uz@@ aga, ariko twaz@@ itum@@ izaga hanze. Ubu turashaka kujya tuz@@ ikorera hano mu Rwanda kuva muri Gicurasi, ku buryo nko mu cyumweru gitaha icupa rya mbere rizaba r@@ yageze hanz@@ e.@@ '' Biteganyijwe ko nyuma y'@@ uru rw@@ ung@@ uko rwa 2015, abanyamigabane ba Bralirwa bazas@@ arang@@ anywa 7@@ 2.@@ 4% by'@@ inyungu yose ya 2015 bingana n'amafaranga atanu y'u Rwanda ku mugabane, iyo ngano ikaz@@ abanza kwemezwa n'@@ Inteko rusange. Si buri wese wemerewe gucuruza udupfukamunwa - FD@@ A Mu rwego rwo gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda gukwirakwiza icyorezo cya Covid-19, abaturage bose basabwe kujya bambara udupfukamunwa igihe cyose bari ahantu bashobora guhurira n’abandi. Leta yoroh@@ ereje aban@@ yeng@@ anda bakora udupf@@ ukamunwa, isaba ko tw@@ akwirakwizwa hirya no hino mu gihugu abaturage bakat@@ ubona ku buryo bworoshye. Abacuruzi banyuranye bahise batangira gucuruza udupfukamunwa ariko ibi ni ukub@@ yit@@ ondera kuko atari buri wese wemerewe kud@@ ucur@@ uza. Antoine Muk@@ unzi, ushinzwe ubuziranenge mu kigo gishinzwe kugenzura ibiribwa n’imiti mu Rwanda (@@ FD@@ A), mu kiganiro yagiranye na KT Radio ku wa Gatatu, yavuze ko udupfukamunwa tw@@ ashyizwe mu bwoko bw’@@ ibikoresho byo kwa muganga, ku buryo d@@ ucur@@ uzwa n’abantu bih@@ ariye. Yagize ati “Kuri ubu ahantu h@@ emerewe gucur@@ urizwa udupf@@ ukamunwa, ni muri za farum@@ asi, sup@@ er@@ market@@ s cyangwa ahandi hantu hemejwe na FD@@ A. Ubu tur@@ avugana n’abajyanama b’@@ ubuzima, amavuriro anyuranye hirya no hino kugira ngo buri muturage akag@@ ereho ku buryo bw@@ orosh@@ ye”. Antoine Mukunzi yavuze ko abad@@ ucuruza bose bagomba kubahiriza amabwiriza ajyanye n’@@ isuku. Ati “@@ abad@@ ucuruza hirya no hino mu mit@@ aka, na bo bagomba kuba baras@@ obanukiwe amabwiriza yo kud@@ ucur@@ uza, bafite isuku kandi bag@@ acuruza uduf@@ unze neza”. Yasabye abaguzi kujya babanza kureba niba ako bagiye kugura g@@ afunze neza, h@@ anditseho ingano yako ndetse n’uruganda rw@@ agak@@ oze, kugira ngo y@@ izere ubuziranenge bwak@@ o. Samuel M@@ por@@ anzi, Umuyobozi w’ishami rishinzwe Ubuz@@ iranenge mu ikoranabuhanga mu Kigo gishinzwe Ubuz@@ iranenge (R@@ S@@ B), yavuze ko aban@@ yeng@@ anda bahawe uburenganzira bwo gushaka ibikoresho bapf@@ uny@@ ikam@@ o, ariko ko udupfukamunwa tutagomba gufungwa mu ish@@ ashi mu rwego rwo kubahiriza ingamba zo kurinda ibidukikije. Abag@@ uzi baba bagomba kureba niba ako baguze g@@ afunze ku buryo kad@@ ahura n’um@@ wanda. Yavuze ko abaturage bakw@@ izera ubuziranenge bw’@@ ut@@ uri ku isoko uyu munsi, kuko ut@@ wakozwe tutari tw@@ ujuje ubuziranenge, basabye abari baduk@@ oze kuduk@@ ura ku isoko, kandi ko hirya no hino hari abagenzuzi ba RS@@ B bagenda bareba niba koko ud@@ ucur@@ uzwa tw@@ ujuje ubuziranenge. Impamvu ituma bamwe mu bagore bagira agahinda nyuma y’@@ imibonano mpuzabitsina Mu gihe abantu benshi bumva ko nyuma y’@@ imibonano mpuzabitsina by’umwihariko iy@@ akozwe ku bwumvikane impande zombi zis@@ igarana ibyishimo, ibi si ko bimeze kuko hari benshi mu bagore bahita biy@@ umvamo agahinda ndetse bakagira ubwoba. Ubushakashatsi buherutse gukorerwa ku bagore 2@@ 30, bwagaragaje ko 46@@ % byabo bagiye biy@@ umvamo agahinda gakabije nyuma y’@@ imibonano mpuzabitsina ib@@ izwi nka P@@ CD (p@@ ost@@ -@@ co@@ it@@ al d@@ y@@ sp@@ hor@@ i@@ a). Ibi kandi byan@@ ahuye neza n’ubundi bushakashatsi bwakozwe mu 2011, aho kimwe cya gatatu cy’@@ abagore babajijwe bavuze ko akenshi bas@@ igar@@ anaga agahinda kenshi kandi nyamara imibonano mpuzabitsina bat@@ ayikoze bahat@@ ir@@ ijwe. The Indep@@ endent ivuga ko hari bamwe mu bagore bumva ko bafite agahinda, ubwoba, umujinya no kumva badat@@ uje, kabone n’ubwo imibonano mpuzabitsina yaba yagenze neza. Dr. Robert D Sch@@ we@@ it@@ z@@ er avuga ko P@@ CD ari ikintu gisanzwe kandi gishobora kuba ku bagore n’abag@@ abo, ariko mu buryo butandukanye bitewe n’imiterere yabo. Buri muntu wese iyo akoze imibonano mpuzabitsina ar@@ ekura imisemburo by’umwihariko d@@ op@@ am@@ ine ituma umubiri w’umuntu wifuza gukora ikintu runaka ndetse akagira ibyishimo ndetse na Pr@@ ol@@ act@@ in igira uruhare mu ikorwa ry’@@ amash@@ ereka, zombi zituma ubasha kwir@@ ekura no kugaragaza amarangamutima yawe. Umujyanama mu birebana n’@@ Imibonano mpuzabitsina, Denise Knowl@@ es, avuga ko iyo imibonano mpuzabitsina irangiye iyi misemburo ndetse n’indi irimo end@@ or@@ ph@@ in na oxy@@ t@@ oc@@ in igenda im@@ anuka isubira ku kigero cyayo gisanzwe ari nabyo bituma umuntu arushaho kugira agahinda n’ubwoba ku buryo na bamwe bar@@ ira. Mu bindi bivugwa kuba intandaro y’aka gahinda harimo ihungabana rishobora guturuka ku kuba umugore yarigeze gukorerwa ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina, bituma igihe akoze imibonano mpuzabitsina kabone n’ubwo yari aby@@ ishimiye bimw@@ ibutsa ibihe yanyuzemo bitoroshye. Kuba umugore atabashije kugera ku ndunduro y’@@ ibyishimo bye kandi nabyo ngo bishobora kumus@@ igira agahinda no kwicuza yibaza icyatumye akora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Ibi bikunze kuba ku bagore batinya kubwira abakunzi cyangwa abagabo babo ik@@ ibash@@ imisha mu gihe bari gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, ahubwo bagahitamo kugaragaza ko bishimye nyamara atari byo kubera imyumvire ndetse n’imico itandukanye bakur@@ iyemo. Kuba umugore atabashije kugera ku ndunduro y’@@ ibyishimo bye kandi nabyo ngo bishobora kumus@@ igira agahinda no kwicuza yibaza icyatumye akora imibonano mpuzabitsina
Mukam@@ a: Abaturage bafite icyizere ko VUP iz@@ abateza imbere Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Murenge wa Mukama mu Karere ka Nyagatare bakora muri gahunda ya VUP bavuga ko bafite icyizere cyo kwikura mu bukene, dore ko mu gihe bamaze bakorana nayo babashije kwigurira amatungo maguf@@ i. Gac@@ oc@@ o Boniface ni umwe mubo Kigali today yasanze bakora umuhanda Rug@@ aram@@ a-@@ Gih@@ engeri muri gahunda ya VUP@@ . Avuga ko aribwo agitangira gukorana na VUP ariko akemeza ko amafaranga yahembwe bwa mbere yag@@ uzemo ibintu bitandukanye. Abaturage bakora muri VUP bizera ko ari inzira yo kugera ku iterambere. Raph@@ a@@ ël Ndimub@@ anzi, nawe wahawe akazi ko gutunganya umuhanda, avuga ko yag@@ ahawe ari umukene abana be batak@@ iga kubera ko at@@ abashaga ku@@ babonera ibikoresho by'@@ ishuri. Ubu ngo yamaze kugura ihene kandi afite intego yo gukomeza gukora y@@ izig@@ ama ag@@ asubiza abana be ku ishuri. Kuba abakora muri gahunda ya VUP bavuga ko bagiye gusezerera ubut@@ indi bishimangirwa n'umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Muk@@ ama, G@@ akuru Jam@@ es. Aba baturage bavuga ko mu mafaranga bahembwa bag@@ uzemo amatungo magufi n'ibindi byo kwik@@ en@@ ura. Avuga ko imirimo ikorwa n'aba baturage mbere yahabwaga ba rwiyemezamirimo bagakoresha bacye ariko ubu amafaranga akaba agera ku baturage benshi kandi n'ibikorwa bakora ari ibyabo. Uyu muhanda aba baturage bakora ugizwe n'@@ abir@@ ometero 16 ug@@ akor@@ wamo n'abaturage basaga ibihumbi 3. Uretse abakora mu muhanda bahembwa amafaranga 1500 ku munsi, hari n'@@ abih@@ uriza mu matsinda bakag@@ urizwa amafaranga baz@@ ishyura mu gihe cy'umwaka ku nyungu y'amafaranga 2%, hakaba n'abah@@ abwa inkunga y'ing@@ oboka kubera ko batishoboye kandi badashoboye no gukora. SEB@@ AS@@ AZA Gasana Emmanuel
IB@@ IZ@@ AM@@ INI B@@ YA L@@ ET@@ A: Amazi si ya yandi ku banyeshuri birukanywe ku bigo Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe Uburezi (REB@@ ) kiravuga ko nta munyeshuri wiruk@@ anywe ku ishuri yig@@ agaho uz@@ emererwa gukora ibizamini bya Leta, kabone n’aho yaba yar@@ iruk@@ anywe yaramaze kuzuza amaf@@ ishi y’ab@@ emerewe gukora ibyo bizam@@ i. B@@ isanzwe bimenyerewe ko umunyeshuri wamaze kuzuza if@@ ishi yo gukora ikiz@@ ami cya Leta mu mashuri abanza, icyiciro rusange n’@@ ayisumbuye, aba atak@@ ig@@ engwa cyane n’ishuri yig@@ aho dore ko n’iyo yiruk@@ anwaga bitam@@ ubuz@@ aga gukora ibizamini bya Leta nk’@@ abandi. Ibi byatumaga hari abanyeshuri bitwara nabi ubwo babaga barangije kuzuza ayo maf@@ ishi kuko babaga bizeye ko bazakora ibizamini bya Leta uko byagenda kose. Mu kiganiro umuyobozi muri REB ushinzwe Ibiz@@ ami Dr Emmanuel Muvunyi yagiranye na MAK@@ URUK@@ I yadutangarije ko muri uyu mwaka ibintu byahindutse ko umunyeshuri uzakora ikizamini cya Leta ari uw@@ abaye mu ishuri kugera ku munsi w’@@ ibizamini bya Leta. Yagize ati: “ twamaze kuzenguruka amashuri yose tumenya abanyeshuri bahari kandi bazakora ibizamini bya Let@@ a… ubwo umunyeshuri tut@@ ah@@ asanze (@@ wiruk@@ any@@ we) ntaz@@ akora, umunyeshuri agomba gukora ikizamini cya Leta ari uko afite indangam@@ anota zose kandi yarize kugeza ku munsi wa nyum@@ a.” Iki cyemezo cya REB kiri mu rwego rwo gufasha ibigo by’amashuri byag@@ or@@ waga n’abanyeshuri babaga bageze mu mwaka usoza icyiciro runaka bakoraga amakosa atandukanye bitwaje ko nta w@@ ababuza gukora ikizamini cya Leta. Ibi kandi ngo bizafasha kurwanya uburiganya bw@@ akorwaga n’abayobozi b’ibigo by’amashuri bafat@@ akaga abakandida bigenga bakab@@ eshya ko ari abanyeshuri basanzwe big@@ a. Ubusanzwe umukandida wigenga yem@@ ere@@ wa gukora ikizamini cya Leta gisoza amashuri yisumbuye mu gihe amaze byibuze imyaka 5 akoze ikizamini cya Leta gisoza icyiciro rusange. Ku kibazo cy’@@ abanyeshuri bajya b@@ angirwa gukora ibizamini bya Leta kubera ko bafitiye ibigo big@@ aho imyenda, Dr Emmanuel Muvunyi avuga ko hakwiye kubaho ubwumvikane hagati y’ishuri n’@@ umub@@ eby@@ i ariko ngo umunyeshuri ntiy@@ akab@@ ujijwe gukora ikizamini kubera umw@@ enda. Yagize ati “@@ cyane cyane mu bigo byig@@ enga, hakwiye kuba ubwumvikane hagati y’ababyeyi abayobozi b’@@ ishuri, ariko ku ruhande rwacu twumva umunyeshuri atab@@ uzwa gukora ikizamini kuko atar@@ ishyura amafaranga y’@@ ishur@@ i." Mu rwego rwo gukomeza guhangana n’abakora uburiganya mu bizamini bya Leta hashyizweho uburyo budasanzwe bwo kubika ibizamini mu cyumba gic@@ ungiwe umutekano ibyo bise "@@ Str@@ ong Ro@@ om@@ "@@ aho icyo cyumba kizaba g@@ ifung@@ ishijwe inguf@@ uri 2 kig@@ afungurwa hari uhagarariye site y’ib@@ izam@@ i, umwungirije ndetse n’@@ umupol@@ isi. REB ntiy@@ ashimye kudut@@ angariza umubare w’abanyeshuri bazakora ibizamini bya Leta muri uyu mwaka wa 2016 ariko ngo war@@ iyongereye ugereranije n’umwaka ushize wa 2015. Abakirisitu bar@@ ashinja bamwe mu bah@@ anuzi guhanura ibinyoma no kub@@ ibasira mu ruhame A@@ bavugabutumwa batandukanye barak@@ angurirwa kujya babanza kwitonda bagash@@ ish@@ oza, mbere yuko bageza ubutumwa bwabo kubo baba bab@@ ug@@ eneye, kubera ko iyo ubutumwa but@@ ambutse but@@ abanje gutekerez@@ waho mbere yuko but@@ amb@@ uka, ngo usanga hari igihe bugira ingaruka mbi kuwo buba bug@@ enewe. Nkuko bitangazwa na bamwe mu bakir@@ istu basengera mu itorero rya ADEPR mu rur@@ embo rw'@@ umujyi wa Kigali, badutangarije ko hari abavugabutumwa akenshi biyita abah@@ anuzi, ngo usanga rimwe na rimwe bah@@ anura ibinyoma cyangwa se ngo ugasanga n'ibyo bah@@ anura bab@@ ivugira mu ruhame kandi ngo hari igihe ubwo butumwa baba bashaka gutanga buba bugenewe umuntu ku giti cye. Bamwe mu bo twaganiriye bagira bat@@ i" ugasanga umuhanuzi yab@@ ib@@ uzemo ubwenge, ugasanga avugira mbega ibintu mu ruhame kandi yakagombye kubibwira umuntu bir@@ eba, cyangwa se igice runaka bir@@ eba@@ ." Undi nawe twaganiriye bisa naho we byam@@ ubayeho, yavuze ko yigeze guhan@@ urirwa n'@@ umuvug@@ abut@@ umwa, ariko ngo mu kumubwira ubutumwa yari yamut@@ umw@@ eho, ntiyar@@ indiriye kub@@ umubwira mu ibanga, ahubwo ngo yahise ab@@ uvugira mu ruhame mu mater@@ aniro, bityo ngo bimug@@ iraho ingaruka yo gutangira kuvugwa n'abantu bitewe n'ibyo bari bamw@@ umv@@ is@@ eho mu rusengero. Hano hari umuntu was@@ amb@@ anye, ngiye kubona mbona ang@@ ezeho ank@@ oraho ati ih@@ ane ubusambanyi, ih@@ ane ubusambanyi waras@@ amb@@ anye, aram@@ fata nyine ajya kum@@ pf@@ ukam@@ isha imbere ngo nih@@ ane, ariko tugeze hanze abantu batangira kuvuga ngo nar@@ as@@ amb@@ anye, ngo uriya yaras@@ ambanye , nkajya numva n'abantu babivuga nanjye nkagira umubabaro mwinshi cyane, ubwo bakirinda no mu buhanuzi bwabo bakajya basaba Imana ikabaha ubundi bw@@ eng@@ e." Rev. Pastor Rurangirwa Emmanuel, umushumba w'itorero rya ADEPR ururembo rw'@@ umujyi wa Kigali , yavuze ko abavugabutumwa bose bakagombye kugira ubwenge mubyo big@@ isha, bakajya babanza gutekereza ku butumwa baba bahawe mbere yuko bab@@ utangaza ku bo bug@@ enewe. Agira ati" …@@ iyo ab@@ ivugiye aho burya wa muntu aran@@ angirwa kuko aba amut@@ angarije ku mugaragaro wenda ni umubyeyi ufitemo abana, ufitemo aba@@ kwe, ufitemo abak@@ az@@ ana, ufitemo abuz@@ ukuru, ni uko. Ariko ijambo ry'Imana riravuga ngo umwuka w'@@ abahanuzi ug@@ engwa na@@ b a nyir@@ aw@@ o." Yongeye agira ati" ntabwo rero Imana hari uvuga ngo ni nt@@ abivuga ngo Imana ir@@ any@@ ica, ntacyo yamut@@ wara kuko ntibiba by@@ enda kuz@@ ima, biba biri aho. Ar@@ agomba kubyumva noneho rero abit@@ ekerez@@ eho neza abivug@@ e mu mwanya waby@@ o." Rev. Pastor Rurangirwa Emmanuel umushumba w'itorero ADEPR ururembo rw'@@ umujyi wa Kigali Rev. Rurangirwa kandi yavuze ko abahanuzi bagomba kujya babanza kumenya abantu ubutumwa buba bug@@ enewe, kuburyo ariho bahera ban@@ at@@ andukanya aho ubwo butumwa bugomba gutangir@@ wa, mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko hari umuntu bw@@ akomeretsa kubera ko buvug@@ iwe ah@@ ad@@ akwiye. Agira ati"@@ …@@ biterwa n'ubutumwa ubwo aribwo , niba ari ubw'@@ Itorero n'ab@@ uvug@@ e, ariko niba ari ubw'@@ umuntu ku giti cye n@@ agire ubwo bwenge atangire yim@@ et@@ iriz@@ e(@@ Ma@@ it@@ ris@@ er) ab@@ umushy@@ ire wenda bas@@ ohot@@ se. Niba ari ubw'@@ umuryango ( Fam@@ ill@@ e) agire ubwenge ab@@ ushyire muri fam@@ ille nyine, niba ari ubw'@@ igihugu nab@@ ushyire abayobozi nabwo mu bwit@@ onzi yit@@ onze, ag@@ ishije inama any@@ ure mu nzira nziz@@ a." Uretse kuba bamwe mu bavugabutumwa bashyira ku ka rubanda aba kir@@ istu bitewe nuko ubutumwa bwabo bab@@ uvug@@ iye mu ruhame kandi bwari bugenewe umuntu ku giti cye, bamwe mu ba kir@@ isitu bashinja aba bavugabutumwa rimwe na rimwe guhanura ibinyoma, akenshi bagend@@ ereye ku@@ babon@@ aho indonke zitandukanye.
Ibyo gushyira udukingirizo mu mashuri ntib@@ ivugwaho rumwe Bamwe mu babyeyi bo mu karere ka Rwamagana ntibavuga rumwe n’abana babo ku ngingo irebana no gushyira udukingirizo mu bigo by’amashuri aho benshi mu babyeyi bavuga ko ibi ari uburyo bwo gukurura ubusambanyi no kwigisha abana imico mibi. Gusa ku rundi ruhande hari ab@@ emeza ko ubu ari uburyo bwiza bwo kurinda indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina no gukumira inda zit@@ ateganyijwe zikunze guterwa abangavu bakiri mu mashuri. Bamwe muri ibi byiciro baganiriye na Ukwezi bagaragaje ko gushyira udukingirizo mu bigo by’amashuri bisa no kwigisha abantu imico mibi ndetse no gukurura ubusambanyi, gusa ariko hari n’abandi biganjemo abanyeshuri bavuze ko iyi gahunda yafasha benshi mu kubarinda izo nda zit@@ ateganyijwe ndetse no kubarinda indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina. Umunyeshuri wiga ku rwunge rw’amashuri rwa Gishari waganiriye na U@@ kwezi, yagize ati “Ng@@ ewe mbona ari nk’uko baba bashaka kwigisha abana ibintu bijyanye n’@@ ubusambanyi, igihe babibonye nyine nabo bajya barwana ishyaka ryo kubikoresha (U@@ duk@@ ingir@@ iz@@ o) kuko bab@@ ibon@@ ye” Yakomeje agira ati “U@@ duk@@ ingirizo bat@@ uzanye nko mu kigo abanyeshuri urumva bajya babik@@ urura ubusambanyi kuko abantu benshi baterwa inda baz@@ iterwa n’abasore baba hanze rero mbona udukingirizo twaba tudafite akamaro mu mash@@ ur@@ i” Ir@@ aguha Yvette nawe wiga mu mwaka wa Gatatu w’amashuri yisumbuye kuri iki kigo yagize ati “ Bir@@ akwiye cyane kuko utwo duk@@ ingirizo bat@@ uzanye hari byinshi baba bak@@ emuye kuko kuvuga ngo bakaz@@ anye ngo byatuma abanyeshuri barushaho ngo kugira ubur@@ ara nk’@@ ubw@@ ong@@ ubw@@ o? Oy@@ a! Hari byinshi byaba bikem@@ uye izo nda ziba zit@@ ateganyijwe z@@ ahagarikwa by@@ acika kabis@@ a” Yakomeje agira ati “Hari icyo byad@@ ufasha, n’abanyeshuri ubwabo erega biraba cyane, ariko nkatwe twiga dut@@ aha izo nda baz@@ iterwa n’abantu bo hanz@@ e.” Yvette kandi yavuze ko icyo bifuza ari uko utu duk@@ ingirizo bajya bat@@ uzana mu mashuri bakab@@ igisha no ku@@ dukoresha mu rwego rwo kubafasha kwik@@ ingira mu buryo bwiza. Nyinawumuntu Cec@@ ile, Umunyamabanga muri G@@ s Gish@@ ari, iherereye mu Murenge wa Gish@@ ari, Akarere ka Rwamagana we yavuze ko iki kintu cyo gushyira udukingirizo mu bigo by’amashuri ari byiza ariko bikaba akarusho mu bigo bic@@ umbikira abanyeshuri. Yagize ati “@@ Rwose ngewe mbona byaba ari byiza, byaba byiza kubera ko yego abana ntabwo tuba tubash@@ ora mu busambanyi cyangwa kugira gute (@@ ……@@ ) Ariko nk’iyo urebye hanze aha uko hameze n’abana benshi ubona batwara inda z’@@ indaro batarageza igihe mbona nk’icyo kintu cy’@@ udukingirizo kud@@ ushyira mu bigo by’amashuri byaba by@@ iza.” K@@ umut@@ ar@@ iza Marie Ass@@ ump@@ ta, umubyeyi utuye mu mudugudu wa Nyakab@@ ungo akagari ka Bw@@ is@@ ange, umurenge wa Gishari ho mu karere ka Rwamagana, Intara y’Iburasirazuba we yabwiye Ukwezi ko gushyira udukingirizo mu mashuri ari ukw@@ igisha abana ubusambanyi Yagize ati “@@ Agak@@ ingirizo se mam@@ a? Yego n@@ umvishe bavuga ngo ni nka mituweri ariko kariya nako numva kaba g@@ akur@@ uye imico mibi, mw@@ ahura ati nt@@ ufite agakingirizo ati akira aya ng@@ aya bak@@ agakoresha noneho yaz@@ ageraho akam@@ enyera akan@@ ibagirwa bakaba bakorera aho akaba aras@@ amye ya nda at@@ ateg@@ anyij@@ we” Mu kub@@ oza 2017, Ubwo yari mu nama n’abayobozi bagize inzego zinyuranye mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, Musenyeri Servilien Nz@@ akam@@ wit@@ a, umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Byumba yavuze ko kumeny@@ ereza abana udukingirizo bituma bir@@ ekura, bak@@ ishora mu busambanyi kuko baba beretswe ko mu gihe hari udukingirizo gusambana babyem@@ erewe. Ati “Hari n’ababyeyi babivuga ngo umwana we iyo yagiye ku ishuri abishyira (@@ uduk@@ ingir@@ iz@@ o) mu isak@@ oshi ye agira ngo nagira ibyago yit@@ abar@@ e! Ibyo rero bituma abana bir@@ ekura tukaz@@ abura aho tub@@ igar@@ urir@@ a.” Nyinawumuntu Cec@@ ile, Umunyamabanga muri G@@ s Gishari K@@ umut@@ ar@@ iza Marie Ass@@ ump@@ t@@ a,@@ , Umubyeyi ufite abana b’abakobwa avuga ko bidakwiye gushyira udukingirizo mu mashuri
Uturere twose twas@@ abwe gushyiraho itsinda ryihariye ryo guhangana na malaria Imibare itangwa n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’@@ Ubuzima (RBC) igaragaza ko indwara ya malaria ikomeje gukaza umur@@ ego, dore ko mu 2013 abay@@ iv@@ uje bang@@ anaga na 1,@@ 0@@ 14,@@ 500 ariko bageze kuri 4,@@ 7@@ 39@@ ,@@ 89@@ 6 mu 2017. Ni muri urwo rwego rero ku wa 3 Gicurasi 2018, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yah@@ urije hamwe abafatanyabikorwa bayo, abayobozi b’uturere twose bungirije bashinzwe ubuzima ndetse n’abayobozi b’@@ ibitaro by’@@ uturere mu Rwanda, h@@ igwa ku kibazo cya mal@@ ar@@ ia. Uretse kurebera hamwe gahunda yo kurwanya iy@@ io ndwara hashyirwa mu bikorwa uburyo bw@@ ashyiz@@ weho, han@@ afati@@ wemo ingamba z’uko buri karere kagomba gushinga itsinda ryihariye ryo guhangana n’icyorezo cya malaria uhereye mu nzego z’ibanze kuzamura ku rwego rw’igihugu. Iryo tsinda ryihariye rik@@ azajya ritanga raporo buri kwezi, r@@ iter@@ ane rimwe mu gihembwe naho buri mezi atandatu rih@@ ure ku rwego rw’igihugu, rih@@ uze amakuru riy@@ as@@ eseng@@ ure, rir@@ ebere hamwe icy@@ arushaho kuba cyiza mu rwego rwo guhashya mal@@ ar@@ ia. Umuyobozi mukuru wa RBC, Dr Jean@@ ine U. C@@ ondo, yagize ati “Ni ngombwa ko inzego zose zihuza imbaraga kugira ngo malaria icik@@ e, haba mu kuyir@@ inda, kuy@@ ivuza ku gihe ndetse no kwigisha abaturage ibijyanye nayo. Kugira ngo urugamba rwo kuyih@@ ashya rube urwa buri wese nta n’umwe usigaye kandi icyizere cyo kuyitsinda kir@@ ahari mu bufatanye busesuye bwa buri wes@@ e.” Abari mu nama b@@ unguranye ibitekerezo, Visi Meya ushinzwe imibereho myiza mu Karere ka Kayonza, Harerimana Jean Damascene, atanga icyifuzo ko inyigisho zijyanye na malaria zag@@ ezwa no ku bana mu mashuri y’ib@@ ibur@@ amw@@ aka. Yagize ati “B@@ yaba byiza mal@@ ar@@ ia, yigish@@ ijwe abana bato, bagakura bay@@ izi bihagije, icy@@ injizwa muri za kirazira nk’uko biri mu zindi ndangagaciro nyarwanda, cyane ko inyigisho ihawe umwana ay@@ ibika neza ik@@ amugirira akamaro mu mibereho ye yose n’igihe azaba mukuru@@ .” Dr. Aimable M@@ bit@@ uy@@ umuremyi uyobora Ishami rishinzwe kurwanya malaria muri RBC yasobanuriye abari aho ko kurwanya no gutsinda malaria atari umugani kuko hari aho ingufu zagiye zih@@ uzwa zig@@ atanga umusaruro. Yagize ati “D@@ ufashe nk’@@ urugero ku Karere ka Nyagatare, aho kubera ingamba zo kurwanya malaria z@@ ashyizwemo imbaraga harimo no gutera imiti mu mazu y’abaturage ndetse no kuyiv@@ urira mu bajyanama b’@@ ubuzima, akarere k@@ avuye ku barwayi 90@@ ,000 mu 2015 kag@@ eza ku 5000 mu 2017@@ .” Gusa ngo iyi gahunda yo gutera imiti yica imibu itera malaria ntishobora gut@@ ererwa uturere twose kubera ko ingengo igenda ku karere kamwe ubwayo ari miliyari imwe n’igice y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda kandi hari izindi ngamba z@@ agah@@ urijwe hamwe nko gus@@ ibanganya ahari ibiz@@ enga imibu y@@ ororok@@ eramo, gutema ibih@@ uru no guk@@ inga amadirishya kare hamwe no kurara mu nzit@@ iram@@ ubu ziteye umuti. Han@@ atangajwe ku mugaragaro ko hari gahunda Leta yashyizeho muri Werurwe 2018, yo kwemerera abikorera ku giti cyabo bag@@ acuruza inzitiram@@ ubu, byongeye kandi bamwe mu baturage bo mu cyiciro cya gatatu n’abari mu cya kane cy’@@ Ubudehe bakajya big@@ urira inzitiram@@ ubu ku giti cyabo. Muri ayo mabwiriza kandi, harimo ko ubwo bucuruzi bw’@@ inzitiram@@ ubu n’uturere dusabwa kuz@@ abish@@ oramo imari kugira ngo Far@@ um@@ asi z’@@ uturere n’ibig@@ ond@@ erabuzima mu bihe bizaba bitanga inzitiram@@ ubu ku baturage bo mu bindi byiciro by’ubudehe nk’uko bisanzwe, abo bo mu byiciro biz@@ azig@@ urira biz@@ abone aho bazih@@ ah@@ ira. Abari mu nama ariko bin@@ ubiye ko inzitiram@@ ubu ziz@@ agurishwa abo mu kiciro cya gatatu kandi hari abak@@ ij@@ uj@@ utira ko bag@@ ishy@@ izwemo nta mikoro bafite, Dr. Aimable az@@ ubiza ati “@@ Si bose baz@@ azig@@ urira, haz@@ arebwa ba bandi bafite imirimo iz@@ wi, cyane cyane abafite akazi muri leta n’abandi bish@@ oboye, si buri wese wo muri icyo cyiciro uz@@ ig@@ urira inzitiram@@ ubu, abo rero baz@@ ishyura amafaranga kandi nt@@ azaba akang@@ anye.” U Rwanda rufite intego ko ingamba zafashwe zo kurwanya malaria zishy@@ izwe mu bikorwa byaz@@ agera mu 2020 iyi ndwara yarabaye amateka. Yagize ati “Nyuma yo kuganira n’abak@@ ura sima hanze muri Uganda, Tanzania na Kenya, b@@ ongereye umusaruro ku buryo tubona uku kwezi kuzajya kurangira turi kuri toni 30 000 za sima yinjira mu gihugu.” Ubusanzwe S@@ ima ituruka hanze ingana na 4@@ 5% bya sima yose icuruzwa ku isoko ry’u Rwanda. Abac@@ uruza sima bavuga ko mu gihe C@@ im@@ erwa yas@@ anaga hari ubwoko bwa sima but@@ anu bushya bw@@ injiye ku isoko ry’u Rwanda. Abag@@ ura sima bakunze kwin@@ ubira ko hari abacuruzi bur@@ iriye ku kugabanuka k’@@ umusaruro wa C@@ im@@ erwa, bakongera ibic@@ iro. Ikipe ya Gisagara VC yatangiye umwiherero w’@@ iminsi itatu Ikipe ya Gisagara VC yateguye umwiherero uz@@ ayihuza n’abakozi bayo ukaz@@ amara iminsi itatu. Ni umwiherero utangira kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 20 Kanama 2020 ukaz@@ arangira ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 22 Kanama 2020 uk@@ abera mu Karere ka Gis@@ agara. Ikipe ya Gisagara ya Volleyball Ni umwiherero uz@@ itabirwa n’abakozi bose ni uk@@ uvug@@ a, abakinnyi, abat@@ oza, abayobozi, abaterankunga b’ikipe ku isonga Akarere ka Gisagara ndetse n’abandi bose bafite aho bahuriye n’imibereho y’iyi kipe. Mu kiganiro Kigali Today yagiranye n’umunyamabanga w’iyi kipe Bwana Gatera Ed@@ mond@@ , yavuze ko uyu mwiherero ugamije kongera kwib@@ ukiranya intego bari batangiranye umwaka. Yagize ati ”@@ Ni umwiherero ugamije kongera kwib@@ ukiranya intego twari twihaye ndavuga gutwara ibikombe mu Rwanda ndetse no kugera ku mukino wa nyuma w’@@ amakipe yabaye aya mbere iwayo muri Afurika, kureba imibereho y’abakinnyi dore hari hashize amezi atanu ikipe tud@@ ahura na y@@ o.” Gatera yas@@ ib@@ anuye ko amasezerano y’abakinnyi ari mu bindi bizag@@ anir@@ waho, ati ”@@ Dufite abakinnyi batandukanye basoje amasezerano n’abandi bashya dushaka kongera mu ikipe barim@@ o: Kapiteni w’ikipe Nd@@ amukunda Flav@@ ier , visi kapiteni Ak@@ umuntu Kav@@ alo Patrick , Am@@ do@@ und@@ ou Djib@@ ril ukomoka muri Niger, Rugira Bar@@ r@@ ack na Olivier Karang@@ wa. Bamwe muri aba bakinnyi hari abamaze kongera amasezerano navuga ko uyu mwiherero uz@@ ashyira akadomo kuri ibi byose.” Mbere yo kwinjira kuri uyu mwiherero hateguwe igikorwa cyo gupima abaz@@ aw@@ itabira icyorezo cya COVID-19. Shampiyona ya Volleyball yasubitswe Gisagara VC iri ku mwanya wa mbere aho yari ifite amanota 21 ikurikiwe na REG VC ifite amanota 22. Kuba REG ari yo ifite amanota menshi, itegeko rivuga ko mu gihe hat@@ ond@@ ekwa uko amakipe agomba gukurikirana mu irushanwa iryo ari ryo ryose, habanza imikino amakipe yatsinze n’iyo yats@@ inzwe. Nyuma yo kureba imikino nibwo harebwa amanota amakipe afite. Icya gatatu kir@@ ebwa ni amaseti yagiye aboneka mu mikino amakipe yagiye ak@@ ina. Ikipe itsinze amaseti atatu ku busa ihabwa amanota atatu, ikipe itsinze amaseti atatu kuri abiri igahabwa amanota abiri, iy@@ atsinzwe igahabwa inota rimwe. Ikipe itsinze amaseti atatu kuri imwe ihabwa amanota atatu, itsinzwe igahabwa ubusa. Indwara itera kunyara ku buriri ku bantu bakuru ni bwoko ki? Abantu batandukanye abana ndetse n’abakuru bany@@ ara ku buriri, rimwe na rimwe biterwa n’uburwayi bwa En@@ ur@@ es@@ ie noc@@ tur@@ ne baba bafite. Ubus@@ azwe ku muntu muzima, uruh@@ ago rw’@@ inkari hamwe n’@@ impyiko ntib@@ ikora kimwe haba ku manywa ndetse na nijoro, aho impyiko zikora inkari nk@@ eya, uruh@@ ago rukaba runini kugira ngo rw@@ ongere ubushobozi bwo gufata inkari nyinshi. Guhera ku myaka itatu umwana aba ashobora gucunga uruh@@ ago rwe, nt@@ any@@ are ku buriri. Hejuru y’iyo myaka iyo any@@ ara ku buriri bifatwa nk’@@ uburwayi, byaba byiza akajyanwa kwa muganga. Uretse ko ibi hari n’abantu bakuru bibaho ntibabashe gufata ink@@ ari, bityo igihe bash@@ akiye kunyara zig@@ ahita z@@ iza, ibi na byo biba bitewe n’uburwayi butandukanye. Bamwe mu bantu bakuru bany@@ ara ku buriri bavuga ko bibatera ipfunwe mu bandi, haba mu bo babana mu rugo ndetse no mu r@@ ungano rwabo muri rusange. Umwe mu bo twaganiriye ariko utarashatse ko amazina ye atangazwa, wiga mu mwaka wa kane w’amashuri yisumbuye yagize ati "Iyo ndi mu rugo Mama ahamagara abana duturanye ngo baze barebe inkumi iny@@ ara ku buriri, ku insh@@ uri na ho usanga abandi banyeshuri bans@@ eka, bigatuma numva niy@@ anze. Sinzi uko biza ariko buri munsi ndah@@ anyar@@ a." Ubush@@ ash@@ atsi bwagaragaje ko 3% by’abantu bakuru baba bafite uburwayi bwo kunyara ku buriri (E@@ n@@ ur@@ es@@ ie noc@@ tur@@ n@@ e) nk’uko urubuga rwa d@@ oct@@ iss@@ imo rub@@ itangaza. Ese ni ibiki bishobora gutera kunyara ku buriri haba ku bana cyangwa ku bantu bak@@ uru@@ ? Ubusanzwe umubiri us@@ ohora umusemburo witwa “@@ AD@@ H@@ =@@ anti di@@ ur@@ et@@ ic hor@@ mon@@ e” utuma umubiri ukora inkari nk@@ e,@@ ahanini umubiri ur@@ ekura uyu musemburo cyane cyane iyo umuntu as@@ inziriye bityo ubushake bwo kunyara bukaba buk@@ e.@@ Ku bantu badafite uyu musemburo akenshi bany@@ ara ku bur@@ ir@@ i.@@ Des@@ m@@ op@@ res@@ sin@@ (s@@ oma d@@ e-@@ s@@ i-@@ m@@ o-@@ p@@ re-@@ s@@ i-@@ n@@ e) ni umwe mu miti ikoreshwa mu kongera uyu musemburo mu mubiri. Kuny@@ ara ku buriri bishobora guturuka ku ruhererekane ry’@@ umuryang@@ o(@@ h@@ ere@@ d@@ it@@ air@@ e) Abantu bag@@ ona bakunze no kunyara ku buriri Abantu bakunze kugira ubwoba cyangwa bakareba nka filime ziteye ubwoba ,@@ bib@@ ongerera ibibazo byo kunyara ku buriri. Ku bana bari hagati y’imyaka 5 na 10 ,@@ kunyara ku buriri ,@@ bishobora guterwa n’@@ uruh@@ ago ruto ruba rutar@@ akura ndetse ngo rug@@ ire n’im@@ ik@@ aya ikomeye y@@ afunga inkari umwanya mun@@ in@@ i,@@ nanone gusinzira igihe kirekire nabyo bitera kunyara ku buriri. Indwara z’@@ imitsi (@@ gus@@ us@@ umira ,@@ par@@ ariz@@ i) nabyo ni ibitera kunyara ku buriri. Kanseri ya pr@@ ost@@ ate cyangwa kwiyongera ubunini kwa pr@@ ost@@ ate bik@@ aby@@ iga uruh@@ ago Ku@@ baga umugore imwe mu myanya myibarukiro bishobora kwangiza imitsi n’im@@ ik@@ aya bigira uruhare mu kubika inkari cyangwa kuzis@@ ohora hanze y’@@ uruh@@ ag@@ o. Abagore bamaze gucur@@ a(@@ men@@ op@@ a@@ us@@ e) bahura n’ikibazo k’@@ igabanuka ry’@@ umusemburo wa o@@ est@@ r@@ ogene ,uyu musemburo utuma imikaya y’@@ uruh@@ ago ikom@@ era ik@@ abasha gufunga ink@@ ari. Umuntu uhorana ikibazo cyo kut@@ ituma neza (@@ Const@@ ip@@ ation) bituma umwanda uri mu mara utsind@@ agira cyane uruh@@ ago bityo rukar@@ ekura inkari bya hato na hato. Umugore utwite ashobora kunyara ku buriri kubera uruh@@ ago ruba r@@ uts@@ indag@@ iwe cyane. A bageze mu za bukuru ,@@ imikaya ifunga inkari itangira gucika integer biryo inkari zig@@ asohoka hanze uko z@@ ishak@@ iye. Indwara ya diyabete nayo ishobora gutuma umuntu any@@ ara ku buriri Abantu bafata imiti ibibazo by’@@ umuvuduko w’amaraso ,@@ bafata imiti igabanya amazi mu mubir@@ i(@@ di@@ ur@@ et@@ ic d@@ rug@@ s) bashobora ikibazo cyo kunyara ku buriri. Umuti wag@@ ufasha guhagarika kunyara ku buriri Kud@@ afata ibyo kunywa mu gihe cya nijoro sibyo bik@@ uraho kunyara ku bur@@ ir@@ i,@@ ahubwo ibyo kunywa big@@ oma gufatwa hakiri kare noneho umuntu akajya ku buriri avuye kwih@@ agarika. Irinde ibinyobwa birimo c@@ aff@@ e@@ ine kuko ubwayo ibarizwa mu bwoko bw’@@ ibinyobwa bitera umubiri gusohora amazi mensh@@ i(@@ di@@ ur@@ et@@ ic@@ ),@@ ituma umuntu ashaka kunyara kenshi. Kwirinda inkomoko ya con@@ st@@ ip@@ ation iyo ariyo yose Hari utw@@ uma tw@@ abugenewe dus@@ ona iyo duhuye n’ahantu hat@@ ose ako kanya umuntu agahita akang@@ uka akajya kwihagarika (@@ mo@@ ist@@ ure al@@ ar@@ m@@ ). Kugabanya umubyibuho Gufata intungamubiri ya mag@@ nes@@ ium@@ (s@@ oma m@@ a-@@ n@@ ye@@ -@@ z@@ i-@@ y@@ u-@@ mu@@ ) bifasha imitsi n’im@@ ik@@ aya gukomera muri rusange iboneka akenshi mu bij@@ umba n’ibit@@ oki. Al@@ co@@ ol@@ (@@ inzoga )@@ nazo ni kimwe mu bintu bituma umuntu ashaka kwihagarika kenshi. Kurya ch@@ ocol@@ ate nabyo byongera kunyara ku buriri kuko inyinshi ziba@@ mo c@@ aff@@ e@@ ine. Kamonyi: Ash@@ eng@@ urwa no kuba mu myaka itanu amaze ashatse ari nk’aho atar@@ atera akabariro Umuhire (@@ izina ryahind@@ uwe@@ ) wo mu karere ka Kamonyi, umurenge tut@@ ashatse kuvuga izina, ni umugore ubyaye kabiri wagaragaje intimba afite bitewe n’imibanire ye n’umugabo bamaranye imyaka itanu barar@@ ana ku buriri bumwe ariko bakaba basa n’abad@@ akora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Uyu mugore n’umugabo we ngo bakiriye agakiza ndetse bashakanye umwe ari im@@ anzi undi ari is@@ ugi, bivuze ko nta n’umwe wari warigeze akinisha gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina mu bus@@ ore bwabo. Kera kabaye rero, muri 2011 umusore wari ufite imyaka 32 ngo abantu bamut@@ eshaga umutwe cyane bamubaza impamvu ad@@ ashaka, bituma atangira gut@@ eret@@ a. Ngo yarebye umukobwa bas@@ eng@@ anaga na we utar@@ akundaga kuvuga bihuza n’uko umukobwa yam@@ ukundaga asa n’uw@@ or@@ osoye uw@@ aby@@ ukaga maze mu 2012 bar@@ abana. Uyu mugore avuga ko nyuma yo kubana bamaze umwaka wa 2013 na 2014 nta mwana bafite bitewe nuko basaga n’abad@@ atera akabariro uko bikwiriye. Kur@@ angiza vuba, ikibazo cyash@@ egeshe umugabo Uyu mubyeyi uvuga ababaye cyane ndetse akag@@ eraho akan@@ arira, ngo byamw@@ anze mu nda akabwira umugabo we ko igihe yumva hari icyo bari buk@@ ore azajya ahita amw@@ egera bagatera akabar@@ iro, kuko kumut@@ egura byatumaga nta gikorwa bageraho kuko umugabo yabaga yarangije kare mu gihe umugore we arimo kwim@@ eza neza. Ati “@@ Umva mu mibanire yacu ni nk’aho ubuzima bwacu burangwa no kud@@ atera akabariro kuko nta n’umun@@ ota amara atar@@ arang@@ iza. Iyo ibyo byabaga nar@@ ababag@@ ara kuko njyewe numvaga mb@@ ishaka, ibaze kuba ndi umukobwa ntabyo nakoze ntabyo nzi no mu gushaka nkaba mby@@ ifuza nkab@@ ibura kandi nk@@ ijijwe nt@@ azam@@ uca inyum@@ a!” Umuhire yakomeje agira ati “Njyewe uku ng@@ uku und@@ eba nabonaga bimur@@ angiranye ntacyo tug@@ ezeho kandi nari natangiye kub@@ ishaka maze nk@@ arara mp@@ ig@@ ima ngira ngo n@@ umve nibura ko ari bw@@ isub@@ ireho ngo twongere tub@@ ikos@@ ore, maze nkumva arimo kwig@@ onera nk@@ umir@@ wa.” K@@ ubyara kwabo ni igitangaza Uyu mugore avuga ko na we atazi uburyo yas@@ am@@ yemo gusa ngo iyo yabaga ari mu gihe cy’@@ uburumbuke yakoraga uko ashoboye igikorwa kikaba nubwo bit@@ at@@ ind@@ aga. Ati “N@@ awe ur@@ abizi, abagore iyo bari mu gihe cy’@@ uburumbuke baba bashy@@ ushye, nanjye rero iyo ndi mu gihe cy’@@ uburumbuke ngira ubushake bwinshi, iyo rero nabaga mbona ntacyo abit@@ ekerezaho naram@@ weg@@ eraga ngo ngire icyo n@@ umv@@ a.” “Aho niho Imana yaboneye akababaro kanjye nuko muri 2015 nt@@ wita mu bintu ut@@ amenya aho bivuye ndetse na 2016 nahise ns@@ ama indi nda ariko nti@@ wab@@ isobanura kuko nta minota ibiri tur@@ amarana turi muri icyo gikorwa kuva tw@@ aban@@ a.” Iyo amusabye kwivuza avuga ko nta muhanga wo kurongora Umuhire ati “@@ Umugabo wanjye ar@@ ank@@ unda, ndetse ar@@ ant@@ et@@ esha ariko ntacyo bik@@ im@@ bwira kuko iyo mus@@ abye kwivuza ngo icyo kibazo kiv@@ eho arambwira ngo ‘@@ tuza rwose nt@@ amuh@@ anga wo kur@@ ongor@@ a.’ Ibyo bir@@ ansh@@ engura nkibaza ukuntu buri munsi nd@@ arana umutima wenda guturika igihe we abarimo kug@@ ona nkumva nd@@ ababa@@ ye.” “M@@ bayeho mu buzima bumeze nk’uko waba uhaye umuntu ibiryo kandi ash@@ onje maze yakor@@ amo rimwe agiye gut@@ amira uk@@ abim@@ wam@@ bur@@ a. Hari ubwo m@@ babar@@ a no kurya bikan@@ anira, nk@@ amubwira ngo wagiye uganira n’abandi bagabo koko, ubundi utaha saa kumi n’ebyiri ujya heh@@ e?” Uyu mugabo ngo ntaz@@ erera, ava iwe agiye ku kazi, akagaruka mu rugo nt@@ ahandi anyuze ubundi akajya no gusenga, ibyo umugore akaba at@@ abikunda ngo kuko byibura ag@@ aniriye n’abandi bagabo bam@@ ugira inama y’uburyo gahunda z’@@ ab@@ ubatse zikor@@ wa. Ikibazo cyo kuboneza urubyaro cyatumye umugabo abir@@ eka burundu Umuhire ngo amaze kubyara abana babiri b’@@ indah@@ ekana , yig@@ iriye inama yo kuboneza urubyaro akoresheje uburyo bwa gakondo bwo kubara iminsi ye y’ubur@@ umbuk@@ e. Ati “N@@ araby@@ ize nd@@ abim@@ enya, nsaba umugabo wanjye ko nawe nab@@ imw@@ igisha kugira ngo nabona ndi mu bihe byo gusama ye kuny@@ egera , yaraby@@ anze avuga ko kuba Imana yar@@ aduhaye abana bihagije uw@@ ashaka yabir@@ ek@@ a.” Uyu mubyeyi avuga ko ubu noneho bih@@ or@@ eranye kuko umugore adashaka kongera gusama n’abo bana batar@@ akura kandi ngo umugabo we, n’iyo amur@@ ebye gusa we biba birangiye akam@@ era nk’aho yateye akabariro. Ati "M@@ ungire inama. Nd@@ ababaye kuko meze nk’@@ utam@@ ufite, ni wa muntu urangiza vuba@@ ; nk’iyo mur@@ ebye cyangwa nk@@ amus@@ ekera mbona ko we igikorwa akir@@ ang@@ ije.”

Inkomoko y’@@ imvugo "Nd@@ atega ziv@@ am@@ o" "Nd@@ atega ziv@@ am@@ o@@ !" ni umugani wamamaye mu Rwanda, uc@@ ibwa n’umuntu umaze kugira intege nke. W@@ aturutse ku mugabo witwaga Nt@@ am@@ babazi ya R@@ uf@@ ang@@ ura, mu Bit@@ ag@@ ata bya Muganza i Rukoma (@@ Git@@ aram@@ a), ah@@ ay@@ inga umwaka w’i 16@@ 00. Nt@@ am@@ babazi uwo yari umuz@@ ig@@ aba, yim@@ uka mu Bw@@ an@@ acy@@ ambwe i Ruh@@ anga na Mb@@ and@@ azi, ajya gutura i Rukoma mu Gish@@ ubi cya Muganza ahitwa mu Bit@@ agat@@ a. Yari umut@@ ezi w’@@ inyamaswa, impu zazo akaz@@ ijyana i B@@ wami, cyane cyane iz’@@ ing@@ we. Uwo mwuga Sem@@ ug@@ eshi araw@@ umush@@ imira bituma amug@@ oror@@ era, amugira umunyam@@ uh@@ ango wo gutura impu z’ ing@@ we. Nt@@ am@@ babazi amaze kuba umunyam@@ uh@@ ango, akor@@ anya bene wabo arab@@ iba@@ bwira, bose baba abat@@ ezi b’i B@@ wam@@ i. Aba umut@@ oni cyane kuri iyo ngoma ya Sem@@ ug@@ esh@@ i. Amaze gutanga, h@@ ima Kigeli Nyam@@ uh@@ esh@@ era, y@@ ima Nt@@ am@@ babazi amaze kuba umus@@ aza, na none ag@@ umya gutura izo mp@@ u z’@@ ing@@ we, ariko ubut@@ oni bur@@ ag@@ abanuka. Bene wabo babonye ko atakiri umut@@ oni bajya kumuh@@ akanwa i bwami bashaka kugabana ubutware bwe ndetse n’inka z’@@ ibiti yag@@ aban@@ ye, hamwe n’ing@@ oror@@ ano yahawe. B@@ atangira kwanga kujya batega kugira ngo Nt@@ am@@ babazi nab@@ ura impu zo gutura i B@@ wami, bizam@@ uv@@ ir@@ emo icyaha cyo kun@@ yag@@ wa. Nuko kuva ubwo, Nt@@ am@@ babazi y@@ ababwira bakaby@@ anga. Imp@@ u zimaze kub@@ ura, i Bwami baramut@@ umira, baramut@@ onganya bamubaza igituma atag@@ itura imp@@ u. Aba@@ bwira ko bene wabo bamug@@ and@@ iye (@@ bamun@@ aniye, bamus@@ uzug@@ ur@@ a). I Bwami bar@@ abat@@ um@@ iza, baba@@ baza icyatumye bigira ibig@@ ande kuri Nt@@ am@@ babazi, bakanga gutega inyamas@@ wa. Abandi bir@@ eguza ko Nt@@ am@@ babazi abab@@ eshy@@ era, bati "Ntabwo at@@ ubwira, ahubwo niwe wab@@ yanze gus@@ a." I Bwami bongera gut@@ onganya Nt@@ am@@ babazi baram@@ wirukana na bene wabo, ngo bajye kuzana impu igitarag@@ anya. Bageze iwabo mu Bit@@ agat@@ a, Nt@@ am@@ babazi ababwiye kujya gutega barar@@ ic@@ urika baramw@@ angira. Ubwo bateg@@ aga mu Gis@@ izi kuri Nyabar@@ ongo. H@@ ac@@ iyeho iminsi, Nt@@ am@@ babazi agira ubwoba, aras@@ ind@@ agira gis@@ aza, ajya mu Gis@@ izi gutega ing@@ we; agenda wenyine kuko yari insh@@ ike nta kana agira. Ag@@ ez@@ eyo, ashaka igiti cy’@@ amaboko arag@@ ishing@@ a. A@@ kig@@ onze kir@@ amun@@ anira, apfa kuj@@ enj@@ eka arat@@ aha. Bukeye aza gusura umutego we. Ahag@@ eze asanga ingwe yaguyemo ariko ir@@ aw@@ ujyana kuko utari ukomeye wat@@ ezwe n’umun@@ yant@@ ege nke. Ubwo i Bwami nanone bamut@@ umaho ngo bam@@ ubaze aho yah@@ ejeje imp@@ u. Ag@@ ezeyo baramut@@ ong@@ anya, ndetse noneho baran@@ amuk@@ ubit@@ a. Ink@@ oni zim@@ ur@@ iye, ati: «@@ Nim@@ und@@ eke njye kuz@@ iz@@ ana@@ ». Ariko byari ibyo gutak@@ amba nta zo yari afite. Baram@@ ur@@ ekura, bati : «@@ Genda uz@@ iz@@ ane vuba@@ », arag@@ enda. Ab@@ uze uko agira, yongera gusubira mu ishyamba atega kw@@ akund@@ i, nanone ingwe ig@@ uyemo ir@@ aw@@ ujyan@@ a. As@@ ub@@ iyeyo gus@@ ura, ahasanga amara masa (@@ ubus@@ a). Agira umuj@@ inya, ati "@@ Ngiye i Bwami mbabw@@ ize ukuri n@@ ibash@@ aka bany@@ ic@@ e!"
