Abakinnyi 12 b’u Rwanda bitabiriye imikino ya Olymp@@ i@@ ad 2020 ya Ch@@ ess Abakinnyi 12 b’@@ Ikipe y’Igihugu y’umukino wa Ch@@ ess bitabiriye irushanwa rya Olempike ry’uyu mukino, uri kuba hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga. Ni imikino yatangiye kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 31 Kamena 2020 muri Saint Famille mu Mujyi wa Kigali, aho abitabiriye bari gukinira kuri Internet@@ . Rwanda B@@ ook Mobile yateye inkunga iyi mikino mu rwego rwo ukund@@ isha abakina uyu mukino umuco wo gusoma Kuri uyu wa Gatanu, Ikipe y’U Rwanda igizwe n’abakinnyi batandatu yakinnye n’amakipe ya Syria, K@@ uw@@ a@@ it na Namib@@ ia. Imikino yakomeje kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 01 Kanama, aho abandi bakinnyi batandatu bas@@ imbura abak@@ innye ku wa Gatanu bakina imikino itatu ari yo ubah@@ uza na Uganda, Qu@@ atar n’@@ Ibirwa bya Mal@@ t@@ a. Uburyo bw’@@ imikin@@ ire, ikipe igizwe n’abakinnyi batandatu buri wese yicara kuri mudasobwa ye , agak@@ ina n’undi ukomoka mu kindi gihugu aho umukino umara iminota mirongo ine n’itanu (@@ 45@@ ). Nyuma y’umukino hafatwa ikiruhuko cy’@@ iminota 15 umukino wa kabiri ug@@ atang@@ ira. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Kigali Today mbere yo gukina, kapiteni w’ikipe y’igihugu y’umukino wa Ch@@ ess mu Rwanda, Alain Pati@@ ence Niyib@@ izi, yavuze ko bagerageje kwiteg@@ ure uko bashoboye nubwo imikino isa n’aho yatung@@ uranye. Olymp@@ i@@ ad 2020 yagombaga kubera mu Burusiya, ubu iri kuba hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga Yagize ati “Tw@@ ibanze ku bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga kuko uburyo bw’@@ imikinire bwari bw@@ ahindutse, ariko navuga ko abakinnyi bacu biteguye neza kuko bakiri bato cyane. Navuga ko gukinira kuri mudasobwa biz@@ abanza kugorana ariko ibi na byo ni ubunararibonye abakinnyi tuz@@ avana muri iyi mikin@@ o”. Umuyobozi w’Ishyirahamwe ry’@@ Umukino wa Ch@@ ess mu Rwanda, Zim@@ urinda Ben Tom@@ , yavuze ko afite icyizere ko U Rwanda ruzakomeza mu cyiciro gikurikir@@ aho. Yagize ati “Tw@@ izeye ko abakinnyi bacu baz@@ itwara neza tuk@@ azakomeza mu cyiciro gik@@ urik@@ iyeho. N@@ ashimira abakinnyi kuko bagerageje kugendana n’uburyo bushya bw’@@ umukino , d@@ etse na Rwanda B@@ ook Mobile yad@@ uteye inkunga kugira ngo iyi mikino ig@@ ende neza”. Umukozi wa Rwanda b@@ ook Mobile ushinzwe ibikorwa byo gusoma, Mah@@ irwe Pacif@@ ique, avuga ko bateye inkunga imikino ya Olymp@@ i@@ ad 2020 kugira ngo bakund@@ ishe abana gus@@ oma. U Rwanda ruz@@ akina imikino icyenda muri iki cyic@@ iro. Yagize ati “Tw@@ afatanyije n’ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Ch@@ ess mu gutegura iyi mikino kuko harimo abana bakiri bato kandi twifuza ko bakura bazi gus@@ oma. Turifuza gukorana n’abandi tuzabona bafite gahunda yo kuzamura umuco wo gusom@@ a”. Imikino ya Olymp@@ i@@ ad ya Ch@@ ess 2020 iri kuba ku nshuro ya 4@@ 4, yatangiye tariki ya 25 Nyakanga, ikaz@@ arangira tariki ya 30 Kanama 2020. Ni inshuro ya mbere imikino ya Olymp@@ i@@ ad ibaye hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga, u Rwanda rukaba rumaze kwitabira inshuro esheshatu iyi mikino. Gat@@ umba@@ : Abar@@ ema isoko rya Rusumo bagiye gusubizwa Nyuma y'igihe kinini abar@@ ema isoko rya Rusumo riri mu Murenge wa Gat@@ umba mu Karere ka Ngororero basaba ko bak@@ ubakirwa isoko rya kij@@ yambere, ubu imirimo yo kur@@ yubaka yamaze gut@@ angira. Abar@@ ema iri soko biganjemo abacuruza imyambaro n'@@ ibiribwa bavuga ko bashimishijwe cyane n'uko bagiye kujya bacuruza bafite umutekano w'@@ ibicuruzwa byabo. Imirimo yo kubaka isoko rya Rusumo yar@@ atang@@ iye. Gat@@ umba ni umwe mu mirenge y'Akarere ka Ngororero irimo ibikorwa by'ubucuruzi byinshi aho iza ku mwanya wa gatatu, nyuma ya Ngororero na Kabay@@ a. Ibyo bituma abar@@ ema isoko rir@@ emera muri uyu murenge baba benshi ndetse baturutse imihanda yose. Kubera ubwinshi bw'@@ abar@@ ema iri soko kandi rikaba r@@ yakoreraga ahantu hat@@ isanz@@ uye, abar@@ irema bari barar@@ ic@@ iyemo ibice bibiri, igice kimwe cyig@@ anjemo abacuruza imyenda bayit@@ andika ku nkengero z'@@ umuhanda ndetse bamwe bakan@@ awug@@ eramo ku buryo byateza impanuka. Abac@@ urur@@ izaga ah@@ ad@@ atunganye batangiye kwir@@ uh@@ uts@@ a. Se@@ bagabo Innocent, umwe mu bacururiza mu isoko rya Rusumo avuga ko bishimiye ko ubuyobozi bw'akarere bw@@ umvise ubusabe bwabo, biteganyijwe ko riz@@ uzura muri nyakanga 2015. Mu mwaka wa 2012, nibwo ubuyobozi bw'akarere bwari bw@@ emereye abatuye uyu murenge n'abar@@ ema iri soko kur@@ yubak@@ a. Iri soko rije ari irya 6 mu masoko ya kijyambere abarirwa muri aka karere. Biteganyijwe ko imirimo yo kubaka isoko rya Rusumo izarangira muri Nyakanga 2015. Ernest Kal@@ inganire

Ukuri kwa Bukuru bivugwa ko yakiniye u Burundi n’uko yakiriye gus@@ igwa n’@@ Amavubi Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu nibwo Amavubi atarimo Bukuru Christophe wa APR FC, yafashe indege yerekeza muri Cameroun, aho yagiye gukina umukino wa gicuti mu rwego rwo kwitegura irushanwa rya CHAN 2020 rizaba muri Mata. Bukuru Christophe wari wah@@ amagawe mu bakinnyi 28, ntabwo ari muri 26 bagiye muri Cameroun kubera ko ngo umutoza Mashami Vincent, ejo ku wa Kane, yamubwiye ko Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Burundi ryavuze ko yigeze gukinira ikipe yabo y’abat@@ o. Bamwe mu baba hafi y’uyu muk@@ innyi, babwiye IGIHE ko yababajwe cyane no gusigara nyamara we azi ko nta kibazo na gito afite kuko atigeze akinira u Burundi ndetse yari afite inzozi zo gukinira Amavubi. Ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, IGIHE yasuye Bukuru Christophe iwabo i Nyamirambo, imug@@ aniriza hamwe n’umubyeyi we, Rwab@@ irinda Omar@@ . Rw@@ abarinda Omar ubyara Buk@@ uru, yavuze ko ari umwe mu bana be batandatu yab@@ ya@@ ye, aho yemeje ko yavukiye i Burundi kuko ari ho yahung@@ iye. Ati “N@@ ahunze mu 196@@ 0, njya i Burundi. Ng@@ ezeyo nashatse Umur@@ und@@ ikazi, tub@@ yarana abana batandatu, Bukuru afite imp@@ anga. Y@@ akiniye ikipe imwe y’i Burundi ya Lydia Lud@@ ic. B@@ abaye aba mbere, agiye kujya hanze ntibyak@@ unda kuko yari afite imv@@ une. “ Umubyeyi wa Bukuru kuri ubu ufite imyaka 7@@ 7, avuga ko ari umwana wir@@ irwaga akinira mu gace bari batuyemo akanga kwiga ndetse yemeza ko ari we wamub@@ ujije gukinira u Burundi ahubwo amugira inama ko azakina nibag@@ era mu Rwanda. Yakomeje avuga ko na we yigeze gukina umupira w’amaguru ku buryo at@@ atuma umuhungu we akinira ibihugu bibiri. Ati “N@@ aram@@ ubwiye nti reka umupira uzak@@ ine tugeze mu Rwanda nta kibazo hano ntacyo bizag@@ ufasha. Nanjye nak@@ innye umupira ndabizi ko gukinira ibihugu bibiri bih@@ anirwa. Ntabwo n@@ ahem@@ ukira igihugu rwose. Nahise muz@@ ana mu Rwanda akinira Kicukir@@ o.” “@@ Umugabo natanga ni Kanyankore [@@ Gilbert Yao@@ und@@ é@@ ] byose ar@@ abizi kuko ni we wari umutoza we. Twam@@ ubwiye ko kuba ari Umunyarwanda agak@@ inira igihugu cy’@@ abandi byaba ari uk@@ uv@@ unikira ubus@@ a.” Bukuru Christophe yavuze ko yatang@@ r@@ iye umupira mu Ikipe y’@@ abato ya La P@@ ép@@ ini@@ ère yari iy’@@ Abanya-@@ Cameroun mu gihe cy’umwaka umwe, aho yash@@ imwe n’umutoza Kanyankore Gilbert ‘@@ Yao@@ und@@ è@@ ’ akajya gukorera imyitozo muri Vital@@ ’@@ O. Nyuma yaho nibwo ngo yaje gukina muri SEC Academy mu Rwanda, aho yagize amahirwe yo kuba yajya gukina mu Bwongereza, ariko ntibyak@@ unda nyuma asubira mu Burundi gukinira LL@@ B, akina imikino ya Shampiyona yo kwishyura. Yabwiye IGIHE ko atigeze akinira amakipe y’u Burundi ndetse yageze aho yir@@ waza kugira ngo atajya mu kibuga. Yam@@ bwiye ko njya mu mwiherero kugira ngo bit@@ azaba bibi, ambwira ko ibindi tuzab@@ ivugana igihe cyo kugenda kig@@ ez@@ e.” Bukuru avuga ko yagiriwe icyizere cyo kujya mu bakinnyi bari kujya muri Sénég@@ al, ab@@ ibwiye se amusaba ko yakwir@@ waza kugira ngo azas@@ ibe umukino. Ati “N@@ abajije papa nti ese ko igihe cyo kugenda kigeze kandi nkaba ndi mu bo bahisemo biragenda gute? Yaram@@ bwiye ngo mvug@@ ane na Kanyankore kuko papa we yari mu Rwanda. Nta kipe y’u Burundi nak@@ in@@ iye.” Abajijwe uko yakiriye kuba atar@@ ajyanye n’@@ Amavubi, Bukuru yavuze ko byam@@ uba@@ baje, asaba ko by@@ akurikiranwa neza kugira ngo azah@@ abwe amahirwe yo gukinira ikipe y’igihugu kuko ari inzozi yak@@ uranye. Umwunganizi akaba na Muk@@ eba wa CIM@@ ERWA araza mu kwezi gutaha Ubuyobozi bw’@@ Uruganda ‘@@ Prime C@@ ement Ltd@@ ’ bwatangaje ko bitarenze ukwezi gutaha kwa Kanama 2020, ruzaba rwatangiye gukora sima yunganira itangwa n’uruganda CIM@@ ERWA rukorera i Rusizi mu Bur@@ engerazuba. Uruganda Prime C@@ ement rwatangiye kubakwa muri 2018 rufite intego yo kuzatanga imirimo 2000 ku baturage b’i Musanze Prime C@@ ement ruz@@ akora amoko atandukanye ya sima ivuye mu ruv@@ ange rw’@@ ibintu bitandukanye birimo n’amabuye y’@@ amak@@ oro (@@ akomoka ku iruka ry’@@ ibir@@ ung@@ a). Ni uruganda rukorera mu Murenge wa Kim@@ onyi mu birometero bine uvuye mu Mujyi wa Musanze mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru. Umwe mu bayobozi ba Prime C@@ ement Ltd, Eric Rutabana yatangarije Kigali Today ko ibikoresho by’ibanze byo gukora sima byamaze guteg@@ urwa, kandi ko n’ibindi biri mu modoka biva ku cyambu i Mombasa muri Kenya. Yagize ati “@@ Imirimo yo gutangira gukora sima irar@@ imb@@ anyije, ntabwo ntekereza ko byaba mbere y’uku kwezi ariko ntabwo bizar@@ enza ukwezi kwa munani 2020, tuzaba turi ku isoko nta kab@@ uz@@ a”. Ati “T@@ ug@@ itangira ngira ngo ig@@ ikomeye kizaba kijyanye n’uko isoko riz@@ agenda riy@@ akira (s@@ im@@ a), ubushobozi dufite but@@ wemerera kuba tw@@ atanga toni ibihumbi 50 buri kwezi cyangwa toni ibihumbi 600 ku mwak@@ a”. Arongera ati “Iyo sima izaza igurishwa ku giciro gito kuko ubu hari aho ugera ugasanga sima ir@@ agurishwa amafaranga 12@@ ,000@@ Frw ku muf@@ uka, ibi ntabwo ari ibintu byiza, twe ntabwo dushobora kugeza aho kuko igiciro kitaz@@ arenga amafaranga ibihumbi icyenda (ku muf@@ uk@@ a)@@ ”. “Nd@@ izera ko sima yacu n@@ iza, igiciro cy’@@ iyari isanzwe ku isoko cy’amafaranga 12@@ ,000@@ Frw kiz@@ ahita kim@@ an@@ uka, kuko ntabwo ntekereza ko ari igiciro kijyanye n’ubushobozi buri ku isok@@ o”. Is@@ ima irenze toni ibihumbi 600 ku mwaka ni yo uruganda CIM@@ ERWA na rwo rwari rwar@@ iyemeje kuva rw@@ ashyirwamo imigabane y’ikigo cyo muri Afurika y’Epfo, Pret@@ oria Port@@ land Land C@@ ement (P@@ P@@ C) mu mwaka wa 2013, ariko kugeza ubu iyo ntego yari itarag@@ erwaho. Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubucuruzi n’is@@ akaza ry’ibikorwa bya CIM@@ ERW@@ A, Mar@@ id@@ adi John J@@ ov@@ is avuga ko bageze ku rugero rwa 80@@ %, ariko ko n’ubwo intego yag@@ erwaho 100@@ %, n’ubundi sima ituruka ahandi izakomeza guk@@ ener@@ wa. Mu byatumye is@@ ima ik@@ enerwa cyane muri iki gihe ndetse bigateza igiciro cyayo kuzamuka kivuye ku mafaranga ibihumbi icyenda ku mufuka kugera ku bihumbi 12, ni iyubakwa ry’@@ ibyumba by’amashuri ibihumbi 22 hirya no hino mu gihugu, bikaba bikeneye sima ingana na toni ibihumbi 1@@ 20. Mu 19@@ 10, u Budage bwak@@ olon@@ izaga u Rwanda rwas@@ inyanye amasezerano n’u Bwongereza bwak@@ olon@@ izaga Uganda, bemeranya ko tumwe mu duce tundi twari ut@@ w’u Rwanda nka Kis@@ oro na Mbarara tujya muri Uganda. Niyo mpamvu ibirindiro byabo bya mbere byari Cyangugu na Gisenyi ntibyam@@ buke i Kiv@@ u.” Senateri Dr Havugimana Emmanuel yavuze ko hari n’igice cy’u Rwanda kig@@ ana muri Tanzania cyat@@ wawe nyuma y’umwaka wa 19@@ 00, kig@@ at@@ warwa n’@@ Abongereza kugira ngo bah@@ anyuze gari ya moshi yagombaga kuva i Cairo mu Misiri, ikagera Cape Town muri Afurika y’Epfo. Igis@@ aka cy@@ agarutse mu 19@@ 22 Abadage bar@@ ats@@ inzwe, kuko Ababiligi basinye andi masezerano agarura Kireh@@ e.” Iyi myaka igera kuri 40, yasize u Rwanda ari kimwe mu bihugu bito ku Isi, ariko isiga imiryango ivuga Ikinyarwanda n’@@ igendera ku mico nyarwanda ikwiriye hirya no hino mu karere. Muri Nzeri 2018, bamwe mu badepite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda batanze icy@@ ifuz@@ o, babaza niba ntacyo u Rwanda rw@@ akora ngo rus@@ ubir@@ ane uduce tw@@ ahoze ari ut@@ warwo tukajya mu mahanga. Dr Havugimana yavuze ko ibyo bidashoboka kuri ubu. Yavuze ko mu nama ya mbere y’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (O@@ U@@ A) yabaye mu 196@@ 3, ibihugu bya Afurika byose byem@@ er@@ anyijwe ko bizag@@ umana imipaka abakoloni bashyizeho mu rwego rwo kwirinda imvururu zishingiye ku mip@@ aka. Ibyo byat@@ erwaga n’uko hafi ibihugu byose byari byagiye bihabwa imipaka itandukanye n’iyo byah@@ or@@ anye, ku buryo kongera kuy@@ ivugurura byari guteza ibibazo birenze ibyari bihari. Dr Havugimana ati “B@@ yarar@@ angiye kubera ko icyo kibazo cyari mu bihugu byinshi bya Afurika, O@@ U@@ A bashyizeho ingingo ko nta n’umwe uz@@ asubira gusaba ivugururwa ry’@@ imipaka ku mipaka twas@@ igiwe n’aba@@ duk@@ olon@@ ij@@ e”. Yavuze ko ubu icyakorwa ari umubano mwiza n’ibihugu by’ibit@@ uranyi, by’umwihariko abanyarwanda bak@@ ishimira ko hari bagenzi babo bo mu bindi bihugu bavuga ururimi rumwe bafite n’imico imwe. G@@ upfa kugabana Afurika ntacyo bit@@ ayeho, kwatumye Afurika yisanga mu makimbirane ad@@ ashira ashingiye ku bw@@ oko, kureba ay’@@ ingwe kw’@@ ibihugu b@@ ipfa imipaka n’ibindi.

Ibir@@ anga ba Will@@ a Ni abantu bakunda guca bugufi bakan@@ akunda cyane inshuti n’umuryango wabo. Gicumb@@ i:@@ Bas@@ inzira mu gihe cy’@@ amasomo kuko batemerewe kurira ku ishuri no kujya iwabo Kuri uyu wa Gatanu 16 Kamena 2017 ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mukuru w’umwana w’@@ umuny@@ afurika, bamwe mu bana bagaragaje ko bag@@ owe no kwiga nyuma ya saa sita kuko baba batemerewe kujya kurya iwabo mu rugo kandi batan@@ emerewe kurira ku ishuri iyo bat@@ ishyuye amafaranga yo kubat@@ unga. Bamwe mu bana baganiriye na Makuruki.rw ni abiga mu mashuri y’imyaka 9 na 12 y’amashuri y’ibanze (9@@ &@@ 12 ye@@ ars bas@@ ic educ@@ ation) bavuze ko bakig@@ orwa no gufata ifunguro ku ishuri. Umwe muri bo wiga mu Rwunge rw’amashuri Iny@@ ange Byumba (G@@ .@@ S.@@ Iny@@ ang@@ e) yagize ati: “@@ bir@@ atug@@ ora cyane kwiga nyuma ya saa sita kuko inzara iba itur@@ ya, abenshi muri twe tur@@ is@@ inz@@ irira mbese muri make nyuma ya saa sita ntitw@@ iga neza.” Aba bavuga ko nabo batakw@@ anga gusangira n’abandi ku ishuri ariko ubushobozi buke butuma bajya gukina saa sita mu gihe abandi baba bagiye kurya. Aba banyeshuri basaba ko ubuyobozi bw’@@ ishuri bw@@ ajya bubar@@ eka saa sita bakajya iwabo mu rugo bag@@ afungura kuko ngo kwigana n’abar@@ iye bo bat@@ ariye bibagiraho ingaruka mu myigire yabo. Iki kibazo aba banyeshuri ntibak@@ ivugaho rumwe n’umuyobozi w’ishuri big@@ aho kuko we avuga ko nta munyeshuri babuza kujya kurya, kuko ngo ababyeyi baza kubivuga kandi ngo ubona ataz@@ abona amafaranga y’umwana we bamuha uburenganzira umwana akajya at@@ aha. Nyir@@ abah@@ ire Esper@@ ans@@ e, umuyobozi w’ishuri G.@@ S.@@ Iny@@ ange yagize ati: “hari ababyeyi baza ku ishuri bakavuga ko amafaranga batar@@ ay@@ abona wenda bak@@ aduha ibyumweru bibiri ko bazaba ba@@ yabon@@ ye; icyo gihe umwana tur@@ amur@@ eka agas@@ angira n’abandi. Hari n’umubyeyi uvuga ko nta mafaranga yabona yo kugaburira umwana we ku ishur@@ i; uwo na we tur@@ amur@@ eka akajya atah@@ a.” Nubwo Nyir@@ abah@@ ire ahakana ko batab@@ uza abana kujya kurya mu ngo iwabo, ubuyobozi bw’akarere ka Gicumbi bwo bwemeza ko gahunda yo gufatira amafunguro ku mashuri itarag@@ erwaho neza. Ben@@ ihirwe Charl@@ ott@@ e, umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Gicumbi wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage yagize ati: “@@ kugaburira abana ku ishuri ntibyari byag@@ erwaho 100% ariko imyumvire igenda ihinduka tug@@ ereranyije no mu myaka yashize ariko turacy@@ ashishikariza ababyeyi kuzana bike bafite abana bakab@@ ifatira ku mash@@ ur@@ i.” Ben@@ ihirwe akomeza avuga ko kubona abana bamwe bafata amafunguro abandi ntiba@@ yafat@@ e bitagira ingaruka mbi mu myigire gusa ahubwo bitera n’@@ ipfunwe ku batabashije gusangira n’abandi. Umunsi w’umwana w’@@ umuny@@ africa wizihizwa buri mwaka ku itariki 16@@ /@@ 6 kuri iyi nshuro ukaba wah@@ uriranye n’umunsi mpuzamahanga wo kurwanya imirimo mibi ikoreshwa abana. Insanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka ikaba ivuga ngo Tw@@ ubake u Rwanda rw’@@ ejo, tur@@ inda ibyagezweho mu kurengera abana. Patrick Rur@@ inda
Hill@@ s@@ ong London igiye kuza gutaramira mu Rwanda Itsinda ry’@@ abar@@ amyi ryo mu Bwongereza, Hill@@ s@@ ong London rigiye kuririmbira mu Rwanda ku nshuro yaryo ya mbere mu gitaramo kizabera mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Abak@@ unda kujya mu mwuka no kuramya Imana mu buryo bwihariye by’umwihariko abakunda ibihangano bya Hill@@ s@@ ong Lond@@ on, bagiye kongera kun@@ ezererwa bikomeye. Iri tsinda ryo mu Bwongereza rish@@ amikiye kuri Hill@@ s@@ ong United Worship yo muri Austral@@ ia. Ni mu gitaramo giteganyijwe kuba ku 6 Ukuboza 2019 gusa aho kizabera ntabwo har@@ am@@ enyekana. K@@ iri gutegurwa na Rwanda Ev@@ ents Group Ltd, sosiyete isanzwe itegura ibitaramo bitandukanye bikomeye. I@@ cy’uyu mwaka cyiswe ‘@@ Hill@@ s@@ ong London Live in Kigal@@ i’. Iri tsinda riz@@ ahurira mu gitaramo n’abandi baram@@ yi bakomeye mu Rwanda nabo baz@@ atangazwa mu minsi mike iri imbere@@ .@@ R@@ iz@@ iz@@ anira abacuranzi ndetse n’abar@@ im@@ byi bose bazaba bavuye mu Mujyi wa Lond@@ res@@ . Hill@@ s@@ ong London izagera mu Rwanda ku wa 4 Ukuboza 2019 mbere ho iminsi mike ngo igitaramo kib@@ e, bakore ibikorwa bitandukanye by’urukundo mu Rwanda. Hill@@ s@@ ong London izaba yiyongereye ku mubare w’@@ ibindi bih@@ angange mu muziki wo kuramya byagiye biza mu Rwanda birimo Don Mo@@ en, P@@ omp@@ i, Mag@@ 4@@ 4, Sin@@ ach@@ , Al@@ ika Mb@@ uba n’abandi. Iri tsinda rish@@ amikiye kuri Hill@@ s@@ ong United Worship Band yakom@@ otse ku rusengero rwa Hill@@ s@@ ong Church ruherereye mu mujyi wa Sy@@ d@@ ney muri Austral@@ ia. Urusengero rwa Hill@@ s@@ ong ni rumwe mu zikomeye z’@@ ivugabutumwa ku Isi yose, rw@@ ashinzwe mu 1993. Uretse kuba rwar@@ atangiriye muri Austral@@ ie ubu rumaze gushinga imizi ku Isi yose ndetse rwag@@ abye amashami mu bihugu 21 no mu migabane it@@ andatu. Ruk@@ orera i Londres mu Bwongereza, Paris mu Bufaransa, Sa@@ o Paulo na Rio de Jan@@ eiro muri Brés@@ il, Cape T@@ own@@ , muri Afurika y’Epfo, Tel Avi@@ v muri Israel ndetse no mu mijyi itatu muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Igitaramo nk’iki Hill@@ s@@ ong London yatumiwemo kigiye kujya kiba buri mwaka gih@@ abwe inyito igend@@ anye n’umuhanzi ugiye kuza gutaram@@ iramo abanyarwanda. Hill@@ s@@ ong London igira umuziki un@@ ogeye amatwi byagera ku ndirimbo zishyira benshi mu bihe byiza byo gusenga byo bikaba agaheb@@ uzo Aho Hill@@ s@@ ong London yataramiye abantu bar@@ afashwa mu buryo bukomeye Hill@@ s@@ ong London igiye kuza mu Rwanda ku nshuro yayo ya mbere Hill@@ s@@ ong ir@@ akundwa ku buryo aho yakoreye igitaramo har@@ akubita hak@@ uzura Ni ubwa mbere Hill@@ s@@ ong London igiye kuririmbira mu Rwanda

Muri icyo gikorwa has@@ uwe abacuruzi 68@@ 6 bib@@ utswa kujya batanga inyemezabuguzi za EBM igihe batanze ibicuruzwa ku banditse muri TV@@ A, naho abat@@ ay@@ andits@@ emo bakajya batanga iz@@ isanzwe z@@ anditse kugirango umuco wo gusohora ibicuruzwa bidafite icyemezo kigaragaza uw@@ abig@@ uze ucike burundu. Iyo habayeho isub@@ iracy@@ aha, iyo TV@@ A yik@@ uba inshuro 20. Naho iyo bibaye ubwa gatatu wa mucuruzi afungirwa ibikor@@ wa. Uko kwinj@@ irirwa ngo kw@@ abaye mu mwaka wa 2014, nyamara ubu nibwo byashyizwe ahagaragara. Kubona ingwate biracyari inzitizi ku iterambere ry’@@ umugore wo mu cyaro Bamwe mu bagore bavuga ko kutagira uburenganzira ku mutungo bituma batabasha kubona ingwate ngo babone inguzanyo mu bigo by’@@ imari. Abagore bo mu cyaro bafite ikibazo cyo kutabona ingwate ngo bakor@@ ane n’ibigo by’imari bigatuma bahera mu bukene Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko kuva muri 2017, abagore bari mu buhinzi badas@@ agurira isoko bag@@ abanutse bava kuri 6@@ 9.@@ 7% bagera kuri 6@@ 5.@@ 7% muri 2018 bakaba ari benshi ugereranyije n’abag@@ abo. Abagore bari mu matsinda yo kubitsa no kugur@@ izanya bageze kuri 80% bituma umubare w’abagore bagerwaho na serivise z’imari uzamuka ugera kuri 9@@ 2%, nubwo abak@@ orana na banki ukiri hasi ugereranyije n’abag@@ abo, aho bari kuri 3@@ 4% kuri 39@@ % by’@@ abagabo. Mutesi Van@@ ice, umuturage wo mu Murenge wa Tabag@@ we mu Karere ka Nyagatare, avuga ko umugore wo mu cyaro ahura n’ibibazo byinshi harimo kutagira uburenganzira ku mut@@ ungo. Avuga ko kenshi umugore iyo ashatse aza ak@@ icara mu mutungo w’umugabo bityo at@@ awug@@ iraho uburenganzira kuko kenshi baba batar@@ afatanyije kuw@@ ushaka. Avuga ko umugore ahinga yakw@@ eza imyaka akabanza kureba ko ih@@ aza umuryango, ndetse hagira is@@ ag@@ uka akay@@ ib@@ uz@@ waho uburenganzira. Ati “@@ Abagore barah@@ inga bak@@ eza ariko burya twe ubanza kureba ibih@@ agije umuryango. Iyo bis@@ ag@@ utse nta burenganzira ubig@@ iraho ahubwo umugabo ni we ugur@@ isha. Ikindi ntiw@@ akorana na banki kubera ko ntaho wak@@ ura ingwate kuko nta nzu cyangwa ubutaka bik@@ wandits@@ eho, kenshi uza usanga rw@@ uz@@ uye@@ ”. Mutesi Van@@ ice avuga ko hari n’abagore bahinga ariko ibyo b@@ ejeje bakaby@@ iken@@ uza ari uko baby@@ ibye kuko umugabo at@@ amuk@@ undira kubig@@ urisha. Abagore bakennye kurusha abandi 16 bor@@ ojwe amatungo magufi Agira ati “Iyo ushatse umugabo w’@@ amahane ur@@ itonda kugira ngo ud@@ aseny@@ a. W@@ eza imyaka way@@ ih@@ inze kenshi wenyine, ariko uk@@ ayig@@ urisha uy@@ ibye kuko umugabo ntiyag@@ ukundira kuko ngo ubutaka way@@ ih@@ inzeho ut@@ abuk@@ uye iw@@ any@@ u”. Ruk@@ and@@ ema Jacqueline avuga ko kenshi abagore bo mu cyaro bahura n’ubukene kubera ubuh@@ arik@@ e. Avuga ko umugabo abatunze ari abagore 5 batung@@ iwe mu butaka but@@ agera kuri kimwe cya kabiri cya heg@@ itar@@ i. Agira ati “@@ Ubuh@@ arike na bwo ni imbogam@@ izi, umugabo yansh@@ ak@@ iyeho abandi 4 twese duh@@ urira muri kimwe cya kabiri cya heg@@ itar@@ i. FIFA yahagaritse Perezida wa CAF imyaka itanu Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi (@@ FIF@@ A) r@@ yahagaritse Perezida w’Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’Amaguru muri Africa (C@@ AF@@ ), Ahmad Ahmad imyaka itanu mu bikorwa by’@@ umupira w’amaguru kubera ikoreshwa nabi ry’@@ umutungo. Ibi bihano byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 23 Ugushyingo 2020. Ahmad Ahmad ukomoka muri Madagascar yari aherutse gutangaza ko ashaka kongera kwiyamamariza kuyobora Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika ndetse uyu mwanya ukaba umuhesha kuba Visi Perezida wa FIF@@ A.@@ Amatora ya CAF ateganyijwe ku wa 12 Werurwe 2021 i R@@ aba@@ t muri Maroc. Itangazo ryashyizwe hanze na FIFA rivuga ko Komite Ng@@ enzuzi yayo yasanze “@@ Ahmad yarat@@ atiriye inshingano ze n’icyizere yag@@ ir@@ iwe, agatanga impano n’izindi ny@@ ungu, agakoresha nabi amafaranga ndetse agakoresha nabi umwanya afite wa Perezida wa CAF@@ .” Ahmad Ahmad yaciwe kandi hafi ibihumbi 200 by’amadorali y’@@ amande (@@ asaga miliyoni 19@@ 6 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda). Imyaka ine Ahmad Ahmad amaze ku buyobozi bwa CAF yaranzwe n’ibir@@ ego bim@@ ushinja gukoresha nabi umutungo n’imyitwarire mibi aho CAF ikorera i Cairo mu Misiri. Mu kwezi kwa Kamena 2019, Ahmad Ahmad yari yafatiwe mu Bufaransa ar@@ afungwa aho yari ari mu Hotel i Paris akurikiranyweho ibyaha bya ruswa. Yah@@ aswe ibibazo n’abashinzwe kurwanya ibyaha bya ruswa ndetse no kunyereza imitungo n’ imisoro (@@ les serv@@ ices de l’@@ Off@@ ice cent@@ r@@ al de l@@ ut@@ te cont@@ re la cor@@ rup@@ tion et les in@@ fr@@ act@@ ions fin@@ anc@@ iè@@ res et f@@ isc@@ ales ,@@ O@@ cl@@ if@@ ). Yar@@ ekuwe mu ijoro ryo ku wa Kane tariki 6 Kamena 2019 ari nawo munsi yari yafati@@ weho mu gitondo cy@@ awo. Icyo gihe Ahmad yari akurikiranyweho gutanga isoko mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko. Ni isoko ryaba ngo ryar@@ ambuwe kompanyi ya P@@ uma mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko hat@@ ubahirijwe amasezerano rig@@ ahabwa indi kompanyi yitwa Techn@@ ical Ste@@ el. Icyo gihe, Jeune Afrique yatangaje ko agera ku bihumbi Magana inani mirongo itatu by’amadorali ya Amerika (8@@ 30@@ .000 $@@ ), asaga gato miliyoni 750 FRW ariyo ngo yong@@ ereweho ngo hatang@@ we iryo soko ari nayo afatwa nka ruswa. Mu kwezi kwa Mata 2019, Ahmad Ahmad yari yatangaje ko ibyerekeye iryo soko byakozwe mu buryo buboneye kandi buny@@ uze mu buryo. Af@@ atirwa mu Bufaransa, hari hasigaye iminsi 15 hag@@ atangira irushanwa ry’igikombe cya Afurika cy’@@ ibihugu.

Menya Gr@@ a@@ ç@@ a Mach@@ el, wabaye umudamu w’@@ abakuru b’ibihugu bibiri bitandukanye Gr@@ a@@ ç@@ a Mach@@ el, ni umunyapolitiki wo muri Mozambique waciye agahigo ko kuba ari we mugore wash@@ atswe n’abakuru b’ibihugu bibiri batandukanye. Gr@@ a@@ ç@@ a ni umunyapolitiki umaze kubaka izina mu gihugu cye no ku mugabane wa Afurika dore ko yamaze igihe kirenga imyaka 10 ari Minisitiri w’uburezi n’umuco muri Mozambique, akaba yaran@@ akoze nk’@@ impuguke ku bibazo by’abana mu Muryango w’Abibum@@ bye. Ubusanzwe amazina yiswe n’ababyeyi ni Gr@@ a@@ ç@@ a S@@ imb@@ ine, nyuma yo kuvuka ku wa 17 Ukwakira 194@@ 5, Se amaze iminsi 17 yitabye Imana akaba ari umuh@@ ererezi mu bana batandatu. Uyu mugore wari usanzwe yitwa S@@ imb@@ ine yaje gufata izina rya Mach@@ el nyuma yo gushakana n’uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu cya Mozambique Sam@@ ora Mach@@ el, ku wa 19 ukwakira 197@@ 5 nyuma y’amezi atatu uyu mugabo agejeje iki gihugu ku bwig@@ enge. Nyuma y’imyaka 11 bari bamaze babana nk’umugore n’umug@@ abo, ku wa 19 Ukwakira mu 1986 Sam@@ ora Mach@@ el yaje kwitaba Imana azize impanuka y’indege yabereye mu misozi ya L@@ eb@@ ombo ku mupaka wa Mozambique na Afurika y’Epfo bituma Gr@@ a@@ ç@@ a ahabwa akazina ka Jackie Kennedy wa Afurika. Ibi byatewe n’uko Jackie Kennedy yari umugore w’@@ uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu wa Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika, bakaba bari bahuje ibyago byo gupfusha abagabo bakiri ku butegetsi. Sam@@ ola Mach@@ el yasigiye Gr@@ a@@ ç@@ a abana babiri ari bo Jos@@ ina na Mal@@ engane Nyuma y’urupfu rwa Sam@@ ora Mach@@ el, Gr@@ a@@ ç@@ a yamaze imyaka itanu yambara imyenda yir@@ abura nk’uburyo bwo kunamira umugabo we. Mu 1998, mu birori by’@@ ibanga Gr@@ a@@ ç@@ a yashy@@ ingiranywe na Nelson Mandela wayoboye Afurika y’Epfo akaza kwitaba Imana mu 2013, bim@@ ugira umugore wa gatatu w’uyu mukambwe nyuma ya Ev@@ ely@@ n W@@ ase na Winnie Mandela an@@ afata izina ‘@@ Mand@@ el@@ a’ guhera ubwo yitwa ‘@@ Gr@@ aca Mach@@ el Mand@@ el@@ a’. Ibitangazamakuru by@@ agarutse cyane ku rukundo rwa Mandela na Gr@@ aca Mach@@ el, kubera ikinyuranyo cy’imyaka cyarimo hagati yabo dore ko Mandela icyo gihe yari afite imyaka 80, Gr@@ a@@ ç@@ a akagira 5@@ 2. Gr@@ a@@ ç@@ a aganira n’ikinyamakuru The Guardian yavuze ko iki kiny@@ uranyo ntacyo cyari kim@@ ut@@ waye. Yagize ati “Nt@@ ago byari ikibazo. Abayobozi ba Niger baje kwiga ibanga u Rwanda rukoresha mu iterambere ryih@@ use Yanditswe kuya 17@@ -09-@@ 2014 saa 22:@@ 00@@ ' na Twizeyimana Fabrice Itsinda ry'@@ abayobozi bakuru bo muri Niger bari mu Rwanda kwigira ku nzego zitandukanye ibanga ry'@@ iterambere ryih@@ use u Rwanda ruri kugaragaza muri iki gihe. Aba bayobozi bayobowe n'@@ Abaminisitiri babiri n'abayobozi bo hejuru mu nzego zitandukanye muri iki gihugu basaga 12, bakiriwe na Minisitiri w'Intebe Anastase Murekezi kuri uyu wa Gatatu, bam@@ ushimira intambwe ikomeye igihugu kimaze gut@@ era. Itsinda ry'@@ abayobozi bakuru bo muri Niger bari mu Rwanda kwigira ku nzego zitandukanye ibanga ry'@@ iterambere ryih@@ use u Rwanda ruri kugaragaza muri iki gihe. Aba bayobozi bayobowe n'@@ Abaminisitiri babiri n'abayobozi bo hejuru mu nzego zitandukanye muri iki gihugu basaga 12, bakiriwe na Minisitiri w'Intebe Anastase Murekezi kuri uyu wa Gatatu, bam@@ ushimira intambwe ikomeye igihugu kimaze gut@@ era. Minisitiri w'@@ Ubucuruzi n'@@ Iterambere ry'@@ Abikorera muri Niger, Al@@ ma O@@ um@@ ar@@ ou uyoboye iri tsinda, yabwiye itangazamakuru ko u Rwanda rumaze kugira ubunararibonye mu miyoborere myiza n'@@ ubucuruzi, ku buryo igihugu cyabo kir@@ ubonamo umwarimu mwiza. Yagize ati "Tw@@ aje kwigira ku bunararibonye bw'u Rwanda mu bijyanye n'ubucuruzi … U Rwanda ni igihugu gikomeye muri Afurika mu bijyanye n'imiyoborere myiza kandi u Rwanda n'ib@@ irwa bya Maurice biza imbere mu koroshya ishoramari muri Afurik@@ a." Yakomeje agaragaza ko igihugu cye gis@@ anga inzego zubatse neza haba mu bijyanye n'@@ ubucuruzi, ubutabera, umutekano w'@@ imbere mu gihugu, n'ibindi basanga byafasha igihugu cyabo kwiz@@ ahura. Minisitiri w'@@ Ubucuruzi n'@@ Ing@@ anda, Francois Kan@@ imba, yagaragaje ko aba bashyitsi bari bany@@ otewe no kumenya ibanga u Rwanda rukoresha mu korohereza ishoramari, aho ubu u Rwanda ruri ku mwanya wa kabiri muri Afurika, ndetse by'umwihariko rukaba urwa mbere ku isi mu gukora ivugurura r@@ ifatika muri uru rwego. Kanimba yagaragaje bimwe mu byo u Rwanda rwas@@ izemo ibindi bihugu mu koroshya ishoramari, birimo koroshya ibijyanye no kwandika imitungo mu buryo bwihuse kandi burimo umutekano, kwihutisha impushya zo kubaka mu Mujyi wa Kigali hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga kandi bih@@ end@@ utse. Kuri ibi hiyongeraho ivug@@ urwa ry'@@ amategeko ajyanye n'@@ imisoro ku buryo itangwa mu mucyo kandi mu buryo bworoshye, mu gihe ahandi bag@@ ut@@ esha igihe kandi bakag@@ us@@ oresha n'iyo udakwiye gusora bitewe na ruswa n'izindi mpamvu. Kanimba ahamya ko mu nzego abayobozi ba Niger bas@@ uye, basobanuriwe ko ibyagezweho ari imbuto z'@@ imiyoborere myiza n'ubuyobozi bukomeye. BY@@ ongeye kandi ni ishema kuba hari abaf@@ atira isomo ku byiza u Rwanda rumaze kugeraho. Niger ni kimwe mu bihugu byateye imbere mu bijyanye n'ubw@@ ishing@@ izi, u Rwanda rug@@ ahamya ko ari kimwe mu byo rushobora kwiy@@ igir@@ aho. Iby’@@ aya mashusho yan@@ enzwe n’abatari bake ndetse bakan@@ amw@@ uka inabi (@@ Apôtre Gitw@@ az@@ a), kaje nyuma y’igihe gito nanone uyu muvugabutumwa yongeye kugarukwaho bamun@@ enga kwig@@ amba ko ari we muhanuzi wa mbere mu Rwanda no muri Afurika. Muri we azi ko abandi bose bad@@ asenga ariwe us@@ enga. Uko ni ukuri kwe yar@@ yam@@ yeho kandi afite igice cy’@@ ukuri kw@@ ako kuko as@@ enga, ariy@@ ir@@ iza, nt@@ akora icyaha kandi akunda Yesu. Abakora muri serivisi zo kuvura Ebola bagiye guhabwa urukingo rwayo ruri mu igeragezwa Minisiteri y’ubuzima mu Rwanda, itangaza ko abakora muri serivisi z’ubuvuzi babyifuza cyane cyane abakora mu bijyanye na Ebola, bagiye guhabwa urukingo rwayo ruri mu igeragezwa mu bihugu bitandukanye bya Afurika birimo na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. Mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe byo muri Afurika y’Iburengerazuba ndetse no muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, abaturage bamaze iminsi bahabwa urukingo rwa Ebola ruri mu igerag@@ ezwa. Mu Kiganiro ‘S@@ obanuk@@ ir@@ wa’ cy@@ anyuze kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda kuri iki cyumweru, Umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe ubuzima bw’ibanze muri Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, Dr Ndimub@@ anzi Patrick, yavuze ko uru rukingo ruz@@ an@@ ahabwa abanyarwanda baby@@ ifuza. Ati “Mur@@ abizi ko mu gihugu cy’abaturanyi cya Congo hari indwara ya Ebola, hari urukingo abantu bari gukoresha rwakoze no muri Afurika y’Ibur@@ engerazuba. Uru rukingo ntabwo rur@@ emezwa burundu rur@@ acyari mu igerag@@ ezwa, ariko ukuntu imibare ibigaragaza ni uko rur@@ inda abantu kwandura eb@@ ol@@ a.” Yar@@ akomeje ati “Iyo urukingo rukiri mu igeragezwa gutyo tur@@ utera umuntu wab@@ yemeye tumaze no kumus@@ obanurira tum@@ ubwira icyo tur@@ uz@@ iho, ingaruka zagaragaye nicyo rushobora kumur@@ inda. Niba ab@@ yemeye akar@@ ufata. Iby@@ ong@@ ibyo tugiye gutangira kuby@@ igisha hirya no hino […] twirinde ko icyorezo cya eb@@ ola cyagera mu gihugu n’urwo rukingo ababy@@ ifuza babe bashobora kuba baruh@@ abw@@ a.” Abaz@@ ahabwa uru rukingo ni abakora muri serivisi zituma bashobora guhura byoroshye n’umuntu urwaye eb@@ ola bityo akaba yab@@ and@@ uza, nk’@@ abakora mu kigo cyagenewe kwita by’umwihariko ku bafashwe n’iyo ndwara. Abajijwe niba hari inkingo zindi zijya zihabwa abanyarwanda ziri mu igerag@@ ezwa, Dr Ndimub@@ anzi yavuze ko kugeza ubu inkingo zose zikoreshwa mu Rwanda by’umwihariko izih@@ abwa abana, ari inkingo z@@ emejwe n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima n’ibigo mpuzamahanga by@@ ita ku buzima. Ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y’@@ At@@ urage “D@@ H@@ S@@ ” bwakozwe mu 2015, bwagaragaje ko abana 9@@ 3% bavuka mu Rwanda bahabwa inkingo 12 zose, kuva umwana ak@@ ivuka kugeza ku mwaka umwe n’igice. Hari n’@@ rukiko rwa kanseri ifata ink@@ ondo y’@@ umura ruhabwa abana b’abakobwa bafite hagati y’imyaka 10 -@@ 12. Umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe ubuzima bw’ibanze muri Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, Dr Ndimub@@ anzi Patrick, yavuze ko uru rukingo ruz@@ an@@ ahabwa abanyarwanda babyifuza [email protected]

Abacuruzi basabwe gukora iyo bwabaga ingwate Lt Gen Karenzi yasabwe ik@@ aboneka Urugaga rw'@@ Abikorera mu Rwanda (PS@@ F) rur@@ atangaza ko ubu rwatangiye ubukangurambaga budasanzwe mu Banyarwanda ariko cyane cyane abacur@@ uzi, kugira ngo amafaranga Lt Gen Karenzi Karake yaciwe n'Urukiko mu Bwongereza nk'@@ ingwate yo kuburana ari hanze abonek@@ e. Lt Gen KAR@@ ENZI yaciwe amafaranga arenga gato Miliyari y'@@ amanyarwanda n'Urukiko rwo mu Bwongereza, kugira ngo yemerewe gukurikiranwa ari hanze by'@@ agateganyo. Kuwa gatanu tariki 26 Kamena nibwo PSF yatangije ikigega "@@ ISH@@ EMA RY@@ AC@@ U@@ ' kigamije gukusanya amafaranga az@@ ifash@@ ih@@ s@@ wa mu kwishyura iyo ng@@ wate Lt Gen yac@@ iwe. PSF itangira icyo kig@@ ega, yavuze ko kigamije guhangana n'@@ agasuzuguro amahanga akomeje kugirira u Rwanda, nyuma gato y'@@ itabwa muri yombi rya Lt Gen Karenzi Karake ukuriye urwego rw'@@ Ubutasi mu Rwanda. Manzi yavuze ko abacuruzi by'umwihariko bah@@ amagarirwa gutanga umusanzu wabo muri icyo kig@@ ega, dore ko n'@@ ubusanzwe cyatangijwe ku gitekerezo cya bamwe mu bacur@@ uzi, ban@@ ahise bashyiramo amafaranga asaga Miliyoni 120 z'amany@@ arwanda. Manzi yakomeje avuga ko abacuruzi bakwiye gufata iya mbere mu gushyigikira igitekerezo cya bagenzi babo, abandi banyarwanda nabo bakab@@ ung@@ anira. Gusa, nubwo PSF nta munsi ntarengwa igaragaza cyo kuba yamaze gukusanya amafaranga yose asaga Miliyari y'@@ amany@@ arwanda, ivuga ko "@@ ari igikorwa cy@@ ihutirwa (@@ Ur@@ gent@@ ) abanyarwanda basabwa gushyigikira byihuse kuko h@@ ifuzwa ko kigira iherezo vuba@@ ." Muri Stade Amahoro nah@@ ar@@ irimbira ! Ikiganiro na Amb Habineza Joe wahoze ari Minisitiri Kuva kuwa Gatatu tariki 15 Nyakanga 2020, abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga batunguwe n’@@ integuza y’uko Ambasaderi Habineza Joseph [@@ Jo@@ e] agiye gushyira hanze indirimbo, bamwe babifata nk’@@ urwenya abandi baraby@@ ishimira. Ibitekerezo by@@ agar@@ ukaga ku kuba Amb Habineza ari umugabo waranzwe kandi ukir@@ angwa no gusabana n’abantu by’umwihariko urubyiruko ku buryo bit@@ abat@@ ungura baramutse bamubonye mu ndirimbo ari kuririmba. Amb Habineza Joe wabaye Minisitiri w’@@ Urubyiruko, Siporo n’@@ Umuco, kuri ubu ni Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’@@ Ubw@@ ishingizi cya Radi@@ ant Y@@ acu Lt@@ d. Amb Habineza avuga ko akiri umwana yakuriye muri korali na nyuma aza gucuranga muri Salus ari naho ahera avuga ko nta mpamvu yam@@ ubuza kuririmba cyane ko n’ubundi asanzwe yarigeze kuba umunyam@@ uz@@ iki. Reba hano ikiganiro twagiranye na Amb Joe Mu kiganiro yagiranye na UKW@@ EZ@@ I, yavuze ko hari abantu baje bamug@@ ezaho icyifuzo cy’uko bashobora gukorana indirimbo yumvise neza umushinga wabo asanga ari mwiza cyane nawe yemera gukorana nabo. Uyu mugabo uvuga ko yigeze no gukina mu ikinamico Urun@@ ana, atangaza ko hari ikintu abona hano mu Rwanda cy’abantu bad@@ aha agaciro abahanzi kandi nabo ari abanyarwanda ndetse bafite uruhare rukomeye mu gushimisha abantu no kub@@ igisha. Yakomeje agira ati “@@ Aha niho hari ikibazo ku banyarwanda, bakumva ko umuntu ukoze indirimbo cyangwa umuhanzi ari umuntu udafite ubuzima nk’@@ ubw’@@ abandi. Icyo kintu njyewe ndak@@ ibaz@@ a, ikibi ni uko nar@@ irimba ibintu bit@@ esha agaciro ariko niba mfite ubutumwa ngomba gutanga ni gute ntar@@ irimba ?” Amb Joseph avuga ko abahanzi ari abantu nk’abandi ariko usanga mu muryango Nyarwanda hari abat@@ umva ko abahanzi bafite agaciro n’uruhare rukomeye mu kubaka abanyarwanda. Ati “Ubu ko tujya mu rusengero kuko abantu baririmba ? Ugasanga umuntu agiye muri korali arar@@ imbye abantu bakamw@@ ubaha ariko yar@@ irimba indirimbo izajya kuri radio ukabona bamuhaye akat@@ o.” Yatanze urugero rw’@@ igihe yari Minisitiri ubwo yigeze kujya mu Buyap@@ ana abantu bag@@ acur@@ angirwa n’uwari Minisitiri w’Umuco muri Brez@@ il. Amb Habineza avuga ko kuririmba atari ibintu azakora nk’@@ akazi ariko igihe yumva yabonye uburyo ashobora no gukora izindi ndirimbo igihe cyose yumva bimur@@ imo. Abajijwe niba aramutse atumiwe mu gitaramo nk’umuntu uzaba afite indirimbo, Amb Habineza yavuze ko ari ibisanzwe kuko niba yar@@ ajyaga ku rubyiniro agiye kuvuga im@@ bwirwaruhame yumva nta cy@@ amubuza kujyaho agiye kuririmba. Ati “@@ Ko najyaga ku rubyiniro ngiye kuvuga im@@ bwir@@ war@@ uham@@ e, ahubwo se kuririmba sibyo byoroshye ? Nibyo nak@@ ubwiye ikibi ni ukuvuga ngo n@@ ishe akazi k@@ anjye, mu gihe iyo ndirimbo yam@@ fasha mu kazi kanjye no kuri Stade Amahoro nah@@ ar@@ irimbira ni uko Guma Guma it@@ agih@@ ari.” Habineza Joseph, yar@@ akoreye uruganda rwa Hein@@ ek@@ en i Kinshasa, mu 199@@ 4-@@ 1998, ndetse aza no kuba Umuyobozi ushinzwe ikoranabuhanga muri Hein@@ ek@@ en muri Nigeria, mu 199@@ 8-@@ 2000. Muri Nzeri 2004 kugeza muri Gashyantare 2011 yabaye Minisitiri w’@@ Urubyiruko, Siporo n’@@ Umuco, mu 201@@ 1@@ - 2014 agirwa Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Nigeria aho yavuye ajya kwihangira imirimo aza gushinga urug@@ anda. Iz@@ ingiro ry’@@ ubwiyongere bw’@@ ind@@ emb@@ e: Kw@@ itiranya ibicurane bisanzwe n’ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 (Video) Imibare y’@@ abandura n’abah@@ itanwa na Coronavirus mu Rwanda ir@@ iyongera ubut@@ itsa ndetse byanatumye igihugu cy@@ ongera ubushobozi bwo kwita ku nd@@ embe zayo. Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abarwayi 500 ba Coronavirus bar@@ embye cyane. Umuntu avugwa ko ari indembe iyo afite ikibazo cyo guhumeka ku buryo amaraso adat@@ embera neza mu mubiri. An@@ agira umuriro no gucika intege cyane, kuribwa mu ngingo n’ibindi birimo gukor@@ ora. Kwita ku nd@@ embe za COVID-19 bisaba ubushobozi buhambaye kuko dufashe nk’@@ urugero hari abarwayi bagiye bakenera litiro icumi z’@@ umwuka ku munota kugira ngo babashe guhum@@ eka. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yahishuye ko imwe mu mpamvu zatumye imibare y’abar@@ embye kubera COVID-19 yiyongera ndetse n’abah@@ itanwa na yo bakarushaho kuba benshi, ari uko hari abantu benshi bit@@ ir@@ anyije ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 n’ib@@ icur@@ ane bisanzwe, bigatuma babis@@ uzugura bagat@@ inda kujya kwivuza. Umuvugizi wa Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, Julien Mahoro Niy@@ ing@@ ab@@ ira, yavuze ko kubera ko muri aya mezi hasanzwe n’ubundi hagaragara ibicurane bisanzwe (@@ gr@@ ip@@ p@@ e), byatumye hari abagira ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 bakab@@ is@@ uzug@@ ura. Yagize ati “Iki gihe ubusanzwe gikunze kubamo ibicurane bisanzwe, ibyo rero byatumye abenshi babis@@ uzug@@ ura, bak@@ amara igihe kinini bat@@ agiye kwa muganga kwisuzumisha kubera ko ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 by@@ enda gusa neza n’ib@@ y’ib@@ icur@@ ane bisanzwe bikunze kugaragara muri aya mez@@ i.” Yongeyeho ati “Kuba rero ari igihe gisanzwe kiz@@ wiho kubamo ibicurane bisanzwe bikaba byaratumye benshi bajya kwa muganga bak@@ erewe, byatumye umubare w’@@ abarwayi ba COVID-19 bar@@ embye cyane w@@ iyongera, binatuma tugira umubare munini w’@@ abit@@ aba Imana.” Niy@@ ing@@ abira yavuze ko kuba har@@ afashwe icyemezo cyo gushyira Umujyi wa Kigali muri Guma mu rugo, ari uko imibare y’@@ abandura yari hejuru cyane kuko yari ikubye inshuro ebyiri imibare y’@@ abandura ahasigaye hose mu gihugu. Yongeyeho ko Umujyi wa Kigali wagombaga gushyir@@ irwaho ingamba zihariye zigamije gukumira ko ubwandu bwar@@ ushaho gukwirakw@@ ira. Ati “Mu Mujyi wa Kigali hashyizweho gahunda ya Guma mu rugo, abantu bakwiye kumva ko iyo d@@ ushyizeho Guma mu rugo cyangwa iyo tug@@ abanyije ingendo z’@@ abantu, bigira uruhare rukomeye kuko bituma abanduye bad@@ akwirakwiza ubwandu mu band@@ i.” Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima (RB@@ C), Dr Sabin Nsanz@@ imana, aherutse gutangaza ko mu bipimo bimaze iminsi bifatwa byagaragaye ko ab@@ angana na 16@@ % y’@@ abap@@ imwa baba bar@@ anduye COVID-19 bakar@@ inda bay@@ ikira bat@@ abim@@ enye, ariko bakaba bashobora kuba bar@@ and@@ uje benshi muri icyo gihe bari bar@@ waye. Umuganga ukora cyane mu bikorwa byo gupima COVID-19, Ig@@ iraneza Debor@@ ah, yatanze ubutumwa bw’uko buri muntu wese akwiye kurushaho kwirinda kuko nta wamenya u@@ wanduye cyangwa utar@@ anduye. Yagize ati “@@ COVID-19 ntabwo ibon@@ eshwa ijish@@ o, ntushobora kubona umuntu ngo umenye niba ayir@@ waye cyangwa at@@ ayir@@ waye, ni yo mpamvu ugomba kwirinda. Buri muntu wese ntabwo yap@@ imwe, buri wese rero ashobora gusanga yar@@ anduye kandi ntiw@@ apfa kubimeny@@ a, ushobora no gusanga umwe mu bo mubana yar@@ and@@ uye, abantu rero bagomba kwirinda kuko nt@@ uzi ukw@@ egereye uko ahag@@ az@@ e.” Imibare ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima igaragaza ko icyiciro gikunze kugaragaramo umubare munini w’@@ aband@@ ura, ari abari hagati y’imyaka 20 na 4@@ 9, ahanini ngo kuko ari bo bantu bakunda kugenda cyane, baba bajya mu mirimo cyangwa ahandi. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iheruka gutangaza ko mu Rwanda nta mubare munini w’@@ indembe kandi n’@@ izih@@ ari zit@@ abwaho zig@@ akira zig@@ at@@ aha. Muri icyo gihe mu Bitaro byo mu Gatenga na Nyarugenge bijyan@@ wamo abarwayi bafite ibibazo bikomeye has@@ ezerewe abantu 45. Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda, imibare igaragaza ko kugeza ku wa 25 Mutarama 2021, abanduye COVID-19 bose bagera ku 13@@ 3@@ 11, muri bo abakir@@ waye bakaba 4@@ 45@@ 3, mu gihe ab@@ itabye Imana ari 17@@ 7. Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umur@@ iro. Y@@ andura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’@@ ubuhumekero. Mu gukomeza kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kwitwararika no kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Leta hitabwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’@@ isab@@ une, kwirinda imih@@ uro itari ngombwa no kwambara udupfukamunwa n’@@ amazuru mu gihe umuntu avuye mu rugo cyangwa ahuye n’abantu benshi. Inzego z’ubuzima z@@ itangaza ko ubwiyongere bw’@@ indembe za COVID-19 b@@ ufitanye isano n’umubare munini w’@@ abit@@ iranya ibicurane bisanzwe n’ibimenyetso by’iki cyorezo. Aba barwayi ni zimwe mu nd@@ embe zir@@ wariye mu Bitaro bya Nyarugenge

Iki kibazo cyag@@ aragajwe ubwo hasozwaga amarushanwa yo gusoma yitabiriwe n’abanyeshuri baturutse mu bigo 45 byo muri Kigali, ariko ugasanga aba@@ bashije kugera ku cyiciro cya nyuma abenshi ari abo mu bigo byig@@ enga. Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage, Muhongerwa Patric@@ ia, yavuze ko ibigo by’amashuri ya leta bigiye gukurikir@@ anirwa hafi, kuko ibitabo bihabwa hagam@@ ije kwimakaza umuco wo gusoma no kwandika bid@@ akoreshwa neza. Yagize ati “Nubwo Minisiteri y’uburezi id@@ ahwema gutanga ibitabo mu mashuri ngo bishyir@@ we mu mas@@ omero y’@@ abanyeshuri, hari ikibazo cy’uko hari abarezi bad@@ atanga ibi bitabo ngo bikoresh@@ we uko bikwiriye ahubwo bagahitamo kubih@@ unika mu mak@@ ar@@ ito aho guhabwa abana ngo babis@@ ome, ban@@ akurikiran@@ we.” Yavuze ko ingaruka zo kud@@ asoma ibitabo ari nyinshi ari ho usanga urubyiruko rur@@ angiza kaminuza rudafite ubumenyi bw@@ atanga umusaruro ku isoko ry’@@ umurimo, rut@@ an@@ abasha kuvugira mu ruhame. Muhongerwa avuga ko igisubizo cyo kwimakaza umuco wo gusoma mu bigo ari byo big@@ ifite, kikaba ari cyo cyah@@ erwaho mu gufashwa kuw@@ im@@ akaz@@ a. Amarushanwa yo gusoma ategurwa buri mwaka n’@@ Umuj@@ y@@ iwa Kigali yatangiye mu 2014. Abat@@ sinze uyu mwaka mu gukora ibiganiro mp@@ aka, gusoma no kwandika bazah@@ emberwa mu nama y’uburezi yaguye yo ku rwego rw’@@ Umujyi wa Kigali iteganyijwe mu kwezi gutaha. Umuryango w'@@ abayisilamu mu Rwanda wah@@ ishuye it@@ ekinika ukora mu bajya mu mut@@ ambagiro i M@@ aka Ngo bibasaba guhindura imibare kugira ngo batab@@ uzwa kwinj@@ i@@ ara i M@@ aka Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu taliki ya 9 Ukuboza 2015 ubwo abayisilamu bavuye mu mut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu bahabwaga ibyemezo by'@@ ishim@@ we,@@ umuryango w'@@ abayisilamu mu Rwanda wagaragaje uburyo ut@@ ekinika imibare y'@@ abajya mu mut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu (H@@ ij@@ j@@ a) kugira ngo igihugu cya Arabia sa@@ ud@@ ite kitaz@@ ababuza kuw@@ itabira. Muri iyi nama umuryango w'@@ abayis@@ iramu mu Rwanda watangaje ko kugeza ubu ikibazo uyu muryango ufite gikom@@ eye,@@ ndetse gishobora no kuz@@ ambura abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda uburenganzira bwo kujya mu mut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu ari uburyo bagend@@ amo iyo bajya I Me@@ qu@@ e. Muf@@ uti w'u Rwanda Kayitare Ibrahim yavuze ko igihugu cya Arabiya sa@@ ud@@ ite cy@@ emereye umuryango w'@@ abayis@@ iramu mu Rwanda kujya ujyana abayisilamu 120 mu gihe cy'@@ umut@@ ambagiro mut@@ agatifu, babura uyu muryango ukaba wah@@ agarikwa gutwara abantu mu mut@@ ambagiro mut@@ agatifu. Kuba uyu mubare w'@@ abayisilamu 120 bemerewe kujyana mu mut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu bat@@ awug@@ ez@@ aho,@@ bituma umuryango w'@@ abayisilamu murwanda wemera gut@@ ekinika kugira ngo utaz@@ ab@@ uzwa kwerekeza ku butaka but@@ agatifu. Mufti k@@ ayit@@ are asobanura uko umuryango w'@@ abayisilamu mu Rwanda ubig@@ enza, yavuze ko nko mu mwaka ushize bajyanye abayisilamu bagera kuri 80 ariko uyu muryango ukaba war@@ ishy@@ uriye ibisabwa abayisilamu 120 ikintu avuga ko gikomeza kubateza igih@@ ombo. Sheikh Kayitare Ibrahim yagize ati:"@@ Iyo tut@@ agejeje ku bantu 120 kiriya gihugu cy@@ atw@@ em@@ ereye, abandi bose basigaye turab@@ ishyur@@ ira. Urugero iyo abantu biyandikishije tukabona nk'abantu 80 hak@@ abura abantu 40 icyo gihe mu kwishyura service zose zisabwa tw@@ ishyurira abantu 120 urumva ko abo 40 bo tub@@ ishyurira kandi bad@@ ahar@@ i." Kuba umubare w'@@ abayisilamu umuryango w'@@ abayisilamu mu Rwanda ujyana mu mut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu ukiri hasi, abayisilamu bavuga ko biterwa n'uko abayisilamu bamwe bagenda n'izindi kompanyi zitari iz'@@ umuryango w'@@ abayis@@ iramu mu Rwanda, bityo bakaba bagirana inama yo kujya bagendera hamwe kugira ngo u Rwanda rut@@ azagera aho rus@@ ibwa mu bihugu by@@ itabira umut@@ ambagiro mut@@ agatifu. Sheikh Abdoul Kal@@ im Harerimana we asaba abayisilamu kujya bagendera hamwe mu gihe bagiye mu mut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu kugira ngo bongere ubumwe kuko ari byo bizatuma abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda bakomeza guhabwa agaciro. Sheikh Abdoul kal@@ im Harerimana yagize ati:"@@ Umuryango w'@@ abayisilamu mu Rwanda ufite ubushobozi bwo gutwara abantu bageze no ku gih@@ umb@@ i,@@ numvaga rero icyiza ari uko twajya tug@@ endera hamwe turi bamwe kuko nibyo byaba byiza kurush@@ ah@@ o" Abayisilamu barasabwa kujya bagendera hamwe kugira ng@@ i imibare y'abas@@ abwa ibashe kuzura Sheikh Tam@@ ir Murangwa ushinzwe ibikorwa byo gutegurira abayisilamu umut@@ ambagiro mut@@ agatifu, avuga ko mu rwego rwo kugira ngo abayisilamu bajye bagendera hamwe, uyu muryango wam@@ anuye ibiciro kugira ngo abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda bajye bagendera hamwe. Mu mwaka w'@@ 196@@ 8 nibwo abanyarwanda batangiye kwitabira umut@@ ambagiro mut@@ agatifu, ariko bakajya bagenda banyuze mu gihugu cya Uganda, ariko mu mwaka wa 2007 baza kwig@@ obotora kugendera mu kwaha kwa Uganda, batangira kugenda bazam@@ uye ibendera ry'u Rwanda. Gusa ngo kuri ubu bakaba bahangayikishijwe n'uko bashobora kuz@@ amburwa ubwo burenganzira bitewe n'uko uburyo bw'@@ imigend@@ ere but@@ an@@ oze bushobora kuzatuma umubare bemerewe ubura bityo bakaba bashobora guhagarikwa kujya gusengera ku butaka but@@ agatifu i Mec@@ qu@@ e.
Abashakashatsi bagomba kugira uruhare mu iterambere ry'igihugu -@@ Dr Musafiri Dr Musafiri Pap@@ i@@ as, umuyobozi w'ishami rya Kaminuza y'u Rwanda ryigisha ubucuruzi n'ubukungu (C@@ oll@@ ege of Business and Econom@@ ic@@ s), aratangaza ko abash@@ akash@@ akashatsi bagomba kugira uruhare mu iterambere ry'@@ ibihugu byabo, bakan@@ agira uruhare mu iterambere ry'@@ akarere batuyemo muri rusange. Ibi Dr Musafiri yabitangaje ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 05 Gicurasi 2015 ubwo hatangizwaga inama mpuzamahanga y'iminsi itatu y'@@ abashakashatsi baturutse mu mpande zose z'@@ isi, aho bateganya kuz@@ aganira ku bushakashatsi bakoze ku iterambere ry'ubukungu n'@@ ubucuruzi, mu bihugu bigize Afurika y'ubur@@ asirazuba. Dr Musafiri atangaza ko abashakashatsi bagomba kugira uruhare mu iterambere ry'@@ ibihugu byabo. Dr Musafiri yatangaje ko haramutse habaye imikoranire no guhuza hagati y'@@ abashakashatsi cyane cyane mu by'ubukungu n'imibereho hamwe n'abag@@ ena politiki z'@@ ubukungu mu bihugu bigize akarere k'@@ Afurika y'ubur@@ asirazuba, hagaragara iterambere rifite ireme muri ibyo bihugu. Yagize ati "@@ Kubera icyuho cy@@ akunze kugaragara hagati y'@@ abashakashatsi mu by'ubukungu hamwe n'abag@@ ena politike z'@@ ubukungu n'iterambere mu bihugu, izo politike zikunze kud@@ ashingira ku bintu byaturutse mu bush@@ akashatsi. Ugasanga inzego zikora ubushakashatsi ari nka za kaminuza, ibyo zikora ntaho bihuriye n'abag@@ ena izo politike mu buryo but@@ andukanye@@ ". Abat@@ eguye iyi nama iri kubera muri Kaminuza y'u Rwanda, ishami ry'@@ ubucuruzi n'@@ ubukungu. Dr Musafiri yakomeje avuga ko icyo cyuho kiv@@ uyeho abag@@ ena izo politike bag@@ ashingira ku bimenyetso bifatika byavuye mu bushakashatsi nta kabuza iterambere r@@ yakw@@ ihut@@ a, kandi rik@@ ag@@ aragarira buri wese muri ibi bihugu bigize akarere ka Afurika y'ubur@@ asirazuba. Muri iyi nama izamara iminsi itatu, abashakashatsi bo ku isi hose baz@@ aganira ku mbogamizi ubukungu n'ubucuruzi bifite mu bihugu byo mu karere, barebe buri gihugu icyo cyakw@@ igira ku kindi ku bijyanye n'iterambere mu bukungu n'@@ ubucuruzi, kugira ngo baz@@ akur@@ emo ingamba bageza ku bag@@ ena politike z'@@ ubukungu n'ubucuruzi mu bihugu byabo. Dr Musafiri yanatangaje kandi ko nyuma y'iyi nama bazan@@ ashyiraho ihuriro ry'@@ aba bash@@ akashatsi, kugira ngo baz@@ akomeze gukora ubushakashatsi ku bibazo bizah@@ aje ubukungu haba mu Rwanda ndetse no mu bihugu bigize akarere, kugira ngo bush@@ ingir@@ weho n'abashinzwe gushyiraho politike z'@@ ubukungu n'iterambere mu bihugu mu guhangana n'ibyo bibazo. Roger Marc Rut@@ ind@@ ukan@@ amur@@ ego

Abitabiriye inama ku bur@@ inganire bw’@@ ibitsina byombi bishimiye Isange Itsinda ry’abantu 25 baturutse mu bihugu bya Afurika bari mu Rwanda mu nama mpuzamahanga aho barebera hamwe uko bateza imbere uburinganire hagati y’abagabo n’abagore, ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 3 Ugushyingo basuye ikigo Isange One Stop Center gikorera mu bitaro bya Kacyiru, aho baje kwirebera uko u Rwanda rw@@ ish@@ ats@@ emo ibisubizo mu gukumira kurwanya no gufasha abak@@ orewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina n’ir@@ ikorerwa abana. Aba bashyitsi bakigera ku Isange One Stop Center, bakiriwe n’Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda wungirije, Chief Supt of Police (C@@ SP) Ly@@ nd@@ er Nkur@@ anga, ababwira amav@@ u n’@@ amavuko yacyo, an@@ abat@@ embereza mu byumba bik@@ ig@@ ize, ari nako basobanurirwa serivise zitangwa n’ iki kigo z@@ irimo, guha uw@@ akorewe ihohoterwa ubufasha mu by’ ubuvuzi, ubutabera ndetse n’ ubuj@@ yan@@ ama. CSP Nkuranga yababwiye ko mu gihugu hose hamaze kugezwa ibigo nk’ibi 4@@ 4, aho yavuze ati:”@@ Ub@@ ufasha bwose buhabwa ug@@ annye ibi bigo burimo abuh@@ abwa ku buntu, kandi ikiza ni uko Serivisi zose akenera az@@ ibonera ahantu ham@@ we.” Nyuma y’aho Tad@@ esse Eng@@ ida ukomoka muri Ethiopia yavuze ko intego y’urugendo rwabo ari ukw@@ igira ku kigo Isange kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina kuko ari ikigo kizwi ku Isi mu kurwanya ibi byaha no gufasha ababikor@@ ewe, akaba yagize ati:”@@ U Rwanda ni igihugu cyam@@ enyekanye ku Isi yose kubera imbaraga cyashyize mu gukumira no kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina. T@@ wamenye ko Ikigo Isange ari bumwe mu buryo u Rwanda rwashyizeho mu guhangana n’ibyo byaha no gufasha ababikor@@ ewe. Ni muri urwo rwego twaje kureba uko Isange ikora, bityo tuz@@ avug@@ ane n’abayobozi b’ibihugu byacu barebe ko bashyiraho ibigo nk’ib@@ i.” Mugenzi we Ruk@@ iya Mohamed wo muri Sudani y’Epfo yavuze ati:”@@ Tub@@ onye ubushake bwo guhuriza hamwe inzego zose zishinzwe gukumira no kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina bw’@@ abayobozi b’u Rwanda, ubunararibonye duk@@ uye mu Rwanda, but@@ w@@ eretse ko gukorera hamwe kw’@@ inzego zose byagize ingaruka nziza mu kurwanya ibi byaha no gufasha ababikor@@ ewe, kandi ibindi bihugu bya Afurika bifite byinshi byakw@@ igira ku Rwanda”. Mbere yaho mu gitondo, CSP Nkuranga yari yakiriye intumwa zo muri Polisi yo mu gihugu cya Suède nazo zas@@ uye iki kigo, zari ziyobowe na Insp@@ ect@@ or, Th@@ ereza Sk@@ og@@ bun@@ d Sh@@ okar@@ ab@@ i. Nawe yashimye uko Isange yita k’@@ uw@@ akorewe ihohoterwa aho yavuze ati:”@@ Ibyo mbonye ni ingenzi cyane, biragaragara ko u Rwanda ruri ku isonga mu guteza imbere uburinganire n’@@ ubutab@@ era.” Abitabiriye iyi nama basuye Isange one st@@ op cent@@ er Iki kigo (@@ Isang@@ e) cyashyizweho muri 2010, ku bufasha bwa Nyakubahwa Madame wa Perezida, Jeanette Kagame, n’@@ Ihuriro ry’@@ Amash@@ ami y’Umuryango w’@@ Ab@@ ib@@ imbye akorera mu Rwanda (@@ One UN@@ ). Isange itanga serivise z’@@ ubutabazi mu rwego rwo kurinda uwah@@ ohotewe gutwara inda, imiti irinda ubwandu bwa SIDA, ubufasha mu kwirinda indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina n’ubundi buv@@ uzi. Isange kandi yohereza mu bitaro bikuru iyo hakenewe ubuvuzi bwih@@ ariye, serivisi z’@@ ubuganga buk@@ enerwa mu map@@ ererez@@ a, ubuj@@ yanye n’imy@@ ibaruk@@ ire, ubuvuzi bw’@@ indwara zo mu mutwe, icumbi mu rwego rw’@@ umutekano na serivise zo gusubiza abantu mu buzima busanzwe. Muri raporo ya Global G@@ ender Ga@@ p 2017 yasohotse kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 3 Ugushyingo, U Rwanda rwaje ku mwanya wa kane ku Isi, n’uwa mbere muri Afurika mu kuziba icyuho mu bur@@ inganire hagati y’abagabo n’abag@@ ore.
Nyaruguru: Umugabo yasanzwe imbere y’urugo rwe yapfuye Umugabo witwa Jean Damascene M@@ por@@ amusanga wo mu Kagari ka Ruh@@ inga, Umurenge wa Nyabimata mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, yasanzwe imbere y’urugo rwe yapfuye, nyuma y’@@ amakimbirane yari yaraye ag@@ iranye n’umugore we Nyir@@ abuk@@ ara Od@@ ett@@ e. Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyabim@@ ata, Rudasingwa Aphrod@@ is, yemereye Kigali Today ko uyu mugabo koko yasanzwe imbere y’@@ iwe mu rugo yapfuye, gusa avuga ko nta wakw@@ emeza ko yishwe n’umugore we. Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko amakuru y’urupfu rwa M@@ por@@ amusanga ba@@ yamenye ahagana saa sita kuri uyu wa mbere, bagahita bihutira kujyayo nk’ubuyobozi hamwe n’inzego z’umutekano. Rudasingwa avuga ko bakih@@ agera basanze uwo mugabo yapfuye, ariko ko nta gikom@@ ere na kimwe bamus@@ anganye ku mubiri. Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko umugore wa nyakwigendera hamwe n’abana batari bahari, kuko abana bakuru bari bagiye kwiga, naho umut@@ o yajyanye na nyina. Yavuze kandi ko baganiriye n’umugore wa nyakwigend@@ era, akababwira ko kuva mu gitondo umugabo yam@@ ubwiraga ko yumva arwaye, akamusaba kujya kwa muganga ariko undi akaby@@ anga avuga ko az@@ ajyayo ejo. Amakuru aturuka mu baturanyi b’uyu muryango aravuga ko uwo mugabo hari aba@@ mubonye mu gitondo arimo y@@ ota izuba aho yag@@ uye. Icyakora andi makuru avuga ko uyu muryango wari umaze iminsi mu makimbirane yaturutse ku mafaranga y’inka bag@@ urish@@ ije, ariko umugabo akay@@ any@@ wera yose akay@@ amar@@ a. Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyabimata Aphrodis Rudas@@ ingwa, na we yemeje aya makuru, avuga ko uwo muryango wari war@@ arag@@ ije inka umuntu, ariko akaza kubabwira ko atag@@ ishoboye kuyit@@ aho. Nyuma y’ibyo ngo haje gufatwa umwanzuro wo kuyig@@ urisha bag@@ abana amafaranga, maze umuryango wa M@@ por@@ amusanga uhabwa amafaranga ibihumbi 80 by’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, ari na yo bivugwa ko yany@@ w@@ ereye akay@@ amar@@ a. Kuva uwo mugabo yabona ayo mafaranga ngo ntiy@@ ongeye kugaruka mu rugo, kugeza ku cyumweru tariki 01 Werurwe 2020, ubwo umugore we yamus@@ angaga mu kabari mu gas@@ antere bat@@ uranye. Uwo muyobozi avuga ko ku k@@ y@@ umweru tariki ya 01 Werurwe 2020, umugore wa M@@ por@@ amusanga yamusanze mu gas@@ antere kari hafi y’aho batuye, akam@@ ubaza aho yashyize amafaranga, ariko agasanga nta yo afite, gusa nyuma y’uko abaturage bab@@ umvikan@@ ishije umugabo yari yemeye ko yari kumuha ibihumbi 20 kuri uyu wa mbere saa kumi n’im@@ we. Abaturage bavuga ko muri uko kugirana amakimbirane, umugore ngo yabwiye umugabo ko "@@ uko any@@ wera ayo mafaranga yan@@ azig@@ ama ayo kugura isanduku yo kumushy@@ u@@ ing@@ uram@@ o". Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, CIP Twaj@@ amahoro Sylv@@ est@@ re, na we yemeje amakuru y’urupfu rwa M@@ por@@ amus@@ anga. CIP Twaj@@ amahoro yavuze ko umurambo wa nyakwigendera w@@ asanzwe imbere y’@@ iwe, ariko hakaba nta kimenyetso kigaragaza icyaba cy@@ amw@@ ishe. Yavuze ko ubu hatangiye iperereza ngo hamenyekanye icyaba cyateye uru rupf@@ u, mu bakor@@ waho iperereza hakaba harimo n’umugore wa nyakwigend@@ era. CIP Twaj@@ amahoro kandi na we yavuze ku makimbirane yari ari hagati y’uyu muryango, avuga ko na we amakuru afite ari uko ku cyumweru bari bat@@ onganye bapfa amafaranga. Umurambo wajyanywe ku Bitaro bya Munini mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, kugira ngo us@@ uz@@ umwe. MENYA UMWANDITSI Charles Ruzindana Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ Charl@@ es@@ RUZIND@@ A@@ 2

REBA H@@ ASI B@@ IMWE MU B@@ ITEKEREZO B@@ YA B@@ AMWE MU BAK@@ URIKIRA KURI IN@@ ST@@ AG@@ RA@@ M K@@ AT@@ E B@@ ASH@@ AB@@ E:
Si abaturage gusa, n’abayobozi barad@@ ohotse ku mabwiriza yo kwirinda Covid-19 - Meya Gash@@ ema Umuyobozi w’agateganyo w’Akarere ka Nyaruguru, Gash@@ ema Janvier, avuga ko atari abaturage gusa bad@@ ohotse ku kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 ahubwo n’abayobozi bad@@ ohotse ari byo bituma imib@@ re y’@@ abarwayi y@@ iyongera. Akarere ka Nyaruguru k@@ ahagurukiye kubahiriza ingamba zo kwirinda Covid-19 Yabig@@ arutseho mu kiganiro yagiranye na Radio Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 31 Werurwe 2021, avuga ku ngamba nshya akarere gafite nyuma y’uko ingendo guhera saa moya z’ijoro zib@@ ujijwe. Gash@@ ema avuga ko mu mirenge 14 igize akarere barimo gushishikariza abaturage kubahiriza amabwiriza ajyanye no kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19. Ikindi ni uko ubuyobozi bwose burimo guk@@ ebura abaturage aho abashobora gutanduk@@ ira ku bijyanye n’am@@ abwiriza. Avuga ko kuva COVID-19 yagera mu Rwanda, mu Karere ka Nyaruguru hamaze kugaragara abarwayi barenga 1@@ 20, abaturage 50 bakaba bakir@@ wariye mu ngo zabo, babiri bari kwa muganga abandi bakaba bari mu bigo biny@@ uzwamo abantu by’igihe gito (@@ Trans@@ it Cent@@ er), naho batandatu bakaba aribo bamaze guhitanwa n’icyo cyorezo. Avuga ko ug@@ aragaweho uburwayi ah@@ erekezwa akag@@ ezwa mu rugo yaba abana n’abandi bag@@ apimwa kugira ngo barebe ko nabo bat@@ anduye hanyuma bagahabwa amabwiriza y’uko bagomba kwit@@ wara. Gash@@ ema avuga ko ku bag@@ aragaweho uburwayi kandi aribo bari batunze ingo zabo kandi bigaragara ko nta bundi bush@@ obozi, akarere k@@ abafasha kubona ibibat@@ unga ndetse n’ibindi bikoresho by’@@ isuku. Agira ati “Hari abo usanga bafite amikoro makeya kandi yenda ugasanga uwo muntu ariwe wari utunze umuryango kandi ntagomba gusohoka kugira ngo at@@ anduza abandi, nk’@@ akarere tubag@@ eraho tuk@@ abag@@ enera ibibat@@ unga ku munsi n’ibindi bikoresho byangombwa byaba iby’@@ isuku ndetse n’ib@@ imufasha kugira ngo COVID-19 itam@@ uzah@@ aza kandi akire vuba@@ ”. Yongeraho ko ibyo bikorwa byose babikora bafatanyije n’inzego z’ubuzima ndetse n’iz’@@ ibanze kugira ngo uwo murwayi akire vuba kandi at@@ and@@ uje abandi. Ikindi ngo batangiye kubahiriza amabwiriza mashya kandi yizeye ko abaturage bazay@@ ashyira mu bikorwa kuko ngo bumvira ubuyobozi. Avuga ko atari abaturage gusa bad@@ ohotse ku mabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19, ahubwo n’ubuyobozi bw@@ ad@@ ohot@@ se. Ati “Nta n’ubwo byakw@@ itwa kud@@ ohoka gusa yenda ku baturage, tuvug@@ ishije ukuri twakw@@ emeranya ko inzego natwe twagiye tud@@ ohoka ari na byo nsaba abayobozi dufatanya kuyobora Akarere ka Nyaruguru, nk’uko nabivuze kare, nta kibazo abaturage bafite mu kubahiriza amabwiriza mu gihe twab@@ ibukije kensh@@ i”. Gash@@ ema avuga ko ahantu hat@@ umye indwara ik@@ wira ari abag@@ endaga bat@@ ambaye neza agapfukamunwa n’abak@@ ibag@@ irwa, kud@@ ahana intera ndetse n’abari bar@@ ahinduye ingo zabo ut@@ ubar@@ i. Ar@@ asaba abaturage gukomeza imirimo yabo ariko bambara neza agapf@@ ukamunwa, bag@@ ahana intera ariko bakan@@ ibuka ko isaha ya saa moya bagomba kuba bageze mu ngo zabo. Ar@@ an@@ ashishikariza kandi abik@@ ekaho ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 kwihutira kujya kwa muganga hakiri kare kugira ngo nibas@@ anga yanduye afashwe atar@@ anduza abandi. Ikindi ni uko abayobozi aribo bab@@ anziriza abaturage mu isoko kugira ngo bas@@ ange hashyizwe uburyo bwose butuma binjira neza kandi amasoko ahuza abantu benshi ahuriramo ibicuruzwa bitandukanye, kuba bimwe by@@ acur@@ uzwa mu gitondo ibindi amasaha y’@@ amanywa cyangwa bimwe mu bicuruzwa bik@@ imurirwa ku w’@@ undi munsi. Waba uzi isano Ubun@@ ane b@@ ufitanye n'iby@@ anditswe by@@ era? Ubusanzwe ku itariki ya 1@@ Mutarama buri mwaka hafi ku isi yose hizihizwa umunsi w'@@ itangira ry'@@ umwaka mushya (@@ Ubun@@ an@@ e), aho abantu baba bishimira ko barangije umwaka mu mahoro ndetse ban@@ atangiye undi mu mahoro. Uyu munsi w'@@ Ubun@@ ane wizihizwa kuri iyi tariki ya Mbere, n'@@ abakoresha ingengabihe (c@@ al@@ end@@ ar@@ ) ya Greg@@ oire ndetse na Julien uhereye mu myaka myinshi ishize. Mu muco wa kera w'@@ abar@@ om@@ ani, itariki ya mbere Mutarama buri mwaka kuva mu mwaka wa 15@@ 3 mbere y'@@ ivuka rya Yezu, yabaga ari itariki ya kuramya ibigirwamana byabo muri icyo gihe. Mu mwaka wa 42 mbere y'@@ ivuka rya Yezu, iyi tariki yabaye itariki yo kwib@@ uk@@ iraho uw@@ itwaga Julius Ca@@ es@@ ar wari warakoze ingengabihe ya Julien wari umaze kwicwa. Umunsi w'@@ Ubun@@ ani uhura neza n'ik@@ ebwa (@@ gus@@ ir@@ amur@@ a) rya Yezu Kirisitu Nyuma y'@@ ivuka rya Yezu abenshi bafata nk'@@ umucunguzi w'@@ isi, amadini n'@@ amatorero amwe ntiy@@ izihiza uyu munsi nk'@@ umunsi w'@@ itangira ry'@@ umwaka gusa, ahubwo ngo aba an@@ izihiza ik@@ ebwa rye ari nabwo yahawe izina nkuko bigaragara muri bib@@ iliy@@ a, muri L@@ uka, 2:@@ 21. Amatorero arimo Abangilikani n'aba Lut@@ h@@ eri kugeza ubu yo ngo ajya mu nsengero kuri iyi tariki atari ukw@@ ishimira ko basoje umwaka ndetse ban@@ atangira undi mu mahoro gusa, ahubwo ngo baba ban@@ ibuk@@ aho ik@@ ebwa ry'@@ umwana Yezu, bitewe n'uko Yezu yavutse kuri 25 Ukuboza, kandi umuco w'@@ Abaheburayo war@@ avugaga ko buri mwana wese w'umuhungu yagombaga guk@@ ebwa ku munsi wa munani ukurikira ivuka rye (@@ itari ya 1 Mut@@ aram@@ a). Mu idini Gatolika kuva muri iyo myaka yakurikiye ivuka rya Yezu kugeza ubwo Papa Paul II yari agiye kuyobora Kiliziya Gatolika, nabo bizih@@ izaga umunsi w'@@ ik@@ ebwa rya Yezu, ariko nyuma yuko Papa agiriye kuri uyu mwanya, yahinduye izina ry'uyu munsi aw@@ ita umunsi w'@@ izina rit@@ agatifu rya Yezu. Akimara kuw@@ uhind@@ urira izina, Papa yahinduye n'@@ itariki wizih@@ iriz@@ waho aw@@ ushyira ku itariki 3 Mutarama buri mwaka, naho itariki ya mbere yemeza ko abayoboke b'@@ idini Gatolika bazajya bizihiza umunsi wa Bikir@@ amariya Nyina wa J@@ ambo. Ku munsi w'@@ Ubun@@ ani abaturage bo mu bihugu bitandukanye bikoresha ingengabihe ya Greg@@ oire bizihiza uyu munsi bahana impano zitandukanye, ari nako basangira ibiribwa n'ibiny@@ obwa hamwe n'imiryango n'inshuti zabo. Isi yose nt@@ itang@@ irira rimwe umwaka Nubwo umwaka mu bihugu byinshi bizihiza itangira ry'@@ umwaka ku itariki ya 1 Mutarama, hari bimwe mu bihugu by@@ izihiza uyu munsi ku yindi tariki kuburyo usanga hamwe baw@@ izihiza mu mwaka hagati. Thail@@ and Mu gihugu cya Thail@@ and bo bizihiza umwaka mushya ku itariki ya 13 cyangwa iya 14 Mata buri mw@@ k@@ a, umunsi wahawe izina rya Song@@ k@@ r@@ an. Iyi tariki kandi ih@@ urirwaho n'igihugu cya Camb@@ od@@ ia muri az@@ iya. Mu bihugu by'@@ Ubushinwa n'ibindi bihugu bikoresha ingengabihe ya Abash@@ inwa, bo bizihiza ubun@@ ani hagati y'@@ itariki ya 21 Mutarama n'@@ itariki ya 20 Gashyantare buri mwaka. Ethiopia Mu gihugu cya Ethiopia umunsi w'@@ ubun@@ ani wahawe izina rya E@@ nk@@ ut@@ at@@ ash@@ , ukaba wizihizwa ku itariki ya 11 Nzeri, aho baw@@ izihiza buri gihe mu mpera z'@@ igihe cy'@@ izuba (@@ imp@@ eshy@@ i) ugendeye ku ngengabihe y'igihugu cya Ethiopia.
Ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko umusore mukundana ashobora kuba atak@@ ig@@ ukunda Um@@ aze igihe ukundana n’umusore ndetse urukundo rwanyu rwar@@ ak@@ ebaga ariko muri iyi minsi ubona ibintu bisa niby@@ ahinduye isura ku buryo ucy@@ ibaza niba koko akig@@ ukunda. I@@ bikurikira ni ibimenyetso biz@@ akwereka ko umusore mukundana yagabanyije umurego mu rukundo ndetse ko bishoboka ko aho mug@@ ana atari heza. 1. Ing@@ eso nziza zawe yishim@@ iraga, zisigaye zim@@ ubera umutwaro 2. As@@ igaye ar@@ akazwa n’@@ ubusa kandi bikag@@ orana ko uburakari bush@@ ira kandi biturutse ku mpamvu zid@@ afatika ( nyamara siko byah@@ oz@@ e) 3. As@@ igaye yih@@ ug@@ iyeho kuburyo asigaye abura umwanya wo kuba muri kumwe (@@ mbere byari ikiny@@ urany@@ o, yig@@ om@@ waga byinshi ngo akubon@@ ere umw@@ any@@ a) 4. Telefoni ye asigaye yaray@@ ishyizemo urufunguzo rukomeye gukuramo (@@ atan@@ ak@@ ubw@@ iye@@ )@@ nyamara mbere war@@ ay@@ injir@@ agamo uko ushaka. 5. As@@ igaye aguh@@ isha amabanga y’ubuzima bwe, ariko mbere yak@@ ubwiraga byose bimw@@ erek@@ eye. 6. Ntak@@ ik@@ ugisha inama ariko mbere ni wowe y@@ abanz@@ aga kubaza icyo agiye gukora akabona gufata icy@@ emezo. 7. As@@ igaye atinda gusubiza ubutumwa bugufi u@@ wandikira cyangwa ntak@@ in@@ ab@@ usubiza na busa ariko mbere umur@@ abyo war@@ at@@ ind@@ aga. 8. Ntak@@ ita ku bintu bikug@@ oye, ur@@ abim@@ ubwira ariko ukabona ntacyo bim@@ ubwiye (@@ mbere yah@@ angayik@@ ishwaga n’ik@@ ik@@ ubabaje icyo aricyo cyose , cyaba gito cyangwa ikig@@ oye cyane, mug@@ afatanya kugeza gikem@@ uts@@ e.@@ ) 9. Nt@@ acy@@ ubaha umuryango wawe n’inshuti zawe 10. Ntag@@ ishaka gukora ibig@@ ushimisha nkuko yahoze abig@@ ira. Ikimenyetso kimwe muri ibi cyangwa ikindi ubona cyahindutse mu rukundo rw@@ anyu. Gusa niba ubona byinshi muri ibi ariko bisigaye bimeze, ukwiriye kugira amakenga y’aho urukundo rwanyu rug@@ ana. Ik@@ it@@ agenda hagati y’@@ abakundana cyangwa abashakanye gikem@@ urwa no kukig@@ anir@@ aho. Mus@@ abe umwanya, mw@@ ic@@ are ahantu h@@ iher@@ ereye, umuba@@ ze impinduka uri kum@@ ubon@@ ana, nak@@ ubera imfura az@@ akubwira ikib@@ imut@@ era, hari n’igihe wasanga ari wowe watumye ahinduka.
Yab@@ eshye ko ari imfubyi yam@@ ar@@ irije bucyeye avuga ko yapfushije nyina Yanditswe kuya 2@@ -06-@@ 2016 saa 19@@ :0@@ 4@@ ' na Emm@@ a-@@ Marie Umurerwa Umukobwa uri mu kigero cy'imyaka 28 yabwiye bagenzi ko nta babyeyi agira bagahora bater@@ at@@ eranya amafaranga yo kumufasha bucyeye ababwira ko yapfushije nyina bagwa mu k@@ antu. "@@ Yatangiye kuvuga ko ari imfubyi yiga mu mashuri yisumbuye, tuk@@ amufasha uko dush@@ oboye, tuk@@ amuha amavuta, amas@@ abune n'ibindi bikoresho twabaga twak@@ uye iwacu, hari n'@@ abaj@@ yaga bamuha imyenda yo kwambar@@ a. Tw@@ agize amahirwe dukom@@ ezanya muri kaminuza naho biba uko, ariko igit@@ eye urujijo nuko nta munyeshuri n'umwe yajyaga yemerera kumus@@ ura, ahubwo yavugaga ko aba mu muryango ut@@ amuk@@ und@@ a." Ibi ni ibyatangajwe na bamwe mu biganye n'uyu mukobwa tutari butang@@ aze amazina nk'uko bagenzi be baby@@ if@@ uje. Ku@@ uri group ya whatsapp ihuriweho n'abantu basaga 80, uyu mukobwa wari usanzwe uzwi nk'@@ utagira ababyeyi, abantu bakamw@@ ihanganisha bakan@@ amufasha uko bash@@ oboye, baherutse gutungurwa no kumw@@ umva gusaba inkunga yo kujya gushyingura nyina, abantu bagwa mu k@@ antu. Umwe mubo babana kuri urwo rubuga yagize ati "@@ Yah@@ oraga atubwira ko ababyeyi be bose bapfuye ndetse ko nta muvandimwe agira, ariko tw@@ atunguwe no kumva avuga ko nyina yapfuye ngo none yabuze amafaranga yo kujya kumushyingura dore ko yavugaga ko avuka mu Karere ka Rusizi, ariko ubu aba mu mujyi wa Kigali aho ari gushakisha akazi kuko yarangije kaminuz@@ a." Nk'uko bakomeza babivuga, ngo bamubajije icyatumye avuga ko nta babyeyi agira, arar@@ uca ar@@ urum@@ ira, ab@@ inkw@@ ak@@ uzi baramut@@ it@@ iriza bamusaba ibisobanuro byim@@ bitse, ababwira ko yari afite ababyeyi bombi ariko ngo ari abakene cyane, akaba yarab@@ eshyaga ko bapfuye kugira ngo afashwe. Mu bihugu byateye imbere kubeshya bifatwa nk'@@ indwara (M@@ y@@ th@@ om@@ ani@@ e) ishobora no guh@@ agurutsa uyirwaye akajya gushaka inzobere mu bijyanye n'@@ imit@@ ek@@ erer@@ ereze ya muntu (p@@ sy@@ c@@ olog@@ u@@ e) cyangwa se umuhanga mu bijyanye n'indwara zo mu mutwe (p@@ sych@@ i@@ at@@ re) bakam@@ uv@@ ura. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe hagam@@ ije kumenya igitera iyi ndwara , haje kuv@@ umburwa ko iterwa no kuba umuntu yaragize ikibazo gikomeye cyangwa se hari icyam@@ ubayeho mu buryo butunguranye akaba aribyo byatuma ukuri gushira muri we. Gasabo: Bavuga ko baciwe amafaranga yo kubakirwa Par@@ king none amaso yaheze mu kirere Ngo barifuza ko bak@@ ubakirwa Par@@ king bij@@ ejwe cyangwa bag@@ asubizwa amafaranga batanze Abakora umurimo wo gutwara abagenzi kuri za Moto (@@ Abam@@ ot@@ ar@@ i) bakorera kuri gare ya Remera, baravuga ko bat@@ swe amafaranga n'abayobozi ba Koperative yabo yo kububakira Par@@ king bazajya bap@@ arik@@ amo, ariko ngo bategereje iyo Par@@ king baray@@ ibuze Aba bamotari bavuga ko bahora bacibwa amande na Polisi ibash@@ inja gup@@ arika ahantu hat@@ emewe. Nkuko abamotari twaganiriye babis@@ oban@@ uye, baravuga ko abayobozi b'@@ amakoperative yabo babag@@ ezemo babak@@ a amafaranga, babwirwa ko ari ayo kububakira Par@@ king bazajya bap@@ arik@@ amo, ariko ngo batunguwe nuko iyi Par@@ king itigeze y@@ ubakw@@ a.@@ Ikindi ngo nuko batigeze ban@@ asubizwa amafaranga yabo. Umwe twaganiriye witwa Tuyisenge agira ati: "Hari igihe bigeze kud@@ uca amafaranga ngo bagiye ku@@ dukorera Par@@ k@@ ing. Icyo gihe amafaranga twaray@@ atanze hashize iminsi icyapa bahise bagik@@ uraho hariya tw@@ ap@@ arik@@ ag@@ a." Yakomeje agira ati" In@@ yemez@@ abwishyu (@@ re@@ ç@@ u) turaz@@ ifite. Hari amafaranga twagiye tw@@ ishyura y'@@ iriya par@@ king ariko iyo par@@ king ntiyigeze y@@ ubakw@@ a,@@ ahubwo bahise bat@@ wiruk@@ ana. Bad@@ uc@@ aga amafaranga 1000 kuri moto nini n'amafaranga 500 kuri v@@ elo mot@@ eur ariko iyo par@@ king ntiy@@ ubats@@ we." Undi twaganiriye utashatse ko amazina ye atangazwa nawe yavuze ko ayo afaranga bay@@ aciwe ariko ntib@@ ubak@@ irwe par@@ k@@ ing, bigatuma polisi iza igahita iba@@ fata ik@@ abatw@@ arira moto ndetse ik@@ anab@@ andikira amande agera ku bihumbi 50 by'@@ amany@@ arwanda. Agira ati :" Ayo mafaranga twaray@@ atanze n'ubu njyewe Rec@@ u nan@@ ayik@@ wereka icyo gihe nat@@ waraga v@@ elo moteri ..@@ ubu iyo bag@@ ufashe up@@ aritse hariya bag@@ uca ibihumbi 25 noneho bak@@ ongeraho na 25 bita iby'@@ agasuzug@@ ur@@ o." Aba bamotari bakaba basaba abayobozi babo kuba bab@@ ubakira Par@@ king bij@@ ejwe kandi ban@@ atangiye amafaranga, cyangwa ngo bitaba ibyo bakaba basubizwa amafaranga yabo bat@@ anze. Umuyobozi wa Koperative y'abo bamotari Kayitare Jean Claude yahakanye yivuye inyuma iby'@@ ayo mafaranga bavuga ko baciye abam@@ ot@@ ari. Yavuze ko ibyo ntabyo azi. Agira ati" Ayo mafaranga ntabwo yat@@ anzwe, ntayo rwose nz@@ i." Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko icyo azi ari uko nta mafaranga yatanzwe ngo bubak@@ irwe par@@ k@@ ing, gusa avuga ko niba hari umu m@@ otari waba war@@ ahuye n'icyo kibazo cyo kwak@@ wa amafaranga, yaz@@ abagana bakareba niba koko aribyo bakabona kugira icyo bakora, kuko ngo hashobora no kugira uw@@ aby@@ iy@@ itir@@ ira. Aba bamotari kugeza ubu ntib@@ emerewe gup@@ arika aho bari basanzwe bap@@ arika ku muryango wa gare ya Remera. Icyakora Kayitare avuga ubu bari gushaka uko babash@@ akira ikibanza cyo kub@@ ubak@@ iramo Par@@ king hafi aho.@@ Iyo Par@@ king akemeza ko izaba yabonetse mu Ukwakira uyu mwaka.
Emmanuel Habumugisha yatawe muri yombi aje gucururiza urum@@ oj@@ yi mu mujyi avuye mu ntara. Umugabo w'imyaka 31 y'amavuko witwa Emmanuel Habumugisha ukomoka mu karere ka Kirehe yatawe muri yombi na olisi ikorera mu mujyi wa kigali yikoreye ibiro 33 by'@@ urum@@ oj@@ yi aje kur@@ ucur@@ uriza mu mujyi. Nyuma y'iminsi mike ar@@ ekuwe mu buroko muri gereza ya k@@ imir@@ onko nabwo azira urum@@ oj@@ yi, hab@@ umugisha em@@ man@@ uel yongeye gutabwa muri yombi atwaye urum@@ oj@@ yi aho yiyemerera ko yari aje kur@@ ucur@@ uriza mu mujyi wa Kigali. Kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 9 Mutarama 2015, ni bwo Polisi y'u rwanda yerekanye uyu mugabo aho yemera ibyo aregwa akanab@@ isabira imbabazi. Umuvugizi wa polisi Supt Modeste Mbabazi, yongeye kwibutsa urubyiruko n'abanyarwanda muri rusange ko bakwiye kureba ibindi by@@ abateza imbere bat@@ ish@@ oye mu biyobyabwenge kuko byangiza iterambere ry'@@ igihugu.
Ni uwuhe mug@@ isha mukuru wak@@ urut@@ ira indi yos@@ e? Hen@@ oki yamaze imyaka mirongo itandatu n'@@ itanu avutse abyara Met@@ us@@ el@@ a. Amaze kubyara Met@@ us@@ ela, Hen@@ oki agendana n'Imana imyaka magana atatu, ay@@ ibyar@@ amo abahungu n'abak@@ obwa. Iminsi yose Hen@@ oki yar@@ amye ni imyaka magana atatu na mirongo itandatu n'@@ itanu. Kandi Hen@@ oki yagend@@ anaga n'@@ Imana, ntiy@@ aboneka, kuko Imana yamw@@ im@@ uye. (Itangiriro 5: 21-@@ 24@@ ) Iyo uvuze "@@ kugend@@ an@@ a" biba bivuga ko hari abafat@@ anyije urugendo basezer@@ anye. Tur@@ ebere hamwe uko umuntu yagend@@ ana n'Imana mu rugendo rujya mu ijuru bik@@ amufasha kur@@ urangiza neza. Buri wese afite uko yahamagawe ava mu byaha arak@@ izwa aza mu nzu y'Imana. Umuntu yibuka igihe yakir@@ ijwe, akaba yan@@ ezer@@ wa; ariko ikiri ngombwa ni kimwe : Mbese muri iyi myaka turacy@@ agenda uko twah@@ amag@@ awe? Tug@@ ume mu muh@@ amagar@@ o, turushaho gukora ibyo Imana ishaka duk@@ izwe uko bwije n'uko buk@@ eye, tub@@ eho tun@@ ezeza Imana kuko yaduhaye imbaraga zo kuz@@ arangiza uru rugendo neza, niyo izab@@ iduh@@ oboz@@ a. Itangiriro ry'@@ urugendo ni ry@@ iza, ariko ikir@@ uta ni iherezo ryar@@ wo. En@@ oki yagend@@ anye n'@@ Imana, aray@@ in@@ ezeza kugeza ubwo ifashe umwanzuro wo kumw@@ imura ad@@ apfuye. Ik@@ iz@@ adufasha muri uru rugendo ni ukug@@ enda tw@@ ezwa mu ngeso zacu zose uko bwije n'uko bukeye (1@@ Petero 1:@@ 15@@ ), ibi ntabwo bikwiye kudut@@ era ubwoba kuko twahawe intwaro yo kudufasha ari yo Ijambo ry'@@ Imana. Dus@@ abwa kuba abera aho tw@@ irirwa hose nk'uko Imana ari iy@@ era. Kuko urugendo rukom@@ eye, Imana ijya iduha impoz@@ amar@@ ira; urug@@ ero: waba utar@@ ashaka ug@@ asenga ngo ik@@ ubakire urugo Imana ik@@ ak@@ umvira ik@@ abikora neza bin@@ ejeje umutima wawe, Imana ikag@@ uha uwo m@@ ufatanya urugendo kuko aba@@ biri bar@@ uta umwe, mug@@ akomezanya muk@@ abasha kunesha n'ibindi. Impamvu tug@@ ihari tuk@@ iriho ni kubw'@@ umurimo w'Imana. Mu gukizwa kwacu tuz@@ era imbuto biz@@ ane benshi kuri Yesu Kristo bin@@ ubah@@ ishe Imana. Guk@@ iranuka kwacu kub@@ e uguh@@ oraho kuko nubwo tuzi itangira ry'@@ urugendo ariko ntituzi iherezo ryar@@ wo. Biz@@ at@@ uzanira umugisha ubwacu no ku bacu. Niyo mpamvu Nowa yar@@ inzwe n'@@ abe bakar@@ ind@@ wa, mu gihe cy'@@ abak@@ oraga ibyaha bari bak@@ ataje nk'uko ubu bimeze mu gihe cyacu. (Itangiriro 6: 5@@ ): Kandi Uwiteka abona yuko ingeso z'abantu zari mbi cyane mu isi, kandi ko kwibwira kw@@ ose imitima yabo itekereza ari kub@@ i gusa iteka ryose. Uwiteka yicuza yuko yaremye abantu mu isi, bimutera agahinda mu mutima. Uwiteka aravuga ati "@@ Nz@@ ar@@ imbura abantu nar@@ emye, m@@ bats@@ embe mu isi uhereye ku muntu n'@@ inyamaswa n'@@ amatungo n'ib@@ ikur@@ uruka n'@@ inyoni n'ibis@@ iga byo mu kirere, kuko nic@@ ujije yuko nab@@ irem@@ ye." Ariko Nowa agirira umugisha ku Uwit@@ eka. Uru ni rwo rubyaro rwa No@@ wa. Nowa yari umuk@@ iran@@ utsi, yatung@@ anaga rwose mu gihe cye. Nowa yagend@@ anaga n'Imana. Nubwo hari imigisha tujya duh@@ ererwa mu gakiza ku bw'@@ ubuntu, umugisha mukuru twahawe ni uwo kuzabona Imana. Tube abagenzi beza bajya mu gihugu cyo mu ijuru twe kuba icyapa kiy@@ obora abandi nyamara cyo kik@@ aguma aho gih@@ agaze. Uru rugendo ruz@@ arangira yemwe abakunda Imana nim@@ uh@@ umur@@ e, dusabwa gusa kuzas@@ angwa turi maso ubwo Umwami wacu Yesu az@@ aza. Tuz@@ abish@@ oboz@@ wa no kugenda tw@@ igenzura buri gihe, aho wis@@ anze wat@@ anduk@@ iriye weg@@ ere Imana uyis@@ abe imbabazi, ir@@ azih@@ orana kandi iteka ihora yiteguye kwakira umuntu wese uy@@ igana afite umutima uciye bugufi. Hat@@ abayeho urupfu, imp@@ anda y'Imana iz@@ avuga kandi abazaba b@@ ejejwe bari maso nibo bazay@@ umva gusa. Iyi si yo irash@@ irana no kwifuza kw@@ ayo, ariko nkuko tub@@ isoma ngo « ariko twe@@ bw@@ eho abizera ntid@@ ufite gusubira inyuma ngo tur@@ imb@@ uke, ahubwo dufite kwizera kugira ngo tuz@@ akize ubugingo bwacu. » (@@ Abaheburayo 10: 39@@ ).
