Ibintu 8 bifasha mu gutegura akabariro ku bashakanye Ibibazo byinshi by’@@ imibanire mibi hagati y’abashakanye bikunze guterwa n’uko gahunda yo gutera akababar@@ iro it@@ agenda neza igihe kinini. Kimwe mu mpamvu zikomeye zo gut@@ agenda neza nuko abashakanye bad@@ ateg@@ urana mbere yo gutera akabariro. Nkuko nta gahunda iy@@ ariyo yose yagenda neza it@@ ateguwe ni nako gutera akabariro bidashobora kugenda neza igihe cyose bikozwe abashakanye bat@@ ateg@@ uranye. W@@ ategura ute uwo mwashakanye nawe uk@@ itegura : 1. Nih@@ abeho gahunda yo gutera akabariro N@@ ibyiza cyane ko abashakanye baganira bagah@@ uza noneho bak@@ emeranya ku nshuro ndetse n’iminsi mu cyumweru cyangwa se mu gihe bashaka bagomba gutera akabariro. Ibyo bifasha umwe wese kwirirwa yitegura ndetse no muri cya gihe mbere yuko bakora iyo gahunda. Ntiw@@ ategura ikintu utazi igihe kiz@@ abera. 2. Gutekereza uwo mwashakanye Mu gihe umugabo cyangwa umugore bari mu kazi igice yag@@ erageza ko anyuzamo ibitekerezo bye biganisha k’@@ uwo bashakanye. Uko umutek@@ ereza cyane ni nako kumukunda biz@@ amuka mu mutima wawe, bityo bikaza kw@@ oroha cya gihe cyo gutera akabariro ; 3. Kwirinda gukora ibyo uzi yanga ukagira imbaraga zo kumukorera ibyo akunda Iyo wiriwe umutek@@ ereza, bir@@ akw@@ orohera kwibuka ibyo akunda nibyo ad@@ akunda, ukirinda ibyo yanga ndetse bikag@@ utera imbaraga zo gukora ibyo akunda. Urugero : Niba uwo mwashakanye yanga ko utaha ut@@ inze icyo gihe uzi neza ko hariho ya gahunda ugomba kwirinda gutaha ut@@ inze. U@@ ba um@@ ufashije kug@@ ubwa neza mu mutima noneho bik@@ amw@@ orohera kuzuza uruhare rwe mu gutera akabariro. Bimeny@@ erewe ko abashakanye batera akabariro nt@@ agah@@ unda bakoze, icyo gihe ntuz@@ atekereza gutaha kare kuko uwo munsi nt@@ uzi neza ko muri bub@@ ikor@@ e. 4. Commun@@ ication Uwo munsi uzi ko muri but@@ ere akabar@@ iro, gerageza ujye umw@@ oherereza utu mess@@ ages turimo amagambo meza nka : Ndag@@ ukunda Cher@@ i(@@ e) ; n@@ iriwe ng@@ utekereza cyane ; N@@ iriwe nibuka bya bihe byiza twagiranye wa munsi …. ; Ur@@ ataha ryari ko ng@@ uk@@ umbuye ? N’@@ ibind@@ i@@ …. Nim@@ ugera mu rugo gerageza mwese muk@@ oreshe imvugo nziza irimo kubah@@ a, urukundo ( aff@@ ection@@ ), umunezer@@ o, … kandi mug@@ abanye cyane ikoreshwa rya whats@@ p, TV n’ibindi bis@@ amaza bituma ut@@ ita kuri ch@@ eri wawe muri ya masaha abanziriza akabariro muk@@ iri mu rug@@ anir@@ iro. 5. Impano z@@ oroheje Ub@@ ishoboye ukaba uzi ko madamu wawe akunda b@@ ombo ( ni uruger@@ o) t@@ umuz@@ anire n’ubwo twaba 2 tw’@@ amafranga ijana. Ibyo bizam@@ ushimisha cyane ndetse big@@ ushe neza umutima we. Nawe wa mudamu we, wibuke gutegura ibyo umutware akunda kandi abe ari wowe umu s@@ erev@@ a. 6. Gut@@ aha kare Umunsi wo gutera akabariro umugabo n’umugore bagomba gutaha kare kugira ngo birinde gutera akabariro amasaha agiye bigatuma babikora bananiwe cyane noneho bakabikora nabi. Mut@@ ahe kare, ameza ateg@@ urwe kare ndetse n’abana bagomba kuryama kare , ibyo mub@@ itegura mbere y@@ igihe. mwirinde gutinda kuri televiziyo niba aricyo kibat@@ inza kuryama kare. M@@ ufatanye gukora utur@@ imo twa nimug@@ or@@ aba. Izindi gahunda zose mugomba kuz@@ ihorera cyangwa se muk@@ az@@ ikora kare. Ibyo bisaba ko mw@@ emeranya iminsi mug@@ om@@ ga kureba aho mud@@ afite izindi nshingano nko mu rusengero, mu mash@@ yir@@ ahamwe, muri sip@@ or@@ o,@@ … 7. Mug@@ eze mu cyumba M@@ wese muk@@ iri « en for@@ me » kuko mug@@ eze mu cyumba hakiri kare, nim@@ ufate akanya mug@@ anire ku tuntu n’ut@@ undi. Ubwo niko buri wese aba ariho akora ibyo mugenzi we akunda kugira ngo amufashe kwitegura kub@@ ishaka nawe yitegura (c@@ ar@@ ess@@ es, kumus@@ oma, kwambara utwenda sex@@ y, utug@@ ambo tw@@ iza, gusangira akantu ko kunywa, n’ibind@@ i). M@@ wirinde kuzimya amatara kugira ngo mukomeze mur@@ eb@@ ane. Buri wese akeneye kubona umubiri wa mugenzi we. 8. Kug@@ anira ku buryo bwiza bwo gutera akabariro Umugabo abaze umugore we ibim@@ un@@ ezeza iyo batera akabariro n’umugore abig@@ enze atyo. N@@ ub@@ imenya bishy@@ ire mu bikorwa kugirango mugenzi wawe an@@ ezer@@ we. Iyi nzu Rucyahana yatangaje ko yo igura Miliyoni 65 z'amafaranga y' u Rwanda. Kamonyi: Ikipe ya Rukoma mu bakobwa n'iya Mus@@ ambira mu bahungu z@@ egukanye igikombe "@@ Umurenge Kagame c@@ up@@ " Mu mukino wa nyuma w'@@ igikombe cy'@@ imiyoborere myiza cyiswe "@@ Umurenge Kagame Cup@@ ", ikipe ya Rukoma mu bakobwa yegukanye igikombe nyuma yo gutsinda iya Nyam@@ iy@@ aga. Naho ikipe y'@@ Umurenge wa Mus@@ ambira mu bahungu itsinda iy'@@ Umurenge wa K@@ arama. Uyu mukino wabereye ku kibuga cy'@@ umupira cya Remera tariki 2 Mata 2015@@ ; mu muhango wo gusoza ukwezi kwahariwe imiyoborere myiza. H@@ abanje umukino w'@@ abakobwa wahuje Umurenge wa Rukoma n'uwa Nyam@@ iy@@ aga, umukino urangira Rukoma itsinze ibitego bitatu ku busa. Ikipe y'@@ Umurenge wa Mus@@ ambira yishimira intsinzi. H@@ akurikiyeho umukino w'@@ abahungu wag@@ arag@@ arag@@ amo ishyaka ku makipe yombi. Ikipe y'@@ Umurenge wa Mus@@ ambira n'iy'@@ uwa Karama barangije iminota 90 ari 0@@ -0@@ ; hitabazwa penaliti maze Umurenge wa Mus@@ ambira w@@ injiza enye kuri eshatu, n'uko ihita yegukana igikombe. Amakipe yatsinze yahawe igikombe gih@@ erekejwe n'@@ imyenda yo gukin@@ ana, umupira wo gukina ndetse n'@@ ibah@@ asha y'amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 100, yegukana n'@@ itike yo guhagararira akarere mu mikino izakomeza ku rwego rw'@@ Intara y'Amajyepfo. Ruts@@ inga ashyikiriza igikombe ikipe ya Mus@@ ambir@@ a. Amakipe yabaye aya kabiri na yo yahawe imyenda yo gukinana n'@@ umupira wo gukina, bih@@ erekejwe n'@@ ibah@@ asha y'amafaranga ibihumbi 50. G@@ ukinira igikombe cyitiriwe Umurenge Kagame Cup, byah@@ ujwe n'@@ ukwezi kw'@@ imiyoborere myiza, kugira ngo uwo mwanya wo kwidagad@@ ura, abayobozi babon@@ ereho umwanya wo gutambutsa ubutumwa bujyanye na gahunda za leta. IK@@ ipe y'abakobwa y'@@ Umurenge wa Rukoma yakira igikombe nyuma yo gutsinda uwa Nyam@@ iy@@ aga. Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kamonyi, Ruts@@ inga Jacques atangaza ko wabaye umwanya wo gutahura impano z'@@ urubyiruko mu mupira w'amaguru ku buryo bizabafasha gushyiraho ikipe y'@@ abahungu y'@@ akarere, no kongera abakinnyi mu ikipe y'abakobwa y'akarere iri mu cyiciro cya mbere. Umukobwa yah@@ umye ijisho nyuma yo kumara igihe kinini akina umukino wo muri Telefone W@@ u X@@ ia@@ oj@@ ing , umukobwa w’imyaka 21 wo mu gace ka D@@ ong@@ gu@@ an mu Bushinwa ari kuvurwa ijisho ry’@@ iburyo ryah@@ umye nyuma yo kumara igihe kirekire akina umukino wo muri telefone ug@@ ezweho cyane mu Bushinwa. Iby@@ am@@ ubayeho byabaye akabar@@ ore ku bandi bakunda gukina mwene iyo mikino nta kuruhuka. W@@ u yamenye ko ijisho rye ry’i buryo rit@@ ak@@ ibasha kureba ku itariki 1 Ukwakira 2017 ubwo yakinaga umukino witwa Hon@@ or of King@@ s. Y@@ afashe uwo munsi wose wari ikiruhuko mu Bushinwa akina umukino , nyuma ijisho rye riza kunanirwa kur@@ eba. Yabanje gukeka ko ari ukun@@ anirwa , ajya kuryama ariko bukeye bwaho nabwo yaby@@ utse ijisho rye rit@@ ak@@ ibasha kubona ikintu icyo aricyo cyose. Ababyeyi be bahise bamujyana mu bitaro. Abaganga bemeje ko amaso ya W@@ u yari ananiwe ku buryo bukabije. Nkuko W@@ u ubwe yabitangaje, ngo iyo yavaga mu kazi, yafataga amasaha hagati ya 7 n’amasaha 8 akina umukino nta kuruhuka. Ak@@ ora mu bijyanye n’@@ ibar@@ uram@@ ut@@ ungo. Aho akora nabwo aba akoresha mudasobwa ari nabyo bituma amaso ye ar@@ uha kurushaho. Mu gihe cye cy’iminsi y’@@ ikiruhuko ho ngo byabaga ari ibindi kuko yakinaga uwo mukino nta n’amasaha make afashe yo kuryam@@ a. Nyuma y’uko amaso ye ananiwe cyane, ijisho ry’@@ iburyo ryo ryar@@ ananiwe burundu. Kugeza nubu W@@ u aracyari mu bitaro. Abaganga bari kugerageza kum@@ uvura ijisho r@@ itab@@ ona ariko ntacyo bir@@ atanga. Ikinyamakuru Met@@ ro cyatangaje ko ababyeyi be akenshi bam@@ ubur@@ iraga bamubwira ko azah@@ uma n@@ akomeza gukina uwo mukino nta kuruhuka, ariko akanga kub@@ umv@@ ira. Abaganga bam@@ uvura bemeje ko basanzwe afite ikibazo R@@ et@@ inal Ar@@ ter@@ y Oc@@ cl@@ us@@ ion (R@@ A@@ O) yagize kubera kumara igihe kirekire akina umukino kuri telefone. Inkuru y’@@ ibyabaye kuri W@@ u yabaye kim@@ omo mu Bushinwa. Ibig@@ wi by’@@ amakipe 15 azah@@ atanira Igikombe cya CHAN 2020 hamwe n’@@ Amavubi y’u Rwanda Amakipe 16 arimo n’i@@ y’u Rwanda ‘@@ Amavub@@ i’ azakina Igikombe cya Afurika gih@@ ug@@ uza abakinnyi bakina imbere mu bihugu byabo (CH@@ AN 2020@@ ), yamaze kumenyekana. Iri rushanwa rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya gatandatu rizabera muri Cameroun hagati ya Mutarama na Gashyantare 2020. Cameroun yahawe kwakira imikino ya nyuma y’iki gikombe bitewe n’uko Ethiopia yari kucy@@ akira yagaragaje ko it@@ iteguye neza. Iki gihugu cyahise gishyirwa mu majonjora mu gace k’@@ Ibur@@ asirazuba, aho mu ijonjora rya mbere cyas@@ ezereye Djibouti mbere yo guk@@ urwamo n’@@ Amavubi y’u Rwanda mu ijonjora rya nyuma r@@ yakin@@ we mu mpera z’icyumweru twas@@ oje. U Rwanda rugiye kwitabira CHAN ku nshuro ya kane U Rwanda rwakiriye CHAN 2016, rugiye gukina iri rushanwa rihuza abakinnyi bakina imbere muri za shampiyona zabo ku nshuro ya gatatu yikurikiranya ndetse ni iya kane muri rusange nyuma yo kwitabira CHAN 2011 yabereye muri Sudani. Inshuro ebyiri gusa (@@ 2009 na 201@@ 4) ni zo u Rwanda rut@@ itab@@ iriyemo iri rushanwa. Amavubi yagiye muri CHAN 2018 yabereye muri Maroc, amaze gusezerera Ethiopia nk’uko byagenze no kuri iyi nshuro mu gushaka itike ya 2020. Ethiopia ni yo yabujije u Rwanda gukina CHAN 2014 yabereye muri Afurika y’Epfo. Mu gushaka itike ya CHAN 2019 yabereye bwa muri Côte d’Ivoire, u Rwanda rwari rw@@ abanje gusezerera u Burundi ariko rw@@ ihan@@ izwa na Sudani ku bitego 5-@@ 1 mu ijonjora rya kabiri. Mu nshuro eshatu Amavubi amaze gukina iri rushanwa, inshuro imwe nibwo yarenze amats@@ inda, asezererwa na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ku bitego 2-1 muri ¼ cya CHAN 2016 yabereye mu Rwanda. Ibihugu bitatu bigiye kwitabira iri rushanwa ku nshuro ya gatanu Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo yatwaye CHAN 2009 na 2016, ni kimwe mu bihugu bitatu biz@@ akina iya 2020, byitabiriye iri rushanwa ku nshuro ya gatanu. Zimbabwe yabaye iya kane mu 2014 na Uganda itar@@ arenga amatsinda kuva mu 2011, ni andi makipe azaba yitabiriye iri rushanwa inshuro eshanu, kurusha ayandi yose. U Rwanda ruri mu bihugu bitanu byitabiriye CHAN ku nshuro ya kane Amavubi y’u Rwanda agiye kwitabira iri rushanwa ku nshuro ya kane nk’uko twabibonye hejuru. Ni inshuro zingana n’iza Cameroun izakira iri rushanwa, aho kure yageze ari muri ¼ mu 2011 na 2016. Maroc yatwaye CHAN 2018 yari yak@@ iriye, Zambia yabaye iya gatatu mu 2009 na Mali yabaye iya kabiri mu 2016 ni andi makipe azakina iri rushanwa ku nshuro ya kane. Ibihugu bitanu biz@@ itabira irushanwa ku nshuro ya gatatu Congo Brazzaville yageze muri ¼ mu mwaka ushize, Tunisia yatwaye CHAN 2011, Guinée yabaye iya kane mu 2016, Burkina Faso itar@@ arenze amatsinda mu 2014 na 2018 ndetse na Niger yageze muri ¼ mu 2011 ni byo bihugu biz@@ akina CHAN ku nshuro ya gatatu. Tanzania na Nam@@ ibi biz@@ itabira irushanwa ku nshuro ya kabiri Tanzania yah@@ agarariye akarere k’@@ Iburasirazuba mu 2009, igiye gukina iri rushanwa ku nshuro ya kabiri nyuma yo kubigeraho mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize isezereye Sudani n’ubundi yari yarak@@ uyemo ubwo yaherukaga kubona itik@@ e. Aba baturanyi b’u Rwanda mu Burasirazuba, ntabwo barenze icyiciro cy’@@ amatsinda ku nshuro yabo ya mbere ubwo iri rushanwa ryari ryabereye muri Côte d’@@ Ivoire. Namibia yitabiriye CHAN ku nshuro ya mbere mu mwaka ushize, yagar@@ ukiye muri ¼@@ . Togo ni yo kipe igiye gukina iri rushanwa ku nshuro ya mbere Nigeria yakabaye yitabira CHAN ku nshuro ya kane, ariko ntabwo iz@@ agaragara muri Cameroun nyuma yo gutungurwa na T@@ ogo, yayis@@ ezereye ku bitego 4-1 mu ijonjora rya nyuma. Togo ni yo kipe izakina iri rushanwa bwa mu makipe 16 azaba ahat@@ aniye CHAN 2020. Hari amazina akomeye ataz@@ agaragara muri Cameroun mu mwaka utaha L@@ ibye yatwaye CHAN 2014 yabereye muri Afurika y’Epfo ntabwo izakina iri rushanwa rit@@ aha nyuma yo gusezererwa na Tunisia mu gace k’@@ Amaj@@ yaruguru. Côte d’Ivoire, Ghana, Al@@ g@@ éri@@ e, Sénégal na Nigeria ni ibindi bihugu bisanzwe biz@@ wiho kugira amakipe akomeye ariko byas@@ ezerewe mu ijonjora rya nyuma ry’@@ uru rugendo rugana muri Cameroun. Ibihugu 16 biz@@ akina CHAN 2020 ni: Burkina Faso, Cameroun (@@ izakira irush@@ an@@ wa@@ ), Congo Brazzaville, Guin@@ ée, Mali, Maroc, Namibia, Niger, Uganda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, u Rwanda, Tanzania, T@@ ogo, Tunis@@ ie, Zambia na Zimbabwe. Impuzamashyirahamwe y’@@ Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika ‘@@ CAF@@ ’ ntabwo iratangaza amatariki azab@@ eraho t@@ ombora y’@@ amatsinda ndetse n’igihe nyir’izina iri rushanwa riz@@ aba. U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu 16 bizah@@ atanira CHAN 2020 izabera muri Cameroun Maroc izaba ishaka kwisubiza iri rushanwa yegukanye mu mwaka ushize ubwo yari yar@@ yakiriye Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo izaba ishaka kwegukana CHAN ku nshuro ya gatatu nyuma yo gutwara iya 2016 yakuye mu Rwanda

Ntim@@ uz@@ acikwe n’igice kiz@@ akurikira Yanditswe na Ndayisaba Simeon
Abantu 7@@ 67 bafatiwe mu byaha by’ubw@@ ambuzi bush@@ ukana muri 2019 Hashize iminsi hirya no hino mu gihugu humvikana abantu bih@@ ererana abandi bak@@ abamb@@ ura amafaranga bab@@ izeza akazi cyangwa kuz@@ abajyana mu mahugurwa mu mahanga cyangwa ku@@ babon@@ erayo akazi, abandi bagah@@ amagarwa ku mat@@ elef@@ oni babwirwa ko batsindiye amafaranga n’ibindi bihembo ahantu runaka. Muri uyu mwaka wa 2019 gusa, abantu 7@@ 67 bamaze gufatirwa mu byaha by’ubw@@ ambuzi bush@@ ukana, bakaba bar@@ ambuye amafaranga abarirwa muri miliyoni 15 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda. Kuri ubu Polisi y’u Rwanda k’@@ ubufatanye n’izindi nzego z’umutekano bahagurukiye kurwanya ubu bw@@ amb@@ uzi. Ubuhamya bwa Uwamahoro Claudine (@@ izina ryahind@@ uwe@@ ) Muri Nyakanga uyu mwaka, Uwamahoro Claudine (@@ izina ryahind@@ uwe@@ ), yitabye telefoni ah@@ amagawe n’umuntu atazi wam@@ ubwiye ko yitwa Bizimana Innocent, amubwira ko ari mu bantu batoranyijwe kuzitabira inama ihuza urubyiruko rwih@@ angiye imirimo (@@ y@@ oung ent@@ rep@@ r@@ ene@@ ur@@ s), inama yagombaga kubera mu gihugu cya Qatar@@ . Uyu Bizimana akaba yar@@ abw@@ iraga Uwamahoro ko akora muri Minisiteri y’@@ ubucuruzi, mu ishami rishinzwe ubucuruzi mpuzamahanga. Bizimana yash@@ utse Uwamahoro amubwira ko iyi minisiteri yateguye inama ku bufatanye n’ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye r@@ itsura amajyambere (@@ UND@@ P@@ ). Uwamahoro yabwiye Bizimana ko adafite urwandiko rw’@@ inzira rumw@@ emerera kujya mu mahanga (p@@ ass@@ port@@ ), Bizimana amubwira ko atagomba kubig@@ iraho ikibazo, kuko mu kigo gishinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka hari umuntu witwa Besigye Fred, ushinzwe korohereza abantu batoranyijwe kuzitabira iyo nama. Uwamahoro yahise abwira Bizimana ko adafite amafaranga yo kwitegura kujya muri iyo nama, harimo n’ayo kwishyura urwandiko rw’@@ inzira. Bizimana yahise abwira Uwamahoro ko ibijyanye n’amafaranga y’urugendo ndetse n’ibyangombwa byo kujya mu mahanga ari ibibazo biz@@ akemurwa n’abat@@ eguye inama. Mu buhamya bwa Uwamahoro (@@ izina ryahind@@ uwe@@ ), akomeza avuga ko uyu Bizimana wiy@@ itaga umukozi wa Minisiteri y’@@ ubucuruzi, yageze aho akamusaba koherereza Besigye Fred amafaranga y’u Rwanda ibihumbi 30 (30@@ ,000@@ r@@ f@@ w@@ ), noneho andi asigaye akaz@@ atangwa n’abat@@ eguye inama. Uwamahoro avuga ko yaje kugira amakenga agak@@ urikirana ashaka kumenya Bizimana, abaza mu bantu bari bamubwiye ko barimo gutegura inama, bamubwira ko batazi uwo Bizimana ndetse ko n’iyo nama yamubwiye ntayo bazi. Uwamahoro yihutiye kubimenyesha inzego z’umutekano, na zo zihita zit@@ abara, abantu babiri bahise bafatwa aribo uwitwa Nkurunziza Ham@@ med na B@@ irik@@ unz@@ ira Salom@@ on. Aba bombi bafashwe muri Kanama 2019, tariki ya 1 n’iya 3, bombi bafatirwa mu mujyi wa Kigali. Iperereza ryaje kugaragaza ko aba bombi batangiye ibikorwa by’ubw@@ ambuzi bush@@ ukana kuva mu mwaka wa 2014, aho bagendaga bakoresha imyirondoro itar@@ iyo. Uyu witwa Nkurunziza, abantu yash@@ ukaga yaba@@ bwiraga ko yitwa Nsengiyumva Sam@@ , ubundi akiy@@ ita Ev@@ ode, hakaba ubwo yiyita Padiri No@@ el, cyangwa akababwira ko yitwa Bizimana Innocent nkuko yari yabibwiye Uwamahoro Claudine twababwiye haruguru. Uwitwa B@@ irik@@ unz@@ ira Salom@@ on, we yakoreshaga amazina nka Mat@@ abaro James cyangwa Nshimiyimana Jean Bos@@ co. Nubwo Uwamahoro yashoboye guhita atanga amakuru bigatuma at@@ ambur@@ wa, iperereza rigaragaza ko hari abandi bantu bagera kuri 15 bash@@ utswe na bariya bagabo bak@@ abamb@@ ura amafaranga y’u Rwanda abarirwa muri miliyoni imwe n’igice y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda. Iperereza rigaragaza ko kuva muri Gashyantare 2016, B@@ irik@@ unz@@ ira Salomon yigeze gufatwa ar@@ afungwa azira icyaha cy’ubw@@ ambuzi bush@@ ukana, yafunguwe muri Nzeri 2018, nyamara bigaragara ko gufungwa ntacyo byam@@ um@@ ariye kuko amaze gufungurwa yasubiye muri bya byaha, ahubwo ash@@ oramo n’abandi, kuko ni bwo yahise azana uwitwa Nkurunziza Ham@@ med muri ibyo byaha, usibye ko na we atari ubwa mbere agaragaye muri ibyo byaha, kuko Nkurunziza na we yari yarigeze kumara amezi 18 muri gereza ya Mageragere azira ibyo byaha by’ubw@@ ambuzi bush@@ ukana. Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, Commissioner of Police (CP) John Bosco Kabera, avuga ko aba bajura bakoresha amayeri atandukanye kugira ngo bagere ku mugambi wabo. Yagize ati “Uyu Bizimana na Nkurunziza bir@@ irwaga bazenguruka hirya no hino mu bitaro bashakisha ibyangombwa by’abantu byat@@ akaye nk’@@ indangamuntu biba bihari birang@@ ishwa, cyangwa bag@@ ashakisha imy@@ irond@@ ora y’abantu bitabye Imana, iyo m@@ yir@@ ond@@ oro yose bakaba ari yo bifash@@ ishaga bahamagara imiryango n’inshuti z’@@ abo bantu@@ ”. Yakomeje avuga ko aba bagabo bakundaga kujya mu nzu z@@ icuruza serivisi za murandasi (@@ internet Caf@@ é@@ ), bakareba abantu b@@ ibagiwe gufunga im@@ eli zabo (@@ email@@ s) cyangwa se abasize baf@@ unguye amadosiye yabo ariho imyirondoro yabo. Ati “Hari abir@@ irwa bazenguruka mu nzu z@@ icuruza serivisi za murandasi (@@ Cy@@ b@@ er Caf@@ é@@ ), bakareba niba hari abantu b@@ ibagiwe gufunga im@@ eli zabo (@@ email@@ ), cyangwa ko hari ab@@ ibagiwe gufunga amadosiye yabo, bagah@@ era ko batwara imyirondoro bakaz@@ ahamagara cyangwa bakam@@ wand@@ ikira. Hari n’abah@@ amagara abantu bakababwira ko batsindiye amafaranga runaka muri t@@ ombora y’ibigo by’@@ itumanaho, ariko kugira ngo baz@@ abone ayo mafaranga cyangwa ibihembo batsind@@ iye, bakababwira ko bagomba kugira amafaranga batang@@ a”. Imibare itangwa n’urwego rw’igihugu rw’ubugenzacyaha (RIB@@ ), igaragaza ko kuva uyu mwaka wa 2019 watang@@ ira, bakiriye ibirego bigera kuri 44@@ 6 bijyanye n’ubw@@ ambuzi bush@@ ukana, abantu 7@@ 67 bakaba bamaze gufatirwa muri ibyo byaha. Raporo kandi igaragaza ko muri icyo gihe cyose, aba bajura bamaze kwambura abantu amafaranga y’u Rwanda abarirwa muri miliyoni cumi n’@@ eshanu (15@@ ,000,000@@ Frw@@ s). Umuvugizi w’urwego rw’igihugu rw’ubugenzacyaha (RIB@@ ), Umuhoza Marie Mich@@ elle, avuga ko ibirego byinshi biba bijyanye n’abantu bavuga ko bash@@ utswe ko batoranyijwe kujya mu mahugurwa mu mahanga, cyangwa bagah@@ amagarwa babwirwa ko batsindiye amafaranga cyangwa ibihembo bihenze mu bigo by’@@ itumanaho. Yagize ati “Hari abaz@@ ana ibirego bijyanye no kuba bar@@ ashyize amafaranga yabo mu bigo bikoresha amafaranga mu buryo bwa murandasi (c@@ ry@@ p@@ t@@ o-@@ c@@ ur@@ r@@ ency sc@@ am@@ s, con@@ men@@ ), aho bababwira ko bazab@@ ungukira inshuro nyinshi z’@@ ayo bazaba baz@@ anye. Hari abakoresha inyandiko mpimbano biyita abayobozi mu bigo bikomeye, bagash@@ uka abantu ngo bajye bazana ibikoresho muri ibyo bigo babah@@ e amafaranga, cyane cyane baba babasaba kuzana ibikoresho by’@@ ikoranabuhanga, ibyuma by’@@ amamodoka n’ibind@@ i”. Yakomeje avuga ko hari n’abag@@ endana ibip@@ apuro bak@@ ase neza bakom@@ ekaho amadolari y’@@ Amerika, wabona ibyo bip@@ apuro ukagira ngo ni maz@@ ima, bakag@@ ush@@ uka ngo bagiye kuk@@ uv@@ unj@@ ira ahubwo bakaba bag@@ uhaye ibip@@ apuro bit@@ abara. Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP John Bosco Kabera, arasaba Abany@@ arw@@ ada kuba maso, bakirinda umuntu wese uza abash@@ ukisha ibitangaza, dore ko bakoresha amayeri menshi bigira abar@@ an@@ eza. Ati “Abantu bagomba kumenya ko ibyo tuvuga ari ukuri, ubwambuzi bush@@ ukana buriho ndetse cyane, barimo kwih@@ uriza mu matsinda atandukanye bagakoresha amayeri menshi yo kwambura abantu. Nih@@ agira uguh@@ amagara akubwira ko watsindiye ibihembo runaka ntuk@@ amw@@ em@@ erere@@ ”. Yakomeje ashishikariza Abanyarwanda kugera ikirenge mu cya Uwamahoro Claud@@ ine, bakajya babanza gush@@ ish@@ oza, bakirinda guhita bemera ibyo umuntu wese ababw@@ iye, kuko bariya bamb@@ uzi baba bar@@ afashe umwanya wo kwiga ku muntu bagiye kwam@@ bur@@ a, bakamenya aho afite intege nkeya bakaba ariho bahera bag@@ ush@@ uka bakak@@ wam@@ bur@@ a. Yabasabye kandi kujya bihutira gutanga amakuru hakiri kare ku nzego z’umutekano. Abantu kandi bagirwa inama yo kujya bihutira guhamagara Polisi y’u Rwanda cyangwa urwego rw’igihugu rw’ubugenzacyaha (RIB@@ ), igihe hari umuntu bak@@ ets@@ eho kuba ari mu bikorwa bw’@@ ubwambuzi bush@@ ukana, bakaba bahamagara kuri telefoni zik@@ urik@@ i: 112 (@@ iza Polisi y’u Rwanda) naho RIB bak@@ itabaza 16@@ 6. Bashobora no guhamagara kuri 0788@@ 3@@ 11@@ 15@@ 2, 0788@@ 3@@ 11@@ 8@@ 29 bakaba bahabwa ubufasha bwihuse. Urwego rw’@@ ubushinjacyaha buvuga ko umubare munini w’@@ abafat@@ irwa muri ibyo byaha bah@@ amwa n’ibyaha bagahabwa ibihano bitandukanye mu gihe hari n’andi mad@@ osiye arimo gukir@@ ikir@@ anwa mu bush@@ injacyaha. Ibihano Itegeko nº@@ 68/2018 ryo ku wa 30@@ /08/201@@ 8, riteganya ibyaha n’ibihano muri rusange mu ngingo yaryo ya 17@@ 4, rivuga ko umuntu wese wih@@ esha umutungo w’@@ undi, imari ye yose cyangwa igice cyayo mu buryo bw’@@ uburig@@ anya, yiy@@ itiriye izina ritari ryo cyangwa umurimo ad@@ afitiye ububasha, cyangwa ak@@ izeza icyiza cyangwa agat@@ inyisha ko hari ikibi kiz@@ aba, aba akoze icyaha. Iyo abihamijwe n’urukiko, ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’imyaka ibiri (2) ariko kitarenze imyaka itatu (3@@ ), n’ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda atari munsi ya miliyoni eshatu (3@@ .000.000 FRW@@ ), ariko atarenze miliyoni eshanu (5@@ .000.000 FRW). Iyo icyo cyaha gikozwe n’umuntu kugira ngo atange impapuro z’@@ inyemez@@ amig@@ abane, z’@@ in@@ yem@@ ezam@@ y@@ enda, inyandiko zig@@ ereranywa n’@@ amafaranga, imigabane cyangwa indi nyandiko yose ifite agaciro k’@@ ifar@@ anga, ari ibya sosiyete y’@@ ubucuruzi, iby’@@ ikigo g@@ icuruza cyangwa iby’@@ urug@@ anda, igihano kiba igifungo kitari munsi y’imyaka itatu (3) ariko kitarenze imyaka itanu (5@@ ), n’ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda arenze miliyoni eshanu (5@@ .000.000 FRW) ariko atarenze miliyoni zirindwi (7@@ .000.000 FRW). Rutsiro: Umukuru w'umudugudu yakubiswe mu gihe yarimo akemura ikibazo cy'@@ abaturage Nz@@ abig@@ ir@@ ante Fabien uyobora umudugudu wa Nyamasheke mu kagari ka Murambi, umurenge wa Mus@@ asa mu karere ka Rutsiro yakubiswe n'abantu batanu bo mu muryango umwe, mu gihe yarimo akemura ikibazo umwe muri abo bam@@ ukubise yari afitanye n'umwana wari umaze guta amafaranga. Ku itariki 01@@ /06/2013 mu ma saa kumi z'umugoroba ni bwo uwo mukuru w'umudugudu yari hafi yo mu rugo iwe, abona haje umwana w'umukobwa uri mu kigero cy'imyaka 15 y'amavuko arimo kurira amubwira ko ataye amafaranga 33@@ 20 kandi ko ator@@ aguwe n'umuntu witwa Nt@@ abang@@ uw@@ abo Thom@@ as. Nt@@ abang@@ uw@@ abo yahise agera aho uwo mwana n'umukuru w'umudugudu bari bah@@ agaze, bamubajije aho amafaranga ator@@ aguye ay@@ ashyize ababwira ko ay@@ ahaye uwitwa Ntakirutimana Benjamin bakunze kwita Se@@ bagabo kuko yay@@ ator@@ aguye amubona ahita amubwira ko ari we wari uy@@ at@@ aye. Uwo mukuru w'umudugudu yahise ah@@ amagaza Ntakirutimana amubaza niba ayo mafaranga ba@@ yamuhaye ariko arabih@@ akana avuga ko ntayo Nt@@ abang@@ uw@@ abo yamuh@@ aye. Uw@@ at@@ oye ayo mafaranga yavuze ko yari ari mu g@@ af@@ uka gat@@ ukura gac@@ itse im@@ ash@@ ini, uwo mukobwa wari umaze kuy@@ ata na we bamubajije avuga ko yari ari mu g@@ af@@ uka gat@@ ukura gac@@ itse im@@ ash@@ ini, ariko uwo ba@@ yahaye wavugaga ko ari we uy@@ ataye we akomeza guhakana ko ntayo yabon@@ ye, ko nta n'ayo bamuh@@ aye. Mu gihe bari bakomeje kw@@ inginga Ntakirutimana ngo ay@@ asub@@ ize uwo mukobwa wari uy@@ at@@ aye, hahise hag@@ era mukuru wa Ntakirutimana witwa Nk@@ in@@ amub@@ anzi Augustin bakunze kwita Nt@@ ambar@@ a, ababwira ko nta muntu uri buk@@ ore kuri murumuna we ngo amw@@ emer@@ ere. Abaturage bari hafi aho bavuga ko Se@@ bagabo na Ntambara na murumuna wabo witwa Nam@@ baj@@ imana Alexis n'umuhungu wa Ntambara n'umugore wa Ntambara bose hamwe uko ari batanu bahise baduk@@ ira uwo mukuru w'umudugudu bar@@ amukubita ata ubwenge, yongera kuz@@ anz@@ amuka ageze kwa muganga ku kigo nderabuzima cya Kay@@ ov@@ e. Afite ibikomere mu mutwe byaturutse ku mabuye bamut@@ eye. Uwo mukuru w'umudugudu avuga ko icy@@ amuz@@ ah@@ aje ari amabuye atatu bamut@@ eye@@ mu mutwe, n'@@ irindi buye bam@@ uteye mu mug@@ ongo, ndetse n'@@ inkoni bam@@ ukubise mu bit@@ ugu. Babiri mu bakubise uwo mukuru w'umudugudu ari bo Nam@@ baj@@ imana na Ntakirutimana bahise batabwa muri yombi na Polisi bafung@@ irwa kuri sitasiyo ya Kay@@ ov@@ e, mu gihe Nt@@ ambar@@ a, umugore we n'umuhungu we bo bahise bacika barah@@ unga, ariko Ntambara yahisemo kwiz@@ ana kuri Polisi ikorera mu murenge wa Gih@@ ango tariki 04@@ /06/2013 nyuma y'uko umwe mu bavug@@ wagaho kumuh@@ isha yari yarafashwe ag@@ afungwa. Umukuru w'umudugudu wa Nyamasheke wakub@@ iswe akeka ko ibyam@@ ukor@@ ewe byari byateguwe kuko at@@ iyumvisha ukuntu abantu batanu bo mu muryango umwe bose bahise bah@@ ahurira bagafatanya kum@@ ukub@@ ita. Uwo mukuru w'umudugudu akeka ko intandaro y'@@ urwo rug@@ omo yagiriwe ishobora kuba ari uko yakundaga guca imanza ndetse no gufatira ibihano Ntambara kubera amakosa akunda gukora yo gutuka abandi baturage ku babyeyi babo mu gihe yabaga yany@@ weye inzoga. Nz@@ abig@@ ir@@ ante Fabien wakub@@ iswe asaba inzego zibifitiye ubushobozi kujya z@@ ifatira ibyemezo bikomeye bene abo baturage bat@@ ubaha abayobozi babo, mu gihe akenshi bitanga bak@@ iyemeza gukemura ibibazo by'abaturage nta n'@@ igihembo bateg@@ ereje. Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko amaraso agenewe indembe hamwe muri Afurika aba arimo malaria Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe ku bubiko bw’@@ amaraso ahabwa indembe muri Afurika, bwagaragaje ko mu duce tumwe tw’@@ Afurika nibura mu bubiko bun@@ e, hari bumwe buba burimo umug@@ era utera mal@@ ar@@ ia. Impuguke z’@@ Abongereza zag@@ enz@@ uye inyigo 26 zagiye zig@@ aragazwa ku gupima umug@@ era wa Pl@@ as@@ mod@@ ium utera malaria mu bantu batanga amaraso muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sah@@ ara, hagati y’umwaka wa 2000 na 2017, maze usanga abantu 23@@ .@@ 46@@ % batanze amaraso bari baw@@ ufite. Gusa ijanisha ryagiye rih@@ indagurika bijyanye n’@@ uduce tw@@ akoz@@ wemo isuz@@ uma, hagati ya 0% na 7@@ 4%. Izo nyigo 26 zirimo ebyiri ebyiri zo muri Afurika y’Amajyaruguru, Iburasirazuba n’iyo hagati@@ ; n’@@ inyigo 14 zo muri Afurika y’Ibur@@ engerazuba. Dr Philippe Gu@@ er@@ in uyobora ikigo cy’ubushakashatsi kuri mal@@ ar@@ ia, Worl@@ d@@ w@@ ide Ant@@ im@@ al@@ ari@@ al Res@@ ist@@ ance Networ@@ k , akaba n’umwarimu mu kigo cyitwa “@@ Centre for Trop@@ ical Medic@@ ine and Global He@@ alth@@ ’ cya Kaminuza ya Ox@@ for@@ d, yavuze ko byagaragaye ko hari igipimo kinini cy’abantu batanga amaraso bafite umug@@ era utera mal@@ ar@@ ia, bityo ikaba yaba iri no mu bubiko bwayo bwag@@ utse. Ibyo ngo bituma hakenewe gusuzuma mu buryo bwihariye amaraso mbere y’uko ahabwa ind@@ ebe ziy@@ ak@@ eneye. Dr Gu@@ er@@ in wayoboye ubu bushakashatsi, yagaragaje ibyab@@ uv@@ uyemo kuri uyu wa Mbere, mu nama ya mpuzamahanga ya karindwi yiga ku kurwanya malaria muri Afurika, yaberaga i Dakar muri Seneg@@ al. Ubusanzwe amaraso abikwa abanza gusuzumwa indwara zose ariko Dr Gu@@ er@@ in avuga ko buri gihe isuzuma rid@@ akorwa uko bikwiye ndetse ubushobozi bwa za laboratwari zose ntib@@ uz@@ ishyira ku rwego rwo kubona udukoko dutera mal@@ ar@@ ia, cyane iyo virusi yinjiye mu rug@@ ingo igas@@ inz@@ irir@@ iramo cyangwa iyo iri mu muntu utarag@@ aragaza ibimenyetso. Sel@@ ali Fi@@ am@@ anya, umushakashatsi muri Worl@@ d@@ w@@ ide Ant@@ im@@ al@@ ari@@ al Res@@ ist@@ ance Networ@@ k, wan@@ agize uruhare muri ubu bushakashatsi yagize ati “@@ Ing@@ orane tekiniki mu gusuzuma no kuvana im@@ igera ya Pl@@ as@@ mod@@ ium mu bubiko bw’@@ amaraso zisaba igenzura rih@@ agij@@ e,” Ubusanzwe ngo abatanga amaraso ni abantu bakuru, ku buryo usanga nko mu duce dufite malaria nyinshi, baba baramaze kwiy@@ ubakamo ubudahangarwa ku mug@@ era wa malaria ku buryo bashobora kuy@@ igend@@ ana igihe batarag@@ aragaza uburwayi. Aba bashakashatsi bagaragaza ko nko muri iki gice cya Afurika, usanga abantu bahabwa amaraso ku bwinshi ari abagore batwite n’abana bato. Gu@@ er@@ in yongeyeho ati “@@ Gutanga amaraso ni uburyo bw’@@ ubut@@ abazi. Igik@@ enewe ni ugus@@ uzuma ibyago bihari, hag@@ ashyirwaho ingamba mu kubik@@ um@@ ira.” Yavuze ko hakenewe ko ibihugu bikoresha ibyuma bifite ubushobozi bwo gutahura ingano ya Pl@@ as@@ mod@@ ium uko ingana kose, amaraso ak@@ itabwaho hifashishijwe imiti ivura malaria cyangwa ikoranabuhanga mu kuy@@ ungurura amaraso mbere y’uko ahabwa ind@@ embe. I@@ byago byo kwand@@ urira malaria mu guhererekanya amaraso ngo ntibir@@ amenyekana neza igipimo bir@@ iho, gusa abahanga bag@@ en@@ ekereza ko muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara biri hagati ya 14 na 28@@ %. Ubu iri tsinda rir@@ ateganya gutangira ubundi bushakashatsi ku buryo bwo kwandura malaria igihe uhawe amaraso arimo Pl@@ as@@ mod@@ ium, no kugenda has@@ uzuma ibyago byihariye kuri buri guh@@ ugu.

Dr HABYARIMANA yavuze ko u Rwanda rw@@ aciye mu mateka mabi , avuga ko nta kizere cy'amahoro cyari k@@ igih@@ ari. Dr HABYARIMANA yagize ati :"@@ uyu munsi rero mu Rwanda twe tuw@@ uha agaciro kubera amateka yacu kubera ko u Rwanda hari igihe rwag@@ ezemo d@@ uta ikizere yuko umunyarwanda adashobora kongera kugira amahoro. Niyo mpamvu abanyarwanda tugomba kwizihiza tugas@@ abana ,@@ tuk@@ ishimira ibyiza bimaze kug@@ erwah@@ o." Uyu muyobozi kandi yibukije abanyarwanda ko umuntu atab@@ uzwa amahoro n'intambara gusa avuga ko n'@@ ubukene bushobora kubuza umuntu amahoro, ahera ko asaba abanyarwanda kwiteza imbere@@ .@@ Yagize ati : "@@ tugomba guhora tuzirikana ko amahoro agomba gusig@@ as@@ irwa kuko amahoro atari uk@@ utagira intambara gusa ahubwo ni no kwiteza imbere tukagira imibereho myiz@@ a: kugira icyo kurya, aho ur@@ yam@@ a,@@ kubona amashur@@ i,@@ kwivuza n'ibind@@ i." Amerika yongereye amahirwe Abanyarwanda b@@ oherez@@ ayo ibicuruzwa Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (US@@ A) z@@ ongereye ub@@ ubare w'@@ ibicuruzwa biva mu Rwanda bijya kugurish@@ iriz@@ wayo bit@@ ishuye amahoro. Minisitiri Kanimba na Ambasaderi wa USA mu Rwanda, Er@@ ica J. Bar@@ ks Rug@@ gl@@ es, mu kiganiro n'abany@@ amakuru. B@@ yatang@@ arijwe mu kiganiro Minisitiri w'@@ Ubucuruzi n'@@ Ing@@ anda, François Kanimba na Ambasaderi wa USA mu Rwanda, Er@@ ica J. Bar@@ ks Rug@@ gl@@ es, bagiranye n'abanyamakuru kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 2 Kanama 2016. Bag@@ aragazaga urutonde rw'@@ ibicuruzwa 27 bizajya byinjira muri USA bit@@ ishyuye amahoro, byiganjemo imit@@ ako, ibikomoka ku mp@@ u, ku buhinzi n'imy@@ enda, aho 16 muri ibyo ari bishya. Gilbert Kubw@@ imana, umuyobozi wa Songa Des@@ ign@@ s Rwanda, sosiyete isanzwe yohereza ibicuruzwa muri USA, avuga ko aya ari amahirwe akomeye yo kwagura ibikor@@ wa. Abanyamakuru n'abandi bitabiriye iki kig@@ aniro. Yagize ati "Ni amahirwe akomeye kuba USA izam@@ uye umubare w'@@ ibi bicuruzwa kuko tugiye kongera ibyo tw@@ oherez@@ ag@@ ayo ndetse n'ab@@ ifuzaga gukora ibi byash@@ ara bakaz@@ it@@ irwa n'@@ ubuk@@ e bw'@@ ibyem@@ erewe kwinj@@ ir@@ ayo bit@@ ishyuye amahoro bagiye gukora bisanz@@ uye." Avuga ko imbogamizi basigaranye ari ari iz'@@ igiciro cy'@@ ubwikorezi by'@@ ibyoherezwa muri USA kikiri hejuru, gusa ngo barimo kucy@@ igaho ku bufatanye na MINI@@ CO@@ M. Minisitiri w'@@ Ubucuruzi n'@@ Ing@@ anda, François Kan@@ imba, avuga ko iyi gahunda yat@@ ek@@ erejweho hagamijwe kuzamura aban@@ yeng@@ anda nto n'iz@@ ic@@ iriritse. Ati "Iyi gahunda izatuma aban@@ yeng@@ anda nto n'iz@@ iciriritse bo mu Rwanda babona abacuruzi bo muri Amerika bazafatanya mu bucuruzi kuko bo bamenyereye isoko, bityo kwinj@@ izayo ibicuruzwa bikor@@ oha ndetse abo bakorana bakabafasha kumenya uko ibicuruzwa by@@ ifuzwa bigomba kuba bit@@ eye@@ ." Yongeraho ko ibi biri muri gahunda yo guteza imbere "M@@ ade in Rwanda@@ ", kugira ngo icyuho kiri hagati y'@@ ibyoherezwa hanze n'iby@@ injira kig@@ aban@@ uke kuko iby@@ injira ngo bikiri byinshi cyane. Ambasaderi wa USA mu Rwanda, Er@@ ica J. Nyanza: Umusore afungiye gushaka gusambanya nyina ku ngufu Kuri sitasiyo ya polisi ya Busasamana mu Karere ka Nyanza h@@ afungiye umusore w'imyaka 27 y'amavuko ukurikir@@ anweho gushaka gusambanya nyina ku ngufu tariki 9@@ /12/201@@ 4 ahagana saa yine z'@@ ijoro, mu Mudugudu wa K@@ idat@@ urwa mu Kagari ka Ng@@ wa ko mu Murenge wa Muk@@ ingo mu Karere ka Nyanza. Uyu musore ngo yah@@ ond@@ aguye ku rugi rw'@@ icyumba nyina aryam@@ amo amut@@ it@@ iriza cyane ngo nam@@ ufung@@ urire bakor@@ ane ibyo we yitaga imibonano mpuzabitsina, ubwo byari bikomeye nyina nibwo yavug@@ ije induru atabar@@ wa n'abaturanyi bamut@@ esha uwo muhungu we wari ufite uwo mugambi wo kumus@@ amb@@ anya. Abaturanyi b'@@ uru rugo iyi nd@@ uru itabaza y@@ umvikan@@ iyemo bafashe uyu musore bam@@ ushyikiriza polisi y'igihugu ikorera mu Karere ka Nyanza, ubu ni nayo im@@ uc@@ umbikiye kuri sitasiyo ya Busasamana nk'uko Mug@@ anam@@ fura Sylv@@ est@@ re, umunyam@@ banga Nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Muk@@ ingo yabitangarije Kigali Today@@ . Mug@@ anam@@ fura yagize ati "N@@ ibyo koko ibyo bintu by@@ abayeho, hari umusore nyina yat@@ abaje avuga ko ashaka kumus@@ ambanya ku ngufu, yat@@ abawe uwo musore ashyikirizwa polisi kugira ngo itangire kubikor@@ aho iperereza ryim@@ bit@@ se@@ ". Bamwe mu baturage babonye uyu musore akimara gutabwa muri yombi umugambi we ubur@@ iyemo babwiye umunyam@@ banga Nshingwabikorwa w'uyu Murenge wa Muk@@ ingo ko nta kibazo cy'@@ ubusinzi cyangwa gutakaza ubwenge yari afite mu buryo bugaragarira amaso. Si ubwa mbere uyu musore agerageje gusambanya nyina ku ngufu Nk'uko abaturanyi b'@@ uru rugo babih@@ am@@ ije, ngo uyu musore si ubwa mbere agerageje iyi myitwarire mibi yo gushaka gusambanya nyina ku ngufu. Hari uwagize ati "Hari ubwo n'ubundi yabonye nyina ak@@ enyeye igit@@ enge avuye koga aramus@@ imb@@ ukira ashaka kumus@@ ambanya avuga ko amafaranga atanga mu ndaya ari menshi kandi ibyo aba az@@ ikurikir@@ anyeho ngo aba abis@@ ize iwab@@ o". Ngo icyo gihe nabwo byaram@@ enyekanye ariko birinda kub@@ iha uburemere nk'uko abaturanyi b'uyu muryango bakomeza babivuga. Umuyobozi wa Polisi y'igihugu ikorera mu Karere ka Nyanza, Chief Inspector of the Police ( C@@ IP) David Nkund@@ imana yabwiye Kigali Today ko uyu musore acumbikiwe kuri sitasiyo ya Busasamana mu gihe hag@@ ikomeje gukorwa iperereza ngo hamenyekane ko ibyo akekwaho ari ukuri. Abajijwe niba uyu musore imyitwarire ye yari isanzwe ih@@ w@@ itse mu gace atu@@ yemo, CIP Nkund@@ imana yasubije ko yari ku rutonde rw'abantu bivugwa ko ari Ibih@@ azi (@@ ban@@ anir@@ anye@@ ). Yagize ati "Ubu tugiye gukurikirana ibigize icyaha tumenye ko mu by'ukuri uyu mugambi wo gusambanya nyina ku ngufu yari aw@@ ufite. Mbese ubu turi mu iperereza nka polis@@ i". Mu mategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda nta ngingo n'imwe yateg@@ anyijwe ihana umwana gusambanya nyina ku ngufu, gusa hagaragaramo ingingo zih@@ ana ibyaha by'@@ urukozas@@ oni, gukorana imibonano mpuzabitsina n'@@ it@@ ungo, gusambanya umwana ndetse no gukoresha imibonano muz@@ ab@@ itsina ku gahato kuva mu ngingo y'@@ 18@@ 2 kugeza mu ngingo ya 20@@ 3 y'@@ igitabo cy'amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda. Gicumbi: Abajyanama b'ubuzima bah@@ omb@@ ejwe asaga miliyoni 40@@ RW@@ f Abajyanama b'ubuzima mu Murenge wa Rukomo mu Karere ka Gicumbi, bamaze imyaka ine bas@@ iragira ku mafaranga bah@@ omb@@ ejwe n'ubuyobozi asaga miliyoni 40@@ RW@@ f. Abajyanama bakora akazi gakomeye ko gufasha abaturage mu byerekeye n'ubuzima (Ph@@ oto Internet) Aya mafaranga yabo bavuga ko bayah@@ omb@@ ejwe n'ubuyobozi bw'@@ ikigo nderabuzima cya Gis@@ iza guhera mu muk@@ wa wa 2013, ubwo bari mu mushinga wo kubaka amazu y'@@ amacumbi kuri iki kigo nder@@ abuzima. Nyuma y'amafaranga bagenerwa na Leta, aba bajyanama bafashe icyemezo cyo gukora umushinga wo kubaka umuc@@ umbi, ubundi akajya ab@@ injiriza bakiteza imbere. Nyuma yo kunoza uyu mug@@ ambi, bibumbiye muri koperative Kom@@ era ku Buz@@ ima, batangira gukora ibikorwa byo guhuriza hamwe amaboko batangira gus@@ iza ikibanza cy'@@ ahazubakwa aya mac@@ umbi, nk'uko bishimangirwa na Muhawenimana Vir@@ ig@@ in@@ ie, uyobora iyi k@@ operative. Avuga bamaze gutangira ibi bikorwa mu kibanza bag@@ ur@@ iye, hahise haza umuyobozi w'ikigo nderabuzima cya Gis@@ iza, Niyo@@ yita Hus@@ sen@@ , ar@@ abahag@@ arika, ababwira ko ibyo barimo bataz@@ abish@@ obora, abasaba kubanza gutanga isoko, kugira ngo bikor@@ we n'abafite ubwubatsi mu nshingano zabo. Ati "@@ Yar@@ at@@ ubwiye ngo dushobora kuz@@ abir@@ yan@@ iramo, avuga ko dushyiraho isoko ab@@ ubatsi bakaza bakar@@ ip@@ ig@@ anira, ubundi ngo amafaranga akajya asoh@@ orwa n'@@ umucungamutungo w'iki kigo nd@@ ere@@ baz@@ ima, kuko ngo twe ntit@@ wari kub@@ ibash@@ a." Iki gihe ngo abajyanama barab@@ yem@@ eye, bap@@ iganisha isoko, ariko ngo nabwo sibo babigizemo uruhare, maze isoko r@@ itsind@@ irwa n'uwitwa Nt@@ ibaz@@ uk@@ ob@@ imeze J@@ ose. Ati "T@@ war@@ amw@@ anze kuko ntawe twari tuzi ndetse ntaho tuzi yigeze yubak@@ ish@@ a." Aba bajyanama bamaze kumw@@ anga, ngo bategetswe na Niyo@@ yita Hus@@ sen@@ , ku mw@@ emera, abizeza ko nta kibazo kiz@@ abaho, baz@@ ashyiraho umug@@ enzura imirimo ikagenda neza. Bar@@ emeye imirimo ir@@ atang@@ ira. Aya mazu ngo bagombaga kuy@@ ahabwa nyuma y'@@ em@@ ezi abiri gusa, ariko ngo byageze mu kwezi kwa Gatanu 2013, amazu ar@@ ahagarara rwiyemezamirimo aray@@ ata arag@@ enda. Nyuma yo kumara igihe kinini aya mazu arimo kw@@ angirika, ngo uyu muyobozi w'ikigo nderabuzima yabaz@@ aniye undi muf@@ undi ngo bag@@ irane amasezerano mashya, ban@@ amw@@ ishyura amafaranga nubwo atigeze yishyura abo yakoresheje mu gihe gito yakoze. Abanyamuryango ba koperative Kom@@ era ku Buz@@ ima, bakavuga ko nubwo ikibazo bakig@@ ejeje mu nkiko ariko bari mu gah@@ inda, kubera gushaka gukora ibishoboka ngo biteze imbere, ariko bakab@@ angamirwa n'aba@@ bash@@ inzwe. Niyo@@ yita Hus@@ sen@@ , umuyobozi w'iki kigo nderabuzima ariko ubu wak@@ im@@ utseho akajyanwa mu cyo mu Murenge wa Rut@@ are, ahakana aya makuru yivuye inyuma, akavuga atazi uko bah@@ om@@ bye. Ati "@@ Rwose abo bantu sinzi uko bah@@ om@@ bye, kuko njye n@@ abafashije uko nagombaga kubafash@@ a, rero b@@ imb@@ eshyera rwose njye nta ruhare nab@@ ig@@ izemo. Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Gicumbi Mudaheranwa Juven@@ al, avuga ko iki kibazo kiri mu nkiko, ko bityo nta byinshi yak@@ ivug@@ aho, ko ahubwo abantu ba@@ kwitonda inkiko zikaba arizo ziz@@ ashyira ahagaragara ukuri. Aba bajyanama b'@@ ubuzima, bavuga ko uretse izi miliyoni 40@@ Frw bah@@ om@@ bye, ko bari banafite ubworozi bw'@@ ingurube bukomeye, izigera kuri 68 zig@@ apfa, kuko zitab@@ onaga ibyiza zir@@ ya bitewe nuko kon@@ te yabo yari yar@@ afunzwe kubera imanza barimo.
McKinstry wiruk@@ anywe mu Mavubi ashobora gutoza muri Ghana Jonathan Mc@@ kin@@ stry wahoze utoza ikipe y'Igihugu y'@@ Umupira w'@@ Amaguru mu Rwanda,@@ Amavubi, akaza kwirukanwa kubera umusaruro muke, yasabye akazi ko gutoza ikipe ya He@@ ar@@ ts of O@@ ak yo muri Ghana. Mc@@ kin@@ stry utari ufite akazi kuva muri Kanama ava mu Rwanda, ikinyamakuru ghan@@ as@@ oc@@ c@@ ern@@ et@@ .com cyatangaje ko yamaze gusaba gutoza ikipe yo mu Murwa mukuru w'iki gihugu, Ac@@ cr@@ a, ya He@@ ar@@ ts of O@@ ak idafite umut@@ oza. Uyu mutoza w'imyaka 31, afite amahirwe yo kubona aka kazi ahanini kubera ko yakoreye muri iki gihugu abwo mu 2010 yatozaga mu ishuri ryigisha umupira w'amaguru, Right to Dream Academy aho yatangiriye mbere yo kujya gutoza Sierra Leone muri 2013-@@ 2014. Mc@@ kin@@ stry yatoje u Rwanda kuva muri Werurwe 2015 ar@@ ufasha kugera ku mukino wa nyuma wa Cecafa y'ibihugu yabereye muri Ethiopia no mu gikombe cya Afurika cy'@@ abakina imbere mu bihugu byabo cyabereye mu Rwanda, aho yarug@@ ejeje muri 1/@@ 8. Gusa yaje gusezererwa muri Kanama uyu mwaka bitewe n'uko u Rwanda rwari rukomeje kwitwara nabi ndetse ruri no kumanuka bikabije ku rutonde ngarukakwezi rwa FIFA aho yari yar@@ usanze ku mwanya wa 68 ku Isi yirukanwa rugeze ku wa 12@@ 1. Imiti ikomeje gufasha abagabo bagira ikibazo cyo kurangiza vuba Mu gihe cy’imibonano mpuzabitsina hari abagabo bakunze kugira ikibazo cyo kurangiza vuba, abenshi bik@@ abab@@ angamira kandi bikaba intandaro yo kud@@ ashimisha abagore babo. Uretse ko n’umugore aba ab@@ angamiwe n’uko at@@ ishimira imibonano mpuzabitsina kubera ko umugabo we ahita arangiza ,@@ n’abagabo bafite iki kibazo bahora babangamiwe kubera ko baba batabasha kugaragaza ubugabo bwabo aho bush@@ ing@@ iye. Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko hagati y’abagabo 30% na 35 % baba bafite iki kibazo. K@@ iri mu bibazo bihangayikishije abagabo benshi mu mpande z’isi yose. Niba uri umugabo ukaba ufite iki kibazo ntiw@@ ihebe ngo uk@@ eke ko ari wowe wenyine. Muri iyi nkuru turar@@ ebera hamwe ibibazo byose wibaza ku kurangiza vuba (E@@ j@@ acul@@ ation Pr@@ éc@@ os@@ e) ndetse n’ubufasha ku bafite iki kibazo. Kur@@ angiza vuba babivuga ryari ? Umugabo urangiza atab@@ ishaka mbere y’uko yinjiza igitsina cye mu cy’umugore cyangwa se akar@@ angiza mu gihe kitarenze iminota 2 igikorwa cy’imibonano mpuzabitsina kig@@ itangira, bavuga ko yarangije vuba. Ibi bikaba bim@@ ubaho buri gihe uko agiye gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Iki kibazo kiri mu byiciro bibir@@ i: 1. Umugabo wahuye nacyo kuva aho yatangiriye gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina big@@ akomez@@ a,@@ kurangiza vuba bikam@@ ubaho akar@@ ande. 2. Hari n’igihe umugabo aba yar@@ ahoze abasha kuyobora ukur@@ angiza kwe (C@@ ont@@ rol@@ er l’@@ é@@ j@@ c@@ ul@@ ation) ariko nyuma akajya arangiza vuba kuburyo butung@@ uranye. Ni Iz@@ ihe mpamvu zituma umugabo arangiza vuba kandi atariko byah@@ oz@@ e? Iyo umugabo yabash@@ aga kurangiza igihe ab@@ ishakiye ,nyuma big@@ ahind@@ uka,@@ hari impamvu nyinshi zishobora kub@@ iter@@ a. Mur@@ izo twavug@@ a: Umun@@ aniro ukabije, ibibazo byinshi kandi atah@@ or@@ anye, Kw@@ ikin@@ isha, Kugira ubwoba mu gihe ukora imibonano no kut@@ igirira icyizere, Imis@@ emburo it@@ ameze neza mu mar@@ aso, Indwara zifata am@@ aby@@ a, Imp@@ an@@ uka,@@ Umuj@@ inya mwinshi, kugira isoni cyane,@@ . Indi mpamvu ishobora kuba intandaro yo kurangiza vuba k’@@ umugabo ni ug@@ ukorera imibonano mpuzabitsina ahantu hat@@ isanzuye cyangwa nawe ubwawe ud@@ at@@ uje. Ku bag@@ ikora imibonano bwa mbere rero, nta mpamvu yo guhangayika ngo wasanga nd@@ angiza vuba bitewe n’igihe wam@@ aze. Ni ibisanzwe ko ku mibonano ya mbere umugabo arangiza vuba kubera ko umubiri we n’ubw@@ onko biba bit@@ aram@@ enyera ibyo byiyumv@@ o bishy@@ ashya uterwa no gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Icyo rero uba ugomba gukora, ni ukwirinda kwihutira gukemura ikibazo cyawe (@@ kwik@@ und@@ a) ahubwo uk@@ ita cyane ku guteg@@ urana kuko aribyo bizatuma umeny@@ era imibonano bityo bik@@ azag@@ ufasha kujya wiy@@ obora mu bijyana n’igihe cyo kur@@ angir@@ iza. N@@ iki umugabo urangiza vuba yakora ngo abashe kub@@ ikira ? Icya mbere ni ukumenya ko ufite iki kibazo kandi ukaba ufite ubushake bwo kub@@ icik@@ aho. Indi nama isumba izindi ni ukwirinda imwe mu mpamvu ishobora kuba itera iki kibazo mu zo twavuze haruguru. Umugore wawe nawe birasaba ko mub@@ ig@@ aniraho mug@@ afat@@ anyiriza hamwe kurwanya uwo mw@@ anzi utuma igikorwa cy’@@ akabariro kit@@ agenda neza uko bikwiriye. Ariko hari n’indi tekiniki abagabo barangiza vuba bakw@@ ifashisha bikabafasha noneho kujya bashim@@ isha abagore babo bakabafasha no kugera ku byishimo byabo byany@@ um@@ a(@@ Or@@ gas@@ m@@ e). Inama zig@@ irwa abafite iki kibaz@@ o: •@@ It@@ ond@@ e,@@ imibonano mpuzabitsina si irushanwa. W@@ ih@@ ubag@@ urika ahubwo bigenze gah@@ oro. •@@ Mbere yo gitangira igikorwa banza uteg@@ ure umugore wawe bihagije, bityo amarangamutima n’iby@@ uy@@ umv@@ o byawe bigende ku murongo. •@@ Jya ugira igihe gisa n’@@ akaruhuko mu gihe uri mu gikorwa kuko uko ut@@ warwa n’@@ amarangamutima yawe, niko urangiza vuba ugas@@ igira umugore wawe ibibazo. Kera bikaz@@ avamo ubwumvikane buke no guca inyuma. •@@ Ugomba kwinjira mu gikorwa wabanje gukiranuka n’umugore wawe aho mut@@ umvikana, kwik@@ uramo ibibazo by’@@ akazi, kuruhuka bihagije. •@@ Kujya kwa muganga wab@@ yig@@ iye@@ (S@@ ex@@ olog@@ u@@ e). Nkuko iki kibazo kiba git@@ uruka mu mutwe ,@@ ntiw@@ akw@@ ifasha kug@@ ikem@@ ura. Guk@@ emura iki kibazo bisaba umuntu w’@@ inzobere mu mibonano mpuzabitsina. Gusa ngo muri bo abantu batanu barimo n’umwana w’imyaka 7 war@@ ibat@@ iwe hasi ubwo yari aguye nibo bakomeretse ku buryo bukomeye. Amas@@ engesho ni nk’@@ akay@@ oga gah@@ iye, iyo usomye intama ebyiri wumva ka m@@ orali kaj@@ e-@@ Pasiteri Mpyisi Pasiteri Ezra Mpyisi yagaragaje amasengesho nk’uburyo bwo gushaka kwir@@ ema agatima igihe abantu batar@@ asobanukirwa Imana bya ny@@ abyo, ibintu yagereranyije n’@@ akay@@ oga gah@@ iye kuko iyo umuntu agas@@ om@@ yeho agira akanyabug@@ abo. Pasiteri Mpyisi ni umusaza w’imyaka 95 uzwiho kugira im@@ ivugire n’imy@@ igishirize itandukanye n’iy’@@ abandi bapasiteri ndetse usanga igaruk@@ waho n’abantu batari bake. Ubwo yigishaga ijambo ry’Imana kuri Radio Ubuntu But@@ angaje mu kiganiro cyitwa ‘@@ Kumenya icy@@ anditswe kiri mu cy@@ andits@@ we’ yagarutse cyane ku bijyanye n’@@ ubum@@ ana cyangwa ubut@@ atu but@@ agatifu. Yagaragaje ko Yesu yari afite kamere y’umuntu n’iy’@@ ubum@@ ana akaba ari yo mpamvu nubwo yabaye ku isi atigeze akora icyaha kandi ko kuba yaraz@@ utse bigaragaza ubum@@ ana kuko nta mun@@ yabyaha waz@@ uka. Yasabye abantu kumva ko bishoboka ko umuntu y@@ abaho nk’umuntu mu bijyanye no kwambar@@ a, kurya n’ibindi ariko ku bijyanye no gutsinda icyaha akabaho afite ubum@@ ana muri we (@@ kamere y’@@ Iman@@ a) nk’uko Yesu yabayeho aho kumva ko amasengesho yabafasha batar@@ ahindutse. Aho niho yahereye agira ati “ Umuntu yarambwiye ati pas@@ ito, ibyawe bir@@ ansh@@ ob@@ eye, koko n@@ abaho gute nt@@ avuga amasengesho ko aribyo byo kurya by@@ anjye@@ ? Nar@@ avuze nti amasengesho aray@@ avuga akagira ka m@@ orali ahawe na sat@@ ani. Amas@@ engesho ni nk’@@ akay@@ oga gah@@ iye, iyo usomye intama ebyiri wumva ka m@@ orali k@@ aje, ariko amaherezo ya ka mor@@ al@@ i… Ng@@ ayo amasengesho ni ka m@@ orali kaz@@ ag@@ ukor@@ aho.” Yakomeje agira ati “N@@ amwe mw@@ umv@@ e, amasengesho se yakub@@ ujije gukora icyah@@ a? Yesu ntabwo yak@@ ijijwe n’amas@@ engesho, yak@@ ijijwe n’icy@@ ari kim@@ ur@@ im@@ o; kamere ebyiri iy’@@ umuntu n’iy’@@ Imana.” Uyu mukambwe avuga ko muri iyi minsi ashishikajwe cyane no kwigisha ibijyanye n’@@ ubum@@ ana n’ub@@ umuntu kuko ariho haz@@ ingiye ipfundo ryo gutuma abantu bamenya uko bab@@ ohorwa ub@@ ubat@@ a bw’@@ icyaha. Ati “ Nz@@ abigisha uko umuntu agira ubum@@ ana mu bw@@ onko, agak@@ izwa n’@@ ikiri mu bw@@ onko, ntak@@ izwe n’@@ ikiri mu ijuru@@ .@@ Ur@@ ataka se niba mu bwonko bwawe hatarimo ubum@@ ana butuma udakora ikibi ngo utabar@@ we n@@ and@@ e?” Yatanze urugero agaragaza ko iyo abantu nk’@@ icumi bafite ubum@@ ana mu bwonko usanga badas@@ amb@@ ana, batab@@ eshya , batang@@ ana. Ati “Ibyo usanga babih@@ uriyeho kuko ubum@@ ana ari bumwe ariko mu b@@ umuntu batanduk@@ anyijwe n’ibyo bar@@ ya, aho bat@@ uye,@@ ibyo bambara guty@@ o.” Y@@ akomoje ku bah@@ ahuzi b’@@ ibinyoma Mpyisi avuga ko igihe abantu bat@@ it@@ oje kugira Ub@@ umana mu bwonko usanga bajya za Kanyar@@ ira, Amerika n’ahandi ngo bagiye gush@@ akir@@ ayo ibisubizo maze Satani akab@@ ibaha koko. Ati “Abo satani ar@@ abav@@ angira, bakora iby’@@ Imana n’ibya sat@@ ani, ak@@ abav@@ angira, akag@@ uh@@ an@@ urira avuga ko ari iby’@@ Imana yamubwiye kandi akavuga ibya sat@@ ani. Imana ntabwo iba Kanyar@@ ira, Amerika, i M@@ aka n’ahandi kuko ibera hose icyar@@ imwe, nta w@@ ukwiriye kwiruk@@ ank@@ a.” Nt@@ iyemera ko Bibiliya ari igitabo cyera Yavuze ko usanga abantu bafata imyumvire yabo bagapfa kuvuga iby’@@ Imana, batan@@ aby@@ umva. Ati “ Ni nka Bibiliya tukay@@ ifata ngo ni igitabo cy’@@ Imana cy@@ era? Kandi kirimo umuntu, ik@@ era ite irimo umuntu@@ ? yandik@@ wa n’umun@@ tu, ishyirwa mu ndimi n’umuntu kandi mu rurimi rw’@@ umuntu wak@@ oc@@ amye narwo ruk@@ oc@@ am@@ ye@@ ?” Mpyisi uk@@ abakaba imyaka 95 kuko yavutse mu 19@@ 22, yabonye impamyabumenyi y’icyiciro cya kabiri cya kaminuza mu 196@@ 4. Musanze: Ibitaro bya Ruhengeri byat@@ ashye ikigo gitanga serivisi z'@@ ubuvuzi bw'@@ amaso Ibitaro bya Ruhengeri biherereye mu Karere ka Musanze byat@@ ashye ikigo gitanga serivisi z'@@ ubuvuzi cy@@ ubatswe ku nkunga y'Umuryango mpuzamahanga utegamiye kuri Leta, One S@@ ight watanze hafi miliyoni 300 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda. Ubusanzwe Ibitaro bya Ruhengeri byatang@@ aga serivisi z'@@ ubuvuzi bw'@@ amaso ku babig@@ ana ariko ibikoresho ugasanga ari ikibazo. Ariko ubu babonye ubushobozi bwo kubona ibikoresho bigezweho bizabafasha mu gusuzuma abarwayi b'@@ amaso n'@@ indorerwamo zo kubafasha kubona. Gus@@ uzumisha amaso iyi mash@@ ini, ngo bizaza bifata iminota itanu aho kuba 20. Kabera Joseph@@ ine, umukozi w'@@ Ibitaro bya Ruhengeri uvura amaso yavuze ko ubu bifata gusa iminota itanu bakaba bamaze gusuzuma umur@@ wayi, mu gihe mbere bakoreshaga iminota 20 bah@@ indur@@ anya ibir@@ ahuri bitandukanye mu gusuzuma amaso. Agira ati "Muri serivisi tw@@ atanga abarwayi ntibaz@@ ongera gutinda hano ntit@@ uzongera kugira umurongo muremure w'@@ abarwayi kuko tuz@@ aza tubas@@ uzuma mu gihe git@@ oya, natwe bizadufasha mu kazi kacu kuko twajyaga tuv@@ unika kubera ibikoresho bitag@@ ezweh@@ o." Mu gihe gito kiri imbere ngo ibi bitaro bizaba bishobora gusuzuma abarwayi 300 ku cyumweru, abakeneye indorerwamo zo kubona bazih@@ abwe ku mafaranga make. Hari gahunda yo kuz@@ ashinga uruganda rukora indorerwamo zo kubona mu Rwanda. Ikig@@ amijwe ni uko izo ndorerwamo ubu zikorerwa muri Amerika baz@@ ashinga uruganda ruz@@ ikora mu Rwanda kugira ngo baz@@ ibone ku mafaranga mak@@ e; nk'uko Umuyobozi Mukuru mu muryango One S@@ ight@@ , Mon@@ y I@@ yer yab@@ ishim@@ angiye. Dr. Jean Baptiste M@@ azar@@ ati ushinzwe laboratwari y'@@ ikitegererezo mu Kigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima (RB@@ C), yifashishije imibare ig@@ aragaraza uko serivisi z@@ egerejwe abaturage asanga Abanyarwanda bakwiye kub@@ ishimira ubuyobozi bukuru bw'@@ igihugu. Ati "Icyo tugomba gushima Perezida wa Repubulika ni uko icy@@ erekeye ubuzima yifuje ko buri Munyarwanda byamug@@ eraho vuba kandi kuri make, dufite ibitaro birindwi by'@@ icyerek@@ ezo, dufite ibitaro 37 by'@@ uturere dufite ibigo nderabuzima 50@@ 6 dufite abajyana b'ubuzima ibihumbi 450 tuk@@ ifuza ko buri kagari k@@ agira iv@@ urir@@ o." Kuva mu 1988@@ , umuryango One S@@ ight umaze gufasha abantu miliyoni 8,@@ 7 mu bihugu 41 ku isi, ukaba uteganya kugeza iyi serivisi no mu bigo nderabuzima bitandukanye byo mu gihugu. NSHIMIYIMANA Leonard
Big Boss wo mu Rwand@@ a! Ibit@@ eye amatsiko ku muraperi ub@@ yib@@ ushye wavug@@ ishije benshi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga Abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bamaze iminsi babona amashusho y’umugabo munini cyane w’@@ igik@@ ara, uba yik@@ okoye igice cyo hejuru, ari imbere ya mic@@ ro ari kuririmba inyana ya Hip Hop@@ . Aya mashusho yafatiwe mu nzu itunganya umuziki yitwa Black Star Records iherereye mu Mujyi wa Rubavu. Icy@@ atumye abantu ba@@ kwirakwiza aya mashusho si uko nyirayo yari ari kuririmba kuko ni ibis@@ anzwe, ahubwo uburyo yari ameze nibyo byat@@ unguye benshi. Kubona umugabo uk@@ uze, ub@@ yib@@ ushye inda, amabere (@@ igit@@ uz@@ a) biri hanze, ari kur@@ apa byatangaje benshi. Hari abavug@@ aga bati “ni Rick Ross wo mu Rwanda@@ !” IGIHE yashak@@ ishije amakuru kuri uyu mugabo, turag@@ anira. Y@@ itwa H@@ aban@@ abashaka Thomas afite imyaka 3@@ 8. Ar@@ ubatse afite umugore umwe n’abana batatu batuye mu Mujyi wa Rubavu. Ni umugabo ushy@@ itse dore ko apima ibiro 14@@ 5 ari naho yakuye izina ry’@@ ubuhanzi rya Big Bos@@ s. Ati “B@@ ig ni umuntu munini, Boss ni irindi rya kabiri nar@@ ih@@ aye, ntawe ns@@ abir@@ iza, nawe ur@@ abyumva ndi umuk@@ ire. Muri Rubavu ibyo kurya rwose turab@@ ifit@@ e.” H@@ aban@@ abashaka Thomas uzwi nka Big Boss iyo ari muri studio aba yiy@@ ambuye imyenda yo hejuru Uyu mugabo uganira ash@@ yenga cyane, yatangaje ko mu buzima busanzwe akora ubucuruzi. Big Boss yavuze ko iby’@@ umuziki abim@@ azemo umwaka umwe n’ubwo yatangiye kuw@@ ukunda akiri umwana. Ubu amaze gukora indirimbo yise ‘@@ Afurika Y@@ acu Nz@@ iz@@ a’ yamaze kujya hanze n’indi yitwa ‘@@ P@@ ererez@@ a’ ari nayo yatumye am@@ enyekana, gusa ntar@@ ayishyira hanze. Yavuze ko yahisemo gukora injyana ya Hip Hop kuko ari yo iny@@ uramo ubutumwa bukagera ku mitima y’abantu. Ati “@@ Burya injyana uy@@ umvira mu matwi ariko ubutumwa njye nibwo nemera cyane. H@@ abamo ubutumwa bw@@ injira neza.” Igitaramo nag@@ ikora nambaye ubusa Big Boss yavuze ko ubwo h@@ afatwaga amashusho ari kuririmba muri studio hashize ibyumweru bibiri. Impamvu yari yik@@ uyemo imyenda mu gice cyo hejuru, ngo ni uko hari h@@ ashyushye cyane akanga kub@@ angam@@ irwa. Ati “Hari hariho icy@@ uya cyinshi ndi gushy@@ a. Buri gihe niko mba meze mba nanga ibintu by@@ amb@@ angam@@ ira.” Kuba amashusho ye yar@@ akwirakw@@ ijwe, ahanini biturutse ku kuba yari yambaye ubusa hejuru, big@@ akubit@@ iraho n’@@ umubyimba we ud@@ asanzwe, yavuze ko nta pf@@ un@@ we byigeze bimut@@ era, kuko “@@ n’@@ igitaramo nag@@ ikora nambaye ubusa. None se nt@@ ubona ko na Rick Ross aririmba indirimbo yiy@@ ambar@@ iye ubus@@ a?” Big Boss yavuze ko amashusho ye yagiye hanze at@@ abizi, ndetse ko yatunguwe n’uburyo abantu benshi bamuh@@ amagaye bamubwira ko bamubon@@ ye, binatuma agira imbaraga zo gukora umuziki we, kuko yabonye ko wagera kure. ‘@@ Umugore wanjye ni umus@@ itar@@ i’ Big Boss avuga ko ubwo yafataga icyemezo cyo kwinjira mu muziki, umugore we atigeze agira impung@@ enge, ahubwo yiyemeje kumushy@@ igikira. Ubu niwe azajya akoresha mu mashusho y’indirimbo ze kuko nawe asanzwe ari ‘@@ umus@@ itar@@ i.’ Ati “@@ umugore wanjye ni umuntu w’umus@@ it@@ ari, ni nawe nzajya nk@@ inana nawe indirimbo. Umugore wanjye ni mwiza ateye ubwoba. Ushobora gukoresha ab’@@ ahandi ug@@ ash@@ iduka wat@@ anduk@@ iriye, niyo mp@@ m@@ avu nzajya mukoresha mu mashusho y’indirimbo z@@ anjye.” Muri gahunda z’uyu muhanzi harimo gukora indirimbo eshanu mu 2019 ariko intumbero ye ni ukuba umuhanzi ukomeye ku buryo yaz@@ akab@@ ya inzozi ze zo gukorana indirimbo na Rick Ross wo muri Amerika. Amashusho ya H@@ aban@@ abashaka ari muri studio yavugishije benshi Uyu mugabo afite ibiro 14@@ 5. Avuga ko kwitwa Big Boss byaturutse ku miterere ye no kuba ari umukire Big Boss afite indoto zo kuz@@ akorana indirimbo na Rick Ross Big Boss arifuza kuz@@ akorana indirimbo na Rick Ross
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje uburyo imyitwarire y’ababyeyi ishobora gutuma abana bifuza kwiyahura Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Kaminuza ya C@@ inc@@ inn@@ ati iherereye muri Leta ya Oh@@ io, imwe mu zigize Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, bwagaragaje ko uburyo ababyeyi bitwara ku bana babo bigira uruhare runini mu kuba bac@@ ura umugambi wo kwiyahura ndetse bakaw@@ ushyira mu bikorwa. Ubu bushakashatsi bwashyizwe ahagaragara ku wa kabiri mu nama y’@@ Ishyirahamwe ry’@@ Abanyamerika bakora mu buvuzi rusange yabereye i Atlant@@ a. Bw@@ akozwe nyuma y’uko byagiye bigaragara ko umubare w’abana bageze mu gihe cy’ubug@@ imbi biy@@ ambura ubuzima muri Amerika ugenda wiyongera cyane. Ke@@ ith King uyobora ishami ryo guteza imbere ubuzima bwiza n’uburezi muri Kaminuza ya C@@ inc@@ inn@@ ati yavuze abana baba bifuza kumenya ko hari umuntu runaka u@@ bashy@@ igik@@ iye, ariko ikibazo gikomeye kikaba ari uko benshi muri bo bat@@ amub@@ ona. King na mugenzi we Rebecca V@@ id@@ our@@ ek bakoze ubushakashatsi bwabo bifashishije ibyag@@ aragajwe mu ibarura ryakorewe muri Amerika mu 2012, ry@@ ibanze cyane ku ruhare rw’@@ ababyeyi mu kuba abana bafite kuva ku myaka 12 kuzamura batekereza kwiyahura. Nk’uko AFP dukesha iyi nkuru yaby@@ anditse, aba bashakashatsi basanze abana bag@@ irwaho ingaruka nyinshi n’im@@ yat@@ warire y’ababyeyi ari abafite hagati y’imyaka 12-1@@ 3. B@@ yag@@ agar@@ aye ko abana batajya bumva na rimwe ababyeyi babash@@ ima cyangwa bababwira ko batewe ishema nabo, bafite ibyago byo gutekereza kwiyahura by@@ ikubye inshuro eshanu ugereranyije n’abandi. Aba bana kandi basanze bafite ibyago byo gutegura umugambi wo kwiyahura no kugerageza kubishyira mu bikorwa, inshuro zirindwi ugereranyije na bagenzi babo bafite ababyeyi baba hafi uko bikwiye. Ibi kandi ni nako bimeze kubana bafite hagati y’imyaka 16@@ -17 bafite ababyeyi bat@@ abah@@ ora hafi. Abashakashatsi King na V@@ id@@ our@@ ek kandi bavuze ko umuti ari uko ababyeyi bagerageza kuba hafi y’abana babo, iteka bakab@@ ereka ko bab@@ ishimiye kuko uretse kuba bibar@@ inda gutekereza kwiyahura ngo ni n’@@ intwaro ikomeye mu kurwanya ingeso zirimo kunywa ibiyobyabwenge no kwishora mu mibonano mpuzabitsina bakiri bato. Raporo y’Ikigo cya Amerika gishinzwe kurwanya no gukumira ibyorezo yashyizwe ahagaragara mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka yagaragaje ko kuva mu 200@@ 7-@@ 2015, kwiyahura by@@ ikubye kabiri mu bakobwa, mu gihe mu bahungu byageze kuri 30@@ %. Abahanga mu bijyanye n’imyitwarire ya muntu bagaragaza ko mu bindi bishobora gutuma umuntu atekereza kwiyahura harimo kwiheba bikabije, uburwayi bwo mu mutwe, ibitekerezo bitandukanye abona ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, kubuzwa amahwemo na bagenzi be, ndetse n’ibibazo birebana n’@@ amafaranga.
H@@ atangijwe ‘@@ It@@ uz@@ e’, uburyo bushya bwo kwiteg@@ anyiriza bugenewe buri wese Ikigo L@@ ia@@ ison Fin@@ anc@@ ial Services ku bufatanye na Banki y’ubucuruzi y’@@ Abanya-@@ Kenya, KCB Rwanda, cy@@ atangije ‘@@ It@@ uz@@ e’, uburyo bugamije gufasha abantu b’ingeri zose guteg@@ anyiriza izabukuru ku bushake. Urban Boys yakiriye ite indirimbo ya Harmonize isa na T@@ ill I di@@ e? Manzi James uzwi nka Humble G@@ izzo uririmba mu itsinda rya Urban Boys aravuga ko kuba Harmonize wo muri Tanzaniya ari gukora indirimbo icur@@ anze nka T@@ ill I D@@ ie yabo nta kibazo bibat@@ eye, ngo ahubwo bigaragaza ko abahanzi bakomeye baha agaciro umuziki nyarwanda. Bamwe mu bumvise iyo ndirimbo batangiye kuvuga ko icur@@ ang@@ itse nka T@@ ill I d@@ ie yakozwe na Urban Boys bafatanyije na R@@ id@@ er Man@@ . Ibi byatumye abantu benshi navuga ko Harmonize yaba yarash@@ ishuye iyo indirimbo ya Ur@@ bana Boy@@ s. Mu kiganiro Humble G@@ izzo yagiranye na Makuruk@@ i.@@ rw, yadutangarije ko nta kibazo abona mu kuba Harmonize yakoze izi indirimbo isa n'iy@@ abo ahubwo ngo ibi bikwiye kwerekana ko umuziki wo mu Rwanda umaze kumen@@ yak@@ ana. Yagize ati "@@ Kuri njyewe nta kibazo. Navuga ko yaba yagize in@@ sp@@ ir@@ ation, ariko bin@@ agaragaza ko nabo bafata umwanya wo kumva umuziki wo mu Rwanda, njye nta kibazo nab@@ ig@@ iram@@ o." Yongeyeho ko kuba abanyarwanda bakora indirimbo zijya gusa n'iz'@@ abanyamahanga bik@@ witwa gush@@ ishura ngo ari imyumvire mibi kuko ibyo ari ibintu bimenyerewe kandi bit@@ agaragaza ubus@@ wa. Yagize ati " Uz@@ ajya Jama@@ ica usange be@@ at imwe ikorerwamo n'abantu nka 20, noneho n'ukuntu bigezweho kimwe n'i Bug@@ ande, producer akora ingoma akay@@ ishyira kuri youtube akavuga ati ushaka ay@@ ikoresh@@ e, ugasanga buri wese ayir@@ irimby@@ emo neza kandi ari ingoma imwe, ni ibintu bituma uburyohe bw'@@ umuziki bud@@ akomeza kuba bumw@@ e." Yongeyeho ati "@@ Twebwe hari ibintu tw@@ ishyizemo ngo umuntu yash@@ ish@@ uye, uz@@ umve abahanzi b'i Bug@@ ande, muri Tanzaniya umuntu arar@@ irimba yag@@ eza hagati@@ … urugero nk'@@ iriya ndirimbo Sal@@ ome ya Diamond wumva ko izamo ya ndirimbo ya kera. Ikintu gihari ni uko mu Rwanda hano tur@@ ifunga cyane kandi wajya kureba ugasanga ibindi byo hanze bir@@ atw@@ injir@@ ira, ugasanga umuntu y@@ ifunze muri ibyo ariko agakoresha ikindi kitari icyo mu Rwanda." Humble G@@ izzo ariko avuga iko ibi ari ukub@@ ikora buri gihe naho gukora indirimbo imwe way@@ ik@@ uze ngo ntibikwiye gufatwa nko guca inka amab@@ ere. Abacuruzi basaga 700 batum@@ iza ibicuruzwa hanze bashyizwe mu murongo ut@@ ukura Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe imisoro n’@@ amahoro@@ (RRA) gitangaza ko hari abacuruzi bakura ibicuruzwa bitandukanye mu bihugu byo hanze bagera kuri 79@@ 6, bamaze gushyirwa ku rutonde rw’@@ abany@@ ereza nkana imisoro bakabaye batangira ku biro bya za gasut@@ amo. Ubusanzwe RRA ivuga ko amafaranga aturuka kuri za gasutamo agize ijanisha rya 30% ry’amafaranga yose yinjira mu mufuka wa leta binyuze mu mis@@ oro. Ni uburiganya RRA ivuga ko bikorwa guhera ku hantu abacuruzi bar@@ angurira ibicur@@ uzwa, inzira bic@@ amo, impapuro bim@@ enyekanish@@ iriz@@ waho, aho by@@ injir@@ ira. Komiseri ushinzwe za gasutamo mu kigo cy’imisoro n’amahoro mu Rwanda,@@ Tug@@ ir@@ umuremyi Raph@@ a@@ el, ubwo yari ayoboye inama yigaga ku cyakorwa kugira ngo ibyo bih@@ agar@@ are, yavuze ko ibyo bikorwa bibi bis@@ ubiza inyuma ubukungu bw’igihugu kandi ngo mu bushakashatsi bakoze basanze abacuruzi ari bo baby@@ ihishe inyuma. Yagize ati “ Bamwe muri bo bavuga ko ari aba@@ bib@@ oherereza babikora nabi, abandi bakavuga ko ari aba@@ bat@@ warira ibicuruzwa babikora nabi, abandi bakavuga ko ari abab@@ unganira mu gukora imenyekanisha muri za gasut@@ amo, ugasanga bit@@ ana bamw@@ ana; twakoze rero igenzura mu nzira zose bic@@ amo kugira ngo tumenye ababig@@ iramo uruhare, ariko twasanze uruhare runini ari urw’@@ umucur@@ uz@@ i.” RRA ivuga ko abo bangana na 12@@ % bam@@ enyekanisha ibicuruzwa byabo nabi ndetse bakabig@@ iramo uburiganya bukomeye. Usibye abo kandi , hari abagera kuri 4@@ 01 bishyura mu buryo buciriritse ku buryo RRA itajya ibash@@ ira amakenga nubwo bad@@ afatwa nk’@@ aban@@ aniranye bikabije. Umucuruzi utum@@ iza hanze ibicuruzwa witwa Alain Manir@@ ak@@ iza, avuga ko hari igihe bamwe baba bafite uburiganya mu mikorere yabo ariko ko nanone hari igihe bafatwa nk’@@ abah@@ emu kandi byaratewe n’ibigo biba byar@@ abap@@ akir@@ iye. Yagize ati “ Abantu ntibat@@ ekereza kimwe, hari abagira uburyarya mu bucuruzi bwabo ariko hari n’aho biterwa na za sosiyete ziba@@ p@@ akir@@ ira, ugasanga zib@@ eshye ku mibare twagera nko ku mupaka w’u Rwanda bakat@@ ubara nk’@@ abany@@ ereza imisoro kandi wenda muba mun@@ aheruka kuvugana wag@@ iyeyo ug@@ ategereza ko babik@@ ohererez@@ a.” Abari mu murongo ut@@ ukura 79@@ 6 bagombaga kwishyura asaga miliyari 14 Frw bishyura agera kuri miliyari 8 Frw gusa andi aburirwa irengero. Ubusanzwe umucuruzi ug@@ aragaweho kunyereza amafaranga binyuze ku guh@@ im@@ bahimba ibyangombwa cyangwa kugerageza amanyanga ku bicuruzwa binyura kuri za gasutamo acibwa amande y’amadolari ibihumbi 10. CNLG yagaragaje amashyirahamwe akomeye n’@@ Int@@ iti z@@ ateguye zikan@@ akora Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside (CNLG) igaragaza ko kuva mu 1970 hashyizweho amatsinda akomeye y’@@ Abah@@ utu, y@@ ifashishijwe mu gutegura no gushyira mu bikorwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. A@@ babaye indashyikirwa mu kwanga Abatutsi muri Kaminuza ni bo babaye Abayobozi bakomeye nyuma yo kurangiza amasomo Dr. Bizimana avuga ko mu bij@@ anditse muri ibyo bikorwa mu 197@@ 3, bake cyane ari bo bahind@@ utse, abandi bakomeje ibikorwa by’@@ Ubut@@ ag@@ ond@@ wa, kandi bag@@ ororerwa imyanya ikomeye muri Leta. Juru Or@@ n@@ ella yashyize hanze indirimbo ya kabiri yizeza impinduka mu muziki nyarwanda Umuhanzikazi ukiri muto, Juru Or@@ n@@ ella yashyize hanze indirimbo ye ya kabiri yizeza ko abanyarwanda bagiye kuryoherwa n’@@ ibihangano bye ashimangira ko agiye kub@@ ibaha ari byinshi kandi biri ku rwego rwiza. Juru Or@@ n@@ ella w’imyaka 20 y’amavuko ku wa 2 Ukwakira 2020, nibwo yashyize hanze indirimbo yise ‘@@ P@@ ang@@ o’ itung@@ anyijwe mu buryo bw’amajwi n’@@ amashusho. Mu kiganiro na UKW@@ EZ@@ I, yavuze ko ari indirimbo avuga ko yay@@ ikoze agamije gukundisha abantu umuziki no kubyina muri rusange by’umwihariko abasore n’inkumi bakundana. Yagize ati “M@@ ba mbwira umuhungu ngo aze tub@@ yin@@ ane, mbese tw@@ ishimire umuziki, tuk@@ aby@@ inana nanjye nk@@ abyina guty@@ o.” Indirimbo ‘@@ P@@ ang@@ o’ yatunganyijwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na El@@ ement muri Count@@ ry Recor@@ d mu gihe amashusho yayo yakozwe na Bob Chris Rah@@ e@@ em@@ . Reba hano amashusho y’indirimbo ’@@ P@@ ang@@ o’ Uyu muhanzikazi avuga ko hari izindi ndirimbo nyinshi ari gukor@@ aho zirimo iz@@ arangiye yiteguye kugeza ku bakunzi b’umuziki n’abanyarwanda muri rusange. Uyu mukobwa uvuka mu muryango w’abana babiri ndetse akaba ariwe wa kabiri avuga ko mu muziki we afashwa na Papa we ndetse akaba ariwe muj@@ yanama we mu bijyanye n’ibikorwa bya muzika. Ati “Nd@@ ashimira abam@@ fasha by’umwihariko pap@@ a, kuko am@@ fasha ahantu hose, ndashimira kandi abakur@@ ikira ibihangano byanjye mbabwira ko mfite imishinga myinshi izajya hanze mu minsi mike cyane.” Yakomeje avuga ko "@@ Intego mfite ni ugukora umuziki mwiza kandi ntabwo nz@@ at@@ enguha abanyarwanda kuko nshaka kuzana imp@@ induk@@ a." Juru Or@@ n@@ ella kuri ubu umaze gukora indirimbo ebyiri kuva yinjiye mu muziki yarangiye amashuri yisumbuye umwaka ushize aho yigaga HE@@ G mu Rwunge rw’@@ Amashuri rwa Gahini mu Karere ka Kayonza. Rwatubyaye Abdul yageze mu Amavubi, atug@@ aniriza uko abayeho muri Amerika Myugariro w’ikipe ya Sporting Kans@@ as City yo muri shampiyona ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Rwatubyaye Abdul yageze mu Rwanda, aho aje gufatanya na bagenzi mu ikipe y’igihugu ‘@@ Amavub@@ i’ ikomeje kwitegura umukino usoza amatsinda yo gushaka itike ya CAN ya 2019, u Rwanda ruz@@ akir@@ wamo na Côte d’@@ Iv@@ ore ku wa Gatandatu. Mu rukerera rwo kuri uyu wa Mbere, ikipe ye yari ifite umukino wa shampiyona bakir@@ iwemo na Col@@ or@@ ado Rap@@ id@@ s, banganya igitego 1-1. Rwatubyaye Abdul ni umwe muri ba myugariro ngenderwaho mu ikipe y’igihugu dore ko amaze gutangira imikino ine muri itanu Amavubi amaze gukina muri uru rugendo rwo gushaka itike ya CAN 2019 izabera mu Misiri. Guinea na Côte d’Ivoire nizo z@@ abonye itike yo gukina CAN 2019 mu itsinda H mu gihe Centrafrique n’u Rwanda bo bamaze gusezer@@ erwa. Bite bya Rwatubyaye muri Amerik@@ a? Rwat@@ uby@@ aye@@ : Yego ikipe yari ink@@ eneye, mu bijyanye no kumeny@@ ereza muri byinshi bya hariya bitoroshye kubimeny@@ era ariko wenda navuga ko wafashe umwanya wawe neza nta cy@@ akug@@ ora. Kuba bar@@ abanje gushidikanya ku butumire ni uko hari gahunda bari bam@@ fit@@ iye. Kuri njye kongera guhamagarwa n’ikipe y’igihugu nta kibazo mb@@ ifit@@ eho, ni agaciro. Rwat@@ uby@@ aye@@ : Uko nab@@ yakiriye n’ubu biracyari kum@@ baho kuko ntabwo navuga ko ari ibintu biri ku rwego rwo hasi, urwego nag@@ iyeho ruri hejuru, rur@@ ashim@@ ishije. Shampiyona iri hejuru, imyitozo bakora, umuj@@ yi, imyitwarire n’umuco waho n’ibintu umuntu atavuga ko bic@@ iriritse, biri hejuru cyane. Byari ibyishimo, byari iby’agaciro kuri njye kuba nari ngiye gukina muri iriya kipe, atari no kuy@@ ikinamo gusa ahubwo n’abakinnyi ngiye gukinana nabo bari ku rwego rwo hejuru, navuga ko hari ibyo n@@ ungutse mu buzima bwanjye. IGIHE: K@@ umeny@@ era muri Amerika, byar@@ akor@@ oh@@ eye? Rwat@@ uby@@ aye@@ : Ntabwo byany@@ oroh@@ eye, n’ubu ntabwo bir@@ any@@ orohera kubera ko maz@@ eyo ibyumweru hafi bitatu, mbere y’uko ngaruka in@@ aha. Ntabwo bir@@ any@@ oroh@@ era, nabanje kug@@ erayo mba muri Hotel, bajya kunsh@@ akira ahandi nat@@ ura, nah@@ abonye ejo bundi mu byumweru bibiri. Nibwo nari nk@@ imara kwim@@ uka, hashize iminsi nk’@@ itatu nim@@ utse, ntabwo nd@@ ameny@@ era neza, haracy@@ arimo ingorane nke, ariko ndakeka bit@@ azam@@ fata igihe kirekire. IGIHE: Ug@@ ererany@@ je n’ubuzima bwo mu Rwanda, ni irihe t@@ andukaniro rih@@ ar@@ i? Rwat@@ uby@@ aye@@ : Ikintu navuga bit@@ andukan@@ iyeho ni imitekerereze y’abantu, uko umukinnyi abayeho n’uko umuntu usanzwe abayeho, itandukaniro ni rinini cyane. Rwat@@ uby@@ aye@@ : Ni mu buryo bwo gukor@@ amo ibintu, urebye bafite uburyo bakor@@ amo ibintu, bir@@ atandukanye cyane. Ahantu bakorera har@@ arenze uk@@ untu, kuh@@ injiramo nabanje kuy@@ oba. Kw@@ injiramo barah@@ any@@ eretse, n@@ isub@@ ijemo nday@@ oba. Ni byo by@@ ant@@ onze. Ibyo w@@ akorera umukunzi wawe igihe yaba@@ baye Ubushakashatsi bwakorewe muri Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika bwerekana ko uburakari bugira ingaruka kuri 18@@ % by’ abaturage ba ho. Gut@@ eret@@ ana rero bifatwa nk’ ibintu bizana umunezero ariko hari ubwo umukunzi wawe aba yarak@@ aye cyangwa y@@ ifite mo umun@@ abi ukaba wagira ngo uwo munsi gut@@ eret@@ ana byah@@ agarara ndetse uk@@ ih@@ eza ariko siko bigomba kugenda. Tw@@ ifashishije urubuga Wik@@ ih@@ ow twag@@ uteguriye ibintu w@@ akorera umukunzi wawe igihe afite umun@@ abi kugira ngo akanyamuneza k@@ agaruk@@ e. 1. Gut@@ ek@@ a: Igihe umukunzi wawe afite umun@@ abi ukab@@ ibona cyangwa akab@@ ik@@ ubwira, uwo mun@@ abi urag@@ enda igihe m@@ ufatanyije gut@@ eka. Ak@@ ajya akora kimwe ukora ikindi. Ibi kandi biran@@ ashimisha igihe cyose bikozwe n’iyo haba ntakibazo cyabaye ho, usanga bin@@ ezeza umwe mu bakundana kubona bari gufatanya umurimo nk’uwo ubusanzwe usa nk’uw@@ ah@@ ariwe bamwe. 2. Mu myaka itatu, ikibazo cy’@@ abacitse ku icumu batagira aho baba kizaba cyakem@@ utse burundu Rub@@ er@@ ang@@ eyo Theophile umuyobozi wa FARG Umuyobozi w’@@ ikigega cy@@ ashyiriweho gufasha abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside batishoboye (@@ FAR@@ G) avuga ko bihaye imyaka itatu yo gukemura burundu ikibazo cy’@@ abacitse ku icumu badafite aho baba@@ . Imyaka 23 irashize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri mata 1994 iba@@ ye. Kugeza ubu haracyari abarokotse jenoside batagira aho baba kandi batishoboye. Leta y’u Rwanda ndetse n’imiryango nt@@ erankunga bagiye bashyiraho gahunda zitandukanye zo gukemura iki kibazo arik@@ ona n’ubu ntikir@@ ar@@ angira. Rub@@ er@@ ang@@ eyo Theophile umuyobozi wa FARG mu kiganiro na Makuruk@@ i, yatangaje ko iki kibazo k@@ igihari koko. Ati "Tur@@ abizi barah@@ ari. Mu mwaka wa 2010 habayeho ibarura ry’@@ ab@@ ubakiwe n’abas@@ igaye kubak@@ irwa, kugeza nko muri 2013 wa mubare tw@@ abar@@ uye uba ur@@ arangiye kuko twari dus@@ igaje amazu 500 mu mujyi wa Kigali. Tw@@ ongeye gukora irindi bar@@ ura tuza kubona imiryango 16@@ 87 y’abat@@ agira aho baba@@ .” Rub@@ er@@ ang@@ eyo avuga ko biba@@ jije aho abo bantu bava ariko baza gusanga ari abari abana babaga mu miryango nyuma ikaza kubir@@ ukana ngo bajye gusaba amazu muri FAR@@ G. Icyakora avuga ko ubu bihaye imyaka itatu yo kuba barangije burundu ikibazo cy’@@ abacitse ku icumu batishoboye badafite aho baba@@ . Ati:”@@ Dukurikije inkunga tub@@ ona, tuv@@ ana muri minisiteri y’imari n’amasezerano twagiranye na bo, twihaye gahunda ko mu myaka itatu tuzaba turangije icyo kibazo wenda hag@@ asigara umuntu umwe umwe nawe waza nyuma uko ubu iyo miryango dufite tuzaba tuy@@ irang@@ ij@@ e." Rub@@ er@@ ang@@ eyo kandi avuga ko ban@@ afashe ingamba zo kubakira umuryango aho kubakira umuntu ku giti cye. Ati "Ubu rero twan@@ afashe ing@@ ambo zo kubakira umuryango. Tw@@ ubakira umuntu umwe umwe ntabwo tw@@ azab@@ ivamo cyane cyane ko twubaka tw@@ ubakira wa muryango was@@ enyewe twongera gusub@@ izaho ya nzu yabo ya mbere@@ .” Uretse abatagira aho baba@@ , hari n’ikibazo cy’@@ abafite amazu ashaje amaze igihe kandi yubatswe nabi mu myaka yo ha mbere, Rub@@ er@@ ang@@ eyo avuga ko aba nabo bazas@@ anirwa ariko kandi ngo iz@@ iri kubakwa ubu zizaba ari inzu zikomeye ziz@@ amara igihe. Ati:”@@ Inzu turimo kububakira ni inzu ihenze imwe byibuze iri mu gaciro ka miliyoni zirindwi mu gihe nko myaka ya mbere dutangira kububakira wasangaga inzu imwe yar@@ abaga ifite agaciro nk@@ ak’@@ ibihumbi 600@@ .”
K@@ uvug@@ uruzanya kw’@@ ababyeyi bishobora gutera umwana uburwayi bwo mu mutwe Kuba ababyeyi bahora bavug@@ uruzanya mu mabwiriza baha abana bishobora kugira ingaruka zikomeye mu mitekerereze bikamuviramo no gufatwa na bumwe mu burwayi bwo mu mutwe. K@@ uvug@@ uruzanya kw’@@ ababyeyi imbere y’@@ umwana, kut@@ amut@@ ega amatwi ngo bumve ibisobanuro abaha ahubwo bak@@ ihutira kumw@@ uka inabi no kumuha ibihano bikar@@ ishye ni kimwe mu bishobora kumuviramo uburwayi bwo mu mutwe. Mu kiganiro inzobere mu bijyanye n’imyitwarire n’imitekerereze ya muntu, Dr Sezibera Vincent, yagiranye na IGIHE, yavuze ko ababyeyi bamwe ari bo nyirabayazana y’@@ uburwayi bwo mu mutwe ku bana babo. Yagize ati “@@ Indwara zitari nke z’ubuzima bwo mu mutwe zigaragara ku muryango, ababyeyi babifitemo uruhare rukom@@ eye. Niba umwana yarak@@ uze at@@ eshwa agaciro, ababyeyi bavug@@ uruzanya imbere ye umubyeyi w’umugabo amubwira ati kora iki, nyina akamubwira ati oya kora kiriya bic@@ anga umwana nt@@ amenye ngo ni iki cyo gukora, akag@@ uma mu r@@ ungab@@ angabo ku buryo imitekerereze ye igera aho ig@@ ac@@ angany@@ ukirwa bikaba byam@@ uviramo bumwe mu burwayi bwo mu mut@@ we.” Dr Sezibera akomeza agira ati “@@ Burya si byiza ko ababyeyi bavug@@ uruzanya imbere y’@@ umwana, bagomba kubyirinda cyane kuko bituma imitekerereze y’umwana izamo akavuyo ‘@@ d@@ és@@ ord@@ re@@ ’ bigah@@ ungabanya imitekerereze ye.” W@@ amenya gute ko umwana afite ikibazo mu mit@@ ekererez@@ e? Iyi nzobere ivuga ko hari uburyo butandukanye bukoreshwa n’abab@@ ifitemo ubumenyi bakav@@ umbura ko umwana afite ikibazo mu mit@@ ekererez@@ e, ariko kandi ngo n’umubyeyi ashobora kubimeny@@ a. Ati “Hari ibintu bidasanzwe umwana akora umubyeyi akaba yahita amenya ko afite ikibazo mu mitekerereze ye. Hari n’abany@@ wera al@@ uk@@ oro (@@ al@@ c@@ oh@@ ol@@ ) kuri iyo mit@@ i, umubiri uk@@ ameny@@ era utyo kugeza ubwo umuti w@@ azana wose udashobora kuvura umuntu, kubera ko mikorobe zabaye inshuti na ya miti ufata mu buryo but@@ emewe, bikarangira umuntu apf@@ uye@@ ”. Mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe n’abanyeshuri biga iby’@@ ubuvuzi (@@ Bi@@ om@@ ed@@ ical L@@ abor@@ ator@@ y sc@@ ienc@@ es) muri IN@@ ES@@ -@@ Ruhengeri, bwagaragaje ko na bo bagiye bahura n’ibyo bibazo by’abaturage bagezweho n’ingaruka zo gufata imiti nabi bikarangira bapfuye. Dor@@ ot@@ h N@@ ant@@ ari, usoza amasomo muri IN@@ ES@@ -@@ Ruhengeri, avuga ko mu bushakashatsi yakoze yibanze ku buryo abaturage bafata imiti, aho yasanze batazi kuy@@ ikoresha, batazi n’ingaruka zo kuyikoresha nabi. Uw@@ akoze ubushakashatsi ku buryo abaturage bafata imiti Ati “Ntabwo abaganga abasobanurira abaturage uko bafata imiti bahawe, no muri za laborat@@ wari, usanga iyo umuganga agiye gufata ibizamini at@@ abanza gusoban@@ urura umurwayi impamvu yabyo. Bir@@ akwiye ko mbere yo gufata umurwayi ibizamini ubanza kumus@@ obanurira impamvu yabyo, ndetse na wawundi ushinzwe gutanga imiti akag@@ aniriza umurwayi ahereye ku bizamini umuganga yam@@ wandik@@ iye, kugira ngo av@@ urwe neza”. Ni yo mpamvu ibi biganiro biriho kugira ngo twirinde kuz@@ atakaza abantu kandi hak@@ abayeho kwirind@@ a”. Kabare Isaie wiga ibijyanye n’ubuvuzi muri IN@@ ES@@ -@@ Ruhengeri Akomeza agira ati “Hari abafata imiti mu kaj@@ agari, ugasanga ay@@ ifashe itari ngombwa. Ibiganiro byitabiriwe n’impuguke zinyuranye mu buvuzi Nk@@ eka ko ari ubumenyi buke bw’@@ abaturage, umuntu yakumva ah@@ emb@@ utse akumva ko yak@@ ize, birasaba inyigisho zifasha abaturage gusobanukirwa neza akamaro ko gufata imiti neza, n’ingaruka zo kuyifata nab@@ i”. Mu myanzuro yafatiwe muri iyo nama, harimo ko ibiganiro by@@ iga kuri icyo kibazo biz@@ akomeza. Bugesera FC na Espoir FC zaguye mis@@ wi, umukino us@@ ozwa n'@@ imirwano y'abafana Yanditswe kuya 29@@ -@@ 10-@@ 2016 saa 21:@@ 29@@ ' na Manzi Rema Jules Umukino wa shampiyona igeze ku munsi wayo wa gatatu, Bugesera FC yak@@ iriyemo Espoir FC i Nyamata kuri uyu wa Gatandatu warangiye amakipe yombi anganya ubusa ku busa, abafana ba Bugesera FC basub@@ iranamo barar@@ wana karah@@ ava. Aya makipe yombi atar@@ itwaye neza ku mikino iheruka aho Bugesera FC yatsinzwe na Police FC 2-1 naho Espoir FC inganya na Rayon Sports 0-0 i Rusizi. Iny@@ ota yo gushaka amanota atatu yagaragaye ku mpande zombi, Bugesera FC n'abafana bayo bari benshi cyane bagerageza ibishoboka byose ngo babone igitego ariko ab'@@ i Rusizi nabo bakih@@ agararaho berekana ko bamb@@ utse ishyamba rya Nyungwe bashaka kwitwara neza. Uburyo bukomeye bw@@ abonetse umukino ug@@ itangira ku munota wa gatatu ubwo Umunya-@@ Mali, Abdallah yateraga ishoti rikomeye ariko umuzamu wa Espoir FC aby@@ itwaramo neza. Nko ku bindi bibuga bya hamwe mu turere bit@@ ubakiye nabyo ubwabyo bikaba ari bibi, igice cya kabiri gitangiye imvura yaguye abafana benshi cyane bari kuri uyu mukino babura aho bug@@ ama abakinnyi nabo gutera umupira biba ihurizo kubera ibit@@ aka. Kuri uyu mukino, amakipe yombi yakiniye hagati mu kibuga, ari nako abakinnyi ku mpande zombi bat@@ akaz@@ aga umupira bya hato na hato, ibintu abatoza bombi bemeje ko byatewe n'@@ ikibuga kib@@ i, byanatumye iminota 90 irangira nta kipe ibasha kureba mu izamu rya mugenzi ry'@@ iy@@ indi. Umutoza wa Espoir FC, Ndayizeye Jimmy wakiniraga kuri iki kibuga bwa mbere yagize ati " Umukino wari ukomeye, Bugesera FC ni ikipe nziza. Twagerageje gukina ariko ntibyari byoroshye kubera ikibuga kib@@ i. Umusaruro ntur@@ aba mwiza nk'uko tub@@ ishaka ariko shampiyona nibwo itangiye haracyari imikino, tuz@@ itwara neza." Mashami Vincent utoza Bugesera FC nawe nubwo akorera imyitozo kuri iki kibuga buri munsi yunze mu rya mugenzi agira ati "@@ Sin@@ abih@@ isha gukinira ku kibuga kibi nta kipe biha amahirwe. Dufite abakinnyi batandukanye ariko ntabwo ushobora kubona ubuhanga bafite badashobora guhererekanya umup@@ ira." Nyuma y'umukino ndetse n'abayobozi bamaze gutaha, abafana ba Bugesera FC basub@@ iran@@ yemo barar@@ wana ngo bitewe n'amafaranga bishy@@ ujwe kuri uyu mukino bat@@ avuz@@ eho rumwe. Bamwe mu baz@@ itiye ikibuga nk'uko byavugwaga n'abari ku kibuga bakubiswe kuko ngo batumye abandi bishy@@ uzwa. Mu mukino wabereye kuri Stade Mum@@ ena, Gicumbi FC yanyagiye Kiyovu Sports ibitego 4-1 bya Rutayisire Egide watsinze bibiri, Mud@@ eyi Sul@@ ey@@ man na Muh@@ umure Omar icy'@@ impozamarira cya Kiyovu Sports gits@@ indwa na Bigirimana Bla@@ ise.
