Ikibuga cy’indege cya Gisenyi kigiye kubakwa kibe mpuzamahanga Minisiteri y’@@ Ibikorwaremezo yatangaje ko Ikibuga cy’Indege cya Gisenyi kigiye kwag@@ urwa ku buryo mu mwaka wa 2021 kizaba cyatangiye kwakira indege nini z’@@ imbere mu gihugu n’izo mu Karere u Rwanda ruherere@@ yemo. Umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe gutwara Abantu n’@@ Ibintu muri Minisiteri y’@@ Ib@@ ikor@@ waremezo, Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu, yatangaje ko imirimo yo kwagura iki kibuga izaba yatangiye muri Nyakanga 2018. Yagize ati “Ubu dufite gahunda ko guhera mu ngengo y’imari y’umwaka utaha guhera mu kwa karindwi tuz@@ atangira imirimo yo kwagura Ikibuga cy’Indege cya Gisenyi. Turashaka kuk@@ igira ikibuga cy’indege cy’@@ Akarere gifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira n’izindi ndege nini, yaba za Boeing cyangwa za Air@@ bus … tuzongera p@@ ist@@ es aho zizajya zig@@ uruk@@ ira kikaba ku rwego mpuzamahang@@ a.’’ Yakomeje asobanura ko biteganyijwe ko nibura mu mwaka wa 2021 Ikibuga cy’Indege cya Gisenyi kizaba cyatangiye gukoresh@@ wa, cyakira indege nini zirimo iza bo@@ e@@ ing ziva mu bindi bihugu byo mu Karere. Ku birebana n’igikorwa cyo kwishyura ingurane ku miryango yari it@@ uriye imbago z’iki kibuga, mu biganiro Leta yagiranye nayo kuri uyu wa Gatanu bemeranyije ko muri Kanama 2018 bizaba byar@@ angiye. Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Rubavu, Habyarimana Gilbert, yagize ati “@@ Abas@@ igaye batar@@ ishyurwa ni 97 ariko abandi mu by’ukuri bar@@ ishy@@ uwe, abo basigaye nabo bahawe umurongo bagiye kuz@@ ishy@@ urwamo kuko bij@@ ejwe ko mu kwa munani baz@@ ishy@@ urw@@ a.’’ Ikibuga cy’Indege cya Gisenyi cy@@ ajyaga cyakira mu bihe bishize indege nto za RwandAir gusa. Umushinga wo kwagura Ikibuga cy’Indege cya Gisenyi urar@@ imb@@ anyije mu gihe n’@@ Iburasirazuba naho hatangiye imirimo yo kubaka Ikibuga cy’Indege Mpuzamahanga cya Bugesera. Abam@@ ug@@ ariye ku rugamba baz@@ iband@@ waho mu muganda udasanzwe w’urubyiruko Mu rwego rwo kuzirikana ubwitange bw’@@ abamug@@ ariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, mu gihugu hose hateganyijwe umuganda udasanzwe w’urubyiruko uz@@ ibanda ku kubafasha mu bikorwa bitandukanye. Uyu muganda udasanzwe wa buri gihembwe uteganyijwe mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 21 Mutarama 2017 ukaz@@ abera muri buri kagari mu gihugu hose. Uyu muganda wateguwe n’inama y’igihugu y’urubyiruko ku bufatanye na Minisiteri y’urubyiruko n’ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwitegura umunsi w’@@ intwari no kugaragaza uruhare rw’@@ urubyiruko mu kuzirikana ubutwari bwar@@ anze intwari z’u Rwanda. Abam@@ ug@@ ariye ku rugamba ni bo baz@@ iband@@ waho muri uyu muganda aho baz@@ akorerwa ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo gus@@ anirwa amazu, ubwiherero cyangwa indi mirimo irimo kwah@@ irira amatungo, guhinga, kum@@ esa n’ibindi bikorwa by’isuku bitewe n’ibyo abaz@@ afashwa bifuza. Zuckerberg yahawe impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga nyuma y’imyaka 13 avuye mu ishuri Mark Zuckerberg washinze ndetse akaba ayobora urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Facebook, yahawe impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga (H@@ on@@ or@@ ary d@@ eg@@ re@@ e) na kaminuza ya Hav@@ ard, nyuma y’imyaka 13 avuye mu ishuri. Mu 2005 nibwo Zuckerberg wigaga muri kaminuza ya Hav@@ ard yavuye mu ishuri, kugira ngo umwanya we wose aw@@ ushyire mu kunon@@ osora Facebook. Icyo gihe yatangaje ko ad@@ ateze kuzar@@ isubiramo ukundi. Ubwo yakiraga iyi mp@@ amyabumenyi ku itariki ya 23 Gicurasi 2017, Zuckerberg uza mu bah@@ erwe ba mbere ku isi aho afite umutungo ubarirwa muri miliyari 6@@ 2.@@ 5@@ $, yabwiye abari barangije amasomo yabo ko aribo bafite inshingano yo kuzana impinduka no kurwanya ubus@@ um@@ bane. Ati “@@ Impinduka zitang@@ irira aho uri, n’impinduka z’isi yose zitang@@ irira ku tuntu dut@@ o, zitang@@ izwa n’abantu nk@@ at@@ we.” Zuckerberg w’imyaka 33 yavuze ko hari abantu benshi basig@@ ajwe inyuma, kandi ko bitoroshye kwita ku bari mu bindi bice by’@@ isi, igihe iwanyu mu rugo naho hari ibibazo. Nk’uko Daily Mail yaby@@ anditse, Zuckerberg yongeye kwiy@@ ibutsa ibihe bye muri Kaminuza ya Hav@@ ard kuva ku munsi wa mbere, uburyo yasobanuye ibijyanye na F@@ ac@@ em@@ ash yaje guhinduka Facebook, uburyo yavuye muri iyi kaminuza ag@@ akorerwa ibirori byo ku mus@@ ezeraho n’inshuti ze, n’ukuntu kuri uwo munsi yahuriye mu bwiherero na Prisc@@ illa Ch@@ an waje kuba umugore we. Ati “Mu byo navuga ko ari ari amagambo y’urukundo adasanzwe naram@@ ubwiye nti ‘ ngiye kwirukanwa muri iyi kaminuza mu minsi itarenze itatu, rero dukeneye gusohokana mu buryo bwih@@ us@@ e’. Umwe muri umwe ugiye kurangiza kwiga nawe ashobora gukoresha aya magamb@@ o.” Yongeye ho ko atigeze yirukanwa ko ahubwo ariwe ubwe wafashe umwanzuro wo kuva mu ishuri, ndetse ahamya ko nubwo muri film yakin@@ we ku buzima bwe bagaragaje ko F@@ ac@@ em@@ ash ariyo yatumye habaho Facebook atari ko bimeze, ahubwo ko icyo yakoze ari ugut@@ uma ahura n’umuntu w’@@ agaciro mu buzima bwe ariwe mugore we. Asoza ijambo rye, Zuckerberg yashishikarije abiga muri Hav@@ ard guharanira ko ubuzima bwabo b@@ ubera abandi umugisha. Nyuma y’uyu muhango yashyize ifoto kuri Facebook ari hagati y’ababyeyi be, ashyiraho amagambo agira ati “M@@ ama, iteka nah@@ oraga n@@ kubwira ko nz@@ agaruka, ndetse nkabona impamyabumenyi yanjye@@ .” Zuckerberg yatangiye kubaka urubuga rw@@ itwaga ‘@@ The@@ Facebook@@ ’ muri Mutarama 2004, afatanyije na Edu@@ ardo Sav@@ erin@@ , Andrew Mac@@ Coll@@ um, D@@ ustin Mos@@ k@@ ov@@ it@@ z na Chris H@@ ugh@@ es, nyuma y’ukwezi tariki ya 4 Gashyantare bar@@ ushyize hanze rutangira gukoreshwa. Yakomeje kur@@ un@@ on@@ osora kugeza rubaye Facebook tuzi uyu munsi, ikoreshwa n’abagera kuri miliyari ebyiri bari hirya no hino ku isi. A@@ jya guhanga ibendera ry’igihugu, iyari Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu yatanze itangazo rivuga ko ikeneye ibir@@ ang@@ ant@@ ego bya Repubulika, maze ab@@ iyumvamo impano y’@@ ubugeni bar@@ ap@@ ig@@ anwa. Ati “N@@ ah@@ embwe neza nk’@@ uwa mbere mu bakoze ibendera n’ib@@ irang@@ ant@@ ego bya Repubulika y’u Rwand@@ a.’’ Mu gukora ib@@ end@@ era, aba bany@@ abug@@ eni bari bahawe amabara bagomba kugend@@ eraho hanyuma ibindi bo bakab@@ ivana mu bwenge bwabo. Ati “Hari ibyo twagombaga kugend@@ eraho nk’@@ icyerekezo cy’@@ igihugu. Niba irya kera ryar@@ imo umutuku uvuga impinduramatwara n’amaraso yam@@ en@@ etse, twagombaga gukoresha ir@@ igaragaza icyizere cyo kwiy@@ ubak@@ a.’’ Abitabiriye aya marushanwa basabwe kwitondera amakosa nk’@@ ay@@ akozwe mu 1959 aho ibendera ry’u Rwanda ryas@@ an@@ ishijwe n’irya Guin@@ é@@ e-@@ Conak@@ ry, nyuma y’imyaka ibiri rik@@ aza kwandik@@ wamo inyuguti ya ‘@@ R@@ ’ mu kub@@ itanduk@@ anya. Kil@@ im@@ ob@@ ene@@ cyo Alphonse ni umun@@ yabugeni w'@@ umwuga wakoze byinshi mu bihangano bikoreshwa mu buzima bwa buri munsi G@@ ushyiramo izuba ni ibitekerezo bye bwite Uyu mugabo wishimira kuba yaratanze umusanzu mu bikorwa bikomeye by’u Rwanda, iyo muganira aba avuga ko ibyo yakoze ari iby’@@ igihugu aho kuba byamw@@ it@@ irir@@ wa. Y@@ ibuka ko mu gihe cy’@@ icyumweru arimo guhanga ib@@ end@@ era, yagerageje ibintu byinshi ariko akazajya asanga nta gis@@ obanuro bifite. Aha niho gushyiramo izuba byat@@ ur@@ utse. Ku ikubitiro iryo zuba yar@@ ihaye imirasire 12, ariko kuko yagombaga gutanga ibisobanuro byar@@ yo abis@@ esenguye asanga bitaba biboneye ni ko guhitamo kuriha 24 kandi rik@@ ajya ibur@@ yo. Ati “N@@ abanje gutekereza utuntu tw@@ ihariye tugomba kuba mu ib@@ end@@ era. Izuba nar@@ avuze nti ‘@@ ese ndar@@ iha imirasire ing@@ ah@@ e’, ndavuga nti ‘@@ irindwi ariko nsanga bid@@ asa nez@@ a’. Natangiye ngira 12, nd@@ enzaho mike nabwo mbona ari bibi nyuma nza kuvuga nti reka ngire 24@@ .” Iyi mirasire 24 yay@@ ihaye igisobanuro cya politiki nziza itagomba gusinzira ahubwo igomba buri gihe guhora im@@ urikiye igihugu. Iryo zuba kandi yag@@ ennye ko rigomba kujya iburyo aho rir@@ asira, aho kujya ibumoso nk’aho rir@@ engera kuko kurenga byaba bivuze ko ya politiki nziza is@@ inzir@@ iye. Ati “U Rwanda rwagize akaga g@@ akomeye@@ ; kubera Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, nahisemo agas@@ eke kuko nyuma yayo Abanyarwanda bari bakeneye kongera gus@@ abana, sinari nzi ko kaz@@ akundwa cyane mu mahanga k@@ akat@@ uzanira n’@@ amad@@ ov@@ ize. Byose bikorwa Abanyarwanda batah@@ iriza umugozi umwe, bivuga ko tugomba gukorera hamwe kandi mu mucy@@ o.’’ Niwe wash@@ ushanyije in@@ ote zirimo iy’@@ ibihumbi bitanu Kil@@ im@@ ob@@ ene@@ cyo yan@@ agize uruhare mu gushushanya in@@ ote dukoresha mu Rwanda rwa none kimwe n’iz@@ akoreshejwe mu bihe byahise nk’iya 500 Frw. Ati “Hari in@@ ote zimwe zirimo iya 5000 Frw, 2000 Frw, 1000 Frw na 500 Frw nagiye nsh@@ ushanya mb@@ is@@ abwe na Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu mu gihe bahind@@ uraga amafarang@@ a.’’ Ig@@ ic@@ eri cy’@@ ijana cy@@ ifashishwa muri iki gihe nacyo ni we wag@@ ish@@ ushanyije ariko mu gihe gito abantu benshi badashobora gutekerez@@ a, kuko cy@@ amut@@ waye iminota itanu gusa. Kirehe: Yat@@ aye umwana yari amaze kubyara mu musarani atabar@@ wa atar@@ apfa Nyir@@ ahag@@ enimana Ver@@ on@@ ika w'imyaka 28 wo mu kagari ka Ruh@@ anga mu murenge wa Kig@@ ina mu gihe, akurikiranwe n'inzego zishinzwe umutekano ar@@ waje umwana we mu bitaro bya Kirehe nyuma yo kum@@ ubyara akam@@ uta mu musar@@ ani. Umwe mu bo mu muryango wa Nyir@@ ahag@@ enimana ubwo yajyaga m'@@ umusar@@ ani mu rukerera rwo kuwa 15 Kamena 2015 avuga ko yumvise umwana ar@@ irira mu musarani asubirayo yiruka ajya kubibwira umuvandimwe we Nyir@@ ahag@@ enimana ko hari icyo yumvise mu musar@@ ani. Nyir@@ ahag@@ enimana ngo yagiye mu musar@@ ano atazi ko abyara umwana ag@@ wamo. Kuba nta tegeko rir@@ engera ababana batar@@ asezer@@ anye, intandaro y'@@ amakimbirane kubera mitungo Gloria Jean Gar@@ al@@ and, umuyobozi w'@@ ibiro bishinzwe imiyoborere na Demokarasi mu mushinga wa USAID mu Rwanda Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'umushinga Land@@ esa mu 2014 buk@@ orewe mu turere twa Nyagatare na Kayonza bwagaragaje ko 89@@ % by'@@ abagore babajijwe bagaragaje ko amakimbirane ash@@ igiye ku butaka ari ikibazo gikomeye. Umuryango Hag@@ uruka wo uvuga ko wakiriye telefoni 1 79@@ 7 by'abantu basabaga ubufasha mu kubak@@ emurira ibibazo bishingiye ku makimbirane y'@@ ubutaka. Ibi n'ib@@ yagaragajwe kuri uyu wa 13 Mutarama 2016 n'umushinga w'@@ abanyamerika Land@@ esa uterwa inkunga n'undi mushinga w'@@ abanyamerika uts@@ ura amajyambere USA@@ ID@@ . Ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko 95% by'@@ abayobozi bo ku nzego z'ibanze n'abagore bangana 89@@ % babajijwe bagaragaje ko amakimbirane mu miryango ashingiye ku butaka ari ikibazo gikomeye, mugihe 7@@ 1% by' abayobozi bo ku nzego z'ibanze babaj@@ ijwe, 6@@ 5% muri bo bemeje ko akenshi imiryango ihura n'ibi bibazo. Ibi bir@@ emezwa na Dis@@ mas Rur@@ ang@@ angabo ushinzwe imibereho myiza y'abaturage mu murenge wa Kat@@ abag@@ emu mu karere ka Nyagatare waganiriye na Makuruk@@ i, aho avuga ko mu karere ka Nyagatare by'umwihariko mu murenge ayoboye abagabo bagurisha ubutaka rwihishwa bak@@ ambuka bakajya mu gihugu cy'@@ abaturanyi cya Uganda. Rur@@ ang@@ angabo yagize ati: "@@ Ibibazo by'@@ amakimbirane mu miryango bituruka ku bagabo usanga bagurisha ubutaka rwihishwa bakigira mu gihugu cya Uganda. Kuba hari bamwe mu bantu bibar@@ uzaho ubutaka butari ubwabo, ndetse hakaba n'abag@@ ura ubutaka batabanje kureba ko ubug@@ urisha afite icyemezo cya burundu, uw@@ abug@@ urishije atag@@ ifite agahita acika agas@@ iga ibibazo by'@@ imanza mu mir@@ yang@@ o." Nyinawumuntu Agn@@ es, Um@@ ufash@@ amy@@ umvire mu murenge wa Rukara mu karere ka Kayonza we yabwiye Makuruki ko ibibazo by'@@ amakimbirane mu miryango aturuka ku ukuba hakiri imwe mu miryango ibana itar@@ asezeranye . Yagize ati:" Haracyari icyuho cyo kuba hari imwe mu miryango ibana itar@@ asezer@@ anye, kandi abenshi ugasanga batazi amategeko abar@@ engera cyane cyane abagore, umugabo ugasanga yagurishije imit@@ ungo, umugore agac@@ ecek@@ a." Mugabo Fidel@@ e, ushinzwe imicungire y'@@ umushinga ndetse akaba n'umukozi muri Hag@@ uruka yavuze ko akenshi ibibazo by'@@ amak@@ ibir@@ ane yo mu miryango bituruka ku mit@@ ere y'amategeko agenga ubutaka mu Rwanda. Mugabo kandi avuga ko biterwa no kuba hari imwe mu miryango ibana mu buryo butemewe mugihe nyamara mu Rwanda nta tegeko rihari rir@@ engera abagore babana n'abagabo mu buryo butemewe n'amategeko. Mugabo yagize ati: "Mu ngo 3@@ 2% twas@@ uye, umugabo afite umugore umwe , twasanze 5% ari ababana mu buryo bunyuranyije n'amategeko, mugihe 7,@@ 5% twasanze ari umugabo utunze abagore barenze umwe. Ibi bigateza ibibazo mu muryango mugihe mu Rwanda nta tegeko rihari rir@@ engera umugore utar@@ asezeranye mu mategeko ku bijyanye n'umut@@ ung@@ o." Fidele Mug@@ abo, Umukozi muri Hag@@ uruka ush@@ izwe umutungo mu mushinga Land@@ esa Ibindi Mugabo yagar@@ utseho bituma mu miryango hakomeza kugaragara amakimbirane n'uko itegeko ry'@@ ubutaka rivuga ko ubutaka butar@@ engeje heg@@ itare imwe but@@ emerewe kugurishwa cyangwa ngo bug@@ abany@@ we abantu. Ubwo uyu mushinga Land@@ esa wakoraga ubushakashatsi uvuga ko wegereye abaturage uk@@ abafasha gukemura ibibazo bishingiye ku makimbirane ashingiye ku mitungo , aho mu turere twa Nyagatare na Kayonza abagore bagera kuri 40% basobanukiwe uburenganzira bwabo mu gukoresh@@ a, kugurisha no guhabwa ubutaka , naho 7@@ 2% by'abaturage bashoboye gukurikira ibikorwa by'@@ umushinga bashoboye gusobanukirwa no kubaza ibijyanye n'uburenganzira ku butaka. Uyu Mush@@ inga Land@@ esa wat@@ erwaga inkunga na USAID ukaba wash@@ oje imirimo yawo .
Bimwe mu biz@@ akwereka ko umusore muc@@ ud@@ itse nta kindi akurikiye kitari ubutunzi ‘G@@ ukura iby@@ iny@@ o’ ni imvugo yamamaye cyane mu Rwanda aho abantu b’ingeri zitandukanye bay@@ ikoresha bashaka kugaragaza umukobwa utagira urukundo ahubwo usanga akundana n’umugabo cyangwa umusore runaka kubera ubutunzi afite. Nubwo ariko abakobwa aribo bakunda gushyirwa mu maj@@ wi, burya ngo hari n’umusore usanga akundana n’umukobwa runaka nta kindi agamije uretse kurya imitungo ye. Imb@@ uga zitandukanye zirimo na Stand@@ ard zagiye z@@ andika ku miterere y’abasore nk’aba aho zagaragaje ko akenshi nta bikorwa bifatika bafite, ahubwo barangwa no kugerageza kwereka abakunzi babo ko ntacyo bat@@ abakorera ngo bish@@ ime ariko hagira ikibazo kiv@@ uka ugasanga ntibash@@ oboye kwihangana. Dore bimwe mu biz@@ akubwira ko umusore mukundana ari muri iki cyic@@ iro: 1. Bash@@ ishikazwa no kumenya amafaranga w@@ injiza Kimwe mu biz@@ akubwira ko umusore mukundana ari umuk@@ uzi w’@@ ibyin@@ yo ni uko uzasanga ashishikajwe no kumenya amafaranga winj@@ iza, uburyo w@@ izig@@ ama ndetse akenshi ugasanga ashaka kugenzura uburyo uy@@ akoresha. Ikindi ngo abasore nk’aba usanga bakunze kugeza ku bakunzi babo ibitekerezo bitandukanye bijyanye no gushora imari, ariko wash@@ ishoza neza ugasanga atari izindi impuhwe ahubwo ari amac@@ o yo kugira ngo babone uko bakoresha umutungo w’@@ abakobwa mu nyungu zabo bwite bitwaje urukundo rud@@ ahari. 2. B@@ iyumvamo kuba abasore b’@@ ibitangaza Abasore nk’aba kandi ngo usanga akenshi bakunze gushyira imbere uburyo bagaragara inyuma mu buryo bukabije, ndetse bak@@ iyumva nk’@@ abasore b’@@ ibitangaza ku buryo gukundana n’abo babifata nk’@@ amahirwe ku bak@@ obwa. Ibi ngo bituma bumva ko abakunzi babo bagomba gukora ibishoboka byose bakabit@@ aho binyuze mu kubah@@ onga impano zitandukanye zirimo n’@@ amafaranga, ku iturufu y’uko nibat@@ abikora bazat@@ andukana na bo. 3. Nt@@ ibash@@ ishikazwa n’umurimo Benshi mu basore barangwa n’imico yo gukunda abakobwa bafite amafaranga usanga nta gitekerezo na gito cyo gukora bafite cyangwa inzozi zo kugera ku kintu runaka, ahubwo bagash@@ ishikazwa no gushaka abakunzi bafite amafaranga menshi. Niba uri umukobwa ufite akazi kabone n’iyo kaba k@@ atag@@ uh@@ emba amafaranga menshi, ukaba ukundana n’umusore utagira akazi, aho gushaka icyo akora ugasanga an@@ ejejwe no gukoresha umutungo wawe gusa ur@@ it@@ onde ut@@ azas@@ igara uririra mu my@@ otsi. 4. Bakunda kubaho ubuzima buhenze Guk@@ uda ubuzima buhenze ubwabyo si ikibazo, ariko uzasanga abasore bari muri iki cyiciro bakunda ibih@@ enze gusa kandi nta gikorwa na kimwe bafite kib@@ injiriza amafaranga. Usanga bakunda imyambaro y’agaciro, gusohokera ahantu hah@@ enze ariko igihe cyo kwishyura cyagera ugasanga iteka bar@@ ereka abakunzi babo ko wenda bibag@@ iriwe amafaranga mu rugo cyangwa bay@@ ash@@ oye mu bikorwa runaka bibyara inyungu kandi mu by’ukuri nta kintu na kimwe bifit@@ iye.

Umuyobozi w’@@ abad@@ ah@@ igwa ku ntego Willy Rukundo yavuze ko kuba aya mazu yar@@ uzuye ad@@ ahenze cyane byaturutse ku bufatanye bwa Leta na koperative yabo byatumye aho kuzura inzu ifite agaciro ka miriyoni zisaga 28@@ RW@@ f@@ , ubu yuz@@ ura ihagaze miriyoni zisaga 18@@ RW@@ f. Ikigo cy’@@ Abanyamerika kigiye gufasha u Rwanda guhangana n’indwara zo mu mutwe Ikigo mpuzamahanga cy’@@ Abanyamerika gitanga ubufasha mu by’ubuvuzi cyitwa ‘@@ Johnson & Johns@@ on@@ ’ cyas@@ inyanye amasezerano y’ubufatanye bw’igihe kirambye na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, agamije kuyifasha gukora ubushakashatsi ku ndwara zo mu mutwe, guhugura abaganga bazo no gutanga imiti. Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr.@@ Diane Gashumba n’umuyobozi wa Johnson & Johns@@ on, Paul St@@ off@@ el@@ s, nibo bashyize umukono ku masezerano kuri uyu wa kabiri. Dr. Gashumba yavuze ko mu by’ibanze Johnson & Johns@@ on, izafasha u Rwanda ari gukora ubushakashatsi ku gitera indwara zo mu mutwe n’uko uz@@ ir@@ waye yakwit@@ abw@@ aho. Ati “Ni inyigo iz@@ areba uburemere bw’@@ ikibazo cy’@@ indwara zo mu mutwe mu gihugu cyose, ikar@@ eba impamvu zitera ibibazo byo mu mutwe, ikar@@ eba nanone ibisubizo big@@ endeye no ku mpamvu, uburyo dushobora kwirinda. Tw@@ an@@ ash@@ izemo ikibazo cy’@@ ibiyobyabwenge kugira ngo turebe uburemere bw@@ acy@@ o.” Uretse ubwo bushakashatsi, iki kigo kizakomeza no gufasha Leta mu bikorwa is@@ anganye byo kwita ku bafite uburwayi bwo mu mutwe, nko kugeza ubuvuzi kuri buri mut@@ urarwanda ubuk@@ eneye, bik@@ avanwa ku bitaro by’@@ uturere, bikag@@ ezwa ku mavuriro mato no ku mid@@ ugudu. Si ibyo gusa kuko Johnson & Johnson izan@@ afasha mu bukangurambaga ku banyarwanda ku kwita ku muntu ufite ubwo bur@@ wayi, kubona imiti hafi kandi ih@@ end@@ utse, guhugura abaganga bavura indwara zo mu mutwe n’abajyanama b’@@ ubuzima. Dr. Gashumba yashimiye iki kigo ku bufatanye git@@ angije na Leta y’u Rwanda, avuga ko bizagira uruhare mu kunoza gahunda za Guverinoma zo kwita ku bafite ubwo bur@@ wayi. Paul St@@ off@@ els yavuze ko biyemeje gufasha u Rwanda guhangana n’uburwayi bwo mu mutwe kuko ari ikibazo gihangayikishije Isi muri rusange. Ati “@@ Ubur@@ wayi bwo mu mutwe ni ikibazo gikomeje kwiyongera ku Isi, kandi cy@@ angiza ubuzima bw’umuntu ku giti cye, umuryango we n’abaturanyi muri rusange, cyane cyane abo mu bihugu bik@@ ennye, ku buryo bikwiye ko tu@@ cy@@ itond@@ era.” Umuganga w’@@ inzobere mu kuvura indwara zo mu mutwe ku Ibitaro bya Nd@@ era, Dr Biz@@ oza R@@ it@@ akay@@ ire, asanga aya mas@@ erano azag@@ irira akamaro benshi, kuko uretse ubushakashatsi, azaba an@@ agamije gukora ubukangurambaga ku ndwara zo mu mutwe, bamwe usanga bazir@@ wara ntib@@ ivuze, bakaz@@ itiranya n’amar@@ ozi, bigatuma bad@@ afata imiti neza. Uretse kuba uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bushobora guterwa n’izindi mpamvu zirimo nko gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge, ihohoterwa n’ibindi, mu Rwanda bifite umwihariko bamwe babitewe n’ibikom@@ ere batewe na Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994. Nubwo nta bushakashatsi bugaragaza umubare w’abanyarwanda bafite indwara zo mu mutwe, ni ikibazo gih@@ angayitse kuko ibitaro bya Nd@@ era, byak@@ iriye abarwayi 99@@ 4 mu 2010, mu 2015 byak@@ irwa 1,@@ 4@@ 32 mu wa 2016, byak@@ irwa 28@@ 0@@ 4, naho mu mu mu 2017 byak@@ irwa 196@@ 0. Minisitiri w'Intebe yahaye ubutumwa abanyarwanda bakiy@@ ita impunzi mu mahanga Minisitiri w'Intebe w'u Rwanda Anastase Murekezi yahamagariye abanyarwanda bose baba hanze y'u Rwanda bitwaza ko ari impunzi ko batah@@ uka cyangwa se bakag@@ uma muri ibyo bihugu bat@@ itwa impunzi kuko u Rwanda rufite umutekano uses@@ uye. Ibi Minisitiri w'Intebe Anastase Murekezi yab@@ ivuye mu muhango wo kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w'@@ impunzi, umunsi wizih@@ ijwe kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 20 Kamena 2016. Minisitiri w'Intebe Anastase Murekezi yagaragaje ko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994, abay@@ ikoze benshi bahungiye mu bihugu bitandukanye by'@@ amahanga, ariko nyuma Leta y'u Rwanda yafashe umwanzuro ukomeye wo kubag@@ arura mu gihugu ngo bafatanye n'abandi kubaka u Rwanda. Yongeyeho ko n'ubwo hari abanyarwanda batahutse hakiri n'abandi bakiri mu mahanga bacy@@ iyita impunzi. Gusa Minisitiri Murekezi yabah@@ amagariye gutaha cyangwa se bakag@@ uma muri ibyo bihugu bat@@ itwa impunzi ndetse ko mu mwaka 2017 sitati y'@@ ubuhunzi iz@@ akurwaho burundu. Yagize ati " Abanyarwanda bafite uburenganzira bwo gutahuka cyangwa se bakag@@ uma mu bihugu by@@ abak@@ iriye ariko bat@@ itwa impunzi, nk'uko turi kwegereza gukuraho burundu sitati y'@@ ubuh@@ unzi, uyu munsi ubaye umwanya wo kongera gushimangira ko nta munyarwanda ukwiye kwitwa impunzi kugeza uyu muns@@ i." Minisitiri w'Intebe Murekezi kandi yaremye agatima abarundi bahungiye mu Rwanda ababwira ko afite icyizere ko baz@@ ataha vuba mu gihe ibiganiro biri guhuza Leta y'u Burundi n'abat@@ avuga rumwe na yo bigenze neza ndetse bafash@@ ishwe na Leta z'ibihugu bigize umuryango wa East Africa Commun@@ ity. Yagize ati "Mu mwaka wa 2015 abantu basaga miliyoni 5 barah@@ unze harimo abarenga ibihumbi 80 b'@@ abarundi baje mu Rwanda. Abanyarwanda na Leta y'u Rwanda bizeye ko abarundi baz@@ asubira iwabo vuba nyuma y'ibiganiro twizeye ko bizagenda neza." Uhagarariye UNHCR mu Rwanda yashimiye u Rwanda uburyo bwagaragaje ubushake bwo gukuraho sitati y'@@ ubuh@@ unzi, aho nawe yashimangiye ko mu ntangiriro z'umwaka wa 2018 nta munyarwanda ku isi uzaba akitwa impunzi. Yagize ati "Mu mwaka wa 2014 Minisitiri muri MIDIMAR na njye twatangiye gahunda yo gukuraho burundu sitati kuko abanyarwanda bahunze mbere y'@@ 1999 nta mpamvu n'imwe bafite yo kut@@ agaruka mu Rwanda, nyuma y'ibiganiro byabaye hagati y'ibihugu byombi tw@@ emeje ko tariki ya 01 Mutarama 2018 sitati y'@@ ubuhunzi izaba yakuwe ku banyarwanda baba mu mah@@ ang@@ a." Abandi bafashe ijambo muri uyu muhango bagaragaje ko ikibazo cy'@@ ubuhunzi gikwiye gucika ari uko hak@@ em@@ uwe igitera ubuh@@ unzi. Kuva mu 1994 abanyarwanda barenga miliyoni 3 bamaze gutahuka ariko hakaba hasigaye n'abandi bakiri mu bihugu bitandukanye ariko abenshi bakaba bari muri Kongo. Muri uyu mwaka wa 2016 abanyarwanda 19@@ 35 ni bo bamaze gutahuka mu gihe abandi 7@@ 101 na bo basubiye mu bihugu byabo bavuye mu Rwanda aho bari bac@@ umbik@@ iwe. U Rwanda kugeza ubu ruc@@ umbikiye impunzi z'@@ abanyamahanga zigera ku bihumbi 16@@ 2.@@ 25@@ 4 barimo impunzi z'@@ abanyekongo zigera ku bihumbi 18@@ 2, abarundi barenga ibihumbi 78 ndetse n'abandi barenga 350 bakomoka mu bindi bihugu. Impuguke zat@@ anze ibitekerezo ku cy@@ akuraho ubuhunzi Abat@@ erankunga batandukanye bafatanyije n'u Rwanda mu munsi mpuzamahanga w'@@ impunzi

Ubusanzwe konti yitwa ko itag@@ ikora iyo imaze igihe kinini id@@ akoreshwa. Buri konti iri muri banki y’@@ ubucuruzi, iyo imaze amezi atandatu id@@ akoreshwa yinjira mu mubare w’@@ iz@@ id@@ akora, yagera ku mezi 12 ikaba itag@@ ikoresh@@ wa. Iyo imaze imyaka itanu, amafaranga ay@@ iriho yoherezwa muri BNR@@ . Mu gihe nta muntu uy@@ aburana mu myaka itanu, ashyirwa kuri konti ya leta. Gusa ngo ba nyirayo n’abandi babifitiye uburenganzira, bashobora kuy@@ aburana biciye muri ya banki y’ubucuruzi bari bafitemo kont@@ i, ariko bagaragaje ibyangombwa byerekana ko bifite ukuri. Ubuyobozi bwa BNR buvuga ko bimwe mu bikunze gutuma habaho izi konti z@@ ibitse amafaranga ariko ntiz@@ ikor@@ e, biterwa n’abantu bagiye gutura hanze y’igihugu. Hari aho ba nyiri konti bapfa kandi batar@@ ashyizeho abas@@ imbura ndetse ngo hari n’aho usanga bamwe batazi ko bafite uburenganzira bwo gukurikirana ya mafaranga yageze mu isanduku za leta nk’uko The New Times yaby@@ anditse. BNR ivuga ko mu 2017 abakurikir@@ anye aya mafaranga ari bake, kuko bari ku kigero cya 15@@ %. Kuba aba aribo ba@@ yasub@@ ijwe, akenshi ngo biterwa n’@@ igenzura rikorwa ku byangombwa by’@@ aba@@ yareg@@ era, mu rwego rwo kureba ko nta many@@ anga y’@@ abashobora kub@@ iy@@ itir@@ ira. Amafaranga akurikiranwa na ba nyir@@ ayo, babanza kwandikira banki aho bafite konti bakay@@ as@@ aba, bitwaje ibyangombwa by@@ uzuye. Iyo icyifuzo cyabo cy@@ ubahir@@ ijwe, ya banki y’ubucuruzi yandikira BNR inyandiko iherekejwe na bya byang@@ ombw@@ a. BNR igenzura bwa bus@@ abe, yas@@ anga bw@@ ujuje ibisabwa, amafaranga ak@@ agarurwa kuri konti ya wa muntu. Iyo bun@@ enz@@ we, BNR ibwira ya banki ko bid@@ ashoboka, umukiliya wasabye ya mafaranga ak@@ abwirwa ibikenewe byose ngo ay@@ ah@@ abw@@ e. BNR ivuga ko gukemura ibi bibazo bigiye kujya bikorwa na Minisiteri y’Ubutabera mu kwemeza igar@@ uzwa ry’amafaranga no kwishyura nk’uko byavug@@ uruwe mu itegeko ryo mu 2015 rijyanye n’@@ igar@@ uzwa ry’@@ umutungo.

Umuyobozi w'umudugudu wa Nyag@@ af@@ unzo Uw@@ ayisaba Evode yavuze ko isoko y'iri v@@ omo yabonetse mu 1980 ariko ntir@@ yabasha gutunganywa n'aho bikor@@ ewe ngo ntib@@ yakozwe neza ku buryo bw@@ afashaga abaturage ari byo batumye bashishikariza abaturage babo kwishakamo ibisubizo bakiy@@ ubakira iri v@@ om@@ ero. Abaturage bo mu mudugudu wa Nyag@@ af@@ unzo bavuze ko kuba bariy@@ ubakiye iri v@@ omero byag@@ abanyije inkom@@ ati yajyaga iba kuri iri v@@ omero kubera amazi make kandi akenewe n'abantu benshi. Umwe muri bo yagize ati "@@ inkom@@ ati yar@@ acitse ubu ngubu abaturage bar@@ av@@ oma neza nta kibazo n'umutekano ur@@ ahari nta bantu bak@@ iza ngo bav@@ und@@ av@@ und@@ e, dore ko mu minsi yashize kuvoma byabaga ari ikibazo hak@@ av@@ oma umusore ufite imbaraga, umugore utwite nt@@ av@@ ome ariko ubu abaturage bari kuvoma neza nta kibaz@@ o." Aba baturage kandi bahaye ibikoresho bishya abanyerondo b'@@ umwuga birimo imyambar@@ o, inkweto, amat@@ oro@@ shi n'ink@@ oni. Iburengerazuba : Trans@@ it Center ya Ngororero ngo ni ikitegererezo mu ntara yose Ubuyobozi bw'@@ Intara y'Iburengerazuba bwemeje ko Ikigo ng@@ orora muco cya Ngororero (@@ Trans@@ it Cent@@ er) kiri mu Murenge wa Kabaya ari icyitegererezo mu bindi bigo nka cyo byo mu tundi turere tugize iyi ntara bityo abayobozi b'uturere bakaba basabwa kukig@@ iraho mu kunoza imikorere y'@@ ibigo ngororamuco byo mu turere tw@@ abo. Abayobozi n'abakozi b'uturere tugize Intara y'Uburengerazuba basuye Ikigo Ngoror@@ amuco cya Ngororero kuri uyu wa 26 Gashyantare 2015 na bo bashimangira ko ari intangarugero mu kwigisha abah@@ ah@@ ererwa amasomo ku birebana n'@@ imyitwar@@ ire, isuku no kwiga imy@@ uga. Abari mu Kigo Ngoror@@ amuco cya Ngororero bahabwa amasomo. Kimwe no mu bindi bigo ngoror@@ amuc@@ o, abah@@ igish@@ irizwa ni abafite imyitwarire mibi mu muryango nyarwanda, bakaba bahabwa amasomo yose hamwe 18 arebana n'@@ imyitwar@@ ire, gukunda Igihugu no kwiga imy@@ uga. Mu kwirinda ko hari uwab@@ eshy@@ erwa , mu ngo abaj@@ yanwa mu Kigo Ngoror@@ amuco cya Ngororero ni abo biba byemejwe na komite y'@@ umudugudu hamwe n'umuyobozi w'@@ akagari ko bafite amakosa akwiye gukosorwa vuba nk'@@ ubus@@ inzi, urugomo, gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge n'ibindi. Aho abag@@ ororerwa mu Kigo Ngoror@@ amuco cya Ngororero bar@@ ara. Twahirwa Abdoul@@ at@@ if@@ , Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Nyabihu wari muri urwo ruzinduko ashima uburyo Akarere ka Ngororero g@@ afashe g@@ afasha abari mu kigo ngororamuco mu kubag@@ aburira neza, kuryama heza kuko bafite matora n'ibyo kwiy@@ or@@ os@@ a, ibikoresho by'@@ isuku ndetse no kwigishwa imyuga itandukanye, nko kubaka amashy@@ iga ya r@@ ond@@ ereza, im@@ babura n'ibindi. Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'Intara y'Ibur@@ engerazuba, J@@ abo Paul, yaboneyeho gusaba utundi turere kwigira ku Karere ka Ngororero maze na bo bakan@@ oza imikorere y'@@ ibigo byabo mu rwego rwo kunganira ikigo cya IW@@ AW@@ A. An@@ asaba ko mu kigo cya Ngororero cyamaze gutera imbere bajya bah@@ it@@ ishamo abak@@ igish@@ iriz@@ wamo imyuga bashaka kwiga. Abayobozi batandukanye mu Ntara y'Ibur@@ enger@@ a@@ uba basura Ikigo Ngoror@@ amuco cya Ngoror@@ ero. Ikigo Ngoror@@ amuco cya Ngororero cyatangiye ku wa 11 Nzeri 2012, kimaze kuny@@ urwamo n'abagabo n'abasore 11@@ 87 harimo n'abat@@ uruka mu tundi turere tugera kuri 15 tw'@@ u Rwanda baba bafatiwe muri Ngoror@@ ero. Muri bo, 11@@ 47 barat@@ ashye basubira mu miryango kandi ngo bitwara neza. 40 baracy@@ ak@@ irimo naho 97 bajyanywe K@@ irwa cya IW@@ AW@@ A, aho ngo bahabwa ibikoresho bitandukanye mbere yo kugenda. Kiliziya Gatolika yamaganye itegeko ryo gukuramo inda, in@@ asaba amavuriro yayo kutaz@@ arik@@ urikiza Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda yatangaje ko umuntu atari igikoresho buri wese afit@@ eho uburenganzira bwo gukoresha icyo ashatse kabone nubwo yaba umwana ukiri mu nda. Yatangaje ko id@@ ashyigikiye itegeko riherutse gusohok@@ a, ritanga uburenganzira ku muntu ufite impamvu zihariye kuba yasaba guk@@ urirwamo inda. B@@ iri mu itangazo ryashyizwe hanze n’inama y’ab@@ episkopi ba Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda, nyuma y’iminsi mike hasohotse igitabo gishya cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda. Ingingo ya 12@@ 3 na 12@@ 4 z’@@ igitabo gishya cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha, zivuga ko gukuramo inda cyangwa kugira uwo uy@@ ikur@@ iramo ari icyaha gih@@ anirwa. Icyakora, ingingo ya 125 ivuga ko nta bur@@ yoz@@ w@@ acyaha b@@ ubaho iyo gukuramo inda byakozwe iyo ub@@ isaba utwite ari umwana, kuba uw@@ akur@@ iwemo inda yarak@@ oreshejwe imibonano mpuzabitsina ku gah@@ ato, kuba uw@@ akur@@ iwemo yaray@@ itwaye nyuma yo kub@@ anishwa n’undi nk’umugore n’umugabo ku gah@@ ato, kuba inda ibangamiye ubuzima bw’@@ utwite cyangwa ubw’@@ umwana atwite n’ibindi. Iyi ngingo ivuga ko guk@@ urirwamo inda bikorwa na muganga wemewe na Leta. Mu itangazo ryashyizweho umukono n’@@ Umwepis@@ ikopi wa Diyosezi ya Butare akaba na Perezida w’Inama y’Ab@@ episkopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, Filipo Ruk@@ amba@@ ; r@@ ishima ko igitabo cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha gifite ingingo zih@@ ana gukuramo inda, ariko rik@@ anenga kuba hari izindi zib@@ yemera. Kiliziya ivuga ko gukuramo inda ku bushake ari icyaha gikomeye kandi ko biteye agahinda kuba itegeko ryemera ko bikorwa na muganga ari we wag@@ akwiye kurengera ubuzima bw’umwana n’@@ umubyeyi. R@@ ikomeza rigira riti “Mu gihe inda ibangamiye ubuzima bw’@@ utwite cyangwa ubw’@@ umwana atwite, ukwemera dusangiye muri Yezu Kirisitu kwibutsa abaganga ko bafite inshingano yo gukora ibishoboka byose bagamije gukiza ubuzima bw’@@ umubyeyi n’ub@@ w’umwana ku buryo n’iyo haba ingaruka mbi ku mwana, atari byo biba big@@ ambir@@ i@@ we.” Kiliziya ivuga ko ubuzima bw’umuntu atari igikoresho buri wese ag@@ iraho uburenganzira kabone nubwo bwaba ari ubw’@@ urus@@ oro rukiri mu nda. Aba b@@ episikopi bakomeza bagira bati “Umuntu si igikoresho buri wese afit@@ eho uburenganzira. Ubuzima bw’umuntu ntib@@ ushyirwa ku munz@@ ani nk’@@ ibintu cyangwa ngo buh@@ abwe agaciro bitewe n’imyaka umuntu afite ahubwo ni impano y’Imana ihabwa uburemere n’urukundo rw’Imana yam@@ wir@@ em@@ eye@@ ”. Kiliziya Gatolika ifite ibigo nderabuzima n’ibitaro bisaga 11@@ 8 mu gihugu hose. Si ubwa mbere ifata umwanzuro ukomeye nk’uyu kuko mu 2016 yahagaritse serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro zitari iza gakondo mu mavuriro yayo. Mu itangazo ryo kuri uyu wa Gatatu, Kiliziya Gatolika yasabye Leta kut@@ azah@@ atira abaganga gukuramo inda, isaba by’umwihariko abakora mu mavuriro yayo kutaz@@ abikora. It@@ i “Tur@@ izera ko ubuyobozi but@@ azah@@ atira abaganga b@@ emewe na Leta gukuramo inda iyo bumva binyuranyije n’umut@@ imanama wabo bikaba by@@ abah@@ ungabanya mu myemerere no mu mibereho yabo bwit@@ e.” “T@@ uram@@ enyesha abakora mu mavuriro yacu ko tut@@ emera ko hakorerwa icyaha cyo gukuramo inda. Turifuza ko abaganga b’@@ abakirisitu bafata iya mbere mu kurengera ubuzima no kugira iyo nama nziza ababagana bose bash@@ ikam@@ iwe n’ibibazo binyuranye by’@@ ubuzim@@ a.” Igitabo gishya cy’amategeko kivuga ko uretse igihe byakozwe mu buryo bwemewe n‘@@ amategeko, umuntu ukuyemo inda mu bundi buryo ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’umwaka umwe ariko kitarenze imyaka itatu n’ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda atari munsi y’ibihumbi ijana ariko atarenze ibihumbi magana abiri. U@@ hamwe n’icyaha cyo guk@@ uriramo undi inda, ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’umwaka umwe ariko kitarenze imyaka ibiri n’ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda atari munsi y’ibihumbi magana atatu ariko atarenze ibihumbi magana atanu cyangwa kimwe gusa muri ibyo bihano. Ibi bihano bir@@ iyongera iyo uw@@ akur@@ iwemo inda yakur@@ ijemo ubumuga cyangwa urupfu. Kiliziya Gatolika yamaganye itegeko ryo gukuramo inda
Nyabihu: H@@ ashyinguwe imibiri 35 y'@@ abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Mu rwibutso rw'akarere ka Nyabihu h@@ ashyinguwe mu cyubahiro imibiri 35 yakuwe mu murenge wa J@@ enda, Mukamira na Mur@@ inga, isanga imibiri 2020 yari isanzwe ishing@@ uwe muri urwo rw@@ ibutso. Muri uwo muhango wabaye tariki 12@@ /04/201@@ 3, habaye amasengesho y'@@ abany@@ amatorero n'@@ amadini batandukanye no gufata umunota wo kunamira inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ndetse han@@ ac@@ anwa urumuri rush@@ ushanya ikizere cyo kubaho ku bacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Benshi mu bagize icyo bavuga, bih@@ anganishije cyane abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside, babah@@ umuriza, bababwira ko Imana yatumye bar@@ okoka bakaba bakiriho izakomeza kubar@@ inda. Imibiri 35 y'@@ abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi niyo yashyinguwe mu cyubahiro. B@@ ongeyeho ko na Leta y'ubumwe ndetse n'ingabo z'u Rwanda, baharanira ibyiza kandi baz@@ arushaho kug@@ umya kwimakaza umuco w'@@ amahor@@ o,@@ ubumwe no kurwanya Jenoside n'@@ ingengabitekerezo yayo kugira ngo bitaz@@ asubira ukundi. Ikindi kandi ku bufatanye n'abaturage ,@@ bakaz@@ aharanira iterambere ry'@@ abacitse ku icumu n'@@ Abany@@ anyarwanda bose muri rusange baharanira kwigira no kwiteza imbere. Perezida wa IBUKA mu karere ka Nyabihu, Juru Anastas@@ e,@@ yashimiye cyane Leta y'ubumwe ku byiza igenda ibag@@ ezaho. Yavuze ko Leta y'ubumwe ibafasha mu nzego zose, haba mu burezi, mu mibereho myiza, mu iterambere n'ahandi. Perezida wa IBUKA mu karere ka Nyabihu, Juru Anastase, yashimiye Leta y'ubumwe ibyiza id@@ ahwema kubagezaho ndetse ashimira n'akarere uburyo kab@@ itaho. Yavuze ko abana 500 biga bamwe bakaba baran@@ arangije babifashijwemo na Leta y'@@ ubumwe. Uretse kwiga amashuri yisumbuye, Leta ibafasha no kwiga kaminuza aho mu mwaka ushize abagera kuri 20 bafashijwe kwiga muri za kaminuza ndetse no muri uyu mwaka bakaba bizeye ko hari aba@@ zig@@ a. Uretse mu burezi, mu mibereho myiza Leta yakoze byinshi. Kugeza ubu abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside bafite amac@@ umbi, aho amazu agera kuri 400 yubats@@ we, abatar@@ abona aho baba bakaba bagera ku 9 kandi nabo ikibazo cyabo kikaba kigiye gukemuka vuba@@ ; nk'uko Juru yabigar@@ uts@@ eho. Ku kibazo cy'@@ amazu akenewe gus@@ anwa, yavuzeko bafite ikizere cyo kuyas@@ anirwa babifashijwemo na FARG . Ku birebana na gahunda ya Girinka, abacitse ku icumu bamaze guhabwa inka zisaga 150 atabar@@ iyemo iz@@ aby@@ aye. Bafite kandi amatungo magufi agera ku ihene 50 byose bak@@ esha Leta y'ubumwe mu gihe Jenoside irangira nta wari utunze kuko bari bar@@ ariye amatungo yabo. Kugeza ubu abantu 87 bahabwa inkunga y'ing@@ oboka muri aka karere. Mu ijoro ryo kwibuka abazize Jenoside mu karere ka Nyabihu hac@@ anwe urumuri rw'@@ ikizere cyo kubaho. Kugeza ubu hari ikibazo cy'@@ amar@@ ange y@@ om@@ oka bitewe n'@@ ubukonje bw'@@ imbere mu rw@@ ibutso, ariko Perezida wa IBUKA mu karere yizeye ko kiz@@ akemuka kuko hari amwe mu mafaranga yateg@@ anijwe mu gukora icyo gikorwa. Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Nyabihu yasezer@@ anije abacitse ku icumu ko nk'@@ akarere bazakomeza gukurikirana ikibazo icyo ari cyo cyose bag@@ ira,@@ bakabafasha muri byose no gutera intambwe ikomeye mu guharanira kwigira nk'uko insanganyamatsiko y'uyu mwaka ibivuga. Safari Viateur
Perezida Kagame yahawe igihembo cy'uko yateje imbere ikoranabuhanga Perezida Kagame yakira iki gihembo yagenewe na IT@@ U Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame yashyikirijwe igihembo nk'umwe mu bakuru b'ibihugu na za guverinoma bagize uruhare mu guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga mu bihugu byabo. Ibi bihembo byiswe ICT@@ s in s@@ ust@@ ain@@ able d@@ evelop@@ ment awar@@ d@@ s, byatanzwe n'umuryango mpuzamahanga w'@@ itumanaho IT@@ U, ni mu nama y'umuryango w'abibumbye iri kubera I New York muri leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika. Ubwo yahabwaga iki gih@@ embo, Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame, yavuze ko acy@@ akiriye mu izina ry'@@ Abanyarwanda. Perezida Kagame yavuze ko iki gihembo acy@@ akiriye mu izina ry'@@ abanyarwanda Perezida Kagame akaba yagize ati" Ndagira ngo nsh@@ imire umuryango mpuzamahanga w'@@ itumanaho, ndetse n'umuryango uharanira iterambere rirambye kubera iki gihembo bamp@@ aye. Nk@@ yakiriye mu izina ry'@@ Abanyarwanda kuko bih@@ atira gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ngo bahind@@ ure ubuzima bwabo, Ndetse ngo barusheho no gusabana neza. Ikoranabuhanga kandi rin@@ atwibutsa ko gusakaza umurongo mugari w'@@ itumanaho rya interineti bizafasha cyane kugera ku ntego z'@@ iterambere riram@@ bye@@ ." Mu bandi bakuru b'ibihugu byo ku mugabane wa Afurika bahawe iki gihembo cya ICT@@ s in S@@ ust@@ ain@@ able d@@ evelop@@ ment awar@@ d@@ s, harimo Perezida wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta, ndetse na Ali Bongo Ond@@ imba uyobora Igihugu cya Gabon@@ . Mbere yuko Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame yitabira inama yashyikir@@ ijwemo iki gih@@ embo, yabanje kwitabira inama yigaga ku kuzamura icy@@ aro, inama yateguwe na Koreya y'epfo ndetse n'@@ ishami ry'umuryango w'abibumbye ryita ku iterambere UND@@ P. Ibi bihembo ICT@@ s in S@@ ust@@ ain@@ able d@@ evelop@@ ment awar@@ ds bihabwa abakuru b'@@ Ibihugu na za Guverinoma bagize uruhare mu guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga, byatanzwe ku nshuro ya mbere, ariko bikaba biteganyijwe ko bizajya bitangwa buri mwaka. Nyampinga Aurore yaba yatanze itike yo kuv@@ uriza mu Buhinde Iranzi urwaye bikomeye Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore biravugwa ko yatanze itike y'indege yo kujya kuv@@ uriza mu gihugu cy'u Buhinde umwana uzwi ku izina rya Iranzi Ndahiro Isaac ufite uburwayi bw@@ ananiranye kuvurirwa hano mu Rwanda. Ibi bibaye nyuma y'uko ibitaro byose bya hano mu Rwanda bin@@ anir@@ iwe kuvura uyu mwana uburwayi bivugwa ko yavukanye bumeze nk'@@ ib@@ ibyimba cyangwa se ubush@@ ye buri kunda ku muk@@ ondo we, hanyuma Minisiteri y'Ubuzima ik@@ emera kumw@@ ishingira mu kumuv@@ uriza mu gihugu cy'u Buhinde ariko hak@@ abura itike yo kum@@ ujyan@@ ayo. Amakuru atugeraho aravuga ko Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore yabanje kwemerera nyina wa Iranzi ariwe Mbabazi Liliane ko azam@@ uha itike yo kumujyana hamwe n'umwana mu Buhinde ariko yanga ko by@@ atangazwa ataram@@ ushyikiriza ayo mafaranga. Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aur@@ ore. Biravugwa kandi ko amafaranga yose Nyampinga Mutesi Kayibanda Aurore yatanze ngo Iranzi na mama we Mbabazi Liliane babashe kujya mu gihugu cy'u Buhinde angana n'@@ amadolari 16@@ 00. Twagerageje kuvugana na Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore ngo tumenye amakuru arambuye kuri iyi nkuru ariko ntibyad@@ ukund@@ ira. Iranzi Ndahiro Isaac afite uburwayi bumeze nk'@@ ib@@ ibyimba cyangwa ubush@@ ye bw'@@ ako kanya buri ku nda ye ku muk@@ ondo aho bivugwa ko yab@@ uv@@ uk@@ anye. Iranzi Ndahiro Isaac urwaye indwara yan@@ aniranye hano mu Rwanda. Afite gusa amezi icyenda akaba az@@ av@@ urizwa mu gihugu cy'u Buhinde mu bitaro bya "N@@ aray@@ ana Hospit@@ al@@ " biri mu mugi wa Bang@@ al@@ ore ku bufatanye bwa Minisiteri y'Ubuzima izam@@ uv@@ uza na Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore watanze itike yo kug@@ er@@ ayo. Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore akunze kugaragara mu bikorwa binyuranye by'@@ urukundo akaba an@@ aherutse gutangiza umushinga wo gufasha abana bafashwe ku ngufu bakiri bato. Mu kiganiro giheruka na IGIHE ubwo u Rwanda rw@@ iteg@@ uraga uyo mwanya, Uw@@ ungirije Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Loni, Olivier Nduhungir@@ ehe, yagaragaje ko kuyobora aka kanama hari isomo bitanga ku Banyarwanda no ku mahanga. Yagize ati “U Rwanda ruz@@ ayobora bwa kabiri Akanama k’@@ Umutekano k’@@ Umuryango w’Abibumbye muri Nyakanga 2014. Icyo gihe tuzaba tw@@ izihiza imyaka 20 u Rwanda rumaze rw@@ iboh@@ oye. Iki ni ikimenyetso gikomeye ku Banyarwanda, kuko gituma twibuka uko amahanga, arimo Akanama k’@@ Umutekano w’Umuryango w’Abibumbye yater@@ aranye u Rwanda mu mwaka wa 1994, maze igihugu kik@@ ab@@ ohorwa n’abana bacy@@ o, bah@@ agarariwe na FPR-@@ Inkotanyi. Bivuze ko ibi bigomba gukomeza kut@@ ubera is@@ omo. U Rwanda nubwo rimwe na rimwe rw@@ akenera ubwisungane mpuzamahanga, ruz@@ areng@@ erwa kandi ruz@@ azamurwa mbere na mbere n’@@ amaboko y’abana barw@@ o.” Mu byo u Rwanda r@@ ushyize imbere kuri iyi nshuro r@@ uyobora A@@ Kanama ka Loni ni ukw@@ ibanda ku kubungabunga umutekano, hakoreshejwe ubufatanye bw’Umuryango w’Abibumbye n’@@ Imiryango y’@@ Uturere (@@ pe@@ ac@@ ek@@ e@@ ep@@ ing : reg@@ ional part@@ n@@ er@@ ship@@ s and its ev@@ ol@@ ut@@ ion). H@@ anag@@ anirwe no ku ngingo yo kubaka amahoro mu bihugu bivuye mu ntambara (p@@ ost@@ -@@ con@@ fl@@ ic@@ t pe@@ aceb@@ u@@ ild@@ ing@@ ). U Rwanda rwah@@ erukaga kuy@@ oboye Akanama k’@@ Umutekano k’@@ Umuryango w’Abibumbye muri Mata 2013.
Abanyamadini barasabwa kurandura ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside Guverineri w'Intara y'Amajyepfo, Munyan@@ twali Alphonse, arasaba abanyamadini n'@@ amatorero gufata iya mbere mu kurandura ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside binyuze muny@@ igisho bat@@ anga. Muri iki gihe hibukwa ku nshuro ya 22 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Guverineri Munyan@@ twali mu butumwa atanga, ahanini yibanda ku madini ay@@ asaba kugendera kure ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside kandi bakabit@@ oza abayoboke babo. Abanyamadini n'@@ amatorero basabwa gufata iya mbere mu kurandura ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside. Mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, ubwo mu cyumweru gishize yifat@@ anyaga n'@@ abatuye Umurenge wa Cyah@@ inda mu kwibuka, yasabye abanyamadini gufata iya mbere mu kwigisha abo bayobora kugira imico myiza n'imikorere miz@@ im@@ a,@@ hagamijwe gukumira ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside. Ati "@@ Bany@@ amadini n'@@ amatorero namwe muri abayobozi, mukwiye kuba aba@@ mbere mu kuyobora neza, muk@@ igisha abo m@@ uyobora imico myiza n'imig@@ irire miz@@ ima, kandi mukaba intangarug@@ ero, kuko ntawe utanga icyo ad@@ afit@@ e". Guverineri Munyantwari y@@ ifatanya n'abaturage ba Cyah@@ inda mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 22 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Nubwo akunze kwibanda ku bany@@ amatorero n'@@ amadini ariko, Guverineri Munyan@@ twali avuga ko atari uko mu madini ari ho hagaragara ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, ko ahubwo abanyamadini ari bo bafite uruhare rukomeye mu gutuma abo bayobora bagira imitekerereze n'imikorere myiza. Agira ati "@@ Abanyamadini n'@@ amatorero simb@@ ibandaho kuko ari ho bafite ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, ahubwo ni uko ari bamwe mu bafite uruhare runini mu gutuma abo bayobora bagira imyumvire n'@@ imitekerereze m@@ izima yubaka u Rwand@@ a". Guverineri Munyan@@ twali kandi avuga ko abanyamadini n'@@ amatorero hamwe n'abayobozi baz@@ atsinda urugamba rwo kurwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, ari uko babaye intangarugero mu bikorwa byiza by@@ ubaka. Abaturage basabwa kwigish@@ anya ubu bw'@@ amac@@ s@@ kub@@ iri. Aba ni ab'@@ i Nyagis@@ ozi muri Nyaruguru. Akomeza agira ati "@@ Burya uko witwara bifasha abo uyobora kuby@@ igir@@ aho, kuko iyo uvuga ibintu bid@@ ahuye n'ibyo ukora birag@@ orana ko abo uyobora babik@@ urik@@ iza. Abayobozi rero dukwiye kuba aba mbere mu kugaragariza abo t@@ uyobora ibyiza byo gushyira hamwe no gukunda igihugu cyacu@@ ". Guverineri Munyan@@ twali kandi asaba abaturage kwigisha abakiri bato ibibi by'@@ amacakubiri n'@@ ibyiza byo gushyira hamwe, kuko ari byo bizatuma bak@@ urana urukundo hagati yabo ndetse bagakunda n'igihugu cyabo bak@@ akir@@ wanira ishyaka mu iterambere.
Manishimwe n’umuryango we bam@@ bur@@ iwe muri Uganda bavuye gup@@ agasa Manishimwe Elias ukomoka mu Murenge wa Rwinkwavu mu Karere ka Kayonza w@@ ajyanye n’umuryango we mu gihugu cya Uganda mu mwaka wa 2017, yagarutse mu Rwanda imb@@ ok@@ obo@@ ko nyuma yo kwam@@ bur@@ irwa muri Uganda ibye byose ubwo yari mu nzira ataha mu Rwanda. Uwo mugabo w’imyaka 25 yagarutse mu Rwanda ari kumwe n’umugore we witwa Iradukunda Emer@@ ence n’abana babo batatu babaga mu gace ka Buny@@ oro. Bavuga ko mu myaka hafi itatu bamaze mu gihugu cya Uganda babayeho bap@@ agas@@ a. B@@ aganira na Kigali Today kuri uyu wa kane tariki 30 Mutarama 2020 aho bari bacumbikiwe ku Murenge wa Cyanika mu Karere ka Burera mu gihe bategereje kugezwa iwabo muri Kayonza, mu gahinda kenshi bagaragaje urugendo bafata nk’@@ inzira y’umusaraba bav@@ uyemo nyuma y’uko bari bafashe icyemezo cyo gutaha iwabo mu Rwanda. Ngo ubwo bageraga mu gihugu cya Uganda muri Nzeri 2017, ngo hari umugabo w’umuk@@ ire wari w@@ abaj@@ yanye abizeza akazi ko mu rugo bag@@ ezeyo bam@@ ukorera mu gihe cy’amezi abiri ar@@ abas@@ iga aragenda ntib@@ ongera ku m@@ uca iry@@ era. Ngo mu gushaka uburyo babah@@ o, big@@ iriye inama yo gup@@ agasa bah@@ ingira abandi, aho bageze aho babona ubushobozi batangira gukodesha ubutaka barih@@ ingira bageza ubwo bagera ku mit@@ waro 60 y’@@ amashilingi ya Uganda aho bavuga ko ay@@ ing@@ ay@@ inga amafaranga ibihumbi 150 y’u Rwanda. Nyuma y’uko ngo bakomeje guhura n’it@@ otezwa rikomeje gukorerwa Abanyarwanda mu gihugu cya Uganda, babonye ko bashobora kuh@@ aburira ubuzima bigira inama yo kugaruka mu gihugu cyabo. Ngo bakimara kuz@@ inga utw@@ ang@@ ushye nibwo bagiye gutega bis@@ i, uw@@ inj@@ izaga abagenzi muri iyo bisi abizeza ko abageza mu Ruhengeri abaca amag@@ ande imitwaro itanu gusa bat@@ ungurwa n’uko ku n@@ yemez@@ abwishyu bahawe yanditseho imitwaro ibiri. Nk’uko Manishimwe yakomeje abivuga, ngo bar@@ abajije impamvu bahawe fagit@@ ire yanditseho imitwaro id@@ ahuye n’iyo bishy@@ uye. Ati “@@ Kuki mud@@ uhaye F@@ agit@@ ire yanditseho imitwaro ibiri kandi tw@@ ishyuye imitwaro itan@@ u@@ ?@@ , bamubwira bati icyangombwa se si uko tuk@@ ugeza aho twavuganye iwanyu mu Ruhenger@@ i?” Ngo baraje bakigera ahitwa Nt@@ ungamo sh@@ oferi ahagarika imodoka avamo n’abo yari itwaye bose has@@ ig@@ aramo Manishimwe n’umuryango we, bat@@ ungurwa no kubwirwa ko batar@@ enga aho. Ngo by@@ ajemo impaka bigeza n’ubwo barara mu modoka mu rukerera bak@@ urwa muri iyo modoka ku ngufu, barebye aho baram@@ bitse ibik@@ apu byabo muri iyo modoka basanga byibwe hasigara igikapu kimwe cyarimo imyambaro bari babit@@ s@@ emo ishaje itak@@ igira umum@@ aro. Manishimwe avuga ko babajije umushoferi w’iyo modoka bati “@@ Ibintu byacu ko ari mwe mw@@ abit@@ ub@@ ikiye tukaba tub@@ ib@@ uz@@ e?” Umushoferi ar@@ abasubiza ati “M@@ ubit@@ ub@@ itsa se hari aho m@@ wanditse ibyo mub@@ ik@@ ije? Mus@@ ohok@@ e vuba mug@@ end@@ e”. Ari amafaranga amashilingi imitwaro 60 yari muri icyo gik@@ ap@@ u, ari imyambaro ibikoresho byose byo mu rugo n’ibindi byari muri ibyo bik@@ apu baraby@@ ibye ba nyirabyo basigara imb@@ ok@@ obo@@ ko uretse amashilingi imitwaro itanu Manishimwe yari yasize mu mufuka w’@@ ipantalo yari yamba@@ ye. Manishimwe avuga ko bateze indi modoka ibag@@ eza ahitwa Kis@@ oro, batanga imitwaro ibiri bas@@ igarana itatu. Ngo bakigera muri Kis@@ oro ni ho bahuriye n’akaga gakomeye aho bahise basang@@ anirwa n’itsinda ry’@@ insoresore babazwa aho bagiye basubiza ko berekeje ku mupaka wa Cyanika dore ko batari bazi aho ari ho kuko mbere bajya muri Uganda banyuze ku mupaka wegereye Umut@@ ara kuko bari batuye muri Kayonza. Ngo abo basore batangiye kubatera ubwoba bababwira ko ugeze ku mupaka wa Cyanika wese ahita yic@@ wa, ba@@ bagira inama yo kubereka inzira z’@@ ubus@@ amo zibafasha kwinjira mu Rwanda nta kibazo bag@@ ize. Agira ati “Abo basore bo muri Uganda nyuma yo kut@@ ubeshya ko ku mupaka bah@@ icira abantu, batug@@ iriye inama yo kuduh@@ erekeza bat@@ unyuza izindi nzir@@ a”. Bat@@ ubwira bati “@@ Mureke tub@@ ereke inzira z@@ oroshye kuny@@ uramo, icyangombwa si uko mug@@ era mu Rwanda@@ ?@@ ”. Ngo bar@@ emeye banyura mu nzira z’@@ ishyamba, bagenda bab@@ ereka ko mu Rwanda ari hafi kuhag@@ era, ariko baza kubah@@ induka babak@@ a amafaranga bababwira bati “@@ Ubutaka bw’u Rwanda ni bur@@ iya, none ni mud@@ uhe amafaranga nim@@ wanga tubah@@ amagar@@ ize Polisi n’abasirikare bacu baze bab@@ ic@@ e”. Manishimwe n’umuryango we ugizwe n’umugore n’abana batatu, bahise bagwa mu kantu babura uburyo bifata kuko bakw@@ aga imitwaro 12 mu gihe bari basigaranye imitwaro itatu gusa. Ngo bakomeje guterwa ubwoba babwirwa ko bagiye kwicwa, bahamagara umugabo w’inshuti yabo bari basize muri Uganda, bamusaba ko ab@@ oherereza imitwaro umunani n’igice abumva vuba aray@@ ab@@ oherereza ay@@ ongera ku@@ yo bari basigaranye bar@@ ishyura. B@@ akimara kuyishyura ntabwo byar@@ angiriye aho, kuko ngo hahise hag@@ era umupolisi wa Uganda ah@@ amagaza abo basore avugana na bo bagaruka bishyuza Manishimwe indi mit@@ waro itatu yiyongera kuri 12 yari amaze kub@@ ishyura. Ati “B@@ akimara kuvugana n’uwo mupolisi bahise bagaruka batubwira ko umupolisi na we ashaka kwishyurwa byakw@@ anga tuk@@ ic@@ wa, ban@@ saba kongera imitwaro itatu kuri 12 nari maze kubah@@ a, n’ubwoba bwinshi ndababwira nti ese, n’ayo m@@ bahaye ko mubonye uko mbig@@ enje ar@@ ava he? Bati shaka andi niw@@ anga upf@@ e”. Manishimwe yig@@ iriye inama yo guhamagara undi muntu bari baziranye amusaba imitwaro itatu, bakimara kuy@@ ohereza baray@@ ishyura. Ngo ako kanya abo basore bahise bishak@@ amo abasore batatu muri bo babaha imitwaro ibiri, ba@@ bategeka guherekeza Manishimwe n’umuryango we bavugana kubageza mu Rwanda aho bakigera mu muhanda ugera mu Rwanda ba basore bab@@ oye Inkeragutabara zo mu Rwanda barir@@ uka. Ngo nyuma yo kwir@@ uka, izo Nk@@ eragutabara zaje zisanga Manishimwe n’umuryango we zir@@ abag@@ aniriza zib@@ ereka aho bar@@ uhuk@@ ira, ngo mu kanya abasirikare b’u Rwanda baba bar@@ ahageze batwara Manishimwe n’umuryango we ku mupaka wa Cyanika aho baba@@ p@@ imish@@ irije Ebola, nyuma babaz@@ ana ku biro by’@@ Umurenge wa Cyanika babash@@ akira icyo kurya ari na ho bag@@ ic@@ umbikiwe mu gihe bategereje guh@@ erekezwa berekeza iwabo i Kayonza. Ibi bibaye nyuma y’iminsi mike uwitwa Uz@@ ab@@ umwana Dieudonné wo mu Karere ka Burera yitabye Imana azira inkoni yakubiswe n’abany@@ a-@@ Uganda, nyuma yo kwamburwa ubwo yatah@@ aga mu Rwanda agezwa ku mupaka wa Cyanika ari int@@ ere. Imanishimwe avuga ko ubuzima Umunyarwanda abayeho muri Uganda ari bub@@ i, kuko bigeze aho ba@@ bambura imitungo yabo irimo n’amas@@ ambu ban@@ ahinga big@@ as@@ arurwa n’Abag@@ ande. Ibyo ngo biba cyane cyane ku muntu utaram@@ ara imyaka itanu muri icyo gihugu, aho bakomeje gutotezwa ban@@ akubit@@ wa. Abahagarariye abikorera n'umuyobozi w'akarere bas@@ obanuriye abar@@ aho gahunda y'@@ itorero bagiye kw@@ itabira. Yagize ati "@@ Abikorera natwe dufite inshingano zo guhora tuzirikana tukamenya amateka y'igihugu cyacu, icya kabiri tugomba kuba abikorera tuk@@ ajyana na gahunda za Leta umuntu akamenya ati <@@ Ndi umunyarwand@@ a@@ > n'@@ iki? ukamenya n'@@ indangagaciro z'@@ umuco N@@ yarwand@@ a." Yavuze ko nk'@@ abikorera baz@@ unguka byinshi mu itorero hak@@ azaba n'@@ impinduka mu mikorere kuko bazaba bamenye ibiranga umunyarwanda bityo ngo izo nyigisho ziz@@ agirira buri mu nyarwanda wese akamaro n'abaz@@ amukom@@ okaho bose. Mugiraneza Daniel umwe mu bikorera i Kirehe avuga ko biteguye kujya mu itorero kugira ngo bige gahunda za Leta, amateka y'u Rwanda na gahunda ya Ndi umunyarwanda n'@@ indangagaciro z'@@ umuco Nyarwanda n'imyitwarire yagakwiye kuranga umuntu mu but@@ ore bwe mu kuvugurura no guhindura ibyo bakoraga kugira ngo babashe guteza imbere igihugu. Muzungu Gerald umuyobozi w'akarere ka Kirehe yasabye abacuruzi kuzajya mu itorero bagamije gukar@@ ishya ubwenge baharanira kumenya ibijyanye na gahunda z'igihugu kugira ngo haz@@ abe impinduramatwara mu mirimo bakora. Ati "@@ abarimu bagiye mu itorer@@ o; abag@@ oron@@ om@@ e; ba m@@ eya, namwe rero abikorera ni byiza kujya gukar@@ ishya ubwenge, ubona ushinga iduka cyangwa resitora ukagira ngo ni inyungu zawe gusa ariko bifite inyungu ku gihugu muri rusange, uwo mutungo uw@@ ukoresheje nabi ni igihugu cyaba gih@@ omba ndizera ko mwe mugiye guhagararira abandi muz@@ agaragaza impinduka mu mikor@@ ere@@ ." Yasabye abazajya mu itorero kumenya ikiba@@ j@@ yanye baharanira kumenya kugira ngo nabo baz@@ afashe abo bahagarariye bityo haz@@ abe impinduramatwara ikenewe mu byiciro bitandukanye bakoreramo baharanira guteza akarere imbere n'igihugu muri rusange. Gahunda y'@@ itorero igenewe abikorera iteganyijwe mu ntara zose zigize igihugu@@ ,@@ intara y'iburasirazuba ikaba iteg@@ anyirijwe kujya mu itorero kuva tariki 09@@ /@@ 1/201@@ 5 i N@@ kumba aho buri karere g@@ asabwa kohereza abahagarariye abandi bagera kuri mirongo irindwi. Servilien Mutuyimana
Nyamasheke: Yafashwe agiye guha umupolisi ruswa Umugabo witwa Rwam@@ ucyo Jean utuye mu mudugudu wa K@@ abagabo mu kagari ka Mub@@ umb@@ ano mu murenge wa Kag@@ ano yafatiwe mu cyuho ubwo yag@@ erageza gutanga ruswa y'ibihumbi 50 ayiha umupolisi amusaba kud@@ akurikirana umuntu w'@@ inshuti ye. Ibi byabaye kuri iki cyumweru tariki ya 14 Ukuboza 2014, mu kabari kitwa Le Pr@@ int@@ emp@@ s hafi y'aho akarere ka Nyamasheke kubat@@ se, mu kagari ka N@@ inzi mu murenge wa Kag@@ ano. Rwam@@ ucyo ngo yifuzaga ko uyu mupolisi amufasha kud@@ akurikirana umuntu witwa Ng@@ irir@@ em@@ ungu Emmanuel wafashwe afite uruhushya rwo gutwara ibinyabiziga rw'@@ uruh@@ imbano, akaba yabikoraga mu rwego rwo kumuh@@ anag@@ uraho icyaha nt@@ akurikiranwe n'amategeko. Uyu mupolisi akimara kumva ko hari umuntu ushaka kumuha ruswa yabim@@ enyesheje inzego z@@ imuk@@ uriye hanyuma bategura uko bazam@@ ufatira mu cyuh@@ o. Muyango yahishuye byinshi birimo uko b@@ angir@@ waga kuririmba abandi bagafungwa ngo ni ‘@@ Abatuts@@ i’ Muyango Jean Marie umwe mu bahanzi bagize uruhare runini mu kumenyekanisha indirimbo zo hambere abinyujije mu mpano ye yihariye afite mu kuririmba no guh@@ amir@@ iza. Muyango yavukiye mu buhungiro i Burundi. Ni umwe mu bahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda ujyan@@ isha guh@@ amiriza no kuririmba bikar@@ yohera abatari bake. Yam@@ amaye mu ndirimbo nyinshi zitandukanye mu Rwanda zirimo iyitwa ‘S@@ abiz@@ ez@@ e’ yabaye nk’@@ ibendera n’@@ ikirango cye mu muziki. IGIHE yamug@@ anirije ahishura byinshi mu buzima bwe n’ubuzima bwe benshi bajya bibaz@@ a. IGIHE: Muyango ni izina rikuru mu muziki nyarwanda, umuntu yakwibaza amav@@ u n’@@ amavuko y’@@ umuziki wawe ? Muy@@ ang@@ o: Ni ibintu navuga ko n@@ akur@@ iyemo. Mu muryango wacu byar@@ ah@@ abaga tugakora ibitaramo by’@@ int@@ ore, nab@@ ikur@@ iyemo rero ntabwo navuga ko ari ibintu nagiye kwiga ahantu cyangwa nashatse ahandi. IGIHE: Niba uby@@ ibuka neza byaje ufite imyaka ing@@ ahe? Muy@@ ang@@ o: Biragoye cyane. Natangiye ndi umwana uko n@@ akur@@ aga bigenda by@@ iyongera. N@@ agize igihe nyine njya ahandi hantu ariko bir@@ akomeza. IGIHE: Iyo ugiye kwandika indirimbo ugendera kuki? Muy@@ ang@@ o: Nk’@@ umuhanzi hari ibyo wibuka n’ibindi biz@@ a. B@@ yak@@ uzamo ugashaka amagambo ubundi ukaba wak@@ wandika amagambo wumva ukunze meza ukay@@ ashakira ij@@ wi. IGIHE: Ni iyihe ndirimbo yawe ukunda cyane? Muy@@ ang@@ o: Indirimbo zanjye zose ndaz@@ ik@@ unda. Kenshi hari izo ukundira ko ijwi ryayo ryabaye ry@@ iza, hakaba iyo ukundira amagambo, hakaba n’ubwo uy@@ ik@@ undira ko itak@@ uv@@ unn@@ ye. IGIHE: Ni iyihe ndirimbo yak@@ ug@@ oye ? Muy@@ ang@@ o: Ni iyitwa ‘M@@ any@@ iny@@ a’. Ni indirimbo nafashe ijwi gusa ariko nashatse kujya muri studio mfite izindi ndirimbo ariko iran@@ anira pe. Tw@@ ayikoze dutangira album tun@@ ayir@@ angir@@ iz@@ aho, mu m@@ icur@@ angire niho byag@@ or@@ anaga. Tw@@ akoze amezi abiri hamwe na album@@ , iyo twatang@@ iriyeho twar@@ ayib@@ itse, izindi zir@@ angiye tuy@@ isub@@ iraho. IGIHE: I@@ yakor@@ oh@@ eye ? Muy@@ ang@@ o: Indirimbo uh@@ imbira umuntu uzi bir@@ akor@@ oh@@ era. Hari izigera kuri ebyiri cyangwa eshatu zit@@ amv@@ unnye nk’@@ izo, harimo ‘@@ Gis@@ a’ indi ni ‘@@ Karam@@ e na Non@@ e’ yo n@@ ayih@@ imbiye Perezida wa Republika Paul Kagame kuvuga ibigwi bye biroroshye cyane. IGIHE: Hari abavuga ko wabaye mu Is@@ amaz@@ a, byo nibyo ? Muy@@ ang@@ o: Ahubwo nabaye mu ‘@@ Im@@ itar@@ i’, ‘@@ Is@@ amaza zaje nyuma. N@@ abanje gukorera i Burundi, nabaye mu itorero rya Sentore Louis se wa Masamba byinshi niwe nab@@ ik@@ uyeho n’ubwo twahuye nanjye hari ibyo nzi afite ibyo yany@@ ongereye byinshi. Tub@@ ana imyaka mike muri iryo torero biza kugera igihe nanjye ngira ir@@ yanjye. Nyuma y’imyaka itatu abakobwa bo mu Bubiligi bar@@ ant@@ umira ni uko nagiye r@@ ero. N@@ iryo tsinda rya mbere ry@@ abayeho ry’@@ abanyarwanda har@@ iya. Byari mu 198@@ 7. IGIHE: Hari amakuru avuga ko Leta ya Habyarimana yigeze kub@@ angira kuririmba bavuga ko nta Mut@@ utsi wah@@ agararira igihugu, byagenze bite ? Yari agiye gukorera ubukwe inaha aza mu Bubiligi kudus@@ ezer@@ a, tum@@ ubwira ko tut@@ abona uburyo tuza mu Burundi. Tum@@ ubwira ko dushaka kumuh@@ imbira indirimbo abanza kuby@@ anga, amara iminsi ajya muri Niger niho yari yarize ubug@@ anga, aragaruka mu Bubiligi akih@@ agera aravuga ati nar@@ atekereje nsanga mugomba kump@@ imbira indirimbo. At@@ angira no gucur@@ anga, ni ibintu yatangiye kera. Ntabwo yari mukuru cyane nta n’ubwo yat@@ urut@@ aga, we yaje akora umuziki usa nk’@@ ug@@ ezweho ariko atat@@ aye umuco wacu. Abash@@ oferi baravuga ko babayeho nk'@@ abasigajwe inyuma n'amateka Abash@@ oferi bibumbiye muri Koperative Pr@@ od@@ co Abash@@ oferi batwara imodoka nini zitwara abagenzi ziganjemo iz@@ ijya mu ntara baravuga ko babayeho mu buzima bubi haba uko bafatwa mu kazi ndetse no mu buzima busanzwe, bakaba bad@@ atinya kugereranya imibereho yabo n'iy'@@ abasigajwe inyuma n'@@ amateka. Aba bashoferi bavuga ko bafatwa nabi n'@@ abakoresha babo, ban@@ atinyuka kuvuga akababaro kabo ngo bagakom@@ anyirizwa muri byose. Ubwo aba bashoferi bam@@ urikaga ku mugaragaro koperative bahur@@ iyemo bise PR@@ OD@@ CO (@@ Profess@@ ional dr@@ iv@@ ers co@@ operativ@@ e) kuri iki Cyumweru, bavuze ko bihuje ngo babone uko baganira ku bibazo byabo ndetse banab@@ ishak@@ ire umuti bari hamwe. Aba bashoferi bavuga ko mu kazi kabo bahura n'ibibazo byo kutagira amasezerano y'@@ akazi, kudahabwa ubwishingizi ndetse no gusuz@@ ugurwa n'@@ abakoresha babo. Ban@@ avuga ko iyo hagize ikibazo bagize bakajya kuk@@ ivuga, ngo basanga abakoresha babo ba@@ batanze mu nzego bagiye ku k@@ ivug@@ amo, kuva ubwo uwab@@ ivuze agakom@@ anyirizwa aho agiye hose. Musoni Sul@@ t@@ an, umwe muri abo bashoferi yagize ati: "Tw@@ ishimiye ko nkatwe nk'@@ abashoferi twahuye tuk@@ aganira ibibazo byacu, twari t@@ ubayeho nk'@@ abasigajwe inyuma n'@@ amatek@@ a.@@ Urabona nitwe dut@@ unze abak@@ ire, baragenda bakaz@@ ana imodoka bat@@ se inguzanyo, tukaz@@ ibishy@@ urira ariko bak@@ atw@@ ima agacir@@ o." Ntig@@ urirwa Theoneste we avuga ko nk'iyo habayeho impanuka, umushoferi udafite ubushobozi ngo ashobora no gupfa iyo at@@ ishoboye. Yagize ati: :"@@ Boss iyo amaze kuguha akazi, wenda ugakora impanuka ushobora gupfa nt@@ ubone n'@@ isanduku yo kug@@ ushying@@ uramo. N@@ akoze acc@@ ident ariko nir@@ wan@@ yeho, nta mukoresha wageze aho nari nd@@ wariye kandi nta bwishingizi bamp@@ ag@@ a." Perezida wa K@@ oper@@ t@@ ive Pr@@ od@@ ico na we yemeza ibivugwa n'abo bash@@ of@@ eri, icyakora akavuga ko kubab@@ ishyize hamwe bizagira icyo bikem@@ ura. Nshimiyimana Innocent Omar@@ , Perezida wa Pr@@ od@@ ico Nshimiyimana Innocent Omar avuga ko bagorwa cyane n'@@ abakoresha babo. Ati: "@@ Uko ushaka gukora siko umukoresha wawe aba ashak@@ a.@@ imibereho yacu burya abashoferi ntabwo ari myiza. Urabona dukora amasaha menshi, abenshi nta masezerano y'akazi bagira, nta bw@@ ish@@ izi …@@ kandi iyo ushatse kuvuga ibyo bibazo, uba igic@@ ibwa, ug@@ akom@@ anyir@@ izwa, aho ugiye ug@@ s@@ anga bag@@ ut@@ anz@@ ey@@ o" Uyu muyobozi avuga ko bagiye gukora ubuvugizi ku bibazo bahura nabyo kandi bakabona nuko bajya bafash@@ anya igihe cyose hari mugenzi wabo wagize ikibazo. Umupolisi yakubise umukunzi we amuziza ko yam@@ uciye inyuma batar@@ yamana Umupolisi wo muri Kenya yakubise umukunzi we amuziza kumuca inyuma kandi nawe batar@@ yamana n’ umunsi n’ umwe. Ibi byabaye kur@@ iki cyumweru kuri uyu wa kane taliki ya 29 ubwo umukobwa yajyan@@ aga ikirego kuri Police avugako umusore bakundana yamuh@@ ohoteye amukubita amuziza ko yam@@ uciye inyuma umusore akir@@ egura avuga ko yamuh@@ anye kubera ko yam@@ urut@@ ishije undi mugabo kandi nawe ntacyo yam@@ ubur@@ anye. Yagize ati ” N@@ amukubise kubera ko yans@@ ebeje imbere y@@ undi mugabo kandi ubwanjye ntacyo yam@@ bur@@ anye “ Umukobwa wakub@@ iswe yam@@ eye icyaha aregwa avuga ko ababazwa cyane nuko nt@@ amafaranga uyu musore bakundana amuha yakw@@ ifashisha agura ibikoresho by’ ubwiza birimo ,@@ amavuta amafaranga yo kwis@@ ukisha mu rwego rwo kugirango az@@ ajye agaragara neza , byatumye ajya gusambana kuw@@ undi mugabo kugirango amuhe amafaranga. Ikinyamakuru cya Keny@@ an@@ Post dukesha iyi nkuru cyavuze ko amazina yaba bombi yagizwe ibanga kubera ko ikirego cyabo kitari cy@@ ajya ahagaragara ahubwo aba bombi bak@@ irimo k@@ ungwa n’ubuyobozi byak@@ anga bakaz@@ itabaza inkiko zig@@ acy@@ emura iki kibazo.
Ikarita imwe igiye kujya ikoreshwa mu kwishyura urugendo mu modoka, moto no guhaha mu masoko Ikoranabuhanga rimaze kumenyerwa mu kwishyura urugendo mu modoka rusange, rigiye kwag@@ urwa rig@@ ere kuri moto ku buryo niba ukeneye kujya ahantu runaka, mubazi yashyizwe kuri moto izajya ikw@@ ereka intera wagenze n’amafaranga w@@ ishyura ug@@ akoz@@ aho ikar@@ ita, ut@@ iriwe uc@@ ir@@ irik@@ anya ngo hato mubur@@ e amafaranga av@@ unj@@ e, usange mut@@ akaje umwanya. Ni urugendo rukomeje rwo kubaka ubukungu bw’u Rwanda bud@@ ashingiye ku guhererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki. M@@ uba@@ zi ziz@@ oroshya iki gikorwa zigiye gutangira gukorerwa mu Rwanda n’uruganda Mara Ph@@ ones rwa mbere rukora s@@ mart@@ ph@@ ones muri Afurika, nyuma y’amasezerano rwas@@ inyanye n’ikigo Pascal Technology (P@@ T@@ Y@@ ) Limit@@ ed. Icyo kigo kiri mu byahawe ko kugeza ku wa tariki ya 1 Nyakanga 2019, buri mumotari azaba akoresha mubazi y’@@ ikoranabuhanga, ziz@@ akuraho uguc@@ ir@@ irik@@ anya hagati y’@@ umumotari n’umug@@ enzi. Uburyo bwo kwishyurana mu byib@@ anzweho Pascal Ndizeye washinze Pascal Technology (P@@ T@@ Y@@ ) Limit@@ ed, yabwiye IGIHE ko ku bufatanye na Mara Ph@@ on@@ es, hazakorwa mubazi zik@@ aboneka hafi mu gihe ubusanzwe zat@@ um@@ izwaga mu Bushinwa. Ni umushinga bibar@@ wa ko uzatwara ishoramari ris@@ aga miliyari imwe y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda. Avuga ko barimo gukorana n’ibigo bifite ikoranabuhanga ryo kwishyurana nka AC Group itanga amakarita ya T@@ ap@@ &@@ G@@ o, urubuga Irembo rufasha abaturage kubona serivisi, Polisi n’ibindi, ku buryo uzaba w@@ ishyura urugendo n’izindi serivisi ukoresheje ikarita imwe y’urugendo cyangwa iya banki. Ati “N’@@ ubundi nk’uko wak@@ oz@@ agaho kuri bus@@ , uzajya uva muri bus wenda ube wak@@ oza kuri moto cyangwa uve kuri moto ukoze kuri bus@@ , ari ikarita imwe ut@@ iriwe uvuga ngo hano nd@@ atanga ikarita n’undi atange indi ikar@@ ita. Noneho mu minsi mike kuri ya karita ube wajya no mu maduka uy@@ ikoreshe nk’uko ukoresha visa c@@ ard@@ .” Yavuze ko ubu ikig@@ ezweho ari ug@@ uhuza ikoranabuhanga (@@ integ@@ r@@ ation) ku buryo mubazi ziz@@ akorwa na Mara Ph@@ ones zizaba zirimo ubushobozi bwo kwakira amakarita yose, yaba iy’@@ urugendo n’@@ isanzwe ya banki. Yakomeje ati “N’@@ ikarita ya banki uzaba ushobora kuyik@@ ozaho amafaranga akav@@ aho. Ubu banki twas@@ inyanye amasezerano ni BPR ariko n’izindi bitab@@ ujije ko ziz@@ aza. N@@ uk@@ ozaho ikar@@ iya ya banki, iyo ufite application y’@@ umug@@ enzi, ushatse ya karita uy@@ ishyira muri application amafaranga akajya ahita yiv@@ anah@@ o.” “Iyo udafite appl@@ ic@@ ation, iyo uk@@ oj@@ ejeho ikar@@ ita, imashini ihita ik@@ oherereza ubutumwa kuri telefoni bug@@ uha aho ushyira umubare w’@@ ibanga, ku buryo wan@@ akw@@ ishyurira umuntu uri mu ntara wenda um@@ ubwiye uti g@@ era i Kigali ndakw@@ ishyur@@ ira. Ntabwo yak@@ uraho amafaranga utar@@ ashyiramo umubare wawe w’@@ ib@@ anga.” Kuri application ya Pascal Moto ushyira muri telefoni ya Android cyangwa i@@ Ph@@ one, ushobora kuy@@ injiramo uk@@ ishyura cyangwa nabwo ug@@ ahabwa ubutumwa bugufi kuri telefoni bug@@ uha aho w@@ uzuza wa mubare w’@@ ibanga. B@@ iteganywa ko iyi gahunda izaba yarangiye nibura mu kwezi kumwe, ku buryo ku wa Ku wa 1 Nyakanga uzaba ushobora gukoresha ikarita imwe ku rugendo kuri moto cyangwa mu modoka. Ferwafa yasobanuye ibijyanye n’@@ ubusabe bwa FIFA bwo kureng@@ anura Rwem@@ al@@ ika Komisiyo y’Amatora muri Ferwafa yatangaje ko nta kureng@@ anya Rwem@@ al@@ ika Félic@@ ité kw@@ abayeho mu matora aheruka kuko atabonye amajwi ahagije, bityo nta kibazo babona afite bakemura nubwo byari byasabwe n’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi, FIFA biciye ku Mun@@ yamabanga waryo Mukuru, Fat@@ ma Sam@@ o@@ ura. Fat@@ ma yandikiye Komisiyo y’Amatora muri Ferwafa tariki 30 Mutarama 2018 asaba Umuyobozi wayo, Kalisa Adolphe n’abo bafatanya gukemura ikibazo cya Rwem@@ al@@ ika Félic@@ it@@ é, w@@ ajuririye icyemezo cyafashwe cyo gutangaza ko atabonye amajwi amwemerera gutsinda amatora. Muri aya matora yabaye tariki 30 Ukuboza 2017, Rwem@@ al@@ ika yari ahanganye na Nzamwita Vincent de Gaulle mbere y’uko uyu akuramo kandidatire ye ku munota wa nyuma. Amatora yarakomeje Rwem@@ al@@ ika ari umukandida rukumbi ariko mu kubara amajwi bigaragara ko ari abanyamuryango 13 bamut@@ oye bat@@ ageze kuri 50% bya 52 bagize Inteko Rusange itora kuko andi majwi yabaye impf@@ abus@@ a. Y@@ ajuririye iki cyemezo mu kanama k’@@ ubujurire muri Ferwafa, abimenyesha CAF na FIFA agaragaza ko hari amategeko yir@@ engag@@ ijwe kuko mu gihe byagaragaye ko abanyamuryango 39 batanze impapuro zabo nta kintu cy@@ andits@@ eho, hagombaga guhabwa agaciro iz’@@ abat@@ oye. Nubwo FIFA yasabye ko ibi bibazo by@@ akemuka vuba bitaba ibyo ikaz@@ aby@@ ikurikir@@ anira, Umuyobozi wa Komisiyo y’Amatora muri Ferwafa, Kalisa Adolphe aganira na IGIHE yavuze ko nta kintu baz@@ akemura kuko babona nta kibazo cyabayeho ahubwo bakaba bari gutegura andi matora az@@ agaragaza perezida mushya tariki 30 Werurwe 2018. Yagize ati “Nta kibazo na kimwe cy@@ abayeho, FIFA n@@ ayih@@ aye impapuro zigaragaza uko amatora yose yag@@ enze, mbas@@ obanurira n’impamvu tw@@ emeje ko amatora agomba gusubirwamo kuko hari abakandida babiri, umwe avuga ko ak@@ uyemo kandidatire hasigara undi, amatora akorwa bisanz@@ we.” Yakomeje agira ati “Muri 52 bagombaga gutora bose batanze impapuro zabo bator@@ eyeho 13 aba aribo bamut@@ ora [@@ Rwem@@ al@@ ik@@ a] abandi 39 barat@@ oye ariko banga gutora umukandida was@@ igaye ari umwe kubera iyo mpamvu dufata icyemezo ko atabashije kugira amajwi 50% guter@@ anyaho rim@@ we.” Kalisa yasobanuye ko nyuma y’uko Komisiyo y’Amatora yemeje ko hazaba andi matora, Rwem@@ al@@ ika yari yemerewe kujurira ariko ngo yabikoze mu buryo butari bw@@ o. Ngo yagombaga kubanza kumenyesha iyi komisiyo ko at@@ ishimye n’impamvu ze zik@@ ig@@ waho nyuma akabona kujya mu kanama k’@@ ubujurire ariko we ngo yahise ajya mu bujurire bamus@@ ubiza inyuma mu nzego yasimb@@ utse bituma iminsi yo kujurira im@@ ush@@ irana niko kwandikira CAF na FIFA. Yashimangiye ko ubu komisiyo ih@@ ug@@ ijwe no gutegura uko amatora yandi ateganyijwe tariki 30 Werurwe 2018 az@@ agend@@ a; ibijyanye na yo byose bikaz@@ atangazwa ku wa kabiri w’icyumweru gitaha. Ibyo wamenya ku mikorere y’@@ umurongo wa telefone udashobora kumv@@ irizwa Ku bajya bareba filime cyane iz’@@ Abanyamer@@ ika, iyo hajemo ibibazo by’umutekano w’igihugu, uz@@ akunda kumva bavuga gukoresha umurongo wa telefone ut@@ ekanye udashobora kumv@@ iriz@@ wa, ushobora kwibaza ko ari ibyo muri filime nyamara bibaho koko mu buzima busanzwe, hari uburyo bukoreshwa bug@@ atuma umurongo wa telefone runaka udashobora kumv@@ iriz@@ wa. Umuyobozi w’ikigo kijya inama ku mutekano w’@@ ikoranabuhanga cya R@@ hino Sec@@ urir@@ y Lab@@ s, Ben Ca@@ ud@@ ill@@ , yavuze ko ubu buryo bub@@ eraho kwirinda ko telefone yawe yak@@ umv@@ irizwa cyangwa yakw@@ inj@@ irir@@ wa. Yagize ati “Iki kibazo mpora nk@@ ibazwa hashingiwe ku bigaragara muri za filime, gusa muri make, ubu buryo bub@@ ereyeho kurinda ko uh@@ amagaraga yak@@ umv@@ irizwa n’urundi ruhande urwo ari rwo rwose.” Ibi big@@ erwaho hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga rituma umurongo uj@@ yamo c@@ ode it@@ afungurwa n’undi uwo ari we wese, ni uburyo bwitwa “@@ enc@@ ry@@ p@@ t@@ ion@@ ”, butuma umuntu at@@ akoresha uburyo ubwo ari bwo bwose, haba kwinj@@ irira mu mig@@ ozi ijyana umur@@ ongo, cyangwa gukoresha ubundi buryo ngo yinj@@ irire telefone yawe uri guh@@ amagara. Ca@@ ud@@ ill yagize ati “N’@@ ubwo n@@ abasha kubona “@@ s@@ ign@@ al@@ ” ya telefone yawe, cyangwa nk@@ injirira imigozi itwara ih@@ uz@@ anz@@ ira rya telefone yawe yo mu rugo, sin@@ abasha kumv@@ iriza ibyo uvugira kuri telefone mu gihe ik@@ ingiwe (@@ enc@@ ry@@ p@@ t@@ ed@@ ), ndetse n’abak@@ oze iyo telefone ndetse na leta ntibabasha kuy@@ umv@@ iriza nab@@ o.” Uwo uh@@ amagaye na we hari uburyo izo c@@ ode ziba zirimo zituma it@@ abasha kumv@@ iriz@@ wa, zihita ziv@@ anamo akabasha kuk@@ umva neza mu buryo bun@@ oze, ariko nta rundi ruhande rwa gatatu rushobora kub@@ umvir@@ iza, hakaba na telefone z@@ ubak@@ anywe ubwo buryo zih@@ amagar@@ ana gusa n’izo by@@ ubatse kimwe. Hari uburyo bubiri ushobora kwifashisha kugira ngo ukoreshe ubu buryo butuma utak@@ umv@@ irizwa (@@ en@@ -@@ t@@ o-@@ end enc@@ ry@@ p@@ t@@ ion@@ ), hari uburyo bikorerwa imbere (s@@ of@@ twar@@ e), hakaba n’uburyo by@@ abikorera inyuma (@@ har@@ d@@ war@@ e). Ati” Sunrise ni ikipe nziza irimo no kwitwara neza muri shampiyona, ariko twebwe ku ruhande rwacu tur@@ iteguye icyo dushaka ni amanota atatu ku munsi w’@@ ej@@ o.’’ Mu mikino 10 imaze guhuza amakipe yombi kuva Sunrise FC izam@@ utse mu cyiciro cya mbere mu myaka ine ishize, APR FC yatsinzemo imikino umunani, iyi kipe yo mu Burasirazuba itsinda ibiri isig@@ aye. Mucyo Philbert na Niyom@@ uk@@ esha basezeranye ku wa Kane mu Murenge wa Nib@@ oyi mu Karere ka Kicukiro. Muri Kanama 2020 ni bwo Mucyo yateye ivi asaba Niyom@@ uk@@ esha ko azam@@ ubera umugore. Bombi baz@@ asezerana imbere y’Imana ku wa 12 Werurwe 2021 muri EAR Remera ku G@@ ipor@@ os@@ o. Mu mwaka ushize, Mucyo Philbert yabwiye IGIHE ko hashize igihe azi Niyom@@ uk@@ esha ndetse ngo yatangiye kumukunda ubwo yakin@@ iriraga ikipe y’@@ Igihugu. Ati “N@@ am@@ umenye kuva kera, ndamukunda ubwo yari mu ikipe y’Igihugu muri 2016. Gusa muri 2013 najyaga njya iwabo gusura abaturanyi nibwo nam@@ um@@ enye@@ .” “Mu 2017 nibwo nafashe icyemezo cyo kum@@ umenyesha ko muk@@ unda, mbig@@ eraho mu 2018. Nyuma nar@@ abim@@ ubwiye, arambwira ngo niba nk@@ omeje arab@@ yem@@ eye.” Mucyo yakomeje avuga ko mu byatumye arushaho gukunda Niyom@@ uk@@ esha E@@ up@@ hr@@ ance harimo kuba bombi bahuriye ku gukunda siporo kandi akaba ari umukobwa ufite ubur@@ ere. Ati “@@ Ikintu cya mbere cyatumye mukunda ni uko yari um@@ u-@@ sport@@ if kandi nanjye ndi we, icya kabiri kandi ni uko ari umukobwa usenga ufite ubur@@ ere. Nari naram@@ wize neza mb@@ ibona. Tw@@ atangiye afite isoni nyinshi ataby@@ umva, ariko ubu nta kibazo kandi twiteguye kub@@ ana.” Niyom@@ uk@@ esha E@@ up@@ hr@@ ance yatangiye urugendo rwe rwo gukina Volleyball ubwo yajyaga kwiga muri St Aloys i Rwamagana muri 2009, akaba ari nabwo yahamagawe bwa mbere mu ikipe y’Igihugu y’@@ abato batarengeje imyaka 18, yit@@ atab@@ iriye imikino yab@@ ere i Cairo mu Misiri muri 2010. Kuva icyo gihe yakomeje kwitwara neza ari nako ah@@ amagarwa mu ikipe y’Igihugu kugeza magingo aya. Mu 2012, ubwo yari asoje icyiciro kibanza cy’amashuri yisumbuye, Niyom@@ uk@@ esha yahise yerekeza muri RRA VC ag@@ ikinira kugeza uyu munsi. Mucyo Philbert arahira imbere y'amategeko kuzabana na Niyom@@ uk@@ esha Niyom@@ uk@@ esha ukinira ikipe y’Igihugu ya Volleyball, na we yemeye kuzabana akaramata na Mucyo Philbert Bombi bas@@ inyiye isezerano bakoze Mucyo Philbert na Niyom@@ uk@@ esha E@@ up@@ hr@@ ance bamaze imyaka ine bakundana Niyom@@ uk@@ esha na Mucyo Philbert bifot@@ oza nyuma yo gusezerana mu murenge Amafoto: UTB
I Kigali hongeye kuboneka abarwayi benshi ba #@@ COVID-19 kurusha ahandi mu gihugu Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iratangaza ko kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 08 Nyakanga 2020 mu Rwanda habonetse abarwayi bashya makumyabiri na babiri (2@@ 2) ba COVID-19. Abo barwayi 22 babonetse mu bipimo 2,@@ 64@@ 4, abamaze kuboneka mu Rwanda banduye icyo cyorezo bose hamwe baba 1,@@ 19@@ 4. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yasobanuye ko abo barwayi bashya 22 barimo 17 babonetse mu kigo kiny@@ urwamo by’igihe gito cya Kigali (@@ Trans@@ it Cent@@ re@@ ). Hari kandi batatu (3) babonetse i Rusizi, abandi babiri (2) babonetse muri Ngoma. Mbere yaho ku wa Kabiri hari habonetse abarwayi bashya 59 barimo 49 babonetse mu kigo kiny@@ urwamo by’igihe gito cya Kigali n’abari mu kato mu Karere ka Kicukiro. Abandi batanu (5) bari babonetse i Rusizi, batatu (3) bari babonetse i Nyamasheke, i Kirehe hari habonetse umuntu umwe (1) n’undi umwe (1) wabonetse i Nyagatare. Abantu cumi na batanu mu bari barwaye bakize kuri uyu wa Gatatu, abamaze gukira bose hamwe baba 6@@ 10, naho abakir@@ waye ni 58@@ 1. Abamaze kwicwa n’icyo cyorezo mu Rwanda ni batatu. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima isaba abaturarwanda bose gukomeza kwitwararika bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19. Za FAR@@ UM@@ ASI zo mu Mujyi wa Kigali zik@@ we@@ pa amazamu zir@@ aburirwa Am@@ afar@@ um@@ asi yasabwe kubahiriza inshingano zo gukora n'@@ amasaha y'@@ ijoro mu gihe yap@@ anzwe Ministeri y'ubuzima mu Rwanda MINISANT@@ E, irasaba abaturage bose kugerageza kuyiha amakuru ajyanye n'imikorere ya za Far@@ um@@ asi, cyane cyane iz@@ it@@ ubahiriza amabwiriza aba yar@@ ashyiriweho n'iyi Minisit@@ eri, kugira ngo barusheho gutanga serivisi nziza kuba@@ bag@@ ana. Ibi iyi Minisiteri yab@@ id@@ utangarije nyuma y'@@ ikibazo cy@@ akunze kugenda kig@@ aragazwa n'abaturage, bavuga ko bajya gushaka aho bagura imiti mu gihe cya n'@@ ijoro, bagasanga amafar@@ um@@ asi afunze, kandi hari ayo usanga aba ap@@ anzwe kurara izamu, ariko nayo ugasanga yafunze imiryango kimwe n'@@ ay@@ andi. Bamwe mu baturage twag@@ anir@@ iye, batubwiye ko babangamiwe bikomeye n'imikorere y'@@ amwe mu mafar@@ um@@ asi cyane mu masaha y'@@ ijoro, kuko ngo B@@ abura aho bag@@ urira imiti, kandi baba bay@@ ikeneye cyane kugira ngo babashe kur@@ amira amagara. Umuturage Hen@@ ri@@ ette Muk@@ amut@@ esi, wemeye kuganira na Makuruki.rw yagize ati"@@ … njye nigeze no kujya hariya ku Gis@@ iment@@ i, nsanga har@@ afunze mbura umuti, ubwo nyine byabaye ngombwa ko ku bucyeye ngaruk@@ a." Yakomeje avuga ko kugera ku mafar@@ um@@ asi ugasanga afunze, bituma umurwayi ar@@ emba kuko aba atabonye umuti, ku buryo bishobora no kuk@@ uviramo urupfu, bitewe no kuba ut@@ aboneye imiti ku gihe. Karasira Jean Pierre nawe yagize ati"@@ … jyewe ubw@@ ange nigeze kuzenguruka Nyarugenge yose nijoro umurwayi yand@@ war@@ anye, mbura umuti, byabaye ngombwa ko njya gusoma farumasi zar@@ aye izamu nijoro, izo ns@@ anzeho n@@ ajyayo ng@@ asanga zir@@ afunze bat@@ akoze, niba baba baryam@@ ye, niba baba bat@@ akoze ari ukut@@ ub@@ eshya, ari baringa simb@@ iz@@ i." Uyu muturage yasabye Minisiteri y'@@ ubuzima, kujya ikora igenzura ikar@@ eba niba amafar@@ um@@ asi yari ap@@ anzwe kurara izamu, ko yarir@@ aye, kuko ngo hari igihe ushobora gusanga hari impamvu ifatika yatumye id@@ akora, cyangwa se ko ari ubushake bw'@@ abakozi b'@@ izo farum@@ asi. Amwe mu mafar@@ um@@ asi twag@@ aniye, yatubwiye ko icyo kibazo gihari, aho hari amafar@@ um@@ asi at@@ ubahiriza ibyo aba yar@@ abwiwe na MINISANT@@ E, ag@@ afunga mu gihe cy'@@ amasaha y'@@ ijoro, kandi biba biteganijwe ko ariyo ari bur@@ are izamu, ariko bagasaba ay@@ abikora kwis@@ ubir@@ aho, kuko ngo aba at@@ ubahiriza ibyo aba yar@@ iyemeje. Umukozi ukorera farumasi Kip@@ har@@ m@@ a, yatubwiye ko ubusanzwe buri munsi haba hari farumasi ziba zigenewe kurara izamu, haba no mu gihe cya k@@ onj@@ i. ariko ngo iyo zitab@@ ikoze ziba zikoze amakosa, kandi ngo ziba zirenze kubyo ziba zar@@ iyem@@ eje, bityo rero ngo bagomba kubikora nkuko baba baraby@@ iyemeje ntaw@@ u@@ bashyizeho agah@@ ato, kandi bakabikora nta kwita ku mas@@ aha. Yat@@ ubwiye kandi ko ntacyo abo bose batubahiriza amasaha bagakwiye kwitwaza ngo bafung@@ e, kuko ntawe uba utazi igihe azar@@ arira izamu, kuko minisiteri y'ubuzima ip@@ anga amafar@@ um@@ asi azar@@ ara izamu mu gihe cy'@@ ukwezi, kandi ngo ik@@ abikora mu ntangiriro z'@@ ukwezi, kuburyo buri wese aba azi umunsi we wo kur@@ ar@@ iraho izamu. Umukozi wa Far@@ um@@ asi New Hope twaganiriye kandi, yatubwiye ko ibi bibaho cyane aho usanga hari amafar@@ um@@ asi afunga mu masaha ya nijoro, kandi yakagombye kuba ari gukora, akavuga ko ibi ari amakosa akomeye, bityo ko bagomba gushyiramo imbaraga, bakagerageza gukora ibyo baba bar@@ iyemeje. Yavuze kandi ko nubwo farumasi yaba yagize ikibazo gituma itari bur@@ are izamu, igomba kubivuga hakiri kare bakaba bayis@@ imbuza indi, bityo abarwayi ntiba@@ bure aho bagura imiti. Nathan Mug@@ um@@ e, Umuvugizi wa Minisiteri y'@@ ubuzima, yavuze ko ubundi bagira amafar@@ um@@ asi agomba gukora nijoro, no muri week end@@ , bityo rero ngo ay@@ ap@@ anzwe gukora, agomba kuby@@ ubahir@@ iza, nkuko biba byar@@ ateganijwe na MINISANT@@ E, bitaba ibyo ag@@ afatirwa ibihano. Yakomeje kandi asaba abaturage, kujya bayig@@ ezaho amakuru y'@@ amafar@@ um@@ asi yakagombye kuba yakoze, maze ngo ay@@ ataby@@ ubahirije bay@@ afat@@ ire ibihano bikar@@ ish@@ ye. Yagize ati"@@ … aba baturage aho bazajya bab@@ isanga bagasanga zit@@ arimo gukora, baz@@ ajye bat@@ ubwira. … bajye bat@@ ubwira, tug@@ akurikirana tw@@ asanga koko ko ari byo, ko izag@@ ombaga kuba ziri ku izamu, zikaba zitari ku izamu, ubwo hari ibihano zifat@@ ir@@ wa." MINISANTE kandi ikaba isaba abaturage kujya bayig@@ ezaho amakuru y'@@ ahantu batak@@ iriwe neza, cyangwa aho batabonye ibyo b@@ ifuza, bahamagara numero 11@@ 4, kugira ngo babashe kuba bar@@ engan@@ urwa igihe bareng@@ anyijwe, cyangwa aho bakiriwe nabi, kugira ngo babashe kubak@@ urikir@@ ana, nibiba ngombwa babe ba@@ bafatira ibihano.
