Menya byinshi ku gituma umuntu avukana ubumuga bw'@@ uruhu (@@ Nyamw@@ er@@ u) Mu miryango itandukanye havugwa abantu bafite uruhu rw@@ era kandi atari abaz@@ ungu, abantu mu Kinyarwanda bavuga ko baba babana n'ubumuga bw' uruhu (@@ nyamw@@ er@@ u). Ub@@ um@@ uga bw' uruhu rw@@ era ni indwara y'@@ uruhererekane nta muti ubaho wo kuyiv@@ ura. Mu kiganiro cyihariye Makuruki.rw yagiranye n' inzobere mu by' uruhererekane mu miryango, umwarimu muri kaminuza y' u Rwanda, ukora mu bitaro bya Kaminuza no bitaro bya gisirikare I Kanombe, Dr Mut@@ esa Leon yasobanuye byinsh@@ yi biny@@ anye n' ubumuga bw'@@ uruhu. Asobanura imvano y' uruhu rw@@ era ku muntu utari umuz@@ ungu, Dr Mut@@ esa yagize ati: "U@@ ruhu rwacu rufite uturemangingo tw@@ itwa mel@@ an@@ os@@ ite dukora ibyitwa mel@@ an@@ os@@ ome. Izo mel@@ an@@ os@@ ome ni zo zituma umuntu asa uko asa, yaba inzobe cyangwa igik@@ ara. Noneho hari n'ibindi nakwita ko ari nk'@@ imisemburo (A@@ nz@@ y@@ me ty@@ ros@@ in@@ as@@ e) ituma za mel@@ an@@ os@@ ite zikora mel@@ an@@ os@@ ome. Ku muntu rero iyo ty@@ ros@@ in@@ ase iba id@@ akora cyangwa itan@@ ahari bigatuma umuntu aguma yera cyane, mbese nta bara uruhu rwe ruba r@@ ufit@@ e." Makuruki im@@ ubajije impamvu umuntu avuka mu bandi akagira uruhu rut@@ andukanye n' urwa bag@@ enzi, yavuze ko kugira ngo umuntu avuk@@ ane ubu bumuga ari uko ababyeyi be bombi baba bari bafite uturemangingo (@@ gen@@ e) dufite ibibazo bakat@@ umuh@@ uriz@@ aho. Yagize ati : "Mu mu biri w' umuntu habamo uturemangingo bita Ch@@ r@@ omos@@ om@@ es, umuntu agira ch@@ r@@ omos@@ ome 4@@ 6, muri ch@@ r@@ omos@@ ome habamo utundi tur@@ emangingo bita g@@ ene two tuba ari twinshi tur@@ enga miliyoni 30. Buri g@@ ene igira umumaro wayo, birumvikana ko harimo n' iz@@ ishinzwe gutanga ibara ry' uruh@@ u." Yakomeje avuga ko kugira ngo g@@ ene ikore ari uko igomba kuba idafite ubus@@ embw@@ a, agaragaza ko hari igihe umuntu aba afite g@@ ene nzima n' iz@@ ifite ikibazo, akavuga ko iyo bimeze gutya bit@@ agaragara ku ruhu ariko uyu muntu aba afite ibyago byo kubyara nyamw@@ eru. Yagize ati: " Mu gihe cy' irekurwa ry' itanga, umugabo n' umugore buri wese atanga ch@@ r@@ omos@@ om@@ es 23 n' undi agatanga 23, iyo umugore muri ch@@ r@@ omos@@ ome yatanze harimo g@@ ene ifite ubus@@ embwa n' umugabo bikaba uko, babyara umwana ufite ubumuga bw' uruhu rw@@ era." Yavuze kandi ko iyo Umugore n' umugabo bafite g@@ ene nzima n' iz@@ ifite ubus@@ embw@@ a, baba bafite amahirwe yo kubyara abana bafite ubumuga bw' uruhu n'@@ abadafite ikibazo. Muganga Dr Mut@@ esa Leon inzobere mu buvuzi bw' indwara z' uruhererekane Dr Mut@@ esa yagize ati: "Iyo umugore n' umugabo bashakanye bombi muri g@@ ene zabo harimo inz@@ ima n' iz@@ ifite ubus@@ embw@@ a, baba bafite ibyago bingana na 25% byo kubyara nyamw@@ eru, 50% byo kubyara abana bameze nk@@ abo. Abafite g@@ ene nzima n' iz@@ ifite ubus@@ embwa ni amahirwe angana na 25% yo kubyara abana bazim@@ a." Hari uburyo bushoboka igihe abashakanye bombi bafite g@@ ene nzima n' iz@@ ifite ubus@@ embwa bak@@ abyara abana badafite ikibazo Dr Mut@@ esa avuga ko bumwe mu buryo bw@@ akoresh@@ wa, abaganga bashobora gufata intanga z' umugore n' iz@@ ' umugabo bag@@ ator@@ anyamo intanga zifite g@@ ene zidafite inenge bakaz@@ ih@@ uriza muri laborat@@ oire bakaz@@ itera mu mugore agat@@ wita akaz@@ abyara umwana udafite ikibazo. Uyu muganga yavuze ko uretse kuba izuba ryinshi rituma uruhu rwabo ruk@@ anyar@@ ara bikaba by@@ abaviramo kurwara kanseri y' uruhu no kuba amaso yabo at@@ itira iyo bari ahantu hari urumuri rw@@ inshi, ngo han@@ i@@ iyongeraho n'@@ umusatsi wabo ushobora gutuma barwara ibih@@ ush@@ i, nta kibazo cy' ubwenge buke baba bafite. Dr Mut@@ esa yasabye abantu kwirinda guhohotera no guheza ababana n'ubumuga bw' uruhu kuko ari abantu nk' abandi. Muri Afurika umuntu umwe mu bantu bari hagati ya 5000 na 15 000 aba abana n' ubumuga bw' uruhu (@@ nyamw@@ er@@ u), ku mugabane wa Afurika, Tanzaniya ni cyo gihugu gifite abantu benshi babana n' ubu bumuga aho umuntu umwe mu bantu 1 000 aba abana n@@ abwo.
Arsene Wenger yagaragaje icyifuzo cyo kuguma muri Arsenal Nyuma y’igihe kirekire abakunzi ba Arsenal n’umupira w’amaguru muri rusange bibaza niba Arsene Wenger azongera amasezerano muri iyi kipe amazemo imyaka irenga 20 mu gihe at@@ orohewe n’@@ igitutu cy’@@ umusaruro muke, ariko yamaze kubwira abayobozi be ko yifuza kuyig@@ um@@ amo indi myaka ibiri. Ah@@ azaza ha Wenger muri Arsenal hagiye h@@ ibaz@@ waho cyane cyane uyu mwaka bitewe n’umusaruro mubi iyi kipe irimo kugira ikaba yaras@@ ezerewe muri Champions League inyag@@ iwe ibitego 10-@@ 2 na Bayern Munich ndetse ikaba inafite ibyago byo kutaz@@ agaragara mu makipe ane ya mbere uyu mwaka bitewe n’uko ubu ari iya gatandatu irushwa amanota atandatu na Liverpool ya kane. Nk’uko tubikesha Daily Mail g@@ aza, mu nama yahuje ubuyobozi bwa Arsenal n’uyu mutoza uy@@ im@@ azemo imyaka 21, yababwiye ko yifuza kongera amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri ubwo iyi shampiyona ya 2016/201@@ 7 izaba irangiye kuko ari nabwo amasezerano ye asanzwe agomba kurangira. Iyi si inkuru nziza kuri bamwe mu bakunzi b’iyi kipe y’i Lond@@ re bari maze iminsi baza ku kibuga aho yakinnye bitwaje ibyapa bisaba ko Wenger yakw@@ egura cyangwa akir@@ ukanwa nubwo had@@ asiba no kugaragara n’ikindi gice cy’@@ abafana bagaragaza ko ibyo uyu musaza w’imyaka 67 yakoreye ikipe bihagije kugira ngo ahabwe andi am@@ s@@ ezer@@ ano, an@@ ategura uz@@ amus@@ imbura. Arsenal inafite ikibazo cyo kuzag@@ umana bamwe mu bakinnyi bayo bakomeye nka rutahizamu Alex Sanchez wamaze kugaragaza ko bigoye kuz@@ aguma muri iyi kipe, agaca amarenga ko niyo yav@@ amo ariko azag@@ uma mu Mujyi wa Lond@@ re kuko umuryango we uh@@ ishimiye bikaba bivugwa ko ashobora kwerekeza muri Chelsea nayo yiteguye gutakaza Eden Hazard ushak@@ wa cyane na Real Madrid. Abam@@ bura SACCO batuma zig@@ abanya umuvuduko wo gutanga inguzanyo Ubuyobozi bwa za SACCO buvuga ko abanyamuryango bakorana n'ibi bigo by'imari bakab@@ yamb@@ ura ari bo batuma bigabanya umuvuduko wo gutanga inguzanyo. B@@ yagaragaye kuri SACCO ya Runda mu Karere ka Kamonyi, aho abanyamuryango 32 yay@@ ifitiye umwenda bamaze igihe kirekire bar@@ anze kwishyura bat@@ ume igabanya umuvuduko wo gutanga inguzanyo kugera ku kigero cya 29@@ %. Icyicaro cya SACCO ya R@@ unda. Kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki 28 Ukwakira 2015, mu nteko rusange y'@@ abanyamuryango b'iyi SACCO yitwa "@@ Ur@@ ufunguzo rw'@@ ubuk@@ ir@@ e", nibwo ubuyobozi bwayo bwag@@ aragarije abanyamuryango ko abo bafite umwenda ugera kuri mil@@ iyo 13@@ Frw, ariko bakaba baratangiye gukurikir@@ anwa. Perezida w'Inama y'ubutegetsi Hab@@ ihirwe Jean Baptiste, yavuze ko uwo mwenda ufatwa nk'@@ ubwambuzi kuko warangije gus@@ ibwa mu bitabo by'@@ ibar@@ ur@@ amar@@ i. Yagize ati "@@ Izo miliyoni zisaga 13 z@@ asib@@ we mu bitabo kuko abaz@@ ifash@@ eho inguzanyo barengeje iminsi 360 bat@@ ishyura. Tw@@ atangiye kubakurikirana mu but@@ ab@@ era." Abagize inama y'ubutegetsi ya SACCO ya R@@ unda. Ayo mafaranga ategerejwe kugar@@ uzwa yatumye SACCO ya Runda ibitse amafranga asaga miliyoni 3@@ 17, igabanya umuvuduko w'@@ inguzanyo itanga. Hab@@ ihirwe akavuga ko n'ubwo bafite ubushobozi bwo kug@@ uriza kugeza kuri 70% by'amafaranga ab@@ itse, kuri ubu ntibar@@ enza 4@@ 1%. Ati "Mu gutanga inguzanyo hari ibintu by'ingenzi tugend@@ eraho. Iyo igipimo cy'@@ inguzanyo cy@@ azamutse tur@@ ahagarika cyangwa tuk@@ agabanya mu buryo bwo kubanza gukurikirana izo zose ziri mu buk@@ ererwe kugira ngo serivise in@@ og@@ e neza." Yavuze ko muri gahunda bafashe harimo ko imishinga isaba inguzanyo izajya yig@@ anwa ubushish@@ ozi, kandi inguzanyo y'amafaranga ari hejuru ya miliyoni izajya itang@@ waho ingwate yandik@@ ishijwe mu kigo cy'igihugu cy'@@ iterambere RD@@ B. Ibigo by'imari by'@@ umurenge SAC@@ CO, nk'@@ ibigo by@@ egereye abaturage, bahamya ko bibafasha mu kugira umuco wo kuzigama no Kug@@ uza. Nyir@@ ant@@ ag@@ or@@ ama Paul@@ ine, wo mu Kagari ka Ruy@@ enzi, ati "@@ Umurenge Sacco wakoraga neza uretse abo bantu bari kuduh@@ emukira bashaka kw@@ ifunga amafaranga y'@@ abaturag@@ e." Mu 2014 imari shingiro yari kuri miliyoni 23 ariko ubu igeze kuri miliyoni 29. Bafite kandi gahunda yo gukor@@ an n'ibigo by'@@ ubwishingizi mu gihe uw@@ atse inguzanyo apfuye, mu rwego rwo kunoza imikor@@ ere. Marie Josee Uwir@@ ingira
Ing@@ eri z’@@ inkwano mu muco w’Abanyarwanda (@@ Igice cya mbere@@ ) Umug@@ enzo wo guk@@ osh@@ a, ni umug@@ enzo ukomeye uh@@ atse iyindi yose iba mu muhango w’ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda. Iyo bam@@ araga kukw@@ emerera umug@@ eni, nta kindi cy@@ akurikir@@ agah@@ o, usibye kukubwira ko umukobwa wabo ari Muk@@ ob@@ waj@@ ana, akagira n’andi menshi arimo na Mut@@ umw@@ inka. Umug@@ enzo wo guk@@ osha watang@@ iraga iyo babaga bamaze kwemerera umugeni abamus@@ abye, nibwo noneho babac@@ aga inkwano izi n’iz@@ i, hanyuma baz@@ emer@@ any@@ aho, bagataha bakajya kuz@@ ishaka, hak@@ azag@@ enwa undi munsi nyirizina wo kuza guk@@ wa. In@@ kwano yose mu muco w’ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda, nta muntu way@@ ish@@ akaga wenyine. Iyo se w’umuhungu yabaga at@@ ishoboye yit@@ abazaga abanyamuryango bose bakam@@ ufasha kuy@@ ishaka, kuko inkwano yari ishema ry’umuryango mugari wasabye umug@@ eni. Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “@@ Umuco mu B@@ uv@@ ang@@ anz@@ o” cyanditswe na Nsanz@@ abera Jean de Dieu, inzobere mu M@@ uco , Ubus@@ izi n’@@ Amateka y’u Rwanda, tugiye kubat@@ at@@ urira zimwe mu nkw@@ ano z@@ em@@ erwaga mu mug@@ enzo wo guk@@ osha umugeni w’i Rwanda. Mu muco w’Abanyarwanda h@@ abag@@ amo inkwano z’@@ ingeri zitandukanye. I@@ z’ingenzi ni izi zikurikira: G@@ ukwa Ink@@ a: In@@ kwano y’@@ Ink@@ a, ni inkwano nkuru mu mateka y’ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda, ikaba yari inkwano ik@@ osh@@ wa uw@@ ifite, uw@@ oroheje n’@@ ukomeye, ni un@@ kwano rusange itagira ubusumbane mu muco w’@@ Abanyarwanda. Umuryango washoboraga gukwa inka zirenze imwe bitewe n’uko uhagaze mu but@@ unzi, ariko iy’@@ ifatizo ku muryango nyarwanda ni imwe. B@@ akundaga kuvuga ngo “Mur@@ ad@@ ukw@@ era inka Ij@@ ana rik@@ inze, cyangwa j@@ ana ry@@ um@@ anye@@ ” bakongera bati “Ni umunani uk@@ inze cyangwa se umunani w@@ um@@ anye@@ ”. Umubare umunani cyangwa Ij@@ ana mu Kinyarwanda, bivuga umubare ushy@@ itse, nk’uko mu gihugu cya Israel usanga muri Bibiliya, bagaragaza ko Gatatu na Karindwi ari umubare ushy@@ itse bakundaga gukoresh@@ a. Guk@@ osha inka ijana cyangwa umunani by@@ avugaga umubare ushy@@ itse w’@@ inka izo arizo zose bafitiye ubushobozi. Hari n’aho bavugaga ko baz@@ atega umuj@@ ug@@ uj@@ ugu w’@@ ink@@ oni, inka ufashe akaba arizo bat@@ wara. Ibyo kandi bik@@ agendana nuko ishyo ry’@@ inka mu Rwanda ryabaga rigizwe n’inka umunani. Ij@@ ana rik@@ inze cyangwa umunani uk@@ inze ni “I@@ nka umunani cyangwa ijana ziri kumwe n’iz@@ az@@ o” Naho “@@ Umun@@ ani cyangwa ijana ry@@ umanye ni inka z’@@ amash@@ ash@@ ah@@ i ziteguye kwim@@ a.” Kubera impamvu z’@@ abageni b’@@ ibyiciro bitandukanye, byatumaga mu muryango nyarwanda bak@@ osha inka zifite imimerere itandukanye. Im@@ imerere y’inka abanyarwanda bak@@ osh@@ aga yari iteye ity@@ a: Inka z’@@ amashashi ziteguye kwim@@ a: Baz@@ ik@@ waga umukobwa w’@@ in@@ kum@@ i, kenshi na kenshi baz@@ ib@@ angur@@ iraga rimwe n’igihe uwo mukobwa yamaze kubonana n’umugabo we. Akaba yab@@ yarira rimwe n’izo yak@@ owe, ari naho hakunze kuvugwa imvugo yifuriza imiryango ibyiza, aho bagira bati “Mur@@ ak@@ abyara mub@@ yaje ink@@ a”. Inka z’@@ im@@ bye@@ y@@ i: Baz@@ ik@@ osh@@ aga umukobwa wab@@ yariye iwabo cyangwa se wat@@ andukanye n’umug@@ abo, ariko icyo gihe bakam@@ ushy@@ ingir@@ ana n’abana be nabo bakaba ab’@@ uwo mugabo ash@@ atse. Inka Mun@@ ani cyangwa ijana n’iz@@ az@@ o: Ni inka zak@@ osh@@ waga umugore bas@@ um@@ bak@@ aje. Gus@@ um@@ bakaza mu muco wa Kinyarwanda, ni ug@@ usaba umugore ut@@ unzwe n’undi mugabo, ukam@@ ukw@@ era nka se ukabona kum@@ ujyan@@ a. Kubera icyubahiro uwo mugore yabaga ahawe cyo kumukunda kandi afite undi mugabo babanye neza, nicyo cyat@@ umaga ak@@ osh@@ wa inka n’iz@@ azo kandi zin@@ akam@@ wa, by’@@ icyubahiro cyo guhabwa amata mu rugo rushya ad@@ ategereje iz@@ imye atazi igihe ziz@@ abyar@@ ira. Ni ikimenyetso cy’uko avuye mu byiza agiye mu byiza bir@@ us@@ eho. Inka niyo nkw@@ ano y’ibanze yabaga mu muco w’@@ Abanyarwanda, iyo wuz@@ uzaga ibisabwa bijyanye n’@@ inkw@@ ano, wat@@ er@@ uraga int@@ ango cyangwa ib@@ ibindi runaka by’@@ inzoga ukajya kubamenyesha ko inkwano yabon@@ etse, hanyuma bakag@@ uha umunsi nyirizina wo guk@@ wa, na byo bikaba ibirori bwo mu rwego rwo hejuru, kuko aricyo kimenyetso cya nyuma kigaragaza ko imiryango yombi yemeje gushyingiranwa koko. Inka yari ikimenyetso cy'@@ inkwano yuje icyubahiro haba ku bakire cyangwa abakene

Nyak@@ inam@@ a: ingabo zivuye mu bihugu 9 ziri kwiga kubaka amahoro Ingabo zivuye mu bihugu 9 byo muri afurika bivuye mu bibazo by'intambara zit@@ eraniye mu kigo cy'u Rwanda cy@@ igisha ibijyanye n'amahoro ( Rwanda Peace Academ@@ y) kiri i Nyak@@ inama mu Karere ka Musanze z@@ iga uburyo ibihugu byabo byak@@ ubaka amahoro arambye (S@@ ec@@ ur@@ ity S@@ ector Ref@@ or@@ m@@ - SS@@ R@@ ). Aya mahugurwa agenewe abagira urur@@ ah@@ are mu mu bikorwa byo kubungabunga amahoro (@@ Peace Sup@@ port Oper@@ ation@@ -@@ PS@@ O@@ ). U Rwanda rukaba ruza ku isonga mu bihugu by'Afurika kuko rufite ingabo n'abapolisi bab@@ ungabunga amahoro mu bihugu bitandukanye. Majoro Rene Ngend@@ ah@@ imana, Umuvugizi w'Ingabo z'u Rwanda, avuga ko amahugurwa ad@@ ater@@ an@@ iyemo inzego z'umutekano gusa harimo n'imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta ifite intego yo kwimakaza amahoro arambye ku baturage. Umugaba w'ingabo zirwanira ku butaka, Gen C@@ eas@@ ar Kay@@ iz@@ ari, wafunguye amasomo ku mugaragaro tariki 06@@ /02/201@@ 2 yavuze ko kuba amahugurwa yo kubaka amahoro ategurwa ak@@ itabirwa n'ibihugu 9 kandi by@@ aciye mu bibazo ari uko byinshi mu bihugu by'@@ af@@ ur@@ ka by@@ ifuza kwiyubaka no kubaka aram@@ bye. Gen Kay@@ izari yavuze ko gushakisha amahoro arambye ari bumwe mu buryo bwo gusana ibyangijwe n'intambara mu ndimi z'@@ amahanga bita Post con@@ fl@@ ic@@ t pe@@ ace bu@@ ild@@ ing proc@@ ess. Ibihugu by'Afurika birah@@ amagarirwa gukorana hagati yabyo kugira ngo bish@@ obore guhagarika intambara nyinshi ziteg@@ urirwa mu bindi bihugu big@@ asenya ibikorwa by'@@ iterambere. Abitabiriye aya masomo bazagira umwanya wo kugaragaza uko ibihugu byabo bihagaze mu kwiyubaka kugira ngo bib@@ ere ibindi is@@ omo. U Rwanda nk'igihugu cy@@ aciye muri Jenoside ruz@@ aganiriza ibindi bihugu uko rw@@ ashoboye kuyik@@ uramo no guhangana n'ingaruka zayo ndetse rug@@ ashobora gutera imbere nk'uko bigaragar@@ arira benshi. Bi@@ ibihugu byitabiriye aya masomo harimo Kenya, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Ubur@@ undi, Uganda, Liber@@ ia, Cote d'@@ Ivoire, Sierra Le@@ one, U Rwanda na Tanzania nubwo yo itigeze ibamo intambara ariko ikeneye kwiyubaka mu kugira amahoro aram@@ bye. Aya masomo yateguwe ku bufatanye n'itsinda mpuzamahanga ku bijyanye n'amahoro arambye (International Security S@@ ector Ref@@ or@@ m Adv@@ is@@ ory Te@@ am@@ - IS@@ S@@ AT@@ ) rifite icyicaro Gen@@ e@@ va mu Busuw@@ isi. Sylidio Sebuharara
Ange Kagame yanenze im@@ itegurire n’im@@ ibar@@ ize mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda Ingabire Ange Kagame yanenze bikomeye abategura irushanwa ry’@@ umukobwa ugomba guhagararira igihugu nka Nyampinga ubereye u Rwanda ugasanga bamubaza ibibazo mu ndimi z’@@ amahanga. Abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter, Ange Kagame yavuze ko bidakwiye ko umukobwa ahat@@ irwa gusubiza ibibazo mu ndimi z’amahanga mu gihe ashoboye gusubiza neza ibibazo mu rurimi rw’@@ Ikinyarwanda. Ibi yabivugiye ko mu ijoro ryakeye ubwo bah@@ it@@ agamo ugomba guhagararira u Rwanda mu irushanwa rya miss Rwanda yagombaga gusubiza ibibazo bibiri kimwe mu cyongereza ikindi mu Kinyarwanda, aho wasangaga bisa akanama nkemurampaka gusubiramo ikibazo inshuro irenze imwe kugira ngo umukobwa yumve ibyo bam@@ ubaj@@ ije. Ange yagize ati, “@@ Umukobwa ud@@ ateg@@ wa mu kuvuga ururimi rw’@@ Ikinyarwanda nta gaciro ari guhabwa kuko atabasha kwisanzura mu ndimi z’@@ amahanga. Abagize akanama nkemurampaka bar@@ akomeza gusubiramo ibibazo bic@@ iriritse biri mu rurimi abakobwa batavuga inshuro 3 cyangwa 4, ntacyo bivuze rwos@@ e." Akimara kuvuga ibi abatari bake bunze mur@@ ye bagaragaza ko mu gihe irushanwa ari ir@@ y’abanyarwanda batak@@ ang@@ ombye kurusha abakobwa babasaba kuvuga mu ndimi z’amahanga ngo kuko ariho hava agasuzug@@ uro. Jean Ngendahimana yagize ati, “Mu Bushinwa ntabwo Minisitiri asabwa kumenya icyongereza kugira ngo ahabwe uwo mwany@@ a,@@ . Niyo mpamvu habaho abas@@ em@@ uzi. Aha niho muh@@ era mw@@ is@@ uzug@@ uza mu rwego mpuzamah@@ ang aho id@@ ent@@ ity (@@ indang@@ agacir@@ o) yacu tut@@ ihakana aho kuy@@ iteza imbere. Ibi bintu bijye byitwa kwanga igihugu. Miss itorwa ni iy’@@ abanyarwand@@ a!" Umunyamakuru Mazimpaka Jean Pierre yunze mu by’@@ aba avuga ko bitari bikwiye ko umukobwa ategekwa kugira ururimi avugamo mu gihe azi neza ururimi gakondo. Jean Pierre ati, “@@ Reka nsh@@ ime Imana ko Atari njye njyenyine ubona akarengane g@@ akorerwa aba bakobwa nta mpamvu. Niba umukobwa ashobora kwisobanura neza mu rurimi gakondo (@@ Ikin@@ yarwand@@ a), bir@@ ahagije. Abas@@ em@@ uzi bazakora akazi kabo mu gihe bibaye ngombw@@ a.” Ibi bije byiyongera ku babona ko iri rushanwa ntacyo rimaze aho mu minsi ishize Umuyobozi wa Transparency International Rwanda, Ingabire Marie Immaculée abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter yari yagaragaje ko atishimiye na gato itorwa rya miss Rwanda kuko asanga ntacyo amarira igihugu. Ingabire yagize ati, “N@@ agerageje kumva akamaro ka Miss ariko w@@ api nar@@ akab@@ uze. Sinzi icyo im@@ ariye abanyarwanda dore ko n’abay@@ izi ari bake cyane. N’@@ ababaye ba Miss kugeza ubu simb@@ ona akarusho bazanye mu iterambere ry’@@ igihugu.” Miss Rwanda 2019 yavuzweho amagambo menshi kuva itangiye kugera igeze ku mus@@ ozo, yasojwe kuri uyu wa gatandatu ikamba ryam@@ bitswe Nimwiza Meghan mu gihe Mwiseneza Josiane wakunzwe n’abantu benshi bakagaragaza ko ari we ukwiye ikamba bagendeye ku muh@@ ate yagaragaje yambitswe ikamba rya Nyampinga ukunzwe cyane (Miss Pop@@ ur@@ al@@ ity)

Prof. Joseph Sem@@ uj@@ anga, umwarimu w'@@ indimi muri Kaminuza ya Mont@@ ré@@ al muri Canada no mu Ishuri Rikuru rya Kibungo (@@ INAT@@ EK@@ ) afatanyije na Jean Luc Gaul@@ bert, banditse igitabo "@@ Fa@@ ire Face au n@@ ég@@ ot@@ i@@ ann@@ isme du G@@ é@@ noc@@ ide des T@@ uts@@ i", bagaragaza uburyo hari bamwe bahakana Jenosid@@ e @@ (...) Aband@@ itsi bamur@@ itse igitabo kivuga uburyo hari abapf@@ obya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda n'uko byar@@ wany@@ wa, bise "@@ Fa@@ ire Face au n@@ ég@@ ot@@ ion@@ n@@ isme du Gén@@ osid@@ e des T@@ utsi », kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 12 Mata, i Kigali. Prof. Joseph Sem@@ uj@@ anga, umwarimu w'@@ indimi muri Kaminuza ya Mont@@ ré@@ al muri Canada no mu Ishuri Rikuru rya Kibungo (@@ INAT@@ EK@@ ) afatanyije na Jean Luc Gaul@@ bert, banditse igitabo "@@ Fa@@ ire Face au n@@ ég@@ ot@@ i@@ ann@@ isme du G@@ é@@ noc@@ ide des T@@ uts@@ i", bagaragaza uburyo hari bamwe bahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda, uburyo bab@@ ikora, amagambo bakoresh@@ a, uburyo bab@@ ishyira mu bikorwa n'uburyo bwo kuyir@@ wanya. Intego y'iki gitabo, nk'uko abanditsi babit@@ angaza ni ukubaka abanyarwanda no kurwanya abapf@@ obya bakan@@ ahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Prof. Sem@@ uj@@ anaga ati "@@ Igitabo cyanditswe n'abantu benshi, twah@@ uje abantu bababajwe n'abapf@@ obya n'abah@@ akana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Muri iki gitabo tw@@ erekana uburyo bwinshi abantu bapf@@ obya bakan@@ ahakana Jenosid@@ re yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda.@@ » Akomeza atangaza ko abateguye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi baba bafite n'uburyo bakoresha bayih@@ akana, bityo iki gitabo kikaz@@ afasha mu kwerekana abapf@@ obya bakan@@ ahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, kikaz@@ afasha gushyiraho ingamba zo kuyir@@ wanya, no gukumira abapf@@ obya bakan@@ ayih@@ akana. Prof. Sem@@ uj@@ anga atangaza ko abantu bakwiye kubaka igihugu gishingiye ku mahame yubak@@ a, umuntu agahabwa agaciro mu gihugu, har@@ wanywa abapf@@ obya n'abah@@ akana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Igitabo "@@ Fa@@ ire Face au n@@ ég@@ ot@@ i@@ ann@@ isme du Gén@@ osid@@ e des T@@ utsi » gifite p@@ aji (P@@ age) 4@@ 15, kik@@ agira n'ib@@ ice bine birimo ipfundo nyamukuru ry'@@ ubuh@@ akanyi bwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ihakana ryayo mu bihugu by'u Burayi, itangazamakuru riy@@ ih@@ akana, no guhangana n'@@ ipfobya n'abah@@ akana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Ntakirutimana Evariste uri mu itsinda ry@@ anditse iki gitabo, yatangaje ko hagaragara amagambo yerekana abapf@@ obya bakan@@ ahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, amagambo atagomba gukoreshwa nko kuvuga ubwicanyi, isub@@ iranamo ry'@@ am@@ oko, ibyabaye muri 1994, aho kuvuga Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo y'Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside (CNL@@ G@@ ), Jean de Dieu Mucy@@ o, yavuze ko iki gitabo kizafasha mu kurwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n'abapf@@ obya bakan@@ ahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda. Mucyo yatangaje ko icyo gitabo ari intambwe nziza izafasha CNLG mu kwandika amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, akenewe kwandik@@ wa, akam@@ enyekana. FERWAFA n'abanyamakuru nyuma yo gus@@ asa inzobe biyemeje gutah@@ iriza umugozi umw@@ e! Dore imyanz@@ ur@@ o! Mu mwiherero wamaze amasaha agera ku icyenda abanyamakuru bakora amakuru y'imikino n'ubuyobozi bw'@@ ishyirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Rwanda FERWAFA biyemeje gukora batah@@ iriza umugozi umwe baharanira kubaka no gusana isura nziza y'umupira w'amaguru mu Rwanda, nyuma yo gus@@ asa inzobe ku bibazo byagiye birangwa hagati ya FERWAFA n'abany@@ amakuru. Minisitiri Habineza ari kumwe na Perezida wa FERWAFA ubwo yatang@@ izwaga umwih@@ erero. Muri uyu mwiherero watangijwe na Minisitiri Joseph Habineza yasabye abanyamakuru n'ubuyobozi bw'@@ umupira w'amaguru mu Rwanda kurebera hamwe icy@@ agirira akamaro abanyarwanda. Minisitiri Habineza yatanze urugero rw'@@ uburyo abanyamakuru bafatanyije hamwe n'ishyirahamwe ry'umukino w'@@ amagare, bikaba byar@@ atanze umusaruro, akaba yashimiye itangazamakuru uburyo ryab@@ yit@@ wayemo kandi az@@ anar@@ ishimira by'umwihariko ubwo azaba ashimira abakinnyi b'@@ amagar@@ e. Nyuma yo gufungura ku mugaragaro, ibiganiro byakom@@ ereje mu mwiherero ukomeye hagati ya Feder@@ asiyo yari ihagarariwe na Perezida wayo Nzamwita Vincent Dega@@ ul@@ le, ari kumwe n'umuvugizi wa FERWAFA Musa Hakiz@@ imana, hari kandi ushinzwe market@@ ing muri Ferwafa n'abandi bakozi b'@@ uru rwego. Abanyamakuru bagera kuri 50 barangajwe imbere na Perezida w'Ishyirahamwe ry'@@ abanyamakuru ba siporo (@@ AJ@@ ES@@ POR@@ ) Jean But@@ oy@@ i, baganiriye ahagiye haboneka ibibazo mu mikor@@ anire, byatumye umwuka utari mwiza ukomeza gut@@ ut@@ umba. Nyuma yo gus@@ asa inzobe no gusabana imbabazi ku mpande zombi ku bitar@@ angiye bigenda neza no ku makosa yagiye aba ku mpande zombi, abanyamakuru n'ubuyobozi bw'@@ umupira w'amaguru biyem@@ eje, guhuriza hamwe imbaraga n'@@ imikoranire bagat@@ ah@@ iriza umugozi umwe byose bigamije kubaka isura nziza y'umupira w'amaguru mu Rwanda. Imyanzuro rusange yavuye mu mw@@ iherero. Umwiherero wemeje ko hat@@ agomba kubaho it@@ on@@ eshwa mu bany@@ amakuru, ko abanyamakuru bose bar@@ eshya kandi bafatwa kimwe imbere ya FERW@@ E@@ FA Inama yemeje ko bagomba guhabwa amakuru ku gihe kandi nabo bagashyiraho umwete mu gushaka amakuru. Inama ym@@ eje ko FERWAFA ikwiye gukorana n'@@ Ishyirahamwe ry'@@ abanyamakuru ba Siporo (@@ AJ@@ ES@@ POR@@ ) kuko ari yo irimo nibura 95% by'@@ aban@@ ay@@ amakuru. Ku birebana n'abanyamakuru bah@@ erekeza ikipe y'igihugu, Inama yasabye ko FERWAFA igomba kuganira na AJ@@ ES@@ POR@@ , AJ@@ ES@@ PO@@ R ikaba ari yo izajya ikoresha tombola ku bitangazamakuru uko bizajya bik@@ urikirana mu guherekeza ikipe y'igihugu, noneho ikinyamakuru kig@@ ezweho akaba ari cyo gih@@ itamo umunyamakuru uh@@ erekeza ikipe y'igihugu. Inama yemeje ko abanyamakuru bakor@@ oherezwa mu kazi mu gihe bari mu mas@@ it@@ ade, amakipe ag@@ ashyiraho uburyo bwo gufasha abanyamakuru kubona line up (l@@ iste z'@@ amakipe agiye gukin@@ a) n'ibindi. Inama yasabye ko habaho ubw@@ ubah@@ ane hagati y'@@ abafatanyabikorwa bagamije guteza umupira w'amaguru imbere. Abanyamakuru basabwe gushyira hamwe hagamijwe guha amakuru yuzuye abanyarwanda. Inama yemeje ko uyu mwiherero utagomba kubangamira ubwisanzure bw'@@ itangazamakuru. (@@ bivuze amakosa ashobora gukorwa bitab@@ uza ko avugwa mu itangazamakuru@@ ). Inama yasabye ko abanyamakuru bakw@@ in@@ ega ubwabo. Inama yasabye AJ@@ ES@@ PO@@ R ko yakw@@ ihutisha inzira zo kubona ubuzima gatozi batang@@ iye. Inama yasabye han@@ ozwa imikoranire hagati ya FERWAFA n'itangazamakuru mu rwego rwo kugarura isura nziza y'umupira w'@@ amaguru. Umwiherero ukaba wari watangiye kuva isa tatu za mu gitondo, ukaba wash@@ ojwe ku isaha y'@@ isa moya n'igice z'umugoro@@ ba.
Ni gute wa kwitwara umukunzi wawe abaye akorera kur@@ e? Abantu benshi bajya bibagora rukundo rwabo mu gihe abakunzi babo bat@@ ababa hafi, dore inama wak@@ ifashisha mu gihe umukunzi wawe aba kur@@ e: Gira intangiriro nziza Mbere y'uko w@@ ishora mu gukundana n'umuntu uri kure, banza umenye ko iby@@ iv@@ umv@@ iro bye kuri wowe bitarimo uburyar@@ y@@ a,@@ ib@@ yi nig@@ enzi cyane kuko iyo uri kure y'umuntu ukund@@ a,@@ ntibyoroshye kumenya icyo agut@@ ekerez@@ aho,@@ niba ari ushaka gukina n'umutima wawe icyiza ni uko wab@@ imenya bit@@ aragera kure V@@ ugana nawe uko bishoboka kose Muri iki gihe ikoranabuhanga mu itumanaho ry@@ oroheje ibintu cyane, w@@ iby@@ it@@ esha rero ubutumwa bugufi bwinshi, gerageza kumuhamagara uko ub@@ ishoboye. Mug@@ irire icyizere gihagije N@@ utangira kumuf@@ uhira cyane ari na kure yawe, menya ko urimo gusubiza ibintu inyuma, kubera ko utari hafi ye ngo umuk@@ urikirane ugomba kumuha icyizere cyose. M@@ ubwire byose Kuba umwe ari kure y'@@ undi ntibis@@ obanuye ko mut@@ agirana umubano nk'uw@@ abari kumwe w@@ int@@ inya kumubwira uko umunsi wawe wag@@ enz@@ e,@@ ku mug@@ anirira ku nshuti zawe, ndetse no kumubwira ibikorwa byawe bya buri munsi. Ukuri ni ryo shingiro ryo kugira ngo ibintu byanyu bikom@@ ere igihe kin@@ in@@ i,@@ niba wumva uruk@@ ondo rutangiye kugabanuka cyangwa hari utuntu wumva utag@@ ishaka bim@@ ubwire hakiri kare kugira ngo wirinde ko by@@ azam@@ era nabi. U@@ bah@@ iriza gahunda mufitanye Niba mwah@@ anye gahunda ngo muz@@ ahure wenda nko muri week@@ end@@ ,@@ gerageza rwose he kugira indi gahunda y@@ ivanga muri iyo@@ ,@@ nubwo wagira indi gahunda umukunzi wawe ni we ugomba kuza mbere y@@ ibyo byose. Perezida Jacob Zuma yagizwe past@@ eri Perezida Jacob z@@ uma ubwo yaram@@ bur@@ ir@@ wagaho ibiganza Perezida wa Afurika y’Epfo Jacob Zuma aherutse kugirwa umup@@ as@@ itoro akazaba ari umushumba mu itorero rya B@@ antu Church of Christ@@ . Amakuru dukesha Smit@@ h@@ ris@@ e.com aravuga ko Perezida Jacob Zuma w’igihugu cya Afurika y’Epfo aherutse gus@@ igwa amavuta ndetse akan@@ aram@@ bik@@ waho n’ibig@@ anza kugira ngo abe umushumba w’itorero rya B@@ antu Church of Christ@@ . Uyu muhango witabiriwe n’abayobozi b’ishyaka abarizwamo rya ANC abanyamuryango bagize ihuriro ry’@@ abagore bo muri AN@@ C, umuryango we ndetse n’inshuti za hafi. Perezida Jacob Zuma witegura kuva ku butegetsi yagiye avuga ko yumva afite umuhamagaro wo gukora umurimo w’Imana. Az@@ aba ayoboye ishami ry’@@ iri torero r@@ ibarizwa mu burasirazuba bwa Cape nyuma yo kuva ku buyobozi bw’@@ umukuru w’igihugu cya Afurika y’Epfo. Perezida wa Afurika y’epfo yagize ati: “M@@ fite umugisha, nah@@ amagariwe gutanga umugisha, nahawe imbaraga zo gutanga umugisha. Nd@@ ishimye ku bw’@@ ibi birori. Nz@@ ava ku buyobozi vuba kandi numva nshaka gukorera Imana ubuzima bwanjye bwos@@ e.” Perezida Jacob Zuma ni umup@@ erezida wa 4 w’ igihugu cya Afurika y’Epfo yavutse mu 194@@ 2 yagiye kub@@ uyobozi muri 2009 kugeza ubu akaba ak@@ iyoboye Afurika y’Epfo
Kaminuza yo mu Bushinwa yatangiye kwigisha Ikinyarwanda Kaminuza ya Beijing For@@ e@@ ign Stud@@ ies University yo mu Bushinwa yatangije porogaramu yo kwigisha isomo ry’@@ Ikinyarwanda ku banyeshuri bayig@@ amo. Ku bufatanye na Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, iyo Kaminuza yo mu Bushinwa ni ubwa mbere itangije iyo gahunda yo kwigisha Ikinyarwanda, rukaba rubaye ururimi rwa kabiri rwo ku mugabane wa Afurika rw@@ igishijwe muri iyo Kaminuza nyuma y’@@ Igis@@ wah@@ ili. Mu muhango wo gutangiza kwigisha Ikinyarwanda wabereye muri Beijing For@@ e@@ ign Stud@@ ies University kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 8 Ukwakira 2019, Visi Perezida w’iyo Kaminuza Prof J@@ ia W@@ enj@@ ian yashimye icyo git@@ ekerezo, ashishikariza abanyeshuri b’@@ Abashinwa gush@@ ishikarira kwiga Ikinyarwanda. Yagize ati “Ni iby’agaciro kuri twe kuba Kaminuza ya mbere mu Bushinwa itangije Ikinyarwanda. Iki ni ikimenyetso gikomeye gih@@ a agaciro umubano ibihugu byacu bifit@@ anye. Abanyeshuri bacu baz@@ iga kandi bak@@ en@@ eke Ikin@@ yarwand@@ a.” Sh@@ u Z@@ han wahoze ari ambasaderi w’u Bushinwa mu Rwanda, yavuze ko u Rwanda n’u Bushinwa byombi bihuriye ku ntego zo kwiteza imbere. Yagize ati “Ubwo nari Ambasaderi mu Rwanda, nabonye icy@@ erecyezo dusangiye n’abanyarwanda cyo kwishakamo ibisubizo by’ibibazo byabo, byatumye igihugu gitera imbere mu myaka isaga icumi ish@@ ize.” Z@@ han yongeyeho ko isura u Rwanda rufite uyu munsi, yavuye mu muh@@ ate no gukora cyane biranga abanyarwanda n’ubuyobozi bwabo. Ushinzwe ibikorwa muri Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Bushinwa, Virg@@ ile Rwany@@ agat@@ are, yashimye umubano uri hagati ya Kaminuza y’u Rwanda na Beijing For@@ e@@ ign Stud@@ ies University ari nawo wash@@ ibuts@@ emo itangizwa ryo kwigisha Ikinyarwanda mu banyeshuri bo mu Bushinwa. Yavuze ko bizafasha abanyarwanda n’abash@@ inwa gusabana no guhana ubunararibonye mu gihe kiri imbere. Umwarimu wigisha Ikinyarwanda muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, Dr. Patrice Ntaw@@ ig@@ ira, yasabye abanyeshuri b’@@ abashinwa kwitabira kwiyandikisha kwiga ururimi rw’@@ Ikinyarwanda ari benshi. Yagize ati “M@@ wahisemo neza. Ikinyarwanda ubu kivugwa n’abagera kuri miliyoni 40 mu Karere k’Ibiyaga big@@ ari. Ni rumwe mu ndimi zivugwa henshi cyane muri Afurika nyuma y’@@ Igis@@ wah@@ ili. Ikinyarwanda n’@@ Igiswahili biz@@ ahuza abaturage bo mu Bushinwa n’abany@@ afurika batuye muri Afurika yo munsi y’Ubut@@ ayu bwa Sahara barimo n’abany@@ arwand@@ a.” Yongeyeho ko nta cyiza nko kuba Ikinyarwanda git@@ angijwe kwigishwa mu Bushinwa muri iki gihe ubwo ibihugu byombi by@@ izihiza imyaka 48 ishize bifitanye umubano mwiza. U Bushinwa ni umufatanyabikorwa ukomeye w’u Rwanda mu bikorwa bijyanye by’@@ iterambere, haba mu bucuruzi, umutekano, uburezi n’ib@@ ikor@@ waremezo, mu mubano umaze imyaka isaga 45. Amateka agaragaza ko ibigo byo mu Bushinwa byab@@ eng@@ utswe u Rwanda mu myaka myinshi ishize, kuko nka China C@@ ivil Engine@@ ering Con@@ struc@@ tion Cor@@ p.@@ , gish@@ amikiye kuri leta y’icyo gihugu cy@@ ohereje abakozi bacyo bwa mbere mu Rwanda mu 198@@ 3, maze imwe mu mishinga yacyo ya mbere ibamo kubaka Stade Amahoro yuzuye mu 1986 kuri miliyoni $@@ 21. Ikinyarwanda, rubaye ururimi rwa kabiri rwo ku mugabane wa Afurika rw@@ igishijwe muri iyo Kaminuza nyuma y’@@ Igiswahili
"U@@ guhemba uram@@ uy@@ oboka, uguh@@ emba ur@@ amw@@ ubah@@ a" - Perezida Kagame Perezida Kagame arongera kwibutsa abayobozi ko gukora neza akazi kabo ari inshingano zabo, kuko amafaranga bahembwa ava mu misoro y'@@ Abat@@ ur@@ arwanda. Ak@@ ongeraho ko bakwiye kongera ubukungu buturuka imbere mu gihugu kugira ngo na cya cyubahiro bah@@ aga abanyamahanga kig@@ ume mu Rwanda. P@@ erez@@ da Kagame yemeza ko Abanyarwanda ari bo musingi w'@@ it@@ em@@ bere ry'@@ igihugu, bityo bakaba bakwiye kubah@@ wa, nk'uko yabigarutseho ku munsi w'@@ umus@@ oreshwa wizih@@ ijwe n'Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Imisoro n'@@ Amahoro (R@@ RA@@ ), kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 2/@@ 11@@ /201@@ 3. Perezida Kagame yatangaje ko yubaha abaturage akan@@ abakorera kuko aribo bamuh@@ emba. Yagize ati: "U@@ guhemba uram@@ uy@@ oboka, uguh@@ emba ur@@ amw@@ ubaha, ni nayo mpamvu twifuz@@ ako gutanga imisoro n'ib@@ iy@@ ivamo twifuza ko bikomeza kuzamuka bik@@ iyongera (...) tug@@ ende tug@@ abanya ukuntu tway@@ oboka abo hanze kuko ubundi ntabwo bikwiye. Njye nifuza kuba nay@@ oboka aban@@ t@@ oye bakan@@ amp@@ emba ijana ku ij@@ ana." Umukuru w'igihugu yabwiye abari bitabiriye uyu muhango ngarukamwaka ko bidakwiye gutekereza gus@@ oresha abantu gusa, hatabayeho gutekereza uruhande rw'@@ ibikorwa bakwiriye kuba bag@@ ez@@ waho. Perezida Kagame ashyikiriza ibihembo bamwe mu bas@@ ora bitwaye neza muri uyu mwaka. Yavuze ko abasora baba bakeneye ibikorwa remezo bifatika no gukorera mu bwisanzure kugira ngo bakore neza ubukungu bwabo bw@@ iyongere bityo n'ibyo bas@@ ora by@@ iyong@@ ere. Yatangaje ko kandi ari uruhare rw'@@ abayobozi gucunga neza umutungo w'igihugu urimo iyo misoro iba yatanzwe n'@@ abaturage. An@@ ashimira byimazeyo abaturage bo mu byaro bakora cyane bakan@@ atanga imisoro. Yavuze ko nubwo abantu benshi bakomeza kumva akamaro ko gus@@ ora, abasora bakiri bake asaba abayobozi gufasha abaturage kugira icyo bakora kugira ngo nabo bashobore gutanga imisoro. Urwego rw'@@ ingabo na Polisi nabyo by@@ ashim@@ iwe ubufatanye big@@ irana na RRA mu gukumira abany@@ ereza imisoro. Kuva mu 1996 kugeza ubu imisoro itangwa n'abaturage yikubye inshuro zirenga 22, aho yavuye kuri miliyari 36 ikaba iteganywa kuzagera kuri miliyari 79@@ 5 uyu mwaka wa 201@@ 3/201@@ 4. Bivuze ko imisoro igira uruhare rugera kuri 15% mu ngengo y'imari igihugu, ariko hakaba hag@@ ikenewe ko byibura uruhare rwayo rw@@ azamuka ruk@@ agera hejuru ya 20@@ %, nk'uko byatangajwe na Minisitiri w'Imari n'@@ igenamigambi, Amb. Claver Gat@@ ete. Bamwe mu bas@@ ora bashimiye Leta uburyo igenda y@@ oroshya uburyo bwo gut@@ angamo imisoro, aho yashyizeho uburyo bwo gusora hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga no kwegereza abasora aho bas@@ orera, nk'uko byatangajwe n'umwe mu bas@@ ora witwa J@@ as@@ ques Rur@@ asir@@ e. Uyu munsi wahariwe abasora bari baw@@ itabiriye ari benshi mu nzego zitandukanye. Uyu munsi wahariwe abasora han@@ ah@@ embwe abagize uruhare mu gutanga neza imisoro ndetse n'abandi bafatanyabikorwa ba RRA, barimo ingabo na Polisi n'itangazamakuru n'abantu ku giti cyabo. Emmanuel N. Hitimana

Nt@@ amug@@ ab@@ umwe avuga ko igishoro yatangiranye ari amaboko ye ndetse n'umutwe we kuko avuye mu mahugurwa yatangiye gukorera abandi ariko agira ubwenge bwo kwizig@@ ama. "@@ Kw@@ izig@@ amira nibyo bing@@ ejeje aho ng@@ eze, kuko iyo nt@@ aza kubikora ntacyo nari kuba nar@@ ig@@ ejej@@ eho. Afurika Yunze Ubumwe yatoye umwanzuro wo kohereza ingabo mu Burundi Akanama k'@@ umutekano mu muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (AU) wamaze gutora umwanzuro wo kohereza ingabo zo kurinda amahoro mu gihugu cy'u Burundi. Uyu mwanzuro watowe kuri uyu wa Gatanu nyuma y'inama n'ibihugu bin@@ yamuryango uko ari 5@@ 4. Nubwo byakunze kuvugwa ko ibibera mu Burundi bishobora kubyara Jenoside, ibihugu bin@@ yamuryango bya AU byavuze ko nta kigaragaza ko Jenoside ishobora kuba. Bonaventure C@@ ak@@ po Gu@@ eb@@ eg@@ d@@ e. Umuyobozi muri AU yabwiye AFP dukesha iyi nkuru ko umwanzuro wo kohereza ingabo mu Burundi watowe n'@@ Akanama k'@@ umutekano k'@@ uwo muryango. Gu@@ eb@@ eg@@ de yavuze ko izo ngabo ziz@@ agendera ku izina ry'@@ ingabo z'@@ umuryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba zishinzwe gutabara aho rukom@@ eye.@@ ( East African Stand@@ by Forc@@ e). AU ivuga ko itaz@@ emera ko muri Afurika haba indi Jenoside, nyuma y'@@ iy@@ abaye mu Rwanda. Umwanzuro wa nyuma wo kohereza ingabo mu Burundi uz@@ emezwa n'aba@@ perezida ba AU ndetse n'@@ U Burundi ubw@@ abwo mbere yo koherez@@ wa. U Burundi bwakomeje kugaragaza ko bud@@ ashaka ko hari ingabo z@@ oherez@@ wa, ngo kuko igihugu gifite umutekano.
Imyitwarire ikwiriye kuranga umukobwa witegura gushyingirwa Umukobwa witegura gushyingirwa aba agiye kuva mu kiciro kimwe cyo mu bus@@ ore agana mu kindi kiciro cy’@@ ab@@ ubats@@ e.@@ Tw@@ avuga ko aba avuye mu buzima bwa wenyine agiye gukom@@ ezanya ubuzima n’undi muntu bakundanye bak@@ emer@@ anwa kubana akaramata. Madamu Mukuru Win@@ fr@@ ide inzobere mu mibanire y’abashakanye ar@@ atanga inama ku bakobwa bitegura gushyingirwa kugira ngo bazaz@@ ubake zikom@@ ere. Imwe mu mit@@ warire ikwiye umukobwa witegura gushyingir@@ wa: Kug@@ anira n’abantu bubatse ingo ( fam@@ ill@@ es) Ni ngombwa ko umukobwa witegura gushyingirwa aganira n’aba@@ mut@@ anze kubaka ingo ,@@ kugira ngo aba@@ baze bimwe mu bibazo aj@@ yay@@ ibaza mu rush@@ ako agiye kwinj@@ iram@@ o.@@ Iyo umukobwa aganira n’aba@@ mut@@ anze gushaka ,@@ bajy@@ enda bamus@@ obanurira ndetse bakan@@ amuha inama z’@@ uburyo az@@ itwara mu buzima bushya agiye kwinj@@ iramo. Kur@@ eka kugendera mu kig@@ are Umukobwa witegura gushyingirwa aba agomba kugaragaza itandukaniro kuko ibyo abas@@ anzwemo biba bihabanye nibyo agiye kuj@@ yamo. Kumenya neza umuryango ush@@ ats@@ emo Umukobwa witegura gushaka aba agomba kumenya neza amakuru y’umuryango ash@@ ats@@ emo kuko ni abantu baba bagiye kuba bugufi bwe mu bikorwa bitandukanye@@ .@@ Umukobwa agomba kuba umugisha mu muryango ash@@ ats@@ emo ndetse n’umuryango av@@ uyemo, ak@@ abahuza akaba ingirakamaro mu muryango aj@@ emo, ni ngombwa rero ko abam@@ enya. Ak@@ amenya ibyo bakund@@ a, ibyo b@@ anga, abagira amah@@ ane, abagira amagambo n’indi mico itandukanye kugira ngo azam@@ enye uko yitwara kuri buri wese maze baz@@ ashe kubana mu mahoro. Kir@@ azira gusezera ku basore mwari inshuti Hari abakobwa bajya gusezera ku basore bahoze bakundana nabo mbere, ibyo ni ibintu bibi cyane kuko bashobora kuk@@ ugirira nabi bakag@@ ufata ku ngufu bitewe nuko nabo bakw@@ ifuzaga ukaba uba@@ c@@ itse. Gutanga av@@ ance (@@ kuryamana mbere yo kurush@@ ing@@ a) Umuco wo gutanga av@@ ance ur@@ eze ,@@ nyamara si umuco nyarwanda ukwiriye kwim@@ ikw@@ a.@@ Umukobwa ni nk’@@ amata ntas@@ og@@ ong@@ erwa, niba rero witegura gushyingirwa nt@@ ukwiriye kwemera gutanga av@@ ance ku musore mwenda kurush@@ ing@@ ana. Niba koko agukunda azar@@ indira mukore ubukwe maze mub@@ one kuryam@@ ana. Kwirinda kwitwara uko utari Hari abakobwa b@@ egereza gushyingirwa ntiba@@ be bacy@@ itwara neza kuri bagenzi babo ku buryo usanga abakobwa bagenzi be bavuga bati runaka yarir@@ ase ntak@@ itw@@ ik@@ oza ntiy@@ adut@@ umiye n’ibindi, si byiza rero nk’uko uba ugiye gushyingirwa n’igihe cyabo nabo kiba kizagera nabo bag@@ ashyingir@@ wa. Gukunda gusenga cyane Ngo umukobwa ugiye gushyingirwa aba agomba gusenga cyane, kugira ngo ubuzima bushya agiye kwinjiramo azay@@ obor@@ we n’Imana kandi n’@@ agah@@ unda zose z@@ itegurwa ziz@@ agende neza.
Umukobwa ukora amavuta muri avoka arasaba inkunga Rwiyemezamirimo Niy@@ id@@ ukunda Mug@@ eni E@@ up@@ hr@@ os@@ ine, washinze uruganda rukora amavuta muri avoka arasaba inkunga kugira ngo abashe gukora amavuta menshi yagera ku Banyarwanda b’@@ ibyiciro byose. Niy@@ id@@ ukunda avuga ko abonye inkunga uruganda rwe rw@@ agura imashini z@@ atanga umusaruro mwinshi Avuga ko amavuta atunganya nta ngaruka agira ku buzima, ariko hari abavuga ko ahenze “ku buryo atari buri wese way@@ ig@@ ondera bitewe n’uko litiro imwe igura amafaranga y’u Rwanda 12@@ .000@@ ”. Ayo mavuta akora yagenz@@ uwe n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuziranenge. Niy@@ id@@ ukunda washinze uruganda ruy@@ akora yemeza ko nta ngaruka yatera uway@@ akoresh@@ eje, ahubwo afasha mu kuvanaho ibinure bitari ngombwa mu mubiri. Agira ati “Hari amavuta menshi babuza abantu kurya kuko iyo uy@@ ac@@ anir@@ iye, uy@@ atek@@ esheje nk’@@ if@@ ir@@ iti, hari igipimo ageraho akam@@ era nk’@@ ubur@@ ozi. Ibyo bituma yangiza uy@@ akoresheje nyuma yo kuy@@ ac@@ anira ak@@ angiza ubuzima bwe, ariko aya avoka aba ari umwimerere kandi yo yinjira mu mubiri agahom@@ ora bya bin@@ ure byose byatewe n’amavuta mabi yakoreshejwe mbere@@ ”. Uruganda rub@@ yaza avoka amavuta rwatanze akazi ku bakozi barindwi barimo bane bah@@ oraho Nubwo aya mavuta avugwaho kutagira ingaruka ku way@@ akoresh@@ eje, abashobora kuyig@@ ondera baracyari mbarwa kubera igiciro cyayo bamwe bavuga ko gih@@ an@@ itse, bagah@@ uriza ku cyifuzo cy’uko hagira igikorwa kugira ngo n’umuturage uc@@ iriritse abashe kuyig@@ ondera ab@@ ungab@@ unge ubuzima bwe. Nt@@ agah@@ oraho Gaston agira ati “A@@ bashobora kugura ayo mavuta ni bake cyane. Icy@@ akorwa ni uko [@@ igiciro cy’@@ ayo mav@@ ut@@ a] cy@@ asubir@@ wamo aba@@ yakora bak@@ akig@@ abany@@ a”. Mukamur@@ enzi Ange yungamo ati “Nk’@@ abanyamakuru mukwiye kut@@ uvug@@ anira ibiciro bikajya hasi kugira ngo tujye tubasha kuy@@ ah@@ aha natwe tur@@ ye neza”. Niy@@ id@@ ukunda na we yemeza ko igiciro cy’@@ amavuta akora kiri hejuru koko, ariko nanone akavuga ko imbaraga zish@@ orwa mu kuy@@ akora n’@@ ubuziranenge bwayo ari byo bituma n’@@ igiciro cyayo kiri hejuru. Amavuta akorwa n’uruganda Av@@ oc@@ are Ati “Kugira ngo mbone litiro imwe haba hagiye ibiro byinshi bya av@@ oka. L@@ itiro imwe ng@@ urisha 12@@ .000@@ Frw, nshobora kuyik@@ uramo andi mal@@ itiro 10 nag@@ urisha ku mafaranga igihumbi cyangwa ibihumbi bibiri, ariko njye ntabwo nashatse gukora byinshi byakw@@ angiza abantu, nahisemo gukora bike byiza byafasha umuntu wang@@ ijwe n’amavuta mabi kugira ngo abeho neza”. Umushinga wav@@ uyemo uruganda rukora ayo mav@@ uta, Niy@@ id@@ ukunda avuga ko yaw@@ utangiye muri 2017, atangije ibihumbi 40 by’amafaranga y’u Rwanda yari avanye kuri buruse yahabwaga ari umunyeshuri wa kaminuza. Nubwo ari umushinga ugenda ukura, ntur@@ abasha gutanga umusaruro mwinshi kuko kugeza ubu bakora litiro 100 z’@@ amavuta mu kwezi. I@@ bib@@ uto bya avoka na byo bikor@@ wamo amaj@@ yane yo kunywa mu cyayi Uretse ayo mav@@ uta, ban@@ akora amaj@@ yane mu bib@@ uto by’@@ izo avoka z@@ iby@@ azwa amavuta, Niy@@ od@@ ukunda akavuga ko babonye inkunga cyangwa inguzanyo yafasha kwagura urug@@ anda, n’@@ igiciro cy’@@ ayo mavuta gishobora kug@@ abanuka. Abanyarwanda barasabwa kwipimisha bakirinda indwara zitandura Minisiteri y'Ubuzima (@@ MINISANT@@ E) irasaba Abanyarwanda kugira umuco wo kwipimisha nubwo baba batar@@ waye mu rwego rwo kwirinda indwara zitandura kuko zica iyo ziv@@ ujwe bit@@ inze. Minisitiri Binagwaho n'abandi bayobozi mu by'ubuzima batanga ibiganiro mu nama. B@@ yavug@@ iwe mu nama mpuzamahanga y'iminsi ibiri yatangiye kuri uyu wa 28 Kamena 2016 i Kigali, igamije kwiga ku kurwanya indwara zitandura (N@@ CD@@ s), ikaba yitabiriwe n'inzego zinyuranye z'@@ abaganga biganjemo inzobere mu kuvura indwara zit@@ andura. I@@ zikunze kugaragara muri izi ndwara kandi zigira ingaruka mbi ku bantu, ni nk'@@ uburwayi bw'@@ umutima, ubw'@@ ibih@@ aha, umuvuduko w'@@ amaraso, kanseri na diyab@@ ete. Dr. Rudakemwa Emmanuel, ukuriye Urugaga rw'@@ Abaganga b'@@ Am@@ eny@@ o, avuga ko abantu bakagombye kugira umuco wo kwip@@ im@@ isha. Yagize ati "Tw@@ akagombye kugira umuco wo kwipimisha nibura kabiri mu mwaka, umuntu akamenya uko ahagaze aho gutegereza kurwara kuko kwivuza bihenze kandi akenshi no gukira bigor@@ ana." Akomeza avuga ko abag@@ itekereza ko izi ngo ari '@@ indwara z'@@ abakir@@ e' bibeshya cyane ahubwo bakagombye kugana abaganga bak@@ abagira inama y'uko zir@@ ind@@ wa. Iyi nama yitabiriwe n'abantu baturutse mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku isi. Umuyobozi Mukuru w'Ikigo cy'Igihugu cyita ku buzima (RB@@ C), Dr. C@@ ondo Jeann@@ ine, avuga ko imyitozo ngororamubiri iri m@@ i@@ u birwanya izi ndwara. Ati "@@ Abanyarwanda bagomba kumenyera gukora siporo no kurya indyo yuzuye kuko ari byo birinda izi ndwara. Buri muntu arasabwa guhagurukira kuz@@ irwanya kuko zigira ingaruka mbi ku buzima zik@@ anam@@ unga igihugu kuko zihenze kuz@@ iv@@ ur@@ a." Minisitiri w'@@ Ubuzima, Dr. Agnes Binag@@ waho, avuga ko akenshi abarw@@ ara izi ndwara baz@@ itera kubera ibyo banywa bib@@ angiriza imibiri birimo ibiyobyabwenge. Ati "@@ It@@ abi n'ib@@ iyobyabwenge bitandukanye ni byo [@@ byig@@ anje kuba@@ ] nyirabayazana by'@@ izi ndwara cyane cyane ku rubyiruko, ari yo mpamvu nsaba buri muntu kubireka ku bushake bwe kuko bigenda byangiza ubuzima bwabo buhoro buh@@ or@@ o." Yongeraho ko kuba izi ndwara zit@@ agaragara vuba atari uko ziba zid@@ ahari, ahubwo ngo inzobere z'@@ abaganga ni zo ziz@@ ibona iyo umuntu agiye kwip@@ im@@ isha, bityo hag@@ afatwa ingamba zo gukurikirana umuntu atar@@ azah@@ ara. Ishami ry'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OM@@ S), ritangaza ko indwara zitandura zahitanye abantu bagera kuri miliyoni 14 ku isi mu mwaka wa 2014.
Am@@ i@@ el, izina ry’@@ umuhungu udakunda gufatirwa ibyemezo Am@@ iel ni izina rihabwa abana b’abahungu rikaba rikomoka mu rurimi rw’@@ Igih@@ eburayo aho risobanura ngo ‘Imana iri kumwe n’abantu banjye@@ .’ Kugeza ubu, iri zina riri muri amwe akunzwe cyane ku Isi aho ubu mu 2019 riri ku mwanya wa 4,@@ 3@@ 15. Ibir@@ anga ba Am@@ iel Intego nyamukuru kuri ba Am@@ iel ni uko bakomeza gushikama ku rush@@ ako rwabo, kut@@ ajegaj@@ ega mu bijyanye n’ubukungu bwabo no kuguma kuba abo bari bo mu bihe ibyo aribyo byose. Am@@ iel ni umusore ukunda gukora ariko iyo wib@@ eshye ukam@@ ushyiraho amategeko ku byo akora ntim@@ wab@@ yumva kimwe ndetse rimwe na rimwe akuka in@@ ab@@ i. Ba Am@@ iel ntibakunda ko hari umuntu wese w@@ abaf@@ atira ibyemezo ahubwo baba bashaka ko ibintu byose babikora uko bashaka. Ni abantu bakunda kwig@@ eng@@ esera cyane mu myitwarire no kugenzura imiterere yabo. Bakunda kumva abantu ba@@ bari hafi ariko nanone batab@@ angamiye uburyo bo babona ibintu. Iyo ba Am@@ iel batangiye urukundo bashyiramo imbaraga zabo zose, bakamenya uko urukundo rwabo n’abo bih@@ eb@@ eye. Ba Am@@ iel barangwa n’urukundo rwinshi ku buryo bakora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo bar@@ inde abakunzi babo. Apôtre Rwand@@ amura na Pasiteri Ntambara batumiwe mu giterane cy’@@ ububyutse i Gikondo Itorero rya UC@@ C (@@ United Christian Church@@ ), Ishami rya Gikondo riyobowe na Bishop Margaret Rwand@@ amura ryah@@ urije abavugabutumwa b’abany@@ abitangaza barimo Apôtre Charles Rwand@@ amura na Pasiteri Emma Ntambara mu giterane cy’@@ ububyutse kizamara iminsi umunani. Iki giterane kigiye kuba ku nshuro ya munani cyiswe “@@ Rev@@ ival con@@ fer@@ enc@@ e@@ ’’ bishatse kuvuga “@@ Igit@@ erane cy’@@ Ub@@ uby@@ uts@@ e’@@ ’, giteganyijwe kubera i Gikondo hagati ya tariki ya 5@@ -1@@ 2 Kanama 2018. Intego yacyo ni uk@@ uyobora abantu inzira y’@@ agakiza binyuze mu kubat@@ urwa ing@@ oyi y’@@ ibyaha no guhindurirwa amateka. Rev@@ ival con@@ fer@@ ence iz@@ ahuriramo abavugabutumwa bakomeye barimo Apôtre Charles Rwand@@ amura uyobora amatorero ya UC@@ C mu Rwanda, umugore we Bishop Margaret Rwand@@ amur@@ a, umun@@ yabitang@@ aza Pasiteri Emma Nt@@ ambar@@ a, Apôtre K@@ aramira Jane na Pasiteri Mug@@ ema Thom@@ as. UC@@ C Gikondo yan@@ atum@@ iye abaririmbyi basig@@ iwe gusakaza ubutumwa bwiza barimo Kingdom of God Ministri@@ es, Korali Imig@@ ezi y’@@ Ubug@@ ingo n’@@ Ijwi ry’@@ Ubuhanuzi ya UC@@ C Kabuga, Itsinda rya Pl@@ an@@ et Shak@@ ers, UC@@ C Gikondo Worship Team na Bless@@ ed Generation ya UC@@ C Nib@@ oye. Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Umushumba w’Itorero rya UC@@ C Gikondo, Bishop Margaret Rwand@@ amur@@ a, yatangaje ko iki giterane bag@@ ihaye intego yihariye yo gusengera abac@@ og@@ oye ku rugendo. Yagize ati ‘‘@@ Uyu mwaka wa 2018 twah@@ aye igiterane intego dusanga mu gitabo cya Yesaya 40@@ :@@ 29@@ -@@ 31 hagira hati ‘@@ Ni yo iha intege abar@@ ambiwe kandi ut@@ ibashije imw@@ ongeramo imbaraga, abasore b’@@ imig@@ enda baz@@ ac@@ ogora baruh@@ e, n’abasore baz@@ agwa rwose ariko abat@@ egereza Uwiteka baz@@ asub@@ izwamo intege nshya, baz@@ atum@@ bagira mu kirere bag@@ uruk@@ ishe am@@ ababa nk’ibis@@ iga, baz@@ iruka be kun@@ anirwa, bazagenda be guc@@ og@@ or@@ a.” Yakomeje ati “Muri iki giterane tuz@@ asenga Imana tuy@@ isaba guha abantu imbaraga ndetse tun@@ ayisaba ngo ibag@@ ar@@ urire ibyo Satani yab@@ any@@ aze n’ib@@ yar@@ iwe n’inz@@ ige byose ibig@@ ar@@ ure. Tur@@ izera tudashidikanya ko Imana itaz@@ abura kwiyereka abaz@@ ay@@ egera muri aya masengesho y’@@ ub@@ uby@@ uts@@ e.’’ Bishop Margaret Rwand@@ amura yavuze ko ibiterane birindwi biheruka byatanze umusaruro ufat@@ ika. Yagize ati ‘‘@@ Umusaruro ur@@ ahari, urag@@ aragara ku mpande zombi. Twabonye abantu bak@@ izwa bakava mu byaha, abandi Imana ibah@@ indurira amateka nko kubona akazi, ubucuruzi bur@@ ag@@ uka, abat@@ abyara babona urubyaro, abarwayi bag@@ akira indwara ndetse n’itorero rik@@ ag@@ uka bitewe n’ub@@ uby@@ utse.” Apôtre Charles Rwand@@ amura ari mu bategerejwe muri iki giterane Rev@@ ival con@@ fer@@ ence izatangira tariki ya 5 Kanama, is@@ ozwe ku wa 12 Kanama 2018, izabera i Gikondo kuri United Christian Church (@@ UC@@ C) mu Ishuri ryisumbuye rya AP@@ AP@@ E. Iki giterane kizajya gitangira saa kumi z’umugoroba gis@@ ozwe saa moya n’igice z’ijoro (16@@ h00 P@@ m -19@@ :@@ 30 P@@ m@@ .)
Ibigo by’@@ ubwishingizi mu ikor@@ osi ry’@@ abat@@ umiza ibicuruzwa mu mahanga bat@@ abig@@ ana Urwego rw’@@ ubwishingizi mu Rwanda rutangiye kuz@@ anz@@ amuka nyuma y’ibih@@ ombo n’ibibazo by’@@ imikorere byar@@ uvug@@ w@@ agamo, gusa haracyari imbogamizi zishingiye ku myumvire y’@@ abafata ubwishingizi ndetse n’icy@@ uho mu mategeko gituma kub@@ ufata ahanini ari ubush@@ ake. Imibare ya Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu (BNR@@ ), igaragaza ko imisanzu y’ubw@@ ishingizi y@@ iyongereyeho miliyari 9.@@ 1 Frw, aho yavuye kuri miliyari 6@@ 4.@@ 3 Frw mu gihembwe cya mbere 2018 akagera kuri miliyari 7@@ 3.@@ 4 Frw mu gihembwe cya mbere 2019, bivuga ko yar@@ anzeho miliyari 4.@@ 6 Frw yari y@@ iyongereyeho mu mwaka w@@ abanj@@ e. U@@ kwiyongera cyane kw@@ abonetse mu bigo by’@@ ubwishingizi bya leta ari byo RSSB na M@@ M@@ I, aho hiyongereyeho miliyari 6 Frw bitewe n’ab@@ ishing@@ anisha bashya bangana na 4@@ 32 45@@ 0. Mu bigo by’@@ ubwishingizi byigenga naho imisanzu ikomeje kwiyongera kuko hagati y’@@ igihembwe cya mbere cya 2018 n’icya 2019, hiyongereyeho miliyari 3.@@ 3 Frw, ahanini bitewe no kongera igiciro cy’@@ ubwishingizi bw’@@ ibinyabiziga. Perezida w’Ishyirahamwe ry’@@ Ibigo by’@@ Ubw@@ ishingizi mu Rwanda, Ga@@ ud@@ ens Kanamug@@ ire, avuga ko nubwo hari intambwe irimo guterwa hakiri imbogamizi z’uko abat@@ umiza ibintu mu mahanga bat@@ agana ibigo byo mu gihugu. Abat@@ umiza ibintu mu mahanga baka ubwishingizi kuko biba bishoboka ko byakw@@ angirika, byakw@@ ibwa cyangwa kuj@@ ugunywa ku bushake. Kanamugire avuga ko kuri ubu usanga abat@@ umiza ibintu mu mahanga basaba aho baz@@ arang@@ ura inyandiko yerekana ibiciro (F@@ ac@@ ture Prof@@ or@@ m@@ a), bakay@@ ihabwa hariho ‘@@ igiciro kirimo agaciro k’@@ ibicur@@ uzwa, ubwishingizi ndetse n’ubw@@ ikorezi biri ham@@ we@@ ’. Yagize ati “@@ Ag@@ uze serivisi y’ubw@@ ishingizi hanze atari uko iriya serivisi yabuze mu Rwanda ariko kubera kut@@ abis@@ obanukirwa neza ugasanga aguze ubwishingizi hanze kandi t@@ ubut@@ anga.” Kanamugire avuga ko impamvu zituma abantu bagura ubwishingizi mu mahanga ni ‘@@ ukut@@ abis@@ obanukirwa neza ndetse n’icy@@ uho mu mategeko cyo kud@@ ategeka abat@@ umiza ibicuruzwa mu mahanga gufata ubwishingizi mu Rwanda@@ ’. Ati “H@@ akwiye kujyaho amategeko asaba abantu kugura mu Rwanda serivisi zih@@ aboneka hanyuma bak@@ agura ahandi iz@@ id@@ ahari. Niba ng@@ uze serivisi hanze kandi yari ihari mu Rwanda, ban@@ sha umusoro ku buryo usanga umuntu atanze umusoro mwinshi ig@@ icuruzwa kig@@ ah@@ enda kuruta uko yaba yak@@ ig@@ uriya ahang@@ ah@@ a”. Kug@@ ura ubwishingizi hanze y’igihugu bifite ingaruka ku bukungu bwacyo kuko ari ikibazo ku micungire y’@@ amadev@@ ize ndetse big@@ ash@@ eg@@ esha kugabanya icyuho mu byoherezwa n’ibit@@ umizwa mu mahanga. Kuki abat@@ umiza ibintu mu mahanga bad@@ afata ubwishingizi mu gihugu Bamwe mu batum@@ iza ibintu mu mahanga bavuga ko uretse kut@@ abis@@ obanuk@@ irwa, ikiguzi cy’@@ ubwishingizi kiri hejuru mu Rwanda nacyo kiri mu bituma bajya kub@@ ufata ahandi. Umwe mu bacuruzi waganiriye na IGIHE yagize ati “@@ Ubw@@ ishingizi iwacu bur@@ ah@@ enda kandi ikindi gituma tub@@ ufatira rimwe n’ibiciro dusabwa ni uko by@@ oroha mu gukurikirana ibyo wat@@ um@@ ije.” Akomeza avuga ko gufatira ubwishingizi rimwe n’@@ ikiguzi cy’@@ ibyo utum@@ ije n’ubw@@ ikorezi bwabyo by@@ oroha mu kubikurikirana ku buryo niyo bib@@ uze uca mu nzira nke ub@@ ibar@@ iriza kuruta kuba wahawe serivisi n’abantu batandukanye. Min@@ ic@@ om ntiy@@ iteguye gushyiraho itegeko Bimwe mu bihugu byo mu Muryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EAC) bifite amategeko ak@@ umira abat@@ umiza ibintu mu mahanga gufata ubwishingizi hanze yabyo. N’@@ uwab@@ ufashe hanze iyo ibicuruzwa bigeze ku cyambu cyangwa ku mupaka bisabwa gufata ubundi bwishingizi birengagije ko byari yafashe n’ub@@ undi. Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe Ubucuruzi n’@@ Ish@@ oramari muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Ing@@ anda, Op@@ ir@@ ah Robert@@ , avuga ko nta hantu na hamwe u Rwanda rufite itegeko rih@@ atira abantu runaka gufata ubwishingizi aha n’@@ aha kuko ni urwego rw@@ igenga rukorera ku kurushanwa gutanga serivisi inoze kandi ih@@ end@@ utse. Ati “Ni ukuvuga ngo gutera imbere k’@@ urwego ntabwo big@@ ombera ko uh@@ atira abantu gukora ikintu runaka ahubwo ni uko bagomba kureba uburyo bakora ku buryo ubwabo bak@@ urura abakiriya haba harimo ibibazo wenda bahura nabyo muri ubu buryo bikaba ari byo baganira n’inzego ngo bikem@@ uke ariko atari uguh@@ atira abakiriya kujya gukora ibintu runak@@ a”. Akomeza agira ati “@@ Twebwe d@@ ushyigikira ubwisanzure mu bucuruzi ntabwo wah@@ atira umuntu gukora ik@@ int@@ u”. Uruhare rw’@@ ibigo by’@@ ubwishingizi mu musaruro mbumbe (G@@ D@@ P), rw@@ ang@@ anaga na 1.@@ 7% muri Kamena 2019 kimwe no muri uko kwezi kwa 2018. Mu mwaka w’imari warangiye muri Kamena 2019, umutungo mbumbe w’urwego rw’@@ ubwishingizi w@@ iyongereyeho miliyari 5@@ 4.@@ 3 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda ugera kuri miliyari 47@@ 7.@@ 3 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, ni ukuvuga 1.@@ 8% bya G@@ D@@ P hagati y’@@ igihembwe cya mbere cya 2018 n’icya 2019. Urwego rw’@@ ubwishingizi ni urwa gatatu mu zigize urwego rw’@@ imari nyuma y’ibigo by’imari n’am@@ abanki ndetse n’ubw@@ iteg@@ anyir@@ ize. Muri Kamena 2019 u Rwanda rwari rufite ibigo by’@@ ubwishingizi 14, harimo 12 byigenga n’ibindi bibiri bya leta by@@ ishingira ibijyanye n’ubuzima ari byo RSSB na M@@ M@@ I. 1 Gicurasi 199@@ 8: Kambanda yabaye uwa mbere wemeye icyaha cya jenoside Kuwa 1 Gicurasi 1998, ni itariki itaz@@ ibagirana mu mateka y’@@ inkiko mpuzamahanga mp@@ anabyah@@ a, aho Kambanda Jean wari Minisitiri w’Intebe muri Guverinoma y’agateganyo muri Leta yiy@@ ise iy’@@ Abat@@ abazi mu 1994, yemeye icyaha cya jenoside mu Rukiko Mpuzamahanga Mpanabyaha rwashyiriweho u Rwanda(@@ IC@@ TR@@ ). Kwemera kwe bikaba bwari ubwa mbere uregwa yemera ko yagize uruhare mu cyaha cya jenoside, mu cy’@@ ubwumvikane bugamije gukora jenoside no mu byaha byibasiye inyokom@@ untu. Ageze mu rukiko yas@@ om@@ ewe ibyaha bitandatu yashinj@@ waga, hagendewe ku kuba nka Minisitiri w’Intebe kuva kuwa 8 Mata 1994 kugeza kuwa 17 Nyakanga 1994, yar@@ ayoboye inama z’@@ Abaminisitiri hak@@ avugwa ku bwicanyi bwakor@@ erwaga Abatutsi ariko ntagire icyo abikor@@ aho mu kubih@@ agarika. Kuri ibyo hakiyongeraho no guhamagarira rubanda ubwicanyi buk@@ uraho ubwoko bw’@@ Abatutsi. Yan@@ agize uruhare mu ikur@@ waho rya Perefe wa Butare, Jean-@@ Baptiste Habyal@@ imana, wari we wenyine w@@ akomokaga mu Batutsi mu bay@@ oboraga P@@ erefeg@@ it@@ ura. Ibi byaje koroshya itangira ry’@@ iyicwa ry’@@ Abatutsi muri Butare. By@@ ong@@ eye, hagati ya 8 Mata na 17 Nyakanga 1994 muri Butare na Git@@ arama, Jean Kambanda w@@ akomokaga mu ishyaka rya MDR yakwirakw@@ ije imbunda mu baturage, zaje gukoreshwa mu kwica Abatutsi. Yashim@@ angiraga ko imbunda itagomba kuba iy’@@ umus@@ irikare, buri wese agomba kumenya kuy@@ ikoresha. Muri Mata 1994 yan@@ agiye ategeka ko hashyirwaho za bariy@@ eri, ari nazo z@@ ifashishijwe mu kugenzura indangam@@ untu, uwo basanze h@@ andits@@ emo ko ari Umututsi nt@@ ahar@@ enge. Hamwe n’ibindi byinshi byar@@ ond@@ owe n’@@ Umush@@ injacyaha, uyu mugabo wavukiye i Gish@@ amv@@ u, ntiy@@ aruh@@ ije Urukiko rwa Arusha, abajijwe niba yemera cyangwa ahakana ibyo ashinj@@ wa, yemeye ibyaha byose yaregwaga birimo icya Jenoside, ubugambanyi mu cyaha cya Jenoside, gushishikariza abaturage gukora Jenoside, kugira uruhare muri Jenoside n’ibyaha byibasiye inyokom@@ untu. Urukiko rwa Arusha rwaje guk@@ atira Kambanda Jean gufungwa burundu. Ubu afungiye muri gereza ya K@@ oul@@ ikoro muri Mali, aho yoherejwe kur@@ angiriza igih@@ ano. Jean Kambanda wakatiwe gufungwa burundu
Uko wakoresha konti ebyiri za Whatsapp muri telefoni imwe Yanditswe na Dusabimana Aimable Kuya 10 Gashyantare 2017 saa 09@@ :05 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 8 0 Whatsapp ni porogaramu ikunzwe kandi ikoreshwa na benshi ku Isi mu kohererezanya ubutumwa bugufi, amafoto n'ibindi. Muri iki gihe isigaye in@@ akoreshwa mu guh@@ amagar@@ ana hakoreshejwe internet haba mu buryo bw'@@ amajwi ndetse n'@@ amashusho. Hari uburyo butandukanye bwo gukoresha nimero zirenze imwe muri telefoni hifashishijwe porogaramu zishobora guhindura ibiranga telefoni bik@@ agaragaza ko irimo ebyiri. Ibi bishobora gutuma umuntu ukoresha iyo telefoni agira ubushobozi bwo gukoresha porogaramu zitandukanye inshuro ebyiri icyarimwe kuko igenzura rikoreshwa n'@@ abakoze izi porogaramu riba ryamaze kwerekana ko hari gukoreshwa telefoni ebyiri. Porogaramu yitwa '@@ Par@@ all@@ el Sp@@ ac@@ e' ijya mu mat@@ elef@@ oni akoresha Android ni imwe mu zikoreshwa na benshi ku Isi babasha gukoresha nimero ebyiri kuri Whatsapp muri telefoni imwe. Iyi porogaramu itandukanye n'izindi zishobora gutuma umuntu akoresha nimero ebyiri kuri Whatsapp kuko yo mu gushyiramo indi nimero bid@@ asaba ko habanza guk@@ urwamo Whatsapp isanzwe. Par@@ all@@ el Sp@@ ace iri muri nke zemewe mu bubiko bwa Google Play bwa porogaramu zitandukanye zijya muri telefoni zikoresha And@@ roid@@ . Ak@@ ari ku mutima wa Lomami F. watwaye igikombe Rayon Sports yam@@ wirukanye Lomami Frank araby@@ inira ku ruk@@ oma nyuma y’aho Mukura VS im@@ uhaye icyizere n’ umwanya wo gukina kugeza ubwo na we ay@@ ifashije kwegukana igikombe cy’Amahoro itah@@ eruk@@ aga. Kuri we ngo uyu mwaka wari uw@@ abo n’igikombe bari bagik@@ wiriye. Lomami Frank wahoze ari rutahizamu wa Rayon Sports ni umwe mu bakinnyi baraye baba@@ baje iyi kipe yambara ubururu n’@@ umweru afasha ikipe ya Mukura VS kwegukana igikombe cy’Amahoro cya 2018 nyuma y’imyaka 26 iyi kipe yari imaze it@@ acy@@ eguk@@ ana. Ar@@ ashimira Niy@@ ob@@ uh@@ ungiro Fidele wamug@@ iriye icyizere Lomami Frank yabaye kapiteni wa SEC yo mu cyiciro cya kabiri, akinira ikipe ya Rayon Sports na Musanze mbere yo kugaruka muri Rayon Sports bwa kabiri ariko akaba umwe mu batar@@ ash@@ imwe n’umutoza Olivier Karekezi ubwo yatozaga iyi kipe umwaka ushize. Mu kwezi kwa Nzeli 2017 nibwo Lomami Frank yabwiwe n’umutoza Karekezi ko ataz@@ abona umwanya wo gukina muri Rayon Sports bityo ko akwiriye kwemera ko bamut@@ iza. Undi ntiy@@ aby@@ ishimiye , yanga gut@@ izwa ari nabwo yahise ahabwa urupapuro rumw@@ emerera kuba yakw@@ ishakira ikipe (@@ rel@@ e@@ ase let@@ ter@@ ). Lomami Frank yahise yerekeza muri Musanze FC ariko naho ntiy@@ ahat@@ inda kuko yakiniye iyi kipe imikino 4 gusa. Nubwo atah@@ abwaga umwanya ariko yaje guhabwa icyizere n’umutoza wungirije wa Mukura VS , Rwaka Jean Claude ndetse na Niy@@ ob@@ uh@@ ungiro Fidele ngo ashimira cyane. Ati " Rayon Sports sin@@ ayig@@ iriyemo ibihe byiza. Ntiba@@ mpaga umwanya wo gukina, ngeze no muri Musanze FC biba uko. Nyuma nibwo umutoza wungirije wa Mukura VS na Niy@@ ob@@ uh@@ ungiro Fidele bang@@ iriye icyizere bans@@ inyisha gukinira Mukura VS icyiciro cy’@@ imikino yo kwishyur@@ a." Yunzemo ati " Burya umupira w’amaguru ni impano ariko ahanini ni icyizere uba wag@@ ir@@ iwe. Kuba Niy@@ ob@@ uh@@ ungiro yarang@@ iriye icyizere cy’uko nak@@ inira Mukura VS nd@@ abim@@ ushimira cyane n’ubuyobozi bwa Mukura VS bwos@@ e." Mukura yasinyishije Lomami Frank na bagenzi be intego ari ukw@@ egukana igikombe cy’Amahoro cya 2018 Muri Mutarama 2018 nibwo Lomami Frank yasezerewe na Musanze FC hamwe na bagenzi be 3 bakin@@ anaga babash@@ inja umusaruro muke. Muri Werurwe 2018 nibwo Lomami Frank yerekeje muri Mukura VS , asiny@@ ishwa amezi 6 angana n’icyiciro cy’@@ imikino yo kwishyura muri Shampiyona y’u Rwanda. Icyo gihe yasinyiye rimwe na Havug@@ ar@@ urema Jean Paul bakunda kwita R@@ aro, akaba na mukuru wa Z@@ ag@@ abe Jean Claude na we ukinira Mukura V@@ S. Abandi bas@@ inyiye rimwe ni Gash@@ ugi Abdul@@ Karim na Muj@@ yanama Jean Fidel@@ e. Nyuma yo kubas@@ inyisha , Niy@@ ob@@ uh@@ ungiro Fidele wari ukuri umunyamabanga wa Mukura VS icyo gihe , yagize ati " Ni abakinnyi beza bazagira icyo bafasha Mukura muri iyi mikino yo kwishyura kuko twari dufite ikibazo cy’@@ abakinnyi benshi bafite imvune bikag@@ ora ikipe yacu. Turashaka kureba uko tw@@ aza mu makipe 4 ya mbere n’ubwo atari ibintu biz@@ atw@@ oroh@@ era, tug@@ atwara n’igikombe cy’@@ amahoro. Dufite ikipe nziza n’umutoza mwiza, dufatanyije n’abakunzi ba Mukura VS, nta kabuza iyi ntego tw@@ abasha kuy@@ iger@@ aho." Yaje ari hasi ariko yazamuye urwego cyane – Har@@ ingingo Francis Umutoza wa Mukura VS avuga ko Lomami Frank yageze mu ikipe ya Mukura VS ari ku rwego rwo hasi cyane ariko agakora cyane akar@@ uzamura ndetse ngo ni umwe mubo bagend@@ eyeho b@@ egukana igikombe cy’@@ Amahoro. Aganira na Rwandamag@@ azin@@ e.com , Har@@ ingingo yagize ati " Y@@ itwaye neza cyane. Yaje ari hasi cyane, inyuma cyane ariko yazamuye urwego rwe. Ari mu bakinnyi bad@@ ufashije rwose ndetse turateganya kumug@@ uman@@ a." Icyo Lomami asanga barar@@ ushije Rayon Sports bakay@@ itwara igikombe cy’Amahoro Mu ijoro ryo kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 12 Kanama 2018 nibwo Mukura Victory Sports yegukanye bwa mbere igikombe cy’Amahoro itsinze Rayon Sports kuri penaliti 3-1 ku mukino wa nyuma. Mu minota 1@@ 20, amakipe yombi yakinnye umukino ur@@ yoheye ijish@@ o, ufung@@ uye, wo guhererekanya hasi ariko impande zombi zig@@ ah@@ usha uburyo bw’@@ ibitego by@@ abazwe harimo ibyo Lomami yagiye ah@@ usha ku ruhande rwa Mukura V@@ S. K@@ ubwe ngo asanga icyo bar@@ ushije Rayon Sports ari ug@@ ukina umupira nta gih@@ unga bafite. Ati " Rayon Sports ni ikipe nziza. Natwe turi ikipe nziza kandi dufite abakinnyi beza kuri buri mwanya. Icyo tw@@ abar@@ ushije ni uko twe tw@@ akinaga nta gihugu cyo kumva ko nid@@ utsindwa hari igikuba kir@@ aba cyac@@ itse. Bo baje mu kibuga bafite igih@@ unga cyo kud@@ atsind@@ wa. Umutoza wacu na we yari yaduhaye amayeri yose twakw@@ ifashisha mu mukino. Iyo rero ukina ntacyo wumva kik@@ ur@@ emereye ukina neza ut@@ uj@@ e." ’@@ Naje ku mukino wa nyuma nshaka kugaragaza ko hari icyo nsh@@ obo@@ ye@@ ’ Kimwe mu byafashije Lomami mu kwitwara neza mu minsi yashize no ku mukino wanyuma ngo harimo kugaragaza ko hari icyo ashoboye. Ati " Muri Rayon Sports sin@@ ahag@@ iriye ibihe byiza. Kuy@@ ivamo nabwo si ikintu cyari cy@@ oroshye, n@@ aciye mu bihe bigoye byinshi ariko nyuma nar@@ akoze cyane ngo ng@@ aragaze ko koko hari icyo nsh@@ oboye. Muri Mukura VS n@@ ahag@@ iriye ibihe byiza kugeza naho nt@@ waye n’igikombe cy’@@ Amahoro. Numvaga hari ikintu n@@ akora, abafana ba Rayon Sports nabo bakabona ko hari icyo nari nsh@@ obo@@ ye." Ku itariki 24 Gashyantare 2018 nibwo Lomami Frank yasezeranye na Umulisa As@@ fat@@ ty bari bamaze imyaka 4 bakundana ndetse bafitanye n’umw@@ ana. Iyo mug@@ anir@@ iye, Lomami akubwira ko umugore we ari umwe mu bakomeje kumushyigikira no kumutera imbaraga mu bihe bikomeye yari arimo. Ubwo bat@@ waraga igikombe, umugore we nabwo yari yaje kuri Stade Regional kumutera ingabo mu bit@@ ugu. Icyo abwira aba-@@ Ray@@ ons@@ . Ati " Nd@@ abih@@ angan@@ isha, mbabwira gukomeza gukora. Uyu mwaka ntabwo igikombe cyari icy@@ abo , bateg@@ ure iby’@@ umwaka utaha , ndakeka biz@@ abagend@@ ekera neza kurusha uy@@ u." Nyuma yo gutwara igikombe cy’Amahoro 2018 , Mukura VS yan@@ ahawe Miliyoni 10 FRW ndetse iz@@ ahagararira u Rwanda muri CAF Confederation Cup ya 2019. Mukura VS itwaye iki gikombe ibashije guh@@ igika amakipe 3 ya mbere muri Shampiyona y’uyu mw@@ ana: Muri 1/4 yasezereye AS Kigali yabaye iya kabiri muri Shampiyona ishize, muri 1/2 isezer@@ era APR FC yegukanye shampiyona y’uyu mwaka ndetse ku mukino wa nyuma itwara igikombe Rayon Sports yari yabaye iya 3. Kamonyi: Barasaba ko inyungu ku nguzanyo z@@ ishyurwa hakurikijwe inyungu imishinga baz@@ isabiye yung@@ uka Bamwe mu banyamuryango ba Koperative yo kubitsa no kug@@ uza CL@@ E@@ CA@@ M EJ@@ O@@ -@@ H@@ EZA Kamonyi, barasaba ko hakurik@@ izwa inyungu z'@@ imishinga mu kugena inyungu ku ng@@ uzany@@ o, kuko imishinga yose itung@@ uka kimwe. Mu nama y'Inteko rusange ya CL@@ E@@ CA@@ M EJ@@ O@@ -@@ H@@ EZA Kamonyi yateranye ku wa kabiri tariki 12@@ /03/@@ 2@@ 2013, abanyamuryango bishimiye ibyo koperative yabo imaze kubagezaho mu gihe cy'imyaka itanu imaze ish@@ inzwe, kuko yabafashije kwiteza imbere. Bamwe mu banyamuryango ba koperative CL@@ E@@ CA@@ M EJ@@ O@@ -@@ H@@ EZA barasaba kugabanyirizwa inyungu ku nguzanyo baka muri koperative yabo. Aba banyamuryango ariko barasaba ko habaho gutandukanya inyungu zak@@ wa ku nguzanyo ziba zahawe abanyamuryango bitewe n'umushinga ugiye gukorwa. B@@ ifuza ko inguzanyo zitangwa ku mishinga y'ubuhinzi no ku mafaranga y'ishuri zit@@ afatwa kimwe n'@@ inguzanyo z'@@ ubucuruzi. Mukank@@ aka Marcel@@ ine, umunyamuryango ukora umwuga w'@@ ubuhinzi, avuga ko inguzanyo baka ku mishinga y'ubuhinzi batangira kuyishyura mu gihe cy'@@ ukwezi kumwe kandi icyo baba bay@@ isabiye kit@@ aragira aho kig@@ era. Uyu munyamuryango agasaba akomeje ko igihe cyo gutangira kwishyura bacy@@ ongera, bakaba batangira kwishyura ibyo baba bas@@ abiye inguzanyo byamaze kw@@ era. Undi munyamuryango witwa Mukeshimana Christine na we asaba ko inyungu zak@@ wa ku nguzanyo zit@@ abarwa kimwe kuko ngo iyo ugereranyije inyungu ziva mu mishinga yakirwa inguzanyo, hari imishinga it@@ agaragaza inyungu, aho atanga urugero rw'@@ inguzanyo y'amafaranga y'@@ ishuri. Abayobozi ba koperative bateg@@ erejweho igisubizo kin@@ ogeye abanyamuryango ba koperative yabo. Perezida wa CL@@ E@@ CA@@ M EJ@@ O@@ -@@ H@@ EZA Kamonyi, Mutabaruka Eph@@ rem@@ , avuga ko icyo kibazo cyo gutandukanya inyungu ku nguzanyo zitangwa abanyamuryango bakomeje kuk@@ ib@@ ereka nk'@@ imbogam@@ izi, bakaba baz@@ acy@@ igaho mu nteko rusange bakemeza uburyo inguzanyo zimwe na zimwe z@@ oroh@@ erezwa inyungu. Iyi koperative yo kubitsa no kug@@ uriza yatangiye mu mwaka wa 2007, ifite abanyamuryango basaga ibihumbi 13 baturuka mu karere ka Kamonyi no mu tundi turere bihana imb@@ ibi. CL@@ E@@ CA@@ M EJ@@ O@@ -@@ H@@ EZA ifite imar@@ ishingiro igera kuri miliyoni 40, mu myaka itanu imaze ikora ngo ifite ubushobozi bwo gutanga inguzanyo zigera kuri miliyoni 6 ku munyamuryango umwe. Zimwe mu mpanuka zikunze kuba mu gihe cyo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina Imibonano mpuzabitsina ni kimwe mu gikorwa cy@@ itabirwa cyane kuri iyi si, nubwo gikorwa abantu biherereye ku buryo ibib@@ eramo bikunze kumeny@@ wa n’abantu babiri gusa. Icyakora nko mu yindi mirimo yose, mu mibonano mpuzabitsina naho habamo impanuka nubwo ingaruka zazo zid@@ akunze kuba mbi nk’@@ izindi mpanuka. Urubuga rwa internet, On@@ e@@ Bu@@ y ruherutse gukora isuzuma mu baturage b’u Bwongereza rigamije kumenya zimwe mu mpanuka zikunze kubaho mu gihe bari gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina. H@@ abajijwe abantu 2 5@@ 44 bavuga ku mpanuka bibuka zigeze ku@@ babaho bari gutera akabariro. Mu byavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi, bigaragaza ko impanuka y@@ ibas@@ ire benshi mu gihe cyo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ari kwitura hasi kuko 75 % by’@@ ababaj@@ ijwe bavuze ko bigeze guhura n’iyi mpanuka. Mu bandi babaj@@ ijwe, 71 % bavuze ko bagiye bat@@ ungurwa no kwinj@@ ir@@ anwa n’umwe mu bantu bo mu muryango mu gihe bari gutera akabariro. Ikindi cyagaragaye ni ukw@@ ikanga kw’@@ im@@ itsi. Ubushakashatsi bugaragaza kandi ko impanuka zikunze kwibasira abantu mu gihe bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina, harimo kuvunika kw’@@ igit@@ anda, kuny@@ erera mu bw@@ ogero no guk@@ oboka cyangwa kugira udus@@ ebe duto kubera guhura kw’@@ ibitsina ku muvuduko ukabije. Mu mibonano mpuzabitsina habamo impanuka zitandukanye
Amay@@ obera ku mv@@ ano ya Coronavirus ikomeje kwandura benshi muri gereza zo mu Rwanda Inzego z’ubuzima mu Rwanda zir@@ atangaza ko imibare y’@@ abandura coronavirus ikomeje kuzamuka muri iyi minsi ariko ikaba yibasiye amagereza ku buryo budasanzwe. Inzego z’ubuzima mu Rwanda zir@@ atangaza ko imibare y’@@ abandura coronavirus ikomeje kuzamuka muri iyi minsi ariko ikaba yibasiye amagereza ku buryo budasanzwe. Imibare itangazwa buri munsi y’abash@@ ya banduye coronavirus iragaragaza ko amazu y’@@ imfungwa ari yo magereza akomeje kwibasirwa cyane n’ubwandu bwa coronavirus. Ministeri y’ubuzima ivuga ko ku bantu 61 batangajwe ku munsi w’@@ ejo, 55 bose ni abat@@ ahuwe muri gereza nkuru ya Kigali iri ahitwa Magerag@@ ere. Ibi byatumye amagereza 3 amaze kugaragaramo ubwandu abar@@ ura abantu banduye basaga 160 kandi iyi ikaba ari imibare yo mu gihe kitarenze icyumweru kimwe. Uretse abanduye itangazo rya Ministeri y’ubuzima r@@ iran@@ avuga abantu 3 bashya bahitanywe n’iyi ndwara bose bakaba baguye mu karere ka Rwamagana. Iyi Rwamagana imaze gutakaza abantu 7 mu gihe kitarenze icyumweru ni na yo irimo Gereza ya Ns@@ inda iherutse kubon@@ ekamo abany@@ ururu banduye ari benshi. Iyi virusi yinjiye ite muri gereza ? Mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye, abayobozi b’@@ urwego rushinzwe imfungwa bumvikanye bavuga ko bataramenya uburyo iyi virusi yinjiye muri gereza kuko n’abashinzwe kurinda abany@@ ururu bapimwe ngo bat@@ agarag@@ ayemo abafite ub@@ wand@@ u. Umuyobozi w’uru rwego Georges Rwigamba yavuze ko nta gik@@ uba cy@@ acitse nubwo abamaze kwandura ari benshi. Y@@ emeje ko abanduye bose bamaze gushyirwa mu kat@@ o, aho badashobora guhura n’izindi mfungwa zit@@ arag@@ aragaza ub@@ wand@@ u. Ministeri y’ubuzima iherutse kuvuga ko ihangayikishijwe n’ubu bw@@ iyongere bw’@@ ubwandu mu magereza aho byoroshye guhererekanya ub@@ wand@@ u. Kuri ubu amatsinda y’@@ abaganga yoherejwe muri aya magereza 3 yagaragayemo abarwayi ariko ngo amagara y’@@ imfungwa agiye kwitabwaho byihariye muri rusange. Kugeza ubu abantu 5@@ 45@@ 5 ni bo bamaze kwandura Coronavirus cyakora abak@@ abakaba 5000 bamaze kuy@@ ikira na ho abo imaze guhitana bo bamaze kugera kuri 45. Mu Rwanda ibikorwa byinshi bimaze kwemererwa kongera gukora uko byahoze mbere y’umw@@ ad@@ uko w’iyi vir@@ us. Ibi birimo amashuri yongeye gutangira ndetse n’imodoka zitwara abagenzi zongeye kwemererwa gutwara abantu mu gihugu cyose. Abashinzwe ubuzima bavuga ko nta bwandu bushya buri kugaragara mu baturage muri rusange ariko bagasaba abaturage kurushaho kwitwararika kuko virus yakongera kugar@@ ukana ingufu mu gihe yaba ihawe icy@@ uh@@ o.
Byinshi kuri "@@ Pr@@ EP@@ ", umuti ufasha uw@@ uny@@ oye kut@@ andura SIDA kabone n’iyo yabon@@ ana n’@@ uyirwaye Umuti uzwi nka Pr@@ E@@ P (Pr@@ e-@@ Ex@@ pos@@ ure Proph@@ y@@ la@@ x@@ is) uk@@ ozwe mu binini bikoreshwa mbere cyangwa nyuma y’uko umuntu akorana imibonano mpuzabitsina n’undi ufite ubwandu bw’agakoko gatera SIDA (H@@ IV@@ ), cyangwa akaw@@ itera mu rush@@ inge kugira ngo at@@ andura ako gak@@ oko. Hari ubwo kandi ukoreshwa mu gihe umuntu atekereza ko ashobora kugira ibyago byo kwandura H@@ IV mu buryo bumwe cyangwa ub@@ undi, ndetse uri no mu miti igabanya ubukana abasanzwe bafite ako gak@@ oko bafat@@ a. W@@ emejwe n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) mu 2015, ko ukora neza mu kurinda abantu kwandura H@@ IV ndetse no kugabanya ubukana ku bayis@@ angay@@ we. Ni umuti ariko ushobora no kugira ingaruka mbi kuri bamwe mu baw@@ ukoresh@@ a, zirimo kurwara impis@@ wi, kuribwa umutwe, kugira umun@@ aniro, kurwara igifu ndetse n’ib@@ icur@@ ane. Abantu bagirwa inama ko mu gihe baw@@ ufashe uk@@ abagiraho ingaruka mbi, bakw@@ egera muganga bak@@ abim@@ us@@ obanurira akabaha ubufasha. Umuti wa Pr@@ E@@ P urimo amoko abir@@ i: umwe witwa Tr@@ uv@@ ada ushobora gukoreshwa n’abantu bose, n’undi witwa Des@@ co@@ v@@ y ugenewe abagabo gusa. Mu mikorere yaw@@ o, uwo muti ugabanya ibyago byo kwand@@ urira H@@ IV mu mibonano mpuzabitsina ku gipimo cya 99@@ % iyo wafashwe neza nk’uko amabwiriza abivuga. Nubwo nta makuru yim@@ bitse ku bijyanye n’uko uwo muti ukora iyo utewe mu rush@@ ing@@ e, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko ugabanya ibyago byo kwandura nibura ku gipimo cya 7@@ 4% iyo ufashwe uko bikwiye. Ubushakashatsi buh@@ eruka gukorwa na Pl@@ os Med@@ ec@@ ine mu bihugu bitatu bya Afurika birimo Malawi, Mozambique na Zambia, bwagaragaje ko uwo muti ugira uruhare runini mu kugabanya ubwandu bushya bwa H@@ IV@@ . Icyakora hagaragazwa ko mu gihe uwo muti ud@@ afashwe neza nk’uko amabwiriza ab@@ iteganya nta kamaro ugirira uw@@ aw@@ ukoresh@@ eje. H@@ asoban@@ urwa ko uwo muti ush@@ ob@@ obora kurinda byuzuye uw@@ aw@@ ukoresheje nyuma yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, hashize iminsi 21 aw@@ ufata buri munsi cyangwa aw@@ itera mu rush@@ ing@@ e. Ku rundi ruhande ariko abashakashatsi bavuga ko nubwo umuti wa Pr@@ E@@ P urinda umuntu kuba yak@@ wand@@ urira H@@ IV mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, ntibikuraho ko akwiye gukoresha agakingir@@ izo. Impamvu ni uko kaz@@ amur@@ inda kwandura izindi ndwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina zinyuranye. Ni nde ukwiye gukoresha Pr@@ EP@@ ? Umuti wa Pr@@ E@@ P ukwiye gukoreshwa n’umuntu udafite ubwandu bwa H@@ IV wakoze imibonano mpuzabitsina mu mezi atandatu ashize, akay@@ ikorana n’umuntu ufite ako gak@@ oko bad@@ akoresheje agakingir@@ izo, cyangwa nyuma yo kuy@@ ikorana nawe akagaragaza ibimenyetso by’@@ indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina muri ayo m@@ ezi. Ushobora kandi gukoreshwa n’umuntu utar@@ andura H@@ IV was@@ angiye ib@@ ikoresha bikom@@ eretsa n’umuntu uy@@ ifite mu gihe kitarenze amezi atandatu ashize. Ku mugore w@@ akoranye imibonano mpuzabitsina n’umugabo ufite ako gak@@ oko kandi akaba akeka ko yaba atwite, ni ngombwa kwegera muganga mbere yo gukoresha Pr@@ EP@@ , kuko iyo uwo muti uk@@ oreshejwe neza uba uburyo buboneye bwo kurinda umubyeyi n’umwana kwandura H@@ IV mu gihe cyo gut@@ wit@@ a, atwite, ndetse n’igihe cyo k@@ ons@@ a. Ku ng@@ imbi n’ab@@ angavu bakoranye imibonano mpuzabitsina idak@@ ingiye n’umuntu ufite ubwandu bwa H@@ IV cyangwa bagasangira nawe ibikoresho bikom@@ erets@@ a, mu gihe bifuza gukoresha uwo muti ni ngombwa ko baba bafite ibilo biri hejuru ya 35. Uko umuti wa Pr@@ E@@ P ugomba gufatwa Mbere yo gutangira gufata ibinini bya Pr@@ E@@ P hatangwa inama ko ugiye kubikoresha yaba yabig@@ anije muganga akab@@ im@@ wem@@ erera, ndetse akaba yafashwe ibipimo bik@@ agaragaza ko nta H@@ IV arwaye. Mu gihe uwo muti ufatwa kandi, uw@@ ukoreshe asabwa kujya ahura na muganga buri mezi atatu, hakarebwa uko umuti uri gukora, agafatwa ibipimo harebwa niba at@@ andura H@@ IV@@ , ndetse agakomeza kuganir@@ izwa ari nako ahabwa am@@ abwiriza. Uw@@ ufata asabwa kuvugana na muganga akamus@@ obanurira ibijyanye no kwisuzuma (s@@ el@@ f@@ -@@ t@@ est@@ ing) n’izindi serivisi z’ubuvuzi zitangirwa kuri telefoni bikajyana no guhura imbon@@ an@@ kubon@@ e. Mu gihe kubonana na muganga imbonankubone bid@@ ashobots@@ e, ntacyo bitwaye gukoresha serivisi z’ubuvuzi zitangirwa kuri telefoni, cyangwa mu bundi buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga burimo kwand@@ ikir@@ ana, ufata umuti akaba yan@@ akw@@ isuz@@ uma. Iyo ukoresha umuti wa Pr@@ E@@ P akeneye kubih@@ agarika ku mpamvu zinyuranye zirimo kuba waba uri kumug@@ iraho ingaruka, kuba adashoboye kubahiriza amabwiriza agenga ikoreshwa ry@@ awo, cyangwa abona ibyago byo kwandura H@@ IV bigenda big@@ abanyuka bitewe n’impinduka ziri kuba ku buzima bwe, agirwa inama yo kwegera muganga akamuh@@ itiramo ubundi buryo bunoze yakoresha but@@ amub@@ angam@@ iye. U@@ wah@@ ahagaritse gufata uwo muti nyuma akifuza kongera kuw@@ ukoresh@@ a, agomba kubig@@ aniza muganga ndetse akabanza gufatwa ibipimo hak@@ ar@@ abwa niba nta H@@ IV iri mu maraso ye. Umuti wa Pr@@ E@@ P ni mwiza ku muntu ufite ibyago byinshi byo kwandura H@@ IV@@ , ariko si byiza kuw@@ ukoresha mu masaha 72 yanduye ako gak@@ oko, ahubwo akwiye kuganira na muganga hakarebwa uko afash@@ wa. Abahanga mu by’ubuzima bavuga ko uwo muti ushobora no gukoreshwa bisanzwe nk’ igihe umuntu agiye gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina idak@@ ing@@ iye, bitandukanye no kuba afite ibyago byinshi byo kwand@@ ura. Icyo gihe ngo ashobora gufata ibinini bibiri mu masaha 24 mbere yo gukora imibon@@ ano, hashira amasaha 24 nyuma yo kub@@ inywa agafata ikindi kimwe, hashira andi 24 nabwo ak@@ anywa ikindi kimwe. Ibyo ariko nta bushakashatsi bwimbitse bur@@ akorwa ngo hag@@ arag@@ azwe neza igipimo cy’@@ ubwirinzi bit@@ anga. Umuti wa Pr@@ E@@ P ucur@@ uzwa muri za farumasi zitandukanye mu gihugu, ndetse no mu mavuriro n’ibigo nderabuzima kimwe n’ibitaro biw@@ uha abaw@@ uk@@ eneye. Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda habarurwa abari hagati ya 5000 na 5@@ 500 bakoresha uwo mut@@ i. Ib@@ inini bya Pr@@ E@@ P bigabanya ibyago byo kwandura H@@ IV ku gipimo cya 99@@ % iyo bikoresh@@ ejwe hubahirizwa amabwiriza

FIFA yategetse ko Haba@@ mahoro wa Kiyovu Sports yishyurwa asaga miliyoni 15 Frw Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi (@@ FIF@@ A) r@@ yategetse AFC Leopards yo mu Cy@@ iciro cya Mbere muri Kenya kwishyura Haba@@ mahoro Vincent agera kuri miliyoni 1.@@ 7 y’@@ amashilingi ya Kenya (@@ agera kuri miliyoni 15.@@ 3 Frw) kuko it@@ ubahirije ibyo impande zombi zari z@@ umvik@@ anye. Haba@@ mahoro Vincent yatandukanye na AFC Leopards mu Ukuboza 2019 nyuma yo kumara amezi ane ad@@ ahembw@@ a, asubira muri Kiyovu Sports akinira kugeza ubu. Nyuma y’uko uyu mukinnyi ar@@ eze ikipe yahoze akin@@ ira, umwanzuro wafashwe n’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi (@@ FIF@@ A) uvuga ko igomba kumwishyura miliyoni 1.@@ 7 y’@@ amashilingi ya Kenya (@@ agera kuri miliyoni 15.@@ 3 Frw) arimo imishahara yamug@@ om@@ bag@@ a, uduh@@ imbazamusyi n’imp@@ oz@@ amar@@ ira. FIFA yavuze ko kandi mu gihe iyi kipe yaba in@@ aniwe kwishyura bitarenze iminsi 45, izab@@ uzwa kugura abakinnyi mu bihe bitatu [@@ trans@@ fer window@@ ] bik@@ urikiranye uhereye muri Kamena.
