Buges@@ er@@ a:@@ H@@ ateguwe amahugurwa ku ikoranabuhanga agenewe abana b'abakobwa Yanditswe kuya 16@@ -01-@@ 2016 saa 19@@ :4@@ 4@@ ' na Jean Baptiste Nshimiyimana Mu gihe abana b'abakobwa 120 bari guhugurwa uko baby@@ aza umusaruro ubumenyi n'ikoranabuhanga biga mu mashuri mu rwego rwo kubafasha gutera imbere mu gihe kiz@@ aza, umuyobozi w'akarere ka Bugesera avuga ko gukora cyane no guharanira kuba indashyikirwa mu byo bakora ari byo bizabafasha kubaka ejo heza. Hashize igihe Leta y'u Rwanda itangije gahunda zitandukanye ziteza imbere abana b'@@ abakobwa, cyane mu rwego rw'@@ uburezi, hagamijwe guca imyumvire yatumaga batabona amahirwe yo kwiga, abandi ntib@@ em@@ ererwe kwiga imyuga na siyansi bavuga ko ari amasomo y'@@ abah@@ ungu. Mu mahugurwa agenewe bamwe mu bakobwa biga amasomo ajyanye n'@@ ubumenyi, ikoranabuhanga n'im@@ ibare, ST@@ EM@@ , yatangijwe kuri uyu wa 15 Mutarama 2016, abagize ihuriro ry'@@ abagore bateza imbere ikoranabuhanga, (T@@ HE@@ CH@@ W@@ OM@@ EN@@ ) bavuga ko bagamije gufasha abakobwa bari muri izo ngeri kumenya kubyaza umusaruro ibyo biga bab@@ ishyira mu ng@@ iro. Marie Claire Murek@@ at@@ ete, ushinzwe ishami rikora por@@ og@@ arag@@ amu za mudasobwa mu Kigo cy'Igihugu cy'@@ Iterambere, RDB avuga ko ubu batumiye abana bo mu turere dutandukanye tw'@@ igihugu ngo na bo bamenye amahirwe agaragara mu ikoranabuhanga n'uko ba@@ yaby@@ aza umusaruro. Yagize ati" Turi guhugura abakobwa bo mu bice bitandukanye by'igihugu ngo babafashe kurushaho gut@@ iny@@ uka, bat@@ ekereze uko bashyira mu bikorwa ubumenyi biga mu mashuri bin@@ arushaho kubateza imbere." Ibisobanuro byimbitse Umutoniwase bisobanura umwana ukundwa cyane na se. Ni izina rifite igisobanuro nk’@@ izina Uwase r@@ ishaka kugaragaza urukundo umubyeyi afitiye umwana we. Aba ab@@ its@@ wa amabanga ndetse akaba yafata ibyemezo mu gihe ababyeyi be badahari kandi bakumva ko nabo ariko bari kubigenza iyo baza kuba bahari. Blatt@@ er yamenyeshejwe n’ubushinjacyaha bukuru bw’u Busuwisi ko aregwa kubera inguzanyo bivugwa ko FIFA yay@@ obor@@ aga, yahaye Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rya Tr@@ in@@ id@@ ad &@@ To@@ bag@@ o mu 2010. Ni ikirego giheruka gukorwa mu iperereza rihuriweho n’u Busuwisi na Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, rihuza FIFA n’amafaranga adasanzwe yishyuwe Jack War@@ n@@ er, wahoze ari visi perezida we ukomoka muri Tr@@ in@@ id@@ ad, kuri ubu urwanya koherezwa muri Amerika. Umukinnyi wa Tottenham yavuye mu kibuga ajya gukubita umufana washakaga guhohotera umuvandimwe we Mu ijoro ryakeye nibwo Eric Di@@ er w’imyaka 26 yakoze amahano ava mu kibuga yir@@ ukira mu bafana agiye guhangana n’@@ umufana washakaga gukubita umuvandimwe we Patric@@ k. Uyu mufana yashakaga gutura umujinya umuvandimwe wa Di@@ er cyane ko bari bamaze gusezererwa kuri penaliti 3-2 na Nor@@ wich muri FA C@@ p nyuma yo kunganya igitego 1-1. Amakuru aravuga ko uyu mufana yat@@ ukaga Di@@ er amushinja ko yabat@@ sind@@ ishije hanyuma umuvandimwe w’uyu mukinnyi aramw@@ egera amut@@ urisha undi ashaka kumut@@ ura umuj@@ inya. Uyu mukinnyi akimara kubona ko umuvandimwe we yugarijwe ndetse ari guterana amagambo bikaze n’uyu muf@@ ana,@@ yahise ava mu kibuga igitaraganya yinjira mu gice cy’@@ ibur@@ engerazuba bwa stade ajya guhangana n’uyu muf@@ ana. Di@@ er yasimb@@ utse intebe 20 azamuka kugira ngo agere aho uyu mufana yari ari ngo bahang@@ ane gusa yahise ahunga uyu mukinnyi ahageze aram@@ ubura. Yanditswe kuya 7@@ -03-@@ 2016 saa 07@@ :4@@ 9@@ ' na R@@ ej@@ o@@ ice Africa Ministries D@@ ukunze kumva abantu bemera ikosa bakoze ariko bagah@@ akana ko bakoze icyaha. Umunyeshuri yafatwa ak@@ op@@ era akaby@@ ita ikos@@ a, umuntu akab@@ eshya uwo bashakanye yatah@@ urwa agasaba imbabazi aby@@ ita ikos@@ a, wabwira umuntu ibitari ukuri nyuma akaza kubimenya uk@@ amusaba im@@ baba@@ bazi uby@@ ita agak@@ os@@ a. Hari um@@ mwe mu banyacyubahiro w@@ avugwaga cyane mu bitangazamakuru kubw@@ ' imyitwarire yari iteye isoni ijyanye n'ib@@ y'ubuzima bwe bwite [@@ pr@@ ivate life aff@@ air@@ ] bamubajije icyo abivug@@ aho, yasubije agira ati: "@@ nakoze ikosa rikomeye, ni njye w@@ arik@@ oze nta wundi kandi ndar@@ yemera. N@@ abwiye umugore wanjye ikosa n@@ akoze, musaba imbabazi, ndangije nsaba n'Imana imbabazi, kandi ibi byag@@ umye hagati yanjye na@@ we." Uko bigaragara uyu mun@@ yacy@@ ubahiro asa n'uw@@ icishije bugufi kandi nk'@@ uba@@ bajwe n'ibyo yakoze. Ese hari ikindi yari ategerejwe gukor@@ a? Nyamara kwita ibyo yakoze ‘@@ ikos@@ a' [@@ m@@ ist@@ ak@@ e] aho kuby@@ ita icyaha, byerekana ko yari ari gupfobya abizi cyangwa atabizi uruhare rwe mu byari by@@ abaye. Impamvu nta yindi ni uko ayo magambo yombi [@@ ikosa n'@@ icyah@@ a] ah@@ abanye cyane nubwo benshi bakunze kuy@@ aha inyito z@@ enda gusa cyangwa rimwe bak@@ arik@@ oresha mu mwanya w'@@ ir@@ indi. Ik@@ osa [@@ m@@ ist@@ ak@@ e] bivuga kwibeshya mu nt@@ ekerezo zatumye ufata icyemezo runaka. [@@ er@@ r@@ or in j@@ ud@@ g@@ ment@@ ]. Ni ikintu wakoze ut@@ abit@@ ekerejeho kandi ut@@ abizi. Reka dufate urug@@ ero: kunyura inzira itari yo kubera utazi ahantu neza; gushyira isukari mu biryo wib@@ wiraga ko ushy@@ izemo umuny@@ u; kwandika ad@@ eresi itari yo muri mudasobwa uk@@ isanga ureba ibyo ut@@ ashakaga kur@@ eba@@ ... Izi ni ingero z'@@ ibyo twakwita koko amakosa. Biba byabaye kubera umuntu yarang@@ aye cyangwa atitaye ku bintu. Icyaha kirenze kure ikos@@ a. Icyaha ni uguh@@ itamo gukora ikintu uzi neza ko ari kib@@ i. Bitandukanye n'@@ ikos@@ a, icyaha gikorwa umuntu yagize amah@@ it@@ amo. Ku bw'ibyo aba agomba kwemera uruhare rwe. Bibiliya itubwira ukuntu ababyeyi bacu ba mbere Adamu na Eva bakoze icyaha. Mu by'ukuri bahisemo gukora ibyo Imana it@@ ashakaga ko bakora, babikora babizi neza ko ari bibi. By@@ umvikane neza ko Adamu na Eva bari bafite ubushobozi bwo guhitamo kudakora icyaha, ariko si byo bakoze. Hari inama z@@ adufasha kwirinda ingaruka tw@@ aterwa no kwit@@ iranya ikosa n'@@ icyah@@ a: 1. Guh@@ itamo inyito ikwiriye twita ibyo tw@@ akoze. Ntuz@@ igera ugerageza kugabanya ubukana bw'@@ icyaha wakoze ucy@@ ita ‘@@ ikos@@ a'. Ijambo ry'@@ ikig@@ ereki '@@ h@@ om@@ olog@@ e@@ õ@@ ' risobanura "@@ kwemera icyah@@ a" [@@ conf@@ ess@@ ion] ni ryo rikoreshwa mu rwand@@ uko rwa 1@@ Yohani 1:@@ 9, ni ukw@@ ita ibyo wakoze nk'uko biri kok@@ o; kwita ibyabaye nk'uko Imana iby@@ ita. Nt@@ ushobora gukira indwara igihe cyose ug@@ ihakana ko ur@@ waye. 2. Kwemera uruhare rwawe mu byo wak@@ oze. Igihe twakoze icyaha, ntit@@ ug@@ ashake kugih@@ akana. N'@@ igihe twakoze ikosa tuba tugomba kur@@ yemera. Igihe wag@@ iranye ikibazo n'@@ umuntu, emera uruhare rwawe mu byabaye n'iyo rwaba ruto gut@@ e. Iyo byiswe icyaha, nta na rimwe tugomba kuzana inz@@ itwazo [@@ ex@@ c@@ uses@@ ] imbere y'Imana. 3. Kwemera ibyiyumvo big@@ ucira urubanza [@@ ack@@ n@@ owl@@ ed@@ ge your gu@@ il@@ t@@ ]. Ni ibisanzwe kumva umutima ug@@ ucira urubanza igihe wakoze icyaha. Iri pf@@ un@@ we dut@@ erwa n'icyaha ni impano ikomeye Imana yaduhaye kugira ngo bid@@ ush@@ ishikar@@ ize kwiyunga nayo twih@@ use. Kwemera bidatinze uruhare rwacu mu byabaye bid@@ utera kwihutira kwiyunga n'uwo twag@@ omeye umubano mwiza ug@@ akomeza. Ntuz@@ igera na none wih@@ ana ibyo wakoze ngo w@@ ong@@ ereho ijambo ‘@@ arik@@ o@@ '. Ibi bifatwa nko kutemera neza icyaha cyangwa kug@@ ihakana mu buryo bw@@ oroh@@ ej@@ e; bikag@@ abanya cyane amahirwe yo guhabwa imbabazi. 4. Guhindura imyitwar@@ ire. Amagambo y@@ oroha kuy@@ avuga kandi ntacyo asaba ariko icy'@@ ingenzi ni icyo ukora ngo ibyabaye ntibiz@@ ong@@ ere. Abantu benshi boroh@@ erwa no kuvuga interuro "@@ ns@@ abye imbabaz@@ i" cyangwa mun@@ yihang@@ anire ku byabaye [@@ I am s@@ or@@ ry@@ ], ariko ntibis@@ ubir@@ eho. Kw@@ ihana si ukw@@ ibwira gusa mu bitekerezo byawe ko ut@@ azongera gukora ikintu runaka, ahubwo ni uguh@@ indura n'icy@@ erek@@ ezo. Uramutse ud@@ ahinduye imig@@ irire ntago mu by'ukuri uba wih@@ ann@@ ye, n'iyo waba war@@ ijijwe bingana iki n'icyaha wak@@ oze. 5. Gusaba imbabazi. Mu by'ukuri imbabazi ntawe uz@@ iha ubwe, ntiby@@ ashoboka, ahubwo uz@@ ihabwa n'uwo wac@@ um@@ uyeho. Icyo ukora ni ukuz@@ isaba ug@@ ategereza kuz@@ ihabwa ku bw'@@ ubuntu. Rimwe na rimwe duhabwa imbabazi iyo twamaze kugaragaza imbuto zo kwihana zig@@ aragazwa n'ubushake bwo guca bugufi no kutaz@@ asubira mu byaha. (Ibyakozwe n'intumwa 26@@ :@@ 19-@@ 20). Rayon Sports yasubijwe imodoka tariki ya 9 Kanama uwo mwaka nyuma y’ibiganiro byahuje impande zombi.
Nta mur@@ wanyi wa M23 n'umwe uri ku butaka bwa Congo - MONUSCO Ingabo za Loni ziri mu butumwa bw'amahoro muri Congo (M@@ ON@@ US@@ CO@@ ) z@@ itangaza zivuye inyuma ko nta mur@@ wanyi wa M23 n'umwe uri ku butaka bwa Congo (D@@ RC@@ ). Abahagarariye Monusco mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru i Kinshasa Kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki ya 18 Mutarama 2017 Monusco yabitangaje ihamya ko yagenz@@ uye amakuru avuga ko hari inyeshyamba za M23 zaba zar@@ injiye muri Congo. Iny@@ omoza amakuru yatanzwe na Leta ya Kinshasa mu mpera z'icyumweru gishize, Monusco yagize ati "Nta mur@@ wanyi wa M23 wigeze yamb@@ uka umupaka wa Congo aturutse muri Ugand@@ a." Umwe mu bayobozi ba Monusco yabwiye itangazamakuru i Kinshasa ko nyuma yo kumva amakuru ya Leta ya Congo ko hari inyesh@@ yam@@ aba za M23 z@@ injiye muri icyo gihugu zivuye muri Ug@@ ang@@ d@@ a, itsinda ry'@@ ingabo za Monusco n'iza Congo ry@@ oherejwe ku mupaka wa Uganda kugenzura ngo barebe niba ari byo. Monusco ivuga ko iryo tsinda rihuriweho n'ingabo zo mu karere zishinzwe kugenzura ibijyanye n'@@ ubushotoranyi ku mipaka y'ibihugu naryo ryag@@ iyeyo n'ubu rikaba rik@@ iri ku mupaka wa Congo na Uganda rish@@ akisha amakuru yim@@ bitse kuri icyo kibazo. Félix Prosper B@@ ass@@ e, Umuvugizi wa Monus@@ co, agira ati "@@ Kugeza ubu tw@@ ahamya tudashidikanya dukurikije ibyavuye mu igenzura tw@@ akoze, ko nta barwanyi ba M23 bari ku butaka bwa Congo Kinsh@@ as@@ a." Ku wa mbere tariki ya 16 Mutarama 2017, Guverineri wa Kivu y'Amajyaruguru, Julien Pal@@ uku yari yakoresheje ikiganiro n'abanyamakuru ikit@@ arag@@ anya, avuga ko amagana y'@@ abarwanyi ba M23 bim@@ uriwe ku mupaka wa Congo na Uganda mu mpera z'icyumweru gishize. Minisitiri w'@@ Itangazamakuru muri Congo akaba n'@@ Umuvugizi wa Guverinoma, Lambert M@@ ende, we yavuze ko hari batayo ebyiri z'@@ abarwanyi ba M23 z@@ injiye muri Congo ziturutse Uganda zikaba zik@@ ambitse ahitwa Ish@@ ash@@ a. Ku wa kabiri tariki ya 17 Mutarama 2017, Ok@@ ello O@@ rw@@ en, umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu muri Uganda, yahakanye yivuye inyuma ibyo Congo ibash@@ inja, ko hari abarwanyi ba M23 binjiye muri icyo gihugu bavuye mu nkambi yabo mu Burengerazuba bwa Uganda. N'@@ umujinya mwinshi, yabwiye Ibiro Ntara Makuru by'@@ Ab@@ ongereza, Reut@@ ers, ati "Nt@@ itw@@ igeze tubash@@ aka ku butaka bwacu n'ubwo tut@@ ig@@ enze tubat@@ umira hano, yewe nta n'ubwo b@@ ifuzwa muri Uganda. I@@ by'@@ abarwanyi ba M23 bireba Leta ya Congo na L@@ oni. Ibyo ni ibyabo rwose si ibya Guverinoma ya Ugand@@ a." Yongeyeho ko Congo idakwiye gukoresha M23 iy@@ obya ubur@@ ari mu guk@@ we@@ pa gukemura ibibazo yifitiye imbere mu gihugu. Monusco yo ivuga iby@@ abaye, bigaragaza ko amasezerano y'i Nairobi hagati ya Leta ya Congo Kinshasa na M23 akwiye kubahirizwa mu buryo bwih@@ ut@@ irwa, buri ruhande rug@@ ashyira mu bikorwa ibyo rw@@ ashyir@@ iyeho umukono. Ayo masezerano yateganyaga urwego rushinzwe gushyira mu ngabo za Leta ingabo za M23 no gusezerera no gusub@@ uza mu buzima busanzwe abazaba bat@@ inj@@ inj@@ we mu gisirikare cya Leta. Kugeza ubu ariko, nta na kimwe Leta ya Congo Kinshasa ir@@ abikor@@ aho mu gihe inyeshyamba za M23 zirimo kwic@@ ira is@@ azi ku jisho mu nkambi mu Uganda no mu Rwanda.

Abakoresha WhatsAp@@ p, Instagram na Messenger bagiye kujya b@@ ohererezanya ubutumwa Facebook yatangaje ko igiye guhuza imikorere ya porogaramu za WhatsAp@@ p, Instagram na Messenger ku buryo abaz@@ ikoresha bazajya bah@@ ererekanya ubut@@ uma, ibintu bitari bisanzwe ku bakoresha porogaramu zitandukanye. Abas@@ anzwe bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga murabizi ko ‘K@@ ohererezanya ubut@@ uma bikunda gusa ku bakoresha porogaramu zim@@ we, nka WhatsApp ku y@@ indi, Instagram ku yindi na Messenger ku y@@ ind@@ i’, ariko ntabwo ukoresha WhatsApp yabw@@ oherereza ukoresha Instagram cyangwa Mess@@ enger@@ , ari ho ab@@ uny@@ uj@@ ije. Umuyobozi mukuru wa Facebook, Mark Zucker@@ ber@@ g, yabwiye New York Times ko ‘@@ nubwo izo porogaramu zizakomeza gukora mu buryo butandukanye, ziz@@ ah@@ uzwa ku buryo ubutumwa bw@@ ava kuri imwe buk@@ ajya ku z@@ ind@@ i’. Zuckerberg yatangaje kuri uyu wa Gatanu ko byatangiye kunon@@ ons@@ orwa ariko bizatwara igihe kirekire ku buryo abakoresha izo porogaramu bazatangira kwand@@ ikirana hagati y’imp@@ era z’uyu mwaka n’int@@ angiriro z’@@ uw@@ utaha. Ku mpamvu z’@@ ibanga ry’@@ akazi, Facebook ntiy@@ atangaje byinshi ku mikorere y’ubu buryo bwo guhuza porogaramu eshatu zisanzwe zikora nk’@@ izih@@ anganye kuko ibyo zikora bijya gusa ariko kwihuza ngo byit@@ ezweho koroshya akazi ka Facebook. Guhuza izi porogaramu ni n’uburyo b@@ ufatwa nk’@@ ubuz@@ oroshya ubucuruzi bwo kuri internet, hagati y’@@ abaz@@ ikoresha na Facebook bik@@ ay@@ orohereza gusangiza amakuru abaz@@ ikoresha zose, ikan@@ agera ku ntego yayo yo kwamamaza ku bantu benshi. Zuckerberg yavuze ko kuz@@ ihuza uko ari eshatu ari uburyo bwo kugira ngo zir@@ usheho gukoreshwa n’abantu benshi kandi n’umwanya bamara baz@@ ikoresha wiyong@@ ere. Inzobere mu by’@@ ikoranabuhanga, Mak@@ ena Kell@@ y, yavuze ko guhuza izo porogaramu biz@@ ongerera imbaraga Facebook zo guhangana n’ibindi bigo bikomeye bitanga serivisi zo kohereza ubutumwa nka Google na Appl@@ e. Itangazo rya Facebook rivuga ko ‘@@ Ish@@ aka kubaka ubunararibonye mu kohereza ubutumwa uko ishoboye, kuko abay@@ ikoresha bifuza kubw@@ ohereza mu buryo bwih@@ uta kandi bufite umutekan@@ o’. R@@ iti “Turi gukora ibishoboka ngo duh@@ e imbaraga uburyo bwo kohererezanya ubutumwa but@@ avog@@ erwa, tun@@ ita ku koroshya uburyo bugera ku nsh@@ uti, imiryango ikoresha imirongo yos@@ e.” Ubu buryo butang@@ ajwe mu gihe Facebook imaze iminsi ikor@@ waho iperereza ndetse ikan@@ an@@ engwa uburyo icunga n’umutekano w’@@ amakuru y’@@ abay@@ ikoresha, bikagera n’aho yib@@ wa. Polisi y'u Rwanda yashimiye abitabiriye CHAN uburyo bitwaye muri ik@@ igihe k'@@ ibyumweru 3 Polisi y'u Rwanda iratangaza ko ishimira abitabiriye Shampiyona y'@@ Ibihugu ya Afurik@@ a@@ (C@@ HAN@@ ) uburyo bitwaye kugirango irushanwa ryose rig@@ ende neza.@@ U Rwanda nirwo rwakiriye iri rushanwa ku nshuro yaryo ya kane, rikaba ryar@@ atangiye ku italiki ya 16 Mutarama 2016 rigomba kumara ibyumweru bitatu kuko ryar@@ angiye kuri iki cyumweru tariki 7 G@@ ashy@@ anat@@ re 2016, rikaba ritegurwa n'ishyirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afurika (C@@ AF@@ ). Umuvugizi wa Polisi y'u Rwanda, Assistant Commissioner of Police (ACP) Celestin Twahirwa yagize ati:"@@ ikig@@ aragaza ko iri rushanwa ryari riteg@@ uwe neza n'abafatanyabikorwa bose harimo na Polisi y'u Rwanda, ni uko nta kintu kigeze kibaho cyah@@ ungabanya umutekano mu gihe imikino yose yabag@@ a. Abapolisi baherekeje abaje bayoboye amakip@@ e, abakinnyi n'abafana aho babaga hose no mu myitozo ,@@ ubufatanye hagati y'@@ abateguye bakan@@ ahagararira irushanwa hamwe n'abashinzwe umutekano bwabaye nt@@ amak@@ em@@ wa.@@ , ." Umubare munini w'@@ abafana bavuye muri Uganda na Kongo kuva iri rushanwa ryatang@@ ira, Polisi y'u Rwanda yashimye imyitwarire myiza berekanye mu ngendo zabo bafatanyije na bagenzi babo b'@@ Abanyarwanda. ACP Twahirwa yagize ati:"@@ Uburyo abafana bitwaye bwari bush@@ imish@@ ije, mu bikorwa by'@@ is@@ aka nta kibazo cy@@ abayemo hose kandi dukomeje kugira ikizere ko inzego zacu zishinzwe umutekano zifite ubushobozi bwan@@ akw@@ akira amarushanwa arenze ay@@ a." Uretse imikino ya nyuma, undi mukino wah@@ uruje imbaga muri iri rushanwa ni uw@@ ahuje u Rwanda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo wakin@@ we mu mpera z'icyumweru cyash@@ ize. Kuri uyu mukino, Polisi yaherekeje amagana y'abafana ba Kongo kuva ku mupaka wa Rubavu kugera I Kigali. Cong@@ o@@ (RDC) yageze ku mukino wa nyuma ik@@ uyemo u Rwanda ku ns@@ inzi ya 2-1 muri kimwe cya kane cy'@@ irangiza nyuma y'igihe cy'@@ inyongera mbere y'uko itsinda Guinea kuri penaliti 5-@@ 4 bamaze kunganya 1-1 muri kimwe cya kabiri cy'@@ irangiza. Mali nayo yageze ku mukino wa nyuma n'ubwo yari yari yatsinze umukino umwe mu itsinda D yari irimo kuko yanganyije na Uganda 2-@@ 2, itsinda Zimbabwe 1-0, inganya na Zambiya 0-0 aho yarangije id@@ atsinzwe ari iya 2 inyuma ya Zamb@@ iya. Irushanwa rya CHAN r@@ yakin@@ iwe ku bibuga bine aribyo Stade Amahoro, Stade ya Kigali I Nyamirambo zo mu Mujyi wa Kigali, stade ya Huye mu Majyepfo na Stade Umug@@ ada yo mu karere ka Rubavu I Bur@@ engerazuba@@ .@@ U Rwanda akaba ari ubwa gatatu rwakiriye ish@@ ushanwa ryo ku rwego rwa Afurika, nyuma yo kwakira neza igikombe cy'@@ ibihugu cy'@@ abatarengeje imyaka 17@@ muri 2011 n'@@ icy'@@ abatarengeje imyaka 20 muri 2009. Iri rushanwa r@@ yahuje ibihugu 16 byo ku mugabane wa Afurika ari byo Tunisia, Moroc@@ co, Guinea, Mali, Angola, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Ethiopia, Uganda, Gabon, DR Congo, Niger, Nigeria, Ivory Co@@ ast@@ , Cameroon n'u Rwanda rwar@@ yakir@@ iye.@@ Irushanwa rya CHAN 2016 ku nshuro yaryo ya kane ryar@@ angiye ry@@ egukanywe n'igihugu cya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kong@@ o.@@ itsinze Mali ibitego 3-0 ku mukino wa nyuma.
Porogaramu za Facebook zigiye guhagarikwa mu bwoko bumwe bwa telefoni Urubuga Nk@@ or@@ anyambaga rwa Facebook rugiye guhagarika gukorera muri zimwe muri telefoni za S@@ mart@@ phone zikoresha porogaramu zishaje zit@@ ak@@ ijyanye n’@@ igihe. Facebook y’umuh@@ erwe ukiri muto Mark Zuckerberg ibinyujije ku rubuga rwayo yatangaje ko kuva mu mpera za Werurwe 2017 iz@@ ahagarika gukorana na telefoni zimwe na zimwe zig@@ ikoresha porogaramu zit@@ agezweho nka v@@ 55 (v@@ ers@@ ion ya 5@@ 5) ya Facebook ndetse na v@@ 10 (v@@ ers@@ ion ya 10) ya Messenger kuri telefoni za And@@ roid@@ . Yan@@ atangaje kandi ko iri hag@@ arik@@ wa rin@@ areba porogaramu ya Facebook yakoreshwaga mu bwoko bwa telefoni zikoresha W@@ indow@@ s. Uru rubuga nkoranyambaga rwag@@ iriye abakiliya barwo inama ko baramutse babonye ikibazo cyo guhagarara kwa porogaramu k@@ ibag@@ ezeho mu buryo butunguranye bashobora kuvugurura (@@ up@@ dat@@ e) izo bari basanzwe bakoresha nk’uko ruri b@@ ujye rub@@ ibasaba mu butumwa cyangwa se bagahitamo guhita batangira gukoresha Facebook L@@ ite, Porogaramu nshya iherutse gushyirwa ahagaragara. Mu gihe telefoni yawe it@@ abasha ubu buryo bushya bwa Facebook, iyi kompanyi y’ubucuruzi yashyizeho inzira abay@@ ikoresha bagana ku rubuga rwa Facebook@@ .com bifashishije Br@@ ows@@ er ya telefoni ngend@@ anwa. Mu bisobanuro byatanzwe ku ihagarikwa ry’@@ izi porogaramu zish@@ aje, Facebook yagize iti “@@ Ikipe yacu ikora amasaha atabar@@ ika kugira ngo m@@ ubashe kwand@@ ikirana n’inshuti ndetse n’imiryango yanyu. Bumwe mu buryo dukomeza guteza imbere ni uguh@@ ora duh@@ anga udushya harimo nko gukoresha uburyo bw’amajwi ndetse n’ubw’@@ amashusho mu guh@@ amagar@@ ana. Abag@@ ikoresha uburyo bush@@ aje bw’@@ izi porogaramu ntibabasha kugerwaho neza n’@@ utu dushy@@ a.” Iyi Kompanyi yatangarije abafite telefoni zirebwa n’izi mpinduka ko izajya ib@@ oherereza ubutumwa muri Messenger ikab@@ ibam@@ enyesh@@ a. Urutonde rwose uko rwak@@ abaye rur@@ ebwa n’iri hag@@ arik@@ wa rugizwe na v@@ 55 ya Facebook, v@@ 10 ya Messenger ikorana na telefoni za And@@ ro@@ id, Facebook yo mu ma i@@ P@@ ad, Facebook ya I@@ os yashyizwe ahagaragara mu 2011, Facebook yo muri telefoni zikoresha W@@ indow@@ s 8 na 8.@@ 1, Messenger na Facebook byo muri telefoni ndetse na mudasobwa zikoresha W@@ indow@@ s 8. G@@ AERG irasaba Leta kwihutisha ibarura ry' imiryango yaz@@ imye Umuryango uhuje Abanyeshuri barokotse Jenoside barangije Kaminuza n'@@ Amashuri makuru (G@@ AER@@ G) ur@@ asaba ubuyobozi bukuru bw'igihugu kuw@@ ufasha kwihutisha igikorwa cyo kubarura imiryango yaz@@ imye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kuko uko bit@@ inda ni ko hari impungenge z'uko amazina yabo yaz@@ ibagirana burundu. Ibi Charles H@@ abon@@ ima uyobora G@@ AERG yabitangarije mu Karere ka Musanze kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 24@@ /05/2014 mu muhango wo kwibuka imiryango yaz@@ imye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Mu majwi at@@ uje, abakobwa batanu n'abasore batanu bambaye imyambaro y'@@ umweru n'@@ umukara bicaye mu hasi bar@@ asoma amwe mu mazina y'@@ imiryango yaz@@ imye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yakom@@ oka mu turere tune tw'@@ Intara y'Amaj@@ yaruguru. Hak@@ imwe umukino werekana amateka ya Jenoside n'imiryango yaz@@ im@@ ye. Mu turere twa Rulindo, Gakenke, Gicumbi na Musanze, mu min@@ isi 100 Jenoside yam@@ aze, imiryango 46@@ 1 yarimo abantu 18@@ 97 barishwe ntihagira n'umwe ur@@ okoka. Charles H@@ abon@@ imana, yagize ati: "@@ Dut@@ egura ibi bikorwa kugira ngo tug@@ aragar@@ aze ubukana Jenoside yateg@@ uran@@ we n'uburyo yashyizwe mu bikorwa kugira ngo he@@ kugira n'umwe wo kuz@@ abara inkur@@ u." Yavuze kandi ko bahisemo kwib@@ ukira mu karere ka Musanze gafite amateka akomeye ya Jenoside kuko ako karere n'@@ uduce tuh@@ ak@@ ikije ari ho Jenoside yag@@ eragejwe kuva 1990 mu gihe abandi bam@@ en@@ eshejwe bajya i Bugesera kuribwa na T@@ se@@ -@@ ts@@ e. Charles H@@ abon@@ ima uyobora G@@ AERG ashyira indabo ku rwibutso rushying@@ uyemo abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Mu myaka itandatu imiryango yaz@@ imye imaze kubarurwa ni iyo mu turere 10 gusa. Nk'uko bigaragara, igikorwa cyo kuy@@ ibarura kir@@ agenda buhoro bivuga ko hatagize igikorwa mu maguru mashya ngo k@@ ihut@@ ishwe kuz@@ arangiza uturere 30 by@@ afata indi myaka itari mike. Prezida wa G@@ AERG agaragaza ko mu turere bak@@ ozemo iryo bar@@ ura bahuye n'ikibazo cy'uko abaturage b@@ ibagiwe amazina cyane cyane ay'@@ abana bakabasha kumenya gusa amat@@ azir@@ ano nka Buh@@ inja, But@@ oyi n'@@ andi, ngo hari impungenge z'uko bakw@@ ibagirana burundu uko imyaka it@@ aha. Aha, yaboneye gusaba ubuyobozi bukuru bw'igihugu kwihutisha iki gikorwa mu maguru mashya. Minisitiri w'Umuco na Siporo, Protais Mitali witabiriye uyu muhango, yemeye ko Minisiteri ayobora yagaragaje imbaraga nke muri iki gikorwa kubera imyiteguro yo kwibuka Jenoside ku nshuro ya 20 yasabaga imbaraga zidasanzwe ariko yizeza ko kigiye kwihut@@ ishwa. Abayobozi bitabiriye umuhango bashyira indabo ku rwibutso rushying@@ uyemo abazize Jenoside. U Rwanda ruri kwiga uko abanyarwanda bose bag@@ ezwaho ubwisungane mu kwivuza Nubwo amategeko y’u Rwanda ateganya ko buri muntu wese uri ku butaka bwarwo agira ubwishingizi bw’@@ indwara, haracy@@ agaragara abat@@ ab@@ ugira bitewe n’impamvu zirimo am@@ ikora make, imyumvire n’ibindi. Ingingo ya gatatu y’itegeko n° 04 ryo kuwa 25 Mutarama 2016 rigena im@@ iterere, imikorere n’imicungire y’ubw@@ ishingizi bw’@@ indwara mu Rwanda, igira iti “Umuntu wese uri ku butaka bw’u Rwanda, yaba Umunyarwanda cyangwa Umunyam@@ ahanga ategetswe kuba afite ubwishingizi bw’@@ indwar@@ a.” Bumwe mu bwishingizi bukoreshwa mu Rwanda harimo na mituweli (@@ Mutuelle de Sant@@ é) ikoreshwa n’abaturage benshi. Imwe mu ngingo zihariye igiye kuganirwaho mu nama rusange y’@@ Ishyirahamwe ry’@@ abaganga mu Rwanda, ni ugushaka uburyo bwo kugeza ubwishingizi n’ubuvuzi ku Banyarwanda bose. Umuyobozi w’@@ iryo shyir@@ ahamwe, Dr. Kayitesi Kayit@@ enj@@ ore, yatangaje ko bagiye kurebera hamwe icyakorwa kugira ngo 100% by’@@ abanyarwanda bagira ubwishingizi bwo kwivuza. Yagize ati “Buri mwaka tur@@ ahura tug@@ ashaka ibibazo byugarije Abanyarwanda mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi. Uyu mwaka, icyo tuzag@@ aniraho ni ukug@@ eza ubuzima ku banyarwanda bose. Kureba uko bagira ubwishingizi mu buzima, butuma bashobora kwivuza kandi bat@@ ishyuye amafaranga mensh@@ i.” Dr. Kayitesi yakomeje avuga ko bafite intego ko mu 2020 bizaba byagezweho ku bufatanye n’abat@@ erank@@ unga. Umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ibikorwa by’ubuzima muri Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, Dr. Z@@ ub@@ eri Muv@@ unyi, yavuze ko nubwo abanyarwanda basaga 80% bafite mut@@ uwe@@ li, haracyari byinshi byo gukorwa ngo bose bagire ubwishingizi bwo kwivuza nk’uko biteganyijwe mu bikorwa by’@@ intego z’iterambere rirambye (S@@ DG@@ s) u Rwanda rwih@@ aye. Yongeyeho ko uretse guharanira ko buri munyarwanda ashobora kugira ubwishingizi mu buzima, hari na gahunda yo kub@@ ub@@ eg@@ ereza. Yagize ati “Hari n’ubundi buryo bwo kub@@ egereza ibigo by’ubuvuzi […] byose ni ukugira ngo Umunyarwanda ukeneye ibikorwa by’ubuvuzi bibe byamug@@ eraho bit@@ amug@@ oye. N@@ ong@@ ereho ko turi gukora n’ikintu gikomeye cyo guha imbaraga zir@@ ushijeho serivisi z’@@ imb@@ angukiragut@@ abara. Hari igihe umurwayi afatirwa mu rugo akaba ayik@@ en@@ eye.” Yakomeje avuga ko nka Minisiteri y’ubuzima ifatanyije n’abafatanyabikorwa kongerera imbaraga abajyanama b’@@ ubuzima, bakaba bak@@ onger@@ wa; hakaba na gahunda yo kwigisha abantu bashinzwe kujya kwita ku bar@@ embeye mu rugo. Dore ibintu utagomba kwirengagiza kubera ko uri mu rukundo n'@@ umuntu. Abantu benshi bakunze gufata urukundo nk'@@ ikintu kidasanzwe cyangwa bakar@@ uha indi r@@ ura rut@@ akagombye kugira bitewe n'@@ ubur@@ yo, igihe cyangwa inshuro bak@@ unze. Ik@@ iz@@ akubwira ibi ni uko usanga hari abas@@ es@@ agura mu gihe bari mu rukundo cyangwa ugasanga b@@ ibagiwe indi mishinga yabat@@ eza imbere kuko baba bibereye mu kin@@ yenga nyamara bakiy@@ ibagiza ko ejo cyangwa ejobundi byas@@ eswa buri wese agasubira kuko kubera ubukene cyangwa igihombo yatewe no kubara nabi. Hano hari ibintu by'ingenzi bishobora gufasha umuntu wese uri mu rukundo yaba arug@@ iyemo vuba cyangwa ar@@ us@@ anzwemo kuko nubwo gukunda no gukundwa ari byiza biba byiza kurushaho iyo umuntu afite amikoro n'@@ '@@ izindi nsh@@ uti. 1. Ubw@@ ig@@ enge. Hari igihe usanga abantu barabaye abacakara b'@@ abo bakundana bitewe n'@@ ibyiyumvo abakunzi babo bafite bityo ugasanga buri wese yumva ko bahorana basangira ariko bakiy@@ ibagiza ko bishobora gushira bag@@ asub@@ iran@@ amo. Ubw@@ ig@@ enge, ntibis@@ obanuye kudas@@ abana n'umukunzi wawe, ahubwo na none bisobanura kuba ufite umurongo ngenderwaho ku buryo ushobora no kubona akanya ko gusabana n'abandi ndetse no gukora utundi dush@@ inga twag@@ uteza imbere. Hari abantu rero usanga barabaye nk'@@ abacakara b'@@ urukundo ku buryo na bo ubwabo nta kanya biha ko gutekereza ku byahise n'@@ ahazaza muri rusange. Muri icyo gihe, umwe aba ari nk'@@ ikig@@ eragezo cy'@@ undi aho kumubera umufasha n'umw@@ ungan@@ izi. 2. Imy@@ izer@@ ere. B@@ aca umugani ngo ingendo y'@@ undi ir@@ avun@@ a. Aha abantu benshi usanga barya ibyo abakunzi babo barya cyangwa banywa nyamara mbere atari ko byari bimeze. Aha rero, abashakashatsi bavuga ko atari byiza guhindura imyizerere kubera umuntu mugenzi wawe kuko rimwe na rimwe bishobora kuz@@ amug@@ iraho ingar@@ uko mu buryo at@@ ateg@@ uye. Aha tug@@ aruka cyane ku bijyanye n'@@ amadini aho umwe ahind@@ urira mugenzi we ngo bakunde babane nyamara nyuma byar@@ angira buri wese agasubira ku ke. Ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko umuntu ug@@ ufitiye urukundo adashobora kukw@@ angira ibyo ur@@ ya, wiz@@ era, unywa cyangwa uko uri ahubwo ko ugomba kumw@@ iy@@ ereka uko uri hanyuma nawe akakw@@ akira hatabayeho kwiy@@ ober@@ anya. 3. Inzozi zawe cyangwa intego. Iyo uri mu rukundo, ntibivuze ko uh@@ induye ibyo wari wit@@ eze kuzag@@ eraho. Kuba wiga indimi ukabona inshuti yiga mu m@@ ibare, ntibivuze ko na we uz@@ ahita uhindura ukaba umunyam@@ ibare bitewe n'uko uwo muntu wamw@@ iyumv@@ isemo ahubwo ugomba gukomeza intego wari war@@ ihaye mutar@@ akund@@ ana. Akenshi abantu bagera mu rukundo ugasanga ni rwo bahaye umwanya munini ndetse bamwe bakan@@ agendera ku bitekerezo by'@@ abakunzi babo nyamara bak@@ ibagirwa ko na bo hari icyo bari bar@@ iyemeje mbere cyangwa ko bashobora kuzana igitekerezo gishya cyaz@@ abateza imbere bombi. 4. Umuryango Si byiza kubona inshuti ngo ucike ku bavandimwe bawe n'izindi nshuti muri rusange. Umuryango rero ntibivuze abo muv@@ ukana gusa ahubwo n'abo mwah@@ oranye mu gihe wari ukiri wenyine utar@@ abona umukunzi baba abahungu n'abak@@ obwa. Umukunzi wawe rero ntagomba kug@@ uca ku bantu mwar@@ er@@ anywe cyangwa mw@@ agendanye mut@@ aram@@ eny@@ ana dore ko hari n'abakora ikosa ryo k@@ osh@@ y@@ wa n'uwo bakundana ngo niba yanga umuntu nawe amw@@ ange. Ibi rero ni amakosa akomeye kuko mu isi yuzuye abantu b'@@ imico n'imyitwarire bitandukanye ntago uba ugomba kwiga iby'@@ uwo mukundana gusa ahubwo uba ugomba no kongera kubona akanya gah@@ agije ko gusabana no gusangira n'abandi. Abagore miliyoni 250 mu bihugu birimo intambara bakeneye ubufasha bwih@@ utirwa Ikigega cy'@@ Umuryango w'Abibumbye cyita ku Bat@@ urage (UN@@ FP@@ A) kir@@ atangaza ko byibuze ku isi hari abantu bagera kuri miliyoni ijana bakeneye ubufasha bwih@@ utirwa ,@@ 1/4 muri bo bakaba ari abagore n'abakobwa bafite imyaka 15 kugera kuri 4@@ 9. Ubwo kuri uyu wa 17 Ukuboza 2015 ikigega cy'@@ umuryango w'abibumbye k@@ ita ku baturage cyam@@ urikaga raporo y'uyu mwaka wa 2015, bagaragar@@ aje ko ku isi abagore bari mu bihugu byah@@ uye n'intambara cyangwa imidugararo ari bo bah@@ ahura n'ibibazo cyane kurusha abagabo. Iyi raporo igaragaza ko mu bihe by'intambara abagore bahura n'ibibazo birimo gufatwa ku ngufu, ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina, gutwara inda zitateguwe no kubura aba@@ baha serivisi z'ubuzima nko kuboneza urubyaro, ndetse no gufasha abari kubyara. Umuyobozi wa UN@@ FP@@ A mu Rwanda avuga ko bashyize imbaraga mu kwita ku buzima bw'@@ abagore n'abakobwa bari mu buhungiro kuko ari bo bag@@ irwaho n'ingaruka kurusha abagabo. Yagize ati :"@@ Abagore benshi mu buhungiro ntibab@@ ona imiti yo kuboneza urubyaro ndetse n'abandi bapfa babyara byibuze 3 muri batanu bar@@ apf@@ a,@@ ubu bur@@ ero turi gushyira imbaraga mu gut@@ anaga imiti yo kuboneza urubyaro, kuba@@ p@@ ima s@@ ida, mbese dukora ibishoboka ngo ubuzima bw' abagore bw@@ itab@@ weh@@ o." Minisitiri muri Minisiteri ishinzwe gukumira Ibiza no gucyura impunzi (M@@ IDIM@@ AR@@ ), Seraphine Mukant@@ abana, avuga ko nk'igihugu cy'u Rwanda cy@@ akiriye impunzi z'@@ abarundi ndetse abenshi muri bo akaba ari abagore n'@@ abana, avuga ko hari byinshi bikorwa ku@@ irango bite ku buzima bw'@@ abakobwa n'abag@@ ore. Yagize ati :"@@ hari ibikorwa bitandukanye byakozwe nko gutanga imiti yo kuboneza urubyaro, gutanga udukingirizo ku bagabo n'abag@@ ore, gupima abagore batwite ndetse no gufasha abana b'abakobwa bari mu mih@@ ang@@ o." Mu mezi ane ashize mu Rwanda har@@ abarirwa impunzi zigera ku bihumbi 200 na 20 z'@@ abarundi , abagera kuri 50@@ 1 bakaba barahawe imiti yo kuboneza urubyaro ndetse abagera kuri 6@@ 60 babashije gufashwa kubyara neza. Umugabane w'@@ afurika niwo w@@ ibasiwe cyane n'intambara ari naho hagaragara imibare myinshi y'@@ imp@@ unz@@ i,@@ ibihugu by'@@ afurika biza ku isonga ni Somalia, Sudani, Sudani y'amaj@@ yepfo, Centre Afrika RDC na Erit@@ ere@@ a Insanganyamatsiko y'uyu mwaka ifite intego igamije gushyiraho gahunda zigamije impinduka ku bagore n'abakobwa bari mu bihugu by@@ ugarijwe n'ibihe bibi. Abana bo mu nkambi y'@@ abarundi i Mahama baby@@ inira abashyitsi
Sin@@ emera ko Afurika yar@@ emewe guhora inyum@@ a-@@ Perezida Kagame Perezida w’u Rwanda Paul Kagame yavuze ko Afurika n’abay@@ ituye badakwiye kwemera ko bar@@ emewe guhora inyuma, ahubwo ko bakwiye kwishakamo ibisubizo bagatera imbere nk’@@ abandi. Yab@@ ibwiye abagize akanama k’@@ Umutekano k’@@ Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu, aho bari i Kigali mu mwiherero wabo ngaruk@@ amw@@ aka. Perezida Kagame ukunze kuvuga ko Afurika ifite buri cyose ngo it@@ ere imbere, yavuze ko mbere na mbere habanza umutekano, ibindi big@@ akurikir@@ aho. Yakomeje avuga ko igikenewe ari ukureba icyakorwa kig@@ ateza umugabane wa Afurika kur@@ enzaho hah@@ erewe ku bisanzwe bihari. Yagize ati “H@@ atari amahoro n’umutekano, iterambere ntir@@ yabah@@ o.@@ Bir@@ asaba kureba igikwiye gukorwa ngo turusheho gutera imbere duhereye ku bisanzwe bih@@ ari.” Kagame yavuze ko at@@ emeranya n’abavuga ko Afurika yar@@ emewe guhora inyuma. Ati “Ni iby’@@ ing@@ eni kumva ko nta handi dut@@ eze amak@@ iriro atari kuri twe ubw@@ acu. B@@ isa n’aho tw@@ emeye guhora inyuma, ko uwo ariwo mwanya wacu@@ .@@ Njye sin@@ umva ko koko uwo mwanya ariwo wacu@@ .”

Muri uru rubanza rwar@@ eg@@ wagamo abantu 12, batatu nibo bahamwe n’icyaha cyo kunyereza umutungo no gukoresha nabi umutungo ufitiye rubanda inyungu, hanyuma icyaha cyo gukoresha impapuro mpimbano kikaba cy@@ abah@@ anag@@ uweho bose. Icyo gihe han@@ abaye amatora aho 5@@ 3% by’@@ abari bahagarariye abandi, batoye bamagana ishy@@ ingirwa ry’@@ abar@@ yamana bahuje imiterere y’@@ umubiri. Abafana ba Arsenal FC bar@@ emeye imiryango 86 y’@@ abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Abafana b’ikipe ya Arsenal bo mu Rwanda kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 17 Mata 2020 bar@@ emeye imiryango 86 yo mu Murenge wa Jali mu Karere ka Gasabo igizwe n’abac@@ itse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, aho bahaye iyi miryango inkunga y’@@ ibiribwa bizera ko iz@@ ayifasha muri ibi bihe abantu basabwa kuguma mu rugo kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19. Buri mwaka mu myaka itandatu ishize, abafana b’ikipe ya Arsenal FC yo mu Bwongereza bibumbiye mu itsinda rizwi nka Rwanda Arsenal Fan Club (R@@ AF@@ C) bifatanya n’Abanyarwanda cyane cyane mu gihe cyo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, bitewe n’ib@@ ikenewe bakag@@ enera inkunga imiryango y’@@ abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside. Inkunga batanze igizwe n’ibiribwa aho buri muryango baw@@ uhaye ibiro 10 by’@@ umuceri, ibiro 10 bya kaw@@ unga, ibiro 10 by’@@ ibishyimbo, litiro 2 z’@@ amavuta yo guteka n’ibiro bitanu by’@@ isuk@@ ari. Kevin Aaron Mwam@@ i, umuyobozi wa RA@@ FC yagize ati “T@@ uzi ko iyi miryango y’@@ abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ari imwe mu miryango ihanganye n’ibibazo turimo muri iyi minsi kuko bamwe muri bo bat@@ ungwa n’ibyo bakoreye uwo munsi. Bashobora kuba bafite ibindi bakeneye tut@@ amenya ariko mpamvu ku nkunga y’@@ ibiribwa tw@@ abahaye tw@@ ongeyeho n’amafaranga make kuri buri muryango kugira ngo ba@@ yakoresh@@ e bitewe n’ibyo bak@@ en@@ eye.” RA@@ FC isanzwe y@@ ifatanya n’Abanyarwanda muri rusange mu bikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ukan@@ ategura ibikorwa bitandukanye byo kuremera no kwegera abacitse ku icum@@ u. Umwaka ushize basuye abasaza n’abak@@ ecuru barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bafite umushinga wo guhinga ibih@@ um@@ yo, babat@@ era inkunga y’inzu yo gukoreramo uwo mushinga, mu gihe muri 2018 bari b@@ ubakiye inzu ebyiri abacitse ku icumu bo mu Karere ka Bugesera. Ikipe ya Arsenal FC ni imwe mu makipe yo mu Bwongereza afite abafana benshi mu Rwanda, ikaba in@@ amamaza ibikorwa by’@@ ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda birimo kwambara no gukinana imyenda yanditseho Visit Rwanda. Abakinnyi bayo barimo umunya-@@ Brazil David Luiz uheruka gusura u Rwanda, baherutse gutanga ubutumwa bifatanya n’Abanyarwanda muri ibi bihe byo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. RA@@ FC yashinzwe n’abafana ba Arsenal muri 2013 ubu ikaba igizwe n’abanyamuryango barenga 1000. Uretse ibikorwa byo gufana iyi kipe bih@@ ebeye no gus@@ abana, iri tsinda ry@@ itabira ibikorwa bijyanye na siporo, iterambere ry’@@ imibereho y’abaturage, imiyoborere ndetse n’ubukerarugendo by’umwihariko muri gahunda ya Visit Rwanda. RDB igiye guhemba abashoramari b’@@ icyitegererezo Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) cyatangaje ko kigiye guhemba abashoramari b’@@ indashyikirwa mu rwego rwo gutera inkunga ibigo by’ubucuruzi bifat@@ iye runini u Rwanda mu iterambere. Ibyo bihembo bigiye gutangwa ku nshuro ya gatanu bizatangwa mu byiciro umunani bifite aho bihuriye n’inzego z’iterambere Leta y’u Rwanda ishyizemo ingufu muri iki gihe. Umuyobozi wa RDB, Clare Akam@@ anzi, yavuze ko bateg@@ anyije iyo gahunda mu rwego rwo gushimira abashoramari uruhare rwabo mu bur@@ umbuke bw’igihugu. Yagize ati “Niba abashoramari baratw@@ umvise bakemera gushora imari mu gihugu bah@@ agera bagakora neza cyane twumva dukwiriye kubashimira tuk@@ abah@@ emba. Mu gutanga ibihembo kandi tw@@ ereka abandi bashoramari icyitegererezo bakwiriye kugend@@ eraho mu kunoza imikorere yab@@ o.” Umuyobozi Ushinzwe Ibikorwa muri RDB, Emmanuel H@@ ateg@@ eka, yasobanuye ko ibyiciro umunani by’@@ ibihembo bizatangwa ari icy’@@ umushoramari w’umw@@ ak@@ a; uw@@ ohereza ibintu mu mahanga w’umw@@ ak@@ a; uwag@@ aragaje udushya kurusha aband@@ i; umugore w’@@ umushoramari w’umw@@ ak@@ a; umushoramari mut@@ o; uwat@@ eje imbere ibyo mu Rwanda cyane; abashoramari bo muri serivisi n’abashoramari bibumbiye mu bikorwa bishingiye ku ng@@ anda. Umuyobozi wa RDB, Clare Akamanzi Ibiz@@ ashingirwaho mu gutoranya uhembwa Mu kureba umushoramari w’umwaka haz@@ arebwa ku gaciro k’@@ imishinga yash@@ oyemo imari muri uyu mwaka, ingano y’abo yahaye akazi, uburyo ibikorwa bye byahinduye ubuzima bw’abanyarwanda bikan@@ ateza imbere ubukungu, no gukoresha ibikorerwa mu Rwanda. Ku muntu uzah@@ emberwa kohereza ibicuruzwa mu mahanga haz@@ arebwa uburyo bah@@ esheje agaciro ibyo bacuruza bigatuma barushaho kung@@ uka; ingano y’@@ inyungu y’ibyo bacur@@ uje mu mahanga muri uyu mwak@@ a; guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu gihugu@@ ; kurema ubufatanye n’ubuc@@ uti n’ibindi bigo by’ubucuruzi mu mah@@ anga; n’ingano y’@@ amoko y’ibyo bacur@@ uza. U@@ wah@@ anze udushya ni uzaba yerekanye ibicuruzwa bishya bidasanzwe ku isoko mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, yar@@ im@@ itse ikoranabuhanga, ahindura ubuzima bw’abaturage kubera udushya, kandi yerekana ko ibyo akoresha biz@@ aram@@ ba. Umugore uz@@ ahembwa azaba ari umwe mu bashinze ikigo cy’@@ ubucuruzi, agatera imbere, afite intego, ingufu no gukunda ibyo akora, kandi ashaka kuzamura abagenzi be b’@@ abari n’abategarugori mu bucuruzi. U@@ zah@@ emberwa kuba umushoramari ukiri muto azaba atar@@ engeje imyaka 35 kandi yar@@ ateye imbere bigaragara mu bucuruzi bwe. Naho uz@@ ahabwa igihembo cyo guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu gihugu agomba kuba azwiho cyane mu gucuruza ibifite irem@@ e, yari itabiriye amam@@ urikagurisha kandi agerageza kumenyekanisha ibyo akora mu gihugu no mu mahanga. Abah@@ atanira ibihembo bazas@@ uzumwa n’impuguke mu ibaruramari n’ishoramari zo mu kigo cya Del@@ o@@ itt@@ e, hanyuma bator@@ anywe mu byiciro bitandukanye binyuze muri za komite ziz@@ ashyir@@ waho, ibihembo bizatangwa muri Mutarama 2018. Cyusa Ibrahim agize amahirwe yo gukora igitaramo kimwe muri 2 yari gukorera mu Bubiligi Umuhanzi Cyusa Ibrahim n’itsinda rye Gakondo bat@@ uruk@@ anye mu Rwanda bagiye mu bitaramo mu Bubiligi, bagize amahirwe yo gukora kimwe mu bitaramo bibiri bagombaga gukorera mu Bubiligi. Mu butumwa yoherereje umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today, Cyusa yavuze ko bavuye mu Rwanda bafite amakuru ko u Bubiligi bwari butar@@ atangira guhagarika ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi, ku buryo bumvaga ko bashobora kugira amahirwe bagakora ibitaramo byabo bibiri bari batum@@ iw@@ emo. Icyakora ubwo bari bamaze kugera muri iki gihugu, Leta y’u Bubiligi yahise itangaza ko guhera ku wa 13 Werurwe 2020 saa sita z’ijoro nta gikorwa gihuza abantu benshi kiz@@ ongera kuba kugeza igihe haz@@ asohokera irindi bwiriza rishy@@ a. Ubundi Cyusa n’itsinda rye yise Gak@@ ondo, bagombaga gukora igitaramo cya mbere ahitwa E@@ mb@@ r@@ ella kuri uyu mugoroba wo ku wa Gatanu bakag@@ eza saa sita nk’uko uruhushya rwabo rwab@@ iteg@@ any@@ aga, mu gihe icya kabiri cyagombaga kuzaba ku wa Gatandatu ku itariki 14 Werurwe 2020. Kubera ko itegeko riteganya ko ibikorwa bih@@ agarikwa guhera saa sita z’ijoro, Cyusa n’itsinda rye bahise bakomeza igitaramo cyabo cyo ku wa gatanu bakag@@ isoza saa tatu z’ijoro. Abanyarwanda benshi baba mu Bubiligi, bari bamaze igihe biteguye iki gitaramo, kandi abenshi bagombaga kuzitabira igitaramo cya kabiri cyari kuz@@ abera i Bruxelles ahitwa St. Lamb@@ ert@@ . Icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyagize ingaruka zikomeye ku muziki n’imyidagaduro muri rusange. Hari ibitaramo bikomeye birenga 53 byamaze gusubikwa nyamara amatike yabyo yaramaze no kugurish@@ wa. Muri ibyo bitaramo harimo ibyo Mari@@ ah Car@@ ey yari kuz@@ akorera i Burayi, ibitaramo bya Mil@@ ey Cy@@ rus@@ , Mad@@ ona n’abandi bahanzi benshi bari mu bikorwa byo kwitegura ibitaramo biz@@ enguruka Amerika n’u Burayi. Bwe@@ yeye ni Umurenge uri kure ugereranyije n’indi muri Rusizi ug@@ ikeneye ibikorwaremezo ariko umuriro w’amashanyarazi batangiye kuw@@ uc@@ ana kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki ya 24 Nyakanga 2017. Uyu muriro uzag@@ abanya ingendo twakoraga tujya I Burundi tujya gus@@ ud@@ ira ibyuma byacu, amagare na za moto. Tw@@ ac@@ anaga za buj@@ i bigatuma duf@@ unga nka saa moya ariko ubu twar@@ aye tuby@@ ina kugeza saa t@@ anu, twumvaga ari inzozi none ubuyobozi bwacu bub@@ ishyize mu bikor@@ wa.” Musabyimana Leon@@ c@@ ie yunzemo ati “Tw@@ ac@@ anaga buj@@ i n’ibish@@ irira tuk@@ agenda tuz@@ ung@@ agiza ariko ubu turak@@ anda ku gik@@ uta tug@@ acana nyin@@ e; ubu haje umuriro tugomba kujya muri salon abari injiji tukaba inj@@ ij@@ uke, ubundi tug@@ atera imbere muri rusange.” Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Bwe@@ ye@@ ye, Sind@@ ayih@@ eba Aphrod@@ is, yavuze ko uyu murenge wari mu bwigunge bityo bakaba bashima Perezida Paul kagame waw@@ ub@@ emereye none akaba asoh@@ oje amasezerano. Ubushinjacyaha bugiye gusaba ko Sylv@@ ère Ah@@ or@@ ugeze yoherezwa mu Rwanda Ubushinjacyaha bw’u Rwanda bwatangaje ko but@@ eganya kongera gusaba ko Sylv@@ ère Ah@@ or@@ ugeze yagar@@ urwa mu gihugu av@@ anwe muri Den@@ mar@@ k, kugira ngo abazwe ku byaha bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ak@@ ekwaho. Sylv@@ ère Ah@@ or@@ ugeze yahoze ari Umuyobozi w’Ikigo gishinzwe iby’@@ indege za gis@@ ivile mbere ya Jenoside, ubu atuye muri Denmark y@@ idegem@@ by@@ a, mu gihe hari ibimenyetso bim@@ ushinja kugira uruhare mu kwica Abatutsi. Ah@@ or@@ ugeze yatawe muri yombi mu 2008 na Polisi Mpuzamahanga kubera ubusabe bwatanzwe n’@@ Ubushinjacyaha bw’u Rwanda ku byaha bya Jenoside, gusa nyuma yaje kuvanwa muri gereza atageze imbere y’@@ ubutabera. Ah@@ or@@ ugeze wari utuye muri Denmark icyo gihe yatawe muri yombi muri Suède ubwo yashakaga kong@@ eresha pasiporo y’umuryango we, kuri Ambasade y’u Rwanda iri mu Murwa Mukuru St@@ ock@@ hol@@ m. Gusa ntiyigeze ab@@ uranishwa cyangwa ngo az@@ anwe mu Rwanda, nyuma yaje kurekurwa ahita asubira muri Denmark aho atuye ubu. Umushinjacyaha Mukuru w’u Rwanda Jean Bosco Mut@@ angana, yabwiye The New Times, ko barimo kongera gukorana na Denmark kuri iki kibazo. Mutangana yavuze ko uyu mugabo agomba kuz@@ anwa imbere y’ubutabera nubwo nta byaha inkiko zo muri Denmark zigeze zig@@ enzura kugira ngo zim@@ ubur@@ an@@ ishe cyangwa ngo babe bah@@ amagaza abat@@ angabuh@@ amya. Ah@@ or@@ ugeze ashinjwa gukoresha umwanya yari afite w’ubutegetsi mu gucura iyicwa ry’@@ abatutsi batari bake, cyane cyane mu gace ka Gikondo aho yari atuye. Abarokotse Jenoside bari batuye i Gikondo, bavuga ko ikintu cyatuma bat@@ uza ari uko babona Ah@@ or@@ ugeze az@@ anwa imbere y’ubutabera ak@@ abaz@@ wa. Umwe mu barokotse yasabye leta gushyiramo imbaraga kugira ngo Ah@@ or@@ ugeze agar@@ urwe mu Rwanda kandi ag@@ ezwe imbere y’@@ ub@@ ubat@@ era. Uyu mutangabuhamya yagize ati “@@ Ikibabaje ni uko uyu mugabo yafatwaga nk’@@ inshuti y’@@ umuryango, ndam@@ uzi neza, yari umuyobozi w’ikigo cy’@@ iteganyagihe cyabaga ahitwa ku Gitega akaba kandi Umuyobozi ku Kibuga cy’@@ Ind@@ ege, yari umuntu ufite umumaro icyo gihe ariko aba umuntu mub@@ i.” Abarokotse Jenoside bavuze ko leta ikwiye gukoresha imbaraga kugira ngo abakekwaho gukora Jenoside bat@@ abwe muri yombi kandi bag@@ ezwe imbere y’ubut@@ areba aho bari hose. Kugeza ubu abagabo babiri aribo Emmanuel Mbarushimana na W@@ enc@@ es@@ las Tw@@ angir@@ ayezu bagejejwe mu Rwanda nyuma y’@@ umwanzuro w’Urukiko rwo muri Den@@ mar@@ k, kubera ibyaha bya Jenoside bashinj@@ waga. Mbarushimana we yahise akatirwa gufungwa burundu mu 2017 kubera kugira uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Mbere y’amatora yabaye kuri uyu wa 28 Mutarama 2018, hari bamwe mu bifuzaga kwiyamamaza mu buyobozi bwa RA@@ F baby@@ angiwe kubera impamvu zitandukanye, abandi bakuramo kandidatire zabo ku bushake, byatumye hasigara umukandida umwe rukumbi ku mwanya wa Perezida. Tuz@@ akorana cyane n’abahoze bakina uyu mukino bifuza gutanga umusanzu wabo ariko uzaza ashaka gusenya uwo nta mwanya az@@ abona. Tugomba gusezera ibihe by’@@ akavuyo no kwica amategeko nkana kugira ngo tuz@@ abashe kugera aho twifuz@@ a.” Abajijwe ku ngamba afite zizatuma umukino wo gusiganwa ku maguru ushobora gutunga uw@@ ukora, yagize ati “Ubundi umuntu ashobora gukora siporo yishim@@ isha cyangwa akay@@ igira umwuga. Ushaka kuy@@ igira umwuga rero na we hari ibyo ashyiramo kugira ngo agire uwo musar@@ uro. RA@@ F ihuza amakip@@ e, na yo akaba ariyo afite abakinnyi, tugomba gufat@@ anyiriza hamwe kugira ngo tuz@@ am@@ ure urw@@ ego, uyu mukino ub@@ yar@@ ire inyungu zifatika abaw@@ ukor@@ a.” Yavuze ko atar@@ enganya amakipe kuba amenshi atagira umushahara agenera abakinnyi kuko amikoro akiri make cyane, ay@@ asezeranya kuzay@@ afasha mu gukora ubuvugizi hirya no hino. Abam@@ ug@@ ariye ku rugamba baz@@ iband@@ waho mu muganda udasanzwe w’urubyiruko Mu rwego rwo kuzirikana ubwitange bw’@@ abamug@@ ariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, mu gihugu hose hateganyijwe umuganda udasanzwe w’urubyiruko uz@@ ibanda ku kubafasha mu bikorwa bitandukanye. Uyu muganda udasanzwe wa buri gihembwe uteganyijwe mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 21 Mutarama 2017 ukaz@@ abera muri buri kagari mu gihugu hose. Uyu muganda wateguwe n’inama y’igihugu y’urubyiruko ku bufatanye na Minisiteri y’urubyiruko n’ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwitegura umunsi w’@@ intwari no kugaragaza uruhare rw’@@ urubyiruko mu kuzirikana ubutwari bwar@@ anze intwari z’u Rwanda. Abam@@ ug@@ ariye ku rugamba ni bo baz@@ iband@@ waho muri uyu muganda aho baz@@ akorerwa ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo gus@@ anirwa amazu, ubwiherero cyangwa indi mirimo irimo kwah@@ irira amatungo, guhinga, kum@@ esa n’ibindi bikorwa by’isuku bitewe n’ibyo abaz@@ afashwa bifuza. Urubyiruko rur@@ asabwa kwitabira iki gikorwa mu rwego rwo kuzirikana ubutwari bw’@@ intwari z’u Rwanda no kwitegura umunsi w’@@ intwari uba tariki 01 Gashyantare buri mwaka. U Rwanda na Congo byiyemeje gufatanya kurandura icyorezo cya Ebola Minisitiri ushinzwe ubuzima mu gihugu cya Congo Dr Et@@ eni Long@@ ondo yatangaje ubufatanye bw’u Rwanda na Congo buz@@ ar@@ andura icyorezo cya Ebola kig@@ aragaje inshuro 10 mu gihugu cya Congo. Intumwa z’u Rwanda n’iza Congo zag@@ aniriye ku bufatanye bw’ibihugu byombi mu gukumira no kurandura Ebola Yabitangaje mu rugendo rw’@@ umunsi umwe yagiriye mu gihugu cy’u Rwanda. Dr Et@@ eni Long@@ ondo na mugenzi we w’u Rwanda Dr Diane Gash@@ umba, bar@@ ebeye hamwe ingamba ibihugu byih@@ aye mu gukumira icyorezo cya Ebola. Amasezerano y’ubufatanye mu kurwanya Ebola yashyizweho umukono tariki ya 6 Kanama 2019, ibihugu byombi by@@ iyemeza gufatanya mu gukumira icyorezo cya Ebola kiri muri Kivu y’Amajyaruguru. Mu nama yahuje amatsinda y’ibihugu byombi ku ruhande rw’ u Rwanda yari akur@@ iwe na Minisitiri Dr. Diane Gashumba mu gihe intumwa zo ku ruhande rwa Congo zari zik@@ uriwe na Minisitiri Dr Et@@ eni Long@@ ondo. Bag@@ aniriye ku kurwanya Ebola nyuma y’@@ izindi nama zabaye mu Mujyi wa Goma na Bukavu baganira ku nkingo ziz@@ ahabwa abaturage ariko baganira n’aho bageze mu gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda yo guhangana na Ebola. Minisitiri Gashumba yashimiye ubuyobozi bwa Congo uburyo bwashyize imbaraga mu gukumira Ebola birinda ko yagera mu Rwanda ndetse hakaba har@@ abaye imikoranire myiza mu guhana amakuru hagati y’ibihugu byombi. Minisitiri Long@@ ondo we yavuze ko uruzinduko rwe mu Rwanda rw@@ ibanda kuri Ebola kandi ko ari rwo rugendo akoze bwa mbere kuva abaye Minisitiri w’@@ Ubuz@@ ima. Yagize ati "Tw@@ ashyize imbaraga mu kurwanya Ebola kandi tuk@@ abigeraho dufatanyije n’abandi, aho ngomba guhura n’abafatanyabikorwa mu mujyi wa Goma. Ejo nzajya Beni na Bun@@ ia kugira ngo menye uko bih@@ agaze. Nk’ igihugu cya Congo tuz@@ ashyiraho uburyo bushoboka mu gukuraho Ebola ariko tug@@ atekereza no ku ngamba zih@@ amye. K@@ iriya cyorezo kig@@ aragaje ku nshuro ya 10, gushyiramo amafaranga menshi ntibih@@ agije ahubwo bigomba kujyana no gushyiraho uburyo bwo kwirinda icyorezo no kug@@ ik@@ um@@ iram@@ ira kandi ni byo twifuz@@ a." Twahirwa Alexand@@ re, umuyobozi ushinzwe imigendekere myiza y'akazi muri M@@ IFOT@@ RA B@@ yavug@@ iwe mu biganiro byahuje urugaga rw'abikorera mu Rwanda (PS@@ F), M@@ IFOT@@ R@@ A, bamwe mu bakoresha na s@@ endika z'@@ abak@@ oz@@ i,@@ kuri uyu wa 6 Ukwakira 2016. Umuyobozi mukuru wa PS@@ F, Ruz@@ ibiza Steph@@ en, avuga sosiyete runaka it@@ atera imbere hatari ubwumvikane hagati y'abakozi mu nzego zose. Ati "Niba umuntu afite sosiyete y'@@ ubucuruzi, yar@@ ateganyije n'ingamba zo kuy@@ iteza imbere, ntiy@@ abigeraho niba at@@ umvikana n'abo akoresha kuko ari bo bashyira mu bikorwa ya mish@@ anga ye". Umuyobozi mukuru wa PS@@ F, Ruz@@ ibiza Steph@@ en, avuga ko bazakomeza gutegura ibiganiro bigamije kurengera imibereho myiza y'abakozi PSF ivuga ko izakomeza gutegura ibiganiro nk'ibi hirya no hino mu gihugu. Iyi kompanyi y’indege yo muri Amerika ni imwe muri za kompanyi za mbere zikomeye zitwara abantu mu ndege yiyemeje kugura izo ’@@ tax@@ i’ zig@@ uruka. United Airlines izan@@ ashora imari muri kompanyi Arch@@ er y’imodoka za ’@@ tax@@ i’ zig@@ uruka, nkuko bikubiye mu masezerano afite agaciro ka miliyari 1.@@ 1 y’amadolari y’Amerika yo guteza imbere ubwo buryo bwo gutwara abantu n’ib@@ intu. Iyi kompanyi icy@@ eneye guhabwa uruhushya n’urwego rug@@ enzura ibyo gutwara abantu mu ndege, mbere yuko ikomeza na gahunda yayo yo kugura izo ’@@ tax@@ i’ zig@@ uruka. United Airlines iz@@ afatanya na kompanyi y’indege Mes@@ a Airlines ikorera mu karere Amerika iher@@ ere@@ yemo, muri iyo gahunda yo kugura imodoka za kompanyi Arch@@ er zikoreshwa n’@@ amashanyarazi. Z@@ ih@@ aguruka buh@@ agarike kandi zik@@ agwa muri ubwo buryo buzwi mu mp@@ ine nka e@@ V@@ T@@ OL@@ . Y@@ az@@ itum@@ ije kuri miliyari imwe y’@@ amadolari. Ayo masezerano abonwa nk’ikimenyetso cyo kwemera imikorere ya kompanyi Arch@@ er icy@@ ishak@@ isha, iyi ikaba yavuze ko nyuma y’aya masezerano igiye gufungura imigabane yayo ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane ry’@@ Amerika. Abandi bashoramari muri iyo kompanyi barimo nka kompanyi nshya St@@ ell@@ ant@@ is ikora imodoka yashinzwe mu kwezi gushize nyuma yo guhuzwa kwa kompanyi Fi@@ at Chrys@@ ler na PS@@ A Group yo mu Bufaransa. United Airlines na Mes@@ a Airlines zavuze ko z@@ iteganya gukoresha izo ’@@ tax@@ i’ zig@@ uruka mu gutwara abagenzi zib@@ anyuza hejuru y’@@ imihanda minini irimo umub@@ yigano w’@@ ibinyabiziga ziba@@ jyana ku bibuga by’@@ indege. Kompanyi Arch@@ er ifite icyicaro muri leta ya California ivuga ko izo ’@@ tax@@ i’ ziz@@ ashobora kug@@ uruka ahantu h’@@ intera ya 95@@ km zig@@ endera ku muvuduko wa 24@@ 0@@ km ku isaha (@@ 24@@ 0@@ km@@ /@@ h@@ ). Kandi ngo zishobora no kugabanya hafi kimwe cya kabiri cy’@@ imyuka ihumanya ikirere ku bagenzi barimo kwerekeza ku kibuga cy’indege bakoresheje ibinyabiziga bisanzwe. Muri ayo masezerano, harimo n’ingingo yuko United Airlines na Mes@@ a Airlines zishobora no kugura izindi ’@@ tax@@ i’ zig@@ uruka zifite agaciro ka miliyoni 500 z’amadolari. Muri iki gihe cy’@@ icyorezo cya coronavirus, byabaye ngombwa ko kompanyi z’indege zig@@ abanya amafaranga zikoresha kubera ko hari igihe cyageze gutwara abagenzi mu ndege big@@ ahagarara. Gufasha abanyamuryango kubona amacumbi na telef@@ on@@ i-@@ Imihigo ya Zig@@ ama CS@@ S mu 2020 Koperative yo kuzigama no kugur@@ izanya Zig@@ ama C@@ SS@@ , yatangaje ko mu igenamigambi ryayo rya 2020, iz@@ ibanda mu gufasha abanyamuryango gusezera ku buk@@ ode bw’@@ amacumbi no kubafasha kubona telefoni kugira ngo babashe gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu gusaba serivisi z’@@ imari. Iyi koperative ihur@@ iwemo n’abagize inzego z’@@ umutekan@@ o; Ingabo z’igihugu, Aba@@ polisi, abarinda amag@@ ereza, abagize Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha (RIB) n’abakozi ba Laboratwari y’u Rwanda y’@@ ibimenyetso bishingiye ku bumenyi n’ubuh@@ anga. Mu nama rusange ya 32 ya Zig@@ ama C@@ SS@@ , yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatanu, hatangajwe igenamigambi rya 2020, riz@@ ibanda ku gukoresha ik@@ r@@ anabuhanga muri iyi banki no gufasha abanyamuryango kubona amac@@ umbi. Perezida w’Inama y’Ubutegetsi ya Zig@@ ama C@@ SS@@ , Dr Ndahiro James, yabwiye itangazamakuru ko umwaka utaha baz@@ agerageza gushora imari mu bikorwa bifasha abanyamuryango cyane cyane gutunga inzu no kubona telefoni. Ati “Hari serivisi tw@@ enda kubaha zijyanye no kubona amatelef@@ oni cyangwa se ikoreshwa ry’@@ amatelef@@ oni rik@@ agera ku banyamuryango bacu benshi ku buryo noneho bigabanya ingendo za buri muns@@ i”. Asobanura ko ari ibintu bagenda bashyiramo ingufu kugira ngo n’ikoranabuhanga bashaka kujyamo r@@ ikor@@ e, hirindwa ko ry@@ ajyaho ariko abar@@ ishyir@@ iweho ntibar@@ ikoreshe kuko nta buryo bwo kur@@ iger@@ amo bafite. Ati “T@@ uz@@ ashyira ingufu mu gushakira abanyamuryango bacu amacumbi cyane cyane abanyamuryango bagiye kugira inzu ya mbere cyangwa se ari bwo bwa mbere bagiye kwishakira ic@@ mbi, abo nibo tuz@@ aha umwihariko cyane”. Dr Ndahiro avuga ko bateg@@ anyije gushyiraho ikigega no gukangurira abanyamuryango ko iyo serivisi ihari, uko baz@@ aby@@ itabira akaba ari byo bizag@@ ena amafaranga baz@@ akoresha. Abajijwe igihe izi serivisi zo gufasha abanyamuryango kubona amacumbi ziz@@ atang@@ ir@@ ira, Dr Ndahiro yagize ati “@@ n’uyu muns@@ i”. Zig@@ ama CS@@ S kandi irashaka gushora imari cyane mu bijyanye n’@@ ikoranabuhanga, aho yifuza ko abakozi bayo bose barih@@ ug@@ urwamo kuko urwego rw’@@ imari muri iyi minsi rugenda ruh@@ indura imikor@@ ere. Dr Ndahiro ati “T@@ uz@@ ashyira ingufu mu mahugurwa, mu kugura ibikoresho bijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga ndetse no kurinda umutungo w’@@ abanyamur@@ yang@@ o”. Intego ikaba ari uko ‘@@ buri munyamuryango wa Zig@@ ama C@@ SS@@ , yabona serivisi ashaka at@@ avuganye n’umun@@ tu, adat@@ eze, adat@@ elef@@ onn@@ ye, ahubwo aho ari akaby@@ ikor@@ er@@ a’. Uyu mwaka iz@@ unguka miliyari 10 FRW@@ , zivuye kuri miliyari 9@@ FRW@@ , yungutse umwaka ushize ndetse umwaka utaha iyi nyungu ikaz@@ iyongera ikagera kuri miliyari 12@@ FRW@@ . Ati “Y@@ iyongera ku bushobozi bwa banki bityo ikaba yabasha guha abanyamuryango inguzanyo ku buryo buhagije ndetse ni nayo mpamvu usanga iyi banki yita ku banyamuryango cyane, ni uko n’iyo nyungu yungutse ig@@ um@@ amo ikongera ubushobozi bwo gutanga inguzany@@ o”. Ibi bigaragazwa n’uko abantu batangiye bag@@ uza ibihumbi 30 FRW bageze ku rwego rwo kug@@ uza miliyoni 10 cyangwa miliyoni 15 FRW@@ . Inyungu ku nguzanyo muri Zig@@ ama C@@ SS@@ , ni 13@@ % ku bafata umwenda wa miliyoni 5 kum@@ anura naho abafata miliyoni 5 kuzamura inyungu ni 15@@ %. Rwamagana: Rwarakabije yasabye imfungwa n'abag@@ ororwa kugaragaza ukuri kuri Jenoside Komiseri Mukuru w'@@ Urwego rw'Igihugu rushinzwe Imfungwa n'@@ Abag@@ ororwa, Paul Rwar@@ akab@@ ije, arasaba imfungwa n'abag@@ ororwa kugaragaza ukuri kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kandi ak@@ ihan@@ angiriza zimwe mu mfungwa n'abag@@ ororwa zishyira igitutu kuri bagenzi bazo ziba@@ buza kuvuga ukuri kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Y@@ abis@@ abye ku wa 13 Mata 2015 ubwo yari muri Gereza ya Rwamagana (@@ Ns@@ ind@@ a), aganira n'@@ imfungwa n'abag@@ ororwa mu muhango wo gusoza icyumweru cy'@@ icyunamo cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 21 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu mwaka wa 1994. Komiseri Mukuru w'@@ urwego rw'Igihugu rushinzwe Imfungwa n'@@ Abag@@ ororwa, Paul Rwar@@ akab@@ ije, yasabye abaf@@ unzwe ukuri kuri Jenoside. Komiseri Rwarakabije yavuze ko mu gihe bamwe mu bafungiye muri Gereza ya Rwamagana bavuga ko ibiganiro byatanzwe mu gihe cy'@@ icyunamo by@@ abafashije kub@@ ohoka ndetse bamwe bagatanga ubuh@@ amya, ngo bibabaje kuba hari abandi badak@@ ozwa ibyo kuvuga ukuri kuri Jenoside ndetse ngo bagashyira igitutu ku zindi mfungwa baz@@ ibuza kugaragaza ukuri no gutanga ubuh@@ amya. By'@@ umwihariko, bamwe mu bahoze ari ba Burugumesitiri b'@@ amakom@@ ini, batunzwe agatoki kuri iyo myitwarire mibi ndetse biba ngombwa ko Komiseri Rwar@@ akab@@ ije, abahag@@ urutsa akabasaba kwemerera imbere y'@@ imbaga y'@@ izindi mfungwa n'abag@@ ororwa ko batazongera kurang@@ waho iyo myit@@ war@@ ire. Ubwo bahaguruk@@ aga, abahoze ari abayobozi b'@@ amwe mu m@@ akom@@ ini yo muri Perefegitura ya Kibungo, bafungiye muri Gereza ya Rwamagana, bagiye bavuga mu ijwi rir@@ angur@@ uye ko batazongera guhisha ukuri ndetse bamwe muri bo bakavuga ko batangiye kuk@@ ugaragaza kandi ngo bifuza umwanya kugira ngo batange ubuhamya kuri Jenoside yakorewe mu m@@ akom@@ ini bay@@ obor@@ aga, bityo ban@@ agaragaze uruhare rwabo. Imfungwa n'abag@@ ororwa baf@@ unguye bafungiye muri Gereza ya Rwamagana basabwe kugaragaza ukuri kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Nubwo hari abak@@ in@@ angiye bakab@@ uza n'abandi gutanga amakuru y'ukuri kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, bamwe mu bafungiye icyaha cya Jenoside bemeza ko kw@@ atura bak@@ avugisha ukuri byatumye baruh@@ uka ku mutima kandi nyuma y'imyaka 21 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ih@@ agar@@ itswe, bakaba baharanira kwigisha bagenzi babo ukuri. Habimana Emmanuel uzwi nka C@@ yas@@ a yakatiwe igifungo cya burundu nyuma yo guhamwa n'ibyaha bya Jenoside. Mu gihe cya Jenoside yari akuriye interahamwe muri D@@ egiteri y'@@ Umujyi wa Kibungo, akaba amaze imyaka 17 muri G@@ ereza. Avuga ko yahindutse cyane mu mutima we kandi akaba yaragize uruhare mu gufasha bagenzi be kwemera ibyaha no kub@@ isabira imbabazi. Af@@ atanyije na bagenzi be bafung@@ anywe muri Gereza ya Rwamagana, Habimana yashinze ihuriro (@@ Club@@ ) ryo kurwanya Jenoside n'@@ ingengabitekerezo yayo kandi ngo kuva ry@@ ajyaho muri Mata 2014, abantu 48@@ 6 bamaze kwandikira imiryango 6@@ 78 bah@@ emuk@@ iye, bay@@ isaba imbabazi. Emmanuel Ntivuguruzwa
Ibikorwa byo mu cyumweru cyahariwe G@@ AR@@ G na AERG byakomeje kuri uyu wa gatandatu - Amafoto Umuryango y'@@ abahoze ari abanyeshuri barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 (G@@ AER@@ G) n'uw@@ abakiri abanyeshuri AERG bayir@@ ok@@ otse, bari mu bikorwa byo gufasha gut@@ un@@ ag@@ anya inzibutso za Jenoside, ibikorwa byakom@@ ereje hirya no hino mu gihugu. Kigali Today ir@@ abakurikiranira uko ibyo bikorwa by@@ itab@@ ir@@ iwe. Iyo ni inzu y'@@ uwar@@ okotse Jenoside iherereye mu karere ka Rulindo, abanyamuryango ba G@@ AERG na AERG baray@@ ivugur@@ ura. Bah@@ ereye mu m@@ ishing@@ i bay@@ iz@@ amur@@ a. I Burasirazuba mu karere ka Rwamagana naho urubyiruko rwari rwitabiriye ibikorwa byo gusukura urw@@ ibutso. Bamwe mu rubyiruko rwo mu karere ka Rulindo rukora isuku ku rwibutso rwa Ngoma rushying@@ uwemo imibiri 1000, ni rumwe mu nz@@ ibutso nyinshi ziri muri aka karere. B@@ akoze n'amas@@ uku imbere mu rw@@ ibutso. Aha ni ku rwibutso ruherereye mu murenge wa Gishari mu karere ka Rwamagana, abari baje gukora umuganda ku rwibutso bategereje guhabwa uburenganzira kugira ngo batangire gukora amas@@ uku. Aha naho ni mu karere ka Gasabo aho urubyiruko rwah@@ uriye rukora isuku run@@ ah@@ arura ku rw@@ ibutso. Turacy@@ abakurikiranira uko iki gikorwa kiri bug@@ ende. Kigali Today

Kuri uyu wa kabiri ni bwo hatangiye amarushanwa nyafurika y’amakipe ya CAF Champions League na CAF Confederation Cup mu mwaka w’imikino 2018/201@@ 9. Intego za APR Fc ni ukur@@ enga aho Rayon Sports yageze APR FC ihagarariye u Rwanda muri CAF Champions League, ir@@ ahura na Club Afric@@ ain yo muri Tunisia kuri uyu wa Gatatu. Abo barimo Ronaldo w’imyaka 4@@ 3, washyizeho ifoto bari kumwe, Roberto Carlos w’imyaka 46 na Samuel Eto’o bakin@@ annye muri FC Barcel@@ one. Ubusanzwe Ronaldinho yajyaga yishimira isabukuru ye y’amavuko mu birori. Ubwo yuz@@ uzaga imyaka 26, yaraye mu kabyiniro ko mu Mujyi wa Barcelone kugeza saa K@@ umi n’ebyiri za mu gitondo mu gihe ubwo yagiraga imyaka 32, yizihije iyi s@@ abukuru iminsi itanu, bim@@ utwara ibihumbi 10 by’@@ ama-@@ eur@@ p muri hoteli ihenze y’i Rio de Jan@@ eiro muri Brés@@ il. ES@@ P@@ N yatangaje ko Ronaldinho "@@ ak@@ unz@@ we" na bagenzi be bafung@@ anywe nubwo amara igihe kinini muri kasho ya gereza, ibikorwa bye bya buri munsi bikaba gukina umupira n’im@@ f@@ ungwa n’abakozi ndetse no kwitabira amasomo y’@@ ub@@ ubaj@@ i. ES@@ P@@ N itangaza ko kandi uwo yaganiriye na we, yavuze ko “@@ Ronaldinho ameze neza muri g@@ erez@@ a” nubwo yabuze imwe mu nkingi z’ubuzima bw@@ e: umuziki. Igihe cye kinini nyuma yo gusezerera umupira w’amaguru akaba yarak@@ imaze acuranga ingoma za b@@ ongo. Yagize ati "Nt@@ ashobora gucuranga imbere muri gereza ariko nzi neza ko mu mutwe we azakomeza kugira injyana z’@@ indirimbo igihe azaba ari hanz@@ e." "@@ Ak@@ ina umupira w’amaguru buri munsi kandi yigisha abasore akina nabo amayeri make. Kuva akinjira muri gereza, yashakaga kumenyana n’izindi mfungwa kandi yahise abikora. Ni nk’@@ ikig@@ irwamana kuri benshi muri bo, bamusabye gusinya ku ng@@ of@@ ero, imipira bambara n’indi m@@ yambar@@ o.” Mu minsi ishize, hashyizwe hanze amafoto n’amashusho agaragaza uyu mugabo wabaye umukinnyi w’umwaka wa FIFA ku Isi inshuro ebyiri, yambaye ik@@ abutura n’@@ umupira, akina umupira muri gereza. Y@@ itabiriye kandi umukino wa F@@ uts@@ al mu cyumweru gishize, afasha ikipe ye gutsinda bagenzi babo b’@@ imfungwa ibitego 11@@ -@@ 2, aho bivugwa ko yatsinzemo ibitego bitanu akan@@ atanga imipira itandatu yavuyemo ibindi biteg@@ o. Mu minsi mike ishize kandi, Umuyobozi wa gereza, B@@ las V@@ era, yatangaje ko Ronaldinho na mukuru we, hari icyubahiro bah@@ abwa. Bas@@ angira ubwiherero n’izindi mfungwa ariko buri umwe afite kasho ye hamwe na televiziyo n’iby@@ uma bituma bagira umuyaga mu cyumba ndetse akaba ahabwa umwanya wo kuganira n’inshuti ze kuri WhatsAp@@ p, aho umwanya munini awuh@@ arira umuryango we. Undi waganiriye na ES@@ P@@ N yavuze ko umwanya munini Ronaldinho amara kuri telefoni, aw@@ umara avugana na nyina. Ati "@@ Av@@ ugana na nyina buri munsi nimugoroba. Ni umwe mu b@@ angayik@@ isha cyane Ronal@@ din@@ h@@ o." Nk’uko Ibiro ntaramakuru EF@@ E b@@ ibitangaza, ngo kuva abapolisi ba P@@ arag@@ u@@ ay batangiye gukora iperereza ku buryo Ronaldinho na mukuru we bagiye muri icyo gihugu, bamaze guta muri yombi abantu 14. Mu bafashwe harimo abayobozi benshi bo mu ishami rishinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka mu gihugu bafashije koroshya ikorwa ry’@@ izo mpapuro [@@ pas@@ ip@@ oro@@ ] mpimbano. Iyi mibare kandi irimo abagabo babiri bakoresheje ibihumbi 18@@ $ yo kubona pasiporo mpimbano, bishy@@ ikirije polisi mu cyumweru gishize. Wil@@ mond@@ es So@@ usa L@@ ira, Umunya-@@ Brés@@ il wahaye pasiporo aba bavandimwe, na we yatawe muri yombi. Abakora iperereza bavuga ko ubu barimo gusuzuma dosiye n’ubutumwa kuri telefone za Ronal@@ din@@ ho, mukuru we, n’abandi bantu bafatiwe muri iki kir@@ ego. Ronaldinho ngo amaze iminsi abar@@ iriza amakuru y’indege zikora ingendo hagati ya As@@ un@@ ci@@ ó@@ n na Rio de Jan@@ eiro kugira ngo nar@@ ekurwa azah@@ ite yerekeza ku kibuga cy’@@ indege. Ibur@@ anishwa rye ryabaye ryig@@ ijwe inyuma kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus nk’uko byemejwe n’umw@@ unganizi we, Sergio Que@@ ir@@ oz@@ . Ronaldinho yok@@ erejwe inyama n'@@ imfungwa bafung@@ anywe muri P@@ arag@@ u@@ ay Umunya-@@ Brés@@ il wabaye umukinnyi ukomeye, yizih@@ irije isabukuru y'imyaka 40 muri gereza Ronaldinho Ga@@ ú@@ c@@ ho yari afite ubuhanga bwihariye mu kibuga, akaba umukinnyi wakund@@ waga n'abafana b'@@ amakipe menshi

Gusa ntit@@ ugomba kurenza imyaka ibiri, ariko sin@@ ibwira ko tuz@@ an@@ ayig@@ ezaho nta mpamvu yabyo, ibindi tuzab@@ ibam@@ enyesh@@ a." Gahima w’imyaka 48 ni umugabo wubatse akaba afite abana 8. Rubavu: Uw@@ anze guh@@ ekera umuturanyi war@@ waje umuntu ahanishwa gucibwa inzoga Umuco wo gutabar@@ ana ufite umuzi kera kuva ku ngoma z’@@ abam@@ i. Uw@@ abaga atunguwe yat@@ abarw@@ aga n’abaturanyi bakamuha ubufasha bwo kumuh@@ ek@@ era. Mu myaka yo h@@ ambere, ingobyi yafatwaga nk’@@ intwaro y’@@ ubutabazi ku barwayi bar@@ embeye mu rugo bakeneye kugezwa kwa muganga. Uyu muco hari aho was@@ igaye na nubu aho usanga mu bice by’@@ icyaro abarwayi bagih@@ ekwa mu ng@@ obyi kuko batag@@ erwaho n’imb@@ angukiragut@@ abara. Urugero rwa hafi ni mu Murenge wa Busasamana mu Karere ka Rubavu aho uyu muco ukomeje kwim@@ akaz@@ wa. Abaturage bo muri aka gace mu kubumbatira umuco wo gutabar@@ ana barak@@ ebur@@ ana mu gihe hari bagenzi babo banze guh@@ ekera ukeneye kugeza umurwayi kwa muganga. Aba bats@@ imbaraye ku ndangagaciro zis@@ ig@@ asira umuco nko gufash@@ anya, gusabana no gutabar@@ ana. Abo mu Murenge wa Busasamana babwiye Ukwezi.com ko gufashanya babigize intego n’uw@@ ar@@ waje umuntu atari hafi y’imb@@ angukiragutabara bit@@ abaza abaturanyi bakamuh@@ ekera bakoresheje ingobyi gakondo. Nta byera ngo d@@ e! Hari bamwe mu bagabo bigize ba ntibind@@ eba bit@@ abazwa ngo bah@@ ekere abaturanyi bak@@ abatera utw@@ atsi. Sindikubwabo Augustin utuye mu Kagari ka Mak@@ oro mu Murenge wa Busasamana yavuze ko mu gufashanya hari abagenda biguru ntege mu gihe bit@@ abaj@@ we. Yagize ati “ Ubu nk’@@ iwacu dufite ingobyi gakondo y’@@ abarwayi, iyo umuntu arwaye nijoro imbangukiragutabara itari hafi, duhita t@@ umuh@@ eka kuko ari nk’@@ ishyirahamwe mu mud@@ ugudu. Uwit@@ abajwe akanga guh@@ eka kandi afite ubushobozi n’imbaraga zo kubikora, tur@@ amuh@@ ana tuk@@ amuca ij@@ erekani y’@@ ikig@@ age cyangwa abiri kugira ngo n’abandi bareb@@ ereh@@ o.” Uwitwa Nzayisenga François wo mu Mudugudu wa Kid@@ adi mu Kagari ka Mak@@ oro na we yavuze ko ab@@ igira ba ntibind@@ eba ntiba@@ fat@@ anye n’abandi bah@@ anirwa muri rusange. Ati “ Umuco wo gutabar@@ ana twe turacy@@ aw@@ ukom@@ eye@@ ho. Iyo hari ut@@ abajwe akan@@ anirwa gutabar@@ a, bashyiraho umwanya wo kumuh@@ anira mu ruhame, bakam@@ uca amafaranga ibihumbi bitanu cyangwa amaj@@ erekani abiri y’@@ inzoga cyangwa ikig@@ age abantu bakak@@ iny@@ wa.” Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akagari ka Kag@@ esh@@ i, Gac@@ am@@ ena Jean Nep@@ o, ashimangira ko umuco wo gufashanya no gutabar@@ ana ukomeye cyane muri Busas@@ am@@ ana, n’ubwo hakiri ab@@ igira ibig@@ ande ntibat@@ abare bagenzi babo aho rukom@@ eye. Yagize ati “@@ Umuco wo gufashanya no gutabar@@ ana uhagaze neza mu murenge wacu. Buri kagari gafite ingobyi gakondo ebyiri zo guh@@ ekamo abagize ikibazo. Mu mudugudu kandi dufit@@ emo k@@ avuz@@ amp@@ anda utabar@@ iza uwagize ikibazo abantu bak@@ abimenya bakamut@@ abara bw@@ angu, bakamuh@@ eka bakamug@@ eza kwa muganga. Ut@@ abajwe nt@@ ahag@@ ere ngo afashe abandi guh@@ eka, acibwa ij@@ erekani rimwe cyangwa abiri y’@@ ikig@@ age cyangwa urw@@ ag@@ wa.” Gac@@ am@@ ena avuga ko gusigasira umuco nyarwanda bimaze kubageza kuri byinshi mu murenge wabo, ngo kuko bibafasha mu bikorwa biteza imbere umuryango nyarwanda n’igihugu muri rusange. Uyu muhango wabaye ku wa Gatandatu tariki 24 Ukuboza 2016 ku cyicaro gikuru cy'@@ iri torero giherereye i Kibagabaga imbere ya Saint Ignace mu Murenge wa Kimironko mu Karere ka Gasabo. Itorero Umuriro wa Pent@@ ec@@ ote r@@ yaherukaga gusengera abashumba baryo mu myaka itandatu ishize. Ni ku nshuro ya kabiri bakoze iki gikorwa kuko baherukaga tariki ya 26 Ukuboza 2010 ari nabwo bwa mbere. Kicukiro: Urubyiruko rukora ‘@@ Pe@@ an@@ ut But@@ ter@@ ’ zifite umwihariko ’@@ kurusha iz@@ itumizwa muri Amerik@@ a’ Mu rwego rwo kwihangira umurimo, urubyiruko rwo mu Karere ka Kicukiro, Umurenge wa Nyarugunga bishyize hamwe bakora ‘@@ Pe@@ an@@ ut but@@ ter@@ ’ zis@@ igwa ku mig@@ ati zihariye kandi zih@@ endutse ugereranyije n’iz@@ itumizwa hanze y’u Rwanda. Mu kwezi kwa Werurwe 2016 nibwo abasore 4 batangije ishyirahamwe bise L@@ F@@ S@@ FC (L@@ ook@@ ing into F@@ uture Sav@@ ing F@@ ud Co@@ operativ@@ e) ry’@@ abanyeshuri barangije kaminuza, beg@@ eranya ubumenyi butandukanye bakuye ku ntebe y’@@ ishuri. Munyen@@ twali Jean Damascene wazanye igitekerezo yatangarije Rwandamag@@ azin@@ e.com ko batangije umushinga wabo bashaka kwihangira umurimo ariko bak@@ ibanda ku hari icyuho mu bit@@ umizwa mu mahanga bashingiye ku bumenyi bigiye mu ishuri. Ati " Igitekerezo cyavuye mu guhanga umurimo ariko cyane hashingiwe cyane ku bibazo bihari n’aho wabona isoko kandi mu bicuruzwa bifite n’int@@ ungamubiri …@@ Nagiye muri Min@@ ic@@ om nkur@@ ayo imibare igarag@@ za ko ibit@@ umizwa hanze bis@@ igwa mu mig@@ ati bit@@ umizwa hanze y’u Rwanda bitwara nibura miliyoni 40 z’amadorali ku mwak@@ a… Ni menshi cyane, niho twashatse guh@@ era." Munyen@@ twali avuga ko we nubwo yize ibijyanye n’ubukungu ariko ngo hari bagenzi be bize ibijyanye na ‘@@ F@@ ood sc@@ ienc@@ e’ mu cyahoze ari KIST bityo ubumenyi bwabo aba aribwo bat@@ angir@@ iraho bakora ‘@@ Pe@@ an@@ ut but@@ ter@@ ’ zikozwe mu buny@@ obwa zis@@ igwa mu mig@@ ati. Muny@@ wen@@ twali avuga ko ‘@@ Pe@@ an@@ ut But@@ ter@@ ’ bakora yihariye kuko ntakindi b@@ ongeramo kuko ikozwe mu buny@@ obwa gusa kandi ikaba it@@ ong@@ erwamo is@@ ukuri. H@@ atangijwe ubukangurambaga bus@@ obanurira abanyarwanda ibijyanye n’umutekano w’@@ ikoranabuhanga Umuryango udaharanira inyungu G@@ et Saf@@ e Online ufite icyicaro Mu Bwongereza, ugiye gutangiza ubukangurambaga mu Rwanda bugamije gusobanurira abaturage uburyo bwo gucunga umutekano mu gihe bakoresha ikoranabuhanga. Ubu bukangurambaga buje nyuma y’ibihe bidasanzwe by’@@ icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho abantu benshi bahanze amaso ikoranabuhanga nk’@@ ubuy@@ ro bubafasha gukomeza akazi kabo batari hamwe. Umuryango G@@ et Saf@@ e Online wahawe inshingano n’ibiro bya Leta y’u Bwongereza bishinzwe ububanyi n’amahanga, zo gushishikariza no kumenyesha abanyamuryango ba “@@ Commonwealth@@ ” mu buryo bun@@ oze, akamaro ko kugira umutekano mu gihe bakoresha ikoranabuhanga. Iyi gahunda ikazaba no mu Rwanda nka kimwe mu bihugu biri muri uwo muryango, yatangiye tariki ya 20 Nyakanga 2020. Iyi gahunda ije mu rwego rwo gusobanurira abantu akamaro ko kugira umutekano mu gihe bakoresha ikoranabuhanga. Ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, uyu muryango uz@@ akorana na Minisiteri y’@@ Ikoranabuhanga mu Itumanaho na In@@ ov@@ as@@ iyo, ndetse n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ikoranabuhanga mu Itumanaho n’@@ Is@@ akaz@@ ab@@ umeny@@ i@@ (R@@ IS@@ A). Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’@@ Ikoranabuhanga mu Itumanaho na In@@ ov@@ asiyo bwana Yves Iradukunda yavuze ko kumenyekanisha ibijyanye n’umutekano w’@@ ikoranabuhanga kuri ubu bikenewe cyane kurusha ikindi gihe cyose. Ati@@ “@@ Gahunda ya G@@ et Saf@@ e Online ije yiyongera ku zindi zari zis@@ anzweho zo guteza imbere umutekano w’@@ abakoresha ikoranabuhanga. Hashingiwe ku bushake Guverinoma yashyize mu gufasha abantu kubona serivisi hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, kumenyesha abantu ibijyanye n’umutekano wabo bir@@ akenewe cyane ku bakozi ba leta ndetse n’ab@@ ikor@@ era.” Peter Dav@@ ies uhagarariye G@@ et Saf@@ e Online ku rwego mpuzamahanga, yasobanuye ko nubwo ikoranabuhanga rifite akamaro g@@ akomeye, iyo rid@@ akoreshejwe neza rishobora kuba ikibazo ariyo mpamvu umutekano waryo ari ingenzi. Yagize ati “Mu byago bishobora guturuka kuri iri kor@@ anabuh@@ anga, hari mo kwibwa amakuru y’ingenzi akw@@ erek@@ eye@@ ho, kwibwa umwirondoro ug@@ akoreshwa mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko, kwamburwa uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri mudasobwa yawe hagamijwe kug@@ uca amafaranga y’amah@@ erere n’ibindi.” Yakomeje agira ati “Ku bufatanye n’abafatanyabikorwa bacu bo mu Rwanda, twizeye kumenyesha abantu akamaro k’@@ umutekano wabo mu gukoresha ikoranabuh@@ anga.” Innocent B@@ agam@@ ba Muh@@ izi, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RIS@@ A yagize yavuze ko ubu bukangurambaga bugamije guhugura abanyarwanda ku byago bishobora guterwa n’ikoreshwa nabi ry’@@ ikoranabuhanga. Ati “Ni ukuz@@ amura ubumenyi bw’Abanyarwanda n’abandi B@@ atur@@ arwanda ku byerekeye ibyago byibasira abakoresha ikoranabuhanga. Ku mpera z’iyi gahunda, turizera ko buri mut@@ urarwanda azaba asobanukiwe uburyo bwo kwirinda kugerwaho n’ibyo byago byibasira abakoresha ikoranabuhanga. Tuz@@ ashyira umwihariko mu gukora ibishoboka byose abana bacu bagire umutekano cyane cyane muri iki gihe bari kwiga bifashishije ikoranabuh@@ anga.” G@@ et Saf@@ e Online yagaragaje ko mu buryo buz@@ ifashishwa hatangwa ubu bukangurambaga haz@@ ifashishwa uburyo butandukanye burimo urubuga www.@@ g@@ ets@@ af@@ e@@ on@@ lin@@ e.@@ org@@ .rw@@ , Gahunda zitandukanye z’@@ imenyekanisha ziz@@ abera mu Rwanda, zigamije kumenyekanisha ibyago byibasira umutekano w’@@ abakoresha ikoranabuhanga, kongera ubushobozi bw’abantu hagamijwe kubamenyesha ibijyanye n’umutekano ku ikoranabuhanga, binyuze muri gahunda y’im@@ enyekanisha ifasha abantu mu miryango n’ibigo babar@@ izwamo binyuze mu mahugurwa, ubuj@@ yanama, inama zitangwa n’impuguke za G@@ et Saf@@ e Online ndetse n’abafatanyabikorwa bo mu Rwanda G@@ et Saf@@ e Online ni umuryango udaharanira inyungu ubarizwa mu Bwongereza washinzwe muri 2005, utanga ubumenyi na seriv@@ izi z’@@ imenyekanisha z’@@ ubuntu kandi zo ku rwego rwo hejuru, zerekeye uburyo bwo kwirinda ibyago byibasira abakoresha ikoranabuhanga. Microsoft yemerewe kuzamura ikoranabuhanga ry'uburezi mu Rwanda Yanditswe kuya 6@@ -03-@@ 2014 saa 19@@ :5@@ 2@@ ' na Jean Claude Ntaw@@ itonda Minisiteri y'uburezi mu Rwanda, yemereye Ikigo mpuzamahanga kabuhariwe mu ikoranabuhanga ku Isi "@@ Microsoft Cor@@ p@@ " kongera ubushobozi bw'@@ ikoranabuhanga mu burezi bw'@@ amashuri abanza n'@@ ayisumbuye, bibon@@ wa nk'@@ ibisubizo ku burezi bwo mu Rwanda. Microsoft yiyemeje guhindura byinshi mu burezi bw'u Rwanda, harimo kuzana porogaramu z@@ afasha mu myigire in@@ oze, aho igiye kujya ikorana na Minisiteri y'uburezi mu kugeza por@@ og@@ aram@@ u, mudasobwa, n'ibindi bifasha uburezi gutera imbere mu ikoranabuhanga ku banyesh@@ ur@@ i @@ (...) Minisiteri y'uburezi mu Rwanda, yemereye Ikigo mpuzamahanga kabuhariwe mu ikoranabuhanga ku Isi "@@ Microsoft Cor@@ p@@ " kongera ubushobozi bw'@@ ikoranabuhanga mu burezi bw'@@ amashuri abanza n'@@ ayisumbuye, bibon@@ wa nk'@@ ibisubizo ku burezi bwo mu Rwanda. Minisitiri Biruta asiny@@ ana amasezerano na Od@@ ipo y'ubufatanye mu burezi Microsoft yiyemeje guhindura byinshi mu burezi bw'u Rwanda, harimo kuzana porogaramu z@@ afasha mu myigire in@@ oze, aho igiye kujya ikorana na Minisiteri y'uburezi mu kugeza por@@ og@@ aram@@ u, mudasobwa, n'ibindi bifasha uburezi gutera imbere mu ikoranabuhanga ku banyeshuri n'abar@@ ezi. Mu muhango wo gusinya amasezerano y'ubufatanye wabaye kuri uyu wa 6 Werurwe 2014, Minisitiri w'@@ Uburezi Dr Biruta Vincent, yemeje ko kwemerera ikigo gikomeye mu ikoranabuhanga nka Microsoft bigiye kuyobora u Rwanda, kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga mu kuzamura ireme ry'@@ uburezi. Dr Vincent Bir@@ uta, yagize ati: "@@ Duh@@ ereza ikaze ibishoboka byose ku barimu no ku banyeshuri bifite intego yo kuzamura ireme ry'uburezi mu Rwanda, kandi gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ni umusingi w'@@ ibyo dukeneye byos@@ e." Nk'uko byemejwe na Eric Od@@ ip@@ o, uhagarariye Microsoft muri Afurika y'i Burasirazuba n'iy'@@ Amaj@@ yepfo, Microsoft igiye gufasha guverinoma y'u Rwanda kugeza ku banyeshuri porogaramu za mudasobwa nka "@@ Off@@ ice 36@@ 5@@ ", iz@@ itwa "@@ imag@@ ine Cup@@ ", "@@ Dre@@ am@@ S@@ par@@ k@@ ", "@@ k@@ odu@@ ", "D@@ ig@@ ig@@ il@@ z@@ " ku bakobwa, zibafasha gukura mu bijyanye n'ubumenyi n'@@ ikoranabuhanga. Ibi biz@@ ajyana no kongerera ubushobozi abarimu n'@@ abanyeshuri, ndetse n'@@ amahugurwa ku ikoreshwa ry'@@ iri kor@@ anabuh@@ anga. Yagize ati: "@@ Intego yacu ni ugufasha abanyeshuri n'abarimu kumenya imbaraga bifit@@ emo, nyuma yo kuzenguruka isi binyuze mu ikoranabuhang@@ a." MINEDUC yongeraho ko amasezerano yasinywe agaragaza ko ubu bufatanye but@@ azar@@ angirira ku gutanga porogaramu n'ubumenyi gusa, kuko Microsoft igiye ibaye isoko rya Mudasobwa zigiye kujya zitangwa mu bur@@ ezi. Mu byem@@ ejwe, harimo ko nih@@ ajya hag@@ urwa mudasobwa zirenze ibihumbi bitatu, u Rwanda ruz@@ abona inyungu yo kugabanyirizwa ibiciro bya porogaramu z@@ oze ziri muri mudasobwa bikajya gusa no kuz@@ ihabwa ku buntu. Ama masezerano yasinywe nyuma y'aho mu kwezi gushize umunyarwandakazi Ak@@ aliza Keza G@@ ara, yahawe icyizere cyo kwinjizwa mu kanama ng@@ ishwanama ka Microsoft muri Afurika (4@@ Afrika Adv@@ is@@ ory Counc@@ il@@ ). Madamu Jeannette Kagame yitabiriye imurik@@ wa ry’@@ igitabo cya Uwineza Cel@@ ine, ‘@@ U@@ ntam@@ ed, Bey@@ ond Fre@@ ed@@ om@@ ’ Madamu Jeannette Kagame yitabiriye umuhango wo kumurika igitabo ‘@@ U@@ ntam@@ ed, Bey@@ ond Fre@@ ed@@ om@@ ’ cyanditswe na Uwineza Cel@@ ine, umunyarwandakazi wanditse ku buzima yabayemo we n’umuryango we muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Iki gitabo cy@@ amuritswe ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu muri Kigali Marriott Hotel, aho umuryango, inshuti n’abavandimwe baje kwifatanya na Celine Uwineza mu gihe cyo kumurika igitabo ‘@@ U@@ ntam@@ ed, Bey@@ ond Fre@@ ed@@ om@@ ’. Iki gitabo cy’@@ amapaji 14@@ 9 cyanditse mu buryo bwo kubara inkur@@ u, mbese nkuko abantu baganira umwe abwira undi ibyam@@ ubayeho. Uwineza atangirana ibaruwa yandikiye mama we wishwe tariki 10 Mata 1994 hamwe na bakuru be babiri na musaza we, abamenyesha agahinda afite nyuma yo ku@@ babura n’uburyo ak@@ umbuye kuzongera ku@@ babona. Iyo baruwa Uwineza yanditse mu Ukwakira 2015 ntiyari iyo kwishimisha cyangwa uruk@@ umbuzi rusanzwe ahubwo ni umuti yari yandikiwe na muganga nyuma y’igihe yari amaze afite ihung@@ abana, ahora ar@@ ota ibintu bibi, bigaruka ku rugendo yanyuzemo muri Jenoside. Mu gitabo cye, Uwineza ajyana umus@@ omyi mu minsi ya mbere ya Jenoside ubwo we, ababyeyi be n’abavandimwe be babag@@ aho bishimye kugeza umunsi atangira inzira y’@@ umubabaro tariki 7 ubwo yak@@ ang@@ ukaga agasanga umusirikare amuh@@ agaze hejuru n’imb@@ unda, akam@@ ukurura amujyana aho mama we n’aband@@ imwe bari bar@@ ind@@ iwe bategereje kwicwa. Uwineza wari ufite imyaka icumi mu gihe cya Jenoside, abara inkuru y’uburyo mama we yarashwe ukuguru mu maso ye, uko baraye mu bih@@ uru bihishe kugeza tariki ya 10 umunsi umuryango we uv@@ anwa mu kigo cy’@@ ababikira (L@@ es Pet@@ it@@ es So@@ eurs de Jes@@ us@@ ) ku Kicukiro kuva ubwo ntiy@@ ongere kuw@@ ubona, n’uburyo yongeye guhura na papa we wari hanze ubwo Jenoside yakorwaga ndetse na musaza we Johnny war@@ okotse. Nyuma yo kur@@ ok@@ orwa n’ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi, Uwineza yagerageje kwiy@@ ibagiza ayo mateka ariko aranga aram@@ ukurikir@@ ana. Ubwo yam@@ urikaga igitabo cye yagize ati “N@@ abayeho mfite abantu babiri muri njye@@ we, umwana w’imyaka icumi ug@@ ifashe igit@@ enge cya mama we ufite ibibazo byinshi mu mutwe, nanjye mukuru. N@@ abayeho ubuzima hanze bigaragara ko nta kibazo ariko imbere mfite agahinda kad@@ ashira. N@@ akoraga ibintu biny@@ ibig@@ iza wa mwana w’imyaka icumu ariko inyuma ntibig@@ aragar@@ e.” Mu 2015 yagize ihungabana rikomeye ajyanwa mu bitaro, muganga amut@@ egeka kugenda yandika ibyo yibuka byam@@ ubayeho muri Jenoside ngo yiy@@ ibuts@@ e. Ibyo yanditse ari umuti nibyo byaje kuvamo igit@@ abo. Ati “N@@ atangiye nandika ku rup@@ ap@@ uro, nandika uko n@@ iyumv@@ a.
