Abayobozi bagera kuri 700 bitabiriye amasengesho yo gusengera igihugu (Amafoto) Abayobozi muri Guverinoma, abikorera ku giti cyabo, abagize sosiyete sivile n’inshuti z’u Rwanda zavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 10, kuri iki Cyumweru bateraniye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu masengesho yo gusengera igihugu azwi nka National Pr@@ ayer Break@@ f@@ ast@@ . Aya masengesho yitabiriwe n’abagera kuri 7@@ 00, abaye mu gihe u Rwanda rus@@ oje icyerekezo 2020 cy’@@ iterambere, no gutangiza icyerekezo 20@@ 50. At@@ eg@@ urwa n’@@ Umuryango, Rwanda Le@@ ad@@ ers Fell@@ ow@@ ship@@ , akaba afite insanganyamatsiko igira iti “@@ Imiyoborere Iz@@ ana Imp@@ induk@@ a:@@ Kw@@ ishimira aho tug@@ ez@@ e-@@ Dut@@ egura ejo hah@@ az@@ a.” Aya masengesho yatangijwe mu 1995 agamije gushyira hamwe abayobozi bakuru mu kwiyegereza Imana, bagas@@ angira, hakabaho gusengera igihugu n’abayobozi bacyo ndetse bagasangira ijambo ry’Imana. Ku nshuro ya mbere yabereye muri Hotel Hotel des Mille Collines tariki 1 Nzeri 1995, kuva icyo gihe iki gikorwa k@@ itabirwa n’abayobozi batandukanye n’abandi. A@@ y’uyu mwaka azaba ari ayo gushimira ibyo Imana yakoreye Igihugu ariko no gusengera abayobozi bacyo bag@@ ashyirwa mu maboko y’Imana. Aya masengesho abaye ahur@@ irana kandi n’igihe u Rwanda rurimo kwishimira ibyo rwagezeho mu cyerekezo 2020 rwari rwar@@ ihaye no gutangira icyerekezo 2020. H@@ agend@@ ewe kuri iyi ns@@ angany@@ amats@@ iko, aya masengesho afite intego yo kureba ibyakozwe no gushimira urugendo rwag@@ enz@@ we, ariko no kureba aho bag@@ anisha igihugu. Ag@@ amije kandi kugira umuco wo gushimira bitari gusa Imana ahubwo n’abo yakoresheje ngo babe bagejeje aho igihugu kiri uyu munsi, kwiga ibyakozwe n’indangagaciro z’Imana yashyize mu bantu, ibi bigafasha kubaha inzira nziza yo gukomeza imbere. Mu masengesho y’umwaka ushize, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko bidakwiye ko umuyobozi abaho neza mu gihe abo ar@@ eberera bafite ibibazo, ashimangira ko biteye isoni kumubona ashyir@@ iye Imana abaturage yamuhaye kuyobora barwaye bwak@@ i. Yagize ati “Njye rwose mpora mfite impungenge ku kuz@@ ash@@ orera abantu barwaye bwak@@ i, bash@@ onje, bameze nabi nkavuga nti ‘@@ Mana ng@@ ’@@ aba abantu bawe wan@@ sh@@ inz@@ e’. Ntabwo umutima wanjye ujyanye na byo. Numva bid@@ akwiye. Kugira ngo utaz@@ ash@@ orera abantu bameze bat@@ yo, ikintu cya mbere ni uko buri muyobozi bikwiye kumutera isoni. Mugomba kugira isoni. Iyo wemera indangagaciro ukaz@@ ibura bikwiriye kugutera ison@@ i.” Yakomeje avuga ko iterambere rirambye rikwiye gushingira ku ndangagaciro y’@@ imikorere hagati y’abayobozi n’abay@@ obor@@ wa. Perezida wa Benin Patrice Tal@@ on yavutse kuwa 1 Gicurasi 195@@ 8, avukira mu gace ka D@@ ég@@ u@@ è@@ -@@ Gare mu mujyi wa Port@@ o-@@ Nov@@ o akaba yaratangiye kuyobora iki gihugu guhera kuwa 6 Mata 2016. Perezida Patrice Tal@@ on yize amashuri ye i Dakar muri Senegal ndetse na To@@ ul@@ ouse mu Bufaransa, yiga ibijyanye n'@@ '@@ Imibare n'@@ ubug@@ enge ariko aza kumenyekana mu bucuruzi bw'@@ ibikomoka ku buhinzi ndetse an@@ amenyekana mu bikorwa by'@@ amahot@@ eli. Kuva mu myaka ya 1980 Patrice yakoraga ubucuruzi bw'@@ ip@@ amba. Uyu mugabo ufite imyaka 58 , ni umut@@ unzi ukomeye wak@@ uye amafaranga menshi mu kugurisha hanze ip@@ amp@@ a, ig@@ icuruzwa gikomeye mu gihugu cye ndetse akaba afatwa nk'@@ umwami w'@@ ip@@ amba kubera uruhare yagize mu nganda zir@@ itung@@ anya. Ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye afite . Ubucuruzi bw'@@ Iny@@ ongeramus@@ aruro abinyujije muri S@@ osiyeti ya S@@ D@@ I muri Benin na Côte d'Ivoire . Amah@@ ot@@ el@@ i: Afite Hoteli Nov@@ ot@@ eli na IB@@ IS zimwe mu zikomeye muri Benin . Seriv@@ is@@ i: S@@ osiyeti ya Ag@@ ence de Trans@@ it et de Log@@ ist@@ ique (@@ At@@ ral@@ ), Ter@@ min@@ al d'@@ All@@ ada (@@ port sec@@ ) Mu bush@@ abitsi bwe kandi ab@@ ifatanya na Politiki aho yagendaga agira inama abak@@ andid@@ a, amashyaka ndetse ak@@ abatera inkung@@ a.@@ A@@ bavugwa cyane ni Nic@@ é@@ phore S@@ og@@ lo mu matora ya Perezida wa Benin muri 1991, mu matora y'@@ abadepite mu 1995 na bwo yafashije amwe mu mashyaka ya Politiki . Muri 2006 Tal@@ on ni umwe mu bateye inkunga Perezida wacy@@ uye igihe B@@ oni B@@ oni, wari urangije manda ebyiri yemererwa n'amategeko. Patrice Tal@@ on na Perezida Kagame bam@@ er@@ anyijwe umubano ut@@ ajegaj@@ ega ushingiye ku buh@@ ahirane Ubwo uyu mugabo yat@@ orer@@ waga kuyobora iki gihugu, yavuze ko afite umugambi wo kugabanya imyaka umukuru w'igihugu amara ku butegetsi akay@@ igira manda imwe gusa y'imyaka itanu. Nkuko ikinyamakuru Jeun@@ af@@ rique cy@@ amus@@ oban@@ uye, ngo ubusanzwe ni umugabo utajya acika intege, wic@@ isha bugufi, ugira uburyo bwinshi bwo gukora ibintu, ni umun@@ yabw@@ enge, akunda gukora ibintu yit@@ onze kandi ijambo avuze ar@@ ishyira mu bikorwa. Nt@@ akunda kugaragara mu itangazamakuru. Prezida Patrice Tal@@ on umaze iminsi itatu mu Rwanda yanag@@ iranye ibiganiro n'inzego zitandukanye mu rwego rwo kumenya uko igihugu cy'u Rwanda cyongeye kwiyubaka, ndetse anag@@ aragar@@ izwa byinshi bikubiye mu cyerekezo cy'u Rwanda mu myaka iri imbere. Uyu mugabo mu ruzinduko rwe yasuye ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, ndetse an@@ agera mu gace kah@@ ariwe inganda kazwi nka '@@ Special Economic Z@@ on@@ e' ndetse agirana ibiganiro byihariye na mugenzi we Perezida Kagame. Abakuru b'ibihugu byombi kandi bemeranyijwe ku bufatanye mu iterambere, ndetse Prezida Paul Kagame, atangaza ko vuba aha indege ya sosiyete Rwand@@ air@@ , izatangira ingendo i Cot@@ on@@ ou muri Benin mu rwego rwo koroshya ingendo n'@@ ubuhahirane hagati y'u Rwanda na Ben@@ in.
Huye: Ab@@ ubatse ibyumba by'amashuri i Cyar@@ wa barinubira ko bamaze umwaka batar@@ ishyurwa Abaz@@ amuye inkuta z'@@ ibyumba by'amashuri y'uburezi bw'ibanze bw'imyaka 12 (12@@ Y@@ B@@ E) ndetse n'@@ icumbi rya mwarimu byo muri Groupe Scolaire Cyar@@ wa, mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2012, binubira ko bamaze umwaka wose bategereje ko bishy@@ urwa amafaranga yose bakor@@ eye, nyamara ubuyobozi bw'umurenge wa Tumba aya mashuri ah@@ erereyemo bukaba buh@@ ora bubar@@ ereg@@ a. Ibi by@@ abateye kwit@@ oramo aba@@ bah@@ agararira maze bajya kugeza ikibazo ku buyobozi bw'Akarere ka Huye, kuwa 22/@@ 10/201@@ 3, ariko bav@@ uyeyo bat@@ ishimye kuko ngo umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Huye na we yari amaze kubabwira ngo bateg@@ ereze amafaranga nab@@ oneka baz@@ ababw@@ ira, mbese nk'uko ubuyobozi bw'@@ Umurenge wa Tumba bw@@ ababw@@ iye. N'@@ akababaro ndetse n'@@ ubur@@ akar@@ i, uwitwa Niyonzima Eric tuganira yagize ati: "@@ Dufite ikibazo cy'uko bo bashaka kwesa imih@@ igo, bak@@ erekana ko amashuri yar@@ angiye, ariko abaturage twe dufite akababar@@ o, k'@@ uko mu ngo zacu hari inzara iteye ubwoba kubera guta umwanya, … icyo gihe ayo mezi yos@@ e…@@ ". Na none kandi, ngo abari kubaka andi mashuri na yo yo muri uyu Murenge bo ngo bahembwa buri cyumweru. Amashuri bubatse agiye kumara umwaka yig@@ irwamo nyamara bo ntibar@@ ahembwa. Ibi byatumye umusaza witwa Ngabonziza Evariste agira ati "@@ bir@@ atangaje kubona dukora, abakoze nyuma bakaba bar@@ ahembw@@ e… kandi ikindi cya kabiri n'ubu bari kuzamura izindi nyubak@@ o… bakaba babah@@ emba@@ … twebwe twakoze mbere abana bakaba barimo big@@ a, tukaba tutar@@ ahembwa … ni ikibaz@@ o…@@ ". Kuba batar@@ ah@@ embwe ngo bin@@ abakur@@ urira umwiryane mu ngo zabo kuko ngo abagore babo bakeka ko ba@@ babeshya ko batar@@ ahembwa. Ngo hari n'aba@@ bahaye ibikoresho bifashishije bakaba batar@@ abashije kub@@ ishyura mu mafaranga y'@@ imisanzu yatanzwe n'@@ abaturage. U Rwanda na Congo byatangiye kwerekana ko kwigira kw'@@ Abanyafurika bishoboka Yanditswe kuya 30@@ -07-@@ 2016 saa 09:@@ 21@@ ' na Cyprien Niyom@@ w@@ ungeri Minisitiri w'ububanyi n'amahanga w'u Rwanda, Louise Mushikiwabo, yavuze ko mu myaka itatu ishize habaye ibikorwa byinshi bigaragaza ko u Rwanda na Repubulika ya Congo Brazzaville bigenda birushaho gukor@@ ana, ngo bish@@ akire amikoro n'imibereho myiza abaturage babyo kandi ko bigaragaza neza ko ibisubizo by'@@ ibibazo bya Afurika biz@@ ava mu bufatanye bw'@@ Abanyafurika ubwabo. Ibi yabitangaje kuwa Gatanu tariki 29 Nyakanga ubwo we na mugenzi we wa Repubulika ya Congo, Jean Claude Gak@@ os@@ so bas@@ ozaga inama ya Kane yah@@ uzaga komite zih@@ oraho z'ibihugu byombi, zis@@ uzuma iyubahirizwa ry'@@ amasezeran@@ 0 y'ubufatanye bw'ibihugu byombi. Mu nama ya gatatu iyi Komite yari yafashe imyanzuro ijyanye n'@@ imikoranire mu bw@@ ikorezi bw'@@ indege, ubucuruzi, ubukerarugendo, imit@@ urire, imicungire y'@@ impunzi, ingufu, umutekano, ubutabera, kurengera ibidukikije, ubur@@ oby@@ i, ikoranabuhanga, itumanaho n'ibindi. Minisitiri Mushikiwabo yavuze ko ibimaze kugerwaho ari byinshi kandi bitanga icyizere ko biz@@ akomeza, mu rwego rwo guteza imbere abaturage b'ibihugu byombi. Yagize ati "Mu gihe cy'imyaka itatu, ine ishize ibihugu byacu by@@ afunguye Ambas@@ ad@@ e.@@ U Rwanda rw@@ afunguye ambasade muri Repubulika ya Congo mu kwezi kwa gatatu k'@@ umwaka wa 2015, Repubulika ya Congo nayo imaze gufungura ambasade hano i Kigali hashize amezi atatu, ibyo byose bir@@ agaragaza ubushake bwa politiki ariko cyane cyane ubushake bwo kugirango dufatanye nk'@@ ibihugu byombi cyane cyane mu gushakira amikoro n'imibereho myiza abaturage bac@@ u." Yakomeje avuga ko iterambere ry'@@ Abanyafurika nta handi riz@@ ahera atari kuri bo ubwabo. Yagize ati "@@ Nk'uko byagarutsweho mu nama y'Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe iher@@ utse, iterambere rya Afurika riri mu biganza by'@@ abany@@ afurik@@ a.@@ Iterambere ry'@@ Afurika riz@@ aturuka mu guhuza imbaraga zacu, no kubaka umubano uham@@ ye." Minisitiri Gak@@ os@@ so yizeza ko hari ubushake bwo gufatanya hagati y'ibihugu byombi buhari kandi amasezerano az@@ ashyirwa mu bikorwa bityo akab@@ iteza imbere. Abaminisitiri bombi basoje inama nyuma yo gusura umupaka muto n'@@ umun@@ ini ihuza u Rwanda na Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo b@@ erekwa imikorere yayo n'uburyo ifasha mu buh@@ ahirane bw'ibihugu byombi mu guteza imbere abaturage. Muri iyi nama h@@ ashyizeho komite ik@@ uriye ibikorwa hagati y'ibihugu byombi ku buryo izajya ihura kabiri mu mwaka kugirango is@@ uzume uko ibyo ibihugu byiyemeje mu ngeri zinyuranye bigenda bishyirwa mu bikorwa. Iyi Komite igiye gutangira akazi kayo iz@@ ongere guhurira mu Rwanda muri Mutarama 2017 harebwa ibyagezweho mu byo ibihugu byombi by@@ iyemeje. Muri iyi nama yari ihuje impuguke zo mu Rwanda na Repubulika ya Congo, binyuze muri Minisiteri z'@@ ububanyi n'amahanga z'ibihugu byombi, han@@ asiny@@ we amasezerano y'@@ imikoranire mishya arimo kuganira bih@@ oraho mu bijyanye na politiki hagati y'ibihugu byombi ndetse n'@@ ubufatanye mu buhinzi n'ubw@@ orozi. Ibyo ababyeyi bateye imbere bakunze kuba bahuriyeho mu gutoza abana babo Umubyeyi wese yishimira kubona umwana yibarutse yitwara neza mu r@@ ung@@ ano, bikaba akarusho iyo abantu bose bamufata nk’@@ icyitegererezo mu byo akora, mu masomo ahabwa no mu buzima busanzwe. Mu gihe ababyeyi baba bashaka ko abana babo bitwara nk’abantu bakuru, ubushakashatsi mu by’@@ imitekerereze y’umuntu bwagaragaje ko nubwo nta mahame yashyizweho agend@@ erwaho mu gutanga uburere bwiza hari ingingo zigaragaza uko ushobora kugera ku nt@@ s@@ inzi. The Indep@@ endent itangaza ko akenshi uz@@ anga ibi bishingiye ku burere butangwa n’@@ umubyeyi. Dore urutonde rw’@@ ibintu 17 ababyeyi bafite abana bitwara neza bashobora kuba bahur@@ iyeh@@ o: 1. Ababyeyi baha abana babo imirimo Jul@@ ie Ly@@ th@@ c@@ ott@@ -@@ Ha@@ im@@ s, wahoze ayobora abanyeshuri muri Kaminuza ya Stan@@ for@@ d, yagize ati “Iyo abana bad@@ akoze imirimo yo mu rugo nko koza ibikoresho byo mu gik@@ oni, baba bazi ko hari undi muntu uri kub@@ i@@ bakorera. Ntib@@ iyumvisha ko ako ari akazi cyangwa se gak@@ eneye no gukorwa. Buri wese muri twe yak@@ agize uruhare mu kubib@@ umv@@ ish@@ a.” Jul@@ ie yan@@ anditse igitabo yise “H@@ ow to Ra@@ ise an Ad@@ ul@@ t@@ ”, bishatse kuvuga uburyo bwo kurera umwana uz@@ avamo intangarugero. Ly@@ th@@ c@@ ott@@ -@@ Ha@@ im@@ s yizera ko abana baby@@ ir@@ utse bakora iyo mirimo yo mu rugo bav@@ amo abakozi ny@@ abo bashobora kubana neza n’abo bakorana. Bene abo bamenya guhangana n’ibibazo kandi biha inshingano bakan@@ az@@ uz@@ uza. 2. Ababyeyi bigisha abana babo iby’@@ ubuzima busanzwe Mu myaka 20 ishize, abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza ya Pennsylv@@ ania n’iya D@@ uke bakoze ubushakashatsi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ku bana 700 bari hagati y’imyaka ine na 25 basanga imyitwarire yabo ari bakuru ir@@ asa neza n’iyo mu bw@@ ana. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko abana babaye indashyikirwa mu mibanire bashoboye kubana neza na bagenzi babo, bar@@ abafasha kandi bakemura ibibazo byabo bwite, ndetse babashije gutsinda neza mu ishuri kandi ku myaka 25 bashoboraga gukora akazi ugereranije n’abat@@ ar@@ ahawe ubumenyi mu by’@@ imibanire n’ubuzima busanzwe. Abat@@ ar@@ ahawe ubumenyi mu by’ubuzima busanzwe, wasangaga bafite amahirwe menshi yo gufungwa, kubat@@ wa n’ubus@@ inzi ndetse bagakora n’akazi ko mu rugo. Kuva umuntu akiri umwana, ubu bumenyi bushobora kwerekana ko umwana azajya mu ishuri cyangwa akan@@ anirana akaba yafung@@ wa, azabona akazi cyangwa az@@ abat@@ wa n’inzoga n’ibiyobyabw@@ enge. 3. Ababyeyi baba biteze ibintu bikomeye ku bana babo Prof. Ne@@ al Hal@@ f@@ on na bagenzi be bo muri Kaminuza ya California muri Los Angel@@ es, bifashishije ibyavuye mu nyigo yakorewe ku bana ibihumbi 6,@@ 600 bavutse mu 2001, bavumbuye ko ibyo ababyeyi baba biteze ku bana rimwe na rimwe biba@@ baho. Iby@@ avuye muri iyi nyigo byagaragaje ko 5@@ 7% by’abana bat@@ agiye mu mashuri yisumbuye, abagera kuri 9@@ 6% bo baj@@ yayo nkuko byari byitezwe n’aba@@ byeyi. 4. Ababyeyi babanye neza Inyigo yakozwe na Kaminuza ya Il@@ lin@@ ois yagaragaje ko abana bavuka mu miryango ikunda kugirana amakimbirane, urugero nk’iy@@ atandukanye, bakunda guhura n’ingaruka ugereranije n’ab’@@ ababyeyi babanye neza. Umuyobozi w’Ishami rishinzwe Imib@@ anire myiza mu miryango muri Kaminuza ya Il@@ lin@@ o@@ is, Prof. Robert H@@ ugh@@ es J@@ r@@ ., yatangaje ko abana bar@@ erwa n’umubyeyi umwe ufite imico myiza babaho neza kurusha abar@@ ererwa mu muryango w’ababyeyi babiri ariko bafite amakimbirane. Indi nyigo yagaragaje ko nyuma yo gutandukana kw’@@ abash@@ akanye, iyo umugabo akomeje kujya ahura na bo ariko adat@@ ongana n’uwari umugore we, abana bam@@ ererwa neza. Ariko iyo bongeye guhura bagat@@ ong@@ ana, bigira ingaruka ku bana. Iyi nyigo kandi yagaragaje ko abana 20 bagizweho ingaruka n’it@@ andukana ry’@@ ababyeyi babo kuko bamaze imyaka icumi yose batar@@ ab@@ yak@@ ira. Benshi muri bo batangaza ko baba bumva barah@@ ombye ndetse bakaba bic@@ uza. 5. Iyo ababyeyi bat@@ ong@@ anye, abana bagira uruhare mu kwiyunga Iyo abana b@@ ivugiye ko bo ubwabo bagize uruhare mu guhosha amakimbirane hagati y’ababyeyi babo, bib@@ ubakamo imbaraga n’ubushobozi byo gukemura ibibazo kandi bishobora kugira uruhare mu kuzamura umubano w’ababyeyi n’abana, ndetse bigafasha abana gutsinda mu ishuri nkuko byatangajwe na E. Mark C@@ um@@ ming@@ s, impuguke mu by’ubuzima bwo mu mutwe wo muri Kaminuza ya N@@ otre Dam@@ e. Umun@@ aniro ukabije ku ba@@ byeyi, hari igihe utera abana umuj@@ inya, gutakaza icyizere, ubur@@ akar@@ i, guhangana nabo, guhindura imyitwar@@ ire, kur@@ wara, umunaniro ndetse no guhura n’ingorane mu ishuri. 6. Ababyeyi bafite amashuri ahan@@ itse Inyigo yakozwe mu 2014 na Sandra T@@ ang@@ , impuguke mu buzima bwo mu mutwe muri Kaminuza ya Mich@@ ig@@ an, yagaragaje ko ababyeyi b’abagore bageze muri za Koleji barera abana babo nkuko bar@@ ez@@ we. Inyigo yakorewe ku bana ibihumbi 14@@ ,000 bize mu mashuri y’@@ incuke kuva mu 1998 kugeza 2007, yagaragaje ko abana baby@@ awe n’abagore batari bagejeje ku myaka 18, batashoboye gusoza amashuri yisumbuye nka bagenzi babo. 7. Ababyeyi bigisha imibare abana babo hakiri kare Is@@ esengura ryakorewe ku bana ibihumbi 35@@ ,000 bari bagiye gutangira ishuri muri 2007, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Canada n’u Bwongereza, ryagaragaje ko ubumenyi mu mibare umwana yabonye hakiri kare bugira akamaro iyo ak@@ uze. Ababyeyi bazamura umubano wabo n’abana Inyigo yakozwe mu 2014, ikorewe ku bantu 24@@ 3 bav@@ ukiye mu bukene, yagaragaje ko abana bit@@ aweho neza mu myaka itatu yabo ya mbere, uretse no gutsinda mu ishuri, bagira imibanire myiza iyo bageze mu myaka 30. Barack Obama n'umugore we Michelle Obama b'@@ abana babo Mal@@ ia na S@@ asha bari gutembera 9. Ababyeyi ntibagira umunaniro ukabije Nkuko bitangazwa na Brig@@ id Sch@@ ul@@ te, mu kinyamakuru The Washington Post@@ , yavuze ko umubare w’@@ amasaha ababyeyi b’abagore bamarana n’abana bari hagati y’imyaka itatu na 11 agira uruhare mu myitwarire y’umwana mu gihe kizaza. Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko iyo inshuti yawe yishimye nawe w@@ ishim@@ a, yaba yarak@@ aye ukaba nawe war@@ akara. Bityo rero, umubyeyi ashobora kwanduza umwana we iyo m@@ imerere. 10. Ababyeyi bagaragaza ingufu bakirinda gutsindwa Impuguke mu buzima bwo mu mutwe muri Kaminuza ya Stan@@ for@@ d, Car@@ ol D@@ we@@ c@@ k, mu myaka icumi yagaragaje ko abana n’abantu bakuru batekereza ku ntsinzi mu buryo bub@@ iri: • "@@ Imit@@ ekerereze id@@ ahinduk@@ a” yiy@@ umvisha ko imimerere yacu, ubwenge cyangwa se ubushobozi bwo guhanga udushya bit@@ ahinduka mu buryo butandukanye, ko intsinzi ari iy’@@ abanyabwenge gusa, kandi ko kuy@@ iharanira bisaba umuntu kuba akorana umur@@ ava. • “ Imit@@ ekerereze ihind@@ uka” ihangana n’ingaruka kandi ntib@@ ona gutsindwa nk’@@ iby’@@ abantu badafite ubwenge, ahubwo nk’ikimenyetso cy’uko umuntu agomba kongera imbaraga mu byo akora. 11. Ababyeyi b’abagore bad@@ akorera hafi y’@@ ingo zabo Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Harv@@ ard Business School bugaragaza ko hari inyungu nyinshi ku bana bar@@ erwa n’ababyeyi bad@@ akorera hafi y’@@ imuh@@ ira. MIN@@ EA@@ COM yer@@ uriye Abadepite ko hari ibibazo by’@@ amak@@ usanyirizo y’@@ amata byatewe n’ubur@@ angare bw’@@ abayobozi Minisitiri w’@@ Ub@@ ucuruzi, Inganda n’@@ Ibikorwa by’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, François Kan@@ imba, kuri uyu wa Kabiri yabwiye Abadepite ko Guverinoma iri gukora ibishoboka byose ngo ik@@ emure ibibazo byugarije amak@@ arag@@ iro n’amak@@ usanyirizo y’@@ amata. Minisitiri Kanimba yari imbere y’Inteko Rusange y’@@ Umutwe w’Abadepite, ngo ayig@@ ezeho ibisubizo mu magambo ku bibazo byagaragajwe muri raporo ku ngendo Komisiyo y’@@ Ubuh@@ inzi, Ubw@@ orozi n’@@ Ibidukikije yakoreye mu turere twose hagati ya Mata na Ugushyingo 2016, harebwa aho gahunda ya Girinka n’iy’@@ ibigo by’@@ ubushakashatsi zigeze zifasha abaturage kwikura mu bukene. Icyo gihe byagaragaye ko mu gihugu hari amak@@ usanyirizo 10@@ 6 y’@@ amata, arimo 48 akora neza, 42 ad@@ atanga umusaruro uko bikwiye na 16 ad@@ akora. Kanimba yashimangiye ko imikorere nk’iyo ishingiye ahanini ku micungire mibi y’@@ amakoperative acunga amak@@ usanyirizo y’@@ amata, bamwe ugasanga nta n’ubushobozi bafite mu birebana n’@@ amafaranga. Yagize ati “Nt@@ it@@ wan@@ abah@@ isha ko ahenshi aya makoperative mu kubaka amak@@ usanyir@@ izo, hari porogaramu za leta z@@ abigizemo uruhare, z@@ abafashije mu kubona aho bakorera ndetse no kubona ibikoresho by’ibanze byo kw@@ akir@@ iramo amata ngo ashobore gufatwa neza ageze mu ik@@ usanyir@@ izo. Ariko mu by’ukuri bahawe ibyo bikoresho ahenshi badafite ubushobozi bugaragara bwo kubifata neza cyangwa se ngo bagire ubushobozi bwo kuba ban@@ abis@@ imbura igihe bigize ikibaz@@ o.” Kanimba yavuze ko ahari ibyo bibazo by’@@ amikoro hari umuturage uzana amata ntibabone amafaranga bamw@@ ishyura, ugasanga hari abacuruzi baca ku ruhande bakamuha amafaranga b@@ umvikanyeho nyamara bo akenshi batagira ibikoresho bip@@ ima ubuziranenge bw’@@ amata baguze mu baturage. Amak@@ usanyirizo ari mu bibazo Kanimba yakomoje kuri Ik@@ arag@@ iro rya Mukamira ryagize amateka maremare ku buryo rimaze imyaka irenga itandatu rit@@ arar@@ angira, ariko ngo hari icyizere ko kuwa 1 Nyakanga 2017 rizatangira gukora. Yagize ati “@@ Leta yar@@ yeg@@ uriye Iny@@ ange niyo igiye kur@@ ifata ikar@@ ic@@ unga. Kuva aho bar@@ yeg@@ uriwe hari imirimo myinshi bak@@ ozeho kugira ngo bashobore kur@@ ishyira ku murongo, r@@ itangire gukora rimeze neza.” Leta yagurishije imigabane yari ifitemo ariko amakoperative yari afitemo imigabane yo aracy@@ arimo. Hari n’@@ Ik@@ arag@@ iro rya Burera ryari umushinga wa leta ugamije gushyiraho ik@@ arag@@ iro ric@@ iriritse ry’@@ icy@@ iteg@@ erezo, ry@@ ashoboraga kubakwa mu turere twose rifite n’ubushobozi bwo gutunganya ibintu bid@@ asaba imashini nini, ariko umushinga war@@ arangiye uhura n’imicungire mibi, weg@@ urirwa rwiyemezamirimo kandi nt@@ ukora 100%. Minisitiri w’@@ Ub@@ ucuruzi, Inganda n’@@ Ibikorwa by’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, François Kanimba Yageze mo ku ruganda rwa Gih@@ eke muri Rusizi rwubatswe ku bufatanye bw’ikigo cy@@ igenga B@@ ot@@ ar cyo muri Ireland g@@ ifatanyije na kop@@ et@@ ar@@ ive icunga ik@@ usanyirizo ry’@@ amata i Gih@@ eke, ariko urwo ruganda rwuzuye ibigo bishinzwe ubuziranenge NIR@@ DA na RS@@ B basanga harimo ibibazo bikomeye. Yakomeje agira ati “B@@ aje gusanga urwo ruganda rud@@ ashobora kuzakora kubera am@@ amashini bas@@ anzemo ntabwo yari mashya, amwe yari ash@@ aje, kuyakoresha ubona biz@@ atera ikibazo, hafatwa icyemezo ko dush@@ akisha amafaranga ku ngengo y’imari ya leta kugira ngo ikibazo cy’@@ am@@ amashini yo mu ik@@ arag@@ iro rya Gih@@ eke gik@@ emuk@@ e." Ik@@ arag@@ iro rya Sav@@ ana ryo muri Nyagatare na ryo ngo ry@@ ubatswe na leta rik@@ ajya r@@ ikorana n’@@ Iny@@ ange Indust@@ ri@@ es, ariko nabwo habamo ibibazo byatumaga Iny@@ ange isanga amata menshi at@@ ujuje ubuziranenge, Guverinoma ir@@ igurisha mu 2013. Hari aho Kanimba abona uburangare Abadepite babajije Minisitiri Kanimba impamvu yatumye ikigo cyo muri Ireland cyagombaga kubaka uruganda rw’@@ amata rwa Gih@@ eke kik@@ azana imashini zish@@ aje. Y@@ asubije ati “@@ Bany@@ ak@@ ubahwa bad@@ epite, rwose sin@@ ashidikanya ko hari aho dushobora kuba tw@@ aragize uburangare kugira ngo ibibazo bigaragara byaturutse ku bufatanye na kiriya kigo k@@ itegamiye kuri leta cyo muri Irel@@ and. twak@@ ig@@ iriye icyizere dutekereza ko bari ku@@ dukorera ibintu by@@ iza.” “@@ Z@@ iriya mashini nibo baz@@ iz@@ anye, bazig@@ uze ku mafaranga yabo birumvikana ariko agenewe gufasha abaturage bo mu karere ka Rusizi, ariko birangiye inzego za leta zibishinzwe ngo zir@@ ebe ko niba ibintu bimeze neza, zis@@ angamo ibibaz@@ o.” Yavuze ko mu myaka yashize igenamigambi ryo kubaka inganda leta yag@@ izemo uruhare atakw@@ emeza 100% ko ryag@@ enze neza, ariko ngo bakuramo amasomo, ku buryo ahandi leta yifuza gushora imari igenzura ko by@@ izwe neza. Hari ingamba zafashwe Minisitiri Kanimba yavuze ko mu mwaka ushize hag@@ iyeho amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’ubuhinzi agenga ibijyanye no gutwara amata, kwegeranya amata no kuy@@ ah@@ uriza mu mak@@ usanyirizo no kuy@@ acur@@ uza, ubu ari kugenda ashyirwa mu bikorwa ku buryo ubwo azaba akurikizwa 100% azafasha byinshi. Ni amabwiriza agena ko nta muntu wemerewe kugura amata at@@ anyuze mu mak@@ usanyir@@ izo. Yakomeje agira ati “Ikindi ni ukugira ngo amakoperative dushobore kuy@@ ahuza n’ibigo by’@@ imari, kuy@@ afasha muri rusange kugira ngo bagire imicungire y’imari ishobora guha icyizere ibigo by’imari kugira ngo bashobore kubona amafaranga yo gukoresh@@ a, bag@@ ure amata y’@@ abaturag@@ e." Mu bindi harimo kureba uko habaho amasezerano y’ubug@@ uzi hagati y’@@ amakoperative acunga amak@@ usanyir@@ izo, n’inganda zitunganya umusaruro uturuka kum@@ ata, zaba in@@ ini, into n’iz@@ ic@@ iriritse. Minisitiri Kanimba yanah@@ ishuye ko hari kurebwa niba mu Rwanda hakenewe ko hashyirwaho igiciro kimwe kuri litiro y’@@ amata, ariko ngo ntabwo bar@@ agera ku ku mwanz@@ uro. Aho amak@@ usanyirizo y'@@ amata akora neza nta bituma aborozi biteza imbere
Mu Rwanda abakira #COVID19 bakomeje kwiy@@ onger@@ a: Uyu munsi abantu 10 bakize Amakuru mashya aturuka muri Minisiteri y’Ubuzima (@@ MINISANT@@ E) arag@@ aragaza ko kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 24 Gicurasi 2020 habonetse abarwayi babiri bashya ba COVID-19 bituma abamaze kuboneka mu Rwanda banduye icyo cyorezo bose hamwe baba 3@@ 27. Abo bantu babiri babonetse mu bipimo 1,@@ 400 byafashwe uyu munsi, ibipimo byose hamwe bimaze gufatwa bikaba ari 5@@ 8,@@ 47@@ 7 ari na byo by@@ abon@@ etsemo abarwayi 3@@ 27. Itangazo rya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima riravuga ko abantu icumi mu bari barwaye COVID-19 bakize kuri iki Cyumweru, abamaze gukira bose hamwe bakaba ari 23@@ 7. Abakir@@ waye COVID-19 mu Rwanda ni 90, kugeza kuri iki Cyumweru icyo cyorezo kikaba nta muntu kir@@ ahitana mu Rwanda. Perezida Kagame yahamagariye ibihugu bigize EAC kwitangira gukora ibyiza Perezida wa Repubulika y'u Rwanda Paul Kagame yasabye abayobozi b'ibihugu bigize umuryango wa Afurika y'iburasirazuba gush@@ ishikarira gukora ibyiza no gushikama ku cyerekezo ibi bihugu bih@@ uriyeho kugirango bikom@@ eze gushimangira ubumwe n'iterambere ry'uyu muryango. Ib@@ i, Perezida Kagame yabitangarije mu nama ya 17 idasanzwe y'umuryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba (EAC) yateraniye i Dar es Salaam muri Tanzaniya kuva kuri uyu wa 08 Nzeri 2016. Perezida Kagame yashimangiye akamaro ko kwih@@ uriza hamwe nk'@@ ibihugu avuga ko ari amahirwe yo gukora ibishoboka byose bakagera kuri byinshi byiza bir@@ us@@ eho. Yagize ati: "Nd@@ ashimira abavandimwe bo mu gihugu cya Sudani y'Epfo kuba bar@@ injiye bidasubirwaho mu muryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba, dukeneye gukomeza gush@@ ishikarira icyerekezo duh@@ uriyeho nka Afurika y'iburasirazuba tugakomeza kwitangira gukora ibyiza bir@@ us@@ eho, uyu muryango utuma dufatanya tug@@ akomera kuruta uko buri wese yaba ameze abaye akora ari umwe, icy'@@ ingenzi ni uko imyanzuro dufata itagomba kugira uwo ib@@ angam@@ ir@@ a" Muri iy@@ i, nama Hon. Christophe Bazivamo yarahiriye kuba Umunyamabanga mukuru w@@ ungur@@ ije wa EAC akaba ari we wungirije Ambasaderi Liber@@ at Mf@@ umuk@@ eko ukomoka mu gihugu cy'u Burundi. Perezida Kagame yashimiye Hon. Christophe Bazivamo nk'@@ umunyarwanda witwaye neza akag@@ irirwa icyizere cyo gutorerwa kuba umunyamabanga mukuru wungirije w'uyu muryango amusaba kuzakora nk'@@ umunyafurika y'ibur@@ asirazuba. Ati: "Nd@@ ashimira umunyamabanga wungirije mushya, mw@@ ifurije kandi we na bagenzi be kuzagira manda irangwa no kugera ku nshingano no kugera ku mirimo itanga umusaruro, agiye kuzakora nk'@@ umunyafurika y'iburasirazuba cyane kurusha uko ari umunyarwand@@ a" Bazivamo yarahiriye inshingano nshya yahawe muri EAC Muri iyi nama kandi h@@ izwe ku cyemezo cyo gusinya amasezerano y'ubucuruzi ahuza EAC n'umuryango w'ubumwe bw'ibihugu by'@@ iburayi (E@@ U) maze abitabiriye iyi nama biha andi mezi atatu yo kwiga kuri aya masezerano. Aya masezerano yiswe [ Economic Part@@ n@@ er@@ ship Ag@@ re@@ ement@@ ,@@ ( EP@@ A@@ )@@ ] ibihugu by'u Rwanda na Kenya byamaze kuy@@ ashyiraho umukon@@ o, Uganda na yo yamaze kugaragaza ko yishimiye aya masezerano ariko ibihugu bya Tanzaniya n'@@ U Burundi byo byakomeje kugaragaza imbogamizi mu gusinya aya masezerano. Muri iyi nama, Perezida John Pombe Magufuli uyoboye EAC, yavuze ko hag@@ ikenewe ikindi gihe cyo kwiga kuri aya masezerano kugirango ibihugu byose bigize uyu muryango bib@@ anze biy@@ as@@ eseng@@ urane ubushishozi kugirango harebwe niba koko bikwiye kuy@@ asiny@@ a. Magufuli yavuze ko abayobozi b'ibihugu bigize EAC bazongera guhura mu mwaka utaha bakongera kuyag@@ aniraho mu rwego rwo kuy@@ an@@ on@@ osora. Ati: "Tw@@ ihaye amezi atatu yo kuganira byimbitse ku gusinya amasezerano ya EP@@ A, tuz@@ ahura muri Mutarama 2017 tun@@ on@@ osore iki kibaz@@ o." Iyi nama yitabiriwe n'aba Perezida batandukanye barimo Perezida Dr John Pombe Magufuli wa Tanzania, Yoweri Museveni wa Uganda, Paul Kagame w'u Rwanda na Visi Perezida wa Kenya William Rut@@ o. Ibihugu by'@@ U Burundi na Sudani y'Epfo byo bikaba byari by@@ ohereje intumwa z@@ ibih@@ agararira muri iyi nama.
Yak@@ ize umubyibuho ukabije kubera siporo no guhindura imirire Florence Uwam@@ w@@ ezi, umwe mu bagore n’abakobwa 150 bishyize hamwe ngo barwanye ikibazo cy’@@ umubyibuho ukabije, akaba ari n’umuyobozi w’ihuriro ryabo bise ‘@@ Sl@@ im n’@@ Fit@@ ’, bakora siporo no kunoza indyo kandi biragenda bik@@ emura ikibazo cyabo bat@@ iy@@ ambaje abag@@ anga. Ngo bagira n’igihe cyo kwigish@@ anya uburyo bwo gutegura amafunguro abafasha mu kibazo cyabo, ndetse hakaba n’ubwo bazana impuguke mu mir@@ ire. Bavuga ko bahisemo icyo bise ‘@@ Life St@@ y@@ le@@ ’, cyangwa uburyo bw’@@ imibereho. Uwam@@ wezi umaze imyaka ibiri ari muri iyo gahunda, aganira na www.@@ kigalit@@ oday@@ .com yavuze ko yabitang@@ iye ari uko umubyibuho ukabije wari watangiye kumut@@ eza ibibazo bikomeye kuko ngo yatangiye afite ibiro 105 ariko ubu akaba afite 8@@ 5, kandi ngo ntib@@ ijya byongera kuzamuka kuko azi uko abik@@ urikirana. B@@ akora siporo ihoraho Kuri we ngo amafunguro bategura ahoraho ni yo amufasha cyane, bitandukanye n’ab@@ iyic@@ isha inzara bashaka kun@@ anuka (R@@ ég@@ im@@ e) kuko bibateza ibibazo aho kuba ibisubizo. Ibyo nar@@ abikoze bir@@ akunda, ibiro birag@@ abanuka ariko ng@@ ahita m@@ bih@@ agarika noneho nyuma y’@@ andi mezi abiri by@@ aragarutse birenga n’ibyo nari mfite mbere@@ ”. Avuga ko ibyo byatumye akora ubushakashatsi kuri Internet ndetse yifashisha n’impuguke mu mirire ari bwo yamenye Life st@@ yl@@ e, asanga kwiy@@ icisha inzara umuntu yanga kurya atari byo. Ati “Kw@@ iyic@@ isha inzara si wo mut@@ i, ahubwo ni ukumenya indyo iboneye ndetse na siporo wakora kandi mu gihe gih@@ oraho noneho ibiro bikagenda big@@ abanuka gake gake kandi ntibig@@ aruk@@ e. Twebwe mu ihuriro ryacu umuntu afata amafunguro atatu ku munsi nk’uko bisanzwe, ariko tukamenya ayo dufata ad@@ ufash@@ a”. Ati “Mu gitondo turya imbuto, amagi ariko atari buri munsi, igikoma ariko ntitw@@ emerewe isukari n’ubuk@@ i. Saa sita turya imboga nyinshi, ibij@@ umba, amat@@ eke, imyumbati n’ibindi mbese iby@@ ongera imbaraga. N@@ ijoro dufata pot@@ age y’@@ imboga zinyuranye n’igikombe cy’@@ amata bik@@ unze, tubikora kugira ngo umubiri ugum@@ ane imbaraga, hatabaho gutakaza ibiro umuntu akan@@ egek@@ ar@@ a”. Ibyo ngo iyo umuntu ab@@ ivanze na siporo ku buryo buhoraho bifasha umuntu gutakaza ibiro buke buke kandi akag@@ umana imbaraga zo gukora imirimo ye isanzwe. Ikindi ngo iyo bibaye ngombwa gutek@@ esha amavuta, ni ugukoresha aturuka ku bih@@ ingwa. B@@ afitemo abantu bafite ibiro birenga 200 ariko ngo bizeye ko bizag@@ abanuka Ikindi ngo yari yar@@ ihaye intego yo gukora siporo imara isaha buri munsi, gusa ngo kubera ko muri bagenzi be harimo abafite ibiro byinshi cyane, bakora iminsi itatu mu cyumweru babifashijwemo n’impuguke (@@ Co@@ ach@@ ) zim@@ enya buri wese icyo ak@@ eneye. Ibyo byose ngo ni byo byatumye Uwam@@ wezi na bagenzi be bagenda bagera ku ntego yabo kuko ngo hari abaje muri Sl@@ im n’@@ F@@ it bafite ibiro 100, 17@@ 5, 250 ariko ubu ngo hakaba hari abag@@ abany@@ ijeho 15, 18, 20 no hejuru kandi bakomeje gahunda, icyiza kandi ngo ni uko umuntu ibiro abih@@ agarik@@ ira aho yumva ashaka. Buri nyuma y’ukwezi abo bagore bar@@ ahura bak@@ abap@@ ima bakareba uko ubuzima bwabo buh@@ agaze, uko ibinure bigenda big@@ abanuka hanyuma buri nyuma y’amezi atatu bakareba abat@@ akaje ibiro byinshi kurusha abandi, uwa mbere agah@@ embw@@ a. Imir@@ ire ibig@@ iramo uruhare rwa 70% naho siporo ikagira 30@@ %, bivuze ko ibiryo birimo amavuta n’@@ isukari ub@@ igabanya cyane, waba wakundaga umushy@@ us@@ yo wa mu gitondo uk@@ aw@@ ur@@ eka, uk@@ ibanda ku biryo birimo imboga nyinshi ndetse na sip@@ oro@@ ”. Impamvu simusiga zagufasha gutahura umukunzi utakw@@ itaho Urukundo ruza imbere mu bitera umunezero w’ubuzima ndetse biba akarusho iyo ufite uwo mujya inama mug@@ ah@@ uriza hamwe ku ntego ishimangira inzira murimo. Abah@@ uye n’ab@@ ish@@ ushanya mu rukundo bagira ibikomere bit@@ apfa kom@@ orwa n’ub@@ on@@ etse wese kubera uburemere bw@@ abyo. Abahanga mu by’@@ imibanire bagaragaza ko hari ibimenyetso bishobora kwereka umukobwa ko umuhungu nta gahunda y’igihe kirekire am@@ ufiteho ndetse ibyo kuba yam@@ ushyira mu rugo ngo amub@@ ere nyina w’abana biri kure nk’@@ ukwezi. Met@@ ro yatangaje ko hari imyitwarire ish@@ ushanya ko umuhungu ag@@ uc@@ enga yish@@ akira ubucuti bwo kuryoshya by’igihe gito yatuma umw@@ irinda cyangwa ukamenya uko umw@@ itwar@@ aho.   Gukunda guhora mu kabari Iyo umuhungu mukundana yibera mu kabari uz@@ agire amak@@ enga. Hari abagira imyitwarire idahwitse ku buryo hari ubwo az@@ ashaka ko muk@@ orera imibonano mpuzabitsina mu kabari atitaye ku bantu babah@@ anze amaso.   Gukunda gukor@@ anaho cyane Igikorwa cyo gukor@@ anaho ku bantu bakundana ni byiza cyane, gusa umuhungu mukundana n@@ ashaka kug@@ ukoraho cyane mwagiye nko mu birori runaka kugeza ubwo an@@ ashaka gukora ku myanya y’ibanga ni byiza ko umug@@ endera kure.   Ntiy@@ ita kumenya aho ukora Mu gihe umuhungu muri mu rukundo nta biganiro byinshi mug@@ ir@@ ana, icyo aba ashaka gusa ni uko muh@@ urira mu mash@@ uka. Rimwe na rimwe un@@ amusaba ubucuti kuri Facebook, ntab@@ ukw@@ emerere kandi ahora kuri internet.   A@@ kubaza niba utari mu mihango mbere y’uko umus@@ ura Iyo mufitanye gahunda yo guhura cyane cyane uri b@@ umus@@ ure, arag@@ uhamagara akak@@ ubaza niba uri imug@@ ongo, wam@@ wemerera akakubwira ko atari kuboneka. Iki kibazo ahanini kibaz@@ wa n’umuntu ufite gahunda yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ndetse wamaze kub@@ iteg@@ ura.   Iyo urwaye ak@@ uvugisha kuri telefone wumva atakw@@ itayeho Urukundo rukom@@ ezwa no kwemera kubana mu byago no mu mun@@ ezer@@ o. Uyu ntan@@ ak@@ wandikira ubutumwa bugufi uretse ubwo kuk@@ ubaza uko mw@@ ahura ngo mw@@ ishim@@ ishe.   Nt@@ akw@@ erekana mu nshuti ze n’umuryango Umuntu umeze gutya uzasanga yirinda ko inshuti ze z@@ asanga muri kumwe, ndetse ntihagire n’umuntu wo mu muryango we akw@@ ereka. Ni we uba uzi gusa. Iyo aramutse ag@@ uhaye impano, w@@ itega ko uzay@@ ishyura mu buryo bw’@@ imibonano mpuzabitsina nta rundi rukundo aba ag@@ ufit@@ iye.   Ntiy@@ ifuza ko muh@@ uza amaso iyo muri mu gitanda Kubera guhora ag@@ ukoresha imibonano mpuzabitsina, big@@ eraho akumva atifuza k@@ ukureba mu maso igihe muri kuy@@ ikora, ndetse ntan@@ aba@@ baz@@ we n’uko way@@ ikoranye n’abandi bantu. Leta yemeye gushakira indi mirimo abakozi ba Minisiteri z@@ avuguruwe Minisiteri y’Abakozi ba Leta n’Umurimo yatangaje ko abakozi ba za Minisiteri bazag@@ irwaho ingaruka n’impinduka z@@ akozwe, baz@@ ashakirwa ahandi mu nzego za Leta bijyanye n’ubushobozi bafite, ut@@ azah@@ abonerwa akaz@@ ahabwa imp@@ erek@@ eza. Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 18 Ukwakira 2018, nibwo Perezida Kagame Paul yavug@@ uruye Guverinoma. Mu mpinduka z@@ akozwe, uretse bamwe mu bayobozi bak@@ uwe@@ ho, nka Minisiteri y’Ubut@@ aka n’@@ Amash@@ yamba (@@ Min@@ il@@ af@@ ) yak@@ uweho nd@@ ese Minisiteri Ishinzwe impunzi n’@@ Imicungire y‘@@ Ibiza (M@@ id@@ imar@@ ) ihindurwa Minisiteri Ishinzwe Ibikorwa by’@@ Ubut@@ abazi. Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Abakozi ba Leta n’@@ Umurimo, Musonera Gasp@@ ard, yabwiye IGIHE ko abak@@ oraga muri minisiteri z@@ akoz@@ wemo impinduka bar@@ akomeza gufatwa nk’@@ abakozi ba leta, cyane ko akenshi iyo urwego rwa leta ruv@@ uyeho, inshingano rusang@@ anwe ziba zifite aho zim@@ ur@@ iwe. Abakozi bamwe ngo barim@@ ukana n’inshingano zabo, ariko hari n’abo inshingano zav@@ uyeho cyangwa se ibyo bakoraga bitajyanye n’inshingano z’@@ urwego r@@ ushya. Musonera ati “Abo bashak@@ irwa ahandi iyo h@@ ahari mu nzego za leta zitandukanye, kandi ngira ngo hari ingero nyinshi zagiye ziba@@ ho nk’igihe MIN@@ EAC yah@@ uz@@ waga na MINI@@ COM bikaba MIN@@ EA@@ COM@@ , abakozi bose bagiye babon@@ erwa aho bajya mu nzego za leta. Aho bujuje ibisabwa barah@@ ashyir@@ wa, nibo baba bafite ubw@@ ihut@@ irwe kurenza undi wese w@@ ava ahand@@ i.” “Ariko biramutse biba@@ yeho ko hari utabona aho ajy@@ a, afite ibyo agenerwa n’igihe abih@@ abwa kuko bimara amezi atandatu, muri ayo mezi atandatu ahabwa bibiri bya gatatu b’@@ umushahara yah@@ abw@@ aga. Ayo mezi atandatu akenshi arangira hashobora kuba habonetse indi nz@@ ira.” Igihe ngo ya mezi arangiye hat@@ abonetse igisubizo cy’@@ aho umukozi yakom@@ ereza akazi, ahabwa imp@@ erek@@ eza. Musonera ati “Ntabwo aba bafatwa nk’@@ ababur@@ iwe umurimo, kubivuga ubu byaba ari impuh@@ a. I@@ cy’@@ ibanze dukora mu izina rya leta ni ugushaka imyanya hirya no hino itarimo abantu bujuje ibisabwa, bakay@@ ishyir@@ wamo akazi kag@@ akomez@@ a.” Imbon@@ erahamwe y’abakozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubut@@ aka n’@@ Amash@@ yamba igaragaza ko yari ifite abasaga 30. Mu yindi myanya y’ubuyobozi yav@@ uyeho harimo n’uw’@@ Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Uburezi ushinzwe Amashuri y’@@ Imy@@ uga n’@@ Ubumeny@@ ingiro warimo Olivier Rwamukwaya n’uw’@@ Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi ushinzwe Ubuhinzi wari us@@ anzwemo Nsengiyumva Fulg@@ enc@@ e. Nyuma yo gutsindwa na Maur@@ iti@@ us, Emery nawe ahise y@@ erura ko ashyigikiye Abanyamahanga mu Mavubi Nyuma y'uko ikipe y'Igihugu y'u Rwanda Amavubi atsinzwe n'ikipe y'igihugu ya Maurit@@ ius igitego kimwe ku busa myugariro wayo Bayisenge Emery nawe ahise yemeza ko igihe habonetse umunyamahanga w@@ afasha Amavubi nta mpamvu bat@@ amuz@@ ana. Mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2014 nibwo FERWAFA na MINISPOC bafashe icyemezo ko nta mukinnyi ufite inkomoko itari iyo mu Rwanda uzongera gukinira Amavubi. Ibi byabaye nyuma y'uko u Rwanda ruh@@ anwe na CAF kubera gukinisha Birori Daddy wakiniraga kuri Pas@@ sport ebyiri. Ibi byatumye n'abandi bakinnyi bose bakin@@ iraga Amavubi bad@@ akomoka mu Rwanda birukanwa mu ikipe y'Igihugu nka Meddy Kag@@ ere. Sina J@@ el@@ ome n'abandi. Kagere Meddy ariko we yakomeje gusaba kenshi ko yasub@@ izwa mu Mavubi ariko inzego zibishinzwe kugeza ubu ntiz@@ ir@@ abim@@ wem@@ erera. Umunya Cote D'@@ Ivoire ukinira AZAM FC Kip@@ re Tch@@ ec@@ he nawe mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana na Radio Isango yavuze ko yifuza gukinira ikipe y'igihugu y'u Rwanda kuko ari igihugu akunda muri Afurika y'iburasirazuba ndetse anavuga ko azab@@ isaba mu buryo bwemewe n'amategeko. Emery Bayisenge myugariro w'@@ Amavubi. Ubwo yarari muri sit@@ udio za Radio Di@@ x Bayisenge Emery myugariro w'Amavubi utak@@ innye uyu mukino kubera amakarita 2 y'@@ umuhondo yemeje ko abakinnyi bafasha Amavubi nta mpamvu bat@@ aza kuy@@ akin@@ ira. Ah@@ ereye kuri Kagere yagize ati:"@@ Kagere Meddy ni umukinnyi ufite umusaruro mwiza muri iyi minsi, n'uwo Kip@@ re Tch@@ ache ni umukinnyi n'@@ umva nawe si mubi ubwo niba abishaka bigira inzira bic@@ amo. Umukinnyi nzi ko yam@@ fasha nta map@@ m@@ vu nt@@ amw@@ em@@ erera, kuko ntawe ut@@ ifuza uw@@ amufasha nziko bahari se ni iyihe mpamvu nt@@ amw@@ ifuz@@ a." Emery Bayisenge yunze mur@@ y'Abanyarwanda batari bake bakomeje kwerekana ko n'ubwo Abanyamahanga baciwe ariko igihe cyari kit@@ aragera bemeza ko igihe umukinnyi ubis@@ abye biciye mu mategeko nta mpamvu bat@@ amwemerera kuza gufasha u Rwanda.
Bat@@ itaye kuri Coronavirus, Karekezi n’abakinnyi bitabiriye ibirori by’@@ isabukuru y’@@ umukunzi wa Sarpong (Amafoto) Umutoza mushya wa Kiyovu Sports, Karekezi Olivier n’abahoze bakinana na Michael Sarpong muri Rayon Sports, bari mu bitabiriye ibirori byo kwizihiza isabukuru y’amavuko y’@@ umukunzi w’uyu muk@@ innyi, ku Cyumweru tariki ya 16 Kanama 2020. Ibi birori byabereye i Nyamirambo ahazwi nka Faz@@ enda, byitabiriwe n’abar@@ imo inshuti za hafi z’uyu mukinnyi n’umukunzi we uzwi nka Dj@@ az@@ il@@ a, gusa nta wari wambaye agapfukamunwa ndetse nta guhana intera kw@@ arimo nka zimwe mu ngamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Ni mu gihe Guverinoma ikomeje gusaba abanyarwanda kut@@ irara na gato, ahubwo bakongera imbaraga mu kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID-19, aho basabwa "@@ kugabanya ingendo zitari ngombwa harimo no kugabanya gus@@ urana mu miryango igihe bid@@ ak@@ ene@@ we." Karek@@ ekezi yagaragaye agirana ibiganiro na Sarp@@ ong@@ , aho bivugwa ko yaje kumushyigikira mu gihe ari kumur@@ eshya ngo az@@ erek@@ eze mu ikipe y’@@ ur@@ uc@@ aca. Uyu mutoza yah@@ erekejwe n’abakinnyi be bashya, umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves na myugariro Irambona Eric, bombi bakin@@ anye na Michael Sarpong muri Rayon Sports. Kapiteni wa Rayon Sports, Rugwiro Herv@@ é wigeze kw@@ ifuzwa na Kiyovu Sports muri iyi mp@@ esh@@ yi, na we yari yagiye gushyigikira inshuti ye hamwe na Habimana Hussein bakinana mu mutima w’ubw@@ ugar@@ izi. Ubwo Sarpong yiruk@@ anwaga muri Rayon Sports muri Mata, bivugwa ko Rugwiro na Habimana ari bo bakinnyi bonyine bamuh@@ amagaye kuri telefoni bamw@@ ihang@@ an@@ isha. Mugisha Gilbert wa Rayon Sports, byitezwe ko az@@ erekeza muri APR FC, na we yagaragaye muri ibi birori Michael Sarpong yah@@ ayemo umukunzi we impano y’@@ igishushanyo yam@@ ukoresh@@ ereje, kigaragaza isura y’uyu mukobwa. Agaruka ku bategura ibirori bihuza abantu benshi muri iyi minsi, Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP John Bosco Kabera, yavuze ko bitaz@@ ashoboka ko Polisi imenya aba@@ biteguye bose, ariko abantu bagomba kumva ko bafite inshingano zo kwirinda. Ati "@@ Ikintu gikomeye cyane tubona ni uko rwose hari abantu batubahiriza aya mabwiriza kandi nta kintu kig@@ oye cyatuma batay@@ ubahir@@ iza. Biz@@ ag@@ orana cyane ko Polisi yamenya ngo uyu arateganya gukora Brid@@ al Sh@@ ower tariki ya 26 ngo dush@@ yir@@ eho polisi. Uwimana yat@@ emwe ubwo yajyaga mu rugo rwa Mukang@@ wije w'imyaka 60 gufata impapuro z'@@ ibarura yari y@@ ibagir@@ iwe@@ yo ubwo yabar@@ uraga urugo rwe. Ariko yasanze umukecuru yamaze kuz@@ itw@@ ika, nk'uko bitangazwa na Polisi y'igihugu. Nyuma yo kuvugana nabi kuri bose byaje kurangira Mukang@@ wije afashe isuka akay@@ ikubita Uwimana akam@@ ukom@@ erets@@ a. Umuyobozi w'umudugudu wa Gas@@ ambu, Jacques Rur@@ ibik@@ iye avuga ko Mukang@@ wije yakoze igikorwa cy'@@ urugomo abitewe no kuba yari yanyoye inzoga y'@@ inkorano yitwa Nyir@@ atar@@ e. Rur@@ ibik@@ iye yongeraho ko uwo mukecuru yari asang@@ anwe amakimbirane n'umuryango wa Uwimana n'abaturanyi ku kirego bamur@@ eze kuri Polisi y'@@ umurenge w Sav@@ e, kubera ubusinzi bwe. Ik@@ avuga ko abantu bakwiye kumva ko zitang@@ iza gusa ubuzima bwabo ahubwo zin@@ atera impagarara mu muryango nyarwanda. Polisi ihamagarira abantu kureka izo nzoga z'@@ inkorano no gut@@ ungira agatoki Polisi abaz@@ ikora, kugira ngo bashyikir@@ izwe ubutabera babir@@ y@@ ozwe kuko bakora ibikorwa binyuranyije n'amategeko agenga igihugu. Nshimiyimana Leonard
Muhanga: Abikorera barifuza gukorerwa ubuvugizi kurusha kwak@@ wa umusanzu Mu gihe h@@ itegurwa amatora y'@@ abahagarariye urugaga rw'abikorera mu gihugu, hirya no hino mu turere hari gukorwa ibiganiro bigamije gusobanura inshingano z'@@ urugaga rw'abikorera PSF ari nako basaba abikorera kugira ibyo batekereza by@@ akomeza kubateza imbere. Min@@ ic@@ om yinjiye mu kibazo cy’@@ inganda z’@@ ubuhinzi z@@ ishingwa zik@@ abura ibyo zitunganya Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Ing@@ anda, Munyeshyaka Vincent, yatangaje ko batangiye gushyiraho ingamba zizatuma inganda z’@@ ubuhinzi zit@@ azongera kubura umusaruro zit@@ ung@@ anya. Mu bihe bishize hagiye havugwa inganda z@@ ishingwa ariko zik@@ abura umusaruro wo gutunganya nyamara n’abahinzi bagat@@ aka ko babuze aho bag@@ urish@@ iriza umusaruro wabo. Umwaka ushize ubwo uwari Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’inganda François Kanimba yaganiraga n’abadepite ku kugurisha umusaruro w’ubuhinzi n’ibijyanye n’amat@@ a, yavuze ko inganda nyinshi zagiye zij@@ yaho ziz@@ eye ko abahinzi bazaz@@ iz@@ anira umusaruro ariko z@@ amara kuzura ntibig@@ ende gutyo, zimwe zig@@ ah@@ omba. Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa Kane, Minisitiri Munyeshyaka yavuze ko bafashe ingamba zizatuma inganda z@@ ibona umusaruro kandi n’abahinzi bakaby@@ unguk@@ iramo. Yagize ati “@@ Abash@@ oramari bazana inganda ariko ntibash@@ yir@@ eho uburyo bwo kumenya aho umusaruro uzat@@ uruka, turashaka ko bajya bagirana amasezerano n’abahinzi bacu n’@@ amakoperative ku buryo uruganda biyemeza bati ‘@@ tuz@@ akenera umusaruro runaka, toni runaka z’@@ ibigori, toni runaka z’@@ ibishy@@ imb@@ o’ ku buryo ikintu cyo kuba abahinzi bahinga bazi aho baz@@ ajyana ibihingwa byabo tu@@ cy@@ ongeramo inguf@@ u.” Uretse kubura umusaruro hari n’ubwo uboneka inganda zik@@ aw@@ anga kubera ko wah@@ un@@ itswe nabi uk@@ angirika. Munyeshyaka yavuze ko uburyo abahinzi bah@@ un@@ ikamo but@@ izewe ari nabyo bituma inganda z@@ anga uwo musar@@ uro. Kuri ubu hariho gahunda yo kubaka amah@@ un@@ ikiro ariko mu gihe atarag@@ ezwa hose n bari kuvugana n’inganda ku buryo zizajya zijya gufata umusaruro w’ubuhinzi ug@@ is@@ arurwa mu mur@@ ima. Ati “Ur@@ agenda ugasanga abaturage bacu ibyo b@@ ejeje uko babis@@ aruye niko bab@@ ib@@ itse. Ikibazo gihari ni uko abahinzi bacu batabasha kugira umusaruro udafite in@@ eng@@ e.@@ Nka buriya dufite uruganda rukora ibiryo by’abana n’@@ a babyeyi bat@@ itwe ariko ku musaruro tubona imbere mu gihugu usanga bafat@@ aho 20@@  % kuko 80@@  % iba it@@ ujuje ubuziran@@ eng@@ e.” Yakomeje agira ati “Turi gufasha abahinzi ku@@ babonera aho bah@@ unika imyaka yabo, aho bay@@ um@@ ishiriza h@@ ujuje ubuziranenge ariko mu gihe ubwo buryo but@@ aragera ku baturage no ku makoperative yose, turi kuvugana n’inganda kugira ngo turebe ukuntu inganda zo z@@ ajya z@@ ijyana utum@@ ashini mu mirima y’@@ amakoperative n’iy’@@ abaturage, bagas@@ arura bak@@ umvikana igic@@ iro, bagaha inganda ku buryo zijya kwiy@@ um@@ ish@@ iriz@@ a.” Munyeshyaka yavuze ko biramutse bikozwe gutyo, byakor@@ ohera inganda kuko zo ziba z@@ izi uko zih@@ unika neza umusaruro ntiw@@ angirik@@ e. Kuva mu mwaka wa 2010 kugeza 2017, Leta yari yiyemeje kuba yubatse ibigega biba@@ sha guh@@ unika toni 200 z’@@ umusaruro w’@@ ubuhinzi. Mu minsi ishize ubwo yari muri Komisiyo y’@@ Iterambere ry’@@ Ubukungu n’@@ Imari muri Sena, Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubw@@ orozi, ushinzwe ubuhinzi, Nsengiyumva Fulg@@ ence, yavuze ko babashije kubaka ibigega by@@ abasha guh@@ unika toni ibihumbi 19@@ 5 ariko nabwo ngo aba@@ bih@@ un@@ itsemo ni mbar@@ wa. Nsengiyumva yavuze ko by@@ et@@ ewe n’ibibazo byinshi byatumye umusaruro ut@@ aboneka uko bikwiye, ahanini bishingiye ku bahinzi baw@@ ug@@ urish@@ ir@@ izaga mu murima ibyo bita ‘@@ k@@ ots@@ a’ n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere yagiye ituma bar@@ um@@ bya. Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Ing@@ anda, Munyeshyaka Vincent

G@@ IC@@ UMB@@ I: B@@ agenda ibirometero 8 bagana ku ishuri, Ushinzwe uburezi ati: ’@@ ni yo miterere y’@@ Akar@@ ere@@ ’ Bamwe mu banyeshuri biga muri G.@@ S.@@ Kag@@ eyo baturuka mu Centre ya Rwas@@ ama bagorwa cyane n’urugendo rwa buri munsi bakora bajya ku ishuri kuko bo bavuga ko bakoresha amasaha abiri ku munsi bajya ku ishuri n’andi abiri bas@@ ubir@@ ayo. Int@@ era iri hagati ya Rwas@@ ama n’ishuri big@@ aho ugereranyije iri hagati y’ib@@ ilometero 4 na 5 abiga mu wa gatandatu w’amashuri abanza bakaba bahang@@ enda inshuro inshuro enye ku munsi. Yagize ati: “Kuva mu rugo kugera ku ishuri nkoresha isaha n’igice, hari igihe imvura igwa tukiri mu rugo tug@@ asiba cyangwa ik@@ ad@@ usanga mu nzira tuk@@ anyag@@ irwa, amak@@ ayi agash@@ wany@@ uka.” Iki kibazo abanyeshuri bataha muri Rwas@@ ama bag@@ ihur@@ iyeho bose kuko imiterere yaho n’uw@@ agira amikoro yo gutega imodoka cyangwa moto ntiy@@ ay@@ ibona kuko ni mu musozi uh@@ an@@ amye kandi nta n’@@ umuhanda ugera ku ishuri. Abanyarwanda benshi ntibazi niba Leta igenzura ibyo bakorera kuri telefoni no kuri interineti Abanyarwanda beshi ntibar@@ amenya niba Leta igenzura ibyo bavugira kuri telefoni cyangwa ubutumwa b@@ ohererezanya haba kuri telefoni no kuri interineti. Ibi ni ibyavuye mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ikigo kig@@ enzura imikorere y’ikoranabuhanga muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba ndetse na Afurika y’amajyepfo (C@@ IP@@ ES@@ A), ubushakashatsi bwashyizwe ahagaragara kuri uyu wa kabiri. Iki kigo mu bushakashatsi bw@@ acyo, kivuga ko mu banyarwanda babaj@@ ijwe, nibura 23@@ % ari bo bavuze ko Leta yaba igenzura ibyo bavugira cyangwa bakorera kuri telefoni na interineti, bitandukanye n’ibindi bihugu byo mu karere, kuko nka Kenya 91 % by’@@ ababaj@@ ijwe, bagaragaje ko Leta ibag@@ enz@@ ura, mu Burundi 60 % barab@@ yem@@ eje, Tanzania 80 % barab@@ yem@@ eza, naho muri Uganda byemezwa na 76 %. Icyakora nubwo ab@@ emeje ko Leta y’u Rwanda yaba igenzura ibivug@@ irwa kuri Telefoni n’ib@@ ikorerwa kuri Interineti ari bake, C@@ IP@@ ES@@ A yo ivuga ko igenzura rir@@ iho. Aha batanze urugero rw’@@ umuhanzi Kizito Mih@@ igo, n’umunyamakuru Cassien Ntamuh@@ anga, bakatiwe n’inkiko muri Werurwe uyu mwaka, bazira kubiba urwango n’ubug@@ ambanyi. Byinshi mu bimenyetso by@@ ashing@@ i@@ weho, ni ibiganiro aba bombi bagiye bagirira kuri W@@ ats@@ app cyangwa Sk@@ yp@@ e, baganira n’@@ abanzi b’igihugu baba hanze. Ikindi kandi iki kigo gish@@ ingiraho kivuga ko Leta igenzura ibivug@@ irwa ku mat@@ elef@@ oni, ni Ishami rishinzwe kurwanya ibyaha by@@ ifashishije ikoranabuhanga ryashyizweho muri Polisi y’u Rwanda, rigamije guha ubumenyi abapolisi ku buryo bwo gutahura ibyaha bikorerwa kuri interineti. Iki kigo kandi cyavuze ko henshi mu bihugu bya Afurika y’ibur@@ asirazuba, bigenzura ibivug@@ irwa kuri telefoni na interineti, ngo mu rwego rwo kurwanya iterabwoba no kurinda umutekano w’igihugu. H@@ atanzwe urugero rwa Ugand@@ a,aho muri Nyakanga 2015 bagiye kugura s@@ of@@ tware muri Israel no mu Butaliyani, ifite ubushobozi buhagije bwo kumv@@ iriza ibikorerwa ku mat@@ elef@@ oni no kuri interineti. Icyakora iki kigo kivuga ko impamvu zituma Leta z’ibihugu zig@@ enzura ibikorerwa kuri interineti no kuri telefoni, ngo hari ibyaha byinshi bisigaye bikorerwa kuri interineti birimo ubujura n’ iterabwoba. Kubera ko Leta zig@@ enzura ibivug@@ irwa ku mat@@ elef@@ on@@ i,@@ C@@ IP@@ ES@@ A ivuga ko hari abaturage bar@@ ekeye aho kongera kug@@ anirira kuri interineti no ku mat@@ elef@@ oni. Aha bigaragara cyane mu Burundi cyane cyane nyuma y’@@ imvururu z@@ akurikiye kongera kwiyamamaza kwa Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza. Ubushakashatsi kandi bwerekanye ko u Rwanda ruza mu bihugu biri kwihuta mu kugeza interineti ku bantu benshi, aho biri ku kigero cya 31 % by’abaturage bose, bingana n’abaturage miliyoni 3.@@ 5. Ku mwanya wa mbere hari Kenya, aho 61 % by’abaturage bagera kuri interineti, hakaza Uganda ifite 20@@ %, ndetse na Tanzania ifite 22@@ %. Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abaturage 74 % bafite telefoni ngend@@ anwa, mu gihe igihugu gifite umubare muto w’abaturage bafite telefoni muri EAC ari u Burundi, ifite 3@@ 1% by’@@ abaturage.

Uganda: Perezida Museveni y@@ erezwe mu Rukiko kuba ashaka kwiyamamaza kandi imyaka ye itab@@ im@@ wemerera Amakuru aturuka mu gihugu cya Uganda, aravuga ko Umukandida bagomba kuba bahanganye mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu ya 2016, Amama Mbabazi yamaze gutanga ikirego mu Rukiko agaragaza ko Perezida Museveni imyaka ye it@@ amwemerera kwiyamamaza muri aya matora nkuko biteganywa n'@@ Itegeko Nshinga ry'@@ icyo gihugu. Nkuko ikinyam@@ akuru, The Monitor k@@ ibitangaza, Umuvugizi wa Amama Mbabazi, ariwe Benjamin Al@@ ip@@ anga, yatangaje ko Perezida Museveni azir@@ itswe n'ibintu bibiri aribyo kuba nta ngufu z'@@ umubiri afite, ndetse n'@@ Itegeko Nshinga rit@@ amwemerera kuyobora igihugu afite imyaka nk'iyo ag@@ ejej@@ eho. Mu kirego cyatanzwe mu Ruk@@ iko, Mbabazi avuga ko Museveni adashobora gukora manda yose y'imyaka 5 ahereye muri 2016, kuko yaba arengeje imyaka ntarengwa iteganywa n'@@ Itegeko nshinga rya Uganda. Iyo abantu bas@@ omana ngo hari imisemburo (H@@ or@@ mon@@ es) za “@@ O@@ cy@@ to@@ cy@@ n@@ es » yinjira mu wo murimo gukorana icyo gikorwa, bikongera ubw@@ iz@@ erane no kwiy@@ umv@@ an@@ amo. Ibi ngo ku gihe cya cyera byari byemerewe gukorwa n’@@ abashakanye gusa. Ku itam@@ a: Ni ind@@ amuk@@ anyo igaragaza ubw@@ uz@@ u, ubucuti ndetse no kwisanzura ku wo us@@ om@@ ye. Uru rubuga ruvuga ko gusomana ku itama mu bihugu by’i Burayi bin@@ agaragaza icyubahiro umuntu afitiye undi, hamwe no kwereka umuntu mumaze kumenyana ko umw@@ ishimiye. Ku ijos@@ i: Gusoma umuntu ni ikimenyetso cy’uko umw@@ ifuza. Ku kig@@ anz@@ a: B@@ igaragaza icyubahiro uhaye uwo muntu, ashobora kuba ari umuntu ukur@@ uta cyangwa umukunzi wawe ushaka kumug@@ aragariza ko umw@@ ubash@@ ye. Ariko uko iminsi igenda is@@ imburana ngo bikaba bigenda bik@@ end@@ era, kuko byakorwaga cyane ku ngoma z’@@ Abami bo mu bihugu by’@@ uburengerazuba bw’@@ Isi. Gus@@ omana ku rur@@ im@@ i: Ibi ngo ni ikimenyetso gikomeye cy’ubw@@ iz@@ erane hagati y’abantu babiri. Kubera ingaruka zishobora guterwa n’@@ uku gusomana zirimo no kwandura indwara zitandukanye, ubu buryo ngo na bwo bugenda buc@@ ika. Si abantu bose bapfa kwemera ko umuntu abas@@ oma, rimwe na rimwe kubera imyizerere cyangwa se kubera ko bazi icyo bisoban@@ ura, kandi bakaba bat@@ iyumvamo umuntu ushaka kub@@ i@@ bakorera.
Mu mwiherero w’ab@@ itegura shampiyona ya Afurika intego ni ukw@@ egukana imidali Iminsi irabarirwa ku ntoki kugira ngo Abanyarwanda bongere kubona ibihangange mu kuny@@ onga igare muri Afurika bit@@ eraniye i Kigali nyuma y’imyaka umunani, abaz@@ aserukira igihugu bakomeje imyiteguro ikomeye amaso bayah@@ anze kwegukana imidali myinshi ariko bakan@@ enga uburyo bateg@@ urwa. Ni inshuro ya kabiri u Rwanda rugiye kwakira rimwe mu mas@@ iganwa akomeye cyane rya shampiyona y’Afurika nyuma ya 2010 ubwo imidali myinshi yatah@@ aga muri Eritrea na Afurika y’Epfo, u Rwanda rug@@ at@@ ahira gutegura neza. Si inzozi ko nyuma y’imyaka umunani ibi bitazongera kwisub@@ iramo kuko kuri ubu abasore bo mu rwa Gasabo bahagaze neza ndetse bagiye bakubita ah@@ ababaza Eritrea isanzwe ari umwami w’@@ igare kuri uyu mugabane aho bahuriye hose mu mezi ashize kandi ntibar@@ ash@@ irwa. Kuri uyu wa Gatanu, IGIHE yabas@@ uye aho bari mu mwiherero i Nyamata batangaza byinshi biteze muri iri rushanwa, ibyo basezer@@ anya Abanyarwanda ndetse n’amakipe amwe biteze ko az@@ abaha akazi gakomeye. Areruya Joseph nk’@@ izina ry@@ igaruriye imitima ya benshi akora amateka agah@@ esha u Rwanda isiganwa rya mbere muri Afurika rya La Trop@@ ical Amissa Bongo 2018, ak@@ egukana Tour de l’@@ Espoir byatanze itike ku gihugu yo kuzakina Tour de France U 23, byiyongera kuri Tour du Rwanda 2017 nayo yat@@ waye, afite intego zo kuguma kuzamura ibendera ariko ntiby@@ oroshye. Yagize ati “Tw@@ iteguye neza muri rusange urabona ko abakinnyi bameze neza. Muri shampiyona ya Afurika habamo imidali itatu muri buri cyic@@ iro, turifuza ko twakw@@ eguk@@ anamo myinshi ish@@ oboka. Sin@@ ir@@ ebaho nka Areruya ahubwo tuz@@ akorera hamwe ku nyungu zo gushakira igihugu ish@@ em@@ a.” Guhera ibumoso ni Mugisha Samuel, Areruya Joseph, Nsengimana Jean Bosco, Byukusenge Patrick, Niyonshuti Adri@@ en, Ndayisenga Val@@ ens, J@@ C Uwizeye na Munyaneza Didier Mu kumw@@ ung@@ anira, Mugisha Samuel basanzwe bakinana muri Team Dimension Data for Q@@ h@@ ub@@ eka yo muri Afurika y’Epfo ban@@ afatanyije bikomeye mu kwegukana Tour de l’@@ Esp@@ oir@@ , yagize ati “Kuri ubu u Rwanda nta gihugu cyo muri Afurika tug@@ it@@ inya, ubona ko abakinnyi bacu bamaze kwigirira icyizere kandi bahora bumva ko bashoboye. Ntabwo twavuga ko imidali tuzay@@ itwara byoroshye ariko ni yo nteg@@ o.” Mugisha na Areruya bazakina mu batarengeje imyaka 23, ariko Areruya yong@@ ereho gukina mu cyiciro cy’@@ abakur@@ u. Mu biganiro by’@@ umutoza S@@ emp@@ oma Fel@@ ex@@ , byumvikana ko ari umusore afitiye icyizere cyinshi nubwo ashimangira ko biz@@ asaba na bagenzi be gukora cyane kugira ngo batah@@ irize umugozi umwe cyane cyane mu gice cyo gusiganwa mu muhanda. S@@ emp@@ oma yagize ati “@@ Irushanwa nk’@@ iri riba rikomeye kuko rin@@ itabirwa n’amakipe akomeye cyane kandi intego iba ari imwe ni ugut@@ wara imid@@ ali. Mu gusiganwa n’ibihe umuntu ku giti cye dufit@@ emo abakinnyi babiri, tukag@@ iramo babiri mu bakiri bato b’abakobwa n’ab’@@ abah@@ ungu, ibi byiciro byose rero turashaka gutwara imidali duhereye ku wa zahabu n’undi wose wabon@@ ek@@ a.” Yongeyeho ati “@@ Abakinnyi bacu bamaze kumenyera amasiganwa cyane. Mu minsi mike ishize begukanye amasiganwa atatu akomeye muri A@@ urika yikurikir@@ anya, birumvikana ni igitutu kuko bazaba basabwa no gutsindira imbere y’@@ abafana. Gusa tugerageza kubag@@ anir@@ iza, kuko bagomba kumenya uko baby@@ itwar@@ amo, bashobora gutsinda cyangwa bag@@ atsind@@ wa.” Fel@@ ex S@@ emp@@ oma avuga ko yizeye ko u Rwanda ruz@@ egukana imidali myinshi muri shampiyona y'@@ Afurika Avuga ko kuba u Rwanda rw@@ aragize amahirwe ruk@@ abona umukinnyi w’@@ inararibonye nka Adrien Niyonshuti wari umaze igihe adah@@ amagarwa muri Team Rwanda kubera amasiganwa menshi yabaga afite mu ikipe yakiniraga ya Team Dimension Data for Q@@ h@@ ub@@ eka akaba yitezweho kuz@@ ayobora barumuna be mu muhanda, abagira inama nk’umuntu w@@ abab@@ anjirije kandi wakinnye ku rwego rw’@@ aba@@ bigize umwuga igihe kinini. Niyonshuti na we yemeza ko byam@@ ushimishije kugaruka gukinira igihugu kandi yizeye ko imidali myinshi iz@@ asigara mu rugo ariko akagira n’ibyo anenga mu buryo abakinnyi bateg@@ urwa igihe gito nyamara abo baba bazah@@ angana bo bahora hamwe. Yagize ati “Ur@@ ebye amakipe nka Eritrea, Ethiopia cyangwa Algeria, ni amakipe afite amateka maremare muri uyu mukino kandi amenyereye kwegukana imid@@ ali. Mur@@ umva ko hakiri urugendo rurer@@ ur@@ e.” Yongeyeho ati “Ni byo hari ibyakozwe ngo umukino wacu uzamuk@@ e kandi ubona ko ufite ejo hazaza ariko ikit@@ aragenda neza im@@ iteg@@ urire. Iyi shampiyona ya Afurika iz@@ akinirwa mu mihanda ya Kicukiro, Gasabo na Bugesera, izakinwa kuva tariki 14 kugera 18 Gashyantare 2018. Mama Cath@@ eline washinze umuryango w’@@ Aba@@ bikira wita ku mf@@ ubyi n’abafite ubumuga yitabye Imana Mama Cath@@ eline Nduw@@ amar@@ iya, Umub@@ ikira w’@@ Umus@@ om@@ us@@ iyo washinze umuryango ushingiye ku idini Gatolika witwa “ Inshuti z’@@ abak@@ ene@@ ” , uzwi mu Rwanda ku bikorwa byo kwita ku mf@@ ubyi n’abafite ubumuga ahantu hatandukanye, yitabye Imana mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kabiri, tariki ya 4 Nyakanga 2017. Umuyobozi w’uyu muryango "@@ Inshuti z’@@ abak@@ ene@@ ", Nikuze Dat@@ ive, yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu mub@@ ikira washinze umuryango babamo mu 1986 yitabye Imana mu ma saa mbili n’igice. Umuryango “I@@ nshuti z’@@ Abak@@ ene (@@ I.@@ A@@ )@@ ” ufite ibikorwa birimo ikigo cy’abana bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe n’ubw’@@ ingingo (@@ Centre Inshuti Z@@ acu, Gah@@ ang@@ a-@@ Kicukir@@ o@@ ); Ikigo cy’abana babana n’ubwandu bw’agakoko gatera SIDA (@@ Centre Ir@@ am@@ iro, Bus@@ anz@@ a-@@ Kicukir@@ o@@ ); Ikigo cy’abana bafite ibibazo binyuranye (@@ Centre H@@ umura, Rut@@ ongo - Rulind@@ o@@ ); Iv@@ uriro (D@@ is@@ p@@ ens@@ a@@ ire, J@@ anj@@ ag@@ iro - Rwamag@@ an@@ a). Umuyobozi w’ "@@ Inshuti z’@@ abak@@ ene@@ " avuga ko muri ibyo bigo byose harimo kwitabwaho abantu byibuze 150. Nk’uko izina ry’uyu muryango rib@@ ivuga, Nikuze avuga ko baz@@ ahora bib@@ ukira kuri Cath@@ eline ubwitange bwo gufasha abatishoboye no kub@@ eg@@ era. Yagize ati “@@ Yari intwari, yaduhaye urugero rwiza kandi twifuza kur@@ ukurik@@ iza. Y@@ akundaga abakene cyane, agakunda guseng@@ a.” Mama Cath@@ eline Nduw@@ amariya mwene Gash@@ ak@@ amba Mathias na Nyir@@ ant@@ eko Ad@@ ela, yavutse mu 194@@ 4, mu Murenge wa Mw@@ endo, Akarere ka Ruhang@@ o; mu nzego z’@@ idini Gatolika ni muri Sant@@ ar@@ ali ya Mw@@ endo, Paruwasi ya Muy@@ unzwe, Diyosezi ya Kabgayi. Nyuma n’abandi babyeyi bafite abana bav@@ ukanye ubumuga bwo mu mutwe bagiye bay@@ oboka iki kigo kuri ubu bakaba bafite abana bagera kuri 30 bafite ubumuga butandukanye. Mama Cath@@ eline Nduw@@ amariya yitabye Imana afite imyaka 73 y'amavuko Aba@@ bikira b'@@ Inshuti z’@@ abakene
Kigali: Abapolisi basabwe kurushaho kunoza imikorere bagendera ku ndangagaciro zayo Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Polisi y'u Rwanda, Emmanuel K. Gasana, yabwiye abapolisi bagize ishami rya Polisi y'u Rwanda rishinzwe kubungabunga umutekano wo mu muhanda (@@ Tr@@ aff@@ ic and Road Saf@@ ety Depart@@ ment@@ ) gukomeza gukora akazi kinyamwuga kugira ngo bakomeze gusigasira umutekano wo mu muhanda. Ubu butumwa IGP Gasana yab@@ utanze ku itariki 5 Nyakanga 2015 mu nama yagiranye n'abapolisi bagize iri shami bakorera mu mugi wa Kigali. Iyi nama yabereye ku cyicaro gikuru cya Polisi y'u Rwanda ku Kacyiru iri muri gahunda ye ng@@ ari ikomeje yo gusura abapolisi bakorera mu mashami n'imitwe bya Polisi y'u Rwanda haba mu mugi wa Kigali ndetse n'ahandi mu gihugu. Iyi nama yitabiriwe n'Umuyobozi w'iri sh@@ ami, Commissioner of Police (CP) George Rum@@ anzi n'abandi ba ofisiye bakuru ba Polisi y'u Rwanda barimo abay@@ iyoboye mu ntara (R@@ eg@@ ional Police Com@@ mand@@ ers@@ -@@ RP@@ C@@ s). IGP Gasana yabanje gushimira abapolisi bagize iri shami ku bwitange n'@@ umurava bibar@@ anga mu kazi ndetse n'uko bafatanya na bagenzi babo bakorera mu yandi mashami mu kubungabunga no gusigasira umutekano w'@@ abaturarwanda n'ib@@ yabo. Yagize ati:"@@ Muk@@ wiye gukora cyane ariko kandi mug@@ akora kinyamwuga mut@@ anga serivisi nziza aho muba muri mu kazi hose ". Yababwiye kuba intangarug@@ ero, inyangamugayo , no kurangwa n'@@ imico n'imyitwarire byiza, bazirikana kandi bajyan@@ isha ibyo bakora n'@@ indang@@ agaciro, intego, n'ingamba bya Polisi. IGP Gasana yabwiye kandi abapolisi bagize iri shami ati:"@@ Muk@@ wiye kumenya inshingano z@@ anyu, mukwiye kumenya ibyo mukwiye gukora n'uko mw@@ abikora neza, mugomba kumenya kandi ibyo mub@@ ujijwe gukor@@ a". Y@@ abag@@ iriye inama yo kwiga no kwihugura buri gihe, aha akaba yaragize ati:" Imikorere myiza igomba kujyana naho iterambere rig@@ eze. Ni ngombwa rero kwihugura buri gihe kugira ngo ud@@ asigara inyuma, ibyo bituma ukora umurimo un@@ oze , bityo ug@@ aha serivisi nziza abaza kuyig@@ us@@ aba@@ ". Yongeyeho agira ati:"@@ Mukomeze mur@@ angwe n'im@@ ok@@ orere ya kinyamw@@ ug@@ a,@@ ibyo bizatuma muk@@ omeza guhesha ishema Polisi y'u Rwanda ndetse n'igihugu muri rusang@@ e". IGP Gasana yasobanuriye abapolisi bagize iri shami ko "@@ Umutekano ari ishingiro ry'@@ iterambere riram@@ bye@@ " bityo ababwira gukomeza kurangwa n'imyitwarire myiza n'@@ ubunyamwuga ku kazi kugira ngo bakomeze kuw@@ ubum@@ bat@@ ira no kuwus@@ igas@@ ira. Yab@@ ibukije ko imikorere yabo id@@ ashimwa gusa n'inzego zibak@@ uriye mu Rwanda ahubwo ko in@@ ashimwa n'ibindi bihugu, aha akaba yaratanze urugero rw'@@ aho muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, itsinda ry'@@ abapolisi bo mu gihugu cya Uganda ryaje mu Rwanda kwigira ku mikorere y'@@ ishami rya Polisi y'u Rwanda rishinzwe kubungabunga umutekano wo mu muhanda cyane cyane uburyo r@@ ifatanya n'izindi nzego mu gutunganya imikorere y'@@ abakora umwuga wo gutwara abagenzi kuri mot@@ o,@@ abo bakunze kwita "@@ Abamotari ". Yabwiye abayobozi ba Polisi y'u Rwanda mu ntara bari bitabiriye iyi nama kuzageza ubu butumwa n'@@ impanuro ku bapolisi babarizwa muri iri shami bakorera mu ntara bay@@ obora. RNP
U Rwanda rwahawe inkunga ya miliyari 13 Frw yo kongera ingufu z'amashanyarazi Yanditswe kuya 18@@ -05-@@ 2016 saa 16@@ :5@@ 2@@ ' na Cyprien Niyom@@ w@@ ungeri Guverinoma y'u Rwanda n'iy'@@ u Budage zas@@ inye amasezerano y'@@ inkunga ya miliyoni 15 z'@@ Amay@@ ero (@@ miliyari hafi 13 z'@@ Am@@ any@@ arwand@@ a) ziz@@ akoreshwa mu gutera inkunga umushinga wo kubaka urugomero rwa Rusizi III ruz@@ atanga amashanyarazi ku Rwanda, Burundi na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. Iyi nkunga iz@@ anyuzwa muri Banki y'@@ Abadage y'iterambere (K@@ f@@ W@@ ) izafasha u Rwanda gutanga umusanzu warwo mu kubaka uyu mushinga. Ubusanzwe umushinga wa Rusizi II uz@@ ashyirwa mu bikorwa hakoreshejwe amadolari y'Amerika miliyoni 6@@ 50 ziz@@ atangwa n'ibyo bihugu uko ari bitatu. Uyu mushinga wa Rusizi III uz@@ aterwa inkunga n'abandi bafatanyabikorwa nka Banki Nyafurika y'@@ Iterambere, Banki y'Isi n'Umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'u Burayi. Minisitiri w'Imari n'@@ Igenamigambi, Amb. Claver Gatete was@@ inye aya masezerano ku ruhande rw'u Rwanda, yavuze ko umushinga wa Rusizi III uzongera MW 50 ku ngufu u Rwanda r@@ ufite, ug@@ atanga akazi ku baturage ndetse ukag@@ abanya n'iy@@ angizwa ry'@@ ibidukikije. Yagize ati "Ni inkunga izafasha u Rwanda gutanga umusanzu warwo muri uyu mushinga uzag@@ irira akamaro akarere, turashimira cyane u Budage kuko umushinga nk'uyu usaba ubufasha ubwo ari bwo bwos@@ e." Muri Werurwe u Rwanda rwas@@ inye inguzanyo ya miliyoni 25 z'@@ amadorali ya Amerika na Banki Nyafurika itsura amajyambere (B@@ AD@@ ) azakoreshwa muri uyu mushinga. Ambasaderi w'u Budage mu Rwanda, Peter F@@ ah@@ r@@ en@@ hol@@ t@@ z yavuze ko bishimiye gutanga umusanzu wabo mu kongera ingufu mu Rwanda, kuko bizatuma abaturage batera imbere bakagira ubuzima bwiza. Yagize ati "@@ Aya masezerano ar@@ ahamya ubufatanye bushingiye ku buc@@ uti no kwiz@@ erana hagati y'ibihugu byombi. U Budage bush@@ ishikajwe n'uko amashanyarazi ah@@ endutse kandi ahagije agera kuri buri Munyarwanda ndetse no mu baturanyi babo mu Burundi na RD@@ C@@ ." U Budage bufasha u Rwanda mu mishinga y'uburezi cyane cyane iy@@ ' ubumenyingiro n'imy@@ ug@@ a(@@ TV@@ ET@@ ), kwegereza ubuyobozi abaturage, iterambere ry'@@ abikorera, igatanga n'@@ inkunga mu kigega cy'@@ imicungire y'imari ya leta n'ibindi, byose itang@@ amo miliyoni z'@@ amayero 6@@ 9.@@ 5. Umushinga wa Rusizi III uzatanga MW 14@@ 7, niwo wa mbere w'@@ ingufu mu Karere k'ibiyaga bigari uzaba ushy@@ izweho ku bufatanye bwa Leta n'@@ abikorera. Biteganyijwe ko uzatwara imyaka itanu, ishobora kugabanuka bitewe n'ibiganiro hagati y'@@ ababishinzwe n'uko amafaranga az@@ aboneka vuba. Jeanne D’@@ Arc Mukand@@ ahiro ukuriye Isange One Stop Center RIB ivuga ko uwas@@ amb@@ anyijwe ku ngufu yakagombye kwihutira kugera kuri Isange kugira ngo ahabwe ubufasha bwihuse bw@@ amur@@ inda gutwara inda cyangwa kwandura indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, bigakorwa mu gihe gito gish@@ oboka bityo ibindi bijyanye n’amategeko bigakomeza nyuma. Agira ati “@@ Isange One Stop Center iba yiteguye kubafash@@ a, ikibabaje ni uko abas@@ amb@@ anyijwe batinda kuhagera w@@ abap@@ ima ugasanga batw@@ ise. Icyo gihe ya miti itangwa mu masaha 48 ibar@@ inda gusama nta mum@@ aro iba ig@@ ifite, itangwa mu masaha 72 ibar@@ inda kwandura virusi itera SIDA na yo ntacyo iba ikim@@ az@@ e”. Ih@@ ohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina rib@@ angamiye uburenganzira bwa muntu Urubyiruko rwari ruk@@ urikiye ibiganiro ku ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina ari na ho icyo kibazo cy@@ avug@@ iwe, rwagaragaje imbogamizi y’ubuk@@ e bwa Isange butuma hari abag@@ orwa no kugera aho iri, aha ariko Jeanne d’Arc akaba ay@@ abamaze impungenge ko zigiye kong@@ erwa. Umwaka utaha ibigo nderabuzima byose byo mu gihugu bizaba bifite icyumba cya Isange One Stop Center, uh@@ ageze nibura iby’@@ ibanze nko kumurinda SIDA no gusama bikor@@ we, ibik@@ eneye ubundi buhanga abone ajye ku bitar@@ o”. Yakomeje avuga ko harimo kwigwa uko n’imb@@ angukiragutabara z@@ ashyirwa muri serivisi yo gufasha abahuye n’icyo kibazo, ut@@ abaje bakay@@ imw@@ oherereza agahabwa ubufasha ku gihe. Urubyiruko rwahawe umwanya wo gutanga ibitekerezo Ati “Hari abana bajyaga bahohoterwa ugasanga nta makuru bafite, ibitaro biri kure nta n’amafaranga yo gutega ngo baj@@ yeyo bigatuma babir@@ eka. Isange n@@ ishyirwa ku bigo nderabuzima bizaba byoroshye, umwana wahuye n’icyo kibazo azajya y@@ iny@@ abya abe ar@@ ahageze afash@@ we”. Ibyo biganiro byabaye kuri uyu wa 13 Ukuboza 2018, ubwo mu Rwanda hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga w’@@ uburenganzira bwa muntu, byibanze ku kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina, cyane cyane abangavu baterwa inda, bikaba byar@@ ateguwe n’ihuriro ry’urubyiruko ruh@@ aranira uburenganzira bwa muntu (@@ AJ@@ PR@@ OD@@ HO@@ -@@ J@@ ij@@ ukir@@ wa@@ ). Minisiteri y’@@ uburinganire n’iterambere (M@@ IGEPR@@ O@@ F), itangaza ko abana basaga ibihumbi 17 bari hagati y’imyaka 16 na 19 batewe inda muri 2016. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’@@ Imp@@ uzamiryango iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu (C@@ L@@ AD@@ HO@@ ) mu turere 10 muri 2016, bwerekanye ko abana baterwa inda bahura n’ingaruka nyinshi, aho bwasanze 5@@ 4% bareka ishuri, 19@@ % bibas@@ irwa n’ubuk@@ ene, 11@@ % bafite agahinda g@@ akab@@ ije, 9% bakorerwa ibikorwa biba@@ baje, 5% bahabwa akato na ho 2% bafite ihung@@ abana. Mudasobwa zikomeje kwibasirwa ni zikoresha porogaramu ya OS (Op@@ er@@ at@@ ing Syst@@ em@@ ) itangwa n’@@ Uruganda rwa Microsof@@ t. Nubwo iki gitero cyibasiye ibihugu bikomeye ku Isi nk’u Bwongereza n’u Burusiya kit@@ aragera mu Rwanda, RIS@@ A yasabye abatunze mudasobwa by’umwihariko iz@@ ikoresha OS ya Microsoft kurushaho kwirinda, ib@@ ereka ibyo bakwiye gukurik@@ iz@@ a: 1. Buri wese arasabwa kubika ku buryo bwihariye (@@ bac@@ ku@@ p@@ s) kandi buri munsi, ibintu byose biri muri mudasobwa ye nka por@@ og@@ aram@@ u, ibirebana na email@@ s, amakuru (d@@ at@@ abas@@ e), n’ibindi. Ndetse akagerageza kub@@ igarura kugira ngo arebe niba byongera gukora neza (@@ rest@@ or@@ ation). 2. Mudasobwa zose zikwiye gushyirwamo uburyo bwo kwirinda bujyanye n’igihe (s@@ ec@@ ur@@ ity up@@ dat@@ es), by’umwihariko MS@@ 17@@ -0@@ 10 ituma mudasobwa yawe id@@ apfa kwinj@@ irwamo n’@@ iriya vir@@ us. 3. Shyira urukuta (F@@ ir@@ ew@@ all@@ ) kuri mudasobwa zose ziri ku m@@ uyobora utari mugari (L@@ ocal Ar@@ ea Networ@@ k, L@@ AN@@ ), ndetse w@@ ong@@ ereho akantu kabuza abashaka gukoresha SM@@ B ku nzira ya 44@@ 5. 5. Mudasobwa zose zigomba gushyirwamo W@@ indow@@ s 10, kugira ngo z@@ ibashe kubona ubwirinzi bwose butangwa na Microsof@@ t. Uburyo bw’@@ ubwirinzi burimo Ant@@ iv@@ ir@@ us, W@@ indow@@ s Def@@ end@@ er, bifite ubushobozi bwo kubona kiriya gitero nabwo bukwiye gushyirwa muri mudasobwa. 6. Reba neza ko Ant@@ iv@@ ir@@ us uri gukoresha yong@@ ewemo uburyo bw’@@ ubwirinzi bwa vuba, kuko aba@@ zitanga bakomeje gukora ibishoboka ngo baz@@ ongerere ubushobozi bwo guhangana n’iki gitero. 7. Buri wese ufite mudasobwa kandi arasabwa kwirinda gufungura ubutumwa ataz@@ i, by’umwihariko ubuh@@ erekejwe n’indi nyandiko cy@@ anga ibindi (@@ attachment@@ ). Ikindi ni ukwirinda gukura kuri internet ikintu cyose ut@@ izeye uwag@@ ishy@@ iz@@ eho. Uramutse uhuye n’ikibazo cyangwa mudasobwa yawe yibasiwe n’iki gitero, ur@@ asabwa kuy@@ ikura ku murongo wa internet, uk@@ ihutira kubimenyesha RIS@@ A uhamagara umurongo ut@@ ishyurwa 40@@ 45, cyangwa ukohereza ubutumwa kuri [email protected] [email protected]
Umukozi wa Apple yirukanwe azira kumena amabanga ya iPhone X Ikom@@ panyi yamamaye mu gukora ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga ya Apple yirukanye umukozi wayo bitewe n’uko umukobwa we yashyize hanze amashusho agaragaza imikorere ya telefone ya iPhone X nyamara itar@@ ashyirwa hanze. iPhone X ni telefone igezweho iri mu ruhererekane rw’@@ iz@@ ikorwa na Apple igiye gukurikira iPhone 8 na iPhone 8 Pl@@ us z@@ amuritswe ku ya 12 Nzeri 2017 ari nabwo hatangajwe umushinga wayo. Mu gihe h@@ aburaga iminsi mike ngo ishyir@@ we hanze, umukobwa witwa Brook@@ e Am@@ el@@ ia Pet@@ erson wa K@@ en Ba@@ u@@ er wakoraga muri Apple yashyize kuri YouTube ye amashusho ay@@ igaragaza, igikorwa cyit@@ ishimiwe na Apple yahise ifata icyemezo cyo kwirukana se. BBC ivuga ko Pet@@ erson yafashe aya mashusho muri Nzeri 2017 ubwo yasohok@@ anaga na se bagiye gufata ifunguro rya saa sita muri C@@ aff@@ è Mac@@ s, ibarizwa ku cyicaro cya Apple muri Californ@@ ia. Aya mashusho Pet@@ erson yahise ay@@ asiba abisabwe na Apple agaragaza se yishyura ibyo kurya akoresheje iPhone X mbere yo kuy@@ imuha agatangira kuyikoresha anagaragaza imikorere yayo mu buryo bwim@@ bitse. Brook@@ e Pet@@ erson yavuze ko umubyeyi we wari umaze imyaka ine akorera Apple yirukanywe ku kazi azira kwica rimwe mu mategeko agenga iyi kom@@ p@@ anyi. Yagize ati “@@ Apple yakundaga umubyeyi wanjye, gusa yirukanwe kubera kwica itegeko, ni icyaha at@@ akoze kandi arab@@ isabira imbabaz@@ i.” Iyi telefone iteganyijwe gushyirwa hanze ku ya 3 Ugushyingo 2017, ifungurwa hifashishijwe isura ya nyir@@ ayo, izaba igura amadolari ya Amerika 99@@ 9, akabakaba ibihumbi 800 mu mafaranga y’u Rwanda. Im@@ yambarire y’@@ inkumi z’i Kigali muri 6 bit@@ avuzweho rumwe ku gitaramo cya David@@ o-@@ Amafoto Mu ijoro ryo ku wa Gatandatu rishyira ku Cyumweru tariki 04 Werurwe 2018, Umuhanzi Davido wo mu gihugu cya Nigeria yataramiye abanyarwanda, mu gitaramo kimwe mu bigize uruhererekane rw’@@ ibyo ari kugenda azenguruka Afurika akora byitwa ‘@@ 30@@ Bill@@ ion Africa Tour@@ ’. Iki gitaramo cyabereye I Kigali muri parikingi ya Sitade Amahoro I Remera mu karere ka Gasabo. Ni igitaramo cyag@@ aragayemo byinshi bit@@ avuzweho rumwe, birimo im@@ itegurire itar@@ anyuze bamwe ahanini ishobora kuba yarat@@ ewe n’imv@@ ura, ikindi cyagaragaye muri iki gitaramo ni uburyo uyu muhanzi Davido yashimangiye ko ari mpuzamahanga ndetse ko hari n’@@ isomo rikomeye rijyanye no kubaha akazi abahanzi Nyarwanda bakwiye kumw@@ igir@@ aho, ikindi cyagaragaye muri iki gitaramo turag@@ arukaho ni imyambarire idasanzwe y’abakobwa bari bak@@ itabiriye. Imvura yakom@@ ye mu nkokora im@@ itegurire y’igitaramo Mu kiganiro yagiranye na U@@ kwezi, ku wa Gatanu tariki 2 Werurwe 2018, Jud@@ o Kan@@ ob@@ ana uyobora Pos@@ it@@ ive Produc@@ tion ari nay@@ o@@ yateguye iki gitaramo yari yavuze ko imyiteguro yatangiye kare ndetse by@@ anag@@ ombaga kugera ku wa Gatandatu yarangiye aho byavugwaga ko amarembo agomba kuba afunguye saa kumi n’im@@ we, ibi no kuby@@ apa by@@ amamaza igitaramo niko byari biri. Si iko byag@@ enzi dore ko kuwa Gatandatu, I Kigali guhera mu masaha ya saa Cyenda z’@@ igic@@ amunsi imvura yatangiye kur@@ wa ndetse igera aho iza kuba nyinshi aha byari bitangiye kuba mu masaha ya saa kumi n’imwe hafi n’@@ ebyiri. Iyi mvura yatangiye kug@@ abanyuka ahagana saa moya z’umugoroba ari naho muri sitade ahag@@ ombaga kubera igitaramo batangiye gucuranga imiziki bay@@ iv@@ angavanga mu rwego rwo kwirukana imbeho no kumvisha abantu ko igitaramo kigiye gutangira, iyi mvura kandi yari yak@@ anze abantu benshi bifuzaga kuza kureba iki gitaramo n’ubwo yageze nyuma igahita ikirere kik@@ er@@ uruka, ndetse n’ibir@@ ori big@@ akomeza. Ahagana saa mbiri n’igice hafi saa tatu nibwo iki gitaramo cyatangiye hajyaho abahanzi batandukanye hano mu Rwanda; barimo Sint@@ ex@@ , Fiona Mbabazi n’abandi bagiye baza gususurutsa abantu bagendaga baza umwe kuri umwe kugeza ubwo Davido yagiye kujya ku rubyiniro abantu basa n’aba@@ maze kuhagera ari benshi n’ubwo batari buzuye aha muri parikingi ya sitade nk’uko byari byitezwe cyangwa bisanzwe bigenda iyo haje umuhanzi ukomeye nk’@@ uy@@ u. Bamwe mu banyamakuru bikom@@ ye abateguye igitaramo Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru cyabaye kuwa Gatanu, umunsi umwe mbere y’igit@@ aramo, abateguye iki gitaramo bari b@@ ijeje abanyamakuru ko kugera kuri sitade ahabereye ibi birori bazahita babona u@@ bafasha akabah@@ ereza ibyangombwa bib@@ injiza mu gitaramo mu rwego rwo kugirango babashe gukora akazi kabo neza. U Rwanda rugiye gushyira ku isoko impapuro mp@@ esh@@ wam@@ wenda zifite agaciro ka miliyari 15 Frw Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ibinyujije muri Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu (BNR@@ ), igiye gushyira ku isoko impapuro mp@@ esh@@ wam@@ wenda (@@ Tr@@ eas@@ ur@@ y B@@ ond@@ s), zifite agaciro ka Miliyari 15 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda. Itangazo rya BNR risobanura ko ayo mafaranga az@@ ifashishwa na leta mu guteza imbere isoko ry’imari n’imigabane no kubaka ibikor@@ war@@ emezo. R@@ igaragaza kandi ko isoko ry’@@ izo mpapuro riz@@ afungurwa ku wa 21 Gashyantare 2018, rig@@ afunga ku wa 23 Gashyantare 2018. Abaz@@ azig@@ ura baz@@ ishyurwa mu myaka itanu guhera ku wa 24 Kanama 2018 kugeza ku wa 17 Gashyantare 202@@ 3. Mu guhatanira kuzig@@ ura, amafaranga yo hejuru ni miliyoni 50 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda mu gihe amake azaba ari ibihumbi 100 Frw. Imp@@ apuro mp@@ esh@@ wam@@ wenda ni impapuro abashoramari batandukanye (@@ abantu ku giti cyabo, ibigo by’@@ imari, amash@@ yir@@ ahamwe, ibigo byig@@ eng@@ a…@@ ) bashobora gush@@ oramo amafaranga bag@@ uriza Leta, mu gihe izo mpapuro zishy@@ izwe ku isoko, bakajya bahabwa inyungu z@@ ibarwa ku mwaka, bakaz@@ asubizwa amafaranga batanze bagura izo mpapuro igihe zagenewe kir@@ angiye. Izo mpapuro uw@@ azig@@ uze ashobora kuz@@ itangaho ingwate muri Banki agahabwa umw@@ enda. Uw@@ azig@@ uze ashobora kuzig@@ urisha ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane ry’u Rwanda akabona amafaranga ye. "G@@ ushy@@ ingura abazize Jenoside mu Rwibutso rusange ni ukugira ngo amateka ad@@ asib@@ angan@@ a"@@ - IBUKA Egide Nkur@@ anga, Visi P@@ erez@@ iza wa IBUK@@ A, asobanura ko gushyingura abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 hamwe bigira akamaro ko kurinda amateka y'urupfu rudasanzwe bapfuye, bikan@@ afasha igihugu n'aba@@ bo kubar@@ indira umutekano w'@@ imva bashying@@ uyemo no gusurwa mu cyubahiro. Ibi yabitangarije mu gikorwa cyo gushyingura imibiri igera kuri 8@@ 4, mu Rwibutso rwa Kib@@ uza, ruherereye mu Karere ka Kamonyi, kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 27@@ /05/201@@ 2. Mu ijambo rye, Nkuranga yavuze ko gushyingura inzirakarengane mu mva rusange birinda ko habaho igihe aho ziba zishying@@ uwe hatandukanye, haba mu mat@@ ongo cyangwa mu mar@@ imbi, igihe kigera hag@@ akorerwa ibindi bikorwa ugasanga amateka ar@@ ibag@@ iranye. Ikindi yagar@@ utseho ni uko abazize jenoside bataz@@ ize urupfu rusanzwe nk'@@ abandi. Ku@@ bashy@@ ingura mu Rw@@ ibutso, ngo bizajya bituma bene wabo baza kub@@ ibuka no kubas@@ ura. Ati: "@@ A@@ bazize Jenoside ntiba@@ pf@@ uye urupfu rus@@ anzwe. Ku bw'@@ iyo mpamvu, ntibag@@ omba kw@@ ibagir@@ ana. Iyo bashyinguye mu Rwibutso rusange igihugu kibar@@ indira umutekano kandi n'aba@@ bo bakaza kubasura ahantu h@@ iy@@ ubash@@ ye". Egide Nkur@@ anga, Visi Perezida wa mbere wa IBUK@@ A, asobanurira abanya kam@@ onyi akamaro ko gushyingura imibiri y'@@ abazize Jenoside mu Rwibutso rusange. Yah@@ amagariye abafite ababo bag@@ ishying@@ uye mu mat@@ ongo, ku@@ bazana bakar@@ uh@@ ukira hamwe n'abandi bapfuye urupfu rumwe, kugira ngo imibiri yabo ikomeze kwitabwaho kandi irind@@ irwe umutekano. Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kamonyi, Ruts@@ inga Jacques, yibukije abari aho ko kwibuka Jenoside bit@@ agarukira ku babuze ababo gusa, ko ahubwo bireba Abanyarwanda bose. Ar@@ iyo mpamvu ntawe ukwiye kwiyumvisha ko uw@@ abuze uwe wese yam@@ ushy@@ ingura mu nsi y'@@ urugo cyangwa mu it@@ ongo. Yakomeje avuga ko mu rwego rwo guhesha agaciro abazize Jenoside, Leta yashyizeho gahunda y'@@ Urwibutso rumwe cyangwa iby@@ iri muri buri karere. Mu karere ka Kamonyi hari Inz@@ ibutso ebyiri urwa Kib@@ uza ari narwo uyu muhango wab@@ ereyeho n'@@ urwa Mug@@ ina, ah@@ ateganyijwe gushyingura imibiri ishying@@ uye mu mva zitandukanye ziri hirya no hino mu karere. Niyonsenga Thomas wari war@@ abanje gushyingura abe mu it@@ ongo ryabo nyuma ya Jenoside, yatangaje ko yashimye icyo gitekerezo cyo gushyingura abazize Jenoside mu Rwibutso rumwe, kuko hari igihe cyari kuzagera abo bashyinguye ku mat@@ ongo hak@@ abura uj@@ yayo kubib@@ uka. Ati: "@@ Nk'@@ ubu se ko ku it@@ ongo n@@ aj@@ yag@@ ayo kwibuka umuvandimwe wanjye, mbaye nt@@ akiriho ni nde waj@@ yay@@ o".
