N@@ CP@@ D irah@@ amagarira ibitaro n’@@ amavuriro kubakira inzira abafite ubumuga Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Inama y’Igihugu y’@@ Abantu bafite Ub@@ um@@ uga (N@@ C@@ PD@@ ) Emmanuel Ndayis@@ aba, yahamagariye ibitaro n’@@ amavuriro kubakira inzira abafite ubumuga kugira ngo bashobore koroherwa kubona serivisi z’@@ ubuzima. H@@ ubatswe inzira ifasha abafite ubumuga kubasha kubona serivisi z’ubuvuzi Ndayisaba yabitangaje nyuma y’uko ku Kigo Nderabuzima cya B@@ yah@@ i mu Karere ka Rubavu hubatswe inzira yorohereza abafite ubumuga kubona serivisi bahabwa muri icyo Kigo Nd@@ er@@ abuzima. Ni inzira yorohereza abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona hamwe n’ab@@ ifashisha insimbur@@ angingo. Ikigo Nderabuzima cya B@@ yah@@ i ni kimwe mu byakira abarwayi benshi mu Mujyi wa Gisenyi harimo n’abafite ubumuga, bakaba bari basanzwe bagorwa n’inzira ikoreshwa n’abafite ubumuga. Abaganga bavuga ko bari bafite imbogamizi zo kuvugana n’abarw@@ ayi bafite ubumuga bwo kutavuga kandi batar@@ ah@@ uguwe gukoresha ururimi rw’@@ amar@@ enga. umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa N@@ CP@@ D Emmanuel Ndayis@@ aba, avugana na Kigali Today, yatangaje ko ibikorwa byo kubakira inzira abafite ubumuga ku bigo nderabuzima no ku bitaro ari gahunda N@@ CP@@ D yahaguruk@@ iye, kugira ngo abafite ubumuga boroh@@ erwe no kubona serivisi z’@@ ubuzima. Agira ati “Ibi ni umuhigo dufite mu korohereza abafite ubumuga kuko uretse kug@@ orwa n’inzira bany@@ uramo, basanzwe bafite ikibazo cyo kuvugana n’abaganga kuko ibigo by’ubuzima byinshi mu Rwanda bidafite abakozi bazi kuvugana n’abafite ubumuga, ubu tur@@ afasha ah@@ ubakwa inzira y’abafite ubumuga hag@@ atangwa n’ubumenyi bufasha abaganga kuvugana n’@@ umurwayi hakoreshejwe amar@@ eng@@ a”. Ndayisaba avuga ko iyi nzira id@@ afasha abafite ubumuga gusa kuko ari inzira ifasha abafite intege nk@@ eya. Inzira z’@@ abafite ubumuga zifasha n’abandi bantu bafite intege nke Ati “@@ Ababyeyi batwite badashobora kurira ing@@ azi, abafite intege nkeya n’abana boroh@@ erezwa n’inzira z’@@ abafite ubumuga kuko ziba z@@ orosh@@ ye”. Ubu mu Rwanda ibigo by’@@ amavuriro 18 ni byo bifite inzira yorohereza abafite ubumuga, N@@ CD@@ P ikaba itangaza ko ifite umuhigo ko muri 2024 mu bigo nderabuzima 50@@ 4, n’ibitaro 42 mu gihugu bigomba kuba bifite inzira z@@ orohereza abafite ubumuga. Mu Karere ka Rubavu, mu bigo nderabuzima 15, ibigo nderabuzima bibiri ni byo bifite inzira z@@ orohereza abafite ubumuga, kandi ubuyobozi bw’akarere bukwiye gushyira izi nzira no ku bindi bigo nderabuzima no guhugura abaganga kuvugana n’abafite ubumuga. Uretse kuba abafite ubumuga barimo gukorerwa ubuvugizi butuma babona inzira zib@@ oroh@@ ereza, Ndayisaba avuga ko hari izindi mbogamizi zib@@ angamiye abafite ubumuga, zirimo kut@@ oroh@@ erezwa mu kwivuza, kwiga no kubona imirimo. Agira ati “Tur@@ acy@@ afite imbogamizi muri serivisi z’@@ ubuzima, nubwo dutekereza ko inzira z@@ orohereza abafite ubumuga ziz@@ ubakw@@ a, abafite ubumuga baracy@@ ag@@ owe no kubona serivisi z’ubuzima kuko indwara zabo zit@@ ishyurwa n’ubw@@ isungane mu kwivuza kandi benshi bafite ubushobozi bud@@ ahag@@ ij@@ e”. Ndayisaba akomeza agira ati “Ur@@ ebye nko kubona insimbur@@ angingo ntiby@@ ishyurwa n’ubw@@ isungane mu kwivuza, kandi ntab@@ undi bwisungane bafite, ibi bik@@ ong@@ erwaho kuba izi serivisi zitangirwa ku bigo bike mu Rwanda”. Ndayisaba avuga ko inyubako z’@@ amashuri mu Rwanda harimo iz@@ it@@ orohereza abafite ubumuga, indi mbogamizi ikomeye ikaba ababyeyi bakib@@ angamira abana bafite ubumuga ntiba@@ jye ku ishuri, kimwe n’abarezi badafite ubumenyi mu kwigisha abafite ubumuga no kubafasha. Ati “@@ Abafite ubumuga bagorwa no kubona akazi, abakoresha benshi ntib@@ izera ko abafite ubumuga bafite ubushobozi mu kazi, ahandi ababonye akazi ntib@@ oroh@@ erezwa kubona ibikoresho bib@@ orohereza mu kazi. Turifuza ko abafite ubumuga bahabwa serivisi nk’@@ abandi, bakor@@ oherezwa kubona ubumenyi no gukora inshingano zabo igihe babonye akaz@@ i”. Mu Rwanda abafite ubumuga baracy@@ afite imbogamizi mu kubona amakuru aho radiyo na telev@@ isiyo nyinshi zidafite abas@@ emurira abafite ubumuga, bigatuma bakomeza kugira ih@@ ezwa mu kubona amakuru. Aba baturage bavuga ko baheruka guhembwa mu kwezi kwa 11 mu mwaka wa 2013. Kuva icyo gihe kugeza mu kwezi kwa kabiri mu mwaka wa 2014 ngo bar@@ akoraga gusa nta guhembwa nyuma baza guhitamo guhagarika akazi. Aba baturage bavuga ko icyo gihe cyose gishize bad@@ ahembwa cyatumye bagira ubukene bukabije ngo kuburyo n'@@ imishinga bateg@@ uraga gukora yah@@ agaze. Ngo ayo bari kumuh@@ emba ni yo yari gutuma umwana we ajya ku ishuri nta kibazo afite. Ab@@ ubaka ikigo nderabuzima cya Gat@@ ebe bavuga ko baheruka guhembwa mu kwezi kwa 11 mu mwaka wa 2013. Bamwe mu bakozi bubaka ikigo nderabuzima cya Gat@@ ebe harimo n'abat@@ urutse mu tundi turere two mu Rwanda. Nshimiyimana Ild@@ ef@@ onse aturuka mu karere ka Muhanga, mu ntara y'amaj@@ yepfo. Agira ati "@@ (@@ amafarang@@ a) twaray@@ abuze burundu rwos@@ e…@@ ubwo n@@ iny@@ w@@ ubona (@@ umush@@ ahar@@ a) nibwo nz@@ atah@@ a! Jye band@@ imo amafaranga ibihumbi 87@@ …@@ ". Ni ryari bavuga ko umuntu an@@ anutse cyane ? Muri iki gihe abantu benshi bahangayikishijwe n’@@ umubyibuho ukabije. Ni mu gihe, kuko kugira ibiro birenze urugero bikurura ibyago byinshi byo kurwara diyab@@ ete, umuvuduko ukabije w’amaraso ndetse n’izindi ndwara zinyuranye. Ariko nubwo bimeze bityo, hari n’abandi bah@@ angayik@@ ijwe no kun@@ anuka bikabije ku buryo usanga bafite ipfunwe mu bandi kandi nabyo bigira ingaruka nyinshi ku buzima. Ni ryari bavuga ko umuntu an@@ anutse cyane ? Abanyarwanda bamenyereye ko umuntu un@@ anutse ari we uba ufite ubuzima butari bwiza na ho kuby@@ ibuha ni ikimenyetso cy’@@ imibereho myiza nk’uko bizwi na benshi. Nyamara impuguke mu buvuzi zivuga ko hari ibipimo byag@@ en@@ we, iyo umuntu abiri hejuru aba afite ikibazo, kimwe n’uko iyo umuntu abiri munsi aba at@@ ifashe neza, ni ukuvuga ko aba bantu bombi baba bafite ibyago byo guhura n’indwara zitandura nk’@@ iz’@@ umutima, diyabete n’izindi. Umuntu un@@ anutse ni wawundi ufite igipimo cya B@@ MI kuri munsi ya 18.@@ 5. B@@ MI (B@@ ody Mas@@ s Ind@@ ex mu cy@@ ongerez@@ a) ni uburyo umuntu amenya niba ibiro bye bijyanye n’ubur@@ ebure bwe. U@@ fata ibiro byawe uk@@ abig@@ abanya n’ubur@@ ebure afite bw@@ ikubye kabiri (K@@ g@@ /@@ m@@ 2). Ubusanzwe umuntu ufite ibiro bijyanye n’ubur@@ ebure bwe, agomba kuba afite ibipimo bya B@@ MI biri hagati ya 18,@@ 5 kugeza kuri 24@@ ,@@ 9. Dore ibyo wakora ngo ibiro byawe by@@ iyong@@ ere@@ : 1. Koresha cyane ibik@@ ungahaye kuri porot@@ eyine nyinshi Iki ni ingenzi kandi gikwiye kwitabwaho cyane.@@ Ubus@@ anz@@ we,@@ imikaya ikozwe na za porot@@ eyine kandi zitab@@ on@@ etse byatuma za cal@@ ories (@@ ingufu z’@@ umubir@@ i) w@@ injije zih@@ induka ibin@@ ure. Kamonyi: Umupasiteri akurikiranyweho kwambura amafaranga abaturage abizeza ubufasha Umushumba w'Itorero "@@ Umusozi w'@@ ibyir@@ ingir@@ o" rifite urusengero mu murenge wa Runda mu karere ka Kamonyi, acumbikiwe kuri Sit@@ at@@ iyo ya Polisi ya R@@ unda, akurikiranyweho kwaka amafranga abakristo b'@@ itorero ayoboye kugira ngo abash@@ akire abaterankunga mu mushinga Comp@@ ass@@ ion Internation@@ al@@ e. Bamwe mu bakristo basengera muri iryo torero bavuga ko iby'@@ ubufasha bab@@ ibwiwe mu ntangiro z'umwaka ushize wa 2013. Ngo icyo gihe basabwe 200@@ frw kuri buri mwana ukeneye gufash@@ wa. Nyuma y'igihe gito bar@@ ongeye babwirwa ko ugomba gufashwa agomba kuba afite ikarita y'@@ umubatizo igura 500@@ frw@@ . Mu mpera z'@@ uwo mwaka, Pasiteri yabaz@@ aniye abazungu kubas@@ ura. Bamaze kugenda ababwira ko inkunga bay@@ ib@@ emereye ariko ko ba@@ basabye kubanza kubaka inzu yo gukoreramo gahunda z'@@ umush@@ ing@@ a; maze arongera abasaba gutanga 1@@ 000frw yo kubaka icyumba cyo gukor@@ eramo. Amafaranga yo kubaka ngo yak@@ usanyijwe n'@@ umubitsi w'@@ itorero, ngo agera ku bihumbi magana atatu, akaba yar@@ ubats@@ wemo akazu kom@@ etse ku rusengero. Aba bakristo batangaza ko mu gihe bari bategereje ubufasha, batangiye kumva muri bagenzi ba bo ko nta bufasha bazabona kuko ibyo pasiteri yababwiye y@@ abab@@ esh@@ yag@@ a, ahubwo yashakaga kubam@@ bura amafaranga gusa. Pasiteri amenye ko hari abamur@@ eze mu bugenzacyaha yatangiye kuvuga ko ibyo yakoze bitari mu nyungu z'@@ itorero kuko ajya gushaka abaterankunga mu gihugu cya Kenya yajyanye n'umuvugizi w'Itorero Bishop Lil@@ iane, uyu akaba ari n'umugore we. Icyo gihe Pasiteri yak@@ ekaga ko umugore we ari we wamur@@ eze kuko bat@@ abanye neza kandi ko ari ibibazo by'@@ itorero by@@ abazwa umugore kuko ari we ur@@ ihagarariye mu mategeko. Kuva yashyikir@@ izwa Polisi, twagerageje kuvugana n'umugore w'uwo mup@@ as@@ iteri, bwa mbere atubwira ko ari mu muhanda urimo imodoka nyinshi, ubundi yanga kwitaba telefoni. Marie Josee Uwir@@ ingira
Gasab@@ o:@@ Abakozi ba WASAC bafatiwe mu cyuho baka ruswa Polisi y'u Rwanda yafatiye mu cyuho abakozi babiri b'@@ Ikigo gishinzwe gusukura no gukwirakwiza amazi (@@ WAS@@ AC) bagerageza kwaka ruswa y'ibihumbi 40 by'amafaranga y'u Rwanda umwe mu bafat@@ abuguzi b'@@ amazi atangwa n'iki kigo. B@@ afatiwe aho bakoreye iki cyaha mu kagari ka Nyarut@@ arama, mu murenge wa Kimironko, Akarere ka Gasabo ku itariki 20 Ukwakira 2015. Umuvugizi wa Polisi y'u Rwanda mu mujyi wa Kigali Superintendent of Police (SP) Modeste Mbabazi yavuze ko mu cyumweru gishize, abo bakozi ba WASAC bagiye guf@@ ungira amazi uwo m@@ ufat@@ abuguzi kubera umwenda w'@@ amazi ungana n'amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 400 yari afitiye iki kigo. Yasobanuye ko bageze aho uwo m@@ ufat@@ abuguzi atuye bamusabye ariya mafaranga bamubwira ko nay@@ abaha batam@@ uf@@ ungira amazi. SP Mbabazi yagize ati:"@@ Uwo m@@ ufat@@ abuguzi yaremeye aray@@ abaha kugira ngo bafat@@ irwe mu cyuho bakora icyo cyaha kandi ahita abimenyesha Polisi y'u Rwanda aribwo yaje igahita ibata muri yomb@@ i." Yavuze ko abo bombi bafungiwe kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi y'u Rwanda ya Remera mu gihe iperereza rikomeje. Yagize ati:"@@ Ingaruka za ruswa zigera ku muryango mugari w'abantu akaba ari yo mpamvu buri wese akwiye kuyirinda kandi akagira uruhare mu kuyirwanya aha Polisi y'u Rwanda n'izindi nzego zibishinzwe amakuru yatuma iki cyaha gik@@ umirwa kandi yatuma hafatwa abag@@ ikoze ndetse n'abat@@ egura kug@@ ikor@@ a." Yashimye uwo m@@ ufat@@ abuguzi wa WASAC kuba yarahise atanga amakuru ya ruswa yari yats@@ we kandi asaba abandi baturage kum@@ ufat@@ iraho urugero. Polisi y'u Rwanda yashyizeho ishami rishinzwe by'umwihariko kurwanya no gukumira ibyaha bya ruswa (@@ Anti-@@ Cor@@ rup@@ tion Unit@@ ) nk'@@ imwe mu ngamba zo kurwanya iki cyaha. Ingingo ya 6@@ 44 y'@@ igitabo cy'amategeko ahana y'u Rwanda ivuga ko umuntu wese, ku buryo bweruye cyangwa but@@ eruye us@@ aba, us@@ ezer@@ anywa, wak@@ ira, ku buryo buziguye cyangwa butazig@@ uye, impano cyangwa indi nd@@ onk@@ e, ahamya ko ashobora gukoresha igit@@ inyiro cye cyangwa ikimeny@@ ane, kugira ngo undi muntu abe yafata icy@@ emezo, iyo mpano cyangwa indi nd@@ onke yaba imug@@ enewe cyangwa yaba igenewe undi, icyo git@@ inyiro cyangwa icyo kim@@ eny@@ ane cyarag@@ ize icyo kig@@ eraho cyangwa ntacyo cyag@@ ezeho mu byari big@@ ambir@@ iwe, ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku mwaka umwe (1) kugeza ku myaka itatu (3) n'ihazabu y'amafaranga y'u Rwanda yikubye inshuro kuva kuri ebyiri (2) kugeza ku icumi (10) z'@@ agaciro k'@@ indonke yas@@ abw@@ e, yasezer@@ anyijwe cyangwa yakir@@ iwe. RNP
Celestin, izina ry'@@ umuntu uh@@ angayik@@ ira abandi cyane Yanditswe na IGIHE Kuya 16 Gashyantare 2017 saa 07:@@ 29 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 1 0 Celestin ni izina rifite inkomoko mu kil@@ atini ku izina Ca@@ el@@ est@@ in@@ us ris@@ obanur@@ a@@ ‘@@ ukomoka mu ijuru@@ '. Bamwe bandika Cel@@ est@@ ine, Cel@@ est@@ ino , Ca@@ el@@ est@@ in@@ us Cel@@ est@@ yn , Cel@@ est@@ ino , Cel@@ est@@ ino Bimwe mu biranga ba Celestin Akunda kuba mu myanya y'@@ imbere bityo akumva ko afite inshingano ku bandi ay@@ oboye. Akunda kugaragara neza, yanga ikintu cyakw@@ angiza isura ye bigatuma akora cyane kugira ngo ataz@@ ag@@ a@@ wa. Celestin ni umuntu ubasha gukemura ibibazo, utagira intonganya mur@@ iwe kandi ukunda kug@@ anira. Ni umuntu ushimishije kumureba , afite uburyo bwo gusabana akabasha kwigarurira abandi vuba. Akunda umuryango we cyane ndetse akaw@@ itaho. Kwita ku bandi yumva ko ari inshingano, ahora ateg@@ anyiriza ahazaza yumva ko nta muntu w@@ igira ubwe wenda nawe ashobora gukenera abandi niyo yaba atar@@ ibo yagiriye neza. Ar@@ igenga mu buzima bwe, yumva ko yakora ibintu yishimiye ad@@ ashyizweho itegeko na rimwe. Biragoye kugira ngo Celestin ube wam@@ ushinja ubunebwe kuko buri munsi aba ah@@ atana kugira ngo abashe kuba umuntu wig@@ ize. Ibyo kwishimisha no gukunda bifata umwanya munini muri we kandi usanga aba ari umuntu abakobwa benshi bifuza gukundana nawe. Abapolisi b’u Rwanda bari muri Sudan y’Epfo mu butumwa bw’amahoro bahawe imidali y’@@ ishimwe Abapolisi 18@@ 3 b’Abanyarwanda barimo abagore 30, bambitswe imidali y’@@ Ishimwe n’Umuryango w’Abibumbye mu kubashimira umurava n’ubwitange bakorana mu bikorwa byo kugarura amahoro mu gihugu cya Sudan y’Epfo. Mu Itangazo ryashyizwe hanze n’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, (UN@@ ) rigaragaza ko abapolisi b’u Rwanda bafite ibirindiro mu murwa m@@ mukuru wa J@@ uba, ko bafite inshingano zikomeye zo gucunga umutekano muri uyu mujyi no kurinda ah@@ ac@@ umbikirwa abasivili badafite aho kuba. Mukuru wa UN muri Sudani y’Epfo, Moustapha So@@ um@@ ar@@ é, yavuze ko bahaye abapolisi b’Abanyarwanda imidali kubera akazi k’@@ indashyikirwa bakoze ndetse no kuba baragize uruhare mu kugarura icyizere cy’abaturage ba Sudan y’Epfo. Umwe mu bapolisi b’u Rwanda bahawe umudali yavuze ko kujya gucunga umutekano muri Sudan y’Epfo bifite aho bihuriye n’amateka yabaye mu Rwanda mu 1994, kuko badashobora kwemera ko ibyabaye mu Rwanda hari ahandi by@@ aba. Abapolisi bahawe imidali barimo 160 bageze muri Sudani y’Epfo mu butumwa bwo kubungabunga amahoro muri Mata 2017, abandi bagera kuri 23 bagiye gufasha bagenzi babo Nyakanga umwaka ushize. U Rwanda rufite abasirikare n’abapolisi bari mu butumwa bwo kubungabunga amahoro muri Sudani y’Epfo bagera ku 26@@ 00
IN@@ ILAK yongeye kwemererwa kwitwa Kaminuza Hashingiwe ku itegeko No 04@@ /201@@ 2 rigenga imiryango n'imikorere y'@@ imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta; Hashingiwe kandi ku busabe bwa IN@@ ILAK bwo guhindura izina ndetse no ku cyemezo cya Ministeri y'Uburezi cyemeza ko IN@@ ILAK yujuje ibisabwa ngo yit@@ we Kamin@@ uz@@ a; IN@@ ILAK yashyikirijwe icyemezo n'Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe imiyoborere (RGB) k@@ iyemerera ko ihind@@ uriwe izina bityo ikaba ibaye UN@@ ILAK imbere y'@@ amategeko. Iki cyemezo git@@ anzwe nyuma y'imyaka ibiri yari ishize IN@@ ILAK itangiye gusaba ko yahind@@ urirwa izina ig@@ asubira ku izina ryayo rya UN@@ ILAK dore ko ariko yahoze yitwa mbere y'umwaka w'@@ 2008. Dore urupapuro rw@@ emerera IN@@ ILAK kwitwa kaminuza Umuyobozi wa UN@@ ILAK , Dr. Ngamije Jean@@ . " Kuba twongeye kwitwa kaminuza ni ishema kuri twe, biz@@ arushaho kudut@@ era ishyaka ryo kugera ku ntego twihaye nka kaminuza kandi nta shiti ko biz@@ arushaho guk@@ uza isura nziza dufite muri sosiye@@ t@@ e." Ku ruhande rw'@@ abanyeshuri biga muri UN@@ IL@@ AK@@ , ngo kuba ishuri big@@ amo rih@@ awe izina rya kaminuza bizabafasha gukuraho urujijo ku babash@@ idikany@@ agaho ko ahari bo bat@@ iga muri kaminuza kandi bizab@@ ongera ishyaka mu masomo yabo. Kaminuza ya UN@@ ILAK yashinzwe mu mwaka w' 1997 n'ababyeyi b'@@ Abal@@ ay@@ iki b'@@ Abadivent@@ iste, kuri ubu ikaba ifite amashami atatu arimo icyicaro gikuru I Kigali, Ishami rya Nyanza n'@@ irya Rwamagana. Amasomo atangirwa muri UN@@ ILAK ari ku rwego rw'@@ icyiciro cya kabiri cya Kaminuza n'icya gatatu ari cyo Master@@ 's mu mashami y'@@ Ubuk@@ ungu, Ib@@ iduk@@ ikije, Amategeko ndetse n'@@ Ikoranabuh@@ anga.
Buri muganga arasabwa kug@@ arurira abarokotse Jenoside icyizere Kuba Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yarageze no mu bitaro, abah@@ ah@@ ungiye bakic@@ wa, bamwe mu baganga bagat@@ atira igihango cyo kubungabunga ubuzima bak@@ ishora mu bwicanyi ngo ni amahano akabije abakora mu bitaro bya Kigeme basabwe guhan@@ agura bafasha abarokotse Jenoside bakan@@ abag@@ arurira icyizere ko ibitaro bit@@ akiri ahantu ho kwic@@ irwa, ahubwo ari ahantu ho gukiza ubuzima. Ubu butumwa bwatanzwe mu ijoro ryo kuwa gatanu tariki ya 13@@ /06/2014 ubwo h@@ ibuk@@ waga abakozi bakoraga mu bitaro bya Kigeme bazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu mwaka w'@@ 1994, ndetse n'@@ abarwayi n'@@ abarw@@ aza babig@@ uyemo. Abakora i Kigeme bashyize indabo z'@@ urwibutso ku mva bun@@ amira abazize Jenoside bose. Dr Muh@@ ay@@ impundu R@@ ibak@@ are wari uhagarariye minisiteri y'ubuzima muri uyu muhango yavuze ko ubundi umuntu ug@@ annye ibitaro aba ashaka ubuzima, ariko ngo bikaba atari ko byagenze mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kuko icyo gihe mu bitaro h@@ iciwe abarwayi n'@@ abarw@@ aza, bamwe mu baganga bav@@ uraga bar@@ icwa n'ubwo hari n'abaganga bic@@ anye. Ati "@@ Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ubwayo ni amahano ariko iyo bigeze kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu bitaro ngira ngo ni amahano ubugira kabiri. Ubundi kwa muganga ni ahantu umuntu ajya ngo ah@@ akir@@ ire, ariko twe mu Rwanda hari abah@@ ambur@@ iwe ubuzima kandi big@@ ambir@@ i@@ we." Dr Muh@@ ay@@ impundu avuga ko uko bibuka Jenoside mu bitaro bya Kigeme bakwiye kureba icyo bakora ngo bafashe abarokotse Jenoside, kandi bakumva ko bagomba kubag@@ arurira icyizere kuko n'ubwo hari intambwe yatewe ariko hakiri n'@@ urugendo run@@ ini. K@@ ubwa Dr Muh@@ ay@@ impundu ati "@@ Uko twibuka tujye tuvuga tuti muri ibi bitaro habayeho amah@@ ano, tw@@ ibaze icyo twakora kugira ngo dufashe abahuye nayo ndetse natwe d@@ ufash@@ anye. Turacy@@ afite abantu bakeneye ubufasha bwacu, cyane kwa muganga barad@@ ukeneye buri gihe. Kugira ngo uwar@@ okotse y@@ ibagirwe ibyago yagiriye mu bitaro ah@@ abone ko ari ahantu hat@@ anga ubuzima nitwe nk'@@ abakozi tuz@@ agar@@ urira icyizere abo bose bat@@ erer@@ anywe n'@@ ikiremwam@@ untu@@ ." Abakora ku bitaro bya Kigeme bakoze urugendo rwo kwibuka bagana ku rwibutso rwa Gas@@ aka. Umuyobozi w'@@ ibitaro bya Kig@@ em@@ e, Dr Munezero Eric avuga ko kuba bafata umwanya wo kwibuka abakozi, abarwayi n'@@ abarw@@ aza bazize Jenoside ngo ari n'umwanya wo gufata ingamba kugira ngo Jenoside itaz@@ asubira ukundi, ndetse no gufata mu mugongo no kwihanganisha abayir@@ okotse. Gahunda yo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ibaye ku nshuro ya gatatu mu bitaro bya Kig@@ em@@ e. Kuri iyi nshuro has@@ anwe inzu y'@@ umukecuru warokotse Jenoside ut@@ ishoboye, igikorwa cyat@@ anzweho amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 700 yavuye mu mis@@ anzu abakozi bak@@ us@@ anyirije hamwe. Abo mu miryango y'@@ abazize Jenoside bakoraga mu bitaro bya Kigeme bari muri icyo gikorwa. Ibitaro bya Kigeme kandi bigiye kubaka urwibutso rwa Jenoside imbere mu bitaro, hagam@@ ije kurushaho kwibuka no guha agaciro ababig@@ uyemo, hakaba har@@ akozwe urutonde rw'@@ abari abakozi, abarwayi n'@@ abarw@@ aza babig@@ uyemo ari nako hag@@ ishakishwa abandi baba bataramenyekana biciwe muri ibyo bitaro. Emmanuel Nshimiyimana

Imv@@ ano y’@@ igitutu cy’u Burayi na Amerika ku Rwanda ubwo Habyarimana yac@@ ud@@ ik@@ aga na Koreya ya Ruguru Intambara n’ibit@@ utsi, ibisasu kirimbuzi no kwig@@ erezaho niyo makuru benshi bazi aturuka muri Koreya ya Ruguru y’umugabo w’@@ igis@@ unz@@ u, Kim Jong Un@@ . Iyo Koreya isa n’iy@@ it@@ ajwe n’ibihugu kuri ubu, yabaye inshuti ikomeye y’u Rwanda ku butegetsi bwa Perezida Habyarimana Juvénal mu gihe cy’@@ intambara y’ubut@@ ita kugeza ubwo Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’u Burayi zari zim@@ ur@@ abye iv@@ u, bik@@ amusaba amayeri ngo at@@ abiz@@ ira. Habyarimana yashatse gukina amayeri Amerika n’u Burayi, bamuha gasopo Ikibazo cyo kutavuga rumwe kwa Koreya ya Ruguru n’i@@ y’Epfo cyo mu 194@@ 8 ubwo z@@ acik@@ agamo kabiri, cyakomeje gukur@@ uruka kig@@ eza mu 1973 ubwo Habyarimana yafataga ubutegetsi mu Rwanda. Nk’@@ umuntu wari ugiye ku butegetsi vuba, yagombaga gushaka ibihugu by’@@ inshuti ariko agah@@ era ku bitari bisanzwe bifitanye ubushuti bwa hafi n’u Rwanda, kugira ngo inkunga iva hanze yiyong@@ ere. Koreya ya Ruguru yari ishy@@ igikiwe n’ibihugu by’u Bushinwa na Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’@@ Abasov@@ iyet@@ i, i@@ y’Epfo ishy@@ igikiwe n’u Burayi Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ibihugu byinshi muri Afurika byari byar@@ ahisemo guca umubano n’ibindi bikoresha Commun@@ isme ari nacyo gice Koreya ya Ruguru yabar@@ iz@@ wagamo kugira ngo ba shebuja b’i Burayi na Amerika babir@@ ebe neza, hato bad@@ akoma rut@@ end@@ eri ingoma zabo zig@@ ah@@ irim@@ a. Leta ya Habyarimana yashakaga ubufasha no kwim@@ enyekanisha mu mahanga, yatangiye kugenda rwihishwa ikorana n’ibihugu bikoresha Commun@@ ism@@ e, dore ko muri ibyo bihe byatang@@ aga inkunga it@@ ubutse kandi itar@@ iho amananiza menshi nk’ayo Amerika n’u Burayi bashyir@@ agaho. U Rwanda rwatangiye kwiyegereza Koreya ya Ruguru, nayo ir@@ aruk@@ undira umubano ur@@ atang@@ ira. Tariki 15 Mata 197@@ 4 mu Rwanda haje itsinda ryo muri Koreya ya Ruguru riyobowe n’uwari Minisitiri wungirije w’ububanyi n’amahanga, Ch@@ un Ny@@ ung So@@ o, ryak@@ irwa na Perezida Habyarimana. Icyo gihe Radio Rwanda yatangaje ko Koreya ya Ruguru yemeye gufasha u Rwanda mu bijyanye n’amahugurwa y’@@ urubyiruko, kubaka inzu mberabyombi y’urubyiruko n’ibindi. Radio Rwanda kandi yavuze ko iryo tsinda ry@@ ashyikirije Habyarimana ubutumwa b@@ uvuye kuri Perezida, Kim il S@@ ong wa Koreya ya Rug@@ uru. Inyandiko z’@@ ibanga za Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda zo muri ibyo bihe zashyizwe hanze n’urubuga Wik@@ il@@ e@@ ak@@ s, zigaragaza ko Koreya ya Ruguru nyuma yaje no kwemera guha imyitozo urubyiruko rw’@@ ishyaka MRND ryari ku butegetsi, gutoza abasirikare ibijyanye n’@@ akar@@ asisi n’ibindi. Uruzinduko rw’@@ intumwa za Koreya ya Ruguru mu Rwanda rwaje mu gihe Koreya zombi zari mu biganiro byo kwiyunga ariko big@@ atam@@ bam@@ irwa n’ibindi bihugu bikomeye. Abas@@ esenguzi icyo gihe bavugaga ko Koreya ya Ruguru nta gih@@ ambaye yashakaga ku Rwanda kitari ijwi ryar@@ wo mu Muryango w’Abibum@@ bye. Habyarimana icyo gihe yabwiye itsinda rya Koreya ya Ruguru ko u Rwanda rufata ikibazo kiri hagati ya Koreya zombi nk’@@ icy’@@ imbere mu gihugu gikwiriye gukemurwa hat@@ ajemo ukub@@ oka kw’@@ amahanga. Umubano w’ibihugu byombi war@@ ak@@ uze, ndetse Koreya ya Ruguru ifungura Ambasade yayo i Kigali. Mu Ukwakira 197@@ 6, inyandiko z’@@ ibanga za Ambasade ya Amerika zigaragaza ko Habyarimana afatanyije na Ambasade ya Koreya ya Ruguru, bashyizeho Komite yiga ku kongera kwiyunga kwa Koreya zombi. Inama yabereye mu nyubako z’@@ uwari uhagarariye Koreya ya Ruguru mu Rwanda. Iyo komite yari igizwe n’abajyanama muri MRND@@ , Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe Ububanyi n’Amahanga muri Perezid@@ ansi, abo muri Minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga n’abandi. Iyo nama yabaye buri buke ngo Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa MRND wafat@@ waga nk’umuntu wa kabiri ukomeye mu butegetsi, ajye mu ruzinduko i P@@ yong@@ yang@@ . Iyo komite yash@@ imwe cyane na Dj@@ e@@ un Ye@@ ung O@@ un wari ushinzwe ibikorwa muri Ambasade ya Koreya ya Ruguru i Kigali, aho yavuze ko gushyiraho iyo komite bizongera ubushuti n’umubano mu by’ubukungu w’ibihugu byombi. Nubwo u Rwanda rw@@ akoraga ibishoboka byose ngo rushim@@ ishe Koreya ya Ruguru, byakorwaga mu ibanga rikomeye ngo ibihugu bya Amerika n’u Burayi bitab@@ imenya. Ibanga ryaje kum@@ enyekan@@ a! Mu 1976 intambara y’ubut@@ ita yari irim@@ bany@@ ije. G@@ ufatwa n’abany@@ aburayi cyangwa abanyamerika uc@@ ud@@ itse n’ibihugu by’@@ Uburus@@ iya, u Bushinwa n’abak@@ orana nabyo, byari icyaha kit@@ ababar@@ irwa. Ibihugu bya Amerika n’u Burayi biciye muri Ambasade zabyo i Kigali, byaje kuvumbura ko u Rwanda ruri mu bush@@ uti bwihariye na Koreya ya Rug@@ uru. Ubwo hari hashize iminsi Komite ishy@@ izweho ndetse n’Umunyamabanga wa MRND avuye muri Koreya ya Ruguru, Ambasaderi w’u Bubiligi yah@@ am@@ g@@ aje Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda, amusaba ibisobanuro ku mubano wihariye uhari na Koreya ya Rug@@ uru. Ambasaderi yamubwiye ko ababajwe no kuba u Rwanda ruri kugendera ku ic@@ engez@@ amatwara rya Koreya ya Ruguru no guh@@ eng@@ amira ku ruhande rumwe, avuga ko u Rwanda rukwiye kumenya neza inshuti z’u Burayi n’umw@@ anzi w@@ abwo. Wik@@ il@@ e@@ ak@@ s igaragaza ko Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda yatung@@ uwe, ar@@ yosh@@ yar@@ yoshya u Bubiligi, avuga ko umubano uri hagati y’u Rwanda na Koreya ud@@ akang@@ anye. Yavuze ko u Rwanda r@@ ushyigikiye kongera kwihuza kwa Koreya zombi, gusa yemera ko kuba bar@@ ashinze komite yiga kuri icyo kibazo ntibaz@@ an@@ emo Koreya y’Epfo kandi nayo biy@@ ir@@ eba, ari amakosa asabira imbabazi. Y@@ ijeje u Bubiligi ko umubano w’u Rwanda n’icyo gihugu ndetse n’ibindi bihugu by’i Burayi na Amerika utaz@@ angizwa n’iryo sh@@ yirwaho rya Komite kuko icy@@ erecyezo cy’@@ ububanyi n’amahanga bw’u Rwanda bak@@ izi neza. Ambasaderi w’u Bubiligi yavuze ko yifuza kubona inyandiko z’ibyo Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa MRND yavugiye muri Koreya ya Ruguru, kugira ngo bem@@ eze koko niba nta kindi cy@@ ihishe inyuma y’uwo mubano ud@@ asanzwe. Habyarimana yasuye Koreya ya Ruguru ahasiga amac@@ umu, ahabwa umudari Ibihugu by’u Burayi na Amerika bimaze kwihan@@ angiriza u Rwanda, rwag@@ abanyije am@@ arere ariko rukomeza kubana na Koreya ya Ruguru kuko yar@@ ufashaga muri byinshi. Tariki 7 Kamena 197@@ 8, Habyarimana yahagurutse i Kigali agiye mu ruzinduko rw’iminsi icumi muri Koreya ya Ruguru no mu Bushinwa. Y@@ ahagurutse ku kibuga cy’indege i Kanombe aherekejwe n’abantu 70, bagenda mu ndege yatanzwe n’u Bushinwa ya Boeing 10@@ 7. Uretse kuba uruzinduko rw’iminsi icumi rudasanzwe ku mukuru w’igihugu, bwari n’ubwa mbere Habyarimana agiye hanze aherekejwe n’abantu bangana gutyo, nkuko inyandiko za Ambasade ya Amerika z@@ ibigaragaza. Habyarimana yakiriwe neza muri Koreya ya Ruguru no mu Bushinwa. I P@@ yong@@ yang yakiriwe n’indirimbo za MRND zar@@ irim@@ bwe mu Kinyarwanda n’abana bo muri Koreya ya Rug@@ uru. Bivugwa ko Habyarimana yasigiye Perezida Kim Il@@ -@@ Sun@@ g amac@@ umu nk’ikimenyetso cy’@@ umubano mwiza, na we ag@@ ororerwa umudari uzwi nka Or@@ der of the National Fl@@ ag@@ . Am@@ acumu Habyarimana yatanze ari mu nzu ndangamurage yiswe International Fri@@ end@@ ship Ex@@ h@@ ibit@@ ion, irimo impano Kim Il@@ -@@ Sun@@ g na Kim Jong-@@ il bagiye bahabwa n’abany@@ amahanga. Nyuma y’iminsi icumi, tariki 17 Kamena 197@@ 8, Habyarimana n’abo bari bajyanye bagarutse mu Rwanda. Ageze ku kibuga cy’@@ indege, yavuze ukuntu yashimishijwe n’umuh@@ ate w’@@ Abashinwa n’@@ Abanya-@@ Koreya n’uburyo bamw@@ ijeje inkunga it@@ ubutse baz@@ aha u Rwanda. Icyo gihe Koreya ya Ruguru yavuze ko igiye kwihutisha umushinga wo kubaka ingoro y’urubyiruko no guhinga umuceri kuri hegitari 200 mu Rwanda. Ban@@ atanze inkunga ijyanye n’imodoka zir@@ ekura amajwi n’amashusho zigenewe urubyiruko ndetse n’iz’@@ Ikigo cy’@@ amatangazo ya Leta, Or@@ in@@ for@@ . Mu 197@@ 9, Koreya ya Ruguru yahaye u Rwanda ibijyanye n’@@ intwaro za gisirikare imbunda zo mu bwoko bwa H@@ ow@@ it@@ z@@ ers, n’@@ imbunda nini zishobora guhangana n’ibitero byo mu kirere. Uwo mwaka kandi Koreya yemeye gufasha u Rwanda mu mishinga irimo uwo kubaka ikigo cy’amashuri cyakira abanyeshuri 400, kubaka ibitaro n’uruganda rw’@@ ibir@@ eti. Umubano w’u Rwanda na Koreya ya Ruguru war@@ akomeje kugeza mu 1994 muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Nyuma yo guhagarika Jenoside, umubano w’u Rwanda na Koreya ya Ruguru wabaye nk’@@ uk@@ onje uretse ko n’ijambo rya Koreya ya Ruguru mu ruhando mpuzamahanga ryas@@ aga nk’aho ntar@@ yo, kandi intambara y’ubut@@ ita yatumaga ibihugu by@@ irem@@ amo udutsiko nayo yari yarah@@ osh@@ eje. Tariki 18 Kanama 2010, Kim Jong I@@ l wayoboraga Koreya yoherereje ubutumwa bw’@@ ishimwe Perezida Paul Kagame amushimira kuba yongeye gutorerwa manda ya kabiri ku majwi 93 %. Ibiro Ntaramakuru bya Kor@@ eya, Korea News Services (K@@ NS@@ ) byatangaje ko Kim yifurije ishya n’ih@@ irwe Perezida Kagame ndetse ko yizeye iterambere ry’@@ umubano w’ibihugu byombi. Guhera mu 1994, nta mubano ushingiye kuri za ambasade ibihugu byombi bifite. Leta ya Habyarimana imaze kwihan@@ angir@@ izwa, yag@@ enje make mu mubano wayo na Koreya ya Ruguru

Espoir FC na yo yahagaritse amasezerano y’abakinnyi kubera Coronavirus Espoir FC yo mu Karere ka Rusizi, yabaye ikipe ya kabiri yo mu Rwanda, yamenyesheje abakinnyi bayo ko ihagaritse amasezerano bari bafitanye kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Mu cyumweru gishize, Musanze FC yab@@ imburiye andi makipe mu gufata iki cyemezo. Kuwa Gatatu tariki ya 15 Mata, Ubuyobozi bwa Espoir FC nabwo b@@ wandikiye abakinnyi n’abatoza bayo ko b@@ ubaye buh@@ agaritse amasezerano bari bafitanye kuko kuri ubu nta kazi bari gukorera ikipe. Bw@@ agize buti “@@ Nsh@@ ingiye ku cyorezo cya Covid-19 cyatumye ibikorwa byose by’imikino n’imyidagaduro bih@@ agarara mu gihugu harimo na Shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru 2019/@@ 20, hakaba hashize ukwezi n’igice kandi n’igihe kiz@@ ar@@ angirira kikaba kitaz@@ wi, Nsh@@ ingiye ko umushahara ari ingurane y’akazi k@@ akozwe kandi ibi bihe turimo akaba ari nta kazi gah@@ ari k@@ ajyanye no gukorera ikipe ya Espoir FC nk’uko bikubiye mu masezerano y’akazi was@@ in@@ ye". Bakomeje bagira bati "N@@ kwandik@@ iye nk@@ umenyesha ko guhera uyu munsi ku wa 15 Mata 2020, amasezerano wag@@ iranye na Espoir FC abaye ahagaritswe by’agateganyo kugeza igihe ibikorwa bijyanye n’imikino bizongera gus@@ ubuk@@ ur@@ wa.” Itegeko ry’umurimo mu Rwanda riteganya ko mu bihe bidasanzwe, ikigo gishobora guhagarika abakozi bacyo mu gihe kitarenze amezi atatu, bag@@ asubizwa mu mirimo igihe ibyo bihe bidasanzwe bir@@ angiye. Espoir FC yahagaritse abakinnyi mu gihe h@@ avugwaga ko ubwo ingamba zo kuguma mu rugo zafashwe mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, zizaba zir@@ angiye, izahita iz@@ abah@@ embwa ukwezi kwa Werurwe. Ubwo Shampiyona y’@@ Icyiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda, yah@@ agarar@@ aga tariki ya 15 Werurwe, Espoir FC yagombaga gukina na APR FC, yari ku mwanya wa 14 n’amanota 17. Inkuru bijyan@@ ye@@ :@@ Amategeko ateg@@ anyiriza iki umuntu wah@@ agarikwa mu kazi mu bihe nk’ibi bya COVID-19@@ ? Espoir FC yabaye ikipe ya kabiri yahagaritse imishahara y'abakinnyi mu Rwanda kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus

Muz@@ amush@@ ak@@ ishe mum@@ um@@ bwir@@ e.” Gitwaza yagarukaga ku byo yari amaze kuvuga, by’uko yagiye ahura n’ibigeragezo byinshi, akitwa igis@@ ambo, umus@@ ambanyi, umupfumu n’ibindi ariko agakomeza gukora umurimo w’Imana kandi akab@@ itsinda. N@@ ahanuye nka Ezekiyeli kugira no amagufwa yongere abeho kandi intambara nac@@ iyemo nta wundi mukozi w’Imana uz@@ az@@ ic@@ amo cyangwa waz@@ ic@@ iyem@@ o.” Nyuma yo gusakara kw’@@ ayo mashush@@ o, ntiy@@ avuzweho rumwe haba mu binyamakuru no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Ubusanzwe amadini yose ntiyemera abahanuzi batari abag@@ aragara muri Bibiliya. Ku bab@@ emera, umuhanuzi ni umuntu ushobora kubona ibizaba akoreshejwe n’umwuka w’Imana akab@@ ivuga, igihe cyagera bikaz@@ agaragara uko yabiv@@ uze. [@@ Ibyo dukor@@ a] ni ibisanzwe aho ufata Bibiliya uk@@ ayis@@ oma, uk@@ agerageza kuyishyira mu buzima bwawe ariko ibyo kuvuga ngo Isi iz@@ ashira ejo bundi cyangwa hagiye kuba ibi, ntabwo tub@@ yemer@@ a.” Rukamba avuga ko na we ahubwo hari ubuhanuzi asigaye yumva buk@@ amutera ubwoba. Ati “Hari ubuhanuzi bun@@ t@@ era n’ubwoba bus@@ igaye bur@@ iho. Bar@@ akubwira bati ‘@@ tur@@ ahan@@ ura wowe Imana irag@@ ukiza ntuz@@ ongere no kunywa imiti, ntuz@@ ongere kureba muganga, emera gusa us@@ eng@@ e.’ Ibyo ntabwo ari byo, twe ntit@@ ub@@ yemera, ni amaf@@ uti. Kuvuga gusa ngo emera nta kintu k@@ ibigarag@@ aza, ushobora no kubim@@ bwira utar@@ ak@@ ize.” Bishop Mar@@ guer@@ ite Rwand@@ amur@@ a, Umushumba w’Itorero United Christian Chur@@ ch, Ishami rya Gikondo, yavuze ko mu Itorero rye bemera ubuhanuzi gusa ngo nta bwo yamenya ikig@@ end@@ erwaho ngo umuntu avuge ko ari we wa mbere. Ntabwo nzi abar@@ usha abandi, ntabwo nzi abaza ku mwanya wa mbere […] icyo nemera ni uko abahanuzi bariho kandi ubuhanuzi bw’@@ ukuri n’ubw’@@ ibinyoma bubah@@ o.” Rwand@@ amura avuga ko abakirisito basabwa guhagarara ku ijambo ry’Imana kugira ngo babashe gutahura abah@@ anura ukuri n’ibiny@@ oma. Ibisobanuro by’@@ amezi ya Kinyarwanda Amezi ya Kinyarwanda agira ibisobanuro bijyanye n’ibihe byar@@ angaga ikirere ndetse n’ib@@ yar@@ angaga umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi n’ubworozi nka bimwe byari bit@@ unze Abanyarwanda hafi ya bose kugeza n’ub@@ u. Aya mazina yagiye yitwa amezi hagendewe ku bihe akenshi abakurambere babayemo bimwe bikaba b@@ igih@@ ura niby@@ ubu ariko hakaba n’iny@@ ito bahaye aya mezi zisa ziz@@ id@@ ahura n’ubuzima abanyarwanda babamo muri iki gihe. Amezi ya Kinyarwanda uko ari 12 asobanura iki? Mut@@ aram@@ a: Ni ukwezi abantu bat@@ indaga kuryama bari mu gitaramo kuko nta mirimo babaga bafite ituma baz@@ induka. Gashyant@@ ar@@ e: Ni igihe cy’@@ izuba rik@@ aze cyane ku buryo nta bantu babaga bak@@ icara ku nt@@ are (@@ amab@@ uye@@ ) kubera ubushyuhe bwinshi bukom@@ oka kuri iryo z@@ uba. Werur@@ we: Ni ukwezi kw’@@ imvura nyinshi, mu magambo arambuye bakw@@ ita “@@ Wer@@ ure ug@@ we”. Mat@@ a: Ni ukwezi urw@@ uri ruba rut@@ oshye cyane, inka zikar@@ isha zig@@ ahaga zig@@ at@@ ubura umuk@@ amo. Gicur@@ as@@ i: Ni ukwezi kw’@@ ibic@@ u byinshi b@@ ibyuka bib@@ ud@@ itse hasi. Kamen@@ a: Ukwezi kw’@@ amasaka aba yeze cyane yabaye menshi. K@@ witwa Kamena kamena amas@@ ek@@ uru. Nyak@@ ang@@ a: Ukwezi kw’@@ izuba ry@@ inshi, inka ziba zish@@ onje kubera kubura urw@@ uri, bak@@ akw@@ ita Nyakanga k@@ anga amab@@ ug@@ uma (@@ inka zish@@ aj@@ e). Kan@@ am@@ a: Ibintu byose biba byan@@ amye kubera izuba ryo muri Nyakanga, bakunze kukw@@ ita Kanama kan@@ amiye Nzeri. Nz@@ er@@ i: Ni ukwezi ibihe biba bitangiye kumera neza, ibyo bah@@ inze biba bitangiye kw@@ era. Ukw@@ akir@@ a: Ni ukwezi ko kwakira imyaka ibyo bah@@ inze biba by@@ eze. Ugushy@@ ing@@ o: Nyuma yo kweza cyane no gusarura byo mu K@@ wak@@ ira, h@@ ahita haza ukwezi ko guh@@ unika imyaka, kuk@@ itwa Ugushyingo gushyingura ukub@@ oza. Ukub@@ oz@@ a: Imyaka iba igenda is@@ aza kubera kubura izuba aho ih@@ un@@ itse, indi ikiri mu mirima kuko iba yareze nt@@ is@@ ar@@ urwe bik@@ ay@@ iv@@ iramo kub@@ ora. Bak@@ akw@@ ita rero Ukuboza kub@@ oza imyaka.
Kiyovu Sports itsinze APR nyuma y’imyaka 12 byar@@ ayin@@ aniye Ku munsi wa Kane wa Shampiyona ikipe ya Kiyovu Sports ibashije gutsinda APR 1-0, ibintu byah@@ erukaga mu 2005. Kiyovu ibashije gutsinda APR nyuma y’imyaka 12 it@@ abasha gutsinda Uyu mukino wabereye kuri Stade Mumena i Nyamirambo, wagiye kuba benshi bibaza niba Kiyovu ikuraho amateka y’imyaka 12 imaze id@@ atsinda APR@@ . Kiyovu yaje kwegukana intsinzi y’@@ igitego kimwe ku busa aho amakipe yombi yari yatangiye igice cya mbere nta bintu bikomeye yagarag@@ az@@ aga. Ku munota wa 32 Kiyovu yaje kwiba umug@@ ono APR itsinda igitego cya mbere ku bur@@ angare bw’@@ umuzamu Kimenyi Yv@@ es. Iki gitego cyatsinzwe na Moustapha Francis igice kirangira Kiyovu iyoboye n@@ igitego 1-0. Rubavu : Umugore yafatanywe ibiro 30 by’@@ ur@@ umugi Mu ijoro rya tariki ya 9 Nzeri 2019, Uwineza Christine utuye mu mudugudu wa Murambi, akagari ka Buh@@ aza mu murenge wa Rubavu, akarere ka Rubavu yatawe muri yombi, yinjiza mu Rwanda udupfunyika ibihumbi 24 tw’@@ urumogi, t@@ ungana n’ibiro 30. Y@@ afatanywe ibiro 30 by’@@ urumogi Umuvugizi wa Police mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) Emmanuel Kay@@ igi, yavuze ko ubufatanye bw’abaturage butuma ab@@ injiza urumogi mu Rwanda kimwe n’abar@@ ucuruza bagenda bafat@@ wa, ndetse Uwineza nabo bari kumwe amakuru yabo akaba yarat@@ anzwe na Polisi. Ati "B@@ afashwe ku bufatanye n’abaturage babwiye inzego z’umutekano ko Uwineza n’abo bakorana binjiza mu Rwanda ur@@ umugi kandi bagiye kwinjiza ur@@ undi, ubwo Uwineza yinjiraga mu Rwanda avuye muri Congo ni bwo yahise afatwa abari kumwe na we bisub@@ irira muri Cong@@ o". Mu Rwanda ntih@@ ah@@ ingwa urumogi kuko rut@@ emewe guh@@ ingwa no gukoresh@@ wa, cyakora ur@@ ucur@@ uzwa ngo ruva muri Tanzania na Congo Kinshasa, kandi ruk@@ agira ingaruka ku bar@@ ukoresh@@ a. CIP Emmanuel Kayigi avuga ko itegeko rihana ab@@ injiza biyobyabwenge mu Rwanda ry@@ azamuye ibih@@ ano, kuburyo ubu igihano cyag@@ ejejwe ku gifungo cya burundu nyamara abarw@@ injiza ntiba@@ c@@ ika intege. Uwineza Christine wafat@@ anywe urumogi, ahakana ko urumogi ari urwe akavuga ko rwari urw’@@ uwitwa Mug@@ anda utuye muri Bis@@ iza, akavuga ko yamuh@@ amagaye kuri telefoni igendanwa bakam@@ ufata batar@@ ahura. Yagize ati "@@ Ur@@ um@@ ogi ntabwo rwari urw@@ anjye, yambwiye ko umutwaro we ufashwe n’@@ abashumba ngo njye kureba abab@@ ifashe ni bwo n@@ afashwe, ariko njye sink@@ ora ubucuruzi bw’@@ urumog@@ i". CIP Emmanuel Kayigi avuga ko Uwineza agiye gushyikirizwa urwego rw’ubugenzacyaha RIB, ruk@@ azaba ari rwo r@@ umushy@@ ikiriza ubush@@ injacyaha, urukiko rwamuh@@ amya icyaha agafungwa burundu. Kayigi avuga ko abaturage bakorana neza n’inzego z’umutekano mu guhashya abacuruza ibiyobyabwenge kuko mu karere ka Rubavu bafata abantu benshi bacuruza urumogi. Agira ati "@@ Kumenya imibare y’@@ urumogi rw@@ afashwe bisaba kugenzura kuko tur@@ ufata kenshi kuko hano ni inzira yarwo, icyo dush@@ ima ni uburyo abaturage baduha amakuru, kandi turabasaba gukomeza gukorana n’inzego z’umutekano kuko nk’uyu yar@@ ajyanye udupfunyika ibihumbi 24 mu Rwanda byari kwangiza abaturage, iyo t@@ umuh@@ agaritse ni ins@@ inz@@ i". CIP Kayigi avuga ko gucuruza urumogi nta nyungu big@@ ira, akab@@ ishingira ko iyo ufashwe amafaranga wash@@ oyemo yose ah@@ omba ndetse w@@ afungwa ibyo wakoraga bik@@ angirika, hiyongereyeho gutakaza igihe. Icy@@ ombo cyashyizwe mu kiyaga cya Mugesera kit@@ ezweho byinshi mu buh@@ ahirane hagati y'@@ uturere Abahinzi n'@@ abacuruzi bo mu karere ka Ngoma baturiye ikiyaga cya Mugesera barishimira icy@@ ombo cya moteri cyashyizwe muri icyo kiyaga kizajya kiba@@ fasha mu buh@@ ahirane n'ubw@@ ikorezi na bagenzi babo ba Rwamagana n'ahandi h@@ akora iki kiy@@ aga. Iki cy@@ ombo cyat@@ ashywe ku mugaragaro na gov@@ ern@@ eur w'intara y'Iburasirazuba, Uwamariya Od@@ ette, kuri uyu wa 23@@ /07/201@@ 4 ubwo yatah@@ aga ibikorwa by'@@ indashyikirwa byagezweho mu ngengo y'imari y'umwaka ushize wa 2013-@@ 2014. Iki cy@@ ombo gifite ubushobozi bwo kwikorera toni 35 git@@ wara imizigo n'abantu ndetse gifite akarusho ko gishobora gutwara n'imodoka maze bikaba byafasha abacuruzi kugera i Kigali byoroshye n'imodoka zabo z@@ ip@@ ak@@ ihe imyaka n'ibindi. Nubwo iki cy@@ ombo cyat@@ ashywe ntago gihita gitangira gukoreshwa kuko hag@@ itegerejwe ko ikigo RURA kiza kuk@@ igenzura ndetse ngo hategerejwe ko iki cy@@ ombo kigira ubwishingizi nkuko bigenda ku modoka igihe igiye mu muhanda. Ubu bwato ngo bufite ubushobozi bwo gutwara toni 35. Icy@@ ombo cyat@@ ashywe cyari kimaze imyaka hafi icyenda cyar@@ apfuye kitag@@ ikora, hanyuma akarere ka Ngoma g@@ afata icyemezo cyo kugis@@ ana kugirango bah@@ amye ubuhahirane n'ubw@@ ikorezi n'utundi turere duk@@ ikije iki kiy@@ aga. Abaturage baturiye ikiyaga cya Mugesera batuye mu murenge wa Mugesera baganiriye n'@@ itangazamakuru, bavuze ko ubundi umusaruro wabo byabag@@ oraga cyane kugirango ugere ku masoko ya Rwamagana na Kigali kubera ikibazo cy'@@ urugendo rurerure bakoraga igihe bat@@ anyuze iyo mu mazi. Nizeyimana Alexandre utuye mu murenge wa Mugesera avuga ko umusaruro wabo w'ubuhinzi nk'@@ ibit@@ oki, inanasi bizajya bib@@ orohera kuw@@ ujyana i Kigali na Rwamagana ahari isoko ry@@ iza. Ubundi kuva mu murenge wa Mugesera ugera i Kigali bisaba kuzenguruka i Kibungo cyangwa ug@@ aca mu Bugesera uciye mu muhanda, ariko ukoresheje inzira y'amazi ngo bir@@ ihuta cyane. Aba baturage bavuga ko bifash@@ ishaga ubwato buto bwa gakondo budafite moteri bw@@ atwara ut@@ uz@@ igo duke bigatuma bitab@@ orohera. Ubw@@ ato buto bwa gakondo bakoreshaga ngo bwabaga bw@@ ateza impanuka. Umuyobozi w'intara y'Iburasirazuba, Uwamariya Odette , ubwo yatah@@ aga ku mugaragaro icyi cy@@ ombo yavuze ko gifite akamaro kanini mu buh@@ ahirane hagati y'@@ imirenge it@@ uriye iki kiyaga mu turere twa Ngoma na Rwamagana ndetse nah@@ andi. Iki cy@@ ombo ngo kije kuba igisubizo mu kuba uyu musaruro bajya baw@@ ugurisha byoroshye mu karere ka Rwamagana ndetse no mu mugi wa Kigali. Icy@@ i cy@@ ombo cyas@@ anwe ku bufatanye n'akarere ka Ngoma mu ngengo y'imari y'umwaka ushize ya 2013-@@ 2014 imirimo yo kugis@@ ana yatwaye miliyoni 32 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda imirimo yo kugis@@ ana itwara amezi atandatu. C@@ yas@@ anywe na kompanyi yitwa View L@@ ake Trav@@ el Lt@@ d. Biteganijwe ko ikiguzi cy'@@ urugendo muri icyi cy@@ ombo kit@@ azar@@ enza amafaranga 200 yari asanzwe atangwa mu bwato buto bwa gakondo bw@@ akoresh@@ waga. Ibindi bikorwa by'@@ indashyikirwa byas@@ uwe n'umuyobozi w'intara harimo gutaha umudugudu w'@@ icyitegererezo i Rukumb@@ eri, gutaha poste de santé yubatswe n'abaturage bo mu murenge wa K@@ azo ndetse no gusura laborat@@ oire y'@@ ibitaro bikuru bya Kib@@ ungo. Jean Claude Gakwaya

Ngo umutekano ukub@@ iyemo byinshi ariko ubuzima nibwo buza ku isonga kuko nti@@ war@@ inda abaturage barwaye kandi nabo ntiba@@ fat@@ anya n'ingabo badafite ubuzima bwiza bityo n'iterambere rikaba rit@@ ag@@ erwaho. Ubundi iyi nyubako ifite agaciro k'amafaranga y'u Rwanda miliyoni 25. Ibintu abakundana bagomba kwimenyereza mbere yo kubana Kugira ngo umubano w’@@ abakundana ube uw’@@ ibihe byose ni ngombwa ko abashaka gushinga umuryango hari ibyo bim@@ enyereza mbere yo gutera iyo ntam@@ bwe. A@@ bitegura kuzabana akaramata bagira ibyo baha agaciro mbere yo kwem@@ er@@ anywa kubana by’@@ iteka nta kwish@@ ishy@@ anya kandi baz@@ iranye. Inkuru ya H@@ uff@@ ing@@ ton Post igaragaza ko abantu bitegura kubana baba bakwiye kumarana igihe, bakag@@ irana gahunda zitandukanye zibah@@ uza kenshi kuko bituma buri wese arushaho kumenya mugenzi we ndetse akan@@ amw@@ iyumv@@ amo. Ibi ni bimwe mu byak@@ usanyijwe bikwiye kwitabwaho mu bari mu rugendo rw’@@ urukundo rur@@ am@@ bye.   Gut@@ emb@@ erana Gufata urugendo rurer@@ ure, ugat@@ emb@@ erana n’umukunzi wawe ni byiza kuko bigufasha kumenyana byimbitse ndetse no kumenya uko yitwara igihe ahuye n’ikintu runaka kim@@ ug@@ oye. Inzobere mu by’@@ imit@@ ekererez@@ e, Sp@@ enc@@ er Sc@@ ott@@ , avuga ko uko ut@@ emb@@ erana n’umuntu mun@@ aganira aribwo umenya ibyo akunda, ibyo yanga niba ari umuntu utekereza ibyiza mu buzima bwe cyangwa se niba ari ahora abona ko nta cyiza kiri mu buzima bug@@ ira.   Gufata imyanzuro hat@@ abaye intonganya Kuba abakundana batak@@ umvikana ku ngingo runaka nta kibazo kib@@ irimo ariko uburyo babig@@ aniraho bat@@ uje nta rus@@ aku no guterana amagambo bituma bagera ku mwanzuro ubon@@ eye. Inzobere mu kugira inama imiryango John Am@@ od@@ eo yagize ati “Ni gute utekereza ko uz@@ ihanganira kutumvikana uzag@@ irana n’umuntu mw@@ amaze gushakana igihe utabasha kwihangana ngo umut@@ ege amatwi mug@@ anire mut@@ uje muk@@ iri abasore ngo kandi muze kugera ku mwanz@@ uro, mwembi mw@@ umvikanye@@ h@@ o.” Avuga ko uko muganira ari nako ubasha kureba niba umuntu wawe aca bugufi muk@@ umvikana cyangwa se niba atera hejuru ibintu bikaba intambara.   Kug@@ anira byimbitse ku byaranze ubw@@ ana bwanyu Gus@@ obanukirwa umukunzi wawe, ibyo yiz@@ era, ibyo yemera, kumenya ibyerekeye umuryango we n’ibyo ukunda, ib@@ yagiye bim@@ ushimisha n’ibyam@@ ubabaje kuva mu bwana bwe ni ing@@ ezi cyane. Ibi bituma umenya niba az@@ akur@@ utisha umuryango we, ukamenya uko uzag@@ ufata kandi ni ibintu bituma mur@@ ushaho kumenyana umubano wanyu ukaz@@ aram@@ ba.   Kug@@ anira ku mafaranga mukoresha Uretse kuba hari ibyo mw@@ emer@@ anyaho bijyanye n’imico n’@@ imyitwar@@ ire, ugomba no kumenya imikoreshereze y’amafaranga y’@@ umukunzi wawe. B@@ ijya bibaho ko umwe yumva ko mugenzi we afite amafaranga wenda ashingiye ku gihe amaze mu kazi, ariko kuko bat@@ abig@@ aniriyeho ugasanga bibat@@ eje ibibazo nyuma. Kug@@ anira ku mafaranga mwumva mutar@@ enza mu bikorwa muba mw@@ atw@@ ateganyije byo kwin@@ ezeza kwanyu ni byiza, bikw@@ ereka niba n’ibindi bikorwa bizak@@ enerwa iwanyu mwar@@ ashinze umuryango muzajya mub@@ iteg@@ ur@@ ana.   Kw@@ ifatanya mu bihe bigoye Bir@@ oroha kuba abantu bakw@@ ifatanya mu bihe byiza, iyo rero ibihe bibi bije nibwo umenya koko niba umukunzi wawe mw@@ ifatanyije cyangwa niba ag@@ ucik@@ aho. Igihe ubona umuntu mw@@ ifatanyije mu bibazo no mu gahinda aho niho ubucuti bwanyu burushaho kugaragara kuko burya nta muntu wakw@@ it@@ esha uwam@@ ubaye hafi mu bibazo.   Kug@@ anira n’inzobere mu mibanire y’imiryango Ni byiza gufata igihe muk@@ aganira n’in@@ araribonye mu bijyanye n’imiryango kuko hari byinshi muba muk@@ eneye kumenya mutar@@ atangira umuryango wany@@ u. Ibyo bibafasha kwis@@ obanuk@@ irwa, atari uburyo ubw@@ anyu mwebwe mw@@ iyumva ahubwo bigizwemo n’undi muntu utab@@ ifitemo inyungu.   Ibiganiro byerekeye gutera akabariro Kug@@ anira ku kijyanye no gutera akabariro ni ingenzi hagati y’@@ abakundana kuko uko byagenda kose baba bafite aho bazahurira nabyo kandi iyo bit@@ it@@ aweho bishobora guteza ibibazo. Gutera akabariro ni igikorwa nyamukuru cy’@@ abash@@ akan@@ ye; kugira ngo umubano utaz@@ azamo agatotsi biturutse kuri iyo ngingo biba byiza iyo umwe azi igihe mugenzi we yishimira icyo gikorwa n’igihe aba atacy@@ ishimira kugira bitaz@@ abat@@ anya. Mu rugendo rwo gush@@ ing urugo no kwemeranya kubana akaramata hari byinshi abantu bakw@@ imenyereza mbere yo gufata icyo cyemezo. Mu bintu abakundana bagomba kwimenyereza mbere yo kubana harimo no kuganira ibyerekeye imibonano mpuzabitsina
Burund@@ i:@@ Nyuma y'amezi 5, Abarundi bongeye guhurira ku meza y'ibiganiro Nyuma y'igihe kigera ku mezi 5 ibiganiro hagati y'@@ abarundi byar@@ ahagaze, kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 28 Ukub@@ oz@@ a@@ 2015 umuhuza w'@@ abarundi Perezida Yoweri Museveni yongeye kubyutsa ibiganiro hagati ya leta n'abat@@ avuga rumwe nayo. Ibi biganiro byit@@ ezweho gutanga umuti ku mvururu zimaze iminsi ziy@@ ogoza u Burundi. Nyuma y'amezi agera muri 5 Leta y'u Burundi n'abat@@ avuga rumwe nayo bongeye guhurira ku meza y'ibiganiro kugira ngo bashak@@ ire hamwe umuti w'@@ ibibazo bimaze iminsi mu gihugu cyabo. Ni ibiganiro bitangira kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 28 Ukuboza 2015, bikaza kubera mu biro bya perezida wa Uganda Yoweri Museveni ari nawe muh@@ uza w'@@ abar@@ undi. Biteganyijwe ko nta mihango ikomeye iza kub@@ anziriza ibyo biganiro kuko nyuma y'@@ ijambo rya Perezida Museveni haza guhita hakurikiraho ibiganiro mu muhezo hagati y'@@ abahagarariye imitwe ya politiki. Amakuru aturuka muri Uganda aravuga ko ibibazo bikomeye bizatangira kuganirwaho mu cyumweru gitaha , ariko nanone biteganyijwe ko ibiganiro byaz@@ asubira I Arusha m@@ ur Tanzaniya ari naho habereye amasezerano y'amahoro yo mu 2000 ari nayo yashoje intambara y'abas@@ iv@@ iri yari yaray@@ ogoje u Burundi mu myaka yashize. Nuko inama y'igihugu ishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry'@@ amasezerano y' I Arusha no kubahiriza amategeko mu Burundi yanze kwicarana n'abandi muri ibi biganiro . Ibi bituma abas@@ esenguzi basanga nta cyizere gihari cyo kuba ibi biganiro by@@ atangijwe byaz@@ agira icyo big@@ eraho vuba mu kugarura amahoro. Ibi biganiro bikaba byari biteg@@ erej@@ wemo intumwa zitandukanye harimo n'abahagarariye Can@@ ar@@ ed@@ ., aho umuvuzi waryo P@@ anc@@ r@@ ace C@@ impaye avuga ko ibi biganiro ari ikimenyetso k'@@ icyizere no kwishakira ibisubizo igihe isi yose yac@@ ec@@ etse. Syl@@ iv@@ estre Ntib@@ ant@@ unganya wahoze ari Perezida w'u Bu@@ ur@@ ndi we ibi biganiro nk'@@ umuti k'@@ ubuzima bw'ibihugu byo mu karere. Yagize ati: Kuva u Burundi B@@ wabura umutekano ,@@ byanze bikunze byagize ingaruka zih@@ use ku batur@@ anyi, tur@@ abano impunzi nyinshi zih@@ ungira muri ibyo bihugu , ibi biganiro rero bigomba kwihut@@ ishwa bigatanga umuti w'@@ ibibazo biri mu Burund@@ i." Ibiganiro hagati y'@@ abarundi n'@@ umuhuza wabo Perezida wa Uganda byah@@ erukaga tariki 14 Nyakanga 2015 , nyuma byaje guhagar@@ ara. Inzira y'ibiganiro hagati ya leta n'abat@@ avuga rw@@ umwe nayo niyo yari yar@@ ifujwe n'ibihugu by'@@ amahanga mu rwego rwo kugarura umutekano mu Burundi, hakaba hategerejwe umusaruro uz@@ ava muri ibi biganiro bishya mu kugarura amahoro yabaye ing@@ ume mu Burundi.
Polisi y’u Rwanda yatangiye gukoresha ’@@ Dr@@ ones@@ ’ mu gukangurira abantu kwirinda Covid-19 Polisi y’u Rwanda yatangiye gukoresha indege zitagira abapilote (@@ Dr@@ on@@ es) mu gukangurira abantu kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus (C@@ ov@@ id@@ -19@@ ). Polisi y’u Rwanda ikaba yaboneyeho gusaba abantu bose gutega amatwi ubwo butumwa aho gusohoka mu ngo bajya kuzir@@ angar@@ ira. Ubutumwa Polisi y’u Rwanda yanyujije kuri Twitter bur@@ agira buti : D@@ ukomeje gukoresha uburyo butandukanye bwo kumenyekanisha ingamba zashyizweho zo kurwanya ikwirakwira rya #@@ COVID-19 kugira ngo tubashe kuz@@ ubahiriza no kwirinda. " Tw@@ atangiye gukoresha indege nto zitagira abap@@ ir@@ ote (@@ Dr@@ ones@@ ). Nim@@ uz@@ ibona zit@@ ambutsa ubutumwa tur@@ abas@@ aba@@ : Guma mu rugo wirinde ur@@ inde n’abandi. R@@ engera ubuzim@@ a." Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 11 Mata 2020, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko abantu babiri bap@@ im@@ wemo icyorezo cya coronavirus , bituma imibare y’@@ abanduye bose hamwe mu Rwanda igera ku 1@@ 20, harimo 18 bav@@ uwe barak@@ ira. Dr@@ ones Polisi y’u Rwanda yatangiye gukoresha mu gutanga ubutumwa bwo kumenyekanisha ingamba zashyizweho zo kurwanya ikwirakwira rya COVID-19

Kenya: Inyama z'@@ inkoko zikomeje guteza impaka mu gihugu Mu gihe abantu benshi bafata inyama y'@@ inkoko nka kimwe mu biribwa bir@@ yoha kandi bihenze ndetse byifashishwa ahantu hose mu bur@@ iro, mu gihugu cya Kenya ho bamaze gutangaza ko inyama y'@@ inkoko igiye mu mafunguro agomba kubanza kwitond@@ erwa kuko hari gucuruzwa cyane iz'@@ inkoko zatewe imiti ituma zik@@ ura vuba, bikagira ingaruka ku buzima bw'@@ aba@@ zir@@ ya. Ubu hatangajwe k@@ oo ubushakashatsi bwakozwe bwerekanye ko mu minsi iri imbere, hashobora kuz@@ avuka ingor@@ ange nyinshi ziterwa no gukoresha inyama z'@@ inkoko ahanini ziba zahawe imiti kugira ngo zik@@ ure vuba. Ngo inyama z'@@ inkoko zifashishwa cyane mu mahot@@ eli, no mu zindi nzu z'@@ ubur@@ iro, aho usanga abantu benshi baza babaza inyama y'ink@@ oko, ibi rero byatumye umubare munini w'@@ abakora imishinga y'ubw@@ orozi, batangira gukoresha uburyo bushya bwo gushakisha uko inkoko z@@ ajya zik@@ ura vuba vuba mu gihe gito, hifashishijwe imiti kabuh@@ ari@@ we. W@@ ach@@ ira Kar@@ i@@ uk@@ i, ni umuvugizi w'umuryango Nyafurika wita ku nyamas@@ wa, P@@ an African A@@ nim@@ al Wel@@ f@@ are Associ@@ ation, yasabye ko hakorwa ubukangurambaga bwo kubuza abantu gukomeza gukoresha inyama z'@@ inkoko mu gihugu cya Kenya, nk'igihugu gikoresha cyane imiti kabuhariwe mu guk@@ uza inkoko ku mugabane w'@@ Afurika, aho ngo usanga mu kwezi kumwe gusa inkoko iba yamaze kugeza igihe cyo kur@@ ibwa. Abayobozi batandukanye bakora mu mishinga yo kwita ku nyamas@@ wa, batangaje ko bitoroshye kugira ngo abantu bab@@ sh@@ e kumva ko inyama nk'@@ izo zikomoka ku matungo aba yahawe imiti kugira ngo akure vuba, ari mbi ku buzima bw'@@ umuntu. Ubushakashatsi bw@@ akozwe, bwerekana ko izi nyama zikomoka ku matungo yahawe imiti ituma akura vuba, zih@@ a umubiri w'umuntu amahirwe menshi yo kurwara indwara zirimo kanseri, umutima, umuvuduko w'@@ amaraso, n'izindi ndwara zitandukanye zishobora kw@@ ataka ubuzima bw'@@ umuntu. Gusa batanga inama ko inyama z'@@ inkoko z@@ or@@ owe neza had@@ akoreshejwe imiti ituma zik@@ ura vuba, zo nta kibazo zitera ndetse ko ari nazo zonyine zemewe mu gihugu cya Kenya.
Umuririmbyi ukomeye muri Aziya wapfuye yiyahuye yashyinguwe (Amafoto) Umuhanzi Kim Jong-@@ Hy@@ un uri mu bamaze imyaka igera ku icumi bakunzwe mu bihugu bya Aziya yashyinguwe nyuma y’iminsi itatu yari ishize yiyah@@ uye. Kim Jong-@@ H@@ yun@@ [@@ uzwi nka Jong@@ h@@ yun@@ ], ni umuhanzi wari mu bakomeye cyane ku Mugabane wa Aziya akaba yakom@@ ok@@ aga muri Koreya y’Epfo. Izina rye r@@ yamenyekanye cyane mu 2008 aririmba mu itsinda SH@@ IN@@ e@@ e. Uyu muhanzi yapfuye yiyahuye ku mugoroba wo kuwa Mbere tariki ya 18 Ukuboza 2017, The Mirr@@ or yatangaje ko isuzuma ry’ibanze abaganga bakoze ku murambo wa Kim Jong-@@ Hy@@ un ryagaragaje ko yiy@@ ahuje uburozi bwa car@@ bon mon@@ ox@@ ide. Kim Jong-@@ Hy@@ un w’imyaka 27 ngo yiyahuye nyuma y’uko yari amaze gush@@ ar@@ irirwa n’ubuzima nk’uko bigaragazwa n’ubutumwa yandikiye mushiki we mbere y’iminota mike ngo ashir@@ emo umwuka. Amav@@ uriro beg@@ erejwe y@@ ababereye igisubizo Abaturage b'Akarere ka Ruhango baravuga ko kuva batangira kweg@@ erezwa amav@@ uriro, basigaye bafite ubuzima bwiza kuko babasha kwivuriza hafi. Aba baturage bashimira gahunda ya Leta yo kub@@ egereza ayo mavuriro mu tug@@ ari, kuko byatumye bat@@ akir@@ wara bah@@ ere mu nzu, bin@@ ab@@ g@@ abanyiriza imvune z@@ ingendo bakoraga bajya kwivuza. Abaturage bashima gahunda y'@@ Iv@@ uriro mu mud@@ ugudu. Iv@@ uriro mu kagali ni gahunda ya Leta yo kwegereza abaturage ubuvuzi bwihuse, mu mihigo ya buri mwaka, mu karere ka Ruhango bahiga ko bagomba kubaka ivuriro mu tug@@ ali tw@@ ose. Ingabire Jose ut@@ uriye ivuriro rya Nyagis@@ ozi mu Murenge wa Nt@@ ong@@ we, avuga ko mbere umwana yarw@@ arag@@ a, kujya ku muv@@ uza bikaba ikibazo, kuko bag@@ om@@ bag@@ ara gukora ingendo ndende. Agira ati "@@ Urabona hano iyo ur@@ waye, bigusaba gukora urugendo rujya mu Ruhango niho hari ibitaro, ugasanga hari abanga kujyayo ugasanga bah@@ eze mu nz@@ u." Undi witwa Bikorimana Egide nawe ati "@@ Rwose turashimira Leta, kuko ihora idut@@ ekerereza ibyiza gusa, reba nk'ubu ukuntu i@@ iba yar@@ atw@@ egereje ubuvuzi bw'@@ ibanze, n'@@ ukuri nta muntu ukir@@ embera mu rug@@ o." Elisab@@ eth Nyiram@@ iv@@ umbi, umuf@@ oromo ku ivuriro rya Nyagis@@ ozi mu murenge wa Nt@@ ong@@ we, avuga ko yitabirwa cyane, kandi batanga ubuvuzi bw'@@ ibanze. Avuga ko mu gihe cy'@@ indwara ikomeye bad@@ afitiye ubushobozi, bahita bahamagara imbangukiragutabara ikam@@ ujyana ku bitaro bik@@ uru. Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Ruhango Mbabazi Francois Xav@@ ier, avuga ko nyuma yo kubona akamaro aya mavuriro afitiye abaturage, bifuza kuy@@ ongerera ubushobozi, kugirango abaturage bajye bav@@ urwa neza bakomeze imirimo yabo ibat@@ eza imbere. Gusa zimwe mu mbogamizi abaturage bagarag@@ aza, ni uko kubera ubwinshi bw'@@ ab@@ itabira, butuma hari igihe imiti iba mike bagategereza ko babanza kujya kuy@@ izana mu bigo nderabuzima cyangwa ku bitaro b@@ ibarizwa hafi aho. Eric Muvara
"@@ Itariki yose bashyir@@ iraho Refer@@ and@@ umu, nta bwoba dufit@@ e" Komisiyo y'amatora Ku cyicaro gikuru cya Komisiyo y'igihugu y'Amatora ku Kimihurura Komisiyo y'igihugu y'amatora (N@@ EC) iravuga ko yiteguye bihagije amatora ya Kamar@@ ampaka ku ivugururwa ry'@@ Itegeko Nshinga ashobora kuba mu gihe cya vuba mu gihe itariki yayo izaba imaze kwem@@ ezwa. Mu nama yaguye ya Biro politiki y'umuryango FPR Inkotanyi yateranye ku cyumweru gishize tar@@ il@@ ki ya 6 Ukuboza 2015, Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame akaba na Chairman w'uyu muryango, yemeye itariki yari yasabwe n'abanyamuryango b'@@ iri sh@@ yaka, bifuzaga yuko amatora ya Refer@@ andumu ku Itegeko Nshinga yaz@@ aba ku itariki ya 18 Ukuboza 2015. Nubwo Perezida Kagame yemeye itariki yahawe n'abanyamuryango b'@@ umuryango wa FPR Inkotanyi, yanavuze ko iyi tariki iz@@ abanza kwemezwa mu nama y'@@ abaminisitiri iteganyijwe muri iki cyumweru, nyuma bikaz@@ asohoka nk'@@ iteka rya Perezida mu igazeti ya Leta. Iyo urebye aho iminsi igeze n'@@ itariki y@@ ifujwe n'abanyamuryango ba FPR Inkotanyi ndetse ikaza guhabwa umugisha n'umukuru w'igihugu, wibaza niba iyi tariki iramutse yemejwe n'inama y'@@ abaminisitiri byakor@@ ohera Komisiyo y'amatora gutegura amatora ya Kamar@@ ampaka mu gihe gito nk'@@ iki. Komisiyo y'igihugu y'amatora yatangarije Makuruki.rw ko nta kibazo ifite ku buryo amatora ya Kamar@@ ampaka at@@ agenda neza. Charles Munyan@@ eza, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo y'Igihugu y'@@ amatora, yagize ati:" Twebwe tw@@ akurikiranye inzira (pr@@ oc@@ ess@@ ) zose kuva mu baturage babis@@ aba, kuva mu Nt@@ eko, ubwo twebwe twah@@ ereye icyo gihe tugerageza kwitegura ibyo twagombaga kwitegura kuko twabonaga ko ariho big@@ an@@ isha. Tw@@ ibutse ko twari dusanzwe dufite amatora asanzwe ahari y'inzego z'ibanze kuburyo n'ubundi hari ibyo twiteguye bishobora kugendera no muri ayo naramuka ashyizwe kuri iyo tarik@@ i. Birumvikana igihe ntabwo ari kinini cyane ariko Komisiyo y'amatora ir@@ iteguye kuz@@ abikora nib@@ iramuka byem@@ ej@@ we." Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko nta myiteguro ihanitse aya matora ibasaba bitewe nuko ibikoresho by'ibanze bikenerwa mu matora nk'@@ amas@@ anduku y'amatora bisanzwe bihari, ndetse n'@@ amakarita y'@@ itora akaba yaramaze gutang@@ wa, bityo rero ngo itariki yose iz@@ emezwa n'inama y'Abaminisitiri ngo izab@@ ereho amatora ya Kamar@@ amp@@ aka, ngo nta bwoba ibat@@ eye kuko biteguye bihagije. Iyi tariki iramutse yemejwe ntiy@@ akuraho ubukangurambaga mu baturage kuri aya matora Bitewe n'igihe gito cyaba gisigaye ngo aya matora abe mu gihe iyi tariki yaba yem@@ ejwe, ntiby@@ orohera bamwe kwiyumvisha ukuntu hazakorwa ubukangurambaga (C@@ amp@@ a@@ ign@@ ) bwo kwigisha abaturage ibijyanye n'aya matora n'uko az@@ akorwa. Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo y'amatora yavuze ko itariki yose iz@@ emezwa igomba kuzagera bamaze gukora ubwo bukangurambaga mu baturage, dore ko ngo nta byinshi bateganya gusobanurira abaturage bitewe nuko ubusabe ku ivugururwa ry'@@ Itegeko Nshinga bwatanzwe nabo. Yagize ati:"@@ Biz@@ akorwa. Ntabwo twab@@ ikora iteka rit@@ arab@@ yem@@ eza, haba twebwe turaby@@ iteguye, haba Inteko Ishinga amategeko ir@@ aby@@ iteguye, ubwo nib@@ imara kwemezwa twebwe dufite gahunda yo kubig@@ eza ku banyarwanda ku buryo bworoshye kandi vuba bishobok@@ a." Yakomeje agira ati:"@@ …@@ Ibi bintu byasabwe n'abanyarwanda bagera kuri Miliyoni enye, abo rero n'ubundi nibo bab@@ isab@@ ye, nibo babizi igisigaye ni uk@@ ubabwira uko bazat@@ ora gusa. Miliyoni ebyiri zirenga zitari muri Miliyoni enye zit@@ ora tuz@@ areba uko tuz@@ abag@@ ira. Ariko urebye n'ubundi nta bintu bishya tuzaba tugiye kuba@@ bwir@@ a." Itegeko Nshinga ryo Kuwa 4 Kamena 2003 ryavug@@ uwe ndetse r@@ yemezwa n'@@ Inteko Ishinga amategeko imitwe yombi na guverinoma, igisigaye bikaba ari ukw@@ emeza itariki izab@@ eraho amatora ya Kamar@@ ampaka yo kwemeza cyangwa guhakana insh@@ ingiro ry'@@ umushinga w'@@ ivugururwa ry'@@ Itegeko Nshinga, wakozwe n'@@ inteko I@@ nshinga amategeko. Ibi bibaye kandi nyuma y'@@ ubusabe bw'@@ abanyarwanda barenga Miliyoni 3 bandikiye Inteko Ishinga amategeko bay@@ isaba ko Itegeko Nshinga ryavug@@ ururwa cyane mu ngingo y'@@ 101 iteganya manda za Perezida wa Repubulika, aho bifuzaga ko hav@@ anwaho inzitizi kuri Perezida Kagame kugira ngo abashe kwiyamamaza mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu ateganijwe kuba mu mwaka wa 2017.
Ib@@ idasanzwe mu “@@ But@@ ay@@ u” aho abar@@ okore bah@@ ererwa amasezerano y’ib@@ iz@@ aba@@ baho Iterambere rir@@ ihuta hirya no hino ku Isi kandi bikaba mu nguni zose z’@@ ubuzima. Ubut@@ ayu bwabaye ubuhungiro n’ubur@@ uhukiro bw’@@ abakirisitu bizera ko iyo nzira ibag@@ anisha ku gusubizwa ibibazo bigoye ubuzima bwabo. Ni ahantu rimwe na rimwe hashobora gushyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga nubwo bid@@ aca intege ababikor@@ a. Iny@@ amas@@ wa z’@@ ink@@ azi mu nd@@ iba z’@@ ubuv@@ umo bwo mu butayu Umuk@@ irisitu ubara ijoro yaraye yabwiye IGIHE ko mu myaka 10 ishize yagiye gusengera mu buvumo buri mu Karere ka Nyarugenge, ahazwi nka “@@ Mon@@ t Kigal@@ i” h@@ ahoze hac@@ ukurwa amabuye y’agaciro. Ubwo buvumo bufite metero ziri hagati ya 300 na 500, ubug@@ iyemo yinjira yun@@ amye kugeza igihe azab@@ uv@@ iramo. Mu buhamya bwe yavuze ko ‘@@ Ubwo buvumo bufite ibyumba bitandukanye ku buryo uyoboye abandi aba azi icyo bagomba kwinjiramo n’ik@@ it@@ inj@@ irwamo kubera inyamaswa z’@@ ink@@ azi zirimo inzoka n’ing@@ we nabonye n’amaso yanjye ih@@ ac@@ arac@@ ar@@ a.’’ Yakomeje ati “Mu butay@@ u, hari abah@@ amara iminsi iri hagati y’@@ itatu n’@@ irindwi batar@@ ya, bat@@ anywa batunzwe n’amas@@ engesho, indirimbo zih@@ erekezwa n’ibiny@@ ug@@ uri, ingoma n@@ etse n’am@@ ashy@@ i, ubundi bagac@@ inya akadiho big@@ atinda batitaye ku nzara n’umw@@ uma ufata bensh@@ i.’’ Inzira igana mu buvumo bwa Mon@@ t Kigali aho abar@@ okore biy@@ ambar@@ iza Uwiteka Ubut@@ ay@@ u, indiri y’ibir@@ ura byih@@ isha mu bana b’@@ intama Amas@@ engesho yo mu But@@ ayu yakunze kw@@ ikom@@ wa na benshi kubera ibib@@ ub@@ eramo cyane bishingiye ku buhanuzi bw’@@ ubukor@@ ano, abajura bit@@ wikira Bibiliya n’abay@@ ikoresha bas@@ ambanya abagore n’abak@@ obwa. Mu mashyamba ari ku misozi yo mu Karere ka Ruhango, ahazwi nka Kanyar@@ ira, Nyab@@ y@@ ugi, Kay@@ enzi, Gis@@ anga, Bang@@ uk@@ unt@@ abare ni hamwe mu hari ubutayu abantu bakunze gus@@ enger@@ amo. Ibih@@ abera ntibis@@ anz@@ we! Usanga abantu bavuga mu ndimi zitandukanye, ababyeyi bah@@ etse abagabo, bitaba ibyo abagabo bak@@ ikorera abagore. Hari ubutayu abantu bas@@ engeramo buz@@ wi, ariko nanone ntawe ugomba kujyayo at@@ abim@@ enyesheje ubuyoboz@@ i.” Yakomeje avuga ko abazajya gusengera ahantu hat@@ azwi bagah@@ urir@@ ayo n’ibibazo bazab@@ yir@@ engera kuko ahantu hag@@ enewe gus@@ engerwa kandi had@@ ashyira ubuzima bw’abantu mu kaga haz@@ wi. ‘@@ Kuki mw@@ ishimiye intsinzi y'umuntu umwe, kandi muzi ko uwo muntu ari umunyam@@ ahang@@ a?@@ ' Joseph Habineza Aya ni amagambo Minisitiri w'Umuco na Siporo Amb Joseph Habineza yasubije umunyamakuru wari um@@ ubajije niba Minisiteri ayoboye nayo iz@@ asaba abanyarwanda imbabazi, nyuma y'uko FERWAFA yari imaze gusaba abanyarwanda bose imbabazi kubera umukinnyi Daddy Birori watumye u Rwanda rus@@ ezererwa mu marushanwa y'igikombe cy'Afurika azaba mu mwaka 2015. Minisitiri Amb Habineza Joseph na Nzamwita de Gaule Abanyamakuru babajije Habineza niba bidakwiye ko na Minisiteri ayoboye isaba abanyarwanda imbabazi, dore ko ikibazo cy'@@ abanyamahanga bakina mu ikipe y'igihugu bari bak@@ izi nyamara ntibagire icyo bakora. Amb Habineza yavuze ko atumva impamvu ikibazo kiba bakag@@ ih@@ arira Minisiteri na FERWAFA kandi abanyarwanda bose bari bazi ko abo bantu ari abanyamahanga, bikan@@ arenga abo banyamahanga batsinda ibiteg@@ o, abanyarwanda bak@@ ishim@@ a, ntib@@ ibuke ko aba@@ bits@@ inze ari abanyamahanga. Yagize ati: " Kuki bishimiye insinzi ya bitatu ku busa y'umuntu umwe kandi bazi ko uwo muntu ari umunyam@@ ahang@@ a.@@ Umuntu anyag@@ ir@@ anwa n'abandi akavuga ngo yat@@ os@@ e.@@ Reka tun@@ yag@@ irwe twese dut@@ oh@@ ere rimwe. …@@ .. B@@ yarar@@ angiye reka tuvuge ngo ntibiz@@ ong@@ ere, turebe ibiri imbere." Minisitiri Habineza yakomeje avuga ko gusaba imbabazi Atari byo bakomeza kwitaho , ahubwo ngo hari gushakishwa ubundi buryo bwo gushakira umupira w'amaguru abaterankunga kuburyo butandukanye, kugirango h@@ ubak@@ we abana b'abanyarwanda kandi ikibazo cy'@@ abanyamahanga nt@@ ikiz@@ ongere kuvugwa mu ikipe y'igihugu. Perezida wa FERWAFA Nzamwita Vincent de Gaule na we yavuze ko icyo kibazo kit@@ azongera kubaho, ndetse anasaba abanyarwanda bose imbabazi ku makosa yakozwe n'urwego ay@@ oboye, bag@@ akinisha Daddy Birori babizi ko ari umunyamahanga , bikaza kuv@@ iramo u Rwanda gusezererwa mu marushanwa . Yagize ati : " Mbon@@ eyeho akanya ko kubwira abanyarwanda bose bakunda umupira w'amaguru ko muri Football tu@@ basabye imbabazi ku byabaye byose mu buryo bw'@@ ubuyoboz@@ i(@@ ad@@ ministr@@ ation) bwo guha abantu ubwenegihugu bit@@ anyuze mu nzira nziz@@ a." Ubwo u Rwanda rw@@ amaraga gusezererwa kubera Dady Bir@@ ori, rwas@@ imb@@ ujwe Congo Brazzaville rwari rwas@@ ez@@ ereye. Nyuma Ishyirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afurika (C@@ AF) r@@ yahaye ibihano Dady Bir@@ ori, byo guhagarikwa imyaka ibiri adak@@ ina.
Ab@@ andura Virus itera Sida ku mwaka bag@@ abanutseho 50% mu Rwanda Ubushakashatsi bushya bwerekanye ko umubare w’abantu bashya bandura Virusi itera Sida mu Rwanda, ugenda ug@@ abanuka uko imyaka ish@@ ira, by’umwihariko ukaba war@@ avuye kuri 3/@@ 1000 (@@ barenga ibihumbi 10) mu 2014 ukagera kuri 1/@@ 1000 (@@ barenga 5@@ 400@@ ) mu 2019. Ibi bivuze ko habayeho igabanuka ris@@ atira 50% mu myaka itanu ishize. Ubu bushakashatsi bw@@ amuritswe ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa 22 Ukwakira 2019, bwagaragaje ko u Rwanda rwateye intambwe idasanzwe mu gukumira icyorezo cya Sida, by’umwihariko rukomeje kuza imbere mu gufasha abayir@@ waye kubona imiti no kubarinda ingaruka zayo. Bw@@ akozwe ku bufatanye bwa Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, Gahunda ya Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (US@@ A) yo kurwanya SIDA (P@@ EP@@ FAR@@ ), Ikigo gishinzwe kugenzura no gukumira indwara cyo muri USA (C@@ D@@ C) n’@@ Umushinga wa Kaminuza ya Col@@ umb@@ ia ushinzwe kurwanya virusi itera Sida (IC@@ AP@@ ). Bw@@ akorewe ku baturage barenga ibihumbi 30 bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 16-@@ 65 n’abarenga ibihumbi icyenda bari hagati y’imyaka 10-1@@ 4 bo mu ngo zirenga ibihumbi 11 basanzwe mu ngo hagati ya Werurwe 2018 na Kanama 2019. Bimwe mu byavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi bigaragaza ko umubare abantu bakuru bari hagati y’imyaka 15 na 64 bafite Virusi itera Sida utag@@ abanutse kuko ukiri ku gipimo cya 3% (@@ basaga ibihumbi 2@@ 10) wah@@ ozeho mu myaka 17 ishize. Abari hagati y’imyaka 15-@@ 49 bari ku gipimo cya 2.@@ 6%. Muri rusange abantu bakuru bari hagati y’imyaka 15-@@ 64 bandura Virus itera Sida ku mwaka bwerekanye ko bari ku gipimo cya 0.@@ 8@@ %, bangana na 45@@ 00. Muri iyo m@@ yaka, abagore bandura Virusi itera Sida ku mwaka mu Rwanda bari ku gipimo cya 3.@@ 7@@ %, abagabo ni 2.@@ 2%, abari hagati y’imyaka 10-1@@ 4 bari ku gipimo cya 0.@@ 4% mu gihe abari muri iyo myaka bafite virusi itera Sida ari 59@@ 00. Mu bakuze bafite virusi itera Sida, 7@@ 6% bigaragara ko igenda igabanuka mu maraso aho abagore bari ku kigero cya 7@@ 9.@@ 1% naho abagabo kuri 7@@ 0.@@ 5%. Ibi biterwa n’uko igipimo cy’@@ abafata imiti igabanya ubukana igenda y@@ iyongera. Impungenge ku b@@ angavu Ubu bushakashatsi bwerekanye ko ubwandu bushya ku bagore bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 5@@ 5-@@ 59 buri ku gipimo cya 6.@@ 5% mu gihe abagabo bafite imyaka 50@@ -@@ 59 buri kuri 7.@@ 4%. Gusa iyo urebye mu rubyiruko usanga biteye impungenge cyane cyane ku b@@ angavu bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 20. Bug@@ aragaza ko abangavu bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 20-@@ 24 bandura virus itera Sida (@@ ari 1.@@ 8@@ %) bik@@ ubye inshuro zirenga eshatu bagenzi babo b’abahungu (@@ bari kuri 0.@@ 6@@ %@@ ). Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima (RB@@ C), Dr Nsanzimana Sabin yagize ati “@@ Abahungu n’abakobwa bafite imyaka 15, igipimo cya Virus itera Sida kijya kungana hafi 1% ariko byagera mu myaka 20, abakobwa bagahita babik@@ uba inshuro hafi enye@@ ! Uk@@ ibaza bay@@ ikuye he mu myaka ine@@ ?” Dr Nsanzimana yavuze ko bishoboka ko muri iyo myaka bishora mu bikorwa by’@@ ubusambanyi cyangwa ikaba ikigero bash@@ ukw@@ amo n’abagabo bakay@@ iband@@ uza. Ati “Muri macye birasaba ngo abar@@ eberera abo bana n’abafite imishinga ibit@@ aho, ibar@@ inda uburwayi bafate ingamba kuko iz@@ isanzwe ntacyo z@@ ahinduye kuri iki kibaz@@ o.” Ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko ku rwego rw’@@ Intara n’Umujyi wa Kigali, Ub@@ wandu bushya bwayo bwig@@ anje mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku gipimo cya 4.@@ 3@@ %, Intara y’Uburengerazuba kuri 3@@ %, Uburasirazuba n’@@ Amajyepfo kuri 2.@@ 9% naho Amajyaruguru kuri 2.@@ 2%. muri rusange mu mijyi buri ku gipimo cya 4.@@ 8% naho mu byaro kuri 2.@@ 5%. Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Diane Gashumba yavuze ko nubwo hari intambwe ishimishije yat@@ ewe, imbogamizi z@@ igihari mu gukumira Virusi itera Sida ku buryo inzego bireba zikeneye kongera imbaraga mu byo zikora n’ubufatanye hagati yazo. Intambwe id@@ ats@@ ikira ku kwesa intego ya Loni Ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yamaze kurenza zimwe mu ntego Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe kurwanya SIDA (UN@@ AID@@ s) ry@@ ihaye yo kugeza ubuvuzi ku bafite virusi itera Sida mu 2020. Ni intego (9@@ 0-@@ 9@@ 0-@@ 9@@ 0) isobanura ko mu 2020 abafite virusi itera Sida bazaba bazi uko bahagaze ari 90@@ %, abafata imiti 90% naho kugabanuka kwa virusi itera Sida bikaba 90@@ %. Ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko ikigero cyo kumenya uko abantu bahagaze ari 8@@ 4@@ %, abafata imiti ari 9@@ 8% naho ikigero cyo kugabanuka kwayo mu mubiri kiri kuri 90@@ %. Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Edouard Ngirente wari witabiriye uyu muhango yagize ati “@@ Imibare iragaragaza ko u Rwanda rurimo gutera intambwe ishimishije mu gukumira Virusi itera Sida. Uyu Munyam@@ isiri yageze muri Liverpool mu mwaka wa 2017. We n’ikipe ye ya Liverpool ban@@ atwaye igikombe cya Champions League i Burayi n’igikombe cy’isi gihuza amakipe (@@ club@@ s). Yabwiye igitangazamakuru Be@@ IN Sports ati "@@ Sin@@ abona uko ns@@ obanura ukuntu niy@@ umvise muri jye nyuma yaho d@@ utsind@@ iye shampiyona nyuma y’imyaka 30 yari ish@@ iz@@ e". "Nd@@ ishimye cyane. N@@ ezezwa n’umwuka uri hano. Nkunda aha hantu kandi nizeye kuz@@ ahag@@ uma igihe kirekir@@ e". "@@ Umwuka uri hano utandukanye n’uw’@@ ahandi hantu aho ari ho hos@@ e". Salah amaze gutsinda ibitego 92 mu mikino 14@@ 5 amaze gukina kuva yagera muri Liverpool@@ , harimo ibitego 21 yatsinze mu mikino 41 muri uyu mwaka w’imikino. Liverpool@@ , yamaze kwegukana igikombe mu cyumweru gishize, irusha Manchester City iy@@ ikurikiye amanota 23, mu gihe isigaje gukina imikino irindwi. B@@ iran@@ ashoboka ko ishobora guca umuhigo w’@@ amanota menshi muri shampiyona ya Premier League, usanzwe uf@@ itwe na Manchester City bazakina ejo ku wa K@@ kane. Salah yongeyeho ati "T@@ wam@@ eny@@ eranye neza nk’ikipe kandi tur@@ umvikana neza". "Niba ibi bikom@@ eje, dushobora kugera ku bindi bintu bikomeye. Biragoye kuguma ku rwego rwacu rw’@@ ubu rw’@@ imikin@@ ire, ariko ibyo ntibivuze ko bid@@ ashobok@@ a". Mu myaka ibiri ishize, Salah (iburyo) yatsindiye urukw@@ eto rwa zahabu rw’@@ umukinnyi watsinze ibitego byinshi kurusha abandi muri Premier League. King James ubundi yitwa James Ruh@@ umuriza, ni umuririmbyi w'@@ injyana ya Rn@@ B n'izindi zish@@ amik@@ iyeho nka Zou@@ k na Pop@@ . Yavutse kuwa 1 Mata 1990. Ni mwene na Consol@@ ati@@ e Kak@@ izi na Isaac Mur@@ ih@@ ano. Yatangiye ubuhanzi mu mwaka wa 2006, ubwo yari mu mashuri yisumbuye. Indirimbo ye ya mbere yay@@ ise '@@ Int@@ iny@@ i' ayis@@ ohora mu mwaka wa 2009. Amashuri ye yisumbuye yay@@ ize mu kigo cya AP@@ E Rug@@ unga aho yarangije mu mwaka wa 2010. Uyu muhanzi yashyize hanze album ye ya mbere yise ‘@@ Umug@@ ish@@ a' kuwa 24 Ukuboza 2010. Iyi album iriho indirimbo zakunzwe nka Umug@@ isha, Kuko Turi K@@ umwe, N@@ arat@@ omb@@ oye, Mwar@@ akoze, Har@@ abura Iki (@@ yar@@ irimbanye na Princ@@ esse Prisc@@ illa@@ ) n'izindi. Ku itariki ya 10 Ukuboza 2011 Album ye ya 2 yise ‘@@ Umuv@@ andim@@ we@@ '. Iyo album kandi yay@@ im@@ urikiye no mu Ntara y'Amajyepfo muri Kaminuza NK@@ uru y'u Rwanda ku itariki ya 13 Mutarama 2012. Iyo Album ye iriho indirimbo nka Nar@@ ashize, Ndakw@@ izera, Buh@@ oro Buh@@ oro, Nta Mah@@ it@@ amo, Bir@@ and@@ enga, Ese w@@ arik@@ in@@ iraga, Kuki uns@@ ize, M@@ babar@@ ira, Nz@@ ajya N@@ gush@@ ima, U@@ baye Uw@@ anjye. Kuwa 31 Mata 2012, King James yabaye umuhanzi w'umwaka mu marushanwa ya Salax Award@@ s, nyuma yo guhabwa ibihembo bine byose (@@ ibihembo byinshi kurusha abandi bahanzi bos@@ e) ari by@@ o: Best Rn@@ B, Best Mal@@ e, Best Album na Art@@ ist of the Y@@ ear@@ . King James mu mwaka wa 2012 yasohoye indirimbo nyinshi zirimo indirimbo "@@ P@@ ala Pal@@ a" zatumye arushaho gukundwa cyane. Ibi byamuh@@ esheje amahirwe menshi yo gutorwa n'abantu benshi mu marushanwa ya Primus Guma Guma Super Star I@@ I. Bityo King James atorwa mu bahan@@ z i@@ 20 bakunzwe kurusha abandi mu Rwanda, arakomeza atorwa muri Top 10, Top 7, Top 4 na Top 2 aho yari asigaye ahangana n'@@ umuraperi Jay Polly uri mu bakunzwe cyane mu Rwanda. Byari bikomeye kuri King James kuko yari yongeye guhurira Fin@@ al na Jay Polly, umwe mu bahanzi bakunzwe kubw'@@ ubutumwa bwe n'@@ injyana aririmba ya Hip@@ -@@ Hop@@ , injyana ikunzwe cyane n'urubyiruko rwinshi mu Rwanda. Tariki ya 28 Nyakanga 2012, mu gitaramo cyari cyitabiriwe n'umuhanzi w'umunyamerika Jason Der@@ ulo hatangajwe ko King James ari we wegukanye umwanya wa mbere mu marushanwa ya Primus Guma Guma Super Star I@@ I. Iki gitaramo cyabereye i Remera hanze ya Stade Amahoro. King James ubu agiye kurushaho gukora cyane kuko yahawe igihembo cya Miliyoni 24 harimo miliyoni 12 zo gukora ubuhanzi bwe harimo kumurika Album no gukora amashusho y'indirimbo ebyiri. Amakuru avuga ko yaba yareg@@ ujwe azira kuba yari inshuti magara ya Bishop Sibomana Jean na Bishop Tom Rwagasana kandi bar@@ akoranye cyane, byatumye ashyirwaho aman@@ an@@ iza. Ibyo ugomba kwitwararika mu gutek@@ esha Gaz bik@@ akurinda impanuka Mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu hakomeje kumvikana inkuru z’abantu bishwe cyangwa bakom@@ erekejwe bikomeye na Gaz batek@@ esha, bigatuma hari abasaba ko hashyirwaho amabwiriza y’uburyo ikoreshwa akag@@ aragazwa ahantu hose. Tariki ya 18 Mutarama 2019, nibwo twabagejejeho inkuru y’umugore wo mu Murenge wa Gisozi mu Karere ka Gasabo, mu Mujyi wa Kigali, wah@@ itanywe na Gaz yamut@@ urik@@ anye ubwo yari ayit@@ ets@@ eho, ikan@@ akomeretsa umwana we ndetse n’inzu bari batuyemo ig@@ ashya igak@@ ong@@ oka. Nyuma y’iyi nkuru, ibitekerezo byatanzwe n’abantu batandukanye byag@@ aragazaga ko hari Gaz z@@ icuruzwa zitujuje ubuziranenge kandi ko abaz@@ icuruza bad@@ asobanurira abantu amabwiriza agenga im@@ ikoresh@@ erezo yazo, bagasaba Urwego ng@@ enzuramikorere (RUR@@ A) gusobanurira abantu imikoreshereze ya G@@ az@@ . Mu batanze ibitekerezo ku nkuru twabagejejeho hari uwagize ati “@@ RURA n@@ ish@@ ake ikintu yakora kuri ibi bintu kuko abatanga gaz ntabwo baz@@ igenzura nta nubwo bigisha abo baz@@ ihaye uko z@@ ikoresh@@ wa. Bir@@ atangaje kubona umuntu ajya kugura Gaz ntiba@@ banze no kureba ko icupa rid@@ afite ikibazo ukab@@ ibona ugeze mu rugo, kenshi usanga zis@@ igirwa abakozi n’iyo abibonye nt@@ amenya icyo gukor@@ a.” Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 21 Mutarama 2019, RURA yanyujije kuri Twitter ubutumwa bugaragaza ibyo abakoresha Gaz bakwiye kwitwar@@ arika. Bagize bati “Mu gihe habayeho guhita kwa gaz cyangwa kuv@@ a, uzab@@ ibwirwa n’imp@@ umuro ya gaz yihariye. Muri cyo gihe kora ibi bikurikira: Mu gihe ut@@ etse, f@@ unga g@@ az@@ , Mu gihe ut@@ ekeye mu nzu s@@ ohora icupa ryawe hanze y’@@ inzu, ahantu hari umwuka uhagije kandi ufung@@ ure n’inz@@ ugi n’@@ amad@@ ir@@ ishy@@ a, Irinde ikintu cyose cyatuma gaz yaka nko kunywa itabi, kw@@ atsa ik@@ ibir@@ iti n’ibindi, Irinde kuzimya cyangwa kw@@ atsa amashanyarazi ukoresheje int@@ ere@@ but@@ eri (@@ Inter@@ rup@@ t@@ eur@@ ). Irinde kuzimya cyangwa kw@@ atsa ibikoresho bikoresha amashanyarazi kuko by@@ azana udush@@ ashi dut@@ uma gaz yak@@ a.” Bakomeza bavuga ko icupa rya gaz r@@ ibik@@ wa buri gihe rihagaze kandi ahantu hari umwuka uh@@ agije, hateg@@ ereye ikintu cy@@ atera ubushyuhe cyangwa cy@@ atera inkongi y’umur@@ iro. B@@ ibaye byiza kurushaho ngo war@@ ibika hanze y’@@ inzu, ahantu h@@ izewe aho rid@@ ashobora guh@@ anuka cyangwa kw@@ angirika. Umug@@ ozi uva ku icupa ugana ku ishy@@ iga ugomba kuba utar@@ angiritse kandi uk@@ anyura ahantu hatari ubushy@@ uye mu gihe ut@@ etse. Minisiteri y’@@ Ib@@ iduk@@ ikije, ivuga ko abanyarwanda 9@@ 8% bakoresha ibikomoka ku biti birimo inkwi n’@@ amakara mu bikorwa bitandukanye bya buri munsi. Ig@@ asaba abantu by’umwihariko abatuye mu mijyi guhindura imyumvire by’umwihariko abakoresha ibic@@ anwa bikomoka ku biti ngo bakwiye gukoresha Gaz kugirango amashyamba arusheho kub@@ ung@@ wab@@ ung@@ wa. Nubwo bavuga ibi ariko polisi yo ivuga ko itegeko rihana abas@@ abiriza ntawe rir@@ obanura. Kigali ni umwe mu mijyi mu Rwanda igaragaramo abas@@ abir@@ izi benshi, biganjemo abafite ubumuga ndetse n'@@ abadafite ikibazo cy'@@ ubumuga. Uko iminsi yic@@ uma, niko iyi ngeso ikomeza kwiyongera muri uyu mujyi ndetse n'indi mijyi ikomeye mu gihugu, abaturage nabo bakomeza kwerekana ko iyi ngeso iny@@ uranyije n'@@ indangagaciro z'@@ umuco w'u Rwanda. Mu gihe Leta nayo yakunze kugaragaza ingamba zo gukura aba bantu mu muhanda, abas@@ abiriza bo bagaragaza ko bab@@ ikoreshwa no kubura ubundi buryo bakw@@ ifashisha ngo babashe kubona amaramuk@@ o. Twag@@ aniriye na bamwe mu bamug@@ aye bas@@ abiriza nka bamwe mu bat@@ ungwa agat@@ oki, batubwira ko kubikora ari amab@@ urak@@ indi ariko ban@@ atunga agatoki abantu bas@@ abiriza bataram@@ ug@@ aye babash@@ inja gutuma badahabwa nk'uko bikwiye. "@@ U Rwanda na Afurika biri mu nz@@ iba@@ cyuho y'@@ ikoranabuhang@@ a" Perezida Kagame Perezida w'u Rwanda Paul Kagame yavuze ko u Rwanda n'@@ umugabane wa Afurika bazakomeza gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ryakozwe n'abandi gusa. Yavuze ko ubu u Rwanda n'@@ Afurika bisa n'@@ ibiri mu nz@@ iba@@ cyuho bikoresha ikoranabuhanga ryakozwe n'abandi, ariko biga n'uburyo bakw@@ ikorera ir@@ yabo bwite. Ubwo yatangaga ikiganiro mu nama mpuzamahanga ngarukamwaka yiga ku bukungu (@@ World Economic Forum@@ ) iri kubera i Dav@@ os mu Busuwisi, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko Afurika igeze igihe cyo kwihangira ikoranabuhanga ryayo. Nkuko tubikesha urubuga rwa Twitter rwa Perezidansi y'u Rwanda, Kagame watang@@ aga ikiganiro ku "@@ impinduka z'@@ ejo hazaza " yavuze ko atari byiza gukomeza gukoresha iby'@@ abandi. Yagize ati: "Mu Rwanda no muri Afurika ubu turi mu nz@@ iba@@ cyuho yo kwikorera ikoranabuhanga ryacu , atari ugukoresha ir@@ y'abandi gus@@ a." Perezida Kagame yafatanyije ikiganiro na Sher@@ y@@ l Sand@@ berg ushinzwe ibikorwa muri Facebook, Sat@@ ya Nad@@ ella Umuyobozi mu ruganda rwa Microsof@@ t, Umuyobozi wa sosiyete ya M@@ ahind@@ ra ku isi na Z@@ ac@@ har@@ y Bo@@ ok@@ man, Umuyobozi mukuru w'ikigo Op@@ en@@ Go@@ v gifasha za leta gusesengura amakuru ajyanye n'@@ ubukungu. Kagame kandi yagarutse ku kamaro k'@@ ikoranabuhanga mu iterambere ry'@@ igihugu, aho yerekanye ko rikwiye kwifashishwa mu guhindura ubuzima bw'@@ abaturage, no kurwanya ivang@@ ura. Aha yatanze rw'@@ aho u Rwanda rukomeje guk@@ ataza mu ikoranabuhanga hitabwa no ku gitsin@@ ag@@ ore. Yagize ati: "Mu Rwanda gushyira no gukoresha abagore mu ikoranabuhanga mu gufasha umuryango nyarwanda, ni zimwe mu ngamba turi kweg@@ er@@ any@@ a". Perezida Kagame yashimangiye ko Afurika iri mu mp@@ induramatwara ya gatatu n'iya kane yo kwiteza imbere. Yagize ati: "@@ Afurika iri mu mp@@ induramatwara ya gatatu n'iya kane zo guhindura imibereho y'abaturage kandi turaz@@ ishoboye zose. Ubusanzwe impinduramatwara zituma haba abats@@ inda n'abat@@ sind@@ wa. Twe akazi kacu ni ukugira abat@@ inda benshi n'abat@@ s@@ indwa bak@@ e." Raporo iherutse ya banki y'isi ishyira u Rwanda ku mwanya wa kabiri muri Afurika mu bihugu byiza byo gukoreramo ubucuruzi. Perezida Kagame yatangaje ko ibyo bit@@ apfuye kwiz@@ ana gusa, ko ahubwo biterwa n'ubuyobozi buh@@ amye, umutekano w'@@ abashoramari n'@@ iyubahirizwa ry'@@ amategeko. Muri iyi nama u Rwanda rwit@@ ezemo guhura n'@@ abashoramari batandukanye mu bukungu ku isi ndetse n'inama zijyanye n'ubukungu nkuko byatangajwe na Amb Gatete Claver, Minisitiri w'Imari n'@@ igenamigambi, umwe mu bagize itinda r@@ yeh@@ erekeje Perezida Kagame. Inama mpuzamah@@ nga mu bukungu yatangiye kuri uyu wa gat@@ at@@ ut@@ ariki 20 Mutarama, izarangira tariki 23 Mutarama 2016.
