Mushikiwabo yabajijwe uko kandidatire ye yakir@@ iwe, dipolomasi y’u Rwanda n’@@ ahazaza ha OIF H@@ asigaye iminsi 17 ngo uz@@ icara ku Nt@@ ebe y’@@ Ubunyamabanga bw’Umuryango Mpuzamahanga w’Ibihugu bikoresha Ururimi rw’@@ Igifaransa (O@@ IF@@ ) mu myaka ine iri imbere am@@ enyek@@ ane. Uyu mwanya uh@@ at@@ aniwe na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Ubutwererane n’@@ Ibikorwa by’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, Mushikiwabo Louise n’@@ Umunya-@@ Canada, Micha@@ ël@@ le Jean uw@@ um@@ azeho imyaka ine. Amatora azabera mu nama ya OIF izat@@ eranira i Er@@ ev@@ an muri Arm@@ én@@ ie ku wa 11-1@@ 2 Ukwakira 2018. Kand@@ idat@@ ire ya Mushikiwabo yashy@@ igikiwe na Perezida Emmanuel Macron w’u Bufaransa, ibihugu byo muri Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (AU) n’ahandi mu mf@@ uruka zose yakor@@ eyemo ingendo yiyamamaz@@ a. Mushikiwabo umaze imyaka icyenda ayobora Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’u Rwanda, aheruka gutangaza ko yifitiye icyizere cyo kwegukana intsinzi. Mushikiwabo ni umunyapolitiki wavukiye i Jabana mu Karere ka Gasabo, ku wa 22 Gicurasi 196@@ 3. A@@ hanze amaso Inama y’Inteko Rusange ya Loni iri kubera i New York izam@@ ufasha gukomeza gushaka amajwi. Minisitiri Mushikiwabo yaganiriye na Jeune Afrique asubiza ibibazo ku cyerekezo cye muri OIF n’imibanire y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa, ibihugu byakunze kurebana ay’@@ ing@@ we. Jeune Afriqu@@ e: Kand@@ idat@@ ire yawe muri OIF yar@@ atung@@ uranye. U@@ vuga iki ku kuba waras@@ un@@ ikiwe kwiyamamaza n’u Bufaransa ndetse ubusabe bukaba bwar@@ any@@ ujijwe kuri Maroc@@ ? Mushik@@ iwab@@ o: Kand@@ idat@@ ire yag@@ aniriweho n’ibihugu by’@@ inshuti nifuje kud@@ atang@@ aza, by@@ iyongeraho u Bufaransa. N@@ abig@@ aniriye na Perezida Kagame n’abagize Guverinoma dusanga atari igitekerezo kib@@ i. Igihe kirageze ngo tugire uruhare rufatika mu miryango tubar@@ izwamo. Jeune Afriqu@@ e: Abayobozi b’u Rwanda bakiriye bate kumva ko ushy@@ igikiwe na Perezida Mac@@ ron@@ ? Mushik@@ iwab@@ o: Bar@@ atung@@ uwe, baran@@ ishim@@ a. Mu bihe byashize Francoph@@ onie yag@@ ererany@@ waga n’u Bufaransa kandi ntabwo twari dufitanye umubano mwiza. Jeune Afriqu@@ e: Iyi kandidatire yaba ari inzira yo gusoza amakimbirane cyangwa iy’@@ ubwiyunge hagati yany@@ u? Mushik@@ iwab@@ o: Ig@@ aragaza ubushake bwo kugira uruhare mu muryango u Rwanda rubar@@ izwamo kuva mu myaka ishize ariko rut@@ ash@@ amad@@ ukiye kwinjiramo kubera imibanire mibi n’u Bufaransa. Mu myaka ishize, igihugu cyanjye cyakomeje kwiyubaka no gusigasira ibyag@@ ezweho. Ni umwanya wo kugira uruhare rukomeye mu miryango tur@@ imo. Ni yo mpamvu tw@@ asubiye mu Muryango w’@@ Ubukungu mu Karere ka Afurika yo Hagati (C@@ E@@ EAC@@ ). Ni ibimenyetso by’@@ ubushake bwa politiki na d@@ ipol@@ amas@@ i. Jeune Afriqu@@ e: Mu myaka icyenda umaze muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ni iki dipolomasi y’u Rwanda yag@@ ezeho@@ ? Mushik@@ iwab@@ o: Twar@@ azamutse mu bijyanye na politiki n’ubuk@@ ungu. Tw@@ afunguye za ambasade muri Aziya no mu Burasirazuba bwo H@@ agat@@ i. Ubu duh@@ ar@@ ariwe muri Singap@@ ore, S@@ é@@ oul@@ , Ab@@ u-@@ D@@ habi n’ahandi. Tw@@ an@@ ashyize imbaraga mu bikorwa byacu mu bice byose bya Afurika. D@@ ipolom@@ asi yacu yarag@@ utse n’ibikorwa byayo bir@@ iyongera mu buryo bufat@@ ika. Tur@@ ateganya gufungura Ambasade nshya muri Mozambique, Zimbabwe na Maroc. Jeune Afriqu@@ e: Mu 2014, Afurika ntiyah@@ iriwe n’umwanya muri OIF kuko yari ihagarariwe n’abak@@ andida bane. Kuri iyi nshuro kandidatire yanyu ishobora gushyigikirwa bis@@ esuye na A@@ U@@ ? Mushik@@ iwab@@ o: Icy@@ iyongera ku ruhare rw’u Rwanda ku mugabane ndetse no muri AU, kuba ibihugu bya Afurika b@@ insh@@ igikiye bigaragaza inzira igana ku b@@ umwe. Ni ibihe by’@@ amavugurura no kwih@@ uza. Afurika yamenye ko mu gihe yunze ubumwe, ishobora gutsinda nkuko yafashije Tedros Ad@@ han@@ om Gh@@ eb@@ re@@ yes@@ us wo muri Ethiop@@ ie kuyobora OM@@ S. Uko iminsi yic@@ uma ni ko ku ruhando mpuzamahanga Afurika izagira ijwi rimwe. Jeune Afriqu@@ e: Ut@@ ekereza iki ku mikorere ya Micha@@ ël@@ le Jean@@ ? Ni ibiki wan@@ oza mu byo yakoze uramutse ut@@ owe@@ ? Mushik@@ iwab@@ o: Nir@@ inze kwibanda ku bitekerezo byo kwiyamamaza bih@@ arabika Umunyamabanga Mukuru ur@@ iho. Icyo navuga ni uko numva mfite igitutu cy’@@ ibihugu by’@@ ibinyam@@ ur@@ yango bikeneye kubona OIF ifite imbaraga kandi ib@@ eg@@ era. Mfite ubush@@ ake, umurava n’@@ ubunararibon@@ ye. Abayobozi benshi ba Afurika n’abandi bashaka kunsh@@ y@@ igikira ngo tw@@ ongerere imbaraga umuryango wacu. Nyuma yo gukorera igihugu kimwe, kwita kuri 84 biri mu byo n@@ ifuza. Jeune Afriqu@@ e: Igihe u Rwanda rw@@ em@@ ezaga Icyongereza nk’@@ ururimi rwo gukoresha mu burezi, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ‘‘@@ D@@ uha agaciro ururimi rufasha abana bacu guhangana kandi ruz@@ adufasha mu cyerekezo cy’iterambere ry’@@ igihugu@@ .’’ Ibi mub@@ ihuza mut@@ e n’umwanya muri kwiy@@ amamar@@ iza? Mushik@@ iwab@@ o: Mu Rwanda nta guhangana kw’@@ Igifaransa n’@@ Icyongereza guh@@ ari. Iby@@ acu ntiby@@ ihariye kuko nizera ko turi ibihugu umunani muri OIF birimo na Canada bikoresha Igifaransa n’@@ Icy@@ ongereza. Icyongereza ni ururimi rw’@@ ikoranabuhanga, ishoramari, imbuga nkoranyambaga kandi niko Isi im@@ eze. Nt@@ iduk@@ wiye kwibagirwa ko igihugu kiri muri Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, akarere g@@ akoresha Icy@@ ongereza. Jeune Afriqu@@ e: Ni iki kigaragaza ukwig@@ anza kw’@@ Igifaransa mu Rwanda? Mushik@@ iwab@@ o: Igifaransa gifite umwanya mu Rwanda nk’@@ um@@ urage. Ubuzima bushingiye ku muco hari aho buh@@ urira n’@@ Igif@@ aransa. Tw@@ emera ko indimi ebyiri z@@ akoreshwa nta kibazo. Ndagira ngo mbabwire ko umwanya w’@@ Igifaransa ut@@ ahawe akato mu Rwanda aho inyandiko zemewe n’ubutegetsi z@@ andikwa mu Kinyarwanda, Icyongereza n’@@ Igif@@ aransa. Jeune Afriqu@@ e: U Rwanda rwaba rwar@@ atanze umusanzu warwo muri OIF@@ ? Mushik@@ iwab@@ o: Twar@@ abik@@ oze. Mur@@ abizi ko imisanzu itangwa mu miryango mpuzamahanga atari ibintu bishya. Akenshi us@@ un@@ ikirwa gutanga umusanzu bitewe n’inyungu wit@@ eze kuvana mu muryango. Nz@@ akora ibishoboka byose ku buryo buri gihugu muri OIF kiz@@ abig@@ iramo uruhare. Igifaransa cy@@ emewe n’amategeko mu bihugu 29 ku Isi, aho muri byo 22 ari ibyo muri Afurika. Ibindi bitari ibya Afurika bikoresha uru rurimi ni nk’u Bubiligi, Canada, u Bufaransa, Ha@@ iti, Lux@@ emb@@ our@@ g, u Busuwisi na Van@@ u@@ atu. G@@ ikoreshwa kandi no mu birwa nka Saint Luc@@ ia, Domin@@ ica na Mon@@ ac@@ o. Mu butegetsi bw’u Rwanda hakoreshwa indimi zirimo Icyongereza, Ikinyarwanda, Igiswahili n’@@ Igifaransa ari nacyo gikoreshwa na benshi mu gihugu. Umuryango wa Francoph@@ onie washinzwe mu 197@@ 0, ur@@ akomeye cyane kuko uhuza ibihugu bivuga Igifaransa, aho igenzura riheruka mu 2014 ryerekanye ko kivugwa na miliyoni 27@@ 4 mu migabane itanu y’@@ Isi. Mushikiwabo Louise ni we mukandida wa Afurika ku buyobozi bwa OIF
Huye: H@@ afunguwe santere yo kuv@@ uriramo abanduye Coronavirus Nyuma y’uko byagaragaye ko umubare w’@@ abanduye indwara ya Coronavirus ugenda wiyongera muri rusange, i Huye hashyizwe santere yo kubav@@ ur@@ iramo. Mu Kigo Nderabuzima cya Mukura ni ho hashyizwe site iv@@ urirwamo abanduye Coronavirus Iyo santere yashyizwe mu Kigo Nderabuzima cya Mukura giherereye mu Murenge wa Mukura, guhera ku itariki ya 6 Nzeri 2020. Kugeza ubu imaze kugez@@ wamo abarwayi bane ariko batar@@ em@@ bye, kandi ubu babiri muri bo bamaze gukira baran@@ ataha nk’uko bivugwa n’umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Huye, Ange Seb@@ uteg@@ e. Nubwo hari Abanye@@ h@@ uye iyi ndwara yamaze kug@@ aragaraho bagera kuri 14, umwe muri bo ubu akaba arwariye mu rugo iwe, aba bane bakiriwe muri santere ya Mukura si Abanye@@ h@@ uye. Ni abagiye kwivuriza ku bitaro bya Kaminuza bya Butare (CH@@ UB@@ ), babas@@ angamo Coronavirus ntibab@@ ohereze iwabo, ahubwo bakav@@ urirwa bugufi y’aho bari bari. A@@ bajyaga biv@@ uriza ku kigo nderabuzima cya Mukura ubu ngo bashak@@ iwe ahandi bazajya biv@@ uriza nk’uko bivugwa na Meya Seb@@ uteg@@ e. Agira ati “Abaturage bashyiriweho ahantu bah@@ erwa serivisi z’ibanze hafi y’ikigo nderabuzima bari basanzwe biv@@ ur@@ izam@@ o. Han@@ ateganyijwe ko abagize ibibazo bituma biba ngombwa ko bakurikiranwa bazajya boherezwa ku kigo nderabuzima cya R@@ ango, cyangwa ku bitaro bya Kab@@ ut@@ are hifashishijwe imb@@ angukiragut@@ abar@@ a”. Uyu muyobozi anaboneraho gusaba Abanye@@ h@@ uye kurushaho kwirinda Coronavirus, buri wese akumva ko amabwiriza yo kwirinda amureba kandi akay@@ akurik@@ iza, kuko uretse kuba abay@@ andura bagenda b@@ iyongera, inam@@ unga ubukungu bw’igihugu. Ibi bin@@ ashimangirwa n’umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Huye wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu, Andre Kam@@ ana, ukunze kubwira imbaga ati “@@ umurwayi umwe gusa kum@@ up@@ ima, bitwara amafaranga hagati y’ibihumbi 50 na 100. Abafite za whats@@ ap mujye mureba ku mbon@@ erahamwe igaragaza iby’@@ imir@@ warire ya Coronavirus, murebe imibare y’@@ abamaze gupimwa hanyuma muk@@ ube mw@@ umve amafaranga iyi ndwara imaze gut@@ war@@ a”. Aha kandi ngo ntih@@ aba h@@ abazwe ibig@@ enda ku barwaye iyi ndwara barem@@ bye, biba ngombwa ko b@@ ongererwa umwuka hifashishijwe imashini (V@@ ent@@ il@@ ator@@ s). Visi Meya Kamana anasaba abantu gutekereza ku gihe abantu bat@@ ir@@ inze, hanyuma bakar@@ warira rimwe uko byag@@ enda. Ati “@@ Abar@@ waye Coronavirus ntibar@@ warira aho abandi barwayi bar@@ war@@ iye. Ese dufite ibitaro bihagije muri buri kagari na buri murenge na buri karere ? T@@ uvuge niba abaturage ba Ngoma bose bar@@ waye, ese twabona ahantu duk@@ wir@@ wa? Buri wese se yabona icupa rya bomb@@ oni rim@@ uj@@ yah@@ o? Ese abo baganga babit@@ aho bava heh@@ e”@@ ? Iyi santere yashyiriweho kuzajya iv@@ urirwamo abar@@ embye kuko abatar@@ embye bazajya bakurikiranwa bari mu ngo. Yashyizweho muri uku kwezi kwa Nzeri, nyuma y’uko guhera ku@@ itariki ya 13 Nyakanga, ibitaro bya Kaminuza (CH@@ UB@@ ) na byo ubu bisigaye bip@@ ima Coronavirus ku batuye mu Ntara y’amaj@@ yepfo. Abana b’abahungu ku isonga mu gukorerwa ihohoterwa ryo ku mubiri Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Rwanda bwerekanye ko abana b’abahungu ari bo bari ku isonga mu gukorerwa ihohoterwa ryo ku mubiri gukubitwa no gukomeretsa aho bwagaragaje ko 5@@ 9.@@ 5% bar@@ ikor@@ ewe. Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 17 Gicurasi 2018 nibwo iyi Minisiteri yashyize ahagaragara ubu bushakashatsi ikaba yagaragaje ko bugamije kwerekana uko ihohoterwa rikorerwa abana rihagaze mu Rwanda bafatiye ku mwaka ushize. Ubu bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko abana b’abakobwa bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 18 na 24, bakorerwa iri hohoterwa ryo ku mubiri ( gukubitwa no gukomerets@@ a) bari ku gipimo cya 37@@ ,@@ 2% mu gihe abasore bari muri iki kigero ari 5@@ 9.@@ 5%. Ubu bushakashatsi kandi bw@@ anag@@ aragaje ko abana b’abakobwa bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 18 na 24, aribo bakorerwa ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina ku gipimo cyo hejuru cyane ugereranyije n’abana b’abahungu kuko imibare yab@@ uv@@ uyemo igaragaza ko abakobwa bahohoterwa ari 23@@ .@@ 9@@ %. mu gihe abahungu bakorewe iri hohoterwa ari 9.@@ 6% Dr Yvonne Kayit@@ esh@@ onga, umuyobozi w’ishami rishinzwe ubuzima bwo mu mutwe muri Minis@@ ant@@ e, akanaba umwe mu bayoboye ubu bushakashatsi, yavuze ko abana bakorerwa ihohoterwa bibagiraho ingaruka nyinshi kandi zikomeye. Yagize ati “@@ Abana bakorerwa ihohoterwa bahura n’ingaruka z@@ zitandukanye@@ .@@ Hari gukomereka ku mubiri, hari kandi ibikomere byo ku mutima bimara igihe kirekire birimo agahinda g@@ akab@@ ije, gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge cyangwa gufatwa n’indwara zo mu mut@@ we.” Yanavuze ko hari abak@@ orerwa ihohoterwa maze bagafata imyanzuro yo kwiyahura kubera ibikomere byo mu mitima baba baras@@ igiwe n’abar@@ i@@ bakor@@ eye. Dr Kayit@@ esh@@ onga yan@@ ashimangiye ko ababyeyi, abarezi ndetse n’abandi bantu bakuze bakag@@ omye kubab@@ ungabunga aribo baza ku isonga mu kugira uruhare mu ihohoterwa rikorerwa abana. Yagize ati “B@@ yagaragaye ko abah@@ ohotera abana ari ababyeyi, abo mu muryango, abaturanyi ndetse n’abar@@ im@@ u.” Ku bijyanye n’ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina Dr Kayit@@ esh@@ onga yasobanuye ko rikorwa mu buryo bwinshi ngo kuko atari uku@@ bafata ku ngufu gusa, ko ahubwo harimo no kubam@@ b@@ ika ubusa, kubak@@ or@@ akora ku ku bitsina , kubis@@ oma no kubakorera ibindi bikorwa biganisha ku mibonano mpuzabitsina.
Karongi: Abantu 9 batawe muri yombi b@@ enga Mak@@ ok@@ eri Abantu icyenda bo mu murenge wa Bw@@ ishyura, mu karere ka Karongi, batawe muri yombi na polisi ikorera muri ako karere bazira gukora no gucuruza inzoga y'@@ inkorano kandi zitujuje ubuziranenge yitwa Mak@@ ok@@ eri. Mu muk@@ wabo wo gufata ab@@ enga n'abany@@ wa inzoga y'@@ inkorano ya Mak@@ ok@@ eri wabereye muri uwo murenge, polisi yafashe litiro 10@@ 60 z'@@ iyo nzoga ndetse aba@@ yenga bagera ku icyenda nabo batabwa muri yombi. Muri icyo gikorwa, polisi yakanguriye abaturage bo muri uwo murenge kureka kunywa ibiyobyabwenge byiganjemo inzoga y'@@ inkorano yitwa mar@@ ok@@ eri ih@@ akorerwa , kuko ituma bad@@ indira mu iterambere ndetse n'ubuzima bwabo buk@@ ah@@ azah@@ arira. Umuyobozi wa sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Bwishyura Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) Bernard Gahima yasobanuriye abo baturage ububi bwo kunywa inzoga nk'iyi y'@@ inkorano n'ibindi biyobyabwenge muri rusange agira ati:" Abany@@ wi b'@@ ibiyobyabwenge ndetse n'iyi nzoga y'@@ inkorano birirwa bicaye baz@@ inywa bad@@ akora. Igik@@ urikiraho rero ni uko zibat@@ esha umutwe maze bak@@ ishora mu byaha bitandukanye nk'@@ ubujura, urugomo, gufata abagore n'abakobwa ku ngufu n'ibindi bikorwa bib@@ i". CIP Gahima yakomeje avuga ko uku kwirirwa banywa iyi nzoga y'@@ inkorano ari nabyo ntandaro y'@@ ubukene kubera kutitabira umurimo bityo iterambere ryabo rik@@ ah@@ azah@@ arira. Yakomeje kandi asaba uwaba ag@@ icuruza izi nzoga z'@@ inkorano kubireka kimwe n'abany@@ wi bayo ahubwo bakitabira gahunda zashyizweho na leta zo guteza imbere imibereho myiza y'abaturage. Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'umurenge wa Bw@@ ishyura, Mutuyimana Emmanuel, yabwiye abaturage bari bitabiriye icyo gikorwa kut@@ enga, kud@@ acur@@ uza, no kut@@ anywa bene izo nz@@ oga, kandi bagatanga amakuru ku gihe y'@@ ababikor@@ a. Itegeko ngenga rihana ibyaha mu Rwanda No 00@@ 1-@@ 201@@ 2/@@ OL ryo ku wa 2 Gicurasi 2012 rihana umuntu wese unywa ibiyobyabwenge, ub@@ ikoresha ndetse n'@@ uk@@ ingira ikibaba abab@@ ikoresha, harimo n'@@ ibihano birimo igifungo cyo kuva ku mezi atatu kugeza ku myaka itanu, n' ihazabu y'amafaranga ibihumbi magana abiri na mirongo itanu y'u Rwanda (25@@ 0. 000@@ Rw@@ F@@ ).
Nyaruguru: Gare ya Kibeho igiye gutangira kubakwa Bamwe mu batwara imodoka zijya cyangwa ava mu karere ka Nyaruguru barishimira ko muri aka karere hagiye kubakwa g@@ are, kuko kuba nta yari ihari byajyaga bituma bakorera mu kaj@@ agari. Bamwe mu batwara imodoka zitwara abagenzi bavuga ko ubusanzwe ngo mu gutega imodoka h@@ ajyaga habamo akaj@@ agari, ugasanga ngo abag@@ ezi batazi aho bagomba guhagarara bategereje imodoka. Inyubako zarimo zamaze guseny@@ wa. Bavuga kandi ko gare nimara kubakw@@ a, ngo uretse no kuba abagenzi bazabasha kugira aho bafatira imodoka haz@@ wi, ngo bazabasha no kubona aho bafatira amafung@@ uro, ubwiherero n'ibindi byangombwa bak@@ eneraga bik@@ abagora kub@@ ibona. Ngir@@ uw@@ ons@@ anga Ven@@ ust@@ e, utwara imodoka itwara abagenzi muri kompanyi ya Rw@@ inyana Ltd, avuga ko muri uyu muhanda habamo akajagari kuberako ntaho guhagarara hazwi habaho bigatuma n'aho bahagaritse imodoka bat@@ izera umutekano waz@@ o. Ikindi kandi avuga ngo ni uko iyi gare niy@@ uzura iz@@ akura abagenzi mu gihirahiro bakaba bazi aho bateg@@ era, kandi ukeneye kugira icyo agura akabona aho akig@@ urira. Ubusanzwe abagenzi bategera imodoka ku muhanda. Ati:@@ "@@ Ubundi gut@@ egera hano ku muhanda haba harimo akajagari kenshi, noneho byaba ari ku minsi mikuru ijya iba hano i Kibeho bwo akajagari kaba ari kenshi cyane, hari n'ubwo t@@ bura aho dus@@ iga imodoka, n'aho tuz@@ isize ntit@@ uba twizeye umutekano waz@@ o. Ikindi n'uko duhora dush@@ yamirana na polisi baduh@@ ana ngo duhagaze nabi, ariko icyo gihe gare niba ihari ntawe bazongera guhana bamuz@@ iza guhagarara nabi, kandi n'@@ abagenzi bazabasha kumenya aho bateg@@ era, ndetse n'@@ ukeneye amazi cyangwa se icyayi abone aho ak@@ iny@@ wa". Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Nyaruguru Habitegeko Francois avuga ahazubakwa gare ubu hari gutegurwa kugirango imirimo yo kubaka itang@@ ire. Uyu muyobozi avuga ko iyi gare igiye kuza ari igisubizo ku bwinshi bw'@@ imodoka ziza I Kibeho mu ngendo ny@@ obokamana z@@ ajyaga ziteza akajagari muri aka gace. Ati:@@ "N@@ ibyo koko hano I Kibeho hagiye kubakwa g@@ are, ubu abaturage bamaze kubar@@ iwa kandi bar@@ ishy@@ uwe, ku buryo ubu imirimo yo kubaka igiye gutangir@@ a.@@ Iyi gare rero ikaz@@ aza ikemura ikibazo cy'@@ ubwinshi bw'@@ imodoka twakira hano cyane cyane mu bihe by'@@ ingendo ny@@ obokam@@ an@@ a". Uyu muyobozi kandi avuga ko muri iyi gare hazaba harimo n'@@ inyubako z'@@ ubucuruzi, zizafasha abagenzi bazajya bah@@ ateg@@ erereza imodoka kubasha kugira icyo bagura bakeneye. Ubuyobozi bw'akarere bukaba butangaza ko imirimo yo kubaka iyi gare izamara imyaka itatu, gusa ngo ikaba iri mu byic@@ iro, kuko ngo habanje kubar@@ ira no kwimura abari batuye ah@@ azuba@@ kw@@ a, h@@ kaz@@ akurikiraho kubaka g@@ are, nyuma hakaz@@ ubakwa inyubako z'@@ ubucuruzi. Umur@@ amyi Rwibutso Emma yasohoye indirimbo nshya “Igihe Uz@@ azir@@ a” isub@@ izamo abantu kwizera Umuhanzi uririmba indirimbo zir@@ amya zik@@ anah@@ imbaza Imana, Karangwa Rwibutso Emmanuel uzwi nka Rwibutso Emm@@ a, yasohoye indirimbo nshya yise “Igihe Uz@@ azir@@ a”, ikubiyemo ubutumwa buh@@ umuriza abantu buk@@ abas@@ ubiz@@ amo kwizera Imana. Rwibutso yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo yay@@ anditse ubwo ibihe bya Guma M@@ urugo byari bit@@ angiye. Igitekerezo cyo kuy@@ andika yag@@ ikuye ku buhamya bw’@@ inshuti ye, yamubwiye ukuntu yari iri mu r@@ ungab@@ angabo biy@@ ig@@ oye, maze isaba Imana ko ibyo yari ari kunyuramo bit@@ atuma ay@@ ish@@ idik@@ anya. Ibyo ngo byatumye yumva yak@@ wandika indirimbo, agas@@ angiza n’abandi batandukanye ubwo butumwa bw’@@ inkom@@ ezi, ababa bari mu bihe bigoye na bo ntibash@@ idik@@ anye ku Mana. Yagize ati “Iyi ndirimbo n@@ ayih@@ imbye numva nshaka guhumuriza abantu mbabwira ko amajwi twumva aduk@@ anga cyangwa ad@@ utera ubwoba tud@@ akwiye kuy@@ itaho ahubwo uko dusanzwe tuzi Imana bitume tut@@ ay@@ iy@@ ober@@ wa.” Indirimbo “Igihe Uz@@ azir@@ a” yiganjemo ubutumwa bw’@@ inkom@@ ezi ku bagenzi bajya mu ijuru ndetse ituma abantu bag@@ arurira Imana icyizere n’ubwo baba baca mu bikomeye. Hari nk’aho igira iti “@@ Ns@@ anzwe nzi yuko uri Imana yanjye, nsanzwe nzi yuko unk@@ unda cyane, nsanzwe nzi yuko utabara abantu bawe, nsanzwe nzi yuko utaz@@ and@@ eka, n’ubwo nak@@ ena nk@@ abur@@ ara, nk@@ ambara ubusa, ibibi big@@ as@@ imburana mu buzima bwanjye, namenye neza ko igihe uz@@ az@@ ira, uzakora ibirenze ibyo nib@@ wir@@ a.” Igihe Uz@@ azira ni indirimbo ya kabiri, Rwibutso asohoye ari wenyine, ikaba yasohokanye n’@@ amashusho, byombi byat@@ ung@@ anyijwe na producer H@@ yac@@ int@@ he, umwe mu batunganya indirimbo zihimbaza Imana uri kuzamuka neza. Rwibutso yavuze ko uretse iyi ndirimbo “Igihe Uz@@ azir@@ a”, agiye gushyira imbaraga mu gukomeza gukora n’izindi nyinshi kugira ngo ubutumwa Imana yam@@ ushyize ku mutima abus@@ angize n’abandi abinyujije mu ndirimbo. U Rwanda ruh@@ angayikishijwe n'abana ruv@@ ukisha buri mwaka bak@@ uzura akarere Umubare w'abana bavuka buri mwaka uh@@ angayikishije igihugu@@ / Photo: Internet Nubwo Leta y'u Rwanda ikunze gushishikariza abanyarwanda kuringaniza urubyaro, kuri ubu imibare itang@@ angwa n'ikigo cy'igihugu cyita k'@@ ubuzima RBC, iragaragaza ko mu Rwanda buri mwaka havuka abana bagera ku bihumbi 300 umubare ungana nibura n'abaturage batuye akarere kamwe ku Rwanda. Mu kiganiro Dr Nzabonimpa Anic@@ et, impuguke mu buzima bw'imy@@ ororokere muri RBC yagiranye na Makuruk@@ i.@@ rw, yagaragaje ko kuri ubu u Rwanda rufite ikibazo cyo kuba abanyarwanda bag@@ ikomeza kwiyongera mu gihe nyamara ubuso bw'u Rwanda bwo but@@ iyongera. Ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko kuva mu mwaka w'@@ 1992, uburumbuke bukiri hejuru aho mu mwaka w'@@ 1992 bwari ku kigero cya 6,@@ 2%, mu 2014-@@ 2015 bigera kuri 4,@@ 2% imibare yemeza ko iri hejuru ugereranyije n'ibihugu byateye imbere aho byo biba biri kuri 2%. Gusa ariko ni ubwo iyo mibare igaragaza ko ubwiyongere bwag@@ abany@@ utse, ntibikuraho ko abanyarwanda mu byiciro byose ari urubyiruko rut@@ arashaka ndetse n'abantu bakuru bashatse bakomeza kubyara umunsi ku wundi. Dr Nzabonimpa agaragaza ko mu Rwanda buri mwaka havuka abana ibihumbi 300, abana bashobora kuzura akarere kamwe k'@@ u Rwanda. Yagize ati: Nibyo hari gahunda ziriho zo gukangurira abanyarwanda kuringaniza im@@ byar@@ o, ariko ubushakashatsi twakoze bugaragaza ko buri mwaka mu Rwanda havuka abana ibihumbi 300, abana bashobora kuzura akarere mu gihe u Rwanda rufite ubuso bungana na kilometero kare ibihumbi 26 33@@ 8. Dr Nzabonimpa akomeza agaragaza impungenge z'iki kibazo aho imibare igaragaza ko urubyiruko ari rwo rurimo kubyara cyane kurusha abantu bakuru bubatse ingo mu buryo buz@@ wi, aho urubyiruko ruri hagati y'imyaka 15 na 19 mu mwaka wa 2014-@@ 2015, babyaye cyangwa batwite bang@@ anaga na 7% mu gihe mu miryango byari kuri 4,@@ 2%. Ibi ntibikuraho ko hakiri imwe mu miryango ifata icyemezo cyo kuboneza urubyaro bak@@ abyara umwana bak@@ amwita buc@@ ura ( Cad@@ et, C@@ adette , Benjam@@ in@@ ..@@ ) nyamara nyuma bak@@ isanga bongeye kubyara undi mwana batar@@ abiteg@@ anyije. Aha niho Dr Nzabonimpa asanga gahunda yo kuringaniza urubyaro it@@ akagombye guh@@ arirwa ab@@ ubatse ingo bonyine ko ahubwo bireba abantu b'ingeri zose. Dr Nzabonimpa Anic@@ et impuguke mu buzima bw'imy@@ ororokere muri RBC Yagize ati: Hari igihe usanga mu muryango umugabo n'umugore bafata icyemezo cyo kugabanya urubyaro bakita umwana izina bagaragaza ko nta wundi bazongera kubyara nka ba Benjam@@ in, Cad@@ et, Cad@@ ette, ariko nyuma ugasanga umugore yongeye gusama inda bikaba byateza ikibazo mu muryango, urubyiruko rut@@ arashaka na rwo rurimo kubyara cyane. Dr Nzabonimpa akomeza avuga ko gahunda yo kuringaniza urubyaro igomba kureba abantu b'ingeri zose ,@@ umugab@@ o-@@ Umug@@ ore, Umut@@ o n'umuk@@ uru. Kugeza ubu ibipimo mu kuboneza urubyaro bigaragaza ko muri rusange bigeze kuri 53@@ %, 48@@ % ni ugukoresha uburyo bwa kiz@@ ungu, 6% ni uburyo bwa gakondo, abakoresha agakingirizo baracyari kuri 6%. Kw@@ ifung@@ isha burundu ku bagore biri kuri 1,@@ 2%, mu gihe ku bagabo biri kuri 0,@@ 8%. Intara y'Amaj@@ ay@@ arug@@ uru ni yo iri ku gipimo cyo hejuru mu kuboneza urubyaro aho abaturage baho babon@@ eje urubyaro bari kuri 55@@ %, Umujyi wa Kigali ukaba uri kuri 50@@ %, Amajyepfo 48@@ % , Uburasirazuba 47@@ % , Intara y'Uburengerazuba ikaza ku mwanya wa nyuma aho iri ku gipimo cya 4@@ 1%. Ubush@@ ak@@ atsi bwakozwe mu mwaka w'@@ 2002 bwagaragaje ko abanyarwanda bari miliyoni 8.@@ 1, mu 2006 bageraga kuri miliyoni 9.@@ 3, naho ibarura rusange ryo mu 2012 ryo ryagaragaje ko abanyarwanda bari hejuru ya miliyoni 11. Abahanga bavuga ko bimwe mu bituma igihugu gitera imbere ari uko abaturage bay@@ oboka gahunda yo kuboneza urubyaro. Dr Nzabonimpa avuga ko Minisiteri y'ubuzima izakomeza gahunda yo gushishikariza abanyarwanda kuringaniza urubyaro nibura buri mwaka hak@@ ajya havuka abantu bak@@ uzura umurenge gusa.
Ubuhamya bw’@@ uw@@ atewe inda afite imyaka 15, akan@@ atem@@ agurwa az@@ izwa kwaka indezo Mukam@@ uny@@ aw@@ era Florence yatanze ubuhamya bw’@@ uburyo yatewe inda afite imyaka 15, agat@@ em@@ agurwa n’umugore w’@@ uw@@ ayim@@ uteye amuziza kwaka ind@@ ezo, akan@@ aterwa ubwoba ko az@@ icwa nah@@ irahira kum@@ uvug@@ a. Uyu mubyeyi w’imyaka 25 ukomoka mu Murenge wa Busasamana mu Karere ka Nyanza, mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo yatanze ubuhamya mu kiganiro “D@@ uh@@ umur@@ iz@@ anye@@ ” git@@ ambuka kuri Radio Ijwi ry’@@ Iby@@ ir@@ ingiro (10@@ 6.@@ 4 F@@ M@@ ), kig@@ aruka ku rugendo rw’@@ ubuk@@ irisitu rw’@@ umuntu n’intambara yahuye nazo. Mukam@@ uny@@ aw@@ era wash@@ utswe n’umusore w’imyaka 25 bari baturanye akam@@ utera inda batar@@ an@@ akundanye ngo ntiy@@ amenye ko yayis@@ amye kuko atari abis@@ obanuk@@ iwe. Yagize ati “Mu 2008 nat@@ ewe inda mfite imyaka 15. Nari maze igihe gito ngiye mu mih@@ ango, m@@ bajije mama impamvu ntak@@ iy@@ ijyamo ati ’@@ nta kibazo nanjye bijya bim@@ bah@@ o’ ariko nyuma ubwo yameny@@ aga ko nt@@ wite yar@@ atunguwe cyane.” Yavuze ko byam@@ ubayeho yaravuye mu ishuri nyuma y’uko se yari yarar@@ waye ibih@@ aha, maze nyina akajya mu bitaro kum@@ urw@@ aza big@@ afata igihe kirekire bigatuma yiyemeza guca inshuro mu mirima y’abaturage ngo abone ikim@@ ut@@ unga. Ak@@ imenya ko atwite yabibwiye umuhungu way@@ im@@ uteye ariko amw@@ uka inabi amubwira ko az@@ amwica nab@@ ivuga ahubwo amugira inama yo kuyig@@ ereka ku mushumba bari bat@@ uranye. Yagize ati “Y@@ aram@@ bwiye ngo ntuz@@ amv@@ uge kuko n@@ umv@@ uga nz@@ akug@@ irira nabi. Nakomeje kugira ubwoba iwacu bam@@ baza nkavuga ngo ni uwo mushumba ariko mu by’ukuri atari we.” Uwo mushumba wab@@ esh@@ yewe ngo yaje gutoroka kuko yari azi ko az@@ afungwa kubera uw@@ ayim@@ ug@@ erek@@ agaho yari akiri muto. Mukam@@ uny@@ aw@@ era avuga ko umwana agize amezi atandatu yarwaye akar@@ emba noneho akab@@ ibwira wa musore wam@@ uteye inda ngo amufashe kumuv@@ uza ariko amutera utwatsi bituma ava ku izima abibwira ababyeyi be. Ati “N@@ aragiye noneho mv@@ ugisha ukuri kuko n’@@ iwacu bari bamuzi ko ari umut@@ urany@@ i.” Kuva ubwo yatangiye kujya mu buyobozi ngo ahabwe indezo y’umwana bituma umugore w’uwo mugabo wam@@ uteye inda amug@@ ambanira ngo bamw@@ ice kuko abantu bose bem@@ ezaga ko umwana asa na se. Ati “@@ Abam@@ ubonye (@@ umwan@@ a) bose bakom@@ aga amashyi bati ni fot@@ ok@@ opi rwose, se yageze aho arab@@ yemera tur@@ am@@ wandik@@ isha ariko bam@@ utegeka no kujya ampa ind@@ ez@@ o.” Uko yat@@ em@@ aguwe kubera kwaka indezo Mukam@@ uny@@ aw@@ era wagombaga guhabwa indezo bit@@ akorwa akab@@ imenyesha ubuyobozi yat@@ em@@ aguwe n’umugore w’umugabo wam@@ uteye inda afashijwe na musaza we bashaka kumwica. Ati “Bar@@ ant@@ eze ari ku mugoroba ngiye kumva numva bari kunt@@ ema mu mutwe n’ahantu hose ariko Imana yak@@ inze ukuboko h@@ ahita haza umugabo bakw@@ ira imish@@ war@@ o, mba ndar@@ usimb@@ utse.” Icyo gihe yahise ajya kubar@@ ega ndetse abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze baby@@ itam@@ bik@@ amo kugeza ubwo inzego zibishinzwe z@@ injiye mu kibazo cye, bakorerwa dosiye ariko bamaze kumenya ko bakatiwe igifungo cy’umwaka bahita bacika bajya muri Uganda Inama agira abakobwa n’ababy@@ aye batab@@ iteguye Mukam@@ uny@@ aw@@ era yagiriye inama abakobwa yo kwitwararika kuko nubwo uw@@ amuteye inda yari yab@@ iteguye kuri we ngo baryamanye atab@@ iteguye. Ukub@@ oko k’u Bubiligi mu m@@ itegekere y’u Rwanda rwa nyuma y’@@ ubwig@@ eng@@ e; Ubuk@@ oloni mu isura nshya Tariki 1 Nyakanga 196@@ 2, ibyishimo byari byose ku bar@@ wanashyaka ba MDR Par@@ m@@ eh@@ utu na Ap@@ ros@@ oma, amashyaka yah@@ anganye cyane n’ubw@@ ami guhera mu 195@@ 7 kugeza burund@@ utse mu 196@@ 2, u Rwanda rug@@ ahinduka Repubulika. U Rwanda rwari mu muj@@ yo w’@@ ibindi bihugu byinshi by’@@ Afurika, byah@@ uh@@ eragamo umuyaga w’@@ impinduka n’ubw@@ igenge nyuma y’imyaka myinshi y’ubuk@@ ol@@ oni, itotezwa n’is@@ uz@@ ugurwa ry’@@ ab@@ enegihugu. Icyakora mu Rwanda ubwigenge busa nk’@@ ubw@@ atandukanye, cyane n’ubw@@ avugwaga mu bindi bihugu bya Afurika, kuko mu gihe ahandi ubwigenge bwabaga bur@@ eba abaturage bose, mu Rwanda ho bwaje bur@@ eba igice kimwe cy’@@ abaturage, Abah@@ utu, bishimira ko bamaze kwirukana mu gihugu bagenzi babo bo mu bwoko bw’@@ Abatutsi. Amateka agaragaza ko kandi mu gihe abandi babaga bishimira ko bir@@ ukanye ubuk@@ oloni n’ib@@ yabwo byose, mu Rwanda ho bashim@@ aga uburyo abakoloni bafashije Abahutu kwikiza Abatutsi ndetse uwo murongo w’ubutegetsi bw’@@ Abak@@ ol@@ oni, ni nawo wakomeje nyuma y’@@ ubwigenge. Abak@@ oloni bashyigikiye abaz@@ akomeza gukorera mu kwaha kwabo nyuma y’@@ ubwigenge Mu bibazo by’@@ imvururu zatangiye mu Ugushyingo 1959 ubwo Abatutsi batw@@ ikir@@ waga, abari babiri inyuma ni abam@@ bari ba Par@@ m@@ eh@@ utu na Ap@@ ros@@ oma ariko bashy@@ igikiwe bikomeye n’abak@@ ol@@ oni. Abak@@ oloni bakomeje kuba hafi y’igice cy’@@ Abah@@ utu, cyane cyane icya Kayibanda Grég@@ oire ndetse ban@@ amuha ubufasha bwose muri gahunda ze zo guhirika ubwami kugeza ubwo ibikoresho byakoreshejwe i Gitarama tariki 28 Mutarama 196@@ 1 ubwo Par@@ m@@ eh@@ utu yah@@ irik@@ aga ubw@@ ami, byatanzwe n’abategetsi b’@@ Ababiligi mu Rwanda. Umunyam@@ ateka Innocent Nizeyimana yabwiye IGIHE ko no mu gihe cyo gut@@ wikira Abatutsi, lisansi yifash@@ ishwaga yatang@@ waga n’abak@@ ol@@ oni. Yagize ati “K@@ wirukana Abatutsi mu 1959 byakozwe n’@@ Abab@@ il@@ igi. Yego bifashishije Abahutu ariko bakubwira ko lisansi zo kujya gut@@ wikira Abatutsi zatang@@ irwaga kuri Ter@@ itwar@@ i, hari n’aho Guy Log@@ i@@ est wari R@@ és@@ ident Sp@@ éc@@ ial yivugira ubwe ko yabaga ari kugenda hejuru mu ndege akurikirana uko ibikorwa byo kwirukana Abatutsi big@@ enda, ngo akaba@@ bazwa nuko batari biteguye bihagije ngo babe bafite lisansi ihagije yo kubat@@ wikira ku buryo iyo baba baraby@@ iteguye, nta Mut@@ utsi wari gusigara mu Rwanda.” Ababiligi baric@@ aga bag@@ akiza mbere na nyuma y’@@ ubwigenge Icy@@ erekana ko u Bubiligi bwari bug@@ ishaka kuguma mu Rwanda, nuko Guverinoma yag@@ iyeho mu Ukwakira 1960 iyobowe na Kayibanda yari igizwe n’aba@@ minisitiri 9 n’abanyamahanga ba Leta 12. Igitangaje muri abo bany@@ amabanga ba Leta, umunani bari Abab@@ il@@ igi. B@@ igaragaza urwego rw’@@ ubwigenge u Bubiligi bw@@ ateg@@ uriraga u Rwanda kuko bwakomeje kugira ijambo rigaragara mu butegetsi bw’u Rwanda na nyuma y’@@ ubwigenge. Muri Gicurasi 196@@ 2, ingabo z’@@ abakoloni zari zishinzwe kurinda u Rwanda z@@ ahind@@ uwemo iz’@@ u Rwanda ariko umubare munini ari uw’@@ abab@@ iligi ari nabo baz@@ itegek@@ aga. H@@ ashinzwe ishuri rikuru rya gisirikare rya Kigali rit@@ ozwa n’@@ Abab@@ il@@ igi. Nyuma y’@@ ibitero by’@@ Iny@@ enzi mu mpera ya 196@@ 3, Abatutsi b’@@ imbere mu gihugu bar@@ ibas@@ iwe, cyane cyane abatar@@ avugaga rumwe n’@@ Ubut@@ egets@@ i. Ingabo z’@@ Ababiligi zakomeje kuba mu Rwanda na nyuma y’@@ ubwigenge ndetse ni nazo mu 1963 z@@ ifashishijwe mu kwica Abany@@ apolitiki bat@@ avugaga rumwe n’@@ Ubutegetsi bo mu mashyaka ya UN@@ AR na RAD@@ ER@@ . Tariki 24 Ukuboza 196@@ 3, hishwe abarimo Michel Rwagasana wari umunyamabanga mukuru wa UN@@ AR, Afrika Etienne na N@@ c@@ ogoza Xavier bahoze muri Guverinoma ihur@@ i@@ weho, Perezida wa R@@ ADE@@ R Bw@@ an@@ akw@@ eri Prosp@@ er, Nd@@ az@@ aro Laz@@ are wayoboraga ikinyamakuru UN@@ IT@@ é cya UN@@ AR n’abandi. B@@ ishwe nta rubanza r@@ ubayeho, bicwa n’abasirikare b’@@ Ababiligi nyuma y’uko ab’@@ abanyarwanda banze kubikora. Jeune Afrique yo ku wa 17 Gashyantare 196@@ 4, igaragaza ko abo banyapolitiki barashwe n’abab@@ iligi barimo TUR@@ P@@ IN wari Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe umutekano, P@@ IR@@ AT@@ E wari umuyobozi wa Polisi n’uwitwa D@@ UR@@ I@@ E@@ U@@ X@@ . Innocent Nizeyimana yavuze ko nyuma y’@@ ubwigenge u Bubiligi bwakomeje kuyobora u Rwanda, dore ko n’ingabo zabwo arizo z@@ oherez@@ waga cyane ku rugamba kurwanya ibitero by’@@ Iny@@ enzi. Ati “None se Repubulika imaze kuj@@ yaho, Politiki yo guheza Abatutsi siyo yakom@@ ej@@ e? Mu 1963 muri biriya bitero by@@ abaye, kujya kurwana mu Bugesera ni Major D@@ ub@@ ois w’@@ Umubiligi wari uyoboye ibit@@ er@@ o.” No mu myaka ya za 1970 u Bubiligi bwari buk@@ is@@ ir@@ is@@ imba muri politiki y’u Rwanda Kugeza mu 197@@ 0, u Bubiligi bwari kimwe mu bihugu biha u Rwanda inkunga nyinshi haba iy’@@ amafaranga n’ubufasha mu bya tekin@@ iki. Muri uwo mwaka u Bubiligi bwari bufite inzobere mu Rwanda mu nzego zitandukanye zisaga 240 n’abarimu basaga ijana. Kayibanda (@@ ibur@@ yo@@ ), Habyarimana Juvenal n'umwe mu basirikare b'u Bubiligi Mu ruzinduko umwami w’ u Bubiligi Ba@@ ud@@ ou@@ in n’umw@@ am@@ ikazi Fab@@ iola bagiriye mu Rwanda muri Nyakanga 197@@ 0, biyemeje guk@@ uba kabiri inkunga icyo gihugu cyag@@ eneraga u Rwanda ndetse ibihugu byombi bis@@ inyana amasezerano atandukanye y’@@ ubufat@@ anye. Kuba umwami Ba@@ ud@@ ou@@ in yaras@@ uye u Rwanda avuye muri Congo, ag@@ akomereza mu Burundi, ibihugu bahoze bak@@ olon@@ iza kandi hose akah@@ amara igihe, nabyo bigaragaza uburyo u Bubiligi bw@@ ashakaga gukomeza kwiyegereza ibihugu bahoze bak@@ olon@@ iza. Ibindi bihamya by’uko u Bubiligi butari bushy@@ igikiye ubwigenge buzatuma abaturage big@@ obotora ubuk@@ ol@@ oni, ni uburyo muri Congo bishe Patrice Lumumba washakaga ko batanga ubwigenge bakah@@ ava, bakamus@@ imbuza Dés@@ ire Mobutu wemeye kugendera mu murongo bashaka. Mu Rwanda Perezida Kayibanda yakomeje gukorera inyungu z’@@ Ababiligi kugeza ubwo babonaga ko ntacyo bak@@ imut@@ ezeho mu 197@@ 3, bashyigikira ih@@ ikwa rye ryakozwe na Général Major Habyarimana Juvénal muri coup d’@@ et@@ at yabaye ku munsi w’@@ iya 5 Nyakanga 197@@ 3. Nizeyimana asanga gukura ku butegetsi Kayibanda byari mu mugambi w’@@ Ababiligi kuko nta nyungu bari bakim@@ ubon@@ amo, ndetse hakaza n’imbaraga z’u Bufaransa bw@@ ashakaga ijambo mu karere. Nubwo Habyarimana yagiye ku butegetsi avuga ko aje kugarura ituze n’@@ amahoro, byabaye iby’@@ akanya gato kuko yakomereje mu murongo wa Kay@@ ib@@ anda. U Bubiligi n’u Bufaransa byabaye inshuti ze z’@@ akad@@ asohoka ndetse inkunga bag@@ eneraga u Rwanda zir@@ ushaho kwiyongera. Umwami Ba@@ ud@@ ou@@ in yakoze ibishoboka byose mu guha inkunga Habyarimana yo kurwanya FPR Inkotanyi Umwami Ba@@ ud@@ ou@@ in w’u Bubiligi yabaye inshuti ikomeye ya Habyarimana kugeza ubwo FPR Inkotanyi yatangizaga urugamba rwo Kwibohora mu Ukwakira 1990, agah@@ atira Guverinoma ye gufasha Habyarimana. Mu gitabo "@@ A Th@@ r@@ one in Brus@@ sel@@ s: Brit@@ ain, the Sa@@ x@@ e-@@ C@@ ob@@ ur@@ g@@ s and the Belg@@ ian@@ isation of Eur@@ ope cyanditswe na Paul Bel@@ i@@ ë@@ n@@ ", avuga ko ubwo Mobutu yatangiraga gut@@ akar@@ izwa icyizere mu myaka ya 1990, amaso Ba@@ ud@@ ou@@ in yay@@ ah@@ anze Habyarimana wari inshuti ye magara kandi amubon@@ amo gukomeza isura y’u Bubiligi mu Karere. Icyo gitabo kivuga ko ubwo Umwami Ba@@ ud@@ ou@@ in y@@ ing@@ ingaga umwe mu bam@@ inisitiri ngo batange ubufasha kuri Habyarimana ahang@@ ane na FPR Inkotanyi, hari aho yageze arar@@ ira. Byaje kurangira Guverinoma y’u Bubiligi yemeye gutanga abasirikare basaga 500 bo gufasha ingabo za Habyarimana ku rugamba. Mu muhango wo gushyingura umwami Ba@@ ud@@ ou@@ in muri Kanama 1993, Perezida Habyarimana yashim@@ agije cyane nyakwigend@@ era. Yagize ati “@@ Umwami Ba@@ ud@@ ou@@ in kuri twese Abanyarwanda yari ikimenyets@@ o, akaba inkingi y’@@ ubwigenge bwacu n’@@ ikiraro gihuza Abanyarwanda n’@@ Abab@@ il@@ igi. Ntabwo yigeze ar@@ ekera aho kuduh@@ angay@@ ikira, ntabwo tuz@@ ibagirwa uburyo yahoraga atit@@ wa@@ yeh@@ o.” Kuba umurongo w’u Bubiligi kandi war@@ akomeje kubahirizwa mu Rwanda rwa nyuma y’@@ ubwigenge, biva ku buryo biy@@ eg@@ erezaga cyane umutegetsi wese ug@@ iyeho. Nyuma y’@@ ihirikwa rya Kay@@ ib@@ anda, mu bajyanama ba Perezida Habyarimana hari harimo D@@ ub@@ ois na Guy Log@@ i@@ est bagejeje Kayibanda ku butegetsi. Imashini z@@ ipima Virusi ya SIDA zigiye kwifashishwa mu gupima COVID-19 Abashakashatsi banyuranye ku ndwara ya Covid-19, bavuga ko imwe mu ngamba yafasha gukumira ikwirakwizwa ry’@@ icyo cyorezo harimo ko abaturage benshi bap@@ im@@ wa, bakamenya uko bah@@ agaze, bagakomeza n’izindi ngamba zo kwirinda. Mu Rwanda hamaze iminsi h@@ apimwa abantu barenze 1000 ku munsi, ariko ngo hari gahunda yo kongera umubare w’@@ abap@@ imwa ku munsi. Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyita ku Buz@@ ima, Dr. Sabin Nsanz@@ imana, avuga ko bagiye kwifashisha izindi mashini zari zisanzwe z@@ ipima ubwandu bwa SIDA mu gupima Covid-19. Yagize ati “Tur@@ ashaka kwifashisha izi mashini ziri mu ntara zitandukanye, kandi tur@@ abikora vuba. Imashini twatang@@ iranye d@@ upima Covid-19 na zo zimaze kwik@@ uba kabiri ariko abakeneye gupimwa na bo bar@@ iyongera umunsi ku w@@ und@@ i”. Dr. Nsanzimana avuga ko ubushobozi nk’ubu but@@ aza mu munsi umwe, ariko ko buri munsi hari icy@@ iyongeraho mu bushobozi bwo gup@@ ima. Avuga ko hari gahunda yo kwegera abap@@ im@@ wa, ibizamini big@@ akorerwa hirya no hino mu gihugu bitabaye ngombwa ko byose biz@@ anwa muri Laboratwari nkuru i Kigali. Harategurwa kandi kongera ibigo byakira abarwayi ba Covid-19, by@@ unganira ikigo cya Kanyinya n’icya Nyamata, mu gihe imibare y’@@ abandura yakw@@ iyongera. Dr. Nsanzimana avuga ko uko abantu benshi basohoka mu ngo bajya mu mirimo iny@@ uranye, ibyago byo kwandura by@@ iyongera. Ati “@@ Imibare iramutse yiyongereye tudafite aho tu@@ bashyira byaba ari imbogam@@ izi. Ni yo mpamvu tuba dufite itsinda rik@@ urikirana rireba iyo m@@ ibare, rig@@ ategura n’aho gushyira abarw@@ aye, ku buryo hari umubare biha wagera hag@@ afungurwa ahandi ho ku@@ bashyir@@ a. Birashoboka ko umubare wag@@ abanuka hakagira aho tuba duf@@ unz@@ e”. Akomeza avuga ko kugeza ubu ah@@ av@@ urirwa abantu ari hab@@ iri, kandi ko hag@@ ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abandi, ariko hategurwa n’ahandi bajyanwa babaye benshi. Kugeza ubu abanduye Covid-19, bar@@ avurwa bag@@ akira kandi kugeza ubu nta murwayi ur@@ icwa na Covid-19 mu Rwanda. Inzira y’@@ inzit@@ ane n’ubuzima bug@@ oranye umwami Yuhi Musinga yanyuzemo Imyaka iras@@ atira 7@@ 6, Umwami Yuhi V Musinga atanze kuko yatanze ku wa 25 Ukuboza 194@@ 4, atangiye mu buhung@@ iro, i M@@ oba muri Congo nyuma yo kwirukanwa mu Rwanda n’@@ Abab@@ il@@ igi, agas@@ imbuzwa umuhungu we Mutara III Rudah@@ ig@@ wa. Birashoboka ko Musinga ari umwe mu bami b’u Rwanda bayoboye mu bihe bibi cyane, nta bunararibonye bwo guhangana nabyo afite, ndetse n’ibiz@@ azane yah@@ anganye nabyo kandi inkur@@ uzi yabyo atar@@ ayig@@ izemo uruhare. Amateka agaragaza ko Musinga yabayeho mu bihe bibi kandi bikomeye, birimo amah@@ wa n’ubush@@ arire bwinshi, uhereye mu bwana bwe, kugeza at@@ anze. Yuhi Mus@@ inga, ni uwa Kigeli Rwabugili na Nyir@@ ay@@ uhi Kanj@@ og@@ era, ni umwe mu bana basaga cumi na batanu Rwabugili yabyaranye n’abagore be bagera kuri 20. Y@@ imye ingoma mu Ukuboza 18@@ 96 kugeza ku wa 12 Ugushyingo 193@@ 1. Rwabugili yashatse Kanj@@ ogera mu buryo butung@@ uranye, kuko se Rwak@@ agara, yam@@ uzanye ibwami nk’@@ uje kumut@@ ura Rwabug@@ ili, biza kurangira abaye umwe mu bagore bwa Rwabug@@ ili, ndetse w’@@ ink@@ und@@ w@@ akazi kuruta abandi. Rwabugili yashatse Kanj@@ ogera nyuma y’urupfu rwa nyina Mur@@ or@@ un@@ kw@@ ere, wapfuye urw’@@ akag@@ amb@@ ane, igihe cyo k@@ umwer@@ era kigeze barag@@ uriza umugore ugomba kweza Rwabugiri nk’uko amategeko y’@@ ubwiru yabiteg@@ any@@ aga, inz@@ uzi zerekana Kanj@@ og@@ era. Ubukwe bwa Kanj@@ ogera bwabaye ah@@ asaga mu wa 18@@ 7@@ 9, b@@ ubera ku Ng@@ ara za Bumbogo bwa Gasabo ( ubu ni mu Kagali ka Ng@@ ara mu Murenge wa Bumbogo wo mu Karere ka Gasab@@ o). Abandi bagore ba mbere uko ari batatu bari barat@@ esh@@ erejwe icyizere no kubeshya bag@@ atuma inzirakarengane z@@ ipf@@ a. Nguko uko Kanj@@ ogera yagiriwe icyizere yinjira mu buzima bwa Rwabugiri atyo. Mu mvugo ivun@@ ag@@ uye, Yuhi V Musinga wari ufite igis@@ ingizo cya Rug@@ wiz@@ akurinda ni umwe mu bami b’u Rwanda wahuye n’@@ ins@@ anganya mu buzima kurusha benshi, akaba umwami was@@ uzug@@ uwe bikabije cyane kurusha abandi bami bose, umwami was@@ imb@@ utse urupfu incuro nyinshi kurusha abandi. Ni we mwami wa mbere mu Rwanda wat@@ unze amafaranga aturutse i Burayi. Ni na we wa mbere wize amasomo azanywe n’abaz@@ ungu. Y@@ igish@@ waga na mwarimu Laurent Nduh@@ ura amusanga mu ngoro ye i Nyanza. Musinga yumvaga neza igis@@ wahili akamenya amwe mu magambo y’@@ ikid@@ age, ku buryo atari akeneye umus@@ em@@ uzi igihe yavuganaga n’abaz@@ ungu. Mu myaka ye 35 yamaze ku butegetsi, mu Rwanda imbere habayemo ibitero 38 by’ingabo zifite imbunda ziyobowe n’abaz@@ ungu, abarwanyi ari abanyamahanga bahanganye n’abany@@ arwanda. Ahagana ku ndunduro y’ubuzima bwe, Musinga yaba yar@@ afunzwe incuro zirenga eshatu, muri za kasho z’@@ abazungu i Cyangugu ,@@ i Uv@@ ira, n’i M@@ oba muri Congo. Uko byatangiye Abat@@ ar@@ ishimiye uko Rwabugiri ar@@ ongoye umukobwa wo mu Ab@@ ega, barat@@ eranye bafata umugambi wo kumubuza kubyara umwana w@@ azaba umwami. Umuhungu we w’imfura witwaga Mun@@ ana yam@@ ubyaye ah@@ asaga mu wa 188@@ 0 amaze kuvuka bashaka uko bamur@@ oga bir@@ aban@@ anira, amaze kugira imyaka itanu baramw@@ iba baramut@@ wara araz@@ imira burundu. Ubwo hari nko mu mwaka wa 188@@ 3. Mun@@ ana bamut@@ waye Kanj@@ ogera amaze igihe git@@ oya abyaye Mus@@ inga. Rwabugiri yamenyeshejwe iyo nkuru nziza y’@@ ivuka rya Musinga ari mu gitero cy’i Min@@ ove mu karere ka Mas@@ isi, ku musozi witwa Kam@@ ur@@ ons@@ i. Hashize igihe gito Rwabugiri yongera kubona inkuru im@@ umenyesha ko Mun@@ ana yapfuye urupfu rut@@ am@@ enyekanye. Nyuma yaho Kanj@@ ogera yaje kuva i Gis@@ eke na Nyagis@@ enyi ajya gutura i Mw@@ ima wa Nyanza. Mu mwaka wa 188@@ 6 icyo gihe Musinga yari afite imyaka itatu, ba bantu batishimiye ko Kanj@@ ogera yaby@@ ara umwana uzaba umwami akagira umugab@@ ekazi uvuye mu muryango w’@@ Ab@@ ega, barongera batuma abagizi ba nabi, biba Musinga baramut@@ wara. Musinga bam@@ ushyize mu gis@@ eke kinini cyane bam@@ uts@@ indag@@ iramo, ku buryo atashoboraga kw@@ inyag@@ ambur@@ a. Bam@@ uny@@ urana ku may@@ aga ya Butare bamujyanye kumur@@ oha mu Kanyar@@ u. Kubera kun@@ anirwa, bar@@ atuye barar@@ uh@@ uka, agatotsi k@@ abatwaye haza abajura bavuye kwiba inka. Bar@@ abak@@ anze bar@@ iruka ya nk@@ angara bayita aho, abo bajura baray@@ ikorera bay@@ ijyana iwabo, bay@@ ipfund@@ uye bas@@ angamo umwana w’@@ umush@@ ishe. Bam@@ ubajije uko yitwa ababwira ko yitwa Mus@@ inga. Avuga amazina y’ababyeyi be, baby@@ umvise bagira ubwoba, kuko bumvise ari umwana w’@@ igikom@@ ang@@ oma. Nyuma yaho biga ubwenge bwo kujya kubivuga ib@@ wam@@ i. Bag@@ ezeyo Rwabugili ar@@ abak@@ ira, bamubwira ko bator@@ aguye umwana we, bamus@@ obanurira uko bamubon@@ ye. Amaze kubyumva abat@@ egeka kujya kubibwira Kanj@@ og@@ era. Kanj@@ ogera na we amaze kubyumva yabat@@ egetse kujya kumuh@@ eka bakam@@ umuz@@ anira. Musinga baramuh@@ eka bam@@ ugarura i Nyanza. Nyuma yaho Kanj@@ ogera yongeye kubyara abandi bana babiri, umukobwa n’umuh@@ ungu, bose bar@@ abar@@ oga bapfa bakiri bato cyane. Musinga yakuze ari wenyine nta wundi muvandimwe bavukana kuri nyina, uretse abandi bana Rwabugili yari yarab@@ yaranye n’abandi bagore. Aha niho agahinda n’uburakari bwa Kanj@@ ogera byatang@@ iriye. Kuba yari we mugore muto, umugore mwiza byah@@ ebuj@@ e, umugore wiz@@ ewe kandi uk@@ unzwe, akagira abanzi bamuh@@ ekuye incuro eshatu zose, byamuteye umutima mubi. Mu buto bwa Musinga bavuga ko yari umusore w’@@ ingeso nziza, ukunda bakuru be na barumuna be bakomoka kuri se, kandi agakunda abaturage cyane. Ngo yakundaga int@@ ore, agakunda umukino wo kum@@ asha, ubundi agakunda ibitaramo by’@@ amah@@ amba, n’amateka ya ba sek@@ ur@@ uza. Itorero ry’@@ intore za Musinga ry@@ itor@@ ezaga i Nyanza ahitwa mu Kag@@ uri. Kubera ko abir@@ u nabo babaga bakomeye kandi bazi amabanga yose y’ib@@ wami, bashoboye kumvisha Rwabugili uko Umug@@ ab@@ ekazi ataz@@ ava mu bwoko bw’@@ Ab@@ ega, bituma bemeza ko Rut@@ al@@ indwa ariwe uzaba umwami uz@@ amus@@ imbura. Ibyo yabikoze ku itariki 22 Ukuboza 188@@ 5, umuhango wo kumw@@ im@@ ika ubera muri Nyaruguru ahitwa mu Ng@@ eli. Muri uwo muhango wabereye mu Ng@@ eli, hari umuhanzi w’umus@@ izi witwaga Ng@@ urus@@ u waz@@ im@@ ije abwira Rwabugili ko ibyo akoze binyuranyije n’amategeko. Ati “Nt@@ aho byabaye gutsindira umwami umugore uh@@ etse umuhungu waby@@ aye@@ ”. Rwabugili arar@@ akara aramusubiza ati “N@@ on@@ eho si ugus@@ iga ni ukw@@ iter@@ era mu mata nk’@@ is@@ az@@ i” Koko kera kabaye Musinga yageze aho aba umwami bigoranye cyane, kuko by@@ aciye mu ih@@ irik@@ abut@@ egetsi bwa Rut@@ al@@ indwa ryabereye ku Ruc@@ unsh@@ u. Ku ngoma ye yahuye n’ibir@@ ushya byinshi, birimo abarw@@ anyije ubutegetsi bwe bamuz@@ iza ko yabw@@ ambuye Rut@@ al@@ indwa wim@@ itswe n’ubw@@ ir@@ u, nawe bikam@@ ubabaza cyane kuko nta ruhare yabig@@ izemo. Ingoma ye yagize ibihe bikomeye byinshi kandi bibi mu mateka y’u Rwanda, kuko inkingi za mwamba zari zis@@ igas@@ iye ubuzima bw’igihugu, zash@@ enywe ku ngoma ye, cyane cyane mu bihe by’@@ Abakor@@ oni b’@@ Abab@@ il@@ igi. Kugeza ubwo bwam@@ uciye ku ngoma ku wa 12 Ugushyingo 19@@ 31, nuko az@@ ungurwa ku ngoma n’umuhungu we Rudah@@ igwa, afata izina ry’@@ ubwami rya Mutara III Rudah@@ ig@@ wa. Umwami Yuhi V Musinga mu ntebe ya kijyambere na nyirarume Kabare (@@ ifoto yahawe iz@@ urash@@ usho na Alphonse K@@ irim@@ ob@@ ene@@ cy@@ o) Umwami Yuhi V Musinga ari kumwe na nyirarume Kabare (@@ ifoto yahawe iz@@ urash@@ usho na Alphonse K@@ irim@@ ob@@ ene@@ cy@@ o) Umwami Musinga ubwo yari mu birori mu 1930 Umwami Musinga asuhuza igikom@@ ang@@ om@@ akazi El@@ ena d'@@ A@@ ost@@ a wo mu Butaliyani Umwami Yuhi V Musinga imbere y’ib@@ endera Abadage bakoreshaga mu bihugu bak@@ olon@@ ije (@@ ifoto yahawe iz@@ urash@@ usho na Alphonse K@@ irim@@ ob@@ ene@@ cy@@ o)
A@@ gahinda k’ Umunyarwandakazi wab@@ enzwe n’ umusore kubera amateka ya Jenoside Mbabazi Jane (s@@ iyo mazina ye) ni Umukobwa uri mu kigero cy’ imyaka 25 yatanze ubuhamya b@@ ubabaje bw’ amateka yanyuzemo bitewe n’ uko yavutse ku mubyeyi wafashwe ku ngufu muri Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi. Umuhungu bakundanye yamenye ko yavutse muri ubwo buryo aram@@ ub@@ enga, yavuze ukuntu yasimb@@ utse imfu nyinshi amarira ab@@ unga mu maso y’ abari bamuteze amatwi. Ni umwe mu bana benshi bavutse ku babyeyi bafashwe ku ngufu n’ Iter@@ ahamwe mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi. Mbabazi, muri 2010 yiga mu mwaka wa 6 y’ amashuri abanza nibwo yamenye ko yavutse muri ubwo buryo. Ngo agiye gukora ikizamini cya Leta gisoza amashuri abanza byabaye ngombwa ko ku if@@ ishi yuz@@ uzaho amazina y’ ababyeyi bombi. Abaj@@ ije nyina amazina ya Se amubwira atariyo kuko nawe atari ay@@ azi neza. Mbabazi ati “Ntabwo yari kumbwira ko atay@@ azi. Naje gukomeza kubaza nsanga amazina yambwiye ari ay@@ ’ umubyeyi we (@@ Papa we@@ )@@ ” Mbabazi avuga ko yakomeje kubaza abantu bazi nyina, kugira ngo amenye ukuri kuko iyo yabaz@@ aga nyina, nyina yahitaga ahung@@ abana. Ku if@@ ishi yakoresheje ayo nyina yamubwiye ariko akomeza gushaka impamvu nyina atazi uw@@ amuteye inda. Ngo yaje kubimenya kuko yagendaga yumva abantu bamuh@@ imba amazina atari aye bikamutera ipfun@@ we. “K@@ umva ko nt@@ afite aho neg@@ amiye bigenda b@@ ingiraho ingaruka nyinshi mu buzima. N@@ kig@@ a nabi rimwe na rimwe sin@@ ige kubera icyo kibazo, ariko nkomeza guhangana naby@@ o” Avuga ko yagiye ahura n’ ibikomere byinshi mu buzima. Ati “N@@ anone nkagira igikomere cyo guhabwa akato muri sos@@ i@@ ete nabaga nd@@ im@@ o” Mbabazi avuga mu buzima bwe yahuye n’ ingaruka nyinshi zirimo no kuba nyina yarah@@ oraga arwara ihung@@ abana. Yaje kumenyana n’ umuryango witwa Hope bakajya bamug@@ anir@@ iza. Muri uyu muryango yahuriyemo n’ abana bavutse ku babyeyi bafite ubwandu bwa SIDA n’ abav@@ utse ku babyeyi bakoze jenoside n’ abay@@ ikor@@ ewe. “B@@ yagiye b@@ ink@@ omeza kuko nabashije kumenya ko atari njye njyenyine ufite icyo kibazo mu gihugu@@ ”. Iyo nyina yamubon@@ aga yagiraga ihungabana bitewe no kumubona mu isura y’ umuntu wamuh@@ ohot@@ eye. Akomeza ubuhamya bwe agira ati “N@@ aje guhura n’ umuntu tugirana ubushuti busanzwe, kuko nubwo n@@ avutse gutya ariko ndi umuntu kandi nagombaga gukora ibyo abantu bazima bakora numvaga ko nanjye mfite uburenganzira bwo kubaho nk’ uko abandi baba@@ yeho. Yar@@ abim@@ enye, abimenya hari ukundi kuntu byagenze mfite inda ye ,@@ aravuga ngo ntabwo nari nziko ari uko byagenze nta kintu na kimwe nshobora gukom@@ ezanya nawe umeze uk@@ o”. Ibi nabyo ngo byababaje Mbabazi kuko yumvaga ari ubundi buzima bubi agiye guhangana n@@ abwo. Ibi kandi ngo byakom@@ erekeje nyina kurushaho ariko umwana ahangana nabyo kuko yari afite imbaraga zo guhangana n’ ibibazo. Ati “Nari maze kumenya ko nta kintu na kimwe mfite cyo guhindura ku byabaye nk@@ ishakamo imbaraga zo guhangana naby@@ o”. Ibyo gutwita no kub@@ engwa byabaye yitegura kujya kaminuza. Umwana we muri 2019 yujuje umwaka. Yaje gushaka amakuru kuri se kuko yumvaga hari abantu bahunze bahung@@ uka. Muri urwo rugendo yahuye n’ abantu bamubwira ko Se ari muri Kenya aza gusanga ari abashaka kum@@ ushim@@ uta bakamug@@ irira nabi ar@@ abir@@ eka. Ati “@@ Papa igihe nari muk@@ eneye sin@@ amubon@@ ye, numva ngomba gukomeza ndi uwo nd@@ iwe mu ruhare rw@@ anjye@@ ” Uyu mukobwa yari yariy@@ ise ‘@@ Urwibutso rw’ amateka mabi kuri nyin@@ a’ kuko yamubon@@ agamo isura y’ iby@@ abaye. Gusa ngo ashimira nyina wah@@ anganye n’ ubuzima bubi kugira ngo ‘@@ umwana ab@@ eho@@ ’. Nyina amaze kub@@ ohoka nibwo yatangiye kumubwira amwe mu mateka akomeye yanyuzemo kubera gufatwa ku ngufu no guterwa inda. Ayo mateka arimo ko umuryango we wamw@@ anze, ukajya ushaka kumuha imiti ngo iyo nda iv@@ emo. S@@ ibyo gusa kuko ngo n’ igihe Mbabazi yari yaravutse yamus@@ igaga yabonye akar@@ aka umuryango we ugashaka kuj@@ ugunya uyu mwana. Mbabazi mu buhamya bwe avuga ko ashimira nyina wam@@ urw@@ aniye ishaka, ag@@ ashimangira ko ibyo nyina yakoraga atari uko yari amw@@ anze ahubwo ari uko yari atar@@ akira ibyam@@ ubayeho. Mbabazi ubu bigaragara ko yifitiye icyizere cyo kubaho. Ash@@ imira imiryango yamug@@ anirije irimo Av@@ ega, Hope n’ indi. Ubwo yatangaga ubu buhamya hari mu nama irimo na Jeannette Kagame. U Rwanda rw@@ ifatanyije n’Isi mu kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe kuboneza urubyaro Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ibinyujije mu Kigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima (RB@@ C), yifatanyije n’Isi yose kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe kuboneza urubyaro. Uyu munsi wizih@@ ijwe kuri uyu wa 25 Nzeri 2020, mu nsanganyamatsiko igira iti “K@@ ubon@@ eza urubyaro ni uburenganzira bwa muntu, ni amahitamo ya@@ we.” RBC ku bufatanye n’Umuryango Ih@@ orere Munyarwanda (@@ IM@@ R@@ O) n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima bw’@@ Imyororokere (UN@@ FP@@ A), yizihije umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe kuboneza urubyaro. Uyu munsi usanzwe wizihizwa ku wa 26 Nzeri buri mwaka kuva mu 2007, kuri iyi nshuro wizih@@ ijwe hubahirizwa ingamba zo kwirinda COVID-19. Umuyobozi muri RBC uhagarariye Ishami ryita ku Buzima bw’@@ Imy@@ ororok@@ ere, Ser@@ uc@@ aca Jo@@ ël@@ , yibukije Abanyarwanda ko kuboneza urubyaro ari uburenganzira bwa muntu kandi ko ari amahitamo ya buri wese. Yagize “Tw@@ ifuje kongera gukangurira Abanyarwanda kwitabira serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro kugira ngo babashe kubyara abo bashoboye kurera ndetse hirindwe n’@@ inda zit@@ ateganijwe mu rubyiruko. Nubwo imibare y’abagabo bitabira kuboneza urubyaro hari aba@@ bisaba aho gufunga abagore babo, gusa baracyari bake. T@@ ubon@@ eyeho gusaba abagabo bose kwitabira iyi gahunda kuko nabo ibar@@ eba@@ .” Yongeyeho ko ababyeyi bagomba kuba hafi y’abana babo bak@@ abasobanurira ibijyanye n’ubuzima bw’imyororok@@ ere. Ati “@@ Twebwe mu nzego z’ubuzima akenshi abangavu tu@@ babona bamaze gusama ariko ababyeyi bo bahorana nabo kuva bakiri bato. Bagomba rero kubaba hafi bak@@ abagira inama bakabaha n’amakuru yose yerekeye ubuzima bwabo bw’imyororok@@ ere.” Umuyobozi w’Umuryango uteg@@ amiya kuri Leta, IM@@ R@@ O, Mwan@@ an@@ awe Aimable, yagaragaje ko mu cyiciro cy’@@ abari mu myaka yo hagati ya 15 na 20 bag@@ ihura n’ibibazo byo kutabona serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro, bitewe no kuba batar@@ abis@@ obanukirwa neza no kuba batar@@ abasha kuba baz@@ ibona ku bigo by’@@ urubyiruko. Yakomeje avuga ko bazakomeza gukora ubuvugizi kugira ngo urubyiruko r@@ ubashe kubona izo serivisi bir@@ w@@ oroheye. Ati “Abantu benshi baracy@@ afata kuboneza urubyaro nk’@@ ibintu by’@@ abashakanye gusa, ibi bik@@ abera urubyiruko imbogamizi mu kubona izo serivisi, haracyari kandi n’imbogamizi ku bafatanyabikorwa ngo bash@@ ore amikoro muri izo serivisi kugira ngo urubyiruko rube rw@@ az@@ ibona mu buryo bworoshye nko ku bigo by’@@ urubyiruk@@ o.” Mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe ku bakoresha serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro mu mwaka wa 2014-@@ 2015, ab@@ angana na 5@@ 3% bakoresha uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro mu buryo bwose naho abakoresha uburyo bw’@@ imiti bari kuri 48@@ %. A@@ babon@@ eza urubyaro bakimara kubyara bageze kuri 53@@ %. Mu gihe kuboneza urubyaro mu Rwanda biri hejuru ya 50 %, intego ni ukug@@ era nibura kuri 6@@ o % mu 202@@ 4. Ubu umugore w’Umunyarwanda abarirwa abana bane, intego akaba ari ukug@@ era ku bana babiri mu 20@@ 50. Mu 196@@ 6, abaturarwanda bageraga kuri miliyoni eshatu. Mu 1988 u Rwanda rwari rut@@ uwe n’abaturage miliyoni esh@@ eshatu, mu gihe mu 2020 rut@@ uwe n’abasaga miliyoni 12. Ibimenyetso byerekana ko bazakomeza kwiyongera ku buryo mu 20@@ 32 bazaba bageze kuri miliyoni 16.@@ 9 mu gihe baba biyongereye cyane, cyangwa miliyoni 15.@@ 4 baramutse babon@@ eje urubyaro. Abitabiriye ibirori byo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe kuboneza urubyaro bari b@@ ubahirije amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19 Umuyobozi w’Umuryango uteg@@ amiya kuri Leta, IM@@ R@@ O, Mwan@@ an@@ awe Aimable, yagaragaje ko mu cyiciro cy’@@ abari mu myaka yo hagati ya 15 na 20 bag@@ ihura n’ibibazo byo kutabona serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro U Rwanda rw@@ ifatanyije n’Isi mu kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe kuboneza urubyaro
Nyuma y'@@ ingamba zo kurwanya imibu itorero ry'@@ Abanyeshuri ryas@@ ubuk@@ uwe Kuri uyu wa mbere tariki ya 11 Mutarama 2016 ni bwo abanyeshuri barangije umwaka wa gatandatu w'@@ amashuli yisumbuye batangiye itorero ry'@@ igihugu. Aba banyeshuli baravuga ko bishimiye kuba bagiye mu itorero kandi ko biteze kuzar@@ yung@@ uk@@ iramo byinshi bizabafasha mu buzima busanzwe. byiganjemo kirazira n'@@ indangagaciro z'@@ umunyarwanda. Bamwe muri abo banyeshuri baganiriye na M@@ akurik@@ i, bavuga ko ubundi bari basanzwe bahabwa amasomo asanzwe yo mu ishuli azabafasha kuz@@ ashaka ibibat@@ unga mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi ubwo bazaba batangiye ubuzima busanzwe. Aba banyeshuli bavuga ko bat@@ ajyaga bigishwa byimbitse ibijyanye na kirazira n'@@ indangagaciro z'@@ umunyarwanda no gukunda igihugu , ari nabyo biteze kuz@@ ungukira muri iri t@@ orero. Biz@@ an@@ atuma umuntu yahita ajya mu gisirikare cyangwa mu gipolisi kugirango abone uko arinda umutekano w'@@ igihugu@@ ." Odette Nyir@@ atabar@@ o yagize ati: "N@@ ajyaga numva ngo intore nt@@ iganya ishaka ibisubizo, none ngiye gutozwa nanjye mbe intore izi indangagaciro z'@@ umuco nyarwanda. Nit@@ eze ko nz@@ ah@@ akura uburyo bwo kwihangira imirimo ndetse no kubana n'abandi amahor@@ o." Gusa nubwo abanyeshuri bishimiye kuba bitabiriye itorero, kuri ubu urebye aho bazajya barara nta nzit@@ iram@@ ibu zihari ndetse nta n'ubwo abo banyeshuri bigeze basabwa kuz@@ iz@@ anira, kandi ikibazo cy'@@ um@@ ubu aricyo cyari cyatumye igihe itorero ryagombaga gutangir@@ iraho kig@@ izwa inyuma. Yagize ati: "Kuba nt@@ anz@@ it@@ iram@@ ibu zirimo cyangwa se ngo tube twar@@ az@@ ibat@@ umye si ikibazo kuko tw@@ ateye umuti wica uduk@@ oko, ndetse n'@@ imib@@ u." Abakina filimi mu Rwanda bakwiye kwirinda gushaka inyungu za vuba kugira ngo batere imbere Umukinnyi wa filime wo mu gihugu cya Nigeria, Ram@@ sey N@@ ou@@ ah avuga ko kugira ngo abakina filimi mu Rwanda batere imbere bakwiye kubanza gukunda umwuga wa bo, kandi bakirinda gushaka inyungu za vuba. Ibi yabivuze mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abafite aho bahurira na sinema mu Rwanda tariki 06@@ /10/201@@ 4 ku cyicaro cya minisiteri y'@@ umuco na Sip@@ oro. Yagize ati "@@ iyo ufite icyo ukora ukag@@ iteg@@ amo amafaranga vuba vuba nta ntambwe ushobora gut@@ era, ahubwo has@@ abwa gukunda icyo ukora kuko amafaranga ava mu kug@@ ikund@@ a". Ram@@ sey N@@ ou@@ ah yasabye abakinnyi ba filimi mu Rwanda kud@@ ashaka inyungu za vuba. Mu rwego rwo gusaba inama Ram@@ sey N@@ ou@@ ah umaze kuba igih@@ ange muri sin@@ ema, abakinnyi ba filime mu Rwanda bitabiriye icyo kiganiro bagaragaje ibibazo byinshi bahura na byo muri uwo mwuga birimo kutagira amahugurwa ahagije mu gukina ndetse n'ikibazo cy'@@ ibikoresho bitajyanye n'@@ igihe. Minisitiri w'@@ umuco na Siporo Amb. Joseph Habineza yashimiye abasanzwe bakora filimi mu Rwanda kubera umurava n'@@ umuhate bagarag@@ aza, kandi anab@@ izeza ko minisiteri izakomeza kwita ku bakora sinema mu Rwanda. Nawe yabasabye gukunda umwuga wabo ababwira ko baw@@ ukoze neza w@@ abateza imbere ndetse n'u Rwanda imbere muri rusange. Minisitiri Habineza yijeje abakora sinema nyarwanda ko minisiteri ayoboye izakomeza kubaba hafi. Uyu mukinnyi wa filime w'@@ umunya Nigeria yan@@ abas@@ obanuriye abitabiriye icyo kiganiro gahunda ya filimi ari gutegura ku Rwanda yit@@ wa: "@@ Love b@@ re@@ we@@ d in Rwandan Pot@@ " (@@ Urukundo rw@@ engewe mu kab@@ indi ka Kin@@ yarwand@@ a) anasaba abakinnyi ba filime mu Rwanda kuz@@ akorana na we. Yavuze ko iyo filimi iz@@ agaragaza isura nyayo y'u Rwanda mu ruhando mpuzamahanga kuko izakoreshwa mu mas@@ erukiramuco atandukanye. Yagize ati "Iyi filimi iz@@ agaragaza Umuco w'u Rwanda n'uwa Nigeria, ariko igice kinini kiz@@ akinirwa mu Rwanda (@@ 90@@ %) naho 10% g@@ ikin@@ irwe muri Nigeria haz@@ akoresh@@ wamo ururimi rw'@@ icyongereza n'@@ ikin@@ yarwanda. Nz@@ akenera gukorana namwe cyan@@ e". Abafite aho bahurira na sinema nyarwanda bari bitabiriye ari benshi. Uyu mukinnyi yaje mu Rwanda ku butumire bwa minisiteri y'@@ umuco na Siporo, imwe mu mpamvu yatum@@ ijwe ikaba ari ukugira ngo atange ubujyanama ku bakinnyi ba filime mu Rwanda. Biteganyijwe ko azongera kuganira n'abafite aho bahurira na sinema nyarwanda tariki 09@@ /10/201@@ 4 mu kiganiro kizabera ku cyicaro cya minisiteri y'@@ umuco na siporo. Cyprien M. Ngendahimana
Cam@@ era, indi ngabo mu gucunga umutekano muri Kigali Yanditswe kuya 22@@ -05-@@ 2016 saa 12@@ :3@@ 7@@ ' na Ntakirutimana Deus Umujyi wa Kigali wamamaye hose ko uhiga iyindi mu mut@@ ekano, w@@ ongereye uburyo budasanzwe bwo gutuma nta cy@@ asha k@@ iw@@ uhind@@ anya, umutuzo n'@@ ituze bigakomeza kureshya abanyamahanga. Ntawe ug@@ ish@@ idikanya ubush@@ ongore n'@@ ubuk@@ aka ku bijyanye n'umutekano w'u Rwanda rus@@ agurira n'@@ amahanga. Ni cya kir@@ ezi u Rwanda rw@@ ambaye kuko uw@@ abuze amahoro niwe umenya akamaro n'@@ ibyiza byayo. U Rwanda ruz@@ wiho umutekano nta buryo rut@@ awus@@ ig@@ asira kugeza ku mus@@ ok@@ oro waw@@ o. Ubwo imijyi ikomeye nayo kugira ngo ibe yitwa ko hari byinshi ishyiramo imbaraga birimo gucunga umutekano n'ibindi. Urugero rwa hafi ni uko raporo yasohowe na televiziyo ya CC@@ TV ibigarag@@ aza, mu mijyi yo mu Bwongereza abaturage 11 baba bafite byibura Camera imwe i@@ bakurikir@@ ana. Hirya no hino ku Isi, naho usanga abakoze ibyaha bag@@ aragazwa n'izo Cam@@ era. Camera nshya i Kigali I Kigali h@@ aherutse kubera inama mpuzamahanga yiga ku bukungu bwa Afurik@@ a(@@ World Economic Forum@@ ), mu buryo budasanzwe. U Rwanda ruzwi ku bijyanye no gukoresha ikoranabuhanga rwari rwar@@ yifashishije mu mf@@ uruka zose. Hagati ya Serena Hotel n'ikigo cy'@@ ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe gukwirakwiza amaraso, uh@@ abona camera zidasanzwe zic@@ unga umutekano ziz@@ eng@@ urutsa nk'@@ ush@@ ushanya uruz@@ iga, bivuze ko zic@@ unga mu mpande zose. Mu bwoko butari bum@@ enyerewe mu Rwanda, izi camera abaz@@ ibona bavuga ko zid@@ asanzwe, ziyongera ku zisanzwe mu mahoteli atandukanye n'izindi ziba aho inama zib@@ era, ndetse n'izindi ziri hirya no hino ku mihanda zikomeje gutanga umusaruro mu bijyanye no kubungabunga umutekano. Mu Rwanda hari abatanga ruswa bafatwa n'izo cam@@ era, nk'@@ ibikorwa n'izo muri Ec@@ os@@ se, aho 95% by'@@ ibimenyetso ku bakekwaho ibyaha by'@@ ubwicanyi byagaragajwe na Camera muri icyo gihugu mu mwaka wa 2009. Muri 2013 muri Kigali h@@ akwirakwijwe Camera Muri Gicurasi 2013, mu kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye n'@@ Umuvugizi w'ishami rya Polisi rishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda, Supt Jean Marie Vianney Ndush@@ abandi, yavuze ko izo Camera zashyizweho ngo zik@@ us@@ anye amakuru polisi yajyaga itab@@ ona neza ku bibera mu muhanda. Muhanga: Abaf@@ unguwe by’agateganyo basabwe kwitwararika kuko batar@@ aba abere Urwego rw’@@ Ubushinjacyaha rur@@ asaba abar@@ ekuwe by’agateganyo muri kasho za RIB ko bagomba kwitwararika kuko gusubira icyaha byatuma bongera gufatwa bag@@ afungwa. Abaf@@ unguwe bahawe impapuro zikubiyemo amabwiriza baz@@ akurikiza Abaf@@ unguwe by’agateganyo kuri Sitasiyo ya RIB ya Nyamabuye ni 36 mu rwego rwo gushyira mu bikorwa icyemezo cy’@@ Umushinjacyaha mukuru cyo kugabanya ubucucike muri kasho za RIB hirya no hino mu Gihugu hagamijwe kwirinda ikwirakwizwa ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Ubushinjacyaha bw@@ ibukije abaf@@ unguwe by’agateganyo ko birinda ibyaha birimo ibyo bari bafungiwe by’umwihariko ibirebana n’amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe ajyanye no kwirinda Coronavirus. Bimwe mu byaha benshi bari guh@@ anirwa muri iyi minsi ni ug@@ ucuruza ut@@ ubar@@ i, gukora ingendo zitari ngombwa no kuva mu ngo nta mpamvu ifat@@ ika. Uhagarariye ubushinjacyaha nyuma yo gutanga inyandiko z@@ ifungura by’agateganyo abari kuri Sitasiyo ya Nyamabuye yavuze ko abaf@@ unguwe atari abere bityo ko gusubira ku byaha by@@ abaviramo kugar@@ urwa gufungwa. Agira ati, “Ntabwo mukwiye gutaha ngo mwir@@ are, mumenye ko mug@@ ikurikir@@ anweho ibyaha, mur@@ asabwa kwitwar@@ arika, tur@@ abar@@ ekuye ariko mus@@ ubiye mu byaha twabag@@ ar@@ ura, mw@@ itware neza mu mir@@ yang@@ o”. “@@ Abagore cyangwa abagabo mwah@@ ozaga abo mwashakanye ku nkeke mur@@ asabwa kugenda muk@@ umvikana na bo mug@@ akundana muk@@ ubaka neza ingo zanyu kuko nim@@ wongera n’ubundi muz@@ abih@@ anir@@ wa”. Inzego z’@@ Ubush@@ injacyaha, Ubugenzacyaha na Polisi zari z@@ itabiriye iki gikorwa, bas@@ obanurira abaf@@ unguwe uko bagomba kwitwara Ubushinjacyaha bwavuze ko abar@@ ekuwe bagomba kandi kwibuka gusubiza ibyo b@@ angije ariko bikaz@@ akorwa icyorezo cya Coronavirus kir@@ angiye, ari nabwo bazatangira kujya bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwitaba ubushinjacyaha nk’uko biri mu nyandiko bahawe. Bamwe mu baf@@ unguwe by’agateganyo bavuga ko bagiye kwisubiraho kuko amahirwe babonye batay@@ at@@ ekerez@@ aga, kandi ko igihe bari bamaze bafunze bari bamaze kwis@@ ubir@@ aho. Umugore wari ukurikiranyweho icyaha cy’@@ ubusambanyi avuga ko yari yasize umwana w’umwaka umwe kuko umugabo we utar@@ akundaga kuba iwe yamufashe asambana akavuga ko agiye kwisubiraho kandi akamusaba imbabazi kandi ntiy@@ ongere kubangamira umugabo we. Agira ati, “Nd@@ atashye ngiye kubasha kurera umwana wanjye, ndasaba imbabazi umuryango wanjye n’umugabo wanjye ko ngiye kumw@@ orohera ntazongera kumub@@ angam@@ ira, yang@@ ushije mu mutego kugira ngo abone ubutane mu mategeko kuko na we afite umugore mu Mujyi wa Kigal@@ i” Kar@@ amb@@ izi Evariste wari ufungiye gukubita umukobwa we insh@@ yi eshatu avuga ko agiye kwitwararika ntiy@@ ongere guhohotera umwana we. Agira ati, “M@@ aze gushy@@ ingira inshuro umunani sinzi uko nan@@ amuk@@ ub@@ ise, ntabwo nari nas@@ inze, s@@ ingira amah@@ ane, umukobwa wanjye asigaranye na musaza we ni bo nd@@ era gusa, ariko yant@@ utse kuri mama muk@@ ubita insh@@ yi eshatu aza kund@@ ega, ngiye kubana na we neza nk’umubyeyi nd@@ usheho kumuha uburere bwiz@@ a”. Avuga ko agiye kuguma mu rugo rwe akah@@ irira inka ze kandi ag@@ akurikiza amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19. Igikorwa cyo gufungura abakekwaho ibyaha byoroheje mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo kiri no kubera mu turere twa Ruhango, Nyanza na Kamonyi. Imb@@ uga nkoranyambaga mu gukwirakwiza indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina Ubushakashatsi buherutse gushyirwa ahagar@@ aga n'ishyirahamwe ry'@@ Abongereza bakurikirana iby'@@ indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina baravuga ko kuva umwaka ushize wa 2014 imibare y'abantu bandura indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina yiyong@@ ereye. Aba bashakashatsi bakagaragaza ko imbuga nkoranyam@@ am@@ baga z@@ abigizemo uruhare runini cyane biturutse ku guhind@@ agura inshuti. Aba bashakashatsi bo mu kigo cy'@@ Abongereza gik@@ urikirana uko ubwandu bw'@@ indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina buk@@ wirakw@@ ira, baravuga ko mu mwaka w' 2014 hagati ya 25 na 40 ku ijana bwari ubushuti bw@@ atangiriye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, aba bakaba biganjemo urubyiruko. Aba bashakashatsi bavuga ko izo nk@@ undo zigira uruhare mu gukwirakwiza byihuse indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina. Indwara bavuga zikomeje kugaragara ni s@@ if@@ il@@ isi na M@@ bur@@ ugu@@ .@@ Aba bahanga bakaba babur@@ ira abantu bavuga ko icyorezo cya SIDA mu minsi ya vuba aricyo kizaba kig@@ ezweho. Dr Peter Green@@ hous@@ e, umwe muri abo bashakashatsi b'@@ Abongereza aganira na BBC yagize ati"@@ Muri iki gihe biroroshye gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga ug@@ ahindura inshuti wari ufite, ariko uko byih@@ uta ni nako byihut@@ isha ubwandu , igih@@ angayikishije cyane n'uko turimo guk@@ oza imitwe y'@@ intoki ku cyorezo cya SID@@ A.@@ Niba abantu bahindura inshuti kenshi bagafata izindi zan@@ anduye ubwandu bwa SIDA byanze bikunze icyorezo cya SIDA vuba aha kir@@ aba cyas@@ akaye mu batuye isi. Nyamara Marie Cos@@ nar@@ d we si uko ab@@ ibona, avuga ko ukwiyongera ku izi ndwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina bitar@@ eb@@ erwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga gusa, ahubwo we asanga abantu baz@@ ikoresha bakagombye kwigishwa byimbitse uko izo ndwara zand@@ ura, bak@@ igishwa ibijyanye n'ubuzima bw'imy@@ ororok@@ ere, bakamenya inshingano zabo. Aba bashakashatsi ntibag@@ aragaza ibihugu cyangwa imigabane yibasiwe kurusha iyindi ariko bavuga ko urubyiruko arirwo rufite ibyago byinshi byo kwand@@ ura, ngo kuko ari rwo usanga rw@@ itabira g@@ ok@@ oresha imbuga nkoranyambaga cyane.
Polisi irasaba abatwara ibinyabiziga kwirinda impanuka za hato na hato Hafi ya buri munsi, nibura umut@@ urarwanda ah@@ itanwa n'@@ impanuka yo mu muhanda, ibintu bibabaje kandi bikwiye guhagar@@ ara, bikaba bisaba uruhare rwa buri wese mu barebwa n'iki kibaz@@ o; nk'uko bitangazwa na Polisi y'u Rwanda, ishami rishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda. I@@ nyinshi mu mpanuka zihitana abantu cyangwa zik@@ abamug@@ aza, ziba zatewe n'@@ uburangare bw'@@ abatwara ibinyabiziga, umuvuduko ukabije, gutwara ikinyabiziga bas@@ inze, rimwe na rimwe batazi neza amategeko y'umuhanda cyangwa se n'@@ ikinyabiziga ubw@@ acyo kit@@ ameze neza, ibi bikaba bikwiye kwamag@@ anwa big@@ ahagarara nk'uko polisi y'igihugu ibitangaza. Polisi y'igihugu itanga ingero nko ku itariki 23@@ /04/201@@ 3, aho mu turere dutandukanye tw'@@ igihugu hose habaye impanuka eshanu zahitanye umuntu umwe, abandi icyenda bag@@ akomereka bikomeye. Mu karere ka Rubavu mu murenge wa Rug@@ erero, igik@@ amyo cya ruk@@ urur@@ ana cyag@@ onganye n'@@ ip@@ ikip@@ iki yari itwawe n'uwitwa Hakizimana Patrick w'imyaka 48 y'amavuko wahise an@@ itaba Imana uwo mwanya, mu gihe uwari utwaye ikamyo we yahise aburirwa irengero. Yanavuze ko hamwe na hamwe ino mvura ituma imihanda ic@@ ika, ahandi hag@@ acika inkangu ku buryo biz@@ itira urujya n'uruza rw'@@ ibinyabiziga akaba yasabye abagenzi ko ibi bibaye ba@@ kwihutira ku bim@@ enyesha inzego z'@@ umutekano. Polisi y'u Rwanda ikaba yongera kwibutsa abatwara ibinyabiziga ko bagomba kubahiriza amategeko abag@@ enga, ndetse bak@@ ubahiriza n'@@ agenga ibinyabiziga n'@@ imit@@ warire yabyo. Niba udafite inzira uny@@ uramo ujya i@@ wawe, uzabona iyo kuny@@ uzamo umwand@@ a?@@ -@@ Min Kaboneka Minisitiri Francis Kaboneka Minisitiri w'Ubutegetsi bw'igihugu Francis Kaboneka yasabye abayobozi b'@@ Inzego z'ibanze mu mujyi wa Kigali kurwanya akajagari uko bash@@ oboye, mu rwego rwo gusigasira intego z'@@ umujyi zo kurangwa n'isuku n'@@ umutekano. Umujyi wa K@@ g@@ ali ni umwe mu ya mbere ku isi ur@@ angwamo isuku n'@@ umutekano, ndetse hari n'ib@@ ikombe bitandukanye wagiye ut@@ wara. Mu Nteko rusange y'@@ Umujyi wa Kigali yabaye kuri uyu wa Mbere, Minisitiri Kaboneka yavuze ko nubwo umujyi wa Kigali ushim@@ ag@@ izwa hose, ut@@ aragera aho bifuza. Yavuze ko kuri ubu mu mujyi wa Kigali hakigaragara ut@@ uj@@ agari twinshi tur@@ angwamo umwanda, ndetse bin@@ agoye kuh@@ ac@@ ungira umutekano. Abayobozi b'inzego z'ibanze batunzwe agatoki kuba ba ntibind@@ eba, ngo kuko utwo tuj@@ agari hafi ya twose tw@@ ubatswe bar@@ eba. Minisitiri Kaboneka yagize ati "@@ Ndag@@ irango m@@ bakang@@ urire gucika kuri iyi ngeso yo gushyigikira akaj@@ agar@@ i.@@ Nta kajagari kubakwa abayobozi bad@@ ahari, n'@@ ako ka za Nyarut@@ arama, sinzi ko hari hashira imyaka 15 kubat@@ s@@ we, none uyu munsi kabaye ikibazo, kubera ko umuntu adashobora no kuhag@@ era.@@ U Rwanda rw'uyu munsi, ntabwo ari urwo umuntu ajya mu rugo rwe ases@@ eye@@ ." Kaboneka yakomeje avuga ko ahantu hari akaj@@ agari, bitan@@ oroshye kuh@@ abona isuku. Ati "Niba udafite inzira uny@@ uramo ujya i@@ wawe, uzabona inzira yo kunyuramo uny@@ uzamo umwanda ? A@@ bavuze ku mutekano bavugaga bati ingabo na polisi bad@@ ufash@@ e, ariko se ingabo na polisi dufite bacunga umutekano abayobozi bat@@ abigizemo uruhar@@ e?" Abayobozi b'inzego z'ibanze mu mujyi wa Kigali biyemeje gucika ku muco wo gih@@ ishira ab@@ ubaka ut@@ uj@@ agari ngo bat@@ iter@@ anya, bib@@ utswa ko uko kut@@ iter@@ anya aribyo bigira ingaruka ku baturage mu gihe kiri imbere. Mu bice bitandukanye by'@@ umujyi wa Kigali hakunze kugaragara inyubako z'@@ ut@@ uj@@ agari, ahanini abahatuye bakavuga ko ariho babasha kubona amacumbi aciriritse n'uburyo bub@@ oroheye bw'@@ imibereho.
Ntabwo tuz@@ igera dutera imbere ni dukomeza gutesha agaciro abaturage bacu - Kagame Perezida yasabye ko abaturage bakwiye kujya bagira uruhare mu bi@@ bakorerwa Perezida Kagame avuga ko impinduka zig@@ anisha ku iterambere zih@@ era mu guhindura imyumv@@ ire, bityo asaba abantu bose kureka gutesha agaciro ibikorerwa imbere mu bihugu by'@@ umugabane wa Afurika ndetse n'abaturage baw@@ ut@@ uye. Ubwo Perezida Kagame yagezaga ijambo ku bitabiriye inama ku Mp@@ induka mu bukungu bwa Afurika (@@ Africa Trans@@ formation Forum@@ ), yababwiye ko buri muntu wese ashaka kubona umugabane wa Afurika uteye imbere kandi mu gihe gito gish@@ oboka. Perezida Kagame kandi yavuze ko byoroshye kuvuga ko hakenewe impinduka, ariko bin@@ akomeye kuz@@ iger@@ aho, icyakora ngo birashoboka ahereye ku rwego u Rwanda rumaze kugeraho ugereranyije naho rw@@ ahoze mu myaka myinshi ishize nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994. Yagize ati "Mu myaka 22 ishize, kubaho kwacu Abanyarwanda byari bigeze hab@@ i.@@ Twah@@ isemo impinduka kuko nta yandi mahitamo twari dufite. Impinduka twagezeho mu Rwanda twaz@@ igiye mu kuz@@ ikora kuko nta yandi mahitamo twari dufite . Twah@@ ereye kuri bike twari dufite ndetse no ku bitekerezo by@@ acu@@ ." Umukuru w'igihugu kandi yabwiye abari bitabiriye iyi nama ko abaturage bakwiye kugira uruhare mu mpinduka zose ndetse bakagira n'uruhare mu byemezo bifatwa bitewe nuko inyungu zose z@@ ishingira ku byo bakora buri munsi. Perezida Kagame yavuze ko umugabane wa Afurika ukeneye impinduka nyinshi ariko ngo ibyo byose bizatanga umusaruro ari uko abanya Afurika bahaye agaciro ibikorerwa iwabo ndetse n'aba@@ bikor@@ a. Yagize ati:" Ndizera ko ibi mw@@ abig@@ aniriyeho hano, kuko kugeza ubu twamaze kubona ibyo dukeneye hano muri Afurika, Ntabwo tuz@@ igera dutera imbere ni dukomeza gutesha agaciro iby'@@ iwacu n'abaturage bac@@ u." Yavuze kandi ko mu gihe abantu bazi icyo bashaka badakwiye gutinda gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo bakeneye bityo ko badakwiye guhora mu magambo gusa aho gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo baba biyem@@ eje. Yagize ati:" Niba tuzi aho dushaka kug@@ era,@@ tukaba tuzi nicyo gukora ngo tuh@@ ag@@ ere, kuki dukomeza gutinda mu ishyirwa mu bikor@@ wa? K@@ wandika ibyo twifuza gukora gusa ntabwo bituma impinduka zig@@ erwaho, ahubwo niho hava inama zitar@@ angir@@ a." Perezida Kagame yabibukije ko umuntu ku giti cye adashobora gushyira mu bikorwa impinduka zikenewe wenyine abasaba kubikora bashyize hamwe. Inama yiga ku Mp@@ induka mu bukungu bwa Afurika yari imaze iminsi ibiri ibera mu Rwanda, ikaba yari ihuje abantu batandukanye baturutse mu bihugu bitandukanye.
