Babiri batawe muri yombi bazira kwiba umuriro Kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 15 Nyakanga 2019, ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ingufu (R@@ EG@@ ) ku bufatanye n’urwego rw’igihugu rushinzwe ubugenzacyaha (RIB) ndetse na polisi y’igihugu n’abaturage, hafashwe abagabo babiri aribo Habimana Sylvain na Nshimiyimana Ob@@ ed, bakaba bakekwaho kwiba umuriro. Aba bagabo bafatiwe mu kagali ka Nyam@@ ugar@@ i,@@ mu murenge wa Gats@@ ata, bakaba bakekwaho guhuza insinga mu buryo bw’@@ uburiganya bagac@@ anira iduka ryabo riherereye aho mu Gats@@ ata. Kuri ubu aba bombi bacumbikiwe kuri sitasiyo ya RIB ya Gats@@ ata. Ubwo aba bombi b@@ erekw@@ aga itangazamakuru, Habimana yahakanye ibyo aregwa, akavuga ko umukozi we witwa Nshimiyimana Ob@@ ed ari we wab@@ ik@@ oze, ubwo yari yagiye mu yindi mirimo mu Nz@@ ov@@ e. Ab@@ on@@ eraho gusaba imbabazi kuko we yumv@@ ako yakoresheje umuntu wakoze ibyo amategeko ab@@ uza. Nshimiy@@ imana, nawe ahakana ibyo aregwa avuga ko atari we w@@ ibye umuriro. Umuyobozi wa REG sitasiyo ya J@@ abana, Habimana Marc@@ el, avuga ko aba bombi bagomba gushyikirizwa ubutabera bak@@ abazwa ku byaha bareg@@ wa. Uyu muyobozi yamagana ibi bintu, agasaba abaturage kugendera kure ibikorwa byo kwiba umuriro, kuko ibihano bikomeye byateg@@ uriwe abafite iyi ng@@ es@@ o. Yongeraho ko kwiba umuriro ari kimwe mu bidindiza iterambere ry’igihugu. Agira ati “@@ REG ku bufatanye n’inzego z’umutekano twafashe ingamba zo guhashya ubujura bw’@@ umuriro kuko bitagira ingaruka gusa kuri REG ahubwo ko zigera ku gihugu muri rusange, bikan@@ adindiza intego z’@@ iterambere. Aba bantu bafashwe tub@@ ifashijwemo n’abaturage batuye muri aka gace. Turasaba buri wese kwita ku bikorwa remezo ku bw’@@ iterambere ry’@@ igihugu@@ ”. Kuva mu Kuboza 2018, REG ikunze gukora ibikorwa byo kugenzura niba nta bujura bw’@@ umuriro bukorerwa mu bice bitandukanye by’@@ igihugu, ari nako abafat@@ wa bashyikirizwa ubutabera. Imibare yerekana ko amashanyarazi atak@@ ara akiri menshi, kuko ari ku kigera cya 6,@@ 5% cy’@@ amashanyarazi yose atangwa mu gihugu, menshi muri yo akaba agendera mu bikorwa by’@@ ubujura. Mu mwaka ushize, amashanyarazi yibwe yab@@ we yabar@@ irwaga agaciro ka miliyari 1,@@ 9 Frw. Icyaha cyo kwiba umuriro gihanishwa ibihano birimo gucibwa amande no gufungwa cyangwa kimwe muri ibyo byombi. Ubuj@@ ura bw’@@ amashanyarazi buh@@ anwa n’itegeko N@@ °@@ 5@@ 2/201@@ 8 ryo kuwa 13@@ /08/2018 nk’uko ryavug@@ ur@@ uwe, rikomoka ku itegeko N@@ º@@ 2@@ 1/201@@ 1 ryo kuwa 23@@ /06/201@@ 1, rigena amashanyarazi mu Rwanda. Inkuru dukesha Mp@@ amo Thierry Ushinzwe itangazamakuru n’itumanaho muri REG
2017 iz@@ asiga u Rwanda rut@@ agit@@ akaza akayabo mu kujya gup@@ imisha ibizamini mu mahanga ACP Celestin Twah@@ irwa, umuvugizi wa Polisi y'u Rwanda Ubusanzwe hari ibizami bimwe na bimwe u Rwanda rutari r@@ ufitiye ubushobozi bwo gupima bikaba ngombwa ko bijya gup@@ imirwa mu bihugu by'@@ amahanga yewe big@@ atwara akayabo igihugu. Ariko nkuko byemezwa na polisi y'igihugu, iravuga ko ibyo bitazongera kubaho kuva mu mwaka utaha bitewe na Laboratwari (l@@ aborat@@ oir@@ e) iri kubakwa mu Rwanda ib@@ izajya ibikor@@ a. Polisi igaragaza ko mu gihe kinini gishize yatangaga akayabo k'@@ ibihumbi 800 by'@@ amanyarwanda yohereza ikiz@@ ami kimwe ngo kij@@ ye gusuz@@ imirwa mu bihugu nk'@@ u Budage cyangwa u Bwongereza, bikaba ari yo mpamvu Leta y'u Rwanda yafashe umwanzuro wo kwiyubakira iyo Laboratwari mu mujyi wa Kigali. Nkuko byemejwe n'umuvugizi wa polisi y'u Rwanda ACP Celestin Twah@@ irwa, ngo iyo laboratwari izatwara akayabo ka miliyari 7 z'@@ amanyarwanda mu kubakw@@ a, ngo byitezwe ko izatangira imirimo yayo mu mpera z'umwaka utaha wa 2017. ACP Twahirwa kandi yavuze ko iyo laboratwari iz@@ akuraho imbogamizi nyinshi zag@@ aragar@@ ga zirimo ko ibimenyetso byih@@ ishe (@@ sc@@ ient@@ ific@@ ) byas@@ abwaga n'@@ ubushinjacyaha ku byaha bitandukanye byat@@ indaga kuboneka bigatuma abak@@ orewe ibyaha badat@@ abarirwa igihe. Yavuze kandi ko ibikoresho bip@@ ima ibizamini by'@@ amaraso (D@@ N@@ A) biz@@ akoreshwa muri iyo laboratwari ndetse n'ibindi bikoresho bizak@@ ener@@ wa, bizaba byag@@ ejejwe mu gihugu mu gihe cya vuba. ACP Twahirwa kandi yavuze ko ikizamini cya DNA cyari imwe mu nzitizi ikomeye ubutabera bwo mu Rwanda bwah@@ uraga nazo bityo ngo iyo laboratwari ikaba igiye kuza nk'@@ igisubizo. Aganira na The New Times dukesha iyi nkuru yagize ati:"@@ iki ni ikintu cy'@@ ingirakamaro k'@@ ubutabera bw'igihugu cyacu, twizeye ko izaba yarangiye ndetse yan@@ atangiye gukora mu 2018@@ ." Yakomeje agira ati: "@@ twajyaga duhura n'ibibazo byinshi byak@@ eneraga ibimenyetso byim@@ bitse, urugero, nk'@@ ahantu habereye impanuka kugira ngo duh@@ uze ibice by'@@ imibiri itandukanye (@@ y'@@ ab@@ itabye Iman@@ a) kugira ngo umuntu ashying@@ urwe mu cyubahiro byag@@ oranaga cyane, guhuza amaraso y'abana n'ababyeyi mu gihe hagaragaye impaka ku mas@@ ano ndetse n'ibindi byaha byak@@ eneraga ibimenyets@@ o." Mu ntangiriro z'iki cyumweru Minisitiri w'@@ umutekano mu gihugu Sheikh Musa Fazil Har@@ er@@ imana, yabwiye abadepite bagize komisiyo y'@@ uburenganzira bwa muntu no kurwanya Jenoside ko abakozi bazakora muri iyi laboratwari bari hafi yo kurangiza amasomo mu gihugu cy'u Budage. Iyi mirimo y'iyi Laboratwari kandi yagarutsweho mu mwiherero w'@@ abayobozi bakuru uherutse gus@@ orezwa I Gabiro ku wa 14 Werurwe 2016, aho yan@@ ashyizwe mu myanzuro yawo basaba ko hak@@ iw@@ ihutisha iyubakwa rya Laboratwari y'Igihugu ipima ibya DNA n'ibindi bifitanye isano nayo (Rwanda For@@ ens@@ ic L@@ abor@@ ator@@ y) kugira ngo itangire gukora.
Ibintu 5 abagabo bashobora kuba bakin@@ isha kandi byatuma bat@@ abyara Muri iki gihe hagenda had@@ uka ibintu byinshi bitari bimenyerewe cyane, bimwe bikagenda bigira ingaruka ku mibereho y’abantu. Usanga abantu bagenda bahura n’uburwayi butandukanye kubera ko rimwe na rimwe bagiye barya ibiribwa byavuye mu nganda ndetse no gukoresha ikoranabuhanga. Ubushakashatsi bwashyizwe ahagaragara, bugaragaza ko ku bantu babana byemewe n’amategeko bagera ku kigero cya 15% bagira ibibazo byo kubura urubyaro kubera ko usanga int@@ aga z’@@ abagabo zar@@ angirijwe no gukoresha ibintu biz@@ angiza. Ibi bibazo bigenda biba imbogam@@ izi, byatumye abashakashatsi bo muri kaminuza zitandukanye bagaragaza ibi bintu 5 bigira uruhare mu kwangiza intanga z’@@ abagabo. 1. Kunywa ikiyobyabwenge cya Mar@@ ju@@ ana Ku bantu basanzwe bat@@ umura ku gat@@ abi, usanga bafite ingorane nyinshi zo kwangirika k’@@ umubiri ariko abanywa Mar@@ ju@@ ana bo ni akarusho kuko bituma intanga zabo z@@ angirika. Nk’uko abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza ya Buff@@ alo babig@@ arag@@ aje, mu ntanga z@@ akorewe ubushakashatsi ku bagabo bafashe kuri Mar@@ ju@@ ana, byagaragaye ko intanga zabo ziba zifite ingufu nkeya ku buryo kubyara biba ari ikibazo. 2. Gukoresha mudasobwa uyit@@ eretse ku bib@@ ero Akenshi usanga abantu bafata za mudasobwa zabo bakaz@@ ishyira ku bib@@ ero byabo bumva ko ntacyo bitwaye ariko mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe byagaragaye ko ibi byangiza int@@ anga. Abahanga bakaba bakomeza batanga inama ko biba byiza gukoresha imashini uyit@@ eretse ku meza cyangwa ku ntebe z@@ abug@@ enewe. 3. Kujya muri Sa@@ una Abantu benshi bajya muri Sa@@ una kugirango ban@@ an@@ ure imitsi ndetse babashe kugabanya ibinure mu mubiri. Abash@@ akash@@ asi bo muri kaminuza ya P@@ od@@ ova yo mu Butaliyani bagaragaje ko ibi nabyo ari bimwe mu byangiza intanga z’@@ abagabo kuko ahantu usanga hakorerwa sa@@ una, akenshi haba h@@ ashyushye kandi ngo kwegereza udus@@ abo tw’@@ intanga ahantu h@@ ashyushye si byiza kuko bituma zic@@ ika intege maze kubyara bikaba ingor@@ ane. 4. Gukora imirimo itera umunaniro ukabije Muri ubu bushakashatsi bw@@ akozwe, byemejwe ko umunaniro ari imwe mu mpamvu zatuma umuntu agira ibibazo mu kubyara, kuko umunaniro ukabije ugira ingaruka mu kwangirika kw’@@ intanga zig@@ atakaza ingufu. Ib@@ ing@@ ibi byagaragajwe n’abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza ya Calif@@ onia Davis kandi bag@@ ashishikariza abantu kujya bafata umwanya wo kuruhuka mu buryo bwo kurinda amagara yabo kuko aras@@ es@@ eka ntay@@ or@@ we. 5. Kurya inyama z@@ anyuze mu nganda Usanga abantu benshi bakunda ibintu by@@ anyuze mu ng@@ anda, nyamara akenshi usanga atari byiza ku mubiri. Ku bagabo ho ni ingorane zikomeye cyane kuko inyama z@@ aciye mu nganda zigira uruhare rukomeye mu kuba zatuma urubyaro rub@@ ura mu muryango kubera ko umugabo aba atak@@ ibasha kugira intanga z@@ atanga umwana. Mu bushakashatsi bw@@ akozwe, byagaragaye ko abagabo bakunda izi nyama usanga nabo bagira ikibazo mu kubona urubyaro. N’ubwo biba@@ bera imbogam@@ izi, ngo ku bir@@ ira amafi bo nta ngor@@ an@@ w nk’izi bagira ariyo mpamvu bashishikariza abagabo kurya amafi kurusha uko barya inyama zivuye mu ng@@ anda.
Uko ibyorezo bitanu bikomeye mu mateka y’Isi byarangiye Nubwo hari ibyorezo byagiye bik@@ endera big@@ asiga bim@@ azeho abatuye mu duce tumwe na tumwe ku Isi, hari izindi ndwara z’@@ ibyorezo abavuzi bashoboye guhagarika ikwirakwira rya zo. Nk’uko ikiremwa muntu kigenda gik@@ ura mu mibereho ya cyo, n’indwara z@@ andura niko big@@ enda. Abantu batura beg@@ eranye ubwabo, beg@@ eranye n’@@ inyamas@@ wa; akenshi hak@@ agaragara n’isuku nkeya n’imirire iciriritse big@@ aha icyuho indwara. Bivugwa ko ubucuruzi bwambukiranya inyanja ari bwo ntandaro y’@@ ikwirakwiza ry’@@ indwara zand@@ ura, zig@@ anisha ku by@@ orezo bya mbere mu Isi. Dore uburyo ibyorezo bitanu byari bifite ubukana mu Isi byaje kurangira. Pl@@ ag@@ ue of Just@@ in@@ ian Ni icyorezo cy@@ adutse mu bwami bw’@@ Abar@@ omani bw@@ itwaga “@@ By@@ z@@ antine Emp@@ ir@@ e” ahagana mu myaka ya 5@@ 4-@@ 54@@ 9, bivugwa ko cy@@ akomotse ku bin@@ yamp@@ eke Misiri yoh@@ ererez@@ aga ubu bwami nyuma yo gutsindwa buk@@ ay@@ iy@@ obora. Iki cyorezo giterwa n’agakoko kitwa Yer@@ sin@@ ia p@@ est@@ is g@@ akomoka ku binyam@@ abere bito nk’@@ imb@@ eba. Bivugwa ko imbeba z@@ ariye kuri ibyo bin@@ yamp@@ eke ari zo zatumye iki cyorezo kigera mu bantu. Ku muvuduko ud@@ asanzwe, iki cyorezo cy@@ akwir@@ akwiye u Burayi, Afurika y’Amajyaruguru, Aziya, na Arab@@ i@@ a; aho cyahitanye ababarirwa hagati ya miliyoni 30 na 50, bikekwa ko ari kimwe cya kabiri cy’@@ abari batuye Isi. Umwarimu w’@@ amateka muri kaminuza ya De@@ Paul, Thomas M@@ ock@@ a@@ it@@ is, avuga ko@@ ”@@ Abantu icyo gihe nta bundi buryo bumvaga bw@@ abafasha kuk@@ irwanya butari ukw@@ itandukanya n’abak@@ ir@@ wa@@ ye.” Uyu mwarimu akomeza avuga ko atekereza ko kugira ngo kir@@ angire byatewe n’uko abenshi mu bari basigaye aho iki cyorezo cyari bari bafite ubudahangarwa mu mubiri. Black De@@ at@@ h (@@ Urupfu rw@@ ir@@ abur@@ a) Nyuma y’imyaka isaga 800, na none ka gak@@ oko ka Yer@@ sin@@ ia p@@ est@@ is k@@ aragarutse k@@ ibasira u Burayi. Ubwo hari mu mwaka wa 13@@ 4@@ 7, bivugwa ko icyorezo cyiswe “Ur@@ upfu rw@@ ir@@ abur@@ a” cyahitanye abasaga miliyoni 200 mu Burayi, mu gihe cy’imyaka ine. Mwarimu M@@ ock@@ a@@ it@@ is avuga ko na muri iyi myaka nabwo abantu batari bak@@ amenye guhangana n’icy@@ or@@ ezo. Icyo bamenye gusa n’uko kwegerana by@@ ong@@ eraga ibyago byo kwand@@ ura. Ibi byaje gutuma hari abayobozi bamwe bategeka ko abas@@ are bageze mu gace vuba bajya bashyirwa mu kato kugeza bigaragaye ko nta burwayi bafite. B@@ ijya gutangira, abas@@ are bag@@ um@@ ishwaga mu mato mu gihe cy’iminsi 30, bakaby@@ ita “@@ tr@@ ent@@ in@@ o”, nyuma baza kubik@@ aza biba iminsi 40 byitwa ‘@@ qu@@ ar@@ ant@@ in@@ o”, ari naho h@@ akomotse ijambo “@@ qu@@ ar@@ ant@@ in@@ e” rig@@ atangira no kubahirizwa mu burengerazuba bw’@@ Isi. Mwarimu M@@ ock@@ a@@ it@@ is avuga ko “hari ikintu kinini ibyo by@@ afash@@ ije.” The Great Pl@@ ag@@ ue of London Nyuma y’uko icyorezo cyiswe “Ur@@ upfu rw@@ ir@@ abur@@ a” gik@@ end@@ ereye, umujyi wa Londres mu Bwongereza nta gah@@ enge wag@@ ize. Na none ka gak@@ oko kagiye k@@ ahagar@@ uka buri nyuma y’imyaka 10 kuva mu 13@@ 48 kugeza mu 16@@ 6@@ 5. Ni ibintu byabaye inshuro 40 mu myaka isaga 300. Muri buri myaka 10 iki cyorezo cyah@@ it@@ anaga 20% by’@@ abagabo, abagore n’abana batuye i Lond@@ res@@ . Ibi byatumye mu wa 1500 mu Bwongereza hashyirwaho amategeko yo kuv@@ angura no gushyira mu kato abag@@ aragayeho uburwayi. Ingo zirimo abarwayi zagiye z@@ ishyirwaho ibimenyetso, umuntu ufite umuryango urwaye nawe akaba afite ikimenyetso igihe agiye mu band@@ i; ndetse n’inyamaswa nyinshi zar@@ ishwe cyane cyane injangwe n’imbwa kuko z@@ avug@@ wagaho gukwirakwiza icyorezo cyane. Ibikorwa by’@@ imyidagaduro ih@@ uriza abantu benshi hamwe byar@@ ahagar@@ itswe, n’abarw@@ ayi baf@@ ungir@@ anwa mu ngo zabo ngo bad@@ akwirakwiza iki cyorezo. June 16, 2014 RDB ikaba yar@@ ashyizeho uburyo bwo kurw@@ eg@@ erereza abaturage mu Ntara kandi ku buntu, aho abantu b’ingeri zose bigishwa gukoresha mudasobwa na Interin@@ eti, h@@ ifash@@ ijwe imodoka nini ifite ibikoresho n’im@@ ashini 20 na kon@@ eg@@ isiyo ya Interineti muri buri mash@@ ini. I@@ nyuma n’imodoka Ariko imbere n’ishuri mu rindi Tw@@ asuye aho ikigo cya RDB cyari mu kwigisha abaturage bo mu Karere ka Musanze, mu Murenge wa Shingiro uri munsi y’ibir@@ unga, kugira ngo twumve icyo byaba bifasha abaturage, maze tuganira n’abari guhabwa amasomo, ndetse n’aba@@ bahug@@ ura. Umwe mubah@@ abwaga amahugurwa ya mudasobwa, Muhaw@@ en@@ ima Ber@@ the Iyamuremye Emmanuel intore yo kurug@@ erero twasanze yaje gufata aya masomo ya mudasobwa yatubwiye ibi baby@@ ishimira kandi batabona uko bashimira abab@@ ibagezaho ku bun@@ tu@@ ah. Naho Muhawenimana Ber@@ the asanga kuba RDB ibafasha kwiy@@ ungura ubumenyi kuri mudasobwa ari amahirwe adasanzwe bagize kuko nta handi bari kuz@@ apfa kuy@@ abonera ku buntu. Uw@@ ing@@ eneye Provid@@ ence umukozi wa RDB ugend@@ ana n’iyi modoka kandi ari new uh@@ ug@@ ura, yatubwiye ko iyi ari imwe muri gahunda ya Leta ibiny@@ u@@ ijije mu kigo cy’igihugu cy’Iterambere aho bagenda bah@@ ugura abantu b’ingeri zitandukanye barimo ingabo, ba rwiyemezam@@ irimo, ur@@ ib@@ yiruko , abapolisi n’abaturage bas@@ anzwe, mu kubigisha gukoresha ikoranabuhanga kandi ku buntu. Uw@@ ing@@ eneye Provid@@ ence, Umukozi wa RDB Provid@@ ence yadus@@ obanuye ko buri ntara ifite Bus yayo, iyi bakoresha akaba ar@@ ’@@ iyi Nat@@ ara y’amajyaruguru bakaba bamaze gukora mu Turere twa Rulindo na Gakenke, ubu bakaba bamaze gukora imirenge ine y’Akarere ka Musanze, babah@@ ugura ku bumenyi bw’ibanze kuri mudasobwa (IC@@ T Bas@@ ic Sk@@ ill@@ s). Tumubajije igihe bisaba mu guhugura buri cyiciro kugira ngo babe bagize icyo biy@@ ungura, Bwana Provid@@ ence yatubwiye buri cyiciro gih@@ ugurwa ibyumweru bibiri, hakaba abiga mu gitondo n’ab@@ iga nyuma ya saa sita ukuyemo iminsi y’ikir@@ uko (@@ week end@@ ). Izi modoka zikora muri buri Ntara nkuko twab@@ is@@ oban@@ uriwe n’@@ umutek@@ in@@ isiye akaba n’@@ umushoferi wayo Kalisa Innocent yatubwiye ko izi modoka zikoresha umuriro w’amashanyarazi ariko nta kibazo bagira no mu Mirenge y’@@ icyaro kuko bafite imashini (g@@ ener@@ ator@@ ) ifite ubushobozi bwo guha umuriro iri shuri ryo mu mud@@ oka. Benshi twaganiriye bose bashimira RDB iki gikorwa, bitewe n’uburyo ibasha ku@@ basanga iwabo ku Mir@@ enge.
Samsung igiye gushyira ku isoko Galaxy F@@ old 2 na Galaxy Note 20 Icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyatumye inganda nyinshi zis@@ ubika ibikorwa byo gushyira ku isoko ibikoresho byazo bishya cyane iz’@@ ikor@@ anab@@ unga. Magingo aya, Samsung yatangaje ko mu mpera z’uyu mwaka aribwo iz@@ ashyira ku isoko telefoni zayo ebyiri zari z@@ itegerejwe na benshi. Samsung Galaxy F@@ old 2 na Samsung Galaxy Note 20 nizo telefoni ebyiri Samsung iteganya gushyira ku isoko muri uyu mwaka. Nk’@@ ubwoko bwa N@@ ote, ni bumwe mu bwagiye bum@@ anuka ku isoko kuko but@@ acy@@ itabirwa cyane, ariko Samsung irashaka kureba uburyo bw@@ akongera gukundwa n’abandi benshi. Samsung Galaxy F@@ old 2 bivugwa ko izaba ifite Camera eshatu zirimo iya meg@@ ap@@ ix@@ el 12, 16 na 6@@ 4. Igiciro cyayo nacyo gishobora kuz@@ amanuka ugereranyije n’uko byari byitezwe aho ishobora kugura hagati ya $@@ 17@@ 80 na $@@ 1980 kugira ngo hong@@ erwe umubare w’@@ iz@@ ishobora kuba zag@@ urwa. Ni telefoni izaba ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira internet yihuta ya 5@@ G ndetse ifite n’ik@@ aramu z@@ imenyerewe (S@@ -@@ Pen@@ ) kuri telefoni za Sams@@ ung@@ . Byitezwe ko kandi izaba ifite RA@@ M ya GB 8, n’ub@@ ubiko bwa GB 25@@ 6 cyangwa 5@@ 12. Galaxy F@@ old ya mbere yagiye hanze iri hejuru y’iyi igiye gusohoka kuko nko mu Bufaransa yag@@ uraga amayero 2020. Byitezwe ko izi telefoni zombi ziz@@ am@@ urikwa muri Kanama hanyuma muri Nzeri zikagera ku isoko. Galaxy F@@ old 2 na Galaxy Note 20 ni zimwe muri telefoni ebyiri za Samsung zih@@ anzwe amaso
Ubur@@ akari bukomeye muri FC Barcelona kubera amasezerano ya Lionel Messi yagiye hanze Iyi kipe yahakanye "@@ uruhare rwayo urwo ari rwo rwose mu gutangaza inyandiko y’aya masezer@@ an@@ o". El M@@ undo ivuga ko amasezerano ya Messi y’imyaka ine azatuma ahembwa miliyoni $@@ 6@@ 74 kugeza tariki 30 z’ukwezi kwa gatandatu 2021. Ibi bivuze ko uyu mukinnyi w’imyaka 33 ahembwa hafi miliyoni $@@ 170 ku mwaka umwe w’imikino. Mu itangazo ryasohowe na Barcelona, iyi kipe ivuga ko "@@ iba@@ baj@@ we" no kuba iyi kont@@ aro yatang@@ ajwe. Yongeraho iti: "@@ FC Barcelona irah@@ akana yivuye inyuma ko nta ruhare urwo arirwo rwose yagize mu gutangaza iyo nyandiko, kandi iz@@ afata ingamba zikwiye mu mategeko ku kinyamakuru El M@@ undo, ku ngaruka zose uku gutangaza kw@@ ater@@ a." Barcelona yongeraho ko "@@ ishyigikiye Lionel Messi, mu gikorwa cyose cyaba kigamije kwangiza izina rye, no kwangiza imibanire ye n’urwego yakoreye akaba umukinnyi wa mbere ku isi no mu mateka y’umupira w’amag@@ uru@@ ". Umutoza Ronald Ko@@ eman waraye at@@ oje umukino Lionel Messi yatsinzemo igitego cya 6@@ 50 uyu mukinnyi yatsindiye FC Barcel@@ on@@ a,@@ yasabye ko uw@@ ashyize hanze aya masezerano yashak@@ ishwa akir@@ uk@@ anwa. Yagize ati "@@ Yakoze byinshi mu mupira wa Espag@@ n@@ e.@@ Hari abantu bashaka kubabaza Barcelona na Mess@@ i.@@ A@@ baye ari umuntu uri imbere mu ikipe byaba ari bibi cyane akwiriye kugira ahazaza muri iyi kip@@ e." Messi wageze muri Barcelona afite imyaka 13, mu kwezi kwa munani umwaka ushize yasabye iyi kipe ko yamur@@ eka akajya ahandi. Har@@ acy@@ ibazwa niba azag@@ uma muri iyi kipe amasezerano ye nar@@ angira mu mpeshyi y’uyu mwaka. Messi niwe ufite umuhigo wo gutsindira iyi kipe ibitego byinshi, yat@@ war@@ anye nayo ibikombe 10 bya La L@@ iga, na UEFA Champions League enye, kandi amaze kuba umukinnyi war@@ ushije abandi ku isi inshuro esh@@ eshatu. Gusaba ko ava muri iyi kipe, byari bik@@ urikiwe n’ubush@@ yamirane yagiranye na perezida wayo Jos@@ ep Maria Bar@@ tom@@ e@@ u, waje guhita yegura mu kwezi kwa cum@@ i. Mu kwezi kwa 12, Messi yagize ati: "@@ Sind@@ amenya icyo nz@@ akor@@ a." Messi aheruka kugirana amasezerano na FC Barcelona mu mwaka wa 2017, ariko muri iyi myaka mike bas@@ inyanye iki gih@@ angange cyo muri Argentina kiz@@ abasha kwinjiza akayabo ka miliyoni 5@@ 55 z’@@ may@@ ero (@@ £@@ 49@@ 2@@ m) nar@@ angira mu mpeshyi y’uyu mwaka. Ikinyamakuru El M@@ undo Dep@@ ort@@ ivo cyavuze ko aya masezerano ya Messi azas@@ enya FC Barcel@@ on@@ a,@@ arimo ibice bitandukanye yaba umush@@ ahar@@ a,@@ ibyo kwamamaz@@ a,@@ n’ibindi bitandukanye birimo n’imis@@ oro. Messi ngo yahabwaga miliy@@ oni@@ 13@@ 8 z’@@ amayero (@@ £@@ 12@@ 2@@ m) buri mwaka nk’@@ umushahara we.@@ Yahawe miliyoni 11@@ 5 z’@@ amayero (@@ £@@ 10@@ 2@@ m) kubera ko yemeye kongera amasezeran@@ o.@@ Yan@@ ahawe miliyoni 79 z’@@ amayero (@@ £@@ 69@@ m) z’uko yemeye kuba indahemuka akag@@ uma I Camp No@@ u. Inkomoko y’@@ Umug@@ ayo w’@@ Ibig@@ wari, igihembo cyah@@ abwaga abat@@ inye urugamba mu Rwanda rwo hambere Mu mateka y’@@ umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda cyane cyane mu rugamba rwo kur@@ wagura no guhashya abag@@ om@@ eram@@ urage wa Gihanga w’igihugu gis@@ ang@@ iwe, habayemo intwari zitagira ingano z@@ akir@@ as@@ aniye, z@@ inag@@ ihanganira n’abat@@ agik@@ unda, habayemo n’ibig@@ wari byat@@ ereranye abandi ku kazi katoroshye ko kug@@ und@@ ag@@ urana n’@@ abanzi badakunda u Rwanda. Abami b’u Rwanda babigize intego nt@@ agam@@ bur@@ uzwa ko bazajya babaha impeta z’@@ ishimwe n’ing@@ oror@@ ano ku bw’@@ ubutwari bagaragaje mu guh@@ anganira u Rwanda, no kug@@ aya abah@@ abaye ibig@@ wari mu rwego rwo kubah@@ witura bak@@ isub@@ iraho. IGIHE yifashishije igitabo “@@ Intwari z’@@ Imb@@ anza, zubatse u Rwanda rug@@ ahamya igit@@ iny@@ ir@@ o” cyanditswe n’@@ Umus@@ izi Nsanz@@ abera Jean de Dieu, Inzobere mu Muc@@ o, Amateka n’@@ Ub@@ uv@@ ang@@ anz@@ o, yat@@ atuye amateka y’imp@@ itab@@ ihe ku m@@ itang@@ irwe y’@@ umug@@ ayo ku bagaragaje ubug@@ wari ku rugamba rwo kuras@@ anira u Rwanda mu mugambi wo guhashya umwanzi no kum@@ utsinda burundu nk’uko byakorwaga ha mbere. Mu mateka y’u Rwanda, Umwami Ruganzu Nd@@ oli, ni we waciye iteka rishyiraho umug@@ ayo w’@@ ibig@@ wari byat@@ eng@@ ushye igihugu bigah@@ arira abandi umurimo wo kuruh@@ anganira bonyine. Iyi nkuru ir@@ agaruka by’umwihariko ku by’@@ umug@@ ayo w’@@ ibig@@ wari n’impamvu yaw@@ o. Umwami Ruganzu Ndoli wakunze kwitwa C@@ yambar@@ ant@@ ama mu mateka y’u Rwanda, yatwaye u Rwanda mu bihe bikomeye aho rwari rumaze imyaka isaga 11 rur@@ ar@@ anze, nyuma y’@@ amahano yadutse mu bikom@@ angoma byo kwa Gahima bik@@ arw@@ anira ing@@ oma. Juru na murumuna we B@@ amara bakica mukuru wabo Ndahiro Cyam@@ at@@ ara agatanga adat@@ anze. Bitewe nuko Ruganzu Ndoli yari afite akazi katoroshye ko gushimangira igit@@ inyiro cy’u Rwanda mu mahanga ar@@ uz@@ engurutse no kwihimura ku bapf@@ akaje u Rwanda bakica se Ndahiro Cyam@@ at@@ are na Nyina Ny@@ abac@@ uzi. Ndoli yashak@@ ishije ikintu cyatuma abaturage ayoboye n’Ingabo bari kumwe mu ig@@ aba@@ bitero byo kor@@ om@@ ya amahanga bayag@@ usha ruh@@ abo, bagira ubushake bwo kwitabira no kwitangira igihugu mu mugambi ukomeye barimo w’@@ umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda, wari ugeze kure mu bitero byo kwagura igihugu no gukomeza guhashya abag@@ om@@ eram@@ urage wa Gihanga w’igihugu gis@@ ang@@ iwe. Muri icyo kibar@@ iro, ni bwo y@@ c@@ iye iteka riha umug@@ ayo abat@@ ereranye abandi muri buri gikorwa cy@@ erekeranye na gahunda yari y@@ imir@@ ije imbere. Ruganzu Nd@@ oli, niwe wag@@ ennye inzego z’@@ Intwari bwa mbere mu mateka y’u Rwanda, an@@ aca iteka rigena umug@@ ayo w’@@ ibig@@ wari. Uwo mug@@ ayo wah@@ abwaga ingabo zah@@ unze urugamba watumye Abanyarwanda barushaho guhug@@ ukira iby’@@ urug@@ amba, gushira amanga no kurwana ishyaka ryo kwikura mu buc@@ akara bw’@@ amahanga no kwigarurira ibihugu. Umug@@ ayo w’@@ ibig@@ wari, wabaga ugenewe abah@@ unze urugamba n’@@ abanze kurw@@ itabira ngo bajy@@ ane n’abandi, aho bag@@ ayir@@ waga mu ruhame ariko mu kiny@@ abupf@@ ura. Nyuma yo kugena impeta z’@@ ubutwari, n’Ing@@ oror@@ ano zah@@ abwaga Intwari uhereye ku ngoma ye, yanag@@ ennye n’umug@@ ayo w’@@ ibig@@ wari wabaga uteye ut@@ ya: Inka y’@@ Imir@@ ind@@ i: Burya mu rugamba rwose habamo intwari hakabamo n’ibig@@ wari, habamo abarw@@ itabira hakaba n’abar@@ uh@@ unga. Inka y’@@ Imir@@ indi yag@@ abir@@ waga ibig@@ wari byose byah@@ unze urug@@ amba, mu buryo bwo kugira ubwoba bag@@ ator@@ oka, cyangwa se mu buryo bwo kut@@ arw@@ itabira, ntiban@@ itabire uwo muh@@ amagar@@ o, abandi bafashe iya mbere mu kur@@ urw@@ anir@@ ira, cyangwa se kwigira ntibind@@ eba no kwik@@ unda. Yag@@ abir@@ waga ibig@@ wari byah@@ unze inshingano zo kuba ibits@@ imb@@ anyi byag@@ om@@ baba kujya gufasha Ingabo ziri ku rugamba mu rwego rwo gushaka ibiz@@ it@@ unga no gush@@ orera im@@ inyag@@ o, kuko ntiz@@ ag@@ ombaga kur@@ ur@@ as@@ anira ngo z@@ ijye no gushaka ibiz@@ it@@ unga. N’ubwo ibyo big@@ wari byah@@ abwaga inka imeze kimwe n’iy’@@ Intwar@@ i, ariko bwari uburyo bwo kunenga mu kiny@@ abupfura kw’@@ Abanyarwanda. Icy@@ atanduk@@ anyaga izo nka ni izina gusa, kuba war@@ ahawe iy’@@ ubutwari, undi agahabwa iy’@@ ubug@@ wari, ntabwo mw@@ akw@@ ishima kimwe, guhorana iryo pf@@ un@@ we ry@@ onyine byatumaga bik@@ osora nabo bagah@@ amya ubutwari. Ikindi Inka y’@@ Imir@@ indi yasoban@@ uraga, nuko wah@@ unze urugamba cyangwa se ntar@@ w@@ itab@@ ire, ibyo ari byose hari uw@@ amuz@@ irikanye nk’@@ umuz@@ iho ubutwari akam@@ ur@@ arikira gutabara igihugu n’ubwo yabaga yamut@@ eng@@ ushye nt@@ amw@@ itab@@ e ku rubanza yamuh@@ amagar@@ iye. Abanyarwanda bat@@ inyaga izina r@@ ibi kuruta ibindi byose byiza wabah@@ a. Kug@@ abira Inka ikig@@ wari, ni umuco w’@@ ikinyabupfura ntag@@ ereranywa kigaragaza uburyo Abanyarwanda bah@@ aga agaciro ikiremwamuntu by’umwihariko abar@@ uv@@ uk@@ amo. Aho niho bagiraga bati “@@ UW@@ ISH@@ E AB@@ AB@@ I YAM@@ AZE AB@@ EZ@@ A” byo kuvuga ko nta Malayika uba mu Isi, uwo ariwe wese yakora nabi, ariko ejo ak@@ isubiraho agakora neza, uramutse wishe abo wita bab@@ i, wam@@ araho abantu ku buryo ab@@ eza nt@@ abo waz@@ abona. Mu mitekerereze ya muntu habamo kug@@ oma no gukora neza, icyo umuntu ag@@ aburiye nicyo gik@@ ura. Ikindi bagend@@ eragaho ni umugani uvuga ng@@ o@@ “ IBY@@ AYE IK@@ IB@@ OZE IRAK@@ IR@@ IG@@ AT@@ A” Igihe cyose umuntu ak@@ unaniye kuri iki, ariko hari ikindi ashoboye ushobora kumuk@@ oresha, bityo bigatuma abayoboye u Rwanda barushaho kug@@ aya ibig@@ wari ariko bat@@ abih@@ ut@@ aza, ahubwo bakag@@ ena izindi nshingano zo kubaka igihugu dore ko zabaga zih@@ ari. Ak@@ eso k’@@ ison@@ i: Mu Rwanda rwo h@@ ambere, bagiraga ibikoresho mug@@ erwa bifash@@ ishaga mu gupima ibis@@ uk@@ ika, ndetse bakaby@@ ifashisha mu gus@@ angir@@ iraho ibiny@@ obwa. Muri ibyo bikoresho h@@ abag@@ amo Int@@ ango, Ik@@ ibindi, Urw@@ eso n’ Ak@@ es@@ o, uko byat@@ andukan@@ aga mu maz@@ ina, ni nako byabaga bit@@ angana no mu bun@@ ini. Mu rwego rwo gushimira ingabo zas@@ oje urug@@ amba, zas@@ angir@@ iraga ku nt@@ ango y’@@ Abah@@ izi z@@ akundaga gut@@ erekwa ingabo n’abag@@ aba bazo mu gitaramo mv@@ arug@@ amba, inzoga yabaga irimo yo yag@@ en@@ waga n’ib@@ wam@@ i. Ikig@@ wari ntabwo cyas@@ angir@@ iraga hamwe n’abandi ku Nt@@ ango, nticy@@ as@@ angir@@ iraga na rubanda ruc@@ iriritse ku kib@@ indi, yemwe no ku rw@@ eso rw’@@ abat@@ indi, nticy@@ abashaga kurus@@ om@@ aho. Ahubwo mu rwego rwo kug@@ aya ubug@@ wari bwa bamwe, mu gihe intwari zabaga zis@@ angirira ku “N@@ T@@ ANGO Y’@@ ABAH@@ IZ@@ I@@ ” babash@@ ak@@ iraga Ak@@ eso (A@@ kab@@ indi gato cyan@@ eeee@@ e@@ !!! Kaj@@ yamo amacupa nk’@@ atanu cyangwa se munsi yay@@ o) akaba ariko bas@@ angir@@ iraho, kuko babaga babuze ubutwari, bakabura no kuba rubanda rwa gis@@ es@@ eka kuko bananiwe kum@@ aranira igihugu cyabo. Ak@@ eso ibig@@ wari byas@@ angir@@ ir@@ agaho niko bitaga “@@ AK@@ ES@@ O K’@@ IS@@ ON@@ I@@ ” bag@@ angir@@ ir@@ agaho mu rwego rwo kubereka ko babaye ibig@@ wari bad@@ akwiriye gus@@ angirira n’abandi ku Nt@@ ango, nabo bak@@ agas@@ om@@ aho n’is@@ oni nyinshi ziv@@ anze n’ik@@ imwaro cy’uko ntacyo bam@@ ariye igihugu. Mu muco w’Abanyarwanda cyar@@ az@@ iraga ko h@@ im@@ akazwa umuco w’@@ ubus@@ ambo no kugira ubuntu buke. Kw@@ imana byari ikiz@@ ira, wah@@ aga umuntu n’iyo mwaba mufite icyo mupf@@ a, ukaz@@ amug@@ aya nyuma, hanyuma muk@@ iy@@ unga muk@@ abana mu gihugu amahoro kuko nta wari ufite uburenganzira bwo kuk@@ ik@@ wir@@ ukan@@ amo. Kubera izo ngoror@@ ano zose, zaba iz@@ ahawe Imp@@ ot@@ ore, uwahawe Umud@@ ende, Uw@@ ac@@ anye urut@@ i, uwahawe Inka y’@@ Umuh@@ eto n’uw@@ ahawe Inka y’@@ Imir@@ indi, uwas@@ omeye ku nt@@ ango y’@@ abahizi n’@@ ak@@ eso k’@@ isoni, byose byatumaga Uw@@ agize ubutwari abir@@ atira abandi mu k@@ ivugo cyab@@ imbur@@ iga kandi kikan@@ asoza ikintu cyose avuze n’uw@@ agize ubug@@ wari ak@@ ik@@ osora ubutaha ak@@ ajyana n’abandi kuras@@ anira igihugu. Ibyo byatumaga Umunyarwanda wese aharanira kuba Intwari bityo ag@@ ashira ubwoba ku rugamba. Usibye no kubaha impeta z’@@ ubutwari, Ingabo zose z@@ atsinze urug@@ amba, zag@@ abanaga im@@ inyag@@ o, ugasanga urugo rufite Ingabo y’igihugu, arirwo rukom@@ eye. Uwo muj@@ yo wo kug@@ abira Intwari im@@ inyag@@ o no kubaha impeta z’@@ Ubut@@ wari, watumye u Rwanda rubona abana benshi bagana mu Itorero kugira ngo big@@ ir@@ emo ibyo kuba Intwari n’@@ imyitozo nj@@ yarug@@ amba. Nuko ab@@ itabira kuba Ingabo z’igihugu baba benshi u Rwanda rugira imitwe y’Ingabo myinshi, ku buryo byak@@ angar@@ anyije amahanga ar@@ uz@@ engur@@ utse, agatangira kwibaza uko az@@ ifata imbere y’u Rwanda. U Rwanda rwar@@ inze rw@@ injira mu gihe cy’ubuk@@ oloni mu ndunduro y’@@ Ingoma ya Rwabugili rumaze kug@@ wiza imitwe y’ingabo igera kuri 17@@ 0. Mu gihe rwah@@ anganywe n’imitwe y’ingabo irindwi mu bihe by’@@ ingoma ya Gihanga ah@@ asaga mu wa 10@@ 9@@ 1, kugeza ku ngoma ya Ruganzu Bw@@ imba ah@@ asaga mu wa 13@@ 45. Kubera ishyaka ry’u Rwanda r@@ yagaragaye ku rugamba r@@ uruh@@ ang@@ anira, byageze mu bihe by’@@ ubuk@@ oloni abaturage bagifite umutima n’ubushake bwo kwitabira kuras@@ anira igihugu, kubera ibanga ryo gushima no kug@@ abira Intwari ryim@@ akaj@@ we.

MINISANTE yaciye mu Rwanda amwe mu mavuta yo kwisiga at@@ ukuza uruhu Kuri uyu wa Gatatu Minisiteri y'Ubuzima (@@ Minis@@ ant@@ e) ifatanyije n'izindi nzego zitandukanye zifite aho zihuriye no guhangana n'ib@@ icuruzwa bitujuje ubuziranenge mu Rwanda yagiranye ibiganiro n'abanyamakuru maze igaragaza amavuta at@@ emewe agiye gukurwa ku isoko mu maguru mashya, kuko ibiy@@ agize bigira ingaruka mbi ku mubiri w'@@ umuntu. Ayo mavuta agira uruhare mu kuba yakw@@ angiza uruhu ndetse akaba yatera na Kans@@ eri. Ku ikubitiro MINISANTE yagaragaje ay@@ itwa Pe@@ au Cla@@ ire, La@@ it de b@@ ea@@ ute na F@@ air@@ &@@ wh@@ ite. MINISANTE ivuga ko ikig@@ iye gukorwa ari ukub@@ anza gukangurira abaturage kwirinda aya mavuta kuko basanze bimwe mu bigize aya mavuta byangiza uruhu harimo no gutera Kans@@ eri. Nz@@ ayire Philipp@@ e, Umuyobozi w'ishami rishinzwe igenzura ry'@@ amabwiriza y'@@ ubuziranenge mu kigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubuziranenge (R@@ S@@ B) , aganira n'abanyamakuru yasabye abag@@ ura amavuta ndetse n'aba@@ yar@@ angura bagamije kuy@@ acuruza ko bajya babanza bagas@@ oma bakamenya ibiy@@ agize mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko yab@@ angiza. Uyu muyobozi kandi yavuze ko kuri ubu mu Rwanda hari ikibazo gihangayikishije cy'@@ abantu basigaye bafata amavuta bakay@@ av@@ angavanga aho usanga batanga amavuta ashobora guhindura umuntu uko ashak@@ a,@@ kandi ayo mavuta akagira ingaruka mbi kuba@@ yakoresh@@ a, bityo asaba ubufatanye bwa buri wese ko uw@@ amenya aho bakorera yat@@ ungira agatoki iki kigo . Nz@@ ayire yasabye abacuruzi bafite aya mavuta kubimenyesha inzego zibishinzwe kugirango amen@@ we,@@ bityo abibutsa ko ni@@ bategereza umukwabu baz@@ iy@@ ishyurira ibijyanye n'im@@ enwa ryayo. Abajijwe uko ibi bicuruzwa bigera mu Rwanda kandi hari ikigo gishinzwe gupima ubuziranenge ,@@ Nz@@ ayire yagize ati: "@@ Dufite imipaka udashobora kubar@@ a. Hari iby@@ injira ku magar@@ e,@@ hari n'iby@@ injira by@@ ikorewe ku mutwe aho abakozi bo ku mupaka batar@@ i. Ntabwo wabona umukozi uh@@ agarara ku mb@@ ibi z'@@ igihugu. I@@ cy'@@ ig@@ enzi ni uko tub@@ irwanya n'iyo byaba byageze mu gihugu@@ ." Minisitiri w'ubuzima Agnes Binagwaho yavuzeko impamvu z'@@ aya mabwiriza ari ukur@@ inda ubuzima bw'@@ abanyarwanda. Mu itegeko rishya rigena ibikwiye gukor@@ wamo amavuta ryagaragaje ibintu bigera ku 13@@ 45 biri mu mavuta agomba kwirind@@ wa,@@ ariko hakaba hari ubundi bwoko bw'@@ amavuta 95 abantu bashobora kwisiga ariko babanje guhabwa urugero ntar@@ eng@@ wa. Minisante ivuga ko ba nyir'@@ izi nganda zikora amavuta yac@@ iwe, bashobora gukosora bag@@ akuramo ibyo bigira ingaruka ku buzima bw'@@ umuntu, amavuta akagaruka ku isoko.

Nk'uko bitangazwa n'@@ Ibiro B@@ ikuru bya EAC, iyo nama iz@@ ayoborwa na Perezida wa Repubulika y'u Rwanda, Paul Kagame, izah@@ uriza hamwe abayobozi mu ishoramari ryo mu nganda n'ubucuruzi bw'@@ ibikomoka ku buhinzi, abafata ibyemezo, n'ibigo by'imari bikomeye biz@@ aturuka muri Afurika no hanze yayo bazag@@ aragar@@ izwa amahirwe ari mu Karere. Iyi nama ya ‘@@ East African Man@@ uf@@ ac@@ tur@@ ing Business Sum@@ m@@ it and Ex@@ h@@ ibit@@ ion@@ (E@@ AMB@@ S@@ )@@ ' izamara iminsi itatu yahawe insanganyamatsiko igira iti "@@ Guhuza imbaraga ziri mu ishoramari ryo mu nganda mu kwihutisha iterambere ry'@@ Ubuk@@ ung@@ u." New@@ v@@ ision dukesha iyi nkuru itangaza ko iyo nama iz@@ akorerwamo imurik@@ abikor@@ wa, aho abashoramar@@ i, ibigo by'@@ ubucuruzi, abashakashatsi n'@@ abahanga mu by'@@ amasomo baz@@ erekana ibishya mu ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu bijyanye n'ing@@ anda, cyane cyane ibigo bito n'ib@@ ic@@ iriritse. Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorerwa muri EAC, Jean Baptiste Havug@@ imana, yavuze ko iyo nama yateguwe n'@@ Ubunyamabanga bw'uyu Mur@@ yango, n'@@ Ihuriro rya Afurika y'Uburasirazuba ry'@@ Ubucuruzi (E@@ AB@@ C), na Guverinoma y'u Rwanda; iz@@ aganira ku mbogamizi zib@@ angamiye urwego rw'@@ inganda mu Karere. Havugimana yavuze ko iyo nama yash@@ ibutse mu bunararibonye bwo kubona ko iterambere rid@@ ashobora kugerwaho muri EAC mu gihe haba hatabayeho gushinga inganda zikora mu buryo buh@@ amye. Yagize ati "Iyi nama ni ahantu h'@@ ingenzi haz@@ igirwa ahazaza h'@@ inganda muri Afurika y'Ubur@@ asirazuba@@ ." Iyi nama igiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri nyuma y'@@ iy@@ abereye muri Sp@@ eke Res@@ ort Hotel, iherereye mu gace ka Muny@@ ony@@ o, i Kampala muri Uganda mu 2015. Guverineri K@@ abahizi yaganiriye n'abayobozi b'akarere ku mpamvu Rutsiro ikomeza gusigara inyuma Guverineri w'intara y'ubur@@ engerazuba, K@@ abahizi Celestin, yagiranye inama n'abakozi ndetse n'abayobozi batandukanye bo mu karere ka Rutsiro tariki 06@@ /04/201@@ 3 bagamije kwib@@ ukiranya ku cyo Leta ib@@ ifuz@@ aho, barebera hamwe aho intege nke zir@@ i, bafata n'ingamba zo kwik@@ osora kugira ngo bih@@ ute mu iterambere. Zimwe mu ngero Guverineri yag@@ aniriyeho n'abayobozi zigaragaza ko akarere k@@ atari kwihuta mu iterambere ni uko mu mwaka w'@@ imihigo ushize wa 201@@ 1/201@@ 2 kaje ku mwanya wa nyuma mu kwesa imih@@ igo. Muri uyu mwaka naho Rutsiro iri inyuma mu buhinzi ndetse no mu kurwanya isuri ndetse mu minsi ishize ngo kari mu turere tur@@ angwamo imibare minini y'@@ abafite imirire mibi uretse ko ubuyobozi bw'akarere buvuga ko iyo mibare yagabany@@ ijwe. Abayobozi baturutse ku rwego rw'@@ intara bavuze ko bitumvikana ukuntu akarere kar@@ waza bwaki kandi gat@@ uriye ikiyaga cya Kivu kibon@@ ekamo amafi n'is@@ am@@ baza, mu gihe kandi bigaragara ko hari n'umubare munini w'@@ inka zimaze gutangwa muri ako karere muri gahunda ya gir@@ inka. Guverineri K@@ abahizi yasabye abayobozi kugaragaza uruhare rwabo mu iterambere ry'@@ akarere ka Ruts@@ iro. Ubuyobozi bw'akarere bwas@@ abwe kwihutisha ubuhinzi bw'@@ icyayi kuko byagaragaye ko butari kwihuta kandi akarere ka Rutsiro ari kamwe mu turere tw@@ atoranyijwe dushobora kw@@ eramo icy@@ ayi. Mu bindi Guverineri K@@ abahizi yavuze ko bidindiza iterambere ry'@@ akarere harimo abayobozi bakora, ariko bageza kuwa gatanu bagakorera mu mirenge iri mu nzira zis@@ ohoka mu karere kugira ngo bah@@ ite bit@@ ahira hanze y'@@ akarere, bityo ntibabashe gukurikirana ibibera mu karere umunsi ku munsi. Abayobozi b'akarere kandi ban@@ enzwe kuba baragize intege nke mu gukumira ubucukuzi butemewe bw'amabuye y'@@ agaciro, bukunze gutwara ubuzima bwa bamwe, buk@@ angiza n'ib@@ idukikije cyane cyane amashyamba, ugasanga abac@@ ukura ayo mabuye nta nyungu bakuramo kuko nta terambere rigaragara aho batuye. Kugira ngo icyo kibazo gih@@ agarare ngo hashobora kwit@@ abazwa inzego zishinzwe umutekano hagamijwe gukumira abac@@ ukura ayo mabuye mu gihe hategerejwe ko amasosiyete afite ibyangombwa byuzuye ahabwa uburenganzira bwo gucukura amabuye y'@@ agaciro. Abayobozi mu nzego zitandukanye basabwe gukorera hamwe, bakirinda guhangana kuko hari ingero zagiye zigaragara z'@@ ubwumvikane bucye bugenda burangwa hagati y'@@ abayobozi. Guverineri K@@ abahizi yavuze ko kugira ngo iterambere ry'@@ akarere r@@ ibashe kugerwaho hagomba kugaragara ubufatanye n'uruhare rwa buri wese, ni ukuvuga abayobozi, abaturage n'@@ abafatanyabikor@@ wa. Ati: "@@ Reka rero tubanze turebe uruhare rwacu nk'@@ abayobozi kugira ngo iyo myanya y'@@ inyuma akarere gafite tubashe kuba tway@@ iv@@ ah@@ o". Iyo nama yari yatumiwemo abayobozi guhera mu kagari kugeza ku karere. Guverineri K@@ abahizi muri iyi minsi ari kugend@@ erera uturere tugize intara y'Iburengerazuba mu rwego rwo kuganira n'abayobozi ku bitagenda no gufata ingamba zih@@ amye, ibyo yise "@@ Open C@@ rit@@ ic@@ ism@@ ". Muri izo nama Guverineri ari gukorera muri buri karere ko mu ntara ay@@ obora, ahura n'abayobozi bose barimo abakozi ku rwego rw'@@ ak@@ agari, abakozi b'@@ umur@@ enge, abagize njyanama z'@@ ut@@ ugar@@ i, njyanama z'@@ imir@@ enge, abakozi bo ku karere, abarimu, abaganga n'abandi bose bafasha akarere mu iterambere no gukora ubukangurambaga mu baturage. Muri iyo nama barag@@ anira, bakar@@ ebera hamwe ahagaragara intege nke, ariko cyane cyane bikaba byar@@ ahur@@ iranye n'uko hari abari bavuye mu mwiherero w'@@ abayobozi bakuru b'@@ igihugu, abitabiriye uwo mwiherero bakaba bafite inshingano zo kugeza ku nzego zose iby@@ avug@@ iwemo hamwe n'ib@@ yemezo by@@ afashwe. Abarwayi umuganga umwe yit@@ aho bagiye kugabany@@ waho abarenga 3000 Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yiyemeje ko mu myaka irindwi iri imbere igiye kongera ibikorwa remezo, umubare n’ubushobozi bw’@@ abakozi b’@@ urwego rw’@@ ubuzima, ku buryo umubare w’@@ abarwayi ku muganga umwe uzag@@ abanukaho abagera ku 30@@ 5@@ 5. Minisitiri w’Intebe, Dr. Edouard Ngir@@ ent@@ e, yagejeje ku bagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko gahunda ya Guverinoma y’imyaka irindwi (@@ 2017-@@ 20@@ 24@@ ), agaragaza byinshi bizakorwa mu gukomeza guharanira ko Abanyarwanda bagira ubuzima bwiza kandi serivisi z’ubuvuzi zikagera kuri bose. Yavuze ko abaganga, abaganga b’@@ inz@@ ob@@ ere, abaforomo n’ababy@@ aza n’abandi bakozi b’@@ ibitaro baz@@ ongerwa bakan@@ ahabwa ubundi bushobozi buzatuma n’@@ igipimo cy’@@ abarwayi ku muganga umwe kig@@ abanuka, aho kiz@@ ava ku barwayi 10 05@@ 5 kikagera ku 7@@ 000. Yagize ati “@@ Ig@@ ipimo cy’@@ umubare w’@@ abarwayi ku muf@@ oromo umwe na cyo kiz@@ agabanuka k@@ ive ku 1 14@@ 2 kig@@ ere kuri 8@@ 00. Ig@@ ipimo cy’@@ umubare w’abagore ku muby@@ aza kizagera ku 2 500 kivuye ku bagore 4 0@@ 37@@ .” Minisitiri w’Intebe, yanavuze ko Guverinoma iteganya kubaka, kwagura no gushyira ibyangombwa bikwiye mu bitaro umunani birimo ibya Ruhengeri, Mun@@ ini, Byumba, Nyab@@ iken@@ ke, Mas@@ aka, Gat@@ unda, Gat@@ onde na Muh@@ oror@@ o. Haz@@ ubakwa kandi ibigo nderabuzima 17 mu mirenge itab@@ ig@@ iraga na Pos@@ te de Sant@@ é nshya 150 mu gihugu hose. Mu ngengo y’imari ya 2017/201@@ 7, urwego rw’ubuzima rwag@@ enewe miliyari 19@@ 3.@@ 6, akaz@@ akoreshwa mu bikorwa birimo kubaka no gusana ibitaro n’ibigo nderabuzima hirya no hino mu gihugu. Ubushakashatsi buh@@ eruka ku bw@@ iyongere bw’abaturage n’ubuzima bwabo, D@@ H@@ S, bwagaragaje ko igipimo cy’@@ umubare w’abagore bapfa babyara ari 2@@ 10@@ / 100 000, Guverinoma yiyemeje ko mu myaka irindwi kiz@@ agabanuka kikagera ku 12@@ 6@@ / 100 000. Ig@@ ipimo cy’@@ umubare w’abana bapfa batarageza ku myaka itanu na cyo kiz@@ agabanuka kig@@ ere kuri 25@@ /@@ 1.@@ 000 kivuye kuri 50@@ /@@ 1.@@ 000. Intego z’iterambere rirambye (S@@ DG@@ s), z@@ iteganya ko mu 20@@ 30 igipimo cy’@@ abagore bapfa babyara kiz@@ agabanuka bakagera munsi ya 70@@ /@@ 100 000. Mu gitaramo cya Peace One Day urubyiruko rw@@ akang@@ uriwe kuba umusemburo w'@@ amahoro Minisitiri w'@@ Urubyiruko n'@@ Ikoranabuhanga Jean Philbert Nsengimana arah@@ amagarira urubyiruko rw'u Rwanda guhagurukira kuba umusemburo w'@@ amahoro kugirango biy@@ ubakire igihugu cyabo. Tariki ya 21 Nzeri ni umunsi mpuzamahanga w'@@ amahoro ku isi, aho ibihugu yose biz@@ irikana ku mahoro ndetse bakan@@ ashishikariza abandi kugira uruhare mu kugarura amahoro ahar@@ angwa umutekano muke. Uyu munsi wizih@@ irijwe no mu Rwanda, urubyiruko rwas@@ abwe kugenda rub@@ iba amahoro aho bagenda hose, kandi bakoresheje imbaraga n'@@ ubwenge bwabo bwose. Minisitiri w'@@ Urubyiruko n'@@ Ikoranabuhanga Jean Philbert Nsengimana yahamagariye urubyiruko rw'u Rwanda guharanira amahoro by'umwihariko nk'@@ abakomoka mu gihugu cy@@ aciye mu bihe bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Yagize : "@@ Amahoro ntago ari imbyino umuntu aby@@ ina, amahoro ntago ari indirimbo umuntu ngo ar@@ ayir@@ irim@@ ba. Ni uburyo bw'@@ imyumvire umuntu agomba guharanira cyane cyane mwebwe urubyiruko twit@@ ezeho ejo hazaza hez@@ a." Urubyiruko rwitabiriye umunsi w'@@ Amahoro. Umuyobozi w'Umuryango Peace One Day wateguye iki gikorwa J@@ ere@@ my Gl@@ ley, yashimiye Leta y'u Rwanda ndetse n'umuryango w'abibumbye ko ba@@ bateye inkunga iki gikorwa, ndetse avuga ko agendeye ku bushake yabonanye abanyarwanda mu kubaka amahoro kuy@@ ageraho bishoboka. Yagize ati "Nd@@ ashimira aba@@ dut@@ eye inkunga bose hari mo Leta y'u Rwanda n'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ku nkunga badut@@ eye. Uruhare rwabo mu gutegura uyu munsi byany@@ eretse ko n@@ iduk@@ omeza gutya amahoro tuzay@@ ageraho nta kab@@ uz@@ a." Uw@@ ashinze Peace One Day J@@ ere@@ my Gl@@ ley Ibi birori kandi byitabiriwe n'abahanzi bakomeye muri Afurika nka Ali Kiba@@ ,@@ I@@ ce Princ@@ e, n'abandi aho barir@@ mb@@ ye indirimbo yar@@ irimb@@ iwe uyu munsi w'@@ amahoro. Hadi Janvier mu ikipe y’igihugu igiye gusiganwa muri Tour du Cameroun Hadi Janv@@ er yagarutse mu ikipe y’igihugu y’umukino w’amagare nyuma y’igihe kinini atay@@ ikinamo aho ajyanye na bagenzi be gusiganwa mu irushanwa riz@@ enguruka igihugu cya Cameroun rizwi nka Tour du Cameroun rizaba kuva tariki ya 10-1@@ 8 Werurwe 2018. Iyi kipe iz@@ erekeza muri Cameroun tariki ya 8 Werurwe. Ni ku nshuro ya kabiri abanyarwanda bagiye gukina muri Cameroun kuva uyu mwaka watangira aho b@@ eh@@ eruka kwandika amateka b@@ egukana irushanwa rya Tour de l’@@ Espoir ryari ryitabiriwe n’abakinnyi batarengeje imyaka 23 beza kurusha abandi ku mugabane wa Afurika. Ubus@@ ilamu ntaho buh@@ uriye n'ibikorwa bw'@@ iterabwo@@ ba@@ -@@ She@@ h Manir@@ iho Umuyobozi w'@@ I@@ bw@@ iriz@@ abutumwa mu muryango w'@@ Abayisilamu mu Rwanda, She@@ h Manir@@ iho Ismail@@ , avuga ko Ubus@@ ilamu buri kure cyane y'@@ iterabwoba kuko bigisha urukundo. B@@ ashyira indabo ku mva zishying@@ uwemo abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatuts@@ e. Yab@@ ivug@@ ize nyuma y'@@ igikorwa cyo gusura Urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 rwa Kigali, cyabaye kuri uyu wa 16 Nyakanga 2016 kikaba kitabiriwe n'urubyiruko rw'@@ Abayisilamu rw@@ aturutse mu bihugu binyuranye, aho rwaje mu Rwanda mu irushanwa mpuzamahanga ryo gusoma no gufata mu mutwe K@@ oroh@@ ani. She@@ h Manir@@ iho Ismail w@@ ifatanyije n'@@ uru rubyiruko muri iki gikorwa, avuga ko Isilamu ntaho ihuriye n'imitwe y'@@ iterabwoba. Yagize ati " Politiki Abayisilamu tug@@ enderaho mu Rwanda isobanura neza ko Ubus@@ ilamu ntaho buh@@ uriye n'@@ iterabwoba. Ubus@@ ilamu ni amahoro, ni urukundo no kwishyira hamwe, ni yo mpamvu nk'@@ urubyiruko tugomba kwamagana ibikorwa by'@@ ubwicanyi no guhohotera abantu byangiza isura yac@@ u". Akomeza avuga ko abag@@ ishaka gukorana n'imitwe y'@@ iterabwoba nta mwanya bafite mu Rwanda kuko nta cyiza cyayo. Umwe muri uru rubyiruko, Reh@@ ema Que@@ en, avuga ko abaturutse mu mahanga babonye ubutumwa bwiza baz@@ ajyan@@ a. Ati "B@@ ishimiye gusura uru rwibutso kuko biboneye ibyabaye mu Rwanda ariko kandi batangajwe n'@@ intambwe rug@@ ezeho rwiy@@ ubaka. B@@ ajyanye ubutumwa b@@ ubwira abat@@ inyaga kuza mu Rwanda ko uko bar@@ ut@@ ekerezaga atari ko ruri kuko bakiriwe neza". B@@ erekwa ban@@ asobanurirwa amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. She@@ h N@@ itanga Jam@@ id@@ u ukuriye itsinda ryateguye iri rushanwa, avuga ko kuba mu basuye urwibutso harimo n'abana bifite akamaro. Ati " Ni ngombwa ko abana bato bamenya amateka bityo batangire hakiri kare kwirinda ibikorwa by'@@ urugomo ndetse n'aba@@ ba bafite ibitekerezo bid@@ ahw@@ itse birimo n'iby'@@ ubuh@@ ezanguni big@@ ishwe babir@@ eke bagire imyitwarire myiz@@ a". Ah@@ am@@ ad Sw@@ idik@@ iy@@ , Umunyam@@ isiri akaba n'umuk@@ emurampaka muri iri rushanwa, yababajwe n'@@ ibyabaye mu Rwanda akumva bitaz@@ agira ahandi biba@@ . Ati "Ni ubwa mbere ns@@ uye iki gihugu, ariko ibyishimo nari mfite ng@@ isura bih@@ indutse agahinda nyuma yo kubona ibyak@@ iba@@ yeho. Ibi ni ibikorwa by'@@ ubunyam@@ aswa byatwaye ubuzima bw'abantu n'ibintu ndetse n'ibyishimo by'@@ Abany@@ arw@@ ad@@ a, natanga ubutumwa bw'@@ uko bitazongera kuba ukundi ku is@@ i". Aya marushanwa abaye ku nshuro ya gatanu arimo kubera mu Karere ka Gicumbi, yitabiriwe ahanini n'abana bato baturutse mu bihugu icyenda byo ku mugabane w'@@ Afurika.

MINISANTE irah@@ umuriza abaturage bumvaga ko baterwa Malariya n'@@ inzitiramibu bahawe Abaturage batuye mu karere ka Gicumbi baremeza ko indwara ya Mar@@ aliya ariyo bari kurwara muri iyi minsi kandi ko iterwa n'@@ inzit@@ ir@@ abibu bahawe zit@@ ameze neza kuburyo zid@@ ashobora kurwanya iyo mar@@ al@@ iya. Minisiteri y'ubuzima yo ir@@ abasaba kwizera inzitiramibu bahabwa n'ubwo koko iza mbere zitari zujuje ubuziranenge. Muri aka Karere ka Gicumbi, mu Murenge wa Kag@@ eyo, abaturage baho bemeza ko muri iyi minsi Mar@@ aliya ariyo ndwara yig@@ anje mu miryango . Aba baturage bavuga ko guhera mu mpera z'umwaka ushize ari bwo Mar@@ aliya yatangiye kwiyongera ku kigero cyo hejuru. Aba baturage kandi bavuga ko bigishwa kuyirwanya bakangurirwa kurwanya imibu ndetse no kurara mu nzit@@ iram@@ ib@@ u, ariko kandi bakavuga ko inzitiramibu Leta yabahaye ari zo bumva ko z@@ abateye iyo Mar@@ al@@ iya. Abag@@ aniriye na Makuruki.rw bemeza ko iyi ndwara n'ubwo iri kugabanuka ariko n'ubu abaturage bakiy@@ ir@@ wara. Uyu yagize ati:"@@ Indwara ziba hano urebye Mar@@ aliya niyo yari itum@@ ereye nabi mu minsi ishize ariko iragenda igabanuka naho ubundi mu minsi ishize wari kugira ngo ni icyorezo cy@@ ad@@ uteye ino ah@@ a." Uyu nawe yagize ati:"@@ Urebye rero ino Mar@@ aliya niyo yari itur@@ emb@@ eje hambere ah@@ a… inzitiramibu se turaz@@ ifite ariko ahubwo ngo nizo zay@@ id@@ uteye niko n'@@ umv@@ a." Uyu ati:"@@ Yewe mar@@ aliya niyo tumaze iminsi tur@@ wara nk'uko babik@@ ubwiye n'ubu kandi ugeze hariya kwa muganga ubona ko itar@@ ashira … inzitiramibu baraz@@ id@@ uhaye turaz@@ ikoresha ariko twumva ko ngo arizo z@@ abiteye kuko ngo zitari zit@@ ung@@ anye@@ ." Iki kibazo cy'@@ inzitiramibu aba baturage bavuga na Minisiteri y'ubuzima (@@ MINISANT@@ E@@ ), iherutse kwemera ko yatum@@ ije mu mahanga iz@@ irenga miliyoni 3 ariko zikaza zidafite umuti uhagije ndetse nayo ik@@ emera ko zagize uruhare mu kongera Mar@@ aliya yari imaze iminsi yar@@ ibasiye Abat@@ ur@@ arwanda. Ibi ariko Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri iyi Minisiteri Ndimub@@ anzi Patrick, avuga ko n'ubwo byabaye ariko abaturage bakwiye kwizera inzit@@ irab@@ imu bari guhabwa ubu. Ati:@@ "@@ Inz@@ it@@ iram@@ ibu turi gutanga muri iki gihe abaturage bagomba kwizera ko nta kibazo zifite kuko twabanje kuz@@ ipima n'ubwo iza mbere koko zari zifite ikibaz@@ o.@@ Tw@@ az@@ itanze duhereye mu duce twig@@ anjemo Mar@@ aliya ndetse no ku bagore batwit@@ e." Kuri uyu wa 26 Mata 2016 ni bwo Ministeri y'ubuzima yatangije icyumweru cyo kwita ku buzima bw'umwana n'ubw'@@ umubyeyi, ikaba yasabye abaturage kwita ku isuku ndetse n'ibindi byose byar@@ inda abana bari munsi y'imyaka 5 ndetse n'abagore batwite kurw@@ arag@@ urika indwara zirimo na Mal@@ ariya. Insanganyamatsiko y'iki cyumweru igira it@@ i @@ « @@ Tw@@ ite ku buzima bw'@@ umubyeyi n'umwana tun@@ afatanya kurandura mal@@ ariy@@ a @@ ».
Umubyeyi wa Joseph Habineza wan@@ ayoboye Inama y’@@ Aba@@ prot@@ est@@ anti mu Rwanda yitabye Imana U@@ tum@@ abahutu Jean, umubyeyi wa Habineza Joseph wabaye Minisitiri w’umuco na Siporo akaba na Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Nigeria, yitabye Imana azize uburwayi, uyu akaba afite izina rikomeye muri ‘@@ Eg@@ lise Pr@@ es@@ by@@ t@@ éri@@ enne au Rwanda@@ ’, EPR@@ , yakoreye ubuzima bwe bwose n’Inama y’@@ Aba@@ prot@@ est@@ anti mu Rwanda yabereye Umun@@ amabanga Mukuru imyaka 25. Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 15 Kanama 2018 nibwo inkuru y’urupfu rwa U@@ tum@@ abahutu yam@@ enyek@@ anye, waguye muri Kenya aho yari yagiye kwivuriza mu bitaro biri mu Mujyi wa Nairobi. Habineza Joseph yabwiye IGIHE ko umubyeyi we yitabye Imana azize uburwayi, akaba yaramaze igihe kinini cy’ubuzima bwe akora umurimo w’@@ itorero, harimo imyaka 25 yamaze akorera Inama y’@@ Aba@@ porot@@ est@@ anti mu Rwanda, Con@@ se@@ il Prot@@ est@@ ant du Rwanda, C@@ PR@@ . Yakomeje agira ati “Y@@ azize kanseri ya pr@@ ost@@ ate, tw@@ abimenye hakiri kare t@@ umuj@@ yana kwa muganga i Nairobi, bagerageza kum@@ uvura bamuha n’imiti azajya afat@@ a. Mu minsi ishize twari twabonye afite intege nke turavuga tuti reka turebe uko tw@@ amusubiza kwa mug@@ anga.” “Ubwo rero yagiye ejo saa kumi n’imwe n’indege ya RwandAir@@ . Uyu munsi mu gitondo yitabye Imana yari amaze kwambara agiye kujya kureba muganga ariko ahita as@@ inz@@ irira mu ntebe ar@@ igend@@ era.” Umuyobozi w’Inama y’@@ Aba@@ prot@@ est@@ anti mu Rwanda, Bishop Kayin@@ amura Samuel, yabwiye IGIHE ko U@@ tum@@ abahutu yari umuntu w’@@ inyangamug@@ ayo. Yagize ati “Y@@ abaye Umunyamabanga mukuru w’Inama y’@@ Aba@@ prot@@ est@@ anti mu Rwanda, kandi yay@@ ikoreye igihe kinini ay@@ ikorera neza, afite ubuhamya bwiza ni umukirisitu mwiza no mu zabukuru ze yari agis@@ enga kandi ag@@ ikunze umurimo w’Imana kuko yari umuririmbyi muri kor@@ ari. Igihugu, Itorero ndetse n’Inama y’@@ abap@@ ot@@ est@@ ani mu Rwanda tub@@ uze umuntu w’@@ ingir@@ akamar@@ o.” U@@ tum@@ abahutu yavutse ku wa 15 Kamena 19@@ 40 yitaba Imana ku wa 15 Kanama 2018, akaba yatabarutse afite imyaka 7@@ 8. Uretse kuba yari umuntu wagize akamaro gakomeye mu buzima bw’itorero EPR@@ , U@@ tum@@ abahutu yize kaminuza kubera aba@@ prot@@ est@@ anti bamw@@ ishy@@ uriye mu gihugu cy’u Busuw@@ isi. Icyorezo cya Ebola cyageze mu mujyi wa Goma uhana imbibi n’akarere ka Rubavu Ubuyobozi bwa Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Kongo bwam@@ enyesheje ko bwa mbere habonetse umurwayi ufite Ebola mu mujyi wa Goma utuwe n’abantu barenga miliyoni. Uyu mujyi uhana imbibi n’umujyi wa Gisenyi mu burengerazuba bw’u Rwanda. Minisiteri y’ubuzima yamenyesheje ko hari umup@@ as@@ itoro was@@ uzumwe bagasanga afite iyi ndwara ubwo yari ageze i Goma ejo ku cyumweru aje n’imodoka itwara abagenzi. Iyi minisiteri ariko ivuga ko ibyago ko iyi ndwara iza gukwirakwira muri uyu mujyi biri ku kigero cyo hasi. Inkuru ya b@@ b@@ c ivuga ko abantu barenga 1,@@ 600 bamaze kwicwa na Ebola kuva yakw@@ aduka mu burasirazuba bwa Kongo mu mwaka ushize. Uyu mup@@ as@@ itoro yageze i Goma avuye kuri kilometero 200 i But@@ embo, aha hakaba hari abantu bafashwe n’iyi ndwara. Itangazo rya minisiteri y’ubuzima ya Kongo rigira rit@@ i, "@@ Kubera uburyo uyu murwayi yabonetse akan@@ ashyirwa mu kato vuba, ibyago ko iyi ndwara ikwirakwira mu mujyi wa Goma biri has@@ i". Biravugwa ko umushoferi n’abagenzi 18 yari atwaye baza guk@@ ingirwa kuri uyu wa mbere. Umujyi wa Goma umaze igihe witeguye guhangana n’iyi ndwara. Umujyi wa Gisenyi mu Rwanda bisa n’ib@@ ifat@@ anye, nawo hashize igihe witegura guhangana na Ebola mu gihe yahag@@ era. Ebola yandura iyo umuntu akor@@ anyeho n’inyamaswa cyangwa umuntu uyir@@ waye, cyangwa akoze ku murambo w’uwo yish@@ e. Y@@ andura vuba kuko amat@@ embabuzi yose kandi macye y’@@ uyirwaye ashobora kwanduza ut@@ ayir@@ waye uy@@ akoz@@ eho.

Uyu muriro wabuze mu masaha ya saa yine z'@@ ijoro, ukaba wabuze ahantu henshi hatandukanye mu gihugu, dore ko abantu batandukanye mu bice by'igihugu bavugaga ko guhera muri ayo masaha bari mu mwijima ukabije. Mu itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara n'ubuyobozi bw'iyi sosiye@@ te, rivuga ko iri bura ry'@@ umuriro ry@@ abayeho hafi mu gihugu hose ryatewe n'iy@@ angirika ry'@@ umuyoboro munini w'amashanyarazi uva Mur@@ uru mu karere ka Rusizi ujya I Gikondo, bityo bituma habaho iri bura ry'@@ umuriro. Ubu buyobozi buvuga ko uyu muyoboro ush@@ amikiye ku ng@@ omero za Rusizi ya II, Nyabarongo ndetse no kuri Kiv@@ u@@ W@@ att@@ . Ikibazo ry'@@ ibura ry'@@ umuriro rya hato na hato ryakomeje kugenda ry@@ umvikana mu bantu batandukanye cyane abikorera ku giti cyabo, aho baba bavuga ko igenda rya hato na hato ry'@@ umuriro w'amashanyarazi ri@@ batera igihombo ndetse no ritar@@ etse no kub@@ angir@@ iriza ibikoresho byabo bik@@ enera umuriro w'@@ amashanyarazi.

Inyungu ziri mu kugira ‘@@ Web@@ sit@@ e’ ih@@ erekeza ibikorwa byawe by’ubucuruzi Muri iki gihe ikoranabuhanga rimaze gutera imbere ndetse n’umubare w’@@ abakoresha internet ukaba urushaho kwiyongera, ibigo by’ubucuruzi n’abantu ku giti cyabo bafite ibikorwa runaka bashakisha uburyo bakoresha aya mahirwe mu kurushaho kwagura no guteza imbere ibyo bakora. Ikoranabuhanga, by’umwihariko internet ni kimwe mu bikoresho bishobora gufasha uwari we wese gutuma ibyo akora biva ku rwego rumwe bikajya ku r@@ undi, igihe ay@@ ikoresheje neza kandi uko bikwiye. Mu bisubizo byagufasha guteza imbere ibyo ukora harimo urubuga rwa internet (@@ Web@@ sit@@ e), kuko ari uburyo bworoshye bwo gusakaza amakuru, ndetse n’ab@@ ifuza kumenya ibyo ikora bakabig@@ eraho bit@@ abasabye gukora urugendo ngo babe bag@@ usanga aho ukor@@ era. Umuntu ufite igikorwa cy’@@ ubucuruzi ariko atagira Website ah@@ omba amahirwe n’inyungu nyinshi cyane zirim@@ o:   K@@ umenyesha abantu ibyo ukora igihe cyose n’aho bari hose Imwe mu nyungu yo kugira urubuga rwa internet igihe ufite ibikorwa by’@@ ubucuruzi, ni uko umuntu aho yaba ari hose ku Isi abasha kumenya ibyo ukora kandi at@@ avuye aho ari. Ikindi kandi mu gihe ibiro bisanzwe usanga hari igihe kigera bag@@ afung@@ a, abakozi bakajya kuryama cyangwa kuruhuka, web@@ site yo ihora ifunguye ku buryo abantu bay@@ isura isaha iyo ariyo yose bashak@@ iye, ndetse bakabasha kubon@@ aho ibisubizo by’ibibazo byose bibaz@@ aga, ariko bat@@ agera aho ukorera ngo babone ub@@ ibas@@ ubiza.   Icyizere Website ni bumwe mu buryo bufasha ubucuruzi bwawe kubwira abakiliya n’abandi bashobora gukenera ibyo ucur@@ uza, impamvu bakwiye gush@@ ingiraho bakw@@ izera ndetse bak@@ akug@@ ana. Ibi big@@ irwamo uruhare n’amakuru atandukanye yerekeye ibyo ukora uba w@@ ashyiz@@ eho, ndetse n’ubuhamya bw’@@ abag@@ uze ibicuruzwa ufite, cyangwa bakoresheje serivisi zawe buk@@ aza bub@@ ishim@@ angira. Burya abantu benshi mbere yo kugura ik@@ intu, cyangwa gukoresha serivisi runaka, akenshi babanza kugenzura niba ari ibyo kwizerwa koko. Mu buryo bifashisha harimo kubaza abay@@ ikoresh@@ eje, cyangwa se bagashaka amakuru banyuze kuri internet, ari naho web@@ site yawe igirira akamaro.   Kum@@ enyekanisha ibyo ukora N’ubwo hari ubundi buryo bwinshi ushobora kum@@ enyekan@@ ishamo ibikorwa byawe (@@ market@@ ing@@ ), web@@ site yagakwiye kuba amahitamo yawe ya mbere kuko ifite umwihariko wo kuba y@@ oroshye, ndetse uretse amakuru ushyir@@ aho, nayo ubwayo ni igikoresho gituma um@@ enyekana. Niyo mpamvu ari ingenzi cyane kwita ku makuru ushyira ku rubuga rwawe rwa internet, kuko arirwo rw@@ ereka abat@@ abasha kugera aho ukor@@ era, ishusho nyayo y’ibyo ukora.   Kongera ingano y’abag@@ ura ibyo ucuruza Niba uri umucuruzi ufite iduka runaka, web@@ site ishobora kugira uruhare mu kongera umubare w’@@ abaza kugura ibicuruzwa by@@ awe. Uko umubare w’@@ abasura urubuga rwawe rwa internet w@@ iyongera, niko aba@@ kugana barushaho kuba benshi bitewe n’amakuru bas@@ anz@@ eho. Ushobora kandi no kurw@@ ifashisha mu gucur@@ uza, aho kugira ngo abantu bakore urugendo baza aho ucur@@ ur@@ iza, bakaba babig@@ ura banyuze kuri web@@ site yawe, ubundi muk@@ umvikana uko ub@@ ibag@@ ezaho.   K@@ ungurana ibitekerezo Indi nyungu iri mu kugira web@@ site ni uko byoroshye cyane kumenya icyo abakiliya bawe bag@@ ut@@ ekerezaho ndetse n’icyo bifuza ko w@@ ashyiramo imbaraga. Ushobora kuganira nabo binyuze kuri e-@@ mail@@ , ch@@ at cyangwa se uk@@ abaha umwanya bashyiramo ibitekerezo byabo (@@ com@@ men@@ ts@@ ), nawe ukaz@@ afata uwo kubis@@ oma ndetse byaba ngombwa uk@@ abas@@ ubiza. Ibi bigira uruhare runini mu kubaka umubano ukomeye, kuko uko mur@@ ushaho kumenyana ariko barushaho kukw@@ izera, nawe ukamenya uburyo urushaho kunoza ibyo ukora ngo uh@@ aze ukw@@ ifuza kwabo. Ikindi ni uko bishobora no kuk@@ ungura ibitekerezo by’@@ uburyo war@@ ushaho kwag@@ uka. Izi nyungu n’izindi tut@@ avuze ariko si urubuga rwose rwa internet rufite ubushobozi bwo kuz@@ ik@@ ug@@ ezaho, kuko bitewe n’uburyo rw@@ ubatse rushobora kur@@ utwa n’@@ urud@@ ahari ari nayo mpamvu ari ngombwa ko ufata umwanya uh@@ agije, ndetse ukan@@ itabaza abab@@ ifitemo ubumenyi bw@@ isumbuye bakag@@ uha inama n’@@ ibitekerezo. Kwizera Emmanuel na mukuru w’umugore we witabye Imana bar@@ anzwe mu rusengero Umuvugabutumwa Kwizera Emmanuel ukorera ivugabutumwa mu Itorero Evangelical Restoration Church (@@ ER@@ C) na Coc@@ o Kal@@ igirwa uv@@ ukana n’umugore we wa mbere witabye Imana bar@@ anzwe mu rusengero mbere gato y’uko bakora ubukwe. Kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 29 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo Ev. Kwizera na Kal@@ igirwa bar@@ anzwe mu rusengero na Pasiteri Aaron Ruh@@ imb@@ ya wabas@@ abiye umugisha no guh@@ irwa mu rugendo rwo kubaka umuryango mushya binj@@ iyemo. Pasiteri Ruh@@ imb@@ ya yag@@ iz@@ e” Ubuhamya bwanyu bur@@ ar@@ inzwe, ubu mujye mug@@ endana , mus@@ angire muri za Rest@@ aur@@ ents zose. Mug@@ end@@ ane kugeza iriya tarik@@ i. Imana ibahe umugish@@ a.” Ubukwe bw’aba bombi buteg@@ anyijwe tariki 21 Werurwe 2020 mu gihe mu ntangiriro z’@@ Ugushyingo 2019 aribwo Ev. Kwizera yambitse impeta Kal@@ igirwa amusaba ko bar@@ ushinga undi nawe nta gushidikanya aram@@ wem@@ erera. Kal@@ igirwa ni mukuru w’umugore wa Kwizera ndetse ni we was@@ igaye yita ku bana K@@ unda yabyaranye na Kw@@ izera. K@@ unda yitabye Imana tariki ya 6 Kanama 2017, azize indwara ya kanseri y’@@ umwijima yari amaranye amezi atanu. Yag@@ uye mu bitaro byitiriwe Umwami Faisal aho yari amaze icyumweru ar@@ war@@ iye. Abas@@ eng@@ anye n’abak@@ oranye na we bam@@ ufataga nk’@@ inkoramutima ndetse bamush@@ ima ubutwari bw@@ amur@@ anze no kwicisha bugufi yagiraga imbere y’abantu bose. Ku wa 5 Kanama 2018 mu rusengero rwa Restoration Church ku Kimisagara ubwo h@@ ibuk@@ waga umwaka K@@ unda amaze yitabye Imana, Umuvugabutumwa Kwizera yatangaje ko yatangije umuryango ‘@@ La K@@ unda Found@@ ation’ ugamije gushyigikira ibikorwa byiza byaranze umugore we. Uyu muryango w@@ ibanda ku gufasha abana bakennye kurusha abandi kwiga, gufasha abashakanye kubaka ingo zabo neza no gukora amasengesho yo gusengera ibihugu bit@@ arag@@ eramo ubutumwa bwiza. Kwizera Emmanuel akorera umurimo w’Imana mu Muryango Nyafurika w’@@ Ivug@@ abutumwa (A@@ EE@@ ) muri Kenya. Yam@@ enyekanye cyane mu murimo w’Imana kuva akiri muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda i Butare, ari naho yakiriye Yesu nk’@@ Umwami n’@@ Umukiza we. Umugore we wa mbere K@@ unda yatabarutse afite imyaka 37, yamus@@ igiye abana batatu barimo abakobwa babiri n’umuhungu umwe. Mu ntangiriro z'@@ Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo Ev. Uko Umuganura wizih@@ izwaga mu mateka y’u Rwanda Umuganura ufite umwihariko mu mateka y’u Rwanda rwo h@@ amb@@ ere@@ ! Ab@@ angavu babyariye iwabo bar@@ asobanura uko batwaye inda Mu Murenge wa Rusororo mu Karere ka Gasabo mu Mujyi wa Kigali hari abangavu babyariye iwabo mbere y’uko bashinga ingo zabo. Umwe muri bo avuga ko impamvu zituma abangavu babyar@@ ira iwabo batar@@ ashaka abagabo ngo biterwa n’uko abakobwa baba bageze mu gihe imiterere y’@@ imibiri yabo iba@@ jyana mu gutekereza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, noneho umuhungu yash@@ uka umukobwa, bombi kwifata bik@@ abag@@ ora. Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kugaruka mu isura nshya Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri, ryateguwe mu buryo bwihariye kuko rizabera kuri internet bitewe n’ingamba zafashwe mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19. Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika ryateguwe mu gufasha abahanzi bo mu Rwanda kwegerana n’abakunzi babo. R@@ yatangijwe mu mwaka ushize aho ry@@ anyuze mu ntara zitandukanye z’igihugu ris@@ orezwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Ku nshuro ya kabiri Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kongera kuba, ariko izaba mu buryo butandukanye n’ubwa mbere. Kuri ubu izajya ica kuri Televiziyo Rwanda no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga z’@@ iri serukiramuco mu rwego rwo gususurutsa abantu batak@@ ibona uko bitabira ibitaramo by’@@ abahanzi kubera COVID-19. Mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko Abanyarwanda bakw@@ icwa n’ir@@ ungu muri ibi bihe ibitaramo bitemewe ndetse no gufasha abahanzi gukora ibitaramo biteguye neza bagas@@ abana n’abakunzi babo, ubuyobozi bwa East African Promot@@ ers (E@@ A@@ P) bwongeye gutegura Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri. Amakuru ava imbere muri EA@@ P ahamya ko iyi kompanyi isanzwe itegura iri serukiramuco yanze kuryama kuko ibitaramo byah@@ agaritswe ih@@ itamo gushaka inzira zo gukora ibitaramo byiza kandi bigezweho bizajya bica kuri internet no kuri televiziyo abantu bakabik@@ urikirana hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga. IGIHE ifite amakuru yizewe yuko ibi bitaramo bigiye gutangira kuba mu minsi ya vuba ndetse bik@@ azajya biba biteg@@ uwe neza mu rwego rwo gukomeza gutuma umuziki w’u Rwanda ug@@ uma ku rwego rushim@@ ishije. Nubwo nta muntu uwo ariwe wese wo muri EA@@ P w@@ ifuje kuduha amakuru kuri ibi bit@@ aramo, ahari ni uko ari ibitaramo bizajya bica kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda (R@@ TV@@ ) ndetse no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga za Iwacu muzika Festival mu rwego rwo gufasha abantu bazaba batari hafi ya televiz@@ iyo. Ni ibitaramo byat@@ umiwemo abahanzi batandukanye kandi bagezweho nubwo amazina yabo atar@@ atangazwa. Ibi bitaramo biz@@ amara amezi arenga atatu biba buri wa Gatandatu w’icy@@ umweru. Buri muhanzi azajya ahabwa umunsi we ataram@@ ire abakunzi be n’ab’@@ umuziki Nyarwanda muri rusange. Iwacu Muzika Festival ni ubwa kabiri igiye kuba, cyane ko mu mwaka wa 2019 yaz@@ engurutse mu ntara zose z’igihugu abahanzi batandukanye bashim@@ isha abakunzi babo. Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika Festival ryatang@@ irijwe i Musanze ku wa 22 Kamena 2019 kuri Stade Ubw@@ oroherane ris@@ orezwa i Kigali mu gitaramo cy’@@ imbat@@ uram@@ ugabo cyatumiwemo umuhanzi ufite izina ryam@@ amaye mu muziki wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, Nas@@ ee@@ b Abdul Juma [@@ Diamond Platnum@@ z@@ ] wat@@ aramiye ibihumbi by’@@ abari muri Par@@ king ya Stade Amahoro i Remera. Afr@@ ex@@ imb@@ ank igiye gutanga miliyari 3@@ $ yo guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus muri Afurika Banki Nyafurika iteza imbere ubucuruzi (@@ Afr@@ ex@@ imb@@ ank@@ ), yatangaje ko izatanga inkunga ya miliyari eshatu z’amadolari ya Amerika, yo gufasha ibihugu bin@@ yamuryango kuri uyu mugabane ngo bish@@ obore guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Iyi nkunga yemejwe n’ubuyobozi bw’@@ inama y’ubutegetsi y’iyi banki, yateranye tariki 20 Werurwe 2020. Umugabane wa Afurika ukomeje kwibasirwa na Coronavirus yibasiye Isi muri rusange, imibare igaragaza ko mu bihugu 54 bigize uyu mugabane, iki cyorezo cyamaze kugera mu bihugu 4@@ 3, abantu barenga 17@@ 00 bamaze kwandura naho 56 bamaze gupfa. Ibi byatumye ibihugu byinshi kuri uyu mugabane bifata ingamba zikomeye kugira ngo iki cyorezo kid@@ akomeza gukwirakwira mu buryo bworoshye, harimo guhagarika ingendo z’indege n’ibindi bikorwa by’@@ ubucuruzi. Tariki 13 uku kwezi, Ikigo Nyafurika cy’@@ ibarurishamibare (E@@ CA@@ ), cyatangaje ko uyu mugabane uzah@@ omba akayabo ka miliyari 65 z’amadolari ya Amerika kubera ihungabana ry’@@ ibikomoka kuri peteroli na miliyari 101 z’amadolari kubera ibyo w@@ oherez@@ aga mu mahanga muri uyu mwaka wa 2020. Iyi banki ivuga ko iyi nkunga izakoreshwa mu gufasha ibihugu bigize Afr@@ ex@@ imb@@ ank mu bijyanye n’ingaruka iki cyorezo kirimo gut@@ eza, byaba mu by’ubuzima ndetse n’ubuk@@ ungu. Itangazo ryayo rivuga ko izafasha kandi banki nkuru z’ibihugu n’ibindi bigo by’@@ imari, kubera ingaruka iki cyorezo cy@@ abig@@ iz@@ eho. Iz@@ afasha kandi mu gushyira mu gushyira ku murongo ibijyanye n’@@ amadev@@ ize, ikibazo cy’@@ iby@@ injizwa mu bihugu n’ibindi. Ivuga ko izafasha ibihugu aho wasangaga ubukungu bwabyo bushingiye ku byo by@@ ohereza mu mahanga harimo nk’@@ amabuye y’agaciro, ubu bikaba byar@@ ahuye n’@@ isubira inyuma ry’amafaranga byav@@ an@@ agamo. Ubu bufasha buz@@ aza buc@@ iye mu nkunga zihabwa ibyo bihugu, mu ng@@ uzany@@ o, ingwate n’ubundi buryo. Perezida wa Afr@@ ex@@ imb@@ ank@@ , Prof. Bened@@ ic@@ t Or@@ amah@@ , yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cy@@ azanye akaga gakomeye n’@@ ihungabana ry’@@ ubukungu. Yagize ati “@@ Uretse ingaruka zikomeye kirimo kugira ku kir@@ emwam@@ untu, iki cyorezo cyagize ingaruka ku bukungu bw’@@ Isi, kizatuma kandi ubukungu buhung@@ abana ku kigero cya 0.@@ 4@@ %@@ .” Yavuze kandi ko ubukungu bw’Isi buz@@ ava kuri 2.@@ 9% bwariho mu 2019, bug@@ ere kuri 2.@@ 5% mu 2020. Ati “@@ Uburyo bwihuse bwo gufasha bur@@ akenewe mu guhangana n’iki kibazo kuri uyu mugabane, Afurika irimo kugira ihungabana rikomeye mu byo yak@@ uraga mu buk@@ erarugendo, isubira inyuma ry’@@ amafaranga, ihindagurika ry’ibiciro by’@@ ibiribwa n’@@ ihungabana ry’ibyo bakor@@ ag@@ a.” Yavuze ko Afr@@ ex@@ imb@@ ank iz@@ akorana n’am@@ abanki y’iterambere mu bihugu bisanzwe, kugira ngo ibi bihugu bish@@ obore guhangana n’ingaruka zirimo guterwa n’iki cyorezo. Afr@@ ex@@ imb@@ ank isanzwe ifite amateka mu gufasha ibihugu bya Afurika mu gihe havutse ikibazo cy’@@ ihungabana ry’@@ ubukungu. Mu 2015 ubwo habaga ikibazo cy’@@ ihungabana ry’ubukungu, iyi banki yatanze inkunga ya miliyari 10 z’amadolari ya Amerika ku bihugu bin@@ yamur@@ yango. Banki Nyafurika iteza imbere ubucuruzi yashinzwe mu 1993, ishingwa na za leta kuri uyu mugabane n’ab@@ ikorera. Kuva mu 1994 imaze gutanga inkunga ya miliyari 67 ku bikorwa by’@@ ubucuruzi, naho umutungo fatizo wayo ugera kuri miliyari 13 z’amadolari ya Amerika. Afr@@ ex@@ imb@@ ank yiyemeje kugoboka umugabane wa Afurika mu guhangana n'ingaruka za Coronavirus

Iki kibazo kik@@ imara kug@@ aragara, BNR yashyizeho ingamba kugira ngo urwego rw’@@ iv@@ unjisha rud@@ ahung@@ abana. Ubusanzwe buri Cyumweru Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu yashyiraga ku isoko ry’@@ iv@@ unjisha miliyoni enye z’amadolari. Ni amafaranga atangwa kuri za banki no ku bigo bitanga serivisi z’@@ iv@@ unjisha kugira ngo aba@@ yak@@ eneye bat@@ aza kuy@@ abura, ariko ubu uwo mubare war@@ iyong@@ ereye. Ni izo ngamba twafashe mu kunganira isoko ry’@@ iv@@ unjisha bituma abantu bakenera gutumiza ibintu hanze bat@@ abura amadev@@ ize ngo bim@@ are igihe kin@@ in@@ i.” Mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari wa 2019-@@ 20, agaciro k’@@ ifaranga ry’u Rwanda kag@@ abanutseho 4,@@ 3% mu mpera za Kamena 2020 ugereranyije n’@@ idolari rya Amerika, mu gihe kari kag@@ abanutseho 4,@@ 5% mu mpera za Kamena 2019. Tugomba gufata ingamba zihamye mu kwirinda Kans@@ er@@ i- Jeannette Kagame Madamu wa Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda ,@@ Jenn@@ ette Kagame, yasabye abatuye isi gufata ingamba zihamye mu kwirinda kanseri kuko ahanini ibiy@@ itera bishobora kwirind@@ wa. Ibi yabitangarije mu nama yateraniye i Kigali kuri uyu wa 07 Ugushyingo 2017 y’Umuryango Nyafurika ukora ubushakashatsi n’amahugurwa ku ndwara ya Kans@@ eri. Iyi nama yari ifite intego yo gushaka ibisubizo ku kibazo cy’ubw@@ iyongere bukabije bwa Kanseri muri Afurika no ku isi muri rusange. Muri 2015 ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye ryita ku buzima (OMS) ryerekanye ko buri mwaka kanseri yica abantu bak@@ abakaba Miliyoni icyenda (@@ miliyoni 8.@@ 8) kandi muri bo 70% bakomoka mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira y’amaj@@ yambere byiganjemo ibyo muri Afurika. Afurika kandi yonyine yihariye 60% by’@@ abarwaye kanseri ku isi. Madamu Jeannette Kagame yibukije abanya-@@ Afurika bose ko Kand@@ eri ari icyorezo gihangayikishije uyu mugabane abasaba guhagurukira rimwe bagafatanya gufata ingamba zihamye mu kuyirinda kuko ari indwara itar@@ obanura. Yagize ati: " Kanseri ntir@@ obanura imyaka, igitsina, idini, cyangwa urwego umuntu yaba arimo. Mu Rwanda tw@@ ababajwe no kubona uburyo abana n’aba@@ ku@@ ze bibas@@ irwa n’iyi nd@@ war@@ a." Yagaragaje ko mu Rwanda Abagabo bibasiwe na Kanseri ifata igitsina g@@ abo, abagore bakaba bibasiwe na kanseri y’@@ amabere n’iy’@@ ink@@ ondo y’umur@@ a, gusa ngo abana na bo ntibas@@ igaye kuko bibasiwe n’iyi ndwara ikunze kubafata ibice bitandukanye by’@@ umubiri. Jeannette Kagame yagaragaje ko ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko kimwe cya gatatu cy’@@ ibitera kanseri bishobora kwir@@ indwa ah@@ eraho asaba ko abanya-@@ Afurika bose bakwiye guhaguruka bagafata ingamba zo kwirinda kanseri. Ati: " Ubushakashatsi bumaze igihe bwerekanye ko hafi ya kimwe cya gatatu cy’@@ ibibazo bya kanseri bishobora kwirind@@ wa, twebwe rero nk’@@ abatuye isi, dufite inshingano yo gushyiraho uburyo bwizewe kandi buhamye bwo kuyir@@ ind@@ a." Yavuze ko abantu bakwiye kwirinda cyane ibintu bitera kanseri bishobora kwir@@ indwa nk’@@ ibikomoka ku mibereho ya buri munsi na sosiyete abantu babam@@ o. Ibi yabivuze ab@@ ishingiye ku kuba ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko 80% bya kanseri ifata abantu bakuru iterwa n’imyitwarire irimo kunywa itabi, inzoga, kurya cyane ibikomoka ku matungo n’ib@@ in@@ ure. B@@ igaragaza ko habayeho kwirinda bene iyi myitwarire Kanseri ishobora kug@@ abanuka. Yibukije abantu ko kwisuzumisha kanseri hakiri kare ari ngombwa ndetse anavuga ko hakwiye kubaho uburyo bwiza bwo guhererekanya amakuru kuri kanseri. Ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, Jenn@@ ette Kagame yavuze ko byibura 95% by’@@ abangavu bak@@ ingiwe kanseri y’ink@@ ondo y’@@ umura ndetse hakaba har@@ ashyizwe uburyo bwo gusuzuma no gukingira Kanseri mu bitaro bya Butaro mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda. Ibyo bitaro bya Butaro byakira nibura abarwayi 1000 ba kanseri ku mwaka kuko kuva by@@ atangira mu 2012 kugera mu 2016 byari bimaze kwakira abasaga 6@@ 000. Yavuze ko u Rwanda nk’igihugu kigamije kugera ku iterambere rirambye kitaz@@ acika intege mu kurwanya kanseri kandi anavuga ko mu mwaka utaha mu bitaro bya Gisirikare haz@@ ashyirwa uburyo bwo gufasha abafite ibibazo bya Kans@@ eri. Jenn@@ ette Kagame yasabye abatuye isi kurwanya no kwirinda kanseri

Uko isi igenda itera imbere, ubuzima bugenda buh@@ induka ku buryo kubera gush@@ abika no gushaka kwiteza imbere, usanga abakundana rimwe na rimwe ban@@ ashakanye nk’umugabo n’umugore bat@@ abana umunsi ku munsi nk’uko bisanzwe.
