Kuba mw@@ egeranye ku ngingo yo guhuza ibitsina Biragaragara neza ko iyo mukundana mutari kumwe, icya gatatu kiba kid@@ ahari kandi ubundi cy’ingenzi cyane kiba kid@@ ahari kuko ntiw@@ akw@@ egera umukunzi wawe mu buriri ngo mw@@ ishim@@ ane kandi muri ahantu hatandukanye. Ugomba kumenya ko kuba hari ukuntu wiy@@ umva mu muntu ariko mut@@ eger@@ anye, mut@@ abana ari nk’@@ ubucuti busanzwe busa. Kandi birumvikana ko uba ut@@ ifuza ko umukunzi wawe aba ari aho nk’@@ inshuti isanzwe cyangwa ngo wem@@ ere ko bibaho. Kugira ngo rero urukundo rwanyu ruk@@ omeze rus@@ ugire mu gihe uwo mukundana atak@@ uri hafi, ukwiye kugerageza gukora ibi bintu bikurikira: Iyo uwo mukundana ak@@ uri kure, icya mbere mukwiye gukora ni ukugira icyerekezo kimwe, uk@@ ita kumenya kwig@@ enzura no kugenzura uko wiy@@ umva ndetse ug@@ atera ingabo mu bitugu umukunzi wawe ukurikije uko yiy@@ umva n’ibihe arimo bim@@ ukora ku mutim@@ a…@@ gusa ntuk@@ ore nk’aho umukunzi wawe azag@@ ufasha igihe wumva ut@@ ent@@ eb@@ utse. Kubera ko muba mushobora guhura rimwe na rimwe mu buryo bud@@ ah@@ oraho, ni n’iby’@@ ingenzi cyane kumenya uko witwara nim@@ uhura amaso ku maso kugira ngo hatagira ikir@@ og@@ oya umub@@ on@@ ano wanyu cyangwa ukaz@@ amo agat@@ otsi. Ibi bituma umubano wanyu ugira ingufu nt@@ ube nk’@@ uhagaze ku buc@@ e. Ikindi cy’ingenzi mu rukundo ni ukw@@ izer@@ ana, kandi bikaba ingenzi cyane kurushaho iyo mukundana mutari kumwe. U@@ ba ukwiye kwiyumvisha ko imbaraga n’igihe uta ku mukunzi ukuri ziz@@ abyara ibyishimo by’ubuzima muz@@ aban@@ amo. 1. Muk@@ wiye guhuza icyerekezo cy’ubuzima Kuba muh@@ uje icyerekezo cy’ubuzima ntibit@@ uma mw@@ iyumv@@ anamo gusa ahubwo bituma wumva umukunzi wawe arushaho kug@@ ukur@@ ura. Reka ng@@ uhe ingero ebyiri zis@@ obanura neza ibyo n@@ andits@@ e: Urugero rwa mbere: Sarah na Joe bakundana batari kumw@@ e@@ kandi ni bwo bag@@ itangira gukorana umushinga wo kuri murandasi (@@ on@@ line business@@ ). Bafite icyerekezo kimwe kuko bashaka kwiteza imbere ariko ban@@ agirira abantu benshi akamaro. Bafite intego ko bazatangira kuba mu mujyi umwe mu mwaka ukurikir@@ a. Urugero rwa kabir@@ i: Alex na Samantha bar@@ ashakanye ariko ubu amwe aba kure y’@@ undi. Bab@@ yaranye abana babiri, umuhungu w’imyaka 13 n’umukobwa w’imyaka 11. Bombi bakunda abana babo kandi bifuza ko abo bana babaho mu buzima bw’umuryango w@@ ishimye. Kuko bifuza kuba icyitegererezo cy’umuryango w@@ ishimye ku bana babo, Alex na Samantha bafite umugambi wo kuz@@ imuka noneho bagat@@ ura mu mujyi umwe mu gihe gito kiri imbere. Muri izi ngero ebyiri, biragaragara izi ‘@@ coup@@ l@@ es’ ebyiri zombi zifite icyerekezo cy’@@ ahazaza kimwe zih@@ ur@@ iyeho. Kuba bakundana batari kumwe ntib@@ iba@@ buza kwishima kuko baharanira kuzabaho neza ahaz@@ aza. Mw@@ aba mukundana mutari kumwe cyangwa muba mu gace kam@@ we, kugira icyerekezo kimwe n’intego ikomeye bir@@ us@@ eho ni urufunguzo ruk@@ ubash@@ isha kuguma ushyize umutima ku cyo ushaka kur@@ ema. Ibi bigira cyane akamaro mu bihe habayeho kutumvikana hagati yawe n’umukunzi wawe. Icyakora, ‘@@ coup@@ l@@ es’ nyinshi usanga zid@@ as@@ angiye icyerekezo gikomeye cyangwa ugasanga ntiz@@ izi neza icyo zishaka kug@@ er@@ an@@ aho. Kutagira icyerekezo mus@@ angiye rero bishobora gutuma urukundo rwanyu rugenda nabi igihe mukundana umwe ari kure y’@@ undi. 2. Muk@@ wiye gukomeza uko mw@@ iyumv@@ anamo n’@@ amarangamutima Aha, uba ugomba gukomeza umutima wawe uko wiy@@ umva ndetse n’uko w@@ iyumv@@ anamo n’umukunzi wawe. Ibi bisaba ko umenya ko ari wowe ubwawe uzag@@ enzura uko wiy@@ umva , ntug@@ ereke umutwaro w’@@ ibyifuzo kuri mugenzi wawe [@@ mukund@@ ana@@ ]. Kuba w@@ abaho nk’@@ uri wenyine biragoye ariko na none si byiza ko imihangayiko yawe yose, utubazo n’indi mij@@ agararo ufite uyir@@ unda ku mukunzi wawe kuko ibi bituma atangira kwibaza niba uri umuntu wa nyawe mw@@ abana, mbese bishobora gutuma uko yakw@@ iyumv@@ agamo big@@ abanuka. Ikintu gishobora gutuma umukunzi wawe ag@@ ushyira mu gat@@ ebo nk’@@ ak’@@ izindi nshuti ze ni uguh@@ ora umubwira akantu kose kak@@ ubayeho buri kanya buri munsi. Impamvu ni uko ibi bishobora kur@@ ambira umukunzi wawe bigatuma ashobora kuba yag@@ abanya urugero yag@@ ukund@@ agamo. Birashoboka ko wumva wahamagara umukunzi wawe buri uko bwije n’uko bukeye ariko guhora muvug@@ ana bishobora gutuma agabanya uko akw@@ iyumvamo bikaba byakw@@ angiza urukundo mukundana umwe ari kure y’@@ undi. Kwiy@@ itaho ug@@ aharanira iterambere ryawe ku giti cyawe nk’umuntu ukagira ubuzima bwawe bwite hanze y’@@ uruk@@ undi rwanyu ni ingenzi cyane hagati y’@@ abakundana bifuza kur@@ amb@@ ana. Gus@@ angiza umukunzi wawe utuntu tw@@ iza wag@@ ezeho cyangwa wabonye bituma uko umukunzi wawe yumva umuk@@ urura by@@ iyongera. Uko wab@@ igenza ngo ukomeze ukur@@ ure umukunzi wawe ah@@ ore abona uri mushya Kugira ngo wongere impamvu zatuma umukunzi wawe akw@@ iyumvamo kurushaho, kumw@@ oherereza ubutumwa bugufi bug@@ anisha ku mibonano mpuzabitsina bishobora gukomeza urukundo mukundana mut@@ eger@@ anye. Utu ‘@@ mess@@ ag@@ es’ duto dush@@ ot@@ orana ku byerekeye ‘@@ imibon@@ an@@ o’ dushobora gufasha urukundo gukura no kuguma rus@@ ugiye kurusha uko wakw@@ irirwa ubwira umukunzi wawe uko umunsi wawe ugenda kandi bigatuma umuriro w’urukundo mu by’@@ ibitsina ub@@ anyura mw@@ emb@@ i. Ni muri ubu buryo, mushobora gusub@@ izanya ubu butumwa mus@@ a n’aho mut@@ inze ukuntu kandi uko mut@@ inda mbere yo gusubiza ni ko muz@@ amura ikigero cyo kwiy@@ umv@@ anamo no guk@@ urur@@ ana. Kumenya igihe ukorera ibi na cyo ni ingenzi cyane. K@@ ubaha ibyifuzo bya mugenzi wawe byo hanze y’urukundo rwanyu bituma na byo akw@@ iyumvamo kurushaho. U@@ ba ukwiye koherereza umukunzi wawe ubutumwa nk’ubwo n@@ avugaga haruguru ubizi neza ko atari kumwe n’umuk@@ oresha we, atari gusangira ifunguro ryo ku manywa n’umw@@ is@@ eng@@ eneza we cyangwa yasuye ababyeyi be. Kugira ngo umukunzi wawe akw@@ iyumv@@ emo kurushaho, uba ugomba kwigirira icyizere haba hanze ndetse no mu cyumba mur@@ yam@@ amo. 3. Kug@@ anira no kwegerana ku ngingo y’@@ imibonano mpuzabitsina Hari ikintu cy’ingenzi abantu badashaka kuganir@@ aho, iyo bigeze mu muco nyarwanda, bih@@ uma byar@@ ebaga imir@@ ari. Nyamara kwegerana no kuganira ku byerekeye imibonano mpuzabitsina ni ingenzi cyane ku bantu bakundana batari kumwe. Iyo mug@@ itangira gukundana mutari kumwe, bishobora kubabera akabazo kwibanda mu kwiy@@ umv@@ anamo n’ibindi byose bigenda neza ariko ntim@@ ug@@ anire ku bintu bishobora kubangamira urukundo rw@@ anyu. Hari ama ‘@@ coup@@ l@@ es’ menshi nzi akundana bat@@ abana b@@ angaga kuganira ku ngingo yerekeye imibonano mpuzabitsina. Akenshi kwanga kuganira ku mibonano mpuzabitsina byerekana impungenge umwe mu bakundana aba afite kuri iyi ngingo. Kandi akenshi usanga muri bo ah@@ angayik@@ iye ikintu gituma n’ubundi imikorere y’iki gikorwa itam@@ era neza. Ibi ni ibintu bibaho cyane kuko 3@@ 1% by’@@ abagabo na 4@@ 3% by’@@ abagore bir@@ abagora kandi byangiza urugero umuntu yig@@ ir@@ iramo icyizere n’agaciro yih@@ a bigatuma at@@ aganira kuri iyi ngingo ubundi y’ingenzi mu mibanire y’umugabo n’umugore. Kut@@ aganira kuri iyi ngingo ni amahitamo atera ibibazo no guhangayika mu rukundo kuko umwe mu bakundana atangira kwibaza impamvu mugenzi we ad@@ ashishikajwe no kuba bakw@@ eger@@ ena muri iki gikorwa. Nta gushidikanya ko iyi ngingo ari yo ituma urukundo rw’@@ abakundana bat@@ abana rut@@ aram@@ ba. Ni ingenzi cyane kumenya ko ibibazo bishingiye kuri iyi ngingo biterwa akenshi no kwibanda ku gikorwa kitari icya nyacyo mu gihe kitari icya ny@@ acyo. Mu muco wo mu Burengerazuba bw’@@ isi, kuganira ku mibonano mpuzabitsina ni nk’@@ ikiz@@ ira, ibi kandi ni ko bimeze mu Rwanda. Ibi rero bitera abakundana kumva bat@@ ishimye kandi bakumva bari mu rujijo iyo ‘@@ coup@@ l@@ es’ zitab@@ igan@@ iyeho. Noneho iyo abakundana bat@@ abana bir@@ akom@@ era, aho baba bashishikajwe no kongera uko biy@@ umv@@ an@@ amo. Bashobora gutegereza igihe kirekire kurusha abandi mbere yo kuganira ku mibonano mpuzabitsina mbere yo kuganira ku bindi bibash@@ im@@ isha, guhura no kuba bagira icyo bakora cy@@ erekeye imibonano mpuzabitsina. Igihe cyose uh@@ isemo kur@@ uca ukar@@ umira ku ngingo y’@@ imibonano mpuzabitsina n’umukunzi mukundana mut@@ abana, ukwiye kumenya ko uri kur@@ oha ubwato bwawe urimo mu rukundo mu ng@@ eri. Ibi bishobora gutuma uwo mukundana atakaza ubushake bwo guhuza ibitsina nawe. Uko wab@@ igenza ngo uko mw@@ iyumv@@ anamo mu by’@@ ibitsina by@@ iyongere Mu gihe ari ingenzi kuganira ku by’@@ ibitsina ngo muri ku ipaji imwe, kuzuza ibi byifuzo bir@@ akomeye gato kurushaho. Nkuko nab@@ yanditse mbere, ushobora gutangira kw@@ a@@ ind@@ ikira umukunzi wawe ubutumwa bugufi bw@@ erekeye ug@@ uhuza ibits@@ ina. Ibi si ngombwa ko umw@@ oherereza ya mafoto n’amashusho wambaye ubusa buri bur@@ i. Uko mby@@ umva, iyo w@@ oherereje umukunzi wawe amafoto ufite icyo wam@@ baye, uram@@ ukurura kurushaho ug@@ atuma agut@@ ekereza kurushaho kuko nyine utuma atangira kukw@@ ibazaho ut@@ ubaz@@ o, ibi kandi ni ingenzi mu gutuma akomeza kukw@@ iyumvamo bigatuma ikibat@@ si cy’urukundo kig@@ uma kig@@ urum@@ ana. Icyakora ugomba kumenya kugenzura ibyo utekereza ngo bitab@@ angamira ibyishimo by@@ awe. Aha uba ugomba kwitondera ibyo wibaza ngo bitak@@ ujyana kure bik@@ akw@@ angiza. Ubundi buryo bwo kuzuza ibyifuzo byawe mu by’@@ ibitsina igihe uwo mukundana mutari kumwe ni ukuba wagira ibyo ukora byo guhanga nko kwandika igit@@ abo, kujya mu nzu rusange za siporo (g@@ ym@@ ) cyangwa ukagira icyo uhindura mu mwuga ukora. Mu by’ukuri, iyo ibyifuzo byawe bid@@ ahise bisub@@ izwa n’umukunzi wawe, kandi ntub@@ ifate nk’aho ari ikibazo, aha uba ushobora kubaka ikintu cy’@@ ak@@ abatar@@ aboneka muri wowe. Wowe uba ugomba kumva neza ko udakwiye gushyira iherezo ku bushake bwawe bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ‘@@ ugerageza kut@@ abit@@ ekerez@@ aho@@ ’. Impamvu ni uko aho umutima wawe uri ari na ho imbaraga zawe ziba@@ . Muri make Guk@@ undana mut@@ abana umunsi ku munsi umwe ari kure y’@@ amaso y’@@ undi bisaba imih@@ ate ihoraho kandi uk@@ it@@ ondera utuntu duto dut@@ o. Nk’@@ undi mubano wose, uba ukwiye kuganiriza umukunzi wawe ibyifuzo n’@@ inzozi zawe kandi ug@@ ahora utera intambwe yo kuz@@ ik@@ aby@@ a.
Gatsibo: Inka eshanu mu zari zibwe z@@ abashije gusubizwa ba nyirazo Ubuyobozi bwa Polisi mu Karere ka Gatsibo butangaza ko mu nka zari zibwe izigera kuri 19 zatangiye gusubizwa ba nyir@@ azo, eshanu muri zo zikaba arizo zimaze gutang@@ wa. Ni mu gihe hari hamaze igihe havugwa ubujura bw'@@ inka muri aka karere. Umuyobozi wa Polisi mu Karere ka Gatsibo, Sp@@ t Habiyambere Gerard avuga ko kugira ngo izi nka zifat@@ we habayeho ubufatanye n'abaturage batanze amakuru, aba bajura bakabasha gukurikiranwa kugeza bafash@@ we. Izi ni zimwe mu nka zari zibwe mu Karere ka Gatsibo. Agira ati "@@ Ubufatanye n'abaturage mu gukumira ibyaha bitar@@ aba nibyo byatumye tubasha gukurikirana ubu bujura bw'@@ inka, kandi bitw@@ ereka ko ubutumwa duha abaturage bab@@ ukurikiza tuk@@ abasha gucunga umutekano wabo n'@@ ibyabo uko bikwiye, kandi bir@@ atw@@ oroh@@ erez@@ eza mu kazi kacu ka buri muns@@ i". Sp@@ t Habiyambere akomeza avuga ko muri iki gihe cy'iminsi mikuru ban@@ afashe amaj@@ erekani atandatu ya kanyanga y'@@ inkor@@ ano, yose abitse kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Kabarore aho ategereje kum@@ enwa agat@@ wik@@ wa. Izi nka zari zibwe mu byiciro binyuranye mu mirenge itandukanye igize Akarere ka Gatsibo. Benjamin Nyandwi
Intangiriro za 2017: U Rwanda rwag@@ abanyije 25@@ .@@ 2% ku kiny@@ uranyo cy’@@ ibit@@ umizwa n’iby@@ oherezwa mu mahanga Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR@@ ) yatangaje ko mu mezi abiri ya mbere ya 2017 igihugu cy@@ abashije kugabanya 25@@ .@@ 2 ku ijana ku kiny@@ uranyo cy’@@ ibicuruzwa by@@ oherez@@ waga mu mahanga n’ibit@@ um@@ iz@@ wayo, ugereranyije no mu mezi nk’ayo mu 2016. Kuwa 28 na 29 Werurwe 2017 nibwo habaye inama za Komite Ishinzwe Gusuzuma ubut@@ ajegaj@@ ega bw’@@ urwego rw’@@ imari (F@@ S@@ C) na Komite ishinzwe politiki y’@@ ifaranga (M@@ P@@ C), inama iba buri gih@@ embwe. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru kuri uyu wa Gatatu, Guverineri wa Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu, John Rw@@ ang@@ ombwa, yavuze ko mu mwaka ushize ikinyuranyo cy’@@ ibicuruzwa byoherezwa n’ib@@ iva mu mahanga cyag@@ abanutseho 5.@@ 9@@  % kikagera kuri miliyoni $@@ 16@@ 4@@ 9.@@ 8 kivuye kuri miliyoni $@@ 17@@ 52 mu 2015. Icyo gihe ngo ibicuruzwa bijya mu mahanga by@@ iyongereyeho 7.@@ 1% naho iby@@ injira mu gihugu big@@ abanukaho 2.@@ 7@@ %. Icyo gihe umusaruro wavuye mu by@@ oherejwe hanze mu 2016 wang@@ anaga na 26@@ .@@ 6% by’agaciro k’@@ ib@@ yatum@@ ijwe mu mahanga, uvuye kuri 24@@ .@@ 2% muri 2015. Yakomeje agira ati “Ni nako bimeze mu mezi abiri y’@@ igihembwe cy’umwaka wa 2017, aho ikinyuranyo cy’@@ ibicuruzwa byoherezwa n’ibit@@ umizwa mu mahanga cyag@@ abanutseho 25@@ .@@ 2% kigera kuri miliyoni 22@@ 1.@@ 9 z’amadolari ya Amerika, kivuye kuri miliyoni 29@@ 6.@@ 6 z’amadolari ya Amerik@@ a.” Asobanura ko ibyo u Rwanda byatewe n’uko ibyo u Rwanda rw@@ ohereje mu mahanga by@@ iyongereyeho 3@@ 9.@@ 1@@ %, iby@@ injira mu gihugu bikag@@ abanukaho 11.@@ 9@@ %. Ati “@@ Umusaruro wavuye mu by@@ oherejwe mu mahanga mu mezi abiri ya mbere ya 2017 ungana na 3@@ 2.@@ 7% by’agaciro k’@@ ib@@ yatum@@ ij@@ we@@ yo, mu gihe iki kigereranyo cyari 20.@@ 7% mu mezi abiri ya mbere ya 2016@@ .” Iki kiny@@ uranyo gikomeje kumanuka mu gihe u Rwanda narwo ruri muri gahunda yo kugabanya ibintu byat@@ um@@ izwaga mu mahanga kandi bishobora gukorerwa mu gihugu, h@@ ongerwa ingufu n’ishoramari m mu bikorerwa mu gih@@ uh@@ gu ‘M@@ ade in Rwanda@@ ’. Hari icyizere ku biciro ku isoko n’agaciro k’@@ ifaranga BNR ivuga ko ‘@@ bitewe n’@@ igabanuka ry’@@ icyuho kiri hagati y’@@ ibicuruzwa bijya n’ib@@ iva mu mahanga, izamuka ry’@@ ibicuruzwa by’@@ ifatizo ku isoko mpuzamahanga n’ir@@ angira ry’@@ imwe mu mishinga minini yatwaraga akayabo k’@@ amadev@@ ize, agaciro k’@@ ifaranga ry’u Rwanda kag@@ abanutse gahoro ugereranyije n’ibihe byash@@ ise. Nibura ku itariki ya 24 Werurwe 2017, agaciro k’@@ ifaranga ry’u Rwanda kag@@ abanutseho 0.@@ 7@@  % ugereranyije na 2.@@ 7@@  % mu gihe nk’icyo mu 2016. Rwangombwa yanavuze ko hari icyizere ko ifaranga ry’u Rwanda kugeza mu mpera z’uyu mwaka riz@@ ata agaciro kuri 4@@ %, ugereranyije na 9.@@ 7% mu 2016. Ibiciro ku masoko munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara nabyo byakomeje kwiyongera bitewe n’iz@@ uba ryinshi ryay@@ ogoje ibintu, n’ingaruka ziturutse ku guta agaciro ku ifaranga ry’ibyo bihugu ku isoko ry’@@ iv@@ unj@@ isha. Ibiciro muri aka gace ka Afurika byazamutseho 11.@@ 3% muri 2016 bivuye kuri 7.@@ 0% muri 2015, bikaba biteganyijwe ko biz@@ aman@@ ukaho gato bikagera ku 10.@@ 8% muri 2017, uko ubushobozi bwo kwinjiza amadev@@ ize buz@@ agenda bw@@ iyongera. Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’@@ ibarurishamibare giheruka gutangaza ko ibiciro ku isoko mu Rwanda muri Gashyantare by@@ azamutse 8.@@ 1@@ %, ariko byitezwe ko nibura bishobora kuzajya hasi mu mp@@ esh@@ yi, ku mw@@ ero w’@@ ibihingwa bitandukanye.
Meya wa Gasabo yasubije abat@@ egereje ingurane ku mitungo yangijwe hashyirwaho imihanda n'@@ amashanyarazi Abaturage batuye mu karere ka Gasabo, Umurenge wa Nduba mu tugari twa Sh@@ ango, Butare na Sha bababajwe no kuba batar@@ ahawe ingurane ku mitungo yabo yangijwe hashyirwa ibikorwa remezo birimo imihanda n'@@ amashanyarazi bagasaba Leta kub@@ ibuka kuba ngo babona basa n'@@ abir@@ engag@@ ijwe. Ibikorwa byo gushyira amashanyarazi mu tugari twa Butare na Sh@@ ango byabaye muri 2014, icyo gihe abaturage ngo babar@@ uriwe imitungo yabo yangijwe ndetse ngo nyuma ban@@ abasaba nimero za konti zabo kugirango hashyir@@ weho amafaranga ahwanye n'@@ ingurane ikwiye nkuko itegeko rib@@ iteg@@ anya. Kuva icyo gihe ngo aba baturage bar@@ ategereje ariko kugeza n'ubu ngo amaso yaheze mu kirere, bibaza niba izo ng@@ urane bazaz@@ ihabwa bik@@ abay@@ obera kuko ngo nta n'amakuru na make bab@@ ifit@@ eho. Umwe mu bo twaganiriye yagize ati: "@@ Rwose mut@@ ubar@@ ize, imitungo yacu yarang@@ ijwe ndetse baraza barat@@ ubar@@ ura bad@@ usaba na nimero za konti batubwira ngo baz@@ aduha ing@@ uran@@ e, ariko twar@@ ategereje twar@@ aramb@@ iwe@@ " Nyuma yaho muri utu tugari twa Sh@@ ango na Sha hany@@ ujijwe imihanda mito inyura mu duce dutandukanye two muri utu tug@@ ari, bamwe mu baturage b@@ angirijwe ibyabo hakorwa iyo mihanda na bo bavuga ko batigeze bahabwa ingurane ndetse nta n'@@ ikizere cyo kuz@@ ihabwa bafite kuko ngo kugeza ubu nta nubwo bigeze babar@@ urirwa imitungo yabo yangijwe hakorwa iyi mihanda. Umwe mu bo twaganiriye kuri iki kibazo yagize ati: " Ubu twar@@ um@@ iwe, iyi mihanda yany@@ ujijwe mu masambu yacu n'iby@@ acu birah@@ angirik@@ ira ariko nta ng@@ urane twahawe kandi n'abayobozi ntibigeze baduha icyizere cyo kwishyurwa ibyacu byang@@ uj@@ we, ubu twibaza niba tugomba kureng@@ anira mu bikorwa rusange bik@@ at@@ uyob@@ era, mut@@ ubar@@ ize igituma tud@@ ahabwa ingurane kandi ahandi hose hakozwe imihanda mu gihugu bahabwa ing@@ uran@@ e" Mu mpera z'icyumweru gishize twaganiriye n'umuyobozi w'umurenge wa Nduba kuri ibi bibazo atubwira ko ku kijyanye n'@@ imitungo yangijwe hakorwa imihanda nta ng@@ urane abo baturage bagomba guhabwa kuko ngo ari ibikorwa by'iterambere abaturage biyem@@ ereye ubwabo yongeraho ko ari umushinga wa VUP kandi ngo muri uyu mushinga nta ng@@ urane z@@ ateg@@ anyijwe. Yagize ati: "@@ mbere yuko tujya kubikora tur@@ abanza tuk@@ abag@@ aniriza aba@@ bishaka tuk@@ abikora abat@@ abishaka tuk@@ abar@@ eka kuko nubundi ni amajyambere aba abas@@ anga, t@@ ubwira ubishaka utab@@ ishaka akab@@ ireka kuko Leta ntabwo yaz@@ ana ibikorwa baz@@ aniye abaturage kugira ngo biba@@ fashe ngo ibone n'amafaranga y'@@ ingurane kuko ibikorwa bya VUP nta mafaranga y'@@ ingurane aba ar@@ iho, niba harimo urutoki cyangwa ik@@ indi, umuturage agomba kuby@@ ig@@ omwa kugirango amajyambere amug@@ ereh@@ o" Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko ababur@@ ana ingurane ari abash@@ akaga guhabwa akazi muri uyu mushinga kandi ako kazi ngo kag@@ enewe abari mu cyiciro cya mbere n'icya kabiri cy'@@ ubudehe gusa. Ku bijyanye n'ab@@ angirijwe ibyabo hashyirwa amashanyarazi mu tugari twa Sh@@ ango na Sha babar@@ uriwe ibyangijwe ariko bagategereza ingurane bagah@@ eba, uyu muyobozi yadus@@ ubije agira ati: "Hari inama iteganyijwe izahuza abayobozi ba REG n'abo bantu, baba abatar@@ abar@@ uriwe ibyabo ndetse n'aba@@ bar@@ uriwe nt@@ ishyur@@ we, ntabwo babar@@ etse turimo gushaka uburyo abo bantu bose bishy@@ urwa, ni abantu 14@@ 9 urumva ko ari abantu benshi cyane, ubwo rero bagomba kwishyur@@ wa" Tw@@ ashatse kumenya icyo ubuyobozi bw'akarere buvuga kuri ibi bibazo tuvugana na Meya w'akarere ka Gasabo Rwam@@ urangwa Stephen atubwira ko ingurane ku bikorwa byangijwe hakorwa umuriro ziri hafi guhabwa abo zigenewe ariko akurira inzira k'@@ umurima abaturage batekerezaga ko baz@@ abwa ingurane ku mitungo yangijwe hakorwa imih@@ anda. M@@ Meya Rwam@@ urangwa yagize ati: " Abantu bo muri REG bari bar@@ ategereje bamwe muri bo badafite ibyangombwa ngo babish@@ ake kuko batubwiye ko amafaranga bay@@ afite bagiye gutangira kub@@ ishyura ahubwo nd@@ abik@@ urikirana n@@ umv@@ e" Ku bijyanye n'@@ ingurane z'@@ ibyangijwe h@@ acibwa imihanda, yavuze ko mbere yo guca iyo mihanda abaturage ubwabo bari baby@@ umvikanyeho bityo ngo abona nta mpamvu bafite zo kuburana ingurane ku bintu ubwabo bemeranyije bakab@@ ikora. Yagize ati: "@@ Abaturage ubwabo ni bo bic@@ iriye iyo mihanda muri gahunda ya VUP ntabwo ari undi muntu waje ngo ah@@ anyuze imihanda kandi abaturage bac@@ aga imihanda ahantu bemer@@ anyijwe, ubwo rero abo ngabo ni wa muturage umwe cyangwa babiri batumva vuba ariko bari baby@@ umvikanye@@ ho, icyakora ufite ikibazo cyihariye yak@@ igeza k'@@ ubuyobozi tuk@@ am@@ ufash@@ a" Itegeko rigenga ingurane mu Rwanda rivuga ko uw@@ im@@ uwe mu bye kubera inyungu rusange agomba guhabwa ingurane ikwiye ku byo yim@@ uwemo mbere yo kwim@@ urwa. Ubu nta mutoza Amavubi akeneye - De Gaulle Yanditswe kuya 26-@@ 10-@@ 2016 saa 09@@ :4@@ 6@@ ' na Manzi Rema Jules Umuyobozi w'Ishyirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Rwanda, Ferwafa, Nzamwita Vincent de Gaul@@ le, yatangaje ko kuba nta marushanwa Amavubi ateganya kwitabira mbere ya Kamena 2017, nta mpamvu yo kuzana umutoza mukuru kuko byaba ari ugut@@ akaza amafaranga y'@@ ubusa. Nyuma yo gusezererwa mu majonjora yo guhatanira itike y'igikombe cy'@@ Isi cya 2018, ntih@@ abon@@ eke n'iyo kwitabira igikombe cya Afurika cya 2017 kizabera muri Gabon, Amavubi azongera kugaragara ku ruhando mpuzamahanga muri Kamena umwaka utaha ubwo hazaba hatangiye amarushanwa yo gushaka itike y'igikombe cya Afurika cy'@@ abakina imbere mu bihugu, CHAN, cya 2018. Umuyobozi wa Ferwafa aganira na The New Times, yatangaje ko umutoza w'Amavubi az@@ ashyirwaho nibura muri Gicurasi 2017 kuko mbere yaho ntacyo yaba aje gukora. Ati "K@@ uzana umutoza mukuru mushya bitwara amafaranga, kandi twas@@ ezerewe mu gushaka itike y'igikombe cy'@@ Isi cya 2018 n'icya Afurika cya 2017, nta mutoza mukuru dukeneye muri iki gih@@ e." "@@ Ayo mafaranga dushobora kuy@@ azig@@ ama ahubwo tug@@ akoresha ibishoboka byose muri Gicurasi 2017 tukaba twamaze kubona umutoza ukwiye wo gutegura CHAN 2018. Ibi nibyo byaba byiza kandi big@@ atwara n'amafaranga akw@@ iye." Yakomeje agira ati "Nd@@ izera ko amezi abiri mbere ya CHAN 2018 ahagije ku mutoza mushya kuba amaze gutoranya abakinnyi, gutegura imikino ya gishuti n'@@ umwih@@ erero. Niyo mpamvu kuri ubu nta mutoza duk@@ eneye@@ ." Mu minsi ishize Nzamwita yari yatangaje ko Ferwafa iri gukorana na D@@ F@@ B, Ishyirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Budage kugira ngo riba@@ fashe kubona umutoza waz@@ aza gusimbura Jonathan Mc@@ kin@@ stry wiruk@@ anwe muri Kanama uyu mwaka nyuma y'@@ umusaruro mubi w'ikipe y'igihugu. August 4, 2014 Polisi y’@@ U@@ Rwanda yongeye kwibutsa ababyeyi kwita ku bana babo cyane cyane urubyiruko rut@@ agejeje ku myaka 18. August 3, 2014 Ni muri urwo rwego Polisi y’u Rwanda isaba abaturage kuba maso bakirinda izi mpanuka z’@@ umuriro kuko z@@ angiza ibintu bitandukanye ndetse zig@@ ahitana n’abantu. Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda Assistant Commissioner of Police (ACP) Dam@@ as Gatare akaba asaba abaturage kwirinda ikintu cyose cyat@@ eza inkongi z’@@ umuriro nk’@@ insinga z’amashanyarazi buj@@ i n’ibindi. Akaba agira ati:” Turasaba abaturage buri gihe kwitwararika gusiga baj@@ im@@ ije ibintu byose bikoresha umuriro w’@@ amashanyarazi, buj@@ i, tun@@ ashishikariza abahinzi kwirinda gutwika ibyatsi kuko akenshi ibyo nibyo biteza impanuka z’@@ inkongi z’@@ umurir@@ o”. ACP Gatare yasabye abafite amazu kuy@@ ashyiramo ibikoresho byagenewe kuzimya umuriro bizwi nka “@@ Kiz@@ im@@ yamw@@ ot@@ o” kugirango haramutse habaye impanuka habeho ubutabazi bwihuse. Kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere uyu mwaka hamaze kuba impanuka z’@@ inkongi z’@@ umuriro 38 mu gihugu hose harimo n’iy@@ ibasiye gereza ya Muhanga kuri uyu wa gatatu. Mu mwaka ushize wa 2013 hakaba hari har@@ abaye impanuka z’@@ inkongi z’@@ umuriro 8@@ 4, zik@@ ag@@ wamo abantu 8 abandi 8 bagakom@@ erek@@ eramo. I@@ nyinshi muri izi mpanuka zikaba zar@@ atewe n’umuriro w’amashanyarazi ndetse na buj@@ i. Mu mwaka wa 2012 naho habaye mwene izi mpanuka 9@@ 3, muri zo 50 zikaba zar@@ atewe n’@@ amashanyarazi. ACP Gatare yasobanuye ko izi mpanuka ziterwa n’amashanyarazi akenshi zituruka ku ns@@ inga ziba zar@@ ashaje cyangwa zitujuje ubuziranenge, iz@@ iba zar@@ ashyizwe mu nzu nabi kimwe n’aba@@ com@@ eka ibintu byinshi ku ns@@ iga zitab@@ ig@@ enewe. Yakomeje asaba abahinzi kwirinda gutwika ibyatsi kuko nabyo bishobora g@@ ur@@ eza inkongi z’@@ umuriro. Aha yagize ati:” Turi mu gihe cy’imp@@ esh@@ yi, niyo mpamvu dusaba abaturage kud@@ atwika ibyatsi ndetse n’abany@@ wi b’@@ itabi bakirinda kuj@@ ugunya ir@@ isigaye aho babonye batabanje kur@@ iz@@ imya kugirango twirinde impan@@ uk@@ a”. Yasabye buri wese gutanga amakuru y’@@ ah@@ ashobora kw@@ aduka impanuka y’@@ inkongi no gutabara igihe hari iz@@ ibaye kugirango hatang@@ irika ibintu byinshi. Mu gihe hari impanuka y’@@ inkongi y’umuriro uhuye nayo wahamagara ku murongo ut@@ ishyurwa wa 11@@ 1 cyangwa ug@@ ahamagara ubuyobozi bw’@@ ishami rya Polisi y’u Rwanda rishinzwe kuzimya inkongi z’@@ umuriro no gutabara abari mu kaga kuri 0788@@ 8@@ 31@@ 12@@ 24, 0788@@ 8@@ 3@@ 11@@ 120 na 0788@@ 3@@ 11@@ 33@@ 5. Ubu Polisi y’u Rwanda ikaba ifite ibikoresho bigezweho byo kuzimya inkongi z’@@ umuriro no gutabara abari mu kaga, ikaba inafite ishami rib@@ ishinzwe rih@@ ora rih@@ ugura abaturage ku kwirinda inkongi z’@@ umuriro. Umwaka ushize Polisi y’u Rwanda ifatanyije n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe amazi n’amashanyarazi (E@@ WAS@@ A) bakaba bar@@ ashyize ibit@@ embo binini by’amazi mu mujyi wa Kigali ayo mazi akaba yakw@@ ifashishwa mu kuzimya umuriro. Ayo mazi akaba yar@@ ashyizwe ahari ibikorwa remezo nka hot@@ eli, am@@ abanki, inzu z’@@ urub@@ yin@@ iro, ibigo by’@@ amashuri, sitasiyo za lis@@ ansi, amasoko n’ahandi ACP Gatare akaba yizeza abaturage ko Polisi izakomeza kubakangurira kwirinda impanuka zihitana abantu n’ib@@ yabo. Ibikorwaremezo bir@@ aha abatuye R@@ ongi n’indi mirenge icyizere Bwa mbere mu mateka ya bo ngo bagiye kubona inyubako z’@@ amagorofa Ibikorwaremezo birimo isoko rya kijyambere n’ikigo Nderabuzima by@@ ubatse mu Kagari ka Ruhango, ni byo biha abatuye Umurenge wa R@@ ongi icyizere cyo kwiteza imbere mu minsi iri imbere. Ntaw@@ usigaye Con@@ s@@ ole utuye ku rub@@ ibi rwa R@@ ongi na Nyab@@ in@@ oni, avuga ko yishimiye kubona abane be bagiye kujya bigira mu nzu y’@@ igorofa yabonye bwa mbere mu buzima bwe, Yongeraho ko umuriro w’amashanyarazi uzatuma at@@ ongera gukubita amaguru ajya gushak@@ a@@ umurir@@ owa terefone mu yindi mir@@ enge. Ati “N@@ ishimiye kuba abana bacu bagiye kwigira ahantu has@@ oban@@ utse, nanjye ngiye gukora nit@@ eze imbere, n@@ ite ku isuk@@ u.” Hakuz@@ imana Anat@@ ole wo mu Murenge wa R@@ ongi avuga ko iwabo bat@@ itaga gukorera impushya zo gutwara ibinyabiziga, kubera nta mihanda yari ihari. Ariko ubu ngo agiye gushaka urwo ruhushya abashe kwiteza imbere. Ati “Nk@@ atwe abasore tugiye kwiga amategeko y’umuhanda kuko izi nyubako z@@ aduhaye akazi turi gukora tukabona amafarang@@ a,@@ nimara kubona uruhushya rwo gut@@ war@@ anz@@ abasha kwiteza imbere.” N’ubwo abaturage bishimira kuba beg@@ erejwe ibikorwa by’@@ iterambere, ariko ngo ntibih@@ agije ngo bibag@@ irire akamaro igihe bad@@ ashyizeho uburyo buhamye bwo kub@@ ibyaza umusaruro. Mu nama y'Inteko rusange y'@@ Ishyirahamwe ry'umupira w'@@ amagar@@ u FERWAFA yateranye kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki ya 10 Nzeri 2014, yemeje imyanzuro ikar@@ ishye iz@@ agend@@ erwaho muri shampiyona y'umwaka wa 2014-@@ 2015, harimo ko n'amakipe atarabona ubuzima gatozi azajya aterwa mpaga kuri buri mukino, kugeza igihe azab@@ ubon@@ era. Abayobozi ba FERWAFA mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru nyuma y'@@ inam@@ a/ Photo Mak@@ uru@@ K@@ i.@@ co, Nkuko byatangajwe na Perezida wa FERWAFA Bwana Nzamwita Vincent de Gaulle mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru nyuma y'inama yamaze amasaha agera ku munani, ikipe yo mu cyiciro cya mbere izaba itab@@ ona ubuzima gatozi nibura by'agateganyo mu gihe cy'@@ iki cyumweru gisigaye ngo shampiyona itang@@ ire, izajya iterwa mpaga kuri buri mukino yakinnye nkuko byemejwe mu nama y'Inteko rusange. Bwana Nzamwita Dega@@ ul@@ le yavuze ko batitaye ku ikipe iyo ari yo yose, ibi biz@@ ubahirizwa ku makipe atarabona ubuzima gatozi ar@@ indwi, ari yo APR FC, POLICE FC, MUK@@ URA FC, MUS@@ ANZE FC, MAR@@ IN@@ E, AMAG@@ AJ@@ U FC na S@@ UN@@ RIS@@ E izam@@ utse mu cyiciro cya mbere uyu mwaka. Ibi bivuze ko aya makipe ataz@@ akurwa muri shampiyona ariko mu gihe akinnye umukino atar@@ ab@@ ubona azajya akurwaho amanota agat@@ erwa mpaga cyangwa for@@ fa@@ it@@ . Perezida wa FERWAFA Bwana Nzamwita Dega@@ ul@@ le ati "M@@ bis@@ ubir@@ emo amakipe adafite ubuzima gatozi azajya aterwa for@@ fa@@ it@@ " Mu bindi byemezo byafatiwe muri iyi nama y'Inteko rusange ni uko shampiyona y'u Rwanda izajya itangira tariki ya 15 Kanama za buri mwaka ig@@ asozwa tariki ya 15 Mata y'umwaka ukurik@@ iyeho. Nyuma amakipe agafata akaruhuko ko gutegura p@@ re-@@ se@@ ason ari yo mikino itegura shampiyona, izajya iba mu kwezi kwa gatandatu ari naho hazajya habamo igikombe cy'Amahoro kizajya gis@@ ozwa tariki ya 4 Nyakanga nkuko bisanzwe. Abanyamuryango ba FERWAFA kandi bemeje ko ikipe y'igihugu y'abatarengeje imyaka 17 n'ikipe y'igihugu y'abagore ataz@@ andik@@ ishwa kwitabira amarushanwa nyafurika umwaka utaha wa 2015, kugira ngo babanze bateg@@ ure amakipe ahereye mu bakiri bato az@@ abashe kwitwara neza muri 2016 ubwo azongera kwitabira amarushanwa mpuzamahanga. Iyi Komisiyo ikaba yahawe icyumweru cyo kuba yagejeje raporo kuri f@@ ederation kugira ngo h@@ afatwe umwanzuro. Kicukiro: Abaturage ba Kanombe barat@@ abaza kubera ibura ry'@@ amazi Abaturage bo mu Murenge wa Kanombe , akagari ka Kabeza barat@@ abaza Leta ngo iba@@ fashe gukemura ikibazo cy'@@ ibura ry'@@ amazi, kuko ngo bigeze aho amafaranga agiye kubash@@ irana kubera kuy@@ agura amazi Bamwe mu bo twag@@ anir@@ iye, badutangarije ko ikibazo cyo kutabona amazi kibah@@ angayikishije cyane kuko uretse no kumara amasaha atari make kugirango bav@@ ome , ngo ba nyir'@@ amazi bar@@ abah@@ enda cyane. Abo baturage bavuga ko nyuma yo gukomeza gushyirwa ku kizere n'inzego z'ubuyobozi ndetse n'ikigo gishinzwe amazi, ngo bamwe mu baturage bih@@ angiye umurimo wo kuv@@ omera mu bigega bakoresheje imodoka, barangiza bakay@@ agurisha ku giciro bishakiye kandi gih@@ anitse nkuko abaturage bakomeza babivuga. Ubusanzwe ij@@ erekani y'amazi isanzwe igura amafaranga makumyab@@ ir@@ i(@@ 20 Frw) nyamara ngo ubu bari kuyigura amafaranga 150 cyangwa 200. Abaturage bakaba bavuga ko ikibazo cyabo kizwi n'inzego z'ubuyobozi zitandukanye, harimo Umur@@ enge, Ikigo gishinzwe gukwirakwiza amaz@@ i(@@ cyahoze cyitwa EW@@ S@@ A) , ariko ngo bakomeje kubabwira ko kiz@@ akemuka nyamara amaso yaheze mu kirere. Abaturage bakaba basaba ko Leta yabak@@ emurira ikibazo vuba, kuko ngo bashobora kwibasirwa n'indwara z'@@ umwanda ndetse bag@@ akur@@ izamo ubukene kubera gutanga amafaranga menshi ku mazi. Ubwo twavug@@ anaga n'Umuyobozi w'Umurenge wa Kanombe, Murenzi Don@@ ati@@ en, yatubwiye ko ikibazo cy'@@ abaturage kigiye gukemuka bafatanyije n'icy@@ ahoze kitwa EWSA kandi ngo bizaba vuba. Yagize ati: " Iki kibazo ni ikibazo kimaze igihe, kuko nange niho nt@@ uye, turag@@ is@@ angiye nk'@@ abaturage bos@@ e@@ ....@@ ni ikibazo kimaze igihe tug@@ aniraho n'inzego zitandukanye, harimo n'urwego ruriya rw@@ ahoze rwitwa E@@ w@@ sa, bak@@ atwereka gahunda yo gusaranganya , gusa ikibazo kiriho nuko kwa kuy@@ ar@@ ekura bag@@ abany@@ a, iyo bar@@ ekuye usanga agera kuri bamw@@ e." Murenzi yavuze ko icyo kibazo kiri gushakirwa umuti, mu mushinga watangiye witwa Kar@@ enge Tw@@ o, kandi ngo amakuru bahabwa n'aba@@ bishinzwe , ngo biri hafi gukem@@ uka. Gusa yakomeje akangurira abaturage kugana uburyo bw@@ ashyizweho bwo kwik@@ op@@ esha ibigega bifata amazi y'@@ imvura, kugira ngo imvura n'@@ igwa bafate amazi ,@@ az@@ abar@@ engere n'igihe izuba ry@@ ac@@ anye. Icyakora iki kibazo nt@@ ikiri mu kagari ka Kabeza gusa, ahubwo ngo bisa n'aho ari umurenge wa Kanombe wose, nk'uko byakomeje bitangazwa na Mur@@ enzi. Ikibazo cy'@@ ibura ry'@@ amazi gikomeje kuba ingorabahizi mu gihugu, kuko uretse n'aho atarag@@ era, na hamwe muh@@ o ari bar@@ arira bavuga ko ba@@ yabona rimwe na rimwe. Yvette Umurerwa

Zambia ishyigikiye ko uwakoze Jenoside wese agezwa imbere y'ubutabera Minisitiri w'Ububanyi n'Amahanga wa Zambia Harry Kal@@ aba aratangaza ko igihugu cye gishy@@ ig@@ k@@ iye ko buri muntu wese wagize uruhare muri Jenoside agomba kugezwa imbere y'@@ ubutabera, kuko batakw@@ ishimira ko abo bantu bid@@ egem@@ bya nyuma y'@@ amahano basize bakoze. Ibi yabitangaje kuri iki cyumweru tariki 7 kamena 2015, nyuma yo gukora urugendo ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi rwa Kigali, akabasha kwibonera amateka yaranze u Rwanda mbere, muri Jenoside na nyuma yayo. Minisitiri Kal@@ aba yabanje gushyira indabo no kunamira imibiri ishying@@ uye mu mva zo ku Rwibutso wa Kigali. Yagize ati "Nd@@ umva m@@ babajwe n'ibyo nabon@@ ye. Nari nziko habaye Jenoside ariko sinari nziko byageze aho nib@@ on@@ eye. Mu gihugu cyacu natwe nibyo Perezida ahora aduk@@ angurira ko tud@@ akwiye kubana tur@@ ebana mu ndorerwamo y'ubw@@ oko. (…) Zambia yakoranye cyane n'urukiko mpanabyaha mpuzamahanga rwashyiriweho u Rwanda, turab@@ ishyigikiye kuko nta sh@@ ema tw@@ aterwa n'uko uwo ari we wese yat@@ wara ubuzima bwa mugenzi we." Y@@ asoban@@ uriwe amateka atandukanye ya Jenoside an@@ erekwa ibice bigize uru rw@@ ibutso. Yavuze ko Afurika yamaze kwigira isomo ku byabaye mu Rwanda ko ubuzima bw'abantu buhenze kandi bakaba bakwiye kwitondera ikintu icyo ari cyo cyose cyak@@ ongera gutera ubwic@@ anye ku mugabane wa Afurika. Minisitiri Kal@@ aba ari mu ruzinduko rw'@@ akazi mu Rwanda aho we n'itsinda ryaje rim@@ uh@@ erekeje baza kugirana ibiganiro na mugenzi we w'u Rwanda Louise Mushikiwabo, ku buh@@ ahirane n'@@ ubutwererane hagati y'ibihugu byombi. Mu mvugo igaragara akababar@@ o, Minisitiri Kal@@ aba yatangaje ko ibi bidakwiye kugira ahandi biba haba mu karere k'ibiyaga big@@ ali cyangwa mu Rwanda. Zambia nacyo ni igihugu kid@@ akora ku Nyanja nk'@@ u Rwanda g@@ ifatanye na Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, kir@@ acyari mu nzira y'@@ amajyambere ariko ubukungu bwayo bushingiye ahanini ku bucukuzi bw'amabuye y'agaciro no ku gutanga ingufu z'amashanyarazi z'@@ imirasire y'@@ izuba. Emmanuel N. Hitimana
Rubavu: H@@ atw@@ itswe udupfunyika ibihumbi 700 tw'@@ ibiyobyabwenge Mu gutangiza icyumweru cyahariwe commun@@ ity polic@@ ing mu karere ka Rubavu hat@@ w@@ itswe udupfunyika tw'@@ urumogi ibihumbi 700 tw@@ afatiwe muri aka karere ruv@@ anywe mu gihugu cya Congo ndetse han@@ ameny@@ we inzoga z'@@ inkorano litiro zigera 1000. Umuyobozi wa polisi mu karere ka Rubavu, Supt. Fel@@ ix, avuga arashima abakomeje gutanga amakuru kub@@ injiza ibiyobyabwenge kuko benshi bab@@ ifat@@ anwa bat@@ angwa n'aba@@ twara moto baba babah@@ etse. Akarere ka Rubavu kaza mu myanya ya mbere mu kw@@ nj@@ iza ibiyobyabwenge mu gihugu bitewe n'uko urumogi rwinshi rw@@ injizwa mu Rwanda ruv@@ anwa Congo. Umubare munini w@@ ababy@@ injiza ni abagore bab@@ icy@@ eny@@ erer@@ aho nk'@@ abatw@@ ite abandi bakab@@ ishyira mu mab@@ ere. Supt. Bizimana Felix agaragaza abagore batwara ibiyobyabwenge nk'@@ abatw@@ ite. Mu mwaka 2012 nabwo Polisi ikorera mu karere ka Rubavu yari fashe udupfunyika ibihumbi 800 tw'@@ urumogi hamwe na litiro ibihumbi 23 z'@@ inzoga z'@@ inkor@@ ano. Nk'uko bitangazwa na Polisi mu karere ka Rubavu ngo kuba abaturage bagaragaza ahari ibiyobyabwenge byag@@ abanyije umubare w'@@ ibyaha aho muri aka karere. Mbere mu kwezi h@@ abonekaga ibyaha bitari munsi ya 20 ariko kuva uyu mwaka watangira ntabwo ibyaha bik@@ irenga umunani. Ibi biyobyabwenge bikaba nyirabayazana mu kongera umubare w'@@ ibyaha birimo gukubita no gukomeretsa hamwe no gufata kungufu bijyana no gusambanya ku gahato abana bato. Bimwe mu biyobyabwenge byafashwe n'abab@@ ifat@@ anywe mu karere ka Rubavu. Uretse kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge muri icyi cyumweru cya commun@@ ity polic@@ ing habaye n'ibikorwa byo kwigisha abaturage kwamagana abatanga n'aba@@ ka ruswa, gutor@@ agura amashashi ak@@ iboneka muri aka karere. Sylidio Sebuharara
Abari batorotse aho bav@@ urirwa COVID-19 uko ari bane bose bafashwe Uwitwa Ndagijimana Dominique ukurikiranyweho icyaha cy’@@ ubujura yafashwe ku manywa yo kuri uyu wa kane nyuma y’uko yari yator@@ ok@@ anye n’abandi batatu aho bari bacumbikiwe bav@@ urwa COVID-19. Polisi y’u Rwanda yabwiye Kigali Today ko uyu Ndagijimana ubusanzwe akomoka i Kabarondo muri Kayonza, ariko akaba afatiwe mu Murenge wa Mugesera mu Karere ka Ngoma aho yari acum@@ bitse. Uwari usigaye gufatwa ni Nsabimana Olivier w’imyaka 30 y’amavuko wo mu Karere ka Kayonza mu Murenge wa Kabarondo mu Kagari ka Rus@@ era uregwa ubujura akaba yari ategereje kubur@@ ana. Icyakora nyuma y’@@ akanya gato bim@@ enyekanye ko Ndagijimana afashwe, andi makuru yageze kuri Kigali Today avuga ko na Nsabimana Olivier afatiwe i Rwamagana mu Muj@@ yi. Nsabimana na Ndagijimana bafashwe bakurikira abandi babiri bafashwe mu masaha ya mbere ya saa sita z’amanywa kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 09 Nyakanga 2020. Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba CIP Hamdun Twizeyimana yavuze ko abo bantu bane baraye batorotse nijoro ahagana saa moya n’igice baciye ibyuma by’@@ amadirishya (@@ Gr@@ ill@@ age) aho bari bari. Batatu muri bo bari bakurikiranyweho ibyaha by’@@ ubujura, undi umwe akurikiranyweho gutera ubwoba akoresheje amag@@ ambo. Aba ni bamwe mu baherutse kugaragara muri kasho i Ngoma band@@ uye, bakaba bar@@ abaku@@ yeyo babajyana mu kigo cy’ishuri cya AS@@ P@@ EK i Ngoma mu Burasirazuba mu Murenge wa Kibungo, bakaba ari ho bav@@ urir@@ waga. Babiri bafashwe mbere harimo uwitwa Mub@@ yarir@@ ehe bakunze kwita Nyam@@ ay@@ ar@@ wo w’imyaka 52 y’amavuko wafatiwe iwabo mu rugo mu Murenge wa Mugesera mu Karere ka Ngoma uregwa icyaha cy’@@ ibikangisho by’@@ amag@@ ambo. Undi yitwa Bang@@ uw@@ iha Jean Paul w’imyaka 21 wafashwe saa tatu n’igice za mugitondo na we ubwo yari mu rugo iwe mu Murenge wa Z@@ aza mu Karere ka Ngoma. Ku@@ bafata ngo byaturutse ku m@@ yir@@ ond@@ oro yabo yatanzwe hirya no hino, dore ko bari basanzwe bafite ibyaha bakurikiranyweho ariko hakiyongeraho no kuba bari bar@@ abas@@ anzemo icyorezo cya COVID-19, hakaba rero hari impungenge z’uko bashoboraga gukwirakwiza ubwo bwand@@ u. Abandi babiri bari bak@@ irimo gushakishwa (@@ ariko na bo bakaba bafash@@ we) ni Nsabimana Olivier w’imyaka 30 y’amavuko wo mu Karere ka Kayonza mu Murenge wa Kabarondo mu Kagari ka Rus@@ era uregwa ubujura akaba yari ategereje kubur@@ ana. Undi wash@@ ak@@ ishwaga ni Ndagijimana Dominique ukomoka mu Murenge wa Kabarondo mu Karere ka Kayonza na we ushinjwa ubujura. Ku mpungenge z’uko abat@@ or@@ otse bashobora kwanduza abaturage basanze hanze, CIP Twizeyimana yavuze ko inzego z’ubuzima n’iz’@@ umutekano zikomeza gukurikirana kugira ngo abahuye na bo bap@@ imwe, ariko hari n’ubutumwa yari yahaye abaturage. CIP Twizeyimana ati “Abaturage twababwiye ko nta gik@@ uba cyac@@ itse, ariko na bo bafashe inzego z’umutekano aho ba@@ babonye batange amakuru bafatwe bagar@@ urwe aho bari bari batar@@ ateza ibibazo, kandi abaturage birinde kuvuga ngo ni mwene wacu cyangwa se ni inshuti yanjye ngo babah@@ ishe kuko baba barimo kwishyira mu kag@@ a.” Polisi ishimira abaturage bagize uruhare mu kugaragaza aba bose bashak@@ ish@@ waga, dore ko imyirondoro yabo yari yashyizwe ahagaragara. Polisi kandi iravuga ko abandi bantu basanze ah@@ afatiwe abo bantu bari batorotse bose bajyanywe mu kato. Kicukiro: B@@ atanu bari mu maboko ya Polisi baregwa uburiganya n'@@ ubujura Abagabo batanu bafungiye ku ishami rya Polisi rya Kicukiro bakurikiranyweho uburiganya n'icyaha cy'@@ ubujura, kuva kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki 2/@@ 4/201@@ 4. Bimwe mu byaha baregwa harimo kur@@ iganya umugore bamug@@ urishije zahabu itar@@ iyo. Aba bagabo bose bakurikiranyweho ibyaha bitandukanye, aho babiri muri bo bashinjwa kur@@ iganya umugore amadolari y'Amerika ibihumbi 11 bamub@@ eshya ko bamug@@ urishije zah@@ abu. Undi witwa Cal@@ ix@@ te Nsengimana ushinjwa kwiba imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa Car@@ ina E nyirayo ay@@ iparitse ku bitaro bya CHUK@@ . Abagabo bakurikiranweho ubujura n'@@ uburiganya bakorera abaturage. Mu bandi bafunzwe harimo n'abandi babiri, Etienne Nseng@@ ima na Sh@@ abani Nyamwasa bashinjwa kwiba insinga z'amashanyarazi za EW@@ S@@ A, icyaha gifatwa nko gusenya ibikorwa remezo ugamije inyungu kandi gisigaye gikurikir@@ anwa n'inzego z'@@ umutekano. N'ubwo bose bahakana ibi byaha buri umwe aregwa, Polisi yo yemeza ko y@@ abafat@@ iye mu cyuho kandi ko baz@@ akurikiranwa mu nkiko, nk'uko SSP Ur@@ ba@@ in Mwis@@ en@@ eza, umuvugizi wa Polisi mu mujyi wa Kigali yabitangarije abany@@ amakuru. Yatangaje ko muri iyi minsi ibyaha bishingiye ku but@@ ekamutwe (@@ es@@ c@@ ro@@ qu@@ er@@ ie) by@@ iyongereye cyane, asaba Abanyarwanda kuba maso bakirinda aba@@ babwira ko ba@@ bafitiye imari za macy@@ e, ahubwo buri wese agah@@ aranira gutunga ikintu mu buryo buc@@ iye mu mucyo. SSP Mwiseneza yemeje ko ibyaha by'@@ ubujura bw'@@ imodoka buriho mu mujyi wa Kigali, gusa nanone akemeza ko butari ku gipimo cyo hejuru. RSS@@ P Mwis@@ en@@ eza, Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu mujyi wa Kigali avuga ko amategeko at@@ ihanganira abajura n'abakora ibikorwa byo kur@@ iganya rubanda. Polisi ikangurira Abanyarwanda kwitondera no kuba maso birinda aba@@ bash@@ uka, ik@@ anab@@ urira abakira ubucuruzi ubwo ari bwo bwose butemewe n'amategeko ko hari amategeko azajya abah@@ ana. Emmanuel N. Hitimana

Cassa Mbungo yatangiye akazi muri Band@@ ari FC Umunyarwanda Cassa Mbungo André yatangiye akazi nk’umutoza mushya wa Band@@ ari FC yo mu Cy@@ iciro cya Mbere muri Kenya. Ni akazi yatangiye kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 5 Mutarama 2021. Cassa Mbungo watozaga Gasogi United, yumvikanye na Band@@ ari FC ku wa Gatanu w’icyumweru gishize ndetse yagombaga kw@@ erekanwa ku wa Gatandatu, ariko bisub@@ ikwa n’uko yatinze kujya muri Kenya kubera ko yabanje gutegereza ibisubizo bya COVID-19. Kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 4 Mutarama 2021 nibwo yerek@@ anywe n’iyi kipe ihereye muri Mom@@ bas@@ a, nyuma yo gusinya amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri asimbuye K@@ en Od@@ h@@ i@@ ambo wagiye muri Sof@@ ap@@ aka FC. Ubwo yerek@@ anwaga Cassa Mbungo André yagize ati “N@@ ishimiye kuza muri Band@@ ari FC, ni ikipe umutoza wese yakw@@ ifuza gut@@ oza. Ndi hano ngo nt@@ war@@ ane ibikombe na Band@@ ari. Ndashaka kuzamura impano nyinshi ziri hano muri Mom@@ bas@@ a.” Yah@@ ishuye ko yigeze kw@@ ifuzwa na Gor Mah@@ ia, ariko yanze kuy@@ erekez@@ amo ahitamo Band@@ ari FC. Ati “Ni icyemezo cy@@ any@@ oroheye guhitamo Band@@ ari, yany@@ eretse umushinga wayo nd@@ any@@ ur@@ wa.” “B@@ and@@ ari FC yany@@ eretse ko ink@@ eneye cyane ni yo mpamvu byany@@ oroheye kuyih@@ itamo imbere ya Gor Mah@@ ia. Band@@ ari twajyaga tuvug@@ ana.” Ni ku nshuro ya kabiri uyu mugabo uri mu Banyarwanda bat@@ oje amakipe menshi agiye gutoza muri Kenya dore ko yabaye muri AFC Leopards kugeza mu Ukuboza 2019 ubwo yasezer@@ aga kubera kumara igihe kirekire ad@@ ahembwa. Band@@ ari FC yatangiye Shampiyona ya Kenya itsinda Sof@@ ap@@ aka FC igitego 1-0. Y@@ anganyije na Tusker FC ubusa ku busa mbere yo gutsindwa na Nairobi City Stars ibitego 2-1. Undi mukino yatsinzwe ni uwo yak@@ iriyemo KCB ku bitego 2-1 mbere yo kunganya na Post@@ a Rang@@ ers igitego 1-1 mu gihe ku wa Gatandatu yatsinze West@@ ern St@@ ima ibitego 2-1. Kuri ubu iri ku mwanya wa gatandatu n’amanota umunani. Casa Mbungo André amaze gutoza amakipe menshi mu Rwanda: Yam@@ enyekanye ari mu ikipe y’@@ abato ya APR FC hagati ya 1998 na 2000 mbere yo gutoza Rwandat@@ el. Yat@@ oje kandi AS Kigali kuva mu mwaka wa 2004 kugeza mu 2007. Mu 2007 kugeza mu 2008 Mbungo yatozaga Kiyovu Sports (@@ yan@@ at@@ oje 2017-@@ 2019@@ ). Mu 2009 kugeza 2011 yatozaga SEC Academ@@ y, mu mwaka wa 2011 kugera 2014 yatozaga As Kigali ayih@@ esha n’igikombe cy’@@ Amahoro. Hagati ya 2015 na 2017 yagarutse muri Police FC yanyuzemo mbere yo kujya muri SE@@ C, na yo ayih@@ esha igikombe cy’Amahoro n’@@ irushanwa ry’@@ Agaciro mu gihe mbere yo gusubira muri Kiyovu Sports mu 2017. Yat@@ oje kandi Sunrise FC, Rayon Sports na Gasogi United yah@@ eruk@@ agamo.

Yari umunyezamu wa kabiri inyuma ya Ndayishimiye Eric Bakame Ikipe ya Rayon Sports it@@ akaje umunyezamu wayo Mbere y’uko abakinnyi batangira imyitozo, umutoza mukuru Karekezi Olivier yasabye abakinnyi kwihanganira iyi nkuru y’inc@@ amug@@ ongo, maze bakora imyitozo yoroheje mu gihe bari bagitegereje kumenya ibindi. Uko umuhango w’@@ irahira ry’@@ Abadepite bashya wagenze (Amafoto) Perezida Kagame yakiriye indahiro z’@@ abadepite bashya 80 mu muhango wabereye mu cyumba cy’@@ Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ku Kimih@@ urura. W@@ itabiriwe n’abayobozi b’ingeri zitandukanye yaba abagize Guverinoma, abayobora ibigo bya leta bitandukanye, abahagarariye ibihugu byabo mu Rwanda n’abandi. Usibye kurah@@ ira, muri uyu muhango hatowe Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko umutwe w’Abadepite wongeye kuba Mukabalisa Donat@@ ille. H@@ atowe kandi Visi Perezida w’Imari n’@@ Abakozi wabaye Musa Fazil Harerimana na Visi Perezida ushinzwe amategeko no kugenzura ibikorwa bya Guverinoma wabaye Muk@@ abag@@ wiza Edd@@ a. Perezida Kagame yahaye abadepite umukoro urimo kugenzura ibikorwa bya Guverinoma ku buryo abaturage bag@@ ezwaho ibyo bem@@ erewe. Yabasabye kandi kujya begera abaturage nk’uko babikoze mu bihe byo kwiyamamaza. Mu bundi butumwa, Perezida Kagame yakomoje ku bany@@ ereza imitungo ya leta ndetse anab@@ urira Ingabire Victoire uherutse kurekurwa ku mbabazi ariko we akavuga ko nt@@ azo yas@@ abye. Manda ya kane y’@@ Umutwe w’Abadepite izatangira ku wa 5 Ukwakira 2018 is@@ ozwe mu 202@@ 3. Abadepite uko ari 80 bose batoye binyuze mu nyandiko Mukabalisa Donatille arahirira kuba Perezida w'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko umutwe w'Abadepite Muk@@ abag@@ wiza Ed@@ da ubwo yarah@@ iriraga kuba Visi Perezida w'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko Ushinzwe amategeko no kugenzura ibikorwa bya Guverinoma Visi Perezida w'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ushinzwe Imari n’@@ Abak@@ ozi, Musa Fazil Har@@ er@@ imana, arahira Perezida Kagame mu ifoto y'urwibutso hamwe n'@@ abadepite bashya 80 Byari ibyishimo ku miryango y'@@ ab@@ injiye mu nt@@ eko. Musa Fazil Harelimana as@@ uhuzanya n'abari bamuh@@ erekeje nyuma y'@@ irahira UKO UYU MUH@@ ANGO W@@ AG@@ ENZ@@ E Perezida Kagame yaburiye Ingabire Victoire Ejo bundi mu buryo busanzwe murabizi ko atari bwo bwa mbere mu buryo bwo gukemura ibibazo byacu, tug@@ iramo n’@@ impuhwe ariko zitari impuhwe zo gushaka gutanga impuhwe, impuhwe zo gukemura ibibaz@@ o; none se iyo bit@@ aza kuba gutyo, ubu tuba dufite abantu bangahe bishingiye ku kuri bicaye muri g@@ erez@@ a? T@@ uba tugifite amagana n’ibihumbi bic@@ ayemo kubera ko niho bakwiriye kuba bari. Ariko twe kubera inyungu zo kubaka igihugu cyacu tuk@@ avuga ngo ariko ntabwo ariko iteka twabig@@ enza. Tur@@ ashakisha n’uw@@ abaye umunyabyaha n’uw@@ agize ut@@ e, dushaka uko tumw@@ ubaka. Ejo b@@ undi, tur@@ ekuye aba bantu b’@@ ejo bundi twar@@ eku@@ ye; barimo bya byamamare bya politiki ishingiye hanze ariko id@@ ashingiye mu gihugu@@ ; twe ni muri iyo nzira tubikora ntabwo aribwo bwa mbere. Uk@@ ajya kubona abantu ngo njye ntabwo n@@ asabye imbabazi, njye ntabwo nasaba imbabazi. Buriya batur@@ ekuye kubera igit@@ utu, igitutu han@@ o? Uk@@ omeje kub@@ igend@@ eraho, ur@@ ajya kwisanga w@@ asub@@ iyemo. Niba ari ubuhamya bush@@ akwa kugira ngo tuk@@ w@@ ereke ko igitutu atari cyo gikor@@ a, h@@ akora gutekereza neza, ur@@ isanga w@@ asub@@ iyemo cyangwa se ur@@ isanga w@@ asubiye hanze kujya kuz@@ erera kuko nta kindi uz@@ akor@@ ayo. Uru Rwanda mur@@ eba, aho rw@@ av@@ uye, twav@@ anyemo amasomo atuma abantu bat@@ aduk@@ anga ngo duk@@ angik@@ e. R@@ ero, uw@@ ashaka yac@@ isha make. Ag@@ akora neza, ag@@ akorana n’abandi neza. N’@@ amasomo ku Isi hose uko bimaze kug@@ aragara, bir@@ atwereka ko gukor@@ ana, kuz@@ uz@@ anya, gushakisha inyungu za buri wese aribyo byonyine bisigaye naho ibindi nk@@ urusha ibi, ngomba kug@@ utam@@ ika ibyo nshaka ukab@@ imira, ntabwo ibyo big@@ ikora. Cyane cyane twe twam@@ ize byinshi. Abany@@ ereza ibya rubanda bahaguruk@@ iwe “Nz@@ abik@@ urikirana ndebe ko ibyo nsaba mub@@ yuz@@ uza, ibi byo kujyana ibikorwa hasi mu giturage […] ababishinzwe bakab@@ igira ibyabo ku giti cyabo […] Ubu ndab@@ ivuga mfite imbere yanjye urutonde rw’@@ ibintu byinshi biba bifit@@ iwe ubushobozi, ndetse ubushobozi bwatanzwe ariko ibikorwa byagombaga gukorerwa abaturage ntib@@ ikor@@ we. Hari umugenzuzi w’imari uhora hano, usa n’aho mwat@@ esheje umutwe cyangwa mwar@@ ond@@ ogo@@ ije, ahora aza akab@@ ereka uko ibintu bis@@ a, ib@@ yatanzwe n’iby@@ avuyemo ntibih@@ ure, ndetse ukabona inzego izo ar@@ izo, akavuga n’abantu abo arib@@ o, akavuga n’umubare w’ibyo batakaje uko ung@@ ana. Niba uri umuyobozi ku rwego runaka ibyo wari ushinzwe byose ub@@ yumva cyangwa n’abandi baby@@ umva, ukaba war@@ ahawe izo nshingano, amikoro n’ikindi cyose cyo kuby@@ uz@@ uza, warangiza umugenzuzi w’imari akaza ak@@ atubwira ko ib@@ yageze aho byagombaga kujya ari nka 25% ibindi ntawe ushobora kumenya aho byany@@ uze. Ni ukuvuga ngo bwa mbere tuz@@ abanza tw@@ umvikane nawe ko ariko bimeze koko […] ib@@ yageze aho byajyaga ni 25@@ %. T@@ ukongera tuk@@ ak@@ ubaza ngo 75% byar@@ engeye he? Nd@@ era: Muri 2016 hak@@ iriwe abarwayi 28@@ 00 babaye imbata z’@@ ibiyobyabwenge Minisiteri y’ubuzima (@@ MINISANT@@ E) igaragaza ko umubare w’@@ abafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe bakirwa mu bitaro byabag@@ enewe bya Nd@@ era, ukomeje kwiyongera. Ham@@ enwe ibiro 200 by’@@ urumogi Byatangajwe ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge wabereye mu Karere ka Kirehe, tariki ya 22 Kamena 2017. MINISANTE ivuga ko mu mwaka wa 2015 ibitaro bya Ndera byak@@ iriye abarwayi 4@@ 40 babaye imbata z’@@ ibiyobyabwenge. Mu mwaka wa 2016 abo barwayi bar@@ iyongereye kuko ngo ibyo bitaro byak@@ iriye ababarirwa mu 28@@ 00@@ ; nk’uko byavuzwe na Dr Tur@@ ate Innocent umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe kurwanya no gukumira icyorezo cya SIDA n’izindi ndwara zirimo n’izo mu mutwe, mu kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima, abisobanura. Akomeza avuga ko urubyiruko ari rwo rugize umubare munini w’@@ abarwayi bak@@ irwa. Niho ahera asaba abaturage guhagurukira rimwe bagak@@ umira ibiyobyabwenge bikomeje guhungabanya ubuzima n’iterambere by’@@ abaturage. Mu rwego rwo gukomeza kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge, kuri uwo munsi bam@@ ennye ibiyobyabwenge birimo toni imwe n’ibiro 200 by’@@ urumogi na litiro 17,@@ 5 za kanyanga bifite agaciro ka Miliyoni 9@@ RW@@ f n’ibihumbi 7@@ 05@@ RW@@ f. Kuri uwo munsi wahariwe kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge kandi hatanzwe ubuhamya bwa bamwe bari bar@@ abas@@ we n’ibiyobyabwenge bak@@ avurwa bagak@@ ira. Umwe muri bo witwa Manir@@ agaba Etienne avuga ko yatangiye ab@@ inywa gake yig@@ ana bagenzi b@@ e,@@ bigera ubwo bim@@ ubat@@ a. Nyuma yo kubireka yicuza igihe yat@@ aye. Agira ati “N@@ ar@@ wanye urugamba rukomeye kugira ngo mb@@ iv@@ emo kuko udutsiko tw’@@ abanywa urumogi turi hanze aha iyo babonye ub@@ ivuyemo bakomeza kuk@@ ugend@@ aho bag@@ ush@@ uka ngo ub@@ isub@@ irem@@ o. Urubyiruko mukwiye kwitonda ntim@@ ug@@ we mu mutego wabo kuko urumogi rw@@ ica ubuzima, ndabizi byam@@ bayeho nah@@ oraga meze nk’@@ umupf@@ u.” Mugenzi we witwa Nsengimana Damien avuga ko yamaze imyaka itanu acuruza urumogi ageza ubwo atangira kugurisha amasambu n’imitungo y’urugo kubera guta umutwe. Avuga ko yafunzwe umwaka umwe, akava muri gereza yarag@@ oror@@ otse none ubu akaba amaze gutera imbere. Agira ati“@@ Kuva muri 2000 kugeza 2005 nib@@ eraga mu rumogi nd@@ ucuruza nd@@ ukuye Tanzania. N@@ afatanywe ibiro 20, mfungwa umwaka. Abo t@@ ungana nasanze barag@@ uze amam@@ odok@@ a, baba mu nzu nziza mu gihe abana banjye umusatsi wari utangiye gut@@ ukur@@ a.” Polisi y’igihugu ivuga ko itaz@@ ihanganira abantu basubiza inyuma iterambere ry’igihugu bishora mu biyobyabw@@ enge. Muzungu Ger@@ al@@ d, Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Kirehe ahamagarira abaturage guh@@ ozaho baharanira kurandura burundu ibiyobyabwenge.
Abas@@ igajwe inyuma n’amateka bagiye gusezerera umuco wo guhora bafashwa Mu karere ka Rubavu, umuryango w’urubyiruko mu iterambere (Y@@ ADE@@ ) wah@@ agurukiye gufasha abana bata ishuri, hibandwa ku bana b’@@ abasigajwe inyuma n’amat@@ eka, ari nako bar@@ andura umuco wo gutegereza ubufasha bih@@ oraho, wakunze kuranga abasigajwe inyuma n’amat@@ eka. abaturage bah@@ ejejwe inyuma n’amateka ngo bagiye gusezerera umuco wo gutegereza ubufasha iteka Youth in ac@@ tion for d@@ evelop@@ ment “Y@@ ADE@@ ” umuryango w’urubyiruko ukorera mu mirenge itatu mu karere ka Rubavu w@@ ibanda ku bikorwa byo guteza abasigajwe inyuma n’amat@@ eka, gusubiza mu ishuri abana bar@@ ivuyemo hamwe. Kuva 2014 Y@@ AD@@ E imaze gusubiza mu ishuri abana 8@@ 5, harimo 15 bashoboye gukomeza mu mashuri yisumbuye. Hakuz@@ we@@ yezu Elis@@ ée uyobora Y@@ AD@@ E avuga ko bashyize imbaraga mu gufasha abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka kuko harimo abafite imyumvire yo gufashwa ndetse bakabit@@ oza n’abana aho kubat@@ oza kwiga, gukora no kwig@@ ira. “U Rwanda turimo n@@ urwo kugira agaciro no kwig@@ ira, ariko twasanze abas@@ ig@@ anj@@ we inyuma n’amat@@ eg@@ ka bo bad@@ ahinduka, abana bata ishuri bakajya gus@@ abir@@ iza, imibereho id@@ ahinduka twifuza kub@@ egera ngo turebe icyo tw@@ abafash@@ a.” Akomeza avuga ko nyuma yo gusubiza abana mu ishuri ndetse bag@@ atangiza n’ishuri ryitwa Mal@@ a@@ ika St Michel bashyiramo abana b’@@ abasigajwe inyuma n’amat@@ eka, bakomeje ibiganiro byo kumenya uko bafasha abantu bakuru mu guhinduka. ikibazo cy’amazi cyarag@@ abanutse “Tw@@ asanze bigoye guhindura imyumvire y’abantu bakuru kuko bakuze batung@@ wa; guhiga no gus@@ abiza ariko urubyiruko rwo turar@@ ufasha kwiga no gukora birashoboka guhinduka. Ikindi twakoze ni uko tw@@ abagize inshuti zacu, batubwira icyo bakeneye natwe icyo tubasaba bak@@ acy@@ umva. Ubu abana ntibag@@ ita ishuri kuko bakora ibyo tubasaba ibib@@ an@@ aniye bakabit@@ ubwir@@ a.” Imiryango 50 igizwe n’abantu 200 ubu ifash@@ wa mu buryo butandukanye harimo kweg@@ erezwa ibigega by’amazi meza ku bufatanye n’umut@@ erankunga J@@ ann@@ ine fr@@ ond uba mu Budage naho ku bufatanye n’itsinda Ir@@ iba - Br@@ unn@@ en bagiye kubaka ishuri rya miliyoni 180 rizafasha abana b’@@ abatishoboye kwiga no gusubiza mu ishuri abar@@ iv@@ uyemo. Mu mirenge ya Cyanz@@ ar@@ we, Gisenyi na Rubavu aho Y@@ AD@@ E ikorera ibikorwa batangaza ko yabafashije kugira imibereho myiza. Umunyarwandakazi Sacha Kate ifoto yashyize hanze yambaye ikariso n’is@@ utiye gusa yatumye abamukurikira bacika ururond@@ ogoro Umunyarwandakazi Agasaro Sandrine uzwi nka Sacha Kate ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ,@@ yongeye kuvugisha imbaga y’abantu bamukurikira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga kubera amafoto yashyize hanze yambaye umwambaro ut@@ avugwaho rumwe wa B@@ ikin@@ i. Iyi foto yagaragaye yambaye ikariso n’is@@ utiye bikurura igitsina byabo byongeye gutuma bamwe mu bantu bamukurikira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bagaragaza amarangamutima yabo dore ko hari na bamwe bir@@ ekuye bamuh@@ ishurira ko ari mwiza. Mu gihe abandi bamuh@@ ishuriye ko ateye neza ndetse ash@@ otor@@ ana. Sacha ashize hanze aya mafoto nyuma yuko uyu mukobwa yigeze amenyekana nk’umuhanzi akaza kub@@ ivamo aho kuri ubu asigaye yikorera ku giti cye. Sacha Kandi ni umwe mu bakobwa bavuzwe mu Rukundo n’abahanzi batandukanye barimo Nizzo wo muri Urban Boys nubwo ibyabo byaje kurangira buri umwe afata inzira ye aho kuri ubu uyu mukobwa adashobora kuvuga umusore bakundana dore ko kuri ubu ibye byose asigaye yar@@ abigize ibanga.
Bimwe mu byo wamenya kuri Miss Iradukunda Lil@@ iane, Nyampinga mushya w’u Rwanda wa 2018 Nyuma y’urugendo rukomeye rwah@@ ereye mu Ntara zose n’Umujyi wa Kigali, mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 24 Gashyantare 2018, hamenyekanye uw@@ egukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda muri uyu mwaka wa 2018, uwo akaba ari Miss Iradukunda Lil@@ iane, us@@ imbuye mugenzi we Miss Iradukunda Elsa wabaye Miss Rwanda 2017. Iradukunda Liliane wari mu bakobwa 20 bahatanira kuba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2018, yari aherutse kugirana ikiganiro n’Ikinyamakuru Ukwezi.com aho yavugaga ko mu mig@@ abo n’imigambi ye harimo kuz@@ ateza imbere ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco naramuka abashije kwegukana iri kamba rihabwa umukobwa wahize abandi mu bwiza, ubwenge, n’@@ umuco, iri kamba akaba yabashije kur@@ yegukana kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 24 Gashyantare 2018. Iradukunda Liliane w’imyaka 18 avuka kuri Nd@@ ori Paul na Uwimana Chant@@ al, akaba yar@@ avukiye mu mujyi wa Kigali. Ni umwana wa karindwi mu muryango w’abana umunani. Gusa muri iri rushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2018, yari ahagarariye Intara y’Uburengerazuba kubw’@@ impamvu z’uko ari ahantu yabaye kandi akunda nk’uko yakunze kub@@ itangaza. Ni umukobwa w’@@ inz@@ obe, afite uburebure bwa metero 1 na sant@@ im@@ ero 70 akaba apima ibiro 5@@ 7. Mu byo yavugaga ashyize imbere@@ m ni uko niy@@ am@@ bikwa ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda muri uyu mwaka wa 2018, az@@ ateza imbere ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muc@@ o. Abarokotse Jenoside ngo bafite igihango bagiranye n'ingabo z@@ ahagaritse iyo Jenoside Nyir@@ atsinda Fl@@ ora war@@ okokeye i Kar@@ ubamba ho mu murenge wa Rukara mu karere ka Kayonza avuga ko abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 bafite igihango badakwiye gut@@ atira bagiranye n'ingabo z@@ abat@@ abaye ubwo z@@ ahagarik@@ aga Jenoside yor@@ ekaga imbaga mu bice bitandukanye by'u Rwanda. Jenoside yakorewe abari bahungiye i Kar@@ ubamba ngo yakor@@ anywe ubugome bukabije, aho abari bahungiye ku kiriziya ya ho ngo bishwe baras@@ wa, abandi bagat@@ erwa amac@@ umu, ndetse batw@@ ika za matora zari mu nzu bari bahung@@ iyemo noneho bamwe bakajya babaj@@ ugunya muri uwo mur@@ iro. N'ubwo yari umwana muto afite imyaka 13 gusa muri Jenoside, Nyir@@ atsinda ngo yibuka ibyo yaboneye aho ku kiriziya ya Kar@@ ubamba by'umwihariko mu nzu ya ho yerek@@ anir@@ wagamo filimi ubwo abantu bat@@ erwaga amac@@ umu abandi bakar@@ as@@ wa, hakaba n'abo baj@@ uguny@@ aga mu muriro bamaze gutwika za matora zari muri iyo nzu. Agira ati "@@ Bar@@ abanje barar@@ asa bageze ku cyumba twarimo bat@@ erag@@ ura amac@@ umu bar@@ atwika umuriro mwinshi za matora zari aho baraz@@ itw@@ ika abari aho bak@@ aban@@ agamo. Umuriro war@@ atw@@ ishe haz@@ aga iby@@ ok@@ ere bishy@@ ushye bik@@ atug@@ wa hejuru@@ ". Nyir@@ atsinda avuga ko abarokotse Jenoside bafite igihango kid@@ akwiye gut@@ atirwa bagiranye n'ingabo z@@ ahagaritse Jenoside. Ibi bibazo byose kimwe n'indi nzira y'@@ umusaraba Nyir@@ atsinda yanyuzemo ni byo bituma avuga ko abarokotse Jenoside badakwiye gut@@ atira igihango bagiranye n'ingabo z@@ abat@@ abaye ubwo z@@ ahagarik@@ aga Jenoside, akavuga ko gut@@ atira icyo gih@@ ango byaba ari ubug@@ wari bukomeye. Ati "@@ Ntit@@ uk@@ ibagirwe aho twav@@ uye, n@@ ujya guh@@ emukira bariya bantu batug@@ iriye neza, jya wibuka iriya sura baj@@ emo. Ubug@@ wari ni bub@@ iri, guh@@ emukira uwag@@ uhaye no gusaba uwo wim@@ ye. Tw@@ ib@@ ima amatwi twaba t@@ ubaye ibyo big@@ wari bya mbere tw@@ ima amatwi abat@@ ugiriye neza". Nyir@@ atsinda anavuga ko abarokotse Jenoside cyane cyane imfubyi za Jenoside zikwiye gushimira Leta y'ubumwe na perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame ku buryo bw'@@ umwihariko, kuko yatumye abana benshi batari bafite icyizere cyo kubaho kubera kugirwa imfubyi na Jenoside baba abagabo. Cyprien M. Ngendahimana

‘@@ Black Belg@@ ian@@ ’, filime y’@@ umunyarwanda ih@@ atanye mu bihembo bikomeye muri Maroc Habyarimana Jean Luc uri mu bazwi cyane muri sinema mu Rwanda, yatoranyijwe mu bakoze filime nziza zih@@ ataniye ibihembo bikomeye muri Maroc. Jean Luc Habyarimana ni umuhanga mu gutunganya no kuyobora filime, azwi cyane mu yitwa ‘@@ Str@@ eng@@ th in Fe@@ ar@@ ’ yasohoye mu mwaka wa 2012 ndetse na ‘@@ Los 100 d@@ í@@ as que no con@@ m@@ ov@@ ier@@ on al mund@@ o’ yakoze mu myaka umunani ishize. Ubu yatumiwe mu iserukiramuco rikomeye ryitwa Festival du c@@ in@@ é@@ ma afric@@ ain de Kh@@ our@@ ib@@ ga rimaze imyaka 20 ribera muri Maroc, ir@@ y’uyu mwaka rizabera mu Ntara ya Kh@@ our@@ ib@@ g@@ a. Iri serukiramuco ry@@ ibanda ku guteza imbere sinema ya Afurika no kuzamura umuco biciye mu muziki, buri mwaka hator@@ anywa igihugu kigomba kuvamo umuhanzi uz@@ erekana umuco wacyo binyuze mu ndirimbo. Mu iserukiramuco ‘@@ Festival du c@@ in@@ é@@ ma afric@@ ain de Kh@@ our@@ ib@@ g@@ a’, haz@@ an@@ atang@@ irwamo ibihembo bikomeye muri sin@@ ema, filime zo mu bihugu 14 bya Afurika ziz@@ erek@@ anwa. I@@ yitwa «@@ Le Bel@@ ge n@@ oir@@ » yakozwe na Jean-@@ Luc Habyarimana nayo iri mu zih@@ ataniye ibih@@ embo. Filime zih@@ atanye uyu mwaka harimo izo muri Sénég@@ al, Mozambique, Ghana, B@@ én@@ in, Mali, Al@@ g@@ éri@@ e, Afrique du Sud@@ , Burkina Faso, T@@ ogo, Uganda, Tunis@@ ie, Maroc, Egyp@@ t, n’u Rwanda. Mu bihembo bizatangwa harimo ikiz@@ ag@@ enwa n’abagize akanama nkemuramp@@ aka, icy’@@ uw@@ ayoboye neza filime kurusha abandi, icy’@@ umukinnyi w’@@ umugabo, ndetse n’umukinnyi wa filime wahize abandi mu cyiciro cy’@@ abagore. Filime izahabwa igih@@ embo, iz@@ anag@@ enerwa ibah@@ asha irimo 400 000@@ .@@ 00 d@@ h@@ s azatangwa n’umuryango O@@ CP utegura iri seruk@@ iram@@ uc@@ o. Mu cyiciro cy’@@ abany@@ amuz@@ iki, u Rwanda ruzaba ruhagarariwe na Jules Sent@@ ore. Ibi ni bimwe mu bintu abantu benshi bagiye bibaza cyane, ubwo umuhanzi uk@@ izamuka akora indirimbo imwe ikam@@ enyekana ariko yakora izindi ntiz@@ im@@ enyek@@ ane, ariko umuhanzi wamaze kumenyekana iyo akoze yose ikam@@ enyekana cyane. Nizeyimana agiye gusohora igitabo gishya ku mateka muzi ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Umwanditsi akaba n’@@ umushakashatsi ku mateka y’u Rwanda yibanda cyane ku mibanire n’ubumwe bw’@@ Abanyarwanda, Innocent Nizeyimana agiye kumurika igice cya kabiri cy’@@ igitabo yise "@@ Ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda mu mateka yab@@ o: U Rwanda nyuma y’ubuk@@ or@@ oni na Politiki y’@@ amacakubiri yagejeje kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda”. Umuhango wo kumurika iki gitabo uteganyijwe kuwa Gatanu tariki ya 13 Ugushyingo muri Lem@@ igo Hotel. Iki ni igice cya kabiri cy’ubushakashatsi bwe, kikaba gikurikira icya mbere kivuga ku ruhare rw’@@ ubukor@@ oni mu macakub@@ iri ashingiye ku moko yatangiye kuba agat@@ erer@@ anz@@ amba kuva mu gihe cy’@@ ubukor@@ oni bw’@@ Abab@@ il@@ igi, ubwo izari inzego z’@@ imibereho y’Abanyarwanda z@@ ahind@@ ukaga bitewe n’impamvu zitandukanye. Izo nzego Nizeyimana akom@@ ozaho cyane cyane ni iz@@ atumaga umuntu ajya mu cyiciro runaka kuko umutungo wiyongereye cyangwa wag@@ abanutse, cyangwa se ubutwari ku rugamba bukaba bwatuma ug@@ abirwa ukava mu rwego rumwe ukajya mu r@@ undi. Muri iki gitabo gishy@@ a, umwanditsi agaragaza uburyo ibyo byiciro byahind@@ uwe ubw@@ oko, mu 1930 bagatangira kubishyira mu ndangam@@ untu. Muri icyo gitabo kandi agaragaza impamvu zateye abakor@@ oni b’@@ Ababiligi kubikora batyo ndetse n’ingaruka byagize ku Rwanda ndetse no mu karere. Iki gitabo cyit@@ ezweho gukomeza gufasha abantu gusobanukirwa n’amateka y’u Rwanda ya mbere ndetse no mu gihe cya gikor@@ oni. Aganira na IGIHE, umwanditsi Innocent Nizeyimana yagize ati"@@ Iyo dus@@ obanurira urubyiruko amateka y’igihugu cyacu, tubag@@ aragariza uburyo amacakubiri yatangiye mu gihe cy’@@ ubukor@@ oni ariko bakat@@ ubaza ukuntu byagenze kugira ngo habeho Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kandi hari hashize igihe abakor@@ oni barag@@ iye. Usanga kandi bafite amatsiko cyane ku ihanurwa ry’indege ry’@@ uwari p@@ Prezida w’u Rwanda, Habyarimana Juvenal@@ ." Ku bijyanye n’@@ ihanurwa ry’indege ya Habyarimana, Nizeyimana yavuze ko yagiye agaragaza ibintu byinshi bivugwa kuri iyi ngingo, n’iby@@ ibazwa n’abantu batandukanye ariko ko ad@@ atanga umwanzuro ugaragaza uw@@ ahanuye indege ahubwo afasha uzag@@ isoma kwifatira umwanzuro uko abyumva akurikije amakuru yose akubiye muri iki git@@ abo. Mu gitabo cye, umwanditsi akomoza no ku ruhare rw’@@ Ikinyamakuru K@@ angura mu kubiba amacakubiri mu banyarwanda, uko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yateguwe mu buryo bud@@ asubir@@ waho. Nizeyimana avuga ko kugira ngo iki gitabo kij@@ ye ahagaragara yab@@ ifash@@ ish@@ ijwemo n’Umuryango A@@ eg@@ is Trus@@ t ndetse na Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Ubumwe n’Ubw@@ iyunge. Nizeyimana Innocent yemeza ko iki gitabo gishya kizafasha abantu kumenya neza inkomoko muzi ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi

Icyo ubufatanye bwa BK na FERWABA bw@@ ahinduye ku bakinnyi ba Basketball mu Rwanda Nyuma y’amezi 15 ashize Ishyirahamwe Nyarwanda ry’umukino wa Basketball, FERW@@ AB@@ A, r@@ itangiye ubufatanye n’umut@@ erankunga mukuru, Banki ya Kigali, hari impinduka zig@@ aragarira buri wese zimaze kuba muri uyu mukino usigaye ukunzwe n’abatari bake mu Rwanda. Ubw@@ itabire bw’@@ abafana, urukundo rw’@@ umukino, kugendera kuri gahunda no kuzamuka mu mikin@@ ire hashingiwe ku ih@@ atana ry’@@ amakipe ni bimwe mu biranga Basketball y’u Rwanda muri iyi minsi, bitandukanye no mu myaka ibiri ishize cyangwa indi yay@@ ib@@ anjir@@ ije. Mu mpera za Ugushyingo 2018 nibwo FERWABA yasinyanye na Banki ya Kigali, amasezerano y’ubufatanye afite agaciro ka miliyoni 300 Frw, impande zombi z@@ emeranya gukorana mu gihe cy’imyaka itatu. Banki ya Kigali itera inkunga amarushanwa ane ya FERWABA arimo shampiyona guhera mu mwaka ushize w’imikino wa 2018@@ /@@ 19. Mbere y’uko uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/@@ 20 ut@@ angira, Banki ya Kigali yongereye amafaranga yatangaga ku mwaka, ava kuri miliyoni 100 Frw, agera kuri miliyoni 135 Frw. Ese ubu bufatanye bw’@@ impande zomb@@ ie hari icyo bufasha abak@@ inny@@ i? Ku ruhande rw’@@ ubuyobozi bw’@@ Ishyirahamwe ry’@@ Umukino wa Basketball mu Rwanda (FERW@@ AB@@ A) ntaw@@ ashidikanya ko bishimiye kubona Banki ya Kigali nk’@@ umuterankunga mu gihe n’amakipe hari icyo yung@@ utse, kuko uretse kuba aza mu myanya ya mbere, agira icyo abona, buri kipe yitabiriye Shampiyona ihabwa miliyoni 2 Frw ziy@@ ifasha mu ngendo ikora. Binyuze mu bufatanye bw’@@ izi mpande zombi, umuntu yakw@@ ishimira ko hari impano zitangiye kugaragara muri Basketball bitewe n’@@ irushanwa rya Basketball y’abak@@ ina ari batatu ryatangijwe mu mwaka ushize, rig@@ ahuza abana batarengeje imyaka 17. Iri rushanwa ryas@@ or@@ ejwe i Rubavu mu Ugushyingo 2019, uyu mwaka byitezwe ko riz@@ agera mu gihugu cyose, aho mu duce tune ryari r@@ yakin@@ wemo ubush@@ ize, kuri ubu haz@@ ong@@ erwaho utundi tubiri (@@ Rusizi na Nyamasheke & Gicumbi na Nyagatar@@ e). Mu cyiciro cy’@@ abakinnyi bakuru, bakina Shampiyon@@ a, hari abah@@ embwe ubwo hasozwaga Shampiyona ishize mu byiciro birimo gutsinda amanota menshi muri Shampiyon@@ a, gutsinda amanota atatu, d@@ un@@ k, abakinnyi batanga icyizere n’ibindi. Hari kandi abakinnyi 10 bitwaye neza (@@ 5 mu bagore na 5 mu bag@@ ab@@ o), aho buri mukinnyi yahawe miliyoni imwe y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda ndetse bazas@@ inya amasezerano yo kuba abam@@ bas@@ aderi ba BK mu gihe cy’umwaka umwe. Ndayisaba Ndizeye Dieudonné ‘@@ Gas@@ ton@@ ’ wa Patriots BBC, wabaye umukinnyi w’umwaka (M@@ V@@ P) mu bagabo, ni umwe mu ba Ambasaderi ba Banki ya Kigali. Aganira na IGIHE , yavuze ko kuza kwa Banki ya Kigali muri Bas@@ k@@ te@@ ball y’u Rwanda byahinduye byinshi mu kibuga ndetse no ku bak@@ innyi. Ati “@@ Mbona kuba BK yaraje ikagira ubufatanye na FERWABA byar@@ adufashije nka Basketball muri rusange. Mbere na mbere ni mu buryo bw’@@ amikor@@ o, bifasha amakipe kandi kuba BK yar@@ ashyizeho ibihembo ku bakinnyi byatumye hazamo guhang@@ ana, buri wese akeneye ko yahabwa ibihembo bya BK kandi mu gihe umukino w@@ ajemo guhangana nibwo Basketball ir@@ yohera n’abakunzi bay@@ o.’’ Mwizerwa Faust@@ ine ni umukinnyi wa The Ho@@ op@@ s muri Shampiyona y’@@ abagore. Na we avuga ko kuba abakinnyi bakina bafite icyo baharanira bibatera ishyaka ndetse bituma bazamura urwego bikaba byan@@ afasha kubaka ikipe y’igihugu ikomeye. Ati “Ni ubufatanye tw@@ unguk@@ iyemo byinshi, nk’@@ abakinnyi mbere ntabwo twag@@ iraga ikid@@ utera imbaraga, ariko kuba umukinnyi witwaye neza ahabwa miliyoni y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda bituma buri wese aharanira gukora cyane kugira ngo n’@@ utar@@ ay@@ ibonye azay@@ ibone ubut@@ aha. Ikindi ni uko buri mukinnyi aharanira kwigaragaza neza kugira ngo az@@ abone n’umwanya mu ikipe y’@@ igihugu.” Nsh@@ oboz@@ wab@@ yos@@ en@@ umukiza Jean Jacques Wil@@ son, yavuze ko kuba ambasaderi wa Banki ya Kigali ari ibintu bishimishije kuko bizajya bifasha abakinnyi kumenyana n’abantu benshi ndetse bagahura n’abafana babo. Ati “B@@ yatumye abakinnyi benshi duk@@ ina twumva ko d@@ ushyigik@@ iwe, hari abakunda ibyo duk@@ ora. Kuba hari amafaranga ahabwa amakipe byar@@ ay@@ afashije kandi hari n’icyo abakinnyi babona. Ibihembo bitangwa nyuma y’umwaka w’imikino bituma abakinnyi bigaragaza kugira ngo baz@@ abe aba mbas@@ aderi ba Banki ya Kigal@@ i.” “Kuba Ambasaderi wa Banki ya Kigali navuga ko ari ibintu bishimishije nubwo tutar@@ atangira kubikora cyane, ariko bizadufasha kumeny@@ ena n’abantu benshi kandi bid@@ uhuza n’abak@@ unda umukino duk@@ in@@ a.” Kapiteni wa APR BBC y’@@ abagore, Umugwaneza Charl@@ ott@@ e, avuga ko ubufatanye bwa FERWABA na Banki ya Kigali bw@@ azanye impinduka nziza ugereranyije n’uburyo byari bimeze kuko abakinnyi ubu bakinana umuh@@ ate. Mub@@ yateje ubukene UR ngo harimo no kur@@ ihira amashuri abakozi bayo basaga 200 Abadepite babajije Minisitiri w’uburezi impamvu Kaminuza y’u Rwanda imaze iminsi mu bibazo by’@@ ubukene kandi idak@@ odesha ibikoresho cyangwa inyubako ndetse ikaba in@@ aterwa inkunga na Leta we asubiza ko amafaranga ya UR ajya muri byinshi birimo no kur@@ ihira amashuri abakozi bayo basaga 200. Ibi Minisitiri w’uburezi Dr Musafiri Papias Mal@@ imba yabitangarije komisiyo y’ubur@@ ezi, Ikoranabuhanga, umuco n’urubyiruko mu nteko ishinga amategeko kuri uyu wa 19 Ukwakira 2017. Yabanje gusobanura impamvu zo guhind@@ uranya iby@@ icaro by’@@ ama k@@ ol@@ eji ya Kaminuza y’u Rwanda avuga ko bigamije kunoza uburyo bwo gusaranganya ibik@@ enerwa no gufasha abanyeshuri kwigira ahari ibikoresho bihagije. Yavuze ko kwimura abanyeshuri mu makor@@ eji amwe bajya mu yandi nta tegeko by@@ ishe kuko abanyeshuri bari batat@@ anye ku buryo bigaga nabi bityo ngo abona hari hakenewe icyemezo cyo kub@@ ihind@@ ura. Ati: “@@ Izi Mp@@ induka ni nziza, urugero nk’iyo urebye ukuntu ibintu byifashe i Rukara aho tw@@ ajyanye k@@ ol@@ eji z’@@ uburezi zose, uhita ubona uburyo hariya hantu hat@@ akoreshwaga uko bikw@@ iye.” Yagarutse no ku guhuza k@@ ol@@ eji z’@@ ubuf@@ oromo agira ati: “…@@ Twari dufite k@@ ol@@ eji y’@@ ubuf@@ oromo i Ngoma, i Gicumbi, i Nyagatare, i Rwamagana n’ahandi kandi muri zose nta n’imwe yari ir@@ engeje abanyeshuri 300, byar@@ umvikanaga cyane kuba twaz@@ imurira i Huye zose uretse iya Rwamagana yari ifite ibyangombwa bihagij@@ e.” Depite Philbert Uwiringiyimana yabajije Minisitiri Musafiri imvano y’@@ ubukene bugaragara muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda agira ati: “@@ Kaminuza zigenga zir@@ akora neza kandi z@@ ishyuza make ugereranyije na UR@@ , ni gute iriya kaminuza yaba idak@@ odesha inyubak@@ o, ikan@@ ahabwa amafaranga na Leta ariko ikagira ibibazo by’@@ ubukene bukab@@ ij@@ e?" Minisitiri Musafiri yasubije avuga ko amafaranga ya Kaminuza agendera mu bintu byinshi ati: “ Hari ahantu henshi amafaranga akoresh@@ wa, nk’@@ urugero hari abakozi ba UR basaga 200 bishy@@ urirwa amashuri kugirango bongere ubumenyi, kandi baz@@ agaruka bakor@@ ere UR@@ .” Uyu muyobozi yanavuze ko bashyizeho ingamba ko buri Koleji izajya yish@@ akira ingengo y’imari yayo bikag@@ enzurwa na UR nk’@@ ikig@@ o. Ibi ngo bizag@@ abanya inzira ndende byasabaga amak@@ ol@@ eji kugera ku mafaranga ziba zikeneye gukoresh@@ a. As@@ ubiza ku mpamvu bamwe mu banyeshuri barangiza muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda bahura n’ubush@@ omeri bukabije, Minisitiri Musafiri yavuze ko ibyo byaba bishingiye ku bumenyi bud@@ ahagije abo banyeshuri bakura muri Kaminuza. Ati: “Ikibazo cy’@@ ubushomeri ni ingaruka zo kutagira abanyeshuri bafite ubumenyi buh@@ agije, ariko uburyo turimo gukoresha bugamije kongera ireme ry’uburezi no kongera uburyo bwo guhanga imirim@@ o.” Iyi komisiyo yari yatum@@ ije Minisitiri w’uburezi nyuma y’@@ ingendo yakoze muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda mu rwego rwo kureba iterambere ryayo. The new@@ times dukesha iyi nkuru yatangaje ko mu munsi mike iyi komisiyo izan@@ ahura n’abayobozi ba Kaminuza y’u Rwanda ndetse n’aba Minisiteri y’abakozi ba Leta n’Umurimo bakaganira ku bibazo byugarije uburezi.

Aganira na Televiziyo y’u Rwanda, Z@@ ac@@ har@@ ie Gasana yagize ati “Tw@@ at@@ ije akarere aya mazu kubera ibibazo abaturage bari bafit@@ e.@@ Bar@@ ar@@ waraga bagah@@ era mu ngo bakabura uko bagera kwa muganga, nd@@ areba mbona bidakwiye kandi nari mfite uburyo bw’@@ ayo mazu nari maze gutung@@ anya, hanyuma mbwira umurenge ko w@@ afasha abaturage, bagatangira bagafasha abaturage kwivuz@@ a.” Abaturage bahawe iv@@ uriro, bashimiye Gasana wemeye gutanga inzu ze ngo z@@ ishyir@@ wemo iv@@ uriro. Iyo ufite urugendo rw’@@ iminota 20 cyangwa 30 bir@@ adufasha cyane, turashimira uyu mubyeyi w@@ adut@@ ek@@ erej@@ eho.” Gasana wat@@ ije Akarere inzu zo gushyiramo ivuriro Icyakora aba baturage bavuga ko bafite ikibazo cy’uko iyo poste de santé id@@ akora mu mpera z’@@ icyumweru. Meya wa Kicukiro ubwo yari amaze kur@@ egwa n'@@ umuturage imbere ya Perezida KAGAM@@ E, yahise ajya kwereka abanyamakuru ukur@@ i(@@ Y@@ avug@@ uru@@ we) Ubwo Meya wa Kicukiro Paul Jules Nd@@ amage yamaraga kur@@ egwa n'@@ umuturage imbere ya Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 11 Ugushyingo 2014 amushinja we n'ubuyobozi bw'akarere kumwirukana mu nzu, nyuma y'@@ uruzinduko rwa Perezida , Meya Nd@@ amage yahise ajya kw@@ er@@ ereka abanyamakuru ukuri kw'@@ icyo kibazo. Perezida Kagame ubwo yag@@ anir@@ aga, an@@ asubiza ibibazo by'abaturage Ni mu ruzinduko Perezida Paul Kagame yagiriye mu murenge wa Jabana mu karere ka Gasabo, aho igihe hari hatanzwe umwanya wo kwakira ibibazo by'@@ abaturage, umuturage witwa Mukas@@ inzi Clarisse yahagurutse akavuga ko yareng@@ anyijwe na Meya wa Kicukiro ndetse n'ubuyobozi bw'akarere ngo bwam@@ wirukanye mu nzu ndetse buk@@ amut@@ eza basaza be ngo bajye bam@@ ukub@@ ita. Mukas@@ inzi yavugaga ko bapfa isambu we na basaza be basig@@ iwe n'aba@@ byeyi, Leta ikaza gut@@ uzamo abandi bantu. Y@@ isobanura Nd@@ amage yavuze ko ubusanzwe Mukas@@ inzi yari afite isambu we na basaza be basig@@ iwe n'ababyeyi babo mu Murenge wa Kagar@@ ama. Mu mwaka wa 2003 iyo sambu yat@@ uj@@ wemo abandi bantu kubera gahunda Leta yari ifite yo gutuza neza abaturage. Paul Jules Nd@@ amage ubwo yasobanuraga ikibazo cya Mukas@@ inzi Nd@@ amage yakomeje avuga ko nta ng@@ urane yatanzwe icyo gihe kubera ko nta tegeko ryo gutanga ingurane ryari ryak@@ ag@@ iyeho. Mu mwaka wa 2009, ngo nibwo Mukas@@ inzi na basaza be bubakiwe inzu yo kubamo nk'@@ abatishoboye. Bamaze kubakirwa inzu, Mukas@@ inzi ngo yashatse umugabo, aram@@ uzana ngo bajye babana na basaza babo. B@@ yahise bizamura amakimbirane ndetse rimwe na rimwe bakajya barwana bapfa uwo mugabo wa Mukas@@ inzi. Ikibazo cy@@ acy@@ em@@ uwe hir@@ ukanwa Mukas@@ inzi n'uwo mugabo , icyakora Mukas@@ inzi yaje kuh@@ agaruka nta mugabo ari kumwe n'@@ abana. Nd@@ amage akaba yahakanye ko nta mas@@ ano afitanye na Mukas@@ inzi ubwo yari ab@@ ibaj@@ ijwe na Perezida Kagame niba hari icyo bapf@@ ana, gusa ngo bahuriye ko bose ari abanyarwanda. Perezida Kagame yagaragaje ko atishimiye uburyo icyo kibazo cy@@ acy@@ em@@ uwe, ngo kuko bitumvikana uburyo hir@@ ukanwa umuntu ufite abana, hag@@ asigara abas@@ ore. Yasabye ko icyo kibazo cy@@ iganwa ubushishozi kandi kig@@ acy@@ em@@ urwa vuba nta we ub@@ ireng@@ an@@ iyemo. Nyuma y'@@ urwo ruzinduko rwa Perezida Kagame, Meya Nd@@ amage yahamagaye abanyamakuru ngo bajye kureba ukuri kw'@@ ibyo Mukas@@ inzi yareg@@ eye Perezida, bag@@ ezeyo basanga Mukas@@ inzi aba mu nzu imwe na basaza be, bitandukanye n'ibyo yabwiye Perezida kuko we yavugaga ko bamw@@ ir@@ ukan@@ yemo burundu. Musaza we witwa Uwizeye Jean Pierre yadutangarije ko ubusanzwe mushiki wabo ari we wan@@ anir@@ anye, ngo kuko nyuma y'uko Leta it@@ uje abandi bantu mu isambu yabo, ngo hari ikibanza n'inzu yo k@@ ogosh@@ eramo Leta yabag@@ eneye, nyamara Mukas@@ inzi ngo ahita aby@@ ig@@ urish@@ ir@@ iza, amafaranga ajya kuy@@ asangira n'abag@@ abo, adah@@ ayeho basaza be. Abaturage baturanye nabo bem@@ ezaga ko Mukas@@ inzi ari we utera ikibazo, ahanini kubera kuzana abagabo batandukanye muri iyo nzu. Meya Nd@@ amage akaba yahise avuga ko bagiye gushakira basaza be babiri aho kuba@@ (@@ kuko musaza we mukuru yagiye kwishakira iye mib@@ ereh@@ o) kandi ngo bakanab@@ itaho ku buryo bwo kubona ibibat@@ unga kugirango ikibazo gik@@ emuk@@ e.
