Cote d'@@ Iv@@ oir@@ e: Abatavuga rumwe na Leta baremeza ko umwuka uhari atari uw'@@ amatora Umurwa mukuru wa Cote d'Ivoire , Abidj@@ an / Phot@@ o.@@ net Abakandida 5 mu bakandida 10 biy@@ amamaza ku mwanya wa Perezida wa Cote d'@@ Iv@@ oir@@ e,@@ batangaje ko igihugu kitari mu bihe byiza kuburyo amatora ateganyijwe ku wa 25 Ukwakira uyu mwaka, yaba mu kuri no mu bw@@ isanzure. Ibi abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bibumbiye mu ihuriro riharanira imp@@ induk@@ a@@ (CN@@ N@@ ) babig@@ aragarije mu nama yah@@ uriwemo n'abat@@ avuga rumwe n'@@ ubutegets@@ i,@@ yabereye mu murwa mukuru Abidj@@ an. Umuvugizi w'@@ inteko Ishinga Amategeko M@@ amadou Co@@ ul@@ iba@@ ly yagize ati: " Bamwe mu bakandida ntabwo barimo gushobora kujya mu biro bitewe n'ibihe igihugu kirim@@ o." Yan@@ ongeyeho ko ubwicanyi bukwiye guhagarara Abakandida icyenda bavuze ko bagomba kwicarana na Alassane Ouattara bakagira ibyo baganir@@ aho. Abandi bakandida batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi barimo n'uwahoze ari Minisitiri w'intebe w'iki gihugu Charles Kon@@ an Ban@@ ny@@ ,@@ yikomye Komisiyo y'amatora (C@@ E@@ I@@ ), avuga ko ib@@ ogamira kuri Ouatt@@ ara. Co@@ ul@@ iba@@ ly kandi yavuze ko mu gihe amatora ategerejwe mu gihe kitageze mu byumweru bit@@ at@@ u,@@ ngo nta mukandida n'umwe urabona urutonde rw'@@ abaz@@ ator@@ a,@@ ndetse ngo nta nubwo Komisiyo y'amatora iratangira gutanga amakarita y'@@ itor@@ a.@@ . Izi mpaka zije nyuma y'aho uwahoze ari Minisitiri w'ububanyi n'amahanga Am@@ ara Es@@ s@@ y, atangarije ko avuye mu bahatanira umwanya w'@@ umukuru w'@@ ig@@ i@@ oh@@ ugu kubera ko ashaka kwirinda ubwicanyi bushobora kuz@@ akurikira amatora. Mu cy@@ um@@ eru gishize abakandida batavuga rumwe n'@@ ubutegetsi, banenze uburyo aya matora yateg@@ uwe. Al@@ as@@ ane Ou@@ at@@ ara uteganyijwe ko ashobora kongera gutsinda amatora, afatwa nk'@@ ufite ubukungu bukomeye muri Afurika y'ubur@@ engerazuba, ubukungu yabonye nyuma y'@@ imv@@ uru zikomoka ku matora zabaye muri 2010. Imv@@ ururu zabaye nyuma y'amatora yo mu mwaka wa 2010 aho Perezida Laurent Gbagbo yatsinzwe na Al@@ as@@ ane O@@ ut@@ t@@ ara, zahitanye abagera ku 3@@ .000 kuko ko yari yanze kuva ku butegetsi. Kugeza mu gitondo cyo kuri iki Cyumweru, ku Isi yose, abantu 4.@@ 10@@ 1.@@ 7@@ 72 nibo bamaze kw@@ angura icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Ni mu gihe 28@@ 04@@ 43 aribo bamaze gupfa naho 1.@@ 44@@ 1.@@ 79@@ 1 bo barak@@ ize. Mu Karere u Rwanda ruherere@@ yemo, Kenya ifite abantu banduye 6@@ 49 mu gihe 30 bapfuye, Tanzania ni 50@@ 9 bamaze kwandura naho 21 bar@@ apfuye, Uganda abamaze kwandura ni 11@@ 6, nta n’umwe ur@@ apfa. Misiri yatangije iperereza ku gikombe cy’Afurika cy’@@ umwimerere cy@@ aburiwe irengero Misiri yegukanye icyo gikombe inshuro eshatu yikurikir@@ anya, mu 2006, 2008 no mu 2010. Impuzamashyirahamwe y’umupira w’amaguru muri Afurika (C@@ AF) yahise iha Misiri uburenganzira bwo kubika icyo gikombe mu buryo buhoraho. Icyo gikombe muri uwo mw@@ imerere w@@ acyo, cyak@@ oreshejwe bwa mbere mu mwaka wa 2002. Mu mwaka wa 2013, abafana barak@@ aye bir@@ aye mu nyubako ya EF@@ A, ariko ntib@@ izwi niba icyo gihe ari bwo icyo gikombe cy@@ aburiwe irengero. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umuvugizi wa E@@ FA yabwiye BBC ko nyuma yuko guterwa kw’@@ iyo nyubako mu mwaka wa 2013, ibikombe bitandukanye byimuriwe mu bub@@ iko. Ariko, yavuze ko vuba aha ari bwo bashak@@ ishije ibyo bik@@ ombe, nyuma y’@@ icyemezo cyo kuvugurura umuryango w’@@ inyubako y’@@ ishyirahamwe E@@ FA kugira ngo ibikombe byinshi Misiri imaze gutwara mu mupira w’amaguru bigarag@@ azwe aho ng@@ aho. Amategeko ya CAF avuga ko ikipe itwaye umwimerere runaka w’igikombe cy’Afurika inshuro eshatu, ihita ihabwa uwo mw@@ imerere w’igikombe ikag@@ itwara burundu. Ghana ni cyo gihugu cya mbere cy@@ egukanye igikombe cy’Afurika inshuro eshatu, mu mwaka wa 197@@ 8, mu gihe Cameroun mu 2000 yaje guhabwa icyo gikombe mu ishusho (v@@ ers@@ ion) yacyo ya kabiri, nyuma yo kuba igihugu cya mbere k@@ icy@@ egukanye inshuro eshatu. Amategeko ya CAF avuga ko amakipe atsindiye igikombe cy’Afurika cy’@@ ibihugu ahabwa igisa n’icy’@@ umwimerere ak@@ akig@@ umana mu buryo buh@@ oraho, mu gihe igikombe cy’@@ umwimerere akig@@ umana mu myaka ibiri yo hagati y’irushanwa rir@@ angiye n’ir@@ igiye gutangira, nyuma akongera akag@@ isubiza CAF@@ . Igikombe cyo muri iki gihe - kig@@ isa n’icyo cy@@ egukanywe na Misiri - ubu kiri mu biganza by’@@ Algeria yatsindiye igih@@ eruka gukin@@ irwa i Cairo mu mwaka wa 2019. BBC

Aha abantu benshi usanga barya ibyo abakunzi babo barya cyangwa banywa nyamara mbere atari ko byari bimeze. Kuba wiga indimi ukabona inshuti yiga mu m@@ ibare, ntibivuze ko na we uz@@ ahita uhindura ukaba umunyam@@ ibare bitewe n’uko uwo muntu wamw@@ iyumv@@ isemo ahubwo ugomba gukomeza intego wari war@@ ihaye mutar@@ akund@@ ana. Umuryango Si byiza kubona inshuti ngo ucike ku bavandimwe bawe n’izindi nshuti muri rusange. Umuryango rero ntibivuze abo muv@@ ukana gusa ahubwo n’abo mwah@@ oranye mu gihe wari ukiri wenyine utar@@ abona umukunzi baba abahungu n’abak@@ obwa. Umukunzi wawe rero ntagomba kug@@ uca ku bantu mwar@@ er@@ anywe cyangwa mw@@ agendanye mut@@ aram@@ eny@@ ana dore ko hari n’abakora ikosa ryo k@@ osh@@ y@@ wa n’uwo bakundana ngo niba yanga umuntu nawe amw@@ ange. Ibihugu 24 bikomeje guhatanira igikombe kiz@@ atangwa tariki ya 19 Nyakanga. Amazina y’@@ ut@@ ubyin@@ iriro aba afite kinini avuze cyane mu mupira w’amaguru wa Afurika, aho atari no kugira ngo ashim@@ ishe abafana gusa ahubwo atera ingufu n’abak@@ innyi. Amazina y’@@ amakip@@ e, abafana bis@@ ize amar@@ ang@@ i, imbyino zid@@ asanzwe, v@@ uvuz@@ ela n’@@ ingoma ni bimwe mu bikomeje kuranga iri rushanwa rya Afurika rih@@ anzwe amaso n’abatari bake. Dore zimwe mu nyam@@ answa zit@@ iriwe amakipe y’ibihugu ari gukina iri rush@@ an@@ wa: Ibis@@ iga (@@ Kag@@ om@@ a) Muri ibi byumweru bitatu igikombe cya Afurika kiz@@ amara, iri zina uzar@@ yumva kenshi. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yanyomoje ibivugwa ko Ebola ikomeje gusatira u Rwanda Minisiteri y’Ubuzima irah@@ umuriza Abanyarwanda n’@@ Abaturarwanda ibam@@ enyesha ko nta tangazo ryatanzwe n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima (OM@@ S), rivuga ko Ebola irush@@ ijeho gusatira u Rwanda. Ni nyuma y’@@ inkuru yac@@ icikanye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga no ku rubuga rwa BBC tariki ya 28 Mutarama 2019, ivuga ko OMS yatangaje ko Ebola irush@@ ijeho gusatira u Rwanda. Iri tangazo ryasohotse tariki ya 28 Mutarama 2019 rir@@ agira riti “@@ Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iram@@ enyesha Abanyarwanda n’@@ Abaturarwanda ko nta tangazo yahawe n’Ishami ry’ Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe ubuzima, OMS, ryaba rivuga ko Ebola irush@@ ijeho gusatira u Rwanda nk’uko byavuzwe mu itangazamakuru no ku mbuga nkoranyambag@@ a”. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ikaba ibon@@ eyeho guhumuriza abanyarwanda n’abandi bose bagend@@ erera u Rwanda ko kugeza ubu nta muntu urag@@ aragaraho icyorezo cya Ebola kandi ko hafashwe ingamba zitandukanye zo gukumira no kwirinda icyo cyorezo. U Rwanda rumaze igihe mu myiteguro yo gukumira no kwirinda icyorezo cya Ebola cyibasiye igihugu cy’@@ abatur@@ anyi, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) kandi aho igeze har@@ ashim@@ ishije. Ku bufatanye n’izindi nzego zitandukanye za leta n’imiryango mpuzamahanga harimo Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe ubuzima, OMS, hateguwe amahugurwa y’abag@@ anga, abaforomo n’abandi bakora mu mavuriro mu turere twose tw’@@ igihugu. Hah@@ uguwe kandi abashinzwe guhugura abandi kuva ku karere kugera ku mudugudu harimo abajyanama b’@@ ubuzima, mu bijyanye no kwirinda no gukumira icyorezo cya Ebola. Abandi bahuguwe harimo aba@@ polisi, abanyamakuru n’abak@@ orera bushake ba Croix Rouge y’u Rwanda. Ubukangurambaga bug@@ ikomeza bur@@ akorwa ku bijyanye no kumenya ibimenyetso bya Ebola, uburyo bwo kwirinda kuy@@ andura n’icy@@ akorwa iyo habonetse uwaba yay@@ anduye. Ibi bir@@ akorwa ku nzego zitandukanye kugera mu mudugudu aho batanga ubutumwa bwo gukumira no kwirinda icyorezo cya Ebola mu mug@@ anda, mu mashuri, ku ma radiyo na za televiziyo n’ahandi hose hahurira abantu benshi. I@@ byaba n’andi mashusho byaram@@ an@@ itswe hafi ya za gasut@@ amo, ku ma hot@@ eri, amashuri, ibitaro n’ibigo nderabuzima n’ahandi hahurira abantu benshi mu turere twegereye imipaka. Ubutumwa butangwa bwakozwe hagendewe ku byavuye mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe mu kureba ubumenyi abanyarwanda bafite mu bijyanye no kwirinda icyorezo cya Ebola. H@@ ubatswe ikigo cyihariye mu kuvura Ebola iramutse ig@@ aragaye mu murenge wa Rugerero mu karere ka Rubavu. Hag@@ uzwe ibikoresho n’imiti byakw@@ ifashishwa haramutse hagaragaye Ebola mu Rwanda. H@@ akozwe imyitozo itandukanye yo gusuzuma uko u Rwanda rwiteguye kuba rwah@@ angana na Ebola iramutse ih@@ agarag@@ aye. Iyo myitozo yabereye mu bitaro bya Gisirikare i Kanombe mu mujyi wa Kigali, Mu Karere ka Rusizi ku bitaro bya Gihund@@ we, ku kibuga cy’indege cya Kamembe no ku kigo gifite ubushobozi buhagije bwo kuvura Ebola i Rugerero mu Karere ka Rubavu. Minisiteri y’ubuzima igira iti “Ibyo byose birag@@ agaza ko u Rwanda rwiteguye bihagije guhangana na Ebola. Nubwo duhagaze neza mu kwitegura Ebola, imyitozo ir@@ akomeje ku nzego zitandukanye mu gihugu.” Minisiteri y’Ubuzima kandi ir@@ ibutsa abantu bose ko Ebola ari indwara yandura iyo amaraso cyangwa amat@@ embabuzi y’umuntu uyirwaye akoze ku muntu muzima. Ibimenyetso by’@@ iyo ndwara ni ukugira umuriro, kurwara umutwe, kuribwa mu ngingo, kubabara mu muh@@ ogo, gucika intege, guhit@@ wa, kuruka cyane kandi kenshi, kuribwa mu nda no kuva amaraso ahantu hose hari umw@@ enge ku mubiri w’umun@@ tu. Ebola ntiy@@ and@@ urira mu mw@@ uka. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ir@@ ibutsa ko iyi ndwara yoroshye cyane kwirinda iyo abantu bit@@ aye ku isuku. Yasabye ko abantu bagira umuco wo gukaraba intoki bakoresheje amazi meza n’@@ isab@@ une. Umuntu wese ufite ibimenyetso bya Ebola byavuzwe haruguru agomba kwihutira kujya ku ivuriro rim@@ weg@@ ereye, gukomeza umuco mwiza wo kwivuza hakiri kare igihe cyose wumva urwaye no kwirinda gukora ingendo zitari ngombwa ahag@@ aragaye Ebola. U Rwanda rwiteguye guhangana n'@@ icyorezo cya Ebola [email protected]

Perezida Kagame yahuye n'itsinda ryam@@ ufashije kunoza amavugurura akenewe muri AU Yanditswe na Rabbi Mal@@ o Umucunguzi Kuya 26 Gashyantare 2017 saa 05:@@ 17 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 6 0 Perezida Paul Kagame yahuye n'itsinda ry'@@ abahanga bamufashije kunoza raporo ku mavugurura akenewe mu mikorere y'Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (A@@ U), mu gihe gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro yemejwe mu nama y'@@ abakuru b'ibihugu iheruka byo byatang@@ iye. Mu Nteko rusange ya 28 y'Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe yateraniye Addis Ababa muri Mutarama, nibwo Perezida Kagame yagejeje raporo ku bakuru b'ibihugu 54 bigize AU, ku mavugurura akenewe mu mikorere y'uyu muryango. Ni inshingano yari yarah@@ erewe mu nama ya 27 ya AU yabereye i Kigali muri Nyakanga 2016, ndetse ator@@ anya inararibonye icyenda zam@@ ufashije muri ako kazi. Hari byinshi byas@@ abiwe kuvugururwa Mu nzego zari zikeneye am@@ avug@@ urura, harimo imikorere ya Komisiyo ya AU, uburyo bwo gupima uko inzego zigera ku byo z@@ iyem@@ eje, kwishakamo ubushobozi nk'@@ ibihugu bihuriye mu muryango, uko abayobozi bahagarar@@ irwa mu nama za AU n'ibindi. Mu nama yabereye mu muhezo muri Ethiopia kuwa 29 Mutarama 2017, Perezida Kagame yagaragarije abakuru b'ibihugu bigize AU ko hari ikibazo cyo kuba imiryango ish@@ amikiye kuri AU it@@ agaragara neza uko ig@@ abana inshingano n'abany@@ afurika bakaba batabona akamaro k'@@ uyu muryango. By@@ iyongeraho kuba kenshi abakuru b'ibihugu bakorana inama, bagafata imyanzuro bakay@@ umvikanaho ariko nt@@ ishyir@@ we mu bikorwa, ashimangira ko kugira ngo aya mavugurura ash@@ oboke bisaba indi mikorere bityo icyo kibazo kig@@ akemuka mbere y'@@ ibindi. Yavuze ko kugira ngo imyanzuro ifat@@ irwa mu nama za AU ijye irushaho gushyirwa mu bikorwa, hakwiye kubaho uburyo abayobozi ba AU bas@@ imburana ku rwego rw'@@ abakuru b'@@ ibihugu, utah@@ iwe akazajya atorwa mbere y'umwaka umwe. Yakomeje agira ati"@@ Abakuru b'ibihugu bakwiye kujya bahagarar@@ irwa mu nama n'abayobozi batari munsi y'@@ urwego rwa Visi Perezida cyangwa Minisitiri w'Int@@ ebe. Kuri iyi ngingo by'@@ umwihariko, hari ubwo Perezida aba adahari, yaba Minisitiri w'Intebe, abam@@ inisit@@ iri, ba ambas@@ ad@@ eri, ugasanga byageze ku bany@@ amabanga ba za ambasade n'abandi. Nd@@ atekereza ko ibi bid@@ akw@@ iye." Gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro byar@@ atangiye Umwe mu myanzuro iri gushyirwa mu bikorwa n'@@ ibihugu, harimo ko ibikorwa bya AU, bigomba gushingira ku bushobozi bw'@@ abany@@ afurika, aho buri gihugu cy@@ ajya gitanga 0.@@ 2% by'@@ amahoro y'@@ iby@@ injira mu gihugu, ukajya muri AU, amafaranga akomoka kuri ayo mahoro yose hamwe akaz@@ agera kuri miliyari $@@ 1.@@ 2 buri mwaka. Muri Ethiopia, Perezida Kagame yagize ati "@@ Gahunda zacu zir@@ aterwa inkunga n'abanyamahanga ku kigero cya 97@@ %, kandi kugera mu Ukuboza 2016, munsi ya kimwe cya kabiri cy'@@ ibihugu bari bar@@ ishyuye imisanzu yabo yos@@ e." "@@ Umwanzuro ku kwishakamo ubushobozi wo muri Nyakanga umwaka ushize wagize uruhare muri aya m@@ avug@@ urura. Iyo ari wowe uri kwishyura, uhita uh@@ angayikishwa no kubona ibih@@ wanye n'amafaranga wat@@ anz@@ e." Uyu mwanzuro u Rwanda rumaze gutera intambwe ifatika mu kuw@@ ushyira mu bikorwa, aho kuwa 21 Gashyantare Abadepite bemeje ishingiro ry'@@ umushinga w'itegeko rishyiraho amahoro (s@@ oma amah@@ o@@ or@@ o) ku bicuruzwa byat@@ um@@ ijwe mu mahanga, agenewe ibikorwa by'@@ Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (A@@ U@@ ). Ni itegeko riz@@ atuma guverinoma y'u Rwanda ibasha gukusanya agera kuri miliyari 1.5 Frw buri mwaka agenewe gushy@@ ikig@@ ira ibikorwa bya A@@ U. Kuva kuwa 1 Mutarama 2017 biteganywa ko AU izakoresha ingengo y'imari ya $@@ 11@@ 67 04@@ 6, arimo $ 88@@ 6 24@@ 6 agize ingengo y'imari y'@@ imirimo isanzwe na $@@ 280 800 agenewe ikigega cyo kubungabunga amahoro. Rayon Sports ni imwe mu makipe atari kuvugwa cyane ku isoko ry’abakinnyi mu gihe hari abakomeje kuyis@@ ohokamo berekeza mu yandi makip@@ e. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Radio Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatanu, Munyakazi yavuze ko Rayon Sports imaze gusinyisha abakinnyi batanu mu gihe ikomeje ibiganiro n’abandi babiri. Umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports yirinze gutangaza aba bak@@ innyi, avuga ko bizakorwa guhera tariki ya 21 Kamena ubwo isoko ry’@@ igura n’@@ igurishwa ry’abakinnyi rizaba r@@ ifung@@ uye. Ati “N@@ amara impungenge abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports ko tumaze gusinyisha abakinnyi batari munsi ya batanu ndetse tukaba tun@@ itegura ko dushobora gusinyisha n’abandi babiri ari nabo bazaba ari aba nyuma mu bakinnyi duteganya kugura muri uyu mwaka. Ku bo tumaze gusiny@@ isha, umubare wa 30 tuz@@ akoresha warag@@ eze, abo tuz@@ asiny@@ isha bandi bivuga ko hari abo tuz@@ at@@ iza.” Um@@ aze kumenyekana wamaze kwerekeza muri iyi kipe ni Uwiringiyimana Christophe ukina inyuma ku myanya itandukanye irimo ibumoso, uyu akaba yar@@ akin@@ iraga Gicumbi FC. Abandi bavugwa ko baganiriye n’ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports barimo Michael Sarpong wasabye imbabazi, Mugheni Fabrice was@@ ezeye ikipe ariko nyuma ak@@ isabira ko bakongera kuganira akongera amasezerano ndetse na Hakizimana Muhadjiri wifuza miliyoni 15 Frw ngo asinye umwaka umwe, ibiganiro bigat@@ inz@@ wa n’uko Rayon Sports imubwira ko yay@@ amw@@ ishyura mu byiciro bibiri. Hakizimana Muhadjiri wamaze gutandukana na Emirat@@ es FC yakiniraga muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’@@ Abar@@ abu, ategerejwe i Kigali mu minsi iri imbere. Munyakazi Sadate avuga ko nubwo batakaje abakinnyi benshi, bizeye ko mu mwaka utaha bazaba bafite ikipe ihanganira igikombe, ariko hari n’abandi bakinnyi batandatu bakiri bato bazaz@@ amur@@ wa, bamwe bagat@@ izwa andi makip@@ e. Iri murikagurisha rizwi nka Made in Rwanda Expo riri kubera i Gikondo muri Expo Gro@@ und@@ , ryatangiye ku wa 22 Ugushyingo 2019 rik@@ azas@@ ozwa ku wa 4 Ukuboza 2019. R@@ yitabiriwe n’aba@@ murika bo mu nzego zitandukanye zirimo ikoranabuhanga, inganda, ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, ubug@@ eni, iz’@@ imari zirimo izo A@@ X@@ ON T@@ unga itanga. U@@ kigera aho A@@ X@@ ON T@@ unga im@@ urikir@@ a, nk’ibisanzwe wak@@ ir@@ anwa urugwiro n’abakozi bayo bafite ubunararibonye mu gucunga neza umutungo no kuw@@ ubyaza inyungu, bakag@@ us@@ obanurira ubwoko bwa konti n’inguzanyo icyo kigo cy’imari gitanga nawe uk@@ ih@@ itiramo wamaze kumva ibyiza bya buri imwe. Muri konti abakozi b’iki kigo cy’imari kimaze kwigarurira imitima y’@@ abatari bacye kubera serivisi inoze kirimo gusobanurira abasura imurikagurisha harimo iyo kubitsa no kubikuza uko waby@@ ifuza, iyo kwizigamira yung@@ uka 3% n’iyo kwizigamira by’igihe kirekire yung@@ uka 9@@ %, zose zik@@ agufasha guhabwa inguzanyo. A@@ X@@ ON T@@ unga kandi ifite serivisi y’@@ umwihariko, aho ushobora kubah@@ amagara kuri 50@@ 10 cyangwa 078@@ 35@@ 23@@ 7@@ 48 aho waba uri hose, bitewe n’ingano y’amafaranga ushaka kubitsa cyangwa kubik@@ uza, bakag@@ usanga aho ukorera ubucuruzi bwawe mu rwego rwo kuy@@ ongerera umutekano. Iki kigo kin@@ afite n’inguzanyo buri wese yis@@ angamo zirimo ihabwa abantu ku giti cyabo, ihabwa amatsinda y’abantu bari hagati ya 6-@@ 10 nyuma yo gufungura kont@@ i, bakan@@ ay@@ izig@@ am@@ iraho ariko bagasabwa gutanga ingwate y’umutungo ut@@ imuk@@ anwa. If@@ itiye ab@@ ishyize hamwe akamaro kihariye nk’uko ubuyobozi bwa A@@ X@@ ON T@@ unga bub@@ is@@ obanura. Iyi ihabwa ab@@ ishyize hamwe nta ng@@ wate bats@@ we. Ubuyobozi bw’iki kigo cy’imari kandi bw@@ abwiye IGIHE ko hari n’inguzanyo ihabwa umuntu ku giti cye, w@@ ikorera ufitemo konti y@@ izig@@ am@@ iraho igihe yifuza kwagura ibikorwa bye. Ruswa mu itangazamakuru ry’@@ imyidagaduro niyo isubiza inyuma Hip Hop – Riderman Umuraperi Riderman ahamya ko kuba injyana ya Hip Hop iri kugenda isubira inyuma biterwa ahanini na bamwe mu banyamakuru b’@@ imyidagaduro avuga ko barya ruswa. Riderman ahamya ko ruswa yak@@ wa abahanzi ba Hip Hop ariyo isubiza inyuma iyo njyana Riderman ubwo yari ari mu kiganiro cyat@@ ambutse kuri Radio y’igihugu, mu cyumweru cyarangiye ku cyumweru tariki ya 17 Nzeli 2017. Icyo kiganiro cyahuje abahanzi n’abanyamakuru bibaza igituma injyana ya Hip Hop isubira inyuma. H@@ atanzwe ibitekerezo byinshi birimo kuba abahanzi bar@@ ahinduye ubutumwa bany@@ uzaga muri Hip Hop no kuba abahanzi bamwe barar@@ etse Hip Hip bakajya mu njyana z@@ ibyin@@ itse. Kuri ibyo kandi ngo h@@ iyongera imyitwarire mibi yagiye iranga abahanzi bakora iyi njyana irimo ibiyobyabwenge, kutamenya uburyo bwo kwamamaza ibyo bakora n’ibindi. Izo ngingo zose ntabwo Riderman yigeze az@@ emera. Avuga ko ahubwo igis@@ ubiza inyuma Hip Hop ari abanyamakuru b’@@ imyidagaduro baba ab@@ andik@@ a, abakora kuri T@@ erev@@ iziyo n’abakora kuri Radio zitandukanye avuga ko “@@ bam@@ unzwe na us@@ wa”. Riderman yavuze ko abahanzi bakora Hip Hop biyemeje kutaz@@ atanga ruswa ngo ibihangano byabo bic@@ ishwe ku ma Radio cyangwa kuri za T@@ erev@@ iz@@ iyo. Bikaba ngo ariyo ntandaro yo kuba bakora imiziki myinshi nyamara abanyamakuru ntiba@@ yim@@ enyekan@@ ishe. Agira ati“@@ Twebwe aba R@@ aperi turi dushaka imp@@ indur@@ amat@@ wara. Ntabwo tujya dutanga amafaranga ngo d@@ ucur@@ arang@@ we, kandi abanyamakuru bamwe ut@@ abahaye amafaranga ntabwo bashobora kug@@ ucur@@ anga. Iyo niyo mpamvu yonyine ituma injyana yacu irushaho gusubira inyuma, navuga ko abanyamakuru aribo bayis@@ ubiza inyum@@ a.” Mu kiganiro cyamaze hafi is@@ aha, Riderman yahagaze kuri icyo git@@ ekerezo, ndetse yanga guha agaciro ibindi bitekerezo byatang@@ waga. Riderman ntiyem@@ eranya n’abavuga ko abaraperi ubwabo ari bo batuma injyana ya Hip Hop isubira inyuma Riderman, umuraperi watwaye irush@@ w@@ anwa rya Primus Guma Guma Super@@ star ubwo ryabaga ku nshuro ya gatatu, kuri ubu afite indirimbo nshya yitwa "@@ Kad@@ ag@@ e". Iyo ndirimbo ni imwe ndirimbo z@@ ikinwa cyane ku ma radi@@ o. Yabajijwe niba yaratanze ruswa kugira ngo iyo ndirimbo ye ikin@@ we. Y@@ asubije ko igituma iyo ndirimbo ikinwa cyane nta kindi uretse kuba yar@@ avuz@@ emo ibya ruswa agasa n’uw@@ erekana icyo kibazo abic@@ ishe mu ndirimbo. Mu ndirimbo “@@ Kad@@ ag@@ e” Riderman hari aho aririmba agira ati “G@@ iti mujye muy@@ aka imish@@ wi jyewe ndi rus@@ ak@@ e.” Umuraperi Jay C nawe wari uri muri icyo kiganiro ntiyem@@ eranya na Rider@@ man. Uyu muraperi afite indirimbo yitwa “@@ I am B@@ ack@@ ” yakoranye na Bruce Melod@@ ie. Iyo ndirimbo ye iri mu njyana ya Hip Hop iri mu za mbere z@@ ikinwa cyane ku ma radio na t@@ erev@@ iz@@ iyo. Yabajijwe niba yaba yaratanze ruswa kugira ngo iyo ndirimbo ye ikin@@ we maze arabih@@ aka avuga ko nta n’uwo yahaye igiceri cya 100@@ RW@@ f. Akomeza avuga ko igis@@ ubiza inyuma injyana ya Hip Hop ari ikinyabupfura g@@ ike cy’@@ abahanzi bakora iyo nj@@ yana. Jay C avuga ko muri iyo myitwarire mibi harimo gutera inda abafana babo, kumvikana mu manza no mu mvururu za gato na hato ndetse no kuba hari bamwe mu baraperi bumvikanye ku mar@@ adio bat@@ uka abany@@ amakuru. Umuraperi Jay C ntiyem@@ eranya na Riderman Umunyamakuru Ep@@ p@@ aphr@@ od@@ ite Nd@@ ungutse wari uyoboye icyo kiganiro, yeretse Riderman ko igituma injyana ya Hip Hop isubira inyuma hatarimo ruswa nkuko abivuga. Y@@ amw@@ eretse ko ahubwo gusubira nyuma kw’@@ iyo njyana big@@ irwamo uruhare n’abar@@ aperi ubwabo aho usanga bamwe bashyira hanze ibihangano bidafite ireme. Nd@@ ungutse yakomeje yereka Riderman ko ikindi gituma injyana ya Hip Hop isubira inyuma ari uko usanga bamwe mu ba r@@ aperi bad@@ akoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga ngo bas@@ akaze ibihangano byabo kuba nt@@ u benshi. Mu butumwa bwe, Minisitiri w'Intebe Anastase Murekezi yasabye abanyarwanda guha abamugaye icyubahiro bakw@@ iye. Yash@@ ishikarije kandi abanyarwanda kwita ku burenganzira bw'@@ abafite ubumuga. Ati:@@ " Ndifuza kwibutsa abanyarwanda bose ko abafite ubumuga ari abantu nk'@@ abandi, bafite uburenganzira bwose busesuye kandi bagira uruhare rukomeye mu kubaka igihugu cyacu. Nd@@ abasaba rero mwese kubaha icyubahiro bakw@@ iye, ndabasaba kubaha ubufasha bak@@ eneye@@ ." Minisitiri Murekezi kandi yijeje abafite ubumuga ko Leta y'u Rwanda izakomeza kubaha ubufasha ndetse anasaba abanyarwanda kuzagira uruhare mu munsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe abafite ubumuga. Gicumbi: Amwe mu mazu yubakiwe abarimu amaze igihe yarabuze abay@@ abamo Amwe muri aya mazu ar@@ afunze kuko nta barimu bay@@ abamo Kuri bimwe mu bigo by'amashuri byo muri buri murenge mu karere ka Gicumbi, uhasanga amazu yagenewe gucumbikira abar@@ imu. Gusa muri aya mazu hari ay@@ akoreshwa n'andi ad@@ akoreshwa bitewe n'uko yubatswe ariko akabura abay@@ abamo bitewe n'uko abarimu bakay@@ abayemo bose baturiye ibig@@ o. Hirya no hino ku bigo bimwe na bimwe byo mu karere ka Gicumbi hari amazu yubakiwe gucumbikira abarimu, ayo mazu acum@@ bits@@ wemo n'abarimu mu gihe hari n'andi atarigeze yinj@@ iramo abarimu ngo bay@@ ac@@ umbik@@ emo. Bamwe mu barimu bo ku rwunge rw'amashuri rwa AP@@ AK@@ E Byumba Iny@@ ange, bat@@ ashatse ko amazina yabo atangazwa, babwiye Makuruki.rw ko impamvu bat@@ itabiriye kuy@@ ajyamo ari uko batuye hafi, kandi ko guc@@ umbika no kud@@ ac@@ umbika muri aya macumbi ari uburenganzira bw'@@ umuntu. Umwe muri bo yagize ati:"@@ Kujya guc@@ umbika muri iriya nzu nta bwo bind@@ imo, impamvu nt@@ ajyamo njyewe sink@@ odesha kuko nt@@ aha mu rug@@ o,@@ cyakora mbaye nt@@ aha kure n@@ aj@@ yamo. " Undi nawe ati:"@@ Inzu yar@@ uzuye ni umuhigo w'@@ akarere, ninjye mus@@ ir@@ ibat@@ eri wak@@ ay@@ iba@@ yemo none mfite iw@@ anjye, abarimu bit@@ eje imbere kuburyo kuba ku kigo ntacyo by@@ abamar@@ ira, keretse turamutse dufite an@@ im@@ atrice na intern@@ at igenga abanyeshuri, abigisha ku Nyange hano dutuye hafi y'@@ ikig@@ o". Makuruki.rw iganira n'umuyobozi w'ishami ry'uburezi mu karere ka Gicumbi, Bizimana Jean Claude, yatangaje ko koko hari amacumbi yubakiwe abarimu ariko bakaba kuri ubu batay@@ abamo bitewe n'uko abarimu bose bigisha ku bigo batuye hafi y'@@ ibigo big@@ ishaho bakaba badashobora kuy@@ abamo kandi iwabo ari hafi. Yavuze ko bajya kubaka aya mashuri bateg@@ anyaga ko kuri ibyo bigo hashobora kuzajya h@@ igish@@ waho n'abarimu baturuka kure, ariko ngo hari aho batunguwe babonye abarimu baho bose batuye hafi y'ishuri bikaba ngombwa ko iyo nzu ifungwa nt@@ ikoresh@@ we. Bizimana avuga ko aya mazu azakomeza gufungwa kugeza igihe azabona abarimu bazajya bay@@ abam@@ o. Gusa ibi bifatwa na bamwe nk'@@ igihombo kuri Leta bitewe n'uko aya mazu yatwaye amafaranga menshi y@@ ubakw@@ a, ariko akaba ari aho apfa ubusa nta cyo akoreshwa. Bizimana ariko avuga ko n'ubwo ngo hari aho abarimu bataba muri aya mazu bitewe n'uko baba hafi y'@@ akazi, ngo akarere nanone gafite imbogamizi y'@@ amikoro atuma hari ib@@ ikib@@ ura ngo ayo mazu yuz@@ ure neza kuburyo yabasha gukoreshwa n'abar@@ imu. Kugeza ubu imirenge 18 kuri 21 igize akarere ka Gicumbi ni yo ifite amacumbi abarimu bac@@ umbik@@ amo, mu gihe imirenge itatu yo ifite amacumbi atar@@ ac@@ umbik@@ wamo n'abar@@ ezi. Kubaka amacumbi y'@@ abarimu muri aka karere byatangiye hagati y'umwaka wa 2012 na 2013, hubakwa inzu imwe ku kigo kimwe cy@@ ator@@ anijwe muri buri murenge. Am@@ ac@@ umbi yagenewe abarimu atari yac@@ umbik@@ wamo aboneka mu mirenge ya Byumba, Kag@@ eyo na Mut@@ ete. ND@@ AR@@ IS@@ AB@@ AMUNGU Paul Clement MAK@@ URUK@@ I.RW

Ubwo yaganiraga n’abanyamakuru kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Sar@@ ri yahakanye amakuru amw@@ erekeza muri Juventus yo mu Butaliyani, anavuga uburyo yag@@ owe n’uyu mwaka wa mbere muri Chelsea n’ubwo kuri ubu ngo afite ikipe nziza. Ati "M@@ f@@ itanye amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri na Chelsea, mureke rero aribyo tuvug@@ aho muri aka kanya. Ku bwanjye, intangiriro z’umwaka w’imikino zari zikomeye cyane mu guhuza n’abakinnyi ariko guhera muri Gashyantare byatangiye guhinduka, sinzi niba ari njye wahindutse kuko ubu mfite abasore 20, 22 beza, abakinnyi bakomeye kandi ndab@@ ishim@@ iye.” Ku myaka 60, Sar@@ ri nta gikombe gikomeye ar@@ atwara mu gihe umutoza wa Arsenal bagiye guhang@@ ana, Un@@ ai Emer@@ y, yatwaye iyi Europa League inshuro eshatu hagati ya 2014 na 2016 ari kumwe na Sev@@ ille, gusa ikipe atoza uyu munsi na yo nta musaruro ifite kuri uru rwego. Amakosa 10 akorwa n’abagabo bubatse ingo Nyuma yo kubagezaho amakosa 10 akorwa n’abagore mu mibanire yabo n’abagabo bashakanye, muri iyi nkuru, tur@@ abagezaho amakosa 10 abagabo bakora mu ngo akaba ashobora kuzis@@ enya cyangwa ntiz@@ im@@ are kabir@@ i: 1. Gutekereza ibyishimo byo mu buriri wenyine ut@@ itaye ku wo mwashakanye Abagabo benshi ni ba nyamwigend@@ aho ku ngingo yo gutera akabariro ndetse ntibat@@ ekereza ku byishimo by’@@ abagore babo. Kut@@ ita ku byishimo by’@@ umugore wawe igihe muri mu gikorwa cy’@@ abashakanye bishobora kugus@@ enyera urugo vuba cyane. Kugira ngo mwembi m@@ ubashe kwishimira iki gikorwa bisaba ko muganira byo ku rwego rwo hejuru muk@@ aganira mut@@ uje kandi muk@@ umv@@ ana. 2. Kw@@ aya umutungo w’urugo Kugira ibyo ugira bihenze ut@@ abanje kubiganiraho n’umugore wawe cyangwa kw@@ aya umutungo w’urugo ni irindi kosa abagabo bakora rikaba ry@@ abas@@ eny@@ era. Kuba ufite konti muri banki uk@@ ayih@@ isha uwo mwashakanye ni ‘@@ s@@ akir@@ ir@@ eg@@ o’ mu rugo. Iyo ut@@ umye umugore wawe at@@ amenya ibyerekeye umutungo wawe, bituma yumva ad@@ akunzwe bihagije ndetse akaba yakw@@ ibona nk’@@ umunyamahanga mu rugo rw@@ anyu. Ni ngombwa ko wizera umugore wawe n’umutima wawe wose ndetse n’@@ ubutunzi bwawe. 3. Kw@@ igira ntibind@@ eba mu kurera abana Abagabo benshi bah@@ arira abagore uburere bw’abana babo bak@@ ibwira ko icyo basabwa gukora gusa ari ugutanga ibit@@ unga umuryango, kandi ibi bihabanye n’@@ ukuri. Si byo na gato rwose kwirengagiza uruhare rwawe rwo kurera abana ufatanyije n’uwo mwash@@ akanye. Ukw@@ iye gufata umwanya uk@@ aw@@ um@@ arana n’abana bawe ndetse ukugira uruhare runini mu buzima bw’abana ba@@ we. 4. Kut@@ ita ku mubiri wawe Abagabo benshi baba bifuza ko abagore babo bita ku mibiri yabo nyamara bo bat@@ abikora. Uko umugabo agaragara ni ikintu abagore bit@@ aho kandi kibat@@ era ish@@ ema. Abagabo benshi iyo bamaze gush@@ aka, ntib@@ ongera kugira icyo bakore ngo bite ku mibiri yabo kandi ntib@@ ishimisha abagore. Nkuko wifuza ko umugore yiy@@ itaho nawe ni ko uba ugomba kubig@@ enza. 5. Kud@@ ateg@@ anyiriza ejo hazaza Nk’@@ umutware w’@@ urugo, ukwiye gutekereza no kumenya guteg@@ anyiriza umugore n’abana ba@@ we. Ugomba gup@@ angira urugo rwawe ahaz@@ aza, ubutunzi bwawe, abana n’ibindi. Ntuk@@ abe umugabo ubaho nk’@@ ubara ubuk@@ eye, akarya nk’aho ari bwo bwa nyuma. Ugomba guteganya ikiz@@ abab@@ eshaho mu bus@@ aza, utag@@ ishoboye gukora, ug@@ ateg@@ anyiriza igihe uzaba wapfuye cyangwa abana bawe n@@ ibash@@ y@@ ingirwa n’ibindi. 6. Kut@@ umva umugore wawe Abagabo benshi ntibabasha kubona abagore babo nk’@@ umufasha cyangwa umufatanyabikorwa bituma bat@@ abat@@ ega amatwi ngo bumve uko babona ibintu. Ntuk@@ umve ko uzi ibyo umugore agiye kuvuga ngo umuc@@ e mu ijambo mbere y’uko avuga uti ‘@@ Ni ay’@@ abagor@@ e’. 7. Kut@@ izera umugore wawe Kut@@ izera umugore ngo ube wamub@@ itsa amabanga akomeye ni irindi kosa abagabo benshi bubatse bakora mu ngo. Umugore wawe aba agomba kuba umuntu ubwira ud@@ ukuru twose ndetse uk@@ amub@@ itsa ut@@ ub@@ anga tw@@ os@@ e; ni ur@@ ubavu rw@@ awe. Umugore wawe ashaka kumenya ik@@ ikw@@ erekeye cyose kandi erega nta cyo ataz@@ i, w@@ igira ibyo umuk@@ inga r@@ ero. 8. Kw@@ emerera umuryango n’inshuti zawe gusuzugura umugore wawe Nk’@@ umugabo, uzaba uts@@ inzwe niw@@ emerera abagize umuryango wawe ndetse n’inshuti zawe kut@@ ubaha umugore wawe. Umuntu wese ut@@ ubashye umugore wawe nawe aba agus@@ uzug@@ uye; ni ibyo rwose. Ujye wirinda kuvuga nabi no gut@@ aranga umugore wawe mu ruhame bitaz@@ atuma ata icyubahiro cye. Umuryango ndetse n’inshuti zawe bagomba kumenya gusa ibyiza by’@@ umugore wawe, ibibi ni wowe ugomba kubimenya gusa. Wowe n’umugore wawe ni mwe mw@@ enyine mugomba kwicarana mug@@ akemura ibibazo mufite mut@@ ihaye rubanda. 9. Kud@@ asaba imbabazi wah@@ em@@ utse Kut@@ emera gusaba imbabazi w@@ af@@ ud@@ itse ni rimwe mu makosa abagabo bakora mu mibanire y’abo mu ngo. Abagabo benshi bibwira ko ari ukw@@ is@@ uzug@@ uza no kwit@@ esha agaciro gusaba imbabazi umugore kandi mu by’ukuri si byo. Kuba uri umugabo si impamvu yo kuba ut@@ asaba imbabazi umugore wawe igihe wam@@ uk@@ osh@@ ereje. 10. Kug@@ ereranya uwo mwashakanye n’abandi bagore Kug@@ ereranya umugore wawe n’abandi ni bibi cyane ndetse bishobora kugus@@ eny@@ era; nt@@ ukag@@ ereranye uwo mwashakanye n’abandi bagore. Iteka ryose iruhande rw@@ awe, aho ukorera n’aho uba nt@@ uh@@ az@@ abura abagore bafite ibyo barusha umugore wawe, ariko se uzi ibibi cyangwa intege nke abo bagore bag@@ ira? Jya wit@@ a, ut@@ et@@ esh@@ e, ukunde kandi w@@ ubah@@ ire umugore wawe uko ari bitari ibyo akora cyangwa ad@@ akora. Inkuru bijyanye : Amakosa 10 akorwa n’abagore mu mibanire yo mu ngo

Sosiyete y'@@ abanya-@@ Koreya igiye gushora miliyoni 5.@@ 2 z'@@ amadorali mu bworozi bw'@@ amag@@ we@@ ja Yanditswe kuya 10@@ -08-@@ 2016 saa 13@@ :0@@ 9@@ ' na Muk@@ aneza M.@@ Ange Mu rwego rwo guteza imbere inganda zikora ubud@@ od@@ o, sosiyete y'@@ abanya-@@ Koreya H@@ EW@@ OR@@ K@@ S Rwanda Sil@@ k Ltd igiye gushora miliyoni 5.@@ 2 z'@@ amadorali mu buhinzi bw'@@ ib@@ obere n'ubworozi bw'@@ amag@@ we@@ j@@ a. Ni nyuma y'uko ku itariki 9 Kanama 2016, iyi sosiyete ig@@ iranye amasezerano n'ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe kohereza mu mahanga ibikomoka ku buhinzi n'ubw@@ orozi, NA@@ EB@@ . Nk'uko bikubiye muri aya masezerano, ku ikubitiro H@@ EW@@ OR@@ K@@ S Rwanda Sil@@ k Ltd iz@@ ashora mu buhinzi bw'@@ amag@@ we@@ ja miliyoni 5.@@ 2 z'@@ amadorali aho iz@@ agura udupfunyika twose tw'@@ ubud@@ odo turi mu Rwanda ndetse ikaz@@ an@@ ashyiraho Ikigo kizajya git@@ angir@@ wamo amahugurwa ku borozi ndetse kikan@@ akoreshwa nk'@@ it@@ urag@@ iro. NAEB n'iyi sosiyete biz@@ afatanya mu gukora ubud@@ odo b@@ uvuye mu musaruro w'@@ amag@@ we@@ ja wit@@ ezweho kwiyongera ukagera kuri toni 500 uvuye kuri toni 7.@@ 5 ku mwaka. Uruganda ruzajya rut@@ ung@@ anyir@@ izwamo ubud@@ odo ruz@@ ubakwa na leta mu gace kag@@ enewe inganda mu gihe H@@ EW@@ OR@@ K@@ S Rwanda Sil@@ k Ltd ari yo iz@@ ashyiramo imashini ziz@@ akoreshwa mu gutunganya umusaruro w'@@ amag@@ we@@ j@@ a. Umuyobozi w'Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubworozi bw'@@ amag@@ we@@ j@@ a(@@ National Ser@@ ic@@ ulture Cent@@ er), Eric Mbon@@ igaba yavuze ko H@@ EW@@ OR@@ K@@ S yamaze kugura hegitari eshatu mu karere ka Rwamagana ndetse ik@@ odesha n'izindi 20 yahise itangira guhing@@ aho ib@@ ob@@ ere. Minisitiri w'@@ Ubuhinzi n'Ubw@@ orozi, Dr Ger@@ ard@@ ine Mukeshimana yashimye umusanzu w'iyi sosiyete yo muri Koreya mu guteza imbere uruganda rw'@@ ubud@@ odo ndetse anavuga ko leta izatanga ubufasha aho buzaba buk@@ enewe. Ati" Iki ni cyo gihe gikwiye cyo gushora mu bijyanye no gutunganya ubud@@ od@@ o. N@@ izera neza ko kugira umufatanyabikorwa ufite ubunararibonye bizadufasha kugera kubyo dushaka kugeraho. Ni iby'@@ agaciro kandi tu@@ basezer@@ anyije gukora ibyo dushoboye byos@@ e." Umuyobozi wa H@@ EW@@ OR@@ K@@ S Ltd, H@@ ee Cho@@ on Y@@ AN@@ G we yashimangiye ko icyo bifuza ari ukug@@ era ku cyo biyemeje no gukora ubucuruzi buz@@ ahindura imibereho y'@@ abahinzi n'@@ abor@@ ozi. Ubuhinzi bw'@@ ib@@ obere n'ubworozi bw'@@ Amag@@ we@@ ja bwatangiye gukorerwa mu Rwanda mu 2006. Kugira ngo amag@@ we@@ ja atange ubud@@ odo abanza kugaburira ibiba@@ bi by'@@ ib@@ ob@@ ere, nyuma akaza gutera amagi ari na yo avamo ubud@@ od@@ o. Wayne Rooney yatangaje ikipe yifuza gus@@ or@@ ez@@ amo umupira w'amaguru Wayne R@@ onn@@ ey wifuza gus@@ oreza umupira w'amaguru muri Manchester United Rutahizamu w'ikipe y'igihugu y'u Bwongereza ndetse n'ikipe ya Manchester United Wayne Rooney yatangaje ko yifuza gus@@ oreza umupira w'amaguru mu ikipe ya Manchester United. Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 30 y'amavuko asigaje imyaka 3 ku masezerano ye mu ikipe ya Manchester United avuga ko at@@ iteguye kuba yah@@ indura ikipe ahubwo yifuza gus@@ oreza umupira we muri Manchester United kandi ngo igihe gisigaye akaz@@ akim@@ arana na Mourinho amuk@@ inira mu kibuga hagati. Nk'uko ikinyamakuru The Sun kib@@ iv@@ g@@ a, Wayne Rooney yifuza kuba yakongera amasezerano muri Manchester United azageza igihe azaba asoje umupira w'amaguru kuko ngo nta yindi kipe yifuza kuba yakin@@ ira. Rooney yagize ati"@@ ndacy@@ afite amasezerano mu ikipe yanjye, nifuza kuba ari ho ns@@ oreza umupira w'amaguru ariko ibyo bir@@ areba ubuyobozi bw'@@ ikipe buz@@ akora igik@@ w@@ iye." Uyu musore kandi yatangaje ko yiteguye gukorana neza na Jose Mourinho umutoza mushya w'ikipe ya Manchester United amuk@@ inira mu kibuga hagati. Yagize ati"@@ ntekereza ko buri gihe nishimira gutanga imipira ivamo ibiteg@@ o(@@ ass@@ ist@@ s) cyangwa nanjye nkab@@ itsinda ariko ubu byar@@ ahindutse ngomba gukomeza kwishimira kugira uruhare rw@@ imbitse mu itegurwa r@@ yaby@@ o." Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 30, afite agahigo ko kuba ari we mukinnyi umaze gutsindira ikipe y'igihugu y'@@ Ubwongereza ibitego byinshi ndetse akan@@ aza ku mwanya wa 2 mu batsinze ibitego byinshi muri Manchester United nyuma ya Bob@@ by Charl@@ t@@ on.
Wari uzi ko abantu bapfa biy@@ ahuye hari icyo baba bahuriyeho mu mar@@ as@@ o? Wari uzi ko se umubare w'@@ abapfa biy@@ ahuye ushobora kug@@ aban@@ uka? Mu bushakashatsi bwashyizwe ahagaragara muri iki cyumweru bwerekanye ko abantu bapfa biy@@ ahuye bo mu bihugu bitandukanye hari akantu gato baba bahuriyeho mu maraso yabo (@@ gen@@ e) bityo ubwo bushakashatsi bukaba bun@@ emeza ko hari icyakorwa umubare w'abantu bapfa biy@@ ahuye ku isi ukag@@ abanuka. Muri Amerika, abashakashatsi bo mu kigo cya kaminuza cya John@@ s Hop@@ kin@@ s, berekanye ko umubare w'abantu bapfa biy@@ ahuye ku isi ushobora kugabanuka nyuma yo gusanga aba bantu biy@@ ahura hari icyo baba bahuriyeho mu maraso yabo. Ubu bushakashatsi bwakozwe nyuma yuko babonye umubare w'abantu bapfa biy@@ ahuye ku isi urimo kwiyongera umunsi ku wundi. Z@@ ac@@ har@@ y Kam@@ ins@@ k@@ y, ni umushakashatsi akaba umwanditsi w'@@ ibitabo n'@@ umuganga ku ivuriro ry'@@ icyo kigo cya Kaminuza ya John@@ s Hop@@ kin@@ s. Aragira ati mu maraso y'aba bantu habamo akag@@ ingo gatoya cyane (@@ gen@@ e) kitwa S@@ K@@ A@@ 2 uwo muntu aba yarav@@ ukanye gah@@ ora kib@@ utsa ubwonko kwiyahura uko ahuye n'ibihe bibi (@@ str@@ ess@@ ) mu bihe bitandukanye kakaba kab@@ oneka no mu maraso y'abantu batandukanye kat@@ itaye ku isano bafitanye. Iyi nyigo yakozwe hifashishijwe abantu batandukanye biy@@ ahuye aho bap@@ imye ubwonko bwabo bag@@ apima n'@@ amaraso yabo bagasanga bahuriye kuri ako kag@@ ingo ka S@@ K@@ A@@ 2. ubu b@@ sh@@ akashatsi kandi bwerekanye k o@@ byibura 80% by'abantu bavukana aka kag@@ ingo bahorana ingengabitekerezo yo kwiyahura kuko ngo ntago bibat@@ ungura mu munota umwe. Nubwo aka kag@@ ingo gah@@ ora gatuma ubwonko but@@ ekereza mu buryo budasanzwe cyangwa k@@ erekana uruhande rub@@ i, aba bashakashatsi berekanye ko hari n'@@ imiti ishobora kuk@@ ag@@ abanyiriza imbaraga bityo byibura 80% bakaba bahindura intekerezo NSENGIMANA J Mer@@ mo@@ z
Ibih@@ anda 3 byugarije Afurika biz@@ akurwaho n’@@ amasengesho y’abar@@ amyi b’@@ ukur@@ i-@@ Apôtre Gitwaza Apôtre Dr Paul Gitwaza uyobora Itorero Zion Temple ku Isi yagarutse ku bibaz@@ o/@@ ibih@@ anda bitandukanye by@@ igaruriye Afurika avuga ko hakenewe abar@@ amyi b’ukuri bagomba kujya ku misozi itandukanye bagas@@ engera ibi bih@@ anda by@@ igaruriye uyu mugabane bityo bik@@ avan@@ waho. Ibi yabigarutseho ku mugoroba wo ku Cyumweru tariki ya 11 Kanama 2019, mu muhango wo gusoza igiterane cyiswe ‘@@ Africa Hag@@ uruk@@ a’ cyari kimaze iminsi umunani kibera kuri Stade ya IPRC Kicukiro (@@ ETO Kicukir@@ o). Iy@@ umvire unareba uko byari byifashe mu gusoza igiterane ’@@ Africa Hag@@ uruk@@ a’@@ : Intumwa y’Imana Gitwaza yagarutse ku byo yise ibih@@ anda 3 byugarije umugabane wa Afurika, avuga ko biz@@ akurwaho n’abar@@ amyi b’ukuri baz@@ ahaguruka bakajya ku musozi w’@@ amas@@ engesho. Ibyo bih@@ anda bitatu byibasiye Afurika, Apotre Dr Gitwaza yagaragaje ni intambara, inzara ndetse n’iby@@ or@@ ezo. Yagize ati “Iyo tureba tubona Afurika yibasiwe n’ibih@@ anda bitatu bikomeye. Igih@@ anda cy’@@ intambara, igih@@ anda cy’@@ inzara n’igih@@ anda cy’@@ iby@@ or@@ ez@@ o.@@ Dufite ikibazo cy’@@ inzara, dufite ikibazo cy’@@ indwara dufite n’ikibazo cy’@@ intambar@@ a.” Apotre Gitwaza yavuze ko ibihugu byinshi byamaze gushaka ibisubizo by’@@ ibi bih@@ anda, abaturage babyo bakaba babayeho mu buzima bwiza. Yagize ati “@@ Ibihugu byinshi byakem@@ uye ikibazo cy’@@ inzara, ibihugu byinshi byakem@@ uye ikibazo cy’@@ iby@@ or@@ ezo, ibihugu byinshi byakem@@ uye ikibazo cy’@@ intambar@@ a.@@ Ibyo bih@@ anda bitatu tub@@ is@@ igaranye aha muri Afurika. Nta wundi mugabane bas@@ angamo indwara z’@@ ibyorezo nka Ebola, Mal@@ ar@@ ia, Sida uretse Afurika. Kuki dufite intambara, indwara n’inz@@ ar@@ a? Hari ikibaz@@ o.” Gitwaza w@@ ashimangiye ko ibi bibazo Afurika iz@@ abik@@ urwamo no gusenga yavuze ko hagomba kuz@@ aboneka abar@@ amyi b’ukuri baz@@ ahaguruka bagas@@ engera umug@@ abane. Ati “D@@ ukeneye Abar@@ amyi beza bajya kuri ya misozi irindwi. Nt@@ iduk@@ eneye abajya ku kazi dukeneye abajya kuramya Imana kuri iyo mis@@ ozi. Dukeneye abar@@ amyi b’@@ Imana.” Yunzemo ati “@@ Abar@@ amyi b’ukuri nibo bagomba kujya ku misozi itandukanye bagas@@ enga ibi bih@@ anda by@@ igaruriye Afurika bik@@ avan@@ waho. Abo bantu tur@@ abak@@ eneye@@ ." Kuri iyi nsh@@ uro, igiterane ‘@@ Africa Hag@@ uruk@@ a’ cyas@@ ojwe mu bihe bidasanzwe byo gusaba kubana n’Imana muri gahunda zose, Apôtre Dr Paul Gitwaza asabira imbaga y’@@ abayitabiriye kubona impinduka mu buzima bwabo, ub@@ w’igihugu n’umug@@ abane wa Afurika. Africa Hag@@ uruka yabaga ku nshuro ya 20 kuva mu 2000, ubwo Gitwaza yagiraga iyerekwa ryo guh@@ embura umugabane binyuze mu kuw@@ ushyira mu maboko y’Imana. Kuri iyi nshuro yitabiriwe n’abantu batandukanye barimo abavugabutumwa n’abakozi b’Imana baturutse mu bihugu byo mu Karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, i@@ y’Iburengerazuba no mu Majyepfo n’ibindi byo hanze ya Afurika nka Amerika, u Butaliyani, Israel, u Busuwisi, u Bubiligi, u Bufaransa, Canada n’ibindi.
Umuyobozi w'@@ Abangilikani ku Isi yasuye u Rwanda atangiza ubukerarugendo ny@@ obokamana i Gahini (Amafoto) Yanditswe na Rabbi Mal@@ o Umucunguzi Kuya 19 Gashyantare 2017 saa 05:@@ 22 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 8 0 Umuyobozi w'Itorero ry'@@ Abangilikani ku Isi, akaba na Arch@@ bish@@ op wa Diyosezi ya C@@ ant@@ er@@ bur@@ y mu Bwongereza, Justin Port@@ al Wel@@ by@@ , yasuye u Rwanda an@@ atangiza ku mugaragaro ibikorwa by'@@ ingendo ny@@ obokamana i Gah@@ ini, mu Karere ka Kayonza, ahari amateka akomeye mu bijyanye n'ub@@ uby@@ utse. Ug@@ eze i Gahini bakubwira amateka anyuranye ajyanye n'im@@ yemerere arimo ‘@@ U@@ rukuta rw'@@ I@@ bitangaz@@ a', Inzu y'@@ ubumwe, ‘@@ Aho gutera igikumwe ushim@@ angira ko utaz@@ ava kuri Yes@@ u@@ ' n'amateka y'@@ ububyutse bw@@ akwiriye muri Afurika y'u Burasirazuba yose. Arch@@ bish@@ op Wel@@ by yashimye uburyo Gahini iri gutezwa imbere mu nzego zose haba Cath@@ edr@@ al iri kuh@@ ubakw@@ a, ikigo ngoror@@ amuc@@ o, ibitaro, amashuri, n'@@ iter@@ amabere ry'@@ ikiremwamuntu muri rusange. Ati "@@ Ikir@@ uta ibindi ni uko ububyutse bwo muri Afurika y'u Burasirazuba bw@@ atangiriye hano, bujyanye n'iterambere ry'@@ itorero, muri make tw@@ ashimye Iman@@ a." Yavuze ko Gahini ari ahantu Itorero ry'@@ Abangilikani rifite amateka akomeye, ari naho mu myaka ya 19@@ 30-@@ 40 r@@ yakom@@ oye imbaraga zo kubona abam@@ isiyon@@ eri, abaganga, n'@@ ububyutse mu kwem@@ era. Ati "Icyo nas@@ abira hano ni uko abantu benshi bajya bah@@ agirira ingendo ny@@ obokam@@ ana, bakagenda nk'@@ Intumwa za Yesu Kirisit@@ o. Ni ibintu nzajya mvug@@ aho ning@@ era mu Bwongereza, nz@@ aby@@ andik@@ aho, ndetse njye mbig@@ arukaho mu gihe ntanga iny@@ igish@@ o." Gahini ifite mateka yihariye U@@ rukuta rw'@@ ibitangaza rwag@@ aragaye mu 2004, ubwo urukuta rw'@@ inyubako ya Diyosezi rwiy@@ asaga nta kir@@ us@@ agar@@ iye, byah@@ uriranye n'uko mu Itorero rya Gahini harimo ibibazo by'@@ amacakubiri by@@ anag@@ ejejwe no kuri Perezida Paul Kagame. Ni ibibazo byat@@ urukaga ku gatsiko kamwe mu idini k@@ akw@@ anyaga Musenyeri Bir@@ ind@@ abagabo aho bivugwa ko hari n'abandi bantu bakomeye bari babiri inyuma. Musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Gah@@ ini, Alex Bir@@ ind@@ abagabo yagize ati "Mu gitondo saa mbiri abakozi barangije gusenga, umwe yabwiye abandi ati igik@@ uta cyas@@ eny@@ utse, iriya nzu igiye gusenyuka nim@@ utabar@@ e. Abantu bah@@ ac@@ aga bose bar@@ ahagarara bakavuga bati iyi nzu iz@@ ize iki? » U@@ kwiy@@ asa k'@@ uru rukuta kwar@@ eshyaga na sent@@ imetero eshanu ubir@@ ebye uri hanze, bajya kuburira abantu barimo imbere, ariko basanga imbere nta kibazo k@@ irimo, babanza gutekereza ko ari ukubera ko aribwo big@@ itangira. Bug@@ enimana Jean Pierre wari ushinzwe kubak@@ isha inzu za Diyosezi ngo yatangiye kwiga uburyo aza guhuza urwo rukuta inzu yose id@@ ashyizwe hasi, maze nka saa tanu haza umuntu amubwira ko inzu yateranye kandi yari yas@@ adutse kuva hejuru kugeza ku musingi wayo n'@@ amatafari yac@@ itsemo kabiri. Baje gutekereza ko ari Imana yohereje ubutumwa bw@@ abah@@ umur@@ izaga ko ibibazo byari bib@@ ugarije mu itorero ryabo bid@@ ateze kubat@@ andukanya burundu. Musenyeri Bir@@ ind@@ abagabo ati «@@ Naje gusobanukirwa mu kwezi kwa 11, icyo Imana yat@@ ubwiraga cyar@@ amaze kuba. Imana yarat@@ ubwiraga ngo mugiye kugaragara nk'@@ itorero ris@@ adutse ur@@ ebera hanze, ariko nim@@ uh@@ umure imbere muri bazim@@ a.» « Ikindi ni uko Imana yavugaga ngo ‘@@ mu gihe abantu bazaba bibaza uko ibya Gahini bigiye kugenda, nibwo iby@@ anyu nz@@ abir@@ angiza nk'@@ Imana.@@ '@@ » Ub@@ ubyutse bwa Gahini kandi bus@@ ubira no mu 193@@ 6, ubwo imbaraga z'Imana z@@ amanutse ahantu hose zig@@ ak@@ angar@@ anya abany@@ abah@@ a, abenshi bakemera kwih@@ ana, izo mbaraga zin@@ akwira Afurika y'u Bur@@ asirazuba. Gahini yahise ihinduka ahantu ho gus@@ engerwa h@@ akomeye ndetse habera n'ibindi bitangaz@@ a, hak@@ urura n'abany@@ amahanga, ari naho Se wa Minisitiri w'Ububanyi n'Amahanga wa Uganda, Sam Kut@@ esa yaguye mu 195@@ 2 ubwo yari yag@@ iyeyo gusenga. Inkuru y'@@ ububyutse bw'@@ i Gahini ni nayo yahinduye Justin Port@@ al Wel@@ by ubwo yari afite imyaka 18 yigisha muri Kenya mbere y'uko atangira kwiga Kaminuza, nk'uko yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa Gatandatu. Icyo gihe ngo ntiyari azi Yesu, maze ubwo yaganiraga n'umuyobozi w'@@ Ishuri R@@ yisumbuye rya Kib@@ uru amubwira ibijyanye n'ub@@ uby@@ uke bwo muri Afurika y'u Burasirazuba, ku wa 12 Ukwakira 197@@ 5 maze yakira Yesu nk'@@ Umwami n'umuk@@ iza. Yatangiye urugendo rw'@@ ubuk@@ irisito ubwo ku wa 4 Gashyantare 2013 yag@@ irwaga umuyobozi wa Diyosezi ya C@@ ant@@ er@@ bur@@ y n'umuyobozi w'@@ Abangilikani ku Isi. Bishop Bir@@ ind@@ abagabo, yavuze ko Gahini iri guhindura is@@ ura, ndetse hari gahunda yo kubaka inzu nyinshi ngo abah@@ asura bajye babona aho baryam@@ a. Ati "Hari n'indi mishinga dufite, hari ikigo tugomba kubaka ngo abantu nacyo bajye baza bag@@ is@@ ure, ni ukuvuga ngo aho ibiro by'@@ Ikigo cy'@@ Ub@@ uby@@ uke kizaba kir@@ i. Ubu rero turimo tur@@ at@@ umira abashoramari kugira ngo baze bubak@@ e kuko nk'uko mub@@ ibona, ubwo Arch@@ bish@@ op wa C@@ ant@@ er@@ bur@@ y y@@ aje, umuryango w'@@ Abangilikani ku Isi yose ndetse si bo bonyine n'abandi bakunda Imana bagiye kuza ari benshi cyane." Aya makuru akomeza avuga ko abat@@ abwa muri yombi bari gushinjwa kuba mu bagamije kurwanya Leta iriho muri iki gihugu. Njye sind@@ eba uko mukeba yiy@@ ubatse ahubwo ndeba uko mp@@ agaze - Mutsinzi Ange Myugariro wa APR FC n’ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi Mutsinzi Ange atangaza ko afitiye icyizere APR FC yiy@@ ubatse ndetse ko ad@@ atewe ubwoba n’uko amakipe bazah@@ anganira igikombe cya shampiyona akomeje kugura abakinnyi umunsi ku wundi. Ibi yabitangaje mu kiganiro yagiranye n’urubuga rwa APR FC. Ngo afite icyizere ko intego y’ikipe y’ingabo z’igihugu izag@@ erwaho umwaka utaha ashingiye ku kuntu yong@@ eyemo amaraso mashya impande zose. Yagize ati " Akenshi rero njyewe sink@@ unda kureba uko mukeba yiy@@ ubatse ahubwo ndeba uko mp@@ agaze, yego nibyo amakipe duhanganye ari kugura abakinnyi beza gusa njye m@@ banza kureba uko ikipe yacu ih@@ agaze, ese iri ku rwego rwah@@ angana n’uwo ari we wese mu gihugu ?" Yunzemo ati " Icyo navuga ku ikipe yacu ni ikipe nziza mw@@ arab@@ ibonye umwaka ushize tw@@ itwaye neza, abayobozi bafatanyije n’abatoza bong@@ eyemo abakinnyi beza baz@@ adufasha cyane haba mu marushanwa yo mu gihugu, mu karere ndetse no ku ruhando nyafurika nka Tuyisenge Jacques hari byinshi az@@ aduha na bagenzi be hari byinshi bazongera mu ikip@@ e." Yavuze ko umutoza ub@@ ongerera ingufu ari umutoza uri ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Ati " Umutoza wongera imbaraga bat@@ uzaniye ni umutoza mwiza uri ku rwego mpuzamahanga ukomeje kudufasha cyane aduha imyitozo myiza, icyo navuga ni uko ikipe yacu ikomeye cyane, abatoza ndetse n’abayobozi beza bayir@@ eberera umunsi ku wundi nabyo biduha icyizere ko intego yacu nta kabuza umwaka utaha tuzay@@ iger@@ aho.” Ubutumwa yahaye abafana Yagize ati " Icyo nakw@@ izeza abafana ni uko ikipe imeze neza kandi nd@@ abizeza ko umwaka utaha tuz@@ atanga ibirenze ibyo twatanze umwaka ushize tw@@ itwara neza kugira ngo t@@ ubahe ibyishimo, ni urugendo ruzaba rut@@ oroshye turabizi ariko natwe tur@@ iy@@ iz@@ eye, baz@@ adut@@ ize umurindi gusa ntibaz@@ ac@@ ike intege nk’uko babikoze umwaka ushize ubundi ibyishimo bazab@@ ibon@@ a." Mu bukerarugendo ako karere gafite umushinga wo kubaka inzu [@@ gu@@ est hous@@ e] ifite amacumbi ku musozi wa Gis@@ unzu uri hafi ya Parike y'@@ Akag@@ era. Akarere kan@@ afite umushinga w'@@ ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muc@@ o, ku buryo abar@@ aye muri iyo ‘@@ Gu@@ est hous@@ e' bazajya basura ibikorwa by'@@ ubwo bukerarugendo bushingiye ku muc@@ o. Michael Sarpong agiye gutangiza umuryango ufasha abatishoboye, ibikorwa byawo mu Rwanda ni vuba Michael Sarp@@ ong@@ , rutahizamu w’@@ Umun@@ ya@@ - G@@ H@@ ANA wahoze muri Rayon Sports yatangaje ko agiye gutangiza umuryango ufasha abatishoboye kugira ngo afashe abana baby@@ iruka ubu kud@@ akurira mu buzima “@@ bw’@@ ubuk@@ ene@@ ” nk’ubwo we n’abana b’@@ aho yab@@ yir@@ ukiye bakur@@ iyemo. Ibi Michael Sarpong ubu ukinira Yanga yo muri Tanzania yabitangaje nyuma y’aho ku cyumweru gishize yafashije abana b’@@ imfubyi bar@@ ererwa mu kigo cy’@@ imfubyi cy’@@ iwabo muri Ghana cyitwa Royal Se@@ ed H@@ ome, ak@@ abag@@ enera ubufasha bw’@@ ibiribwa, ibiny@@ obwa, ibikoresho by’isuku n’ibindi. Mu kiganiro cyihariye Sarpong yagiranye na RWANDA MAG@@ AZ@@ IN@@ E, yavuze ko uyu muryango witwa The Michael Sarpong Foundation ut@@ azaba ukorera gusa iwabo muri Ghana ahubwo ko uzas@@ akaza ibikorwa byawo “ku isi hose kugira ngo tubashe gufasha no kugoboka abantu b’@@ amikoro make kurusha abandi mu muryango mug@@ ari.” Sarpong yavuze kandi ko “@@ amarembo ak@@ inguye ku wo ari we wese wifuza gufasha agatanga umusanzu we mu gufasha abandi bakeneye ubufasha n’abandi bat@@ ishobo@@ ye.” Ati “T@@ uz@@ akirana yombi inkunga iyo ari yo yose uz@@ aduha ubik@@ uye ku mutima ngo dut@@ eze imbere uyu muryango [@@ The Michael Sarpong Found@@ ation@@ ] kuko binyuze muri wo tuzakora ibintu byinsh@@ i.” Sarpong avuga ko impamvu yamuteye kugira igitekerezo cyo gutangiza umuryango ufasha abatishoboye ari ubuzima bubi we n’abana b’@@ abaturanyi be bakur@@ iyemo. Yagize ati “N@@ akuriye ahantu twari duk@@ ennye, kugira ngo ng@@ ere aho ngeze ubu, rwari urugamba rw’@@ inj@@ yan@@ amun@@ tu. Sin@@ ifuza kubona abana baby@@ iruka ubu guca muri ibi bintu [@@ yakur@@ iyem@@ o@@ ]@@ .” Nyuma yo gufasha abana b’@@ imfubyi b’@@ iwabo muri Ghana, Sarpong yavuze ko vuba aha “@@ tuz@@ akomereza i Kigali dukore ibikorwa by’@@ urukund@@ o.” Kugeza ubu nta baterankunga cyangwa abandi abo ari bo bose batanze ubufasha kuri The Michael Sarpong Found@@ ation. Gufasha imfubyi muri Ghana, Sarpong yabikoze mu muj@@ yo wa The Michael Sarpong Foundation agiye gushinga

Abakozi ba Ambasade ya Amerika n’abad@@ ipolomate babarizwa mu Rwanda batanze amaraso Abakozi ba Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda na bamwe mu bad@@ ipolomate bakorera imiryango mpuzamahanga mu gihugu batanze amaraso az@@ ifashishwa mu but@@ abazi ku nd@@ embe ziy@@ akeneye mu bitaro bitandukanye mu Rwanda. Iki gikorwa cyateguwe na Ambasade ya Amerika mu rwa Gasabo ifatanyije n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe gutanga Amaraso (N@@ CB@@ T@@ ). Abakozi 108 ba Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda na bagenzi babo bo mu yindi miryango mpuzamahanga ni bo bagaragaye muri iki gikorwa cyabereye ku cyicaro cy’@@ iyo ambasade ku Kacyiru mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ku wa 20 Werurwe 2019. Ku nshuro ya 10 y’iki gikorwa, Ambasade ya Amerika yatumiye abandi bad@@ ipolomate bakorera i Kigali barimo ab’@@ u Bufaransa, u Bwongereza n’u Budage bahuza imbaraga mu gikorwa cyo gutanga amaraso. Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ibikorwa (@@ Char@@ g@@ é d’@@ aff@@ air@@ es) muri Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda, Richard Micha@@ el@@ s, ni we watangije iki gikorwa cyiswe “@@ Share Lif@@ e, G@@ ive Bl@@ ood@@ ”, bishatse kuvuga “S@@ angira n’abandi ubuzima, t@@ anga amaras@@ o.’’ Yagize ati “N@@ ishimiye ko abakozi ba ambasade batanze amaraso n’umutima uk@@ unze, ni uburyo bworoshye bwo gutanga ubut@@ abazi. Ndizera ko igikorwa cyacu cyo gutanga amaraso gish@@ ishikariza buri wese mu Rwanda gutangira kuy@@ atang@@ a.’’ Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda yatangiye gutanga amaraso mu 2012, aho yagize uruhare mu gushyikiriza udup@@ aki 7@@ 36 muri N@@ CB@@ T. Intego yo gutanga amaraso in@@ ajyanye no gushyigikira ubukangurambaga bw’@@ Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe gutanga Amaraso mu kuy@@ ageza aho ashobora kugoboka aho akenewe no gushishikariza abatuye u Rwanda gukang@@ ukira kuyatanga ku bushake kandi mu buryo buhoraho. Amaraso yatanzwe azakoreshwa mu gutabara inkom@@ ere, abarwayi babaz@@ we, n’abafite indwara zo kubura amaraso ahagije mu mubiri mu Rwanda. Biteganyijwe ko kandi hari az@@ oherezwa mu bitaro hifashishijwe Dr@@ ones za Z@@ ipline zitwara amaraso ku bitaro byo mu gihugu. Mu mpera za 2018, izi ndege zitagira abapilote zatangiye mu 2016 nk’@@ igisubizo mu koroshya ubutabazi ku barwayi bakeneye amaraso byihutirwa batuye mu mis@@ ozi, zari zimaze kujyana udup@@ aki 15 700 tw’@@ amaraso ku bitaro bitandukanye ziy@@ akuye ku kibuga cy@@ azo kiri mu Karere ka Muhanga. Iki gikorwa Ambasade ya Amerika yag@@ iteguye ifatanyije n’Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe gutanga Amaraso (N@@ CB@@ T) Ni ku nshuro ya 10, abakozi ba Ambasade ya Amerika batanze amaraso yo kugoboka indembe ziy@@ akeneye Abakozi ba Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda bishimiye gutanga amaraso

Ni igikorwa cyabaye kuri uyu wa 27 Kanama 2014, mu nteko rusange yari igizwe n'abas@@ enateri 23 bari bitabiriye igihembwe kid@@ asanzwe. Uyu mush@@ ingwa wari uh@@ agarariwe na Depite Musabyimana Samuel uyoboye akanama k'@@ Abadepite k@@ ateguye uwo mushinga ndetse na Depite Uw@@ ayisenga Yv@@ one umw@@ ungir@@ ije. Depite Musabyimana amaze kugeza ku Bas@@ enateri ishingiro ry'uyu mushinga w'@@ iryo tegeko, yabasabye guhita bar@@ it@@ orera bibaye ngombwa, hagamijwe gusubiza ubusabe bw'@@ abagera kuri Miliyoni eshatu n'ibihumbi 700 bandikiye Inteko Ishinga Amategeko basaba ko Itegeko Nshinga ryavug@@ ururwa. Umushinga watowe n'@@ Abasenateri bose bari bahari Inteko rusange yari iyobowe na Perezida wa Sena, Bernard Makuza nyuma yo gusuzuma uyu mushinga yahise iw@@ ut@@ orera maze Abasenateri 23 kuri 23 bose baraw@@ ut@@ ora. Bernard Mak@@ uza, Perezida wa Sena ni we wari uyoboye Inteko Rusange Nyuma yo kur@@ itora Senateri Makuza yabwiye IGIHE ko ibi ari ibintu bisanzwe by'@@ uruhererekane rw'@@ amategeko mu gusubiza icyifuzo cy'@@ abaturage, bakaba batanze ibitekerezo mu buryo ingingo ya 101 yavug@@ ururwa. Makuza yagize ati "@@ Kubera uburemere by'@@ Itegeko Nshinga imitwe yombi yasabye ko hajyaho Komisiyo yunganira Inteko Ishinga Amategeko mu kwandika imb@@ anzirizamushinga y'@@ ivugurura ry'@@ Itegeko nshing@@ a." Depite Uw@@ ayisenga Yv@@ one avuga ko iyi Komisiyo izafasha Inteko Ishinga Amategeko imitwe yombi mu kuvugurura Itegeko Nshinga nir@@ angiza itange raporo ku mutwe w'@@ abadepite na Sen@@ a. Umutwe w'@@ abadepite uz@@ iga iri tegeko ushyikir@@ ize umutwe wa Sena kugirango bay@@ ifash@@ ishe mu mushinga wo kuvugurura itegeko nsh@@ inga. Nyuma y'uko Sena yemeje iri tegeko riz@@ atangazwa maze Guverinoma ig@@ ene Abakom@@ iseri barindwi bazajya muri iyi Kom@@ isiyo. Kw@@ emerera abaganga basanzwe bahembwa na Leta gukorera ahantu har@@ enze hamwe bigamije kunoza serivisi - MINISANTE Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko mu rwego kurushaho kunoza serivisi zihabwa abagana amavuriro ya Leta no guha ayo mavuriro ubushobozi bwo gukomeza gukoresha abaganga n’abaganga b’@@ em@@ enyo bafite ubumenyi bukenewe ku isoko, yashyizeho amabwiriza yemerera abaganga n’abaganga b’@@ amenyo gukorera mu mavuriro arenze rimwe, no gukora mu buryo burenze bumwe aho basanzwe bakorera (D@@ ual cl@@ in@@ ical pr@@ act@@ ic@@ e). MINISANT@@ e ivuga ko aya amabwiriza yemerera abaganga gukorera amavuriro basanzwe bakoreramo nyuma y’amasaha asanzwe y’@@ akazi, ariko serivisi batanze muri icyo gihe zik@@ ishyuzwa ku giciro kingana n’icyo mu mavuriro yigenga biri ku rwego rumwe. Itangazo rya MINISANTE rigenewe abanyamakuru riravuga ko aya mabwiriza kandi yemerera abaganga n’abaganga b’@@ em@@ enyo gukorera mu rindi vuriro ritari irya Leta mu gihe cyabo cy’@@ ikiruhuko cyangwa mu minsi ya week@@ -@@ end@@ . Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr. Daniel Ng@@ am@@ ije, yagize ati “Kw@@ emerera abag@@ ang@@ ag@@ ukora muri ubu buryo bifitiye akamaro urwego rw’ubuzima mu Rwanda, kuko bizafasha amavuriro ya Leta gukomeza gukoresha abaganga bafite ubumenyi kandi bakorana umur@@ ava, bityo n’aba@@ yag@@ ana bakarushaho guhabwa serivisi nziz@@ a”. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ivuga ko hashyizweho imirongo ngenderwaho muri iyi mikor@@ ere, izatuma imirimo abaganga bakora itaba myinshi ngo ir@@ enge urugero, bityo n’@@ ireme rya serivisi basabwa gutanga rig@@ at@@ akara. MINISANTE ivuga ko ku bw’@@ izo mpamvu, abaganga bazajya bakorera muri ubu buryo mu mavuriro basanzwe bakor@@ eramo, h@@ ahindutse gusa ibiciro bya serivisi bat@@ anga, igihe amasaha asanzwe y’akazi azajya aba arangiye. Icyakora bazajya bemererwa kuba bajya gutanga serivisi mu ivuriro ryig@@ enga, rimwe mu minsi ya week@@ -@@ end cyangwa mu minsi yabo y’ikir@@ uhuko. Mu gihe bibaye ngombwa ko umuganga atanga serivisi mu mavuriro ya Leta arenze rimwe, ubwo burenganzira azajya abuh@@ abwa na Minisiteri y’@@ Ubuz@@ ima. MINISANTE ivuga ko kugira ngo serivisi zitangwa zir@@ usheho kuba nziza ku bagana amav@@ uriro, abaganga bazajya bemererwa kwakira nyuma y’amasaha y’@@ akazi, abarwayi batar@@ enga 50% by’@@ abo bakiriye mu masaha asanzwe y’@@ akazi. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ni yo izajya iha amavuriro ya Leta uburenganzira bwo gutangiza iyo mikor@@ ere, ndetse ikan@@ emerera abaganga bab@@ isab@@ ye. Amav@@ uriro yifuza gutangiza ubu buryo az@@ asabwa gushyiraho uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bwo kugenzura imibare y’@@ abarwayi abaganga bak@@ ira, ibi@@ bakorerwa ndetse n’inyungu z@@ abon@@ etse. MINISANTE ivuga ko nih@@ ashira amezi atandatu iyi mikorere mishya itang@@ iye, izakora igenzura kugira ngo hagire ibin@@ ozwa hashingiwe ku byavuye muri iryo g@@ enz@@ ura. Iyi mikorere ikaz@@ atangira gushyirwa mu bikorwa nyuma y’amezi abiri, Minisitiri w’Ubuzima ashyize umukono ku mabwiriza agenga iyo mikor@@ ere. RGB yahagaritse F@@ AH@@ IC@@ O kongera kujyana abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda i M@@ aka Urwego rw’Igihugu rushinzwe Imiyoborere (RGB) rufat@@ anyije n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’@@ Iter@@ amb@@ ere@@ (RDB) byab@@ ujije isosiyete y’@@ abayisilamu yitwa F@@ AH@@ IC@@ O kongera kujyana abayisilamu mu mut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu i M@@ aka muri Arabie sa@@ oud@@ ite. F@@ AH@@ I@@ CO, sosiyete yigenga ikora ibikorwa birimo ibyo kujyana abayisilamu mu mut@@ ambagiro no kubashakira viza n’@@ amacumbi i M@@ aka, yab@@ ujijwe kongera kubajyana ibyo bikorwa by’@@ idini bigomba gukorwa n’Umuryango w’@@ Abayisilamu mu Rwanda (RM@@ C). Nubwo RGB yandikiye F@@ AH@@ IC@@ O iy@@ ibuza kongera kujyana abayisilamu i M@@ aka, ubuyobozi bwa F@@ AH@@ IC@@ O b@@ ubona ko RMC ariyo yagize uruhare rukomeye mu gutuma iyi sosiyete ib@@ uzwa kongera gutwara abayisilamu mu mut@@ ambagiro kubera inyungu zih@@ ariye. Aganira na IGIHE, Umuvugizi wa F@@ AH@@ I@@ CO, Sheikh N@@ amahoro Hassan, un@@ ashinzwe gutegura ibijyanye n’umut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu ubera muri Arabie Saoud@@ ite, yagize ati “@@ Ayo makuru niyo koko RGB yarat@@ wandikiye itum@@ enyesha ko tud@@ akwiye kongera kujyana abantu i M@@ aka ngo kuko ari igikorwa by’umwihariko cy’@@ Umuryango w’@@ abayisilamu mu Rwanda (RM@@ C) ndetse nta n’undi wemerewe kug@@ ikora, gusa RMC babikoze kugira ngo bih@@ arire iryo soko ryo kujyana abantu i M@@ aka kubera ko twari dusigaye tubar@@ usha gut@@ war@@ ayo abantu bensh@@ i.” Iki cyemezo cyafashwe nyuma y’uko hari hashize imyaka igera kuri itatu RMC igerageza gukoresha uko ushoboye kugira ngo F@@ AH@@ IC@@ O itazongera gutwara abayisilamu i M@@ aka. RMC yandikiye RGB kuwa 1 Werurwe 2017 iy@@ isaba gutesha agaciro icyemezo cy’@@ ubucuruzi RDB yahaye F@@ AH@@ IC@@ O k@@ iyemerera gukora ibikorwa byakabaye bikorwa n’abany@@ amad@@ ini. Ubu busabe RDB yab@@ uhaye agaciro, ihita yandikira iyi sosiyete kuwa 21 Mata 2017 iy@@ im@@ enyesh@@ a; kuwa 25 Gicurasi 2017 na RGB iy@@ ihagarika gukomeza kwivanga muri ibyo bikorwa. Sheikh N@@ amahoro Hassan yabwiye IGIHE ko atumva impamvu F@@ AH@@ IC@@ O yakom@@ wa mu nkokora gukomeza imirimo yakoraga mu gihe RMC nta nshingano ifite mu itegurwa ry’@@ umut@@ ambagiro i M@@ aka. Yagize ati “@@ Birumvikana ntabwo byad@@ ushimishije kubera ko n’ubusanzwe twe ntabwo dukora igikorwa cyo kuyobora umut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu yewe na RMC ntib@@ yemerewe kuko bikorwa na Leta ya Arabie sa@@ oud@@ ite gusa. Kuba barat@@ ub@@ ujije kandi twe dukora akazi ko kugez@@ ayo abantu gusa no kubashakira amacumbi na viza ni nko kutur@@ eng@@ anya.” Im@@ amu w’Umujyi wa Kigali, Sheikh Sindayigaya Mus@@ a, yemeza ko F@@ AH@@ IC@@ O yab@@ ujijwe kongera kujyana abayisilamu mu mut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu kubera ko biri mu nshingano za RM@@ C. Yagize ati “Y@@ arab@@ ib@@ ujijwe kubera ko biri muri wa murongo wo kuba hari amategeko y’Umuryango w’@@ abayisilamu (RM@@ C) aw@@ uha inshingano zo gushyira mu bikorwa no guhuza ibikorwa by’@@ idini ya Islam mu Rwanda, yaba mu kwamamaza cyangwa kuvug@@ anira ibikora by’@@ idini kandi kujya i M@@ aka mu mut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu ni inkingi ya Gatanu ya Islam@@ .” Yasoje avuga ko uretse F@@ AH@@ IC@@ O nta n’undi muryango cyangwa isosiyete yemerewe gutwara abayisilamu mu mut@@ ambagiro mutagatifu nta masezerano y’imikoranire na RM@@ C. Minisitiri w'@@ Ubuhinzi n'Ubworozi yamenyesheje Inama y'Abaminisitiri ko: H@@ atangijwe ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry'@@ Umushinga wa Gako wo Kongera Umusaruro w'@@ Inyama z'@@ Inka n'@@ Ibiz@@ ikomokaho hat@@ ung@@ anywa ibikorwa remezo kuri H@@ a 4@@ 500 z'@@ ubutaka mu rwego rwo guhaza isoko ry'@@ imbere mu Gihugu ndetse no gus@@ agurira amasoko yo mu mahanga. Minisitiri w'@@ Ubucuruzi n'@@ Inganda yamenyesheje Inama y'Abaminisitiri ko u Rwanda ruz@@ itabira ku nshuro ya IV kuva mu mwaka wa 2000 Im@@ urikagurisha ku rwego rw'@@ Isi riteganyijwe kuz@@ abera i Mil@@ ano mu Butaliyani kuva tariki ya mbere Gicurasi kuzageza tariki ya 31 Ukwakira 2015. Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu ushinzwe Amajyambere Rusange n'@@ Imibereho Myiza y'@@ Abaturage yamenyesheje Inama y'Abaminisitiri aho gahunda yo gushyira abaturage mu byiciro by'@@ ubudehe ig@@ eze. Nyuma y'@@ ivugururwa ry'@@ ibyiciro by'@@ ubudehe muri Kanama 2014, ibyiciro bishya bigaragazwa n'@@ imibare aho kugaragazwa n'@@ amazina yihariye. Abanyarwanda bose bashyizwe mu byiciro by'@@ ubudehe bigaragazwa n'@@ imibare 1, 2, 3 na 4. Ku ikubitiro, igikorwa cyo gushyira Abanyarwanda mu byiciro by'@@ ubudehe cyakozwe muri Kanama 2014 kibera mu Turere dut@@ anu tw@@ atoranyijwe ar@@ itw@@ o: Nyagatare, Rulindo, Rutsiro, Gisagara na Nyarugenge hanyuma gis@@ ozwa muri Mutarama 2015. Ubu amakuru yavuye mu gikorwa cyo gushyira abaturage mu byiciro by'@@ ubudehe ari gushyirwa muri mudasobwa ku buryo biteganyijwe ko iki gikorwa kizaba cyarangiye muri Kamena 2015. f. Ibi bikoresho byiganjemo ibiribwa, amavuta yo gut@@ eka, ibiny@@ obwa, ibikoresho by’@@ isuku, imy@@ unyu n’@@ isuk@@ ari@@ …@@ Sarpong yabig@@ eneye abana b’@@ imfubyi bar@@ ererwa mu kigo cy’@@ imfubyi cyitwa Royal Se@@ ed H@@ om@@ e@@ / Or@@ ph@@ anag@@ e. Royal Se@@ ed Home ni ikigo cy’@@ impfubyi cy@@ ashinzwe mu mwaka wa 2002, kikaba gifasha abana ndetse n’abandi bantu batishoboye kubona ibyo kurya, icumbi ndetse n’ubur@@ ezi. Ubu gifasha abana b’@@ imfubyi bagera kuri 53 bakir@@ erwamo mu gihe cyita kandi kig@@ afasha abandi bana n’aba@@ ku@@ ze batishoboye bagera kuri 8@@ 3. Ib@@ inyujije ku rubuga rwayo rwa Twitter, ikipe ya Yanga isanzwe yiyita ‘T@@ imu ya W@@ an@@ an@@ ch@@ i’ [@@ Ikipe ya Rub@@ and@@ a] yavuze ko gukora iki gikorwa, Sarpong yabitewe n’umuco us@@ anzweho w’iyi kipe “@@ wo kugira icyo basubiza umuryango mugari w’abantu no kubasha gukora icyiza ngo batange ibyishimo ku bantu bat@@ andukanye@@ .” Abafana ba Yanga bishimiye iki gikorwa cyakozwe na rutahizamu wabo wageze muri iyo kipe avuye muri Rayon Sports icyakora bamwe bagaragaza ko batangajwe no kumenya ko ari muri Ghana mu gihe bari bazi ko “@@ ari mu Bushin@@ wa.” Michael Sarpong yavuye muri Rayon Sports umwaka ushize nyuma yo kwirukanwa kubera amagambo “@@ at@@ esha agacir@@ o” Munyakazi Sadate wahoze ayobora iyo kipe. Yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ubwo yafunguraga ku mugaragaro Dove Hotel y’@@ Itorero ADEPR, iherereye ku Gisozi mu mujyi wa Kigali, ikaba ari hotel itar@@ akunze kuvugwaho rumwe mu bakirisitu ba ADEPR. Murekezi yavuze ko ari iby’agaciro ku Rwanda kuba huzuye Hotel nk’iyo ya ADEPR, ngo kuko izafasha muri serivisi z’@@ ubukerarugendo Leta yiyemeje guteza imbere, kandi ig@@ aha akazi abantu benshi. Yagize ati "Iyi Hotel Dove ir@@ adufasha muri gahunda y’u Rwanda yo kongera ubukerarugendo, ndetse na serivisi nziza. Iyi Dove Hotel iz@@ aha Abanyarwanda benshi akazi kaz@@ abafasha guteza imbere imibereho yabo n’abab@@ o." Ati "@@ Kugira ngo iyi Dove Hotel izar@@ usheho kubagirira akamaro ndetse n’@@ Itorero ry@@ anyu, muz@@ ah@@ ore muh@@ aranira kuba umw@@ e.@@ Nim@@ ugira ibyo mut@@ umvikan@@ aho, mujye mw@@ ic@@ ar@@ ana, mub@@ ig@@ anir@@ eho maze mub@@ ik@@ emure nk’@@ Abak@@ irisit@@ u." Iyi hotel yuzuye itwaye asaga miliyari eshanu z’amany@@ arwanda, yatangiye kubakwa mu mwaka wa 2007. Papa Francis arag@@ irira uruzinduko rw’@@ amateka muri Leta zunze Ubumwe z’@@ Abarabu Papa Francis aragera muri Leta zunze Ubumwe z’@@ Abar@@ bu kuri iki cyumweru, abe abaye Papa wa mbere us@@ uye iki gihugu. Papa Francis agiye ku butumire bw’@@ igikomangoma Sheikh Mohammed bin Z@@ aye@@ d al-@@ Nah@@ yan@@ , w@@ imye ingoma muri iki gihugu, ngo yitab@@ ire inama mpuz@@ amad@@ ini. Uru rugendo rw’@@ amateka ruz@@ an@@ arangwa n’@@ igitambo cya Misa izaba ku wa kabiri, byitezwe ko izitabirwa n’abantu ibihumbi 1@@ 20. BBC yanditse ko uru ruzinduko rwa Papa Francis rur@@ aza gukurikir@@ anirwa hafi, harebwa niba hari icyo avuga ku ntambara yo mu gihugu cya Yem@@ en. Papa Francis yamaganye aya makimbirane Leta zunze Ubumwe z’@@ Abarabu z@@ ifitemo uruhare kuko ziri mu rugaga ruyobowe n’@@ Arabie Saoud@@ ite. Mu mwaka ushize wa 2018, Papa Francis yasabye amahanga kwirinda ko ibintu biz@@ amba mu mahano n’ubundi amaze gut@@ ikir@@ iramo abantu yo muri Yem@@ en. Leta zunze Ubumwe z’@@ Abarabu zit@@ uwe n’abak@@ ristu Gatolika bagera hafi kuri miliyoni imwe mu baturage bagera hafi kuri miliyoni 10 batuye iki gihugu, benshi muri bo bagiye baturuka mu gihugu cya Philippines cyangwa mu Buhinde. Mu butumwa bwa videwo yatangaje ku wa kane, Papa Francis agira ati "N@@ ishimiye aka kanya Nyagasani yampaye ngo n@@ andik@@ e, ku butaka bwanyu muk@@ unda, ipaji nshya mu mateka y’@@ imibanire y’@@ amad@@ in@@ i". "@@ Kwizera Imana bir@@ aduh@@ uza, ntabwo bid@@ ut@@ anya, bituma turushaho kwegerana nubwo dufite ibid@@ ut@@ anduk@@ anya, bituma tw@@ itar@@ ura ubushyamirane no kud@@ akund@@ an@@ a". Yashimye Leta zunze Ubumwe z’@@ Abarabu nk’@@ ubutaka buri kugerageza kuba intangarugero yo kub@@ ana, y’@@ ubuv@@ andimwe mu bantu, n’ahantu hah@@ urirwa n’abantu b’@@ imico it@@ andukanye@@ ’. Mu gihe azaba ari mu murwa mukuru Abu D@@ hab@@ i, Papa Francis azahura kandi na Sheikh Ahmed al-@@ T@@ aye@@ b@@ , Im@@ am mukuru w’umus@@ igiti wa al-@@ Az@@ h@@ ar w’i Cairo mu Misiri, ukaba ari cyo cyicaro gikuru cyane aho abayisilamu b’@@ abas@@ uni big@@ ira. Umunyamakuru wa BBC Mur@@ ad Bat@@ al Sh@@ ish@@ ani wo mu ishami ritangaza ibiganiro mu rurimi rw’@@ Icy@@ ar@@ abu uri i Abu D@@ hab@@ i, avuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Vatican bufite icyizere ko uru ruzinduko rwa Papa Francis rushobora koroshya inzitizi ku kubaka za kiliziya muri aka karere. By’umwihariko mu gihugu git@@ uranyi cya Arabie Saoudite aho ahantu ho gusengera hatari ah@@ ’@@ abayisilamu hat@@ emewe. Abategetsi ba Vatican bavuga ko bacy@@ eneye ko kiliziya gatolika ishinga imizi kurushaho muri Leta zunze Ubumwe z’@@ Abar@@ abu, ik@@ og@@ eza ubutumwa ku bak@@ ristu gatolika bo muri iki gihugu. Rwanda Peace Academy irimo kwiga uburyo Abanyarwanda bakomeza kubana mu mahoro Ishuri ryigisha amahoro (Rwanda Peace Academ@@ y) r@@ ifatanyije n’inzego zitandukanye, rir@@ asuzuma aho u Rwanda rugeze rwiy@@ ubaka rin@@ ashakisha ibyar@@ ufasha gukomeza kubaka amahoro aram@@ bye. Rwanda Peace Academy yahuje inzego zay@@ ifasha kubona amasomo yo kubaka amahoro arambye Inama izamara iminsi ibiri ibera i Kigali kuva tariki 19@@ /@@ 9/201@@ 9, yitabiriwe n’inzego za Leta hamwe n’iz@@ igenga zishinzwe umutekano, imiyobor@@ ere, ubutabera, ubumwe n’ubwiyunge, ubukungu, uburing@@ anire, urubyiruko ndetse n’ub@@ ubanyi n’@@ amahanga. Rwanda Peace Academy yan@@ atum@@ iye abayobozi b’ibigo byigisha amahoro bya bimwe mu bihugu bya Afurika, birimo Cameroon, Ethiopia, Ghana, Kenya, Mali, Nigeria, Zimbabwe na Sudan y’Epfo. Umuyobozi wa Rwanda Peace Academ@@ y, Col J@@ ill Rutaremara avuga ko barimo gusuzuma u Rwanda guhera nyuma y’umwaka wa 1994 , ibyakozwe ndetse n’ib@@ igomba gukorwa kugira ngo Abanyarwanda bakomeze kubana mu mahoro. Agira ati "Tur@@ asuzuma aho tuvuye n’aho tugeze mu rwego rwa Politiki, mu bukungu, mu mib@@ ereho, mu rubyiruko ariko tun@@ arebe imbogamizi zihari n’uburyo z@@ akem@@ uk@@ a". "Ntabwo tw@@ akwir@@ ara ngo tuvuge ko aho u Rwanda rumaze kugera bihagije. Mu butumwa bwinshi bw’amahoro usanga abantu bibanda ku kureba ikibazo cy@@ avutse ariko ntib@@ ite ku gukumira amakimbir@@ an@@ e". Mu byo ’@@ Rwanda Peace Academ@@ y’ isabwa gushyira mu nyigisho zayo za buri munsi, nk’uko by@@ ifujwe n’Umuyobozi w’Umuryango Transparency International mu Rwanda, Ingabire Marie Immacul@@ ée, ngo ntih@@ agomba kubur@@ amo isomo ryo gukora umurimo un@@ oze. Ati "Mu nzego zitandukanye haracyari ikibazo, umuturage wakoreye VUP ariko amaze umwaka wose ad@@ ahembw@@ a, nta muntu wab@@ ur@@ aye uvuga ko afite umutekan@@ o". "Niba ushaka icyangombwa cy’@@ ubutaka uk@@ ajyayo inshuro eshanu, ur@@ adindiza imirimo yawe, nta ter@@ amb@@ ere@@ ". "@@ Ur@@ ajya kuzana ibicuruzwa byawe muri MAG@@ ERWA bakakubwira ngo uz@@ agaruk@@ e, kandi ari nako bakomeza kuk@@ wandik@@ aho amafaranga y’uko wag@@ um@@ ishij@@ eyo ibicur@@ uzwa, hari abo biba ngombwa ko batanga ik@@ int@@ u(@@ rus@@ wa) kugira ngo bem@@ ererwe gusohora ibint@@ u". Madame Ingabire akomeza agira ati "Hari inzego nyinshi zig@@ ifite ikibazo mu mikor@@ ere, zikaba zikwiye kwigishwa gukorera ku gihe kandi zig@@ akora umurimo un@@ oz@@ e." Rwanda Peace Academy yatumiye abay@@ oh@@ ozi b’inzego zitandukanye kugira ngo bagaragaze icyakorwa mu kubaka amahoro arambye Minisitiri w’Ingabo, Maj Gen Albert Mur@@ asira watangije inama ya ’@@ Rwanda Peace Academ@@ y’ n’izindi nzego, avuga ko aho u Rwanda rugeze rwiy@@ ubaka rwab@@ ifashijwemo no kugarura indangagaciro z’Abanyarwanda za mbere y’ubuk@@ oron@@ i. Minisitiri w’Ingabo akomeza asaba inzego z’u Rwanda kureba niba habaho no gut@@ ira imikorere myiza y’ibigo byo mu bindi bihugu byitabiriye iyi nama. Rwanda Peace Academy irashaka amasomo mashya yo kwigisha ifatanyije na Ambasade y’u Buyapani mu Rwanda hamwe n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe Amaj@@ yamb@@ ere@@ (@@ UND@@ P@@ ). Uburyo wakw@@ ifashisha ushyira umuriro muri telefone ud@@ akoresheje uw’@@ amashanyarazi Telefone yabaye umuhuza w’@@ abantu, kuva ku mukozi wo mu rugo na shebuja kugera mu bush@@ or@@ ish@@ ori ahag@@ anir@@ irwa imishinga ibyara inyungu n’amafaranga menshi, bituma abay@@ ikoresha barushaho kuyiha agaciro umunsi ku wundi bishingiye ku ruhare rwayo mu kunoza ihan@@ ahana ry’@@ amakuru. Agaciro ihabwa gatuma benshi bay@@ ifata nk’@@ amata y’@@ abashyitsi bakamenya ko ifite ibyangombwa nkenerwa byose birimo amafaranga yo guhamagara n’umuriro uhagije ud@@ atuma it@@ et@@ ereza nyirayo mu gihe cya ngombwa. Abatuye isi babayeho mu buzima aho usanga umuriro w’amashanyarazi ufite agaciro ntay@@ eg@@ ayez@@ wa mu mpande zose kuko uk@@ enerwa kuva mu rugo ku bikoresho by’ibanze birimo rad@@ io, televiziyo, f@@ rig@@ o, telefone n’ibindi kugeza mu nganda ah@@ atung@@ anyirizwa ibya rut@@ ura. Amash@@ anyarazi asigaye abura, benshi bak@@ itabaza telefone ngendanwa bam@@ urika gusa umuriro wazo ushobora kut@@ aramba ku buryo benshi baw@@ uhanga amaso. Mu gushaka umuti w’iki kibazo, abahanga bashatse amayeri ashobora gukoreshwa nk’@@ iturufu ry@@ afasha abantu kwinjiza umuriro muri telefone batay@@ ishyize ku muriro nk’ibis@@ anzwe. Abahanga batanga inama zo kwirinda gukoresha bumwe muri ubu buryo kuko bushobora kwangiza ubuzima bwabo ndetse na telefone muri rusange. Ikinyamakuru The Sun dukesha iyi nkuru cyerekana uburyo bwo gushyira umuriro muri telefone, igihe waba wabuze aho uc@@ omeka kandi wag@@ ush@@ iranye. K@@ ubyaza umuriro mu mbuto Gukoresha imbuto ni uburyo bushobora gufasha gushyira umuriro muri telefone gusa hari ingaruka bi@@ osh@@ obora kugir@@ a. Iyo urangije iki cyiciro uhita ush@@ ishura US@@ B yawe uk@@ ayihuza n’@@ insinga ziri mu mbuto z’@@ amac@@ unga cyangwa ind@@ imu. Ibi birashoboka cyane ko byat@@ anga umuriro wakw@@ ifashisha uc@@ omeka telefone yawe, bigomba kwitond@@ erwa kuko bishobora no kuy@@ angiza. Nta gisubizo kir@@ aboneka ku haz@@ imurirwa imibiri yang@@ irik@@ ira mu rwibutso rwa Muhoza Mu Karere ka Musanze ntibar@@ afata umwanzuro ku kibazo cy’@@ imibiri isaga 800 y’abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ikomeje kw@@ angizwa n’amazi mu rwibutso rwa Muh@@ oza. Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Muhoza rwar@@ ashaje ku buryo imibiri irimo inyag@@ irwa Bamwe mu bafite ababo bashyinguye muri uru rw@@ ibutso, bavuga ko rw@@ ashaje ku buryo imibiri yatangiye kwangirika kubera kuv@@ a. Iki kibazo kig@@ ar@@ utsweho mu gihe hasigaye iminsi itarenze 30 ngo mu Rwanda rw@@ injire mu gihe cyo kwibuka Abatutsi bazize Jenoside yo mu 1994. Ubuyobozi bw’akarere bw@@ ashatse kuba buy@@ im@@ uriye mu rwibutso rwa Busogo ariko bamwe mu bafite ababo bah@@ ashyinguye muri uru rwibutso ba@@ bitera ut@@ wat@@ i. Kayitesi Chantal avuga ko kwimura ababo ari ugus@@ ibanganya amateka y’ib@@ yabereye muri Muh@@ oza. Agira ati “@@ (@@ abac@@ u) biciwe aha ng@@ aha, kubajyana i Busogo ni ukuz@@ im@@ ang@@ atanya amateka ya han@@ o.” Yabitangaje mu nama nyunguranabitekerezo yahuje ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Musanze n’abafite ababo bashyinguye muri uru rw@@ ibutso, kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 6 Werurwe 2018. Abitabiriye inama babaza ibibazo by’uko batishimiye aho abavandimwe babo bazize Jenoside bashyinguye Uwitwa Nyir@@ amahoro Vestine utuye mu murenge wa Cy@@ uv@@ e, we avuga ko kubajyana mu rwibutso rwa Busogo biruta kubag@@ umisha ah@@ anyag@@ irwa, ariko bigakorwa mu gihe hag@@ ishak@@ wa uko urwibutso rwabo rw@@ ubakw@@ a. Ati “Kuba bari hariya ntabwo bid@@ ushim@@ ishije, bah@@ av@@ anwe bashyir@@ we mu rwibutso rwiza aho bat@@ anyag@@ irwa, aho im@@ ivu idat@@ emba ngo is@@ ange bene wacu har@@ iy@@ a." Gash@@ abizi we@@ a asa n’@@ ug@@ aya Akarere ka Musanze kubera nyuma y’imyaka 24 hakigaragara urwibutso rush@@ aje gutyo, mu gihe utundi turere twamaze kubaka inzibutso z’@@ ik@@ itegererez@@ o. Ati “Ntabwo bikwiye ko mu myaka 24 haba hakiri imibiri inyag@@ irwa. Bir@@ aduh@@ ungabanya iyo tubona imibiri y’@@ abavandimwe bacu inyag@@ irwa turashaka urwibutso han@@ o.” Guverineri Gatabazi y@@ ungurana ibitekerezo n’ab@@ itabiriye inama Urwibutso rwa Busogo ni rwo rwakomeje kuza ku isonga mu hateg@@ anywa kuzaba h@@ im@@ uriwe im@@ ibiri. Indi mibiri ni iy’@@ abic@@ iwe hirya no hino mu mirenge inyuranye igize akarere ka Musanze.
Karongi : Babiri bakatiwe amezi umunani y'@@ igifungo kubera gucuruza ibiyobyabwenge Urukiko rw'@@ Ibanze rwa Bw@@ s@@ ih@@ y@@ ura mu karere ka Karongi rwah@@ amije Munyem@@ anzi Albert na Nz@@ akam@@ ayimana Charles icyaha cyo gucuruza ibiy@@ abwenge byo mu bwoko bw'@@ urumogi, bahita bak@@ atirwa amezi umunani y'@@ igif@@ ungo, kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 14@@ /11/201@@ 4. Urukiko rwan@@ abaciye n'ihazabu y'amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi magana 300 kuri buri muntu, nk'uko biteganywa n'amategeko ahana y'u Rwanda mu ngingo ya 59@@ 3 n'iya 594 n'@@ Itegeko Ngenga rishyira amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda. Ubushinjacyaha bw@@ aham@@ yaga ko iki cyaha Munyem@@ anzi Albert wo Mu Murenge wa Rubengera yahamijwe cyam@@ enyekanye ubwo yavaga kurangura urumogi maze bub@@ imenye bug@@ ahita bub@@ imenyesha Polisi ari na bwo bahise bamus@@ angana udupfunyika ibihumbi 17 t@@ ungana n'ibiro 22. Munyem@@ anzi yam@@ ereye urukiko ko yakoze iki cyaha akag@@ isabira imbabazi ari na byo byat@@ umwe ahanishwa gufungwa amezi umunani n'ihazabu y'amafaranga ibihumbi 300 mu gihe ubundi ubushinjacyaha bw@@ amus@@ ab@@ iraga gufungwa imyaka itatu n'ihazabu y'amafaranga ibihumbi 500. Naho Icyaha Nz@@ akam@@ ayimana we wo mu Murenge wa Git@@ esi mu Karere ka Karongi icyaha ashinjwa kandi yan@@ iyem@@ ereye mu rukiko akan@@ ag@@ isabira imbabazi ngo cyakozwe tariki 9@@ /10@@ / 2014. Uyu we ngo yafatanywe udupfunyika 62 tw'@@ urumogi nawe ahanishwa igifungo cy'amezi umunani n'ihazabu y'amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 300. Abah@@ amijwe ibyaha bombi basabaga ko igifungo bah@@ anishwa igihe urukiko r@@ ubah@@ amije icyaha cy@@ asub@@ ikwa. Mu bush@@ osh@@ ozi bw'@@ urukiko ariko rukaba rwanzuye kuri bombi ko igifungo kit@@ agomba gusub@@ ikwa. Ingingo ya 59@@ 3 yo mu gitabo cy'@@ Itegeko Ngenga rishyiraho amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda iteganya ko guhinga, gukora, kub@@ ika, kugur@@ isha, kug@@ ura, gutunga no kunywa ibiyobyabwenge bibujijwe keretse igihe bikozwe ku buryo bwag@@ enwe n'@@ itegeko. Naho ingingo ya 594 yo iteganya ko umuntu uny@@ wa, wis@@ iga cyangwa wit@@ era ibiy@@ ob@@ wenge mu buryo bunyuranyije n'amategeko ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku mwaka umwe kugeza ku myaka 3 n'ihazabu y'amafaranga 500. RIB yemeje ko Ingabire Victoire yahamag@@ ajwe kubera ibitero by’i Musanze Urwego rw’igihugu rushinzwe ubugenzacyaha (RIB) rwah@@ amag@@ aje Ingabire Umuhoza Vict@@ oire, umuyobozi w’ishyaka FDU-Inkingi rit@@ arem@@ ererwa gukorera mu Rwanda, kugira ngo abazwe ku kuba hari aho yaba ahuriye n’@@ igitero cyagabwe mu karere ka Musanze mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize, kig@@ ahitana abantu 14, abandi 18 bagakom@@ ereka. Umuvugizi wa RIB, Mbabazi Modeste yemereye Kigali Today ko Ingabire yahamag@@ ajwe n’uru rwego ngo abazwe kuri icyo gitero, ariko ntiyigeze (M@@ babaz@@ i) atangaza byinshi kuri aya makuru. Yagize ati “Ni byo yahamag@@ ajwe ngo abazwe ku bitero byabereye i Musanze, ariko ibyinshi kuri icyo kirego bifit@@ we n’umug@@ enzacyaha ukurikirana iyo dos@@ iye. Nta makuru arambuye ahari ubung@@ ub@@ u”. Amakuru aravuga ko bamwe mu bakorana na Ingabire baba bafite aho bahuriye n’@@ igitero cyo mu ijoro rishyira tariki ya 05 Ukwakira 2019, cyagabwe ku baturage b’@@ abasivil@@ e. Polisi y’igihugu yavuze ko abag@@ abye igitero bari bitwaje intwaro zirimo n’iza gakondo. Polisi y’igihugu kandi, nyuma yatangaje ko 19 mu bagabye igitero baje kwicwa, naho abandi batanu bar@@ afatwa. Nyuma y’iki gitero, Ingabire yar@@ acy@@ amag@@ anye, asaba abak@@ ig@@ abye “@@ gusubiza inkota mu rw@@ ubat@@ i”, yungamo ati “@@ ntim@@ ushobora gukunda igihugu igihe mw@@ ica abaturage bacy@@ o”. Mu kwandika iyi nkuru, byari bitar@@ asobanuka neza niba Ingabire yahamag@@ ajwe ngo abazwe gusa hanyuma aze kur@@ ekurwa. Bamwe mu bagabye igitero mu karere ka Musanze bafash@@ we, batangaje ko ari abarwanyi ba FDLR@@ /@@ RUD Urun@@ ana, ndetse na RNC. Bavuga ko bari bagabye igitero ari 45. Mu bafashwe harimo uwitwa Theoneste Hab@@ umuk@@ iza, wari war@@ arangije muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda. Abag@@ abye igitero bateye mu mirenge ya Musanze, Kinigi na Ny@@ ange, ku bufatanye bwa polisi y’igihugu n’ingabo z’igihugu utu duce tukaba tw@@ aragar@@ utsemo umutekano. Abah@@ itanwe n’icyo gitero bashying@@ uwe ku cyumweru tariki 06 Ukwakira 2019, abaturage b’akarere ka Musanze n’ab’@@ intara y’Amajyaruguru biz@@ ezwa umutekano. Abaturage babibonye bavuze ko abag@@ abye igitero baje bambaye imyenda ya gisirikare, ban@@ it@@ waje intwaro zirimo iza gakondo nk’@@ imihoro n’amas@@ uka, batangira gutegeka abaturage gusohoka mu nzu zabo, ba@@ bambura ibikoresho bifite agaciro nk’@@ ama telefoni ndetse batangira no gusahura amad@@ uka. Mu muhango wo gushyingura abah@@ itanwe n’icyo gitero, abaturage batanze ubuhamya bw’@@ uburyo abag@@ abye igitero bakoresheje amas@@ uka bakubita buri wese wag@@ eragezaga kud@@ akurikiza amabwiriza batang@@ aga, cyangwa uwag@@ eragezaga guc@@ ika.
