Kayirebwa na Clarisse Karasira bagiye guhurira ku rubyiniro mu gitaramo ‘@@ Ikirenga mu Bah@@ anzi 2020@@ ’ Igitaramo ‘@@ Ikirenga mu Bah@@ anz@@ i’ ni igitaramo gishingiye ku guteza imbere umuco biciye ku bah@@ anzi, aho haz@@ ashimirwa umuhanzi wam@@ amaje umuco nyarwanda mu Rwanda no mahanga, kizajya kiba buri mwaka kandi gih@@ uze abahanzi b’@@ injyana gakondo barimo abany@@ abigwi mu bihe byashize n’abo muri ibi bihe. Igitaramo cy’uyu mwaka kizaba ku nshuro ya mbere muri Kigali Conference and Ex@@ h@@ ibit@@ ion Village (K@@ CE@@ V@@ ) h@@ ahoze hitwa Camp Kigali tariki ya 8 Werurwe 2020, aho Cécile Kayirebwa ari we muhanzi wator@@ anyijwe kub@@ anziriza abandi bahanzi bakiriho ngo ash@@ imir@@ we uruhare rwe ndetse ibi birori byashyizwe ku munsi w’abagore kugira ngo uyu munsi koko uz@@ abe uw@@ abo ban@@ ishimira mugenzi wabo wabaye ‘@@ Ind@@ ongozi y’@@ Umuc@@ o’. Iki gitaramo cyateguwe na Bwiza Media ifatanyije na Ag@@ ence Kar@@ ibu as@@ bl@@ , Umush@@ anana Media n’@@ Abac@@ uk@@ umbuzi b’@@ Amateka n’@@ Umuc@@ o. Cécile Kayirebwa azat@@ aram@@ ana n’abaz@@ acy@@ itabira, afatanyije n’abandi bahanzi barimo Muyango Yoh@@ ani, Mariya Yoh@@ ani, Mani Martin, Sentore Jul@@ es, Karasira Clarisse n’@@ Itorero Ibih@@ ame by’@@ Imana. Mu kiganiro na Mec@@ ky Kayir@@ anga, umuhuzabikorwa akaba n’umuvugizi w’iki gikorwa yavuze ko iki gitaramo kigamije guha ikuzo no gushimira abahanzi bagize cyangwa bakomeje kugira uruhare mu kubungabunga umuco nyarwanda no ku@@ wam@@ amaza mu gihugu no mu mahanga. Ati : “Uyu ni umwanya wo gushimira aba h@@ abanz@@ i. Iyo bat@@ aboneka, abenshi ntit@@ uba tuzi ib@@ yaranze intwari zacu, ntabwo tuba tuzi ibijyanye n’ubus@@ izi twagiye turag@@ wa n’abas@@ o@@ kur@@ uza, aba ni bo babit@@ wigisha mu bihang@@ ano. Mureke tubash@@ imire bakir@@ iho, bakoze umurimo ukomeye. Nd@@ ak@@ ubwiza ukuri ko abahanzi bat@@ abayeho byag@@ orana kumenya no kumenyekanisha umuco wacu@@ .” Mec@@ ky Kayiranga akomeza avuga ko iki gitaramo kizaba umwanya mwiza w’uko buri munyarwanda wese yaza ag@@ ashimira aba bah@@ anzi, bo ‘@@ Nd@@ ongozi z’@@ Umuc@@ o’ kuko ari bo baw@@ ubum@@ bat@@ iye , avuga ko ubundi umuntu utar@@ ize ubuv@@ anganzo cyangwa avuk@@ ire mu rugo rukomeye ku muc@@ o, byamug@@ ora kumenya ibijyanye n’ibis@@ igo , imby@@ ino, iby@@ ivug@@ o, amah@@ amba …@@ , bivuze ko umuhanzi ari ishingiro ry’@@ umuco kuko adufasha kubis@@ akaz@@ a. Umuhanzi ni we ub@@ ungab@@ unga, akan@@ ah@@ ererekanya umuco, wo gic@@ umbi cy’@@ amajyambere arambye mu bya politiki, mu by’ubukungu mu mibereho n’imibanire y’abantu. Bityo, ni uguh@@ esha agaciro Ind@@ ongozi muri twe z@@ abigizemo uruhare rug@@ aragara, cyane cyane ko ari bo babashije kwigomeka ku iy@@ aduka ry’@@ indi mico iturutse hirya no hino, maze babasha gusigasira uw@@ acu. Izo Nd@@ ongozi ni zo dukesha zimwe mu ngeri z’umuco wacu, twavuga nk’ibis@@ igo, imigani mig@@ ufi n’imig@@ ani mirem@@ ire, ibitekerezo, imbyino n’indirimbo rubanda ihur@@ iyeho (ch@@ ans@@ ons p@@ op@@ ul@@ air@@ es). Mec@@ ky Kayiranga avuga ko Kayirebwa yatoranyijwe hash@@ igiye ku big@@ wi bye birimo kuba yaratangiye ubuhanzi bwe mu 196@@ 5, ni umwe mu bakobwa b’Abanyarwanda bagiye ku rubyiniro mpuzamahanga mu bihugu bitandukanye baririmba Ikinyarwanda , mu njyana za kin@@ yarwanda, yaririmbye mu bihugu byinshi cyane birimo : Uganda, Burundi, Ububil@@ igi, Franc@@ e, Su@@ ise, America, Ubuh@@ or@@ ande , Ubud@@ age, Kenya, Ubwongereza n’ahandi. Kayirebwa Cécile yakunze kuririmba akiri muto guhera mu mashuri abanza muri N@@ otre D@@ ame de Cit@@ eaux i Kigali, aho agiriye kwiga ku Karub@@ anda, atangira gushinga icyo yise « C@@ er@@ cle de Chan@@ ts et de Dan@@ se Rwanda@@ ise ». At@@ angira yasabaga buri mwana uvuka mu turere dutandukanye kumubwira indirimbo z’@@ iwabo n’uko z@@ ibyin@@ wa, noneho akaz@@ ih@@ imbira inj@@ yana. Mu 196@@ 4, yafashwe amajwi na Radio Rwanda maze indirimbo ze zitangira gukoreshwa mu biganiro binyuranye byany@@ uraga kuri Radio Rwanda ndetse imwe muri zo, agira ati: “@@ Banyarwand@@ akazi, mw@@ egere rad@@ iyo, uyu mwanya ni uw@@ any@@ u@@ ”, iza guh@@ arirwa kuba ariyo ifungura Radio saa tanu z’amanywa. Aho agiriye mu mahanga kubera amateka y’igihugu cyacu cyac@@ iyemo, yakomeje kuririmba no kwigisha umuco abinyujije mu buh@@ anzi. Mu Bubiligi yatangije amatorero atandukanye ndetse an@@ ahabwa ibihembo bijyanye n’@@ ubuhanzi bw@@ amamaza Umuco w’Igihugu avuk@@ amo. Imwe mu ndirimbo ye yaje gutor@@ anywa yitwa ‘@@ Umun@@ ezer@@ o’ yafunguraga Radiyo Muh@@ abura yari iya FPR-@@ Inkotanyi, yak@@ angur@@ iraga abantu urugamba rwo kubohoza igihugu. Avuga ku bijyanye n’uburyo umuhanzi az@@ ashimirwa , Mec@@ ky Kayiranga yavuze ko ikintu cya mbere ari ukw@@ ereka umuhanzi nk’@@ Abanyarwanda ko turi kumwe na we tum@@ ushyigikiye , ibyo yakoze byose yabikoze ku bacu n’igihugu cyacu, ati: “@@ Kuki twaz@@ ashimira cyangwa tuk@@ avuga umuntu at@@ akiriho ? T@@ umush@@ imire akiriho, bihe imbaraga n’abandi bari kuzamuk@@ ira mu njyana ishingiye ku muc@@ o. Uriya ni umwanya umunyarwanda wese akwiye kuzaza azanye inka , azanye urur@@ abo kugirango ashim@@ ire umuh@@ anz@@ i.” Akomeza avuga ko Umuhanzi w’uyu mwaka az@@ ashimirwa n’abat@@ eguye igitaramo aribo Ag@@ ence Kar@@ ibu as@@ bl@@ , Bwiza Med@@ ia, Umush@@ anana Media n’@@ Abac@@ uk@@ umbuzi b’@@ Amateka n’@@ Umuc@@ o. Az@@ ahabwa ishimwe rid@@ ashingiye ku mibare ahubwo rivuye ku mutima, umuntu wese wumva hari uruhare abahanzi bagize mu muco w’u Rwanda, ni umwanya we wo gushimira Ind@@ ongozi z’umuco nk’uko Mec@@ ky Kayiranga abivuga. Uyu mushinga wo gutegura ibi bitaramo ugiye gutangira muri uyu mwaka, wit@@ ezweho kugarura Umuhanzi mu is@@ angano (hagati) ry’@@ ik@@ us@@ anya, ib@@ ungabunga n’is@@ akaza ry’@@ umuco nyarwanda. Biz@@ an@@ afasha mu kugarura no guha ireme indirimbo n’im@@ byino zigenda z@@ ibagirana nyamara zih@@ etse umuco, z@@ ibagirana bitewe no kutagira urwego rub@@ yih@@ atira rwih@@ ariye. Ngo kuko gutakaza ikimenyetso kimwe cy’@@ umuco w’abantu bisa nko gus@@ ibanganya amateka y’uwo muntu mu isi muri rusange no mu gihugu by’umwihariko. Uyu mushinga kandi ugamije gutanga umuganda mu kur@@ inda, kubungabunga no guhererekanya amahame shingiro y’Umuco w’u Rwanda, wo soko y’imbaga ifite imp@@ agarik@@ e. Iki gitaramo cya mbere cyo gushimira abahanzi ‘@@ Ind@@ ongozi z’@@ Umuc@@ o’ kizaba muri uyu mwaka tariki 8 Werurwe 2020, kuva saa kumi n’ebyiri muri Camp Kigali aho kwinjira bizaba ari 5000 Frw mu myanya isanzwe, 100@@ 00 Frw mu myanya y’icyubahiro na 20@@ 000 Frw mu myanya y’ikir@@ enga.
Ikir@@ ezi, imfura y’umuhanzi Masamba Intore yinjiye mu muziki asohora indirimbo ya mbere Ikirezi An@@ na@@ i@@ is Dé@@ bor@@ ah umwana wa Masamba Intore akanaba imfura ye utuye Ot@@ t@@ awa muri Canada yateye ikirenge mu cya se yinjira mu muziki an@@ ahita ashyira hanze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise “S@@ mil@@ e”. Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, uyu mukobwa wavukiye mu Rwanda mu 1995, yavuze ko yah@@ avuye afite imyaka ibiri gusa y’amavuko ajya muri Canada. Yak@@ uze abana na nyina ariko akur@@ ana urukundo rw’@@ umuziki yatangiye kugaragaza akiri muto kuko yaririmbye muri za korali zitandukanye. Yagize ati “@@ Mama yarany@@ umvaga kandi akan@@ shy@@ igikira ariko wasangaga ambwira ko ngomba kwiga kugira ngo ngire amahitamo arenze umuziki gusa.” Ikirezi yavuze ko ababyeyi be bakiriye neza kuba ari umuhanzi nubwo atar@@ irimba gakondo nkuko papa we Masamba aririm@@ ba. Mu 2018 nibwo yinjiye mu muziki ariko atangira asubiramo ibihangano by’@@ abandi ari nako agerageza kwitabira amarushanwa atandukanye y’@@ umuziki. Muri uwo mwaka yakoze igitaramo yise “@@ Gen@@ es@@ is@@ ” cyangwa se It@@ angir@@ iro, cyabereye mu Mujyi wa Ot@@ t@@ awa aho atuye muri Canada. Yari yatum@@ iyemo na se Masamba Int@@ ore. Mu mwaka wa 2019 uyu muhanzikazi yongeye gutegura ikindi gitaramo mu mujyi wa Mont@@ ré@@ al agamije kugaragaza impano ye yo kuririmba nubwo nta ndirimbo ye n’imwe yag@@ iraga. Muri Gicurasi 2020 nibwo Ikirezi yasohoye indirimbo ye ya mbere yise S@@ mil@@ e. Yavuze ko atigeze atekereza ko indirimbo ye ya mbere iz@@ asohoka mu bihe isi ihanganye n’icyorezo gikomeye nka coronavirus. Ati “Sin@@ igeze ny@@ itekereza cyane, sinari nzi ko iz@@ asohoka gutya, gusa kubera ibihe bya Covid-19 turimo byabaye ngombwa ko ns@@ ohora indirimbo ibyin@@ itse nk’iy@@ i.” Yavuze ko nubwo indirimbo ye ya mbere iri mu njyana ya Regg@@ a@@ e, azag@@ erageza gukora n’izindi zitandukanye zirimo na Gakondo I@@ se yam@@ enyekan@@ iyemo. Mu mishinga ya vuba afite ngo harimo gusohora album ya mbere nubwo izaba iriho indirimbo nke. Ikirezi ushimira ababyeyi be uburyo bam@@ ushy@@ igikira, yavuze ko yifuza kuz@@ akorera igitaramo mu Rwanda nubwo atazi igihe kiz@@ abera. Uyu mukobwa kuri ubu ari kurangiza icyiciro cya kabiri cya Kaminuza mu bijyanye n’imibereho myiza. Reba indirimbo nshya ya Ikirezi Intore Masamba yitegereza imfura ye mu 2018 mu gitaramo bakoreye Ot@@ t@@ awa muri Canada Intore Masamba yahaye umugisha wa kib@@ yeyi imfura ye an@@ ibutsa abantu ko ari we yah@@ imbiye indirimbo yise " Yar@@ aye av@@ uts@@ e"
KAY@@ ON@@ Z@@ A: Bar@@ atabaza nyuma yo gufung@@ urirwa amazi n'abayobozi ag@@ asub@@ iran@@ ayo na bo Abaturage bo mu karere ka Kayonza, umurenge wa Mw@@ iri by'umwihariko akagari ka Ny@@ aw@@ era, bugarijwe n'ikibazo cyo kubura amazi meza aho bamaze hafi umwaka batazi uko amazi meza asa aho bakoresha amazi mabi yo mu gish@@ anga. Aba baturage bavuga ko aya mazi yat@@ ashywe ku mugaragaro n'abayobozi ariko ngo nyuma yo kuy@@ ataha akaba atar@@ ongeye kugar@@ uka. Mu baturage baganiriye na Makuruki.rw bat@@ ashatse ko amazina yabo atangazwa, badutangarije ko bamaze igihe kirekire nta mazi meza bafite kandi ibisabwa ngo ayo mazi abag@@ ereho byose bab@@ ifite (@@ ibigega na rob@@ in@@ ets@@ ). Aba baturage bavuga ko ikibabaje ari uko umurenge baturanye wa Gahini wo ufite amazi, bakibaza impamvu amazi at@@ abag@@ eraho. Ikindi kandi n'uko aba baturage iyo uganiriye na bo bakubwira ko aka kagari harimo ibigega byinshi ariko n'iyo amazi aje aza mu kigega kimwe cy'@@ ahitwa ku Gitega ibindi byo ban@@ acy@@ eka ko imiyoboro yabyo ishobora kuba yar@@ angiritse. Gusa n'iki kigega ngo kiz@@ amo amazi na cyo ngo kimaze amezi arenga 9 nta mazi azam@@ o. Uyu yagize ati"@@ nta kub@@ eshye sin@@ akubwira ngo tumaze igihe kingana gute tudafite amazi, icyo nzi cyo ni uko ari kinini, twibaza impamvu tut@@ ay@@ abona kandi dufite ibigega by'@@ amazi ndetse nabo duturanye muri Gah@@ ani bay@@ afit@@ e." Yakomeje avuga ko kubura amazi meza bibagiraho ingaruka mbi kuko bakoresha amazi mabi bityo bakaba bibas@@ irwa n'indwara ziterwa n'@@ umwanda. Aba baturage bavuga ko ikiba@@ babaza ari uko aya mazi yaje gutah@@ wa n'abayobozi ariko ngo nyuma yo kuy@@ at@@ aha, aya mazi ngo ntiy@@ ogeye kugaruka kuko yagiye ubut@@ agaruka. Icyo aba baturage bifuza ni uko ubuyobozi bw@@ ashaka uburyo bubak@@ emurira ikibazo na bo bakabona amazi meza. Umunyabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'@@ akagari ka Ny@@ aw@@ era, Umurerwa Solange aganira na Makuruki.rw yatubwiye ko koko abaturage bamaze igihe kinini nta mazi babona. Yagize ati"@@ nibyo koko amazi yarab@@ uze, hashize nk'@@ amezi icyenda nta mazi tub@@ ona, abaturage bakoresha amazi mabi kandi murabizi ko atera indwara ikindi ban@@ akora urugendo rurerure kuko bavoma ahitwa Nt@@ aruka cyangwa Kib@@ ombw@@ e." Uyu muyobozi nawe arasaba ubuyobozi bumuk@@ uriye kuba bw@@ ashaka uko bubak@@ emurira iki kibazo maze amazi ntaz@@ ajye agarukira muri Gahini gusa. Mu kiganiro Makuruki.rw yagiranye n'umuyobozi wa karere ka Kayonza wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu, Uw@@ ibam@@ be Consol@@ ee yemeje aya makuru avuga ko bakoranye inama na WASAC kugira ngo ibar@@ ebere impamvu nyamukuru amazi atagera kubo ag@@ enewe, bityo ngo bakaba bategereje igisubizo cyayo. Yagize ati"@@ birashoboka ko umurenge umwe wagira amazi undi nt@@ uy@@ abon@@ e, biterwa n'@@ isoko bafat@@ iraho. Icyo kibazo turak@@ izi kandi twatangiye no kug@@ ikoraho kuko mu minsi yashize twakoranye inama na WASAC ngo ig@@ ende itur@@ ebere impamvu nyakuri amazi atarimo kugera ku baturage hanyuma n@@ itum@@ ara kumenya aho ikibazo kiri ni bwo tuz@@ ahita tumenya n'uburyo tug@@ ikem@@ uram@@ o." Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko b@@ ohereje abakozi babo ngo bajye gufatanya na WASAC mu gushaka iyo mpamvu, bityo bakaba bizeye ko mu cyumweru kimwe bazaba babonye impamvu ituma ayo mazi atagera mu baturage uko bikwiye. Twagerageje kuvugana na WASAC muri ako karere kuri iki kibazo ariko ntibyad@@ ukund@@ iye.
Bad@@ ind@@ ijwe mu iterambere no Kur@@ wara malariya Abaturage bo mu mirenge igize Akarere ka Gatsibo bavuga ko kurwara no kurw@@ aza malariya bituma iterambere ryabo rit@@ ihuta nk'uko baby@@ ifuza. Mu gukomeza kurwanya malariya mu karere ka Gatsibo hari igikorwa cyo gutera umuti wica imibu mu nzu z'@@ abaturage. Bamwe muri aba baturage bo mu Mr@@ enge wa Kiz@@ igura baganiriye na Kigali Today, B@@ agaragaza uburyo basigaye babona indwara ya malariya yar@@ iyongereye ugereranyije no mu bihe byash@@ ize. Umwe muri abo baturage witwa Kamp@@ ay@@ ana Eph@@ ros@@ ine agira ati "@@ Malariya ni umwanzi w'@@ iterambere kuko iyo yageze mu rugo nta kindi kintu ushobora gukora, kuko umara kuy@@ ikir@@ uka abana bagafatwa cyangwa se umugabo, ugasanga ari uguh@@ ora kwa mug@@ ang@@ a." Hakizimana Emmanuel ushinzwe ibijyanye no kwirinda malariya mu kigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima (RB@@ C), avuga ko ibyo aba baturage bavuga atari amak@@ ab@@ yan@@ kur@@ u, kuko ngo kugeza ubu akarere kabo ari ko kaza ku isonga mu kugira abarwayi benshi ba mal@@ ariya. Ati "Iyo turebye mu mibare dusanga Akarere ka Gatsibo kaza ku mwanya wa mbere mu kugira abaturage ben@@ si barwaye mal@@ ariya, mu ngamba zafashwe zo kuyirwanya mu gihugu cyose harimo no kongera ubushobozi bw'@@ abajyanama b'@@ ubuzima, bakar@@ enga kubyo kwita ku bana gusa bakajya bafasha n'abantu bak@@ uz@@ e." Ubuyobozi bw'@@ Ibitaro bya Ng@@ arama buvuga ko hakwiye ubufatanye bw'abaturage bose mu gushyira mu bikorwa ingamba zo kurwanya ubwiyongere bukabije bwa mal@@ ariya. Ubuyobozi bw'Akarere ka Gatsibo buributsa abaturage ko ubuzima buzira umuze ari wo musingi w'@@ ibanze w'@@ iterambere ry'@@ Igihugu n'imibereho myiza y'abaturage, buk@@ abasaba kudakoresha nabi amahirwe yo kubaho neza Leta iba yar@@ abashyir@@ iyeho. Mu rwego rwo gukomeza guhashya mal@@ ariya, Leta yashyizeho ingamba zitandukanye zo kuyirwanya zirimo kwivuza hakiri kare, kuryama mu nzit@@ iram@@ ibu ikoranye umuti, gukuraho ibih@@ uru n'ib@@ in@@ ogo bik@@ ikije ingo no kubahiriza gahunda zose zijyanye n'@@ igikorwa cyo kubat@@ erera umuti wica imib@@ u.
Itorero Angilikani ryateguye igiterane kiz@@ akoresh@@ wamo amarushanwa yo kwiruka Yanditswe kuya 22@@ -07-@@ 2014 saa 09:@@ 27@@ ' na Emm@@ a-@@ Marie Umurerwa Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryateguye igiterane mpuzamahanga cy'iminsi itatu kiz@@ ab@@ imbur@@ irwa n'@@ amarushanwa yo kwiruka ku rubyiruko ruri hejuru y'imyaka 15 n'@@ igikorwa cy'@@ imy@@ idagaduro, azatangira tariki ya 1 Kanama 2014 saa mbiri za mu gitondo. Ku munsi wa nyuma w'@@ igiterane urubyiruko rw@@ itwaye neza mu marushanwa ruz@@ ahabwa ibihembo bitandukanye birimo telefoni zigend@@ anwa, n'@@ imyambaro itandukanye mu birori bizaba byitabiriwe na Minisiteri y'@@ Umuco na Sip@@ oro. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru, ubuyoboz@@ i @@ (...) Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryateguye igiterane mpuzamahanga cy'iminsi itatu kiz@@ ab@@ imbur@@ irwa n'@@ amarushanwa yo kwiruka ku rubyiruko ruri hejuru y'imyaka 15 n'@@ igikorwa cy'@@ imy@@ idagaduro, azatangira tariki ya 1 Kanama 2014 saa mbiri za mu gitondo. Rev. Samuel Mug@@ isha, Rev Maurice Ruk@@ imbira na Man@@ as@@ se@@ h Tuy@@ iz@@ erwe mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru Ku munsi wa nyuma w'@@ igiterane urubyiruko rw@@ itwaye neza mu marushanwa ruz@@ ahabwa ibihembo bitandukanye birimo telefoni zigend@@ anwa, n'@@ imyambaro itandukanye mu birori bizaba byitabiriwe na Minisiteri y'@@ Umuco na Sip@@ oro. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru, ubuyobozi bw'@@ iri torero bwavuze ko iki giterane ngarukamwaka gifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti ‘@@ Ahubwo muh@@ induke rwose mufite imitima mishy@@ a…@@ Rom@@ 12:@@ 2@@ ". Rev. Mugisha Samuel umuyobozi ku rusengero St. Etienne mu Biry@@ ogo, yavuze ko batumiye abigisha b'@@ Ijambo ry'Imana batandukanye ndetse n'@@ Abahanzi ku giti cyabo. Rev. Mugisha yagize ati « Buri mwaka dutegura igiterane nk'iki mu rwego rwo kurushaho kwigira hamwe ijambo ry'@@ Imana, abakristo bak@@ aboneraho n'umwanya wo kwis@@ uz@@ uma, babifashijwemo n'@@ inyigisho zitandukanye z'@@ ijambo ry'@@ Iman@@ a». Yakomeje avuga ko mu bigisha batumiwe harimo Pasiteri Ger@@ ri@@ t Wol@@ fa@@ ard@@ t w'@@ umunyafurika y'Epfo wakiriye agakiza ariko akaba ari mu bigeze gutegura its@@ emba@@ bwoko ry'@@ abir@@ abura, hamwe n'abandi bapasiteri batandukanye bo mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, hari kandi amahugurwa y'urubyiruko n'aya ba@@ byeyi. Tuyizere Maurice umwe mu bashinzwe gutegura iki giter@@ ane, yavuze ko batumiwe n'abahanzi batandukanye, barimo D@@ udu uz@@ aturuka i Burundi, Pati@@ en Bizimana, Bless@@ ed s@@ ist@@ ers Group, Kamikazi Joy@@ , Ed@@ ie Mico hamwe na Mas@@ s ch@@ oir yo kuri St Etienne mu Rwanda. Yasobanuye umusaruro uva mu bit@@ erane agira ati « Hari ingo nyinshi zari zifitanye amakimbirane zongeye kubana mu mahoro ». Uyu musaruro kandi ngo uboneka kubera amahugurwa y'is@@ anamitima mu bijyanye n'@@ ubumwe n'ubwiyunge hakaba n'abandi bagenda bakira agakiza kandi bar@@ ahoze ari inz@@ ererez@@ i. "@@ Itumanaho rya Airtel rije gufasha Umunyarwanda wese aho ava akag@@ er@@ a" Yanditswe kuya 29@@ -03-@@ 2012 saa 14:@@ 19@@ ' na Olivier RUB@@ IBI "@@ Itumanaho ryacu rigamije guhuza isi yose n'@@ umuturage w'@@ Umunyarwanda aho ava akag@@ er@@ a". Ibi Jay@@ ant Kh@@ os@@ l@@ a, Umuyobozi wa Sosiyete y'itumanaho Airtel yabitangarije abanyamakuru mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 29 Werurwe 201@@ 2; nyuma yo kwakirwa na Minisitiri w'intebe Dr Pierre Damien Hab@@ umurem@@ yi. Nk'uko yabitangarije abanyamakuru, uruzinduko rwe rwari rugamije gutumira Minisitiri w'intebe Dr. Pierre Damien Habumuremyi mu gikorwa cyo gutangiza ibikorwa bya Sosiyete yabo y'itumanaho mu@@  @@ (...) "@@ Itumanaho ryacu rigamije guhuza isi yose n'@@ umuturage w'@@ Umunyarwanda aho ava akag@@ er@@ a". Ibi Jay@@ ant Kh@@ os@@ l@@ a, Umuyobozi wa Sosiyete y'itumanaho Airtel yabitangarije abanyamakuru mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 29 Werurwe 201@@ 2; nyuma yo kwakirwa na Minisitiri w'intebe Dr Pierre Damien Hab@@ umurem@@ yi. Nk'uko yabitangarije abanyamakuru, uruzinduko rwe rwari rugamije gutumira Minisitiri w'intebe Dr. Pierre Damien Habumuremyi mu gikorwa cyo gutangiza ibikorwa bya Sosiyete yabo y'itumanaho mu Rwanda igikorwa giteg@@ anijwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu. Jay@@ ant Kh@@ os@@ la yavuze ko ibikorwa bya Sosiyete ahagarariye bije bigamije guteza imbere umuturage wo mu rwego rwo hasi ut@@ abashaga kungurana ibitekerezo n'abandi. Ati" tuje twiyemeje kuzamura ubukungu bw'u Rwanda tub@@ inyujije mu gucuruza ibikorwa byifashishwa mu itum@@ anah@@ o". Airtel ni isosiyete yo mu gihugu cy'u Buhinde, u Rwanda rukaba rubaye igihugu cya 17 muri Afurika itang@@ ijemo ibikorwa byayo by'@@ itumanaho. Minisitiri w'intebe Dr. Pierre Dam@@ ie Habumuremyi aganira na Jay@@ ant Kh@@ os@@ la Jay@@ ant aganira n'abany@@ amak@@ urum@@ akuru Inkuru byerek@@ er@@ anye@@ : Airtel yiteguye gutangiza ibikorwa byayo mu Rwanda Airtel izongera kugeza kuri 70% by'@@ ibikorwa bit@@ anduza ikirere Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE
Umwana wa Gen. Ntaw@@ unguka uyobora FDLR yamush@@ ishikarije gutaha Muk@@ iza Willy Maurice ni umwana wa kabiri wa General Major Ntaw@@ unguka Pacifique ubarizwa mu mashyamba ya Congo mu mitwe y’iterabwoba igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda. Muk@@ iza Willy Maurice Yag@@ iriye inama Abanyarwanda bakiri hirya no hino hanze y’igihugu kuza mu Rwanda bagafatanya kubaka u Rwanda. Yagize ati “@@ Abanyarwanda bose bakiri mu mashyamba harimo na Data, bakwiye gushyira intwaro hasi bakaza tug@@ afatanya kubaka igihugu. Mu Rwanda hari umutekano, amahoro ni yose, tur@@ akat@@ aje mu iteramb@@ ere.” Ati “Ubundi s@@ imba numva uburyo bakw@@ ing@@ ingira amahirwe ukay@@ anga.” Muk@@ iza Willy Maurice afite mukuru we akagira na mushiki we umuk@@ urikir@@ a, bose uko ari batatu bakaba ari abana ba Ntaw@@ unguka Pacif@@ ique. Muk@@ iza yatse ijambo mu Nama y’Igihugu y’ Umushyikirano irimo kubera i Kigali ku nshuro ya 17, ashima Leta y’u Rwanda, atanga n’ubuh@@ amya, abon@@ er@@ ho no kugira inama urubyiruko bagenzi be. Muk@@ iza avuga ko n’ubwo se ari mu mashyamba ya Congo, Leta y’u Rwanda ngo ntabwo yat@@ ereranye abana be. Ati “@@ Igihugu cyat@@ wit@@ ayeho, cyar@@ atw@@ igish@@ ije, dukora neza nk’abandi Banyarwanda bose, dufite umutekano, ntawe utur@@ eng@@ anya, mbese mw@@ atwit@@ ayeho nk’uko mw@@ itaye ku Banyarwanda bose. Mu mashuri twar@@ ize, mukuru wanjye ndetse yize kaminuza arih@@ irwa n’@@ igihugu, arangije akomereza mu Bushinwa, ni ho arimo gukorera Master@@ ’@@ s, nta cyangombwa yigeze yim@@ wa, nta n’uw@@ amubajije ngo ugiye he, mbese murumva ko twari tumeze nk’abandi Banyarwanda bose, hatitawe ko turi abana ba Ntaw@@ unguka Pacif@@ iqu@@ e.” Muk@@ iza Willy Maurice yavuze ko mushiki we na we abayeho neza, ubu akaba arimo kwiga muri Ghana ibyerekeranye n’ubuvuzi (P@@ har@@ macy@@ ). Muk@@ iza na we arangije muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda (C@@ oll@@ ege of Science and Technology Nyarugeng@@ e) mu byerekeranye n’ubw@@ ubatsi (C@@ ivil Engine@@ er@@ ing@@ ). Ar@@ angije kwiga muri uyu mwaka akaba yishimira ko ubu ari umu enj@@ en@@ iyeri (E@@ ng@@ ine@@ er) abikesha igihugu cy@@ amuhaye umutekano kit@@ itaye ku wo ari we. Ati “Mu rugo hari igihe tuganira tukumva bidashoboka ko dushobora kuba dufat@@ wa kimwe nk’abandi kandi muz@@ ehe wacu ari umwe mu batak@@ ifuriza gutera imbere.” Muk@@ iza Willy Maurice agira inama urubyiruko bagenzi be ko bafite igihugu ki@@ bakunda kandi k@@ ibash@@ y@@ igik@@ iye, abasaba kubyaza umusaruro ayo mah@@ irwe, bih@@ angira imirimo, bakora n’ibindi bitandukanye by@@ abateza imbere, bigateza imbere n’igihugu muri rusange. Yasabye urubyiruko kandi kwirinda abantu baba@@ jya mu matwi bak@@ abashishikariza kwanga igihugu cyabo. Muk@@ iza Willy Maurice yijeje Perezida Paul Kagame ko bo nk’abana ba Ntaw@@ unguka Pacifique biteguye gukorera igihugu mu buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose bug@@ iteza imbere. General Major Pacifique Ntaw@@ unguka General Major Pacifique Ntaw@@ unguka uzwi ku mazina nka Om@@ ega, Nzeri na Israel ni we wagizwe umuyobozi w’agateganyo ku buyobozi bw’@@ umutwe w’igisirikare cya FDLR, nyuma y’urupfu rwa Lt Gen Sylvestre Mudacumura warashwe n’ingabo za Congo (FARD@@ C) ku wa 17 Nzeri 2019 zim@@ usanze mu birindiro bye ahitwa M@@ akom@@ al@@ ehe muri Rutsh@@ uru. Gen Maj Pacifique Ntaw@@ unguka ni we wari umugaba w’ingabo (@@ Etat Maj@@ or) wa FDLR, akaba yar@@ atoranyijwe n’abandi basirikare bakuru kugira ngo abe ayobora by’agateganyo igisirikare cy’uyu mutwe ubu uri mu bibazo bitoroshye. Gen Maj Pacifique Ntaw@@ unguka wavutse mu 196@@ 4, yarush@@ waga imyaka 10 na Lt Gen Mud@@ ac@@ umur@@ a. Av@@ uka i Kag@@ eshi muri Gas@@ eb@@ eya mu cyahoze ari Komini Gas@@ eke aho azwi ku izina rya Mul@@ ef@@ u. Gen Maj Pacifique Ntaw@@ unguka (@@ Om@@ eg@@ a) yize amashuri abanza ahitwa Mb@@ and@@ ari akomereza mu Rw@@ ank@@ eri mu cyari Komini N@@ kuri aho yavuye akomereza muri Christ@@ -@@ Ro@@ i mu Karere ka Nyanza, aho yarangije yinjira mu ishuri rya Gisirikare ES@@ M icyiciro cya 25 kuri Leta ya Habyarimana ndetse akaba yarize ibyo gutwara indege. Av@@ ugwa mu bayobozi ba batayo 94 yarwanye n’ingabo za RPA mu Mutara ahazwi nka Komini Muv@@ umba agats@@ indwa akerekeza i Kigali. Muri Gicurasi 1994 yakom@@ erekeye mu mirwan@@ o, ajyanwa mu kigo cya Gisirikare cya Mukam@@ ira, aho yavuye ahungira mu nkambi ya Kat@@ ale inyuma y’ibir@@ unga. Mu gihe cy’@@ umutwe wa AL@@ IR yabaye umuyobozi w’ibikorwa bya gisirikare bizwi nka Beth@@ leh@@ em muri Komini Sat@@ ins@@ yi, Gakenke na R@@ amba ariko nyuma yo gutsindwa asubira muri Congo. Igitabo ‘@@ Le@@ ader@@ ship of Rwand@@ ese ar@@ med gro@@ up@@ s in D@@ RC@@ ’ kivuga ko azwi nk’umuntu ut@@ ava ku iz@@ ima, ibi bikaba intandaro ituma atar@@ umvikanaga n’umuyobozi we Lt Gen Mud@@ ac@@ umur@@ a. Yabaye umuyobozi w’@@ igis@@ ir@@ kare cya FDLR mu bice bya Rutsh@@ uru na Masisi ndetse akajya as@@ uzugura ibyemezo bya Mud@@ ac@@ umur@@ a. Yari umwe mu barwanyi ba FDLR bifuzaga impinduka mu gisirikare binubira ko bay@@ oborwa n’abasaza n’abany@@ abw@@ oba. Gen Kabarebe muri 2016 yatangaje ko Ingabo z’u Rwanda na we ubwe bavug@@ anaga n’abarwanyi bari mu mashyamba bafite imigambi mibi ku Rwanda, bab@@ umvisha gutaha kandi mu bo yashishikarije gutaha harimo Ntaw@@ unguka Pacifique udak@@ ozwa ibyo gutaha. Gen. Kabarebe ati ‘‘@@ Njye ubwanjye naram@@ wih@@ amagariye nti ‘@@ Pacifique ko w@@ ize, uri umupilote w@@ igiye mu Bufaransa, ntabwo uri inj@@ ij@@ i, ayo mashyamba ya Congo urimo imyaka makumyabiri n’ing@@ ah@@ e, nt@@ ugeraho ug@@ ash@@ ishoza ibyo ur@@ imo, n’intambara yaran@@ aniranye ntabwo uzay@@ itsinda, nt@@ ugeraho uk@@ ibwir@@ a?" Undi na we ati “@@ J@@ ener@@ ali, reka nkubwire ikintu kimwe. Njyewe kugaruka mu Rwanda, nz@@ agaruka mu Rwanda nta Mut@@ utsi n’uyu n’umwe uri muri icyo gihugu, niba hari ikindi washakaga kongeraho kum@@ bwira, ikiganiro tuk@@ ir@@ ekere ahang@@ ah@@ a." Om@@ ega uc@@ um@@ bagira kubera ibikomere yavanye mu Rwanda, yageze muri Congo ayobora Son@@ oki yashinze itsinda ry’@@ abakirisitu r@@ iyoborwa n’uwitwa Muz@@ im@@ angane ariko riza kwamag@@ anwa na Lt Gen Mud@@ ac@@ umur@@ a. Y@@ ahoze ari nimero enye mu gisirikare cya FDLR@@ -@@ FO@@ CA ariko ubu ni we ug@@ ezweho kuk@@ iyobora nyuma y’uko aba@@ mub@@ anjirije bagiye batakaza ubuzima barimo Lt Gen Sylvestre Mud@@ ac@@ umura, Brig Gen Stanislas Nzeyimana wari uzwi nka Big@@ aruka wab@@ uriwe irengero yagiye muri Tanzania hamwe na Brig Gen Lé@@ od@@ imir Mug@@ arag@@ u, uzwi nka Lé@@ o Manzi waras@@ iwe mu birindiro bye. Inkuru bijyan@@ ye: Gen Pacifique Ntaw@@ unguka yasimbuye Gen Mudacumura ku buyobozi bwa FDLR@@ -@@ FO@@ CA MENYA UMWANDITSI Mal@@ achie Hakizimana Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ h@@ _@@ mal@@ achie Inkuru bijyanye Ubukungu bur@@ amutse buz@@ amuk@@ aho 10% ubushomeri bwaba amateka Iyi mirenge iz@@ abona amashanyarazi bitarenze ukwezi kwa gatandatu 2020 Amafoto: Urugwiro n’@@ akanyamuneza ku bitabiriye Umushyikirano Perezida Kagame yategetse MINAGRI kwishyura Mukeshimana na bagenzi be Perezida Kagame yongeye kuburira abat@@ ekereza guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda Ntabwo igishanga git@@ ur@@ wam@@ o!@@ - Kagame Perezida Kagame arifuza kuz@@ asimburwa n’umugore
Ubutumwa bwihariye Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda az@@ ibandaho namara kwim@@ ikwa nka Cardinal Ar@@ k@@ iyepis@@ kopi wa Kigali, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda uherutse gutorerwa kuba Cardinal n’abandi 12 bat@@ orewe rimwe na we bazim@@ ikwa ku wa 28 Ugushyingo 2020. B@@ azaba binjiye mu mubare w’@@ abajyanama ba hafi b’@@ umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi. Aba baba bafite amahirwe agirwa na bake yo kugeza ibitekerezo byabo kuri Papa maze bikaba bishobora no gushyirwa mu bikorwa vuba. Ar@@ k@@ iyepis@@ kopi wa Kigali, Musenyeri Antoine Kamb@@ anda, yavuze ko ubutumwa bumur@@ aje ishinga bushingiye ku kwita ku muryango kuko ari wo gic@@ umbi cy’ubuk@@ irisit@@ u. Muri iyi minsi, mu miryango hagaragara ibibazo by’ing@@ utu bibangamiye ubuzima n’@@ imibereho. Amakimbirane yo mu miryango akomeje gutuma abashakanye bic@@ ana, batanduk@@ ana, bac@@ ana inyuma, cyangwa bakabana bar@@ ebana ay’@@ ingwe maze ingaruka zikagera kuri bo ubwabo no ku bana babo. Ubu bamwe mu bana baba ku mihanda bagaragaza ko intandaro yo kujya kuba ku muhanda ari amakimbirane yo mu miryango bav@@ uk@@ amo. Mu muryango Nyarwanda kandi ubu haravugwa ikibazo gikomeye cy’@@ abangavu batw@@ ita imburagih@@ e, akenshi izi nda baz@@ iterwa n’abagabo bakuze bafite imiryango ubundi bakagombye kuba basig@@ asira abo bahohot@@ era. Rimwe na rimwe abo b@@ angavu iyo bamaze kubyara ababyeyi babo bar@@ abat@@ ererana cyangwa bakabah@@ oza ku nkeke rimwe na rimwe bag@@ ator@@ ongera bakajya kubaho mu buzima bush@@ arira. Abana bavuka kuri abo b@@ angavu na bo bahura n’ubuzima bubi bud@@ akwiye ibib@@ ondo. Ibi n’ibindi bibazo bitandukanye bigira ingaruka no ku iy@@ ogezabutumwa cyane cyane ko rih@@ era mu muryango. Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda yatangaje ko mu gihe azaba amaze kwim@@ ikwa nka Card@@ in@@ al, ubutumwa azih@@ atira kugeza ku mushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi buzaba bushingiye ku kwita ku muryango kuko ari wo kiliziya y’ib@@ anze. Yagize ati “@@ Umuryango ni ubutumwa bw’@@ umwihariko nsh@@ inzwe. Ni wo gic@@ umbi cy’ubuk@@ irisit@@ u, ni wo kiliziya y’ib@@ anz@@ e.” Musenyeri Kambanda yavuze ko yagize amahirwe yo kuba ari we wah@@ agarariye u Rwanda mu Nama y’Ab@@ episikopi (s@@ yn@@ od@@ ) yo mu 2015 bigatuma yumva ibibazo umuryango ufite ku Isi yose muri za Kiliziya. Avuga ko mu byo yumvise hari abahuje ibibazo n’umuryango Nyarwanda hakaba n’abafite iby’@@ umwihariko ariko kandi ngo iyo nama yatumye agira amahirwe yo kubona ukwemera kuri hirya no hino no kubona ko imbaraga z’@@ ivanj@@ ili z@@ igih@@ ari. Ngo kuri we, iki ni igihe cyiza cyo kugeza ibitekerezo bye ku Mush@@ umba wa Kiliziya, akagaragaza uburemere umuryango ufite mu iy@@ ogez@@ abut@@ umwa. Ati “@@ Iy@@ ogezabutumwa rih@@ era mu muryango, niho umwana ameny@@ era Imana, niho ameny@@ era isengesho rya mbere kandi niho akura umusingi w’@@ ubuk@@ irisitu n’@@ ukwemera biz@@ amw@@ ambutsa ubuzima bwe bwose, kwita rero ku muryango mu iy@@ ogezabutumwa ni cyo kintu cya mbere numva mu Kiliziya bakwiye guha imbarag@@ a.” Abal@@ ay@@ iki bafite umukoro ukomeye ku bus@@ ugire bw’umuryango Musenyeri Kambanda avuga ko abal@@ ay@@ iki (@@ abakirisit@@ u) bafite inshingano ikomeye yo kwita ku muryango cyane cyane gutoza abana bato kumenya Imana n’@@ ivanj@@ ili. Ati “@@ Abal@@ ay@@ iki nibo bagize ingo, kandi ndimo ndavuga ubutumwa buh@@ era mu ngo, abal@@ ay@@ iki biri mu nshingano zabo by’umwihariko kwita ku iy@@ ogezabutumwa ryo mu muryang@@ o.” Yavuze ko ibihe bya Guma mu rugo byatanze isomo rikomeye ku bakuru b’@@ imiryango kuko byatumye bamenya neza ko ari bo bashumba b’@@ ibanze b’@@ imiryango yabo. Ati “@@ Guma mu rugo muri COVID-19 yatug@@ aragarije ko mu gihe abantu bat@@ ashoboraga kujya mu misa bas@@ engeraga mu rugo, umukuru w’umuryango akaba yay@@ obora umuh@@ im@@ bazo w’@@ ijambo ry’Imana […] ni we us@@ obanurira abana ivanjiri y’uwo munsi, ni we ubat@@ oza gusenga, buri mwana ag@@ ashobora kuvuga isengesho […] ubw@@ igishwa ni hariya buh@@ era, niho kiliziya yubats@@ e. Abal@@ ay@@ iki rero bagize umusingi wa Kiliziya, kwita ku muryango ni ubutumwa bafite kandi tw@@ ubak@@ iyeho twes@@ e.” Yagarutse ku nshingano z’@@ abihaye Imana, avuga ko bakwiye gukoresha neza ingabire bahawe maze bagatanga umusanzu wabo mu kubaka umuryango na Kiliziya. Yakomeje ati “@@ Kwiy@@ egurira Imana ni ingabire mu mateka roho mutagatifu aby@@ utsa mu muntu ak@@ ifatanya n’abandi mu ng@@ abire yo kwita ku m@@ babar@@ e, kwita ku bar@@ wayi, kwigisha abat@@ o, kwita ku bantu bafite ubumuga, kwigisha no kujya kwamamaza ivanjiri mu mahanga. Ab@@ iy@@ eguriye Imana icyo tubasaba ni ugushyira mu bikorwa no kubahiriza ingabire bahawe kugira ngo uruhare bateg@@ erejweho mu kubaka Kiliziya bar@@ ug@@ arag@@ az@@ e.” Kugira ngo umuntu abe Cardinal biri mu bushake bwite bwa Papa kuko nta t@@ ora riba@@ ho, bigakorwa mu bus@@ esenguzi bwe, ak@@ itor@@ anyiriza abaj@@ yan@@ ama. Ba Cardinal ni bo bator@@ wamo ba Pap@@ a, bivuze ko buri Cardinal aba ari umuk@@ andid@@ a. B@@ iteganywa ko Cardinal Kambanda azahita ahabwa imyambaro itukura iranga ba Cardinal namara kwim@@ ikwa ku wa 28 Ugushyingo 2020. Ar@@ k@@ iyepis@@ kopi wa Kigali, Musenyeri Antoine Kamb@@ anda, yavuze ko ubutumwa bumur@@ aje ishinga bushingiye ku kwita ku muryango kuko ari wo gic@@ umbi cy’ubuk@@ irisitu
Impanuka y'@@ ikamyo yakom@@ erekeje batatu Ik@@ amyo yikoreye imifuka ya S@@ ima yavaga i Rusizi yerekeza i Kigali, yakoreye impanuka mu Karere ka Nyanza h@@ akom@@ ek@@ eramo batatu. Mu gitondo ku wa 26 Mutarama 2016, ni bwo iyo kamyo yari yikoreye sima z'@@ uruganda rwa CIM@@ ERW@@ A, yakoze impanuka ariko abari bayirimo bakom@@ ereka bid@@ ak@@ anganye nk'uko bamwe mu baturage babat@@ abaye babivuga. Batatu bakomeretse hanyuma imodoka na yo ir@@ angirika bikomeye. Ngendahimana Gasp@@ ard, umwe mu baturage bahageze mbere ikimara kuba, yavuze ko umwe mu bakomeretse ari we wabonaga arembye kurusha abandi. Yagize ati "@@ Umwe muri abo bantu batatu bari mu modoka yakomeretse cyane undi na we akomereka byoroheje we yig@@ enz@@ aga kuko ni we winj@@ yanye mu modoka tw@@ abash@@ akiye bakimara gukora impan@@ uk@@ a." Akomeza avuga ko nyuma gato Polisi ikorera mu Karere ka Nyanza yahageze ariko ig@@ asanga abaturage bari bamaze gukorera ubutabazi bw'ibanze abari bakom@@ eretse. Iri k@@ ona rik@@ unze kub@@ eramo impanuka. Uwo muturage yakomeje agira ati "@@ Kubera ko hano hakunze kubera impanuka kandi akaba ari ku muhanda munini wa kaburimbo dukunze guhita tubat@@ abara, abakoze impanuka tuk@@ abashakira uko bag@@ ezwa kwa muganga tuk@@ abat@@ egera izindi modoka ziba zih@@ it@@ a." Abakom@@ eretse bahise bajyanwa mu Bitaro bya Nyanza kugira ngo bahabwe ubutabazi bw'@@ ibanze, mu gihe imodoka igic@@ ungiwe aho impanuka yabereye mu Murenge wa Muk@@ ingo mu Karere ka Nyanza. Polisi ishinzwe Umutekano wo mu Muh@@ anda yo yatangaje ko iyo mpanuka yaturutse ku muvuduko ukabije w'iyo modoka.
Rutsiro : Abany@@ erondo bahag@@ obotse umugabo wari ufite umup@@ anga n'@@ icyuma atar@@ akora ibara Nt@@ amug@@ ab@@ umwe uzwi ku izina rya Ki@@ wi wo mu kagari ka B@@ umba mu murenge wa Mush@@ ubat@@ i mu karere ka Rutsiro yashatse gutema abaturanyi be ahereye ku mugore we mu ijoro rishyira ku wa gatanu tariki 11@@ /07/201@@ 4, ariko abanyerondo babasha kuhag@@ oboka bamw@@ ambura umup@@ anga, inkoni n'@@ icyuma yari afite at@@ aragira uwo akom@@ erets@@ a. Muri iryo j@@ oro, abaturage, ubuyobozi bw'@@ akagari ka B@@ umba ndetse n'abany@@ erondo basa n'abar@@ aye batar@@ yamye kubera ko baraye barar@@ iriye uwo mugabo w'imyaka 29 y'amavuko wari wat@@ eje umutekano mucy@@ e. Abany@@ erondo bamw@@ ambuye umup@@ anga n'@@ icyuma yashakaga gut@@ em@@ esha abaturage ahereye ku mugore we. Y@@ avuye mu kabari aza iwe mu rugo gushaka umup@@ anga n'@@ it@@ oro@@ shi ngo asubire kurwana mu kabari, ariko akiri aho mu rugo at@@ ongana n'umugore aba ari we ashaka guh@@ eraho at@@ ema. Icyakora umugore yabashije kumuc@@ ika, ajya guh@@ uruza abashinzwe umutekano. Abany@@ erondo bahageze bahita bamufata baram@@ uzamuk@@ ana bamushyira mu nyubako y'@@ akagari bajya kureba abayobozi b'@@ ak@@ agari, ariko bagarutse basanga urugi rw'@@ ibiro by'@@ akagari yar@@ uciye aras@@ ohoka, abantu baramut@@ ang@@ atanga barongera bam@@ ugarura ku k@@ agari. Umugore we avuga ko ubusanzwe umugabo we arwana nta mpamvu ifatika ihari, ahubwo ngo abit@@ erwa n'@@ inzoga ndetse n'@@ urumogi aba yany@@ we@@ ye, dore ko no muri ako kanya ubwo yafatwaga yasaga n'uw@@ as@@ inze akaba yari afite n'@@ agac@@ upa kuz@@ uye k'@@ inzoga ya African G@@ in bamwe bita S@@ urud@@ uw@@ iri. Umugore avuga ko umugabo we amaze kum@@ anika umup@@ anga inshuro zigera kuri eshatu ashaka kumut@@ ema, akaba yifuza ko uwo mugabo nibura y@@ ajyanwa ahantu akah@@ amara nk'@@ umwaka at@@ anywa inzoga n'@@ itabi kuko ari byo bimutera kugira imyitwarire mibi. Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'@@ akagari ka B@@ umba, Tuyishimire Marc@@ el, na we yemeza ko uwo mugabo ad@@ ashobots@@ e. Ati "@@ asanzwe ari umuntu wat@@ un@@ aniye, urugomo rwe rur@@ asanzwe, kandi iyo abonye ibintu bikomeye, aryama hasi akih@@ w@@ erez@@ a." Tuyishimire avuga ko bafite amakuru yuko Nt@@ amug@@ ab@@ umwe anywa urumogi usibye ko atar@@ afatwa ar@@ ufite cyangwa ari kur@@ uny@@ wa. Mu rwego rwo kurushaho kwicungira umutekano, muri ako kagari ngo hari ingamba zafashwe zirimo kubahiriza amasaha y'@@ utubari kuko bamwe bateza umutekano mucye biturutse ku bus@@ inzi. Indi ngamba ya kabiri ngo ni ukug@@ enzura abantu bavugwaho kunywa ibiyobyabwenge kugira ngo niba@@ bifat@@ anwa bah@@ anwe hakurikijwe amategeko. Mal@@ achie Hakizimana
Ba rwiyemezamirimo bo muri L@@ iba@@ n bagiye kuza mu Rwanda kureba amahirwe y’@@ ishoramari Ba rwiyemezamirimo bakomeye muri L@@ iba@@ n bar@@ ateganya kuza gusura u Rwanda mu mpera z’uyu mwaka, aho bazaba baje kureba aho bashobora gushora imari yabo mu gihugu cya Afurika gifite ubukungu bukomeje kwihuta cyane. Ku itariki ya 8 Gicurasi 2017, nibwo Umuyobozi w’@@ Urugaga rw’@@ abakora mu bucuruzi, inganda n’ubuhinzi muri L@@ iba@@ n (F@@ CC@@ I@@ AL@@ ), Mohamed Cho@@ uc@@ a@@ ir yatangaje ko bifuza gusura u Rwanda. Hari mu muhango wo gusoza inama ku bucuruzi n’ishoramari mu Rwanda, yaberaga ku cyicaro cya FC@@ CI@@ AL mu mujyi wa Be@@ ir@@ ut muri Lib@@ an. Cho@@ uc@@ ar yavuze ko yifuza kubona ubucuruzi hagati y’ibihugu byombi bw@@ iyongera, kuko umwaka ushize Abanya-@@ L@@ iba@@ n b@@ ohereje mu Rwanda ibintu bifite agaciro k’ibihumbi 28@@ 1 by’@@ amadolari, ariko ntibagire ikintu na kimwe bah@@ ak@@ ura. Yavuze ko kandi ari we uzar@@ angaza imbere itsinda riz@@ asura u Rwanda hagati ya 8-1@@ 1 Ukwakira 2017. Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Lib@@ an, Williams Nkurunziza yagaragaje ko igihugu cy@@ iteguye kwakira ubucuruzi, kandi ko kuba ubukungu bwacyo busa n’aho bukiri bushya, bituma haba amahitamo ya mbere kuri ba rwiyemezamirimo bifuza gushinga imizi muri Afurika. Yan@@ abas@@ oba@@ uriye kandi ku bijyanye no gukora ubucuruzi mu Rwanda, kugura ubutaka, gusubiza umutungo wabo aho bakomoka n’ibindi birimo abakozi n’andi mahirwe atangwa binyuze muri gahunda yo guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu gihugu izwi nka ‘ Made in Rwanda@@ ’. Mu bigo byagaragaje inyota yo kuba byash@@ ora imari mu Rwanda harimo ibikora ibikoresho byo mu nzu, amar@@ ang@@ i, ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, moto, ib@@ icuruza ibikomoka kuri peteroli n’ibigo by’imari ic@@ iriritse. Iyi nama yari yitabiriwe n’uhagarariye inyungu z’u Rwanda mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati, Tar@@ ek R@@ ag@@ h@@ eb@@ , na ba rwiyemezamirimo bakomeye barimo Umuyobozi w’Ikigo INT@@ ech Invest@@ ments Ltd gikorera mu Rwanda, Hana Hal@@ la@@ j na William Sa@@ ad, umwe mu bashinze Ikigo IS@@ H akaba anak@@ ibereye umuyobozi mukuru. IS@@ H ni ikigo gifite imin@@ ara y’itumanaho ibihumbi 26 irimo n’iyo mu Rwanda. Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Lib@@ an, Williams Nkurunz@@ iz@@ a(@@ ibumoso) yagaragaje ko igihugu cy@@ iteguye kwakira ubucuruzi Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Lib@@ an, Williams Nkurunziza atanga impano y'@@ ishusho y'@@ ingagi nka kimwe mu bikurura ba mukerarugendo mu Rwanda [email protected]
Ass@@ umpta Mug@@ anwa agiye kumurika album y’@@ amashusho Umuhanzikazi Ass@@ umpta Mug@@ anwa uririmba indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana akomeje imyiteguro ikomeye yo kur@@ umur@@ ika Album y’indirimbo z’@@ amashusho. Ni igitaramo az@@ afash@@ wamo n’abandi bahanzi nka Aline Gahong@@ ayire, T@@ onzi, Arsene Tuy@@ i na Brian Bless@@ ed. Ni igitaramo yiswe ‘@@ Sat@@ ura Ijuru Live Concert@@ ’. Iki gitaramo kizabera ku rusengero rwa New Life Bible Church ruherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali , ku Kicukiro mu Kagarama tariki 22 Nyakanga 2018 guhera saa cyenda z’ amany@@ wa. Mu kiganiro na Ass@@ umpta Mug@@ anwa yagiranye na Rwandamag@@ azin@@ e.com yavuze ko ari igitaramo giteg@@ erej@@ wemo guh@@ em@@ buk@@ iramo abantu batandukanye ndetse benshi bakaz@@ at@@ ahana imigisha y’Imana. Yongeyeho ko iki gitaramo gifite insanganyamatsiko iboneka muri Yesaya 6@@ 4:@@ 1-1@@ 1 H@@ agira hati " Icy@@ ampa ugas@@ atura ijuru uk@@ aman@@ uka, imisozi igat@@ eng@@ ukira imbere yawe nk’uko umuriro utw@@ ika iny@@ ayu uk@@ atuza amazi, kugira ngo izina ryawe rim@@ enyekane mu banzi bawe, amahanga agah@@ indira im@@ ishy@@ itsi imbere ya@@ we." Kwinjira muri iki gitaramo ni ibihumbi bitanu ug@@ ahabwa DVD , ibihumbi bitatu ku bantu babiri ndetse n’ibihumbi bibiri ahasigaye hose. Ass@@ umpta azwi cyane mu ndirimbo ye Sat@@ ura, Tumus@@ i@@ inze n’iz@@ ind@@ i.@@ Az@@ wi cyane kandi mu biganiro bya Pos@@ it@@ ive Th@@ ink@@ ing. Avuga ko impano ye akeka ko ay@@ ikom@@ ora mu muryango kuko na ‘@@ m@@ aman@@ ’ we umubyara ari umuririmby@@ i. Yar@@ irimbye muri Sing@@ iza, Del@@ iver@@ ance Chur@@ ch, Assemb@@ l@@ ée de Dieu y’i Butare, kuri ubu akaba ari umwe mu baririmbyi bayobora abandi mu kuramya no guhimbaza Imana muri New Life Bible Church iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali, mu Kagar@@ ama, mu Karere ka Kicukiro. Ni umwe mu bagize itsinda ry’@@ abah@@ anzikazi 11 bo muri ‘G@@ osp@@ el@@ ’ bishyize hamwe ryitwa ’ All In One Gospel Lad@@ i@@ es@@ ’. Ni itsinda na Ass@@ umpta abar@@ izwamo. Ubuhamya bwa Mukabalisa n’uburyo ababyeyi n’abavandimwe be bishwe urw’@@ agashinyaguro Nitwa Immaculee Mukabalisa Sh@@ ema, n@@ avutse mu mwaka w’@@ 198@@ 7, mv@@ uka mu cyahoze ari komini Kig@@ om@@ a; ubu ni mu murenge wa Muk@@ ingo mu karere ka Nyanza, gusa ubu mba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ababyeyi banjye ni KAG@@ ERUKA Aphrod@@ ice (M@@ war@@ im@@ u) na Mukak@@ izima Ev@@ ast@@ e. Iwacu tw@@ avutse turi abana 7, nkaba ari nanjye wari mut@@ oya. Ndibuka ko Inkotanyi ziza mu Rwanda njye nari i Kigali kwa mukuru wanjye, tujya ku muhanda aho imodoka (@@ bus@@ ) zany@@ uraga zigiye muri CN@@ D (@@ ahakorera Inteko Ishinga Am@@ ategek@@ o) ariko iwabo wa mama bose bari barah@@ ungiye i Bugande cy@@ era. Ubwo bidatinze nar@@ at@@ ashye, ngeze iwacu mucy@@ aro hari murumuna wa mama witwaga Oliv@@ e, yaje kudus@@ ura aturutse i Bugande ariko baram@@ ufunga tumub@@ ona hashize iminsi gusa sinzi aho yari afungiye ariko muri icyo gihe iwacu bajyaga baza kudus@@ aka imbunda n’iby@@ itso bavuga ko boherejwe n’uwari bur@@ ugum@@ estre wa Kig@@ oma. Jenoside ijya gutangira rero nar@@ aby@@ utse mu git@@ ongo nsanga papa na mama n’abo tuv@@ ukana (B@@ ane nanjye wa 5 kuko 2 bari barash@@ ats@@ e) bar@@ icaye ari mugitondo bose barimo kumva rad@@ iyo, ariko nk’umwana njye sinari nzi ibyo ar@@ ibyo. Ni uko mukuru wanjye witwaga Mig@@ none ni we wam@@ bwiye ati “@@ intambara igiye gutera Perezida yapf@@ uye@@ ”. Ubwo uwo munsi tw@@ iriwe aho ariko mbona iwacu byahind@@ utse, bigeze ku mugoroba tujya kurara mu mas@@ aka twumva imbwa zir@@ ara zim@@ oka ariko bw@@ enda gu@@ cya tur@@ at@@ aha. Musaza wanjye na mukuru wanjye bigaga mu mashuri yisumbuye nibo bakuru twari dus@@ igar@@ anye, sinzi aho bab@@ ohereje muri icyo gihe. Papa we yakomezaga yumva amakuru kuri rad@@ iyo, byabaye iminsi tw@@ irirwa mu rugo tuk@@ arara mu mas@@ aka. Bid@@ at@@ inze, ndibuka ko nasanze mama ari mu muryango arimo kurira kuko abav@@ aga i Kigali bahunze bazanye amakuru ko mukuru wanjye bamut@@ aye muri Nyabarongo n’umugabo we n’umwana bahunga baza iwacu, bakavuga ko undi mukuru wanjye wari utw@@ it bishe umugabo we hanyuma uwo mukuru wanjye bakamus@@ atura ngo kuko yari atwite Iny@@ enzi. Mama yari afite agahinda kenshi gusa mukuru wanjye tw@@ akurikir@@ anaga ni we wam@@ bwiye ibyo byose, mubaza impamvu bab@@ ishe ans@@ obanurira ko intambara yateye ko abahutu barimo kwica abatutsi, njye sinari nzi umuhutu cyangwa umututsi kuko njye n’aho nigaga ntawab@@ im@@ bajije kuko papa yari umwarimu buriya bari babizi niyo mpamvu bat@@ abim@@ baj@@ ije. Ubwo rero ibintu byabaye bibi batangira gusahura amazu, baras@@ enya, inka batangira kuz@@ irya ariko mama wanjye ku ikubitiro bahise bamw@@ ica bamuk@@ uye aho yari yih@@ ishe, gusa ikintu k@@ inkom@@ eretsa umutima ni uburyo mama bamw@@ ishe bamw@@ ambuye ubusa bamutera igis@@ ongo mu nda ibyara bamur@@ ambika mu muhanda kandi ari umubyeyi. Ubwo twe aho twari tw@@ ihishe na papa n’abo tuva inda imwe, amakuru twaray@@ amenye ariko papa at@@ ubuza kurira gusa icyo yakoze amafaranga yari afite yahise ay@@ aduha aray@@ atug@@ abanya ariko ngirango yadus@@ ezer@@ agaho atubwira ko uzajya kutw@@ ica tuzay@@ amuha gusa sin@@ akubwira ngo yari angahe s@@ iny@@ ib@@ uka. Ubwo aho twari turi twahise tuh@@ ava papa aravuga ngo tujye gupfira aho abandi bari, tujya ku musozi wari hakurya y’@@ iwacu ariko twar@@ ebaga ibibera ku musozi w’@@ iwacu. Twari abantu benshi tw@@ icaye inyuma y’@@ urub@@ ingo. Ubwo interahamwe z@@ amenye aho abantu bari, ni uko twagiye kubona tubona zirimo zir@@ amanuka ziza ku musozi twar@@ iho, umugabo witwa Mun@@ yab@@ uranga niwe wari uz@@ iri imbere n’ubu ifoto ye ( yambaye imyenda y’@@ ama tra@@ in@@ ing ya or@@ ang@@ e) mpora ny@@ ibona kuko yari umuturanyi wacu. Ubwo twagerageje kwiruka gusa papa we yar@@ ajij@@ ishije yinjira mu kabari ariko sinzi uw@@ abat@@ ungiye agatoki bamus@@ oh@@ oyemo baramut@@ em@@ agura bagenda bazi ko yapfuye, icyo gihe hapfuye abantu benshi cyane. Twe rero twir@@ ukaga tutazi n’iyo tuj@@ ya, nkanjye n@@ akurikir@@ aga bakuru banjye babiri twari kumwe ariko iby’@@ abana nyine tw@@ aragarutse tujya kureba papa dus@@ ubira iwacu dusanga papa bamut@@ em@@ aguye avir@@ irana amaraso, ubwo bafashe ikanzu nari nambaye bahita bay@@ im@@ uz@@ irika mu mutwe dus@@ ubira mu mat@@ ongo. Nih@@ use rero tw@@ asubiye mu mat@@ ongo, icyo gihe bavugaga ko abagore n’abakobwa batazongera kub@@ ica, ubwo hari ba mas@@ enge babiri twari kumwe bageragezaga guk@@ anda papa bam@@ uvura bya Kinyarwanda, bidatinze rero amakuru yaram@@ enyekanye ko papa akiriho, maze bar@@ agaruka baramut@@ em@@ agura kuko ataby@@ ukaga rero batem@@ aga nk’abat@@ ema igit@@ i, uko bamut@@ ema agat@@ aka bigeze aho rero gutaka byar@@ ahagaze, twumvaga bavuga ko at@@ akin@@ yag@@ ambura bahita bag@@ enda. Aho twari tw@@ icaye rero amarira yari yar@@ akam@@ ye ahubwo twar@@ irimbaga indirimbo z’@@ Imana. Bak@@ igenda mukuru wanjye Mig@@ none (@@ wigaga mu mwaka wa 5 w’amashuri abanz@@ a), ni nawe wari mukuru tw@@ asaga n’aho dus@@ igar@@ anye, aragenda na mas@@ enge witwaga Ev@@ el@@ iyana barebye papa batubwira ko akiri muzima, mu byukuri ntiyag@@ aragaraga mu maso ahantu hose yari amaraso kandi ntiy@@ an@@ avugaga yewe n’umus@@ ambi yari aryam@@ yeho wari amaraso gusa, n’ibik@@ uta byari byat@@ aruk@@ iyeho amaraso kubera uburyo bamut@@ em@@ aga. Gusa ba mas@@ enge bagerageje kum@@ urw@@ anaho yewe bamus@@ ab@@ iraga mu baturanyi inyama z’@@ inka z@@ abatutsi babaga bat@@ emye bagat@@ og@@ osa inyama bakamus@@ uka is@@ up@@ u muk@@ anwa arongera arah@@ emb@@ uka ntiy@@ avugaga ariko yameny@@ aga umuntu. Inshuro ya 3 ho baje ari simusiga n’@@ umujinya mwinshi noneho bafata ish@@ oka bah@@ ereza umugabo twari duturanye w’@@ umututsi we bari baramur@@ etse bavuga ko az@@ ipf@@ usha, maze bati “N@@ ut@@ amwica nawe tur@@ akw@@ ic@@ ”. Yari umugabo un@@ anutse cyane kandi mur@@ emur@@ e, yat@@ eruye ish@@ oka y@@ ikub@@ itana nayo hasi, ni uko bafata ya sh@@ oka umutwe baraw@@ asa nk’@@ abas@@ a inkw@@ i, bamus@@ ize yabaye amagufwa gusa kuko nta n’ubwo noneho w@@ abashaga kubona ko ari umuntu ahubwo ba mas@@ enge abo na Mig@@ none wabaye mag@@ orwa ari umwana nibo baz@@ inze ikir@@ ago bari bamw@@ ashir@@ ijeho njye na mukuru wanjye wundi bah@@ imbaga Mb@@ eget@@ i twar@@ arir@@ aga, data yarat@@ em@@ we, aras@@ wa, ar@@ akubitwa gusa Imana iba@@ babar@@ ire. Ubwo twabaye imfubyi gutyo na musaza wacu aho yari yihishe baje kumw@@ ic@@ a; abagore n’abakobwa twese bad@@ ushyize hamwe batubwira ko tugomba kujya kwitaba kuri komine Kigoma tugenda tuny@@ ura ku mirambo y’abantu, ukumva baravuze bati ni kan@@ aka. Njye abenshi sinari m@@ bazi gusa amazina naray@@ umv@@ aga. Tw@@ ageze kuri kom@@ ine, abas@@ ir@@ irikare n’abapolisi batangira kubohoza (@@ gusamb@@ any@@ a) abagore n’abakobwa twabaga turi kumwe bagenda bakuramo umwe agenda akongera ak@@ agaruka, twar@@ ah@@ iriwe ku mugoroba bati mus@@ ubire iyo mw@@ atur@@ utse. Ubwo twar@@ atashye ariko tuh@@ ageze bad@@ ushyira ahantu hamwe, ni uko interahamwe yitwaga Gah@@ ind@@ ig@@ iri iraza ifite ama grenade itangira kubaza aho mukuru wacu yagiye (@@ umwe iwacu b@@ ohereje intambara igitangira akajya ku nshuti y’@@ iwacu@@ ) tum@@ ubwira ko tut@@ ah@@ azi akavuga ko nta kintu bakoze ko agiye kut@@ wic@@ ira mu ishyamba ry@@ uwitwa Kar@@ amb@@ izi. Bar@@ adush@@ oreye ariko dutanga amafaranga bar@@ atur@@ ekura n’abo ba mas@@ enge. Icyo gihe abakobwa n’abagore barab@@ oh@@ ozwaga (@@ bak@@ abajyana kubas@@ ambany@@ a) bamwe bak@@ abatera amac@@ umu mubir@@ enge, n’izo mbabazi wumva kwari ukub@@ ica urw’@@ agashinyaguro gusa. Ku kandi gasozi duturanye abagore n’abakobwa bari babat@@ aye mu mis@@ arane bam@@ aramo n’iminsi bamwe batar@@ ashiramo umwuka baririm@@ ba. Muri icyo gihe rero njye amatariki s@@ iny@@ ibuka ariko hari hac@@ iyeho iminsi. Ubwo umunsi wo kutw@@ ica warag@@ eze rero, ni uko twese abagore n’abakobwa ari ninjoro ngirango hari nka saa moya cyangwa saa m@@ biri, bar@@ adush@@ orera twese batw@@ icaza hirya y’@@ iwacu gatoya batangira kujya m@@ ungo basaba amat@@ oro@@ shi n’imih@@ oro, baba bar@@ adush@@ oreye bamwe imbere abandi inyuma natwe turi hagati ariko njye mbwira bakuru banjye babiri twari kumwe nti muze twir@@ uke kuko nabonaga bad@@ utwaye mu ishyamba kandi ari ninj@@ oro, nuko bati tur@@ atanga amafaranga kuko n’ubundi byajyaga bibaho bak@@ adush@@ orera mug@@ atanga ayo mufite bakabar@@ ekura muk@@ agenda ariko byabaga kum@@ anywa. Ni uko njye nkomeza kubabwira ariko njye numvaga mfite ubwoba bw’@@ iryo sh@@ yamba. Nagiye inyuma y’@@ igishy@@ itsi nk’@@ ugiye kun@@ yara, nari gatoya rero ngirango ntiba@@ mbonye bar@@ akomeje umurongo wose ur@@ arangira bageze imbere gatoya bahise bab@@ icira aho batangira gutaka mb@@ umva, umukobwa umwe witwaga Ven@@ ant@@ ie niwe wah@@ ar@@ okotse bamuha imbabazi ariko nawe bari bar@@ amug@@ ize ikim@@ uga kubera kwirirwa bamus@@ ambanya byan@@ am@@ uviriyemo gupfa nyuma ya Jenoside. Gusa ni Imana iba ifite umugambi wayo ku muntu, nanjye rwose ni yo y@@ aban@@ kij@@ ije kuko mugitondo n@@ asubiye kureba aho bab@@ iciye numva ijwi rya Mig@@ none ataka ngo bam@@ uhe amazi barimo babat@@ aba mu byobo ariko we bamut@@ aba itaka ryose rig@@ ahita rim@@ uv@@ aho kuko yarah@@ um@@ ek@@ ega cyane asaba amazi, bam@@ ukubise ip@@ iki mu mutwe mv@@ uza induru muri iryo shyamba baba bar@@ anyir@@ uk@@ ank@@ anye, mu kwiruka rero nahuye n’umusore ar@@ ant@@ angira, ni umusore wari uzi iwacu, icyo gihe igitero cyari kiny@@ iruk@@ ank@@ anye n@@ agendaga ntazi iyo njya maze uwo mug@@ iraneza ati: “Nt@@ uri umwana wo kwa mwar@@ im@@ u@@ ?” Nd@@ amw@@ ikiriza maze ati ng@@ w@@ ino, anjyana mu nzu maze abany@@ iruk@@ ank@@ agaho ntiba@@ menya aho nd@@ eng@@ eye. Kubera kudas@@ inzira, nahise ns@@ inzira n’ibig@@ ori by@@ ok@@ eje yampaye sin@@ abir@@ iye. N@@ akang@@ utse barimo bat@@ ukana ngo nav@@ ane iny@@ enzi mu rugo, yatangiye k@@ njya anjyana ku mar@@ ondo akan@@ twara anz@@ ingiye mu mus@@ ambi akand@@ aza mu bishy@@ imbo cyangwa munzu ya mukuru we yari itar@@ uzura yari aho hafi y’@@ ir@@ ondo, aho yany@@ itayeho Imana imuhe iruhuko rid@@ ashira yitwaga F@@ ere@@ siy@@ ani. B@@ yaranze abantu baza kubimenya anjyana ku rundi rugo rwa se kuko se yari afite abagore babiri, naho bar@@ anyir@@ ukana ansh@@ yira undi mugenzi we naho nah@@ abaye iminsi naho baza kun@@ yirukana uwo mug@@ enz@@ iwe adahari ntangira kuz@@ erera gutyo ntazi iyo mva ariko kuko hagati aho twigeze kujyana iwacu kuzana imyenda mu babis@@ ahuye kuko nta myenda nari mfite uretse iyo nari nam@@ ba@@ ye; inzira tw@@ anyuze naray@@ ibuk@@ aga nd@@ agenda ariko n@@ enda kuhagera mpura n’umugore wa Kan@@ iz@@ iyo, yari n’inshuti ya mama amb@@ onye ararira cyane ati “@@ Koko ubu ur@@ ajya heh@@ e?@@ . Bir@@ irwa bag@@ ushakisha bar@@ akub@@ uze none uriz@@ anye@@ ?@@ ”. Ubwo y@@ anj@@ yanye mu nzu, imvura yahise igwa ari nyinshi, bamb@@ era abantu beza kuko b@@ anj@@ yanye muri iyo mvura bampa ik@@ ote ry’@@ umuhungu wabo, umugabo we aran@@ twara n’amaguru anjyana ku wundi musozi duturanye ku muntu wari inshuti na pap@@ a. Niho inkotanyi z@@ ans@@ anze gusa Jenoside irangiye nza guhura n’abavandimwe banjye basig@@ aye, kuri ubu dusigaye turi batatu gusa Imana yang@@ iriye neza ir@@ and@@ okora ni ubuntu y@@ angir@@ iye. Ndah@@ umuriza imfubyi zose nz@@ ibutsa ko Yesu ari we se w’@@ impf@@ uby@@ i. Jenoside irangiye ubuzima bwabaye bubi ariko Imana yagiye ibid@@ ut@@ amb@@ uts@@ amo ir@@ ad@@ ukomeza ir@@ atw@@ ubakira kandi iran@@ atw@@ ubaka yag@@ erets@@ eho no kuduha abana. Imana yamb@@ ereye umubyeyi iram@@ fasha nd@@ iga, ing@@ irira ubuntu injyana kwiga no muri Amerika Kaminuza nday@@ irangiza. Ubu nd@@ ubatse mfite umugabo n’abana babiri, n’ubwo abana banjye batagira nyirakuru cyangwa sekuru ariko tur@@ abyara inshuti n’abavandimwe bak@@ aduh@@ emba. Ikindi nshimira Imana ni uko yansh@@ obo@@ je abo tw@@ anyuranye m@@ ur iyo nzira y’umusaraba nk@@ abashy@@ ing@@ ura, imva yabo nabashije kuy@@ ubak@@ isha no kuyis@@ ukura mu bushobozi bwanjye bucy@@ e, ndumva h@@ ashyinguye 64 ni bo babasha kwib@@ ukwa abandi ntaw@@ ub@@ ibuka ariko numva bavuga ko bashobora kuba bar@@ enga. Ibyo mb@@ ishimira Imana cyane ko n’aho baruh@@ ukiye njye w@@ abav@@ uyemo ng@@ asigara ariko nt@@ abat@@ ereranye ababikoze njye nar@@ ababar@@ iye n’ Imana ibabar@@ ire ariko kandi rero ntabwo nibag@@ iwe.
Umunyamakuru Ntaw@@ uy@@ irush@@ amaboko ar@@ ishing@@ anisha nyuma yo gut@@ ukirwa mu biro na Gitifu Umunyamakuru wa Radio One na TV1 Ntaw@@ uy@@ irush@@ am@@ aba@@ ko Celestin, yatangaje ko afite impungenge z’umutekano we kubera amagambo yabwiwe n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa R@@ unda, mu Karere ka Kamonyi. Aganira na Makuruk@@ i, Ntaw@@ uy@@ irush@@ amaboko yavuze ko byatangiye ubwo yari agiye gutara inkuru y’@@ umug@@ ambo wat@@ emwe na mugenzi we akam@@ uca ukuboko muri uwo murenge. Ubwo Ntaw@@ uy@@ irush@@ amaboko hamwe n’umufasha gufata amashusho (c@@ amer@@ aman@@ ) bageraga muri R@@ unda, ngo babanje kujya aho umuturage yat@@ emewe ngo babanze bavug@@ ane n’abaturage. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe kuri uwo mugabo wo mu Bwongereza, bwerekanye ko afite virusi itera SIDA mu 2003, atangira gufata imiti igabanya ubukana kuva mu 2012. Muri uwo mwaka kandi, yaje gusuzumwa basanga arwaye kanseri y’amaraso ‘@@ Ly@@ mp@@ h@@ om@@ a’. Mu 2016, yahawe ut@@ uny@@ angingo tw@@ atanzwe n’abantu batajya bandura virusi itera SIDA, dore ko ari abantu bake cyane bafite utwo tuny@@ angingo. Ni ukuvuga ko ari umuntu umwe ku ijana by’abaturage batuye isi bose. Nyuma yo gus@@ imbur@@ irwa imis@@ ok@@ oro yo mu maguf@@ a, umurwayi w’i Lond@@ re yagumye ku miti igabanya ubuk@@ ana, mu gihe cy’amezi 16, nyuma ar@@ ayih@@ agarika, kuva ubwo iyo bap@@ im@@ aga bas@@ angaga nta virusi igaragara mu maraso ye. Abo barwayi 59 babonetse mu bipimo 2,@@ 87@@ 1, abamaze kuboneka mu Rwanda banduye icyo cyorezo bose hamwe baba 1,@@ 17@@ 2. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yasobanuye ko abo barwayi bashya 59 barimo 49 babonetse mu kigo kiny@@ urwamo by’igihe gito cya Kigali n’abari mu kato mu Karere ka Kicukiro . Hari kandi batanu (5) babonetse i Rusizi, batatu (3) babonetse i Nyamasheke, i Kirehe habonetse umuntu umwe (1) n’undi umwe (1) wabonetse i Nyagatare. Abantu makumyabiri mu bari barwaye bak@@ ize, abamaze gukira bose hamwe baba 59@@ 5, naho abakir@@ waye ni 57@@ 4. Abamaze kwicwa n’icyo cyorezo mu Rwanda ni batatu. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima isaba abaturarwanda bose gukomeza kwitwararika bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19. Akamaro k’@@ ubuki mu kuvura ndetse no kurinda indwara zifata umutima Muri iki gihe indwara z’umutima ziri guhitana benshi kubera imibereho ya buri munsi iba it@@ ameze neza ,@@ hamwe usanga abantu benshi bafite umubyibuho ukabije badakora imyitozo ngororamubiri ndetse n’ibindi. Ubushakashatsi butandukanye bwagaragaje ko ubuki bw@@ ifitemo ubushobozi bwo kurinda izi ndwara zifata umutima ndetse bukaba bwan@@ afasha mu kuvura zimwe muri izo ndwara. Muri iyi nkuru rero tugiye kubagezaho byinshi utari uzi ku buk@@ i mu kurinda ndetse no kuvura indwara z’@@ umutima. Ibyiza by’@@ ubuki ku mikorere y’umutima wacu 1. Ub@@ uki butuma umutima utera neza Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko un@@ uki bufasha umutima gutera neza,@@ nka ba bantu rero umutima wabo uba utera nabi ni byiza ko yajya byibura arya ku buk@@ i mbere yo kurya. 2. Ub@@ uki bw@@ ongerera imbaraga umutima Burya uko umuntu agenda as@@ az@@ a,@@ umutima ugenda ut@@ akaza imbaraga ukagenda un@@ anir@@ wa,@@ ubuki rero burya ngo ni bwiza mu gutuma umutima wawe ugira imbaraga bityo nt@@ ucike integer ku buryo bworoshye. 3. Ub@@ uki butuma amaraso atembera neza mu mutima Iyo amaraso adat@@ embera neza mu mutim@@ a,@@ umutima nawo nt@@ ubasha gus@@ unika amaraso neza mu mubir@@ i,@@ ibi rero bituma umubiri wose ugira ikibaz@@ o.@@ Ngo ni byiza byibuze kurya ut@@ uy@@ iko 3 tw’@@ ubuki ku munsi kugira ngo wirinde icyo kibazo. 4. Ub@@ uki bug@@ abanya urug@@ imb@@ u mu mutima Iya urug@@ imb@@ u (@@ Ch@@ ol@@ ester@@ ol@@ ) rubaye rwinshi mu mit@@ si y’@@ umutim@@ a,@@ ir@@ ifunga bityo bigatera indwara y’umutima bita c@@ oron@@ ary he@@ art dis@@ eas@@ e,@@ ubuki rero bufasha gusukura iyi mit@@ si yo mu mutim@@ a.@@ Ni byiza gufata byibuze ut@@ uy@@ iko 3 tw’@@ ubuki ku munsi. 5. Ub@@ uki bug@@ abanya ububabare bw’@@ umutima Ku barwaye umutim@@ a,@@ usanga akenshi baba@@ bara mu gatuza mu gice umutima uh@@ erere@@ yem@@ o,@@ iyo urya byibuze hagati y’@@ ut@@ uy@@ iko 3 na 5 tw’@@ ubuki ku munsi birinda uko kubabara k’@@ umutima. Icyitonderwa: Nubwo tumaze kubona ko ubuki ari bwiza ku mikorere y’@@ umutim@@ a,@@ bir@@ abujijwe guha ubuki abana bari hasi y’umwaka 1 kuko bushobora kubatera ikibazo. Wari uzi ko habonetse imiti ikozwe mu bimera irinda ndetse ikan@@ avura indwara zifata umutim@@ a? Nkuko tumaze kubibona hejuru@@ ,@@ ubuki ni bwiza ku mutima wacu@@ ,gusa nanone hari ababa barwaye indwara zitandukanye zifata umutim@@ a.@@ Ubu rero habonetse imiti ikoze mu bimera ivura ndetse ikan@@ arinda indwara zifata umutim@@ a.@@ Muri iyo miti twavugamo Card@@ iop@@ ower Cap@@ sul@@ e, Super Co@@ Q@@ 10 Cap@@ sul@@ e, D@@ ee@@ p se@@ a f@@ ish o@@ il Cap@@ sul@@ e,@@ … Ir@@ izewe kandi nta zindi ngaruka igira ku way@@ ikoresh@@ eje. BK igiye gutanga inyungu ku migabane ingana na miliyari 8.@@ 3 Frw Banki ya Kigali (B@@ K) yatangaje ko igiye gutanga inyungu ku migabane igera kuri miliyari 8,@@ 30@@ 2,@@ 3@@ 47@@ ,000 Frw, ni ukuvuga agera kuri 40% by’@@ inyungu yabonetse mu mwaka ushize. Inyungu ku mugabane umwe mu 2016 ni 12.@@ 3 Frw, aho igice kinini gisigaye cy’@@ inyungu kiz@@ ashyirwa mu ishoramari hagamijwe iterambere rya banki. Kugeza kuwa 31 Ukuboza 2016, BK yungutse miliyari 20.@@ 8 Frw, iyi nyungu ikaba yar@@ azamutse ivuye kuri miliyari 20.@@ 5 yinjiye mu 2015. Kuri uyu wa 5 Gicurasi, ubuyobozi bwa BK bwam@@ enyesheje abanyamigabane mu Nteko Rus@@ ange, ko mu mwaka ushize amafaranga banki yakiriye aturutse mu bak@@ iliya bayo yageze kuri miliyari 4@@ 19.@@ 0 Frw avuye kuri miliyari 38@@ 4.@@ 7@@ Frw mu 2015, ndetse umutungo mbumbe wa Banki ya Kigali ugera kuri miliyari 63@@ 8.@@ 3 Frw uvuye kuri miliyari 56@@ 1.@@ 2 Frw mu 2015. Ing@@ uzanyo yatanze mu mwaka ushize na zo zar@@ azamutse cyane kuko z@@ iyongereyeho 22@@ % ugereranyije n’umwaka w@@ abanj@@ e, kuko zageze kuri miliyari 39@@ 7.@@ 6 Frw, zivuye kuri miliyari 3@@ 24@@ .@@ 8 Frw mu 2015. Umuyobozi w’@@ Icy@@ ubahiro wa B@@ K, Marc Hol@@ t@@ z@@ man, yavuze ko kuba banki imaze imyaka 10 iyoboye izindi, mu bihe biri imbere idashobora kwihanganira ubunebwe cyangwa kud@@ asubiza ibyifuzo by’@@ abak@@ iliy@@ a. Yavuze ko ubutumwa aha abanyamigabane ba Banki ya Kigali iri kwizihiza imyaka 50 ari uko iri kugana ah@@ eza, y@@ itangaho urugero ko yaguze imigabane muri BK ubwo isoko ry@@ afung@@ urwaga mu Ugushyingo 2016, ubwo yag@@ uraga imigabane 7@@ 06@@ ,000 ayig@@ uriye abana be bane bato, yiyongera kuri 11@@ 80 000 yaguze muri Nzeri 2011. Yagize ati “N@@ ag@@ uzemo imigabane kandi s@@ injye gusa n’aba@@ bana nar@@ abag@@ uriye. Ntabwo nigeze ng@@ urisha imigabane yanjye, nta nubwo nt@@ eganya kuyig@@ urisha igihe cyose nkiri muzima, mfite icyizere cy’@@ ahazaza h’@@ iyi bank@@ i.” Yabwiye abanyamigabane ko kuba umugabane w’iyi banki ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane utari kuzamura igiciro (ubu umugabane uri kuri 24@@ 4@@ Frw), ahanini biri guterwa n’uko isoko rihagaze kuko ud@@ asanga hari abantu bagura imigabane umunota ku mun@@ ota, ariko icy’ingenzi ni uko abag@@ uze imigabane bahabwa inyungu yabo kandi hari icyizere ko mu gihe kiri imbere uz@@ az@@ amuka. Umuyobozi wa Banki ya Kigali, Dr Diane Kar@@ us@@ isi, yavuze ko uyu mwaka udasanzwe kuri B@@ K, aho iri kwizihiza imyaka 50 imaze itanga serivisi z’@@ imari, yizeza abanyamigabane ko hari byinshi biteganyijwe mu bihe biri imbere. Yagize ati “Mu 2017 dufite icyizere cyo gukomeza uburyo bw’@@ imari busanzwe, no guhanga udushya muri serivisi n’ibyo dukorera abak@@ iliy@@ a. Mobile Bank@@ ing izafasha byinshi muri uyu mwaka. ” BK ikomeje guhindura uburyo yakor@@ agamo ubucuruzi, nk’aho muri Werurwe 2017 yatangije ikigo BK T@@ ec@@ House kigiye kwita cyane ku iterambere ry’ikoranabuhanga no guhanga ibisubizo bir@@ ishing@@ iyeho. Ni ikigo yatangije nyuma y’iminsi mike hatangiye ikindi gitanga ubw@@ ish@@ ig@@ izi, BK General Ins@@ ur@@ ance, na gahunda yiswe ‘@@ Urumuri Initi@@ ativ@@ e’, aho ibitekerezo bitanu by’indashyikirwa mu ikoranabuhanga biz@@ ahabwa miliyoni 60 Frw. Icyo kigo cy’ubw@@ igish@@ izi cyit@@ ezweho umusaruro ufat@@ ika, kuko imibare yerekana ko abafite ubwishingizi mu Rwanda bagera kuri 3@@ %, byerekana amahirwe akomeye ari kuri iri s@@ oko. Om@@ my D@@ imp@@ oz yafung@@ iwe muri Amerika agirango ari muri hoteli Umuhanzi wo mu gihugu cya Tanzaniya Om@@ my D@@ imp@@ oz yatangaje ko yas@@ oreje umwaka mu gih@@ ome ubwo yari muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika azira gukora igitaramo adafite uburenganzira . Mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2015 nibwo umuhanzi Om@@ my D@@ imp@@ oz yari muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika aho yari yagiye agiye mu biruhuko by'@@ iminsi mik@@ uru. Uyu mugabo ak@@ iger@@ ayo ntiyigeze ag@@ enzwa na kamwe ahubwo yahise yitabira igitaramo nyamara atab@@ yemererwa n'amategeko y'iki gihugu kuko kuri Visa ye hatarimo gukora igitaramo. Om@@ my yavuze ko polisi yo muri Leta Zunze z'Amerika itigeze imw@@ ihanganira kuko ikim@@ enya ko ari gukora ibit@@ aram@@ uzanye yahise imuh@@ agarika ndetse im@@ ujyana kumuf@@ unga. No mu minsi iza tuz@@ ah@@ atana mu mat@@ or@@ a-@@ Umuvugizi wa D@@ AL@@ FA@@ -@@ UMUR@@ INZ@@ I-@@ Video Umuvugizi w’ishyaka D@@ AL@@ FA@@ -@@ UMUR@@ IN@@ ZI rit@@ arem@@ erwa mu Rwanda, Mahoro Jean avuga ko mu ishyaka abereye umuvugizi biteguye gukora hasi no hejuru bak@@ umvisha abanyarwanda ibishy@@ izwe imbere muri iri shyaka birimo Politiki y’amahoro igamije kugirira neza abaturage, yahishuye ko ngo no mu matora ari imbere bazay@@ ahat@@ an@@ amo. Iri shyaka riharanira iterambere n’ubw@@ isanzure kuri bose (D@@ evelop@@ ment and Lib@@ ert@@ y For All@@ ), D@@ AL@@ FA@@ -@@ Umur@@ inzi, Mahoro avug@@ ira, ryashinzwe n’umun@@ ye@@ politiki utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi buriho mu Rwanda, Madamu Ingabire Victoire mu mwaka ushize wa 2019, akaba ari na we ur@@ ibereye umuyobozi. Mahoro Jean uvugira D@@ AL@@ FA@@ -@@ Umur@@ inzi, ni umusore wacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside Y@@ akorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda muri Mata 1994, avuka mu Karere ka Ngororero mu Murenge wa Ngororero nkuko aby@@ ivugira. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’umunyamakuru w’@@ UMUB@@ AV@@ U, Mahoro yatangiye avuga ku bantu usanga bumva nabi ’@@ Op@@ oz@@ is@@ iyo@@ ’ bakay@@ ifata nk’@@ abanzi b’@@ igihugu, nk’iby@@ ihebe cyangwa nk’abantu bagambiriye kugirira nabi igihugu cyabo cyangwa ubutegetsi bur@@ iho, akavuga ko kuri we Op@@ ozisiyo atay@@ ifata nk’@@ ababit@@ ekereza guty@@ a,@@ . Kuri we ati "@@ Op@@ ozisiyo ni uburyo ushobora gut@@ angamo ibitekerezo byawe uko ubibona kubera ko uri ku butegetsi ubona hari ibyo mutari kwem@@ er@@ an@@ waho, noneho wa wundi uri ku butegetsi akaba yabik@@ osora, igihe at@@ abik@@ os@@ oye, wowe uri mu ishyaka riri ku ruhande, hakaba hari igihe cyaz@@ agera kubera bya bitekerezo byawe byiza ufite, abantu bakag@@ ukurikira bakavuga bati ’@@ noneho turabona uri ku butegetsi ad@@ ashoboye, ngwino ut@@ uy@@ obore kuko uriho hari ibyo atabashije kubah@@ ir@@ iza, iyo ni yo Op@@ ozisiyo ub@@ und@@ i’ ". Abajijwe uburyo azah@@ angana n’abantu batumva neza Op@@ ozisiyo icyo ari cyo, Mahoro ati "@@ Bur@@ ya, kugira ngo ibintu bih@@ induk@@ e, ni uko ubanza kubivuga noneho ukan@@ aby@@ umvisha abantu, twe twiteguye gukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo tw@@ umvishe abanyarwanda ko twebwe muri D@@ AL@@ FA@@ -@@ Umur@@ inzi icyo dushyize imbere ari Politiki y’@@ amahoro, igamije kugirira neza abaturage, guha ubwisanzure abantu bose, no kubaka amahoro arambye ndetse no kugeza iterambere ku bantu bose muri rusang@@ e". Avuga ko ngo ibi bazakomeza kubivuga no kub@@ isobanura kandi ngo ikiz@@ ab@@ ibafash@@ amo ni uko muri D@@ AL@@ FA@@ -@@ Umur@@ inzi ibyo baz@@ ashinjwa byose ngo byaba no gutotezwa binyuze mu binyamakuru n’ahandi, baz@@ agerageza kwerekana ko ntaho bahuriye n’ibyo bikorwa, ati "@@ Kandi nta kimenyetso na kimwe kiz@@ agaragaza ko twebwe abantu bo muri D@@ AL@@ FA@@ -@@ Umur@@ inzi tugamije kugirira nabi igihugu cyacu, ingobyi iduh@@ etse@@ ". Mahoro akomeza avuga ku rubyiruko rw@@ irirwa rw@@ ikurikir@@ ira iby’@@ abandi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, akavuga ko ruk@@ wiriye kugira uruhare muri Politiki y’igihugu ngo kuko ibiri gukorwa ubu ari rwo bizag@@ iraho ingaruka. Atanga urugero ku kuba muri 1994, urubyiruko rwinshi rw’@@ icyo gihe arirwo rw@@ ij@@ anditse muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Akavuga ko uru rubyiruko rw’@@ iki gihe iyo ruza guhaguruka ruk@@ anga iby@@ abaga, bitari gushyirwa mu bikorwa, ati "@@ Urubyiruko ruh@@ agurukiye hamwe rug@@ akora ibyiza, rug@@ atanga umusanzu warwo mu kubaka Politiki nziza y’igihugu, byat@@ anga umusaruro mwiza kuri ejo hazaza ndetse n’ub@@ ung@@ ubu muri rusang@@ e". Abajijwe ku bitagenda ku rubyiruko rw’@@ ubu, agaruka ku kuba urubyiruko rut@@ inya cyane Politiki ruvuga ko itar@@ ur@@ eba, ugasanga ngo rw@@ iha umupaka ruvuga ko hari ibit@@ arur@@ eba, ngo rukwiye gutinyuka ndetse ruk@@ umva ko rush@@ oboye. Dal@@ las C@@ ow@@ boy@@ s yah@@ igitse Real Madrid ku rutonde rw'@@ amakipe akize ku Isi Yanditswe kuya 14@@ -07-@@ 2016 saa 12@@ :3@@ 3@@ ' na Manzi Rema Jules Real Madrid yo muri Espagne yari imaze imyaka itatu iyoboye urutonde rw'@@ amakipe akize ku Isi mu mikino yose yamaze kuva kuri uyu mwanya ufatwa n'ikipe ya Dal@@ las C@@ ow@@ boy@@ s yo muri Amerika, Arsenal ica agahigo nk'@@ ikipe yazamutse mu bukungu kurusha izindi. Ku rutonde ruk@@ orwa n'ikinyamakuru Forbes Magazine rugaragaza uko amakipe akurikirana mu kugira amafaranga menshi ku Isi, ikipe ikina muri shampiyona ya Amerika (National Football League, N@@ FL@@ ), Dal@@ las C@@ ow@@ boy@@ s yaciye agahigo ko gufata umwanya wa mbere n'agaciro ka miliyari 4 z'amadolari ya Amerika. Dal@@ las C@@ ow@@ boy@@ s ibaye ikipe ya mbere itari iy'@@ umupira w'amaguru iyoboye urutonde rw'@@ amakipe akize ku Isi kuva muri 2011. Real Madrid ifite ibikombe 11 bya Champions League, ndetse ikaba yarat@@ waye bibiri mu myaka itatu iheruka, yaje ku mwanya wa kabiri n'agaciro ka miliyari 3.@@ 65 z'@@ amadorali ya Amerika. Umwanya wa gatatu uriho FC Barcelona ifite agaciro ka miliy@@ ali 3.@@ 55 z'amadolari ya Amerika. Ikipe ya Arsenal niyo yazamutse cyane kuri uru rutonde iva ku mwanya wa 36 igera kuri 23 n'agaciro ka miliy@@ ali 2.@@ 02 z'amadolari ya Amerika. Amakipe atatu ya mbere ku Isi nk'uko Forbes yabitangaje ni: 1. Dal@@ las C@@ ow@@ boy@@ s yari ku mwanya wa kabiri mu 2015, ifite agaciro ka miliyari 4 z'@@ amadolari. 2. Real Madrid yari ku mwanya wa mbere mu 2015, ifite agaciro ka miliyari 3.@@ 65 z'@@ amador@@ ali. 3. Barcelona yari ku mwanya wa kane mu 2015, ifite miliy@@ ali 3.@@ 55 z'amadolari ya Amerika. Dal@@ las C@@ ow@@ boy@@ s yah@@ igitse Real Madrid ihita ifata umwanya wa mbere Real Madrid iheruka gutwara Champions League, bwa mbere nyuma y'imyaka itatu yakuwe ku mwanya wa mbere ku rutonde rw'@@ amakipe akize ku Isi FC Barcelone iri ku mwanya wa gatatu mu makipe yib@@ itseho agatubutse Manchester United yo mu Bwongereza iri ku mwanya wa gatanu Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

M@@ fata kimwe abahungu n'umukobwa banjye@@ -@@ Perezida Kagame Mu kiganiro ku guteza imbere igitsina gore cyar@@ aye kibaye muri gahunda y'inama mpuzamahanga ngarukamwaka yiga ku bibazo Isi ifite izwi nka '@@ Mil@@ k@@ en Institute Global Confer@@ enc@@ e', Perezida Paul Kagame yitabiriye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yavuze ko kuringaniza ibitsina byombi aribyo shingiro ry'@@ iterambere ryih@@ use igihugu kirimo kugeraho. Muri iki kiganiro cyari kitabiriwe n'abantu bany@@ uranye, bas@@ uz@@ umira hamwe uko igitsina gore ku Isi cy@@ ahabwa agaciro n'amahirwe ang@@ ina n'ay'@@ abagabo, Perezida Kagame yari nk'@@ inararibonye kuko ubu u Rwanda aricyo gihugu cya mbere ku Isi gifite abagore benshi mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko (6@@ 4@@ %@@ ), ndetse no mu zindi nzego zifata ibyemezo. Perezida Kagame yavuze ko nta kuntu igihugu nk'@@ u Rwanda gifite abagore 5@@ 2% by'abaturage bose cyakw@@ irengagiza abo bakobwa n'ababyeyi mu igenamigambi ry@@ acyo. Uretse ibyo kandi, yanavuze ko amateka n'ibibazo u Rwanda rw@@ anyuzemo byar@@ w@@ igishije amasomo menshi arimo no guha agaciro, kuringaniza no guha amahirwe angana abantu, no gufata Abany@@ ar@@ a@@ wanda bose kimwe, abagore n'abag@@ abo. Kagame yavuze ko Abagore n'abagabo b'u Rwanda, bombi bahuye n'ibibazo kandi bombi bagize ndetse barimo kugira uruhare mu kongera kubaka igihugu. Ati "@@ Igihugu ni icy@@ acu twese tugomba k@@ us@@ angira amahirwe gifite mu buryo b@@ ungan@@ a…@@ Umubyeyi nkanjye w'@@ abahungu batatu n'umukobwa umwe, nta kuntu n@@ afata umwanya wo kwiga uko n@@ afata umwana umwe binyuranye n'uko mfata undi kandi bose ari abana b@@ anjye. Niba mbibona gutya kandi ntekereza ko ariko n'Abanyarwanda babon@@ a/@@ bafata imiryango yabo, ari nayo mpamvu tw@@ ashyize ubushobozi mu baturage bacu, abagabo n'abagore mu buryo b@@ ungan@@ a." Gusa, Perezida yavuze ko iby'@@ uburinganire bw'@@ ibitsina byombi bit@@ apfuye kwiz@@ ana gutyo kuko byabaye ngombwa ko habanza guhindurwa imyumvire y'@@ abantu, kuko Abanyarwandakazi bari bag@@ ihura n'ibibazo byinshi kimwe n'ahandi hose ku Isi. Abaj@@ ije akamaro u Rwanda rwak@@ uye mu kuringaniza ibitsina byombi, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko kuba mu myaka 12 ishize u Rwanda rw@@ aragize umuvuduko w'@@ ubukungu uri hagati ya 7% n'@@ 8@@ %, ari ukubera ko impande zombi zit@@ anze kandi zikorera hamwe mu kuzamura igihugu cyabo. Avuga kandi ko kuba abagore n'abakobwa basigaye bajya mu mashuri, bakaba bari no mu nzego zose zifata ibyemezo bituma abagore bad@@ asigara inyuma muri gahunda zose. Mu Rwanda ubu umugore ntaho agih@@ ezwa, kimwe n'uko nta murimo bagik@@ um@@ irirwa gukora gusa urugamba rwo kubaz@@ amura rur@@ acyari rurerure kuko Banki y'Isi ivuga ko ubushobozi bwabo mu buryo bw'@@ ubukungu bukiri bucye cyane ugereranyije n'abag@@ abo. Gasabo: Imyaka ibaye ine beg@@ erejwe ibigega n'@@ imp@@ ombo bitagira amazi Abaturage batuye mu tugari dutandukanye tw'@@ umurenge wa Nd@@ uba, mu karere ka Gasabo, mu mujyi wa Kigali, bamaze imyaka ine bategereje kuvoma amazi aturutse mu bigega n'@@ imp@@ ombo beg@@ erejwe muri 2012 ariko ngo bakaba bar@@ ategereje amaso ahera mu kirere. Muri 2012 ni bwo mu tugari dutandukanye tugize Umurenge wa Nduba nka Sh@@ ango, Gas@@ anze, Mur@@ emure na Butare hany@@ ujijwe imiyoboro y'amazi ndetse h@@ ashyirwamo amat@@ iyo nyuma n'@@ ibigega bir@@ ubakwa yewe n'@@ amav@@ omo yeg@@ erezwa abaturage ariko ntibab@@ ona amazi. Abatuye muri utu tugari bavuga ko bari bazi ko ikibazo cyo gukoresha no kunywa amazi mabi nayo bavoma kure kigiye gukem@@ uka, nyamara nkuko bamwe mu bo twaganiriye babivuga, ngo bamaze imyaka ine bategereje aya amazi kuri ibyo bikorwa remezo baz@@ aniwe ariko ngo bay@@ obewe amah@@ erezo. Aba baturage bavuga ko aya mazi akimara kuhagera ba@@ yav@@ omye igihe gito cyane agatangira kugaragaza ibibazo birimo guturika kw'@@ amat@@ iyo ayobora amazi ndetse rimwe na rimwe ngo bakan@@ abwirwa ko moteri ikura amazi ku is@@ o@@ oko ngo yagize ikibazo gituma bat@@ av@@ oma. Iki kibazo cya moteri ngo cyagiye kivugwa kenshi ariko abaturage babwirwa ko amashanyarazi nagera muri uyu murenge iki kibazo ngo kiz@@ akemuka burundu, gusa ig@@ ikomeje kubatera urujijo ngo ni uko amashanyarazi yahageze ariko ikibazo nt@@ igik@@ em@@ uke nkuko bari barab@@ ibw@@ iwe. Umwe mu baganiriye na Makuruki.rw utuye mu kagari ka Butare yagize ati: "@@ Aya mazi tuy@@ ategereje imyaka ine yose, twabanje kuv@@ om@@ aho agah@@ e gato, nyuma amat@@ iyo akajya at@@ urika, ubundi bak@@ atubwira ngo moteri ifite ikibazo gusa ikibazo cy'amazi kir@@ aduh@@ angayikishije muri Nd@@ uba@@ ." Undi na we utuye mu kagari ka Sh@@ ango yagize ati: "@@ Bar@@ aje bacukura imiyobor@@ o, bashyiramo amat@@ iyo tubona bubatse ibigega n'@@ amav@@ omo tugira ngo ikibazo cy'amazi kigiye gukem@@ uka, ariko kugeza ubu twav@@ omye iminsi mike none tumaze imyaka ine yose tut@@ abona amaz@@ i." Umuyobozi w'umurenge wa Nduba Bar@@ igye Peter yadutangarije ko ikibazo cy'@@ ingutu cy@@ ahagaritse ikoreshwa ry'@@ ibi bikorwa remezo ngo ari moteri zakoreshejwe zidafite ubushobozi bwo gutanga amazi, maze atubwira ko akarere karimo kubikemura vuba abaturage bakaz@@ abona amazi mu gihe gito. Bar@@ igye yagize ati:@@ "N@@ ibyo ayo mazi yar@@ ahageze koko n'@@ ibigega baraby@@ ubaka ndetse n'abaturage batangira kuvoma ariko haza kubaho ikibazo cyuko moteri yari ifite ubushobozi buke bwo kuzamura amazi kandi ikan@@ akoresha ess@@ ence nyinshi, ariko noneho ubu ngubu aho bigeze akarere k@@ atanze isoko ndumva muri iki cyumweru rwiyemezamirimo yarag@@ ezeyo ubu barimo gushaka uburyo amazi yaz@@ amuka aho mv@@ ugira aha ubu ngubu barimo kubikora moteri ya ess@@ ence ntabwo izongera gukoreshwa haz@@ akoreshwa uburyo bw'@@ amashanyaraz@@ i." Gusa uyu muyobozi avuga ko hari impungenge zuko amat@@ iyo ashobora kuba yar@@ angiritse bitewe n'imyaka ishize at@@ abye mu butaka kandi ad@@ akoresh@@ wa, gusa ngo nihagira aho biboneka ko yangiritse ngo bazay@@ as@@ ana nyuma bitewe n'uko ngo badashobora kubimenya amazi atar@@ az@@ amuka. Ubuyobozi bw'akarere ka Gasabo butangaza ko iki kibazo kirimo gukemurwa kuko nga h@@ oherej@@ weyo imashini (p@@ omp@@ e) ifite ubushobozi bwo kuz@@ azamura amazi ndetse yongeraho ko mu gihe gito cyane aba baturage bazaba bav@@ oma. Stephen Rwam@@ urang@@ wa, umuyobozi w'akarere ka Gasabo yagize ati: "Tw@@ abag@@ uriye p@@ om@@ pe (@@ imashini ikura amazi ku is@@ o@@ oko iy@@ ohereza mu mat@@ iyo@@ ) ifite ubushobozi buh@@ agije, ubundi bag@@ uraga ut@@ w'@@ amafuti tudafite ubushobozi tug@@ ateza ikibazo, iyo p@@ om@@ pe yatwaye miliyoni 15 kuko abaturage bagomba kubona amazi, ahubwo ubundi bagombye kuba baratangiye kuvoma kuko hari har@@ atinze isoko ry'@@ iyo p@@ om@@ pe kandi bambwiye ko yaguzwe ahubwo reka nk@@ urikirane ndebe kuko nta kindi kib@@ ur@@ a." Meya Rwam@@ urangwa yijeje abaturage ko aya mazi agomba kuboneka vuba nubwo na we yagaragaje impungenge zuko amat@@ iyo ashobora kuba yar@@ angiritse ariko akavuga ko no kuyas@@ ana bit@@ atwara igihe kinini. Yanavuze ko hari n'undi mushinga wamaze kwigwa w'@@ amazi azatangwa na WASAC uk@@ azageza amazi mu tugari tut@@ azag@@ erwaho n'aya mazi arimo gukorwa. Jean Paul NIY@@ IT@@ ANGA MAK@@ URUK@@ I.RW
FIFA yategetse FERWAFA kwishyura miliyoni 15@@ 8 Mac@@ kin@@ stry wahoze atoza Amavubi Joh@@ nat@@ han McKinstry yirukanywe kuwa 18 Kanama 2016, nyuma y’umwaka n’amezi atanu yari amaze atoza Amavubi, dore ko yahawe akazi ko kuy@@ atoza mu gihe cy’umwaka umwe kuwa 20 Werurwe 2015, akaza kongererwa amasezerano mu ntangiriro z’umwaka wa 2016. OMS yohereje mu Bushinwa impuguke zo gukora ubushakashatsi ku nkomoko ya Coronavirus Nyuma y’amakuru menshi yagiye avugwa ku bijyanye n’@@ inkomoko ya Coronavirus, Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe kwita ku Buzima (OM@@ S), ry@@ ohereje impuguke mu Bushinwa zigiye gukora ubushakashatsi bugamije kureba niba koko inyamaswa ariyo yabaye intandaro ya Coronavirus n’uburyo yageze mu bantu. Ir@@ itsinda ry’@@ abashakashatsi babiri barimo inzobere mu by’ubuzima bw’@@ inyamaswa n’inzobere mu ndwara z’@@ ibyorezo biteganyijwe ko niz@@ igera mu murwa mukuru w’u Bushinwa, Beij@@ ing, bazafatanya n’inzobere z’iki gihugu bazah@@ as@@ anga. Byitezwe ko iri tsinda rigiye gukora iby’@@ ibanze biz@@ ifashishwa n’irindi tsinda rinini ry’@@ inzobere riz@@ akora ubu bushakashatsi mu buryo bwag@@ utse. Ubwo yatangazaga ibijyanye n’iki cyemezo ku wa 11 Nyakanga, Umuvugizi wa OMS Margaret Harris yavuze ko izi mpuguke zizaba zigiye kureba koko niba ibivugwa ko coronavirus yavuye mu nyamaswa ari byo. Yagize ati “B@@ azaba bagiye kureba niba Coronavirus yaravuye mu nyamaswa ikajya mu bantu n’inyamaswa yaba yar@@ avuyemo cyangwa niba atari by@@ o”. Uretse ibi, izi nzobere ziz@@ an@@ areba niba Coronavirus yarabanje kunyura mu nyamaswa nyinshi mbere y’uko igera mu bantu. N’ubwo nta bushakashatsi bur@@ ab@@ yemeza mu buryo bud@@ ashidikany@@ waho, abahanga muri siyansi bavuga ko Coronavirus ishobora kuba yarat@@ urutse mu d@@ ucur@@ ama ikajya mu zindi nyamaswa z’@@ inyam@@ abere zirimo injangwe n’igis@@ am@@ ujy@@ onj@@ yo mbere yo kugera mu bantu. Uretse abavuga ibi abandi barimo Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta ya Amerika ushinzwe Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Mike P@@ om@@ pe@@ o, bumvikanye bavuga ko yaturutse muri Laboratwari iri muri Wuhan ikorerwamo ubushakashatsi ku ntwaro z’@@ ibiny@@ abut@@ abir@@ e. Ubu bushakashatsi buz@@ asiga ham@@ enywe inkomoko nyayo ya Coronavirus

Indi ntambwe yat@@ ewe, ni uko ubu hari abagiye kuzajya bav@@ urwa iyi ndwara ku buntu.
