Mu nama Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yagiranye n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo batanga umuti wo gutera mu nzu wica imib@@ u, tariki ya 28 Nzeri 2016, niho Dr Aimable M@@ bit@@ uy@@ umurem@@ yi, Umuyobozi wa gahunda zo kurwanya Malaria mu kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima (RB@@ C), yagaragarije ko Malaria ihitana Abanyarwanda 20 buri kwezi.
Ut@@ i “@@ Gut@@ erekera byaturutse h@@ e?” Gut@@ erekera ni umwe mu mihango yerekeye Abantu bazima n’abandi B@@ antu baz@@ imu. Umuntu ut@@ erekera aba agamije kug@@ usha neza abaz@@ im@@ u@@ ( baba abe bapfuye cyangwa se bene wabo w’abandi gusa aha agaciro g@@ akomeye@@ ). Kug@@ usha neza abo baz@@ imu ngo bituma atunga agat@@ ung@@ anirwa kandi ibyo akoze byose bikagenda neza. Tw@@ ifashishije igitabo cya Mus@@ enye@@ li Aloy@@ izi Bigir@@ umwami cyitwa IM@@ IH@@ ANGO N’@@ IM@@ IG@@ ENZ@@ O N’@@ IM@@ IZ@@ IR@@ IR@@ IZO MU RWAND@@ A@@ ; tur@@ abagezaho aho gut@@ erekera byat@@ ur@@ utse. Ngo habayeho abagabo babiri bavaga inda imwe, umwe yitwaga KIB@@ AND@@ A, undi akitwa BAS@@ IND@@ I, bag@@ akundana cyane. Bukeye umuhungu wa BAS@@ INDI n’uwa KIB@@ ANDA bar@@ anywa baras@@ inda barar@@ wana, mwene BAS@@ INDI yica mwene KIB@@ AND@@ A. Nuko BAS@@ INDI ac@@ ikana n’abana be, bajya mu gihugu cya kure cyane bibera iyo ng@@ iyo. Hashize iminsi myinshi BAS@@ INDI ahurira na KIB@@ ANDA mu nzira, aram@@ ufata maze amujyana iwe, agira ngo amw@@ ice, ah@@ orere umwana we. Bageze imuh@@ ira, KIB@@ ANDA ntiyaba akim@@ wak@@ uye, ahubwo amufata neza bigeza aho bas@@ angira. Bimaze kabiri, BAS@@ INDI abwira KIB@@ ANDA ati: ’’@@ Burya twahuye nitw@@ erereza ngo njye gushy@@ ingira umukobwa wanjye, none nd@@ ekura ngend@@ e, njye kum@@ ushying@@ ira, nz@@ agaruka unt@@ eg@@ eke uko ushaka ndangije ibyo@@ ’’. KIB@@ ANDA aremera aram@@ ur@@ ekura ngo ajye gushy@@ ingira umukobwa we ati: "G@@ enda ariko uz@@ agaruke vuba. Tur@@ angize iby@@ acu@@ ". BAS@@ INDI agiye kugar@@ uka, agar@@ ukana na wa muhungu we w@@ ishe, amuz@@ anira se wabo KIB@@ AND@@ A. Nuko BAS@@ INDI abwira KIB@@ ANDA ati: "K@@ IB@@ AND@@ A, dore ng@@ uyu uw@@ akw@@ iciye umwana, ndamuk@@ uzaniye ngo umuh@@ or@@ e". KIB@@ ANDA aram@@ wak@@ ira, amur@@ ekera aho ng@@ aho. Bukeye yeng@@ esha amay@@ oga menshi, at@@ umira ba@@ mwana we, se w’umukobwa wapf@@ ushije umugab@@ o; bamaze gukorana bose, ab’@@ iwabo w’umuk@@ azana we n’inshuti ze zose, KIB@@ ANDA abaha inzoga, abat@@ ekerereza uko umuhungu we yarwanye n’uwa mwene BAS@@ IND@@ I, uwa BAS@@ INDI akica uwe, ababwira uko byagenze kose, n’ukuntu bacitse mu gihugu bagah@@ ungira mu kindi. Ati: "@@ None BAS@@ INDI y@@ anzan@@ iye umuhungu we wishe uw@@ anjye, ngo muh@@ or@@ e." Undi ati: "Ntabwo muh@@ ora, aho kumuh@@ ora kandi na we ari umwana wanjye, nd@@ amuha uriya muk@@ azana wanjye, bombi nari m@@ baby@@ aye@@ ". Nuko ahamagara umuk@@ azana we, ati:"@@ Dore umugabo ng@@ uh@@ aye@@ ". Abari aho bose, bar@@ abim@@ ushimira cyane. KIB@@ ANDA ah@@ amagaza ingwa n’umw@@ ishy@@ wa, ati:"@@ Dore tur@@ uzuye njye na BAS@@ IND@@ I, t@@ ubaye imy@@ ishywa y’@@ imir@@ embe, ntit@@ uzongera kw@@ angana, nta n’ubwo twaby@@ ig@@ ez@@ e". Nuko umw@@ ishywa bar@@ awam@@ bar@@ a. B@@ azana n’@@ ingwa y’@@ in@@ on@@ o, bar@@ ayir@@ eba, bati :@@ "T@@ uran@@ on@@ otse nta nabi, tuz@@ ahorana ineza n’@@ ins@@ eko nziz@@ a". Mbese nk’uko ingwa y’@@ in@@ ono nta kantu kay@@ ibam@@ o, haba n’@@ agat@@ irim@@ wa, ngo na bo ni ko baz@@ ahora bam@@ eze. Impamvu bakoresha umw@@ ishywa mu it@@ erek@@ era, ngo ni uko iyo baw@@ uk@@ uyeho int@@ ar@@ izi, ari zo nz@@ abir@@ izi zawo zifata ib@@ yats@@ i, bamara kuw@@ uz@@ ik@@ iza, ugasanga ari icyatsi cy@@ oroh@@ ereye mu ntoki, wag@@ ikora ntiw@@ umve gik@@ aram@@ ye. Impamvu yo gukoresha umw@@ ishywa n’@@ ingwa y’@@ in@@ on@@ o, ngo ni ukw@@ ibuka uko KIB@@ ANDA na BAS@@ INDI big@@ oro@@ ye, kandi umwe yari yic@@ iye und@@ i; umw@@ ishywa n’@@ ingwa bik@@ abag@@ usha neza, bakongera kuba abavandimwe uko bari bas@@ anzwe. N’@@ ubu iyo bashaka gut@@ erekera umuntu, ngo bamut@@ erek@@ ereza ibyo yakund@@ aga, bikaba uburyo bwo kumw@@ ibuka no kwig@@ orora na we, bik@@ amug@@ usha neza nt@@ abat@@ er@@ ereze ibyag@@ o. Ng@@ ayo ng@@ uk@@ o! Bigaragara ko impamvu nyamukuru ya byose ari uk@@ ubabar@@ ir@@ ana, tuk@@ ig@@ orora n’aba@@ duh@@ emukiye maze tuk@@ iyemeza kubana neza biz@@ ira inzika no guh@@ ora. Bari mu gihirahiro nyuma yo kubwirwa ko aho bakoreraga bazah@@ avanwa Abash@@ igajwe inyuma n’amateka bo mu Karere ka Gasabo bafite impungenge z’uko bashobora kuz@@ ajyanwa kure y’@@ umuj@@ yi, nyuma yo kubwirwa ko igishanga bakor@@ eragamo bazak@@ imur@@ wamo. Ati “Muri koperative umub@@ um@@ byi ashobora kubona inyungu y’amafaranga asaga ibihumbi 100@@ Frw, ku buryo yamufasha kubona ibyo umuryango we uk@@ eneye. Ibyo nibyo bitemewe mu gish@@ anga. Naho ubundi batwaye ibumba bakajya gukorera ahandi nta kibazo bashobora kugir@@ a.” A@@ birukanywe mu gishanga bagiye kub@@ umbira mu ngo Nyir@@ abah@@ ire L@@ angu@@ ida, Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Gasabo wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage, atangaza ko ibyo bibazo abab@@ um@@ byi bahuye na byo ubuyobozi bw@@ igeze b@@ umenya ariko akab@@ izeza ko niba@@ bishaka bakaganira baz@@ abashakira ahandi. Ingingo ya 83 y’Itegeko rigena uburyo bwo kureng@@ era, kubungabunga no guteza imbere ibidukikije mu Rwanda, ivuga ko nta nyubako cyangwa ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi bigomba gushyirwa mu bishanga byaba ibyo mu mijyi cyangwa mu Byar@@ o. Iyi ngingo ivuga ko igikorwa cyose cyangwa inyubako byemerewe gushyirwa muri metero 20 uvuye ku nkombe z’@@ igish@@ anga. Impano yo kub@@ umba ituma binjiza asaga ibihumbi 100@@ Frw
Hari abah@@ arik@@ wa n’abagabo babo kuko babyaye abana bafite ikibazo cya ‘@@ Aut@@ ism@@ e’ Abagore babyaye abana bafite ibibazo by’@@ imyitwarire bizwi nka ‘@@ Aut@@ ism@@ e’, bavuga ko bakorerwa ihohoterwa rit@@ andukanye n’abagabo babo kugera n’aho babah@@ arika. Aut@@ isme ni uruhurirane rw’@@ ibibazo by’@@ imyitwarire bijyanye n’ibibazo byo kwisanga mu muryango ndetse no gutinda kuvuga bijyana n’ub@@ uf@@ ura ku mwana ukiri muto. Niw@@ em@@ ut@@ oni Claud@@ ine, wo mu Karere ka Kamonyi, uvuga ko yabyaye umwana ufite ibibazo byo mu mutwe. Yaje kumenya ko umwana we afite ikibazo cy’@@ imyitwarire ‘@@ Aut@@ ism@@ e’ ab@@ ibwiwe n’abaganga b’ i Gatagara mu Karere ka Nyanza. Ati “@@ Umugabo yamaze kubona ko umwana adafite imiterere nk’iy’@@ abandi bana, agahora ant@@ oteza avuga ko iwabo bat@@ abyara abana bameze bat@@ yo, ubundi akambwira ngo nz@@ am@@ ujyane iwacu. Igihe cyaje kugera yinjira undi mugore nkomeza kuruh@@ ana n’umw@@ ana, akajya aza mu rugo igihe ashak@@ iye.” Nyinaw@@ abas@@ inga Claud@@ ine, wo mu Karere ka Gasabo, avuga ko yaj@@ uj@@ ub@@ ijwe n’umugabo kubera ko yabyaye umwana ufite ikibazo cyo mu mutwe. Ati “Y@@ amp@@ ozaga ku nk@@ eke, akambwira ngo az@@ ashaka undi mugore uz@@ amub@@ yarira umwana muzima. Ariko ubwo yabivug@@ aga afite insh@@ oreke ku ruh@@ and@@ e.” Umuyobozi w’Ikigo “@@ Aut@@ isme Rwanda@@ ”, Rosine D@@ u@@ qu@@ es@@ ne K@@ amag@@ aju, avuga ko ababyeyi bafite abana bav@@ ukanye ikibazo cya Aut@@ isme badakwiye kwiheba kuko ari abana nk’@@ abandi. Ati ‘‘@@ Hari abana baba batazi kwig@@ abur@@ ira, kw@@ ijyana mu bwiherero n’ibindi. Ariko iyo bageze hano tur@@ abakurikir@@ ana, tuk@@ abit@@ aho ku buryo mu gihe gito usanga abana bakora nk’ibyo abandi bo mu kigero cyabo bakora nubwo baba bafite ubuk@@ ererwe mu mit@@ ekererez@@ e.’’ Mu rwego rwo gufasha ababyeyi babyaye abana bafite iki kibazo, ‘@@ Ikigo Aut@@ isme Rwanda’ k@@ ifashisha inzobere zo mu bihugu bitandukanye, bagah@@ ugura ababyeyi n’abakozi b’iki kigo. Umwe mu batanga amahugurwa, Dr T@@ ashi Ky@@ il, wo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, avuga ko umwana ufite ikibazo cya Aut@@ isme iyo yit@@ aweho akura neza nk’abandi bana kabone nubwo aba afite ubuk@@ erer@@ we. Ati “Umwana wanjye yavutse afite ikibazo cya ‘@@ Aut@@ ism@@ e’ nyuma yo kwitabwaho mu gihe cy’imyaka ibiri yari amaze kugaragaza impinduka. Ibi byatumye numva ko ngomba gufasha ababyeyi bafite abana bafite iki kibazo nk@@ abas@@ angiza ubunararibonye bwanjye@@ .” Mu myaka itanu ishize, Ikigo cya Aut@@ isme Rwanda, kimaze kwita ku basaga 100, ubu gifasha abana 32. Ubushakashatsi na OMS bwagaragaje ko umwana umwe ku bana 160 afite ikibazo cya Aut@@ ism@@ e. Minisitiri w'@@ ubucuruzi n'inganda mu Rwanda Francois Kanimba Umwanzuro MINI@@ COM yafashe kuri uyu wa 27 Nyakanga 2016 wo guhagarika imikino y'@@ amahirwe urag@@ aragaza kw@@ ivuguruza gukomeye kuko yari imaze iminsi micye itangaje ku mugaragaro ko iyo mikino yemewe mu Rwanda ndetse ko nta kibazo na kimwe ishobora guteza kuko ngo bayis@@ uzum@@ anye ubushishozi mbere yo ku@@ yemerera gukin@@ irwa mu Rwanda. Ni kenshi abaturage bagiye bagaragaza ibibazo n'@@ impungenge bafite ku mikorere n'ingaruka zituruka ku mikorere n'@@ imikoreshereze y'@@ ibyuma bikoreshwa mu mikino y'@@ amahirwe bamwe bakunze kwita Ibir@@ yabar@@ ezi ariko Minisiteri y'ubucuruzi n'inganda (MIN@@ I@@ COM@@ ) ari na yo ifite mu nshingano iyi mikino ikab@@ yam@@ aganira kure. Itangazamakuru na ryo r@@ yagarutse cyane kuri iyi mikino, aho ryag@@ endaga rifasha aba baturage mu kumvikanisha akababaro kabo, maze ku ikubitiro akarere ka Nyanza g@@ afata iya mbere mu gufata icyemezo cyo guca ibyo bir@@ yabar@@ ezi ku butaka bwak@@ o. Iki cyemezo cy'@@ akarere ka Nyanza cy@@ amag@@ anywe na Minisiteri y'ubucuruzi n'ing@@ anda, ivuga ko ibyakozwe n'ubuyobozi bw'@@ aka karere ndetse n'abandi nk@@ abo, bitemewe n'amategeko. Icyo gihe umuyobozi w'akarere Ntazinda Er@@ as@@ me mu cyemezo cye yari yagize ati:"@@ .... Hari abana bish@@ oraga muri iyo mikino y'@@ amahirwe bak@@ emererwa kuy@@ ikina kandi bizwi neza ko nta mafaranga bakorera maze ug@@ usanga bar@@ iba iwabo bik@@ abar@@ arur@@ a.@@ ..@@ ". Yakomeje avuga ko Ibir@@ yabar@@ ezi "@@ bizongera gukora ari uko ba nyirabyo bagaragaje ibyangombwa by'@@ umwimerere bahawe n'ikigo gishinzwe iterambere mu Rwanda (RDB) kandi hakan@@ ubahirizwa amategeko agomba kug@@ enga aho iyo t@@ ombora ikorera. Nubwo ubuyobozi bw'akarere ka Nyanza bwag@@ aragazaga impamvu buf@@ unze iyo mikino, MINI@@ COM yo yavugaga ko ibir@@ yabar@@ ezi ntacyo bit@@ waye, ikan@@ emeza ko ari yo itanga ibyangombwa kandi idashobora kub@@ iha umuntu it@@ abanje kugenzura niba ahantu agiye gukorera ari heza kandi hakaba hat@@ ateza umutekano muke. Ruz@@ ibukira Alex@@ is, Umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe inganda n'ibigo bito n'ib@@ iciriritse muri MINI@@ COM yavugaga ko iyi Minisiteri itazi iby'@@ urugomo bibera ah@@ akinirwa umukino w'@@ ikir@@ yabar@@ ezi. Yagize ati: "Ibyo by'@@ urugomo n'ib@@ ijyanye na byo byumvikane ko mu Rwanda hari umutekano uses@@ uye, hari inzego zibish@@ inzwe, nk'uko tub@@ izi twese, umutekano wacu ni nt@@ amak@@ em@@ wa, ibyo rero nkaba nt@@ abizi ni bwo bwa mbere mby@@ umvise ko habamo urug@@ om@@ o." Uyu muyobozi yan@@ aham@@ yaga ko abantu bem@@ erera gukora imikino y'@@ amahirwe abakozi ba MINI@@ COM babanza kugenzura niba ahantu bagiye gukorera ari ahantu h@@ adashobora guteza umutekano muke. Nta n'@@ icyumweru gishize iyi Minisiteri igaragaje ko ibyo bir@@ yabar@@ ezi byemewe n'amategeko, kuri uyu wa gatatu yasohoye itangazo rivuga ko ibaye ibih@@ agaritse by'agateganyo mu Rwanda hose, ibyo bigaragaza ko ari ukw@@ ivuguruza mu gufata ibyemezo kuri iyi Minisit@@ eri. Bamwe mu baturage bo mu mujyi wa Kigali baganiriye na MAK@@ URUK@@ I na bo bavuga ko batunguwe no kumva abayobozi ba Minisiteri bivug@@ uruza mu byemezo ibintu ngo bishobora gutuma batakaza ikizere bag@@ iriraga aba bay@@ obozi. Umwe yagize ati: "@@ Aba sibo ejo bundi bavugaga ko iyi mikino yemewe nta kibazo ifit@@ e? Ubuse ni nde uzongera kujya yizera ibyo bavug@@ a? Uku ni uguh@@ uzagurika rwose bajye babanza bash@@ ish@@ oze mbere yo kuvuga no gufata ibyem@@ ez@@ o." Nanone kandi nubwo iyi Min@@ s@@ iteri ifash@@ ye uyu mwanz@@ uro, umuntu ashobora kwibaza ikiz@@ akurikiraho hagati y'@@ abac@@ uruzaga ibi bir@@ yabar@@ ezi na MINI@@ COM dore ko bari bafitanye amasezerano y'imyaka 10 bakorera mu Rwanda nkuko bigaragarira kub@@ yemezo bafite bibemerera gukorera mu Rwanda , ibintu na none bishobora guteza ikibazo bikaba byan@@ agera no mu rwego rw'@@ amategeko. Muneza Ferdinand MAK@@ URUK@@ I.RW
Mo@@ i, le D@@ ern@@ ier T@@ utsi, igitabo cy’@@ ubuhamya bwa H@@ abon@@ imana wari kwicwa akam@@ an@@ ikwa ku musozi Charles H@@ abon@@ imana yanditse igitabo yise ‘@@ Mo@@ i le d@@ ern@@ ier T@@ uts@@ i’ gikubiyemo ubuhamya bw’@@ imibereho y’@@ Umututsi mbere ya Jenoside, inzira y’umusaraba yanyuzemo mu gihe cya Jenoside n’uburyo Ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi zatumye ar@@ okoka. H@@ abon@@ imana yar@@ okokeye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu yahoze ari Segiteri ya May@@ unzwe, Komini Tam@@ bwe, Perefegitura ya Git@@ arama, ubu ni mu Karere ka Ruhango. H@@ abon@@ imana avuka mu muryango w’abana icyenda , ubwo Jenoside yakorwaga yari afite imyaka 12 y’amavuko. Abo bavukana 6 n’ababyeyi be barishwe muri Jenoside ar@@ okok@@ ana na mushiki we umwe mukuru. Ubuhamya bw’@@ imibereho ye mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi n’inzira ikomeye cyane yanyuzemo yab@@ ishyize mu nyandiko agamije ko bitaz@@ ibagirana ndetse kugira ngo bibe n’uburyo ku bandi barokotse Jenoside bwo kwiyumvamo ko amateka babayemo ba@@ yas@@ angiye. Inkuru ivugwa muri iki gitabo itangira igaragaza ubuzima bw’umwana uk@@ ib@@ yiruka ufite imyaka umunani wo ku misozi y’i K@@ angoma na May@@ unzwe bakunze kwita mu Nd@@ uga. Ig@@ aragaza imibereho y’@@ Abatutsi, abaturanyi babo, abanyarwanda bose muri rusange. H@@ abon@@ imana mu kiganiro na IGIHE yavuze kur@@ oka kwe by@@ amubereye nk’@@ igitangaza kuko yari yarag@@ enwe n’abak@@ oraga Jenoside ko ariwe uz@@ icwa nyuma y’abandi Batutsi kandi ak@@ icwa akam@@ an@@ ikwa ahantu ku buryo abantu bazajya barebera uko umututsi yas@@ aga. Ati “Ni nayo mpamvu iki gitabo cyitwa ‘@@ Mo@@ i le d@@ ern@@ ier T@@ uts@@ i’, bishatse kuvuga ko nari narag@@ enwe n’abakora Jenoside iwacu ko njye baz@@ any@@ ica nyuma y’@@ abandi, bakabanza bakica abandi Abatutsi bash@@ ira ku misozi noneho bakany@@ ica bak@@ aman@@ ika ah@@ ant@@ u.” Yakomeje agira ati “Uwo mugambi rero wag@@ ezweho ariko uza gut@@ ambam@@ irwa n’uko Inkotanyi zari zigeze mu gihugu, zigeze mu gice cy’@@ iwacu zih@@ afata Abatutsi bose bari batar@@ ash@@ ira.” H@@ abon@@ imana yavuze ko kuba iki gitabo cyar@@ ahawe iri zina bitavuze ko ariwe Mut@@ utsi wa nyuma was@@ igaye ahubwo ‘ni ijwi rya buri muntu wese wacitse ku icum@@ u, ni ijwi rigaragaza ko buri muntu wese warokotse ariwe was@@ igaye kugira ngo az@@ abare inkuru zo ku musozi w’@@ iwab@@ o”. Yakomeje agira ati “Kubera ko habayeho abat@@ ub@@ anjir@@ ije, habayeho abishwe turi kumwe ndetse muri twe abarokotse harimo abak@@ orewe iyicarubozo, gus@@ og@@ ot@@ wa ariko ntiban@@ og@@ oka. Icyo gice ng@@ ifata nk’@@ igice gikomeye kubera ko buri muntu wese warokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mufata nk’umuntu wa nyuma warokotse umugambi wo kubar@@ imbur@@ a.” Muri iki gitabo kandi H@@ abon@@ imana agaragaza uburyo Jenoside yahagaritswe abanyarwanda bakongera kugira icyizere cyo kubaho, umuntu agatangira gutekereza ku m@@ ishing@@ a, kongera kugira umuryango n’ibindi byubaka umuntu mu buzima busanzwe. Iki gitabo kiri mu rurimi rw’@@ Igifaransa, ni umushinga yatekereje kuva mu 2002 akir@@ angiza amashuri yisumbuye. Nyuma yo kugira ubutwari bwo gutanga ubuhamya mu gihe cyo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, henshi hatandukanye, yagiriwe inama yo kwandika amateka ye mu git@@ abo. Kigali: Abac@@ urur@@ izaga mu Mih@@ anda baravuga ko amasoko bahawe ari kubah@@ om@@ bya. Mu minsi ishize nibwo ubuyobozi bw'@@ umugi wa Kigali bwafashe icyemezo cyo gutangiza amasoko azajya ahuriramo abac@@ urur@@ izaga ku mihanda amasoko azwi nka Free Market@@ . Gusa abacuruzi bay@@ acurur@@ izamo biganjemo abagore bahoze bacururiza mu mihanda baravuga ko aya masoko arimo kubah@@ om@@ bya. Kuri uyu wa 1@@ Nzeri , ubwo urubuga rwacu Makuruki.rw rwas@@ uraga amasoko atandukanye yagiye ahur@@ izwamo abagore bac@@ urur@@ izaga mu mihanda aba bazwi nk' abany@@ ad@@ utar@@ o, batug@@ aragarije ko kuva bagera muri ayo masoko bahuye n'@@ igihombo gikomeye kubera ko batabona abakiriya baza kubag@@ urira. Tug@@ anira na bamwe mu bagore twasanze bacururiza muri ayo masoko bat@@ ashimye ko amazina n'@@ amafoto yabo byajya ahagaragara, batug@@ aragarije imbogamizi bafite ku masoko bahawe kuva mu kwezi Kamena muri uyu mwaka. Tukaba twar@@ ahereye ku isoko rya Kar@@ ambo Free Market riherereye mu karere ka K@@ acuk@@ iro, aho aba bagore bavuga ko bamaze amezi 2 bah@@ acurur@@ iza, ariko ngo ibicuruzwa byabo byatangiye kub@@ ora kubera kubura abakir@@ iya. Aba bagore bar@@ agira bati "T@@ umaze amezi 2 dukorera muri iri s@@ oko, ariko twabuze abakiriya riri kure y'abaturage ikindi kandi ntibar@@ anar@@ imenya, ibicuruzwa byacu tur@@ abir@@ angura bikab@@ ora kubera ko aba ari imboga n'@@ imbuto. byongeye kandi haracyari n'abag@@ icur@@ uriza mu mihanda, ibyo byose rero bir@@ atuma tub@@ ura abakiriya ibicuruzwa byacu bik@@ angirika, bigatuma tug@@ wa mu gih@@ ombo. Gisozi Free Market@@ (@@ Gasab@@ o) Iki kibazo aba bagore bo mu isoko rya Kar@@ ambo ( Kicukir@@ o) twasanze bag@@ ihur@@ iyeho n'abo mu isoko rya Gisozi. Aho nabo bavuga ko batabona abakiriya ibicuruzwa byabo nabo bib@@ orera mu isoko. baravuga ko bishimira ko bav@@ anywe mu muhanda bakaba bafite umutekano bacuruza ntawe ubir@@ uk@@ ank@@ ana, ariko nanone ngo uretse umutekano bafite wo kuba bacururiza mu isoko, bar@@ agira bat@@ i" tur@@ arang@@ ura imin@@ ek@@ e,@@ iny@@ anya, Amat@@ unda n'ibindi bitandukanye bik@@ amara icyumweru ntawe uraza kubig@@ ura big@@ ahita bib@@ ora, kubona abakiriya ni ukub@@ anza kur@@ is@@ ohokamo tukajya kub@@ inginga ngo baze bag@@ ure. Kabeza Free Market@@ ( Kicukiro ) N'@@ ibibazo twasanze kuri aya masoko hafi ya yose aho aherereye mu mugi wa Kigali keretse ay@@ ubatse ahag@@ ere abaturage , nk'@@ ir@@ iherereye hafi y'@@ isoko rya Kimir@@ onko. Mugihe aba bagore bavuga ko barimo gukorera mu gih@@ ombo, ngo hari amafaranga leta yabahaye ibabwira ko ari ayo kubafasha kwiteza imbere amafaranga ibihumbi 8@@ 7,@@ ariko bo babona ko ari inguzanyo kuko ngo baba bagomba kwishy@@ uramo 10% y'@@ inyungu buri kwezi. Aba bagore baravuga ko yah@@ ombye , kuko ngo mugihe cy'amezi 2 gusa bamaze bacuruza nta n'@@ igishoro bas@@ igar@@ anye. Bakaba bavuga ko amezi 6 bahawe n@@ ashira bataz@@ ashobora kwir@@ waza nk'uko babwiwe n'ubuyobozi bw'@@ umug@@ i. Aba bacuruzi bakaba basaba ubuyobozi bw'@@ umugi wa Kigali kubakorera ubuvugizi bushingiye kubam@@ enyekan@@ ishiriza ayo masoko ndetse no kuvana abandi bagore bose bag@@ icur@@ uriza mu mihanda kubera ko ari yo mp@@ avu batabona abakir@@ iya. Muk@@ iganiro na Makuruki.rw , Muvunyi Kib@@ ombo Is@@ aa umuyobozi ushinzwe imibereho myiza y'abaturage no kur@@ en@@ egera abatishoboye bo mu mugi wa kag@@ ali, avuga ko iki kibazo bak@@ izi kandi ko umugi wa kigali watanze amasoko yo gukora amatangazo akin@@ its@@ e(@@ Adv@@ er@@ ts) mu bitangazamakuru , ngo akazaba am@@ enyekanisha aho ayo masoko agiye ah@@ erereye. Kib@@ ombo avuga ko bitarenze kuwa mbere taliki 7 Nzeri ayo m@@ atangazo azaba yatangiye gutambuka mu bitangazamakuru by'@@ amajwi n'@@ amashusho. Ku kibazo cyo kuba hakiri bamwe mu bagore bag@@ icur@@ uriza mu mihanda bigatuma abari muri ayo masoko B@@ abura abakir@@ iya, Muvunyi Kib@@ ombo avuga ko k'@@ ubufatanye n'inzego z'umutekano batangiye igikorwa cyo kuvana mu mihanda abak@@ iy@@ icur@@ ur@@ izam@@ o, babash@@ ishikariza gusanga abandi mu mas@@ oko. Mugihe aba bagore bakomeje kwin@@ ubira uburyo bah@@ abw@@ amo ariya mafaranga ibihumbi 87 mu byic@@ iro, kandi ngo hakaba zimwe muri Banki z'@@ imirenge SACCO zibak@@ a inyungu za buri munsi, Kib@@ ombo avuga ko hari zimwe muri za SACCO zar@@ enze ku masezerano zag@@ iranye n'ubuyobozi bw'@@ uturere, aho bavuganye ko abo bagore bagomba gutangira kwishyura nyuma y'amezi 2, nabwo bak@@ ishyuzwa 5% aho kuba 10% nk'uko aba bagore babivug@@ a.@@ naho ubundi buri mugore afite uburenganzira bwo guhabwa ariya mafaranga yose uko yakabaye kuko ari uburenganzira bwabo. Gusa ariko nabyo ngo bigakorwa mu bushishozi kuko hari uway@@ ahabwa yose akay@@ akoresha nabi akay@@ ah@@ omba yose. Bityo ngo hakaba hari zimwe muri za SACCO zatang@@ aga make kugira ngo barebe uko akoreshwa kuko ngo n'ubundi aba bagore bari basanzwe bamenyereye kurang@@ uza amafaranga atarenze ibihumbi 20@@ frw@@ .
Akar@@ engane g@@ akorerwa abahinzi b’@@ ibirayi bo mu Karere ka Nyabihu Kuba abag@@ ena ibiciro by’@@ umusaruro w’@@ ibirayi babig@@ ena ku muhinzi gusa ariko ntiba@@ big@@ ene ku isoko r@@ icur@@ ur@@ izwaho ibyo bir@@ ayi nirwo rw@@ ir@@ eg@@ uzo rw’@@ abafite amak@@ usanyirizo n’abacuruzi b’@@ ibirayi bashinjwa kuryam@@ ira abah@@ inzi. Ibi ni bimwe mu byag@@ aragarijwe mu nama yahuje ubuyobozi bw’akarere ka Nyabihu n’abafite aho bahuriye n’ubucuruzi bw’@@ ibirayi kuri uyu wa mbere tariki ya 27 Ugushyingo 2017. Inama ariko ntiy@@ ashoboye kubonera igisubizo iki kibazo. Muhanga: barifuza ko amavuriro aciriritse yakora n’amasaha ya nijoro Abaturage bo mu Karere ka Muhanga baravuga ko serivisi bahabwa ku mavuriro aciriritse zikwiye no kujya zitangwa na nijoro. Amav@@ uriro aciriritse yafashije abaturage kutar@@ embera mu ngo Abaturage by’umwihariko batuye mu byaro ahat@@ aboneka amavuriro akora nijoro, bavuga ko serivisi z’ubuvuzi bahabwa ku mavuriro aciriritse (@@ Pos@@ te de Sant@@ é) zibafasha ku manywa gusa kandi na nijoro haboneka abantu barem@@ bye. Umurenge wa Kiy@@ umba ni umwe mu Mirenge ya kure y’Umujyi wa Muhanga ku buryo kub@@ egereza amavuriro aciriritse byatumye abaturage bar@@ emb@@ eraga mu ngo bag@@ abanuka nk’uko byemezwa na benshi mu baw@@ ut@@ uye. Mah@@ irwe Aimable, Um@@ u@@ baf@@ oromo ukorera kuri imwe muri poste de santé zubatswe mu Murenge wa Kiy@@ umba mu karere ka Muhanga na we yemeza ko ibibazo by’ubuvuzi bw’ibanze byag@@ abany@@ utse kubera amavuriro ac@@ irir@@ tse yeg@@ erejwe abaturage. Agira ati, “@@ Serivisi dutanga hano zag@@ iriye abaturage akamaro kuko nti@@ bakir@@ embera mu rugo ugereranyije na mbere, cyane cyane nk’@@ abak@@ oraga urugendo rurerure bava K@@ abac@@ uzi bajya kwivuriza ku kigo nderabuzima cya Nyab@@ iken@@ k@@ e”. N’ubwo bimeze gutyo ariko, abaturage bagaragaza ko bag@@ ihura n’ikibazo cya kwakirwa nijoro bag@@ annye aya mav@@ uriro, kuko aba yafunze bagasaba inzego z’ubuyobozi ko z@@ abafasha kubona aba@@ bakira mu m@@ asha ya nijoro kuko naho haboneka abakeneye serivisi zo kwa muganga byihut@@ irwa. Uwam@@ aliya avuga ko kweg@@ urira abikorera amavuriro aciriritse ari bwo buryo bwo gutuma akora nijoro Umuyobozi w’akarere ka Muhanga Uwam@@ aliya Beatrice avuga ko, nyuma yo kubaka aya mavuriro nka kimwe mu byihut@@ irwaga ngo abaturage babone serivisi nziza mu buv@@ uzi, ubu hakurikiyeho kuy@@ egurira abikorera kugira ngo barusheho gutanga bene izo serivisi. Agira ati, “Icya mbere kwari ukw@@ ihutira kubaka aya mavuriro ku@@ igira ngo abaturage bacu babone serivisi z’ibanze kwa mug@@ ang@@ a”. “Ubu igik@@ urikiyeho ni ukuy@@ egurira abikorera kugira ngo barusheho gut@@ aga serivisi nziza kumut@@ urage zizaba zirimo no kung@@ era amasaha kugira ngo n’abo bakenera ubuvuzi nijoro bab@@ ubon@@ e”. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’@@ Imiyoborere RGB mu mwaka wa 2018, serivisi zirimo kwakira no kwita ku bar@@ wayi, gukingira indwara, ibikorwa remezo n’ibikoresho by’@@ amavuriro birimo n’@@ Imb@@ angukiragut@@ abara, abakozi b’@@ amav@@ uriro, n’izindi zitangirwa kwa muganga, bugaragaza ko muri rusange abaturage babajijwe baz@@ ishimira ku gipimo cya 7@@ 0.@@ 8%. Inama zitangwa na Minisiteri y’ubuzima zikaba zisaba abakira abagana serivisi z’ubuzima gushyiramo imbaraga kugira ngo zir@@ usheho kunozwa bityo babashe gufasha ababag@@ ana, mu gihe L@@ ata ya yo yihaye Umuh@@ igo wo kuba mbere y’ umwaka wa 2019 nibura buri Kagari kagomba kuba gafite ivuriro ryak@@ ira abakeneye serivisi z’ibanze kwa muganga. Cl@@ ov@@ is yatangiye muzika aba muri Kenya muri 2011. Y@@ atangiriye ku@@ yo yise ‘N@@ atak@@ a’ akurikizaho iyo yise ‘@@ Aho wan@@ ku@@ ye@@ ’. Iyo aheruka yayis@@ e’ Nak@@ uteg@@ eme@@ a’. Cl@@ ov@@ is aba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kuva muri 2014. Avuga ko impamvu yamuteye kwinjira muri muzika y’indirimbo zo guhimbaza Imana ari uko asanzwe ari umukristu ariko aho yag@@ ereye muri Amerika akaba yarabonye impamvu ifatika yo gukomeza kwamamaza ubutumwa bwa Yesu kuko yasanze hari benshi badak@@ ijijwe bakeneye kumenya ubutumwa bwiza. N@@ amubon@@ yemo umutima wo kubaka urugo, icya kabiri ni uko yank@@ unze urukundo nifuzaga atitaye kubyo naba mfite cyangwa nt@@ afite, atitaye ku mateka yanjye yaba meza c@@ angwa mab@@ i(@@ unc@@ ond@@ it@@ ional lov@@ e). Bugesera, Kiyovu, Musanze na Muhanga zigiye gutangira kubyaza umusaruro abafana bazo binyuze mu myambaro Amakipe ya Musanze, Bugesera, Muhanga na Kiyovu agiye gutangira kubyaza umusaruro abafana bayo binyuze mu myambaro yayo mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ibibazo by’@@ amikoro make. Aya makipe asanzwe yam@@ bikwa na Sosiyete yo muri Tanzania izwi ku izina rya S@@ G Sports yatangiye ibiganiro n’iyi sosiyeti mu rwego rwo kubakorera imyenda y’abafana aho biteganyijwe ko aya makipe yari asanzwe yambika abakinnyi na bamwe mu bayobozi agiye no kujya yambika abafana bayo akab@@ ibyaza amafaranga. Sosiyete S@@ G Sports n’aya makipe batangiye ibiganiro aho iyo sosiyete izajya ibaha imyenda y’abafana bakay@@ igurisha abafana bayo aho bavuga ko abafana na bo bazajya bagira uruhare mu gutera inkunga ikipe zabo binyuze mu mwambaro usanzwe w’@@ aya makip@@ e. Simon Ns@@ anga ukuriye sosiyete ya S@@ G Sports Sam Kar@@ enzi, umunyamabanga mukuru wa Bugesera, imwe mu makipe yam@@ bikwa na S@@ G Sports, yavuze ko ubu buryo bushya bugiye kunganira amakipe kubona amafaranga. Yagize ati “Ur@@ ebye ni uburyo bwiza bugiye gutuma abafana bacu bagaragara neza. Was@@ angaga bambaye imyambaro itandukanye ugasanga biragaragara nk’aho ari akavuyo ariko ubu bagiye gutangira kwambara neza, baz@@ ambara neza bagarag@@ are neza ndetse n’ikipe iby@@ unguk@@ irem@@ o. Yakomeje avuga ko nubwo bigoye kumenya umubare w’@@ abafana bose ba Bugesera mu gihugu ariko ngo biteze ko byibuze mu baturage batuye aka karere bataz@@ abur@@ amo abantu ibihumbi bitanu bashobora kuz@@ agura uyu mwambaro wa Bugesera. Umunyamabanga mukuru wa Bugesera, Sam Kar@@ enzi, avuga ko biteguye kubyaza umusaruro abafana babo binyuze mu myambarire Theodore Ntar@@ ind@@ wa, Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibya tekiniki muri Kiyovu na we yavuze ko ubu buryo bugiye gutuma abafana bifuzaga kugira uruhare mu gufasha iyi kipe babona uko bay@@ ifasha ban@@ ambaye neza. Patrick N@@ amenye uhagarariye S@@ G Sports mu Rwanda, avuga ko intego yabo ari ugufasha amakipe mu rwego rwo kubereka aho bashobora gukura ubushobozi mu gihe ubu hari ibibazo by’@@ amikoro bikomeje kugora amakip@@ e. Patrick N@@ amenye uhagarariye S@@ G Sports mu Rwanda S@@ G Sports ivuga ko mu bufatanye n’amakipe bagiye gufungura amaduka acuruza imyenda y’aya makipe mu gihugu bityo ushatse umwambaro w’@@ aya makipe akaba yaw@@ ubona bit@@ amug@@ oye. Uburyo bwo kwinjiza amafaranga binyuze mu myambaro busanzwe bukoreshwa n’amakipe atandukanye ariko hano mu Rwanda ntabwo bwari bwag@@ atangiye gukoreshwa. Amakipe yari asanzwe yinj@@ iriza amafaranga ku bibuga ku mikino yakiriye no ku bat@@ erank@@ unga. Mugisha Samuel, Mugisha Moï@@ se, Hakizimana S@@ eth@@ , Munyaneza Didier ‘M@@ bap@@ p@@ é@@ ’, Uwizeye Jean Claude na Nz@@ afash@@ wan@@ ayo Jean Claude nibo bagize ikipe y’u Rwanda muri iri siganwa ryitabiriwe n’amakipe 15, aho batozwa na S@@ emp@@ oma Fél@@ ix@@ . Tom Rwagasana ar@@ ashinja ADEPR kum@@ wand@@ agaza no kumut@@ esha agaciro mu ruhame Nyuma y’icyumweru kimwe abahoze ari abayobozi na ADEPR bambuwe ubup@@ as@@ iteri, Tom Rwagasana wari umuyobozi wungirije na we uri mu babw@@ ambuwe yasabye itorero rya ADEPR kw@@ ivuguruza kuko ngo icyemezo ryafashe akibona nk’uburyo bwo kumut@@ esha agaciro no kum@@ wand@@ agaza mu ruhame. Ibi bikubiye mu ibaruwa yandikiye itorero rya ADEPR kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 13 Ukwakira 2017. Iyi baruwa yasubizaga iyo ADEPR yanditse tariki 5 Ukwakira 2017, ijya hanze tariki 6 Ukwakira. Ni ibaruwa yam@@ bur@@ aga inshingano z’@@ ubup@@ asiteri Sibomana Jean wari umuyobozi wa ADEPR, Rwagasana Tom wari umwungirije , Se@@ bagabo Leon@@ ard, Niyitanga Sal@@ ton, Sindayigaya Theophile na Gasana Val@@ en@@ s. Uko ari 6 bose bahuriye mu kirego cy’@@ ic@@ ungwa nabi ry’umutungo w’@@ inyubako ya Dove Hotel y’itorero rya ADEPR. Mu ibaruwa Tom Rwagasana yandikiye umuyobozi wa ADEPR akaba n’umuvugizi wayo , Rev Ephrem Karuranga yamusabye ko bakwiriye kwisubiraho ku cyemezo bafashe cyo kubam@@ bura ubup@@ as@@ iter@@ i. Ingingo ya mbere yash@@ ingiyeho ni uko ngo bidakwiye ko bam@@ burwa Ub@@ up@@ asiteri kuko ari umuhamagaro w’Imana. Tom Rwagasana yakomeje atanga izindi ngingo 3 ashingiraho zirimo ko raporo bash@@ ingiyeho bamuh@@ agarika we atay@@ izi atazi ibiy@@ ikub@@ iyemo. Yongeyeho ko ibiy@@ irimo bihabanye n’izindi raporo zakozwe ndetse zikan@@ emezwa n’inzego za ADEPR zib@@ ifite mu nshingano. Mu ibaruwa ye, Tom yagize ati " Mwene d@@ ata, izindi mpamvu nsh@@ ingiraho harimo kuba icyemezo cyar@@ ashingiye kuri raporo y’@@ ubugenzuzi (Ex@@ t@@ ern@@ al For@@ ens@@ ic Aud@@ it Report@@ ) ntam@@ enyesh@@ ejwe, nt@@ akor@@ ewe, ntag@@ izemo uruhare urwo arirwo rwose cyangwa ngo mugire icyo muy@@ imbaz@@ aho m@@ bahe ibisoban@@ uro. Kuba nanone nsanga icyo cyemezo ubw@@ acyo kiny@@ uranye n’amategeko y’igihugu muri rusange n’ay’@@ itorero ADEPR by’umwihariko, cyane cyane ku bijyanye n’igihe icyemezo nk’iki cyak@@ abaye gifat@@ wa, ububasha bwo kug@@ ifata, inzira biny@@ uzwamo kugira ngo gifat@@ we ndetse no gusuzuma ibikwiye gush@@ ingirwaho mu gihe icyo cyemezo cyaba kiri mu nyungu zanyu ndetse n’iz@@ i’@@ itorero muri rusange.” Tom Rwagasana yasoje ashimira ubuyobozi bwa ADEPR uburyo buri bus@@ uzum@@ ane ubushishozi ibyo yab@@ andikiye kandi ngo bakaba bagomba kwisubiraho mu gihe gito gish@@ oboka kuko icyemezo nk@@ icy@@ abafat@@ iwe yag@@ ifashe nk’uburyo bwo kumut@@ esha agaciro no kum@@ wand@@ agaza mu ruhame. Amat@@ ara yo ku muhanda Kigali-@@ Rubavu az@@ ateza imbere ubucuruzi n'@@ ubukerarugendo Minisitiri w'@@ ibikor@@ waremezo, James Musoni aratangaza ko guc@@ anira umuhanda Kigali-@@ Rubavu bizatanga umusaruro mu guteza imbere ubucuruzi, ubukerarugendo ndetse no kongera ubuhahirane hagati y'u Rwanda na Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo (RD@@ C). Ibi Minisitiri Musoni yabitangarije mu Karere ka Musanze kuwa 29@@ /01/201@@ 5 ubwo yatangizaga ku mugaragaro igikorwa cyo guc@@ anira umuhanda Kigali-@@ Rubavu ureshya n'@@ ibirometero 12@@ 4. Uyu muyoboro w'amashanyarazi wat@@ ashywe watwaye akayabo k'amafaranga y'u Rwanda agera kuri miliyari zirindwi yatanzwe na Leta y'u Rwanda ifatanyije n'@@ utur@@ ere. Guc@@ anira umuhanda K@@ Ig@@ al@@ i-@@ Rubavu ngo biz@@ ateza imbere ubucuruzi n'@@ ubukerarugendo. Uyu muhanda wa Kigali-@@ Rubavu unyura mu turere dut@@ anu ari two Rulindo, Gakenke na Musanze mu Ntara y'Amajyaruguru, na Nyabihu na Rubavu two mu Ntara y'Ibur@@ engerazuba. Uretse Gakenke na Rulindo, utwo turere dusigaye ni two duk@@ ungahaye ku bir@@ ayi n'@@ ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku gusura ibirunga ndetse n'ing@@ ag@@ i. Abaturage bo mu Karere ka Musanze bemeza ko hari inyungu nyinshi baz@@ akura kuri ayo mat@@ ara rusange yirukanye umwijima kuko amasaha yo gukora yiyongereye aho ijoro rit@@ azongera kuba imbogamizi y@@ ababuza gukomeza akazi kabo nk'@@ abakoresha umuhanda. Umukozi wa NP@@ D-@@ Cot@@ r@@ aco yashyizeho aya mat@@ ara asobanurira Minisitiri Musoni uko ayo mat@@ ara akora. Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Nyabihu, Twahirwa Abdul@@ ati@@ f ashimangira ko ahageze urumuri ni umutekano nawo utah@@ atang@@ wa. Ati "@@ Nk'uko byagarutsweho ni umucyo haba h@@ avuye umwij@@ ima. N@@ atanga urugero rw'@@ ubujura bukorwa mu mwijima ariko iyo hari umucyo bidufasha gukumira ibyaha cyane cyane by'@@ ubuj@@ ur@@ a". Amat@@ ara yashyizwe kuri uyu muhanda akoresha umuriro muke ungana na ¼ cy'@@ ut@@ warwa n'@@ amatara asanzwe yo ku mihanda, amatara 3@@ 500 yakoreshejwe azajya atwara kil@@ ow@@ ati 25@@ 0, ig@@ ishimishije ngo ashobora kumara imyaka 25 atar@@ apf@@ a; nk'uko byemezwa na Uwimbabazi Od@@ ette, umuyobozi ushinzwe gukwirakwiza amashanyarazi mu kigo gishinzwe gucunga ingufu (E@@ UC@@ L@@ ). Minisitiri w'@@ ibikorwaremezo avuga ko mu mwaka utaha n'indi mihanda ihuza uturere iz@@ ac@@ anirwa. Minisitiri w'@@ ibikor@@ waremezo, James Musoni yavuze ko iki ari icyiciro cya mbere cyo guc@@ anira imihanda min@@ ini, ngo mu mwaka utaha n'indi mihanda ihuza uturere ikaz@@ ashyirwaho ayo mat@@ ara. Agira ati "D@@ ukoresheje uburyo bugenda buvug@@ ur@@ uye, gushyira ku bindi bice by'igihugu bizatwara miliyari zigera ku 10 ni ukuvuga ko aha hah@@ enze cyane kuko twari tug@@ itangira kubera ko twavug@@ uruye imikorere n'aho tugenda dukora neza izindi miliyari kugira ngo tur@@ angize mu gihugu cyos@@ e". Abaturage bishimiye aya mat@@ ara yo kum@@ ih@@ anda ariko ban@@ asabwe kuy@@ ab@@ ungab@@ unga. Maf@@ ia mu mad@@ in@@ i! I@@ bikom@@ ere Pasiteri Jean-@@ Désiré wo muri Zion Temple yatewe na bagenzi be (Video) Ub@@ ishatse wam@@ wita Mvuye@@ kur@@ e! Kuko ashobora kuba nawe yicara agatera ya kor@@ asi yo mu Bar@@ okore ivuga iti ‘@@ aho wan@@ kuye Man@@ a’. Ni byo koko hari igihe unyura mu bihe bikomeye, ku buryo igihe kigera ukavuga uti rwose si ku bwanjye. Ni ko na Pasiteri Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ iga Jean-@@ Désiré H@@ ul@@ let am@@ eze. Yak@@ uriye mu muryango w@@ ifashije kuko se yari Umukozi wa Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika i Kigali. Usibye kuba bari abat@@ unzi mu by’@@ Isi, bari n’abat@@ unzi mu by’@@ ijuru kuko bas@@ engaga cyane, bak@@ anabit@@ oza abana babo ku buryo buri Munsi wa Karindwi nkuko Abadivantisiti baby@@ emera, bajyaga imbere y’Imana, bakay@@ irag@@ iza. Afite imyaka 4@@ 3, ariko yose irimo ubuhamya buh@@ ambaye. Ni umugabo utar@@ ah@@ iriwe n’ur@@ ushak@@ o, umugore wa mbere Imana yaramw@@ isub@@ ije bamaranye amazi make bashying@@ iwe nta n’@@ akana amus@@ igiye kuko yari atwite inda y’amezi atandatu. Y@@ ish@@ umb@@ ushije undi bari bar@@ ameny@@ anye mu but@@ o, gusa nawe ikiny@@ ot@@ era cy’urukundo cyashize mu cyumweru cya mbere, birangira batandukanye. Ubu arasaba Imana ko yas@@ ohoza isezerano ryayo ikam@@ ushak@@ ire undi umuk@@ wiye. Mu minsi irenga ibihumbi 15 amaze ku Isi, yanyuze muri byinshi, ndetse yakoze buri kimwe cyangwa n’Imana n’abantu. Y@@ anyoye ibiyobyabwenge, yaras@@ ambaye, yaciye inyuma uwo bashakanye, yaras@@ inze, yafunzwe kubera uburig@@ anya, yambuye abat@@ abarika n’ibindi. Nyuma y’aho Imana im@@ ubat@@ uye ik@@ amwereka inzira ikw@@ iye, yaje kongera kugira intege nke yisanga mu byaha ku buryo asobanura ko ar@@ ond@@ oye umubare w’abagore baryam@@ anye, has@@ enyuka ingo nyinshi zo muri Kigali. Mu buzima bwe kandi, yabanye n’ibikom@@ ere yatewe n’aba@@ pasiteri bagenzi bakoranaga umurimo w’Imana, by@@ amubereye intandaro yo kug@@ wa, asubira mu bus@@ inzi n’@@ ubusambanyi yah@@ ozemo atar@@ ak@@ izwa. Muri iki gihe ni Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo “@@ L@@ add@@ er Le@@ ader@@ ship Con@@ sul@@ t@@ ing@@ ” kigira inama abakora ubucuruzi. Amaze imyaka 16 yakiriye agak@@ iza, ariko mu 2015 hagati aho yaje kug@@ wa, ubu amaze amezi asaga atanu agarutse mu murimo w’Imana. Mu kiganiro kirekire yagiranye na IGIHE, yavuze byinshi ku buzima bwe. Uko yafung@@ iwe muri Gereza Nkuru ya Kigali azira kwigana is@@ inya y’@@ Umuyobozi Mukuru wa B@@ RD@@ , uko ababyeyi n’abavandimwe be bagiye gutura muri Amerika yibereye mu kabari, yavuye gushyingura umugore we n’umwana asanga yirukanwe mu rusengero, yahawe amasaha 24 ngo abe avuye ku butaka bwa Afurika y’Epfo bigizwemo uruhare na Pasiteri n’ibindi. Ikiganiro kirambuye IGIHE: Mu mab@@ yiruka yawe wari umwana umeze ute? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Ndi umwana w’imfura iwacu, ariko nari umwana wan@@ aniye ababyeyi. Ababyeyi banjye bari b@@ ifashije rwose kuko Papa yakoraga muri Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda. Nak@@ uze ndi wa mwana ugira amanyanga ku buryo najyaga kwik@@ op@@ esha imigati kuri but@@ ike kandi mu rugo Mama ay@@ ikora, najyaga kwik@@ op@@ esha S@@ ard@@ ine kandi mu rugo twat@@ etse inyam@@ a. Iwacu bajyaga bamara kuryama umukozi twari dufite akam@@ by@@ utsa tukajya kurara mu kabari hariya i Nyamirambo tug@@ ataha mu gitondo. Ubu ababyeyi banjye n’abavandimwe baba muri Amerika, ariko umunsi bagendeye njye sinari mp@@ ari nari nar@@ aye mu kabari, nagiye kubasura bam@@ az@@ eyo imyaka 10. IGIHE: Bish@@ oboka bite ko umwana wo mu bakirisitu akora ibintu nk’ibyo ? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Ntabwo wak@@ wambara umwambaro w’umuntu uk@@ ijijwe ngo agakiza kak@@ uj@@ yeho, ntabwo agakiza kand@@ ura, ni ikintu umuntu y@@ imeny@@ era ku giti cye. Ababyeyi banjye bas@@ engeraga mu Itorero ry’@@ Abadivent@@ iste b’@@ Umunsi wa Kar@@ indwi, bany@@ igishije gusenga nubwo nageze aho nk@@ ananir@@ ana, byinshi mu byo nakoraga ntib@@ anab@@ imen@@ yag@@ a. IGIHE: Ababyeyi bawe iyo babonaga iyo myitwarire baby@@ ifat@@ agamo gute? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Umwana umeze gutyo ateza ibibazo, nat@@ eje ibibazo byinshi nar@@ akubiswe bihagije, mu rugo bar@@ ans@@ engeye bak@@ abwira n’abantu basenga ngo bans@@ engere bir@@ ananir@@ ana. IGIHE: W@@ igeze gufungirwa muri Gereza Nkuru ya Kigali, wari wakoze iki? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Nari mfite akazi keza ndi Umuc@@ ungamutungo muri BRD n@@ ahembw@@ aga amafaranga menshi, ariko nari mfite ikibazo cyo kut@@ anyurwa n’ubuzima mba@@ yeho. N@@ abagaho ubuzima buhenze cyane but@@ ajyanye n’amafaranga n@@ akoreraga b@@ injyana mu mad@@ eni, b@@ injyana mu kwambura no mu kubeshya nd@@ afatwa nd@@ afungwa. Icyo gihe mf@@ atwa nari mfite gahunda yo gutoroka ngo mv@@ e mu Rwanda n@@ igire muri Amerika. N@@ afunzwe nd@@ egwa kwigana umukono w’@@ Umuyobozi Mukuru wa B@@ RD@@ . IGIHE: Wari umaze igihe kingana gute ugerageza kwigana umukono we ? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Kuva nkiri umwana nari nzi kwigana is@@ inya, ndibuka ko najyaga n@@ igana is@@ inya ya Papa ku buryo iyo mwarimu yabaga yandikiye ababyeyi banjye kubera amakosa nabaga n@@ akoze, n@@ afataga ik@@ ayi nk@@ andikira mwarimu mu muk@@ ono wa Papa nar@@ angiza ng@@ asinya mu izina rya Pap@@ a. Ntabwo nari nziko bizan@@ kur@@ ikirana bik@@ ageza ubwo bim@@ f@@ ung@@ isha. Ikindi n@@ azize kwari ugutanga amash@@ eki (ch@@ è@@ qu@@ e) zit@@ azigam@@ iye. Ayo mafaranga yose yagendaga mu nzoga no mu bakobwa, kuko buri munsi nabaga mfite nk’@@ umukobwa umwe iwanjye kandi ntabwo yagend@@ erag@@ aho, yarar@@ yag@@ a, yarany@@ waga. Pasiteri Jean-@@ Désiré wo muri Zion Temple yavuze ku bikom@@ ere yatewe na bagenzi be mu murimo w'Imana IGIHE: W@@ aje kwakira agakiza gute? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Mu 2003 mf@@ unzwe nibwo nak@@ iriye agak@@ iza, ubusanzwe njye ibintu by’@@ abar@@ okore nar@@ aby@@ angaga cyane Yesu Kristo ubwe niwe wany@@ is@@ angiye. Mf@@ unguwe rero naje ndi umuntu mushya, nshaka kwibera mu rusengero. N@@ akoze umurimo w’Imana m@@ bwiriza ubutumwa bwiza. N@@ ajyaga m@@ bwiriza mu muhanda, nk@@ abwiriza mu modoka zitwara abagenzi, nari mfite umuhamagaro ukomeye ndi icy@@ arem@@ we gishy@@ a. IGIHE: Urugendo rwawe mu bar@@ okore rwari rw@@ ifashe gute? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Nagiye mu Itorero rya Zion Temple mu 2004 ari Imana iny@@ oherej@@ eyo, abayobozi b’@@ Itorero babona umuhamagaro wanjye bar@@ ans@@ engera mba Pasiteri mu mwaka wa 2011. N@@ abaye Pasiteri mu 2011, ariko bari bar@@ abanje kuny@@ ohereza kujya kuba Pasiteri wungirije mu Itorero rya Zion Temp@@ e i Butare, icyo gihe itorero ryari rifite ibibazo, pasiteri mukuru ntiy@@ umvikanaga na pasiteri wari umwungirije byari ibibazo bikomeye. Naje kugira ibyago umugore wanjye Anita Niy@@ uh@@ ire twari tumaranye amezi icyenda yicwa n’impanuka yabereye i Burundi, atwite umwana wacu w’@@ imf@@ ura. Pasiteri mukuru twakor@@ anaga ntiyari yarigeze aza kudus@@ ura kuva twagera i Butare, umugore wanjye n’umwana bamaze gupfa nabwo ntiyigeze adus@@ ura. IGIHE: Nyuma y’ibyo byag@@ o, ubuzima bw’@@ iy@@ ogezabutumwa bwakomeje gute? Ntabwo wigeze ucika integ@@ e? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Nyuma yo gushyingura umugore wanjye i Burundi kuko niho impanuka ye@@ b@@ ereye, n@@ agarutse ku murimo w’Imana ngiye gufungura ibiro n@@ akor@@ eragamo ku itorero, umunyamabanga wacu arambwira ati pasiteri mukuru yahinduye is@@ er@@ ire yaravuze ngo umurimo wari ufite aha war@@ arangiye uz@@ asubire ku bak@@ oh@@ ereje. N@@ agize agahinda g@@ akomeye, ndavuga nti mf@@ ushije umugore uyu niwe wak@@ amp@@ umurije none ar@@ anyir@@ uk@@ anye@@ ? IGIHE: Nibwo wahise uva mu gak@@ iza? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Nkunda kubibwira abantu ngo iyo uri umukirisitu usanzwe ukajya mu itorero ug@@ asenga uk@@ it@@ ahira burya ni byiza nt@@ ujye mu bintu by’@@ ubuyobozi. Kuko n@@ injiye mu buyobozi mbona ibintu ntigeze mbon@@ a, nkavuga nti ese burya ba bantu babwiriza baba mu bintu bimeze guty@@ a? IGIHE: Zion Temple yag@@ ufashije iki muri icyo gihe? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Ubuyobozi bwa Zion Temple bwahise buny@@ ohereza kwiga muri Afurika y’Epfo gukomeza amasomo aho nari nar@@ ize t@@ ewoloj@@ iya. Ng@@ ezeyo bar@@ ank@@ unda, barany@@ ishimira b@@ angirira umuyobozi w’@@ abanyeshuri, bampa n’akazi nd@@ igisha […] Iryo torero ryari riyobowe n’abaz@@ ungu naryo nasanze ririmo ibibazo, uw@@ ariy@@ oboraga yar@@ avugaga bose bagac@@ eceka ntihagire ut@@ inyuka kumubaza ati ibi ukora nib@@ iki? Kubera kwa kut@@ ihanganira amafuti kwanjye natangiye kujya m@@ ubwiza ukuri ku byo nabonaga bitari byiza akora, maze arany@@ anga kugeza ubwo yampaye amasaha 24 ngo mbe mvuye muri icyo gihugu, yany@@ ir@@ ukanye mu masaha y’@@ ijoro, mu mb@@ eho ikomeye yanga ko mfata n’ik@@ ote ryanjye ngo n@@ if@@ ubik@@ e. S@@ ingiye kuk@@ ubeshya buriya abakozi b’Imana biriya bibazo byo gucikamo ibice mu matorero harimo ibinyoma byinshi, harimo intambara zirenze n’iza politike harimo maf@@ ia. Njye rero ukuntu n@@ avutse mvuga ibintu uko biri. IGIHE: W@@ akomoje ku bibazo bibera mu mad@@ ini, ndakeka icyo cyari icya ikindi uhuye nacyo nyuma yo kwiruk@@ anwa. Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Mu bakozi b’Imana habamo intambara zirenze iz@@ iba mu bany@@ apolitike […] ubwo nar@@ aje ngeze mu Rwanda nsanga mu Itorero rya Zion Temple harimo bya bibazo byose mwagiye mwumva byabaye mu 2015. Nar@@ avuze nti ibi ni ib@@ iki? Ibintu byatumye ny@@ erera nk@@ agwa ni ibikom@@ ere, nari nsigaye njya mu rusengero s@@ imf@@ ashwe bigeze muri Kamena 2015 mbwira Imana nti mb@@ iv@@ uyemo. Nd@@ avuga nti nd@@ asubira mu byo nah@@ oz@@ emo, nd@@ asubira mu nzoga kandi n@@ inz@@ inywa nz@@ az@@ inywera ku mugaragaro. Ub@@ up@@ asiteri m@@ but@@ ereka hasi kuko nari nz@@ in@@ uts@@ we. Sin@@ ari kuba muri ubwo buzima ngo nk@@ omeze no kujya gusenga, ntabwo nab@@ iv@@ anga, ntabwo nab@@ ishobora kuko burya iyo ubaye gutyo nibura Imana iba izi aho ubar@@ izwa. IGIHE: Nyuma yo gupfusha umugore waba wongeye gushak@@ a? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Nar@@ ongeye nd@@ ashaka, umukobwa wabaga muri Canada, ariko twari dusanzwe tuz@@ iranye na cya gihe mf@@ unzwe yar@@ ans@@ uye. Mu 2014 nibwo twakoze ubukwe, ariko muh@@ isha ibikomere nari mfite by’@@ itorero. Tw@@ akoze ubukwe ntag@@ is@@ enga, nari nsigaye ns@@ enga ku cyumweru ng@@ ezaho nabyo nd@@ abir@@ eka. Urugo rwanjye rw@@ apfuye mu cyumweru cya mbere cy’@@ ubukwe kuko naho nag@@ iriyemo ibikomere m@@ bih@@ isha mad@@ amu, ank@@ om@@ eretsa nawe atabizi bituma muz@@ in@@ uk@@ wa. N@@ ash@@ id@@ utse ntak@@ im@@ ukunda nkuko namuk@@ und@@ aga, yoh@@ erezaga impapuro ngo njye muri Canada ng@@ ataha nas@@ inze nkaz@@ ica, naz@@ iciye inshuro enye, ubwo ni imyaka ine. Nagiye mu nzoga nyinshi, njya mu busambanyi bwinshi cyane. Muri ibyo bibazo byose nta mupasiteri n’umwe wan@@ sh@@ atse, washaka intama yaz@@ imiye gute se kandi muri mu mat@@ ik@@ u? Abany@@ itayeho ni abo ntacy@@ ek@@ aga. Nyuma yo gukora ubukwe umugore wanjye yasubiye kuba muri Canada, yaje kugaruka nyuma arambwira ati bambwiye ko w@@ anc@@ iye inyuma n’abagore bensh@@ i? Nd@@ amubwira nti yaba umwe, baba ijana wowe emera ko nag@@ uciye inyuma kandi ndag@@ usaba imbabazi. N@@ abim@@ ubwiye nshaka kumw@@ ikiza kuko numvaga twat@@ anduk@@ ana. Gat@@ anya bay@@ id@@ uhaye umwaka ushize mu kwezi kwa munani. IGIHE: W@@ anyuzemo mu bihe bitoroshye. Uk@@ ura he imbaraga zo gutanga ubuhamya nk’@@ ub@@ u? Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ ig@@ a: Twese turacy@@ ubakwa nta muntu wajya hariya ngo avuge ngo we byar@@ arangiye Imana yamaze gusiga amar@@ ang@@ i, oya twese turi inzu icy@@ ubakw@@ a. Ikibazo rero abantu bagira ni uko abapasiteri bamwe bat@@ igaragaza uko bari bigatuma abantu bibwira ko ari abantu batajya bakora ibyaha. H@@ ave have bar@@ abikora ahubwo ni uko batajya ba@@ byat@@ ura. Kubaho mu kinyoma bir@@ avun@@ a, iyo ut@@ abaye wowe ntub@@ ohoka kandi nt@@ un@@ akira. Hari abantu bazi ko n@@ ugera mu rusengero wib@@ om@@ bar@@ ika, wagera hanze ukaba undi muntu. Iyo rero ufite amasura abiri n’imbere y’Imana uba uri “@@ f@@ ak@@ e” numva njye kubaho mu kuri aribyo byoroshye, kubaho mu kinyoma nibyo bih@@ enze. Mu mpera za 2018 nibwo Pasiteri Ntaw@@ in@@ iga yongeye kwakira agak@@ iza, agaruka mu murimo w’Imana abifashijwemo n’umuntu w’inshuti ye. Avuga ko Yesu ariwe wongeye kumus@@ anga, am@@ uvura ibikomere byose yari afite, ko atagomba kureba abantu. Ati "@@ Yam@@ bwiye ko ntagomba kureba abana b’@@ abantu kuko ariwe wenyine wany@@ itor@@ anyir@@ ije, kandi ko ubu igihe cyanjye cyo gukora ny@@ ag@@ ukora aribwo kig@@ eze. Maf@@ ia mu mad@@ in@@ i! Tour du Rwanda: U@@ guhangana kud@@ asanzwe hagati ya Mugisha wambaye umuhondo na Ndayisenga Valens Tour du Rwanda 2018 igeze hagati ndetse umwenda w’@@ umuhondo ur@@ acyari mu bitugu by’@@ Umunyarwanda Mugisha Samuel, ariko umwuka si mwiza hagati ye na Ndayisenga Valens ashinja gushaka kuw@@ umw@@ ambura nyamara we yaram@@ ufashije kwegukana iri siganwa mu 2016. Ubusanzwe mu mukino w’amagare nta w@@ igira kabone n’iyo yaba umuhanga gut@@ e, bisaba ko afatanya na bagenzi be bagakora nk’ikipe cyane cyane mu kun@@ aniza abo bahanganye kugira ngo intsinzi ibon@@ eke. Abanyarwanda bakunze gufashanya muri Tour du Rwanda hatitawe ku ikipe buri mukinnyi yitabiriye irushanwa ahagar@@ arar@@ iye, kuko babikoze mu 2016 Ndayisenga Valens akinira Dimension data yo muri Afurika y’Epfo akar@@ yeguk@@ ana, n’umwaka ushize barab@@ isubira bafasha Areruya Joseph wakiniraga Dimension Dat@@ a. Uyu mwaka Mugisha Samuel, kapiteni wa Team Rwanda, yambaye umwenda w’@@ umuhondo ku munsi wa kabiri nyuma yo kwegukana agace kav@@ aga i Kigali k@@ ajya i Huye, gusa yij@@ uj@@ utiye ko umwe mu bakinnyi bakomeye muri uyu mukino, Valens Ndayis@@ enga, ari kumus@@ atira cyane aho kumufasha ngo ats@@ inde iri rushanwa. Mu gace ka Gatatu k’@@ irushanwa kav@@ aga i Huye k@@ ajya i Musanze kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Ndayisenga ukinira Equ@@ ipe De PO@@ C Côte De Lum@@ ière yo mu Bufaransa, yamus@@ atiriye cyane ashaka kujya gutsinda ndetse no kureba niba yamw@@ ambura umwenda w’umuh@@ ondo. No kuri uyu wa Gatatu mu gace kav@@ aga i Musanze k@@ ajya i Karongi byongeye kubaho bituma Mugisha agaragaza kutishimira uko mugenzi we ari kwitwara ndetse atangaza ko niba ashaka ko bahangana ariko bigiye kugenda. Yabwiye itangazamakuru ati “Ntabwo urugendo rw’uyu munsi rwag@@ enze neza kuko hajemo guhangana no kud@@ ashaka gufat@@ anya. Ibyo byabaye umwaka ushize ntabwo byari bikwiye kongera kuba uyu mwaka. Ntabwo n@@ iyumvisha uburyo Valens [@@ Ndayis@@ eng@@ a] yashaka ko ns@@ igar@@ a, uriya muny@@ a-@@ Ethiopia ay@@ itwaye ntabwo baririmba Rwanda Nz@@ iza, kuba akinira ikipe yo mu Bufaransa ntibivuze ko atari Umunyarwand@@ a.” Yakomeje agira ati “@@ Sinzi impamvu yiy@@ umvisha ko adashobora kumfasha kandi nawe izo yatwaye baram@@ ufash@@ ije, ntabwo w@@ atsinda uri wenyin@@ e.” Mugisha yakomeje asobanura uko yah@@ anganye na Ndayisenga ati “Y@@ at@@ akaga ng@@ asigara njyeny@@ ine, abakinnyi banjye basigaye inyuma, urumva ko nta kindi nari gukora nahise n@@ ishyiramo ko atagomba kuns@@ iga kuko n’abandi bari kugenda kandi nd@@ abas@@ iga amasegonda 21, byabaye akazi katoroshye ariko ndashima Imana yampaye imbaraga sin@@ s@@ igar@@ e.” Mugisha avuga ko nyuma yo kubona uruhande Ndayisenga ariho nawe yiteguye kugira ngo bahang@@ ane kandi yizeye ko az@@ afatanya na bagenzi be bak@@ itwara neza. Ndayisenga Valens we aganira n’abanyamakuru, yavuze ko yaje mu Rwanda aje gutsinda ndetse aramutse abonye uko yambara umwenda w’@@ umuhondo nta kabuza ya@@ wambar@@ a, yongeraho ko ibyo akora byose ari ibyo aba yasabwe n’umutoza we. Yagize ati “Ntabwo tubikora ngo duh@@ angane na Mugisha ahubwo tur@@ akora dukurikije ibyo abatoza bat@@ ubwiye. Mb@@ onye umwenda w’@@ umuhondo naw@@ ufata. Gahunda dufite [@@ nka Equ@@ ipe De PO@@ C Côte De Lum@@ iè@@ re@@ ] ni ukw@@ egukana Tour du Rwanda. Niba abatoza bo b@@ ivugiye bati ntihagire umuntu wongera kureba ku Mun@@ yarwanda, icyo gihe wakora iki ? Biba bic@@ anga umuntu. ” Abajijwe niba abona bishoboka ko Mugisha yaz@@ ag@@ umana umwenda w’@@ umuhondo kugera ku munsi wa nyuma, yagize ati “@@ Mugisha ameze neza, yar@@ it@@ oje uko bamw@@ ataka kose ndabizi neza az@@ itwara neza kandi umwenda w’@@ umuhondo az@@ aw@@ egukana ndamw@@ iz@@ eye@@ ." Kugeza ubu Mugisha aracy@@ ambaye umwenda w’umuh@@ ondo, asiga Uwizeye Jean Claude ukin@@ ana na Ndayisenga n’@@ Umunya-@@ Ethiopia Hail@@ em@@ ich@@ ael Mul@@ u amasegonda 0@@ :@@ 21@@ " akar@@ usha L@@ oz@@ ano RIB@@ A David wa Team Nov@@ o Nor@@ dis@@ k umunota 01@@ ’@@ 5@@ 1@@ ’@@ ’, agas@@ iga Dor@@ ing Jonas wa Team Des@@ c@@ art@@ es Rom@@ and@@ ie iminota 02@@ ’@@ 10@@ ’’ naho Ndayisenga Valens wa gatandatu akamus@@ iga iminota 02@@ ’@@ 13@@ ’’. Tour du Rwanda iz@@ akor@@ em@@ ereza i Rubavu mu gace kaz@@ ahagurukira i Karongi kuri uyu wa Kane kar@@ eshya na kilometero 9@@ 5,@@ 1 kuwa Gatanu hakaz@@ akinwa agace ka Rubav@@ u-@@ Kinigi kar@@ eshya 10@@ 8,@@ 5 km@@ , kuwa Gatandatu hakin@@ we agace ka Musanz@@ e- Kigali (@@ imbere ya M@@ IC@@ ) kar@@ eshya na 10@@ 7,@@ 4 km naho ku Cyumweru ris@@ ozwe hakinwa agace ka Kigali (Stade Amahoro@@ )@@ - Kigali (@@ Nyamiramb@@ o) ka 8@@ 2,@@ 2 km@@ . Abana bo muri Afurika y’Epfo mu rugendo berekeza mu Misiri mu ndege bikoreye Indege yakozwe n’ing@@ imbi n’ab@@ angavu bo muri Afurika y’Epfo iri gukora urugendo rwo kuva mu mujyi wa Cape Town muri iki gihugu yerekeza i Cairo mu murwa mukuru wa Misiri ndetse yamaze guhagarara bwa mbere muri Namibia mu rugendo rwayo nta kibazo ig@@ ize. Bavuga ko biz@@ abafata ibyumweru bitandatu mu kurangiza urwo rugendo rwa kilometero 1@@ 2000 rw@@ erekeza mu Misiri. Iyo ndege y’iby@@ icaro bine yo mu bwoko bwa Sl@@ ing 4 yater@@ anyijwe n’itsinda ry’@@ abanyeshuri 20 bakomoka mu miryango y’@@ amikoro atandukanye. Ariko ubu barany@@ ishimiye cyan@@ e". Meg@@ an ni we watangije umushinga wo gukora iyo ndege, ndetse abandi bo muri iryo tsinda baj@@ onj@@ owe mu bakandida barenga 1000 bari bab@@ isab@@ ye. Rayon Sports yanyagiye Espoir FC, igabanya amanota yarush@@ waga na APR FC (Amafoto) Ibitego bibiri byatsinzwe na Bizimana Yannick n’ikindi cya Mugisha Gilbert byafashije Rayon Sports gutsinda Espoir FC 3-0 mu mukino w’umunsi wa Shampiyona wabereye kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu. Rayon Sports yab@@ uraga benshi mu bakinnyi babanza mu kibuga uhereye mu izamu ryar@@ imo Mazimpaka Andr@@ é, yabanj@@ emo myugariro w’@@ iburyo Iradukunda Ax@@ el w’imyaka 17 nyuma y’uko Rad@@ u afite amakarita atatu y’umuh@@ ondo. Ku munota wa gatatu w’umukino, iyi kipe yambara ubururu n’@@ umweru yafunguye amazamu ku gitego cyatsinzwe na Bizimana Yannick ku mupira yahawe na O@@ um@@ ar Sid@@ ib@@ é. Bizimana Yannick yatsinze ikindi gitego cya kabiri ku munota wa 25, ku mupira wahind@@ uwe na Sekamana Max@@ ime, ar@@ oba umunyezamu Nd@@ ikur@@ iyo Patient wahise ugira ikibazo gikomeye, asimburwa nyuma y’iminota irindwi yamaze yitabwaho n’abaganga. Hab@@ ura iminota itanu ngo umukino ur@@ angire, Mugisha Gilbert yatsindiye Rayon Sports igitego cya gatatu ku ishoti rikomeye yat@@ ereye muri metero nka 25. Gutsinda uyu mukino byatumye Rayon Sports igira amanota 38 ku mwanya wa kabiri, irushwa amanota ane gusa na APR FC ya mbere. Indi mikino yabaye uyu munsi yasize Etincelles FC ing@@ anyije na APR FC igitego 1-1 mu gihe Heroes FC yanganyije na Marines FC ubusa ku busa. Urugendo rwa Jess@@ e, umwe mu nkingi z@@ azamuye abanyamakuru bakomeye mu Rwanda (Video) J@@ esse Max@@ ella Kiy@@ ingi, wamenyekanye nka ‘D@@ a’ African Son@@ ’ ku maradiyo atandukanye mu gihugu uhereye kuri Radio Flash FM, Contact FM, K@@ FM, Royal FM na Kiss F@@ M@@ ; ni umwe mu bafatwa nk’@@ inkingi ya mwamba mu itangazamakuru ryo mu Rwanda bitewe n’uruhare rwe mu kugaragaza impano nshya. Yam@@ enyekanye cyane mu biganiro byo mu rurimi rw’@@ icyongereza, abenshi bamw@@ ibukira ku cyitwa ‘@@ Break@@ f@@ ast in the c@@ it@@ y’ na ‘@@ E@@ as@@ y Sund@@ ay@@ ’ kuri Radio Flash akaba muri kamere ye umuntu uc@@ isha make udakunda kugaragara mu ruhame ahubwo ‘@@ wih@@ ug@@ irah@@ o’. Yavukiye muri Uganda, akura ar@@ ota kuba umunyamategeko kurusha uko yakw@@ iga ibijyanye na siy@@ ansi. Gusa, yaje kwisanga muri Makerere University yiga ibijyanye n’ubukungu kuko yatekerezaga ko nabyo byaz@@ amuh@@ esha kuba umuntu wiy@@ ubash@@ ye. Uko yinjiye mu itangazamakuru@@ … J@@ esse asobanura ko ubwo yigaga ibijyanye n’@@ ubukungu, mu kiruhuko yaje gusoma mu kinyamakuru ko hari amahirwe ku bashaka kwiga ibijyanye na radiyo na televiz@@ iyo@@ ; aby@@ injiramo gutyo. Ati “Nyuma yaho, umuntu yaje kumbwira ngo ufite ijwi ry@@ iza, wakora kuri rad@@ iyo. Nt@@ angira gukora kuri radiyo mu biruhuko n’ikindi gihe nabaga ndi ku ishuri. Kuva ubwo sind@@ ar@@ ivamo. Nari nkiri muto, umunsi umwe umuntu yakunze ijwi ryanjye, aza kund@@ eba kuri radiyo turag@@ anira gusa yahise ajya mu Bwongereza, turakomeza tur@@ avug@@ ana. Ni we wam@@ bwiye ngo nz@@ aze gusura umuryango we mu Rwanda.” Mu 2005 ubwo yazaga gusura umuryango w’umuntu wakunze ijwi rye amw@@ umvise kuri rad@@ iyo, yari akiri umunyesh@@ uri, gusa akundwa n’uwo muryango umusaba kuba yag@@ uma mu Rwanda ariko an@@ akomeza amasomo ye muri Uganda. Ni umwe mu batangiye kuri radiyo bahembwa agatubutse Mu gihe itangazamakuru ryari rig@@ icum@@ bagira bih@@ ambaye, J@@ esse yatangiye akora kuri Radio Flash mu 2005, ahembwa amafaranga ibihumbi 25@@ 0. Ni mu gihe ahandi hari hig@@ anje abakorerabushake n’abah@@ embwa ay’@@ int@@ ica ntik@@ ize nk’@@ ibihumbi 30 Frw cyangwa 50. Ati “Mu 2005, guhembwa ibihumbi 250 Frw kuri rad@@ iyo, ndakeka nari umwe muri ba bantu bahembwa neza. Ndibuka bagenzi banjye bah@@ embwaga 20, 30 abandi bakorera ubuntu. Icyo gihe naje hano, Radio Flash FM iram@@ bwira ngo ir@@ amp@@ emba ibihumbi 250 Frw, ndavuga nti ni amafaranga meza nanjye yam@@ fasha kwib@@ eshaho ns@@ ubiye muri Ugand@@ a.” Aha ni mu mpera za 2017 ubwo yashyikir@@ izwaga igihembo cyagenewe Radio Kiss FM nk'@@ iya kabiri ikunzwe mu gihugu Ikinyarwanda cyabaye imbogamizi Mu myaka ya mbere mu Rwanda, asobanura ko yari acumbitse mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku Gisozi. Ngo umunsi umwe, yageze ku Kin@@ amba ahasanga icyapa cya MTN cy@@ anditseho ijambo ‘@@ Bit@@ e?@@ ’ Ibyo byatumye yibaza icyo bisoban@@ uye, abis@@ anisha n’icy@@ ongereza ku ijambo ‘@@ bit@@ e’ [@@ kur@@ uma ukoresheje ameny@@ o@@ ]. Ati “B@@ yansabye nk’@@ imyaka itatu kugira ngo nt@@ angire nib@@ one mu Kinyarwanda, ng@@ ikund@@ e. Numvaga n@@ akomeza kuvuga icyongereza, kuko sin@@ atekereza ko nz@@ amara imyaka myinshi mu Rwanda.” Nk’@@ umwe mu bantu bamaze igihe kinini mu itangazamakuru ryo mu Rwanda, asobanura ko ir@@ ijyanye na radiyo r@@ yahindutse cyane uhereye ku buryo amajwi asigaye asohok@@ a, ndetse big@@ ahur@@ irana n’uko hari ihangana ku murimo. Mu Rwanda hagiye kubera igiterane ngarukamwaka ‘@@ Abagore twese hamwe 2014@@ ' (@@ All Women T@@ og@@ eth@@ er 201@@ 4) kigiye kuba ku nshuro ya 4. Nk'uko byatangajwe na Apostle Alice Mig@@ non@@ ne Kabera, Umuyobozi mukuru wa Women Foundation Ministri@@ es, ngo kino giterane uyu mwaka gifite umwihariko. Yagize ati: "@@ Umwaka wa 2014, ni igihe Imana ishaka ko Umugore w'@@ umush@@ un@@ emu y@@ ubakira icyumba umuhanuzi El@@ isha. Yatanze icy@@ umba, abona umwana, ibye birar@@ ind@@ wa, ndetse n'igihe umwana yapfuye, yaraz@@ utse kubw'@@ icyumba yat@@ anze. (2 Abami 4:@@ 8). Uy@@ umunsi Imana ntid@@ usaba ibyumba by'@@ amazu yacu, ahubwo ir@@ adusaba ko tuy@@ isubiza mu mitima yacu, ibyacu byari byar@@ apfuye bikongera kubaho. Iki giterane kikaz@@ amara iminsi 4, aho buri munsi kizajya gitangira saa kumi z'umugoroba (16@@ h00@@ /@@ 4@@ p@@ m) kik@@ ageza saa tatu z'@@ ijoro, kibera kuri Women Foundation Ministries Kimih@@ urura. Abari gutegura iki giterane bakaba badutangarije ko Pastor Ev@@ ah Mug@@ erwa wo muri Uganda, uzwi ku buhamya bw@@ ubaka abari n'abat@@ egarug@@ uri cyane nawe azaba ari muri iki giter@@ ane. Uretse abashyitsi bat@@ urus@@ te hanze bazaba bahari bonyine, ahubwo hazaba hari n'abagore ndeste n'abakobwa bat@@ urus@@ te mu ntara zose z'u Rwanda bazatanga ubuhamya bwabo bwo kuva mu guts@@ ikam@@ irwa ujya mu bus@@ t@@ inzi. Hari n'abaz@@ afasha mu guhimbaza Imana no kuyir@@ amya bazitabira muri iki giterane harimo Worship team ya Women Foundation Ministries izwi ku izina rya pr@@ ec@@ ious st@@ ones n'abandi b@@ esh@@ i. Nk'uko buri mwaka biba bimeze, intumbero n'@@ intego y'@@ igiterane ikaba ari "@@ Kuva mu gus@@ t@@ ikam@@ irwa tujya mu bus@@ t@@ inz@@ i" naho insanganyamatsiko ikaba "@@ Umwami Mana yatanze itegeko abagore bam@@ amaza inkuru baba bensh@@ i" biboneka mu gitabo cya Zaburi 6@@ 8:@@ 12. Iki giterane "@@ All Women T@@ og@@ eth@@ er 2014@@ " kikaz@@ atangira kuva kuwa kabiri tariki 29@@ th Nyakanga 2014 kugeza kuwa Gatanu tariki ya mbere Kanama 2014. Umum@@ arar@@ ungu, ni umubyeyi w'abana babiri. Ati "@@ Ab@@ anjye bavuka bafite amaz@@ ina. Uyu mubyeyi avuga ko iterambere r@@ yahinduye iny@@ umv@@ ire, n'abantu bakaba bategura ibirori by'@@ umwana babanje kuby@@ itegura neza nta k@@ ibih@@ utisha kandi bigakorwa uko ababyeyi baby@@ ifuza. Avuga ko aba@@ bishoboye bak@@ ubahiriza ya minsi umunani, ariko kuri we ngo in@@ arenze nta kibazo ab@@ ibon@@ amo. H@@ ambere ababaga bitabiriye umunsi wo kwita izina babikor@@ aga ban@@ ifuriza umubyeyi gukomeza kwagura umuryango ak@@ abyara ibitsina byombi, ariko ubu umubyeyi agomba kubyara azirikana niba umutungo uz@@ amufasha kurera abo aby@@ aye. Kuri ubu abenshi bahitamo kugabanya iminsi mikuru yo gusesagura nk'uko bamwe bab@@ idutangar@@ ije, bagahitamo guhuza iminsi mikuru bakorera umwana wabo nko kum@@ ubat@@ ir@@ isha n'indi bakab@@ ikorera rimwe no '@@ kwita izin@@ a'. Bah@@ angayikishijwe n'ab@@ itwa "@@ Int@@ arag@@ ahang@@ a" ba@@ bategera mu nzira bakabah@@ ohotera Abatuye i Mw@@ ili mu Karere ka Kayonza ngo bahangayikishijwe n'ab@@ itwa "@@ Int@@ arag@@ ahang@@ a" bategera abaturage mu nzira bak@@ abamb@@ ura ibyo bafite bakan@@ abah@@ ohot@@ era. Abo bantu bazwi ku izina ry'@@ Int@@ arag@@ ahanga ngo bah@@ ohotera cyane abaturage bo mu tugari twa Kag@@ eyo na Nyamug@@ ali kandi bakabah@@ ohotera ku manywa y'@@ ihang@@ u. Bakam@@ urera wigeze guhohoterwa n'@@ int@@ arag@@ ahanga ngo yifuza ko igih@@ uru ziba@@ mo cyat@@ em@@ wa. Abaturage b'i Kag@@ eyo bavuga ko Int@@ arag@@ ahanga ziba mu gace kitwa R@@ yamut@@ umo kagizwe n'imy@@ obo y'@@ ibir@@ ombe by@@ acuk@@ urw@@ agamo amabuye y'agaciro bik@@ ikijwe n'ibih@@ uru impande n'@@ imp@@ ande. Ngo zih@@ isha muri iyo my@@ obo n'ibih@@ uru z@@ itegereje abaturage banyura muri ako gace ngo ziba@@ m@@ bure ibyo bafite, ariko zik@@ ibasira cyane ab'@@ igitsina gore nk'uko abo twavuganye bab@@ idutangar@@ ije. F@@ ere@@ d@@ iyana Baz@@ im@@ az@@ iki agira ati "@@ Int@@ arag@@ ahanga ni abantu tut@@ azi, gusa urah@@ anyura bak@@ akw@@ ambura ndetse n'umubyeyi uh@@ anyuze aba akeka ko bari bumug@@ irire nab@@ i." Abaturage bahangayikishijwe n'@@ int@@ arag@@ ahanga zibah@@ ohot@@ era. Mukand@@ amutsa Mar@@ igar@@ ita na we yungamo agira ati "Iyo tuvuye kuri SACCO ud@@ ateze moto, bakw@@ ambura amafaranga bak@@ akug@@ irira nab@@ i." Ikibazo cy'@@ izo Nt@@ arag@@ ahanga ngo kimaze amezi agera kuri ane nk'uko abaturage twavuganye bab@@ id@@ uham@@ ir@@ ije. Bavuga ko z@@ ibas@@ ubiza mu bukene kuko umuturage unyuze muri ako gace ziba@@ mo avuye kubikuza amafaranga kuri Sacco atay@@ ageza mu rugo. Bakam@@ urera Aur@@ el@@ ia wigeze guhohoterwa n'@@ Int@@ arag@@ ahanga agira ati "Tw@@ ifuza ko hakorwa umuganda bagat@@ ema ibyo bih@@ uru kuko abo bantu bih@@ isha muri ibyo bih@@ uru n'imy@@ obo@@ ." Mukand@@ amutsa kimwe n'abandi baturage bavuganye na Kigali Today, bo basaba ko muri ako gace k@@ abamo Int@@ arag@@ ahanga hashyirwa abantu barinda umutekano kugira ngo abaturage bajye bah@@ anyura ntacyo bik@@ anga. Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kayonza, John Mug@@ abo, na we yemera ko izo nt@@ arag@@ ahanga zihari ariko akavuga ko bazih@@ aguruk@@ iye. Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kayonza, Mugabo John, avuga ko abo bantu bah@@ ohotera abaturage ari ababa mu birombe bagamije kwiba amabuye y'agaciro ku buryo iyo bahuye n'@@ umuturage uba@@ zi bamug@@ irira nabi kuko baba banga ko y@@ abav@@ uga. Gusa ngo ubuyobozi bw'akarere bufat@@ anyije n'ibigo bic@@ ukura amabuye y'agaciro bugenda bufata bamwe muri izo Nt@@ arag@@ ahanga bak@@ igishwa bakan@@ ahabwa akazi, bamara guhabwa akazi "@@ bakavuga bagenzi babo ku buryo bari gufatwa buh@@ or@@ ob@@ uh@@ oro@@ " nk'uko umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kayonza abivuga.
Eddy Kenzo yasuye inzu ye y@@ aban@@ agamo n’umugore we wat@@ wawe n’undi mugabo asanga yatwaye ibintu byo mu nzu birimo na Televiziyo ya rut@@ ur@@ a@@ [AMAFOTO] Rema yakoze ubukwe n’umugabo witwa Ham@@ za w’umuk@@ ire nawe wo mugihugu cya Uganda, ubu bari mu kwezi kwa buk@@ i. Eddy Kenzo ntiyari ak@@ ibana na Rem@@ a, imyaka 2 yari igiye gush@@ ira, uyu mugore yib@@ ana wenyine mu nzu ya Eddy K@@ enz@@ o. Uyu mugore yatangaje ko impamvu yanze Eddy Kenzo agash@@ akana nundi mugabo ariko ngo Kenzo yari yaramut@@ aye mu nzu wenyine, akaba atar@@ an@@ akoraga inshingano ze nk’umugabo murug@@ o. Eddy Kenzo nawe ashinja uyu wahoze ari umugore ko ari umugore wakund@@ aga, ibintu kurusha abazima n’abapf@@ uye kuburyo Kenzo atari ak@@ ibashije kubana nawe, avugako yamut@@ akaz@@ agaho arenga mill@@ ioni 3 mu@@ cyumweru kimwe gusa. Eddy Kenzo wari war@@ ataye Rema mu nzu amus@@ igana n’umw@@ ana, yongeye gusubira aho bab@@ anaga, ngo icy@@ amut@@ unguye ni uburyo yas@@ anze, inzu yaras@@ ahuwe ndetse ngo uyu mugore yahereye kuri televiziyo nini yabaga muri Sal@@ o.
